Matthew: Ade Yesu Kristo kĩ ɛnyɛ Dawid ɔwa, kĩ Dawid lɛmɛ nyɛ Abraham ɔwa a bawanyɔ kasinu buĩ nɛ awĩ a.
Kito Abraham akũ kɛyawo Lɛgã Dawid akũ bawanyɔ a kama kamɛ nyɛ Abraham ma Isak, Isak ma Yakob,
ade Yakob ma Yuda mɔ bawaɛ̃nyole a. Yuda mɔ ɔtsɔ̃ Tamai ma Perez mɔ Zera. Perez ma Hezron, Hezron lɛmɛ ma Aram.
Aram ma Aminadab, Aminadab ma Naheson,
ade Naheson ma Salmon a. Salmon mɔ Rahab ma Boaz, ade Boaz mɔ Rut ma Obed a. Obed ma Isai,
ade Isai lɛmɛ ma Lɛgã Dawid a.
Kito Dawid akũ kɛnawo lɔkɔ a kĩ bipili Israelfɔ ndom bɛnamɛna Babilonia tite akũ a ni, ade bawanyɔ a kasinu buĩ nɛ awĩ a.
Dawid mɔ otsole a kĩ kufɛ ɛnyɛ Uria ɔtsɔ̃ a ma Salomo.
Salomo ma Rehoboam, Rehoboam ma Abiya, Abyia ma Asa.
Asa ma Yosafat, Yosafat ma Yoram, Yoram ma Uziya.
Uziya ma Yotan, Yotan ma Ahaz, Ahaz lɛmɛ ma Hezekiya.
Hezekiya ma Manase, Manase ma Amon, Amon ma Yosiya,
ade Yosiya ma Yekoniya mɔ ye bawaɛ̃nyole a.
Kito Israelfɔ kamuniki kato Babilonia kɛyawo Yesu kama lɔkɔ a, bawanyɔ a kasinu buĩ nyɛ Yekoniya ma Sealtiel, Sealtiel ma Zerubabel,
Zerubabel lɛmɛ ma Abihud. Abihud ma Elyakim, Elyakim ma Azur,
ade Azur ma Zadok, Zadok ma Akim, Akim lɛmɛ ma Elihud.
Elihud ma Eleazar, Eleazar ma Matan, ade Matan ma Yakob.
Yakob ma Yosef a kĩ ɛkɔã Maria a, kĩ ɛma Yesu a kĩ bavɛ Kristo a.

Foesũ kito Abraham akũ kɛyawo Dawid akũ ni, bawanyɔ ewua-ana lɛna nɛ kasinu a kamɛ. Ade kĩ kito Dawid akũ kɛnawo lɔkɔ a kĩ Babiloniafɔ pili Israelfɔ ndom bɛnamɛna be tite akũ a, bawanyɔ ewua-ana lɛna nɛ kasinu a kamɛ. Kĩ kito lɔkɔ a na kɛyawo Kristo kama ni, bawanyɔ ewua-ana lɛna nɛ kasinu a na lɛmɛ kamɛ.
Ade ayekĩ Yesu Kristo kama fɔlɛtsa a ya nɛ foe kamɛ a nɛ awĩ a. Bitinya ɔma Maria bɛkpa Yosef, lɛmɛ fɔmɔ baapi ye a, Maria mɔ́ eyi ɔsũ kĩ ɛtsɛ̃mɔ kɔma kĩ kuto Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ.
Ayekĩ Yosef nyɛ oti kpĩĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ, ade ɛtáwɛ kĩ yado Maria kɔnyɔã nɛ bati anɛ sũ ni, ɛwɛ kĩ yasĩ ye nɛ kabɛla kamɛ.
Kĩ ɛkakɔna fukĩĩ akũ a, boe Ɔlate a ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ odi nyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa ye nɛ kɔda kamɛ, ebi ye kĩ, “Yosef, Dawid obi, tavila Maria kakɔã, kitonɛkĩ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kɔma a to.
Yaama obinyole, ote ye dĩ kĩ Yesu, kitonɛkĩ ye aanyɛ ye bati etomɛna tɔkpa kamɛ.”
Fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ flee ya nɛ foe kamɛ, ayekĩ lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi ɛtsãmɛna ye onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ akũ a fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ kĩ,
“Oyitsɔ̃ kĩ enyína onyole aatsãmɔ kɔma, ɛma obinyole. Baavɛ ye Imanuel,” kĩ de kayɔ nyɛ, “Baguma deĩ mɔ boe.”
Foesũ kĩ Yosef nyinya a, ɛkɔã Maria ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ bi ye a.
Lɛmɛ Yosef mɔ Maria táta mɔ akũ ndɛ ɔtsɔ̃ mɔ ɔnyɔ aye, kɛnawo lɔkɔ a kĩ ɛma ye obinyole a. Ade Yosef te ye dĩ kĩ Yesu a.
Bɛma Yesu nɛ Betlehem nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ Herodes kanya lɛgã nɛ Yudea tite akũ a. Owi tábuna mɔ banyole badi kĩ bɛkɔlɛ fɔtsa nɛ fusibii kadã akũ to suwa kadekɔ̃ bɛya nɛ Yerusalem,
ade bɛyavia kĩ, “Ndia bɛma obisɛ̃ a kĩ yaanya Yudafɔ lɛgã a? Bɔmɔ́ ye lisibii kĩ lide nɛ suwa kadekɔ̃, ade bɔya kĩ bɔ́asum ye a.”
Kĩ Lɛgã Herodes nu fukĩĩ a, ɔwɔlɛ bɔlɛ ye mɔ odi nyɛ odi nɛ Yerusalem a.
Foesũ ɛvɛ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ mbla batsanɛ a flee ɛkpɔta evia be kĩ, “Nɛ ndia baama Kristo a?”
Bɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nɛ Betlehem nɛ Yudea tite akũ, kitonɛkĩ ade lɛtsa kĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ tsɛlɛ eyi kĩ,
‘Nɔ Betlehem nɛ Yuda tite akũ,
nnɛ́ ɔmatɔ kabii kɔlaa anɛ
nɛ Yuda tɛmatɔ tɛkpale tɛkpale a kamɛ.
Kitonɛkĩ nɔ kamɛ mɔ ɔkpãnɛ a kĩ,
yaakpã yĩ bati Israelfɔ a aanɛ eto.’ ”
Foesũ Herodes vɛ anyansãfɔ a kĩ bito suwa kadekɔ̃ a ɛnamɛna kabɛlakɔ̃, ade evia be lɔkɔ paa a kĩ lisibii a nɛ a.
Ke liti a, ɛnyɛ be osi kĩ bɛnaa Betlehem mɔ ɔlɛdo kĩ, “Minaawɛ obisɛ̃ a kawɛ wĩ. Ntɛ mimɔ́ ye ni, mifɔ̃ ĩnyi lɔkɔa yĩ malo nnaasum ye.”
Foesũ bɛdzakũ, ade kĩ banaa nɛ osi a, bɛmɔ́ lisibii mɔapɛ a kĩ bɛmɔ́ nɛ suwa kadekɔ̃ a. Kĩ bɛmɔ́ de lɔmɔ a, kawɔlɛ de be paa. Lɛnya be lɔtɔ tĩĩ lɛnafɔ̃ lɛdza nɛ kakɔ a kĩ obisɛ̃ a deĩ a lɔlɔ nyangɛ.
Foesũ bɛdzakũ, ade kĩ banaa nɛ osi a, bɛmɔ́ lisibii mɔapɛ a kĩ bɛmɔ́ nɛ suwa kadekɔ̃ a. Kĩ bɛmɔ́ de lɔmɔ a, kawɔlɛ de be paa. Lɛnya be lɔtɔ tĩĩ lɛnafɔ̃ lɛdza nɛ kakɔ a kĩ obisɛ̃ a deĩ a lɔlɔ nyangɛ.
Kĩ biwo nɛ kɔla a kamɛ a, bɛmɔ́ obisɛ̃ a mɔ ɔma Maria, ade bike aduli bisum ye a. Bibinya be futetsa a kĩ fɔnyɛ sika ngbã, lifii mɔ klubɔũ bɛkpa ye.
Baguma nyɛ ɛtsa be nɛ kɔda kamɛ kĩ bɛtabuki bɛnaa Herodes sɛkɛ̃, foesũ bimuniki bɛtsã osi bɛbã bɛdzakũ bɛnaa ɔtɔ.

Kĩ anyansãfɔ a dzakũ a, ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ odi nyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa Yosef nɛ kɔda kamɛ ebi ye kĩ, “Herodes aatsã ɛwɛ obisɛ̃ a kĩ yakɔ ye, foesũ yidza kakpã obisɛ̃ a mɔ ɔma milo minaa Egipte tite akũ. Mina nɛ awã kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ maabi nɔ kĩ mimuniki miya.”
Lɛnyɛ lɛnyɛ a na, Yosef yidza ɛkpã obisɛ̃ a mɔ ɔma bilo bɛnaa Egipte tite akũ.
Edzi nɛ awã kɛnawo kĩ Herodes ku. Fukĩĩ ya lɔmɔ ayekĩ lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ lɛ eyi a fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ kĩ, “Nvɛ yĩ obi ntomɛna Egipte tite akũ.”

Kĩ Herodes mɔ́ eyi ɔsũ kĩ anyansãfɔ a kĩ bito suwa kadekɔ̃ a bu ye tɛkɔasia a ni, ɛna kalɔkpa paa. Foesũ edo bati kĩ bɛnaakɔ kubisɛ̃ɛ̃nyole a kĩ kɔtɛ futeli nviã kɛka, kɛyawo akɔkɔa amɛ akũ a flee nɛ Betlehem, mɔ ye tɛmatɔ kĩ tifuã a flee kamɛ. Herodes vɛ futeli nviã kĩ fuketimɔ lɔkɔ a kĩ bibi ye kĩ lisibii a nɛ a.
Adeke fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yeremia lɛ eyi a ya nɛ foe kamɛ kĩ,
“Fɔwɔla nɛ́ nɛ Rama,
kabe mɔ ayɔlɔhɔ fɔwɔla fɔanɛ.
Rahel kabe ye babi,
ade yaátunɔ kĩ bɛdɔla ye ɔwɔlɛ a,
kitonɛkĩ ye babi ku.”
Kĩ Herodes ku a, ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ odi nyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa Yosef nɛ kɔda kamɛ nɛ Egipte,
ade ebi ye kĩ, “Yidza, kakpã obisɛ̃ a mɔ ɔma mimuniki minaa Israelfɔ tite akũ, kitonɛkĩ bikĩ bɛwɛ kĩ bakɔ obisɛ̃ a ku.”
Foesũ Yosef kpã obisɛ̃ a mɔ ɔma bimuniki bɛya nɛ Israel tite akũ.
Lɛmɛ kĩ Yosef nu kĩ bidzina Arkelao lɛgã nɛ ɔlɛga Herodes kadzakɔ̃ nɛ Yudea a, evila awã kanaa. Baguma buki ɛnyɛ foe ɛtsa ye nɛ kɔda kamɛ kĩ ɛtanaa awã, foesũ ɛdzakũ ɛnaa Galilea amantam kamɛ,
ade ɛnadzi nɛ ɔmatɔ a kĩ bavɛ Nazaret a kamɛ a. Foesũ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a lɛ biyi a ya nɛ foe kamɛ kĩ, “Baavɛ ye kĩ Nazaretni.”
Nɛ fuwi a na kamɛ a, Yohanes Mui Ɔwɔlanɛ a ya nɛ Yudea kɔsa a kamɛ, ade eyi lɛtsã kade kayɔ nɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa a akũ a.
Ɛlɛ kĩ, “Midani mi tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a fuã!”
Yohanes nyɛ́ oti a kĩ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yesaya lɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ ye akũ eyi kĩ,
“Odi lamɛna fɔwɔla kabɔa nɛ kɔsa kamɛ kĩ,
‘Milɔla boe Ɔlate a osi.
Mifɔ̃ ye akũ eyo kpĩĩ!’ ”
Yohanes do tɛtadiɛ kĩ bɛkɔa ɔpɔnkɔpoku tɛtsã bɛnɔ, ade ɛkɔa ɔyaɛ ovoli abɔsɔ eboomu kate a. Ye funitsã nyɛ koolo mɔ kɔsã.
Bati kato Yerusalem, Yudea tite flee mɔ tite a kĩ tifuã Yordan ɔwɔ a flee akũ kaya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃.
Bɛnyɛ be tɔkpa bɛtsa ade Yohanes wɔla be mui nɛ Yordan ɔwɔ a kamɛ a.
Kĩ Yohanes mɔ́ Farisifɔ mɔ Zadukifɔ beblebee kĩ baya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ kĩ ɛwɔla be mui a, ebi be kĩ, “Mi bati kĩ mila ndɛ bɔɛ kpa! Owei lɛkpa mi kɔdɛ kĩ milo nɛ sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ a kĩ Baguma aayamɛna a kamɛ?
Mikɛna fɔtsa a kĩ fɔatsa kĩ midani mi tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ.
Mitakɔna kĩ minyɛ Abraham bawa sũ, míapuli milo sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ a. Mabi mi kĩ Baguma aapuli ɛfɔ̃ boe kĩĩ lɛdani babi mɔ bawa ɛkpa Abraham.
Bike kasɔã kɔkɔɛ nɛ futse tɔbɔlɛ akũ kĩ baatsua. Kutse nyɛ kutse kĩ kɔáwũ babi wĩ ni, baakpeli koe bɛta bido nɛ fi luwotu kamɛ.

“Yĩ kɔ̃ ni, nkɔa mui mawɔla mi mui fɔtsa kĩ midani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ, lɛmɛ oti a kĩ yaaya nɛ yĩ liti a, aakɔa Hũhũ Kpalɛwa mɔ fi ɛwɔla mi mui. Edeĩ kɔbɛ̃ kɔlaa ɛbɛ̃ yĩ, ade ntáfɛta kĩ mawũnya mpabua nɛ ye abɔa malo a.
Ɛnɛɛ ye kɔvɛla nɛ awɛ kĩ yaakɔa ɛwɛ ye kamɔnɛ. Yaafila ye kamɔnɛ eko nɛ oli kamɛ, lɛmɛ yaapila afafa a nɛ fi kĩ fɔádĩ da a kamɛ.”
Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, Yesu to Galilea ɛya nɛ Yohanes sɛkɛ̃ nɛ Yordan ɔwɔ a abuĩ kĩ ɛwɔla ye mui.
Lɛmɛ Yohanes wɛ kĩ Yesu ɛdani adzuni. Ebi Yesu kĩ, “Nɔ a kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ awɔla yĩ mui a ni, nɔ mbom lɛya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃?”
Lɛmɛ Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Finyaakɔ̃ fɔ̃ fɔna lɔmɔ, kitonɛkĩ ade osi kĩĩ akũ bɔ́atsã bɔkɛna fɔtsa a kĩ Baguma awɛ a.” Foesũ Yohanes tunɔ nɛ foe akũ.
Kĩ Yohanes wɔla Yesu mui eyua a, ɛnɛ nɛ mui a kamɛ lɛtalɛta, ade ode binya ɛkpa Yesu, ɛmɔ Baguma Hũhũ kĩ yaka ndɛ mblɔduma aye ɛyadzi nɛ ye akũ.
Ade odo odi nɛ eto ode ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ade yĩ mɔawɛ Obi kĩ maátunɔ ye kalɛ nɛ awĩ a, yawo yĩ anɛ.”
Ade Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a kpã Yesu ɛnamɛna kɔsa kamɛ kĩ Abonsam ɛsɔ ye ɛdã a.
Kĩ Yesu dzi katanya, lɛnyɛ mɔ suwa fuwi tɛna flee a, kɔlɛ kɔ ye.
Ade Abonsam ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ ebi ye kĩ, “Ntɛ Baguma obi anɛ ni, kekɔ̃ bi boe kĩĩ bɛdani bɛkɛna abodoo.”
Lɛmɛ Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, ‘Nnɛ́ funitsã odi sũ oti adzi nkpã, mbom edzi nkpã nɛ kalɛ nyɛ kalɛ kĩ kanɛ kato Baguma onukpɛ̃ kamɛ a akũ.’ ”
Ade Abonsam kpã Yesu ɛnamɛna Yerusalem, Ɔmatɔ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ a. Ɛkɔa ye ɛnadzɛla nɛ Asɔli Kɔla ode kakɔ geĩ a,
ebi Yesu kĩ, “Ntɛ Baguma obi anɛ ni, vɛnya kaka kanaadza nɛ tite, kitonɛkĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ,
‘Baguma aakpa ye ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ ɔlɛdo nɛ nɔ akũ,
kĩ baakaɛ nɔ nɛ be awɛ kamɛ,
ayekĩ ɔláatula nɛ de akũ.’ ”
Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Lɛmɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a buki kɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Tasɔ boe Ɔlate nɔ Baguma a ɔdã.’ ”
Ade Abonsam buki ɛkpã Yesu ɛnamɛna ɔtɔ geĩ odi kalete, ade ɛnyɛ katinya kamɛ fɔgã kanyakɔ̃ flee, mɔ foe akũ obu ɛtsa ye a.
Abonsam bi ye kĩ, “Maakɔa fukĩĩ flee nkpa nɔ, ntɛ aake aduli osum yĩ.”
Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Satana, dzakũ nɛ yĩ akũ! Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, ‘Nɔ Ɔlate Baguma odi kɛnɛ kĩ akɛna nɔ akũ ɔkpa lɔkɔa osum ye lɛmɛ.’ ”
Ade Abonsam dzakũ ɛfɔnɛ Yesu mɔ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ yabumɔ ye a.
Kĩ Yesu nu kĩ bipi Yohanes bido nɛ kɔla a, ɛdzakũ ɛnaa Galilea tite akũ.
Ɛtánaadzi nɛ Nazaret ɔmatɔ a kamɛ, mbom ɛnadzi nɛ Kapernaum, ɔmatɔ nɛ Galilea ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a ɔwɛ̃. Awã deĩ nɛ Zebulon mɔ Naftali amantam a kamɛ.
Fɔya lɔmɔ ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yesaya lɛ eyi a kĩ,
“Zebulon tite mɔ Naftali tite,
osi kĩ ɛnaa mpo abuĩ mɔ Yordan ɔwɔ liti
Galilea, bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ tite!
Bati a kĩ bidzi nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ a
mɔ́ ɔhaĩ kpale.
Ade bikĩ bidzi nɛ tite kĩ wuda nya te akũ a,
ɔhaĩ a nɛ́ ɛkpa be.”
Kito lɔkɔ a na, Yesu yi lɛtsã kade kayɔ kĩ, “Midani mi tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a fuã!”
Kĩ Yesu tsɛ̃ Galilea ɔwɔ lutubu baũ abuĩ yanaa a, ɛmɔ́ bawaɛ̃nyole nviã kĩ bɛnyɛ kɔfɔabi banyɛnɛ. Ade be nyɛ Simon kĩ bavɛ Petro mɔ ɔwaɛ̃ Andrea, kĩ bɛkata tɛsau nɛ lutubu baũ a kamɛ.
Yesu bi be kĩ, “Miyatomɔ yĩ lɔkɔa maakɛna mi bati banyɛnɛ.”
Nɛ awã naa, bɛfɔnɛ be tɛsau awɛ bitomɔ ye.
Yesu naa lɔtɔ ade ɛmɔ bawaɛ̃nyole nviã bɛbã, Yakobo mɔ Yohanes kĩ bɛnyɛ Zebedeo babi. Bɛna nɛ be ɔkɔlɔ kamɛ bɛmɔ ɔlɛga Zebedeo bɛkalɔla be tɛsau. Yesu vɛ be,
ade lɛtalɛta bɛfɔnɛ ɔkɔlɔ a mɔ be ɔlɛga awɛ biyi, bitomɔ ye a.
Yesu tsã emini nɛ Galilea tite flee akũ ɛkatsa fɔtsa nɛ Yudafɔ fɔtsɛnakɔ̃ a. Ede lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ akũ nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a akũ, ade ɛtsa fɔsɔ ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ flee a.

Ye akũ fɔlɛtsa gba nɛ Siria tite flee akũ, foesũ bati kpã be a kĩ basɔ fɔsɔ ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ a bɛma ye, bati kĩ bideĩ nɛ fɔsɔ mɔ ɔhau kamɛ, bikĩ hũhũ kpa deĩ nɛ be kamɛ, bikĩ odetɔ fɔsɔ kaha be, mɔ abafã amɛ, ade Yesu tsa be flee a.
Bati kɔdabu baũ kĩ bito Galilea tite akũ, mɔ Tɛmatɔ Ewua kamɛ, Yerusalem ɔmatɔ, Yudea tite akũ mɔ Yordan ɔwɔ liti tite akũ a yatomɔ ye.
Kĩ Yesu mɔ́ bati kɔdabu a, ede ɛnaa ɔtɔ akũ ɛnakɛna akũ edzi. Ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a yakpɔta nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃.
Ade edo be fɔtsa katsa awɛ kĩ,
“Baguma hila bikĩ binyina kĩ bɛnyɛ ahiãfɔ nɛ Baguma anɛ a,
kitonɛkĩ be la Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a.
Baguma hila bikĩ babe kɔnya a,
kitonɛkĩ Baguma aadɔla be tɔwɔlɛ.
Baguma hila bikĩ bɛdɔla be akũ a,
kitonɛkĩ ade be aanya tite akũ adzapadiɛ a.
Baguma hila bikĩ Baguma kawɛ akũ kakɛna kɔlɛ mɔ ɔmɔado akɔ be a,
kitonɛkĩ Baguma aafɔ̃ biwĩ!
Baguma hila bikĩ bamɔ bati kɔnya a,
kitonɛkĩ ade be Baguma aamɔ kɔnya a!
Baguma hila bikĩ be tɔwɔlɛ teĩ nɛ ye odi akũ,
kitonɛkĩ ade be aamɔ Baguma a!
Baguma hila bikĩ bakɛna lukudɔ nɛ bati kayite,
kitonɛkĩ Baguma aavɛ be kĩ ye babi!
Baguma hila bikĩ batomɔ be liti, nɛ ye kawɛ akũ kakɛna sũ a,
kitonɛkĩ be la Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a!
“Baguma hila mi ntɛ bati avũna mi, katomɔ mi liti, kalɛ tuwuli kpa nɛ mi akũ, nɛ yĩ sũ.
Mimɔ kawɔlɛ, mitu osee, kitonɛkĩ mideĩ kɔtɔkase kpale nɛ ode. Ade ayea bitomɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a kĩ bɛnya mi lɔtɔ a liti a.
“Mila ndɛ lɛdɛmɛ mikpa batidziwa flee. Lɛmɛ ntɛ lɛdɛmɛ yɛla de ɔmɛnɛ ni, osi odima lɛláa kĩ baatsã bibuki bido de ɔmɛnɛ. Lɛdani fɔtsa pupulidza foesũ bata de kawula lɔkɔa bati asumini de.
“Mila ndɛ ɔhaĩ mikpa batidziwa flee. Bɛláapuli bɛkɔla ɔmatɔ kĩ bitsua nɛ ɔtɔ akũ.
Odima látɛna ɔsɛdza kakɔa lɔɔda katsa ye, mbom yakɔa ye kate nɛ ɔsɛdza otse akũ nɛ awã kĩ yaakpalɛ fɔkɔ ɛkpa odi nyɛ odi nɛ tɔtɔ a kamɛ.
Ade ayea kɛnɛ kĩ mi ɔsɛdza ɛtɛ̃ nɛ bati anɛ, ayekĩ baamɔ fɔtsa wĩ a kĩ miakɛna a, lɔkɔa bimu mi Ɔlɛga nɛ ode a.”
Ade Yesu buki ɛlɛ kĩ, “Mitakɔna kĩ ĩya kĩ mayaafɔnɛ Mose mbla a mɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ fɔtsa katsa a awɛ. Ntáya kĩ mayaafɔnɛ foe awɛ, mbom ĩya kĩ mayaakɛna foe fɔkpɔla.
Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ ayekĩ tite mɔ ode táwɔ tɔ̃ kĩĩ ni, bɛláafɔnɛ katsɛlɛ kabii ĩye ke akũ lɛtsa kabii nɛ mbla a kamɛ awɛ, mbɔɛntɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa ya nɛ foe kamɛ.

Foesũ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaafum mbla kabii adi, ɛtsa bati bɛbã lɛmɛ bɛkɛna lɔmɔ ni, yaanya obisɛ̃ kɔlaa nɛ Baguma ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a. Lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛkɛna nɛ mbla a akũ, mɔ ɛtsa bati bɛbã lɛmɛ kĩ bɛkɛna foe lɔmɔ ni, yaanya ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ nɛ Baguma ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a.
Foesũ mabi mi kĩ míapuli miwo nɛ ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a, ntɛ miakɛna nɛ Baguma kawɛ akũ kaba mbla batsanɛ mɔ Farisifɔ a.
“Minu kĩ kɔkɔɛ a, bibi bati kĩ, ‘Takɔ oti, ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ edi awu ni, baadzɛmɔ ye.’

Lɛmɛ finyaa mabi mi kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛna kalɔkpa nɛ ɔwaɛ̃ akũ ni, baadzɛmɔ ye. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛvɛ ɔwaɛ̃ kĩ, ‘Ɔkɔasia’ ni, baakpã ye bɛnamɛna nɛ Ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ anɛ bɛdzɛmɔ ye, ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛvɛ ɔwaɛ̃ kĩ, ‘ɔyaɛ’ ni, ɛfɛta ɛkpa ode fi luwotu a kamɛ kanaa.
Foesũ ntɛ ɔwɛ kĩ akɔa nɔ afɔlibɔ fɔtsa ɔnaate nɛ afɔlibɔ atɛnyɛ akũ ɔkpa Baguma, mɔ ote anɛ kĩ awaɛ̃ nɛɛ nɔ kalɔɛ ni,
fɔnɛ nɔ afɔliɛ fɔtsa a awɛ kayi nɛ afɔlibɔ atɛnyɛ a lɔtɔ nɛ awã, kamuniki kanaalɔla mi mɔ ye kayite tɔ̃ fɔmɔ ayakɔa nɔ afɔliɛ fɔtsa ɔkpa Baguma.

“Ntɛ odi sama nɔ nɛ fɔlɛtsa kadzɛkɔ̃ ni, bɔa mbɔdi milɔla mi kayite nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ lideĩ fɔmɔ baavɛ kalɛ a. Ntɛ nnɛ́ aye mɔ miwo fɔlɛtsa kadzɛkɔ̃ a, oti a aakɔa nɔ edo nɛ fɔlɛtsa ɔdzɛnɛ awɛ. Fɔlɛtsa ɔdzɛnɛ a lɛmɛ aakɔa nɔ ɛkpa polisifɔ ade baado nɔ nɛ kɔla a.
Mabi nɔ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ ade awã aana flee kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ ose kɔtɔ a flee oyua a.
“Minu kĩ bɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Batsɔ̃ mɔ banyɔ bɛtanɛ bakɔba liti.’
Lɛmɛ finyaa mabi mi kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛmɔ́ otsole, mɔ ɛkɔ ye odo ni, ɛwɛ ye kɔkɔɛ nɛ ye ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ.
Foesũ ntɛ nɔ sɔmɔna linebi afɔ̃ akɛna tɔkpa ni, bɔlɛ de kata kamuni. Fɔnɛnɛ fɔkpa nɔ kĩ ayɛla nɔ sukɛna kakɔ kadi kɛba kĩ baata nɔ oti mɔa bido nɛ fi kĩ fɔádĩ kamɛ.
Ntɛ nɔ sɔmɔna kɔkpɔ afɔ̃ akɛna tɔkpa ni, tsua koe kata kamuni. Fɔnɛnɛ fɔkpa nɔ kĩ ayɛla nɔ kɔkpɔ mɔa kɛba kĩ bɛta nɔ oti mɔa a flee bido nɛ fi kĩ fɔádĩ a kamɛ.
“Bɛlɛ lɛmɛ kĩ, ‘Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaasĩ ɔtsɔ̃ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ ɛkpa ye kɔtsɔ̃ kasĩ ovoli.’

Lɛmɛ finyaa mabi mi kĩ ntɛ onyole odi sĩ ɔtsɔ̃ nɛ fɔlɛtsa bɛbã akũ kɛba kĩ nnɛ́ ye liti kanɛ sũ ni, onyole a fɔ̃ otsole a bɔa adɔpaa ntɛ ebuki ɛnadzi kɔnyɔ bɛbã. Ade ayea onyole bɛbã a kĩ yaakɔã ye a lɛmɛ bɔa adɔpaa a.
“Minu lɛmɛ kĩ bibi kɔkɔɛ bati a kĩ, ‘Mitatu mi fubo, mbom mikɛna nɛ fubo a kĩ milɔ mikpa boe Ɔlate a akũ.’
Lɛmɛ finyaa mabi mi kĩ mitalɔ fubo ntɛ miakɛna nhihiɛ adi. Mitatani ode, kitonɛkĩ Baguma lɛgãkpo yanɛ.
Mitatani tite kitonɛkĩ Baguma abɔa kakekɔ̃ tanɛ ĩye mitani Yerusalem, kitonɛkĩ ɛnyɛ Lɛgã Kpale a ɔmatɔ.
Tatani nɔ lɔlɔ malo, kitonɛkĩ ɔláapuli ɔdani sɔlɔ mɔapɛ malo sɛkɛna suwovoe ĩye sɔwɔwa.
Mikɔ̃ milɛ kĩ, ‘Oo,’ ĩye ‘Oowo.’ Kalɛ bɛbã kĩ mialɛ nɛ kakĩĩ liti to Oti Kpa a sɛkɛ̃.
“Minu kĩ bɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Linebi nɛ linebi kadokɔ̃, lɔdɔ̃ nɛ lɔdɔ̃ kadokɔ̃.’
Lɛmɛ finyaa mabi mi kĩ mitakɛna tɔkpa mise tɔkpa kɔtɔ. Ntɛ odi balɛ nɔ awɛ nɛ sɔmɔna ɔlɔtɔ ni, fɔ̃ ɛbalɛ nɔ nɛ sɛba ɔlɔtɔ lɛmɛ.
Ade ntɛ odi sama nɔ nɛ fɔlɛtsa kadzɛkɔ̃ kĩ yatɛ nɔ atadiɛ anyanglede ni, fɔ̃ ɛtɛ nɔ atadiɛ wulaa a lɛmɛ.
Ntɛ oti kĩ edeĩ otumi hɛ nɔ kĩ lɔ ye fɔtsa mɔ kuvũ mitsã lisikũ mɔa ni, lɔ foe mitsã fusikũ nviã.
Ntɛ odi wã nɔ litsedi ni, kpa ye, ntɛ odi wɛ kĩ yavɛ litsedi nɛ nɔ sɛkɛ̃ ni, kpa ye ɛvɛ.
“Minu kĩ bɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Wɛ nɔ ɔkɔba kalɛ, kakesĩ nɔ bakesĩnɛ.’
Lɛmɛ finyaa mabi mi kĩ miwɛ mi bakesĩnɛ kalɛ ade mibɔa mpaɛ nɛ bikĩ bitomɔ mi liti a lɔlɔ,
ayekĩ míadani boe Ɔlɛga nɛ ode a babi. Kitonɛkĩ ye afɔ̃ suwa ata kakpa bati wĩ mɔ bati kpa flee, ade yafɔ̃ oni ako kakpa bati kĩ badã kpĩĩ mɔ bikĩ baádã kpĩĩ a flee a.
Ntɛ miawɛ bikĩ bawɛ mi kalɛ odi a, kɔtɔkase kɔɔdabe míana? Tɔgɔlɛ batɛnɛ malo akɛna foe lɔmɔ!
Ade ntɛ mi bakɔba odi miado onukpɛ̃ ni, litsa mitɛnɛ kakɛna? Amamufɔ malo akɛna foe lɔmɔ!
Foesũ midã kĩ mikpɔla ndɛ ayekĩ mi Ɔlɛga nɛ ode a lɛmɛ kpɔla a.
“Midã kadã wĩ kĩ miláakɛna mi ɔsum fɔtsa a nɛ kanade anɛ ayekĩ bati aamɔ lɛtsa a kĩ miakɛna a. Ntɛ mikɛna foe nɛ bati anɛ ni, miláana kɔtɔkase mitomɛna mi Ɔlɛga nɛ ode a sɛkɛ̃.

Foesũ ntɛ ote ohiãni fɔtsa ni, tade lɛtsã nɛ foe akũ ndɛ ayekĩ anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa bakɛnanɛ a akɛna nɛ be fɔtsɛnakɔ̃ mɔ tɔblɔnu anɛ a. Bakɛna foe ayekĩ bati aamu be. Mabi mi pefee kĩ bɛtɛ be kɔtɔkase a flee kɔkɔɛ.
Foesũ nɔ kɔ̃ ntɛ akɛna sɛmɛ kalɛ ɔkpa ohiãni ni, tafɔ̃ nɔ ɔkɔba paa malo linyi lɛtsama nɛ foe akũ.
Foesũ nɔ futetsa a fɔna nɛ kabɛla kamɛ, lɔkɔa nɔ Ɔlɛga a kĩ yamɔ fɔtsa nɛ kabɛla kamɛ a, aase nɔ foe kɔtɔ.

“Ntɛ miabɔa mpaɛ ni, mitakɛna ndɛ anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa bakɛnanɛ a aye. Bawɛ kayidza kadza kabɔa mpaɛ nɛ Yudafɔ fɔtsɛnakɔ̃ mɔ tɔblɔnu fɔbalikɔ̃ ayekĩ odi nyɛ odi aamɔ be. Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ bɛtɛ be kɔtɔkase a lodo kɔkɔɛ.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ abɔa mpaɛ ni, wo nɛ nɔ kɔla kamɛ, kabalɛ kɔla a lɔkɔa kabɔa mpaɛ kakpa nɔ Ɔlɛga a kĩ bɔámɔ mɔ anɛ a, lɔkɔa Aga a kĩ yamɔ fɔtsa a kĩ akɛna nɛ kabɛla kamɛ a aase nɔ kɔtɔ.
“Ntɛ miabɔa mpaɛ ni, mitalɛ fɔlɛtsa beblebee kĩ fɔlá kayɔ ndɛ ayekĩ amamufɔ akɛna a. Be bakɔna kĩ ntɛ be mpaɛbɔ deĩ lugo a mɔ Baguma aatse be.
Mitakɛna mi akũ ndɛ be, kitonɛkĩ mi Ɔlɛga nyina lɛtsa a kĩ lisĩ mi kɔkɔɛ fɔmɔ miavia ye malo.
Foesũ mibɔa mpaɛ kĩ,
‘Boe Ɔlɛga kĩ edeĩ nɛ ode,
nɔ dĩ akũ lɛkpalɛ.
Nɔ lɛgãkanya lɛya.
Bɛkɛna nɔ kawɛ nɛ tite akũ,
ndɛ ayekĩ bakɛna nɛ ode a.
Kpa boe daa funitsã a kĩ busĩ nviã a.
Kɔa boe tɔkpa a kĩ bɔkɛna a kate boe,
ndɛ ayekĩ bɔakɔa kate bikĩ bɛkɛna tɔkpa
nɛ boe akũ a.
Takpã boe ɔnamɛna sɔhuiɛ kamɛ,
mbom nyɛ boe katomɛna Oti kpa a awɛ.
Fɔya lɔmɔ.’
“Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ mikɔa bati tɔkpa a kĩ bɛkɛna nɛ mi akũ mite be ni, mi Ɔlɛga nɛ ode a lɛmɛ aakɔa mi tide a ete mi.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ mitákɔa bati tɔkpa mite be ni, mi Ɔlɛga nɛ ode a lɛmɛ lɛláakɔa mi tɔkpa a ete mi.

“Ntɛ miasui onukpɛ̃ ni, mitakɛna anɛ kamɛ kusuu ndɛ ayekĩ anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa bakɛnanɛ akɛna a. Bakɛna anɛ kamɛ kusuu ayekĩ bati aamɔ kĩ basui onukpɛ̃. Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ bɛtɛ be kɔtɔkase a flee kɔkɔɛ.
Ntɛ asui onukpɛ̃ ni, vɔlɛ anɛ, do kugua nɛ lɔlɔ kamɛ kasɛla tɔlɔ,
ayekĩ bati bɛbã lɛláanyi kĩ asui onukpɛ̃. Nɔ Ɔlɛga a, kĩ baámɔ mɔ anɛ a odi aanyi, ade Ɔlɛga a kĩ yamɔ fɔtsa nɛ kabɛla kamɛ a aase nɔ foe kɔtɔ a.
“Mitawɛ akũ kana fɔtsa miyi akũ nɛ tite kĩĩ akũ, awã kĩ fupuka mɔ nkandɔlɔ aabula foe kade, ade bayekpanɛ lɛmɛ abubuli kɔla kawo kaye foe a.
Mbom miwɛ akũ kana fɔtsa miyi akũ nɛ ode, awã kĩ fupuka mɔ nkandɔlɔ lɛláabula foe kade, ade bayekpanɛ lɛmɛ lɛláapuli bubuli biwo biye foe a.
Kitonɛkĩ awã kĩ nɔ fɔtsa mɔ kɔya deĩ ni, ade awã nɔ ɔwɔlɛ lɛmɛ deĩ a.
“Otidziwa banebi nyɛ ye ɔsɛdza. Ntɛ nɔ banebi amɔ kamɔ wĩ ni, nɔ oti mɔawɛ a flee aana nɛ ɔhaĩ kamɛ.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ nɔ banebi lɛnɛ́nɛ ni, nɔ oti mɔawɛ a aana nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ. Foesũ ntɛ ɔhaĩ a kĩ edeĩ nɛ nɔ kamɛ a nyɛ ɔtũ ni, nɔ oti mɔawɛ kamɛ aake ɔtũ paa.
“Odima lɛláapuli esum balate nviã, kitonɛkĩ yaakesĩ ɔmɔa lɔkɔa ɛwɛ ɔyade a kalɛ, ĩye yaakɔa akũ ɛmɛnamɔ ɔmɔa esupa ɔyade a. Ɔnɔkɔali nyɛ kĩ ɔláapuli osum Baguma mɔ katinya kamɛ fɔtsa.

Ade foesũ mabi mi kĩ mitaha akũ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ míanya, mimɔa midzi nkpã akũ, ĩye tilima a kĩ míasua akũ ĩye midzi a akũ. Mbɔɛɛ nkpã tátɛ kɔya ɛba funitsã, ĩye mbɔɛɛ oti mɔawɛ a tátɛ kɔya ɛba tilima mɔ tɛtadiɛ?
Midã kɔvɔlabi, kɔádu funitsã, kɔákpɔta funitsã kako nɛ tili kamɛ, lɛmɛ mi Ɔlɛga nɛ ode a adɔɔla koe! Mbɔɛɛ mitátɛ kɔya miba kɔvɔlabi?
Mi kamɛ owei aapuli ɛkɔa luwi mɔa ete nɛ ye nkpã fuwi akũ ntɛ eti ɛha ye akũ bo aye malo?
“Lɔkɔa nde sũ miaha akũ nɛ tilima mɔ tɛtadiɛ akũ? Midã ayekĩ lupo kamɛ futse ako nhuilɛ kabo anɛ, fɔákɛna adzuma, fɔátaɛ tileti kanɔ tilima kakpa akũ.
Lɛmɛ mabi mi kĩ Lɛgã Salomo mɔ ye akũ kana fɔtsa a flee malo táhɛhɛ fɔlɛ kadã ndɛ nhuilɛ kĩĩ kamɛ amɔa.
Ntɛ Baguma kɛɛlɛ lupo kamɛ tuwĩ lɔmɔ, kĩ tideĩ nkpã nviã, ade kunya tiku, bipila te nɛ luwotu kamɛ a ni, ɛláakɛɛlɛ mi ɛba te? Mi katɛkado adã kabii paa!
“Foesũ mitakaha akũ mikalɛ kĩ, ‘Litsa bɔ́anya, litsa bɔ́amɔa ĩye litsa bɔ́asua akũ?’
Ade fukĩĩ bamɛ liti amamufɔ atomɛna a. Mi Ɔlɛga nɛ ode a nyina kĩ fɔtsa kĩĩ flee sĩ mi.
Mifɔ̃ anɛ ɛyɔɔlɛ mi ɛba nɛ Baguma ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a liti katomɛna mɔ fɔtsa a kĩ ɛwɛ etomɛna mi sɛkɛ̃ kĩ mikɛna a akũ, lɔkɔa yaakɔa fɔtsa bɛbã kĩĩ flee ebu ɛkpa mi.
Foesũ mitaha akũ nɛ kunya akũ, kunya luwi a aana de mɔawɛ ɔhau. Luwi nyɛ luwi kamɛ ɔhau pɔnɛ ɛkpa de.
“Mitadzɛmɔ bati bɛbã fɔfɔ̃ Baguma lɛmɛ lɛdzɛmɔ mi,
kitonɛkĩ ayekĩ midzɛmɔ bati bɛbã a, ade aye Baguma lɛmɛ aadzɛmɔ mi a, ade mbla a kĩ mikɔa midzɛmɔ bati bɛbã a, ye mɔapɛ a yakɔa ɛdzɛmɔ mi malo a.
“Nde sũ adã sukuluku kĩ sideĩ nɛ awaɛ̃ linebi kamɛ lɛmɛ aámɔ luvokũ a kĩ lideĩ nɛ nɔ mɔawɛ linebi kamɛ a?
Nde aapuli obi awaɛ̃ kĩ, ‘Make nɔ aduli, fɔ̃ ĩnyɛ sukuluku nɛ nɔ linebi kamɛ’ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ luvokũ deĩ nɛ nɔ mɔawɛ linebi kamɛ a?
Nɔ anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa ɔkɛnanɛ! Nya lɔtɔ kanyɛ luvokũ a nɛ nɔ linebi kamɛ lɔkɔa aapuli ɔmɔ́ yededeede ɔnyɛ sukuluku nɛ awaɛ̃ linebi kamɛ a.
“Mitakɔa fɔtsa a kĩ foe akũ kpalɛ mikpa bakpete, baadani bɛyaadɔ̃ mi. Mitata mi fulitsa kĩ fɔtɛ kɔya miko baplakuo, kitonɛkĩ baasumini foe bibula kade.
“Mivia fɔtsa lɔkɔa baakpa mi, miwɛ fɔtsa lɔkɔa míamɔ foe, mibɔa opunu lɔkɔa baabinya bɛkpa mi.
Kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛwã fɔtsa ni, yana foe. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛwɛ litsedi ni, yaamɔ de, ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ yabɔa opunu ni, baabinya bɛkpa ye.
“Mi kamɛ obilɛga ɔɔdabe deĩ kĩ ntɛ obi via ye abodoo ni, yaabɔɛ de edo nɛ ye awɛ?
Ĩye ntɛ evia ye kafɔabi kĩ yaakɔa kɔɛ ɛkpa ye?
Ntɛ mi a kĩ minyɛ bati kpa a, minyina ayekĩ miate mi babi fɔtsa wĩ a ni, titi eni mɔ mi Ɔlɛga nɛ ode lɛláakɔa ye fɔtsa wĩ pii ɛkpa bikĩ bavia ye a?
Foesũ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ miawɛ kĩ bati bɛbã bɛkɛna bɛkpa mi ni, mi malo mikɛna foe lɔmɔ mikpa be. Ade fukĩĩ Mose mbla a mɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ fɔlɛtsa a atsa a.
“Mitsã onyukpɛ̃ manɛwa a kamɛ miwo, kitonɛkĩ onyukpɛ̃ a kĩ ɛsa a mɔ osi a kĩ ɛdzɛlɛ a anaa kawɔ kamɛ, ye akũ katsã lɛlá ɔsĩ, ade bati pii lɛmɛ tsɛ̃ ye akũ a.
Lɛmɛ onyukpɛ̃ a kĩ yanaa nkpã kamɛ a manɛ, ade osi a kĩ ɛwaa ɛnaa a awã akũ katsã deĩ ɔsĩ, ade bati sukuloo lɛmɔ ye a.
“Midã mi akũ kadã wĩ nɛ fɔvã tunukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ akũ. Baya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ miamɔ ndɛ baveli aye, lɛmɛ nɛ be kamɛkamɛ ni, bɛla ndɛ kulikii kĩ kude adɔ̃.
Míakɔa be fɔkɛnatsa minyi be. Ɔgɔabi láwũ akutu, ade ɔtatsuɛ láwũ asãã babi a.
Kutse wĩ awũ babi wĩ, ade kutse kpa lɛmɛ awũ babi kpa a.
Kutse wĩ lɛláapuli kuwũ babi kpa, ade ayea kutse kpa lɛmɛ lɛláapuli kuwũ babi wĩ a.
Lɛmɛ kutse nyɛ kutse kĩ kɔáwũ babi wĩ ni, batsua koe kata kado nɛ fi kamɛ.
Foesũ fɔvã onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a fɔkɛlatsa míakɔa minyi be.
“Nnɛ́ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yavɛ yĩ kĩ, ‘Boe Ɔlate! Boe Ɔlate!’ aanaa ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ, mbɔɛntɛ bikĩ bakɛna nɛ Nda kawɛ akũ a odi aanaa awã.
Ntɛ Kadzɛ Luwi a wo ɔtɔ a, bati pii aavɛ yĩ kĩ, ‘Boe Ɔlate! Boe Ɔlate! Nnɛ́ nɔ dĩ akũ bɔlɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa, bɔblɔmɛna hũhũ kpa butomɛna bati kamɛ, ade bɔkɛna awãwã fɔtsa pii lɛmɛ a?’
Ade awã mɔ maabi be kĩ, ‘Ĩnyína mi koũ. Midzakũ nɛ yĩ anɛ kamɛ, mi tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ!’
“Foesũ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yatse yĩ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ mɔ ɛkɛna nɛ foe akũ ni, ɛla ndɛ ɔnyansãni kĩ eke ye kɔla nɛ de mɔ ɔsĩ akũ.
Oni kpale ko, ade tɔwɔ yili, ɔwɛ vũ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ ɛyabɔa kɔla a, lɛmɛ kɔtáveli, kitonɛkĩ bike koe nɛ de mɔ ɔsĩ akũ.
Lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yatse yĩ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ mɔ yaákɛna nɛ foe akũ ni, ɛla ndɛ odzimbifɔ kĩ eke ye kɔla nɛ dã kamɛ.
Oni kpale ko, tɔwɔ yili ade ɔwɛ mɔ ɔsĩ vũ ɛyabɔa kɔla ade kuveli, kɔtɔ gbloo, kububuli a!”
Kĩ Yesu yua fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kalɛ a, akũ dzuli bati kɔdabu a nɛ ye fɔtsa katsa a akũ.
Kitonɛkĩ ɛtsa fɔtsa ndɛ oti kĩ edeĩ otumi, kĩ fɔtána ndɛ mbla batsanɛ a fude.
Kĩ Yesu ka eto katɔbii a akũ yaya a, bati kɔdabu kɔdabu pii tomɔ ye.
Ade awã mɔ onyole odi kĩ yasɔ fɔsɔ ngbã, kĩ bati avila a, yake aduli nɛ ye anɛ kamɛ, ebi ye kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, ntɛ fɔnyɛ nɔ kawɛ ni, aapuli ɔfɔ̃ fɔsɔ kĩĩ lɛwɔ nɛ yĩ akũ.”
Yesu yo awɛ ɛta ye ade ebi ye kĩ, “Mawɛ lɔmɔ. Nɔ akũ ɛkpalɛ.” Ade lɛtalɛta fɔsɔ a wɔ nɛ ye akũ a.
Ade Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Tse! Tabi odima kadima, mbom dã osi kpĩĩ kanaa ɔsɔfɔ sɛkɛ̃, kafɔ̃ ɛsɛla nɔ akũ ɛdã, lɔkɔa kabɔa afɔliɛ a kĩ Mose mbla tsa a, fɔfɔ̃ odi nyɛ odi enyi kĩ ɔsaɛ.”
Ke liti a, kĩ Yesu wo nɛ Kapernaum ɔmatɔ kamɛ a, Roma sodzafɔ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ odi yake ye aduli kĩ,
“Boe Ɔlate, yĩ ɔsumunɛ waa nɛ kɔla yasɔ, yaápuli ekuna akũ, ade ɛlamɔ lubo kamɔ paa a.”
Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Maaya ĩyaatsa ye.”
Lɛmɛ sodzafɔ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a bi ye kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, ntákpɔla kĩ awo nɛ yĩ tɔtɔ kamɛ. Nɔ kɔ̃ lɛ kalɛ mɔapɛ lɔkɔa yĩ ɔsumunɛ a aasaɛ.

Yĩ malo ĩnyɛ oti kĩ ndeĩ nɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ kayɔ, ade ndeĩ sodzafɔ nɛ yĩ malo kayɔ a. Ntɛ mbi be kamɛ odi kĩ, ‘Naa’ ni, yanaa, ade ntɛ mbi ɔbɛbã lɛmɛ kĩ, ‘Ya’ ni, yaya. Ntɛ mbi yĩ ɔsumunɛ lɛmɛ kĩ, ‘Kɛna fukĩĩ’ ni, yakɛna foe.”
Kĩ Yesu nu fukĩĩ a, fɔkɛna ye wãwã, ade ebi bati a kĩ bitomɔ ye a kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔali mabi mi kĩ ntámɔ odima nɛ Israel kĩ edeĩ katɛkado kĩĩ odu.
Mabi mi pipiipi kĩ bati pii aato suwa kadekɔ̃ mɔ suwa katomukɔ̃ bɛyaadzi nɛ opunu akũ mɔ Abraham, mɔ Isak mɔ Yakob nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ.
Lɛmɛ Baguma aata bikĩ be mbom la lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a ewula nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ, awã kĩ baabe, bɛba adɔ̃.”
Ke liti a, Yesu bi sodzafɔ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ, “Naa kɔla! Fɔ́aya nɛ foe kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ ɔtɛ odo a.” Ade ye ɔsumunɛ a saɛ nɛ lɔkɔ a na pɛpɛɛpɛ kamɛ a.
Kĩ Yesu naa Petro tɔtɔ kamɛ a, ɛmɔ kĩ Petro nyina waa nɛ ɔkɛna akũ yasɔ atilili.
Yesu pi ye nɛ kɔkpɔ ade lɛtalɛta atilili a dɔ ye, eyidza ete opunu ɛkpa ye a.
Kĩ olobe wo ɔtɔ a, bati kpã bikĩ hũhũ kpa deĩ nɛ be kamɛ a bɛma Yesu. Ɛblɔmɛna hũhũ kpa a etomɛna be kamɛ mɔ kalɛ mɔapɛ, ade ɛtsa basɔnɛ a flee lɛmɛ a.
Fukĩ ɛkɛna kĩĩ ya nɛ foe kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yesaya lɛ eyi kĩ,
“Ye mɔawɛ lɛkɔa boe lubo kamɔ,
mɔ fɔsɔ ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ ete nɛ ye akũ!”
Kĩ Yesu mɔ́ bati kɔdabu pii a kĩ kusinya ye a, ebi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ bɛfɔ̃ binyina bɛnaa ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a liti.
Ade mbla batsanɛ a kamɛ odi ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ ɛyabi ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, maatomɔ nɔ nnaa kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ kĩ aanaa.”
Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Kulikii deĩ fudzikɔ̃, kɔvɔlabi lɛmɛ deĩ fɔtsɔɛ, lɛmɛ Otidziwa Obi a lɛlá awã kĩ yate lɔlɔ malo.”
Ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kamɛ ɔmɔa lɛmɛ bi ye kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, maatomɔ nɔ, lɛmɛ fɔ̃ nnaabila nda tɔ̃.”
Ade Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Tomɔ yĩ. Fɔnɛ bikĩ bidzi nkpã ndɛ kaku biku a awɛ bibila be mɔawɛ banɔkpa.”
Yesu wo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ odi kamɛ ade ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a tomɔ ye a.
Lɛtalɛta ɔwɛ mɔ ɔsĩ odi do kavũ awɛ nɛ ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a akũ, kabɔa mui kako nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ, kĩ fɔfɔ̃ kite sukuloo ɔkɔlɔ a adoomu, lɛmɛ Yesu kɔ̃ waa tida.
Ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a nadzɛla ye, ade bibi ye kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, tɛ boe o-o! Buku buyua!”
Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Nde sũ libe wo mi lɔmɔ? Mi katɛkado lɛpɔ́nɛ kɔlaa!” Adeke eyidza ɛdza, ewũni nɛ mui mɔ ɔwɛ a akũ kĩ bɛkɛna dĩĩ, ade awã flee kɛna dĩĩ a.
Odi nyɛ odi kɛna saa, ade bɛkavia akũ kĩ, “Oti ɔdabe odu nyɛ okĩĩ? Ɔwɛ mɔ mui malo atse ye ɔlɛdo!”

Kĩ Yesu nawo Gadara tite akũ nɛ ɔwɔ lutubu baũ liti a, bati nviã kĩ hũhũ kpa na nɛ be kamɛ nɛ́ bito fɔkɛ kĩ babila banɔkpa kamɛ bɛyatsɛlamɔ ye. Ayekĩ be akũ deĩ libe sũ ni, odima lapuli katsã awã osi a katɛ̃.
Ade lɛtalɛta bɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba kĩ, “Nɔ Baguma Obi, litsa deĩ nɛ bɔmɔ nɔ kayite? Kaya ɔya kĩ ayaakɛna boe tɛnya fɔmɔ lɔkɔ wĩ a aawo ɔtɔ mbɔɛɛ?”
Awã fuã kakɔ a kĩ baplakuo kɔdabu baũ kudi dza kɔkadɛ a.
Hũhũ kpa a ke Yesu aduli kĩ, “Ntɛ aablɔmɛna boe ni, fɔ̃ bɔnaawo nɛ baplakuo kɔdabu nɛ akĩĩ a kamɛ.”
Yesu bi be kĩ, “Minɛ minaa.” Foesũ bɛnɛ bɛnawo nɛ baplakuo a kamɛ. Ade baplakuo kɔdabu a flee wula atsɛ kliklikli bɛka lɔwɔtuni geĩ a biwo nɛ lutubu a kamɛ, bɛmɔa mui biku a.
Bayaɛ akũ badãmɛnanɛ a lo bɛnaa ɔmatɔ kamɛ bɛnalɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ fɔya a flee nɛ banyole nviã a kĩ hũhũ kpa na nɛ be kamɛ a akũ.
Foesũ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ bati flee nɛ́ kĩ banaadã Yesu, ade kĩ bɛmɔ́ ye a, bike ye aduli kĩ ɛdzakũ nɛ be tite akũ ɛnaa.
Yesu de ewo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ emuniki ɛtsã mui a anɛ ɛnaa ye awɛ ɔmatɔ kamɛ.
Nɛ awã a, bati badi bɔɛ oti odi kĩ eveliveli bɛwɔla nɛ ɔkɛna akũ bɛma ye. Kĩ Yesu mɔ́ be katɛkado a, ebi oti a kĩ eveliveli a kĩ, “Yĩ obi, nɔ ɔwɔlɛ ɛka edzi! Nkɔa nɔ titikpa nte nɔ.”
Adeke Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ badi bi be akũ kĩ, “Onyole kĩĩ alɛ fubusuotsa!”
Kĩ Yesu mɔ́ lɛtsa a kĩ bɛkakɔna a, ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nde sũ miakɔna tɔkpa nɛ mi tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ?
Fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ fɔɔdabe lɛ́la ɔsĩ mɔ kalɛ, ‘Nkɔa nɔ titikpa nte nɔ,’ mbɔɛɛ kĩ, ‘Yidza katsã’?
Lɛmɛ kĩ míanyi kĩ yĩ Otidziwa Obi, ndeĩ kɔbɛ̃ kĩ makɔa bati titikpa kate nɛ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ sũ ni, midã o-o!” Foesũ ebi oti a kĩ eveliveli a kĩ, “Yidza kadza, bɔɛ nɔ ɔkɛna kanaa nɔ awã!”
Onyole a yidza ɛdza, ɛdzakũ ɛnaa ye awã.
Kĩ bati a mɔ́ fukĩĩ a, libe wo be ade bimu Baguma nɛ ayekĩ ɛkɔa kɔbɛ̃ kĩĩ odu ɛkpa batidziwa.
Yesu dzakũ nɛ awã, ade kĩ ɛtsɛ̃ yanaa a, ɛmɔ́ ɔgɔlɛ ɔtɛnɛ odi kĩ bavɛ Mateo kĩ edzi nɛ ye ɔgɔlɛ katekɔ̃. Ebi ye kĩ, “Tomɔ yĩ.” Ade Mateo yidza etomɔ Yesu a.
Kĩ Yesu kanya nɛ Mateo awã a, tɔgɔlɛ batɛnɛ pii mɔ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ bɛbã yadzi nɛ opunu akũ, bibumɔ Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a bɛnya.
Farisifɔ a badi mɔ́ foe ade bivia ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Nde sũ mianya kamɔa mɔ tɔgɔlɛ batɛnɛ mɔ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ?”
Yesu nu lɛtsa a kĩ bɛkalɛ a, ade ɛkpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Basɔnɛ lisĩ bɛkpa tutsonu ɔkɛnanɛ, nnɛ́ bikĩ bideĩ akũ ɔsĩ.
Minaawɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kalɛ kĩĩ kayɔ, ‘Sɛmɛ kalɛ kakɛna mawɛ, nnɛ́ bayaɛ afɔliɛ kabɔa mawɛ.’ Ntáya kĩ mayaavɛ bikĩ badã kpĩĩ, mbom ĩya kĩ maavɛ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ.”
Ke liti a, Yohanes Mui Ɔwɔlanɛ a fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃ ade bivia ye kĩ, “Nde sũ bɔmɔ Farisifɔ bɔawɛ onukpɛ̃ kasui, lɛmɛ nɔ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kɔ̃ lásui onukpɛ̃ koũ?”

Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Kakɔna miakɔna kĩ obolitsɔ̃ ɔnyɔ bakɔba aadzi nɛ ayɔlɔhɔ kamɛ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ edeĩ nɛ be kamɛ a? Fɔláanya lɔmɔ. Lɛmɛ luwi a aaya kĩ baakpã obolitsɔ̃ ɔnyɔ a bɛdzakũmɛna nɛ be sɛkɛ̃, ade lɔkɔ a na kamɛ mɔ́ baasui onukpɛ̃ a.
“Odima lákɔa limakũ vɔɛ̃ kataɛ atadiɛ kɔɛ, kitonɛkĩ limakũ vɔɛ̃ a aavɛlɛ lɔkɔɛ a lɛbɛ̃, lɔkɔa ɔkɛ baũ aawa ɛba ɔkɔɛ a.

“Ade ayea odima láko waĩ vɔɛ̃ nɛ ɔyaɛ ovoli kuvũ kɔɛ kamɛ a, kitonɛkĩ ɔyaɛ kuvũ a aayili kɔbɛ̃, waĩ a liwula, ade ɔyaɛ kuvũ a lɛmɛ aabu kade a. Mbom bako waĩ vɔɛ̃ nɛ ɔyaɛ kuvũ vɔɛ̃ kamɛ lɔkɔa foe atsu nviã a flee lɛláabu kade.”
Kĩ Yesu kalɛ kɔdzɛla a, Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ odi ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃, ade eke aduli nɛ ye anɛ kamɛ, ebi ye kĩ, “Yĩ obitsole ku finyaakĩĩ, lɛmɛ yaate awɛ nɛ ye akũ ayekĩ yaanyinya.”
Ade Yesu yidza bɛmɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a bitomɔ ye bɛnaa a.
Otsole odi kĩ babɔanɛ kawula ye futeli ewua-nviã flee natsã Yesu liti, ɛta ye atadiɛ sɔtɔbi.
Ɛlɛ nɛ ye lɔlɔ kamɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ nsila nta ye atadiɛ odi pɛ, maasaɛ.”
Kĩ Yesu dani ɛmɔ́ otsole a, ebi ye kĩ, “Yĩ obi, nɔ ɔwɔlɛ ɛka edzi. Nɔ katɛkado tsa nɔ.” Otsole a akũ de ɔsĩ nɛ lɔkɔ a na pɛpɛɛpɛ kamɛ.
Ke liti a, Yesu tomɔ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a biwo nɛ ye tɔtɔ kamɛ. Kĩ ɛmɔ́ tukutɔnɔ basãnɛ mɔ bati beblebee a kĩ bɛlamɛna kabe yoo a,
ebi be kĩ, “Mi flee minɛ, kabisɛ̃ɛ̃tsole a táku, mbom tida kɛwaa!” Ade bati a flee mɛmɛ ye a.
Kĩ bɛblɔmɛna bati a bɛnɛmɛna a, Yesu wo nɛ kabisɛ̃ɛ̃ a sɛkɛ̃ nɛ kɔla a kamɛ. Epi ke nɛ kɔkpɔ ade kinyinya kiyidza kɛdza a.
Fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ gba nɛ tite a na akũ flee.
Kĩ Yesu to awã yanaa a, banɛkunɛ nviã badi tomɔ ye nɛ liti bɛkabɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba kĩ, “Dawid obi, mɔ boe kɔnya!”
Kĩ Yesu wo nɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ a, banɛkunɛ a ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃, ade evia be kĩ, “Mitɛ mido kĩ maapuli ntsa mi?”
Bɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oo, boe Ɔlate!”
Foesũ Yesu kɔa awɛ ɛta be banebi ɛlɛ kĩ, “Fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ mitɛ mido a.”
Ade be anɛ binya bɛmɔ́ fɔkɔ a. Yesu si be mbla mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ, “Mitabi odima fukĩĩ!”
Lɛmɛ bɛdzakũ nɛ awã bɛnagbamɛna fɔlɛtsa a nɛ Yesu akũ nɛ tite a amantam a flee kamɛ.
Kĩ banyole a nɛ banaa a, bati badi kpã oti bɛbã kĩ yaápuli ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla, kitonɛkĩ hũhũ kpa deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ a bɛma Yesu.
Kĩ Yesu sila ɛblɔmɛna hũhũ kpa a nɛ ye kamɛ a, epuli ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla. Fɔkɛna bati kɔdabu a wãwã, ade bɛlɛ kĩ, “Bɔtámɔ tɔ̃ fukĩĩ odu nɛ Israel.”
Lɛmɛ Farisifɔ a lɛ kĩ, “Hũhũ kpa a lɛgã lɛkpa ye kɔbɛ̃ ɛnɛɛ yablɔmɛna hũhũ kpa.”
Yesu mini nɛ tɛmatɔ mɔ tukula a kamɛ. Ɛtsa fɔtsa nɛ fɔtsɛnakɔ̃ a, ɛlɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a nɛ ode lɛgã kanyakɔ̃ a akũ, ade ɛtsa fɔsɔ ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ lɛmɛ a.
Kĩ ɛmɔ́ bati kɔdabu a, be akũ kɔ ye kɔnya, kitonɛkĩ kipiã be, bɛlá obumɛnanɛ ade bɛgba biko ndɛ baveli kĩ bɛlá ɔkpãnɛ a.
Foesũ ebi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Fudutsa a kĩ baaveli a pɔnɛ, lɛmɛ adzuma bakɛnanɛ a lɛpɔ́nɛ.
Foesũ mike kɔba ɔlate a kĩ ye fudutsa baaveli a aduli, kĩ edo adzuma bakɛnanɛ bɛyaakpɔta foe.”
Yesu vɛ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ewua-nviã a ɛkpɔta, ade ɛkpa be kɔbɛ̃ kĩ bɛblɔmɛna hũhũ kpa bitomɛna bati kamɛ, bɛtsa fɔsɔ fudi nyɛ fudi a.
Fɔtɔ banyanɛ ewua-nviã a buĩ nyɛ.
Ɔtɔnyade, Simon kĩ bibuki bavɛ Petro, mɔ ɔwaɛ̃ Andrea,
Yakobo mɔ ɔwaɛ̃ Yohanes kĩ bɛnyɛ Zebedeo babi,
Filipo mɔ Bartolomeo mɔ Toma,
Mateo ɔgɔlɛ ɔtɛnɛ a,
mɔ Alfeo obi Yakobo mɔ Tadeo,
Simon kĩ epili ye kade lɔlɔ,
mɔ Yuda Iskariot kĩ ye lɛnyɛ Yesu ɛkpa a.
Yesu do bati ewua-nviã kĩĩ fɔtɔ mɔ ɔlɛdo kĩ, “Mitanaa bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a tite akũ ĩye miwo nɛ Samariafɔ tɛmatɔ kamɛ.
Mbom minaa Israelfɔ a kĩ bɛla ndɛ baveli kĩ bɛyɛla osi a sɛkɛ̃.
Minaade lɛtsã kĩ, ‘Baguma ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a fuã!’
Mitsa basɔnɛ, midzɛla banɔkpa bidzi nkpã, mitsa bikĩ basɔ fɔsɔ ngbã, miblɔmɛna hũhũ kpa mitomɛna bati kamɛ. Mitɛ kɔbɛ̃ kĩĩ kɔa, foesũ mikɔa mikpa faa.
Mitabɔɛ sika sidima milɛ nɛ mi fuvũ kamɛ.
Odima ɛtabɔɛ ositsãnɛ kuvũ, atadiɛ ayade, mpabua ayade ĩye otse kĩ bake katsã ɛlɛ nɛ osi a akũ. Kɛfɛta kĩ bɛkpa adzuma ɔkɛnanɛ lɛtsa a kĩ esĩ a.
“Ntɛ miwo ɔmatɔ ĩye akula adi kamɛ ni, miwɛ oti odi kĩ yaatunɔ ɛtɛ mi, lɔkɔa mise nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃, mina nɛ awã kɛnaawo kĩ míadzakũ.
Ntɛ miwo nɛ tɔtɔ tidi kamɛ ni, miwɔ̃na te kamɛ bati a kĩ, ‘Lukudɔ lɛna nɛ mi akũ.’
Ntɛ tɔtɔ a kamɛ bati a tɛ mi mɔ kawɔlɛ ni, mifɔ̃ mi lukudɔ kawɔ̃na a kɛkahɔ nɛ be akũ. Lɛmɛ ntɛ bɛtátɛ mi ni, mifɔ̃ mi lukudɔ kawɔ̃na a kimuniki kɛya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃.
Awã kĩ bati tátɛ mi ni, minɛ nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ lɔkɔa miyɔ mi abɔa akũ kudu miko be.
Mabi mi ɔnɔkɔali a kĩ nɛ Kadzɛ Luwi a akũ a, Baguma aamɔ Sodom mɔ Gomora bati kɔnya ɛba ɔmatɔ a na kamɛ bati.
“Midã, mado mi ndɛ baveli aye nɛ kulikii kamɛ, foesũ minyi kadi ndɛ bɔɛ aye, midɔla akũ bɔɛɛ ndɛ mblɔduma aye.
Midã mi akũ kadã wĩ, kitonɛkĩ bati aakɔa mi bido nɛ fɔlɛtsa badzɛnɛ awɛ, ade baabo mi nɛ Yudafɔ fɔtsɛnakɔ̃ a.
Ade nɛ yĩ sũ baakpã mi bɛnamɛna ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ fɔgã anɛ, lɔkɔa fɔnya adansiɛ kĩ míadi nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ mikpa be mɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a.
Ntɛ bɛkpã mi bɛnamɛna fɔlɛtsa kadzɛkɔ̃ ni, mitaha akũ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ míalɛ mɔ ayekĩ míadzɛla a akũ. Ntɛ lɔkɔ a wo ɔtɔ a, Baguma aakpa mi fɔlɛtsa a kĩ míalɛ a,
kitonɛkĩ nnɛ́ mi aalɛ kɔdzɛla, mbom mi Ɔlɛga Hũhũ a aalɛ kɔdzɛla ɛtsãmɛna mi akũ.
“Bati aakɔa be mɔawɛ bawaɛ̃ bɛkpa kĩ bɛkɔ, ade balɛga lɛmɛ aakɛna foe lɔmɔ nɛ be mɔawɛ babi akũ, ade babi aayidza bɛdza nɛ be bamanɛ akũ bɛfɔ̃ bɛkɔ be a.
Bati flee aakesĩ mi nɛ yĩ sũ, lɛmɛ oti a kĩ yaadza pintii kɛnaawo kawũna ni, Baguma aakpa ye nkpã.
Ntɛ bitomɔ mi liti nɛ ɔmatɔ odi kamɛ ni, milo minaa ɔbɛbã kamɛ. Mawɛ kĩ minyi kĩ miláayua adzuma kakɛna nɛ Israel tɛmatɔ a kamɛ fɔmɔ Otidziwa Obi a aaya.
“Fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ odima lɛbɛ́ ye fɔtsa ɔtsanɛ, ade ɔsumunɛ lɛmɛ lɛbɛ́ ye ɔlate a.
Kɛnɛ kĩ fuwĩ ɔkɔlɛnɛ kĩ yayaakɛna ndɛ ye fɔtsa ɔtsanɛ, ade ɔsumunɛ lɛmɛ kĩ yayaakɛna ndɛ ye ɔlate a. Ntɛ bɛvɛ kɔla ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ odi kĩ hũhũ kpa flee lɛgã a, buĩ kpa badabe bɛláavɛ kɔla babi?
“Nɛ foe sũ mitavila bati. Lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ bɛkɔa bɛkɔla finyaa ni, baanyɛ de kanya, ade kalɛ a kĩ bɛkɔla ni, kaanɛ binu ke.
Lɛtsa a kĩ mabi mi nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ a, milɛ de nɛ suwa ketee, ade lɛtsa a kĩ minu nɛ kabɛla kamɛ a, mide ke lɛtsã nɛ kanade.
Mitavila bati a kĩ bakɔ oti sukɛna lɛmɛ bɛláapuli bɛkɔ ɔkla a, mbom mivila Baguma a kĩ yaapuli ɛwɔla oti sukɛna mɔ ye ɔkla flee nɛ fi luwotu kamɛ a.
Kaplɛ mɔapɛ miakɔa kaya funitataɛ nviã, lɛmɛ koe kamɛ kamɔapɛ malo látɔ nɛ tite kĩ fɔnyɛ́ mi Ɔlɛga nɛ ode a kawɛ.
Mi kɔ̃ Baguma kã mi lɔlɔ tɔlɔ malo flee.
Foesũ mitavila, kitonɛkĩ mitɛ kɔya miba funitataɛ beblebee.
“Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaabɔa yĩ dĩ nɛ bati anɛ kĩ ye ode manɛ ni, yĩ malo maakɛna foe lɔmɔ nkpa ye nɛ Nda nɛ ode a anɛ.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi sĩ yĩ nɛ bati anɛ ni, yĩ malo maasĩ ye nɛ Nda nɛ ode a anɛ.
“Mitakɔna kĩ lukudɔ nkɔa ĩyamɛna nɛ katinya kamɛ. Oowo, ntáya mɔ lukudɔ, mbom kɔpã nkɔa ĩyamɛna.
Ĩya kĩ makɛna
‘babinyole biyidza bɛdza nɛ balɛga akũ,
babitsole liyidza bɛdza nɛ bama akũ,
babi batsɔ̃ biyidza bɛdza nɛ be nyina amɛ akũ.
Oti bakesĩnɛ aanya ye mɔawɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ bati.’
“Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yawɛ ɔlɛga ĩye ɔma kalɛ kaba yĩ ni, ɛtákpɔla kĩ yanya yĩ fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ, ade ayea odi nyɛ odi kĩ yawɛ ye obinyole ĩye obitsole kalɛ kaba yĩ ni, ɛtákpɔla kĩ yanya yĩ fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtábɔɛ ye asendua etomɔ yĩ nɛ liti ni, ɛtákpɔla kĩ yanya yĩ fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛwɛ kĩ yapili ye nkpã ni, yaayɛla ye, lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaayɛla ye nkpã nɛ yĩ sũ ni, yaana nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a.
“Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ mi ni, ɛtɛ yĩ malo, ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ yĩ ni, ɛtɛ oti a kĩ edo yĩ a.

Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ nɛ kĩ ɛnyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ sũ ni, yaana kɔtɔkase a kĩ Baguma aakpa ye a kamɛ. Ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ oti wĩ nɛ ayekĩ ɛnyɛ oti wĩ sũ ni, yaana tsɛfã nɛ kɔtɔkase a kĩ Baguma aakpa oti wĩ a odu.
Mitɛ mido kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaakpa bikĩ bitomɔ yĩ kĩĩ kamɛ obisɛ̃de mɔa mui dɔwa kɔɔpu mɔapɛ malo ni, yaana foe kɔtɔkase.”
Kĩ Yesu do ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ewua-nviã a fɔtɔ eyua a, ɛdzakũ nɛ awã ɛnaa tɛmatɔ a kĩ tifuã a kamɛ kĩ yanaatsa fɔtsa, ede lɛtsã nɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa a lɛmɛ akũ.
Kĩ Yohanes Mui Ɔwɔlanɛ a, kĩ ɛwaa kɔla a nu lɛtsa a kĩ Yesu lamɛna kakɛna a, edo ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a badi nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃,
kĩ bɛnaavia ye kĩ, “Nɔ nyɛ oti a kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi kĩ yaaya a, mbɔɛɛ kĩ bɔdã oti bɛbã anɛ?”
Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mimuniki minaabi Yohanes lɛtsa a kĩ mimɔ́ mɔ lɛtsa a kĩ minu a.
Banɛkunɛ mɔ́ fɔkɔ, bikĩ biveliveli yidza bɛtsɛ̃, bikĩ basɔ fɔsɔ ngbã akũ kpalɛ, batɔsĩnɛ anu fɔkɔ, bɛdzɛla banɔkpa bidzi nkpã, ade bɛlamɛna ahiãfɔ Kalɛ Wĩ a kabi a.
Baguma hila oti a kĩ ɛtámɔ nfumusu adima nɛ yĩ akũ!”
Kĩ Yohanes batɔ a dzakũ a, Yesu yi kayɔ mɔ kɔdzɛla kalɛ nɛ Yohanes akũ kabi bati kɔdabu a kĩ, “Kĩ minɛ minaa Yohanes sɛkɛ̃ nɛ kɔsa kamɛ a, litsa minaadã? Kɔɔkaɛ kĩ ɔwɛ abɔa katomɛna katɛ̃mɛna mbɔɛɛ?
Litsa koũ minɛ minaadã? Oti kĩ ɛkɛɛlɛ ye akũ mɔ fɔtsa mɔ kalɛ yanɛ? Bikĩ bado tɛtadiɛ mɔ kɔya ni, fɔgã tɔtɔ kamɛ bana.
Mibi yĩ lɛtsa a sũ koũ miti minɛ a? Kĩ míamɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ mbɔɛɛ? Nuwĩ mifɔ̃ nti mbi mi, mimɔ́ oti a kĩ ɛbɛ̃ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ malo.
Kitonɛkĩ Yohanes akũ mɔ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ,
‘Dã, maado yĩ fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ ĩnyamɛna nɔ lɔtɔ,
yaalɔla osi nɛ nɔ lɔtɔ.’
Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ Yohanes Mui Ɔwɔlanɛ a bɛ̃ otidziwa odi nyɛ odi kĩ edzi nkpã tɔ̃. Lɛmɛ oti kĩ ɛnyɛ obisɛ̃ kɔlaa nɛ ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a bɛ̃ Yohanes.
Kito Yohanes lɛtsã kade lɔkɔ kɛyawo nviã kĩĩ ni, bati yidza bɛdza nɛ Baguma ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a akũ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ, bɛlamɔ mbɔdi kabɔa lɛmɛ kĩ basua de kaya osi.
Kɛyawo Yohanes kaya lɔkɔ a, Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a flee mɔ Mose mbla a lɛ fɔlɛtsa biyi nɛ Baguma ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a akũ.
Ntɛ miawɛ kĩ miatɛ be fɔlɛtsa mido kɔ̃ ni, minyi kĩ Yohanes nyɛ Eliya a kĩ bɛlɛ biyi kĩ yaanya lɔtɔ ɛya a.
Oti a kĩ edeĩ sɔtɔ kĩ sanu tuwuli ni, etse!
“Finyaa, litsa maakɔa nviã bati nkɔnamɔ? Bɛla ndɛ babisɛ̃ kĩ bikoni nɛ kɔyaatɔ bagulo. Babɔa fɔwɔla kabi be bakɔba kĩ,
‘Bɔsã obolitsɔ̃ tɔnɔ bɔkpa mi,
lɛmɛ mitáto.
Bɔsã tukutɔnɔ bɔkpa mi,
lɛmɛ mitábe.’
Kĩ Yohanes ya a, ɛtánya ɛtámɔa waĩ, lɛmɛ bati lɛ kĩ, ‘Hũhũ kpa deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ!’
Kĩ Otidziwa Obi a ya a, yanya, yamɔa, ade bati lɛ kĩ, ‘Midã ɔnyakpanɛ mɔ bavɛ ɔmɔanɛ, tɔgɔlɛ batɛnɛ mɔ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ ɔkɔba.’ Lɛmɛ oti fɔkɛlatsa kamɛ bamɔ ye nyansã.”
Tɛmatɔ a kĩ te kamɛ Yesu kɛna ye awãwã fɔtsa pii a kamɛ bati tádani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ, foesũ ɛkã tɛmatɔ a anɛ ɛlɛ kĩ,

“Bɔbɔɛ makpa nɔ Korasin! Bɔbɔɛ makpa nɔ Betsaida! Ntɛ awãwã fɔtsa a kĩ nkɛna nɛ mi kamɛ a mɔ Tiro mɔ Sidon tɛmatɔ kamɛ nkɛna foe ni, kufɛ te kamɛ bati dani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kɔkɔɛ bidzi tikpekpe, bɛtsɛla batɔ.
Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ nɛ Kadzɛ Luwi a akũ ni, Baguma aamɔ Tiro mɔ Sidon bati kɔnya ɛba mi!

Ade nɔ Kapernaum! Ɔwɛ kĩ abɔɛ nɔ akũ ɔdɛla ɔnaatamɔ ode? Baakɛna nɔ nɛ kayɔ flee ɔnaawo kanɔkpade! Kitonɛkĩ awãwã fɔtsa a kĩ bɛkɛna nɛ nɔ kamɛ a mɔ Sodom bɛkɛna foe ni, kufɛ ɔmatɔ a buki edeĩ mɔ nviã kĩĩ!
Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ nɛ Kadzɛ Luwi a akũ ni, Baguma aamɔ Sodom ɔmatɔ a kɔnya ɛba nɔ.”
Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, Yesu lɛ kĩ, “Nda, tite mɔ ode Ɔlate, manyɛ nɔ kɔlɛ kĩ ɔnyɛ fɔtsa a kĩ bɛkɔa bɛkɔla tuvoli banyinɛ mɔ anyansãfɔ a ɔtsa babisɛ̃.
Oo! Nda, ade foe awo nɔ anɛ a.
“Nda kɔa lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa edo nɛ yĩ awɛ. Odima linyína Obi a mbɔɛntɛ Ɔlɛga a odi, ade odima lɛmɛ linyína Ɔlɛga a mbɔɛntɛ Obi a odi, mɔ bikĩ Obi a awɛ kĩ yanyɛ ye ɛtsa a.
“Miya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃, mi flee a kĩ mikɛna adzuma, minɔnɛ fɔtsa mɔ ɔlɔmɛ kĩ kipiã mi a, lɔkɔa maakpa mi kawɛya.
Mibɔɛ yĩ sɔmɔ akũ otse a mite nɛ mi akũ, mikɔlɛ fɔtsa mitomɛna yĩ sɛkɛ̃, lɔkɔa mina kawɛya, kitonɛkĩ yĩ fɔlɛtsa dɔ, ade ndɔla yĩ akũ nɛ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ a.
Kitonɛkĩ yĩ sɔmɔ akũ otse a kalɔ lɛlá ɔsĩ, ade yĩ fɔtsa a kĩ maalɔla mi a adã faafaa a.”
Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, Yesu natsã fugbanɔ kɔba kudi kamɛ nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ. Kɔlɛ kakɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a, foesũ biveli fudi bɛtsɛ̃ bɛba.
Kĩ Farisifɔ mɔ́ foe a, bibi Yesu kĩ, “Dã, nɔ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ akɛna lɛtsa a kĩ boe mbla tákpa osi kĩ bɛkɛna nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ!”
Ade Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mbɔɛɛ mitakã tɔ̃ lɛtsa a kĩ Dawid kɛna nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ kɔlɛ kɔ bɛmɔ bati a kĩ bitomɔ ye a?
Ewo nɛ Baguma kɔla a kamɛ ade bɛmɔ ye bati a bɛnya abodoo a kĩ bɛkɔa bɛbɔa afɔliɛ bɛkpa Baguma a, titɔ kĩ mbla tákpa osi kĩ bɛnya ye malo. Basɔfɔ odi bɛkpa osi kĩ bɛnya abodoo a na.
Mbɔɛɛ mitákã nɛ Mose mbla ovoli a kamɛ kĩ nɛ Kawɛya luwi nyɛ luwi akũ ni, basɔfɔ a kĩ basum nɛ Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ a afum Kawɛya Luwi mbla a, lɛmɛ baákɔ be foe kɔtɔ?
Mabi mi kĩ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛtɛ kɔya lɛba Asɔli Kɔla a deĩ nɛ awĩ.
Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, ‘Sɛmɛ kalɛ mawɛ, nnɛ́ bayaɛ afɔliɛ.’ Ntɛ kanu minu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kayɔ ni, kufɛ miláakɔ bikĩ bɛtáfum a kɔtɔ,
kitonɛkĩ Otidziwa Obi a nyɛ Kawɛya Luwi a Ɔlate.”
Yesu dzakũ nɛ awã ɛnaa Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ kadi, awã kĩ
onyole odi kĩ ye kɔkpɔ ku lɛmɛ na. Bati badi kĩ bɛwɛ kĩ babɔɛ fɔlɛtsa nɛ Yesu akũ na nɛ awã, foesũ bivia ye kĩ, “Boe mbla kpa osi kĩ bɛtsa fɔsɔ nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ?”
Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ mi kamɛ odi deĩ kuveli mɔa mɔ kɔka kuwo nɛ lɛkɛ kamɛ nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ a, ɛláado awɛ epi koe ɛnyɛ?
Ade oti deĩ kɔya ɛbɛ̃ kuveli a! Foesũ boe mbla kpa osi kĩ bɛkɛna tuwĩ nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ.”
Adeke ebi onyole a kĩ ye kɔkpɔ ku a kĩ, “Yo nɔ kɔkpɔ.” Eyo kɔkpɔ a ade kubuki kɔna ɔsĩ ndɛ kɔyade a.
Ade Farisifɔ a dzakũ bɛnapi adzuni kĩ baakɔ Yesu a.
Kĩ Yesu nu kĩ bisui nɛ ye akũ a, ɛdzakũ nɛ lɔpɔ a na kamɛ, lɛmɛ bati kɔdabu baũ tomɔ ye. Ɛtsa basɔnɛ a flee,
ade esi be mbla kĩ bɛtabi bati kadima nɛ ye akũ.
Ɛlɛ fukĩĩ ayekĩ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Baguma lɛ ɛtsãmɛna ye Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yesaya akũ a aaya nɛ foe kamɛ kĩ,
“Ade yĩ osumunɛ a kĩ mpau nɛ awĩ a.
Ɛnyɛ oti kĩ mawɛ kalɛ, ade yawo yĩ anɛ a.
Maakɔa yĩ Hũhũ nko nɛ ye akũ,
lɔkɔa ede lɛtsã nɛ yĩ fɔlɛtsa kadzɛ akũ ɛkpa fude fude.
Ɛláavɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa, ĩye ɛbɔa fɔwɔla,
ĩye binu ye odo nɛ tɔblɔnu anɛ.
Yaana ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ ɛkpa bikĩ bɛlá kɔbɛ̃ a,
ade yaakɛna sɛmɛ kalɛ ɛkpa bikĩ bɛlá kabumɛna a.
Yaadza pintii kɛnaawo kĩ ɛfɔ̃ kadzɛ nɛ osi kpĩĩ akũ anya akũ,
ade bati flee aakɔa anɛ bite nɛ ye akũ a.”
Ke liti a, bati badi kpã oti odi kĩ hũhũ kpa deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ, kĩ ɛnyɛ ɔnɛkunɛ mɔ omumu bɛma Yesu. Yesu tsa oti a, epuli ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla ɛmɔ fɔkɔ lɛmɛ.
Lɛtsa a kĩ Yesu kɛna a, kɛna bati kɔdabu a flee a saa, ade bivia kĩ, “Mbɔɛɛ nnɛ́ Dawid Obi a nɛ awĩ a?”
Kĩ Farisifɔ nu fukĩĩ a, bɛlɛ kĩ, “Yablɔmɛna hũhũ kpa kitonɛkĩ hũhũ kpa lɛgã Beelzebul akpa ye kɔbɛ̃ kĩ ɛkɛna foe.”

Yesu nyi lɛtsa a kĩ bɛkakɔna a, foesũ ebi be kĩ, “Ɔmaĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛsɛ̃ ye akũ nɛ kutsu kutsu kamɛ, mɔ tɛdzɛ deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ ni, ɛláadzi gɛlɛɛlɛ. Ade aye a ntɛ ɔmatɔ ĩye kɔla kudi bati sɛ̃ nɛ kutsu kutsu kamɛ mɔ tɛdzɛ deĩ nɛ be kamɛ ni, kaku ɔmatɔ a ĩye kɔla a aaku.
Foesũ ntɛ katsu mɔa kadi nɛ Abonsam lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ anɔ mɔ kabɛbã ni, fɔatsa kĩ ye lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a sɛ̃ kutsu kutsu kɔkɔɛ, ade kɔ́ayalɛ a.
Ntɛ mialɛ kĩ Beelzebul lɛkpa yĩ kɔbɛ̃ nnɛɛ mablɔmɛna hũhũ kpa a ni, owei lɛkpa bati a kĩ bitomɔ mi a kɔbɛ̃ bɛnɛɛ bablɔmɛna hũhũ kpa? Lɛtsa a kĩ mi mɔawɛ bati a kĩ bitomɔ mi akɛna a, aakɔ mi kɔtɔ.
Oowo! Nnɛ́ Beelzebul kɔbɛ̃ nnɛɛ, mbom Baguma Hũhũ kɔbɛ̃ nnɛɛ mablɔmɛna hũhũ kpa, kĩ fɔatsa kĩ Baguma lɛgãkanya a ya nɛ mi akũ kɔkɔɛ.
“Odima lɛláapuli ewo nɛ ɔbɛlɛbɛ kɔla kamɛ efila ye akũ fɔtsa, mbɔɛntɛ ɛnya lɔtɔ esuli oti a edo nɛ tɔwɛ̃ kamɛ fɔmɔ yaapuli ɛpasa tɔtɔ a kamɛ efila ye fɔtsa.
“Odi nyɛ odi kĩ edzɛ́ nɛ yĩ liti ni, eyidza nɛ yĩ akũ, ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaábumɔ yĩ bɔakpɔta ni, kayalɛ yayalɛ kawula.
Ade foesũ mabi mi kĩ baakɔa tɔkpa nyɛ tɔkpa mɔ fubusuotsa fudi nyɛ fudi kĩ bati alɛ a bite be, lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaalɛ fubusuotsa nɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a kɔ̃ akũ ni, bɛláakɔa bite ye.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaalɛ kɔdzɛla etia Otidziwa Obi a ni, baakɔa bite ye, lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaalɛ kɔdzɛla etia Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a ni, bɛláakɔa bite ye finyaa ĩye nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ laya a kamɛ.
“Fɔmɔ aana kutse libi wĩ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ ana kutse wĩ, ade ntɛ odeĩ kutse kpa ni, kutse libi kpa aana. Babi a kĩ kutse awũ a bakɔa kanyi kutse a odu.
Mi bati ndɛ bɔɛ babi! Nde míapuli milɛ fɔlɛtsa wĩ kĩ minyɛ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ? Kitonɛkĩ lɛtsa a kĩ liyi oti ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ ni, ade foe anɛ nɛ ye onukpɛ̃ a.
Oti wĩ anyɛ fɔtsa wĩ kanya katomɛna ye fɔtsa wĩ kakɔlakɔ̃, ade oti kpa lɛmɛ anyɛ fɔtsa kpa kanya katomɛna ye fɔtsa kpa kakɔlakɔ̃ a.
Mitɛ mido kĩ nɛ Kadzɛ Luwi a akũ ni, odi nyɛ odi aanyɛ ye akũ onukpɛ̃ nɛ kalɛ pupulidza kadi nyɛ kadi kĩ ɛlɛ tɔ̃ a akũ.
Nɔ mɔawɛ onukpɛ̃ kamɛ fɔlɛtsa baakɔa bɛdzɛmɔ nɔ bɛkpa nɔ ɔtɔbɛ ĩye bɛkɔ nɔ kɔtɔ.”
Ade mbla batsanɛ mɔ Farisifɔ badi bi Yesu kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, bɔawɛ kĩ kɛna nsɛntsɛlɛni adi bɔdã.”
Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nviã babi kpa mɔ bati kĩ binyína Baguma! Miavia yĩ kĩ nkɛna awãwã fɔtsa midã? Oowo! Awãwã fɔtsa a kĩ baanyɛ bɛtsa mi nyɛ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yona fude a.
Ndɛ ayekĩ Yona dzi fuwi ɛlalɛ lɛnyɛ mɔ suwa nɛ kafɔabi kpale lupu kamɛ a, ade aye Otidziwa Obi a lɛmɛ aatɛ fuwi ɛlalɛ lɛnyɛ mɔ suwa nɛ tite kamɛ a.
Nɛ Kadzɛ Luwi a akũ ni, Ninivefɔ aayidza mɔ mi bidzi bɛkɔ mi kɔtɔ, kitonɛkĩ bɛdani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kĩ binu Baguma fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Yona lɛ a. Midã, litsedi deĩ nɛ awĩ kĩ lɛbɛ̃ Yona.
Nɛ Kadzɛ Luwi a akũ a, Seba Lɛgãtsole aayidza ɛdza ɛkɔ mi kɔtɔ, kitonɛkĩ ɛtsã osi gɛlɛɛlɛ eto ye ɔmaĩ kamɛ ɛyatse Lɛgã Salomo nyansã fɔtsa katsa, ade mitɛ yĩ mido kĩ odi deĩ nɛ awĩ kĩ ɛbɛ̃ Salomo.
“Ntɛ hũhũ kpa nɛ́ nɛ oti kamɛ a, yanaatsã kamini nɛ fɔkɔ wɛlɛwa kawɛ kadzikɔ̃. Ntɛ ɛtána kadzikɔ̃ ni,
yabi ye akũ kĩ, ‘Maamuniki nnaa yĩ kɔla kɔɛ a kamɛ.’ Foesũ ntɛ ɛyamɔ kĩ bɛyɔ koe kamɛ bɛlɔla koe kamɛ yededeede a,

yanaa kanaakpã hũhũ kpa bɛbã evũkɔnɔ kĩ bideĩ ɔsĩ bɛbɛ̃ ye kayamɛna. Bawo nɛ oti a kamɛ kadzi nɛ awã, ade oti a kadzi kamɛ abu kade kaba ayekĩ fɔna nɛ kayɔkayi a. Ade aye fɔ́aya fɔkpa nviã bati kpa kĩĩ a.”
Kĩ Yesu kalɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ bati a, ɔma mɔ bawaɛ̃nyole yawo awã. Bɛdza nɛ kanya bɛwɛ kĩ balɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ ye.
Foesũ bati a kamɛ odi bi ye kĩ, “Dã, ama mɔ awaɛ̃nyole amɛ dzɛ̃ nɛ kanya bawɛ kĩ balɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ nɔ.”
Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Owei nyɛ mma? Bawei nyɛ nwaɛ̃ amɛ?”
Ade eyo awɛ ɛtsa ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a ɛlɛ kĩ, “Midã, ade mma mɔ nwaɛ̃ amɛ nɛ awĩ a!
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɛna nɛ Nda nɛ ode kawɛ akũ ni, ade ye nyɛ nwaɛ̃nyole, mɔ nwaɛ̃tsole mɔ mma a.”
Luwi mɔapɛ a, Yesu nɛ́ nɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ, ɛnadzi nɛ ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a abuĩ ɛkatsa fɔtsa.
Ayekĩ bati kɔdabu a kĩ kɔtsɛna nɛ ye akũ a tɛ́nɛ kapɔ sũ ni, ewo edzi nɛ ɔkɔlɔ kamɛ ade kɔdabu a dza nɛ ɔwɔ abuĩ a.
Ɛtsa be fɔtsa pii nɛ fɔgbã kamɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Luwi a onyole odi naasã kamɔnɛ.
Kĩ ɛkasã babi a nɛ kɔba kamɛ a, badi tɔ nɛ osi ɔɔwɛ̃ ade kɔvɔlabi yafila be bɛmɛna a.
Babi a badi tɔ nɛ apibɔ akũ awã kĩ tite lɛpɔ́nɛ nɛ boe a anɛ. Babi a mɛ mɔatsɛ kitonɛkĩ tite a kamɛ tádzũ.
Foesũ kĩ suwa yata a, sipila te tɛvɛ ade tivio mɔatsɛ a, kitonɛkĩ te tunu a tanaa kamɛ dzununu.
Babi a badi tɔ nɛ fu tuwĩ kamɛ ade kĩ bɛmɛ bade a tuwĩ a bo anɛ tɛmɛna be.
Lɛmɛ babɛbã tɔ nɛ tite wĩ akũ ade biwũ babi a, badi wũ babi ɔha, badi wũ babi aduesia, ade babɛbã lɛmɛ wũ babi taalɛ a.”
Yesu wũna kĩ, “Oti a kĩ edeĩ sɔtɔ ni, etse!”
Ade fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a ya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃ bivia ye kĩ, “Nde sũ abi bati a fɔlɛtsa nɛ fɔgbã kamɛ?”
Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mi kɔ̃ bɛnyɛ ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a fɔlɛtsa kɔlawa kamɛ bɛtsa mi, lɛmɛ, bɛtányɛ foe kamɛ bɛtsa be.
Kitonɛkĩ oti a kĩ edeĩ fɔtsa ni, baakpa ye fudi bibu lɔkɔa fɔpɔ fubu, lɛmɛ oti a kĩ ɛlá lɛtsama ni, baatɛ foe kabii a kĩ edeĩ a malo nɛ ye awɛ.
Lɛtsa sũ a kĩ malɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ fɔgbã kamɛ mɔ be nyɛ kĩ bamɔ mɔ anɛ lɛmɛ baámɔ kayi ɔsũ, batse lɛmɛ baánu foe kayɔ.
Foesũ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yesaya fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi a ya nɛ foe kamɛ kĩ,
‘Bati kĩĩ aanu bibuki binu lɛmɛ bɛláanu foe kayɔ.
Ade baamɔ bibuki bɛmɔ́ lɛmɛ bɛláamɔ biyi ɔsũ.
Kitonɛkĩ be adzuni adã yududu,
ade be atɔ lánu kanu wĩ a,
ade bisua be anɛ a.
Ntɛ nnɛ́ aye ni, be anɛ aamɔ fɔkɔ,
be atɔ aanu,
be adzuni aanu fɔlɛtsa kayɔ!
Ade baadani bɛya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃,
lɔkɔa ntsa be fɔsɔ!’
Lɛmɛ mi kɔ̃ Baguma hila mi! Mi anɛ amɔ ade mi atɔ lɛmɛ anu fɔkɔ a.
Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ, Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ mɔ bati kpĩĩ pii wɛ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ bamɔ lɛtsa a kĩ miamɔ a, lɛmɛ bɛtápuli bɛmɔ́ foe, ade bɛwɛ lɛmɛ kĩ banu lɛtsa a kĩ mianu a lɛmɛ bɛtánu foe.
“Foesũ finyaa mitse ĩnyɛ lɛgbã nɛ kamɔnɛ odunɛ akũ a kayɔ minu.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yanu ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ fɔlɛtsa lɛmɛ yaánu foe kayɔ a, la ndɛ babi a kĩ biwula nɛ osi ɔɔwɛ̃ a. Oti Kpa a ayawãnɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bidu nɛ ye kamɛ a.
Babi a kĩ bɛtɔ nɛ apibɔ akũ a nyɛ oti a kĩ ntɛ esila enu fɔlɛtsa a, yatɛ foe mɔatsɛ mɔ kawɔlɛ,
lɛmɛ fɔáwo kanaa ye ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ dzununu, ade fɔábuna owi nɛ ye kamɛ a. Foesũ ntɛ ɔhau ĩye bati liti katomɛna ya nɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ sũ ni, yamuniki liti mɔatsɛ.
Babi a kĩ bɛtɔ nɛ fu tuwĩ kamɛ a nyɛ oti a kĩ yanu fɔlɛtsa a, lɛmɛ katinya kamɛ ɔhau mɔ akũ kana fɔtsa liti katomɛna anya fɔlɛtsa a akũ, foesũ fɔáwũ babi.
Ade babi a kĩ bɛtɔ nɛ tite wĩ akũ a nyɛ oti a kĩ yanu fɔlɛtsa a, kanu foe kayɔ lɛmɛ. Bawũ babi, badi ɔha, badi aduesia babɛbã lɛmɛ be taalɛ.”
Yesu bɔa be lɛgbã bɛbã kĩ, “Ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a la ndɛ oti odi kĩ ɛsã kamɔnɛ babi wĩ nɛ ye kɔba kamɛ.
Nɛ lɛnyɛ mɔa lidi, kĩ odi nyɛ odi wa tida a, ye okesĩnɛ nasã tuwĩ wuluwulu nɛ kamɔnɛ a kamɛ ɛdzakũ.
Kĩ kamɔnɛ a bo anɛ kido kayɛlɛ awɛ a, tuwĩ a lɛmɛ nɛ́ tɛdza nɛ ke kamɛ.
“Oti a basumunɛ ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ bibi ye kĩ, ‘Boe ɔlate, nnɛ́ funitsã wĩ odu nɛ kɔba a kamɛ, mɔ ndia tuwĩ kpa to tɛyamɛ nɛ ke kamɛ?’
“Ɔlate a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Okesĩnɛ odi lɛkɛna fukĩna.’
“Adeke bivia ye kĩ, ‘Awɛ kĩ bɔnaabɔlɛ tuwĩ a nɛ ke kamɛ?’
“Ebi be kĩ, ‘Oowo! Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ minaabɔlɛ tuwĩ a ni, míabɔlɛ kamɔnɛ a kadi mɔ te.

Mifɔ̃ kamɔnɛ a mɔ tuwĩ a flee fɔdza fubo anɛ kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ baanɛna kamɔnɛ a. Ade lɔkɔ a na maabi kamɔnɛ banɛnanɛ a kĩ bɛnya lɔtɔ bɛbɔlɛ tuwĩ a bisui te fudzu fudzu lɔkɔa bipila te, ke liti bɛkpɔta kamɔnɛ a bifila bɛnaako nɛ yĩ oli kamɛ.’ ”
Yesu bɔa be lɛgbã bɛbã kĩ, “Ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a la ndɛ kutse libi kabii kĩ oti odi nadu nɛ ye kɔba kamɛ.
Lɛnyɛ kutse libi kabii flee nɛ kutse babi kamɛ, lɛmɛ ntɛ libo anɛ ni, kɔapɔ lububu kaba futse flee, ade kɔvɔlabi ayakɛna fɔtsɔɛ nɛ koe tɛnanɛ kamɛ a.”
Yesu buki ɛbɔa be lɛgbã bɛbã kĩ, “Ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a la ndɛ oyila fɔtsa kĩ otsole odi pɔtɔ edo nɛ mawɛ fɔwɔda kakɔna ɛlalɛ kamɛ kɛnawo kĩ mawɛ a flee vuya.”
Yesu bi bati kɔdabu a fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ flee nɛ fɔgbã kamɛ, ade yaálɛ fɔlɛtsa fudima ntɛ nnɛ́ nɛ fɔgbã kamɛ.
Ɛkɛna fukĩĩ kĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ fɔlɛtsa a fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ kĩ,
“Maalɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ fɔgbã kamɛ,
ade maanyɛ fɔtsa a kĩ bɛkɔa bɛkɔla kito anɛ
katinya kayɔkayi a ntsa a.”
Kĩ Yesu nyɛ bati kɔdabu a osi a, ɛya nɛ kɔla kamɛ ade ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ bɛyavia ye kĩ, “Nyɛ lɛgbã a kĩ ɔbɔa nɛ tuwĩ wuluwulu nɛ kamɔnɛ kamɛ a kayɔ katsa boe.”
Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oti a kĩ edu fudutsa wĩ a nyɛ Otidziwa Obi a.
Kɔba a nyɛ katinya kamɛ, fudutsa wĩ a nyɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a bade, ade tuwĩ a lɛmɛ nyɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ Okesĩnɛ a bade a.
Okesĩnɛ a kĩ ɛsã tuwĩ a nyɛ Abonsam. Fudutsa kakpɔta a nyɛ katinya kamɛ kawũna lɔkɔ, ade fudutsa bakpɔtanɛ a nyɛ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a.
“Ndɛ ayekĩ bakpɔta tuwĩ kapila te a, ade aye fɔ́ana nɛ katinya kawũna lɔkɔ a.
Otidziwa Obi a aado ye ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ bɛyaakpɔta be a kĩ bɛfɔ̃ bati kɛna tɔkpa mɔ be a kĩ bɛkɛna tɔkpa a flee bɛnɛmɛna nɛ Baguma lɛgã kanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ.
Baata be bido nɛ fi luwotu kamɛ, ade awã baabe bɛba adɔ̃ a.
Baguma bade a kɔ̃ akũ aakpalɛ ndɛ suwa aye nɛ be Ɔlɛga lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ. Oti a kĩ edeĩ sɔtɔ ni, etse!
“Ode lɛgã kanyakɔ̃ a la ndɛ akũ kana fɔtsa fudi kĩ bɛkɔa bɛkɔla nɛ kɔba kamɛ. Oti odi nake foe, ɛdani ɛkɔla foe. Ɛmɔ́ kawɔlɛ paa, foesũ ɛnanɔ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ edeĩ a emuniki ɛnaya kɔba a.”
Yesu buki ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a la ndɛ kɔyaatɔ ɔnyanɛ odi kĩ ɛtsɛ̃ yawɛ fulitsa babi wĩ.
Kĩ ɛnatsɛlamɔ lidi kĩ lideĩ kɔya paa a, ɛnanɔ fɔtsa a kĩ edeĩ a flee ɛkɔa ɛya fulitsa libi a.
“Ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a buki lɛla ndɛ asau kĩ bɛta bido nɛ mpo kamɛ bɛnyɛ kɔfɔabi ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ pii.
Kĩ asau a yi mɔ kɔfɔabi a, bɛvɛlɛ ye bɛyamɛna nɛ mpo abuĩ, bidzi bɛsa kɔfɔabi a kamɛ. Bɛkɔa kɔfɔabi wĩ a biko nɛ fɔwɔda kamɛ ade bɛtalɛ kɔkpa a biwula a.
Ade aye fɔ́ana nɛ katinya kawũna lɔkɔ a. Ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a aayasa bati kpa bɛnyɛ nɛ bati wĩ kamɛ,
ade baata be bido nɛ fi luwotu kamɛ, awã kĩ baabe bɛba adɔ̃ a.”
Yesu via be kĩ, “Minu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ flee kayɔ?”
Bitunɔ kĩ, “Oo.”
Foesũ ebi be kĩ, “Fukĩĩ atsa kĩ mbla ɔtsanɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛdani ɛkɛna fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ nɛ ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a akũ la ndɛ ɔtɔlate odi kĩ yanyɛ fɔtsa vɔɛ̃ mɔ fɔkɔɛ kanya katomɛna ye fɔtsa kakɔlakɔ̃.”
Kĩ Yesu bɔa fɔgbã kĩĩ eyua a, ɛdzakũ nɛ awã,
ɛnaa ye mɔawɛ ɔmatɔ kamɛ, ɛnatsa fɔtsa nɛ be katsɛnakɔ̃ a. Bati a kĩ binu ye fɔtsa katsa a kɛna saa, ade bivia akũ kĩ, “Ndia ɛkɔlɛ kadikanyi kĩĩ etomɛna? Ndia awãwã fɔtsa a lɛmɛ to?
Nnɛ́ ye nyɛ titse fɔtsa ɔmɛnɛ obi a mbɔɛɛ? Nnɛ́ ɔma nyɛ Maria, ade nnɛ́ bawaɛ̃nyole nyɛ Yakobo, Yosef, Simon mɔ Yuda a?
Nnɛ́ bawaɛ̃tsole lɛmɛ deĩ nɛ boe kamɛ nɛ awĩ a? Ndia etomɛna fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ flee?”
Ade ɛdani oti kĩ ye akũ ado be kalɔkpa a.
Yesu bi be kĩ, “Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ deĩ obu nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ mbɔɛntɛ nɛ ye mɔawɛ ɔmatɔ mɔ ye kɔla bati kamɛ mɔ ɛlá obu.”
Ayekĩ bɛtátɛ bido sũ ni, Yesu tákɛna awãwã fɔtsa pii nɛ awã.
Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, Herodes, Galilea tite akũ ɔnyanɛ a, nu Yesu nkã.
Ebi ye banɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ, “Yohanes Mui Ɔwɔlanɛ a liyidza eto kanɔkpa edzi nkpã, ade foesũ edeĩ kɔbɛ̃ kĩĩ ɛnɛɛ yakɛna awãwã fɔtsa a.”
Herodes nya lɔtɔ ɛfɔ̃ bipi Yohanes bisui ye bɛkɔa bido nɛ kɔla. Ɛkɛna fukĩĩ nɛ Herodia, ɔwaɛ̃ Filipo ɔtsɔ̃ sũ.
Lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya nyɛ kĩ Yohanes Mui Ɔwɔlanɛ a bi Herodes kĩ, “Mose mbla a tákpa osi kĩ akɔã Herodia.”
Fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ sũ Herodes wɛ kĩ yakɔ Yohanes, lɛmɛ evila Yudafɔ a kitonɛkĩ babu ye ndɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ aye.
Nɛ luwi a kĩ Herodes anya ye lɛmawi a, Herodia obitsole yato nɛ bati a flee anɛ. Ye kuto a lɛ Herodes kadã paa,
foesũ ɛlɔ fubo ɛkpa oyitsɔ̃ a kĩ, “Maakpa nɔ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ aavia yĩ!”
Oyitsɔ̃ a ɔma fɔ̃ ebi Herodes kĩ, “Kɔa Yohanes Mui Ɔwɔlanɛ a lɔlɔ kate nɛ tsensi akũ kakpa yĩ finyaakĩĩ!”
Kalɛ a wo lɛgã a kalɔɛ, lɛmɛ nɛ fubo a kĩ ɛlɔ nɛ obu bati a kĩ ɛvɛ a anɛ sũ ni, ɛkpa osi kĩ bɛkɛna nɛ oyitsɔ̃ a kawɛ akũ.
Foesũ ɛfɔ̃ bɛnatsua Yohanes lɔlɔ nɛ kɔla a kamɛ.
Bite oti lɔlɔ a nɛ tsensi akũ bɛyamɛna, ade bɛkɔa bɛkpa oyitsɔ̃ a, ade ye malo ɛkɔa de ɛma ɔma a.
Yohanes fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a nabɔɛ ɔnɔkpa a bɛnabila, ade bɛnabɔa Yesu amandiɛ a.
Kĩ Yesu nu Yohanes fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, ewo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ kamɛ ɛdzaku ɛnaa kakɔ kadi kĩ bati lɛláa. Lɛmɛ bati nu ye nkã, foesũ bɛtsã abɔa bito be tɛmatɔ kamɛ bitomɔ ye liti.
Yesu nɛ́ nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ, ade kĩ ɛmɔ bati kɔdabu a, be akũ kɔ ye kɔnya, ade ɛtsa be kamɛ basɔnɛ a.
Ke olobe a, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a fuã ye, ade bibi ye kĩ, “Kade dɔ kiyua ade awĩ táfuã ɔmatɔ kamɛ a, foesũ fɔnɛ bati a awɛ bɛdzakũ bɛnaa tukula kamɛ bɛnaaya funitsã bɛnya.”
Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Fɔtásĩ kĩ badzakũ. Mi mɔawɛ a mikpa be litsedi bɛnya!”
Fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Abodoo fɔbɔ elo mɔ kɔfɔabi nviã pɛ bɔnɛɛ nɛ awĩ.”
Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mikɔa foe mima yĩ nɛ awĩ.”
Ɛfɔ̃ bati a flee dzi nɛ tuwĩ akũ nɛ awã, ade ɛbɔɛ abodoo elo mɔ kɔfɔabi nviã a, ɛdã ode, ehila foe. Ke liti a, ɛyɛlɛ abodoo a, ɛkɔa ɛkpa ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a, ade be bɛsɛ̃ bɛkpa bati a.
Odi nyɛ odi nya ewĩ. Ke liti a, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a fila fuwuliwa a kĩ fute a biyula tɛtsɛtsɛ ewua-nviã.
Bati a kĩ bɛnya funitsã a lidede aawo banyole mpim elo, kĩ bɛtákã batsole mɔ babisɛ̃ bido nɛ be kamɛ.
Yesu fɔ̃ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a wo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ kamɛ kĩ binyina bɛnaa ɔwɔ lutubu baũ sɛkɛ sitide a, lɔkɔa ɛnyɛ bati a osi.
Kĩ ɛnyɛ bati a osi eyua a, ede ɛnaa ɔtɔ akũ ye odi kĩ yanaabɔa mpaɛ. Kĩ kade dɔ a Yesu odi lite nɛ awã.
Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, ɔkɔlɔ a naa mɔ lugo flee ade mpo akũ ɔwɛ kabɔa ye kato katɛ̃mɛna, kitonɛkĩ ɔwɛ mɔ ɔsĩ kavũ katsɛlamɔ ye.
Odenyinawi tɔdɔũ ɛlalɛ kamɛ a, Yesu tsɛ̃ nɛ mui anɛ yaya nɛ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a sɛkɛ̃.
Kĩ bɛmɔ́ ye ɛtsɛ̃ nɛ mui anɛ a, fute bɔɛ be bɛlɛ kĩ, “Ɔnɔkpa yanɛ!” ade bɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba mɔ libe a.
Deedimɔapɛ Yesu lɛmɔ be kɔdzɛla kĩ, “Mi ɔwɔlɛ ɛka edzi. Yĩ manɛ. Mitavila!”
Ade Petro lɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, ntɛ nuwĩ nɔ anɛ ni, fɔ̃ ntsã mui a anɛ ĩya nɛ nɔ sɛkɛ̃.”
Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Ya!”
Ade Petro nɛ́ nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ ɛtsã mui anɛ yanaa Yesu sɛkɛ̃ a.
Lɛmɛ kĩ ɛmɔ́ ayekĩ ɔwɛ lamɔ kavũ kɔɔba a, libe wo ye ade edo kayɛla awɛ nɛ mui a kamɛ a. Adeke ɛbɔa fɔwɔla kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, tɛ yĩ!”
Deedimɔapɛ Yesu yo awɛ epi ye nɛ kɔkpɔ, ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nɔ katɛkado adã kabii. Nde sũ ɔtɛ atsindze?”
Kĩ be nviã a biwo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ a ɔwɛ a fɔ̃ kavũ.
Fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ a ke aduli bisum Yesu, ade bɛlɛ kĩ, “Nuwĩnuwĩ Baguma Obi anɛ!”
Kĩ binyina ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a, bɛyaduma nɛ Genezaret tite akũ.
Awã bati mɔ́ Yesu biyi ɔsũ, foesũ bɛnakpã basɔnɛ nɛ kayite a flee bɛyamɛna nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃.
Bike ye aduli kĩ efɔ̃ basɔnɛ a bɛta ye atadiɛ atɔ odi pɛ. Ade bati a kĩ bɛta ye a flee akũ de ɔsĩ a.
Ade Farisifɔ mɔ mbla batsanɛ badi to Yerusalem bɛya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃ bivia ye kĩ,
“Nde sũ nɔ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a lákɛna nɛ fɔtsa katsa a kĩ boe bawanyɔ kɔa biyi boe a akũ? Baávɔlɛ awɛ nɛ osi wĩ akũ fɔmɔ banya!”
Yesu lɛmɛ via be kĩ, “Nde sũ mi malo miafum Baguma mbla mɔ miakɛna nɛ miawɛ fɔtsa katsa a akũ?
Mbɔɛɛ Baguma tálɛ kĩ, ‘Bu aga mɔ ama,’ ebuki ɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Odi nyɛ odi kĩ edumu ɔlɛga ĩye ɔma ni, kɛnɛ kĩ bɛkɔ ye’?
Lɛmɛ mi kɔ̃ miatsa fɔtsa kĩ ntɛ odi deĩ fɔtsa fudi kĩ yaapuli ɛkɔa ebumɔ ɔlɛga ĩye ɔma, mɔ ɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Nkɔa foe nkpa Baguma’ ni,
fɔtábuki fusĩ kĩ oti a abu ɔlɛga ĩye ɔma. Nɛ osi kĩĩ akũ mitábu Baguma mbla ayekĩ míatomɔ mi bawanyɔ fɔtsa katsa a sũ.
Mi anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa bakɛnanɛ! Fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yesaya lɛ nɛ mi akũ a ya nɛ foe kamɛ nuwĩ.
Baguma lɛ kĩ,
‘Ɔmaĩ kĩĩ asum yĩ mɔ onukpɛ̃ kamɛ fɔlɛtsa mɛnɛmɛnɛ,
lɛmɛ be tɔwɔlɛ deĩ mɔ lugo nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃.
Pupulidza basum yĩ,
kitonɛkĩ batidziwa mbla batsa
nɛ Baguma mbla a kadokɔ̃!’ ”
Ade Yesu vɛ bati kɔdabu a ɛkpɔta nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ ebi be kĩ, “Mitse lɔkɔa minu fɔlɛtsa kayɔ!
Nnɛ́ lɛtsa kĩ lawo nɛ oti onukpɛ̃ kamɛ a ado ye efĩĩ, mbom lɛtsa a kĩ lanɛ kato ye onukpɛ̃ kamɛ a, ado ye efĩĩ.”
Adeke ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ bɛyabi ye kĩ, “Onyina kĩ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ɔlɛ a wo Farisifɔ a kalɔɛ?”
Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Kutse nyɛ kutse kĩ nnɛ́ Nda nɛ ode lidu ni, baabɔlɛ koe bimuni.
Foesũ mifɔnɛ be awɛ. Bɛnyɛ banɛkunɛ kĩ bakpã banɛkunɛ, ade ntɛ ɔnɛkunɛ akpã ɔnɛkunɛ ni, be nviã a flee baatɔ nɛ lɛkɛ kamɛ.”
Petro bi ye kĩ, “Nyɛ lɛgbã kĩĩ kayɔ katsa boe.”
Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mbɔɛɛ mi malo bati kĩ baánu fɔlɛtsa kayɔ mibuki mianɛ?
Mitánu foe kayɔ kĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ lawo nɛ oti onukpɛ̃ kamɛ a kanaa ye lupu kamɛ, ke liti yanaanyɛ nɛ kɔbɔa kayo kamɛ?
Lɛmɛ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔanɛ kato oti onukpɛ̃ a, ato ye ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ ade foe ado oti efĩĩ a.
Kitonɛkĩ oti ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ adzuni kpa, oti kakɔ, adɔpaa kabɔa, bayitsɔ̃ mɔ bapopo kawa katɛ̃, kaye, fɔvã adansiɛ kadi, mɔ bati buĩ kanyɛ anɛ kato.
Ade fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ ado oti efĩĩ a, lɛmɛ kĩ ɔkɔa awɛ kĩ ɔtávɔlɛ anya ndɛ ayekĩ Farisifɔ atsa a, ládo oti efĩĩ.”
Yesu dzakũ nɛ awã ɛnaa kayite a kĩ kifuã Tiro mɔ Sidon tɛmatɔ kpale a kamɛ.
Awã naa, Kanan otsole odi kĩ edzi nɛ kayite a na ya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃ mɔ fɔwɔla kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, Dawid Obi, mɔ yĩ kɔnya! Yĩ obitsole lamɛna lubo kamɔ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ nɛ hũhũ kpa awɛ kamɛ!”
Lɛmɛ Yesu tálɛ kadima. Ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a nake ye aduli bɛlɛ kĩ, “Blɔmɛna ye ɛdzakũ, kitonɛkĩ etomɔ boe mɔ fɔwɔla!”
Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Baveli a kĩ bɛyɛla nɛ Israelfɔ kamɛ odi sɛkɛ̃ bido yĩ.”
Lɛmɛ otsole a yatɔ nɛ Yesu abɔa kamɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, bumɔ yĩ!”
Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Fɔnɛ́nɛ kĩ bata babisɛ̃ funitsã biko bakpete.”
Otsole a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, fudeĩ lɔmɔ kɔ̃, lɛmɛ bakpete a malo anya funitsã wuliwa a kĩ futo be ɔlate opunu akũ fɔtɔ a.”
Kĩ Yesu nu foe a, ɛkpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “O, boe ɔma, nɔ katɛkado pɔnɛ! Lɛtsa a kĩ awɛ a lɛya lɛkpa nɔ.” Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ a obitsole a akũ de ɔsĩ.
Yesu dzakũ nɛ awã ɛtsã Galilea ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a abuĩ. Ede ɛnaa katɔbii kadi akũ ade ɛkɛna akũ edzi a.
Ade bati kɔdabu baũ kpã abafã amɛ, banɛkunɛ, bamumu, mɔ basɔnɛ bɛbã pii bɛyamɛna nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ a. Bɛkɔa be biko nɛ ye anɛ kamɛ ade ɛtsa be a.
Kĩ bati kɔdabu a mɔ́ kĩ bamumu kalɛ kɔdzɛla, abafã amɛ kayidza katsã, bikĩ bɛnɛ lɛkpɛ̃ akũ dani fuyo, banɛkunɛ kamɔ fɔkɔ a, fɔkɛna be wãwã, ade bimu Israel Baguma a.

Yesu vɛ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a bɛya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ ade ebi be kĩ, “Bati kĩĩ akũ akɔ yĩ kɔnya, kitonɛkĩ bɛna nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ fuwi ɛlalɛ flee, lɛmɛ bɛlá lɛtsama kĩ banya. Ntáwɛ kĩ manyɛ be osi bɛnaa mɔ kɔlɛ, anɛ lɛnaasinya be nɛ osi.”
Ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a via ye kĩ, “Nɛ ndia bɔ́ana funitsã nɛ kɔsa kamɛ nɛ awĩ kĩ fɔ́ato bati kɔdabu kĩĩ odu bɛnya?”
Yesu via be kĩ, “Abodoo eni minɛɛ?”
Bibi ye kĩ, “Abodoo evũkɔnɔ mɔ kɔfɔabi wuluwulu sukuloo deĩ.”
Ade Yesu fɔ̃ bati kɔdabu a kɛna akũ bidzi nɛ tite a.
Ade kĩ ɛbɔɛ abodoo evũkɔnɔ mɔ kɔfɔabi a ɛnyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ a, ebulibuli ye mɔ koe ɛkɔa ɛkpa ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a, ade be malo bɛsɛ̃ bɛkpa bati a.
Be flee bɛnya biwĩ. Kĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a fila fuwuliwa a kĩ fute a, fuyi tɛtsɛtsɛ evũkɔnɔ.
Bati a kĩ bɛnya funitsã a nyɛ banyole mpim ɛna, kĩ bɛtákã batsole mɔ babisɛ̃ bibu.
Ke liti a, Yesu nyɛ bati a osi ade edzi ɔkɔlɔ ɛnaa Magadan amantam kamɛ a.
Farisifɔ mɔ Zadukifɔ badi kĩ bɛya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃ a wɛ kĩ basɔ ye bɛdã, foesũ bivia ye kĩ ɛkɛna awãwã fɔtsa kĩ futo ode ɛtsa be.
Lɛmɛ Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ suwa anaa katomukɔ̃ a, mialɛ kĩ, ‘Fɔkɔ aakpalɛ kunya, kitonɛkĩ odetɔ́ kamɛ yɔɔlɛ.’

Ade ayea ɔnɔnɛ lɛmɛ mialɛ kĩ, ‘Nviã oni aako kitonɛkĩ odetɔ́ kamɛ yɔɔlɛ fɔkɔ lɛmɛ kɛna tũũ.’ Miayi anɛ kadã odetɔ́ kamɛ kapuli kalɛ ayekĩ fɔkɔ aana, lɛmɛ miápuli minyi nviã nsɛntsɛlɛni a kĩ yaaya a kayɔ.
Nviã babi kpa kĩ binyína Baguma! Miavia yĩ awãwã fɔtsa? Oowo! Bɛláakpa mi awãwã fɔtsa fudima kɛba Yona fude a.”
Ade ke ɛdzakũ ɛfɔnɛ be a.
Kĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a nyina ɔwɔ lutubu baũ bɛnaa sɛkɛ sitide a, bɛyate anɛ kĩ bɛtábɔɛ abodoo adima bɛlɛ.
Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mite anɛ, midã kadã wĩ nɛ Farisifɔ mɔ Zadukifɔ fuyilatsa a akũ.”
Ade bido kalɛ nɛ be nɛɛnɛɛ kamɛ kĩ, “Ayekĩ bɔtábɔɛ abodoo adima bɔlɛ sũ mɔ ɛlɛ foe.”
Yesu nyi lɛtsa a kĩ bɛkalɛ a foesũ evia be kĩ, “Nde sũ mialɔmɛna nɛ abodoo katabɔɛ akũ? Mi katɛkado adã kabii!
Foesũ mitámɔ miyi ɔsũ tɔ̃? Mitáte anɛ kĩ nsɛ̃ abodoo elo nkpa bati mpim elo bɛnya a? Tɛtsɛtsɛ eni kamɛ mifila fuwuliwa a miyula?
Litsa mialɛ nɛ abodoo evũkɔnɔ a kĩ nsɛ̃ nkpa banyole mpim ɛna bɛnya a akũ? Tɛtsɛtsɛ eni kamɛ miko fukĩ fute a?
Nde sũ mɔ miámɔ kĩ nnɛ́ abodoo fɔlɛtsa nlamɛna mi kabi? Midã kadã wĩ nɛ Farisifɔ mɔ Zadukifɔ fuyilatsa akũ!”
Ade finyaa fɔmɔ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a yanu foe kayɔ kĩ nnɛ́ fuyilatsa a kĩ bakɔa kado nɛ mawɛ kamɛ a akũ yadɛ be, mbom kadɛ ɛdɛ be nɛ Farisifɔ mɔ Zadukifɔ fɔtsa katsa a akũ.
Kĩ Yesu wo kakɔ a kĩ kifuã Kaisarea Filipi ɔmatɔ a, evia ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Owei bati alɛ kĩ Otidziwa Obi a anɛ?”
Bɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Badi alɛ kĩ Yohanes Mui Ɔwɔlanɛ a anɛ. Babɛbã alɛ kĩ Eliya, ade badi lɛmɛ alɛ kĩ Yeremia ĩye Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a kamɛ ɔmɔa anɛ.”
Yesu via be kĩ, “Adeke mi malo, owei mialɛ kĩ ye manɛ?”
Ade Simon Petro kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nɔ nyɛ Kristo a, Baguma kĩ edzi nkpã a Obi.”
Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Simon, Yona obi, Baguma hila nɔ, kitonɛkĩ nnɛ́ otidziwa odima lɛtsa nɔ foe, mbom Nda nɛ ode a lɛnyɛ foe ɛtsa nɔ.
Nɛ foesũ, Petro, mabi nɔ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ nɔ dĩ kayɔ nyɛ de mɔ ɔsĩ a, ade de kĩĩ akũ maayi yĩ asɔli a. Wuda malo lɛláapuli ɛnya ye akũ da.
Maakɔa ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a tɛsafi ndo nɔ nɛ awɛ. Lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ osĩ nɛ tite akũ ni, baasĩ foe nɛ ode, ade lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ ɔkpa osi nɛ tite akũ ni, baakpa de osi nɛ ode.”
Adeke Yesu si ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a mbla kĩ bɛtabi odima kĩ ye nyɛ Kristo a.

Kito luwi a, Yesu do ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kabi awɛ pefee kĩ, “Kɛnɛ kĩ nnaa Yerusalem, nnaamɔ lubo paa nɛ banɔkɔɛ̃, basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ mbla batsanɛ a awɛ. Baakɔ yĩ, lɛmɛ nɛ luwi lɛlalɛde akũ ni, Baguma aadzɛla yĩ ndzi nkpã.”
Petro kpã Yesu bɛnaadza nɛ ɔɔwɛ̃, ade edo ye anɛ kakã awɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, Baguma esua foe osi. Fukĩnaa lɛláaya nɛ nɔ akũ da!”
Yesu dani ɛtsɛlamɔ Petro ebi ye kĩ, “Satana, dzakũ nɛ yĩ akũ! Ɔnyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lasua yĩ osi kitonɛkĩ nɔ kakɔna táto Baguma sɛkɛ̃ mbom futo otidziwa sɛkɛ̃.”
Ade Yesu bi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Ntɛ odi wɛ kĩ yatomɔ yĩ ni, ɛtatsɛla ye mɔawɛ akũ lɔkɔa ɛbɔɛ ye asendua etomɔ yĩ.
Kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yawɛ kĩ yapili ye nkpã ni, yaayɛla ye, lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛyɛla ye nkpã nɛ yĩ sũ ni, yaana ye.
Ntɛ katinya kamɛ fɔtsa flee dani odi fude mɔ ɛyɛla ye nkpã ni, litsa nfasɔ yaana? Mbɔɛɛ litsedi deĩ kĩ oti aakɔa ɛvɛmɛna mɔ ye nkpã?
Kitonɛkĩ Otidziwa Obi a aaya nɛ Ɔlɛga kukũkpalɛ kamɛ mɔ ye ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ, lɔkɔa yaase odi nyɛ odi kɔtɔ nɛ ayekĩ edzi nkpã a onukpɛ̃.
Mabi mi pipiipi kĩ badi deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ nɛ awĩ kĩ bɛláaku kɛnaawo kĩ bɛmɔ́ Otidziwa Obi a kĩ ɛya ndɛ Lɛgã aye.”
Nɛ fuwi evũ liti a, Yesu kpã Petro, Yakobo mɔ ɔwaɛ̃ Yohanes bide bɛnaa ɔtɔ geĩ odi kalete, awã kĩ be odi bɛnadzi.
Kĩ bɛkadã ye a, Yesu akũ dani nɛ be anɛ kamɛ. Ye anɛ kamɛ kata ndɛ suwa aye, ade ye tɛtadiɛ lɛmɛ kɛna fitaa ndɛ ɔhaĩ aye a.
Adeke fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ɛlalɛ a mɔ́ Mose mɔ Eliya kĩ bɛkalɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ Yesu a.
Foesũ Petro dzɛla odo ebi Yesu kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, fɔnɛnɛ paa kĩ budeĩ nɛ awĩ! Ntɛ awɛ ni, maabɔa fɔpɛ ɛlalɛ nɛ awĩ, nɔ lide lɔmɔa, Mose lide lɔmɔa lɔkɔa Eliya lɛmɛ lide lɔmɔa.”
Kĩ ɛkalɛ kɔdzɛla a, luflututu fitaa ka lɛtsa be, ade odo nɛ́ eto de kamɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ade yĩ Obi kĩ maátunɔ ye kalɛ a, yawo yĩ anɛ. Mitse ye!”
Kĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a nu odo a libe wo be paa, foesũ bɛka bɛtsa anɛ nɛ tite.
Yesu ya nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ ɛkɔa awɛ ɛta be, ade ebi be kĩ, “Miyidza! Mitavila!”
Foesũ bɛdzɛla anɛ nɛ ode, lɛmɛ bɛtámɔ odima nɛ awã kɛba Yesu.
Kĩ bɛka ɔtɔ a baya a, Yesu si be mbla kĩ, “Mitabi odima lɛtsa a kĩ bɛnyɛ bɛtsa mi nɛ awĩ a, kɛnaawo kĩ bɛdzɛla Otidziwa Obi a bitomɛna kanɔkpa.”
Adeke fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a via Yesu kĩ, “Nde sũ mbla batsanɛ a alɛ kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ Eliya ɛnya lɔtɔ ɛya?”
Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔali fɔanɛ kĩ Eliya ɛnya lɔtɔ ɛya, ɛyaalɔla lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa eyi.
Mabi mi kĩ Eliya ya kɔkɔɛ lɛmɛ bati támɔ ye biyi ɔsũ, foesũ bɛkɛna lɛtsa a kĩ bawɛ nɛ ye akũ. Ade ayea baakɛna Otidziwa Obi a lɛmɛ awɔda a.”
Ade awã mɔ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a nu foe kayɔ kĩ Yohanes Mui Ɔwɔlanɛ a akũ kɔdzɛla ɛkalɛ.
Kĩ Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a muniki bɛya nɛ bati kɔdabu a sɛkɛ̃ a, onyole odi ya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃ ɛyake aduli nɛ ye anɛ,
ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, mɔ yĩ obinyole kɔnya! Odetɔ́ fɔsɔ deĩ nɛ ye akũ fɔamɔna ye lubo mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ. Fɔfɔ̃ yawɛ katɔ nɛ fi ĩye mui kamɛ.
Nkpã ye mma nɔ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a lɛmɛ bɛtápuli bɛtsa ye.”
Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “O mi nviã babi kpa kĩ milá katɛkado. Mbɔɛɛ maana nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ daa? Lɔkɔ lɔɔdabe kamɛ maana ɔwɔlɛ nvɛlɛ mi nnaawo? Mikpã kanyolebi a mima yĩ nɛ awĩ!”
Adeke Yesu wũni nɛ hũhũ kpa a akũ mɔ ɛnɛ nɛ kanyolebi a kamɛ, ade kɛna akũ ɔsĩ nɛ lɔkɔ mɔapɛ a na kamɛ a.
Ke liti a, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ nɛ kabɛla kamɛ bivia ye kĩ, “Nde sũ boe kɔ̃ bɔtápuli bɔblɔmɛna hũhũ kpa a bɔnɛmɛna?”

Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Kitonɛkĩ mi katɛkado lɛpɔ́nɛ. Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ ntɛ mideĩ katɛkado ndɛ kutse libi kabii ni, míapuli mibi ɔtɔ kĩĩ kĩ, ‘Bɔlɛ nɛ awĩ kanaa akĩĩ,’ ade yaabɔlɛ a. Lɛtsama lɛláa kĩ miláapuli mikɛna.
Lɛmɛ hũhũ kpa kĩĩ odu lɛláanɛ mbɔɛntɛ fɔtsɛ̃ mpaɛbɔ mɔ, onukpɛ̃ kasui kamɛ.”
Kĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a flee yakpɔta nɛ Galilea a, Yesu bi be kĩ, “Baakɔa Otidziwa Obi a bido nɛ bati awɛ.
Baakɔ ye, lɛmɛ nɛ luwi lɛlalɛde akũ a, Baguma aadzɛla ye edzi nkpã.”
Nɛ foesũ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a wo ɔblɔ paa.
Kĩ Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a wo Kapernaum a, bikĩ batɛ Asɔli Kɔla ɔgɔlɛ a ya nɛ Petro sɛkɛ̃ bivia ye kĩ, “Mi fɔtsa ɔtsanɛ a ase Asɔli Kɔla ɔgɔlɛ?”
Petro kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oo, yase.”
Kĩ Petro wo ɛnaa tɔtɔ kamɛ a, Yesu nya lɔtɔ evia ye kĩ, “Simon, litsa nyɛ nɔ adzuni? Baáde ase dutɛ ĩye tɔgɔlɛ kakpa katinya kamɛ fɔgã? Kade a bati ase mbɔɛɛ kĩ banɔvɔɛ̃?”
Petro kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Banɔvɔɛ̃ a.”
Ade Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Kekɔ̃ fɔatsa kĩ kade bati a wɛya.

Lɛmɛ bɔáwɛ kĩ bɔafum bati kĩĩ, foesũ naata dalɛwa nɛ ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a kamɛ. Kafɔabi katɔnyade a kĩ aanyɛ a ni, daɛ ke onukpɛ̃, aamɔ sika ovoe kĩ saato bɔmɔ nɔ Asɔli Kɔla ɔgɔlɛ kase. Kɔa se kanaase be bɔmɔ nɔ tɔgɔlɛ.”
Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a ya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃, bivia ye kĩ, “Owei bɛ̃ flee nɛ ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ?”
Nɛ foesũ Yesu vɛ kabisɛ̃ɛ̃ kadi ɛyadzɛla nɛ be kayite,
ade ebi be kĩ, “Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ ntɛ mitádani mikɛna ndɛ babisɛ̃ aye ni, miláapuli miwo nɛ ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ da.
Oti kĩ ɛbɛ̃ flee nɛ ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a nyɛ oti a kĩ ɛdɔla ye akũ, ɛdani ɛkɛna ndɛ obisɛ̃ kĩĩ aye.
“Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaakɛna sɛmɛ kalɛ ɛkpa obisɛ̃ kĩĩ odu nɛ yĩ dĩ akũ ni, yĩ ɛkɛna ɛkpa.
“Ntɛ oti odi aakpã babisɛ̃ kĩĩ, kĩ bɛtɛ yĩ bido a kamɛ ɔmɔa edo nɛ tɔkpa kamɛ ni, fɔnɛnɛ fɔkpa ye fɔbɛ̃ kĩ bɛkɔa kɔwɔlɛ kpale bɛvɛla nɛ ye sɔmɔ bɛta bido nɛ mpo kamɛ ɛmɔa mui eku.
“Bɔbɔɛ makpa katinya kamɛ bati nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ foe avɛlɛ oti kado nɛ tɔkpa kamɛ a akũ. Kɛnɛ kĩ sɔhuiɛ kĩĩ odu ɛya kokooko, lɛmɛ bɔbɔɛ makpa oti a kĩ ye akũ fɔ́atsã fɔya!

“Foesũ ntɛ nɔ awɛ ĩye nɔ kɔbɔa aafɔ̃ ɔkɛna tɔkpa ni, tsua koe kata kamuni! Fɔnɛnɛ fɔkpa nɔ kĩ aana nkpã mɔ awɛ mɔa ĩye kɔbɔa mɔa, kɛba kĩ aana akpɔ mɔ abɔa lɛmɛ bɛta nɔ bido nɛ fi a kĩ fɔádĩ da a kamɛ.
Ade ayea ntɛ nɔ linebi aafɔ̃ ɔkɛna tɔkpa ni, bɔlɛ de kanyɛ kata kamuni! Fɔnɛnɛ fɔbɛ̃ kĩ aana linebi mɔa odzi nkpã, kɛba kĩ aana banebi nviã lɛmɛ bɛta nɔ bido nɛ fi a kĩ fɔádĩ da a kamɛ a.
“Midã kadã wĩ, ayekĩ miláasupa babisɛ̃ kĩĩ kamɛ odima. Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ be ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ nɛ ode adza nɛ Nda anɛ kamɛ luwi daa,
kitonɛkĩ Otidziwa Obi a ya kĩ yaatɛ bikĩ bɛyɛla a bɛna nkpã.
“Mikɔna fukĩĩ akũ midã. Ntɛ odi deĩ baveli ɔha mɔ kɔmɔa yɛla nɛ be kamɛ a, yaáfɔnɛ be aduekrɔũ-evedi a nɛ katɔbii akũ bɛkadɛ, ɛnaatsã ɛwɛ kɔmɔa a kĩ kɔyɛla a?
Ntɛ ɛmɔ́ koe ni, yamɔ kawɔlɛ paa nɛ kɔmɔa a akũ kaba be aduekrɔũ evedi a kĩ bɛtáyɛla a.
Ade ayea mi Ɔlɛga nɛ ode a láwɛ kĩ babisɛ̃ kĩĩ kamɛ odima ɛyɛla a.
“Ntɛ awaɛ̃ fum nɔ ni, naa ye sɛkɛ̃ kanaanyɛ ye mfumsu katsa ye, lɛmɛ kɛna foe nɛ kabɛla kamɛ nɛ mimɔ ye odi kayite. Ntɛ enu foe kayɔ ɛkpa nɔ ni, ɔdani ɔtɛ awaɛ̃.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ ɛtánu ye akũ kayɔ ni, kpã oti mɔa ĩye bati nviã kabumɔ nɔ akũ minaa ye sɛkɛ̃, ayekĩ fɔlɛtsa a flee aanɛ fɔwa nɛ adansifɔ anɛ.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ esĩ ɛtátse be malo ni, kɔa fɔlɛtsa a kama asɔli a, ade ntɛ ɛtátse asɔli bati a lɛmɛ ni, bu ye ndɛ ɔmamuni ĩye ɔgɔlɛ ɔtɛnɛ aye.
“Foesũ mabi mi flee kĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ mitákpa osi nɛ tite akũ ni, bɛláakpa de osi nɛ ode, ade lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ míakpa osi nɛ tite akũ ni, baakpa de osi nɛ ode.
“Mabi mi mbu kĩ ntɛ mi kamɛ bati nviã mikɛna ɔmɔa nɛ litsedi akũ nɛ tite akũ, mɔ mibɔa mpaɛ mivia de ni, Nda nɛ ode a aakɛna foe ɛkpa mi.
Kitonɛkĩ awã kĩ bati nviã ĩye be ɛlalɛ tsɛna nɛ yĩ dĩ akũ ni, ndeĩ nɛ be kayite.”
Ke liti a, Petro yavia Yesu kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, ntɛ nwaɛ̃ dzɛmɛna tɔkpa kakɛna nɛ yĩ akũ ni, titi eni kɛnɛ kĩ nkɔa nte ye? Titi evũkɔnɔ mbɔɛɛ?”
Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oowo, nnɛ́ titi evũkɔnɔ, mbom aduesɔũ titi evũkɔnɔ.
“Kitonɛkĩ ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a la ndɛ lɛgã lidi kĩ lɛwɛ kĩ lakɛna akunta mɔ de basumunɛ.
Kĩ esila eyi kayɔ a, bɛkpã be kamɛ ɔmɔa kĩ edzimɔ ye sika mpim mpim kɔtɔ bɛyamɛna.
Ɔsumunɛ a lɛlá sika kĩ yaase kɔtɔ a, foesũ lɛgã a kpa kɔbɛ̃ kĩ bɛnɔ ye mɔawɛ a ndɛ ɔsate, ye ɔtsɔ̃ mɔ babi, mɔ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ edeĩ a bɛkɔa bise kɔtɔ a.
“Ɔsumunɛ a ke aduli nɛ lɛgã a anɛ eke ye aduli kĩ, ‘Na ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ kakpa yĩ. Maase nɔ se flee.’
Ye akũ kɔ lɛgã a kɔnya foesũ ɛfɔnɛ ye awɛ ade ɛkɔa kɔtɔ a kĩ edzimɛna a flee ete ye a.
“Ade kĩ ɔsumunɛ kĩĩ nɛ́ ɛdzakũ a, ɛnamɔ ɔkɔba ɔsumunɛ bɛbã odi kĩ edzimɔ ye sika ovoe ɔha mɔa kɔtɔ. Epi ɔkɔba a nɛ sɔmɔ ɛmɛnana ye odomɛna kɔɔba, ebi ye kĩ, ‘Se yĩ kɔtɔ a kĩ odzimɔ yĩ a!’
“Ɔkɔba a tɔ nɛ ye abɔa kamɛ eke ye aduli ɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Na ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ kakpa yĩ! Maase nɔ kɔtɔ a!’
“Lɛmɛ ɛtátunɔ, mbom ɛfɔ̃ bido ye nɛ kɔla kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ yaase kɔtɔ a.
Kĩ basumunɛ bɛbã a mɔ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya a, fuwo be kalɔɛ ade bɛnabi lɛgã a lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya a flee a.
“Foesũ lɛgã a vɛ ɔsumunɛ a ɛya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ ade ebi ye kĩ, ‘Nɔ ɔsumunɛ kpa! Nkɔa kɔtɔ beblebee a kĩ odzimɔ yĩ a nte nɔ nɛ kĩ oke yĩ aduli sũ.
Kɛtáfɛta kĩ amɔ nɔ ɔkɔba ɔsumunɛ kɔnya ndɛ ayekĩ mmɔ́ nɔ kɔnya a?’
Ade lɛgã a na kalɔkpa mɔ ɔsĩ ɛfɔ̃ bɛnado ye nɛ kɔla kĩ bɛmɔna ye lubo kɛnaawo kĩ ese kɔtɔ a flee.”
Yesu wũna kĩ, “Ade aye Nda nɛ ode a aakɛna mi kamɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtákɔa ete ɔwaɛ̃ etomɛna ye ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ a.”
Kĩ Yesu lɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ eyua a, ɛdzakũ nɛ Galilea ɛnaa Yudea amantam nɛ Yordan ɔwɔ liti a.
Bati kɔdabu pii tomɔ ye bɛnaa ade ɛtsa be fɔtsa nɛ awã a.
Farisifɔ a badi ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃, ade bɛwɛ kĩ basɔ ye bɛdã, foesũ bivia ye kĩ, “Boe mbla kpa onyole osi kĩ esĩ ɔtsɔ̃ nɛ kalɛ nyɛ kalɛ kĩ yawɛ a akũ?”
Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mitákã nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ nɛ kayɔkayi a, otsole mɔ onyole Ɔbɔanɛ bɔa?
Ade Baguma lɛ kĩ, ‘Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ onyole aafɔnɛ ɔlɛga mɔ ɔma eyi ɛkɔa akũ ɛmɛna mɔ ɔtsɔ̃, lɔkɔa be nviã a baakɛna oti mɔa.’
Foesũ bibuki bɛnyɛ́ bati nviã mbom bɛkɛna oti mɔa. Nɛ foesũ otidziwa ɛtasɛ̃ lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma boomu a kamɛ.”
Ade Farisifɔ a via ye kĩ, “Mɔ nde sũ Mose kpa osi kĩ onyole ɛkpa ye ɔtsɔ̃ kasĩ ovoli lɔkɔa ɛfɔnɛ ye awɛ?”
Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ade mi atɔ ɔsĩ sũ mɔ Mose kpa mi osi kĩ misĩ mi batsɔ̃ a, lɛmɛ fɔtána lɔmɔ nɛ kayɔkayi a.
Lɛmɛ finyaa mabi mi kĩ ntɛ onyole odi sĩ ɔtsɔ̃ kĩ nnɛ́ kanɛ ɛnɛ ye liti sũ, mɔ ɛnakɔã otsole bɛbã ni, ɛbɔa adɔpaa.”
Ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a bi ye kĩ, “Ntɛ aye onyole mɔ otsole kayite fɔlɛtsa la kɔ̃ ni, fɔnɛ́nɛ kĩ bɛkɔã ɔtsɔ̃.”
Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nnɛ́ odi nyɛ odi aapuli enu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kayɔ, mbɔɛntɛ bikĩ Baguma kpa be foe a.

Kitonɛkĩ kayɔkanyɛ futefute deĩ kĩ foe sũ banyole lɛláapuli bɛkɔã batsɔ̃. Badi bɛma be basaɛ, babɛbã bati lɛkɛna be basaɛ, ade badi lɛmɛ lákɔã batsɔ̃ nɛ ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a sũ. Oti a kĩ yaapuli ɛtɛ fɔtsa katsa kĩĩ ni, ɛtɛ foe.”
Bati badi kpã babisɛ̃ bɛma Yesu kĩ ete awɛ nɛ be akũ, ɛbɔa mpaɛ ɛkpa be, lɛmɛ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a wũni nɛ be akũ.
Lɛmɛ Yesu lɛ kĩ, “Mifɔ̃ babisɛ̃ a bɛya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃, mitasua be osi, kitonɛkĩ ade bikĩĩ bamɛ odu lá ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a.”
Adeke Yesu te awɛ nɛ be akũ ehila be, ade ɛdzakũ nɛ awã a.
Luwi a onyole odi ya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃ ɛvia ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, lɛtsa wĩ lɔɔdabe kɛnɛ kĩ nkɛna mɔ maana daa nkpã a?”
Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nde sũ avia yĩ kalɛ nɛ fɔtsa wĩ kakɛna akũ? Oti mɔapɛ nyɛ owĩ. Lɛmɛ ntɛ awɛ kĩ awo nɛ nkpã kamɛ kɔ̃ ni, kɛna nɛ tɛbla a akũ.”
Oti a via ye kĩ, “Tɛbla tɛwɔdabe?”
Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Takɔ oti, tabɔa adɔpaa, taye, tadi adansiɛ klumu,
bu aga mɔ ama, kawɛ nɔ ɔkɔba kalɛ ndɛ ayekĩ awɛ nɔ akũ kalɛ a.”
Ade opopo a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nkɛna nɛ tɛbla kĩĩ flee akũ. Litsa libuki lisĩ kĩ nkɛna?”
Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Ntɛ awɛ kĩ akpɔla ni, naa kanaanɔ nɔ akũ fɔtsa flee, kakɔa sika a kate ahiãfɔ, lɔkɔa aana akũ kana fɔtsa nɛ ode. Ke liti muniki kayaatomɔ yĩ.”
Kĩ opopo a nu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, ɛdzakũ mɔ ayɔlɔhɔ, kitonɛkĩ edeĩ akũ fɔtsa beblebee.
Adeke Yesu bi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ fɔ́ana ɔsĩ paa fɔkpa osikani kĩ yaawo nɛ ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ.
Mbuki mabi mi kĩ fɔadã bɔɛɛ fɔkpa ɔpɔnkɔ mɔ kanɛ mɔ lɔpɔ kĩ yaatsã ɔnɔbɔ̃ ɔkɛ kamɛ ɛnɛ́ kɛba kĩ osikani aawo nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ.”
Kĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a nu kalɛ kĩĩ a, akũ dzuli be, ade bivia kĩ, “Kekɔ̃ owei aapuli ɛna katɛ?”
Yesu dã be kɛnanaana ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Otidziwa lɛláapuli ɛkɛna fukĩĩ, lɛmɛ Baguma kɔ̃ apuli kakɛna lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa.”
Ade Petro dzɛla odo ɛlɛ kĩ, “Dã kĩ bɔfɔnɛ boe fɔtsa flee awɛ bɔya butomɔ nɔ, litsa koũ aanya boe fude?”

Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ ntɛ Otidziwa Obi a kɛna akũ edzi nɛ ye lɛgãkpo kpalɛwa a akũ nɛ katinya vɔɛ̃ a kamɛ ni, mi bati ewua-nviã a kĩ mitomɔ yĩ a lɛmɛ míadzi nɛ fɔgãkpo ewua-nviã akũ midzɛmɔ Israel futete ewua-nviã a.
Ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛfɔnɛ fɔla, bawaɛ̃nyole, ĩye bawaɛ̃tsole, balɛga ĩye bama ĩye babi, ĩye fɔba biyi nɛ yĩ sũ ni, Baguma aakpa ye foe titi ɔha mɔ nkpã kĩ ɛla kawũna a.
Lɛmɛ bati pii kĩ bɛnyɛ batɔnyade finyaa a, aakɛna liti bade, ade liti bade a aakɛna batɔnyade a.”
“Ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a la ndɛ okuani odi kĩ eyidza mɔ ɔnɔnɛ tutuutu ɛnabɔɛ apaafɔ badi kĩ bɛyaakɛna adzuma bɛkpa ye nɛ ye waĩ kɔba kamɛ.
Bɛmɔ apaafɔ a bɛnya kɔya, etunɔ kĩ yaase be sika ovoe sɔmɔa sɔmɔa kĩ fɔnyɛ luwi mɔa kɔtɔkase, ade edo be nɛ ye waĩ kɔba a kamɛ a.
“Kĩ ɔnɔnɛ tɔdɔũ evedi bɔa a, onyole a buki ɛnɛ ɛnaa kɔya ade ɛnamɔ banyole badi kĩ bɛdzɛ̃, kĩ bɛlá adzuma kɛnawa adima.
Foesũ ebi be kĩ, ‘Mi malo minaakɛna adzuma nɛ yĩ waĩ kɔba kamɛ, maase mi kɔtɔ kĩ kɛfɛta a.’
Ade bɛnaa kɔba a.
“Ebuki ɛnɛ nɛ tɔdɔũ ewua-nviã mɔ olobe tɔdɔũ ɛlalɛ kamɛ ɛnakɛna ndɛ fɔtɔnyade a.
Kĩ tɔdɔũ elo anaa kabɔakɔ̃ a, ɛnaa kɔya ɛnamɔ banyole bɛbã kĩ bɛdzɛ̃ pupulidza. Evia be kĩ, ‘Nde sũ midzɛ̃ nɛ awĩ luwi a flee kĩ miákɛna lɛtsama?’
“Bɛkpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Odima tábɔɛ boe kĩ bɔkɛna adzuma bɔkpa ye.’
“Foesũ ebi be kĩ, ‘Ntɛ aye ni, mi malo minaakɛna adzuma nɛ yĩ kɔba a kamɛ.’
“Kĩ olobe wo ɔtɔ a, kɔba ɔlate a bi ye adzuma akũ ɔdãmɛnanɛ a kĩ, ‘Vɛ adzuma bakɛnanɛ a kase be kɔtɔ, kayi kayɔ katomɛna bikĩ bɛya nkaɛ a akũ kanaawũna nɛ batɔnyade a akũ.’
“Bikĩ biyi adzuma kayɔ nɛ olobe tɔdɔũ elo kamɛ a kamɛ odi nyɛ odi tɛ sika ovoe sɔmɔa sɔmɔa.
Foesũ kĩ bati batɔnyade a yaatɛ be kɔtɔkase a, bɛkɔna kĩ baase be bɛba lɔmɔ, lɛmɛ be malo bɛtɛ sika ovoe sɔmɔa sɔmɔa.
Kĩ bɛtɛ be sika a biyua a, bɛna kalɔkpa bɛkakɛna hũhũhũhũ nɛ ɔlate a akũ.
Ade bɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Bati a kĩ ɔbɔɛ nkaɛ a kɛna adzuma dɔũhuilɛ mɔapɛ, ade boe kɔ̃ bɔdza nɛ suwa kpaa kamɛ luwi a flee bɔkɛna adzuma a, lɛmɛ ose boe flee kɔtɔ tsɛtsɛɛ!’
“Kɔba ɔlate a kpa be kamɛ ɔmɔa mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Ɔkɔba, dã ntásisi nɔ. Nnɛ́ sika ovoe sɔmɔa akũ bɔnya kɔya?
Kɔa nɔ kɔtɔkase kanaa kɔla. Yĩ lɛwɛ kĩ mase bati nkaɛ kĩĩ kɔtɔ ndɛ ayekĩ nse nɔ a.
Ndeĩ osi kĩ makɛna yĩ sika akũ adzuma ndɛ ayekĩ mawɛ. Mbɔɛɛ ayekĩ nkɛna sɛmɛ kalɛ a sũ anɛ abɛɛlɛ nɔ?’ ”
Ade Yesu wũna kĩ, “Foesũ bati a kĩ bɛkpa liti a, aadani batɔnyade, ade bikĩ bɛnyaa lɔtɔ a aadani batide a.”
Kĩ Yesu yɛlɛ yanaa Yerusalem a, ɛvɛ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ewua-nviã a nɛ ɔɔwɛ̃,
ade ebi be kĩ, “Mitse lɛtsa a kĩ malɛ a! Bɔanaa Yerusalem, awã kĩ baakɔa Otidziwa Obi a bido nɛ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃, mɔ mbla batsanɛ a awɛ. Baakɔ ye kɔtɔ bɛkpa wuda,
bɛkɔa ye bido bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a nɛ awɛ kĩ bidi ye nsekuo. Baabo ye, ke liti baabɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ, lɛmɛ nɛ luwi lɛlalɛde akũ a, Baguma aadzɛla ye edzi nkpã.”
Adeke Zebedeo ɔtsɔ̃ kpã ye babinyole nviã ɛyamɛna nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃, ɛyake aduli nɛ ye anɛ kamɛ evia kabumɛna a.
Yesu via ye kĩ, “Litsa awɛ?”
Otsole a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Kpa yĩ bɔhɛ kĩ aafɔ̃ yĩ babinyole nviã kĩĩ kamɛ ɔmɔa lidzi nɛ nɔ sɔmɔna, ɔyade a lɛmɛ lidzi nɛ nɔ sɛba, nɛ nɔ lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a.”
Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Minyína lɛtsa a kĩ de milamɛna kavia a. Míapuli mimɔa lubo kamɔ kɔɔpu a kĩ maamɔa a?”
Bɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oo, bɔ́apuli.”
Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔali fɔanɛ kĩ míapuli mimɔa foe, lɛmɛ nlá osi kĩ manyɛ oti a kĩ ye aadzi nɛ yĩ sɔmɔna ĩye yĩ sɛba. Fudzikɔ̃ a na nyɛ bikĩ Nda manɛ foe eyi a fude.”
Kĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ nkaɛ ewua a nu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, bɛna kalɔkpa nɛ bawaɛ̃ nviã a akũ.
Foesũ Yesu vɛ be flee ɛkpɔta ade ebi be kĩ, “Minyina kĩ fɔgã a kĩ fɔanya amamufɔ akũ a deĩ kɔbɛ̃ nɛ be akũ, ade be banɔkɔɛ̃ lɛmɛ deĩ otumi baũ a nɛ be akũ a.
Lɛmɛ kɛtánɛ kĩ fɔana lɔmɔ nɛ mi kamɛ. Ntɛ mi kamɛ odi awɛ kĩ yanya ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ ɛnya mi ɔsumunɛ.
Ade ayea ntɛ mi kamɛ odi awɛ kĩ yanya ɔtɔnyade ni, kɛnɛ kĩ ɛnya mi ɔsumunɛ,
ndɛ Otidziwa Obi a kĩ ɛtáya kĩ bisum ye, mbom kĩ yaasum ɛkɔa ye nkpã ɛkpa ɛnyɛ bati pii.”
Kĩ Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a nɛ́ bito Yeriko ɔmatɔ a kamɛ banaa ni, bati kɔdabu baũ tomɔ be.
Banɛkunɛ nviã kĩ bidzi nɛ osi ɔɔwɛ̃ nu kĩ Yesu yaatɛ̃, foesũ biyi fɔwɔla kabɔa kayɔ kĩ, “Lɛgã Dawid Obi, mɔ́ boe kɔnya!”
