Bati kɔdabu a wũni nɛ be akũ kĩ bɛfɔ̃ fɔwɔla kabɔa, lɛmɛ bɛbɔa fɔwɔla a kɔɔba bɛba bɛlɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, Dawid Obi, mɔ́ boe kɔnya ni!”
Yesu fɔ̃ ɛdza ɛvɛ be kĩ bɛya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃. Evia be kĩ, “Litsa miawɛ kĩ nkɛna nkpa mi?”
Bɛkpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃, fɔ̃ boe anɛ ebinya.”
Be akũ kɔ Yesu kɔnya, ade ɛkɔa awɛ ɛta be banebi a. Deedimɔapɛ be anɛ binya bɛmɔ́ fɔkɔ ade bitomɔ ye a.
Kĩ Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a fuã Yerusalem, biwo Betfage kĩ ɛwaa nɛ Kugua Futse Ɔtɔ akũ a, edo ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ nviã kĩ bɛnya lɔtɔ.
Ebi be kĩ, “Minaa akula a kĩ ɛwaa nɛ mi lɔtɔ a kamɛ. Ntɛ misila miwo awã a, míamɔ kĩ bido aflimu mɔ obi ɔwɛ̃ bɛdzɛla. Miwũnya be mikpã mima yĩ.
Ntɛ odi via mi kadi ni, milɛ kĩ, ‘Boe Ɔlate a sĩ be,’ lɔkɔa yaafɔnɛ be awɛ ɛkpa mi lɛtalɛta.”
Bɛkɛna fukĩĩ ayekĩ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ lɛ eyi a aaya nɛ foe kamɛ kĩ,
“Bi Zion ɔmatɔ a kĩ,
‘Dã kĩ nɔ lɛgã aya nɛ nɔ sɛkɛ̃!
Ɛdɔla ye akũ, edzi nɛ aflimu mɔ obi akũ yaya.’ ”
Ade fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a naa bɛnakɛna ndɛ ayekĩ Yesu bi be kĩ bɛkɛna a.
Bɛkpã aflimu mɔ obi a bɛyamɛna, bɛkɔa be tilima bɛtɛɛtɛɛ nɛ be akũ ade Yesu de edzi a.
Bati kɔdabu a dzɛlɛ be tɛtadiɛ wulaa biko nɛ osi a akũ, ade badi lɛmɛ pãã pãã futse tɛnanɛ biko nɛ osi a akũ a.
Bati kɔdabu a kĩ bɛnya Yesu lɔtɔ mɔ bikĩ bitomɔ ye nɛ liti a kabɔa fɔwɔla kĩ,
“Mitu osee nɛ Lɛgã Dawid Obinyole a akũ!
Baguma ehila oti a kĩ yaya nɛ boe Ɔlate dĩ akũ a!
Mimu Baguma nɛ ode!”
Kĩ Yesu wo nɛ Yerusalem ɔmatɔ a kamɛ a, ɔmatɔ a flee bɔa obũ, ade bati via kĩ, “Owei nɛ awĩ a?”
Bati kɔdabu a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ade Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yesu kĩ eto Nazaret nɛ Galilea tite akũ a.”
Ade Yesu nawo nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ, ɛblɔmɛna bati a kĩ bɛkanɔ fɔtsa mɔ bikĩ bɛkaya fɔtsa a nɛ awã ɛnɛmɛna. Edu bikĩ babɛ̃ sika a tupunu mɔ bikĩ banɔ mblɔduma a fukpo ewula,
ade ebi be kĩ, “Bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ Baguma lɛ kĩ, ‘Baavɛ Yĩ Asɔli Kɔla a kĩ mpaɛ kabɔakɔ̃’ lɛmɛ mi kɔ̃ mikɔa koe mikɛna bayekpanɛ kabɛlakɔ̃!”
Ade banɛkunɛ mɔ abafã amɛ ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ ade ɛtsa be fɔsɔ a.
Kĩ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ mbla batsanɛ a mɔ́ awãwã fɔtsa a kĩ ɛkɛna a, mɔ ayekĩ babisɛ̃ kabɔa fɔwɔla nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ kĩ, “Mitu osee nɛ Lɛgã Dawid Obinyole a akũ!” a ni, bɛna kalɔkpa paa.
Foesũ bivia Yesu nɛ kalɔkpa kamɛ kĩ, “Anu lɛtsa a kĩ bɛlamɛna kalɛ a?”
Ade Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oo, manu. Mbɔɛɛ mitákã tɔ̃ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ,
‘Babisɛ̃ mɔ bakɔkɔa onukpɛ̃ kamɛ
kamu kĩ kɛkpɔla anɛ kato’ a?”
Ke liti a, Yesu dzakũ ɛfɔnɛ be, ɛnɛ nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ ade ɛnaa Betania ɛnawa nɛ awã a.
Nɛ kadekanyina ɔnɔnɛ a, kĩ emuniki yanaa ɔmatɔ a kamɛ a, kɔlɛ kɔ ye.

Ɛmɔ́ kutse kĩ kɔawũ babi kĩ kɔdzɛ̃ nɛ osi ɔɔwɛ̃ ade ɛbɛlɛ ɛnaa koe kayɔ a, lɛmɛ ɛtámɔ babi badima nɛ koe akũ kɛba tɔɔta nɛnɛ. Foesũ ebi kutse a kĩ, “Ɔláabuki owũ babi dadaada.” Deedimɔapɛ kutse a tɔɔta vɛ.
Kĩ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a mɔ́ fukĩĩ a, fɔkɛna be wãwã, foesũ bivia ye kĩ, “Nde fɔya mɔ kutse a tɔɔta vɛ mɔatsɛ lɔmɔ?”

Ade Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mabi mi pipiipi kĩ ntɛ mitɛ mido, mɔ mitátɛ atsindze ni, míapuli mikɛna lɛtsa a kĩ nkɛna kutse kĩĩ. Nnɛ́ fukĩĩ odi malo, míapuli mibi ɔtɔ kĩĩ kĩ, ‘Bɔlɛ kanaatɔ nɛ mpo kamɛ,’ ade yaabɔlɛ a.
Ntɛ mideĩ katɛkado ni, lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ míavia nɛ mpaɛbɔ kamɛ ni, míana foe.”
Kĩ Yesu muniki ɛya nɛ Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ ɛkatsa fɔtsa a, basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ bivia ye kĩ, “Otumi ɔdabe ɔnɛɛ akɛna fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ? Owei lɛkpa nɔ osi a?”
Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Maavia mi kalɛ mɔapɛ ade ntɛ mikpa yĩ ke mbuayɛ ni, maabi mi otumi a kĩ nnɛɛ nkɔa makɛna fɔtsa kĩĩ.
Owei sɛkɛ̃ Yohanes tɛ otumi etomɛna mɔ ɛwɔla bati mui? Baguma sɛkɛ̃ ɛtɛ ye etomɛna mbɔɛɛ kĩ batidziwa sɛkɛ̃?”
Ade bido foe kamɛ kasa awɛ nɛ be kamɛ kĩ, “Litsa bɔ́alɛ? Ntɛ bɔlɛ kĩ, ‘Eto Baguma sɛkɛ̃’ ni, yaavia boe kĩ, ‘Mɔ nde sũ mitátɛ Yohanes mido?’
Ade ntɛ bɔlɛ kĩ, ‘Eto bati sɛkɛ̃’ ni, bɔavila lɛtsa a kĩ bati a aakɛna, kitonɛkĩ be flee bɛtɛ bido kĩ Yohanes nyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ.”
Foesũ bɛkpa Yesu mbuayɛ kĩ, “Bunyína.”
Ade Yesu lɛmɛ bi be kĩ, “Kekɔ̃ yĩ malo nláabi mi awã kĩ ntomɛna otumi nnɛɛ makɛna fɔtsa kĩĩ.”
“Nde mikɔna nɛ kalɛ kĩĩ akũ? Onyole odi deĩ babinyole nviã. Ɛnaa ɔnɔkɔɛ̃de a sɛkɛ̃ ebi ye kĩ, ‘Yĩ obi, naa yĩ waĩ kɔba kamɛ nviã kanaakɛna adzuma kakpa yĩ.’
“Ye obi a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Nláanaa,’ lɛmɛ ke liti a, fuwo ye kalɔɛ ade ɛnaa kɔba a.
“Ɔlɛga a naa obi ɔyade a sɛkɛ̃ ebi ye kalɛ mɔapɛ a. Ɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Awoo, papa maanaa,’ lɛmɛ ɛtánaa.
“Bati nviã kĩĩ kamɛ ɔɔdabe lɛkɛna nɛ ɔlɛga a kawɛ akũ?”
Bɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃de a.”
Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ tɔgɔlɛ batɛnɛ mɔ adɔpaafɔ nya mi lɔtɔ bɛnaa nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ.

Kitonɛkĩ kĩ Yohanes Mui Ɔwɔlanɛ a ya kĩ yatsa mi osi wĩ a kĩ míatsã midzi nkpã a, mitátɛ ye mido. Mbom tɔgɔlɛ batɛnɛ mɔ adɔpaafɔ kɔ̃ tɛ ye bido. Ade titɔ kĩ mimɔ́ fukĩĩ malo ni, ke liti a mitádani adzuni mitɛ ye mido.”

Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mitse lɛgbã bɛbã lidi lɛmɛ. Kɔba ɔnɛnɛ odi nɛ́ waĩ kɔba, ade edzi kɔbã emini koe a. Ɛnyɛ lɛkɛ ɛkpa waĩ mui a kakã kako, ade eke kɔla geĩ kĩ oti aana nɛ awã ɛkadã kɔba a akũ. Ke liti ɛkɔa kɔba a edo nɛ waĩ kɔba banɛnɛ awɛ ɛdzakũ ɛnaa osi akũ.
Kĩ kutse babi a kana a wo ɔtɔ a, edo ye basumunɛ nɛ waĩ kɔba banɛnɛ a sɛkɛ̃ kĩ bɛnaatɛ ye kanyakɔ̃ bɛma ye.
“Kɔba akũ badãmɛnanɛ a pi ye basumunɛ a, bibo ɔmɔa, bɛkɔ ɔbɛbã ade bɛtalɛ ɔlalɛde a boe a.
Ke liti a, kɔba ɔlate a buki edo basumunɛ bɛbã kĩ bɛpɔnɛ bɛbɛ̃ batɔnyade a, lɛmɛ kɔba akũ badãmɛnanɛ a kɛna be lɛtsa mɔapɛ a.
Nɛ foe kawũna kamɛ a, edo ye obi nɛ be sɛkɛ̃, ɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Matɛ kado kĩ baanyɔã yĩ obi.’
“Lɛmɛ kĩ kɔba akũ badãmɛnanɛ a mɔ́ obi a, bibi akũ kĩ, ‘Ade fɔtsa ɔnyanɛ a nɛ awĩ a. Miya bɔkɔ ye, ye adzapadiɛ a ɛdani boe ade.’
Foesũ bipi ye bɛvɛlɛ bɛnɛmɛna nɛ kɔba a kamɛ, ade bɛkɔ ye a.”
Yesu via kĩ, “Finyaa, ntɛ waĩ kɔba ɔlate a ya ni, litsa yaakɛna kɔba akũ badãmɛnanɛ kĩĩ a?”
Bɛkpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, yaawɔla bati kpa a na, lɔkɔa ɛkɔa kɔba a edo nɛ kɔba akũ badãmɛnanɛ bɛbã awɛ, bikĩ baakɔa ye kanyakɔ̃ bɛma ye nɛ fudutsa kakpɔta lɔkɔ kamɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ.”
Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mitákã tɔ̃ lɛtsa a kĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ a?
‘De a kĩ fɔla bakenɛ sĩ a,
ade de lɛdani kɔla akũ de titiliwu a.
Boe Ɔlate a lɛkɛna fukĩĩ.
Fɔkɛna boe wãwã!’ ”
Yesu lɛ ebu kĩ, “Foesũ mabi mi kĩ, baatɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a nɛ mi awɛ bɛkɔa bɛkpa kade a kĩ kaawũ babi wĩ a.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaanɛ ɛtɔ nɛ de kĩĩ akũ ni, yaaveli gblɛgblɛgblɛ, lɛmɛ owula kĩ ye akũ laaatɔ ni, laabubuli ye kpɛtɛkpɛtɛkpɛtɛ.”
Kĩ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ Farisifɔ a nu Yesu fɔgbã kĩĩ a, bɛmɔ́ kĩ be akũ fɔlɛtsa ɛkalɛ,
foesũ bɛwɛ kĩ bapi ye. Lɛmɛ bivila bati kɔdabu a, kitonɛkĩ bati a bu Yesu ndɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ aye.
Yesu buki ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ be nɛ fɔgbã kamɛ kĩ,
“Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a la ndɛ fukĩĩ. Lɛgã lidi te opunu ɛkpa obinyole nɛ ye obolitsɔ̃ kapi luwi akũ.
Lɛmɛ kĩ edo ye basumunɛ kĩ bɛnaavɛ bati a kĩ ɛkpa kanyi a kĩ bɛya nɛ kanyakɔ̃, bisĩ kaya.

“Foesũ ebuki edo basumunɛ bɛbã nɛ bikĩ bɛvɛ a sɛkɛ̃ mɔ ɔlɛdo kĩ, ‘Bɛtɔ yĩ funitsã a biyua, bɛkɔ yĩ banantsuenyole mɔ banantsue babi dɔliwa, bɛmanɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa biyua. Miya nɛ obolitsɔ̃ luwi kanyakɔ̃ a!’
“Lɛmɛ bati a kĩ bɛvɛ a tákpeti ye kavɛ a, mbom bɛdzakũ bɛnaa be tudzuma kamɛ. Oti mɔa naa ye kɔba, ɔbɛbã naa kɔyaatɔ,
bati nkaɛ a pili basumunɛ a bɛkɛna be tɛnya ade bɛkɔ be a.
Lɛgã a na kalɔkpa paa, foesũ edo ye sodzafɔ bɛnakɔ awudifɔ a, bipila be ɔmatɔ a lɛmɛ.
“Ke liti a, ɛvɛ ye basumunɛ ebi be kĩ, ‘Biyua obolitsɔ̃ kapi funitsã a katɔ, lɛmɛ bati a kĩ nvɛ a táfɛta obu a kĩ nkpa be a.
Foesũ finyaa minaa ɔmatɔ a tɔblɔnu kpale akũ minaavɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ míamɔ ɛya nɛ kanyakɔ̃ a.’
Ade basumunɛ a nɛ bɛnaa tɔblɔnu akũ bɛnakpã odi nyɛ odi kĩ bɛmɔ́, bati wĩ mɔ bati kpa flee, ade obolitsɔ̃ kapikɔ̃ a yi mɔ bati a.
“Kĩ lɛgã a nawo kĩ yadã bikĩ bɛvɛ a, ɛmɔ́ onyole odi kĩ ɛtádo obolitsɔ̃ kapi atadiɛ nɛ awã.
Ade lɛgã a via ye kĩ, ‘Ɔkɔba, nde ɔkɛna owo nɛ awĩ kĩ ɔtádo obolitsɔ̃ kapi atadiɛ?’ Lɛmɛ onyole a tɔ lumumu.
“Foesũ lɛgã a bi ye basumunɛ a kĩ, ‘Misui ye akpɔ mɔ abɔa mita ye mimuni nɛ kanya nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ, awã kĩ yaabe ɛba adɔ̃.’ ”
Yesu wũna kĩ, “Bati beblebee bavɛ, lɛmɛ be sukuloomɛ bapau.”
Farisifɔ a nanaa adzina ayekĩ banaĩ Yesu bɛtsãmɛna fɔlɛtsa kavia kamɛ, bɛna ye nɛ ye kɔdzɛla kalɛ kamɛ.

Foesũ bido be fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ mɔ bikĩ bitomɔ Herodes a kamɛ badi nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ bɛlɛ kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, bunyina kĩ odeĩ ɔnɔkɔali, atsa Baguma osi a nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ, ade ɔtsɛ́la odima akũ, kitonɛkĩ aádã oti anɛ.
Foesũ bi boe nɔ adzuni. Boe mbla kpa osi kĩ bute tɔgɔlɛ bɔkpa Roma Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃, mbɔɛɛ kĩ ɛtákpa osi?”
Lɛmɛ Yesu mɔ́ be adzuni kpa a kĩ bɛbɔɛ a eyi ɔsũ, foesũ ebi be kĩ, “Mi anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa bakɛnanɛ! Nde sũ miasɔ yĩ midã?
Mikɔa sika a kĩ miakɔa kase ɔgɔlɛ a mitsa yĩ.”
Bɛkɔa sika a bɛma ye,
ade evia be kĩ, “Owei lɔlɔ kata mɔ dĩ teĩ nɛ se akũ?”
Bɛkpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Roma Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ fude fɔanɛ.”
Foesũ Yesu bi be kĩ, “Kekɔ̃ mikɔa lɛtsa a kĩ lɛnyɛ Roma Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ lide mikpa ye, ade mikɔa lɛtsa a kĩ lɛnyɛ Baguma lide lɛmɛ mikpa Baguma.”
Kĩ binu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a fɔkɛna be saa, ade bɛfɔnɛ ye awɛ bɛdzakũ a.
Luwi mɔapɛ a, Zadukifɔ kĩ balɛ kĩ banɔkpa kayidza lɛláa kamɛ badi ya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃ bɛyavia ye
kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, Mose bi boe kĩ ntɛ onyole odi kĩ ɛtáma ku ni, kɛnɛ kĩ ɔwaɛ̃nyole ɛkɔã okunawa a lɔkɔa bɛma bido ye lɔlɔ.
Finyaa bawaɛ̃nyole evũkɔnɔ badi dzi nɛ boe kamɛ tɔ̃ nɛ awĩ. Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃de a kɔã ɔtsɔ̃ lɛmɛ bɛmɔ ye bɛtáma fɔmɔ eku, foesũ ɛfɔnɛ ye okunawa a eyi ɛkpa ɔwaɛ̃nyole a.
Ade lɛtsa mɔapɛ a lɛya nɛ ɔyade a, mɔ ɔlalɛde a, kɛnawo ovũkɔnɔde a akũ a.
Nɛ foe kawũna kamɛ a, otsole a lɛmɛ ku.
Finyaa, nɛ luwi a kĩ banɔkpa aayidza bidzi nkpã akũ a, be kamɛ ɔɔdabe ɔtsɔ̃ yaanya, kitonɛkĩ banyole evũkɔnɔ a flee kɔã ye tɔ̃ a?”
Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mikɛna mfumsu, kitonɛkĩ minyína Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a fɔlɛtsa mɔ Baguma kɔbɛ̃ a.
Kitonɛkĩ nɛ banɔkpa kayidza kadzi nkpã kamɛ ni, bɛláakɔã batsɔ̃ ĩye bidzi fɔnyɔ, mbom baana ndɛ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ aye.
Mbɔɛɛ mitákã tɔ̃ lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma lɛ nɛ banɔkpa kayidza kadzi nkpã akũ a? Ɛlɛ kĩ,
‘Yĩ nyɛ Abraham Baguma, mɔ Isak Baguma mɔ Yakob Baguma.’ Nnɛ́ banɔkpa Baguma yanɛ, mbom batidziwa ade yanɛ.”
Kĩ bati kɔdabu a nu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, akũ dzuli be nɛ ye fɔtsa katsa a akũ.
Kĩ Farisifɔ a nu kĩ Zadukifɔ a tápuli bɛdza nɛ Yesu anɛ a, bɛnakpɔta nɛ kakɔ mɔa,
ade be kamɛ ɔmɔa kĩ ɛnyɛ mbla ɔtsanɛ sɔ Yesu ɛdã nɛ fɔlɛtsa kavia kamɛ kĩ,
“Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, Mose mbla aádabe bɛ̃ nɛ te kamɛ?”
Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Wɛ boe Ɔlate, nɔ Baguma a kalɛ mɔ nɔ ɔwɔlɛ flee, mɔ nɔ ɔkla flee, mɔ nɔ adzuni flee.
Ade mbla kĩĩ nyɛ atɔnyade mɔ ekĩ ɛbɛ̃ flefle a.
Mbla ayade a la ndɛ ye, ‘Wɛ nɔ ɔkɔba kalɛ ndɛ ayekĩ awɛ nɔ mɔawɛ akũ kalɛ.’
Ade tɛbla nviã kĩĩ akũ Mose mbla a mɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ fɔtsa katsa a flee dzɛ̃ a.”
Kĩ Farisifɔ a yakpɔta a, Yesu via be kĩ,
“Litsa nyɛ mi adzuni nɛ Kristo akũ? Owei obinyole yanɛ?”
Bɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Lɛgã Dawid kasinu kamɛ ɔwa yanɛ.”
Ade Yesu via be kĩ, “Kekɔ̃ nde sũ Dawid tsã Hũhũ kamɛ ɛvɛ ye kĩ, ‘Ɔlate’? Kitonɛkĩ Dawid lɛ kĩ,
‘Boe Ɔlate bi yĩ Ɔlate a kĩ,
“Dzi nɛ yĩ sɔmɔna
kɛnaawo kĩ maakɔa
nɔ bakesĩnɛ ndo nɛ nɔ abɔa kayɔ.” ’
Ntɛ Dawid vɛ Kristo kĩ Ɔlate a ni, nde Kristo aapuli ɛnya Dawid obinyole?”
Be kamɛ odima tápuli ɛkpa Yesu mbuayɛ, ade kito luwi a kanaa a, odima tádo ɔwɔlɛ ebuki evia ye kalɛ kadima.
Ke liti a, Yesu bi bati kɔdabu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a fɔlɛtsa kĩ,
“Mbla batsanɛ mɔ Farisifɔ a bɛkpa kɔbɛ̃ kĩ banyɛ Mose mbla a kayɔ.
Foesũ mikɛna lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ bibi mi kĩ mikɛna a mipi foe midomɔ akũ. Lɛmɛ mitadã be fɔkɛlatsa mikɛna, kitonɛkĩ baákɛna nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ balɛ a akũ.
“Bisuli fɔtsa mɔ ɔlɔmɛ kĩ fudeĩ ɔsĩ mɔ kalɔ bɛlɔla bati, lɛmɛ be mɔawɛ a kɔ̃ baáwɛ kĩ bayo lawobi malo bibumɛna bati foe kalɔ.

Bakɛna lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa ayekĩ bati bɛmɔ be kɛkɛ. Bakɔa fumakɛ kĩ fɔsa a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa bite kabɔa nɛ nnyɛ mɔ akpɔ. Ade bakɛna be tɛtadiɛ wulaa atɔ tɛsa, tɛvanɛ mɔ mpɛsɛmpɛsɛ gɛlɛɛlɛgɛlɛɛlɛ a!
Bawɛ kĩ badzi nɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ fudzikɔ̃ nɛ kanyakɔ̃, mɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ fudzikɔ̃ nɛ Yudafɔ fɔtsɛnakɔ̃.
Bawɛ kĩ bati bɛwɔ̃na be mɔ obu nɛ kɔyaatɔ, bɛvɛ be kĩ Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ mɔ obu.
“Kɛtánɛ kĩ bavɛ mi kɔ̃ kĩ Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, kitonɛkĩ Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ mɔapɛ mideĩ, ade mi flee minyɛ bawaɛ̃ a.
Ade ayea mitavɛ odima nɛ tite akũ kĩ mi Ɔlɛga, kitonɛkĩ Ɔlɛga mɔapɛ mideĩ nɛ ode.
Mitafɔ̃ odima lɛvɛ mi kĩ Ɔkpãnɛ malo, kitonɛkĩ ɔkpãnɛ mɔapɛ mideĩ, kĩ ɛnyɛ Kristo.
Oti a kĩ ɛnyɛ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ nɛ mi kamɛ ni, ɛnya mi ɔsumunɛ.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yadɛla ye akũ nɛ ode ni, baakɛna ye nɛ kayɔ, ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛdɔla ye akũ ni, baadɛla ye nɛ ode.
“Lɛmɛ makpa mi mbla batsanɛ mɔ Farisifɔ bɔbɔɛ! Anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa bakɛnanɛ! Mibalɛ ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a onyukpɛ̃ a mido bati. Mi mɔawɛ a miáwo, ade miákpa bikĩ bɛbɔa mbɔdi kĩ bawo a osi biwo a.
“Makpa mi mbla batsanɛ mɔ Farisifɔ bɔbɔɛ! Anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa bakɛnanɛ! Miatɛ bakunawa tɔtɔ nɛ be awɛ ade miabɔa mpaɛ gɛlɛɛlɛ kakɔa tsa akũ a. Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ míana sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ mɔ ɔsĩ sɛba!

“Makpa mi mbla batsanɛ mɔ Farisifɔ bɔbɔɛ! Anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa bakɛnanɛ! Mitsã mpo akũ minyina minaa fude fude kĩ miawɛ oti mɔapɛ ɛdani Yudani, lɛmɛ ntɛ midani ye a, miakɛna ye titi nviã ɛkpɔla ɛkpa fi luwotu kamɛ kanaa ndɛ mi aye!
“Makpa mi banɛkunɛ a kĩ bakpã bati a bɔbɔɛ! Mialɛ kĩ, ‘Ntɛ odi tani Asɔli Kɔla ni, fɔnyɛ́ lɛtsama, lɛmɛ ntɛ ɛtani sika ngbã nɛ Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ kɔ̃ ni, fubo a pi ye.’
Banɛkunɛ bakɔasia! Fɔɔdabe bɛ̃ kɔya? Sika ngbã a mbɔɛɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kĩ kɔfɔ̃ sika a akũ kpalɛ a?
Miatsa fɔtsa lɛmɛ kĩ, ‘Ntɛ odi tani Baguma afɔlibɔ atɛnyɛ a ni, fɔnyɛ́ lɛtsama, lɛmɛ ntɛ ɛtani afɔliɛ fɔtsa a nɛ afɔlibɔ atɛnyɛ a akũ kɔ̃ ni, ɛlɔ fubo.’
Banɛkunɛ mianɛ nuwĩ! Fɔɔdabe bɛ̃ kɔya? Futetsa a mbɔɛɛ kĩ afɔlibɔ atɛnyɛ a kĩ ye lɛkpalɛ futetsa a akũ a?
Foesũ ntɛ odi tani afɔlibɔ atɛnyɛ a ni, ɛtani ye mɔ futetsa a kĩ futeĩ nɛ atɛnyɛ a akũ a flee.
Ade ntɛ odi tani Asɔli Kɔla a ni, ɛtani koe mɔ Baguma a kĩ edzi nɛ koe kamɛ a.
Ade ayea ntɛ odi tani ode ni, ɛtani Baguma lɛgãkpo mɔ Baguma a kĩ edzi nɛ de akũ a.

“Bɔbɔɛ makpa mi mbla batsanɛ mɔ Farisifɔ! Anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa bakɛnanɛ mianɛ! Miakpa Baguma tuwĩ kĩ bakɔa kado funitsã ɔlɛ̃ te kamɛ kasɛ̃ katsu kawuade a pɛpɛɛpɛ, lɛmɛ mifɔnɛ mbla fɔtsa katsa sĩwa, kĩ fɔnyɛ fɔlɛtsa kadzɛ nɛ osi kpĩĩ, kɔnyakamɔ mɔ ɔnɔkɔali kadi awɛ. Ade fukĩĩ kufɛ kɛfɛta kĩ miakɛna lɔkɔa mikɛna fɔbɛbã a mibu a.
Banɛkunɛ bati bakpãnɛ! Miasɔni kɔyabi kanyɛ nɛ bavɛ kamɛ, lɛmɛ miamɛna ɔpɔnkɔ mɔ kanɛ mɔ lɔpɔ!
“Bɔbɔɛ makpa mi mbla batsanɛ mɔ Farisifɔ! Anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa bakɛnanɛ! Miavɔlɛ mi kuyei mɔ titsensi liti yededeede, lɛmɛ foe kamɛ yi mɔ fɔtsa a kĩ mikɔa kɔbɛ̃ mɔ anɛngbã mitɛ a.
Nɔ Farisini ɔnɛkunɛ, nya lɔtɔ kavɔlɛ kayei a kamɛ, lɔkɔa ke liti lɛmɛ aakpalɛ!
“Bɔbɔɛ makpa mi mbla batsanɛ mɔ Farisifɔ! Anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa bakɛnanɛ! Mila ndɛ funikɛ kĩ bikputa mɔ tite ovoe kĩ fɔalɛ kadã, lɛmɛ foe kamɛ yi mɔ banɔkpa fɔtsɔ̃ mɔ sukɛna vɔ̃wa.
Ade ayea miatsa akũ nɛ bati anɛ ndɛ bati wĩ, lɛmɛ mi kamɛ kɔ̃ yi mɔ anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa kakɛna mɔ tɔkpa.
“Bɔbɔɛ makpa mi mbla batsanɛ mɔ Farisifɔ! Anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa bakɛnanɛ! Mike funi mɔ kalɛ mikpa Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a ade mihɛhɛ bikĩ bidzi nkpã wĩ a anɛ kate fɔtsa a.
Ade mialɛ kĩ, ‘Ntɛ budzi nkpã nɛ boe bawanyɔ lɔkɔ a ni, kufɛ bɔtákɛna ɔmɔa mɔ be bɔkɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a.’
Ade fukĩĩ mikɔa midi adansiɛ nɛ mi akũ kĩ minyɛ bati a kĩ bɛkɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a bawa!
Nɛ foesũ mikɛna minaa lɔtɔ, lɔkɔa miyula lɛtsa a kĩ mi bawanyɔ yi kayɔ a!
“Mi bati kĩ bɛla ndɛ bɔɛ babi! Kakɔna mikɔna kĩ míapuli milo, kĩ bɛláakɔ mi kɔtɔ bɛkpa fi luwotu kamɛ kanaa?

Foesũ mabi mi kĩ maado Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ, anyansãfɔ, mɔ fɔtsa batsanɛ nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃. Míakɔ badi, mibɔa babɛbã nɛ asendua akũ, míabo badi mɔ mple nɛ mi fɔtsɛnakɔ̃, mitomɔ be liti kito ɔmatɔ kɛnaa ɔmatɔ.
Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ bati wĩ babɔanɛ a kĩ biwula a flee aaya nɛ mi akũ. Fɔ́ayi kayɔ futo oti kpĩĩ Abel babɔanɛ akũ kɛnaawo Zakaria, Barakiya obi a kĩ mikɔ nɛ Asɔli Kɔla mɔ afɔlibɔ atɛnyɛ a kayite a akũ.
Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ nɛ wuda kĩĩ flee akũ aaya nɛ mi nviã babi akũ!

“Yerusalem, Yerusalem, nɔ a kĩ ɔkɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ, ade ɔnɔ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kĩ Baguma do nɛ nɔ sɛkɛ̃ a boe a! Titi eni nwɛ kufɛ kĩ makpɔta nɔ babi ndɛ ayekĩ ɔkɔkɔ bima akpɔta ye babi kado nɛ fupoki kayɔ, lɛmɛ ɔtátunɔ!
Dã, baafɔnɛ nɔ tɔtɔ awɛ biyi tɛdza luto.
Mabi nɔ kĩ kito finyaa kanaa ni, ɔláabuki ɔmɔ́ yĩ kɛnaawo kĩ aalɛ kĩ, ‘Baguma hila oti a kĩ yaya nɛ boe Ɔlate dĩ akũ a.’ ”
Kĩ Yesu nɛ́ nɛ Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ yanaa a, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ kĩ batsa ye ayekĩ bike kɔla a flee a.
Yesu bi be kĩ, “Midã fukĩĩ flee kadã wĩ. Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ bɛláatina de lidima nɛ lɔkɔba akũ kĩ bɛláadu bimuni.”

Kĩ Yesu nɛ edzi nɛ Kugua Futse Ɔtɔ a akũ a, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a bɛla bɔɛɛ bɛya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ bivia ye kĩ, “Lɔkɔ lɔwɔdabe fɔtsa kĩĩ aaya nɛ foe kamɛ. Bi boe lɛtsa a kĩ laanya nɔ kaya mɔ katinya kamɛ kawũna a nsɛntsɛlɛni.”
Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Midã kadã wĩ ayekĩ odima lɛláakɛ mi.
Kitonɛkĩ bati pii aaya nɛ yĩ dĩ akũ bɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Yĩ nyɛ Kristo a.’ Baakɛ bati pii.
Míanu kawũ kanɔ mɔ kawũ akũ fɔlɛtsa mɔ lugo. Lɛmɛ mitafɔ̃ fɔtsa kĩĩ lɛbɔlɛ mi tɔwɔlɛ. Kɛnɛ kĩ fɔtsa kĩĩ fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ, lɛmɛ fɔátsa kĩ katinya kamɛ kawũna a wo ɔtɔ.
Ɔmaĩ aanɔ mɔ akũ, ade fɔgã kanyakɔ̃ aayidza bɛnɔ mɔ fɔgã kanyakɔ̃ a. Kɔlɛ aana, ade tite aakuna mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ nɛ fɔkɔ pii a.
Fukĩĩ flee la ndɛ ɔmatsɔ̃ sɛmɛ kapi kawo a kayɔkayi aye.
“Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ ni, baanyɛ mi bɛkpa kĩ bɛkɛna mi awɔda, bɛkɔ mi malo. Batidziwa flee aakesĩ mi nɛ yĩ sũ.
Bati pii aamuniki nɛ be katɛkado liti. Baanyɛ be akũ akũ abɔa, bikesĩ akũ lɛmɛ.
Fɔvã onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ aanɛ bɛkpã bati pii bɛyɛla osi.
Tɔkpa kakɛna aade nɛ ode paa kĩ bati pii ɔdɔ onukpɛ̃ aadɔ.
Lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaadza pintii ɛnawo kawũna ni, Baguma aatɛ ye.
Baalɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ akũ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ fɔlɛtsa nɛ katinya kamɛ flee fɔnya adansiɛ fɔkpa batidziwa flee. Nɛ fukĩĩ liti a, katinya kawũna a aaya.
“Ntɛ mimɔ́ Fɔtsa mɔ libe kĩ fɔakɔ Ɔmaĩ, kĩ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Daniel lɛ foe akũ fɔlɛtsa eyi a kĩ fɔdzɛ̃ nɛ kakɔ kpalɛwa a, nɔ ovoli kĩĩ ɔkãnɛ, nu foe kayɔ dzununuunu,
lɔkɔa bati a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Yudea, bilo bɛnaa tɔtɔ a akũ.
Oti a kĩ edeĩ nɛ kɔla ode ni, ɛtaduma ɛka kĩ yanaabɔɛ ye akũ fɔtsa ɛnɛmɛna nɛ kɔla kamɛ.
Ade ayea oti a kĩ edeĩ nɛ kɔba lɛmɛ, ɛtamuniki ɛya kĩ yanaabɔɛ ye atadiɛ.
Lɛmɛ bɔbɔɛ makpa bamatsɔ̃ mɔ bikĩ babi amɛmɛ nɛ awɛ nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ.
Mibɔa mpaɛ mikpa Baguma kĩ mi kalo lɔkɔ lɛtana nɛ osili lɔkɔ ĩye Kawɛya Luwi akũ!
Kitonɛkĩ lubo kamɔ nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ aana ɔsĩ lɛba lidi nyɛ lidi kĩ lɛya tɔ̃, kito katinya kayɔkayi kɛyawo nviã kĩĩ, ade de odu lɛmɛ lɛláabuki lɛya dadaada a.
Ntɛ Baguma ɛtatinya lubokamɔ fuwi a na akũ kɔkɔɛ ni, kufɛ otidziwa odima lɛláana nkpã. Lɛmɛ nɛ bati a kĩ ɛpau eyi a sũ ni, Baguma aatinya fuwi a akũ.
“Foesũ ntɛ odi bi mi kĩ, ‘Dã, Kristo deĩ nɛ awĩ,’ ĩye ‘Amɔ ye nɛ akĩĩ’ ni, mitatɛ foe mido.
Kitonɛkĩ fɔvã kristofɔ mɔ fɔvã onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ aanɛ, ade baakɛna nsɛntsɛlɛni mɔ awãwã fɔtsa kĩ ntɛ baapuli bɛkɛ bikĩ Baguma pau a malo.
Midã, mbi mi fukĩĩ ĩnyamɛna lɔtɔ fɔmɔ lɔkɔ a aawo ɔtɔ.
“Foesũ ntɛ bati bi mi kĩ, ‘Dã, edeĩ nɛ kɔsa kamɛ’ ni, mitanaa awã. Ade ayea ntɛ bati lɛ kĩ, ‘Dã, edeĩ nɛ kɔla kamɛ’ ni, mitatɛ foe mido.
Kitonɛkĩ Otidziwa Obi a kaya aana ndɛ ayekĩ odetɔ́ kamɛ amɔanɛ kato suwa kadekɔ̃ kanaa suwa katomukɔ̃ a.
“Awã kĩ fɔtsa kuwa deĩ ni, ade awã fɔpɛtɛ akpɔta a.
“Ntɛ lubo kamɔ fuwi a na yatɛ̃ pɛ, suwa aake ɔtũ, odetɔ lɛmɛ lɛláabuki ɛvɔlɛ. Fusibii aato ode fɔtɔ ade kɔbɛ̃ fɔtsa a kĩ fudeĩ nɛ odetɔ́ kamɛ a aakuna akũ, fɔdzakũ nɛ foe kadzakɔ̃ a.
“Ade lɔkɔ a na kamɛ mɔ Otidziwa Obi a nsɛntsɛlɛni aanɛ nɛ odetɔ́ kamɛ, ade tite akũ bati flee aabe, ade baamɔ Otidziwa Obi a kĩ yaya nɛ luflututu akũ mɔ kɔbɛ̃ nɛ kukũkpalɛ kpale kamɛ.
Baavɔ̃ kagbulɛɛ kpale a, lɔkɔa yaado ye ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ bɛnaa katinya tukonto ɛna a akũ, bɛnaakpɔta ye bati a kĩ ɛpau a kito katinya sɛkɛ kĩĩ kɛnaa sɛkɛ kĩĩ akũ.
“Mikɔlɛ fɔtsa nɛ atɔ kutse a akũ. Ntɛ kɔnɛ tɛbabi vɔɛ̃ mɔ kudo tɔɔta blɔblɔ kanɛ awɛ ni, minyina kĩ ovio lɔkɔ fuã.
Ade ayea ntɛ mimɔ́ fɔtsa a kĩ nlɛ flee a ni, minyi kĩ katinya kawũna a lɔkɔ wo ɔtɔ fuyua.
Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ fɔtsa kĩĩ flee aaya nɛ foe kamɛ, fɔmɔ nviã babi kasinu kĩĩ flee aaku.
Tite mɔ ode aayatɛ̃, lɛmɛ yĩ fɔlɛtsa a kɔ̃ onukpɛ̃ lɛláatɛ̃ da.
“Odima linyína luwi ĩye dɔũhuilɛ a kĩ fɔ́aya nɛ foe kamɛ. Ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a ĩye Obi mɔawɛ a malo linyína, mbɔɛntɛ Ɔlɛga odi keĩ nyina.
Otidziwa Obi a kaya aana ndɛ ayekĩ fɔya nɛ Noa lɔkɔ a.
Nɛ fuwi a kĩ fɔnya mui kayili nɛ tite akũ lɔtɔ kamɛ a, bati kanya bɛkamɔa, bɛkakɔã batsɔ̃, bɛkakɔã banyole kɛnawo luwi a kĩ Noa wo nɛ adaka ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ,
lɛmɛ bɛtányi lɛtsa a kĩ lɛkaya kɛnawo kĩ mui kayili a yalɔ be flee ɛnamɛna. Ade aye lɛmɛ Otidziwa Obi a kaya aana a.
Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, banyole nviã aakakɛna adzuma nɛ kɔba, baabɔɛ ɔmɔa bɛnamɛna, bɛfɔnɛ ɔmɔa awɛ biyi.
Batsole nviã aakawɔlɛ onuvoe nɛ kɔwɔlɛ akũ, baabɔɛ ɔmɔa bɛfɔnɛ ɔyade a biyi.
“Foesũ mina nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ minyína luwi a kĩ de akũ mi Ɔlate a aaya.
Ntɛ kanyi tɔtɔ ɔlate nyina lɔkɔ a kĩ oyekpanɛ aawo nɛ ye akũ ni, kufɛ esi lipe kĩ ɛtákpa oyekpanɛ a osi ewo nɛ ye kɔla kamɛ.
Nɛ foesũ mi malo mimanɛ akũ miyi, kitonɛkĩ Otidziwa Obi a aaya nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ miádã ye anɛ a akũ.
“Foesũ owei nyɛ ɔsumunɛ ɔnɔkɔalini mɔ kadi onyinɛ? Ade ye nyɛ oti a kĩ ye ɔlate kɔa ɛdzɛla nɛ ye basumunɛ bɛbã onukpɛ̃ kĩ ɛkpa be funitsã nɛ lɔkɔ wĩ akũ.
Bihila ɔsumunɛ a kĩ ye Ɔlate aato osi akũ ɛyaamɔ kĩ ɛlamɛna adzuma a kĩ ɛkpa ye a kakɛna!
Ɔnɔkɔali mabi mi kĩ, ɔlate a aakɔa ye ɛdzɛla nɛ ye fɔtsa flee onukpɛ̃.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ ɛnyɛ ɔsumunɛ kpa ni, yaabi ye akũ kĩ, ‘Yĩ ɔlate a lɛláaya mɔatsɛ!’
mɔ edo ye bakɔba basumunɛ a kabo awɛ, yanya kamɔa mɔ bavɛ bawuganɛ ni,
ye ɔlate a aamuniki ɛya nɛ luwi a kĩ ɛtáte anɛ mɔ lɔkɔ kĩ enyína akũ.
Ye ɔlate a aablɔmɛna ye, ɛvɛlɛ ye sɔtɔ ɛfɔ̃ ɛna tsɛfã mɔ anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa bakɛnanɛ. Ade awã yaabe ɛba adɔ̃ a.
“Lɔkɔ a kĩ Otidziwa Obi a aaya a, Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a aana ndɛ bayitsɔ̃ ewua kĩ bɛbɔɛ be tɛsɛdza kĩ banaatsɛlamɔ obolitsɔ̃ ɔnyɔ.
Be elo nyɛ bakɔasia, be elo lɛmɛ nyɛ anyansãfɔ.
Kĩ badzimbifɔ a bɔɛ be tɛsɛdza a, bɛtábɔɛ kugua bibu.
Anyansãfɔ a kɔ̃ ko kugua nɛ titontolowa kamɛ bɛlɛ bibu mɔ be tɛsɛdza a.
Obolitsɔ̃ ɔnyɔ a táya mɔatsɛ, foesũ tida bɔɛ bayitsɔ̃ a, ade bɛwa tida a.
“Nɛ lɛnyɛ kayite a, binu fɔwɔla kĩ, ‘Amɔ obolitsɔ̃ ɔnyɔ a nɛ awĩ tsoo! Minɛ miyaatsɛla mɔ ye!’
“Ade bayitsɔ̃ ewua a yidza bɛtɛna be tɛsɛdza a.
Badzimbifɔ a bi anyansãfɔ a kĩ, ‘Mikpa boe mi kugua a kudi, kitonɛkĩ boe tɛsɛdza lamɔ kadĩ.’
“Lɛmɛ anyansãfɔ a kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Oowo, kukĩ bɔnɛɛ a lɛláato bɔmɔ mi. Minaa bikĩ banɔ a sɛkɛ̃ minaaya mi kude.’
“Lɛmɛ kĩ bayitsɔ̃ badzimbifɔ a dzakũ bɛnaaya kugua a, obolitsɔ̃ ɔnyɔ a yaya. Bayitsɔ̃ elo a kĩ bɛmanɛ akũ a, tomɔ ye bɛnaa obolitsɔ̃ kapikɔ̃ a, ade bɛbalɛ opunu a.
“Ke liti a, bayitsɔ̃ nkaɛ a muniki bɛya, ade bɛbɔa fɔwɔla kĩ, ‘Boe Ɔlate, boe Ɔlate, binya opunu kakpa boe!’
“Obolitsɔ̃ ɔnyɔ a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Oowo! Nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, ĩnyína mi!’ ”
Yesu lɛ ewũna kĩ, “Nɛ foesũ mina nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ minyína luwi ĩye dɔũhuilɛ a.
“Ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a la ndɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ. Onyole odi manɛ akũ kĩ yanaa osi akũ. Ɛvɛ ye basumunɛ ɛkpɔta ade ɛkɔa ye fɔtsa kĩ edeĩ a edo nɛ be awɛ a.
Ɛkpa odi nyɛ odi nɛ ye mbɔdibɔ onukpɛ̃. Foesũ ɛkpa oti mɔa sika ovoe mpim elo, ɛkpa ɔbɛbã mpim nviã, ade ɛkpa ɔlalɛde a apim mɔa, ɛdzakũ ɛnaa osi akũ a.
Ɔsumunɛ a kĩ ɛtɛ sika mpim elo a, nadani awɛ nɛ se akũ ɛna mpim elo nfasɔ ete nɛ se akũ.
Ade ayea oti a kĩ ɛtɛ sika mpim nviã lɛmɛ nadani awɛ nɛ se akũ ɛna mpim nviã ete nɛ se akũ a.
Lɛmɛ ɔsumunɛ a kĩ ɛtɛ apim mɔa a, natu lɛkɛ ɛkɔa ye ɔlate sika a ɛkɔla nɛ de kamɛ.
“Nɛ lɔkɔ gɛlɛɛlɛ liti a, be ɔlate a muniki ɛya, ade ɛkɛna akunta mɔ be a.
Ɔsumunɛ a kĩ ɛtɛ sika mpim elo a kɔa se mɔ mpim elo kute a ɛyamɛna ɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Boe Ɔlate, sika mpim elo a kĩ ɔkpa yĩ a, dã nna mpim elo bɛbã nte nɛ se akũ.’
“Ye ɔlate a bi ye kĩ, ‘Mbo, ɔsumunɛ wĩ mɔ ɔnɔkɔalini! Odi ɔnɔkɔali nɛ fɔtsa kabii akũ, foesũ maakɔa nɔ ndzɛla nɛ fɔtsa pii onukpɛ̃. Yaawo nɛ yĩ kawɔlɛkamɔ kamɛ!’
“Ɔsumunɛ a kĩ ɛtɛ sika mpim nviã a lɛmɛ yalɛ kĩ, ‘Boe Ɔlate, ɔkpa yĩ sika mpim nviã. Dã, nna mpim nviã bɛbã kute nte nɛ se akũ.’
“Ye ɔlate bi ye kĩ, ‘Mbo, ɔsumunɛ wĩ mɔ ɔnɔkɔalini! Odi ɔnɔkɔali nɛ fɔtsa kabii akũ foesũ maakɔa nɔ ndzɛla nɛ fɔtsa pii onukpɛ̃. Yaawo nɛ yĩ kawɔlɛkamɔ kamɛ!’
“Ade oti a kĩ ɛtɛ sika apim mɔa a yabi ye kĩ, ‘Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃, ĩnyina nɔ kĩ oti mɔ ɔsĩ anɛ. Ana fɔtsa nɛ awã kĩ ɔtádu foe, ade akpɔta funitsã nɛ awã kĩ ɔtádu foe a.
Nɛ foesũ nvila, ade nnakɔa nɔ sika a nnabila nɛ tite kamɛ a. Amɔ nɔ fɔtsa nɛ awĩ.’
“Ye ɔlate kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Nɔ ɔsumunɛ kpa mɔ ɔnyɔnɛpo! Ntɛ onyina kĩ mana fɔtsa nɛ awã kĩ ntádu foe, ade makpɔta fɔtsa nɛ awã kĩ ntásã foe a ni,
kufɛ kakɔa akɔa sika a ɔnaado nɛ sika kakɔlakɔ̃ ayekĩ ntɛ mmuniki ĩya, maatɛ se mɔ se akũ kute a.
“ ‘Mitɛ sika a nɛ ye awɛ, mikɔa se mikpa oti a kĩ edeĩ sika mpim ewua a.
Kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ edeĩ fɔtsa ni, baakɔa fɔtsa pii bibu ye, ade yaana foe fublusu a. Lɛmɛ oti a kĩ ɛlá lɛtsama ni, foe kabii a kĩ edeĩ a malo baatɛ foe nɛ ye awɛ.
Ɔsumunɛ kĩ ye akũ lɛlá nfasɔ kĩĩ lɛnɛ́nɛ ɛkpa lɛtsama kakɛna. Foesũ mita ye mimuni nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ. Ade awã yaana ebe ɛba adɔ̃ a.’
“Ntɛ Otidziwa Obi a to ode ɛya nɛ ye kukũkpalɛ kamɛ, kĩ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ flee a tomɔ ye a, yaadzi nɛ ye lɛgãkpo a akũ.
Ade baakpɔta katinya kamɛ bati flee nɛ ye anɛ kamɛ a. Adeke, yaasɛ̃ be nɛ kutsu nviã kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ baveli ɔkpãnɛ asɛ̃ baveli mɔ kutukpabi kamɛ a.
Yaakɔa bati wĩ a ɛdzala nɛ ye sɔmɔna, lɔkɔa bati kpa a anna nɛ ye sɛba.
“Lɛgã a aabi bati nɛ ye sɔmɔna a kĩ, ‘Miya, mi a kĩ Nda hila a. Miyaawo nɛ lɛgã kanyakɔ̃ a kĩ bɛmanɛ biyi bɛkpa mi a kamɛ, kito anɛ kĩ bɛbɔa katinya kamɛ a,
kitonɛkĩ kĩ kɔlɛ kɔ yĩ a, mikpa yĩ litsedi ĩnya. Kĩ ɔmɔado kɔ̃ yĩ a, mikpa yĩ mui mmɔa, ade kĩ ĩnyɛ ɔnɔvɔɛ̃ a, mitɛ yĩ nɛ mi tɔtɔ kamɛ.
Kĩ ndzi ɔdzɔ a, mido yĩ atadiɛ, kĩ masɔ a midã yĩ akũ, ade kĩ nwaa kɔla a, miyasɛla yĩ.’
“Ade bati wĩ a aavia ye kĩ, ‘Boe Ɔlate, luwei bɔmɔ́ nɔ kĩ kɔlɛ kɔ nɔ mɔ bɔkpa nɔ funitsã, ĩye kĩ ɔmɔado kɔ nɔ mɔ bɔkpa nɔ mui ɔmɔa?
Luwei bɔmɔ́ nɔ ɔnɔvɔɛ̃ mɔ bɔtɛ nɔ nɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ, ĩye luwei ɔtsã ɔdzɔ mɔ bɔkpa nɔ atadiɛ odo?
Luwei ɔsɔ mɔ bɔdã nɔ akũ, ĩye luwei ɔwa kɔla mɔ bɔyasɛla nɔ?’
“Lɛgã a aakpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ mikɛna mikpa nwaɛ̃ amɛ babisɛ̃ kĩĩ kĩ bɛlá obu a kamɛ odi ni, yĩ mikɛna foe mikpa!’
“Adeke mɔ Lɛgã a aabi bikĩ nɛ ye sɛba a kĩ, ‘Minɛ liti nɛ yĩ akũ, mi bati kĩ Baguma dumu! Mitɔ minaa fi kĩ fɔádĩ da a kĩ bɛmanɛ bɛkpa Abonsam mɔ ye ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kamɛ!
Kɔlɛ kɔ yĩ lɛmɛ mitákpa yĩ ĩnya, ɔmɔado kɔ yĩ lɛmɛ mitákpa yĩ mui mmɔa.
Ĩnya ɔnɔvɔɛ̃ lɛmɛ mitátɛ yĩ nɛ mi tɔtɔ kamɛ. Ndzi ɔdzɔ lɛmɛ mitádo yĩ atadiɛ. Nsɔ mitádã yĩ akũ, ade nwa kɔla lɛmɛ mitáyaasɛla yĩ a.’
“Ade be malo baakpa mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Boe Ɔlate, luwei tɔ̃ kɔlɛ kɔ nɔ, ĩye ɔmɔado kɔnɔ, ĩye ɔnya ɔnɔvɔɛ̃, ĩye odzi ɔdzɔ, ĩye ɔsɔ, ĩye kĩ ɔwa kɔla mɔ bɔtákɛna lɛtsama bɔkpa nɔ?’
“Lɛgã a aakpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ mitákɛna mikpa nwaɛ̃ amɛ babisɛ̃ kĩ bɛlá obu kĩĩ kamɛ odi ni, yĩ mitákɛna foe mikpa.’
“Foesũ baanamɔ bati kĩĩ lubokamɔ a kĩ lɛlá kawũna a kamɛ, lɛmɛ bati wĩ a aanaa nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a kamɛ.”
Kĩ Yesu lɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ flee eyua a, ebi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ,
“Minyina kĩ kite fuwi nviã kĩ banya Wuda Katɛ̃ luwi a. Nɛ fuwi a na kamɛ, baanyɛ Otidziwa Obi a bɛkpa kĩ bɛbɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ.”
Ade basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ a tsɛna nɛ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee Kaiafa tɔtɔ kamɛ a.
Bɛkɛna nhihiɛ kĩ baapi Yesu nɛ kabɛla kamɛ lɔkɔa bɛkɔ ye.
Bɛlɛ kĩ, “Kɛtánɛ kĩ bɔakɛna foe nɛ fuwi kanya a kamɛ, ntɛ nnɛ́ aye ni, bati a aado ɔtutũ nɛ ɔmaĩ a kamɛ.”
Yesu naa Simon kĩ ɛsɔ tɔ̃ fɔsɔ ngbã a awã nɛ Betania.
Lɔkɔ a kĩ Yesu dzi nɛ opunu akũ ɛkanya a, otsole odi kĩ ɛnɛɛ tumpã mɔ kalɛ, kĩ eyi mɔ kugua mɔ ɔlɛ̃ yatsokui kugua eko nɛ Yesu lɔlɔ kamɛ.
Kĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a mɔ́ fukĩĩ a, bɛna kalɔkpa ade bivia kĩ, “Nde sũ yabula kugua a kade lɔmɔ?
Baapuli bɛnɔ koe mɔ kɔya baũ lɔkɔa bɛkɔa se bite ahiãfɔ!”
Yesu nu lɛtsa a kĩ bɛkalɛ a, foesũ ebi be kĩ, “Nde sũ miaha otsole kĩĩ? Ɛkɛna fɔtsa wĩ ɛkpa yĩ.
Ahiãfɔ deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ daa, lɛmɛ yĩ kɔ̃ miláana yĩ nɛ mi kamɛ daa.
Lɛtsa a kĩ otsole kĩĩ kɛna nyɛ kĩ eko kugua nɛ yĩ akũ ɛkɔa ɛmanɛ yĩ ɛkpa kabila.
Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ kĩ baade lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ ni, baalɛ lɛtsa a kĩ otsole a kɛna a lɛmɛ, bɛkɔa bɛkai ye.”
Adeke fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a ewua-nviã kamɛ ɔmɔa kĩ bavɛ Yuda Iskariot a naa basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a sɛkɛ̃ a.
Ɛnavia be kĩ, “Litsa míakpa yĩ ntɛ ntsa ye liti osi?” Bɛkã sika ovoe fɔbɔ taalɛ bido nɛ ye awɛ.
Kito lɔkɔ a naa, ɛkawɛ osi wĩ a kĩ yaatsã ɛnyɛ Yesu ɛkpa.
Nɛ Abodoo Kĩ Ɛtáyila Luwi kanya lɔtɔnyade akũ a, fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a ya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃ bivia ye kĩ, “Nɛ ndia awɛ kĩ bɔnaamanɛ bɔkpa nɔ Wuda Katɛ̃ funitsã a kanya?”
Ɛkpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Minaa ɔmatɔ a kamɛ nɛ onyole odi sɛkɛ̃, mibi ye kĩ, ‘Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ bo yĩ lɔkɔ fuã, foesũ bɔmɔ yĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a bɔ́ayanya Wuda Katɛ̃ funitsã a nɛ nɔ awã.’ ”
Fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kɛna ndɛ ayekĩ Yesu bi be a, ade bɛtɔ Wuda Katɛ̃ funitsã a.
Kĩ olobe wo ɔtɔ a, Yesu mɔ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a nadzi kĩ banya.
Nɛ kanyakɔ̃ a, Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mabi mi pipiipi kĩ mi kamɛ ɔmɔa aanyɛ yĩ ɛkpa.”
Fɔha fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a paa, ade bivia ye ɔmɔa ɔmɔa kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, yĩ manɛ mbɔɛɛ?”
Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oti a kĩ bɔmɔ ye awɛ kpɔta nɛ sɔɔdaɛ kamɛ a, ade ye aanyɛ yĩ ɛkpa a.
Otidziwa Obi a aaku ndɛ ayekĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ, lɛmɛ bɔbɔɛ makpa oti a kĩ ye aanyɛ Otidziwa Obi a ɛkpa! Ntɛ bɛtama oti a na malo, kufɛ fɔnɛnɛ fɔkpa ye fɔbɛ̃!”
Ade Yuda a kĩ ɛnyɛ ye ɛkpa a lɛmɛ via kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, yĩ manɛ mbɔɛɛ?”
Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nɔ mɔawɛ lɛlɛ.”
Kĩ bɛkanya a, Yesu bɔɛ abodoo, ade kĩ ɛbɔa mpaɛ nɛ ye akũ a, ebulibuli ye ɛkpa ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a, ebi be kĩ, “Mitɛ minya, ade yĩ sukɛna nɛ awĩ a.”
Ke liti a, ɛbɔɛ okuluwa mɔ waĩ ɛnyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ ade ɛkɔa ɛkpa be a. Ebi be kĩ, “Mi flee mitɛ mimɔa.
Fukĩĩ nyɛ yĩ babɔanɛ kĩ bɛkɔa bisipi Baguma apam mɔ bati a. Fɔnyɛ yĩ babɔanɛ kĩ biko nɛ tite nɛ bati pii lɔlɔ kĩ Baguma ɛkɔa be tɔkpa ete be.
Mabi mi kĩ nláabuki mmɔa waĩ kĩĩ kɛnaawo luwi a kĩ bɔmɔ mi bɔmɔa waĩ vɔɛ̃ nɛ Nda Lɛgã kanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ.”
Kĩ bɛsã kɔlɛkanyɛ ɔnɔ biyua a, bɛnɛ bɛnaa Kugua Futse Ɔtɔ a akũ.
Ade Yesu bi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Nviã lɛnyɛ, mi flee míalo mifɔnɛ yĩ, kitonɛkĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ,
‘Baguma aakɔ baveli ɔkpãnɛ a
ade baveli a aagba bɛsã a.’
Lɛmɛ ntɛ Baguma dzɛla yĩ ndzi nkpã ni, maanya mi lɔtɔ nnaa Galilea.”
Petro bi Yesu kĩ, “Ntɛ be flee aalo bɛfɔnɛ nɔ malo ni, yĩ kɔ̃ nláalo nfɔnɛ nɔ da!”
Ade Yesu bi Petro kĩ, “Mabi nɔ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ lɛnyɛ kĩĩ fɔmɔ ɔkɔkɔ aabe ni, aalɛ titi ɛlalɛ kĩ onyína yĩ.”
Petro kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nláalo nfɔnɛ nɔ da ntɛ kɛnɛ kĩ bɔmɔ nɔ aaku malo!” Ade ayea fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ nkaɛ a flee lɛ kalɛ mɔapɛ a.
Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a naa kakɔ kadi kĩ bavɛ Getsemane. Ebi be kĩ, “Midzi nɛ awĩ nnaa lɔtɔ nnaabɔa mpaɛ tɔ̃.”
Ɛkpã Petro mɔ Zebedeo babi nviã ebumɔ ye akũ. Nɛ awã naa, ayɔlɔhɔ pi ye edo ɛkatila bliblibli awɛ,
ade ebi be kĩ, “Ayɔlɔhɔ tɛ yĩ kamɛ flee ndɛ maku. Midzi nɛ awĩ bɔmɔ mi bɔkaadzɔlɛ fɔkɔ.”
Kĩ ɛnaa lɔtɔ sukuloo a, ɛtsa anɛ nɛ tite ɛbɔa mpaɛ kĩ, “Nda, ntɛ fɔ́adã bɔɛɛ fɔ̃ lubo kamɔ kɔɔpu kĩĩ ɛtɛ̃ nɛ yĩ akũ! Lɛmɛ nnɛ́ nɛ ayekĩ mawɛ, mbom ndɛ ayekĩ awɛ.”
Emuniki ɛya nɛ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ɛlalɛ a sɛkɛ̃ ɛyamɔ kĩ bɛwaa tida, ade ebi Petro kĩ, “Nde sũ mi ɛlalɛ a miápuli midzi midzɔlɛ dɔũhuilɛ mɔapɛ malo mibumɔ yĩ?
Mikaadzɔlɛ akũ, mikaabɔa mpaɛ ayekĩ miláawo nɛ sɔhuiɛ kamɛ. Hũhũ a awɛ lɛmɛ sukɛna a kɔ̃ kɛna kpɛtɛɛ.”
Yesu buki ɛnaa lɛyade ɛnabɔa mpaɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nda, ntɛ fɔnyɛ kĩ lubo kamɔ kɔɔpu kĩĩ lɛláapuli ɛtɛ̃ nɛ yĩ akũ mbɔɛntɛ mmɔa ye ni, kekɔ̃ kɛna nɛ nɔ kawɛ akũ.”
Ebuki ɛya ɛyamɔ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ kĩ bɛwa tida, kĩ bɛtápuli bibinya anɛ.
Yesu dzakũ ɛfɔnɛ be ɛnabɔa mpaɛ lɛlade, ɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa mɔapɛ a.
Ke liti a, emuniki ɛyabi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Tida miwaa miawɛya? Midã, lɔkɔ a wo ɔtɔ kĩ baakɔa Otidziwa Obi a bido nɛ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ kɔbɛ̃ awɛ.
Miyidza, mifɔ̃ bɔnaa. Midã, oti a kĩ yaanyɛ yĩ ɛkpa a, fuã.”
Kĩ Yesu buki ɛkalɛ kɔdzɛla a, Yuda kĩ ɛnyɛ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ewua-nviã a kamɛ ɔmɔa a yawo awã. Bati kɔdabu baũ a kĩ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ do a tomɔ ye, bɛnɛɛ fɔpamɛ mɔ futsekpa nɛ awɛ.
Oti a kĩ ɛnyɛ ye ɛkpa a, kpa be nsɛntsɛlɛni kĩ, “Oti a kĩ ye onukpɛ̃ maadzɛmɛ a, ade ye nɛ awã a. Mipi ye.”
Yuda yɛlɛ tĩĩ ɛnaa Yesu sɛkɛ̃ ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, lukudɔ litomɔ nɔ,” ade ɛdzɛmɛ ye onukpɛ̃ a.
Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ɔkɔba, wɛ sɔwa nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ɔyaakɛna a akũ.”
Adeke bati a fuã bipi Yesu, bitimtim ye kɔɔba a.
Bati a kĩ bitomɔ Yesu a kamɛ ɔmɔa vɛlɛ kɔpã ɛnyɛ nɛ sɛpapo kamɛ, etsua Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a ɔsumunɛ sɔtɔ emuni.
Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Kɔa nɔ kɔpã a kado nɛ koe kadokɔ̃, kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛbɔɛ kɔpã nɛ oti akũ ni, kɔpã onukpɛ̃ yaatɔ.
Mbɔɛɛ onyína kĩ kufɛ maapuli nwã Nda kĩ ɛyaabumɔ yĩ, kĩ lɛtalɛta yaado ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ sodzafɔ kĩ bɛbɛ̃ kutsu ewua-nviã bɛya?
Lɛmɛ ntɛ fɔya lɔmɔ ni, nde fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ a kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ fɔya a, aaya nɛ foe kamɛ?”
Ke liti a, Yesu via bati kɔdabu a kĩ, “Nde sũ minɛɛ apã mɔ futsekpa kĩ miayaapi yĩ ndɛ oyekpanɛ aye? Luwi daa madzi nɛ Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ katsa fɔtsa, lɛmɛ mitápi yĩ.
Lɛmɛ fukĩĩ flee ya nɛ foe kamɛ, ayekĩ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a tsɛlɛ biyi a, aaya nɛ foe kamɛ.” Ade awã naa mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a flee lo bɛfɔnɛ ye a.
Bati a kĩ bipi Yesu a, kɔa ye bɛnamɛna Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee Kaiafa sɛkɛ̃, awã kĩ mbla batsanɛ mɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a natsɛna.
Petro tomɔ be nɛ liti kɔlaa ɛnawo nɛ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a tɔtɔ kamɛ. Ewo ɛnadzi kĩ yadã fɔlɛtsa a kĩ fɔya a kawũna.
Basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ Fɔlɛtsa Badzɛnɛ a flee wɛ kĩ bama fɔvã bite nɛ Yesu akũ ayekĩ baakɔ ye.
Titɔ kĩ bati pii nɛ bɛyama fɔvã nɛ ye akũ malo ni, bɛtámɔ lɛtsama nɛ ye akũ.
Nɛ ke kawũna kamɛ a, bati nviã nɛ bɛyadza,
ade bɛlɛ kĩ, “Onyole kĩĩ lɛ kĩ, ‘Maapuli nveli Asɔli Kɔla a, mbuki nke koe nɛ fuwi ɛlalɛ liti.’ ”
Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a yidza ɛdza, evia Yesu kĩ, “Ɔláanyɛ onukpɛ̃ nɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛbɔɛ nɛ nɔ akũ a akũ?”
Lɛmɛ Yesu tábinya onukpɛ̃.
Ade Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a buki ebi ye kĩ, “Ntani Baguma kĩ edzi nkpã a kĩ, bi boe ntɛ nɔ nyɛ Kristo, Baguma Obi a.”
Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ade aye ɔlɛ a. Lɛmɛ mabi mi kĩ kito finyaa kanaa ni, míamɔ Otidziwa Obi a kĩ edzi nɛ Baguma Kpale sɔmɔna, ade yaya nɛ ode luflututu akũ a!”
Mɔ ye onukpɛ̃ katɔ pɛ, Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a yɛlɛ ye atadiɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Onyole kĩĩ lɛ fubusuotsa! Bɔtábuki busĩ adansifɔ badima! Minu fubusuotsa a kĩ ɛlɛ a!
Litsa nyɛ mi kakɔna?”
Bɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Eku kɔtɔ, foesũ kɛnɛ kĩ bɛkɔ ye.”
Adeke bitua tanɛ biko nɛ ye anɛ kamɛ, bɛtalɛ ye fukpeni, ade badi lɛmɛ balɛ balɛ ye tɔlɔtɔ,
ade bivia ye kĩ, “Kristo, ntɛ ɔnyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ ni, bi boe oti a kĩ ɛbɔa nɔ!”
Kĩ Petro dzi nɛ lɔwabe a, Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a ɔsumunɛtsole mɔa ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nɔ malo otomɔ Yesu Galileani a.”
Lɛmɛ Petro sĩ nɛ bati a flee anɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ĩnyina lɛtsama nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ alɛ a akũ.”
Kĩ eyidza ɛtsã onyukpɛ̃ yanɛ nɛ kanya a, katsolebi ɔsumunɛ bɛbã mɔ ye, ade ebi bikĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ awã kĩ, “Onyole kĩĩ lɛmɛ na nɛ Yesu Galileani a sɛkɛ̃ tɔ̃.”
Petro buki esĩ ɛlɔ fubo ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ĩnyína onyole a na!”
Owi tábuna mɔ banyole a kĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ awã ya nɛ Petro sɛkɛ̃ bibi ye kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔali fɔanɛ kĩ nɔ malo ɔnyɛ be kamɛ ɔmɔa, kitonɛkĩ nɔ kɔdzɛla kalɛ kamɛ nyɛ nɔ kanya!”
Awã naa, Petro do kadumu awɛ, katani fɔtsa kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔali malɛ. Baguma ɛvɛlɛ yĩ sɔtɔ ntɛ fɔvã mama. Ĩnyina oti a na!”
Deedimɔapɛ ɔkɔkɔ be.
Adeke mɔ Petro kai fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Yesu bi ye a kĩ, “Fɔmɔ ɔkɔkɔ aabe ni, aalɛ titi ɛlalɛ kĩ onyína yĩ.” Ade ɛnɛ ɛnaa kanya ɛnabe a.
Nɛ odenyinawi a, basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ a flee tsa fɔlɔ bipi adzuni kĩ baaakɔ Yesu.
Bisui ye bɛkpã ye bɛnakɔa bido nɛ Roma Abãã Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃, Pilato awɛ.
Kĩ Yuda, kĩ ɛnyɛ Yesu ɛkpa a, mɔ́ kĩ bɛkɔ Yesu kɔtɔ a, fuwo ye kalɔɛ ade ɛkɔa sika ovoe fɔbɔ taalɛ a ɛma basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a.
Ebi be kĩ, “Nkɛna tɔkpa, kĩ ĩnyɛ oti kĩ mfumsu adima lɛláa ye akũ nkpa kĩ bɛkɔ.”
Ade bɛkpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Fukĩnaa lɛtsɛ́la boe. Nɔ kalɛ kanɛ!”
Ade Yuda talɛ sika fɔbɔ taalɛ a eko nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ, ɛdzakũ ɛnado ye akũ ɔwɛ̃ a.
Basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a nafila sika a bɛlɛ kĩ, “Sika kĩĩ nyɛ babɔanɛ kaya sika, boe mbla tákpa osi kĩ bɛkɔa se bido nɛ Asɔli Kɔla sika adakã kamɛ.”
foesũ bipi adzuni nɛ se akũ, ade bɛnaya Fubui Ɔmɛnɛ Tite kĩ tɛnya banɔvɔɛ̃ kabilakɔ̃.
Nɛ foesũ kɛyawo nviã bavɛ awã kĩ, Babɔanɛ Tite.
Ade Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yeremia fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi a ya nɛ foe kamɛ kĩ, “Bɛkɔa sika ovoe fɔbɔ taalɛ a kĩ Israel tunɔ baase nɛ ye lɔlɔ a,
bɛya fubui ɔmɛnɛ tite ndɛ ayekĩ boe Ɔlate wɛ kĩ nkɛna a.”
Bɛfɔ̃ Yesu dza nɛ Romafɔ Abãã Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a anɛ. Ade Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a via ye kĩ, “Nɔ nyɛ Yudafɔ lɛgã a mbɔɛɛ?”
Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nɔ lamɔ kalɛ.”
Kĩ Yudafɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ a katsua ye onukpɛ̃ malo ni, Yesu tálɛ kadima.
Adeke Pilato via ye kĩ, “Aánu fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛlamɔ kate nɛ nɔ akũ flee a?”
Lɛmɛ Yesu sĩ ɛtákpa kalɛ mɔapɛ malo mbuayɛ, foesũ fɔkɛna Abãã Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a wãwã paa.
Nɛ Wuda Katɛ̃ luwi lidi nyɛ lidi kanya kamɛ ni, Abãã Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a awɛ kɔla bawanɛ a kamɛ ɔmɔa, kĩ bati kɔdabu a awɛ a, awɛ kafɔnɛ kakpa be.
Nɛ lɔkɔ a kamɛ a, onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Baraba, kĩ ɛtɛ dĩ nɛ fɔtsa kpa kakɛna kamɛ waa kɔla.
Foesũ kĩ bati kɔdabu a kpɔta a, Pilato via be kĩ, “Owei miawɛ kĩ nfɔnɛ awɛ nkpa mi? Yesu Baraba mbɔɛɛ kĩ Yesu a kĩ bavɛ Kristo a?”
Kitonɛkĩ Pilato nyina pefee kĩ lineke kanɔ sũ Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a kpã Yesu bɛyado nɛ ye awɛ.
Kĩ Pilato dzi nɛ fɔlɛtsa kadzɛ lukpo kamɛ a, ɔtsɔ̃ do lɔtɔ bɛyabi ye kĩ, “Takɛna oti kpĩĩ a na lɛtsama, kitonɛkĩ kadzɔ lɛnyɛ mmɔ́ lubo paa nɛ kɔda kamɛ nɛ ye sũ.”
Basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ a fɔ̃ bati kɔdabu a wã Pilato kĩ ɛfɔnɛ Baraba awɛ lɔkɔa bɛkɔ Yesu.
Ade Pilato via bati a kĩ, “Bati nviã a kamɛ ɔwɔdabe miawɛ kĩ nfɔnɛ awɛ nkpa mi?”
Bɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Baraba!”
Pilato via be kĩ, “Lɔkɔa litsa nkamɔ Yesu kĩ bavɛ Kristo a?”
Be flee bɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Bɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ!”
Ade Pilato via be kĩ, “Litsa tɔkpa ɛkɛna?”
Ade bido fɔwɔla kabɔa kɔɔba awɛ kĩ, “Bɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ!”
Kĩ Pilato mɔ́ kĩ lɛtsama kakɛna buki lɛláa, mbom ɔtutũ aaya sũ ni, ɛbɔɛ mui ɛvɔlɛ awɛ nɛ bati kɔdabu a anɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Yĩ akpɔ mɔ abɔa lɛláa onyole kĩĩ wuda kamɛ!”
Bati kɔdabu a flee kpa mbuayɛ yoo kĩ, “Ye babɔanɛ a bɛya nɛ boe mɔ boe babi akũ!”
Adeke Pilato fɔnɛ Baraba awɛ ɛkpa be a, ade kĩ ɛfɔ̃ bibo Yesu mɔ mple biyua a ɛkɔa ye ɛkpa kĩ bɛnaabɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ.
Ade abãã ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a sodzafɔ kpã Yesu bɛnamɛna Pilato lɔwabe ade sodzafɔ katsu a flee yadza bisinya Yesu a.
Bɛnyɛ ye tɛtadiɛ nɛ ye akũ ade bɛkɔa atadiɛ wulaa ngbã bido ye a.
Bɛkɔa fɔtsɔlɛwɛ bɛnɔ lɛgãbɔɛ bɛtsa ye, ade bɛkɔa otse bido nɛ ye sɔmɔna awɛ a. Bɛkake aduli nɛ ye anɛ kadi ye nsekuo kĩ, “Yiiduu! Yudafɔ lɛgã a edzi nkpã daa!”
Bitua tanɛ biko nɛ ye akũ, bɛtɛ otse a nɛ ye awɛ biwula ye nɛ lɔlɔ.
Kĩ bidi ye nsekuo lɔmɔ biyua a, bɛnyɛ atadiɛ wulaa a nɛ ye akũ bɛbɔɛ ye mɔawɛ tide a bibuki bido ye. Ke liti bɛkpã ye bɛnɛmɛna kĩ banaabɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ.
Kĩ bɛnɛ banaa a, bɛtsɛlamɛna onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Simon, kĩ eto Kirene. Sodzafɔ a hɛ ye kĩ ɛlɔ Yesu asendua a.
Ade bɛyawo kakɔ kadi kĩ bavɛ Golgata, kĩ foe kayɔ nyɛ Oti Lɔlɔ Fɔtsɔ̃.
Ade awã bɛkpa ye waĩ kĩ bɛtsɛka mɔ otsonu mɔ ɔnyɛ kĩ ɛmɔa a, lɛmɛ kĩ ɛta be onukpɛ̃ ɛdã a, esĩ be kamɔa.
Kĩ sodzafɔ a bɔa ye bɛmɛna nɛ asendua akũ biyua a, bɛta bavulibi nɛ ye tɛtadiɛ akũ, bɛsɛ̃ bɛkpa akũ.
Ke liti a, bɛkɛna akũ bidzi nɛ awã bɛkadzɔlɛ ye akũ.
Ade bɛtsɛlɛ ye onukpɛ̃ katsua fɔlɛtsa nɛ ye lɔlɔ nyangɛ kĩ, “Ade Yesu Yudafɔ Lɛgã a nɛ awĩ a.”
Bɛbɔa bayekpanɛ nviã lɛmɛ bɛmɛna nɛ asendua akũ bibumɔ Yesu, ɔmɔa nɛ ye sɔmɔna, ɔyade nɛ ye sɛba.
Bati a kĩ bɛtsã awã batɛ̃ a, kakpɔkpa fɔlɔ, kata fuvũnatsa kamɛna Yesu,
ade bɛkalɛ kĩ, “Nɔ a kĩ ɔlɛ kĩ aaveli Asɔli Kɔla a, lɔkɔa obuki oke koe nɛ fuwi ɛlalɛ kamɛ a, tɛ nɔ akũ! Ntɛ Baguma Obi anɛ ni, duma nɛ asendua a akũ!”
Ade ayea lɛmɛ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ mbla batsanɛ mɔ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ a di Yesu nsekuo kĩ,
“Ɛtɛ bati bɛbã nkpã, lɛmɛ yaápuli ɛtɛ ye akũ. Nnɛ́ ye nyɛ Israel lɛgã a? Kekɔ̃ eduma nɛ asendua a akũ finyaa, lɔkɔa bɔ́atɛ ye budo!
Yatɛ Baguma kado ade yalɛ kĩ Baguma Obi yanɛ. Ntɛ Baguma awɛ ye kalɛ nuwĩ ni, ɛyaatɛ ye finyaa!”
Ade ayea bayekpanɛ nviã a kĩ bɛbɔa nɛ asendua akũ a malo vũna Yesu a.
Kĩ kito suwa tɔdɔũ ewua-nviã a, katinya kamɛ flee ke ɔtũ kɛnawo olobe tɔdɔũ ɛlalɛ kamɛ.
Ndɛ tɔdɔũ ɛlalɛ kamɛ a, Yesu bɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba kĩ, “Eli, Eli, lama sabaktani?” Foe kayɔ nyɛ kĩ, “Yĩ Baguma, yĩ Baguma, nde sũ ɔfɔnɛ yĩ awɛ?”
Kĩ bati a kĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ awã a kamɛ badi nu lɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ a, bɛlɛ kĩ, “Onyole kĩĩ avɛ Eliya!”
Ade deedimɔapɛ be kamɛ ɔmɔa wula atsɛ ɛnabɔɛ ɔsapɔ edo nɛ waĩ yilawa kamɛ ɛkɔa ɛvɛla nɛ otse onukpɛ̃, ɛdɛla ete ye nɛ onukpɛ̃ kĩ ɛmɔa.
Lɛmɛ bati bɛbã a lɛ kĩ, “Dza tɔ̃. Mifɔ̃ bɔdã ntɛ Eliya aayanyɛ ye mbɔɛɛ?”
Yesu buki ɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba, ade ɛmɛna onukpɛ̃ a.
Adeke lima kpale a kĩ bɛvɛla nɛ Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ a bɛ̃ fɔkɛ nviã, kito nyangɛ kɛyawo kayɔ. Tite kuna boe bakpale bakpale yɛlɛ,
funikɛ binya ade bɛdzɛla bati kpalɛwa pii kĩ biku a bidzi nkpã a.
Kĩ Yesu yidza eto kanɔkpa liti a, bati kpalɛwa a nɛ́ nɛ funikɛ a kamɛ bɛnaa Yerusalem, ɔmatɔ kpalɛwa a kamɛ, awã kĩ bati pii mɔ be.
Kĩ sodzafɔ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a mɔ bikĩ bibumɔ ye bɛkadzɔlɛ Yesu akũ a mɔ́ tite kakuna mɔ fɔtsa bɛbã kĩ fɔya a, libe wo be paa ade bɛlɛ kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔali obi kĩĩ nyɛ Baguma Obi!”
Batsole pii kĩ bito Galilea, kĩ bitómɔ Yesu bɛkabumɔ ye a, dza mɔ lugo bɛkadã.
Be kamɛ badi nyɛ Maria Magdalani, Maria kĩ ɛnyɛ Yakobo mɔ Yosef ɔma, mɔ Zebedeo ɔtsɔ̃.
Kĩ olobe wo ɔtɔ a, onyole osikani odi kĩ bavɛ Yosef, kĩ eto Arimatia, kĩ ye malo ɛnya Yesu fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kamɛ ɔmɔa a yanɛ ɛta.
Ɛnaa Pilato sɛkɛ̃ ɛnawã ye kĩ ɛkɔa Yesu ɔnɔkpa a ɛkpa ye. Ade Pilato kpa osi kĩ bɛfɔnɛ ɔnɔkpa a awɛ bɛkpa ye a.
Foesũ Yosef bɔɛ ɔnɔkpa a, ade ɛkɔa aklala fitaa vɔɛ̃ esuli ye,
ɛkɔa ɛnado nɛ ye mɔawɛ linikɛ vɔɛ̃ kĩ ɛfɔ̃ bɛnyɛ nɛ de kpale ɔkɛ kamɛ a. Emininya de kpale esua linikɛ a onukpɛ̃ ade ɛdzakũ a.
Maria Magdalani mɔ Maria kĩ a dzi nɛ awã bɛtsɛlamɔ linikɛ a bɛkadã.
Nɛ luwi lɛyade, kĩ lɛnyɛ Kawɛya Luwi ɔnɔnɛ a, basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ Farisifɔ yatsɛna nɛ Pilato sɛkɛ̃,
bibi ye kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃, bute anɛ kĩ, kĩ ɔvãlɛvã a na dzi nkpã a, ɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Maayidza ndzi nkpã nɛ fuwi ɛlalɛ liti.’

Foesũ kpa mbla kĩ bɛdzɔlɛ ye kuni a akũ kadzɔlɛ wĩ kɛnaawo luwi lɛlalɛde a akũ. Ntɛ nnɛ́ aye ni, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a aapuli bɛnaaye ɔnɔkpa a lɔkɔa bibi bati kĩ bɛdzɛla ye bitomɛna banɔkpa kamɛ. Ntɛ fɔya lɔmɔ ni, liti fɔvã a aaba fɔtɔnyade a.”
Pilato bi be kĩ, “Mikpã badzɔlɛnɛ minamɛna, midzɔlɛ kuni a akũ ayekĩ míapuli.”
Foesũ bɛdzakũ bɛnatim de a nɛ kuni a onukpɛ̃ kɔɔba, ade bɛdzɛla de akũ badzɔlɛnɛ nɛ awã a.
Kĩ Kawɛya Luwi a tɛ̃, nɛ ɛkwansieda a luwi lɔtɔnyade kĩ lɛnyɛ Ɛkwansieda odenyinawi a, Maria Magdalani mɔ Maria kĩ a naa kĩ banaadã Yesu kuni a.
Lɛtalɛta tite kuna mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ, kitonɛkĩ ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ to ode ɛka ɛyamininya de nɛ linikɛ a onukpɛ̃ a eyi, ɛkɛna akũ edzi nɛ de akũ.
Ye akũ flee la ndɛ odetɔ́ kamɛ kamɔanɛ aye, ade ye tɛtadiɛ voe fitaa ndɛ aklala aye a.
Libe wo bikĩ badzɔlɛ fɔkɔ a paa, bɛkatila bliblibli, bɛkɛna ndɛ banɔkpa.
Ade ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a bi batsole a kĩ, “Mitavila! Ĩnyina kĩ Yesu a kĩ bɛbɔa nɛ asendua akũ a miawɛ.
Ɛláa awĩ, kitonɛkĩ bɛdzɛla ye edzi nkpã ndɛ ayekĩ ɛlɛ eyi a. Mifuã miyaadã awã kĩ ɛwa a.
Miwɛ sɔwa minaabi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, ‘Eyidza eto banɔkpa kamɛ. Ɛnyaa mi lɔtɔ yanaa Galilea. Ade awã míamɔ ye a!’ Mite anɛ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ mbi mi a akũ.”
Foesũ batsole a dzakũ mɔatsɛ nɛ linikɛ a ɔwɛ̃, ade bɛkɔa libe mɔ kawɔlɛ, biwula atsɛ kĩ banaabi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya a.
Lɛtalɛta Yesu tsɛlamɔ be ade ebi be kĩ, “Lukudɔ litomɔ mi.” Bifuã bɛyapili ye nɛ fɔnɛta, bike aduli bisum ye.
Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mitavila, mbom minaabi nwaɛ̃ amɛ kĩ bɛnaa Galilea, lɔkɔa baamɔ yĩ nɛ awã.”
Kĩ batsole a dzakũ banaa a, kuni a akũ badzɔlɛnɛ a kamɛ badi naa ɔmatɔ kamɛ bɛnabi basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya a flee.
Kĩ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ a tsa fɔlɔ a, bipi adzuni ade bɛkpa badzɔlɛnɛ a sika baũ,
bibi be kĩ, “Milɛ kĩ, ‘Lɛnyɛ a kĩ bɔwa tida a ade ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a yaye ɔnɔkpa a bɛdzakũmɛna a.’
Adeke mɔ ntɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ wo Abãã Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ sɔtɔ kamɛ ni, bɔ́api foe onukpɛ̃ kĩ fɔláanya ɔhau fɔkpa mi.”
Badzɔlɛnɛ a tɛ sika a, bɛnakɛna ndɛ ayekĩ bibi be a. Foesũ ade fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ lɛgba nɛ Yudafɔ kamɛ bɛnɛɛ balɛ kɛyawo nviã kĩĩ a.
Nɛ foe kamɛ a, fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ewua-odi a naa Galilea nɛ ɔtɔ a kĩ Yesu tsa be kĩ bɛnaa a akũ.
Kĩ bɛmɔ́ ye a, bike aduli bisum ye, lɛmɛ be kamɛ badi tɛ atsindze.
Yesu fuã be ɛlɛ kĩ, “Baguma kɔa tite mɔ ode otumi flee edo nɛ yĩ awɛ.
Foesũ minaa fude flee kamɛ nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ, minaakɛna bati a bɛdani yĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ. Miwɔla be mui nɛ Ɔlɛga a, Obi a mɔ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a dĩ akũ.
Mitsa be kĩ bidi nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ nhɛ mi a akũ. Midã, ndeĩ nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ luwi daa kɛnaawo katinya kawũna.”
Mark: Ade Kalɛ Wĩ nɛ Yesu Kristo kĩ ɛnyɛ Baguma obi akũ kayɔkayi a.
Anɛ kɔkɔɛ a mɔ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yesaya tsɛlɛ eyi kĩ Baguma bi ye obi kĩ,
“Maado yĩ fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ ɛnya nɔ lɔtɔ,
ɛyaalɔla osi eyi ɛkpa nɔ.
Aanu kĩ oti kĩĩ tsɛ̃ yade lɛtsã nɛ kɔsa kamɛ kalɛ kĩ,
‘Mimanɛ osi mikpa Ɔlate a kaya.
Mikɛna osi a eyo kpĩĩ.’ ”

Fɔtɔ Ɔnyanɛ kĩĩ nyɛ Yohanes kĩ ɛna nɛ kɔsa kamɛ ɛkawɔla bati mui nɛ ɔwɔ kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ Yudafɔ akɛna a. Emini ede lɛtsã kĩ bati bɛdani be tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ, bɛtɛ mui kawɔla amaniɛ a, lɔkɔa Baguma aakɔa be titikpa ete be.
Bati pii to Yudea tite a akũ mɔ be ɔmatɔ kpale kĩ bavɛ Yerusalem, bɛnaa kɔsa a kamɛ, kĩ banaatse Yohanes ɔlɛdo. Bibinya be tɔkpa kamɛ bɛtsa Baguma, ade Yohanes wɔla be mui nɛ Yordan ɔwɔ kamɛ a.
Lɔkɔ a na kamɛ ni, Yohanes do ɔpɔnkɔ mɔ kanɛ mɔ lɔpɔ tɔlɔ tɛtadiɛ, ɛkɔa ɔyaɛ ovoli ɔwɛ̃ ɛbɔa kate. Ye funitsã nyɛ kɔsã mɔ koolo.
Ede lɛtsã kĩ, “Oti a kĩ yaaya nɛ yĩ liti a, ɛbɛ̃ yĩ kɔlaa kĩ ntáfɛta kĩ makɛna akũ nwũnya mpabua nɛ ye abɔa malo.
Yĩ kɔ̃ mui nkɔa makɛna mui kawɔla amaniɛ, lɛmɛ ye kɔ̃ yaakɔa Hũhũ Kpalɛwa ɛwɔla mi mui.”
Owi tábuna mɔ Yesu to Nazaret ɔmatɔ nɛ Galilea tite akũ, ɛyatɛ Yohanes mui kawɔla amaniɛ a nɛ Yordan ɔwɔ kamɛ.
Kĩ Yesu sila ɛnɛ́ eto mui a kamɛ a, ɛmɔ kĩ odetɔ́ kamɛ binya ade Hũhũ a ka eko nɛ ye akũ ndɛ ayekĩ mblɔduma aka a.
Ade ɔlɛdo nɛ eto ode ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nɔ nyɛ yĩ obi kĩ maátunɔ kalɛ, kawɔlɛ ade yĩ nɛ nɔ akũ.”
Lɛtalɛta Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a kpã Yesu ɛnamɛna kɔsa kamɛ nɛ awã kĩ tuwĩ kamɛ bayaɛ deĩ.
Ye odi ɛna nɛ awã fuwi tɛna. Lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, Abonsam sɔ Yesu ɛdã, ade ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ yasum ye a.
Lɔkɔ a kĩ bipi Yohanes bido nɛ kɔla kamɛ a, Yesu dzakũ ɛnaa Galilea ɛnalɛ Baguma Kalɛ Wĩ a nɛ awã.
Ɛkalɛ nɛ awã kĩ, “Lɔkɔ wĩ a wo ɔtɔ ade Baguma lɛgãkanya lɔkɔ a fuã. Mimuniki nɛ mi tɔkpa liti lɔkɔa mitɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a mido!”
Kĩ Yesu kamini nɛ ɔwɔ lutubu baũ ɔwɛ̃ nɛ Galilea tite akũ a, ɛmɔ kɔfɔabi banyɛnɛ nviã kĩ bɛnyɛ Simon mɔ ɔwaɛ̃ Andrea, bɛkata be tɛsau.
Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Miyaatomɔ yĩ, lɔkɔa maakɛna mi bati banyɛnɛ.”
Nɛ awã naa, bɛfɔnɛ be tɛsau awɛ biyidza bitomɔ ye.
Kĩ bɛnaa lɔtɔ sukuloo a, ɛmɔ bawaɛ̃ nviã Yakobo mɔ Yohanes. Bɛna nɛ be ɔkɔlɔ kamɛ bɛkalɔla be tɛsau.
Kĩ Yesu mɔ be a, ɛvɛ be deedimɔapɛ kĩ bitomɔ ye. Be malo biyidza lɛtalɛta, bɛfɔnɛ be ɔlɛga Zebedeo mɔ ye adzuma bakɛnanɛ a odi nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ, ade bitomɔ Yesu a.
Yesu mɔ bikĩ bitomɔ ye a nawo ɔmatɔ kĩ bavɛ Kapernaum. Nɛ Yudafɔ Kawɛya Luwi a kĩ litomɔ be awã kawo luwi a, Yesu naa Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ ɛnatsa fɔtsa.
Bati a kĩ binu ye fɔtsa katsa a kɛna saa, kitonɛkĩ fɔvɛmɛna nɛ Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ a fude akũ, mbom ye ɛtsa fɔtsa mɔ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kɔbɛ̃.
Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, onyole odi kĩ hũhũ kpa deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ na nɛ be katsɛnakɔ̃ a,
ade ɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba kĩ, “Yesu Nazaretni, litsa deĩ nɛ bɔmɔ nɔ kayite? Ɔya kĩ ayaawɔla boe mbɔɛɛ? Ĩnyina oti a kĩ anɛ. Nɔ nyɛ Baguma Oti Kpalɛwa Kĩ Bido a.”
Yesu wũni nɛ hũhũ a akũ kĩ, “Sua onukpɛ̃, kanɛ nɛ oti a kamɛ.”
Hũhũ a fufulinya oti a mɔ ɔsĩ, ɛfɔ̃ ɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba ade ɛnɛ nɛ ye kamɛ a.
Fɔkɛna bati a flee kĩ bɛdza nɛ awã saa, ade bivia be akũ kĩ, “Litsa nɛ awĩ a? Ei! Fɔtsa katsa vɔɛ̃ ɔdabe nɛ awĩ a? Oti kĩĩ deĩ kɔbɛ̃ yawũni nɛ hũhũ kpa akũ ade yatse ye ɔlɛdo a!”
Foesũ Yesu dĩ gba nɛ Galilea tite akũ flee.
Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ, Yakobo mɔ Yohanes dzakũ nɛ Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ a, ade bɛnaa Simon mɔ Andrea tɔtɔ kamɛ a.
Kĩ biwo awã a, badi bi Yesu kĩ Simon nyina waa yasɔ, ye akũ bo hlihlihli.
Foesũ Yesu wo nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃, ade epi ye nɛ kɔkpɔ ɛdzɛla ye kĩ eyidza. Deedimɔapɛ fɔsɔ a dɔ ye, ade eyidza esum be a.
Kĩ suwa tomu a, bati kpã basɔnɛ pii mɔ bikĩ hũhũ kpa deĩ nɛ be kamɛ a bɛyamɛna kĩ Yesu ɛtsa be.
Bati nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ yabɔa obũ nɛ onyukpɛ̃.
Yesu tsa bati pii kĩ basɔ fɔsɔ ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ, ade ɛblɔmɛna hũhũ kpa etomɛna bati pii lɛmɛ kamɛ a. Yesu tákpa hũhũ a osi bɛlɛ kɔdzɛla kitonɛkĩ binyina ye.
Odenyinawi a, Yesu yidza nɛ tɔtɔ a kamɛ, ɛnɛ nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ ɛnaa awã kĩ oti odima táfuã, ɛnabɔa mpaɛ.
Lɛmɛ Simon mɔ bikĩ bitomɔ ye a nɛ bɛtsɛ̃ bawɛ Yesu.
Kĩ bɛmɔ́ ye a, bibi ye kĩ, “Odi nyɛ odi lamɛna nɔ kawɛ!”
Lɛmɛ Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mifɔ̃ bɔnaa tukula bɛbã kĩ tifuã a lɛmɛ kamɛ. Kɛfɛta kĩ mabi be malo Baguma fɔlɛtsa, kitonɛkĩ ade foesũ ĩya nɛ katinya kamɛ a.”
Foesũ ɛnamini nɛ Galilea flee. Ɛtsã ɛkalɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa a nɛ Yudafɔ fɔtsɛnakɔ̃, ade ɛkablɔmɛna hũhũ kpa kanɛmɛna nɛ bati kamɛ a.
Oti odi kĩ yasɔ fɔsɔ ngbã kĩ bati avila ya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃. Ɛkɛna akũ ade eke Yesu aduli kĩ ebumɔ ye a. Onyole a bi ye kĩ, “Ntɛ awɛ ni, aapuli ɔfɔ̃ fɔsɔ kĩĩ lɛwɔ nɛ yĩ akũ.”
Ye fɔlɛtsa kɔ Yesu kɔnya, foesũ eyo awɛ ɛta ye. Ebi ye kĩ, “Mawɛ lɔmɔ. Nɔ akũ ɛkpalɛ.”
Deedimɔapɛ fɔsɔ a wɔ nɛ ye akũ.
Awã naa, Yesu bi ye kĩ ɛdzakũ mɔatsɛ ɛnaa, lɛmɛ esi ye mbla mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ,
“Tafɔ̃ ɔdza nɛ osi ɔkabi bati lɛtsa a kĩ de lɛya, mbom naa kpĩĩ, kakɔa nɔ akũ kanaatsa ɔsɔfɔ. Bɔa afɔliɛ a kĩ Mose mbla tsa a, ayekĩ odi nyɛ odi aanyi kĩ nɔ akũ kpalɛ.”

Lɛmɛ kĩ oti kĩĩ dzakũ a, ɛnado fɔlɛtsa a kagbamɛna awɛ, ɛkabi bati flee ayekĩ Yesu tsa ye a. Nɛ foesũ, Yesu tápuli ebuki ewo nɛ ɔmatɔ odima kamɛ, ade ɛkana nɛ tuwĩ kamɛ a. Lɛmɛ bati buki bɛkato kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ kaya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃.
Fuwi fudi liti a, Yesu muniki ɛnaa Kapernaum, ade owi tábuna mɔ bati nu ye nkã kĩ ɛya nɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ a.
Foesũ bati yayi tɔtɔ a kĩ te kamɛ edeĩ a mɔ kanya flee, ade ɛkatsa be Baguma fɔlɛtsa a.
Ade awã naa mɔ bati ɛna lɔ oti odi kĩ eveliveli bɛma ye a.
Kĩ bɛtápuli bɛtsã onyukpɛ̃ nɛ bati lidede sũ ni, bide nɛ kɔla ode bɛnyɛ ɔkɛ nɛ kakɔ kadi, ade bɛkɛna ɔsɔnɛ a mɔ ɔkɛna biyi nɛ Yesu anɛ kamɛ a.
Kĩ Yesu mɔ́ be katɛkado sũ ni, ebi oti a kĩ eveliveli a kĩ, “Obi, bɛkɔa nɔ titikpa bite nɔ.”
Lɛmɛ Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ a kĩ bɛna nɛ awã kakɔna nɛ be kamɛ kĩ,
“Nde sũ yalɛ fubusuotsa lɔmɔ? Baguma odi aapuli ɛkɔa titikpa ete.”
Yesu nyi be kakɔna a foesũ ebi be kĩ, “Litsa sũ fukĩĩ aha mi nɛ mi kamɛ?
Fɔɔdabe deĩ ɔsĩ fɔbɛ̃ kĩ baabi oti kĩ eveliveli kĩ, ‘Bɛkɔa nɔ titikpa bite nɔ,’ ĩye kĩ, ‘Yidza, bɔɛ nɔ ɔkɛna katsã?’
Kĩ míanyi kĩ Otidziwa Obi a deĩ kɔbɛ̃ nɛ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ kĩ yakɔa bati titikpa kate sũ ni,” Yesu bi oti a kĩ eveliveli a kĩ,
“Yidza, bɔɛ nɔ ɔkɛna kanaa kɔla.”
Lɛtalɛta oti a yidza ɛbɔɛ ye ɔkɛna ɛnɛ nɛ bati a kĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ awã anɛ. Fɔtsa a kɛna bati a flee wãwã, ade bimu Baguma, bɛlɛ kĩ, “Bɔtámɔ fɔtsa kĩĩ odu tɔ̃.”
Yesu buki ɛdzakũ ɛnaa Galilea ɔwɔ lutubu baũ abuĩ a. Bati pii ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ nɛ awã ade ɛtsa be Baguma fɔlɛtsa a.
Kĩ ɛdzakũ yanaa a ɛmɔ́ ɔgɔlɛ ɔtɛnɛ Levi, Alfeo obi kĩ edzi nɛ ɔgɔlɛ katɛkɔ̃. Ade Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Tomɔ yĩ.” Adeke Levi yidza ade etomɔ ye a.
Ke liti a, Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a mɔ bati pii kĩ bitomɔ ye a naanya nɛ Levi awã. Tɔgɔlɛ batɛnɛ mɔ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ pii lɛmɛ na nɛ kanyakɔ̃ a mɔ be.

Ade Farisifɔ kĩ bɛnyɛ Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ badi lɛmɛ na nɛ awã a. Kĩ Farisifɔ mbla batsanɛ a mɔ́ kĩ Yesu anya mɔ titikpa bakɛnanɛ mɔ tɔgɔlɛ batɛnɛ a, bivia ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Litsa sũ yanya kamɔa mɔ tɔgɔlɛ batɛnɛ mɔ tɔkpa bɛbã bakɛnanɛ?”
Kĩ Yesu nu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, ebi be kĩ, “Bati kĩ bideĩ akũ ɔsĩ tásĩ tutsonu ɔkɛnanɛ, mbom basɔnɛ lisĩ ye. Ntáya kĩ mayaavɛ bati kpĩĩ, mbom tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ kavɛ ĩya.”
Nɛ lɔkɔ lidi kamɛ, kĩ Yohanes mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ mɔ Farisifɔ kasui onukpɛ̃ a, bati badi ya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃ bivia ye kĩ, “Nde sũ nɔ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a lásui onukpɛ̃ ndɛ Yohanes bade mɔ Farisifɔ a aye?”
Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mbɔɛɛ obolitsɔ̃ ɔnyɔ bakɔba aapuli bidzi kɔlɛ nɛ obolitsɔ̃ kapikɔ̃ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ obolitsɔ̃ ɔnyɔ a deĩ nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ a?
Lɛmɛ luwi lidi aaya kĩ baakpã ye nɛ ye bakɔba a sɛkɛ̃, lɔkɔa baasui onukpɛ̃ nɛ fuwi a kamɛ.
Odima lákɔa limakũ vɔɛ̃ kataɛ ɔkɛ nɛ lima kɔɛ akũ. Limakũ vɔɛ̃ a aabɛ̃ lɔkɔɛ lidomɔ akũ ntɛ bɛvɔlɛ de, ade fɔ́afɔ̃ ɔkɛ baũ lɛwa ɛba ayekĩ fɔna kɔkɔɛ a.
Bio, odima lákɔa waĩ vɔɛ̃ kako nɛ ɔyaɛ ovoli kuvũ kɔɛ kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ waĩ vɔɛ̃ aabɛ̃ kuvũ kɔɛ a, lɔkɔa waĩ a aawula, kuvũ a lɛmɛ aabu kade. Mbom bakɔa waĩ vɔɛ̃ kako nɛ ɔyaɛ ovoli kuvũ vɔɛ̃ kamɛ.”
Nɛ Kawɛya Luwi lidi akũ a, kĩ Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ tsɛ̃ batɛ̃ nɛ fugbanɔ kɔba kudi kamɛ a, fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kave fudi.
Foesũ Farisifɔ a bi Yesu kĩ, “Dã! Boe mbla tákpa osi kĩ bakɛna fukĩnaa nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ.”

Awã naa Yesu via be kĩ, “Mitákã lɛtsa a kĩ Lɛgã Dawid kɛna a? Lɔkɔ a kĩ kɔlɛ kɔ ye mɔ bikĩ bitomɔ ye a, Dawid wo nɛ Baguma kɔla a kamɛ a, nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ Abiata anya Yudafɔ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a. Ɛnanyɛ afɔlibɔ abodoo kĩ Yudafɔ basɔfɔ odi deĩ osi kĩ banya a ɛnya, ade ɛkɔa adi ɛkpa bikĩ bitomɛna ye a lɛmɛ bɛnya a.”

Awã naa Yesu via be kĩ, “Mitákã lɛtsa a kĩ Lɛgã Dawid kɛna a? Lɔkɔ a kĩ kɔlɛ kɔ ye mɔ bikĩ bitomɔ ye a, Dawid wo nɛ Baguma kɔla a kamɛ a, nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ Abiata anya Yudafɔ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a. Ɛnanyɛ afɔlibɔ abodoo kĩ Yudafɔ basɔfɔ odi deĩ osi kĩ banya a ɛnya, ade ɛkɔa adi ɛkpa bikĩ bitomɛna ye a lɛmɛ bɛnya a.”
Yesu bi be kĩ, “Otidziwa sũ bɛbɔa Kawɛya Luwi a, nnɛ́ Kawɛya Luwi a sũ bɛbɔa otidziwa.
Foesũ Otidziwa Obi a nyɛ Kawɛya Luwi a Ɔlate.”
Ke liti a, Yesu buki ɛnaa Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ kadi. Oti odi kĩ ye kɔkpɔ ku na nɛ awã.
Lɔkɔ a na Yesu bakesĩnɛ badi na nɛ katsɛnakɔ̃ a, bɛkadã ntɛ yaatsa oti a nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ, ayekĩ baabɔɛ fɔlɛtsa nɛ ye akũ.
Yesu vɛ oti a kĩ ye kɔkpɔ ku a kĩ ɛnɛ ɛyaadza nɛ bati a flee anɛ kamɛ.
Ade ɛdani ɛtsɛlamɔ bati a evia be kĩ, “Mbla kpa osi kĩ bɛkɛna tuwĩ nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ, mbɔɛɛ bɛkɛna tɔkpa? Fɔnyɛ luwi kĩ batɛ oti nkpã, mbɔɛɛ kĩ bɛfɔnɛ ye awɛ eku” Lɛmɛ bɛtálɛ kadima.
Yesu dã be ɛtɛ̃mɛna nɛ kalɔkpa kamɛ, ade fɔha ye paa nɛ be lɔlɔ kamɛ ɔsĩ sũ a. Ade ebi ɔsɔnɛ a kĩ, “Yo nɔ awɛ.” Eyo awɛ a ade ye awɛ a de ɔsĩ a.
Adeke Farisifɔ a dzakũ bɛnamɔ Lɛgã Herodes batomɛnanɛ a, ade bipi adzuni nɛ Yesu kakɔ akũ a.

Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a naa Galilea ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a abuĩ, ade bati beblebee tomɔ be bɛya a. Bito Galilea tite, Yudea tite, Yerusalem ɔmatɔ mɔ Idumea kamɛkamɛ a, bikĩ bito Yordan Ɔwɔ liti a, mɔ be a kĩ bito Tiro mɔ Sidon tɛmatɔ kamɛkamɛ a bɛya. Bati kĩĩ flee ya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃, kitonɛkĩ binu ye awãwã fɔtsa a kĩ ɛtsɛ̃ yakɛna a.

Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a naa Galilea ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a abuĩ, ade bati beblebee tomɔ be bɛya a. Bito Galilea tite, Yudea tite, Yerusalem ɔmatɔ mɔ Idumea kamɛkamɛ a, bikĩ bito Yordan Ɔwɔ liti a, mɔ be a kĩ bito Tiro mɔ Sidon tɛmatɔ kamɛkamɛ a bɛya. Bati kĩĩ flee ya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃, kitonɛkĩ binu ye awãwã fɔtsa a kĩ ɛtsɛ̃ yakɛna a.
Yesu tsa bati pii ade basɔnɛ pii kapili kĩ bata ye lɔkɔa bɛna akũ ɔsĩ a. Bati a lidede sũ ni, Yesu bi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ bɛwɛ ɔkɔlɔ odi bɛdzɛla ye, ayekĩ bati a lɛláamɛnana ye.
Yesu tsa bati pii ade basɔnɛ pii kapili kĩ bata ye lɔkɔa bɛna akũ ɔsĩ a. Bati a lidede sũ ni, Yesu bi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ bɛwɛ ɔkɔlɔ odi bɛdzɛla ye, ayekĩ bati a lɛláamɛnana ye.
Ntɛ bati a kĩ hũhũ kpa na nɛ be kamɛ sila bɛmɔ́ Yesu pɛ, batɔ nɛ ye abɔa kayɔ kabɔa fɔwɔla kĩ, “Nɔ nyɛ Baguma Obi.”
Lɛmɛ Yesu sua be osi kĩ bɛtafɔ̃ bati linyi oti a kĩ ye yanɛ.
Ke liti a, Yesu de ɛnaa ɔtɔ kalete. Ade awã ɛvɛ bikĩ yawɛ kĩ bɛnya ye bade a.
Bati kĩĩ yakpɔta nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ ade ɛpau be kamɛ bati ewua-nviã, ete be dĩ kĩ fɔtɔ banyanɛ. Ebi be kĩ, “Mpau mi kĩ mina nɛ yĩ akũ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ. Maado mi lɛmɛ kĩ minaalɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa a,
ade míana kɔbɛ̃ kĩ míablɔmɛna hũhũ kpa mitomɛna bati kamɛ a.”

Bati ewua-nviã a kĩ ɛnyɛ a buĩ nyɛ Simon, ade ye Yesu te dĩ kĩ Petro, Yakobo mɔ ɔwaɛ̃ Yohanes kĩ bɛnyɛ Zebedeo babi. Yesu vɛ be kĩ Boanerges, foe kayɔ nyɛ kĩ balɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ kɔbɛ̃ ndɛ ayekĩ ɔplala akpɛ̃nɛ a. Babɛbã nyɛ Andrea, Filipo, Bartolomeo, Mateo mɔ Toma, Yakobo kĩ ɛnyɛ Alfeo obi, Tadeo, Simon kĩ eto Kana kĩ epili ye kade lɔlɔ a. Yuda Iskariot, oti kĩ ye lɛnyɛ Yesu ɛkpa.

Bati ewua-nviã a kĩ ɛnyɛ a buĩ nyɛ Simon, ade ye Yesu te dĩ kĩ Petro, Yakobo mɔ ɔwaɛ̃ Yohanes kĩ bɛnyɛ Zebedeo babi. Bati ewua-nviã a kĩ ɛnyɛ a buĩ nyɛ Simon, ade ye Yesu te dĩ kĩ Petro, Yakobo mɔ ɔwaɛ̃ Yohanes kĩ bɛnyɛ Zebedeo babi. Yesu vɛ be kĩ Boanerges, foe kayɔ nyɛ kĩ balɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ kɔbɛ̃ ndɛ ayekĩ ɔplala akpɛ̃nɛ a. Babɛbã nyɛ Andrea, Filipo, Bartolomeo, Mateo mɔ Toma, Yakobo kĩ ɛnyɛ Alfeo obi, Tadeo, Simon kĩ eto Kana kĩ epili ye kade lɔlɔ a. Yuda Iskariot, oti kĩ ye lɛnyɛ Yesu ɛkpa.
Yesu dzakũ nɛ awã ɛnaa tɔtɔ kamɛ, ade bati pii buki bɛya nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ nɛ awã. Nɛ foesũ Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a lána aya bɛnya malo.
Kĩ Yesu akũ bati nu foe a, bɛnaa kĩ banaakpã ye, kitonɛkĩ bati kalɛ kĩ, “Ye lɔlɔ kamɛ lamɔ kade kabu.”
Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ a kĩ bito Yerusalem bɛya a lɛ kĩ, “Hũhũ kpa deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ. Hũhũ kpa lɛgã a lɛkpa ye kɔbɛ̃ yablɔmɛna hũhũ a katomɛna bati kamɛ.”
Ade Yesu vɛ bati a ɛyamɛna nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ be nɛ fɔgbã kamɛ kĩ, “Nde fɔ́aya kĩ Abonsam aapuli ɛblɔmɛna ye mɔawɛ akũ etomɛna oti kamɛ?
Foe nfantuhũ nyɛ kĩ ntɛ lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ kadi sɛ̃ ke akũ kutsu kutsu kĩ kɔanɔ akũ ni, kanyakɔ̃ a na lɛláapuli kitim.
Ade ayea ntɛ kɔla kudi sɛ̃ koe akũ kutsu kutsu mɔ tɛdzɛ nɛ́ nɛ be kamɛ ni, kɔla na lɛláapuli kɔdza.
Foesũ ntɛ Abonsam yidza ɛdza nɛ ye mɔawɛ akũ, mɔ ye kanyakɔ̃ a sɛ̃ kutsu kutsu ni, ye kanyakɔ̃ a aayalɛ lɔkɔa ade ye lɛgã kanya a kawũna nɛ awã a.
“Odima lɛláapuli ewo nɛ oti kĩ edeĩ kɔbɛ̃ kɔla kamɛ ɛnaafila ye fɔtsa, mbɔɛntɛ ɛnya lɔtɔ esuli ɔbɛlɛbɛ a fɔmɔ yaawo efila ye fɔtsa a.
“Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ Baguma aakɔa bati tɔkpa tidi nyɛ tidi kĩ bɛkɛna mɔ fubusuotsa fudi nyɛ fudi kĩ bɛlɛ ete be.
Lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaalɛ fubusuotsa nɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a akũ ni, Baguma lɛláakɔa ete ye da. Kitonɛkĩ ɛkɛna tɔkpa kĩ taawa daa.”
Yesu lɛ fukĩĩ kitonɛkĩ Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ a badi lɛ kĩ hũhũ kpa deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ.
Ke liti a, Yesu ɔma mɔ bawaɛ̃nyole ya bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ kanya ade bido lɔtɔ kĩ bɛvɛ ye ɛya.
Bati a kĩ bidzi bɛtsɛna Yesu a bi ye kĩ, “Dã, ama mɔ awaɛ̃ amɛ dzɛ̃ nɛ kanya bawɛ nɔ!”
Ade Yesu via be kĩ, “Owei nyɛ mma? Bawei nyɛ nwaɛ̃ amɛ?”
Kĩ ɛdã bati a kĩ bidzi bisinya ye ɛnake a, ɛlɛ kĩ, “Midã, ade mma mɔ nwaɛ̃ amɛ nɛ awĩ a!
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɛna nɛ Baguma kawɛ akũ ni, ade ye nyɛ nwaɛ̃nyole mɔ nwaɛ̃tsole, mɔ mma a.”

Yesu buki ɛnaa Galilea ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a ɔwɛ̃, ade ɛkatsa Baguma fɔlɛtsa a. Ayekĩ bati pii fɔli nɛ ye akũ sũ ni, ewo edzi nɛ ɔkɔlɔ kĩ eteĩ nɛ mui anɛ kamɛ. Bati dza nɛ ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a abuĩ ade Yesu katsa be fɔtsa nɛ fɔgbã kamɛ a.
Lɔkɔ pii nɛ ye fɔtsa katsa kamɛ a, ɛkɔa fɔgbã ɛtsa fɔtsa a kĩ yawɛ kĩ ɛtsa be a. Fɔtsa a kĩ ɛtsa be a nyɛ fukĩĩ.
Ebi be kĩ, “Mitse! Luwi a onyole odi naa kɔba ɛnaasã funitsã babi.
Kĩ ɛkasã foe a fudi tɔ nɛ osi ɔɔwɛ̃, ade kɔvɔlabi yafila be bɛmɛna a.
Badi tɔ nɛ lɛkpakpalabode akũ, kĩ tite lɛláa pii. Foesũ babi a mɛ mɔatsɛ.
Lɛmɛ kĩ suwa ta kpaa pɛ bɛvɛ biku, kitonɛkĩ be tunu tána funitsã, nɛ boe a sũ.
Badi tɔ nɛ tuwĩ mɔ fu ndɛ ɔgɔabi kamɛ. Tuwĩ mɔ fu mɛ fusuli be, kĩ bɛtápuli bibo anɛ. Nɛ foesũ bɛtáwũ babi.
Babi badi tɔ nɛ tite wĩ akũ. Bɛmɛ bibo anɛ, ade biwũ bido babi a. Badi do babi taalɛ, badi aduesia, badi ɔha.”
Nɛ kawũnakɔ̃ a Yesu bi be kĩ, “Oti kĩ edeĩ atɔ ni, etse katse wĩ!”
Kĩ Yesu odi na nɛ kakɔ mɔa a, bati a kĩ binu ye lɛgbã a mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ mɔ ye fɔtɔ banyanɛ a ya kĩ ɛnyɛ de kayɔ ɛtsa be.
Yesu bi be kĩ, “Baguma nyɛ ye lɛgãkanya kamɛ fɔtsa kɔlawa a ɛtsa mi. Lɛmɛ bati a kĩ bite a ni, mbɔɛntɛ fɔgbã kamɛ baakanu fɔlɛtsa a.
Foesũ fɔ́aya nɛ foe kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ kamɛ odi tsɛlɛ eyi kĩ,
‘Baakadã, lɛmɛ bɛláamɔ biyi ɔsũ.
Baakatse lɛmɛ bɛláanu foe kayɔ.
Kitonɛkĩ titɔ kĩ banu ĩye bamɔ malo ni,
bɛláanu kayɔ mɔ
baadani bɛdã Baguma,
lɔkɔa ɛkɔa be titikpa ete be.’ ”
Ade Yesu via be kĩ, “Ntɛ mitánu lɛgbã kĩĩ kayɔ a, nde míakɛna fɔmɔ míanu fɔgbã bɛbã kayɔ?
Fɔtsa odunɛ a nyɛ oti kĩ ɛtsɛ̃ yalɛ Baguma kalɛ.
Bati badi la ndɛ babi a kĩ bɛtɔ nɛ osi ɔwɛ̃ a. Ntɛ binu pɛ lɔkɔa Abonsam yanyɛ foe nɛ be fɔlɔ kamɛ.
Bati badi lɛmɛ la ndɛ babi a kĩ bɛtɔ nɛ boe kamɛ. Ntɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ binu pɛ lɔkɔa kawɔlɛ de be.
Lɛmɛ kalɛ a ke tunu láwo nɛ tite kamɛ kawo wĩ. Be katɛkado adã lukũ. Ntɛ bati liti katomɛna yawo nɛ kalɛ kĩĩ akũ pɛ, baamuniki nɛ ke liti.
“Ade bati badi lɛmɛ la ndɛ babi kĩ bɛtɔ nɛ tuwĩ mɔ fu kamɛ a. Be bɛnyɛ bati kĩ binu Baguma fɔlɛtsa a,
lɛmɛ katinya kamɛ ɔhau, sika kawɛ mɔ sukɛna fɔwɛtsa yi be tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ. Fɔtsa kĩĩ mɛna Baguma fɔlɛtsa a, foesũ fɔáwũ babi.

“Bati badi lɛmɛ atɛ Baguma Kalɛ a ndɛ babi kĩ bɛtɔ nɛ tite wĩ akũ. Bati kĩĩ tɛ ke mɔ be ɔwɔlɛ flee. Luwi nyɛ luwi, babo anɛ kanɛ lɔlɔ kawũ babi beblebee. Bɛkɛna ndɛ fudutsa a kĩ fɔawũ babi taalɛ, ĩye aduesia, ĩye ɔha mɔa.”
Yesu buki evia be kĩ, “Owei atɛna ɔsɛdza kakɔa lɔɔda katsa ye ĩye kakɔa ye kado nɛ mpa kayɔ? Nnɛ́ ɔsɛdza otse akũ bakɔa ye kate?
Lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ bɛkɔa bɛkɔla a baanyɛ de kanya, ade Baguma aabinya lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ bisua a.
Foesũ ntɛ mideĩ atɔ ni, mitse foe katse wĩ!”
Bio, Yesu bi be kĩ, “Miyi atɔ yededeede mitse lɛtsa a kĩ mianu a. Kitonɛkĩ fɔtsa kakɔna odu a kĩ mikɔa mikɔna mikpa bati bɛbã a, ade foe odu Baguma lɛmɛ aakɔa ɛkɔna ɛkpa mi a.
Bikĩ bɛkɔa be akũ bɛkpa yĩ fɔtsa katsa a baakpa be kayɔkanu dzununuunu. Lɛmɛ bikĩ baátse a ni, baatɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bideĩ a malo nɛ be awɛ.”
Yesu buki ebi be kĩ, “Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a la ndɛ oti kĩ yasã kamɔnɛ.
Luwi daa kĩ yawa kayidza, ade babi a amɛ kabo anɛ. Lɛmɛ enyína ayekĩ fɔtsa a akɛna kabo anɛ.
Tite afɔ̃ fudutsa alɛ nɛ foe akũ akũ. Lanya lɔtɔ lɔkɔa lɛnyɛ tɔɔta fɔmɔ kutse a anɛ. Ntɛ kubo anɛ kɔawũ babi beblebee.
Ntɛ babi a yɔɔlɛ a banɛna be, kitonɛkĩ kɔba funitsã kakpɔta lɔkɔ wo ɔtɔ.”
Yesu via kĩ, “Litsa bɔ́akɔa bɔkɔnamɔ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a? Lɛgbã lɛwɔdabe makɔa ĩnyɛ kayɔ ntsa?
Fɔla ndɛ kutse libi kabii nɛ katinya kamɛ flee kĩ oti bɔɛ ɛnadu.
Kutse kĩĩ yapɔ kɔkɛna futse baũ a kamɛ kɔmɔa nɛ kɔba kamɛ. Kɔanɛ tɛnanɛ pii ade kɔakpa ɔna a. Kɔvɔlabi akɛna fɔtsɔɛ nɛ koe kamɛ.”
Yesu bi be Baguma fɔlɛtsa a nɛ fɔgbã kamɛ nɛ be kapuli kanu kayɔ onukpɛ̃.
Yaábi be kadima kɛba fɔgbã kamɛ. Ntɛ bɛmɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a odi bidzi a, lɔkɔa yanyɛ foe kayɔ katsa be.
Luwi a ke olobe a, Yesu vɛ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a ɛlɛ kĩ, “Mifɔ̃ bunyina ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a bɔnaa de abuĩ atide a.”
Foesũ bɛfɔnɛ bati a biwo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ kamɛ. Yesu nawo ɛkɛna akũ edzi, ade biyi ɔwɔ a kanyina kayɔ a. Tɔkɔlɔ bɛbã lɛmɛ na nɛ mui a akũ.
Owi tábuna ɔwɛ kpale odi do kavũ awɛ, ɛbɔa mui eko nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ. Ɔkɔlɔ a ka kɔlaa kĩ kite sukuloo kufɛ yayi mɔ mui ɛyɛla.
Lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, Yesu wa nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a liti. Ɛkɔa sumuyɛ ete lɔlɔ ɛlamɛna tida kawa. Ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a nadzɛla ye ade bibi ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, fɔtsɛ́la nɔ kĩ bɔwɔ buyua?”
Kĩ Yesu yidza ɛdza a, ade ewũni kĩ, “Ɔwɛ, fɔ̃ kavũ!” Ebi mui a lɛmɛ kĩ, “Mui, kɛna dĩĩ.” Ɔwɛ a fɔ̃ kavũ ade mui a anɛ flee kɛna dĩĩ a.
Yesu via ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Nde sũ libe wo mi lɔmɔ? Mitátɛ yĩ mido?”
Nɛ libe a kĩ libuki liwo be a sũ ni, bɛkavia be akũ kĩ, “Owei koũ nyɛ oti kĩĩ? Mui mɔ ɔwɛ malo atse ye kalɛ!”
Ke liti a, Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a naa Galilea lutubu baũ sɛkɛ kĩ a nɛ Gerasefɔ tite akũ.
Kĩ Yesu nɛ nɛ ɔkɔlɔ kamɛ a, onyole odi kĩ hũhũ kpa deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ nɛ eto asie ɛyatsɛlamɔ ye.
Onyole kĩ kadzikɔ̃ nyɛ asie a kĩ efuã nɛ awã. Bati a flee lápuli kapi ye kado nɛ nkɔsɔnkɔsɔ kamɛ.
Lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ kĩ basuli ye akpɔ mɔ abɔa ni, yaveli nkɔsɔnkɔsɔ a kĩ tipini ye a. Oti kĩ deĩ kɔbɛ̃ kudi odu kĩ odima lápuli kapi ye.
Lɛnyɛ mɔ suwa flee yamini nɛ asie mɔ tɔtɔ kamɛ. Ɛtsɛ̃ yabɔa fɔwɔla lɔkɔa yakɔa boe kakpeli ye akũ.
Onyole kĩĩ dzɛ̃ mɔ lugo fɔmɔ ɛmɔ Yesu. Foesũ ewula atsɛ ɛnake aduli nɛ Yesu nnyɛ.
Ade ɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba ɛlɛ kĩ, “Yesu, Baguma Nɛ Ode Flee Obi! Bɔake nɔ aduli, nɛ Baguma sũ, tunɔ kĩ ɔláavɛlɛ yĩ sɔtɔ!”
Ɛlɛ foe lɔmɔ kitonɛkĩ enu kĩ Yesu kalɛ kĩ, “Hũhũ kpa, nɛ́ nɛ oti kĩĩ kamɛ!”
Yesu via ye kĩ, “Nde bavɛ nɔ?”
Awã naa ɛlɛ kĩ, “Bavɛ yĩ lidede, kitonɛkĩ boe a kĩ budeĩ nɛ onyole kĩĩ kamɛ a bɔpɔnɛ!”
Ade awã ebuki eke Yesu aduli mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ ɛtablɔmɛna be ɛnɛmɛna nɛ tite a na kamɛ a.
Lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, baplakuo pii dzɛ̃ badɛ nɛ katɔbii kayɔ.
Ade bike Yesu aduli kĩ, “Blɔmɛna boe bɔnaawo nɛ baplakuo a kĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ akĩĩ a kamɛ.”
Ɛkpa be osi ade hũhũ a nɛ́ nɛ onyole a kamɛ bɛnawo nɛ baplakuo kamɛ a. Baplakuo a flee kĩ baawo ndɛ mpim nviã, lo atsɛ kplikplikpli bɛka kakpenii a, bɛnawo nɛ ɔwɔ a kamɛ ade be flee bɛmɔa mui biku a.
Bati a kĩ badãmɛna be akũ a wula atsɛ bɛnaa ɔmatɔ a mɔ tikĩ tifuã a kamɛ, bɛnalɛ lɛtsa flee a kĩ lɛya a. Bati wula atsɛ bɛnaa awã kĩ banaadã lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya a.
Kĩ biwo Yesu sɛkɛ̃ a, bɛmɔ́ oti a kĩ hũhũ kpa beblebee na nɛ ye kamɛ a nɛ awã. Ɛkɛna akũ edzi ade edo atadiɛ a, ye anɛ kamɛ lɛmɛ kpalɛ. Libe wo bati a flee!
Bikĩ bɛnya lɔtɔ bɛmɔ foe a, lɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya nɛ onyole a mɔ baplakuo a akũ.
Foesũ bike Yesu aduli kĩ ɛdzakũ nɛ be tite akũ.
Kĩ Yesu awo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ kamɛ a, onyole a kĩ hũhũ kpa na nɛ ye kamɛ a ke ye aduli kĩ, “Fɔ̃ ntomɔ nɔ bɔnaa!”
Lɛmɛ Yesu tátunɔ. Mbom ebi ye kĩ, “Naa kɔla nɛ nɔ bati sɛkɛ̃, lɔkɔa kabi be lɛtsa a kĩ Ɔlate a kɛna ɛkpa nɔ, mɔ ayekĩ ɛmɔ nɔ kɔnya a.”
Foesũ onyole kĩĩ naa ɛnamini nɛ tɛmatɔ ewua kamɛkamɛ a, ade ebi be fɔlɛtsa flee a kĩ Yesu kɛna ɛkpa ye a. Fɔkɛna bikĩ binu foe a saa.
Yesu buki ɛdani ɛnaa lutubu baũ a sɛkɛ̃ kĩ a. Kĩ ewo de abuĩ a, bati pii yayi ye akũ.
Onyole odi nɛ Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ banɔkɔɛ̃ a kamɛ ɔmɔa kĩ bavɛ Yairo ya nɛ awã. Kĩ ɛmɔ Yesu a, ɛkɛna akũ ɛkpa ye.
Ade ebi ye mɔ kudulike kĩ, “Yĩ obitsole kabii kĩ kɛtɛ futeli ewua-nviã asɔ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ. Foesũ ya kayate awɛ nɛ ye akũ lɔkɔa yaana akũ ɔsĩ edzi nkpã.”
Ade Yesu yidza etomɔ ye a.
Nɛ ayekĩ bati a kĩ bitomɔ Yesu pɔnɛ sũ, ɛna nɛ be kayite kĩ banaa.

Otsole odi kĩ babɔanɛ kawula nɛ ye akũ futeli ewua-nviã flee mɔ lubo kamɔ paa, titɔ kĩ bawanɛ kadã ye a malo na nɛ be kamɛ. Ebula sika flee kade nɛ fɔsɔ kĩĩ katsa akũ, lɛmɛ fɔsɔ a tádɔ ye, mbom kade fɔkade nɛ ode.

Otsole odi kĩ babɔanɛ kawula nɛ ye akũ futeli ewua-nviã flee mɔ lubo kamɔ paa, titɔ kĩ bawanɛ kadã ye a malo na nɛ be kamɛ. Ebula sika flee kade nɛ fɔsɔ kĩĩ katsa akũ, lɛmɛ fɔsɔ a tádɔ ye, mbom kade fɔkade nɛ ode.
Enu Yesu nkã foesũ ɛna nɛ bati a kĩ bitomɔ Yesu nɛ liti a kamɛ.
Ade ebi ye akũ kĩ, “Ntɛ maapuli nta titɔ ye atadiɛ malo ni, kufɛ maasaɛ.”
Kĩ ɛta Yesu atadiɛ a, ade akũ fɔ̃ ye kawula deedimɔapɛ a. Ɛmɔ́ eyi ɔsũ nɛ ye kamɛ kĩ ɛsaɛ ade ɛnɛ nɛ ye lubo kamɔ kamɛ a.
Lɛtalɛta Yesu nyi kĩ kɔbɛ̃ kudi nɛ́ nɛ ye kamɛ. Foesũ ɛfɔ̃ ɛdza, ɛdani evia bati a kĩ bitomɔ ye a kĩ, “Owei nyɛ ekĩ ɛta yĩ atadiɛ?”
Ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a bi ye kĩ, “Dã ayekĩ bati beblebee sinya nɔ. Nde sũ avia kĩ owei lɛta nɔ?”
Lɛmɛ Yesu dzɛmɛna anɛ kako kadã kĩ yaamɔ oti a kĩ ye lɛta ye a.
Otsole a mɔ́ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya nɛ ye akũ. Foesũ nɛ libe mɔ kukũtila kamɛ ni, ɛnɛ ɛyake aduli nɛ Yesu anɛ kamɛ. Ebi ye lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya a yededeede.
Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Yĩ obitsole, nɔ katɛkado fɔ̃ ɔsaɛ. Naa nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ. Nɔ lubo kamɔ a lɛláabuki lɛya nɛ nɔ akũ dadaada.”
Lɔkɔ a kĩ Yesu kalɛ fukĩĩ a, batɔ to Yairo awã bɛyabi ye kĩ, “Nɔ obi a ku kɔkɔɛ. Nde sũ obuki aha fɔtsa ɔtsanɛ kĩĩ?”
Yesu tátse be kalɛ a, mbom ebi Yairo kĩ, “Tavila, nɔ kɔ̃ tɛ kado.”
Yesu kpã Petro, Yakobo mɔ ɔwaɛ̃ Yohanes be odi bɛnaa Yairo awã.
Kĩ biwo tɔtɔ a kamɛ a, ade kĩ Yesu mɔ́ ayekĩ bati dzɛ̃ mɔ kɔnya mɔ fɔwɔla a,
ewo nɛ be kamɛ, evia be kĩ, “Litsa tsɛ̃mɔ fɔwɔla kĩĩ odu? Nde sũ miabe? Kabisɛ̃ɛ̃ kĩĩ táku. Tida kawa!”
Kĩ ɛlɛ foe lɔmɔ pɛ, bati a kĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ awã támɔ ye kamɛmɛ.
Ade Yesu fɔ̃ bɛnyɛ bati a flee bɛnaa kanya, ade ɛfɔ̃ kabisɛ̃ɛ̃ a ɔlɛga mɔ ɔma mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ɛlalɛ a biwo nɛ awã kĩ ɔnɔkpa a waa a.
Yesu pi ye nɛ kɔkpɔ ade ebi ye kĩ, “Talita koumu!” Foe kayɔ nɛ tide a kamɛ nyɛ kĩ, “Kayitsɔ̃bi kabii, mabi nɔ kĩ yidza!”
Deedimɔapɛ katsolebi kĩĩ yidza kɛdza ade kido kato katɛ̃ awɛ a. Kĩ fɔya lɔmɔ a, fɔkɛna be a flee wãwã.
Lɛmɛ Yesu si be mbla mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ bɛtabi odima kadimanɔ. Ebuki ebi be kĩ, “Mikpa ke litsedi kɛnya.”
Yesu dzakũ nɛ awã ade bɛmɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a bɛnaa ɔmatɔ a kĩ ye kamɛ bɛdɔɔla ye a.
Nɛ Kawɛya Luwi a akũ a, ɛnatsa Baguma fɔlɛtsa a nɛ katsɛnakɔ̃ a. Ye ɔmatɔ bati pii yatse ye fɔtsa katsa, ade fɔkɛna be saa a.
Bivia be akũ kĩ, “Ndia oti kĩĩ kɔlɛ fɔtsa kĩĩ odu etomɛna? Kadikanyi mɔ kɔbɛ̃ wɔdabe bɛkpa ye sũ mɔ epuli yakɛna awãwã fɔtsa kĩĩ odu?
Mbɔɛɛ nnɛ́ Maria obi kĩ yamɛ fɔtsa a yanɛ? Ĩye nnɛ́ bawaɛ̃nyole nyɛ Yakobo, Yose, Yuda mɔ Simon? Miádã! Nnɛ́ bawaɛ̃tsole lɛmɛ nɛ awĩ a?” Foesũ bati kĩĩ sĩ ye katɛ kado.
Yesu bi be kĩ, “Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ tɛ dĩ nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ, lɛmɛ nɛ ye mɔawɛ ɔmatɔ, mɔ ye mɔawɛ bati kamɛ ni, ɛlá dĩ wĩ lidima.”
Nɛ ayekĩ ye ɔtɔ bati tátɛ ye bido sũ ni, fɔlɛtsa a nyɛnɛ Yesu akũ. Fɔtsɛ̃ foe akũ sũ ɛtápuli ɛkɛna awãwã fɔtsa pii nɛ awã, kɛba kĩ ete awɛ nɛ basɔnɛ badi akũ, ade be fɔsɔ a dɔ be a.
Ke liti a lɛmɛ, Yesu mini nɛ tukula mɔ fɔkɔ a kĩ fufuã awã, ade ɛkatsa Baguma fɔlɛtsa wĩ a.
Nɛ ayekĩ ye ɔtɔ bati tátɛ ye bido sũ ni, fɔlɛtsa a nyɛnɛ Yesu akũ. Fɔtsɛ̃ foe akũ sũ ɛtápuli ɛkɛna awãwã fɔtsa pii nɛ awã, kɛba kĩ ete awɛ nɛ basɔnɛ badi akũ, ade be fɔsɔ a dɔ be a.
Ke liti a lɛmɛ, Yesu mini nɛ tukula mɔ fɔkɔ a kĩ fufuã awã, ade ɛkatsa Baguma fɔlɛtsa wĩ a.
Ɛvɛ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ewua-nviã a ɛkpɔta, ade edo be nviã nviã a. Ɛkpa be kɔbɛ̃ kĩ kɔnya hũhũ kpa flee akũ.
Esi be mbla kĩ, “Odima ɛtabɔɛ lɛtsama ɛlɛ nɛ ye osi akũ, mbɔɛntɛ otse kĩ bake katsã odi. Mitalɛ funitsã ĩye kuvũ ndɛ ayekĩ fɔtsa bawãnɛ alɛ a. Mitabɔɛ sika milɛ nɛ mi fuvũ kamɛ.
Mido mi tɛpambua, lɛmɛ mitabɔɛ tilima bɛbã mibumɛna lɛtsa a kĩ mido a.”
Ebuki ɛlɛ kĩ, “Awã kĩ míase a ni, mina nɛ awã kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ míadzakũ.
Awã kĩ bati tátɛ mi ni, minɛ nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ lɔkɔa mikpa mi abɔa kudu miko nɛ be akũ, fɔnya nsɛntsɛlɛni fɔkpa be kĩ Baguma aavɛlɛ be sɔtɔ.”
Fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ewua-nviã kĩĩ mini bɛtsa Baguma fɔlɛtsa wĩ a kĩ odi nyɛ odi ɛdani ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ.
Bɛblɔmɛna hũhũ kpa pii bitomɛna bati kamɛ. Bɛtsɛla basɔnɛ kugua ade bɛtsa be a.

Lɔkɔ kĩĩ, Lɛgã Herodes kanu lɛkɛnawa wĩ a flee kitonɛkĩ Yesu dĩ gba nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ. Bati badi kalɛ kĩ, “Yohanes, Mui Ɔwɔlanɛ a, liyidza ebuki eto kanɔkpa ɛya! Ade foesũ edeĩ kɔbɛ̃ yakɛna awãwã fɔtsa a!”
Badi lɛmɛ lɛ kĩ, “Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Eliya yanɛ.”
Babɛbã lɛmɛ lɛ kĩ, “Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ kɔɛ a kamɛ odi yanɛ.”
Lɛmɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ Lɛgã Herodes nu fɔlɛtsa kĩ a ye malo ɛlɛ kĩ, “Yohanes a kĩ nfɔ̃ bitsua ye lɔlɔ a, ade ye liyidza ebuki edzi nkpã a.”

Lɔkɔ lidi kamɛ ni, Lɛgã Herodes mɔawɛ lɛfɔ̃ bipi Yohanes ade ke ɛfɔ̃ bisuli ye mɔ tɔwɛ̃ bɛkɔa bido nɛ kɔla kĩ bado tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ a kamɛ a. Lɛgã Herodes kɛna fukĩĩ kitonɛkĩ Herodia kĩ ɛkɔã a nya ɔwaɛ̃ Filipo ɔtsɔ̃.
Yohanes kabi Herodes kĩ, “Kɛtáfɛta kĩ atɛ awaɛ̃ ɔtsɔ̃ ɔkɔã.”
Foesũ Yohanes fɔlɛtsa a wo Herodia kalɔɛ, ade ɛbɔɛ ye likesĩ a. Ɛwɛ kĩ yakɔ ye lɛmɛ ɛláapuli ɛkɛna fukĩĩ nɛ Lɛgã Herodes liti.

Kitonɛkĩ Lɛgã Herodes avila Yohanes, ade enyina kĩ Yohanes nyɛ oti wĩ kĩ ye akũ kpalɛ. Ɛkana kɔnɛyi nɛ ye akũ. Yawɛ katse ye fɔtsa katsa a katse fɔkɔ fudi, titɔ kĩ ye fɔlɛtsa awɛ ye ɔwɔlɛ kaha ntɛ enu foe.
Ke kawũna a, osi yabinya ɛkpa Herodia. Luwi a nya Lɛgã Herodes lɛmawi. Lɛgã Herodes vɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ banɔkɔɛ̃ nɛ ye lɛgãkanyakɔ̃, sodzafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ nɛ Galilea tite akũ bɛya nɛ kanyakɔ̃ a.
Herodia obi oyitsɔ̃ ya ɛyato edo Lɛgã Herodes mɔ ye bakɔba a kawɔlɛ paa nɛ kanyakɔ̃ a.
Foesũ Lɛgã Herodes via oyitsɔ̃ a kĩ, “Litsa awɛ kĩ nkpa nɔ?”
Ɛlɔ fubo ɛlɛ kĩ, “Lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ aavia yĩ ni, maakpa nɔ, ntɛ fɔ́anya yĩ lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a sɛkɛ malo!”
Foesũ oyitsɔ̃ kĩĩ nɛ ɛnavia ɔma kĩ, “Litsa nvia?”
Ade ɔma bi ye kĩ, “Via Yohanes, mui ɔwɔlanɛ a, lɔlɔ.”
Oyitsɔ̃ a wɛ sɔwa ɛnaa kɔla a kamɛ, ade ebi Lɛgã Herodes kĩ, “Mawɛ kĩ tsua Yohanes Mui Ɔwɔlanɛ a lɔlɔ kate nɛ tsensi akũ kakpa yĩ finyaa finyaakĩĩ.”
Fukĩĩ wo Lɛgã Herodes kalɔɛ paa lɛmɛ ɛláapuli ɛdani ye sɛmɛ nɛ fubo a kĩ ɛlɔ nɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ banɔkɔɛ̃ anɛ sũ.
Foesũ awã naa edo ye ɔblafɔ kĩ ɛnaatsua Yohanes lɔlɔ ɛyamɛna. Ɔblafɔ a natsua naa kɔla kĩ bado bati a ɛnatsua Yohanes lɔlɔ.
Ɛkɔa lɔlɔ a ete nɛ tsensi akũ ade ɛkɔa ɛma oyitsɔ̃ a. Ye malo ɛtɛ ɛkɔa de ɛma ɔma.
Kĩ Yohanes fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a nu fɔlɛtsa a, bɛnaa bɛnabɔɛ ye ɔnɔkpa a bɛnabila.
Fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kĩ Yesu do kĩ mini nɛ fɔkɔ a kĩ fufuã buki bimuniki, ade bibi ye fɔtsa flee a kĩ bɛkɛna, fɔtsa a kĩ bɛtsa mɔ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔya nɛ be osi akũ a.
Awã kĩ Yesu mɔ be bɛna a bati a yapɔ lidede, bikĩĩ anaa ni bikĩĩ aya, foesũ bɛtána osi mɔ banya malo. Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mifɔ̃ boe odi bɔnaa awã kĩ kadã dĩĩ bɔnaawɛya sukuloo.”
Biwo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ kamɛ kĩ banaa awã kĩ bati lɛláa.
Lɛmɛ kĩ banaa a, bati pii mɔ be biyi ɔsũ, ade ke biwula atsɛ bɛnya be lɔtɔ biwo awã fɔmɔ Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a nawo awã.
Kĩ Yesu nɛ́ nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ a, ɛmɔ bati beblebee. Be akũ kɔ ye kɔnya kitonɛkĩ bɛkɛna ndɛ baveli kĩ bɛlá ɔkpãnɛ. Foesũ eyi kayɔ mɔ be Baguma fɔlɛtsa katsa.
Kĩ olobe wo ɔtɔ a, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a ya bɛyabi ye kĩ, “Kade dɔ kiyua. Ayekĩ awĩ la a bɛláana lɛtsama bɛnya.
Foesũ kpa be osi bɛdzakũ, lɔkɔa ntɛ biwo tɛmatɔ a mɔ tukula kamɛ a, baana litsedi bɛya bɛnya.”
Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mi mɔawɛ a miwɛ litsedi mikpa be bɛnya.”
Bɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Be kanya aatɛ ndɛ oti mɔa tidetɔ ɛlɛ̃ kɔtɔkase. Awɛ kĩ bubula sika kade nɛ be kanya odi sũ?”
Ade ke Yesu via be kĩ, “Abodoo eni minɛɛ? Minaa minaadã.”
Kĩ bɛnadã a bibi ye kĩ, “Abodoo elo mɔ kɔfɔabi nviã pɛ deĩ.”
Yesu bi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ bɛfɔ̃ bati a flee bidzi nɛ kutsu kutsu kamɛ nɛ tuwĩ blɔblɔ akũ.
Bati a flee sɛ̃ bidzi nɛ kutsu kutsu kamɛ. Kutsu kudi aawo ndɛ bati ɔha, kudi lɛmɛ aawo ndɛ aduenum.

Yesu bɔɛ abodoo elo mɔ kɔfɔabi nviã a ade kĩ ɛdã odetɔ́ kamɛ fɛɛ a, ɛnyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ ade ɛyɛlɛ abodoo a. Ɛkɔa foe ɛkpa ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ bɛsɛ̃ bɛkpa kutsu a flee. Ade ɛkɛna kɔfɔabi a lɛmɛ lɔmɔ a.
Bati a flee nya biwĩ.
Kĩ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a fila funitsã a kĩ fute bɛkpɔta a, fuyi kɔba tɛtsɛtsɛ ewua-nviã.
Ade bati a kĩ bɛnya funitsã a banyole nɛnɛ odi lidede wo mpim elo.
Awã naa Yesu fɔ̃ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a wo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ kamɛ kĩ bɛnaa ɔmatɔ kĩ bavɛ Betsaida nɛ lutubu baũ sɛkɛ̃ kĩ a. Ɛfɔ̃ bati beblebee a lɛmɛ pansam.
Ke liti a, ye malo ede ɛnaa ɔtɔ kalete ɛnabɔa mpaɛ.
Ke lɛnyɛ a, ɔkɔlɔ a wo ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a kayite, ade kite Yesu odi nɛ awã a.
Ɛmɔ́ kĩ kɛkapiã ye bati a mɔ ɔkɔlɔ a kahali, kitonɛkĩ ɔwɛ kavũ katsɛlamɔ be. Foesũ fɔmɔ ɔnɔnɛ tɔdɔũ elo aabɔa a, Yesu tsã mui anɛ ɛnaa be sɛkɛ̃. Kĩ efuã be a, ɛkɛna ndɛ yatɛ̃ be,
ade bɛbɔa fɔwɔla kĩ, “Ɔnɔkpa yanɛ!”
Libe wo be flee.
Lɛmɛ lɛtalɛta Yesu lɛmɔ be kɔdzɛla kĩ, “Mitavila! Yĩ manɛ. Mina ɔwɔlɛ!”
Ewo nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ, ade ɔwɛ a fɔ̃ kavũ a. Fukĩĩ fɔ̃ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kɛna saa,
kitonɛkĩ bɛtányi ayekĩ fɔkɛna fɔmɔ ɛkpa bati mpim elo funitsã bɛnya bitina. Be kakɔna nɛ fukĩĩ akũ malo tákpalɛ, foesũ bɛtátɛ bido.
Kĩ biwo ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a sɛkɛ sitide a, biduma nɛ Genezaret. Ade awã bɛbla be ɔkɔlɔ bɛdzɛla a.
Mɔ be kanɛ nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ pɛ bati mɔ Yesu biyi ɔsũ.
Foesũ biwula atsɛ bɛnakpa kanyi nɛ be tite flee akũ. Awã kĩ binu kĩ Yesu na a, bɛlɔ basɔnɛ bɛma ye.
Ade kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ kĩ Yesu tsã, ntɛ ɔmatɔ kamɛ o-o, ĩye akula kamɛ o-o, bati kayamɛna basɔnɛ nɛ kɔyaatɔ ade bɛkawã ye kĩ ɛfɔ̃ bɛta ye atadiɛ atɔ. Bikĩ bɛta ye a na akũ ɔsĩ.
Farisifɔ mɔ Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ badi to Yerusalem bɛyatsɛna nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃.
Bɛmɔ́ kĩ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a dzi banya, ade badi távɔlɛ awɛ ndɛ ayekĩ be Farisifɔ bɛtsa bati kĩ bɛkaakɛna a.
Biyi foe ɔsũ kitonɛkĩ Farisifɔ a mɔ Yudafɔ a flee tomɔ be bawanyɔ amaniɛ a kĩ bɛkɔa biyi be a. Foesũ ntɛ bɛtávɔlɛ awɛ kavɔlɛ wĩ ni, baánya.
Ntɛ bɛya litsedi bitomɛna kɔyaatɔ malo, kɛnɛ kĩ bavɔlɛ awɛ fɔmɔ banya. Bitomɛna mbla kumɛkumɛ lɛmɛ kĩ bibo anɛ bɛyamɔ a, ndɛ kuyei, fɔtɔtsa mɔ fugumi kavɔlɛ.
Foesũ Farisifɔ mɔ Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ a via Yesu kĩ, “Nde sũ bikĩ bitomɛna nɔ a lákɛna nɛ boe bawanyɔ amaniɛ akũ? Ade ntɛ banya malo baávɔlɛ awɛ!”
Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mi anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa bakɛnanɛ! Fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yesaya lɛ nɛ mi akũ a ya nɛ foe kamɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ. Baguma lɛ kĩ,
‘Bati kĩĩ asum yĩ mɔ onukpɛ̃ kamɛ fɔlɛtsa mɛnɛmɛnɛ odi,
lɛmɛ be tɔwɔlɛ deĩ lugo nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃.
Pupulidza basum yĩ,
kitonɛkĩ batsa batidziwa mbla nɛ Baguma mbla a kadokɔ̃.’
Fɔatsa kĩ bɛkɔa yĩ mbla biyi nɛ ɔɔwɛ̃ ade bɛkɔa batidziwa amaniɛ a batsa a!”
Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mideĩ tɛdake tidi kĩ mitomɛna ade mikɔa Baguma mbla miyi nɛ ɔɔwɛ̃ nɛ ayekĩ míakɛna nɛ mi bawanyɔ amaniɛ akũ sũ.
Foesũ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Mose tsɛlɛ eyi kĩ, ‘Bu aga mɔ ama.’ Ade ebuki ɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Odi nyɛ odi kĩ edumu ɔlɛga ĩye ɔma ni, kɛnɛ kĩ bɛkɔ ye.’

Lɛmɛ miatsa kĩ ntɛ odi deĩ litsedi kĩ yaakɔa ebumɔ ye bamanɛ ni, yaapuli ɛlɛ kĩ ɛkɔa foe eyi lite ndɛ fɔtsa kpalɛwa ɛkpa Baguma lɔkɔa fɔatsa kĩ owula kɔa fɔtsa tewa a eyi kĩ yaabɔa afɔliɛ ɛkpa Baguma.
Ade ke mitákpa ye osi malo kĩ yabumɛna ye bamanɛ a mɔ fɔtsa tewa a!
Ade aye mikɔa mi bawanyɔ amaniɛ mibula Baguma mbla kade a. Miakɛna fɔtsa bɛbã ndɛ fukĩĩ odu.”
Ke liti a, Yesu buki ɛvɛ bati a flee ɛkpɔta nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃. Ebi be kĩ,
“Lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ oti nya mɔ fuwo nɛ ye kamɛ ni, fɔádo ye efĩĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ. Mbom lɛtsa kĩ lato oti ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ a, ade foe ado ye efĩĩ a.
Mi flee miyi atɔ mitse katse wĩ.”
Kĩ ɛdzakũ nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ ɛnaa kɔla a, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a via ye kĩ ɛnyɛ lɛgbã a kayɔ ɛtsa be.
Yesu bi be kĩ, “Ntɛ mitánu kalɛ kĩĩ kayɔ kekɔ̃ mi adzuni lɛláapuli epi lɛtsama. Fɔwaa yedede kĩ lɛtsa kĩ lawo nɛ oti kamɛ ni, fɔádo ye efĩĩ.
Kitonɛkĩ fɔtáwo nɛ ye ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ. Mbom fɔnaa ye sɛmɛ kamɛ, ade fɔtsa ye kamɛ fɔnɛ ndɛ fɔtsa kpa a.” Lɛtsa a kĩ Yesu lɛ nɛ awĩ tsa kĩ funitsã fudi nyɛ fudi nɛnɛ fɔkpa kanya.
Ebuki ɛlɛ ɛnamɛna lɔtɔ kĩ, “Lɛtsa a kĩ lanɛ kato oti ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ ni, ade foe ado ye efĩĩ a.
Kitonɛkĩ oti ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ tɔkpa kakɔna ato, tɔkpa a tidi nyɛ linyolewɛ mɔ litsolewɛ, kaye, oti kakɔ, kɔnyɔ mɔ kɔtsɔ̃ liti kanɛ,
anɛ ngbã, ablɔ kakɛna, fɔvã kama, sukɛna fɔwɛtsa kĩ fɔnɛnɛ, likesĩ, fɔvã kama kate nɛ bati akũ, lukũta mɔ kadzi nɛ tidzimbi kamɛ.
Fɔtsa kĩĩ flee to oti kamɛ ade foe ado ye efĩĩ a.”
Yesu dzakũ ɛnaa tite a kĩ tifuã ɔmatɔ kĩ bavɛ Tiro a kamɛ. Ɛwo nɛ tɔtɔ tidi kamɛ. Ɛtáwɛ kĩ odima enyi kĩ edeĩ nɛ awã, lɛmɛ ɛtápuli ɛkɔla ye akũ.
Otsole odi kĩ hũhũ kpa deĩ nɛ ye obi kamɛ nu kĩ Yesu na nɛ awã, ade ɛya ɛyake aduli nɛ ye anɛ kamɛ a.
Otsole kĩĩ nyɛ ɔnɔvɔɛ̃ kĩ bɛmɔ Yudafɔ baákã. Ɛnyɛ Foenikeni kĩ eto Siria tite akũ. Eke Yesu aduli kĩ ɛblɔmɛna hũhũ kpa a etomɛna obitsole kamɛ.
Lɛmɛ Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Fɔ̃ bɛkpa babisɛ̃ funitsã tɔ̃. Fɔnɛ́nɛ kĩ bakɔa babisɛ̃ funitsã bɛkpa bakpete.”
Awã naa otsole a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Awoo, boe Ɔlɛga, lɛmɛ bakpete a kĩ bikoni nɛ kanyakɔ̃ a ana osi kanya babisɛ̃ funitsã a kĩ fuwuli fuko nɛ tite a.”
Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ɔlɛ nɛ awĩ sũ ni, kaanaa kɔla. Aamɔ kĩ hũhũ kpa a nɛ́ nɛ nɔ obitsole a kamɛ.”
Otsole kĩĩ naa kɔla, ade ɛmɔ kĩ obi a waa nɛ ɔkɛna akũ, lɔkɔa hũhũ kpa a nɛ nɛ ye kamɛ.
Kĩ Yesu dzakũ nɛ Tiro kayite a ade ɛtsã Sidon ɔmatɔ a kamɛ a, ɛtsã Galilea ɔwɔ lutubu baũ abuĩ, ɛnaa tɛmatɔ ewua a kamɛkamɛ a.
Nɛ awã a, bati badi yamɛna odi kĩ esĩ atɔ ade ɛnyɛ omumu lɛmɛ a. Bike ye aduli kĩ ete awɛ nɛ ye akũ.
Foesũ Yesu kpã ye ɛnamɛna ɔɔwɛ̃, ade ɛkɔa bawobi edo nɛ ye atɔ kamɛ a, ade etua tanɛ lɛmɛ ete nɛ lawobi akũ ɛkɔa ekputa onyole a sɛmɛ a.
Ade Yesu dzɛla anɛ ɛdã ode, ɛwɛya eke fɛɛ ade ebi onyole a kĩ, “Hefata,” foe kayɔ nyɛ kĩ, “Binya!”
Deedimɔapɛ onyole a atɔ binya ade ye sɛmɛ tɔwɛ̃ wũnya, epuli ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla a.
Yesu sua bati a kĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ awã osi kĩ bɛtabi odima lɛtsama nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bɛmɔ́ a akũ. Lɛmɛ pupulidza esi be mbla, kitonɛkĩ be flee bɛnaa bɛnalɛ lɛtsa kĩ lɛya a.
Bati a flee kĩ binu fɔlɛtsa kĩ a, fɔkɛna be saa! Ade bibi akũ kĩ, “Yakɛna lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kakɛna wĩ. Ɛfɔ̃ omumu alɛ kɔdzɛla, ade ɔtɔsĩnɛ lɛmɛ anu fɔkɔ a!”
Owi tábuna fɔmɔ bati pii yatsɛna nɛ awã. Kĩ lɛtsama lɛláa kĩ baanya sũ ni, Yesu vɛ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a efuãmɔ ye ade ebi be kĩ,
“Bati kĩĩ fɔlɛtsa akɔ yĩ kɔnya kitonɛkĩ bɛna nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ fuwi ɛlalɛ flee. Ade finyaakĩĩ bɛlá lɛtsama kĩ baanya.
Ntɛ nfɔnɛ be awɛ mɔ bɛdzakũ mɔ kɔlɛ ni, baanaa lɔkɔa anɛ aasinya be nɛ osi, kitonɛkĩ badi to mɔ lugo.”
Ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a via ye kĩ, “Nɛ kɔsa kĩĩ kamɛ, ndia oti odi aana funitsã ɛkpa bati kĩ bɛnya biwĩ?”
Awã na Yesu via be kĩ, “Abodoo eni minɛɛ?”
Bibi ye kĩ, “Bɔnɛɛ abodoo evũkɔnɔ.”
Yesu bi bati a kĩ bɛkɛna akũ bidzi. Ade ɛbɔɛ abodoo evũkɔnɔ a. Ɛnyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ ade ɛyɛlɛ ye fɔkɛfɔkɛ a, ɛkɔa ɛkpa ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ bɛkɔa bɛkpa bati a flee. Be malo bɛtɛ, ade bɛsɛ̃ bɛkpa be a.
Bɛnɛɛ kɔfɔabi kubii kudi lɛmɛ nɛ awã, ade Yesu bɔɛ koe lɛmɛ ɛnyɛ kɔlɛ a. Ɛkɔa koe ɛkpa ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ bɛsɛ̃ koe lɛmɛ bɛkpa be.

Bati a flee nya biwĩ. Bati a lidede aawo mpim ɛna. Kĩ bɛnya biyua a, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a fila fuwuliwa a kĩ fute a bɛkpɔta ade fuyi kɔba tɛtsɛtsɛ kpale kpale evũkɔnɔ a. Ke liti a, Yesu nyɛ bati a flee osi ade bɛdzakũ a.

Bati a flee nya biwĩ. Bati a lidede aawo mpim ɛna. Kĩ bɛnya biyua a, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a fila fuwuliwa a kĩ fute a bɛkpɔta ade fuyi kɔba tɛtsɛtsɛ kpale kpale evũkɔnɔ a. Ke liti a, Yesu nyɛ bati a flee osi ade bɛdzakũ a.
Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a wo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ kamɛ binyina bɛnaa Dalmanuta tite akũ.
Farisifɔ badi ya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃ ade bɛkavia ye fɔlɛtsa kĩ basɔ ye bɛdã. Foesũ bibi ye kĩ ɛkɛna awãwã fɔtsa fudi lɔkɔa bɛmɔ kĩ eto Baguma sɛkɛ̃.
