Lɛmɛ Yesu wɛya eke ade evia be kĩ, “Nde sũ koũ nviã babi awɛ kĩ bamɔ awãwã fɔtsa? Oowo, mabi mi kĩ nláayakɛna awãwã fɔtsa a odu kĩ miawɛ nɛ awĩ!”
Ɛdzakũ nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ ade ebuki ewo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ enyina ɛnaa ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a sɛkɛ̃ sitide a.
Kĩ banaa a, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a lɛla abodoo kabɔɛ kabu, foesũ abodoo a amɔapɛ bɛna nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ.
Yesu bi be kĩ, “Midã kadã wĩ nɛ Lɛgã Herodes mɔ Farisifɔ oyila a akũ.”
Bɛkavia akũ kĩ, “Ade ayekĩ bɔnɛ́ɛ abodoo adima sũ mɔ ɛlɛ fukĩĩ a.”
Lɛmɛ Yesu nyi lɛtsa a kĩ bɛkalɛ a, ade evia be kĩ, “Nde sũ mialɛ abodoo katabɔɛ fɔlɛtsa? Foesũ kɛyawo lɔkɔ kĩĩ a mitáyi ɔsũ ĩye mitánu foe kayɔ tɔ̃? Mi atɔ deĩ ɔsĩ paa! Miáte lɛtsama anɛ?
Mideĩ anɛ lɛmɛ miámɔ! Mideĩ atɔ lɛmɛ miánu!
Mitámɔ lɔkɔ a kĩ nsɛ̃ abodoo elo nkpa bati mpim elo bɛba a? Tɛtsɛtsɛ eni fɔkɛfɔkɛ kubii a kĩ fute a yi?”
Bibi ye kĩ, “Kɔba tɛtsɛtsɛ ewua-nviã.”
Yesu buki evia be kĩ, “Mɔ lɔkɔ a kĩ nsɛ̃ abodoo evũkɔnɔ nkpa bati mpim ɛna a, awuliwa a kĩ ete a, tɛtsɛtsɛ eni eyi?”
Bibi ye kĩ, “Te kpale kpale evũkɔnɔ.”
Ade evia be kĩ, “Kɛyawo nviã kĩĩ a, nde sũ mɔ miányi oti a odu kĩ ye manɛ?”
Kĩ Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a wo Betsaida a, bati badi kpã ɔnɛkunɛ bɛma ye ade bike ye aduli kĩ ɛkɔa awɛ ɛta ɔnɛkunɛ a.
Yesu pi oti a nɛ kɔkpɔ ade ɛkpã ye ɛnamɛna ɔmatɔ a ɔbaɛ̃ a. Kĩ evũma tanɛ eko nɛ oti a anɛ kamɛ a, ɛkɔa awɛ ete nɛ ye akũ ade evia ye kĩ, “Amɔ litsedi?”
Ade oti a dzɛla anɛ ɛdã ode ɛlɛ kĩ, “Oo! Mamɔ bati, lɛmɛ badã ndɛ futse. Lɛmɛ bɛtsɛ̃ bamini.”
Ade Yesu buki ɛta ye anɛ a. Lɛyade kĩ kɔ̃ oti a binya ye anɛ yededeede, ye anɛ kamɛ kpalɛ ade ɛmɔ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɔ wĩ a.
Yesu nyɛ ye osi ebi ye kĩ ɛtabuki ɛtsã ɔmatɔ a kamɛ ɛnaa kɔla.
Ke liti a, Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a dzakũ nɛ awã bɛnaa tukula kĩ tifuã Kaisarea nɛ Filipi kamɛkamɛ a. Kĩ banaa nɛ osi a, Yesu via be kĩ, “Mibi yĩ oti a odu kĩ bati alɛ kĩ ye manɛ.”
Bibi ye kĩ, “Badi alɛ kĩ nɔ nyɛ Yohanes Mui Ɔwɔlanɛ a. Ade badi lɛmɛ alɛ kĩ nɔ nyɛ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Eliya. Badi bɛbã lɛmɛ alɛ kĩ nɔ nyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ kɔɛ a kamɛ ɔmɔa.”
Ade ke Yesu buki evia be kĩ, “Nde nyɛ mi lɛmɛ? Owei mialɛ kĩ ye manɛ?”
Petro bi ye kĩ, “Nɔ nyɛ Kristo a Kĩ Bɛbɔa Tɔdɔ̃ a.”
Yesu sua be osi kĩ bɛtabi odima lɛtsa a kĩ binyi nɛ ye akũ nɛ awĩ a.

Ade Yesu yi kayɔ mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a fɔtsa fudi katsa a. Ebi be kĩ, “Kɛnɛ kĩ fɔya kĩ Otidziwa Obi a ɛmɔ lubo etomɛna ɔmatɔ banɔkɔɛ̃, Yudafɔ basɔfɔ banɔkɔɛ̃, mɔ Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ a awɛ kamɛ. Ade baasĩ ye, bɛkɔ ye, lɛmɛ nɛ luwi lɛlalɛde akũ ni, yaayidza edzi nkpã.”
Ebi be fukĩĩ yededeede binu. Petro kpã ye ɛnamɛna ɔɔwɛ̃, ade ɛtsa kĩ bɛmɔ ye bɛtákɛna ɔmɔa nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ a akũ.
Lɛmɛ kĩ Yesu dani ɛdã ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a, ɛkã Petro anɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Dzakũ nɛ yĩ akũ Satana! Aáwɛ fɔtsa a kĩ Baguma awɛ a, mbom awɛ lɛtsa a kĩ batidziwa awɛ a odi!”

Foesũ Yesu vɛ bati kɔdabu a mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a bɛya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ ade ebi be kĩ, “Ntɛ odi awɛ kĩ yatomɔ yĩ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ yafɔnɛ ye apɛdiɛ awɛ, ɛbɔɛ ye lubo kamɔ fɔlɔtsa luwi nyɛ luwi lɔkɔa etomɔ yĩ nɛ liti.
Kitonɛkĩ oti kĩ ɛwɛ kĩ yapili ye nkpã ni, yaayɛla ye. Lɛmɛ oti kĩ ɛkɔa ye akũ ɛkpa nɛ yĩ mɔ Kalɛ Wĩ a sũ ni, yaana nkpã daa.
Litsa nfasɔ oti aana ntɛ ɛna katinya kamɛ fɔtsa flee mɔ ɛyɛla ye nkpã mɔawɛ a?
Ĩye litsa oti aakɔa ɛvɛmɛna mɔ nkpã mɔawɛ a?

Foesũ ntɛ yĩ mɔ yĩ fɔtsa katsa a flee nyɛ fɔnyɔãtsa fɔkpa odi nɛ ablɔ katinya kpa kĩĩ kamɛ ni, ye malo yaanya fɔnyɔãtsa ɛkpa Yĩ Otidziwa Obi, nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ bɔmɔ́ Baguma fɔtɔ banyanɛ kpalɛwa a bɔ́aya nɛ Baguma kukũkpalɛ a flee kamɛ.”
Yesu buki ebi be kĩ, “Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ, badi deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ nɛ awĩ kĩ bɛláaku kɛnaawo kĩ bɛmɔ́ Baguma lɛgãkanya a ya mɔ kɔbɛ̃.”
Fuwi evũ liti a, Yesu kpã Petro, mɔ Yakobo, mɔ Yohanes bɛnaa ɔtɔ akũ, awã kĩ be bɛna. Kĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kadã a, Yesu akũ dani nɛ be anɛ kamɛ,
ade ye tɛtadiɛ dani tivoe kɛba ayekĩ otidziwa aapuli ɛvɔlɛ te tɛnɛ́ lɔmɔ.
Adeke fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ɛlalɛ a mɔ́ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ Mose mɔ Eliya kĩ bɛnyɛ be akũ bɛkalɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ Yesu a.
Ade Petro bi Yesu kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, fɔnɛnɛ kĩ bɔya nɛ awĩ! Fɔ̃ bɔkɛna tɛpatampa ɛlalɛ, nɔ ade amɔa, Mose ade amɔa, lɔkɔa Eliya lɛmɛ ade amɔa.”
Lɛmɛ enyína lɛtsa a kĩ ɛkalɛ a, kitonɛkĩ bɛtɛ́nɛ kavila.
Lufulututu lidi ka lɛyasua be akũ, ade odo nɛ́ eto de kamɛ kĩ, “Ade yĩ obi kĩ maátunɔ ye kalɛ a, mitse ye kalɛ!”
Lɛtalɛta bɛdã fɔkɔ bisinya lɛmɛ bɛtámɔ odima kɛba Yesu kĩ ɛdzɛ nɛ be ɔwɛ̃.
Kĩ bito ɔtɔ akũ baka a, Yesu si be mbla kĩ, “Mitabi odima lɛtsa a kĩ mimɔ́ a kɛnaawo lɔkɔ kĩ Otidziwa Obi a yidza eto banɔkpa kamɛ.”
Bɛfɔ̃ kalɛ kĩĩ kahɔ nɛ be lɔlɔ kamɛ, lɛmɛ ntɛ be odi bidzi a balɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ foe akũ kavia akũ kĩ, “Kayidza kato kanɔkpa a kayɔ nyɛ litsa?”
Adeke bivia Yesu kĩ, “Litsa sũ Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ a alɛ kĩ, kɛnɛ kĩ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Eliya ɛnya lɔtɔ ɛya?”
Yesu bi be kĩ, “Nuwĩ, kɛnɛ kĩ Eliya ɛnya lɔtɔ ɛya ayekĩ yaamanɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa eyi. Litsa sũ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ Otidziwa Obi a aayamɔ lubo pii, bisupa ye lɛmɛ a?
Mabi mi kĩ Eliya ya kɔkɔɛ ade bɛkɛna ye lɛtsa a kĩ bɛwɛ a, ndɛ ayekĩ bɛtsɛlɛ biyi nɛ ye akũ a.”
Kĩ Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ɛlalɛ a muniki bɛya nɛ be nkaɛ a sɛkɛ̃ a, bɛmɔ́ bati kɔdabu baũ kĩ bisinya be, ade mbla batsanɛ a badi kavɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa mɔ be a.
Kĩ bati a kɔdabu a mɔ́ Yesu a, akũ dzuli be, ade biwula atsɛ bɛnawɔ̃na ye a.
Yesu via ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Litsa fɔlɛtsa milamɔ kavɛlɛ mɔ be?”
Onyole odi nɛ bati kɔdabu a kamɛ kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, nkpã yĩ obi mma nɔ, kitonɛkĩ hũhũ kpa deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ ade yaapuli ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla a.
Kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ kĩ hũhũ a api ye ni, yabɔɛ ye kamuni nɛ tite, ade kuvũ anɛ nɛ ye onukpɛ̃, yaba adɔ̃ lɔkɔa ye akũ flee asinsĩ. Nkpã ye mma nɔ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ bɛblɔmɛna hũhũ a, lɛmɛ bɛtápuli.”
Yesu bi be kĩ, “O! Nviã babi kĩ milá katɛkado! Maana nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ daa? Lɔkɔ lɔɔdabe mado ɔwɔlɛ nvɛlɛ mi nnaawo? Mikpã kanyolebi a mima yĩ!”
Bɛkpã ke bɛma Yesu. Kĩ hũhũ a sila ɛmɔ Yesu a, efufulinya kanyolebi a kɛka kɛtɔ, kɛkamilinya nɛ tite kanɛ kuvũ nɛ onukpɛ̃.
Ade Yesu via ɔlɛga kĩ, “Lɔkɔ ɔdabe fuyi ye kayɔ?”
Ɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Kito anɛ ye tibisɛ̃ kamɛ.
Lɔkɔ pii hũhũ kpa a awɛ kĩ yakɔ ye, foesũ yabɔɛ ye kamuni nɛ fi ĩye mui kamɛ. Ntɛ aapuli ɔkɛna litsedi ni, mɔ́ boe kɔnya lɔkɔa kabumɔ boe.”
Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Kalɛ ɔlɛ kĩ ntɛ maapuli? Lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa aapuli lɛya lɛkpa oti kĩ ɛtɛ yĩ edo.”
Deedimɔapɛ kabisɛ̃ɛ̃ a ɔlɛga bɔa fɔwɔla kĩ, “Ndeĩ katɛkado, lɛmɛ kɛpɔ́nɛ, bumɔ yĩ nna katɛkado mbu!”
Kĩ Yesu mɔ́ kĩ bati kɔdabu a kadu kafuã be a, ewũni nɛ hũhũ kpa a akũ kĩ, “Nɔ hũhũ kpa ɔtɔsĩnɛ mɔ omumu, mabi nɔ kĩ nɛ nɛ kabisɛ̃ɛ̃ a kamɛ, tabuki ɔyaawo nɛ ke kamɛ dadaada!”
Hũhũ kpa a bɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba, efufulinya kabisɛ̃ɛ̃ a mɔ ɔsĩ, ɛbɔɛ ke emuni nɛ tite, ade ɛnɛ́ nɛ ke kamɛ a. Kabisɛ̃ɛ̃ a kɛna ndɛ kaku kiku, foesũ bati a pii lɛ kĩ, “Eku!”
Lɛmɛ Yesu pi kabisɛ̃ɛ̃ a nɛ kɔkpɔ ade kiyidza kɛdza a.
Ke liti a, kĩ Yesu naa tɔtɔ kamɛ a, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a via ye pɛtɛɛ kĩ, “Nde sũ boe kɔ̃ bɔtápuli bɔblɔmɛna hũhũ kpa a ɛnɛ́ nɛ ye kamɛ?”
Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Bɛláapuli bɛblɔmɛna hũhũ kĩĩ odu, mbɔɛntɛ bɛtsãmɛna foe mpaɛbɔ kamɛ.”
Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a dzakũ nɛ awã bɛnatsã Galilea. Yesu táwɛ kĩ odima anyi awã kĩ ɛnaa,
kitonɛkĩ ɛkatsa ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a fɔtsa. Ebi be kĩ, “Baakɔa Otidziwa Obi a bido nɛ bati awɛ ade baakɔ ye a, lɛmɛ nɛ luwi lɛlalɛde liti a, yaayidza edzi nkpã.”
Lɛmɛ bɛtánu lɛtsa kĩ ebi be a kayɔ, ade bivila kĩ bavia ye a.
Bɛyawo Kapernaum ɔmatɔ a kamɛ, ade kĩ biwo nɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ a, Yesu via ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Litsa kalɛ mivɛlɛ nɛ osi a?”
Lɛmɛ bɛtákpa ye mbuayɛ, kitonɛkĩ nɛ osi akũ a, bɛkavɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa nɛ owula kĩ ɛbɛ̃ flee nɛ be kamɛ.
Yesu kɛna akũ edzi ɛvɛ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ewua-nviã a, ebi be kĩ, “Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yawɛ lɔtɔ ɛnya ni, kɛnɛ kĩ ɛnya bati a flee nkaɛ mɔ ɔsumunɛ.”
Ke liti a, ɛkpã kabisɛ̃ɛ̃ kadi kɛyadza nɛ be anɛ kamɛ, ade kĩ etu eboomu ke a, ebi be kĩ,
“Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaatɛ kabisɛ̃ɛ̃ kĩĩ kamɛ ɔmɔa nɛ yĩ dĩ akũ ni, yĩ ɛtɛ. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ yĩ ni, nnɛ́ yi odi ɛtɛ, mbom ɛtɛ oti a kĩ edo yĩ a lɛmɛ.”
Ade Yohanes bi Yesu kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, bɔmɔ́ onyole odi kĩ ɛkablɔmɛna hũhũ kpa nɛ nɔ dĩ akũ, ade bubi ye kĩ ɛfɔ̃, kitonɛkĩ ɛláa boe kamɛ.”
Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mitasua ye osi, kitonɛkĩ oti kĩ yakɛna awãwã fɔtsa nɛ yĩ dĩ akũ ni, ɛláadani ɛlɛ kalɛ kpa nɛ yĩ akũ.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaákɛna lɛtsama katia boe ni, ɛdzɛ̃ nɛ boe liti.
“Ɔnɔkɔali a mabi mi kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaakpa mi mui mimɔa kĩ minyɛ yĩ bade sũ ni, yaana ye kɔtɔkase kokooko.”
“Ntɛ oti odi aafɔ̃ kabisɛ̃ɛ̃ kĩĩ kamɛ ɔmɔa kĩ ɛtɛ yĩ edo lɛyɛla ye katɛkado ni, fɔnɛnɛ fɔbɛ̃ fɔkpa oti a ntɛ bɛkɔa kɔwɔlɛ bɛvɛla nɛ ye sɔmɔ, bɛta ye bido nɛ mpo kamɛ.
“Foesũ ntɛ nɔ awɛ afɔ̃ akɛna tɔkpa ni, tsua ye kamuni. Fɔnɛnɛ fɔbɛ̃ fɔkpa nɔ kĩ aakɔa awɛ mɔa owo nɛ nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna kamɛ, kɛba kĩ odeĩ awɛ nviã lɔkɔa bɛkɔa nɔ bido nɛ fi luwotu kĩ laádĩ a kamɛ.
“Foesũ ntɛ nɔ awɛ afɔ̃ akɛna tɔkpa ni, tsua ye kamuni. Fɔnɛnɛ fɔbɛ̃ fɔkpa nɔ kĩ aakɔa awɛ mɔa owo nɛ nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna kamɛ, kɛba kĩ odeĩ awɛ nviã lɔkɔa bɛkɔa nɔ bido nɛ fi luwotu kĩ laádĩ a kamɛ.
Ade ntɛ nɔ kɔbɔa akpã nɔ kado nɛ tɔkpa kamɛ ni, tsua koe kamuni. Fɔnɛnɛ fɔbɛ̃ kĩ odeĩ kɔbɔa mɔa ɔna nkpã mɔawɛ a, kɛba kĩ odeĩ abɔa nviã ade baata nɔ bido nɛ fi kamɛ a.
Ade ntɛ nɔ kɔbɔa akpã nɔ kado nɛ tɔkpa kamɛ ni, tsua koe kamuni. Fɔnɛnɛ fɔbɛ̃ kĩ odeĩ kɔbɔa mɔa ɔna nkpã mɔawɛ a, kɛba kĩ odeĩ abɔa nviã ade baata nɔ bido nɛ fi kamɛ a.
Ntɛ nɔ linebi akpã nɔ kado nɛ tɔkpa kamɛ ni, bɔlɛ de kanyɛ. Fɔnɛnɛ fɔkpa nɔ kĩ aakɔa linebi mɔa owo nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a, kɛba kĩ odeĩ banebi nviã lɛmɛ baata nɔ bido nɛ fi luwotu kamɛ.
‘Awã kĩ batebi a kĩ bawo be a láku dadaada,
ade fi a kĩ fɔapila be a lɛmɛ ládĩ da a.’
Kitonɛkĩ baakɔa fi bɛkpalɛ odi nyɛ odi akũ ndɛ ayekĩ bakɔa lɛdɛmɛ kakpalɛ afɔliɛ akũ a.
“Lɛdɛmɛ nɛnɛ, lɛmɛ ntɛ de ɔmɛnɛ nɛ́ nɛ de kamɛ ni, nde aakɛna obuki ɔkɔa ɔmɛnɛ odo nɛ de kamɛ? Foesũ mina tɔkɔba kakɛna lɛdɛmɛ nɛ mi kamɛ, lɔkɔa midzi nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ mɔ akũ akũ.”
Yesu dzakũ nɛ awã ɛnaa Yudea amantam kamɛ mɔ Yordan Ɔwɔ liti. Bati kɔdabu buki bɛyatsɛna nɛ ye akũ nɛ awã, ade ɛtsa be fɔtsa ndɛ ayekĩ yawɛ kakɛna a.
Farisifɔ badi ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ bɛwɛ kĩ basɔ ye bɛdã, foesũ bivia Yesu kĩ, “Boe mbla a kpa osi kĩ onyole esĩ ɔtsɔ̃?”
Yesu kɔa kavia ɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mbla adabe Mose kpa mi?”
Bɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mose kpa osi kĩ onyole ɛtsɛlɛ kasĩ ovoli ɛkpa ye kanyi lɔkɔa esĩ ye.”
Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mose tsɛlɛ mbla kĩĩ nɛ mi atɔ ɔsĩ sũ.
Kito katinya kayɔkayi a, onyole mɔ otsole Baguma kɛna.
Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ onyole aafɔnɛ ɔlɛga mɔ ɔma awɛ ɛkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ ɔtsɔ̃,
lɔkɔa be nviã a baakɛna oti ɔmɔa. Foesũ bibuki bɛnyɛ́ bati nviã, mbom bɛkɛna oti mɔa.
Foesũ lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma boomu ni, otidziwa ɛtasɛ̃ foe kamɛ!”
Ke liti a, kĩ bɛya nɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ a, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a via ye fɔlɛtsa nɛ fukĩ ɛlɛ a akũ.
Yesu bi be kĩ, “Onyole kĩ esĩ ɔtsɔ̃ mɔ ebuki ɛkɔã ɔbɛbã ni, ɛbɔa adɔpaa nɛ ɔtsɔ̃ akũ.
Ade ayea ntɛ otsole fɔnɛ ɔnyɔ awɛ mɔ ɛnadzi mɔ onyole bɛbã ni, ye malo ɛbɔa adɔpaa.”
Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, bati badi kpã babisɛ̃ bɛma Yesu kĩ ete awɛ nɛ be akũ, lɛmɛ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kã be anɛ.
Kĩ Yesu mɔ fukĩĩ a ni, ɛna kalɔkpa ade ebi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Mifɔ̃ babisɛ̃ bɛya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃, mitasua be osi, kitonɛkĩ ade bati kĩĩ odu lá Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a.
Ɔnɔkɔali a mabi mi kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtátɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a ndɛ obisɛ̃ aye ni, ɛláawo nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ da.”
Ke liti a, etu eboomu babisɛ̃ a, ade ete awɛ nɛ be akũ ehila be a.
Kĩ Yesu yidza epi osi a, onyole odi wula atsɛ ɛyake aduli nɛ ye anɛ kamɛ evia ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ Wĩ, litsa kɛnɛ kĩ nkɛna fɔmɔ maana nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a?”
Yesu via ye kĩ, “Nde sũ avɛ yĩ oti wĩ? Odima lɛnyɛ́ oti wĩ mbɔɛntɛ Baguma odi.
Onyina Baguma mbla a. Takɔ oti, tanɛ kɔnyɔ ĩye kɔtsɔ̃ liti, taye, tama fɔvã ote nɛ oti akũ, tasisi oti, mɔ bu aga mɔ ama.”
Onyole a bi ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, kito nɛ yĩ tibisɛ̃ kamɛ kĩ makɛna nɛ tɛbla a flee akũ.”

Yesu dã ye kɛnaana nɛ ɔdɔ kamɛ, ade ebi ye kĩ, “Kite nɔ lɛtsa mɔa. Naa kanaafila fɔtsa a kĩ odeĩ a flee kanɔ, kakɔa sika a kakpa ahiãfɔ, lɔkɔa aadani ɔkɛna osikani nɛ ode. Ke liti a, ya kayaatomɔ yĩ!”
Kĩ onyole a nu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, emuna anɛ ade ɛdzakũ mɔ ayɔlɔhɔ a, kitonɛkĩ ɛna akũ.
Yesu dã ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a ɛtsɛna ade ebi be kĩ, “Fɔ́ana ɔsĩ paa fɔkpa osikafɔ kĩ baawo nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a.”
Fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ dzuli ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a akũ. Lɛmɛ Yesu buki ebi be kĩ, “Yĩ babi, Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ kawo deĩ ɔsĩ paa fɔkpa asikafɔ.
Fɔ́adã bɔɛɛ fɔkpa ɔpɔnkɔ mɔ kapu kĩ yaatsã ɔnɔbɔ̃ ɔkɛ kamɛ ɛnɛ kɛba kĩ osikani aawo nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a.”
Fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a kɛna fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a wãwã paa. Ade bɛkavia akũ kĩ, “Lɔkɔa owei koũ aapuli ɛna nkpã katɛ?”
Yesu dã be kɛnanaana ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Batidziwa sɛkɛ̃ mɔ fɔláapuli fɔya, lɛmɛ nnɛ́ mɔ Baguma, kitonɛkĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa adã bɔɛɛ lɛkpa Baguma.”
Ade Petro lɛ kĩ, “Dã, bɔfɔnɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa awɛ buyi bɔya butomɛna nɔ.”
Yesu lɛ kĩ, “Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ odi nyɛ odi ɛfɔnɛ ye tɔtɔ eyi, ĩye bawaɛ̃nyole mɔ bawaɛ̃tsole, ĩye ɔma, ĩye ɔlɛga, ĩye ye babi, ĩye fɔba eyi nɛ yĩ mɔ Kalɛ Wĩ a sũ ni,
yaana fɔtsa pii ɛba nɛ lɔkɔ kĩĩ kamɛ. Yaana fɔla titi ɔha, bawaɛ̃nyole mɔ bawaɛ̃tsole, bama mɔ babi, mɔ fɔba, mɔ bati liti katomɛna. Ade nɛ lɔkɔ kĩ laya kamɛ a, yaana nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna da a.
Lɛmɛ bati pii kĩ bɛnyɛ batɔnyade a finyaa aakpa liti, ade bati batide finyaa aakɛna lɔtɔ banyanɛ.”

Finyaa Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a yɛlɛ banaa Yerusalem. Yesu nyaa be lɔtɔ ade fɔkɛna ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a saa a, bati a kĩ bitomɔ be nɛ liti a kavila. Yesu buki ɛvɛ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ewua-nviã a ɛnamɛna ɔɔwɛ̃ ade ɛkabi be lɛtsa a kĩ laaya nɛ ye akũ a.
Ebi be kĩ, “Mitse! Bɔanaa Yerusalem awã kĩ baakɔa Otidziwa Obi a bido nɛ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ mbla batsanɛ a awɛ. Baakɔ ye kɔtɔ bɛkpa wuda lɔkɔa bɛkɔa ye bido nɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ awɛ.
Baadi ye nsekuo, bitua tanɛ biko nɛ ye akũ, baabo ye mɔ mple ade baakɔ ye a, lɛmɛ nɛ luwi lɛlalɛde akũ a, yaayidza edzi nkpã.”
Ke liti a, Zebedeo babi kĩ bɛnyɛ Yakobo mɔ Yohanes ya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃ ade bibi ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, bɔawɛ kĩ kɛna lɛtsa a kĩ bɔavia nɔ a kakpa boe.”
Yesu via be kĩ, “Litsa fɔanɛ?”
Bibi ye kĩ, “Ntɛ ɔnɛ odzi nɛ nɔ lɛgãkpo akũ nɛ nɔ kukũkpalɛ kamɛ ni, bɔawɛ kĩ budzi nɛ nɔ ɔwɛ̃, boe kamɛ ɔmɔa nɛ nɔ sɔmɔna, ɔmɔa lɛmɛ nɛ nɔ sɛbã.”
Yesu bi be kĩ, “Minyína lɛtsa kĩ de milamɛna kavia a! Mitɛ mido kĩ míapuli mimɔa lubo kamɔ kɔɔpu a kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ mmɔa? Ĩye míapuli mitɛ mui kawɔla a kĩ maatɛ a?”
Bɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Bɔ́apuli.”
Yesu bi be kĩ, “Oo, míapuli mimɔa kɔɔpu a kĩ maamɔa a, mɔ mui kawɔla amaniɛ a kĩ maatɛ a.
Lɛmɛ nlá osi kĩ mapau oti a kĩ ye aadzi nɛ yĩ sɔmɔna ĩye sɛbã. Baguma nyɛ oti a kĩ yaakɔa foe ɛkpa bati a kĩ ɛmanɛ foe eyi a.”
Kĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ewua nkaɛ nu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, bɛna kalɔkpa nɛ Yakobo mɔ Yohanes akũ.
Foesũ Yesu vɛ be ɛkpɔta ebi be kĩ, “Minyina kĩ bati a kĩ babu kĩ bɛnya tɔnɔkɔɛ̃ nɛ amamufɔ akũ a, deĩ kɔbɛ̃ nɛ be akũ, ade banɔkɔɛ̃ kĩĩ deĩ otumi nɛ be akũ a.
Lɛmɛ kɛtánɛ kĩ fɔana lɔmɔ nɛ mi kamɛ. Ntɛ mi kamɛ odi awɛ kĩ yanya ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ ɛnya mi ɔsumunɛ.
Ntɛ mi kamɛ odi wɛ kĩ yanya ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ ɛnya be nkaɛ a ɔsumunɛ.
Kitonɛkĩ Otidziwa Obi a malo táya kĩ bisum ye, mbom ɛya kĩ yasum bati ɛkɔa ye nkpã ɛkpa lɔkɔa ɛtɛ bati pii nkpã.”

Ke liti a, Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a yawo Yeriko. Kĩ banɛ nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ a, bati kɔdabu baũ tomɔ be. Kĩ banaa nɛ osi a, bɛmɔ́ ɔnɛkunɛ odi kĩ bavɛ Bartimeo, Timeo obi kĩ edzi nɛ osi ɔɔwɛ̃ yawã fɔtsa.
Kĩ enu kĩ Yesu Nazaretni a lɛyaatɛ̃ a, edo fɔwɔla kabɔa awɛ kĩ, “Yesu! Dawid obi! Mɔ yĩ kɔnya!”
Bati pii wũni nɛ ye akũ kĩ esua onukpɛ̃. Lɛmɛ ɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba ɛba kĩ, “Dawid obi! Mɔ yĩ kɔnya!”
Yesu fɔ̃ ɛdza ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Mivɛ ye mikpa yĩ.”
Foesũ bɛvɛ ɔnɛkunɛ kĩĩ bibi ye kĩ, “Fɔ̃ ɔwɔlɛ ɛka edzi nɔ! Yidza mɔ atsɛ, yavɛ nɔ.”
Awã naa ɛta ye atadiɛ wulaa eyi nɛ ɔɔwɛ̃ eyidza ɛdza, ɛnaa Yesu sɛkɛ̃.
Yesu via ye kĩ, “Litsa awɛ kĩ nkɛna nkpa nɔ?”
Ɔnɛkunɛ a bi ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, fɔ̃ mbuki mmɔ́ fɔkɔ!”
Ade Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Naa. Nɔ katɛkado tsa nɔ.” Deedimɔapɛ ye anɛ binya ɛmɔ́ fɔkɔ, ade etomɔ Yesu nɛ osi a akũ a.
Kĩ bifuã Yerusalem a, bɛkɔa bawo Betfage mɔ Betania tɛmatɔ a, bɛyawo Kugua Futse Ɔtɔ akũ. Nɛ awã Yesu do ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ nviã kĩ bɛnya lɔtɔ,
mɔ ɔlɛdo kĩ, “Minaa akula a kĩ ɛwaa nɛ lɔtɔ a kamɛ. Ntɛ miwo ye kamɛ pɛ, míamɔ aflim obi kĩ bido ɔwɛ̃ bɛdzɛla kĩ odima tádzi tɔ̃ nɛ ye akũ. Miwũnya ye nɛ ɔwɛ̃ kamɛ mikɔa miyamɛna.
Ntɛ odi via mi kĩ, ‘Nde sũ miawũnya ye’ ni, mibi ye kĩ mi Ɔlate sĩ ye, ade yaakɔa ye ɛmɛna mɔatsɛ a.”
Foesũ bati a naa, ade bɛnamɔ kĩ bido aflim obi ɔwɛ̃ ɛdzɛ̃ nɛ ɔblɔnu akũ nɛ kɔla onyukpɛ̃. Ade kĩ bɛkawũnya ye nɛ ɔwɛ̃ kamɛ a,
bati badi kĩ bɛdza nɛ awã a via be kĩ, “Litsa miakɛna nɛ awã? Litsa sũ miawũnya aflim obi a?”
Bɛkpa mbuayɛ ndɛ ayekĩ Yesu bi be a, ade bati a kpa be osi bɛnyɛ ye a.
Kĩ bɛkɔa ɔyaɛ a bɛma Yesu a, bɛdzɛlɛ be tilima biko nɛ ye akũ, ade Yesu de edzi nɛ ye akũ a.
Bati pii dzɛlɛ be tilima biko nɛ osi akũ, ade badi lɛmɛ veli tɛnanɛ mɔ tɔɔta biko nɛ osi akũ a.
Bati a kĩ bɛnyaa lɔtɔ mɔ bikĩ bitomɛna ye a do fɔwɔla kabɔa kalɛ kĩ,
“Hosiana! Mimu Baguma!
Baguma hila oti a kĩ yaya nɛ Ɔlate a dĩ akũ!
Baguma hila Boe Ɔlɛga Dawid lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kĩ kaya a!
Hosiana deĩ nɛ ode flee flee!”
Kĩ Yesu wo Yerusalem a, ɛnaa Yudafɔ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ, ade eko anɛ ɛdã lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa ɛtɛ̃mɛna a. Lɛmɛ kĩ kade lamɛna kadɔ sũ ni, bɛmɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a ewua-nviã dzakũ bɛnaa Betania.
Kĩ kade nyina bimuniki bito Betania baya a, kɔlɛ kɔ Yesu.

Ɛmɔ́ kutse kudi kĩ kɔawũ babi kĩ bavɛ figi mɔ lugo, kɔtalɛ mɔ tɔɔta beblebee nɛ koe akũ. Foesũ ɛnadã ntɛ yaana babi badi nɛ koe akũ. Lɛmɛ kĩ ewo kutse a kayɔ a, ɛtámɔ babi badimanɔ, mbɔɛntɛ tɔɔta nɛnɛ teĩ, kitonɛkĩ kutse a kawũ lɔkɔ táwo tɔ̃ ɔtɔ.
Ade Yesu bi kutse a kĩ, “Odimanɔ lɛláabuki ɛnya nɔ babi dadaada!” Ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a nu foe.

Kĩ biwo Yerusalem a, Yesu naa Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ ade edo bati a kĩ bɛkanɔ fɔtsa, mɔ bikĩ bɛkaya fɔtsa a kablɔmɛna kanɛmɛna awɛ a. Edu sika babɛ̃nɛ a tupunu ewula, ade edu bikĩ bidzi banɔ mblɔduma a lɛmɛ fukpo ewula a.
Ade ɛtákpa osi malo kĩ odima abɔɛ lɛtsama ɛtsã kɔla kamɛ ɛtɛ̃mɛna a.
Ke liti a, ɛtsa bati a fɔtsa ɛlɛ kĩ, “Bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ Baguma lɛ kĩ,
‘Baavɛ yĩ Asɔli Kɔla kĩ
kamɛ katinya kamɛ bati flee mpaɛ kabɔakɔ̃.’
Lɛmɛ midani koe mikɛna bayekpanɛ kabɛlakɔ̃!”
Basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ mbla batsanɛ a nu fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Yesu lɛ a, foesũ bɛwɛ osi a kĩ baatsã bɛkɔ ye. Lɛmɛ bivila ye kitonɛkĩ ye fɔtsa katsa a nyɛnɛ bati kɔdabu a flee akũ.
Kĩ kiwo olobe lɔkɔ a, Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a nɛ nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ.
Luwi lɛyade ɔnɔnɛ tutuutu kĩ bɛtsɛ̃ nɛ osi banaa a, bɛmɔ́ kĩ kutse a kĩ kɔawũ babi a ku kito lɔlɔ kɛnawo tunu akũ.
Petro te anɛ nɛ lɛtsa kĩ lɛya a akũ, ade ebi Yesu kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, dã! Kutse a kĩ odumu a ku!”
Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mitɛ Baguma mido.
Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaabi ɔtɔ kĩĩ kĩ ɛbɔlɛ ɛnaatɔ nɛ mpo kamɛ, mɔ ɛtátɛ atsindze nɛ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ mbom ɛtɛ edo kĩ lɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ a aaya nɛ foe kamɛ ni, fɔ́aya lɔmɔ.
Foesũ mabi mi kĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ míavia Baguma nɛ mpaɛbɔ kamɛ ni, mitɛ mido kĩ mina foe, ade Baguma aakpa mi foe a.
Ade ntɛ midzɛ̃ miabɔa mpaɛ mɔ mimɔ́ kĩ oti odi fum mi ni, mikɔa mite ye ayekĩ mi Ɔlɛga nɛ ode a lɛmɛ aakɔa mi tɔkpa ete mi.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ mitákɔa bati tɔkpa mite be, mi Ɔlɛga nɛ ode a lɛmɛ lɛláakɔa mi tɔkpa a ete mi!”
Ade Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a buki bɛnaa Yerusalem a. Kĩ Yesu nɛ ɛtsɛ̃ yamini nɛ Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ a, basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃, mbla batsanɛ a mɔ ɔmatɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ badi ya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃,
ade bivia ye kĩ, “Kɔbɛ̃ ɔdabe ɔnɛɛ akɛna fɔtsa kĩĩ? Owei lɛkpa nɔ osi kĩ kɛna fɔtsa kĩĩ?”
Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Maanya lɔtɔ nvia mi kalɛ mɔapɛ. Ntɛ mikpa ke mbuayɛ ni, maabi mi kɔbɛ̃ a odu kĩ nnɛɛ makɛna fɔtsa kĩĩ.
Mibi yĩ Yohanes bati mui kawɔla a ni, Baguma sɛkɛ̃ futo mbɔɛɛ kĩ batidziwa sɛkɛ̃ futo? Mikpa yĩ mbuayɛ.”
Biyi fukĩĩ kavɛlɛ nɛ be kamɛ awɛ ade bɛlɛ kĩ, “Litsa bɔ́alɛ? Ntɛ bɔlɛ kĩ kɔbɛ̃ a to Baguma sɛkɛ̃ ni, yaavia boe kĩ, ‘Kekɔ̃ litsa sũ mitátɛ Yohanes mido?’
Mbɔɛɛ bɔ́alɛ kĩ futo batidziwa sɛkɛ̃?” Lɛmɛ bavila bati kɔdabu a, kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi abu Yohanes kĩ ɛnyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ.
Foesũ bɛkpa Yesu mbuayɛ kĩ, “Bunyína.”
Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Yĩ malo nláabi mi awã kĩ kɔbɛ̃ a to nnɛɛ makɛna fɔtsa kĩĩ!”

Ke liti a, Yesu tsa be fɔtsa nɛ fɔgbã kamɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Onyole odi nɛ waĩ futse kɔba, edzi kɔbã esinya koe. Ɛnyɛ lɛkɛ nɛ kɔba a kayite, awã kĩ yaana kutse babi a ɛkpɔta, ɛkakã mui a kako. Ade eke kɔla geĩ kudi, ayekĩ koe akũ ɔdãmɛnanɛ a aadzi ɛkadã kɔba a akũ. Ɛkɔa kɔba a edo nɛ apaafɔ awɛ kĩ bɛkaadã koe akũ, ade ɛdzakũ ɛnaa osi akũ a.
Kĩ lɔkɔ wo ɔtɔ kĩ baana babi a, onyole a do ye ɔsumunɛ nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ kĩ ɛnaatɛ ye kanyakɔ̃ ɛma ye.
Lɛmɛ ye apaafɔ a pi fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a bibo ye ade bɛblɔmɔ ye mɔ awɛ pupulidza a.
Onyole kĩĩ buki edo fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ bɛbã. Kĩ ɛnaa a, apaafɔ a bo ye, bipila ye nɛ lɔlɔ, bido ye kɔnyɔã lɛmɛ.
Kɔba ɔlate a buki edo fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ bɛbã, adeke bɛkɔ ye a. Ade aye bɛkɛna babɛbã pii a. Bibo badi, bɛkɔ babɛbã lɛmɛ.
“Oti kĩ ete kĩ yaado nyɛ ye mɔawɛ obi kĩ yaátunɔ kalɛ. Nɛ kawũna kamɛ a, edo ye obi a kĩ yawɛ kalɛ paa a, ɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Matɛ kado kĩ baakpa yĩ obi kĩĩ kɔ̃ obu.’
“Lɛmɛ kɔba akũ badãmɛnanɛ kĩĩ bi be akũ kĩ, ‘Ade adzapadiɛ ɔnyanɛ a nɛ awĩ a. Miya bɔkɔ ye ayekĩ ye adzapadiɛ a aakɛna boe ade!’
Foesũ, bipi obi a bɛkɔ ye, bɛta bimuni nɛ waĩ kɔbã a liti.”
Nɛ awã a, Yesu via bati a kĩ, “Litsa waĩ kɔba ɔlate a aakɛna? Yaaya ɛyaakɔ apaafɔ a ɛkɔa waĩ kɔba a edo nɛ bati bɛbã awɛ.
Mbɔɛɛ mitákã nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ,
‘De a kĩ fɔla bakenɛ sĩ a,
ade de lɛyadani kɔla okonto akũ de a.
Baguma lɛkɛna fɔtsa kĩĩ,
ade fɔnyɛ awãwã fɔtsa nɛ boe anɛ a!’ ”
Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a wɛ kĩ bapi Yesu, kitonɛkĩ bɛmɔ́ kĩ ɛbɔa lɛgbã a etia be, lɛmɛ bivila bati kɔdabu a, foesũ bɛfɔnɛ ye ade bɛdzakũ a.
Ke liti a, bido Farisifɔ badi mɔ bikĩ bitomɛna Herodes a kĩ bɛnaa Yesu sɛkɛ̃, bɛnaanaĩ ye nɛ tɛdake kamɛ mɔ fɔlɛtsa kavia bɛkɔa bipi ye.

Kĩ bɛya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ a, bibi ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, bunyina kĩ alɛ ɔnɔkɔali daa, ade ɔtsɛ́la lɛtsa a kĩ bati akɔna nɛ nɔ akũ a. Aádã oti anɛ, mbom atsa Baguma akũ ɔnɔkɔali osi a. Bi boe ntɛ boe Mbla kpa osi kĩ bute ɔgɔlɛ bɔkpa Roma Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃. Bute mbɔɛɛ kĩ bɔtate?”
Lɛmɛ Yesu mɔ́ be tɛdake a, foesũ evia be kĩ, “Nde sũ miawɛ kĩ miasɔ yĩ midã? Mikɔa sika a miyamɛna ndã!”
Bɛkɔa sɔmɔa bɛma ye, ade evia be kĩ, “Owei lɔlɔ mɔ dĩ teĩ nɛ se akũ?”
Awã naa bɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Roma Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ Kaisare.”
Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Kekɔ̃ mikɔa lɛtsa kĩ lɛnyɛ Kaisare lide a mikpa ye, ade lɛtsa kĩ lɛnyɛ Baguma lide a lɛmɛ ni, mikɔa mikpa Baguma.”
Fukĩĩ fɔ̃ akũ nyɛnɛ be nɛ Yesu akũ.
Ade Zadukifɔ kĩ balɛ kĩ bati kayidza kato kanɔkpa lɛláa a kamɛ badi ya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃, bɛyavia ye kĩ,
“Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, Mose tsɛlɛ mbla kĩĩ eyi ɛkpa boe kĩ ntɛ onyole odi ku ɛfɔnɛ ɔtsɔ̃ kĩ bɛmɔ ye bɛtáma ni, ɔwaɛ̃nyole ɛkɔã okunawa a, lɔkɔa bɛma babi bɛkpa ɔtɔnyade a.
Fɔya kĩ bawaɛ̃ evũkɔnɔ badi dzi nkpã. Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃de a kɔã ɔtsɔ̃ ade eku a, kĩ bɛtáma obi odima.
Ade ɔyade a kɔã otsole a, ade ye malo eku, kĩ bɛtáma obi odima. Ɔwaɛ̃ ɔlalɛde a lɛmɛ kɔã otsole a, ade ye malo ɛyaku kĩ bɛtáma obi odima.
Ade aye a be evũkɔnɔ a kɔã otsole a, lɛmɛ be flee a biku kĩ bɛmɔ otsole a bɛtáma babi. Nɛ foe kawũna a otsole a lɛmɛ yaku.
Nɛ kayidza kadzi nkpã kamɛ mɔ ntɛ biyidza a ni, be kamɛ ɔwɔdabe ɔtsɔ̃ otsole a aanya? Be evũkɔnɔ a flee bɛkɔã ye tɔ̃?”
Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mikɛna mfumsu, kitonɛkĩ minyína Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a fɔlɛtsa ĩye Baguma kɔbɛ̃ a.
Ntɛ banɔkpa yidza bidzi nkpã ni, baana ndɛ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ ade bɛláakɔã batsɔ̃ a ĩye bidzi fɔnyɔ a.
Lɛmɛ nɛ banɔkpa kayidza akũ ni, mitákã nɛ Mose ovoli a kamɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Baguma lɛ nɛ kutse a kĩ kɔkatɛ̃ a akũ? Baguma bi Mose kĩ, ‘Yĩ nyɛ Abraham Baguma, Isak Baguma mɔ Yakob Baguma.’
Fukĩĩ atsa kĩ ɛnyɛ bati kĩ bidzi nkpã Baguma, nnɛ́ banɔkpa Baguma yanɛ. Mikɛna mfumsu paa!”
Ade Yudani mbla ɔtsanɛ odi kĩ ɛna nɛ awã a, nu fɔlɛtsa kamɛ kasa a. Ɛmɔ́ kĩ Yesu kpa Zadukifɔ a mbuayɛ wĩ, foesũ efuã Yesu evia ye kĩ, “Mbla wɔdabe nyaa Baguma tɛbla a flee lɔtɔ?”
Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Bɛtsɛlɛ mbla a kĩ ɛbɛ̃ a bɛtsa kĩ, ‘Israelfɔ, mitse! Ɔlate a nyɛ boe Baguma, ade ye odi lɛmɛ deĩ a.
Foesũ awɛ Ɔlate, nɔ Baguma a, mɔ nɔ ɔwɔlɛ flee, mɔ nɔ ɔkla flee, mɔ nɔ adzuni flee mɔ nɔ kɔbɛ̃ flee.’
Ade mbla sĩwa ayade nyɛ kĩ, ‘Wɛ nɔ ɔkɔba kalɛ ndɛ ayekĩ awɛ nɔ akũ a.’ Mbla adima buki ɛbɛ́ tɛbla kĩĩ.”
Adeke mbla ɔtsanɛ a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, ɔlɛ foe kalɛ wĩ. Ɔnɔkɔali fɔanɛ ndɛ ayekĩ ɔlɛ kĩ Ɔlate a odi nyɛ Baguma, ade Baguma adima buki ɛláa kɛba ye odi a.

Foesũ kɛnɛ kĩ oti ɛwɛ Baguma kalɛ mɔ ye ɔwɔlɛ flee, ye adzuni flee mɔ ye kɔbɛ̃ flee. Ade kɛnɛ kĩ ɛwɛ ye ɔkɔba kalɛ ndɛ ayekĩ yawɛ ye akũ kalɛ a. Fɔnɛnɛ kĩ oti ɛkɛna nɛ tɛbla nviã kĩĩ akũ kɛba kĩ yaabɔa bayaɛ mɔ afɔliɛ bɛbã ɛkpa Baguma.”
Kĩ Yesu mɔ kĩ onyole a kpa ye mbuayɛ nɛ nyansã kamɛ a ni, ebi ye kĩ, “Mimɔ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kayite lɛlá lugo.” Nɛ fukĩĩ liti a, odimanɔ tápuli edo ɔwɔlɛ evia Yesu kalɛ kadima.
Kĩ Yesu katsa fɔtsa nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ a, evia be kalɛ kĩ, “Nde fɔla sũ mbla batsanɛ a aapuli bɛlɛ kĩ Kristo a aanya Lɛgã Dawid kasinu obi?
Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a lɛfɔ̃ Dawid lɛ eyi kĩ,
‘Baguma bi yĩ Ɔlate kĩ,
“Kɛna akũ kadzi nɛ yĩ sɔmɔna nɛ awĩ,
kɛnawo kĩ maakɔa
nɔ bakesĩnɛ ndo nɛ nɔ abɔa kayɔ.” ’
Kĩ Lɛgã Dawid mɔawɛ vɛ ye kĩ Ɔlate a ni, nde fɔ́apuli fɔya kĩ Kristo a aanya Dawid kasinu obi?”
Bati kɔdabu baũ dza nɛ awã bɛkatse Yesu fɔlɛtsa a mɔ kawɔlɛ.
Kĩ Yesu katsa bati a fɔtsa a ebi be kĩ, “Midã kadã wĩ nɛ Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ a akũ. Bado tɛtadiɛ wulaa katsã kawɛ kĩ bati bɛwɔ̃na be nɛ obu kamɛ nɛ kɔyaatɔ.
Bawɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ fudzikɔ̃ kadzi nɛ be fɔtsɛnakɔ̃ mɔ obu fudzikɔ̃ kadzi nɛ kanyakɔ̃.
Basisi bakunawa katɛ be tɔtɔ nɛ be awɛ. Babɔa mpaɛ gɛlɛɛlɛ kakɔa kapia be akũ. Be sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ aana ɔsĩ sɛba bati bɛbã fude.”
Ade Yesu nadzi nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ efuã ɔgɔlɛ kate adakã a, ɛkadã ayekĩ bati lamɔ sika kata kado a. Asikafɔ pii ta sika baũ baũ bido nɛ ye kamɛ.
Adeke okunawa ohiãni odi lɛmɛ ya ade ɛkɔa kaplɛ nviã edo nɛ adakã a kamɛ a.
Nɛ awã a Yesu vɛ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a ɛkpɔta ebi be kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔali mabi mi kĩ okunawa ohiãni kĩĩ lɛtsa a kĩ edo nɛ ɔgɔlɛ adakã kamɛ a pɔnɛ fɔbɛ̃ bati a flee fude.
Kitonɛkĩ bati bɛbã a kɔa akũ kana fɔtsa a kĩ fute a fudi bɛyate ɔgɔlɛ, lɛmɛ otsole ohiãni kosokoso kĩĩ kɔ̃, lɛtsa kĩ edeĩ a flee ɛkɔa ete. Ɛkɔa lɛtsa a kĩ de akũ yaadzi nkpã a ɛyate ɔgɔlɛ.”
Kĩ Yesu nɛ eto Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ yanaa a, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kamɛ ɔmɔa bi ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, dã fɔla mɔ kalɛ mɔ boe kpale kĩĩ!”
Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Amɔ fɔla kpale kpale kĩĩ. Bɛlátina de a kamɛ lidima nɛ lɔkɔba akũ kĩ bɛláadu biwula! Baatinya de lidi nyɛ lidi biwula.”
Kĩ Yesu nɛ edzi nɛ Kugua Futse Ɔtɔ a akũ, ɛtsɛlamɔ Asɔli Kɔla a, Petro, mɔ Yakobo, mɔ Yohanes mɔ Andrea ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ bɛyavia ye pɛtɛɛ kĩ,
“Boe Ɔlate, lɔkɔ wɔdabe fukĩĩ aaya nɛ foe kamɛ? Bi boe fɔtsa a kĩ fɔ́aya fɔkɔa fɔtsa kĩ lɔkɔ a wo ɔtɔ kĩ fɔtsa kĩĩ flee fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ.”
Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Midã kadã wĩ, ade mitafɔ̃ odima lɛkɛ mi a.
Bati pii aaya nɛ yĩ dĩ akũ bibi mi kĩ, ‘Yĩ nyɛ Kristo a!’ ade baakɛ bati pii a.
Ɔwɔlɛ ɛtabɔlɛ mi ntɛ minu kawũkanɔ nkã nɛ mi ɔwɛ̃ ĩye kawũkanɔ akũ fɔlɛtsa mɔ lugo. Kɛnɛ kĩ fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ odu fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ, lɛmɛ fɔátsa kĩ katinya kamɛ kawũna a wo ɔtɔ.
Ɔmaĩ mɔ ɔmaĩ aanɔ akũ. Lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ aayidza nɛ lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ akũ. Tite aakuna nɛ fɔkɔ kumɛkumɛ, ade kɔlɛ aaya a. Lɛmɛ fukĩĩ flee la ndɛ sɛmɛ kapi kayɔkayi lubo kamɔ a aye.
“Kɛnɛ kĩ mi mɔawɛ a miana nɛ kɔnɛte kamɛ. Baapili mi lɔkɔa bɛkɔa mi bɛnamɛna fɔlɛtsa kadzɛkɔ̃. Baabo mi nɛ fɔtsɛnakɔ̃. Baafɔ̃ midza nɛ fɔgã mɔ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ anɛ nɛ yĩ sũ, lɔkɔa mibi be Kalɛ Wĩ a.
Lɛmɛ fɔmɔ katinya kawũna a aaya ni, kɛnɛ kĩ bɛnya lɔtɔ bide lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ wĩ a akũ bɛkpa fude fude a flee.

Ntɛ bipi mi bɛkɔa mi bɛnamɛna fɔlɛtsa kadzɛkɔ̃ ni, mitanya lɔtɔ mibo akũ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ míalɛ a akũ. Ntɛ lɔkɔ a wo ɔtɔ ni, milɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ baakpa mi kĩ milɛ a. Kitonɛkĩ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ míalɛ a lɛláanya mi fude, mbom fɔ́ato Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a sɛkɛ̃.
“Bati aakɔa be mɔawɛ bawaɛ̃ bɛkpa kĩ bɛkɔ, ade balɛga lɛmɛ aakɛna foe mɔapɛ a nɛ babi akũ. Babi aayidza bɛdza nɛ be bamanɛ akũ, bɛfɔ̃ bɛkɔ be.
Odi nyɛ odi aakesĩ mi nɛ yĩ sũ. Lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaadza pintii kɛnaawo ye nkpã kawũna ni, Baguma aakpa ye nkpã.”
Yesu buki ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ mimɔ́ fukesĩtsa mɔ libe kĩ fɔakɔ ɔmaĩ kĩ fɔdzɛ̃ nɛ awã kĩ kɛtánɛ kĩ fɔna a ni, ovoli ɔkãnɛ a enu foe kayɔ kanu wĩ, lɔkɔa bati a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Yudea a bilo bɛnaa tɔtɔ akũ.
Oti kĩ edzi nɛ ye kɔla lɛtsã a, ɛtaduma ɛya nɛ tite kĩ yaabɔɛ litsedi etomɛna ye kɔla kamɛ ɛkpa ye akũ.
Oti kĩ edeĩ nɛ ye kɔba kamɛ ɛtamuniki ɛnaa kɔla kĩ yanaabɔɛ ye lima.
Bɔbɔɛ makpa batsole a kĩ bɛtsɛmɔ fɔma mɔ bikĩ bɛnɛɛ babi kĩ bamɛmɛ nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ.
Mibɔa mpaɛ mikpa Baguma kĩ fɔtsa kĩĩ fɔtaya nɛ osili lɔkɔ!

Kitonɛkĩ lubo kamɔ a kĩ laaya nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ aana ɔsĩ lɛba lidi nyɛ lidi kĩ lɛya tɔ nɛ katinya kamɛ, kito nɛ kayɔkayi kĩ Baguma bɔa katinya a kɛyawo finyaa. Adeke lubo kamɔ kĩĩ odu lɛláabuki lɛya dadaada a.
Lɛmɛ Ɔlate a tinya lubo kamɔ fuwi a akũ. Ntɛ nɛ aye ni, kufɛ odima lɛláana nkpã. Lɛmɛ nɛ ye bati a kĩ ɛpau a sũ ni, etinya fuwi a akũ.
“Foesũ ntɛ odi bi mi kĩ, ‘Dã! Kristo a deĩ nɛ awĩ,’ ĩye ‘Edeĩ nɛ akĩĩ,’ mitatɛ ye mido!
Kitonɛkĩ fɔvã Kristo amɛ, mɔ fɔvã Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ aanɛ. Baakɛna awãwã fɔtsa mɔ nsɛntsɛlɛni pii kĩ ntɛ baapuli ni, baakɔa bɛkɛ bati a kĩ Baguma pau a malo.
Mi kɔ̃ midã kadã wĩ! Mbi mi lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa ĩnyamɛna lɔtɔ fɔmɔ lɔkɔ a aawo ɔtɔ.”
Yesu lɛ ɛnamɛna lɔtɔ kĩ, “Nɛ fuwi a kĩ fɔ́aya nɛ lubo kamɔ fuwi liti a,
‘suwa aadĩ sɛkɛna tũũ,
odetɔ lɛmɛ lɛláabuki ɛvɔlɛ.
Fusibii aato ode fɔtɔ,
ade odetɔ́ kamɛ kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ kupini ode a aakuna akũ.’
“Ke liti a, baamɔ Otidziwa Obi a, kĩ ɛnɛ yaya nɛ liflututu kamɛ mɔ kɔbɛ̃ mɔ kukũkpalɛ baũ.
Adeke yaado ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kĩ bɛnaakpɔta bati a kĩ ɛpau eyi a, bitomɛna katinya kamɛ tukonto ɛna a kamɛ kito tite kakpulakɔ̃ kɛnaawo ode kakpulakɔ̃.
“Mikɔlɛ fɔtsa nɛ kutse kĩ kɔawũ babi a akũ. Ntɛ fɔya kĩ mimɔ́ kĩ kutse a na nɛ́ tɛnanɛ kɔnyɛ tɔɔta vɔɛ̃ ni, minyi kĩ ovio lɔkɔ fuã.
Ade aye ntɛ mimɔ́ kĩ fɔtsa a kĩĩ do kaya awɛ pɛ, minyi kĩ lɔkɔ a fuã, ade liti liwo onyukpɛ̃ malo a.
Ɔnɔkɔali a mabi mi kĩ mi lɛtsã babi a flee lɛláaku fɔmɔ fɔtsa kĩĩ flee aaya nɛ foe kamɛ.
Tite mɔ ode flee aayatɛ̃, lɛmɛ yĩ kalɛ a kɔ̃ lɛláatɛ̃ da.
“Lɛmɛ luwi a ĩye ɔdɔũ a, odima linyína de. Ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a mɔ Baguma Obi mɔawɛ a malo linyína, mbɔɛntɛ Ɔlɛga a odi keĩ nyina.
Midã kadã wĩ mina nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ minyína luwi a kĩ de akũ lɔkɔ a aawo ɔtɔ.
Fɔ́ana ndɛ ayekĩ onyole odi naa osi akũ, ade ɛfɔnɛ ye tɔtɔ eyi ye basumunɛ a. Ɛkpa odi nyɛ odi ye kɔbɛ̃ mɔ adzuma kĩ ɛkɛna. Ke liti a, esi onyukpɛ̃ ɔdãmɛnanɛ a mbla kĩ ɛna nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ.
“Nɛ foesũ mina nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ minyína lɔkɔ a kĩ tɔtɔ ɔlate a aaya. Fɔ́apuli fɔnya olobe lɔkɔ ĩye lɛnyɛ kayite ĩye odenyinawi ĩye ɔnɔnɛ.
Ntɛ ɛyafuta mi ni, ɛtayaamɔ mi kĩ miwaa tida.
Lɛtsa a kĩ mabi mi a, ade foe mɔapɛ a mabi bati flee kĩ mina nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ.”

Kite fuwi nviã kĩ Yudafɔ aanya Wuda Katɛ̃ Luwi, kĩ bate anɛ nɛ be kadzakũ nɛ Egipte akũ a, mɔ Abodoo Kĩ Ɛtáyila Luwi. Basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a mɔ mbla batsanɛ kawɛ osi a kĩ baatsã nɛ kabɛla kamɛ bipi Yesu bɛkɔ ye.
Bɛlɛ kĩ, “Kɛtánɛ kĩ bɔkɛna foe nɛ fuwi kanya a kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ bati aado ɔtutũ nɛ ɔmaĩ a kamɛ.”

Yesu na nɛ Betania ɔmatɔ kamɛ nɛ Simon kĩ ɛsɔ tɔ̃ fɔsɔ ngbã a awã. Kĩ Yesu dzi ɛkanya a, otsole odi kĩ ɛnɛɛ tumpã kĩ eyi mɔ kugua mɔ ɔlɛ̃ kĩ kɔtɛ kɔya paa a wo nɛ kɔla a kamɛ. Otsole a binya tumpã a ade etsokui kugua a flee eko nɛ Yesu lɔlɔ kamɛ a.
Ade bati a kĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ awã a badi na kalɔkpa bɛlɛ kĩ, “Litsa sũ yabula kugua mɔ kɔya kĩĩ kade?
Baapuli bɛnɔ kugua mɔ ɔlɛ̃ kĩĩ fɔba sika ovoe fɔbɔ ɔha ɛlalɛ, lɔkɔa bɛkɔa se bɛkpa ahiãfɔ.” Nɛ foe sũ, bɛkã ye anɛ mɔ ɔsĩ.
Lɛmɛ Yesu lɛ kĩ, “Mifɔnɛ ye awɛ. Litsa sũ miaha ye? Ɛkɛna lɛtsa wĩ ɛkpa yĩ.
Ahiãfɔ aana nɛ mi kamɛ daa, ade míapuli mibumɛna be lɔkɔ kĩ miawɛ a. Yĩ kɔ̃ nláana nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ daa.
Otsole a kɛna lɛtsa kĩ yaapuli. Ɛnya lɔtɔ ɛtsɛla yĩ sukɛna kugua kĩ yamanɛ yĩ eyi ɛkpa yĩ kabila.
Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ kĩ baade Kalɛ Wĩ a lɛtsã nɛ katinya kamɛ flee ni, baalɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ lɛtsa kĩ otsole kĩĩ kɛna a akũ bɛkɔa bite ye anɛ.”
Ke liti a, Yuda Iskariot kĩ ɛnyɛ fɔtɔ banyanɛ ewua-nviã a kamɛ ɔmɔa naa Yudafɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a sɛkɛ̃ kĩ yaanyɛ Yesu ɛkpa be.
Kawɔlɛ de be nɛ fɔlɛtsa a akũ, ade be malo bike otse kĩ baakpa ye sika a. Foesũ Yuda kawɛ osi a kĩ yaatsã ɛnyɛ ye ɛkpa be.
Nɛ Abodoo Kĩ Ɛtáyila Kanya Luwi lɛtɔnyade a kĩ bakɔ Wuda Katɛ̃ Kavelibi a akũ a, Yesu fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a via ye kĩ, “Ndia awɛ kĩ bɔlɔla bɔkpa nɔ luwi a funitsã kanya?”
Ade Yesu do be kamɛ bati nviã, mɔ ɔlɛdo kĩ, “Minaa ɔmatɔ a kamɛ, oti odi kĩ ɛnɔnɛ kugumi aatsɛlamɔ mi. Mitomɔ ye miwo nɛ tɔtɔ a kĩ te kamɛ yaawo a,
lɔkɔa mibi tɔtɔ ɔlate a kĩ, ‘Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ a bo, “Ndia banɔvɔɛ̃ kɔla a kĩ bɔmɔ yĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a aanya Wuda Katɛ̃ funitsã a deĩ?” ’
Ade yaatsa mi abansulu kɔla baũ awã kĩ bɛhɛhɛ biyi kɔkɔɛ. Milɔla awã mikpa boe funitsã a kanya.”
Fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a dzakũ bɛnaa ɔmatɔ a kamɛ, ade bɛnamɔ fɔtsa flee ndɛ ayekĩ Yesu bi be a. Ade bɛtɔ Wuda Katɛ̃ funitsã a nɛ awã a.
Kĩ olobe wo ɔtɔ a, Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ewua-nviã ya nɛ awã.
Ade kĩ bidzi banya a Yesu lɛ kĩ, “Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ mi kamɛ ɔmɔa, kĩ bɔmɔ ye budzi bɔanya aanyɛ yĩ ɛkpa.”
Fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ ha be, ade bɛkavia ye ɔmɔa ɔmɔa kĩ, “Yĩ manɛ mbɔɛɛ?”
Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ɛnyɛ mi ewua-nviã a kamɛ ɔmɔa, oti a kĩ ye awɛ deĩ nɛ sɔɔdaɛ kamɛ mɔ yĩ a.
Otidziwa Obi a anaaku ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ nɛ ye akũ a. Lɛmɛ bɔbɔɛ makpa oti a kĩ yaanyɛ Otidziwa Obi a ɛkpa a. Ntɛ bɛtama oti a na ni, kufɛ fɔnɛnɛ fɔkpa ye.”
Ade kĩ bɛkanya a, Yesu bɔɛ abodoo, ɛnyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ nɛ ye akũ, ade ebuli ye ɛkpa ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a, ɛlɛ kĩ, “Mitɛ minya, ade yĩ sukɛna a.”
Ke liti a, ɛbɔɛ kɔɔpu mɔ waĩ, ɛnyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ, ɛkɔa ɛkpa be flee bɛkate kamɔa.
Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Ade fukĩĩ nyɛ yĩ apam babɔanɛ a kĩ biwula nɛ bati pii lɔlɔ a.
Ɔnɔkɔali a mabi mi kĩ nláabuki mmɔa waĩ adima kɛnaawo luwi a kĩ maamɔa waĩ vɔɛ̃ nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a.”
Ke liti a, bɛsã tɔnɔ bimu Baguma, ade bɛnɛ bɛnaa Kugua Futse Ɔtɔ a akũ a.
Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mi a flee míalo mifɔnɛ yĩ, kitonɛkĩ bɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ,
‘Maakɔ baveli akũ ɔdãmɛnanɛ a,
ade ye baveli a flee aapansam a.’
Lɛmɛ ntɛ bɛdzɛla yĩ ndzi nkpã ni, maanya mi lɔtɔ nɛ Galilea.”
Ade Petro bi ye kĩ, “Yĩ kɔ̃, nláalo nfɔnɛ nɔ da, ntɛ be nkaɛ a flee lo malo!”
Yesu bi Petro kĩ, “Mabi nɔ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ fɔmɔ ɔkɔkɔ aabe titi nviã lɛnyɛ kĩĩ ni, aalɛ titi ɛlalɛ kĩ onyína yĩ.”
Lɛmɛ Petro buki ebi ye mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ, “Ntɛ kɛnɛ kĩ bɔmɔ nɔ buku malo ni, nláalɛ kĩ ĩnyína nɔ!” Fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a flee lɛ kalɛ mɔapɛ a.
Bɛyawo kakɔ kadi kĩ bavɛ Getsemane, ade Yesu bi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Midzi nɛ awĩ lɔkɔa nnaabɔa mpaɛ.”
Ade ɛkpã Petro, Yakobo mɔ Yohanes ebumɔ ye akũ a. Kalɔɛ mɔ libe wo nɛ ye kamɛ, ɛkatila bliblibli,
ade ɛdani ebi be kĩ, “Ayɔlɔhɔ tɛ yĩ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ paa ndɛ maku. Midzi nɛ awĩ, mikaadã fɔkɔ.”
Kĩ ɛnaa lɔtɔ sukuloo a, ɛka ɛtsa nɛ tite ɛbɔa mpaɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ fɔ́adã bɔɛɛ ni, lubo kamɔ lɔkɔ kĩĩ lɛtɛ̃ nɛ yĩ akũ.”
Ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nda, yĩ Ɔlɛga, apuli kakɛna lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa. Nyɛ lubo kamɔ kɔɔpu kĩĩ nɛ yĩ akũ. Lɛmɛ nnɛ́ lɛtsa a kĩ mawɛ, mbom lɛtsa a kĩ nɔ awɛ.”
Ke liti a, emuniki ɛyamɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ɛlalɛ a kĩ bɛwa tida. Ebi Simon Petro kĩ, “Simon, tida ɔwaa? Ɔtápuli odzi ɔdã fɔkɔ dɔũhuilɛ mɔapɛ malo?”
Ade ebi be kĩ, “Mina nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ lɔkɔa mikaabɔa mpaɛ ayekĩ miláawo nɛ sɔhuiɛ kamɛ. Hũhũ a awɛ lɛmɛ sukɛna a kɔ̃ lɛlá kɔbɛ̃.”
Yesu buki emuniki ɛnabɔa mpaɛ ɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa mɔapɛ a.
Ebuki emuniki ɛnaa ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a sɛkɛ̃ ɛnamɔ kĩ bɛwa tida. Bɛtápuli bibinya anɛ, tida deĩ nɛ be anɛ ade bɛtányi lɛtsa kĩ balɛ bɛnyɛ be akũ onukpɛ̃ a.
Kĩ ebuki emuniki ɛya lɛlalɛde a, evia be kĩ, “Tida mibuki miwaa miawɛya? Fɔlɛ! Ɔdɔũ a wo ɔtɔ! Midã, bɛkɔa Otidziwa Obi a, bado nɛ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ awɛ.
Miyidza mifɔ̃ bɔnaa. Midã oti a kĩ yaanyɛ yĩ ɛkpa a fuã.”

Yesu buki ɛlamɔ kɔdzɛla fɔmɔ Yuda kĩ ɛnyɛ be ewua-nviã a kamɛ ɔmɔa yanɛ ɛta. Bati kɔdabu a kĩ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ mbla batsanɛ mɔ ɔmatɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ nyɛ bibu a tomɔ ye, ade bɛnɛɛ fɔpamɛ glɛlɛ glɛlɛ mɔ titse fukũ a.
Oti a kĩ ɛnyɛ ye ɛkpa a kpa be nsɛntsɛlɛni eyi kĩ, “Oti a kĩ míamɔ kĩ ndzɛmɛ ye onukpɛ̃ a ni, ade ye nɛ awã a. Mipi ye mikpã minamɛna, lɔkɔa mi anɛ ɛna nɛ ye akũ.”
Kĩ Yuda sila ewo awã a, ɛnaa Yesu sɛkɛ̃ ɛvɛ ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ!” ade ɛdzɛmɛ ye onukpɛ̃ a.
Foesũ bipi Yesu, ade bipini ye kɔɔba a.
Lɛmɛ bati a kĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ awã kamɛ ɔmɔa vɛlɛ ye kɔpã ɛnyɛ ɛbaa Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a ɔsumunɛ sɔtɔ emuni.
Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Fusĩ kĩ mialɛ apã mɔ titse fukũ miya kĩ miaayapi yĩ ndɛ tɔkpa ɔkɛnanɛ manɛ?
Luwi daa mana nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ, katsa fɔtsa, lɛmɛ mitápi yĩ. Lɛmɛ kɛnɛ kĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa fɔlɛtsa a fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ.”
Ade ke ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a flee lo bɛfɔnɛ ye a.
Nɛ lɔkɔ a kamɛ a, opopobi odi kĩ esua aklala lima odi akũ tomɛna Yesu. Bati a wɛ kĩ bapi ye,
lɛmɛ ɛwɔlɔ ye lima edo be nɛ awɛ, ade elo mɔ ɔdzɔ a.
Ade bɛkpã Yesu bɛnamɛna Yudafɔ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a tɔtɔ kamɛ, awã kĩ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃, ɔmatɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ a kpɔta a.
Petro tomɛna nɛ liti flee, ɛyawo nɛ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a lɔwabe. Ɛkɛna akũ edzi nɛ basumunɛ a ɔwɛ̃ bɛkawa fi.
Yudafɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ fɔlɛtsa badzɛnɛ a kĩ bidzi nɛ awã wɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩ batsua bite nɛ Yesu akũ bɛkɔa bɛkɔ ye wuda kɔtɔ, lɛmɛ bɛtána fudima nɛ ye akũ.
Adansifɔ pii yama fɔvã bite nɛ ye akũ, lɛmɛ be adansiɛ kadi táketi mɔ akũ.
Ade bati badi yidza bɛdza bɛma fɔvã kĩ,
“Bunu kĩ ɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Maabubuli Asɔli Kɔla kĩĩ kĩ bike mɔ awɛ a, ade nɛ fuwi ɛlalɛ liti ni, maake kɔbɛbã kĩ nnɛ́ awɛ bɛkɔa bike.’ ”
Lɛmɛ bati kĩĩ adansiɛ malo táketi mɔ akũ.
Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a yidza ɛdza nɛ bati a flee anɛ, ade evia Yesu kĩ, “Ɔláanyɛ onukpɛ̃ nɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛlamɔ kalɛ katia nɔ a?”
Lɛmɛ Yesu sua onukpɛ̃ ɛtálɛ kadima.
Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a buki evia ye kĩ, “Nɔ nyɛ Kristo, Nhila Ɔlate a Obi a?”
Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Ye manɛ, ade míamɔ Otidziwa Obi a kĩ edzi nɛ Baguma Kpale a sɔmɔna, ade yaato ode ɛya nɛ luflututu kamɛ a!”
Nɛ awã a, Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a bɛ̃ ye atadiɛ kamɛ nɛ kalɔkpa kamɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Bɔtábuki busĩ ɔdansini odima!
Minu ye mbusuo fɔlɛtsa a. Litsa nyɛ mi adzuni?”
Adeke be flee bitunɔ yɔ kĩ eku kɔtɔ ade ɛfɛta ɛkpa wuda a.
Be kamɛ badi yi kayɔ mɔ tanɛ katua kako nɛ Yesu akũ, badi sua ye anɛ, bɛkake ye fukpeni kavia ye kĩ, “Bi boe owula kĩ ɛbɔa nɔ!” Ade badãmɛnanɛ a kpã Yesu bɛbalɛbalɛ ye awɛ nɛ tɔlɔtɔ a.
Kĩ Petro buki edzi nɛ lɔwabe a, abawa adi nɛ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a tɔtɔ kamɛ a ya nɛ awã.
Kĩ ɛmɔ Petro kĩ edzi yawa fi a, ɛbɛ̃ anɛ ɛdã ye ade ebi ye kĩ, “Nɔ malo otomɛna Yesu Nazaretni a!”
Ade Petro sĩ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ĩnyína lɛtsama, ade maánu lɛtsa a kĩ alɛ a malo a!” Ade ɛnɛ ɛnaa onyukpɛ̃ a. Mɔ ye awã kawo pɛ mɔ ɔkɔkɔ nyɛ onukpɛ̃.
Abawa a buki ɛmɔ́ ye nɛ awã, ade edo bati a kĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ awã kabi awɛ kĩ, “Ɛnyɛ be kamɛ ɔmɔa!”
Lɛmɛ Petro buki esĩ.
Owi tábuna mɔ bikĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ awã bi ye kĩ, “Ɔláapuli osi kĩ ɔnyɛ́ be kamɛ ɔmɔa, kitonɛkĩ nɔ malo Galileani anɛ.”
Ade Petro do kadum mɔ katani awɛ kĩ, “Ntani kĩ ɔnɔkɔali malɛ, Baguma ɛvɛlɛ yĩ sɔtɔ ntɛ fɔvã mama. Ĩnyína oti a kĩ ye fɔlɛtsa milamɛna kalɛ a.”
Deedimɔapɛ ɔkɔkɔ be lɛyade, ade Petro te anɛ nɛ kalɛ a kĩ Yesu bi ye a akũ kĩ, “Fɔmɔ ɔkɔkɔ aabe titi nviã ni, aalɛ titi ɛlalɛ kĩ onyína yĩ.” Kĩ ɛmɔ ye akũ eyi ɔsũ a, ebe blobloblo.
Ɔnɔnɛ tutuutu a basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a, ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ a, mbla batsanɛ a mɔ fɔlɛtsa badzɛnɛ a tsɛna mɔatsɛ bɛnaa adzina nɛ Yesu akũ. Bisui Yesu nɛ tɔwɛ̃ kamɛ, bɛkpã ye bɛnado nɛ Pilato awɛ.
Awã naa, Pilato via Yesu kĩ, “Nɔ nyɛ Yudafɔ Lɛgã a?”
Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Oo, fɔla ndɛ ayekĩ ɔlɛ a.”
Basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a lɛ fɔlɛtsa pii bitsua Yesu onukpɛ̃.
Foesũ Pilato buki evia ye kĩ, “Ɔláakpa kalɛ a mbuayɛ? Tse fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛlamɛna katsua kate nɛ nɔ akũ a.”
Lɛmɛ Yesu tábuki ebinya onukpɛ̃ ade Pilato kɛna saa a.
Kateli nyɛ kateli, nɛ Wuda Katɛ̃ luwi kanya kamɛ a, Pilato afɔnɛ oti mɔa nɛ abãã kɔla bawanɛ a kamɛ, kĩ Yudafɔ via a awɛ kakpa be.
Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Baraba waa kɔla mɔ bati bɛbã badi. Bati a yidza bɛdza nɛ Roma Abãã akũ ade bɛkɔ bati nɛ foe kamɛ a.
Kĩ bati kɔdabu a kpɔta a, bivia Pilato kĩ ɛkɛna sɛmɛ kalɛ kĩ yawɛ kakɛna kateli nyɛ kateli a ɛkpa be.
Evia be kĩ, “Miáwɛ kĩ nfɔnɛ Yudafɔ Lɛgã a awɛ nkpa mi?”
Pilato via fukĩĩ kitonɛkĩ enyina yededeede kĩ lineke sũ mɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a kɔa Yesu bido nɛ ye awɛ.
Lɛmɛ Yudafɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ kɔa bido nɛ bati kɔdabu a kamɛ kĩ bivia Pilato ɛfɔnɛ Baraba mbom awɛ ɛkpa be.
Pilato buki evia bati kɔdabu a kĩ, “Kekɔ̃ litsa miawɛ kĩ nkɛna oti a kĩ miavɛ kĩ Yudafɔ Lɛgã a?”
Ade bɛbɔa fɔwɔla bibi ye kĩ, “Bɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ!”
Pilato via be kĩ, “Litsa tɔkpa ɛkɛna?”
Ade be flee bɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba kĩ, “Bɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ!”
Pilato wɛ kĩ yakɛna nɛ bati kɔdabu a kawɛ akũ ɛkpa be, foesũ ɛfɔnɛ Baraba awɛ ɛkpa be, ade kĩ ɛfɔ̃ sodzafɔ bo Yesu paa mɔ mpile biyu a, ɛkɔa ye ɛkpa sodzafɔ a kĩ bɛnaabɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ.
Sodzafɔ a kpã Yesu biwomɛna nɛ abãã ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a tɔtɔ a lɔwabe, ade bɛvɛ sodzafɔ nkaɛ a bɛyakpɔta a.
Ade bɛkɔa lima ngbã atadiɛ wulaa bido ye, bɛnɔ fɔtsɔlɛwɛ lɔbɔɛ bɛtsa ye a.
Adeke bɛkawɔ̃na ye kĩ, “Yiiduu! Yudafɔ Lɛgã, lidzi nkpã gɛlɛɛlɛ!”
Bibo ye nɛ lɔlɔ mɔ otse, bitua tanɛ biko nɛ ye akũ, ade bike aduli bɛkɛna fɔlɔ bɛkpa ye a.
Kĩ bidi ye nsekuo biyua a, bɛnyɛ atadiɛ ngbã a nɛ ye akũ, bimuniki mɔ ye mɔawɛ tide bido ye. Ke liti a, bɛkpã ye bɛnɛmɛna kĩ banaabɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ.

Kĩ banaa a, bɛtsɛlamɛna onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Simon kĩ eto akula adi kamɛ yanaa ɔmatɔ kamɛ. Ade sodzafɔ a hɛ ye kĩ ɛtɛ Yesu asendua a ɛlɔ a. Simon kĩĩ to Kireneni ɔmatɔ a, ade ɛnyɛ Aleksandro mɔ Rufo ɔlɛga a.
Bɛkpã Yesu bɛnamɛna kakɔ kadi kĩ bavɛ Golgata, kĩ foe kayɔ nyɛ oti lɔlɔ fɔtsɔ̃.
Ade awã bɛkpa ye waĩ kĩ bɛtsɛkamɔ otsonu kĩ yadina akũ kawo kĩ ɛmɔa a, lɛmɛ Yesu támɔa be.
Sodzafɔ a bɔa Yesu nɛ asendua akũ ade bɛta bavulibi nɛ ye tɛtadiɛ akũ bɛmɔ́ ekĩ yaanya odi nyɛ odi ade a.
Bɛbɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ nɛ ɔnɔnɛ tɔdɔũ evedi kamɛ.
Ade bɛtsɛlɛ ye onukpɛ̃ katsua fɔlɛtsa bɛbɔa nɛ ye lɔlɔ nyangɛ kĩ, “Yudafɔ Lɛgã a.”
Bɛbɔa bayekpanɛ nviã lɛmɛ nɛ asendua akũ bibumɔ Yesu, ɔmɔa nɛ ye sɔmɔna, ɔyade nɛ ye sɛbã.
Nɛ osi kĩĩ akũ, lɛtsa a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ a ya nɛ foe kamɛ kĩ, “Bibu ye bido nɛ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ kamɛ.”
Bati a kĩ bɛkatɛ̃ a kpɔkpa fɔlɔ ade bivũna Yesu kĩ, “Ao! Nɔ a kĩ ɔlɛ kĩ aaveli Asɔli Kɔla a obuki oke kɔbɛbã nɛ fuwi ɛlalɛ liti a nɛ awĩ a?
Duma nɛ asendua akũ, kanyɛ nɔ akũ!”
Ade ayea Yudafɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ mbla batsanɛ a lɛmɛ di ye nsekuo bɛkabi akũ kĩ, “Ɛtɛ bati bɛbã nkpã, lɛmɛ yaápuli ɛtɛ ye mɔawɛ akũ.
Mifɔ̃ Kristo, Israelfɔ Lɛgã a eduma nɛ asendua akũ finyaa bɔmɔ lɔkɔa bɔtɛ ye budo” Ade bati nviã a kĩ bɛbɔa nɛ asendua akũ bibumɔ Yesu a, lɛmɛ vũna ye a.
Kĩ suwa tɔdɔũ ewua-nviã bɔa a, katinya kamɛ flee ke ɔtũ, kɛnawo tɔdɔũ ɛlalɛ kamɛ.
Nɛ tɔdɔũ ɛlalɛ kamɛ a, Yesu bɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba ɛlɛ nɛ Hebri tide kamɛ kĩ, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabaktani?” Foe kayɔ nyɛ, “Yĩ Baguma! Yĩ Baguma! Litsa sũ ɔfɔnɛ yĩ awɛ?”
Bati a kĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ awã a badi nu lɛtsa kĩ ɛlɛ a, ade bɛlɛ kĩ, “Mitse! Yavɛ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Eliya.”

Be kamɛ ɔmɔa wula atsɛ ɛnabɔɛ kanyinya butubu ɔsapɔ kĩ edo nɛ waĩ mɔ ɔnyɛ kamɛ ade ɛdɛla mɔ otse ɛkpa Yesu kĩ ɛmɔa a. Ade oti a kalɛ kĩ, “Midza, mifɔ̃ bɔdã ntɛ Eliya aaka ɛyaanyɛ ye nɛ asendua a akũ!”
Yesu buki ɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba ade ɛmɛna onukpɛ̃ a.
Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ pɛ, Asɔli Kɔla lima kpale a kĩ litsua koe kamɛ a bɛ̃ nɛ kayite, kito nyangɛ kɛyawo kayɔ.
Ade kĩ sodzafɔ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ ɛdza ɛtsɛlamɛna asendua a nu Yesu fɔwɔla kabɔa mɔ ayekĩ eku a, ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nuwĩ fɔanɛ kĩ oti kĩĩ nyɛ Baguma Obi.”
Batsole badi lɛmɛ dza mɔ lugo bɛkadã. Be kamɛ badi nyɛ Maria Magdalani, Salome mɔ Maria kĩ ye babi nyɛ Yakobo obisɛ̃de a mɔ Yose.
Lɔkɔ a kĩ Yesu na nɛ Galilea, ade be lɛkatomɔ ye bɛkabumɔ ye a. Batsole bɛbã pii kĩ bitomɔ ye bɛya nɛ Yerusalem a lɛmɛ na nɛ awã.
Fɔtsa kĩĩ flee ya nɛ luwi kĩ lɛnya Kawɛya Luwi a lɔtɔ. Nɛ olobe lɔkɔ a,

Yosef kĩ eto Arimatia ɔmatɔ a ya. Ɛnyɛ oti kĩ edeĩ obu nɛ fɔlɛtsa badzɛnɛ a kamɛ, ade edzi yadã Baguma Lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kaya anɛ a. Yosef do ɔwɔlɛ ɛnaa Pilato sɛkɛ̃ eke ye aduli evia kĩ ɛfɔnɛ Yesu ɔnɔkpa a awɛ ɛkpa ye.
Fɔkɛna Pilato wãwã kĩ enu kĩ Yesu ku kɔkɔɛ. Foesũ ɛvɛ sodzafɔ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ evia ye kĩ nuwĩ Yesu ku kɔkɔɛ.
Ade kĩ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a bi ye ɔnɔkɔali a, Pilato kpa Yosef osi kĩ ɛnaavɛnya ɔnɔkpa a.
Ade Yosef naya aklala, ade kĩ ɛnavɛnya Yesu ɔnɔkpa a, esuli ye nɛ lima a kamɛ. Ɛkɔa ye ɛwɔla nɛ linikɛ kĩ bɛnyɛ nɛ de ɔkɛ kamɛ, ade emilinya de kpale ɛbalɛ linikɛ a onukpɛ̃ a.
Maria Magdalani mɔ Maria kĩ ɛnyɛ Yose ɔma a dza bɛkadã, ade bɛmɔ́ awã kĩ bɛkɔa Yesu ɔnɔkpa a bibila a.
Kĩ Kawɛya Luwi a wũna a, Maria Magdalani, Maria Yakobo ɔma mɔ Salome bɛnaya klubɔũ kĩ banaatsɛla Yesu ɔnɔkpa a.
Nɛ Ɛkwansieda ɔnɔnɛ tutuutu a, kĩ suwa de a, biyidza bɛnaa linikɛ a akũ.
Kĩ banaa a, bɛkavia akũ kĩ, “Owei aamilinya de kpale a nɛ linikɛ a onukpɛ̃ ɛkpa boe?” De a pɔnɛ lububu paa. Kĩ bɛdzɛla anɛ bɛdã a, bɛmɔ́ kĩ bimilinya de a biyi nɛ ɔɔwɛ̃ kɔkɔɛ.
Kĩ banaa a, bɛkavia akũ kĩ, “Owei aamilinya de kpale a nɛ linikɛ a onukpɛ̃ ɛkpa boe?” De a pɔnɛ lububu paa. Kĩ bɛdzɛla anɛ bɛdã a, bɛmɔ́ kĩ bimilinya de a biyi nɛ ɔɔwɛ̃ kɔkɔɛ.
Foesũ biwo nɛ linikɛ a kamɛ. Adeke bɛmɔ́ opopo odi kĩ edo atadiɛ wulaa fitaa edzi nɛ sɔmɔna sɛmakɛ, ade bɛbɔa oblia.
Opopo a bi be kĩ, “Mitavila. Yesu Nazaretni a kĩ bɛbɔa nɛ asendua akũ a, miawɛ. Ɛláa awĩ kĩĩ. Eyidza edzi nkpã! Midã, ade awĩ bɛkɔa ye bɛwɔla a.
Minaabi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a mɔ Petro lɛmɛ kĩ, ‘Yesu nyaa mi lɔtɔ yanaa Galilea, ade awã míamɔ ye ndɛ ayekĩ ebi mi eyi a.’ ”
Foesũ batsole a nɛ bilo atsɛ bɛdzakũ nɛ linikɛ a ɔwɛ̃ nɛ libe mɔ kukũtila kamɛ. Bɛtábi odima kadima kitonɛkĩ bɛkavila.
Kĩ Yesu yidza eto banɔkpa kamɛ nɛ Ɛkwansieda ɔnɔnɛ tutuutu a, ɛnya lɔtɔ ɛnyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa Maria Magdalani, kĩ ye kamɛ ɛblɔmɛna hũhũ kpa evũkɔnɔ etomɛna a.
Ade ye lɛnabi bikĩ bitomɔ Yesu tɔ̃ a fɔlɛtsa a. Bati kĩĩ dzi bɛkabe ayɔlɔhɔ nɛ ye wuda a akũ.
Lɛmɛ kĩ Maria bi be kĩ Yesu yidza edzi nkpã, ade kĩ ɛmɔ́ ye malo ni, bɛtátɛ ye bido.
Fukĩĩ liti a, Yesu nyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ nviã kĩ Bito Yerusalem banaa akula, lɛmɛ bɛtámɔ ye biyi ɔsũ nɛ kayɔkayi a.
Bimuniki bɛnabi be nkaɛ a, lɛmɛ be malo bɛtátɛ bido.
Ke liti a, Yesu nyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ewua-odi a kĩ bidzi banya. Lɛmɛ ɛkã be anɛ kĩ bɛtána katɛkado, mɔ kĩ bɛna atɔ ɔsĩ, bɛtátɛ bati a kĩ bɛmɔ́ kĩ ye edzi nkpã a lɛmɛ bido a.
Ebi be kĩ, “Minaa katinya kamɛ flee minaalɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a mikpa batidziwa flee.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ edo, ɛtɛ mui kawɔla lɛmɛ ni, baatɛ ye nkpã, lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtátɛ edo ni, baakɔ ye kɔtɔ.
Baguma aakpa batɛ badonɛ a kɔbɛ̃ bɛkɛna awãwã fɔtsa. Baablɔmɛna hũhũ kpa bɛnɛmɛna nɛ yĩ dĩ akũ, baalɛ tide vɔɛ̃.
Ade ntɛ bipi kɔɛ ĩye bɛmɔa otsonu kpa ni, fɔláakɛna be lɛtsama. Ntɛ bite awɛ nɛ basɔnɛ akũ ni, baana akũ ɔsĩ.”
Ke liti a, kĩ boe Ɔlate Yesu lɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ be eyua a, bɛbɔɛ ye bɛnamɛna nɛ ode ade ɛnadzi nɛ Baguma sɔmɔna a.
Ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a nalɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ. Boe Ɔlate a kɛna adzuma mɔ be, ɛkɔa awãwã fɔtsa a kĩ bɛkakɛna a ete de kĩ be fɔlɛtsa a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali.
Luke: Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Tiofilo, bati pii bɔa mbɔdi ayekĩ baapuli, bɛtsɛlɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya nɛ boe kamɛ a biyi.
Bɛtsɛlɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bibi boe a, ndɛ ayekĩ binu bitomɛna bikĩ bɛmɔ́ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ bamɛ kito anɛ kayɔkayi a, ade bide lɛtsã nɛ foe akũ a.
Foesũ, Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Tiofilo, nɛ ayekĩ yĩ mɔawɛ a ntsã fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ flee kamɛ kito kayɔkayi a sũ ni, nkɔna kĩ fɔnɛnɛ kĩ matsɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa a pɛpɛɛpɛ mma nɔ.
Nkɛna fukĩĩ ayekĩ aanyi ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a nɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛtsa nɔ a flee kamɛ.
Nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ Herodes kanya lɛgã nɛ Yudea tite akũ a, Yudafɔ ɔsɔfɔ odi na kĩ bavɛ Zakaria. Eto ɔsɔfɔ katsu a kĩ bavɛ Abiya a kamɛ. Ɔtsɔ̃ dĩ nyɛ Elizabet kĩ ye malo eto ɔsɔfɔ Aaron kasinu a kamɛ.
Ɔtsɔ̃ mɔ ɔnyɔ kĩĩ dzi nkpã wĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ, ade bɛkadi ye tɛbla mɔ nhihiɛ akũ pɛpɛɛpɛ a.
Bati kĩĩ táma obi odima kitonɛkĩ Elizabet nya oduko, ade bati nviã a lɛmɛ dɛ a.
Luwi a Zakaria kakɛna ye tɔsɔfɔ adzuma nɛ Yudafɔ afɔliɛ kabɔakɔ̃, kitonɛkĩ be katsu a akũ fuke.
Nɛ be basɔfɔ adzuma kakɛna onukpɛ̃ a, biwole ade fɔyake nɛ Zakaria akũ, kĩ ɛnaate ɔnyɔ mɔ ɔlɛ̃ ɛkpa Baguma nɛ ye afɔlibɔ atɛnyɛ a akũ. Foesũ ewo ɛnaa Yudafɔ afɔliɛ kabɔakɔ̃ a.
Lɔkɔ a kĩ ɛkate ɔnyɔ a, bati nkaɛ a ko nɛ kanya bɛkabɔa mpaɛ.
Boe Ɔlate ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ odi nyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa ye nɛ ɔnyɔ katekɔ̃ a sɔmɔna sɛmakɛ.
Kĩ Zakaria mɔ́ ye a, ɛbɔa obili ade libe wo ye paa a.
Lɛmɛ Baguma ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a bi ye kĩ, “Zakaria, tavila! Baguma nu nɔ mpaɛbɔ, nɔ ɔtsɔ̃ Elizabet aama obinyole ɛkpa nɔ. Aate ye dĩ kĩ Yohanes.
Kawɔlɛ aade nɔ paa, ade ayea kawɔlɛ aade bati pii lɛmɛ ntɛ bɛma ye a.
Yaanya oti kpale nɛ Baguma anɛ. Kɛtánɛ kĩ yamɔa waĩ ĩye bavɛ mɔ ɔsĩ. Ade kito ye kama kamɛ ni, Hũhũ Kpalɛwa aatɛ ye kamɛ.
Ade ye aanya oti kĩ yaamunikimɔ Israelfɔ bati pii ɛyamɛna nɛ be Ɔlate Baguma a sɛkɛ̃ a.

Yaanya boe Ɔlate kaya a lɔtɔ ɛna hũhũ mɔ kɔbɛ̃ ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Eliya na a. Yaalɔla babi mɔ balɛga kayite. Yaadani bikĩ bideĩ atɔ ɔsĩ bɛna adzuni ndɛ bikĩ bakɛna tuwĩ. Fukĩĩ aafɔ̃ boe Ɔlate bati lɛna nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ bɛkpa ye.”
Ade Zakaria via ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a kĩ, “Nde maakɛna ĩnyi kĩ fukĩĩ aaya nɛ foe kamɛ? Kitonɛkĩ ndɛ, ade yĩ ɔtsɔ̃ lɛmɛ dɛ a.”
Baguma fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Yĩ nyɛ Gabriel kĩ madza nɛ Baguma anɛ. Ade ye lido yĩ kĩ ĩyaabi nɔ ɔlɛdo wĩ kĩĩ a.
Lɛmɛ ɔtátɛ yĩ ɔlɛdo odo, kĩ yaaya nɛ foe kamɛ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ Baguma hihiɛ eyi a. Nɛ foesũ aatɔ lumumu, ɔláapuli ɔlɛ kɔdzɛla kɛnaawo luwi a kĩ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ nlɛ ĩyi kĩĩ a aaya nɛ foe kamɛ.”
Nɛ lɔkɔ a kamɛ a, bati a kĩ bɛna nɛ kanya bɛkadzɔlɛ Zakaria kɛna saa, ade bɛkabu lɔlɔ kamɛ nɛ lɛtsa a sũ kĩ ebuna owi beblebee nɛ afɔliɛ kabɔakɔ̃ a.
Kĩ Zakaria nɛ ɛya a, ɛtábuki epuli ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ be. Foesũ bɛmɔ́ biyi ɔsũ kĩ ɛmɔ kanyɛkatsa kadi nɛ afɔliɛ kabɔakɔ̃ a. Kĩ ɛtɔ lumumu sũ ni awɛ ɛkɔa ɛkakɛna nsɛntsɛlɛni katsa be.
Kĩ Zakaria yua ye adzuma nɛ Yudafɔ afɔliɛ kabɔakɔ̃ a, ɛdzakũ ɛnaa ɔtɔ.
Ke liti a, Elizabet yatsãmɔ kɔma ade ɛtábuki ɛnɛ kanya a. Ɛkɔla ye akũ tidetɔ elo flee.
Adeke Elizabet lɛ kĩ, “Finyaakĩĩ ni, Baguma bumɔ yĩ ade ɛnyɛ yĩ kɔnyɔã nɛ bati anɛ a.”
Nɛ tidetɔ evũ liti a, Baguma do ye ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ Gabriel ɛnaa Galilea ɔmatɔ odi kĩ bavɛ Nazaret kamɛ.
Ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ kĩĩ kɔa ɔlɛdo ɛma oyitsɔ̃ kĩ bitinya bɛkpa onyole kĩ bavɛ Yosef, kĩ ɛnyɛ Lɛgã Dawid kasinu a kamɛ obi. Oyitsɔ̃ a dĩ nyɛ Maria.
Ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a ya nɛ Maria sɛkɛ̃ ade ebi ye kĩ, “Oyitsɔ̃, mawɔ̃na nɔ nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ! Nɔ oti kĩ bɛmɔ́ kɔnya, boe Ɔlate tomɔ nɔ!”
Ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ ɔlɛdo a fɔ̃ Maria kɛna basaa, ade evia ye akũ kĩ, “Litsa kawɔ̃na nɛ awĩ a?”
Ade ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a bi ye kĩ, “Maria, tavila. Baguma mɔ́ nɔ kɔnya.
Aatsãmɔ kɔma ɔma obinyole, lɔkɔa aate ye dĩ kĩ Yesu.
Yaatɛ dĩ paa kĩ bati aavɛ ye kĩ Baguma Nɛ Ode Flee Obi. Boe Ɔlate aadzina ye lɛgã ndɛ ɔwanyɔ Dawid aye.
Ade yaanya lɛgã nɛ Yakob babi mɔ bawa akũ daa a. Ye lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a lɛláawũna dadaada.”
Awã naa Maria bi Baguma ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a kĩ, “Nde fukĩĩ aapuli fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ nɛ lɔkɔ kĩ ĩnyína onyole a?”
Ade ke ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a bi ye kĩ, “Hũhũ Kpalɛwa ayako nɛ nɔ akũ ade Baguma kɔbɛ̃ aatɛ nɔ kamɛ a. Foesũ obi kpalɛwa a kĩ aama a ni, baavɛ ye kĩ Baguma Obinyole.
Mawɛ kĩ kai nɔ akũ oti kĩ bavɛ Elizabet. Bati alɛ kĩ ɛláama, lɛmɛ finyaakĩĩ ɛtsɛ̃mɔ kɔma. Edeĩ nɛ odetɔ ovũde kamɛ, titɔ kĩ ɛdɛ posoposo malo.
Kitonɛkĩ lɛtsama lɛláa kĩ Baguma lɛláapuli ɛkɛna.”
Ade Maria bi ye kĩ, “Dã, boe Ɔlate ɔsumunɛ manɛ. Fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ fɔkpa yĩ ndɛ ayekĩ ɔlɛ a.” Ade ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a dzakũ ɛfɔnɛ ye a.
Nɛ fuwi a na kamɛ a, Maria manɛ akũ, ɛwɛ sɔwa ɛnaa Zakaria awã nɛ Yudea ɔmatɔ odi kĩ edeĩ nɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ, ade ɛnawɔ̃na Elizabet a.
Nɛ fuwi a na kamɛ a, Maria manɛ akũ, ɛwɛ sɔwa ɛnaa Zakaria awã nɛ Yudea ɔmatɔ odi kĩ edeĩ nɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ, ade ɛnawɔ̃na Elizabet a.
Kĩ Elizabet nu Maria kawɔ̃na a, ye obi nɛ sɛmɛ kamɛ a kuna akũ, ade Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a tɛ Elizabet kamɛ a.
Ade awã na ɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba ɛlɛ kĩ, “Bihila nɔ nɛ batsole flee kamɛ, ade bihila nɔ sɛmɛ kamɛ obi a lɛmɛ a!
Yĩ nyɛ owei kĩ boe Ɔlate ɔma ya kĩ yayaawɔ̃na yĩ?
Lɔkɔ a kĩ nsila nnu nɔ kawɔ̃na pɛ, obi nɛ yĩ sɛmɛ kamɛ a kuna akũ mɔ kawɔlɛ.
Bihila nɔ paa kitonɛkĩ ɔtɛ odo kĩ Baguma ɔlɛdo a kĩ ɛlɛ nɛ nɔ akũ a aaya nɛ foe kamɛ.”
Awã naa Maria lɛ kĩ,
“Yĩ ɔwɔlɛ amu Baguma.
Ade kawɔlɛ ade yĩ hũhũ a, nɛ Baguma yĩ Ɔtɛnɛ a sũ,
kitonɛkĩ ete anɛ nɛ,
yĩ ye ɔsumunɛ kĩ ɛnyɛ́ lɛtsama akũ.
Kito finyaa kanaa ni, babi mɔ bawa flee aavɛ yĩ oti kĩ bihila ye,
kitonɛkĩ Baguma Otumifɔ kɛna fɔtsa kpale ɛkpa yĩ.
Ye dĩ akũ kpalɛ.
Ye kɔnyakamɔ waa,
kɛkpa babi mɔ bawa kĩ bavila ye a.
Ɛkɛna fɔtsa kpale,
ade ɛyalɛ bati a kĩ bɛdɛla be akũ nɛ ode mɔ be kakɔna flee a.
Ɛdzɛla fɔgã kĩ fudeĩ kɔbɛ̃ nɛ be fɔgãkpo akũ,
ade ɛdɛla bikĩ bɛdɔla be akũ a nɛ ode a.
Ɛkpa bikĩ kɔlɛ akɔ be a fɔtsa wĩ pii,
ade ɛfɔ̃ bikĩ bideĩ akũ a dzakũ mɔ awɛ pupulidza a.
Ete anɛ nɛ lɛtsa a
kĩ ɛlɛ eyi ɛkpa boe bawanyɔ a akũ,
ade ɛyaabumɔ ye ɔsumunɛ Israel a.
Ete anɛ, ɛmɔ Abraham kɔnya,
mɔ ye babi mɔ bawa kito finyaa flee kanaa!”
Ete anɛ nɛ lɛtsa a
kĩ ɛlɛ eyi ɛkpa boe bawanyɔ a akũ,
ade ɛyaabumɔ ye ɔsumunɛ Israel a.
Ete anɛ, ɛmɔ Abraham kɔnya,
mɔ ye babi mɔ bawa kito finyaa flee kanaa!”
Maria dzi nɛ Elizabet sɛkɛ̃ ndɛ tidetɔ ɛlalɛ fɔmɔ emuniki ɛnaa ɔtɔ.
Kĩ Elizabet aama a, ɛma obinyole.
Ye akũ bati mɔ banunɛ flee nu ayekĩ Baguma kɛna sɛmɛ kalɛ ɛkpa ye, foesũ be flee bɛmɔ́ kawɔlɛ paa mɔ ye.
Kĩ akɔkɔa a tɛ fuwi ɛlɛ̃ a, ye akũ bati ya kĩ batsua ye lɛkpati, ade bɛwɛ kĩ bakɔa ye ɔlɛga dĩ Zakaria bite ye a.
Lɛmɛ ɔma tátunɔ mɔ be, ade ebi be kĩ, “Ye dĩ aanya Yohanes.”
Ade awã mɔ bibi ye kĩ, “Odima táto nɔ kɔla kamɛ kĩ yanya dĩ a na.”
Nɛ foesũ bɛkɔa awɛ bɛkɛna nsɛntsɛlɛni bivia ɔlɛga kĩ ɛtsa dĩ a kĩ ɛwɛ kĩ yate obi.
Awã naa Zakaria via sileti ade ɛtsɛlɛ ete kĩ, “Ye dĩ nyɛ Yohanes.” Fɔkɛna be a flee saa.
Deedimɔapɛ Zakaria buki edo kɔdzɛla kalɛ awɛ ade emu Baguma a.
Libe wo ye banunɛ a flee ade fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ gba nɛ tɛmatɔ a kĩ tideĩ nɛ Yudea tɔtɔ kamɛ a flee a.
Fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kpa bati a kĩ binu foe a lɔlɔ kamɛ kabu, ade bivia be akũ kĩ, “Litsa odu obisɛ̃ kĩĩ aadani ɛkɛna?” Bivia foe kitonɛkĩ fɔwaa yedede kĩ Baguma kɔbɛ̃ tomɔ ye.
Hũhũ Kpalɛwa tɛ obisɛ̃ a ɔlɛga Zakaria kamɛ ade ɛlɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa eyi kĩ,
“Mifɔ̃ bumu boe Ɔlate, Israel Baguma,
kitonɛkĩ ɛyabumɔ ye kade bati, ade ɛnyɛ be nɛ tɔkpa kamɛ a.
Ɛkpa boe Ɔtɛnɛ kĩ edeĩ kɔbɛ̃,
oti kĩ ɛnyɛ ye osumunɛ Lɛgã Dawid kasinu a kamɛ obi.
Nɛ ayekĩ ɛlɛ eyi anɛ kɔkɔɛ ɛtsãmɛna ye onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ kpalɛwa a akũ,
kĩ yaanyɛ boe etomɛna bikĩ bapi boe osumbɔ
mɔ boe bakesĩnɛ flee awɛ kamɛ.
Ɛlɛ kĩ yaamɔ boe bawanyɔ kɔnya,
ade ete anɛ nɛ ye nhihiɛ kpalɛwa a kĩ ɛkɛna eyi a akũ a.
Yaakɛna nɛ fubo a kĩ ɛlɔ ɛkpa boe ɔwanyɔ Abraham,
kĩ yaanyɛ boe etomɛna boe bakesĩnɛ awɛ kamɛ a akũ,
ayekĩ bɔ́apuli busum Baguma nɛ katavila kamɛ,
Yaakɛna nɛ fubo a kĩ ɛlɔ ɛkpa boe ɔwanyɔ Abraham,
kĩ yaanyɛ boe etomɛna boe bakesĩnɛ awɛ kamɛ a akũ,
ayekĩ bɔ́apuli busum Baguma nɛ katavila kamɛ,
boe akũ lɛkpalɛ, budzi kadzi wĩ nɛ ye anɛ, nɛ boe nkpã fuwi flee kamɛ.
Nɔ, yĩ obi, bati aavɛ nɔ Baguma Nɛ Ode Flee Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ.
Ade nɔ aanya boe Ɔlate lɔtɔ lɔkɔa ɔlɔla osi ɔkpa ye kaya a.
Aabi ye bati kĩ baana katɛ
nɛ be titikpa kakɔakate kamɛ.
Boe Baguma deĩ sɛmɛ kalɛ mɔ ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ,
foesũ yaafɔ̃ katɛ ɔhaĩ a lide ɛkpa boe.
Yaafɔ̃ ɔhaĩ kĩĩ lɛyaako nɛ bati a kĩ bideĩ nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ,
mɔ bikĩ bideĩ nɛ wuda kuyo kamɛ a akũ,
lɔkɔa ɛkpã boe ɛtsãmɛna lukudɔ osi akũ.”
Obisɛ̃ a bo anɛ nɛ sukɛna mɔ hũhũ kamɛ. Edzi nɛ kɔsa kamɛ, kɛnawo luwi a kĩ ɛnyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa Israel kanade a.
Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ Kaisare Augusto si mbla kĩ bɛkã, bɛtsɛlɛ bati flee a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Roma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ tite akũ a buĩ.
Nɛ bati buĩ katsɛlɛ katɔnyade kĩĩ kamɛ a, abãã ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ kĩ bavɛ Kirenio lɛnya Siria tite akũ.
Nɛ mbla a sũ odi nyɛ odi naa ye ɔtɔ kĩ yanaatsɛlɛ dĩ.
Ade ke Yosef to Nazaret ɔmatɔ nɛ Galilea ɛnaa Betlehem ɔmatɔ nɛ Yudea tite akũ, awã kĩ bɛma Lɛgã Dawid lɛmɛ a. Yosef naa awã kitonɛkĩ ɛnya Lɛgã Dawid kasinu a kamɛ obi.
Bɛmɔ Maria kĩ bitinya bɛkpa ye a kĩ ɛtsɛ̃mɔ kɔma lɛmɛ a lɛnaa kĩ banaatsɛlɛ buĩ.
Kĩ bɛna nɛ Betlehem a, lɔkɔ wo ɔtɔ kĩ Maria ama.
Ɛma ye obinyole ɔtɔnyade, ade esuli obi a edo nɛ fumakũ kamɛ, ɛkɔa ɛwɔla nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ de kamɛ bayaɛ anya a kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ bɛtána kawakɔ̃ kadima nɛ banɔvɔɛ̃ kasekɔ̃ a.
Baveli bakpãnɛ badi na nɛ tite a kakɔ kadi lɛnyɛ a flee bɛkadã be bayaɛ akũ.
Deedimɔapɛ ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ odi nɛ ɛta nɛ be kayite ade Baguma kukũkpalɛ ko nɛ be akũ a. Nɛ foesũ bivila paa,
lɛmɛ ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a bi be kĩ, “Mitavila! Mma mi fɔlɛtsa wĩ kĩ fɔ́ayamɛna kawɔlɛ mɔ lukudɔ pii fɔkpa bati flee.
Nɛ nviã luwi kĩĩ akũ, bɛma Ɔtɛnɛ kĩ ɛnyɛ boe Ɔlate Kristo bɛkpa mi nɛ Lɛgã Dawid ɔmatɔ a kamɛ.
Lɛtsa a kĩ míakɔa mimɔ́ miyi ɔsũ nyɛ kĩ míamɔ waawa a kĩ busuli ye bido nɛ fumakũ kamɛ ɛwaa nɛ bayaɛ kanyakɔ̃.”
Deedimɔapɛ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ kɔdza baũ kudi to ode kɔka kɔyabumɔ ɔtɔnyade a, ade be a flee bɛkamu Baguma mɔ kawɔlɛ kĩ,
“Obu mɔ kamu kɛkpa Baguma nɛ ode flefle,
lɔkɔa lukudɔ litomɛna katinya kamɛ bati flee a kĩ Baguma awɛ a!”
Kĩ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a dzakũ nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ bɛdani bɛnaa ode a, baveli bakpãnɛ a bi be akũ kĩ, “Mifɔ̃ bɔnaa Betlehem bɔnaadã lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya a kĩ boe Ɔlate bi boe a.”
Ade bɛwɛ sɔwa bɛnaa bɛnamɔ Maria, Yosef mɔ waawa a kĩ ɛwaa nɛ bayaɛ kanyakɔ̃ a.
Kĩ bɛmɔ́ ye a, bɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa a flee kĩ Baguma ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a bi be nɛ obisɛ̃ a akũ.
Bati flee a kĩ binu baveli bakpãnɛ fɔlɛtsa a kɛna saa.
Lɛmɛ Maria pi fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ flee edo nɛ lɔlɔ kamɛ, ɛkakɔna foe akũ dzununuunu.
Baveli bakpãnɛ a muniki bɛnaa mɔ Baguma kamu nɛ fɔlɛtsa flee a kĩ binu, bɛmɔ́ lɛmɛ a akũ, kitonɛkĩ foe flee fɔya pɛpɛɛpɛ ndɛ ayekĩ ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a bi be a.
Nɛ luwi lɛlɛ̃de akũ kĩ batsua obisɛ̃ a lɛkpati a, bite ye dĩ kĩ Yesu ndɛ ayekĩ ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a lɛ eyi fɔmɔ bɛyatsãmɔ ye kɔma a.
Lɔkɔ wo ɔtɔ kĩ Yosef mɔ Maria bɛkɛna akũ kakpalɛ yedede amaniɛ ndɛ ayekĩ Mose mbla tsa a. Foesũ bɛkɔa waawa a bɛnamɛna Yerusalem kĩ banaakɔa ye bido nɛ boe Ɔlate awɛ,
ndɛ ayekĩ bɛtsɛlɛ bido nɛ boe Ɔlate mbla ovoli a kamɛ kĩ, “Obinyole ɔtɔnyade odi nyɛ odi ni kɛnɛ kĩ bɛnyɛ ye biyi bɛkpa boe Ɔlate.”
Ade bɛnaa bɛnakɛna afɔlibɔ fɔtsa a nɛ boe Ɔlate mbla a onukpɛ̃ kĩ bɛkɔa mblɔduma nviã ĩye fɔblɔblɔm nviã bɛbɔa afɔliɛ bɛkpa ye.
Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Simeon dzi nɛ Yerusalem. Ɛnyɛ oti wĩ kĩ yavila Baguma ade edzi ɛkadã osi kakpa Israel katɛ a. Hũhũ Kpalɛwa deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ,
ade ɛnyɛ ɛtsa ye lɛmɛ kĩ ɛláaku kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ ɛmɔ boe Ɔlate, Kristo a kĩ bɛlɛ biyi a.
Ade ke Hũhũ a kpã Simeon ɛnamɛna Yudafɔ Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ a. Kĩ bamanɛ a kɔa waawa Yesu a bɛyamɛna kĩ bayaakɛna amaniɛ nɛ mbla a onukpɛ̃ a,
Simeon tɛ waawa a ɛlɛ nɛ awɛ, ade ɛnyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ kĩ,
“Boe Ɔlate, finyaa, ɔkɛna nɛ nɔ kalɛ onukpɛ̃ akũ,
aapuli ɔnyɛ yĩ, nɔ ɔsumunɛ, osi nnaa nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ.
Yĩ mɔawɛ banebi mɔ́ Ɔtɛnɛ a,
kĩ ɔkɔa ɔma bati flee a.
Ɛnyɛ ɔhaĩ a kĩ yaanyɛ nɔ fɔwɛtsa ɛtsa bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ,
ade yaanya obu fɔtsa ɛkpa nɔ bati Israelfɔ a.”
Fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Simeon lɛ nɛ obisɛ̃ a akũ kɛna Yosef mɔ Maria saa.
Simeon hila be ade ebi Maria kĩ, “Baguma nyɛ obisɛ̃ kĩĩ kĩ fɔtsã ye akũ Israelfɔ pii bɛna katɛ ĩye kawɔ. Yaanya nsɛntsɛlɛni kĩ eto Baguma sɛkɛ̃ ade bati pii aayidza bɛdza nɛ ye akũ a.
Ade yaanyɛ bati kakɔna a kĩ bɛkɔa bɛkɔla a kanya a. Fɔtsɛ̃ fukĩĩ akũ sũ ni, aatɛ kalɔɛ ndɛ ayekĩ lɛpamɛ atsɔɛ nɔ du.”

Otsolenɔkɔɛ̃ odi kĩ ɛnya Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ na nɛ awã, ɛnyɛ okunawa kĩ bavɛ Hana. Ɔlɛga nyɛ Fanuel kĩ eto Aser kasinu kamɛ. Futeli evũkɔnɔ pɛ edzi kɔnyɔ fɔmɔ ɔnyɔ ku, ade finyaakĩĩ ɛtɛ futeli aduewɔtsi-ɛna. Yudafɔ afɔliɛ kabɔakɔ̃ a ɛkana lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ, ɛkasum Baguma lɛnyɛ mɔ suwa, ade ɛkasui onukpɛ̃, kabɔa mpaɛ lɛmɛ a.

Otsolenɔkɔɛ̃ odi kĩ ɛnya Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ na nɛ awã, ɛnyɛ okunawa kĩ bavɛ Hana. Ɔlɛga nyɛ Fanuel kĩ eto Aser kasinu kamɛ. Futeli evũkɔnɔ pɛ edzi kɔnyɔ fɔmɔ ɔnyɔ ku, ade finyaakĩĩ ɛtɛ futeli aduewɔtsi-ɛna. Yudafɔ afɔliɛ kabɔakɔ̃ a ɛkana lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ, ɛkasum Baguma lɛnyɛ mɔ suwa, ade ɛkasui onukpɛ̃, kabɔa mpaɛ lɛmɛ a.
Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ ye malo ɛyawo awã ade ɛnyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ, ɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa nɛ obisɛ̃ a akũ ɛkpa bati flee a kĩ bidzi badã Baguma anɛ kĩ yaanyɛ Yerusalem a.
Kĩ Yosef mɔ Maria yua be amaniɛ kakɛna ndɛ ayekĩ boe Ɔlate mbla tsa a, bimuniki bɛnaa be ɔtɔ Nazaret nɛ Galilea tite akũ.
Obisɛ̃ a bo anɛ, ɛna akũ ɔsĩ, ade enyi kadi paa a. Baguma nhila lɛmɛ tomɔ ye.
Kateli nyɛ kateli, Yesu bamanɛ kanaa Yerusalem kanaanya luwi kĩ bavɛ Wuda Katɛ̃ Luwi.
Kĩ Yesu tɛ futeli ewua-nviã a, bibuki bɛnaa luwi a kanyakɔ̃ ndɛ ayekĩ bɛkakɛna kɔkɔɛ a.
Kĩ luwi a kanya wũna a, bimuniki banaa ɔtɔ, lɛmɛ Yesu kɔ̃ kahɔ nɛ liti nɛ Yerusalem nɛ ye bamanɛ katanyi kamɛ.
Bibu kĩ ɛna nɛ bati kamɛ, foesũ bɛtsã luwi mɔa flee fɔmɔ bido ye kawɛ awɛ nɛ ye akũ bati mɔ bakɔba kamɛ.
Kĩ bɛtámɔ ye sũ ni, bimuniki bɛnaa Yerusalem bɛnɛ bɛtsɛ̃ bawɛ ye.
Nɛ luwi lɛlade a bɛnamɔ ye nɛ Yudafɔ Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ a kĩ ye mɔ Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ badi bidzi, ɛkatse be fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛkalɛ, ade ɛkavia be fɔlɛtsa nɛ foe akũ a.
Be flee a kĩ binu ye fɔlɛtsa kamɛ kakpalɛ a, kɛna saa nɛ kadi kanyi baũ odu a kĩ ɛkɔa ɛkpa mbuayɛ a.
Kĩ ye bamanɛ mɔ ye a, akũ yɛla be, ade ɔma via ye kĩ, “Obi, litsa sũ ɔkɛna boe fukĩĩ odu? Bɔmɔ aga flee bɔkɔa kɔnɛyɔɔlɛ bɔtsã bɔwɛ nɔ.”
Ade Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nde sũ mitsã miwɛ yĩ? Minyína kĩ yĩ Ɔlɛga awa kɛnɛ kĩ nna mbɔɛɛ?”
Lɛmɛ bɛtánu lɛtsa a kĩ de ebi be a kayɔ.
Yesu tomɔ be bɛdzakũ bɛnaa Nazaret, ade ɛdɔla ye akũ ɛkpa be a. Ɔma kɔa fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ flee edo nɛ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ dzununuunu.
Ade Yesu bo anɛ nɛ sukɛna mɔ kadikanyi kamɛ, ade Baguma mɔ bati flee mɔ kawɔlɛ nɛ ye akũ a.

Nɛ Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ Kaisare Tiberio lɛgãkanya kateli kawualode kamɛ a, Pontio Pilato nya abãã ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ nɛ Yudea tite akũ. Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, Herodes lɛnya Galilea tite akũ, ade ɔwaɛ̃ Filipo nyá Iturea mɔ Trakoniti tite akũ a. Lisania nya Abilene tite akũ.
Hana mɔ Kayafa lɛmɛ nya Yudafɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ flefle a. Ade lɔkɔ a na kamɛ lɛmɛ mɔ Baguma ɔlɛdo ya ɛkpa Yohanes kĩ ɛnyɛ Zakaria obi a kĩ ɛna nɛ kɔsa kamɛ a.
Foesũ Yohanes tsã emini nɛ Yordan ɔwɔ abuĩ mɔ ye fuyite a ɛkade lɛtsã kĩ, “Midani mi tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ lɔkɔa mitɛ mui kawɔla amaniɛ ayekĩ Baguma aakɔa mi tɔkpa ete mi.”
Ade aye bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yesaya ovoli a kamɛ kĩ,
“Oti odi tsɛ̃ yabɔa fɔwɔla nɛ kɔsa kamɛ kalɛ kĩ,
‘Milɔla osi mikpa boe Ɔlate kaya.
Mikɛna osi kpĩĩ miyi ye.
Miyula fɔkɔ a kĩ fɔpɛlɛ pɛlɛ fuwo a,
ade mibubuli tɔtɔ mɔ kɔtɔbii a flee fɔtɛɛ a.
Miyo tisi balibaliwa a,
ade mitɛɛtɛɛ fɔkɔ a kĩ fude fute a.
Katinya kamɛ bati flee aamɔ Ɔtɔnɛ a kĩ Baguma do a!’ ”
Bati kɔdabu kɔdabu pii ya nɛ Yohanes sɛkɛ̃ kĩ ɛkɛna be mui kawɔla amaniɛ, ade ebi be kĩ, “Mi bati kĩ mila ndɛ bɔɛ kpa! Owei lɛkpa mi kɔdɛ kĩ míapuli milo nɛ sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ a kĩ Baguma aayamɛna a kamɛ?

Minyɛ mitsa nɛ mi fɔtsakɛlawa kamɛ bɛmɔ kĩ midani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ. Ade mitakalɛ kĩ minyɛ Abraham babi mɔ bawa sũ ni, Baguma lɛláavɛlɛ mi sɔtɔ. Kitonɛkĩ mabi mi kĩ Baguma aapuli ɛkɔa boe kĩĩ ɛkɛna babi mɔ bawa ɛkpa Abraham.
Bike kasɔã kɔkɔɛ nɛ futse tɔbɔlɛ akũ kĩ baatsua. Kutse nyɛ kutse kĩ kɔáwũ babi wĩ ni, baakpeli koe bɛta bido nɛ fi luwotu kamɛ.”
Awã naa bati a via Yohanes kĩ, “Foesũ litsa kɛnɛ kĩ bɔkɛna?”
Ade ke ɛkpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nɔ a kĩ odeĩ tɛtadiɛ tiwo te nviã ni, kɔa amɔa kakpa odi kĩ ɛlá adima. Ade ke nɔ a kĩ odeĩ funitsã ni sɛ̃ foe mɔ bikĩ bidzi kɔlɛ a.”
Tɔgɔlɛ batɛnɛ badi malo ya kĩ ɛwɔla be mui, ade bivia ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, litsa kɛnɛ kĩ bɔkɛna?”
Yohanes bi be kĩ, “Mitatɛ ɔgɔlɛ fɔba fukĩ abãã tsua eyi kĩ mitɛ a.”
Sodzafɔ badi lɛmɛ yavia ye kĩ, “Boe malo litsa kɛnɛ kĩ bɔkɛna?”
Yohanes bi be kĩ “Mitakɔa kɔbɛ̃ mitɛ sika nɛ bati awɛ, ade mitatsua odima onukpɛ̃ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ minyina kĩ ɛtákɛna a akũ. Mifɔ̃ mi kɔtɔkase kuwo mi anɛ.”
Ayekĩ bati anɛ teĩ nɛ boe Ɔtɛnɛ a kaya mɔatsɛ akũ sũ ni, bɛkakɔna kĩ ɔsa Yohanes nyɛ oti a kĩ badzɔlɛ a.
Foesũ Yohanes bi be kĩ, “Yĩ kɔ̃ nkɔa mui mawɔla mi mui, lɛmɛ oti odi kĩ ɛbɛ̃ yĩ aya nɛ liti. Ntáfɛta kĩ manyɛ ye mpabua nɛ ye abɔa malo. Oti kĩĩ aakɔa Hũhũ Kpalɛwa mɔ fi ɛwɔla mi mui.
Ɛnɛɛ ye kɔvɛla kĩ yaakɔa ɛwɛ ɛnyɛ ye babi wĩ a lɔkɔa efila be eko nɛ oli kamɛ. Lɛmɛ yaapila afafa a nɛ fi kĩ fɔlá kadi a kamɛ!”
Ade Yohanes tsã kɔdɛ tisi futefute pii akũ ede lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ kĩ bati bɛdani be kadzi kamɛ a.
Yohanes kã abãã ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Herodes anɛ, kitonɛkĩ ɛtɛ ɔwaɛ̃ ɔtsɔ̃ kĩ bavɛ Herodia ɛkɔã, ade Herodes kɛna fɔtsa kpa bɛbã pii lɛmɛ a.
Ade ebuki ɛkɛna tɔkpa kĩ tɛbɛ̃ kɔlaa kĩ epi Yohanes edo nɛ abãã kɔla kamɛ a.
Kĩ Yohanes wɔla bati a flee mui eyua a, ɛwɔla Yesu lɛmɛ mui. Ade lɔkɔ a kĩ Yesu kabɔa mpaɛ a, odetɔ́ kamɛ binya,
ade Hũhũ Kpalɛwa ka ndɛ mblɔduma aye ɛyadzi nɛ ye akũ a. Awã naa odo odi to ode ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nɔ nyɛ yĩ obi kĩ maátunɔ kalɛ. Kawɔlɛ ade yĩ nɛ nɔ akũ.”
Yesu tɛ ndɛ futeli taalɛ fɔmɔ eyi ye kanade adzuma kayɔ. Bati kɔna kĩ ɔlɛga nyɛ Yosef.
Kĩ ye ɔlɛga nyɛ Eli,
Eli ɔlɛga nyɛ Mata.
Mata ɔlɛga nyɛ Levi, Levi ɔlɛga nyɛ Melki.
Melki ɔlɛga nyɛ Yanai, Yanai ɔlɛga nyɛ Yosef.
Yosef ɔlɛga nyɛ Matatia, Matatia ɔlɛga nyɛ Amos.
Amos ɔlɛga nyɛ Nahum, Nahum ɔlɛga nyɛ Esli.
Esli ɔlɛga nyɛ Nagae,
Nagae ɔlɛga nyɛ Mahat.
Mahat ɔlɛga nyɛ Matatia, Matatia ɔlɛga nyɛ Semei.
Semei ɔlɛga nyɛ Yosek, Yosek ɔlɛga nyɛ Yuda.
Yuda ɔlɛga nyɛ Yohanan, Yohanan ɔlɛga nyɛ Resa.
Resa ɔlɛga nyɛ Zerubabel, Zerubabel ɔlɛga nyɛ Sealtiel.
Sealtiel ɔlɛga nyɛ Neri,
Neri ɔlɛga nyɛ Melki.
Melki ɔlɛga nyɛ Adi, Adi ɔlɛga nyɛ Kosam.
Kosam ɔlɛga nyɛ Elmadam, Elmadam ɔlɛga nyɛ Er.
Er ɔlɛga nyɛ Yosua, Yosua ɔlɛga nyɛ Eliezer.
Eliezer ɔlɛga nyɛ Yorim, Yorim ɔlɛga nyɛ Matat.
Matat ɔlɛga nyɛ Levi,
Levi ɔlɛga nyɛ Simeon.
Simeon ɔlɛga nyɛ Yuda, Yuda ɔlɛga nyɛ Yosef.
Yosef ɔlɛga nyɛ Yonam, Yonam ɔlɛga nyɛ Eliakim.
Eliakim ɔlɛga nyɛ Melea, Melea ɔlɛga nyɛ Mena.
Mena ɔlɛga nyɛ Matata, Matata ɔlɛga nyɛ Natan.
Natan ɔlɛga nyɛ Dawid,
Dawid ɔlɛga nyɛ Isai.
Isai ɔlɛga nyɛ Obed, Obed ɔlɛga nyɛ Boaz.
Boaz ɔlɛga nyɛ Salmon, Salmon ɔlɛga nyɛ Nahason.
Nahason ɔlɛga nyɛ Aminadab, Aminadab ɔlɛga nyɛ Admin.
Admin ɔlɛga nyɛ Arni, Arni ɔlɛga nyɛ Ezron.
Ezron ɔlɛga nyɛ Perez, Perez ɔlɛga nyɛ Yuda.
Yuda ɔlɛga nyɛ Yakob, Yakob ɔlɛga nyɛ Isak.
Isak ɔlɛga nyɛ Abraham, Abraham ɔlɛga nyɛ Tara.
Tara ɔlɛga nyɛ Nahor,
Nahor ɔlɛga nyɛ Seruk.
Seruk ɔlɛga nyɛ Regu, Regu ɔlɛga nyɛ Pelek.
Pelek ɔlɛga nyɛ Eber, Eber ɔlɛga nyɛ Sala.
Sala ɔlɛga nyɛ Kainan, Kainan ɔlɛga nyɛ Arfaksad.
Arfaksad ɔlɛga nyɛ Sem, Sem ɔlɛga nyɛ Noa.
Noa ɔlɛga nyɛ Lamek,
Lamek ɔlɛga nyɛ Metusala.
Metusala ɔlɛga nyɛ Henok, Henok ɔlɛga nyɛ Yared.
Yared ɔlɛga nyɛ Mahaleel, Mahaleel ɔlɛga nyɛ Kainan.
Kainan ɔlɛga nyɛ Enok, Enok ɔlɛga nyɛ Set.
Set ɔlɛga nyɛ Adam, ade Adam ɔlɛga nyɛ Baguma a.
Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a tɛ Yesu kamɛ flee ade ɛdzakũ nɛ Yordan ɔwɔ a abuĩ a. Hũhũ a kpã ye ɛnamɛna kɔsa kamɛ, awã kĩ bati lɛláa.
Ade awã mɔ Abonsam sɔ ye ɛdã fuwi tɛna flee a. Nɛ fuwi a na kamɛ flee a, Yesu tánya lɛtsama foesũ kɔlɛ kakɔ ye mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ.
Ade ke Abonsam bi ye kĩ, “Ntɛ Baguma obi anɛ ni, kekɔ̃ bi de kĩĩ lɛdani lɛkɛna abodoo.”
Lɛmɛ Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Oowo! Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ nnɛ́ funitsã odi sũ oti adzi nkpã.”
Ke liti a, Abonsam kpã ye ɛnamɛna kakɔ kadi nɛ ode, ade nɛ sinepo mɔa kabɔa kamɛ ni, ɛnyɛ katinya kamɛ mɔ ke fɔgãtsa a flee ɛtsa Yesu.
Ebi Yesu kĩ, “Maakɔa katinya kamɛ kɔbɛ̃ kĩĩ mɔ ke kɔbɛ̃ mɔ anunyam flee nkpã nɔ, kitonɛkĩ bɛkɔa foe flee bido nɛ yĩ awɛ, ade ke maapuli nkɔa foe nte owula a kĩ mawɛ a.
Foesũ fɔtsa kĩĩ flee aanya nɔ fude ntɛ ɔkɛna akũ ɔkpa yĩ.”
Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, ‘Nɔ Ɔlate Baguma odi kɛnɛ kĩ akɛna nɔ akũ ɔkpa lɔkɔa osum ye lɛmɛ.’ ”
Ke liti a, Abonsam kpã Yesu ɛnamɛna Yerusalem nɛ Yudafɔ Asɔli Kɔla a ode flee, ade ebi ye kĩ, “Ntɛ Baguma obi anɛ ni, kekɔ̃ vɛnya kaka kanaadza nɛ tite.
Kitonɛkĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ,
‘Baguma aakpa ye ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ
ɔlɛdo nɛ nɔ akũ,
kĩ baakaɛ nɔ nɛ be awɛ kamɛ,
ayekĩ nɔ abɔa lɛláasãmɔ de.’ ”
Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛmɛ lɛ kĩ, ‘Tasɔ boe Ɔlate nɔ Baguma a ɔdã.’ ”
Kĩ Abonsam yua Yesu kasɔkadã nɛ osi nyɛ osi akũ a, ɛfɔnɛ ye awɛ ɛdzakũ tɔ̃ kɛnaawo lɔkɔ bɛbã kĩ yaana osi.
Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a tɛ Yesu kamɛ ade emuniki ɛnaa Galilea tite akũ a. Ye dĩ gba nɛ kamɛ kamɛ nɛ awã flee.
Ɛtsa fɔtsa nɛ Yudafɔ fɔtsɛnakɔ̃ a, ade odi nyɛ odi mu ye fɔtsa katsa a.
Ke liti a, Yesu naa Nazaret awã kĩ bɛdɔla ye a. Nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ a, ɛnaa Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ ndɛ ayekĩ yawɛ kakɛna a. Eyidza ɛdza kĩ yakã Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ fɔlɛtsa,
ade bɛkɔa Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yesaya ovoli a bɛkpa ye a. Ebinya ovoli a nɛ awã kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ kĩ,
“Boe Ɔlate Hũhũ a tɛ yĩ kamɛ flee,
kitonɛkĩ ɛpau yĩ,
kĩ nlɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a ntsa ahiãfɔ.
Ade edo yĩ kĩ nde lɛtsã kĩ bikĩ bideĩ nɛ awɔba kamɛ
aana be akũ akũ kadzi,
kĩ banɛkunɛ aamɔ fɔkɔ,
bikĩ bideĩ nɛ ɔhau mɔ lubo kamɔ kamɛ a, aana kawɛya.
Ade nkpa kanyi kĩ lɔkɔ a kĩ Baguma aamɔ ye bati kɔnya a wo ɔtɔ.”
Yesu sua ovoli a emunikimɔ ye ɛkpa fɔtsa akũ ɔdãmɛnanɛ a, ade ɛkɛna akũ edzi a. Bati a flee ke anɛ nɛ ye akũ, bɛkadã ye kɛnanaana.
Ade ebi be kĩ, “Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa fɔlɛtsa a kĩ minu kĩ nkã kĩĩ a, ya nɛ foe kamɛ nviã kĩĩ nɛ mi mɔawɛ anɛ kamɛ.”
Bati a flee kĩ bɛna nɛ awã a mu ye paa mɔ ye kɔdzɛla kalɛ, ade ye kɔnyakamɔ fɔlɛtsa a kɛna be saa lɛmɛ a. Ade bivia be akũ kĩ, “Mbɔɛɛ nnɛ́ Yosef obi a nɛ awĩ a?”
Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Nti ĩnyina kĩ míabɔa yĩ lɛgbã kĩĩ kĩ, ‘Ɔwanɛ tsa nɔ akũ,’ ade míabi yĩ lɛmɛ kĩ, ‘Fɔtsa a kĩ bunu kĩ ɔkɛna nɛ Kapernaum a ni, kɛna foe odu nɛ nɔ mɔawɛ ɔmatɔ lɛmɛ.’ ”
Yesu buki ɛlɛ kĩ, “Lɛmɛ mabi mi kĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ odima látɛ dĩ wĩ nɛ ye mɔawɛ ɔmatɔ.
Fɔnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali kĩ bakunawa pii na nɛ Israel tite akũ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ Eliya dzi nkpã a, kĩ oni fɔ̃ kako futeli ɛlalɛ mɔ sɛkɛ, ade kɔlɛ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ ya nɛ tite a na akũ a.
Lɛmɛ Baguma tádo Eliya nɛ Israelfɔ bakunawa a kamɛ odima sɛkɛ̃. Mbom okunawa odi kĩ ɛna nɛ Zarepta ɔmatɔ kĩ edeĩ nɛ Sidon tite akũ a sɛkɛ̃ edo ye.
Bati pii lɛmɛ kasɔ fɔsɔ ngbã nɛ Israel, nɛ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Elisa lɔkɔ, lɛmɛ bɛtátsa be kamɛ odima, kɛba Naeman kĩ eto Siria tite akũ.”
Kĩ bati a kĩ bɛna nɛ katsɛnakɔ̃ a nu fukĩĩ a bɛna kalɔkpa paa.
Ade ke bɛta biyidza bipi Yesu bɛvɛlɛ, bidu ye bɛnɛmɛna nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ a. Bɛkpã ye bɛnamɛna ɔtɔ a kĩ ye akũ bitsua ɔmatɔ a kalete nɛ kakɔ pɛlɛpɛlɛ a, mɔ kakɔna kĩ badu ye ɛnaatɔ nɛ kayɔ,
lɛmɛ Yesu tsã bati a kayite ɛdzakũ.
Ke liti a, Yesu dzakũ ɛnaa Kapernaum ɔmatɔ kamɛ nɛ Galilea tite akũ, ade ɛkatsa bati fɔtsa nɛ Kawɛya Fuwi akũ a.
Ye fɔtsa katsa kɛna bati a saa, kitonɛkĩ kɔbɛ̃ na nɛ ye kɔdzɛla kalɛ kamɛ.
Luwi a, odi kĩ hũhũ kpa na nɛ ye kamɛ na nɛ Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ a, ade ɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba ɛlɛ kĩ,
“Ao! Yesu Nazaretni, litsa akamɔ boe? Ɔya kĩ ayaawɔla boe mbɔɛɛ? Ĩnyina owula a kĩ ye anɛ. Nɔ nyɛ Baguma Oti Kpalɛwa Kĩ Bido a!”
Awã naa, Yesu do hũhũ a onukpɛ̃ kĩ, “Tse kɔdzɛla kanɛ nɛ oti a kamɛ!” Hũhũ a bɔɛ oti a emuni nɛ tite nɛ bati a anɛ kamɛ na, ɛnɛ nɛ ye kamɛ, ade lɛtsama tákɛna ye a.
Fɔtsa a kɛna bati a flee wãwã ade bivia be akũ kĩ, “Litsa fɔlɛtsa odu nɛ awĩ a? Oti kĩĩ deĩ otumi mɔ kɔbɛ̃ yawũni nɛ hũhũ kpa akũ ade batse a.”
Yesu akũ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ gba nɛ kayite a na flee.
Yesu to Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ a ɛnaa Simon awã. Lɔkɔ a na Simon nyina waa yasɔ atilili mɔ ɔsĩ, foesũ bɛkpa Yesu kanyi kĩ ɛyaadã ye.
Ade ke Yesu nadza nɛ ye mpa ɔwɛ̃, ewũni nɛ fɔsɔ a akũ, ade fɔnɛ nɛ ye kamɛ eyidza mɔatsɛ ɛkɛna fɔdɛtsa ɛkpa be a.
Kĩ fɔkɔ ka a, bati kpã be bakɔba a kĩ basɔ fɔsɔ kumɛkumɛ a bɛma Yesu. Ete awɛ nɛ be kamɛ odi nyɛ odi akũ ɛtsa be flee.
Hũhũ kpa nɛ́ nɛ bati pii kamɛ mɔ fɔwɔla kabɔa kĩ, “Nɔ nyɛ Baguma obi a!” Lɛmɛ Yesu bɔa hũhũ kpa a onukpɛ̃ ade ɛtákpa be osi kĩ bɛlɛ kɔdzɛla kitonɛkĩ binyina kĩ ye nyɛ Kristo a.
Odenyinawi a, Yesu dzakũ nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ ɛnaa kakɔ dĩĩ kadi, ade bati a do ye kawɛ awɛ a. Kĩ bɛmɔ́ ye a bike ye aduli kĩ ɛtadzakũ nɛ be sɛkɛ̃.
Lɛmɛ ebi be kĩ, “Kɛnɛ kĩ nnaalɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ akũ a nɛ tɛmatɔ bɛbã lɛmɛ kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ ade foe Baguma do yĩ kĩ ĩyaakɛna a.”
Foesũ ɛkalɛ Baguma kalɛ a nɛ Yudafɔ fɔtsɛnakɔ̃ a nɛ tite a na akũ flee.
Luwi a, kĩ Yesu dza nɛ Genezaret ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a abuĩ a, bati kapili kĩ bafuã ye bitse Baguma fɔlɛtsa a.
Yesu mɔ́ tɔkɔlɔ nviã nɛ lutubu a abuĩ ade kɔfɔabi banyɛnɛ a nɛ́ bɛlamɛna be tɛsau kavɔlɛ a.
Yesu wo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kĩ ɛnya Simon ode a kamɛ ebi ye kĩ edu ɔkɔlɔ a ɛnamɛna mui anɛ sukuloo. Ɛkɛna akũ edzi nɛ ye kamɛ ɛtsa bati a fɔtsa.
Kĩ Yesu tsa fɔtsa eyua a, ebi Simon kĩ, “Ta ɔkɔlɔ a kanamɛna awã kĩ kidzũ, lɔkɔa mimɔ nɔ babumɛnanɛ mita mi tɛsau minyɛ kɔfɔabi.”
Ade Simon kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃, bɔkɛna adzuma mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kadzɔ lɛnyɛ flee lɛmɛ bɔtána lɛtsama. Lɛmɛ ntɛ ɔlɛ lɔmɔ ni maafɔ̃ bɔta tɛsau a.”
Kĩ bɛta tɛsau a bɛnyɛ kɔfɔabi beblebee kĩ fɔfɔ̃ be tɛsau a do kakpeli awɛ.
Foesũ bɛbɔa awɛ bɛvɛ be bakɔba nɛ ɔkɔlɔ ɔyade a kamɛ kĩ bɛyaabumɔ be. Bɛya bɛyanyɛ kɔfɔabi biyula tɔkɔlɔ nviã a tiyi limii kĩ tido kayɛla awɛ.
Kĩ Simon Petro mɔ́ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya a, eke aduli nɛ Yesu anɛ kamɛ ebi ye kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, nɛ liti nɛ yĩ ɔwɛ̃, kitonɛkĩ tɔkpa ɔkɛnanɛ manɛ.”
Simon mɔ ye bade a kɛna saa nɛ kɔfɔabi beblebee a kĩ bɛnyɛ a sũ.
Ade ayea fɔkɛna ye adzuma bakɔba Yakobo mɔ Yohanes kĩ bɛnyɛ Zebedeo babi a lɛmɛ wãwã a.
Ade Yesu bi Simon kĩ, “Tavila. Kito finyaakĩĩ kanaa ni, bati aakanyɛ.”
Ke liti a, bɛta be tɔkɔlɔ bɛnadzɛla nɛ ɔwɔ abuĩ, bɛfɔnɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa awɛ biyi ade bitomɔ Yesu nɛ liti a.

Lɔkɔ lidi, Yesu na nɛ ɔmatɔ odi kamɛ awã kĩ onyole odi kĩ ɛkasɔ fɔsɔ ngbã na. Kĩ onyole kĩĩ mɔ́ Yesu a, ɛnatɔ nɛ ye abɔa kamɛ eke ye aduli kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, ntɛ fɔnyɛ nɔ kawɛ ni, aapuli ɔfɔ̃ fɔsɔ kĩĩ lɛwɔ nɛ yĩ akũ.”
Yesu yo awɛ ɛta ye ade ebi ye kĩ, “Mawɛ lɔmɔ. Nɔ akũ ɛkpalɛ.” Deedimɔapɛ fɔsɔ a wɔ nɛ ye akũ.

Ade Yesu si ye mbla ɛlɛ kĩ, “Tabi odima kadima mbom naa tĩĩ kanaakɔa nɔ akũ katsa ɔsɔfɔ, kafɔ̃ ɛsɛla nɔ akũ ɛdã, lɔkɔa edi adansiɛ ɛkpa odi nyɛ odi kĩ nuwĩnuwĩ fɔsɔ a wɔ nɛ nɔ akũ. Kpa afɔlibɔ fɔtsa a kĩ Mose mbla tsa a lɛmɛ.”
Lɛmɛ Yesu akũ fɔlɛtsa gba fɔnaa mɔ lugo, ade bati pii kaya kĩ bayaatse ye fɔtsa katsa, bɛna fɔsɔ katsa lɛmɛ a.
Lɛmɛ fɔkɔ fudi Yesu adzakũ kanaa kakɔ kĩ kɛkɛna dĩĩ kanaabɔa mpaɛ.
Luwi a, kĩ Yesu katsa fɔtsa a, Farisifɔ mɔ Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ a kĩ bito tɛmatɔ kumɛkumɛ nɛ Galilea mɔ Yudea tite akũ, mɔ Yerusalem na nɛ awã. Baguma kɔbɛ̃ a na nɛ Yesu kamɛ kĩ ɛkɔa ɛtsa fɔsɔ.
Ade bati badi lɔ oti odi kĩ eveliveli nɛ ɔkɛna akũ bɛyamɛna a. Bɛbɔa mbɔdi bɛwɛ osi kĩ batsã biwo nɛ kɔla a kamɛ bɛkɔa oti a biyi nɛ Yesu anɛ kamɛ.
Lɛmɛ nɛ bati lidede sũ ni, bɛtána osi biwomɔ ye. Foesũ bɛbɔɛ oti a bide nɛ lɛtsã. Ade bitinya fɔkpã bɛnyɛ ɔkɛ bɛkamɛna ɔsɔnɛ a mɔ ye ɔkɛna biyi nɛ Yesu mɔ bati a flee anɛ kamɛ a.
Kĩ Yesu mɔ be katɛkado a, ebi onyole a kĩ, “Nwaɛ̃, bɛkɔa nɔ titikpa bite nɔ!”
Ade Farisifɔ mɔ mbla batsanɛ a do akũ kavia awɛ kĩ, “Owei nyɛ oti kĩĩ kĩ yalɛ fubusuotsa nɛ Baguma akũ? Baguma odi keĩ aapuli ɛkɔa titikpa ete!”
Yesu nyi be kakɔna, foesũ evia be kĩ, “Nde sũ miakɔna fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ odu?
Fɔɔdabe kalɛ deĩ ɔsĩ fɔbɛ̃, ‘Bɛkɔa nɔ titikpa bite nɔ’ mbɔɛɛ kĩ, ‘Yidza kadza, katsã’?

Lɛmɛ kĩ míamɔ miyi ɔsũ kĩ yĩ a kĩ ĩnyɛ Otidziwa Obi a ndeĩ kɔbɛ̃ kĩ makɔa bati titikpa kate nɛ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ sũ ni, midã o-o!” Kĩ ɛlɛ fukĩĩ eyua a, ɛdani ebi oti a kĩ eveliveli a kĩ, “Mabi nɔ kĩ yidza kabɔɛ nɔ ɔkɛna kanaa kɔla!”
Lɛtalɛta onyole kĩĩ ta eyidza nɛ bati a flee anɛ kamɛ, ɛbɔɛ ye ɔkɛna a kĩ ye akũ ɛwa a, ɛnaa kɔla mɔ Baguma kamu.
Fukĩĩ kɛna bati a flee wãwã. Akũ nyɛnɛ be flee, ade bimu Baguma, bɛkalɛ kĩ, “Litsa awãwã fɔtsa bɔmɔ́ nviã kĩĩ a!”
Ke liti a, kĩ Yesu anɛ nɛ tɔtɔ a kamɛ a, ɛmɔ́ ɔgɔlɛ ɔtɛnɛ odi kĩ bavɛ Levi edzi nɛ ye adzumamu. Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Tomɔ yĩ.”
Levi yidza ɛfɔnɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa eyi ade etomɔ ye a.
Owi tábuna mɔ Levi te opunu kpale ɛkpa Yesu nɛ ye tɔtɔ kamɛ. Tɔgɔlɛ batɛnɛ pii mɔ bati bɛbã lɛmɛ na nɛ awã.
Farisifɔ mɔ be bakɔba Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ a badi kɛna hũhũhũhũ bivia Yesu fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Nde sũ mianya kamɔa mɔ tɔgɔlɛ batɛnɛ mɔ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ?”
Ade ke Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Basɔnɛ lisĩ bɛkpa tutsonu ɔkɛnanɛ, nnɛ́ bikĩ bideĩ akũ ɔsĩ.
Ntáya kĩ mayaavɛ bati kĩ bidzi kpĩĩ, mbom ĩya kĩ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ bɛdani be tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ.”
Bati badi bi Yesu kĩ, “Yohanes fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a awɛ onukpɛ̃ kasui mɔatsɛ mɔatsɛ kabɔa mpaɛ ade ayea Farisifɔ bade a lɛmɛ akɛna a. Nde sũ nɔ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ anya, kamɔa?”
Ade Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Miakɔna kĩ bati a kĩ bɛvɛ nɛ obolitsɔ̃ kapikɔ̃ a adzi kɔlɛ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ obolitsɔ̃ ɔnyɔ a deĩ nɛ be sɛkɛ̃? Oowo! Fɔlá lɔmɔ!
Lɛmɛ luwi aaya kĩ baakpã obolitsɔ̃ ɔnyɔ a nɛ be sɛkɛ̃. Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ ni, baasui onukpɛ̃.”
Yesu buki ɛbɔa be lɛgbã kĩ, “Odima lábɛ̃ lima vɔɛ̃ kakɔa katalɛ lima kɔɛ ɔkɛ. Ntɛ ɛkɛna foe lɔmɔ ni, yaabɛ̃ lima vɔɛ̃ a, lɛmɛ lɔvɔɛ̃ mɔ lɔkɔɛ a lɛláaketimɔ akũ.
Ade ayea baáko waĩ vɔɛ̃ nɛ ɔyaɛ ovoli kuvũ kɔɛ kamɛ a, kitonɛkĩ waĩ vɔɛ̃ a aafɔ̃ kuvũ a lɛbɛ̃ lɔkɔa waĩ a lɛmɛ aawula.
Nɛ foesũ kɛnɛ kĩ biko waĩ vɔɛ̃ nɛ ɔyaɛ ovoli kuvũ vɔɛ̃ kamɛ.
Finyaa, ntɛ odi mɔa waĩ kɔɛ ni, ɛláawɛ kĩ yamɔa bavɔɛ̃. Lɛtsa a kĩ yaalɛ nyɛ kĩ, ‘Waĩ kɔɛ a nɛnɛ ɛbɛ̃.’ ”
Nɛ Kawɛya Luwi mɔa lidi akũ ni, Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ tsã fugbanɔ kɔba kudi kayite batɛ̃. Ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a ve fudi bɛtsɛ̃ foe bɛkaba.
Ade ke Farisifɔ a badi via be kĩ, “Nde sũ miakɛna lɛtsa a kĩ boe mbla tákpa osi kĩ bɛkɛna nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ?”
Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mitákã nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ, mimɔ́ lɛtsa a kĩ Lɛgã Dawid kɛna nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ kɔlɛ kakɔ bɛmɔ ye bade a?

Lɛgã Dawid nawo nɛ Baguma kɔla kamɛ ɛbɔɛ abodoo a kĩ bɛkɔa bɛbɔa afɔliɛ bɛkpa Baguma a ɛnya, ade ɛkɔa adi ɛkpa ye bakɔba a lɛmɛ bɛnya a. Fɔnyɛ boe mbla kĩ odima lɛlá osi kĩ yanya foe, mbɔɛntɛ basɔfɔ odi keĩ.”
Yesu wũna kĩ, “Otidziwa Obi a nyɛ Kawɛya Luwi a Ɔlate.”
Nɛ Kawɛya Luwi bɛbã akũ ni, Yesu naa Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ a ɛnaatsa fɔtsa. Onyole odi kĩ ye kɔkpɔ ku na nɛ awã.
Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ mɔ Farisifɔ badi kawɛ osi a kĩ ye akũ baatsã bɛwɛ fɔlɛtsa bite nɛ Yesu akũ. Foesũ biko anɛ bɛdã flee ntɛ yaatsa fɔsɔ nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ.
Lɛmɛ Yesu nyi be kakɔna ade ebi onyole a kĩ, “Yidza kayaadza nɛ bati anɛ kamɛ nɛ awĩ.” Onyole a nɛ ɛyadza nɛ awã.

Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mavia mi ntse ni, litsa boe mbla kpa osi kĩ bɛkɛna nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ? Fɔnɛnɛ kĩ bɛkɛna tuwĩ nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ, mbɔɛɛ kĩ bɛkɛna tɔkpa? Fɔnyɛ luwi kĩ de akũ bɛtɛ oti nkpã, mbɔɛɛ kĩ bɛfɔnɛ ye awɛ eku?”
Yesu dã be flee ɛtɛ̃mɛna ade ebi onyole a kĩ, “Yo awɛ.” Eyo awɛ ade ye awɛ a lɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ a.
Yudafɔ mɔ mbla batsanɛ a na kalɔkpa mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ ade bɛkapi adzuni nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ baakɛna ye akũ a.
Luwi a Yesu de ɛnaa ɔtɔ akũ kĩ yanaabɔa mpaɛ, ade ɛbɔa mpaɛ lɛnyɛ flee ɛkpa Baguma a.
Kĩ kade nyina a, ɛvɛ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a flee ɛkpɔta ade ɛnyɛ be kamɛ bati ewua-nviã ɛvɛ be kĩ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a.
Ade be nyɛ Simon kĩ ete dĩ kĩ Petro mɔ ɔwaɛ̃ Andrea, Yakobo mɔ Yohanes, Filipo mɔ Bartolomeo.
Babɛbã nyɛ Mateo mɔ Toma, Yakobo kĩ ɛnyɛ Alfeo obi mɔ Simon a kĩ epili ye kade lɔlɔ.
Be nkaɛ nyɛ Yuda kĩ ɛnyɛ Yakobo obi mɔ Yuda Iskariot kĩ ye lɛyatsa Yesu liti osi.

Kĩ Yesu mɔ ye fɔtɔ banyanɛ a ka bito ɔtɔ akũ a, bɛyadza nɛ kakɔ tɛɛwa kĩ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ pii mɔ bati kɔdabu baũ kudi na. Bati pii to Yudea tite akũ, Yerusalem ɔmatɔ mɔ tɛmatɔ a kĩ tɛwaa nɛ Tiro mɔ Sidon mpo abuĩ a kamɛ bɛya.
Bɛya kĩ bayaatse Yesu fɔtsa katsa bɛna fɔsɔ ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ katsa. Bikĩ hũhũ kpa kaha be a lɛmɛ ya ade ɛtsa be a.
Bati a flee kabɔa mbɔdi kĩ bata Yesu kitonɛkĩ kɔbɛ̃ kudi kanɛ kato ye kamɛ katsa be flee.
Yesu dzɛla anɛ ɛdã ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a ade ebi be kĩ,
“Baguma aahila mi a kĩ minyɛ ahiãfɔ a,
kitonɛkĩ mi kade nyɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a
Baguma aahila mi a kĩ kɔlɛ akɔ mi finyaakĩĩ a,
kitonɛkĩ míawĩ!
Baguma aahila mi a kĩ miabe finyaa a,
kitonɛkĩ miaya kamɛmɛ kɔ̃!
Baguma aahila mi ntɛ bati akesĩ mi,
bisĩ mi, bavũna mi,
ĩye balɛ kĩ minyɛ bati kpa nɛ Otidziwa Obi a sũ!
“Mimɔ kawɔlɛ, ntɛ fɔya lɔmɔ a, mito, mimɔ kawɔlɛ kitonɛkĩ mideĩ kɔtɔkase kpale nɛ ode. Mite anɛ lɛmɛ kĩ ade fukĩĩ odu be bawanyɔ kɛna Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ kɔɛ a.
Lɛmɛ bɔbɔɛ makpa mi a kĩ mideĩ akũ a,
kitonɛkĩ mimɔ́ mi kawɔlɛ kɔkɔɛ nɛ awĩ!
Bɔbɔɛ makpa mi a kĩ miwĩ finyaakĩĩ a,
kitonɛkĩ kɔlɛ aakɔ mi!
Bɔbɔɛ makpa mi a kĩ miamɛmɛ finyaakĩĩ a,
kitonɛkĩ míawo ɔblɔ, mibe.
Bɔbɔɛ makpa mi ntɛ bati flee abɔa mi buĩ wĩ,
kitonɛkĩ ade aye be bawanyɔ mu fɔvã onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a.
“Lɛmɛ mabi mi a kĩ miatse yĩ kalɛ a kĩ miwɛ mi bakesĩnɛ kalɛ, mikɛna tuwĩ mikpa be.
Mikpa bikĩ badumu mi a nhila. Mibɔa mpaɛ mikpa bikĩ bakɛna mi tɛnya a.
Ntɛ odi balɛ nɔ awɛ nɛ ɔlɔtɔ mɔa ni, fɔ̃ ɛbalɛ nɔ nɛ ɔyade a lɛmɛ. Ntɛ odi tɛ nɔ atadiɛ wulaa ni kɔa nɔ atadiɛ anyanglede a lɛmɛ kakpa ye.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaawã nɔ fɔtsa ni, kpa ye, ade ntɛ odi bɔɛ nɔ litsedi ni, tabuki ɔlɛ kĩ atɛ foe.
Lɛtsa a kĩ miawɛ kĩ bati bɛbã bɛkɛna bɛkpa mi ni, mikɛna foe lɔmɔ mikpa be.
“Ntɛ miawɛ bati a kĩ bawɛ mi kalɛ odi ni, nde sũ kɛnɛ kĩ bihila mi? Tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ malo awɛ bikĩ bawɛ be kalɛ a.
Ade ntɛ bati a kĩ bakɛna mi sɛmɛ kalɛ odi mɔ miakɛna sɛmɛ kalɛ kakpa a ni, nde sũ kɛnɛ kĩ bihila mi? Tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ malo akɛna lɔmɔ.
Ade ntɛ bikĩ baapuli bise mi kɔtɔ odi mɔ miakpa tɛvɛ ni, nde sũ kɛnɛ kĩ bihila mi? Tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ malo akpa be akũ tɛvɛ, nɛ ayekĩ baase foe flee bɛkpa be sũ!

Oowo! Miwɛ mi bakesĩnɛ kalɛ mikɛna be tuwĩ. Mikpa be tɛvɛ lɛmɛ mitate anɛ kĩ baase bɛkpa mi. Ntɛ mikɛna foe lɔmɔ ni, míana kɔtɔkase kpale lɔkɔa míanya Baguma Kpale Nɛ Ode a babi. Kitonɛkĩ Baguma deĩ sɛmɛ kalɛ ɛkpa bikĩ baáyi bati ayɛ mɔ bati kpa malo.
Mimɔ bati kɔnya ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma amɔ kɔnya.
“Mitadzɛmɔ bati bɛbã ayekĩ Baguma lɛmɛ lɛláadzɛmɔ mi. Mitakɔ bati bɛbã kɔtɔ lɔkɔa Baguma lɛmɛ lɛláakɔ mi kɔtɔ. Mikɔa bati tɔkpa mite be, lɔkɔa Baguma lɛmɛ aakɔa ete mi.
