Mikpa bati fɔtsa lɔkɔa Baguma lɛmɛ aakpa mi. Nuwĩnuwĩ Baguma aakɔna, edo ɛmɛnana fuyi tsɔnɔnɔɔnɔ fuwula nɛ ye sɛmɛ kalɛ onukpɛ̃. Fɔtsa kakɔna odu a kĩ mikɔa mikɔna mikpa bati bɛbã a, ade foe odu Baguma lɛmɛ aakɔa ɛkɔna ɛkpa mi a.”
Ade Yesu bɔa be lɛgbã kĩ, “Ɔnɛkunɛ lɛláapuli ɛkpã ɔkɔba ɔnɛkunɛ. Ntɛ ɛkɛna foe ni be nviã a flee baatɔ lɛkɛ.
Fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ lɛbɛ́ ye fɔtsa ɔtsanɛ, lɛmɛ ntɛ ɛkɔlɛ fɔtsa eyua ni, yaana ndɛ ye fɔtsa ɔtsanɛ aye.
“Nde sũ adã sukuluku kĩ sideĩ nɛ awaɛ̃ linebi kamɛ lɛmɛ ɔtsɛ́la luvokũ a kĩ lideĩ nɛ nɔ mɔawɛ linebi kamɛ a?

Nde aapuli obi awaɛ̃ kĩ, ‘Make nɔ aduli, fɔ̃ ĩnyɛ sukuluku nɛ nɔ linebi kamɛ’ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ luvokũ deĩ nɛ nɔ mɔawɛ linebi kamɛ a? Anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa ɔkɛnanɛ anɛ! Nya lɔtɔ kanyɛ luvokũ a nɛ nɔ linebi kamɛ lɔkɔa aapuli ɔmɔ́ yededeede ɔnyɛ sukuluku nɛ awaɛ̃ linebi kamɛ.
“Kutse wĩ láwũ babi kpa, ade kutse kĩ kɔnɛ́nɛ lɛmɛ láwũ babi wĩ a.
Babi a kĩ kutse nyɛ kutse awũ a bakɔa kamɔ koe kayi ɔsũ. Baána figi babi nɛ fu kutse kamɛ ade baána akutu nɛ ɔgɔabi akũ a.

Oti wĩ anyɛ fɔtsa wĩ a kĩ fudeĩ nɛ ye ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ a kanya, ade aye oti kpa lɛmɛ anyɛ fɔtsa kpa a kĩ fudeĩ nɛ ye ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ a kanya a. Kitonɛkĩ lɛtsa a kĩ lideĩ nɛ oti ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ a, ade de anɛ nɛ ye onukpɛ̃ a.
“Nde sũ miavɛ yĩ kĩ, ‘Boe Ɔlate, boe Ɔlate’ lɛmɛ miákɛna nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ matsa mi a akũ?
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ katse yĩ fɔlɛtsa, kakɛna nɛ foe akũ ni, maatsa mi oti a odu kĩ yanɛ.
Ɛla ndɛ oti kĩ ntɛ eyi kɔla kake kayɔ etu ɔkã dzununuunu eke litekũ lɛyɔde nɛ boe akũ. Ntɛ ɔwɔ yili mɔ mui yalɔmɔ kɔla a ni, lɛtsama lɛláakɛna kɔla a, kitonɛkĩ bike koe kake wĩ.
Lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaátse yĩ fɔlɛtsa, ade yaákɛna nɛ foe akũ lɛmɛ ni, ɛla ndɛ oti kĩ eke kɔla kĩ koe kayɔ litekũ a lɛla ɔsĩ. Ntɛ ɔwɔ yili ɛyalɔmɔ kɔla a na ni, kɔ́aveli kɔtɔ gbloo!”
Kĩ Yesu bi bati fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ flee eyua a, ɛdzakũ ɛnaa Kapernaum.
Awã naa, Romafɔ sodzafɔ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ odi nɛ awã na ɔsumunɛ kĩ yaátunɔ kalɛ. Ɔsumunɛ kĩĩ kasɔ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ ewo wuda onukpɛ̃.
Kĩ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ kĩĩ nu Yesu nkã a, edo Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ badi kĩ bɛnaabi ye ɛyaatsa ye ɔsumunɛ a.
Bɛya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃ ade bike ye aduli mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ, “Oti kĩĩ fɛta ɛkpa nɔ kabumɛna paa,
kitonɛkĩ yawɛ boe kade bati kalɛ, ade ye like boe katsɛnakɔ̃ a ɛkpa boe a.”
Nɛ foe sũ Yesu tomɔ be ɛnaa.
Ki kite sukuloo kĩ Yesu awo nɛ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a tɔtɔ kamɛ a, ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a do ye bakɔba kĩ bibi Yesu kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, tabuki ɔha nɔ akũ. Ntákpɔla nkpa kĩ awo nɛ yĩ tɔtɔ kamɛ,
ade ke ntákpɔla lɛmɛ kĩ maya nɛ nɔ sɛkɛ̃ a. Foesũ lɛ kalɛ mɔapɛ lɔkɔa yĩ ɔsumunɛ a aasaɛ.

Yĩ malo ĩnyɛ oti kĩ ndeĩ nɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ kĩ bɛbɛ̃ yĩ lɔnɔkɔɛ̃ kayɔ, ade ndeĩ sodzafɔ nɛ yĩ kayɔ a. Ntɛ mbi odi kĩ, ‘Naa ni’ yanaa, ntɛ mbi ɔbɛbã kĩ, ‘Ya ni’ yaya, ade ntɛ mbi yĩ ɔsate lɛmɛ kĩ ‘Kɛna fukĩĩ ni’ yakɛna foe.”
Kĩ Yesu nu fukĩĩ a fɔkɛna ye saa. Ɛdani ebi bati kɔdabu a kĩ bitomɔ ye a kĩ, “Mabi mi kĩ ntámɔ tɔ̃ katɛkado kĩĩ odu nɛ Israelfɔ malo kamɛ da!”
Batɔ a kĩ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a do a muniki bɛnaa tɔtɔ a kamɛ, ade bɛnamɔ kĩ ɔsumunɛ a saɛ a.
Ke liti a, Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a mɔ bati pii naa Nain ɔmatɔ kamɛ.
Kĩ ewo nɛ ɔmatɔ a koletia a, ɛtsɛlamɔ bati kɔdza kĩ bɛnɔnɛ ɔnɔkpa banaabila. Ɔnɔkpa a nyɛ otsole odi kĩ ɛnyɛ okunawa obinyole mɔapɛ, ade ke ɔmatɔ a kamɛ bati pii lɛmɛ tomɔ okunawa a.
Kĩ boe Ɔlate mɔ́ otsole a, ye fɔlɛtsa kɔ ye kɔnya ade ke ebi ye kĩ, “Fɔ̃ kabe.”
Awã naa Yesu fuã ɛnata ɔnɔkpa apaka a ade bikĩ bɛnɔnɛ ye a fɔ̃ bɛdza a. Ade Yesu lɛ kĩ, “Opopo! Mabi nɔ kĩ yidza!”
Ɔnɔkpa a yidza edzi edo kɔdzɛla kalɛ awɛ, ade Yesu kɔa ye edo nɛ ɔma awɛ a.
Libe wo bati a flee ade bimu Baguma bɛlɛ kĩ, “Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ kpale odi nɛ́ ɛta nɛ boe kamɛ! Baguma ka ɛya kĩ yayaanyɛ ye bati!”
Yesu akũ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ gba nɛ Yudea tite mɔ fɔkɔ a kĩ fufuã a flee kamɛ.
Kĩ Yohanes fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a bi ye fɔtsa kĩ Yesu lamɛna kakɛna flee a, ɛvɛ be kamɛ bati nviã,
ade edo be nɛ boe Ɔlate sɛkɛ̃ kĩ bɛnaavia ye kĩ, “Nɔ nyɛ oti a kĩ bɛlɛ kĩ yaaya a, mbɔɛɛ kĩ bɔdã oti bɛbã anɛ?”
Kĩ biwo Yesu sɛkɛ̃ a bibi ye kĩ, “Yohanes Mui Ɔwɔlanɛ a do boe kĩ bɔyaavia nɔ kĩ, ‘Nɔ nyɛ oti a kĩ bɛlɛ kĩ yaaya mbɔɛɛ kĩ bɔdã oti bɛbã anɛ?’ ”
Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ a, Yesu tsa bati beblebee fɔsɔ, ɛblɔmɛna hũhũ kpa etomɛna bati kamɛ ade ɛfɔ̃ banɛkunɛ pii lɛmɛ mɔ́ fɔkɔ a.

Ade ɛkpa Yohanes batɔ a mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mimuniki minaabi Yohanes lɛtsa a kĩ mimɔ́ mɔ lɛtsa a kĩ minu a, banɛkunɛ mɔ́ fɔkɔ, bikĩ biveliveli yidza bɛtsɛ̃, bikĩ basɔ fɔsɔ ngbã akũ kpalɛ, batɔsĩnɛ anu fɔkɔ, bɛdzɛla banɔkpa bidzi nkpã, ade bɛlamɛna ahiãfɔ Kalɛ Wĩ a kabi a.
Baguma hila oti a kĩ ɛtamɔ́ nfumusu adima nɛ yĩ akũ.”

Kĩ Yohanes batɔ a dzakũ a, Yesu yi kayɔ mɔ kɔdzɛla kalɛ nɛ Yohanes akũ kabi bati kɔdabu a kĩ, “Kĩ minaa Yohanes sɛkɛ̃ nɛ kɔsa kamɛ a, litsa mikɔna kĩ míamɔ? Mimɔ́ ye ndɛ kɔkaɛ sɔɔta kĩ ɔwɛ abɔa katomɛna katɛ̃mɛna?
Litsa koũ minɛ minaadã? Oti kĩ ɛkɛɛlɛ ye akũ mɔ fɔtsa mɔ kalɛ yanɛ? Bikĩ bɛkɛɛlɛ be akũ mɔ fɔtsa mɔkalɛ bidzi nɛ ɔmɛnɛ kamɛ ni, fɔgã tɔtɔ kamɛ bamɔ be.
Mibi yĩ lɛtsa a koũ sũ miti mina a? Kĩ míamɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ mbɔɛɛ? Mifɔ̃ nti mbi mi kĩ mimɔ́ oti kĩ ɛbɛ̃ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ kɔlaa.
Ade Yohanes akũ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ,
‘Maado yĩ fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ ɛnya nɔ lɔtɔ,
ɛyaalɔla osi eyi ɛkpa nɔ.’ ”
Yesu buki ebi be kĩ, “Yohanes bɛ̃ odi nyɛ odi kĩ edzi tɔ̃ nɛ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ. Lɛmɛ odi kĩ ɛnyɛ obisɛ̃ kɔlaa nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ bɛ̃ Yohanes.”
Fɔmɔ fukĩĩ aayanɛ a, bati a flee nu Yohanes fɔlɛtsa a, bɛmɔ tɔgɔlɛ batɛnɛ a titiliwu nyɛ bikĩ bɛkɛna nɛ Baguma kawɛ akũ, ade bɛfɔ̃ Yohanes kɛna be mui kawɔla amaniɛ a.
Lɛmɛ Farisifɔ mɔ Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ a sĩ Baguma nhihiɛ a kĩ ɛkɛna eyi ɛkpa be a, ade bɛtátunɔ kĩ Yohanes ɛwɔla be mui a.
Yesu lɛ ɛnamɛna lɔtɔ kĩ, “Finyaakĩĩ litsa maakɔa nviã babi nkɔna mɔ?
Bɛla ndɛ babisɛ̃ kĩ bikoni nɛ kɔya bagulo. Babɔa fɔwɔla kabi bakɔba kĩ,
‘Bɔsã obolitsɔ̃ kapi tɔnɔ bɔkpa mi,
lɛmɛ mitáto!
Bɔsã tukutɔnɔ bɔkpa mi,
lɛmɛ mitábe.’
Yohanes Mui Ɔwɔlanɛ a ya, ɛkasui onukpɛ̃, ɛtámɔa waĩ, lɛmɛ milɛ kĩ, ‘Hũhũ kpa deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ!’
Otidziwa Obi a lɛmɛ ya, ɛnya, ɛmɔa lɛmɛ, ade mialɛ kĩ, ‘Midã ɔnyakpanɛ mɔ bavɛ ɔmɔanɛ kĩĩ! Ɛnyɛ tɔgɔlɛ batɛnɛ mɔ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ ɔkɔba!’
Lɛmɛ bati flee a kĩ bɛtɛ Baguma kadikanyi ni, be fɔkɛlatsa atsa kĩ fɔnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali fɔlɛtsa.”
Farisini odi vɛ Yesu kĩ ɛyaanya nɛ ye awã. Yesu tunɔ ɛnaa ɛnadzi bɛkanya.
Otsole odi kĩ ɛtábɔa ɔbla wĩ na nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ. Kĩ enu kĩ Yesu na nɛ Farisini a tɔtɔ kamɛ ɛkanya a, ɛbɔɛ tumpã mɔkalɛ mɔ kugua mɔ ɔlɛ̃ mɔlɛ̃ ɛyamɛna nɛ awã.
Ɛdza nɛ Yesu liti nɛ ye abɔa ɔwɛ̃ ade ɛkabe kako nɛ ye fɔnɛta akũ a. Otsole kĩĩ kɔa ye lɔlɔ tɔlɔ ɛyɔ babe a nɛ Yesu fɔnɛta, ade efifi foe akũ, ɛkɔa kugua a lɛmɛ eko nɛ foe akũ a.
Kĩ Farisini a mɔ fukĩĩ a, ɛlɛ nɛ ye lɔlɔ kamɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ obi kĩĩ mɔ nuwĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ yanɛ ni, kufɛ yaanyi kĩ otsole a odu kĩ ɛlamɛna ye katalɛ a nyɛ titikpa ɔkɛnanɛ!”
Ade Yesu bi Farisini a kĩ, “Simon, ndeĩ kalɛ kĩ mabi nɔ.”
Simon kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, bi yĩ lɛtsa a.”
Ade Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Banyole nviã badi dzimɔ sika ɔvɛ ɔkpanɛ odi kɔtɔ. Ɔmɔa dzimɔ ye sika kĩ siwo tidetɔ ewua kɔtɔkase, ade ɔyade a lɛmɛ dzimɔ ye odetɔ mɔa kɔtɔkase a.
Bati kĩĩ tápuli bise ye fɔtɔ kĩĩ, foesũ ɛkɔa ete be. Bati nviã kĩĩ kamɛ ɔwɔdabe aawɛ sika ɔvɛ ɔkpanɛ a kalɛ ɛba?”
Ade Simon kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Matɛ kado kĩ oti a kĩ bɛkɔa kɔtɔ kpale bite ye a.”
Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Ɔlɛ ɔnɔkɔali.”
Ade Yesu dani ɛdã otsole a ebi Simon kĩ, “Amɔ otsole kĩĩ? Kĩ nwo nɛ nɔ tɔtɔ kamɛ a, ɔtákpa yĩ mui kĩ nvɔlɛ fɔnɛta, lɛmɛ otsole kĩĩ kɔa ye babe ɛvɔlɛ yĩ fɔnɛta, ɛkɔa ye tɔlɔ lɛmɛ ɛyɔ be.
Ɔtákɛna yĩ atuu, lɛmɛ kito lɔkɔ a kĩ ĩya nɛ awĩ a, otsole kĩĩ táfɔ̃ yĩ fɔnɛta kafifi.
Ɔtákpa yĩ kugua ntsɛla nɛ lɔlɔ kamɛ, lɛmɛ ɛkɔa kugua mɔ ɔlɛ̃ mɔ ɔlɛ̃ ɛtsɛla yĩ fɔnɛta.
Foesũ mabi nɔ kĩ nɛ ɔdɔ a kĩ ɛnyɛ ɛtsa kĩĩ a sũ ni, bɛkɔa ye titikpa beblebee a bite ye. Lɛmɛ oti kĩ bɛkɔa fɔtsa kabii bite ni, ɔdɔ kabii yanyɛ katsa.”
Yesu bi otsole a kĩ, “Bɛkɔa nɔ titikpa bite nɔ.”
Bati a kĩ bɛna nɛ kanyakɔ̃ a kavia be akũ kĩ, “Owei nɛ awĩ a kĩ yakɔa bati tɔkpa malo kate?”
Ade Yesu bi otsole a kĩ, “Nɔ katɛkado tɛ nɔ. Naa nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ.”
Nɛ fukĩĩ liti a, Yesu tsã emini nɛ tɛmatɔ mɔ tukula a kĩ tifuã a kamɛ ɛkalɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a akũ. Ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ewua-nviã a lɛmɛ tomɔ ye.
Batsole badi kĩ Yesu blɔmɛna hũhũ kpa nɛ be kamɛ, mɔ bikĩ ɛtsa be fɔsɔ lɛmɛ tomɔ ye. Be kamɛ ɔmɔa nyɛ Maria Magdalani kĩ ye kamɛ ɛblɔmɛna hũhũ kpa evũkɔnɔ etomɛna a.
Otsole a odi lɛmɛ nyɛ Yohana, kĩ bavɛ ɔnyɔ kĩ Kusa kĩ ɛnya ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ nɛ Lɛgã Herodes fɔlɛtsa kadzɛkɔ̃, Susana mɔ batsole bɛbã pii kĩ bɛkɔa be mɔawɛ akũ fɔtsa bɛkadãmɛna Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ akũ a.
Bati kato tɛmatɔ pii kamɛ kaya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃, ade kĩ bati beblebee yakpɔta a, ɛbɔa be lɛgbã kĩĩ kĩ,
“Luwi a okuani odi naasã funitsã babi. Kĩ ɛkasã be a badi wula nɛ osi ɔɔwɛ̃ ade ke bati sumini be, kɔvɔlabi lɛmɛ tsuli be a.
Badi wula nɛ apibɔ akũ, ade kĩ bɛmɛ a bɛvɛ biku, kitonɛkĩ apibɔ a kamɛ lɛla mui.
Badi wula nɛ tuwĩ mɔ fu kamɛ. Tuwĩ mɔ fu a mɛ tipi be.
Badi lɛmɛ wula nɛ tite wĩ akũ, bɛmɛ bibo anɛ, kutse nyɛ kutse wũ babi kpasaa.”
Ade Yesu wũna kĩ, “Oti kĩ edeĩ atɔ ni, etse katse wĩ!”
Yesu fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a via ye lɛgbã a kayɔ.
Ade ebi be kĩ, “Bɛnyɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ fɔtsa kɔlawa a bɛtsa mi, lɛmɛ bati bɛbã a kɔ̃ ni, fɔgbã kamɛ fɔaya kakpa be ayekĩ,
‘Baadã lɛmɛ bɛláamɔ biyi ɔsũ,
baanu lɛmɛ bɛláa nu foe kayɔ.’
“Lɛgbã a kayɔ nyɛ fukĩĩ. Funitsã babi a nyɛ Baguma kalɛ a.
Babi a kĩ biwula nɛ osi ɔɔwɛ̃ nyɛ bati a kĩ binu kalɛ a, lɛmɛ Abonsam yanyɛ kalɛ a nɛ be tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ, ayekĩ bɛláatɛ bido bɛna katɛ
Bikĩ biwula nɛ apibɔ akũ a nyɛ bati a kĩ binu kalɛ a, bɛtɛ ke mɔ kawɔlɛ, lɛmɛ kɛtáwo nɛ be kamɛ dzununuunu. Bɛtɛ bido nɛ lɔkɔ lukũ odi kamɛ, ade ntɛ sɔhuiɛ adi ya ni, bamuniki liti.
Babi a kĩ biwula nɛ tuwĩ mɔ fu kamɛ a nyɛ bati a kĩ binu kalɛ a bɛtɛ ke lɛmɛ katinya kamɛ ɔhau, akũ fɔtsa kawɛ mɔ katinya kamɛ kawɔlɛkamɔ anya be akũ, kafɔ̃ baábo anɛ kawũ babi kayɔɔlɛ.
Lɛmɛ babi a kĩ biwula nɛ tite wĩ akũ a nyɛ bati a kĩ binu kalɛ a, bɛtɛ ke nɛ tɔwɔlɛ wĩ mɔ obu kamɛ ade bipini ke mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kɛnawo kĩ biwũ babi a.
“Odima látɛna ɔsɛdza kakɔa lɔɔda kasua ye, ĩye kakɔa ye kado nɛ mpa kayɔ. Mbom yadɛla ye kate nɛ ɔsɛdza otse akũ ayekĩ bati aamɔ fɔkɔ ntɛ bawo nɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ.
“Lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ bɛkɔa bɛkɔla ni, baanyɛ de kanya. Ade lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ bisua de ni, baamɔ de bɛnyɛ bɛyamɛna nɛ ɔhaĩ kamɛ.
Mitse lɛtsa a kĩ mianu a katse wĩ, kitonɛkĩ okĩ edeĩ fɔlɛtsa kayɔkanu ni, baakpa ye kayɔkanu bibu, lɛmɛ okĩ ɛla kayɔkanu kadima ni, baatɛ sukuloo a kĩ ɛkɔna kĩ edeĩ a malo nɛ ye awɛ.”
Luwi a, Yesu ɔma mɔ bawaɛ̃ ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ lɛmɛ bɛtápuli bifuã ye nɛ bati lidede sũ.
Ade ke odi bi Yesu kĩ, “Ama mɔ awaɛ̃ amɛ dzɛ̃ nɛ kanya kĩ bawɛ bɛmɔ́ nɔ.”
Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mma mɔ nwaɛ̃ amɛ nyɛ bikĩ batse Baguma kalɛ, bakɛna nɛ ke akũ.”
Luwi a Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a wo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ kamɛ ade ebi be kĩ, “Mifɔ̃ bunyina ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a bɔnaa abuĩ atide a.” Ade biyi ɔwɔ a kanyina kayɔ a.
Kĩ biteĩ nɛ mui anɛ banaa a, Yesu wa tida. Deedimɔapɛ ɔwɛ mɔ ɔsĩ odi vũ nɛ lutubu baũ a akũ, ade ɛkabɔa mui kako nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ, fɔfɔ̃ bɛna nɛ wuda mɔ nkpã kayite a.
Ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a nadzɛla Yesu bibi ye kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate! Boe Ɔlate! Buku buyua!”
Awã naa Yesu yidza ɛdza ewũni nɛ ɔwɛ mɔ mui a akũ. Ɔwɛ mɔ mui a onukpɛ̃ dɔ, ade awã flee kɛna dĩĩ a.
Ade evia ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Nde mi katɛkado?”
Bɛkɛna saa, libe wo be lɛmɛ, ade bivia be akũ kĩ, “Owei nyɛ oti kĩĩ? Yado ɔwɛ mɔ mui onukpɛ̃ ade batse ye a!”
Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a nyina ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a bito Galilea tite akũ bɛyawo Gadara nɛ tite a sɛkɛ sitide a.
Kĩ Yesu nɛ́ nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ a, onyole odi kĩ hũhũ kpa na nɛ ye kamɛ nɛ eto ɔmatɔ a kamɛ ɛyatsɛlamɔ ye. Owi buna kĩ onyole kĩĩ tsã ɔdzɔ, ade yaádzi nɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ, mbom asie mɔ funikɛ kamɛ yadzi.
Kĩ ɛmɔ Yesu a, ɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba ade ɛbɔɛ ye akũ emuni nɛ Yesu abɔa kamɛ mɔ fɔwɔla kĩ, “Yesu Baguma Kpale Nɛ Ode Obi! Litsa akamɔ yĩ? Make nɔ aduli, takɛna yĩ awɔda!”

Onyole a lɛ fukĩĩ kitonɛkĩ Yesu wũni nɛ hũhũ kpa a akũ kĩ ɛnɛ nɛ oti a kamɛ. Lɔkɔ pii hũhũ kpa a adzi nɛ ye akũ ade ntɛ bido ye nkɔsɔnkɔsɔ nɛ akpɔ mɔ abɔa malo a, yaveliveli ye lɔkɔa hũhũ kpa a akpã ye kanamɛna kɔsa kamɛ.
Yesu via ye kĩ, “Nde bavɛ nɔ?”
Ade ɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Bavɛ yĩ Lidede,” kitonɛkĩ hũhũ kpa beblebee wo nɛ ye kamɛ.
Hũhũ kpa a ke Yesu aduli kĩ ɛtablɔmɛna be bɛnaawo nɛ lɛkɛ dzununuunu a kĩ lɛlá kakpulakɔ̃ a kamɛ.
Baplakuo beblebee na nɛ ɔtɔ odi akũ bɛkadɛ. Foesũ hũhũ kpa a ke Yesu aduli kĩ ɛfɔ̃ bɛnɛ bɛnawo nɛ be kamɛ, ade Yesu lɛmɛ kpa osi a.
Ade bɛnɛ nɛ onyole a kamɛ bɛnawo nɛ baplakuo a kamɛ a. Be kɔdabu a flee wula atsɛ bɛka ɔtɔ sɛkɛ geĩ a biwo nɛ mui kamɛ, bɛmɔa mui biku.
Kĩ bikĩ badãmɛna baplakuo akũ a mɔ́ lɛtsa kĩ lɛya a, bilo bɛnaa ɔmatɔ mɔ tukula kamɛ bɛkabi bati lɛtsa kĩ lɛya a.
Bati nɛ bɛyaadã lɛtsa kĩ lɛya. Ade kĩ biwo Yesu sɛkɛ̃ a bɛmɔ́ onyole a kĩ ye kamɛ hũhũ kpa a nɛ a kĩ edzi nɛ ye abɔa kayɔ. Edo atadiɛ ade ye anɛ kamɛ lɛmɛ kpalɛ. Libe wo bati a flee.
Bikĩ bɛmɔ́ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya a bi bati ayekĩ bɛblɔmɛna hũhũ kpa nɛ oti a kamɛ.
Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ bati a flee nɛ Gadara kayite a na ke Yesu aduli kĩ ɛdzakũ nɛ be tite akũ, kitonɛkĩ libe wo be paa. Nɛ foesũ ewo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ ɛdzakũ.
Onyole a kĩ ye kamɛ hũhũ kpa a nɛ a ke Yesu aduli kĩ, “Fɔ̃ ntomɔ nɔ bɔnaa.” Lɛmɛ Yesu nyɛ ye osi, ebi ye kĩ,
“Muniki kanaa ɔtɔ kanaalɛ lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma kɛna ɛkpa nɔ a.”
Onyole a tsã nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ ɛkalɛ lɛtsa a kĩ Yesu kɛna ɛkpa ye a.
Kĩ Yesu muniki ɛnaa ɔwɔ lutubu baũ sɛkɛ sitide a, bati a tɛ ye mɔ kawɔlɛ kitonɛkĩ be flee bidzi bɛkadzɔlɛ ye.
Ade ke onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Yairo kĩ ɛnyɛ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ ɔmɔa nɛ Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ ya nɛ awã a. Ɛyake aduli nɛ Yesu abɔa kamɛ ɛwã ye kĩ ɛfɔ̃ bɛnaa ye tɔtɔ kamɛ,
kitonɛkĩ ye obitsole mɔapɛ kĩ ɛtɛ futeli ewua-nviã waa nɛ wuda mɔ nkpã kayite.
Kĩ Yesu kanaa a, bati pii yi ye akũ.
Otsole odi kĩ akũ awula ye futeli ewua-nviã flee lɛmɛ na nɛ bati a kamɛ. Otsole kĩĩ bula ye sika flee kade nɛ fɔsɔ batsanɛ sɛkɛ̃ lɛmɛ odima tápuli ɛtsa ye.
Ɛkɛna bɔɛɛ ɛtsã bati a kamɛ nɛ Yesu liti ɛta ye atadiɛ sɔtɔ. Deedimɔapɛ babɔanɛ a fɔ̃ kawula.
Ade ke Yesu via kĩ, “Owei lɛta yĩ?”
Lɛmɛ odima tákpeti. Foesũ Petro bi ye kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, dã ayekĩ bati beblebee yi nɔ akũ!”
Lɛmɛ Yesu lɛ kĩ, “Mmɔ́ nɛ yĩ kamɛ kĩ odi ta yĩ ni, kitonɛkĩ kɔbɛ̃ kudi nɛ kuto yĩ kamɛ.”

Kĩ otsole a mɔ eyi ɔsũ kĩ bɛmɔ́ ye sũ ni, ɛna nɛ kukũtila kamɛ ɛnɛ ɛyake aduli nɛ Yesu abɔa kamɛ. Nɛ bati a flee anɛ kamɛ na, ebi ye lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa. Ebi ye lɛtsa a kĩ de sũ ɛta ye, mɔ ayekĩ ɛsaɛ lɛtalɛta a.
Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Yĩ obitsole, nɔ katɛkado kpa nɔ akũ ɔsĩ. Naa nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ.”
Lɔkɔ a kĩ Yesu kalɛ fukĩĩ a, ɔtɔ to Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a awã ɛyabi Yairo kĩ, “Nɔ obitsole a ku, fɔtábuki fusĩ kĩ aha fɔtsa ɔtsanɛ a.”
Lɛmɛ kĩ Yesu nu fɔlɛtsa a ebi Yairo kĩ, “Tavila. Nɔ kɔ̃ tɛ kado, obisɛ̃ a aasaɛ.”
Kĩ Yesu wo Yairo tɔtɔ kamɛ a, ɛtákpa odima osi ewo nɛ kɔla a kamɛ, mbɔɛntɛ Petro mɔ Yohanes mɔ Yakobo mɔ obisɛ̃ a ɔlɛga mɔ ɔma odi.
Bati pii dza nɛ awã bɛkabe mɔ kɔnya nɛ obisɛ̃ a wuda sũ. Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mifɔ̃ kabe. Obisɛ̃ a táku. Tida kɛkɛ ɛwaa.”
Lɛmɛ bati a flee mɛmɛ ye kitonɛkĩ binyina kĩ obisɛ̃ a ku.
Ade Yesu pi obisɛ̃ a nɛ kɔkpɔ ɛvɛ ye kɔɔba kĩ, “Yĩ obi, yidza kadza!”
Ade ke katsolebi a nyinya kiyidza kɛdza deedimɔapɛ a. Yesu bi be kĩ bɛkpa ke funitsã kɛnya.
Fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ nyɛnɛ bamanɛ a akũ, lɛmɛ Yesu si be mbla kĩ bɛtabi odima lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya a.
Luwi a, Yesu vɛ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ewua-nviã a ɛkpɔta, ade ɛkpa be kɔbɛ̃ mɔ otumi kĩ bɛblɔmɛna hũhũ kpa flee, bɛtsa fɔsɔ kumɛkumɛ lɛmɛ.
Edo be kĩ bɛnaalɛ kalɛ nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a akũ, lɔkɔa bɛtsa basɔnɛ.
Fɔmɔ baanaa ni, Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mitabɔɛ lɛtsama ndɛ otse kĩ bake katsã, fɔtsa bawãnɛ kuvũ, funitsã ĩye sika milɛ. Mitabɔɛ atadiɛ ayade malo mibu.
Kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ kĩ mise ni, mina nɛ tɔtɔ a kamɛ kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ míadzakũ nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ.
Awã kĩ bati tátɛ mi ni, minɛ nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ lɔkɔa mikpa mi abɔa kudu miko nɛ be akũ, fɔnya nsɛntsɛlɛni fɔkpa be kĩ Baguma aavɛlɛ be sɔtɔ.”
Ade fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a namini nɛ tukula a flee kamɛ bɛkalɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a, bɛkatsa basɔnɛ a nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ a.
Kĩ Lɛgã Herodes, Galilea tite akũ ɔnyanɛ a nu fɔtsa kĩ fɔlamɛna kaya a, ɛkɛna basaa, kitonɛkĩ bati badi kalɛ kĩ Yohanes Mui Ɔwɔlanɛ a libuki eyidza edzi nkpã.
Bati bɛbã lɛmɛ lɛ kĩ Eliya libuki ɛya, ade babɛbã lɛmɛ lɛ kĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ kɔɛ a kamɛ odi liyidza edzi nkpã.
Lɛgã Herodes lɛ kĩ, “Nfɔ̃ bitsua Yohanes lɔlɔ, mɔ owei nyɛ oti a kĩ ye akũ fɔlɛtsa manu a?” Foesũ Lɛgã Herodes kabɔa mbɔdi kĩ yamɔ Yesu.
Kĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a muniki bɛya a, bibi Yesu lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bɛkɛna. Ade ɛkpã be odi bɛnɛ bɔɛɛ bɛnaa Betsaida ɔmatɔ a kamɛ a.
Lɛmɛ kĩ bati kɔdabu a nu foe a, bitomɔ ye bɛnaa awã. Yesu tɛ be ade ebi be fɔlɛtsa nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ akũ, ɛtsa bikĩ bisĩ fɔsɔ katsa lɛmɛ a.
Kĩ suwa anaa katomukɔ̃ a, Yesu fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ewua-nviã yabi ye kĩ, “Fɔ̃ bati a bɛdzakũ bɛnaa tukula mɔ fɔpɛ a kĩ fufuã a kamɛ bɛnaawɛ funitsã mɔ fɔwakɔ̃ kitonɛkĩ awĩ lɛnyɛ́ bati kadzikɔ̃.”
Lɛmɛ Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mi mɔawɛ a miwɛ litsedi mikpa be bɛnya.”
Ade bɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Funitsã flee kĩ bɔnɛɛ nyɛ abodoo elo mɔ kɔfɔabi tɔlɛwa nviã. Awɛ kĩ bɔnaaya funitsã bɔma bati beblebee kĩĩ?”
Banyole ndɛ be mpim elo na nɛ awã.
Ade Yesu bi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Mifɔ̃ bati a bidzi nɛ kutsukutsu kamɛ. Katsu nyɛ katsu kiwo ndɛ bati aduenum.”
Kĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kɛna foe lɔmɔ biyua a,
Yesu bɔɛ abodoo elo mɔ kɔfɔabi nviã a, ɛdɛla anɛ ɛdã odetɔ́ kamɛ, ɛnyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ, ade ebulibuli ye ɛkɔa ɛkpa ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ bɛsɛ̃ bɛkpa bati a.
Bati a flee nya biwĩ, ade ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a fila fukĩ fute a biyula tɛtsɛtsɛ ewua-nviã a.
Luwi a, kĩ Yesu odi na ɛkabɔa mpaɛ a, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ ade evia be kĩ, “Owei bati alɛ kĩ ye manɛ?”
Bɛlɛ kĩ, “Badi alɛ kĩ nɔ nyɛ Yohanes Mui Ɔwɔlanɛ a. Badi alɛ kĩ nɔ nyɛ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Eliya, ade babɛbã lɛmɛ alɛ kĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ kɔɛ a kamɛ odi liyidza edzi nkpã.”
Ade evia be kĩ, “Nde nyɛ mi lɛmɛ? Owei mialɛ kĩ ye manɛ?”
Awã naa, Petro kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nɔ nyɛ Baguma Kristo a.”
Ade Yesu si be mbla mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ bɛtabi odima fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ.

Yesu buki ebi be kĩ, “Kɛnɛ kĩ Otidziwa Obi a ɛmɔ lubo paa nɛ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃, Yudafɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ a awɛ. Baasĩ ye lɔkɔa bɛkɔ ye, lɛmɛ nɛ luwi lɛlalɛde akũ ni, Baguma aadzɛla ye etomɛna banɔkpa kamɛ edzi nkpã.”
Ade ebi bati a flee kĩ, “Ntɛ odi awɛ kĩ yatomɔ yĩ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ yafɔnɛ ye apɛdiɛ awɛ, ɛbɔɛ ye lubo kamɔ fɔlɔtsa luwi nyɛ luwi lɔkɔa etomɔ yĩ nɛ liti.
Kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yawɛ kĩ yapili ye nkpã ni, yaayɛla ye, lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛfɔnɛ ye nkpã awɛ ɛkpa nɛ yĩ katomɛna sũ ni, yaana nkpã wĩ a kĩ ɛlá kawũna a.
Litsa nfasɔ oti aana ntɛ ɛna katinya kamɛ fɔtsa flee lɛmɛ ɛyɛla ye mɔawɛ nkpã?
Ntɛ yĩ mɔ yĩ fɔtsa a kĩ matsa a nyɛ fɔnyɔãtsa fɔkpa odi ni, ye malo yaanya fɔnyɔãtsa ɛkpa Yĩ Otidziwa Obi a, ntɛ ĩya nɛ yĩ kukũkpalɛ mɔ Nda mɔ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ kpalɛwa kukũkpalɛ a kamɛ.
Mabi mi pipiipi kĩ badi deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ nɛ awĩ kĩ bɛláaku kɛnaawo kĩ Baguma aanyɛ ye lɛgãkanya a ɛtsa be.”
Ndɛ ɛkwansieda mɔa liti kĩ Yesu lɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, ɛkpã Petro, Yohanes mɔ Yakobo bide bɛnaa ɔtɔ odi akũ kĩ banaabɔa mpaɛ.
Kĩ ɛkabɔa mpaɛ a ye anɛ kamɛ dani, ade ye tɛtadiɛ kɛna fita fita, tɛkata muamua a.
Ade banyole nviã kĩ bɛnyɛ Mose mɔ Eliya nɛ bɛdza bɛmɔ Yesu bɛkalɛ kɔdzɛla a.
Bɛna nɛ ode kukũkpalɛ kamɛ ade bɛkalɔmɛna mɔ Yesu nɛ osi a kĩ ye akũ yaatsã ɛkɛna nɛ Baguma nhihiɛ a kĩ ɛkɛna eyi kĩ yaaku nɛ Yerusalem akũ a.
Titɔ kĩ Petro mɔ ye bade a wa tida kɔlaa malo ni, binyinya bɛmɔ́ Yesu kukũkpalɛ mɔ bati nviã a kĩ bɛdza nɛ ye ɔwɛ̃ a.
Kĩ bati a adzakũ a, Petro bi Yesu kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, fɔnɛnɛ paa kĩ bɔya nɛ awĩ. Bɔ́abɔa fɔpɛ ɛlalɛ, nɔ lide lɔmɔa, Mose lide lɔmɔa, Eliya lɛmɛ lide lɔmɔa.” Lɛmɛ ɛtáti enyi lɛtsa a kĩ de ɛkalɛ a malo.
Kĩ ɛkalɛ kɔdzɛla a, luflututu ka ade de kuyo ko nɛ be akũ a. Fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a vila nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ luflututu a ka lisua be akũ a.
Ade odo odi nɛ eto luflututu a kamɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ade yĩ obi a kĩ mpau a. Mitse ye kalɛ.”
Kĩ odo a tsua a, Yesu odi lite nɛ awã. Fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a sua onukpɛ̃ nɛ fukĩĩ flee akũ ade bɛtábi odima kadima nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bɛmɔ́ a akũ nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a.
Kĩ kade nyina a, Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ɛlalɛ a ka ɔtɔ a, ade bati kɔdabu baũ kudi yatsɛlamɔ ye a.
Onyole odi nɛ bati a kamɛ bɔa fɔwɔla ɛlɛ kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ! Make nɔ aduli dã yĩ obi kakpa yĩ, yĩ obi mɔapɛ!
Hũhũ kpa adi adzi nɛ ye akũ lɔkɔa yabɔa fɔwɔla. Odetɔ́ fɔsɔ ade kadzi nɛ ye akũ, kabɔɛ ye kamuni, lɔkɔa kuvũ anɛ nɛ ye onukpɛ̃. Fɔafɔ̃ yapila ade hũhũ a lɛvá ye awɛ kafɔnɛ lɛmɛ a.
Nke nɔ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a aduli kĩ bɛblɔmɛna hũhũ kpa a, lɛmɛ bɛtápuli.”
Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “O nviã babi mɔ atɔ ɔsĩ kĩ milá katɛkado! Lɔkɔ lɔwɔdabe maana nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃, nna ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ lɛmɛ nkpa mi?” Ade ebi onyole a kĩ, “Kpã nɔ obi a kayamɛna nɛ awĩ.”
Kĩ kanyolebi a yɛlɛ kaya a, hũhũ kpa a bɔɛ ye emuni nɛ tite ade ke odetɔ́ fɔsɔ de fudzi nɛ ke akũ a. Awã naa Yesu do hũhũ kpa a onukpɛ̃, ade ɛtsa kanyolebi a ɛkɔa ke ɛkpa ɔlɛga a.
Baguma kɔbɛ̃ baũ lɛkɛnana kĩĩ kɛna bati a flee saa.
Kĩ bati a kakɔna lɔlɔ kamɛ nɛ awãwã fɔtsa a kĩ Yesu kɛna akũ a, ebi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ,
“Mitalɛla lɛtsa a kĩ maabi mi a! Baakɔa Otidziwa Obi a bido nɛ bati awɛ.”
Lɛmɛ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a tánu foe kayɔ. Bɛkɔa foe bɛkɔla be kĩ bɛtanu foe kayɔ ade bivila kĩ bavia ye foe kayɔ a.
Fɔlɛtsa kavɛlɛ ya nɛ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kamɛ nɛ owula a kĩ ye bɛ̃ flee nɛ be kamɛ.
Kĩ Yesu nyi lɛtsa kĩ bɛkakɔna a, ɛvɛ obisɛ̃ odi ɛyadzɛla nɛ ye ɔwɛ̃.

Ade ebi be kĩ, “Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ obisɛ̃ kĩĩ nɛ yĩ dĩ akũ ni, ade yĩ ɛtɛ a, ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ yĩ ni, ɛtɛ owula a kĩ edo yĩ fɔtɔ a. Kitonɛkĩ owula kĩ ɛnyɛ obisɛ̃ kɔlaa nɛ mi kamɛ a, ade ye lɛtɛ kɔya ɛbɛ̃ a.”
Yohanes bi Yesu kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, bɔmɔ́ onyole odi kĩ ɛkablɔmɛna hũhũ kpa nɛ nɔ dĩ akũ, lɛmɛ busua ye osi, kitonɛkĩ ɛláa boe kamɛ.”
Yesu bi ye mɔ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ bɛbã a kĩ, “Mitasua ye osi, kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛdzɛ́ nɛ mi akũ ni, mi etomɛna.”
Kĩ lɔkɔ kawo ɔtɔ kĩ Baguma aabɔɛ Yesu ɛnamɛna ode a, esipi kĩ yanaa Yerusalem.
Edo fɔtɔ banyanɛ badi bɛnya ye lɔtɔ bɛnaa Samaria akula adi kamɛ kĩ bɛnaamanɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa bɛkpa ye kaya.
Lɛmɛ akula a kamɛ bati sĩ kĩ baátɛ Yesu, kitonɛkĩ binyina kĩ ɛtɛ̃ yanaa Yerusalem.
Kĩ Yohanes mɔ Yakobo nu fɔlɛtsa a, bivia Yesu kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, awɛ kĩ bɔvɛ fi butomɛna ode fɔyaawɔla be?”
Lɛmɛ Yesu dani ɛkã be anɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Minyína Hũhũ a kĩ ye bade mianɛ! Yĩ Otidziwa Obi a ntáya kĩ mayaawɔla bati, mbom ĩya kĩ maatɛ be nkpã.”
Foesũ Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a tɛ̃ bɛnaa akula bɛbã kamɛ.
Kĩ bɛtsɛ̃ banaa a, onyole odi bi Yesu kĩ, “Maatomɔ nɔ nnaa kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ kĩ aanaa.”
Ade Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Kulikii deĩ fudzikɔ̃, kɔvɔlabi lɛmɛ deĩ fɔtsɔɛ, lɛmɛ Otidziwa Obi a lɛlá awã kĩ yate lɔlɔ malo.”
Ebi oti bɛbã kĩ, “Tomɔ yĩ.”
Lɛmɛ oti a lɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, maatomɔ nɔ, lɛmɛ fɔ̃ nnaabila nda tɔ̃.”
Ade Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Fɔnɛ bikĩ bɛlá Baguma nkpã mɔawɛ a bibila be banɔkpa. Nɔ kɔ̃ naa kanaade lɛtsã nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a akũ.”
Oti bɛbã kɔ̃ lɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, maatomɔ nɔ, lɛmɛ fɔ̃ nnaakla yĩ kɔla bati tɔ̃.”
Ade ke Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Oti kĩ ɛdzɛ̃ yapupu, mɔ yadani kadã liti ni, ɛtáfɛta ɛkpa Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ adzuma a.”
Fukĩĩ liti a, boe Ɔlate pau bati aduesɔũ-nviã bɛbã, ade edo be nviã nviã kĩ bɛnya lɔtɔ bɛnaa tɛmatɔ mɔ tukula a kĩ ye mɔawɛ yaatsã te kamɛ a kamɛ.
Ade ebi be kĩ, “Fudutsa a kĩ míave a pɔnɛ lɛmɛ adzuma bakɛnanɛ a lɛpɔ́nɛ. Mibɔa mpaɛ mikpa kɔba ɔlate a kĩ edo adzuma bakɛnanɛ pii bɛyaave fudutsa a.
Minaa! Mado mi fɔtɔ ndɛ bavelibi nɛ kulikii kamɛ.
Mitabɔɛ sika kuvũ, ĩye osi katsã fuvũ, ĩye mpabua milɛ, ade mitafɔ̃ midza nɛ osi kĩ miawɔ̃na odima a.
“Ntɛ miwo tɔtɔ tidi kamɛ ni, minya lɔtɔ milɛ kĩ, ‘Lukudɔ lɛya nɛ tɔtɔ kĩĩ kamɛ.’
Ntɛ oti kĩ yawɛ lukudɔ deĩ nɛ awã ni, mifɔ̃ mi lukudɔ a litomɔ ye. Lɛmɛ ntɛ odima lɛláa ni, mi nhila a aamuniki ɛya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃.
Mina nɛ tɔtɔ mɔapɛ a kamɛ, minya mimɔa lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bɛkpa mi. Kitonɛkĩ adzuma ɔkɛnanɛ odi nyɛ odi sĩ kɔtɔkase. Mitatu nɛ tɔtɔ mɔa kamɛ minaa tɔtɔ bɛbã kamɛ.
“Ntɛ miwo ɔmatɔ odi kamɛ mɔ bɛtɛ mi ni, minya lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bɛkpa mi.
Mitsa basɔnɛ nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ lɔkɔa mibi bati a kĩ, ‘Baguma lɛgãkanya lɔkɔ a fuã mi.’
Lɛmɛ ntɛ miwo ɔmatɔ odi kamɛ mɔ bɛtátɛ mi ni, midzakũ minaa ye tɔblɔnu akũ lɔkɔa milɛ kĩ,
‘Bɔkpa mi ɔmatɔ kudu a nɛ boe abɔa buko nɛ mi akũ. Lɛmɛ mite anɛ kĩ Baguma lɛgãkanya lɔkɔ a fuã mi!’
Ade mabi mi pipiipi kĩ nɛ bati kadzɛmɛna luwi a akũ ni, Baguma aamɔ Sodom ɔmatɔ a kɔnya ɛba ɔmatɔ a na!

“Bɔbɔɛ makpa nɔ Korasin ɔmatɔ, bɔbɔɛ makpa nɔ Betsaida ɔmatɔ a lɛmɛ! Ntɛ Tiro mɔ Sidon tɛmatɔ a kamɛ nkɛna awãwã fɔtsa ni, kufɛ bidzi nɛ tite, bisua fumakũ akũ, bɛtsɛla batɔ kɔkɔɛ, bɛkɔa bɛtsa kĩ bɛdani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ.
Baguma aamɔ Tiro mɔ Sidon kɔnya nɛ kadzɛmɛna luwi a akũ ɛba mi.
Ade nɔ Kapernaum ɔmatɔ! Kawɛ ɔwɛ kĩ adɛla nɔ akũ nɛ ode? Baakɛna nɔ nɛ kayɔ ɔnaa kanɔkpade!”
Yesu bi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yatse mi kalɛ ni, ade yĩ yatse a. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ esĩ mi ni, ade yĩ esĩ a. Ade ke odi nyɛ odi kĩ esĩ yĩ ni, esĩ Baguma a kĩ edo yĩ fɔtɔ a lɛmɛ.”
Bati aduesɔũ-nviã a muniki bɛya mɔ kawɔlɛ bɛyalɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, hũhũ kpa malo tse boe ntɛ buwũni nɛ be akũ nɛ nɔ dĩ akũ.”
Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mmɔ́ Abonsam ndɛ odetɔ́ kamɛ kamɔanɛ aye kĩ eto ode ɛyatɔ.
Mitse! Nkpa mi kɔbɛ̃ ayekĩ míapuli misuma bɔɛ mɔ kɔkpɔ̃na, ade míanya Okesĩnɛ a kɔbɛ̃ akũ kĩ lɛtsama lɛláakɛna mi a.
Lɛmɛ kawɔlɛ kɛtade mi kĩ hũhũ kpa tse mi kalɛ, mbom mimɔ kawɔlɛ kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ mi buĩ biyi nɛ ode.”

Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a kawɔlɛ wo nɛ Yesu kamɛ ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Yĩ Ɔlɛga, tite mɔ ode Ɔlate, manyɛ nɔ kɔlɛ kitonɛkĩ fɔtsa a kĩ bɛkɔa bɛkɔla kadi banyinɛ mɔ tuvoli banyinɛ a, ɔnyɛ foe ɔtsa bikĩ binyína tuvoli ndɛ babisɛ̃ aye. Oo, Nda, ade aye koũ ɔwɛ kĩ fɔna a.”

Yesu buki ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nda kɔa lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa edo nɛ yĩ awɛ. Odima linyína oti a kĩ Baguma Obi a anɛ mbɔɛntɛ Ɔlɛga a odi keĩ. Ade aye odima lɛmɛ linyína oti a kĩ Ɔlɛga a anɛ, mbɔɛntɛ Obi odi mɔ bikĩ Obi aawɛ kĩ yanyɛ Ɔlɛga ɛtsa a.”
Ade Yesu dani ebi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a odi bɔɛɛ kĩ, “Lɛmɛ mi kɔ̃ Baguma hila mi! Mi anɛ amɔ ade mi atɔ lɛmɛ anu fɔkɔ a.
Mabi mi kĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ pii mɔ fɔgã wɛ kĩ bamɔ lɛtsa a kĩ mimɔ́ finyaa, lɛmɛ bɛtápuli bɛmɔ́, ade bɛwɛ kĩ banu lɛtsa a kĩ mianu a, lɛmɛ bɛtánu foe.”
Luwi a, Yudani mbla ɔtsanɛ a odi ya kĩ yasɔ Yesu ɛdã. Evia ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, litsa kɛnɛ kĩ nkɛna nna nkpã a kĩ ɛlá kawũna a?”
Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Litsa Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ? Nde onu foe kayɔ?”
Onyole a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Wɛ nɔ Ɔlate, nɔ Baguma kalɛ mɔ nɔ ɔwɔlɛ flee, nɔ ɔkla flee nɔ kɔbɛ̃ flee mɔ nɔ kakɔna flee, kawɛ nɔ ɔkɔba kalɛ ndɛ ayekĩ awɛ nɔ mɔawɛ akũ a.”
Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Ɔlɛ ɔnɔkɔali. Kɛna fukĩĩ lɔkɔa aana nkpã.”
Lɛmɛ mbla ɔtsanɛ kĩĩ wɛ kĩ yakpa ye akũ ɔtɔbɛ, foesũ evia Yesu kĩ, “Owei nyɛ yĩ ɔkɔba?”
Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Luwi a, onyole odi to Yerusalem yanaa Yeriko ɔmatɔ kamɛ, ade bayekpanɛ napi ye nɛ osi a. Bibo ye bɛyɛlɛ ye akũ tɛtadiɛ, ade bɛfɔnɛ ye awɛ biyi nɛ wuda mɔ nkpã kayite a.
Fɔyaya kĩ ɔsɔfɔ odi yatsã nɛ osi a na akũ yatɛ̃, lɛmɛ kĩ ɛmɔ oti kĩĩ a ɛtsã ɔɔwɛ̃ ɛtɛ̃.
Ade ayea Levini lɛmɛ yatɛ̃ a. Efuã ɛnadã onyole a, ade ye malo ɛtsã ɔɔwɛ̃ ɛtɛ̃ a.
Lɛmɛ Samariani odi kĩ ɛtsɛ̃ osi a akũ yamɔ oti a. Kĩ ɛmɔ oti a, ye akũ kɔ ye kɔnya.
Efuã ye ade ɛkɔa kugua mɔ bavɛ eko nɛ ye fɔɔkpa kamɛ esui foe a. Ade ɛbɔɛ onyole a ete nɛ ye mɔawɛ ɔyaɛ akũ, ɛkɔa ye ɛnamɛna banɔvɔɛ̃ kasɛkɔ̃ ade ɛdã ye akũ a.
Kĩ kade nyina a, ɛnyɛ sika ɛkpa kasɛkɔ̃ a akũ ɔdãmɛnanɛ a ebi ye kĩ, ‘Dã ye akũ. Ntɛ mmuniki matɛ̃ ni maase nɔ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ aabuki obula kade nɛ ye akũ a kɔtɔ.’ ”
Ade Yesu wũna evia ye kĩ, “Nɛ nɔ kakɔna onukpɛ̃ ni, bati ɛlalɛ kĩĩ kamɛ a, ɔwɔdabe lɛnyɛ ye tɔkɔba kakɛna ɛtsa oti a kĩ ewo nɛ bayekpanɛ awɛ kamɛ a?”
Ade mbla ɔtsanɛ a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oti a kĩ ɛmɔ ye kɔnya a.” Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Kekɔ̃ nɔ malo naa kanaakɛna foe lɔmɔ.”
Luwi a, Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a tsɛ̃ nɛ osi ade bɛnawo akula adi kamɛ a. Otsole odi kĩ bavɛ Marta tɛ ye nɛ ye tɔtɔ kamɛ.
Marta deĩ ɔwaɛ̃tsole kĩ bavɛ Maria. Edzi nɛ boe Ɔlate ɔwɛ̃ ɛkatse ye fɔtsa katsa.
Fɔha Marta kĩ tɔtɔ kamɛ adzuma ko nɛ ye odi akũ, foesũ ɛnabi Yesu kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, fɔtsɛ́la nɔ akũ kĩ nwaɛ̃ kɔa tɔtɔ kamɛ tudzuma a flee eko nɛ yĩ odi akũ? Bi ye ɛyaabumɛna yĩ!”
Ade boe Ɔlate kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “O Marta! Dã, aha nɔ akũ nɛ fɔtsa pii akũ,
lɛmɛ lɛtsa mɔapɛ lisĩ. Maria nyɛ lɛtsa wĩ a kĩ bɛláatɛ nɛ ye awɛ.”
Luwi a, Yesu kabɔa mpaɛ nɛ kakɔ kadi. Kĩ eyua a, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kamɛ ɔmɔa bi ye kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, tsa boe mpaɛ kabɔa ndɛ ayekĩ Yohanes tsa ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a.”
Yesu bi be kĩ, “Ntɛ miabɔa mpaɛ ni, milɛ kĩ,
‘Boe Ɔlɛga,
fɔ̃ bɛkpalɛ nɔ dĩ akũ.
Nɔ lɛgãkanya a kɛya.
Bɛkɛna nɛ nɔ kawɛ akũ,
nɛ tite akũ ndɛ ayekĩ bakɛna nɛ ode a.
Kpa boe luwi nyɛ luwi funitsã a kĩ fusĩ boe a
Kɔa boe tɔkpa kate boe
kitonɛkĩ boe malo bɔakɔa odi nyɛ odi tɔkpa kĩ ɛkɛna nɛ boe akũ a kate.
Tafɔ̃ buwo nɛ sɔhuiɛ kamɛ,
mbom nyɛ boe katomɛna tɔkpa kamɛ.’ ”
Ade Yesu bi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Mibɔɛ foe kĩ mi kamɛ odi naa ɔkɔba sɛkɛ̃ mɔ lɛnyɛ kayite ɛnabi ye kĩ, ‘Ɔkɔba, vɛ abodoo fɔbɔ ɛlalɛ kakpa yĩ,
kitonɛkĩ yĩ ɔkɔba odi to osi mɔ lugo akũ ɛyase yĩ finyaakĩĩ, ade nlá funitsã fudima kĩ makpa ye a!’
“Bɔɛ foe kĩ nɔ ɔkɔba a nɛ́ nɛ kɔla kamɛ ɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Taha yĩ kɔlaa! Ndo kɔla safi ade bɔmɔ yĩ babi bɔwa kɔkɔɛ. Nláapuli mbuki ĩyidza mbɔɛ lɛtsama nkpa nɔ finyaa.’
Mabi mi kĩ ntɛ nɛ be tɔkɔba kakɛna sũ ni, ɛláayidza. Lɛmɛ nɛ ayekĩ ɛdzɛ̃mɛna opunu kabɔa sũ ni, yaayidza ɛkpa ye lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ lisĩ ye a.
“Foesũ mabi mi kĩ mivia fɔtsa lɔkɔa baakpa mi, miwɛ lɔkɔa míamɔ foe, mibɔa opunu lɔkɔa baabinya bɛkpa mi.
Kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛwã fɔtsa ni, yaana foe. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛwɛ litsedi ni, yaamɔ de, ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ yabɔa opunu ni, baabinya bɛkpa ye.
“Mi kamɛ ɔwɔdabe kĩ ɛnyɛ obilɛga, aakɔa kɔɛ ɛkpa obi ntɛ evia ye kafɔabi?
Ĩye ɛkɔa kakpɔ̃na ɛkpa ye ntɛ evia ye ɔkɔkɔ lige?
Titɔ kĩ minyɛ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ malo ni, minyina ayekĩ miate mi babi fɔtsa wĩ. Nde fɔ́aya mɔ boe Ɔlɛga nɛ ode lɛláakɔa ye Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a ɛkpa bikĩ baavia ye a!”
Luwi a, Yesu kablɔmɛna hũhũ kpa kĩ yaálɛ kɔdzɛla etomɛna odi kamɛ. Kĩ hũhũ kpa a nɛ a, oti a yi kɔdzɛla kalɛ kayɔ. Fukĩĩ kɛna bati a kĩ bɛdza nɛ awã a wãwã.
Lɛmɛ bati a badi lɛ kĩ, “Hũhũ kpa lɛgã a kĩ bavɛ Beelzebul a lɛkpa ye kɔbɛ̃ ɛkɔa ɛblɔmɛna hũhũ kpa a.”
Ade badi lɛmɛ wɛ kĩ basɔ Yesu bɛdã, foesũ bibi ye kĩ ɛkɛna awãwã fɔtsa ɛkɔa ɛtsa kĩ Baguma sɛkɛ̃ eto.
Lɛmɛ Yesu nyi lɛtsa a kĩ bɛkakɔna a, foesũ ebi be kĩ, “Ɔmaĩ kĩ ɛsɛ̃ nɛ kutsu kutsu kamɛ, mɔ lɛma nɛ́ nɛ ye kamɛ ni, ɔmaĩ a na aawɔ. Ade aye tɔtɔ nyɛ tɔtɔ kĩ te kamɛ bati sɛ̃ be akũ ni, tayalɛ.
Foesũ ntɛ Abonsam lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a sɛ̃ nɛ kutsu kutsu kamɛ mɔ banɔ akũ lɛma ni, nde kanyakɔ̃ a na aapuli kɛdza? Mialɛ kĩ mablɔmɛna hũhũ kpa kitonɛkĩ Beelzebul lɛkpa yĩ kɔbɛ̃ sũ.
Ntɛ aye mablɔmɛna hũhũ kpa a ni, nde bikĩ bitomɔ mi a ablɔmɛna hũhũ kpa? Mi mɔawɛ bati a nyɛ mi kayɔ bɛtsa kĩ fɔvã miama.
Oowo! Mbom Baguma kɔbɛ̃ akũ fɔtsɛ̃ mɔ mablɔmɛna hũhũ kpa, foesũ fukĩĩ atsa yededeede kĩ Baguma lɛgãkanya a wo mi sɛkɛ̃ kɔkɔɛ.
“Ntɛ odi kĩ edeĩ kɔbɛ̃ dzi akpadza, edzi yadzɔlɛ ye tɔtɔ ni, enyina kĩ ye akũ fɔtsa waa pɛpɛɛpɛ.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi kĩ edeĩ kɔbɛ̃ ɛbɛ̃ ye yanɔ mɔ ye ɛnya ye akũ ni, yafila ye kawũkanɔ fɔtsa a kĩ ete anɛ nɛ foe akũ a ɛsɛ̃ fɔtsa a kĩ ɛtɛ a.
“Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛnyɛ́ yĩ ode ni, ɛdzɛ̃ nɛ yĩ akũ paa, ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaábumɔ yĩ bɔkpɔta ni, fɔtsa ɛlamɛna kayalɛ paa.”
“Ntɛ hũhũ kpa nɛ́ nɛ oti kamɛ ni yanaatsã kamini nɛ fɔkɔ wɔlɛwa kawɛ kasekɔ̃. Ntɛ ɛtána kasekɔ̃ ni, yabi ye akũ kĩ, ‘Maamuniki nnaa yĩ tɔtɔ a kĩ te kamɛ nnɛ́ nto a kamɛ.’
Foesũ yamuniki kanaamɔ kĩ bɛyɔ tɔtɔ a kamɛ bɛmanɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa pɛpɛɛpɛ.
Lɔkɔa yamuniki kanaawɛ hũhũ kpa evũkɔnɔ kĩ bideĩ ablɔ bɛbɛ̃ ye kabumɔ ye akũ bayaadzi nɛ awã. Ntɛ fɔya lɔmɔ a, oti a kadzi kamɛ abu kade kaba ayekĩ fɔna nɛ kayɔkayi a.”
Kĩ Yesu kalɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, otsole odi bɔa fɔwɔla nɛ bati kɔdabu a kamɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Baguma hila otsole a kĩ ɛma nɔ, mɔ lɛmɛ a kĩ de ɔmɛmɛ a!”
Lɛmɛ Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mbom bihila bikĩ batse Baguma kalɛ, kĩ bakɛna nɛ ke akũ lɛmɛ a!”
Kĩ bati kɔdabu a bɔa opim nɛ Yesu akũ a, ɛlɛ ɛnaa lɔtɔ kĩ, “Nviã babi nyɛ bati kpa paa! Bawɛ nsɛntsɛlɛni fɔtsa bɛmɔ́ lɛmɛ bɛláamɔ fudima kɛba Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yona fude a.
Ndɛ ayekĩ Yona nya nsɛntsɛlɛni ɛkpa Ninivefɔ a, ade aye Otidziwa Obi a lɛmɛ aanya nsɛntsɛlɛni nkpa nviã babi a.

Nɛ Kadzɛ Luwi a akũ ni, Seba Lɛgãtsole a aayidza ɛdza ɛkɔ nviã babi kɔtɔ kitonɛkĩ eto ye tite akũ nɛ kakɔ mɔ lugo ɛnatse Lɛgã Salomo kadikanyi fɔtsa katsa a, lɛmɛ mabi mi kĩ odi kĩ ɛbɛ̃ Salomo deĩ nɛ awĩ.
Ninivefɔ lɛmɛ aayidza bɛkɔ mi kɔtɔ nɛ Kadzɛ Luwi a akũ, kitonɛkĩ bɛdani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ Yona bi be Baguma kalɛ a. Lɛmɛ mabi mi kĩ odi kĩ ɛbɛ̃ Yona deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ nɛ awĩ.
“Odima látɛna ɔsɛdza kakɔla ye ĩye kakɔa lɔɔda kasua ye. Mbom bakɔa ye kate nɛ ɔsɛdza otse akũ ayekĩ ntɛ bati awo nɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ ni, baamɔ fɔkɔ yededeede.
Oti banebi kɛna ndɛ ɔsɛdza ɛkpa ye kutitse. Ntɛ nɔ anɛ amɔ kamɔ wĩ ni, nɔ kutitse a flee deĩ nɛ ɔhaĩ kamɛ. Lɛmɛ ntɛ nɔ anɛ lɛnɛ́nɛ ni, nɔ kutitse a flee aana nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ.
Foesũ dã kadã wĩ lɔkɔa ɔhaĩ a kĩ edeĩ nɛ nɔ kamɛ a ɛtadani ɛkɛna ɔtũ.
Ntɛ nɔ akũ flee kɛna haĩ mɔ nɔ kakɔma lɛláa ɔtũ kamɛ ni, nɔ akũ flee aakpalɛ ndɛ ayekĩ ɔsɛdza ako nɛ fɔtsa akũ kakpalɛ foe a.”
Kĩ Yesu yua kɔdzɛla a, Farisini odi tsɛlamɔ ye kĩ ɛyaanya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃. Foesũ ɛnaa awã ɛnɛ edzi kĩ yanya.
Fɔkɛna Farisini a wãwã kĩ ɛmɔ kĩ Yesu távɔlɛ awɛ ndɛ ayekĩ mbla tsa a fɔmɔ eyi kanya kayɔ.
Foesũ boe Ɔlate bi ye kĩ, “Finyaa ni, mi Farisifɔ miavɔlɛ mi tɔkɔɔpu mɔ fɔɔdaɛ liti, lɛmɛ anɛngbã mɔ ablɔ yi mi kamɛ tɛtɛɛtɛ.
Bakɔasia! Nnɛ́ Baguma a kĩ ɛkɛna fɔtsa fɔmɛde a lɛkɛna kanya fude a lɛmɛ mbɔɛɛ?
Mikɔa fɔtsa a kĩ fudeĩ nɛ tɔkɔɔpu mɔ fɔɔdaɛ kamɛ a mikpa ahiãfɔ lɔkɔa mi lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa akũ aakpalɛ nɛ Baguma anɛ.

“Bɔbɔɛ makpa mi Farisifɔ! Miakɔa tɛnyɛ kumɛkumɛ kĩ tabɔa mɔ ɔlɛ̃ mɔ ɔlɛ̃ a te katsu kawuade kakpa Baguma, lɛmɛ misĩ ɔtɔbɛ kakpa bati ade miáwɛ Baguma kalɛ lɛmɛ a. Ade fukĩĩ bamɛ kɛnɛ kĩ miakɛna mibumɔ foe nkaɛ a.
“Bɔbɔɛ makpa mi Farisifɔ! Miawɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ fudzikɔ̃ nɛ mi katsɛnakɔ̃ ade miawɛ kĩ bati bɛwɔ̃na mi mɔ obu nɛ kɔya a.
“Bɔbɔɛ makpa mi! Mila ndɛ funi kĩ bɛtáyi foe ɔsũ, kĩ bati tsɛ̃ nɛ foe akũ nɛ katanyi kamɛ.”
Nɛ awã naa Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ a kamɛ ɔmɔa bi ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, ntɛ ɔlɛ fukĩĩ ni, ovũna boe malo.”
Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Bɔbɔɛ makpa mi mbla batsanɛ a lɛmɛ. Milɔ́la bati fɔlɔtsa kĩ foe kalɔ deĩ ɔlɔmɛ, lɛmɛ mi mɔawɛ miáyo awɛ kĩ míabumɔ be fɔtsa a kalɔ.
“Bɔbɔɛ makpa mi paa kitonɛkĩ mike funi mɔkalɛ mikpa Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a. Ade Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a kĩ mi bawanyɔ kɔ a.
Mi mɔawɛ a mitunɔ kĩ lɛtsa a kĩ mi bawanyɔ kɛna a nɛnɛ. Bɛkɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a ade mi mike be funi a.
Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ Baguma nɛ ye kadikanyi kamɛ lɛ kĩ, ‘Maado Yĩ onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ mɔ fɔtɔ banyanɛ nɛ be sɛkɛ̃. Baakɔ badi, bitomɔ babɛbã lɛmɛ liti.’
Foesũ baavɛlɛ nviã bati sɔtɔ nɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ flee a kĩ bɛkɔ, kito anɛ katinya kayɔkayi a.
Kito Abel kakɔ kɛnawo Zakaria kĩ bɛkɔ nɛ afɔlibɔ atɛnyɛ mɔ kakɔ kpalɛwa kayite a. Nuwĩ paa kĩ, baavɛlɛ nviã babi sɔtɔ nɛ fukĩĩ flee sũ!
“Bɔbɔɛ makpa mi mbla batsanɛ a. Kitonɛkĩ mikɔla safi a kĩ sabinya kadikanyi kɔla a. Mi mɔawɛ misĩ kĩ miáwo nɛ koe kamɛ ade miasua bikĩ babɔa mbɔdi kĩ bawo a lɛmɛ osi a!”
Kĩ Yesu dzakũ nɛ awã a, Farisifɔ mɔ Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ yi fɔlɛtsa kavɛlɛ kayɔ mɔ Yesu mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ, ade bɛkavia ye fɔlɛtsa nɛ fɔtsa pii akũ,
bɛkabɔa mbɔdi kanaĩ kĩ bapi ye nɛ ye kɔdzɛla kalɛ kamɛ a.
Bati mpim mpim yakpɔta limii kĩ bɛkasumini akũ malo. Yesu nya lɔtɔ ebi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Midã kadã wĩ paa nɛ Farisifɔ oyila fɔtsa a kĩ fɔnyɛ anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa katsa a akũ.
Lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ bisua bido ni, baanyɛ de kanya, ade fɔlɛtsa kɔlawa fudi nyɛ fudi ni, bati aanu foe.
Foesũ kalɛ nyɛ kalɛ kĩ bɛlɛ nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ ni, baanu ke mɔ suwa ketee ade kalɛ kĩ biwusa mido nɛ odi sɔtɔ kamɛ ni, baade lɛtsã nɛ ke akũ.
“Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mabi mi kĩ mitavila bikĩ baakɔ sukɛna lɛmɛ ke liti bɛláapuli bɛkɛna lɛtsama fɔba foe.
Maatsa mi oti a kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ miavila. Mivila Baguma a kĩ ntɛ ɛkɔ bati eyua edeĩ kɔbɛ̃ kĩ yaata be edo nɛ fi kĩ fɔádĩ kamɛ. Mitɛ yĩ mido, ade ye nyɛ oti kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ miavila a.
Nnɛ́ kaplɛ nviã banɔ funitataɛ elo? Lɛmɛ Baguma lálɛla kamɔapɛ malo.
Mi lɔlɔ tɔlɔ malo bɛkã te flee, foesũ mitavila, kitonɛkĩ mitɛ kɔya mibɛ̃ funitataɛ beblebee.
“Mabi mi yededeede kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛlɛ nɛ bati anɛ kĩ ɛnyɛ yĩ ode ni, Otidziwa Obi lɛmɛ aakɛna lɔmɔ ɛkpa ye nɛ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a anɛ.
Lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ esĩ yĩ nɛ bati anɛ ni, Otidziwa Obi lɛmɛ aasĩ ye nɛ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a anɛ.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaalɛ kalɛ kadi etia Otidziwa Obi ni, baakɔa bite ye, lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaalɛ fubusuotsa nɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa akũ ni, bɛláakɔa bite ye da.
“Foesũ ntɛ bɛkpã mi banaadzɛmɔ mi nɛ Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃, ĩye abãã banɔkɔɛ̃ anɛ ĩye fɔgã anɛ ni, mitaha akũ nɛ ayekĩ míapili mi lɔlɔ ĩye lɛtsa a kĩ míalɛ a akũ.
Kitonɛkĩ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa aatsa mi lɛtsa a kĩ míalɛ nɛ lɔkɔ a kamɛ.”
Onyole odi nɛ bati kɔdabu a kamɛ bi Yesu kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, bi nwaɛ̃nyole ɛfɔ̃ bɔsɛ̃ boe ɔlɛga adzapadiɛ a kĩ ɛkɔa eyi boe a.”
Ade ke Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nwaɛ̃, owei lɛkpa yĩ osi kĩ ndzɛ mi fɔlɛtsa ĩye nsɛ̃ adzapadiɛ nkpa mi bati nviã kĩĩ?”
Ade ebi be flee kĩ, “Midã kadã wĩ, lɔkɔa mipi mi akũ nɛ anɛngbã akũ, kitonɛkĩ oti nkpã lɛláa akũ fɔtsa kamɛ.”
Ade Yesu bɔa be lɛgbã ɛlɛ kĩ, “Luwi a, osikani odi kĩ edzi tɔ̃ na tite kĩ yanyɛ funitsã wĩ nɛ te kamɛ.
Ɛlɛ nɛ ye kamɛ kĩ, ‘Nlá awã kĩ mako yĩ funitsã kĩĩ flee. Litsa maapuli nkɛna?’
“Ebi ye akũ kĩ, ‘Ade fukĩĩ maakɛna a. Maapansam yĩ tɛpata lɔkɔa nke tɛbaũbaũ awã kĩ maatɛɛ yĩ fugbanɔ mɔ yĩ fɔtsa bɛbã flee.
Lɔkɔa maabi yĩ ɔkla kĩ, “Ɔna lɔlɔ wĩ paa. Odeĩ fɔtsa wĩ kĩĩ flee kĩ fɔ́akpã nɔ nɛ futeli pii kamɛ. Dzi kawɛya, kanya, kamɔa, kamɔ kawɔlɛ.” ’
“Lɛmɛ Baguma bi ye kĩ, ‘Ɔkɔasia! Lɛnyɛ mɔapɛ kĩĩ baatɛ nɔ nkpã nɛ nɔ awɛ, lɔkɔa owei aanya fɔtsa a kĩ ɔmanɛ oyi ɔkpa nɔ akũ a?’ ”
Ade Yesu wũna ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ade aye fɔla fɔkpa bikĩ a kĩ bɛmanɛ fɔtsa pii bɛkpa be akũ lɛmɛ bɛtátɛ kɔya nɛ Baguma anɛ a.”
Ke liti a, Yesu bi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Foesũ mabi mi kĩ mitaha akũ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ míanya midzi nkpã, ĩye lɛtsa a kĩ míasua akũ a akũ.
Minyi kĩ nkpã tɛ kɔya ɛba funitsã, ade kutitse lɛmɛ tɛ kɔya kɔba tilima a.
Midã anande, yaádu funitsã ade yaákpɔta funitsã lɛmɛ a. Ɛlá oli ĩye funitsã kakokɔ̃ lɛmɛ Baguma adɔɔla ye. Mi kɔ̃ mitɛ kɔya kɔlaa miba kɔvɔlabi.
Mi kamɛ owei aapuli ɛkɔa luwi mɔa ete nɛ ye nkpã fuwi akũ ntɛ eti ɛha ye akũ bo aye malo?
Ntɛ ɔláapuli ɔkɛna lɛtsama nɛ fɔtsa kabii kĩĩ akũ ni, nde sũ aha nɔ akũ nɛ fɔtsa bɛbã akũ?
“Midã ayekĩ flawasi abo anɛ. Fɔákɛna adzuma ade fɔánɔ tilima kakpa foe akũ a. Lɛmɛ mabi mi kĩ Lɛgã Salomo mɔ ye akũ kana fɔtsa a flee malo táhɛhɛ fɔlɛ kadã ndɛ nhuilɛ kĩĩ kamɛ fɔmɔa.
Baguma akɛɛlɛ lupo kamɛ tuwĩ. Tuwĩ adza nviã, kunya tiku, lɔkɔa bipila te. Nde sũ Baguma lɛláadã kĩ ɛkpa mi lɛtsa a kĩ míasua akũ ɛba tuwĩ a? Mi katɛkado adã kabii koũ!
Foesũ mitakaha akũ kɔlaa, mitakabu lɔlɔ kamɛ luwi daa nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ míanya mɔ likĩ míamɔa akũ.
Kitonɛkĩ bikĩ bɛtátɛ Baguma bido a, ade be adzi kabu lɔlɔ kamɛ nɛ fukĩĩ bamɛ odu akũ a. Mi Ɔlɛga nyina kĩ misĩ fɔtsa kĩĩ flee.
Mbom miwɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a akũ osi lɔkɔa yaakpa mi fɔtsa kĩĩ flee lɛmɛ.
“Mi sukuloo a kĩ mitomɔ yĩ a, mitavila, kitonɛkĩ fɔnyɛ Baguma kawɛ kĩ yaakpa mi fudzikɔ̃ nɛ ye lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ.

Minɔ mi akũ kana fɔtsa mikɔa foe sika a mite ahiãfɔ. Minɔ sika fuvulumi a kĩ fɔláakpeli a mikpa mi akũ, lɔkɔa mikɔla mi akũ kana fɔtsa nɛ ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a. Awã naa, foe akũ lɛláatinya kitonɛkĩ oyekpanɛ lɛláapuli ɛta foe ade lupuka lidima lɛmɛ lɛláapuli libula foe kade a.
Kitonɛkĩ awã kĩ nɔ akũ kana fɔtsa sĩwa deĩ ni, ade awã nɔ ɔwɔlɛ lɛmɛ aana a.
“Mina nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ mikpa lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ laaya, mido tɛtadiɛ mikpa adzuma kakɛna lɔkɔa mifɔ̃ mi tɛsɛdza tɛkaatɛ̃,
ndɛ basumunɛ kĩ bidzi badzɔlɛ be Ɔlate kamuniki kato obolitsɔ̃ kapikɔ̃ kaya. Ntɛ ɛyabɔa opunu ni baabinya bɛkpa ye mɔatsɛ.
Kawɔlɛ aade basumunɛ ntɛ be Ɔlate a yamɔ kĩ bɛmanɛ akũ bidzi badzɔlɛ ye kaya. Mabi mi kĩ yaakɔa ye lima efili nɛ kate, ɛfɔ̃ bidzi lɔkɔa ɛsɛ̃ funitsã ɛkpa be bɛnya.
Kawɔlɛ aade bikĩ baana nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ titiliwu ntɛ ɛya nɛ lɛnyɛ kayite ĩye odenyinawi.
Ade minyina kĩ ntɛ tɔtɔ ɔlate a enyi lɔkɔ a kĩ oyekpanɛ aya ni, kufɛ ɛláakpa ye osi ebubuli ye kɔla ewo.
Ade ayea kɛnɛ kĩ mi malo mina nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ a, kitonɛkĩ Otidziwa Obi aaya nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ miláate anɛ a kamɛ.”
Ade Petro via Yesu kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, boe odi ɔbɔa lɛgbã kĩĩ ɔkpa mbɔɛɛ kĩ latamɔ odi nyɛ odi?”
Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Owei nyɛ osumunɛ ɔnɔkɔalini mɔ kadi onyinɛ? Ade ye nyɛ ekĩ ye ɔlate kɔa ɛdzɛla kĩ ɛkaadã tɔtɔ akũ, ɛkpa basumunɛ bɛbã a funitsã nɛ lɔkɔ wĩ akũ.
Kawɔlɛ aade osumunɛ a kĩ ye ɔlate ayamɔ ye kĩ ɛlamɛna fukĩĩ kakɛna!
Ɔnɔkɔali, mabi mi kĩ Ɔlate a aakɔa osumunɛ kĩĩ ɛdzɛla nɛ ye fɔtsa a kĩ edeĩ flee a onukpɛ̃.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ osumunɛ a bi ye akũ kĩ, ‘Yĩ ɔlate buna owi nɛ osi akũ.’ mɔ eyi ye bakɔba basumunɛ batsole mɔ banyole kabo kayɔ, kanya pɔtɔɔ, kamɔa bavɛ kawuga lɛmɛ ni,
ye ɔlate ayafuta ye luwi mɔa nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ ɛtáte anɛ ĩye ɛláanyi kamɛ. Ɔlate a aavɛlɛ ye sɔtɔ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ ndɛ bikĩ bideĩ atɔ ɔsĩ aye.
“Osumunɛ a kĩ enyina ye adzuma kĩ ye ɔlate kpa ye lɛmɛ ɛtámanɛ akũ ɛkpa foe kakɛna ni, yaatɛ sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ mɔ ɔsĩ paa.

Lɛmɛ osumunɛ kĩ enyína lɛtsa kĩ ye ɔlate awɛ, lɛmɛ ɛkɛna lɛtsa kĩ a lɛfɛta sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ ni, baavɛlɛ ye sɔtɔ sukuloo. Oti kĩ bɛkɔa fɔtsa pii bido nɛ ye awɛ ni, baavia foe pii bitomɛna ye awɛ. Ade oti kĩ bɛkɔa fɔtsa pii kĩ fublusu bido nɛ ye awɛ ni, baavia foe pii kĩ fublusu bitomɛna ye awɛ.
“Nkɔa kadani vɔɛ̃ kĩ fɔnyɛ fi ĩyaatɛna nɛ katinya kamɛ ade nwɛ kĩ kufɛ fi a fuyi katɛ̃ kayɔ kɔkɔɛ a.
Ndeĩ mui kawɔla lubo kamɔ adi kĩ maatɛ ade ke fɔ́akaha yĩ ɔwɔlɛ flee kɛnaawo luwi a kĩ lubo kamɔ a atɛ̃ nɛ yĩ akũ a.
Miakɔna kĩ lukudɔ nkɔa ĩyamɛna nɛ katinya kamɛ mbɔɛɛ? Oowo! Nnɛ́ lukudɔ mbom ɔdzɛ mɔ kasɛ̃ ĩyamɛna.
Kito finyaa kanaa a, tɔtɔ kĩ bati elo deĩ nɛ te kamɛ ni, kasɛ̃ aaya nɛ be kamɛ. Be ɛlalɛ ayidza bɛdza nɛ be nviã akũ ade be nviã aayidza bɛdza nɛ be ɛlalɛ akũ a.

Babilɛga aayidza bɛdza nɛ be babinyole akũ, ade babinyole aayidza bɛdza nɛ be balɛga akũ a. Babima aayidza bɛdza nɛ be babitsole akũ ade babitsole aayidza bɛdza nɛ be bama akũ a. Nyina amɛ aayidza bɛdza nɛ be babi batsɔ̃ akũ ade babi batsɔ̃ aayidza bɛdza nɛ be nyina amɛ akũ a.”
Yesu buki ebi bati a kĩ, “Ntɛ mimɔ́ kĩ oni dza nɛ suwa katomukɔ̃ ni mialɛ kĩ oni aako, ade yako lɛmɛ a.
Ade ke ntɛ mimɔ́ kĩ ɔwɛ bɔa eto kayɔ sɛmakɛ ni, mialɛ kĩ ovio ya, ade fɔaya lɔmɔ a.
Mi anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa bakɛnanɛ, miapuli kadã tite mɔ odetɔ́ kamɛ kamɔ kalɛ lɛtsa a kĩ laaya. Nde sũ miápuli minyɛ nviã lɔkɔ kĩĩ kayɔ?
“Nde sũ miápuli mike otse mikpa mi akũ nɛ lɛtsa wĩ a kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ mikɛna akũ?

Ntɛ odi bɔɛ kalɛ nɛ nɔ akũ ni, tsã osi nyɛ osi akũ mimɔ ye milɛ foe fɔmɔ yanaadza nɛ fɔlɛtsa kadzɛkɔ̃. Ntɛ nnɛ́ aye ni yaavɛlɛ nɔ ɛma fɔlɛtsa ɔdzɛnɛ ade ye malo yaakɔa nɔ ɛkpa polisifɔ bɛnaado nɔ nɛ kɔla a.
Mabi nɔ kĩ ade awã aana flee kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ ose kɔtɔ a flee oyua a.”
1 Lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, bati badi yakpa Yesu kanyi kĩ Pilato kɔ Galileafɔ badi nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ bɛkabɔa afɔliɛ nɛ Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ nɛ Yerusalem.
Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mikɔna kĩ Galileafɔ a kĩ bɛkɔ a tɛnɛ titikpa kakɛna kaba Galileafɔ bɛbã flee a sũ?
Oowo, nnɛ́ aye kɔlaa! Mabi mi kĩ ntɛ mitádani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ ni, mi a flee míaku ndɛ be aye.
Nde nyɛ bati ewua-alɛ̃ a kĩ Siloam kɔla gɛlɛɛlɛ veli kɔkɔ be a? Mikɔna kĩ be nyɛ titikpa bakɛnanɛ bɛba bikĩ nɛ Yerusalem flee a?
Oowo! Nnɛ́ aye fɔla kɔlaa! Mabi mi kĩ ntɛ mitádani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ ni, míaku ndɛ be aye.”
Ade Yesu bɔa be lɛgbã ɛlɛ kĩ, “Lɔkɔ lidi onyole odi du atɔ kutse nɛ ye kɔba kamɛ. Ɛkasɛla kadã ntɛ yaana atɔ babi nɛ koe akũ lɛmɛ ɛtána badima.
Ade ke ebi ekĩ yadãmɛna kɔba akũ kĩ, ‘Dã! Ade futeli ɛlalɛ mɔa flee kĩ maya nɛ awĩ kayaawɛ kutse kĩĩ babi lɛmɛ maámɔ badima. Tsua koe kamuni. Nde sũ kɔadza kɔkabula tite a kade?’
“Lɛmɛ kɔba akũ ɔdãmɛnanɛ a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃, fɔ̃ kɔdza, kpa yĩ kateli mɔa kabu. Maatu nsinya koe lɔkɔa nko fɔtsa a kĩ fɔ́akpa koe tite kanɔ.
Ntɛ kuwũ atɔ babi kateliva ni, kekɔ̃ fɔnɛnɛ. Lɛmɛ ntɛ kɔtáwũ babi ni, aapuli ɔfɔ̃ bitsua koe bimuni.’ ”
Nɛ Kawɛya Luwi lidi akũ ni, Yesu katsa fɔtsa nɛ Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ kadi.
Otsole odi kĩ hũhũ kpa do ye fɔsɔ mɔ akũ futeli ewua-alɛ̃ flee na nɛ awã. Fɔsɔ a fɔ̃ ekũũkũ ebuki yaápuli eyo akũ kpĩĩ.
Kĩ Yesu mɔ ye a ɛvɛ ye ebi ye kĩ, “Boe ɔma, bɛnyɛ nɔ nɛ fɔsɔ kamɛ!”
Yesu kɔa awɛ ete nɛ ye akũ. Lɛtalɛta otsole a puli eyo akũ kpĩĩ ade ke emu Baguma a.

Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ yadãmɛna Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ a na kalɔkpa paa kĩ Yesu tsa ɔsɔnɛ nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ, foesũ ebi bati a kĩ, “Fuwi evũ deĩ kĩ foe kamɛ kɛnɛ kĩ bɔkɛna adzuma. Foesũ miya nɛ fuwi kĩĩ kamɛ bɛtsa mi fɔsɔ, lɛmɛ nnɛ́ nɛ Kawɛya Luwi a akũ!”
Boe Ɔlate kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mi anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa bakɛnanɛ, mianyɛ mi bayaɛ tɔwɛ̃ banaamɔa mui nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ.
Finyaakĩĩ amɔ Abraham kasinu kamɛ obi kĩ Abonsam do ye fɔsɔ mɔ akũ futeli ewua-alɛ̃ flee. Fɔnɛ́nɛ kĩ banyɛ ye nɛ tɔwɛ̃ kamɛ nɛ Kawɛya Luwi a akũ?”
Mbuayɛ a kĩ Yesu kpa a fɔ̃ kɔnyɔã wo ye bakesĩnɛ a, lɛmɛ kawɔlɛ de bati a nɛ awãwã fɔtsa flee a kĩ ɛkɛna a sũ.
Ade Yesu via kĩ, “Nde Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a la? Litsa maakɔa nkɔnamɔ de?
Fɔla ndɛ fudutsa libi kabii ki onyole odi bɔɛ ɛnadu nɛ ye kɔba. Libi a mɛ libo anɛ lɛkɛna kutse, ade kɔvɔlabi yakɛna fɔtsɔɛ nɛ koe tɛnanɛ kamɛ a.”
Yesu buki evia kĩ, “Litsa maakɔa Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a nkɔnamɔ?
Fɔla ndɛ ayekĩ otsole kɔa oyila fɔtsa ɛtsɛka nɛ bodobodo onuvoe baũ kamɛ, fɔna flee kɛnawo kĩ evuya puu.”
Lɔkɔ a kĩ Yesu anaa Yerusalem a, ɛnatsã tɛmatɔ mɔ tukula kamɛ ɛkatsa bati fɔtsa.
Ade odi via ye kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, mbɔɛɛ bati sukuloo aana katɛ?”
Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ,
“Bɔa mbɔdi katsã onyukpɛ̃ a kĩ ɛtása a kamɛ kawo, kitonɛkĩ bati pii abɔa mbɔdi kĩ bawo lɛmɛ bɛláapuli.
Kɔla ɔlate a aayidza ɛyaabalɛ kɔla a, ade ntɛ midza nɛ kanya mikabɔa opunu kalɛ kĩ, ‘Boe Ɔlate, binya kakpa boe ni.’
“Ɔlate a aakpa mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Ĩnyína mi mɔ awã kĩ mito!’
“Ade ke míalɛ kĩ, ‘Bɔmɔ nɔ lɛnya bɔmɔa ade ɔtsa fɔtsa nɛ boe ɔmatɔ kamɛ lɛmɛ a!’
“Lɛmɛ yaakpa mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Ĩnyína awã kĩ mito! Midzakũ nɛ yĩ ɔwɛ̃, mi tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ.’
“Awã naa, kabe kadi kĩ míabe, miba adɔ̃ ntɛ mimɔ́ Abraham, Isak mɔ Yakob mɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a flee nɛ ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ, lɛmɛ mi kɔ̃ bɛblɔmɛna mi kĩ mitawo.
Bati aato suwa kadekɔ̃ mɔ suwa katomukɔ̃, kayɔ mɔ nyangɛ bɛyaanya bɛmɔa nɛ ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a.
Ade bati a kĩ bɛkpa liti finyaa a, badi aadani batɔnyade, ade bikĩ bɛnyaa lɔtɔ finyaa a, badi aadani liti bakpanɛ.”
Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, Farisifɔ badi yabi Yesu kĩ, “Wɛ sɔwa kadzakũ nɛ awĩ kĩĩ kanaa kakɔ bɛbã, kitonɛkĩ lɛgã Herodes wɛ kĩ yaakɔ nɔ.”
Ade ke Yesu bi be kĩ, “Minaabi kalikii a kĩ, ‘Nviã mɔ kunya flee maakablɔmɛna hũhũ kpa, maatsa fɔsɔ lɛmɛ, ade nɛ luwi lɛlalɛde a akũ ni, maayua yĩ adzuma.’
Lɛmɛ kɛnɛ kĩ mpi osi, nviã, kunya mɔ kukunya, kitonɛkĩ fɔtáfɛta kĩ bakɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ nɛ kakɔma kɛba Yerusalem.

“Yerusalem, Yerusalem! Nɔ bati kɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a ade bɛtalɛ bikĩ Baguma do nɛ nɔ sɛkɛ̃ a boe bɛkɔ be a. Titi eni ntáwɛ kĩ makpɔta nɔ babi ndɛ ayekĩ ɔkɔkɔbima api ye babi kado nɛ ye fupoki kayɔ, lɛmɛ ɔtákpa yĩ osi.
Nɛ foesũ finyaa nɔ Asɔli Kɔla aawaa luto. Ade mabi mi kĩ miláabuki mimɔ́ yĩ kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ míalɛ kĩ, ‘Baguma hila ekĩ yaya nɛ boe Ɔlate dĩ akũ a!’ ”
Nɛ Kawɛya Luwi lidi akũ ni, kĩ Yesu naanya nɛ Farisifɔ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ odi awã a, bati a ko anɛ bɛkadã ye.
Onyole odi kĩ ye akpɔ mɔ abɔa wumi dzi nɛ ye anɛ kamɛ.
Ade ke Yesu via Farisifɔ mɔ mbla batsanɛ a kĩ, “Boe mbla kpa osi kĩ bɛtsa oti nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ mbɔɛɛ kĩ ɛtákpa osi?”
Lɛmɛ bisĩ bɛtákpa ye mbuayɛ. Ade Yesu ta oti a ɛtsa ye, ɛnyɛ ye osi ɛdzakũ a.
Ade ɛdani ebi be kĩ, “Ntɛ mi kamɛ odi obi ĩye ɔnantsue tɔ mui lɛkɛ nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ ni, miáwɛ sɔwa kanaanyɛ ye nɛ lɛkɛ a kamɛ?”
Lɛmɛ bɛtápuli bɛkpa ye foe mbuayɛ.
Kĩ Yesu mɔ́ ayekĩ bati a kĩ bɛvɛ nɛ kanyakɔ̃ kawãnɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ fudzikɔ̃ a, ɛbɔa be lɛgbã kĩĩ kĩ,
“Ntɛ odi vɛ nɔ nɛ obolitsɔ̃ kapikɔ̃ ni, tanaadzi nɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ kadzikɔ̃, kitonɛkĩ fɔ́apuli fɔya kĩ ɛvɛ odi kĩ edeĩ obu ɛbɛ̃ nɔ,
lɔkɔa oti a kĩ ɛvɛ mi bati nviã ayabi nɔ kĩ, ‘Kɔa nɔ lukpo kakpa oti kĩĩ’ ade ke aakɔa kɔnyɔã oyidza ɔnaadzi nɛ kakɔ nkaɛ a.

Mbom ntɛ bɛvɛ nɔ nɛ kakɔ kadi ni, naadzi nɛ kakɔ a kĩ kɛtátɛ kɔya, ayekĩ ntɛ ekĩ ɛvɛ nɔ a yamɔ nɔ ni, yaabi nɔ kĩ, ‘Ɔkɔba, yidza kanaadzi nɛ awã kĩ kɛtɛ kɔya a.’ Awã naa bati bɛbã flee a kĩ bɛvɛ a aakɔa obu bɛkpa nɔ,
kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛdɛla ye akũ nɛ ode ni, baakɛna ye nɛ kayɔ, ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛdɔla ye akũ ni, baadɛla ye nɛ ode!”

Ade Yesu bi oti a kĩ ɛtsɛlamɔ ye nɛ kanyakɔ̃ a kĩ, “Ntɛ ote opunu ɔkpa bati ni, tavɛ nɔ bakɔba, awaɛ̃ amɛ, nɔ kɔla babi ĩye nɔ badzi kɔba a kĩ bideĩ akũ a, ayekĩ baavɛ nɔ malo ɔnaanya nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ bise kɔtɔ.
Mbom ntɛ ate opunu ni, vɛ ahiãfɔ, bikĩ bɛnɛ lɛkpɛ̃, bikĩ biveliveli mɔ banɛkunɛ.
Fukĩĩ aafɔ̃ Baguma lihila nɔ kusɛkusɛ, kitonɛkĩ bɛláapuli bise nɔ foe kɔtɔ. Lɛmɛ Baguma aase nɔ kɔtɔ nɛ luwi a kĩ bati wĩ aayidza bito kanɔkpa a.”
Kĩ bati a kĩ bidzi nɛ opunu akũ bɛkanya kamɛ ɔmɔa nu fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Yesu lɛ a, ebi ye kĩ, “Kawɔlɛ aade bati a kĩ baadzi nɛ opunu akũ nɛ ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a.”
Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Luwi a onyole odi te opunu ɛvɛ bati beblebee.
Kĩ kanya lɔkɔ wo ɔtɔ a edo ye osumunɛ kĩ ɛnaavɛ bikĩ ɛtsɛlamɛna a kĩ, ‘Miya. Buyua Lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa!’ ”
“Lɛmɛ bati a kĩ ɛtsɛlamɛna a flee kamɛ odi nyɛ odi nyɛ onukpɛ̃. Oti ɔtɔnyade bi osumunɛ a kĩ, ‘Nnaya tite finyaa, foesũ kɛnɛ kĩ nnaadã te, make nɔ aduli nláapuli ĩya.’
“Oti bɛbã lɛmɛ lɛ kĩ, ‘Ĩya banantsue ewua, kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ nkpã be nnaasɔ be ndã ntɛ baapuli bɛkɛna adzuma kakɛna wĩ. Makɛ nɔ aduli, nláapuli ĩya.’
“Oti bɛbã lɛmɛ lɛ kĩ, ‘Wɔadzɔ nkɔã ɔtsɔ̃, foesũ nláapuli ĩya.’

“Osumunɛ a muniki ɛnabi ye ɔlate lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya a flee. Awã naa ɔlate a na kalɔkpa paa ade ebi ye osumunɛ a kĩ, ‘Wɛ sɔwa kanaa tɔblɔnu mɔ fɔla fuyite nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ, kakpã ahiãfɔ, lɛkpɛ̃ banɛnɛ, banɛkunɛ mɔ bikĩ biveliveli a kayamɛna.’
“Owi tábuna mɔ osumunɛ a yabi ye kĩ, ‘Yĩ ɔlate nkɛna nɛ nɔ ɔlɛdo akũ, lɛmɛ fudzikɔ̃ buki fute.’
“Ade ke ɔlate a bi ye kĩ, ‘Naa tɔblɔnu mɔ fusikũ akũ nɛ tukula kamɛ, kabi be kĩ bɛya ayekĩ kɔla a kamɛ aayi.
Mabi mi a flee kĩ, bikĩ be ĩnya lɔtɔ nvɛ a kamɛ odima lɛláata yĩ funitsã a onukpɛ̃!’ ”
Luwi a, kĩ bati kɔdabu tomɔ Yesu a, ɛdani ebi be kĩ,
“Ntɛ odi ya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃, mɔ yawɛ ye ɔlɛga, ɔma, ɔtsɔ̃, babi, bawaɛ̃nyole mɔ bawaɛ̃tsole, mɔ ye mɔawɛ akũ kalɛ kaba yĩ ni, ɛláapuli ɛnya yĩ fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtábɔɛ ye asendua ɛlɔ etomɔ yĩ ni, ɛláapuli ɛnya yĩ fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ.
“Ntɛ mi kamɛ odi awɛ kĩ yake kɔla baũ kudi ni, yaánya lɔtɔ kadzi kabu kɔla a kake akũ akunta kadã, kamɔ ntɛ yaana sika epuli eke kɔla a ewũna?
Ntɛ ɛtákɛna foe lɔmɔ ni, ɛláapuli eyua kɔla a titɔ kĩ eke kayɔkayi futekũ malo. Ade ke bati flee a kĩ bamɔ foe a aadi ye nsekuo bɛlɛ kĩ,
‘Oti kĩĩ yi kɔla kake kayɔ lɛmɛ ɛtápuli eke koe ewũna.’
“Ntɛ lɛgã lidi aabɔɛ kawũ nɛ lɛgã bɛbã akũ ni, yaanya lɔtɔ edzi ɛkɔna foe akũ ɛdã ntɛ yaapuli ɛkɔa sodzafɔ mpim ewua ɛnya lɛgã bɛbã a kĩ lideĩ sodzafɔ mpim tɛya a akũ.
Ntɛ ɛláapuli ni, yaanya lɔtɔ edo batɔ nɛ lɛgã kĩ a sɛkɛ̃ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ bɛtáfuã akũ lɔkɔa ɛkpa lɔlɔ.”
Yesu lɛ ewũna kĩ, “Ade aye mi kamɛ odima lɛláapuli ɛnya yĩ fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ ntɛ ɛtáfɔnɛ ye lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ edeĩ awɛ a.
“Lɛdɛmɛ nɛnɛ, lɛmɛ ntɛ lɛyɛla de ɔmɛnɛ ni, osi odima lɛláa kĩ aatsã ye akũ obuki odo de ɔmɛnɛ.
Lɛnɛ́nɛ lɛkpa ndɛ tite kanɔ, ĩye lɛkpa fukluku kawulakɔ̃ malo. Kata bata de kawula.
“Okĩ edeĩ atɔ ni, etse katse wĩ!”
Luwi a, tɔgɔlɛ batɛnɛ mɔ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ bɛbã ya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃ bɛyaatse ye fɔlɛtsa.
Nɛ awã naa, Farisifɔ mɔ mbla batsanɛ a kakɛna hũhũhũhũ kalɛ kĩ, “Oti kĩĩ atɛ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ ade yado awɛ kanya mɔ be malo a!”
Foesũ Yesu bɔa be lɛgbã kĩĩ kĩ,
“Ntɛ mi kamɛ odi ɔmɔa deĩ baveli ɔha mɔ kɔmɔa yɛla nɛ be kamɛ a, litsa yaakɛna? Yaafɔnɛ baveli aduekrɔũ-evedi a nɛ kanyakɔ̃ a ɛnaatsã ɛwɛ kukĩ kɔyɛla a kɛnaawo kĩ ɛmɔ koe.
Ntɛ ɛmɔ koe a, yaamɔ kawɔlɛ paa lɔkɔa ɛbɔɛ koe ete nɛ lɔbɔtɛɛ ɛyamɛna nɛ kɔla.
Ade yaavɛ ye bakɔba mɔ banunɛ ebi be kĩ, ‘Kawɔlɛ de yĩ kĩ mmɔ́ yĩ kuveli a kĩ kɔyɛla a, foesũ mifɔ̃ bɔmɔ́ kawɔlɛ!’
Mabi mi kĩ ade aye baamɔ kawɔlɛ nɛ ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a nɛ oti mɔa kĩ ɛdani ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ akũ, kɛba bati aduekrɔũ-evedi kĩ be akũ kpalɛ kĩ bɛtásĩ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kadani.
“Ntɛ otsole odi deĩ sika ovoe babi ewua mɔ ɛyɛla libi mɔa ni, litsa yaakɛna? Yaatɛna ɔsɛdza ɛyɔ kɔla kamɛ ɛdã kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ yededeede kɛnawo kĩ ɛmɔ sika libi a.
Ntɛ ɛmɔ de a, yaavɛ ye bakɔba mɔ banunɛ ɛkpɔta ebi be kĩ, ‘Kawɔlɛ de yĩ paa kitonɛkĩ mmɔ́ yĩ sika libi a kĩ lɛyɛla a. Mifɔ̃ bɔmɔ́ kawɔlɛ!’
Mabi mi kĩ ade aye Baguma ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ aamɔ kawɔlɛ nɛ tɔkpa ɔkɛnanɛ mɔa kĩ ɛdani ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ akũ a.”
Yesu lɛ ɛnaa lɔtɔ kĩ, “Onyole odi na babinyole nviã.
Ade obisɛ̃de a bi ɔlɛga kĩ, ‘Papa, kɔa adzapadiɛ a kĩ yaanya yĩ kanyakɔ̃ a kakpa yĩ finyaa.’ Foesũ onyole a sɛ̃ ye adzapadiɛ kamɛ ɛkpa ye babinyole nviã a.
“Nɛ fuwi fudi liti ni, obisɛ̃de a nɔ ye kanyakɔ̃ fɔtsa a flee ade ɛdzakũ mɔ foe sika a. Ɛnaa katide mɔ lugo ɛnabula sika a kade nɛ nkpã basabasa kadzi kamɛ.
Ebula lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ edeĩ a kade. Ke liti a kɔlɛ kudi nɛ nɛ tite a na flee akũ ade ohiã pi ye a.
Nɛ foesũ ɛnaa onyole odi nɛ tite a akũ sɛkɛ̃ kĩ yanaakɛna adzuma ɛkpa ye. Onyole a kpa ye baplakuo akũ kadãmɛna nɛ ye kɔba.
Nɛ kɔlɛ sũ ɛwɛ kĩ yanya funitsã a kĩ bɛkako baplakuo a fudi lɛmɛ odima tákpa ye lɛtsama.
“Nɛ ke kawũna a, ɛyamɔ ye akũ eyi ɔsũ, ade ɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Bati a kĩ nda bɔɛ bakɛna tudzuma a ana kanya kawĩ pɔtɔɔ fɔate malo. Amɔ yĩ dzi nɛ awĩ kɔlɛ ayua yĩ kakɔ.
Maayidza nnaa nda sɛkɛ̃ nnaabi ye kĩ, “Papa, nkɛna tɔkpa nɛ Baguma mɔ nɔ akũ.
Ntáfɛta kĩ abuki ɔvɛ yĩ kĩ nɔ obi, mbom kɔa yĩ kakɛna ndɛ nɔ tudzuma bakɛnanɛ a kamɛ ɔmɔa.” ’
Foesũ eyidza epi osi yanaa ɔlɛga sɛkɛ̃.
“Ɔlɛga mɔ́ ye mɔ lugo kĩ yaya. Obi akũ kɔ ye kɔnya ade ewula atsɛ ɛnatu eboomu ye a.
“Ade ke obi a bi ye kĩ, ‘Papa, nkɛna tɔkpa nɛ Baguma mɔ nɔ akũ. Ntáfɛta kĩ abuki ɔvɛ yĩ kĩ nɔ obi.’
“Lɛmɛ ɔlɛga a vɛ ye basumunɛ a ebi be kĩ, ‘Miwɛ sɔwa mibɔɛ tɛtadiɛ kĩ tɛnɛnɛ paa mido ye. Mido ye lipetia nɛ lawobi mɔ mpabua nɛ abɔa.
Ke liti ni, minaanyɛ ɔnantsue kĩ ɛdɔli paa mikɔ, lɔkɔa bɔnya bɔmɔ́ kawɔlɛ.
Kitonɛkĩ bɔbɔɛ foe kĩ yĩ obi kĩĩ ku lɛmɛ finyaakĩĩ edzi nkpã. Ɛyɛla lɛmɛ bɛmɔ́ ye.’ Foesũ biyi luwi a kanya kayɔ.
“Nɛ lɔkɔ kĩĩ kamɛ a, obinyolenɔkɔɛ̃ a na nɛ kɔba. Kĩ eto yade, efuã tɔtɔ kamɛ a, enu tɔnɔ mɔ kuto nkã.
Foesũ ɛvɛ basumunɛ a kamɛ ɔmɔa evia ye kĩ, ‘Litsa lámɔ kaya nɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ?’
“Osumunɛ a kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Awaɛ̃ muniki ɛya nɛ ɔtɔ ade ke aga fɔ̃ bɛkɔ ɔnantsue dɔliwa a, kitonɛkĩ emuniki ɛya mɔ akũ ɔsĩ.’
“Tuwũna ba ɔnɔkɔɛ̃de a, ade esĩ kĩ yaáwo nɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ, foesũ ɔlɛga naa ye sɛkɛ̃ ɛnake ye aduli kĩ ewo ɛya nɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ.
Lɛmɛ obi bi ɔlɛga kĩ, ‘Dã, nkɛna adzuma ndɛ ɔsate nɛ futeli pii kĩĩ kamɛ nkpa nɔ, kĩ ntáyidza ndza nɛ nɔ akũ da. Ade ɔtákpa tɔ̃ yĩ midi katukpabi malo kĩ nkɔ bɔmɔ yĩ bakɔba bɔmɔ́ kawɔlɛ a.
Lɛmɛ nɔ obi kĩĩ nabula nɔ akũ kana fɔtsa flee kade nɛ adɔpaafɔ akũ ade kĩ emuniki ɛya ni, ɔkɔ ɔnantsue dɔliwa akpa ye!’
“Awã naa, ɔlɛga bi ye kĩ, ‘Yĩ obi, odeĩ nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ luwi daa, ade lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ ndeĩ a, nɔ lide lanɛ.
Lɛmɛ kɛnɛ kĩ bɔanya luwi bɔmɔ́ kawɔlɛ, kitonɛkĩ bɔbɔɛ foe kĩ awaɛ̃ kĩĩ ku lɛmɛ finyaa edzi nkpã, ɛyɛla lɛmɛ bɔmɔ́ ye.’ ”
Yesu bi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Osikani odi na adzuma ɔkɛnanɛ kĩ edzi nɛ ye tudzuma onukpɛ̃. Bati yabi osikani a kĩ ye tudzuma onukpɛ̃ ɔdzanɛ a abula ye sika kade.

Foesũ osikani a vɛ tudzuma onukpɛ̃ ɔdzanɛ a evia ye kĩ, ‘Litsa fɔlɛtsa manu kĩ balɛ nɛ nɔ akũ a? Kɛna akunta yededeede nɛ ayekĩ ɔnɛɛ yĩ tudzuma akũ, kitonɛkĩ ɔláapuli obuki ɔnya yĩ fɔtsa akũ ɔdãmɛnanɛ.’
“Ade ke tudzuma akũ ɔdãmɛnanɛ a bi ye akũ kĩ, ‘Yĩ ɔlate aablɔmɛna yĩ nɛ adzuma kamɛ. Litsa maakɛna? Nlá kɔbɛ̃ kĩ maatu tɔbɔnkam ade ke kɔnyɔã akɔ yĩ mɔ fɔtsa kawã lɛmɛ a.
Ahãã! Ĩnyina lɛtsa a kĩ maakɛna. Ntɛ adzuma nɛ́ nɛ yĩ awɛ ni, maana bakɔba kĩ baatɛ yĩ mɔ kawɔlɛ nɛ be awã!’
“Foesũ ɛvɛ bati a kĩ bidzimɔ ye ɔlate fɔtɔ a. Evia ɔtɔnyade a kĩ, ‘Ani odzimɔ yĩ ɔlate?’
“Ekĩ edzimɔ kɔtɔ a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Bɔ̃ tɛkantsi ɔha.’
“Ade tudzuma akũ ɔdãmɛnanɛ a bi ye kĩ, ‘Amɔ nɔ akunta nɛ awĩ. Kɛna akũ kadzi katsɛlɛ aduenum.’
“Ade evia ɔbɛbã lɛmɛ kĩ, ‘Nɔ malo ani odzimɛna?’
“Kɔtɔ odzimɛnanɛ a lɛ kĩ, ‘Fugbanɔ fuvũ baũbaũ ɔha mɔa.’
“Oti a kĩ ɛdzɛ̃ nɛ tudzuma onukpɛ̃ a bi ye kĩ, ‘Amɔ nɔ akunta nɛ awĩ. Tsɛlɛ aduesɔũ kayi.’
“Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ ɔlate a mu ye tudzuma ɔdãmɛnanɛ a nɛ nyansã tɛdake tisi a kĩ ɛbɔɛ a sũ. Ɔnɔkɔali ni, katinya kamɛ bati deĩ nyansã tisi nɛ be fɔtsakɛlawa kamɛ bɛbɛ̃ bikĩ batse Baguma kalɛ a.”
Ade Yesu lɛ ɛnaa lɔtɔ kĩ, “Mikɔa katinya kamɛ akũ kana fɔtsa mikɛna tɔkɔba, ayekĩ ntɛ fuwoli ni, baatɛ mi nɛ daa nkpã ɔtɔ a kamɛ.
“Odi nyɛ odi kĩ edi oni nɛ fɔtsa kabii akũ ni, yaadi fɔtsa baũ akũ oni. Ade ayea odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtádi oni nɛ fɔtsa kabii akũ ni, ɛláadi fɔtsa baũ akũ oni lɛmɛ.
Ade ntɛ mitádi katinya kamɛ fɔtsa akũ oni a, nde baapuli bɛkɔa fɔtsa kĩ fɔtɛ kɔya fɔba katinya kamɛ fɔtsa bido nɛ mi awɛ?
Ntɛ mitádi lɛtsa a kĩ lɛnyɛ oti bɛbã fude kĩ fɔtɛ kɔya akũ oni ni, owei aakɔa litsedi kĩ laanya mi fude ɛkpa mi?

“Osumunɛ odima lɛláapuli esum balate nviã. Yaakesĩ ɔmɔa lɔkɔa ɛwɛ ɔyade a kalɛ. Ĩye yaakɔa ye akũ ɛkpa ɔmɔa lɔkɔa ɛvɛlɛ akũ nɛ ɔyade a akũ. Ɔnɔkɔali nyɛ kĩ, ɔláapuli osum Baguma mɔ katinya kamɛ fɔtsa.”
Kĩ Farisifɔ a nu fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Yesu lɛ a, bɛnyɛ ye ahĩsɛm kitonɛkĩ sika bawɛnɛ banɛ.
Yesu bi be kĩ, “Minyɛ bati kĩ bakɛna be akũ ndɛ badã yedede nɛ bati bɛbã anɛ, lɛmɛ Baguma nyina mi tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ. Kitonɛkĩ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔtɛ kɔya nɛ otidziwa anɛ a, fɔnyɛ kɔwɛ̃ fɔtsa nɛ Baguma anɛ.

“Mose mbla mɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ fɔtsa a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ biyi a kɛna adzuma kɛyawo Yohanes Mui Ɔwɔlanɛ a lɔkɔ. Kito ke a, balɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a akũ, ade odi nyɛ odi lamɛna kapili kĩ yawo nɛ de kamɛ.
Lɛmɛ fɔadã bɔɛɛ kĩ tite mɔ ode aawɔ kɛba kĩ baafɔnɛ fɔlɛtsa kabiiwɛ awɛ nɛ mbla a kamɛ.
“Onyole nyɛ onyole kĩ esĩ ɔtsɔ̃, mɔ ɛnakɔã ɔbɛbã ni, ɛbɔa adɔpaa. Ade onyole kĩ ɛkɔã otsole kĩ bisĩ ni, ye malo ɛbɔa adɔpaa.
“Osikani odi dzi nkpã. Ɛkahihiɛ ye akũ nɛ tilima kĩ tɛtɛ kɔya kamɛ, ade ɛkanya nkpã mɛnɛmɛnɛ luwi daa a.
Ohiãni odi lɛmɛ kĩ bavɛ Lazaro lɛmɛ dzi nkpã tɔ̃. Fɔɔkpa nɛ́ nɛ ye akũ flee ade bɛkabɔɛ ye kanaadzina nɛ osikani a kɔla onyukpɛ̃ a.
Ɛkakɔna kĩ yaana funitsã wuliwa a kĩ fɔato osikani opunu akũ katɔ nɛ tite a ɛnya. Bakpete malo kayadzɛmɛ ye fɔɔkpa a kamɛ.
“Ohiãni a ku, ade ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ yabɔɛ ye bɛnamɛna ode bɛnadzina nɛ Abraham ɔwɛ̃ a. Osikani a lɛmɛ yaku, ade ke bibila ye a.
Nɛ kanɔkpade awã kĩ ɛkamɔ lubo paa a, ɛdzɛla anɛ ɛmɔ Abraham mɔ lugo nɛ ode, mɔ Lazaro lɛmɛ kĩ edzi nɛ ye ɔwɛ̃.
Ade osikani a bɔa fɔwɔla ɛvɛ ye kĩ, ‘Boe Ɔlɛga Abraham! Mɔ yĩ kɔnya kafɔ̃ Lazaro edo lawobi nɛ mui kamɛ ɛta nɛ yĩ sɛmɛ akũ, ayekĩ fɔ́adɔla yĩ ɔmɔado, kitonɛkĩ nlamɛna lubo kamɔ nɛ fi kĩĩ kamɛ!’
“Lɛmɛ Abraham bi ye kĩ, ‘Yĩ obi, te anɛ kĩ bɛkpa nɔ fɔtsa wĩ flee nɛ nɔ nkpã kamɛ, lɛmɛ Lazaro kɔ̃ ni, fɔtsa kpa nɛnɛ ɛna. Lɛmɛ finyaakĩĩ a, ɛlamɛna kawɔlɛ kamɔ, ade nɔ malo ɔlamɛna lubo kamɔ a.

Ade lɛtsa kĩ lɛbɛ̃ kɔlaa nyɛ kĩ, lɛkɛ dzununuunu waa nɛ boe kayite, kĩ ntɛ odi wɛ kĩ yato awĩ ɛnyina ɛya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ ni, ɛláapuli. Ade ayea ntɛ odi lɛmɛ wɛ kĩ yato awã ɛnyina ɛya nɛ boe sɛkɛ̃, ɛláapuli a.’
“Awã naa, osikani a bi ye kĩ, ‘Boe Ɔlɛga Abraham, make nɔ aduli kĩ do Lazaro ɛnaa nda tɔtɔ kamɛ,
awã kĩ ndeĩ bawaɛ̃nyole elo. Fɔ̃ ɛnaabɔa be kɔkɔ ayekĩ be malo bɛláayawo nɛ lubo kamɔ kĩĩ kamɛ.’
“Ade Abraham bi ye kĩ, ‘Awaɛ̃ amɛ deĩ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Mose mɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a tsɛlɛ biyi a. Kɛnɛ kĩ bitse fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛlɛ a lɔkɔa bɛkɛna nɛ foe akũ.’
“Osikani a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Boe Ɔlɛga Abraham, fɔláawĩ be! Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi aayidza eto kanɔkpa ɛnaa be sɛkɛ̃ ni, baadani be tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ.’
“Lɛmɛ Abraham bi ye kĩ, ‘Ntɛ bɛláatse Mose mɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a fɔlɛtsa ni, ntɛ odi to kanɔkpa ɛnaa be sɛkɛ̃ malo a, bɛláatɛ ye fɔlɛtsa a bido.’ ”
Yesu bi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Fɔtsa a kĩ foe aafɔ̃ bati liwo nɛ tɔkpa kamɛ a aaya kokooko, lɛmɛ bɔbɔɛ makpa oti a kĩ ye akũ fɔ́atsã fɔya a!
Fɔnɛnɛ fɔkpa ye ntɛ bɛkɔa kɔwɔlɛ kpale bɛvɛla ye nɛ sɔmɔ bɛta bido nɛ mpo kamɛ, kɛba kĩ yaafɔ̃ babisɛ̃ kamɛ ɔmɔa liwo nɛ tɔkpa kamɛ.
Foesũ midã kadã wĩ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ miakɛna a akũ.
“Ntɛ awaɛ̃ kɛna nɔ tɔkpa ni, kã ye anɛ. Ntɛ etunɔ kĩ eku kɔtɔ ni, kɔa kate ye.
Ntɛ ɛkɛna tɔkpa nɛ nɔ akũ titi evũkɔnɔ nɛ luwi mɔa kamɛ mɔ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ ɛyabi nɔ kĩ eku kɔtɔ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ akɔa ote ye.”
Fɔtɔ banyanɛ a bi Yesu kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, fɔ̃ boe katɛkado kide nɛ ode kibu.”
Ade Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ odeĩ katɛkado kĩ kɛpɔnɛ lububu ndɛ kutse libi kabiiwɛ flee ni, aapuli obi kutse kĩĩ kĩ, ‘Bɔlɛ mɔ tunu kanaadza nɛ mpo kamɛ’ ade kɔ́atse nɔ a.
“Mibɔɛ foe kĩ mi kamɛ odi deĩ ɔpaani kĩ yadã nɔ kɔba akũ, ĩye ekĩ yadãmɛna nɔ baveli akũ, ntɛ eto ede a, aabi ye kĩ ɛwɛ sɔwa ɛyadzi ɛnya?
Oowo! Mbom aabi ye kĩ, ‘Manɛ akũ katɔ funitsã, kadza kasum yĩ, ĩnya, mmɔa ĩyua tɔ̃ fɔmɔ nɔ malo aanya.’
Osumunɛ tásĩ ɛkpa kɔlɛkanyɛ ntɛ ɛkɛna nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ ɛkɛna akũ. Mbɔɛɛ esĩ?
Ade ayea fɔla fɔkpa mi a. Ntɛ mikɛna lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ mbi mi kĩ mikɛna ni, milɛ kĩ, ‘Basumunɛ odi bɔanɛ, lɛtsa a kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ de bɔakɛna a, ade de bɔkɛna a.’ ”
Kĩ Yesu anaa Yerusalem a, ɛnatsã Samaria mɔ Galilea ɔbɛ̃ akũ.
Kĩ ɛkɔa yawo akula adi kamɛ a, banyole ewua kĩ basɔ fɔsɔ ngbã yatsɛlamɔ ye.
Bɛdza mɔ lugo ade bɛbɔa fɔwɔla kĩ, “Boe Ɔlɛga Yesu, mɔ boe kɔnya!”
Yesu dã be ade ebi be kĩ, “Minaa, minaakɔa mi akũ mitsa basɔfɔ bɛsɛla mi akũ bɛdã.” Kĩ bɛyɛlɛ banaa nɛ osi a, fɔsɔ a wɔ nɛ be akũ.
Kĩ be kamɛ ɔmɔa mɔ kĩ fɔsɔ a wɔ nɛ ye akũ a, emuniki ɛya mɔ Baguma kamu mɔ fɔwɔla kɔɔba.
Ɛyatɔ nɛ Yesu abɔa kamɛ ɛnyɛ ye kɔlɛ. Onyole kĩĩ nyɛ Samariani.
Yesu via ye kĩ, “Nnɛ́ banyole ewua ntsa fɔsɔ a? Nde be evedi nkaɛ a?
Nde sũ ɔnɔvɔɛ̃ kĩĩ odi limuniki ɛyaanyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ?”
Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Yidza kanaa. Nɔ katɛkado fɔ̃ ɔsaɛ.”
Farisifɔ badi via Yesu lɔkɔ a kĩ de kamɛ Baguma lɛgãkanya a aaya. Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Baguma lɛgãkanya a lɛlaaya nɛ osi a kĩ bati amɔ mɔ anɛ a.
Odima lɛláalɛ kĩ, ‘Dã, amɔ foe nɛ awĩ’ ĩye ‘amɔ foe nɛ akĩĩ,’ kitonɛkĩ Baguma lɛgãkanya a deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ.”
Ke liti a ebi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Lɔkɔ lidi aaya kĩ míawɛ kĩ miamɔ Yĩ Otidziwa Obi fuwi a kamɛ lɔmɔa lɛmɛ miláamɔ de.
Bati badi aana, ade baabi mi kĩ, ‘Midã ye nɛ akĩĩ!’ ĩye ‘Midã ye nɛ awĩ!’ Lɛmɛ mitatomɔ foe liti.
Kitonɛkĩ ayekĩ odetɔ́ kamɛ amɔanɛ kato sɛkɛ kĩĩ kanaa sikĩĩ a, ade aye Otidziwa Obi a kaya aana a.
Lɛmɛ kɛnɛ kĩ ɛnya lɔtɔ ɛmɔ lubo pii, ade nviã bati lɛmɛ aasĩ ye a.
“Ayekĩ fɔna nɛ Noa lɔkɔ a, ade aye fɔ́ana nɛ Otidziwa Obi a kabuki kaya fuwi a kamɛ a.
Bati flee kanya bɛkamɔa, banyole mɔ batsole kakɔã akũ, kɛnawo luwi a kĩ Noa de ewo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ, ade oni ko eyili fɔkɔ ɛwɔla bati flee a.
“Ade ayea fɔ́ana ndɛ ayekĩ fɔna nɛ Lot lɔkɔ lɛmɛ a. Bati kanya, bɛkamɔa, bɛkanya kɔyaatɔ, kadu fɔtsa ade badi lɛmɛ kake fɔla a.
Ade luwi a kĩ Lot nɛ́ nɛ Sodom ɔmatɔ kamɛ a, fi mɔ fukpokpo kĩ fudeĩ nfiã kpitii wula futo ode fɔyawɔla be a flee.
“Ade aye fɔ́ana nɛ luwi a kĩ Otidziwa Obi a aanɛ ɛta a.
Nɛ luwi a na, oti kĩ edeĩ nɛ kɔla ode ɛtabuki eduma kĩ yanaafila ye akũ fɔtsa nɛ kɔla kamɛ. Ade ayea odi kĩ edeĩ nɛ kɔba kamɛ ni, ɛtabuki emuniki ɛnaa tɔtɔ kamɛ kĩ yanaabɔɛ litsedi.
Mite anɛ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya nɛ Lot ɔtsɔ̃ akũ a!
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛbɔa mbɔdi kĩ yapili ye nkpã ni, yaayɛla ye, ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛyɛla ye nkpã ni yaana nkpã a bio.
Luwi a lɛnyɛ ni, mabi mi kĩ bati nviã aawa nɛ ɔkɛna mɔa akũ, baabɔɛ ɔmɔa bɛdzakũmɛna lɔkɔa bɛfɔnɛ ɔyade a biyi.
Batsole nviã aakawɔlɛ onuvoe nɛ kɔwɔlɛ akũ, baabɔɛ ɔmɔa lɔkɔa bɛfɔnɛ ɔyade a awɛ biyi.
Banyole nviã aakakɛna adzuma nɛ kɔba. Baabɔɛ ɔmɔa bɛnamɛna, bɛfɔnɛ ɔmɔa biyi.”
Ade fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a via ye kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, nɛ ndia?”
Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Awã kĩ fɔtsa kuwa waa ni, ade awã fɔpɛtɛ akpɔta a.”
Yesu bɔa ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a lɛgbã lidi, ɛkɔa yatsa be kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ bɛkaabɔa mpaɛ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ, kĩ akpɔ ɛtaveli be da.
Ebi be kĩ, “Fɔlɛtsa ɔdzɛnɛ odi na nɛ ɔmatɔ odi kamɛ kĩ ɛtávila Baguma ĩye ɛkɔa obu ɛkpa odima lɛmɛ.
Okunawa odi lɛmɛ na nɛ ɔmatɔ mɔapɛ a kamɛ, ade ɛkayake ye aduli kĩ, ‘Bumɔ yĩ kanyɛ yĩ nɛ yĩ okesĩnɛ awɛ kamɛ.’
“Fɔtɛ lɔkɔ pii kĩ fɔlɛtsa ɔdzɛnɛ a sĩ ɛtákɛna lɛtsama nɛ foe akũ. Lɛmɛ nɛ ke kawũna kamɛ a, ebi ye akũ kĩ, ‘Titɔ kĩ maávila Baguma ade maákɔa obu kakpa otidziwa malo ni,
nɛ ɔhau beblebee kĩ okunawa kĩĩ akpa yĩ sũ ni, maadã kĩ ɛna ye ɔtɔbɛ. Ntɛ ntákɛna lɔmɔ ni, yaakaya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ lɔkɔa ɛláafɔ̃ nna kawɛya.’ ”
Ade boe Ɔlate lɛ ɛnaa lɔtɔ kĩ, “Mitse lɛtsa a kĩ fɔlɛtsa ɔdzɛnɛ kĩ yaádi ɔnɔkɔali kĩĩ lɛ.
Finyaakĩĩ a, miatɛ kado kĩ Baguma lɛláadzɛ ɛkpa ye bati a kĩ babe kavɛ ye lɛnyɛ mɔ suwa, kavia kabumɛna a ɔtɔbɛ? Mbɔɛɛ miatɛ kado kĩ ɛláabumɛna be mɔatsɛ?
Mabi mi kĩ yaadzɛ ɛkpa be ɔtɔbɛ mɔatsɛ. Lɛmɛ ntɛ Otidziwa Obi a ya nɛ katinya kamɛ ni, yaamɔ kĩ bati deĩ katɛkado?”
Yesu bɔa lɛgbã kĩĩ ɛkpa bati a kĩ bɛtɛ bido kĩ bɛkpalɛ yedede ade basupa bati nkaɛ a.
Ebi be kĩ, “Luwi a, bati nviã badi naa Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ kĩ banaabɔa mpaɛ. Ɔmɔa nyɛ Farisini, ɔyade a nyɛ tɔgɔlɛ ɔtɛnɛ.

Farisini a kpɛ̃ ye akũ ɛnadza ɛbɔa mpaɛ kĩ, ‘Baguma, manyɛ nɔ kɔlɛ, kitonɛkĩ nlá anɛngbã. Maádi bati ablɔ ade maákɛna adɔpaa ndɛ ayekĩ bati bɛbã akɛna a. Manyɛ nɔ kɔlɛ lɛmɛ kĩ nlá ndɛ tɔgɔlɛ ɔtɛnɛ a kĩ ɛdzɛ nɛ akĩĩ a aye.
Masui onukpɛ̃ fuwi nviã nɛ ɛkwansieda mɔa kamɛ, ade makɔa lɛtsa a kĩ mana a foe katsu kawuade a kakpa nɔ a.’
“Lɛmɛ tɔgɔlɛ ɔtɛnɛ a dza mɔ lugo, ade ɛtáwɛ kĩ yadzɛla anɛ ɛdã ode malo a. Lɛmɛ ɛkɔa awɛ ɛbɔamɔ ɔwɔlɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Baguma, titikpa ɔkɛnanɛ manɛ, mɔ yĩ kɔnya!’ ”

Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mabi mi kĩ tɔgɔlɛ ɔtɛnɛ a akũ lɛkpalɛ yedede nɛ Baguma anɛ kĩ emuniki ɛnaa kɔla a, nnɛ́ Farisini a. Kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛdɛla ye akũ nɛ ode ni, baakɛna ye nɛ kayɔ, ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛdɔla ye akũ ni, baadɛla ye nɛ ode.”
Bati badi kɔa be babi bɛyamɛna kĩ Yesu ete awɛ nɛ be akũ. Kĩ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a mɔ́ fukĩĩ a, bɛkã be anɛ.
Lɛmɛ Yesu vɛ babisɛ̃ a ɛyamɛna nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃, ɛlɛ kĩ, “Mifɔ̃ babisɛ̃ bɛya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃, mitasua be osi. Kitonɛkĩ bikĩĩ bamɛ odu lá Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a.
Mite fukĩĩ anɛ! Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtátɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a ndɛ obisɛ̃ aye ni ɛláapuli ewo nɛ de kamɛ dadaada.”
Yudafɔ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ odi via Yesu kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ wĩ, litsa kɛnɛ kĩ nkɛna fɔmɔ maana nkpã kĩ ɛla kawũna dadaada a?”
Ade Yesu via ye kĩ, “Nde sũ avɛ yĩ oti wĩ? Odima lɛnyɛ́ oti wĩ, mbɔɛntɛ Baguma mɔapɛ.
Onyina mbla a kĩ ɛtsa kĩ, ‘Tabɔa adɔpaa, takɔ oti, taye, tama fɔvã ote nɛ odima akũ, bu aga mɔ ama.’ ”
Oti a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Kito anɛ yĩ tibisɛ̃ kamɛ a, nkɛna nɛ tɛbla kĩĩ flee akũ.”
Kĩ Yesu nu foe a, ebi ye kĩ, “Lɛtsa mɔa te nɔ kakɛna. Naanɔ nɔ fɔtsa flee a kĩ odeĩ a kakɔa foe sika a kakpa ahiãfɔ, lɔkɔa aana akũ kana fɔtsa nɛ ode. Ke liti muniki kayaatomɔ yĩ.”
Lɛmɛ kĩ onyole a nu fɔlɛtsa a ewo ɔblɔ paa, kitonɛkĩ ɛna akũ kana fɔtsa beblebee.
Yesu mɔ ayekĩ ewo ɔblɔ a, ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Fɔ́ana ɔsĩ fɔkpa asikafɔ kĩ baapuli biwo nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ!
Fɔadã bɔɛɛ kĩ ɔpɔnkɔ mɔ kapu aatsã ɔnɔbɔ̃ ɔkɛ kamɛ ɛnɛ, kɛba kĩ osikani aawo nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ.”
Ade bati a kĩ binu kalɛ kĩĩ a via Yesu kĩ, “Kekɔ̃ owei koũ aana katɛ?”
Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Lɛtsa a kĩ otidziwa lɛláapuli ɛkɛna dadaada ni, Baguma kɔ̃ aapuli ɛkɛna.”
Awã naa Petro bi Yesu kĩ, “Dã, bɔfɔnɛ boe tɔtɔ awɛ buyi bɔya butomɔ nɔ.”
Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mafɔ̃ minyi yededeede kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛfɔnɛ ye tɔtɔ, ɔtsɔ̃ ĩye bawaɛ̃, ĩye bamanɛ ĩye babi eyi nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a sũ ni,
baase ye fɔtsa kĩĩ fublusu nɛ nviã katinya kĩĩ kamɛ mɔ nkpã kĩ ɛla kawũna a nɛ kikĩ kaaya a kamɛ.”
Yesu kpã ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ewua-nviã a ɛnamɛna ɔɔwɛ̃ ade ebi be kĩ, “Mitse! Bɔanaa Yerusalem, awã kĩ fɔtsa flee a kĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ tsɛlɛ nɛ Otidziwa Obi akũ biyi a, aaya nɛ foe kamɛ.
Baakɔa ye bido nɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ awɛ, bidi ye nsekuo, bivũna ye, bitua tanɛ biko nɛ ye akũ.
Baabo ye lɔkɔa bɛkɔ ye, lɛmɛ nɛ luwi lɛlalɛde akũ ni, yaabuki eyidza edzi nkpã.”
Lɛmɛ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ tánu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ fudima kayɔ. Bɛkɔa foe kayɔkanu bɛkɔla be, ade ke bɛtányi lɛtsa a kĩ de akũ Yesu kalɛ kɔdzɛla a.
Kĩ Yesu fuã Yeriko ɔmatɔ a, ɔnɛkunɛ odi dzi nɛ osi ɔɔwɛ̃ ɛkawã fɔtsa.
Kĩ enu bati kɔdabu nkã kĩ batɛ̃ a, evia kĩ, “Litsa lamɔ kaya?”
Ade bibi ye kĩ, “Yesu Nazaretni a lɛyaatɛ̃.”
Awã naa, ɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba kĩ, “Yesu, Lɛgã Dawid Obi! Mɔ yĩ kɔnya!”
Bati a kĩ bɛnyaa lɔtɔ a wũni nɛ ye akũ kĩ esua onukpɛ̃. Lɛmɛ ɛdanɛ fɔwɔla kabɔa kɔɔba kalɛ kĩ, “Lɛgã Dawid Obi! Mɔ yĩ kɔnya!”
Foesũ Yesu fɔ̃ ɛdza ade ɛlɛ kĩ bɛkpã ɔnɛkunɛ a bɛma ye a. Kĩ ewo Yesu sɛkɛ̃ a, evia ye kĩ,
“Litsa awɛ kĩ nkɛna nkpa nɔ?”
Ɔnɛkunɛ a akpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, mawɛ kĩ mbuki mmɔ́ fɔkɔ.”
Ade Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Kekɔ̃ mɔ fɔkɔ. Nɔ katɛkado fɔ̃ ɔsaɛ.”
Deedimɔapɛ epuli ɛmɔ fɔkɔ ade ke etomɔ Yesu mɔ Baguma kɔlɛ kanyɛ a. Kĩ bati kɔdabu a mɔ fukĩĩ a, be flee bimu Baguma.
Yesu nawo nɛ Yeriko ɔmatɔ a kamɛ, ɛtsã ye kamɛ ɛtɛ̃.
Tɔgɔlɛ ɔtɛnɛnɔkɔɛ̃ osikani paa odi kĩ bavɛ Zakeo dzi nɛ awã.
Ɛkabɔa mbɔdi kĩ yamɔ Yesu enyi ye, lɛmɛ kĩ ɛnyɛ oti lukũ sũ, bati lidede fɔ̃ ɛtápuli ɛmɔ ye.
Foesũ ewula atsɛ ɛnya bati kɔdabu a lɔtɔ ɛnade nɛ kutse gɛlɛɛlɛ kudi kamɛ ayekĩ yaamɔ Yesu kitonɛkĩ enyina kĩ yaatsã awã ɛtɛ̃.
Kĩ Yesu wo kutse a kayɔ a, ɛdzɛla anɛ ɛmɔ Zakeo ade ɛvɛ ye kĩ, “Zakeo, duma mɔatsɛ, kɛnɛ kĩ mase nɛ nɔ awã nviã.”
Zakeo wɛ sɔwa eduma ade ɛyatɛ Yesu mɔ kawɔlɛ a.
Bati a flee kĩ bɛmɔ́ fukĩĩ a kɛna hũhũhũhũ nɛ Yesu akũ bɛlɛ kĩ, “Oti kĩĩ nase nɛ titikpa ɔkɛnanɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ.”
Zakeo yidza ɛdza ebi boe Ɔlate a kĩ, “Boe Ɔlɛga, dã! Maakɔa yĩ akũ fɔtsa sɛkɛ mɔa nte ahiãfɔ, ade ntɛ nsisi odi ni, maase ye foe titi ɛna kɔtɔ.”
Ade Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Nkpã katɛ ya nɛ tɔtɔ kĩĩ kamɛ nviã, kitonɛkĩ oti kĩĩ lɛmɛ nyɛ Abraham kasinu a kamɛ obi.
Otidziwa Obi a ya kĩ yawɛ bikĩ bɛyɛla ɛnyɛ be lɛmɛ.”
Ade kĩ bati katse fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Yesu kabi be a, ɛlɛ ɛnamɛna lɔtɔ, ɛbɔa be lɛgbã lidi. Lɔkɔ kĩĩ a, efuã Yerusalem ade bati a kɔna kĩ Baguma lɛgãkanya a do kanɛ kata awɛ a.
Foesũ ebi be kĩ “Nɛ lɔkɔ lidi kamɛ ni, ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ odi yidza kĩ yanaa tite tidi akũ mɔlugo mɔlugo bɛnaadzina ye lɛgã. Ehihiɛ eyi kĩ yaamuniki ɛya nɛ ɔtɔ nɛ foe liti.
Fɔmɔ yaapi osi a, ɛvɛ ye basumunɛ ewua ɛkpɔta ade ɛkpa be kamɛ odi nyɛ odi sika ngbã sɔmɔa sɔmɔa ebi be kĩ, ‘Mikɔa sika a minya kɔyaatɔ mina kute nɛ yĩ liti.’
“Lɛmɛ ye ɔtɔ bati akesĩ ye foesũ bido batɔ bitomɔ ye liti kĩ bɛnaalɛ kĩ, ‘Bɔáwɛ onyole kĩĩ kĩ ɛnya boe lɛgã.’
“Bidzina onyole a lɛgã ade emuniki ɛya nɛ ɔtɔ a. Kĩ ɛya a, ɛfɔ̃ bɛvɛ ye basumunɛ a bɛyadzɛla nɛ ye anɛ kamɛ kĩ yawɛ enyi kute a kĩ bɛna.
“Osumunɛ ɔtɔnyade a bi ye kĩ, ‘Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃, nna sika a sɔmɔa sɔmɔa foe ewua nte nɛ sikĩ ɔkpa yĩ a akũ.’
“Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a kpa ye mbo ɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Ɔkɛna foe kakɛna wĩ! Ɔnyɛ osumunɛ kĩ yadi ɔnɔkɔali! Nɛ ayekĩ odi ɔnɔkɔali nɛ fɔtsa kabii akũ sũ ni, maakɛna nɔ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ nɛ tɛmatɔ ewua akũ.’
“Osumunɛ ɔyade a lɛmɛ yalɛ kĩ, ‘Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃, nna sika sɔmɔa sɔmɔa foe elo nte nɛ sikĩ ɔkpa yĩ a akũ!’
“Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a bi ye kĩ, ‘Mbo, ɔkɛna foe kakɛna wĩ! Aanya ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ nɛ tɛmatɔ elo akũ!’
“Osumunɛ ɔlalɛde a yalɛ kĩ, ‘Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃, amɔ nɔ sika sɔmɔa kĩ ɔkɔa ɔkpa yĩ a. Nsui se nɛ limakũ kamɛ nkɔa nkɔla.
Nvila nɔ kitonɛkĩ oti mɔ ɔsĩ odi anɛ. Abɔɛ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔnyɛ́ nɔ fude, ade ana fɔtsa a kĩ ɔtádu lɛmɛ a.’
“Ade Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a bi ye kĩ, ‘Nɔ osumunɛ kpa, maakɔa nɔ mɔawɛ onukpɛ̃ kamɛ kɔdzɛla kalɛ nkɔ nɔ kɔtɔ. Onyina kĩ oti mɔ ɔsĩ manɛ kĩ mabɔɛ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔnyɛ́ yĩ fude, ade mana fɔtsa kĩ ntádu a.
Kĩ onyina lɔmɔ a, nde sũ ɔtákɔa yĩ sika ɔnaado nɛ sika kakɔlakɔ̃ kĩ ntɛ mmuniki ĩya ni, maatɛ se mɔ se akũ kute?’
“Ade ebi bati a kĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ awã kĩ, ‘Mitɛ sika sɔmɔa nɛ ye awɛ mikɔa mikpa osumunɛ a kĩ ɛna sika sɔmɔa sɔmɔa ewua a.’
“Lɛmɛ bati a bi ye kĩ, ‘Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃, oti a na deĩ sika sɔmɔa sɔmɔa se ewua kɔkɔɛ!’
“Ade Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Mabi mi kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ edeĩ litsedi ni, ade ye baakɔa foe pii bibu a, lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛlá lɛtsama a ni, foe kabii a kĩ edeĩ a malo baatɛ foe nɛ ye awɛ.
Finyaa ni, mivɛlɛ yĩ bakesĩnɛ a kĩ bɛtáwɛ kĩ ĩnya be lɛgã a miyamɛna nɛ awĩ, lɔkɔa mikɔ be nɛ yĩ anɛ kamɛ.’ ”
Kĩ Yesu bi be fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ eyua a, ɛnya ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a lɔtɔ epi osi yanaa Yerusalem.
Kĩ efuã Betfage mɔ Betania tɛmatɔ a nɛ Kugua Futse Ɔtɔ ɔwɛ̃ a, edo ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ nviã ɛnyamɛna lɔtɔ, ebi be kĩ,
“Minaa ɔmatɔ kabii a kĩ ɛwa nɛ mi lɔtɔ a kamɛ. Ntɛ miawo nɛ ye kamɛ ni, míamɔ aflim obi kĩ odima tádzi nɛ ye akũ tɔ̃ kĩ edeĩ nɛ ɔwɛ̃ kamɛ. Miwũnya ye lɔkɔa mikɔa miyamɛna nɛ awĩ.
Ntɛ odi via mi kĩ litsa sũ miawũnya ye ni, mibi ye kĩ, ‘Boe Ɔlate sĩ ye.’ ”
Fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a naa ade bɛmɔ́ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa ndɛ ayekĩ Yesu bi be a.
Kĩ bɛkawũnya aflim obi a, ye balate via be kĩ, “Nde sũ miawũnya ye?”
Fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ nviã a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate sĩ ye.”
Bɛkɔa aflim obi a bɛma Yesu ade bɛdzɛlɛ be tɛtadiɛ wulaa biko nɛ ye akũ bibumɛna Yesu ede edzi nɛ ye akũ a.
Kĩ edzi nɛ ye akũ banaa a, bati dzɛlɛ be tɛtadiɛ biko nɛ tite.
Kĩ Yesu fuã Yerusalem nɛ awã kĩ osi a ka eto Kugua Futse Ɔtɔ akũ a, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ kɔdabu flee a yi kayɔ mɔ Baguma kɔlɛ kanyɛ, mɔ ye kahulu mɔ fɔwɔla kɔɔba nɛ awãwã fɔtsa flee a kĩ bɛmɔ́ a sũ.
Ade ke bɛlɛ kĩ,
“Baguma ehila Lɛgã a kĩ laya nɛ Boe Ɔlate dĩ akũ!
Lukudɔ lɛna nɛ ode, obu ɛnya Baguma nɛ ode flefle fude!”
Farisifɔ badi kĩ bideĩ nɛ bati kɔdabu a kamɛ bi Yesu kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, bi nɔ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a bisua onukpɛ̃!”
Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mabi mi kĩ ntɛ bisua onukpɛ̃ ni, boe nɛ osi ɔɔwɛ̃ a mɔawɛ aayi fɔwɔla kabɔa kayɔ.”
Kĩ Yesu fuã Yerusalem ɛkɔa anɛ ɛmɔ ɔmatɔ kĩĩ a, ewula babe nɛ ye lɔlɔ.
Ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Mawɛ kĩ nviã kĩĩ malo ni, aanyi lɛtsa a kĩ laakpa nɔ lukudɔ. Lɛmɛ finyaa kĩĩ a, ɔláapuli ɔmɔ́ de!
Lɔkɔ lidi aya kĩ nɔ bakesĩnɛ aatsua bisinya nɔ nɛ sɛkɛ nyɛ sɛkɛ.
Baawɔla nɔ mɔ bati a kĩ bideĩ nɛ nɔ kamɛ a, ade bɛláafɔnɛ de lidima lɛwa nɛ de kawakɔ̃ malo a, kitonɛkĩ ɔtámɔ lɔkɔ a kĩ Baguma yatɛ nɔ a oyi ɔsũ!”
Kĩ Yesu nawo nɛ Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ a, eyi kayɔ mɔ fɔtsa banɔnɛ kablɔmɛna awɛ nɛ awã.
Ebi be kĩ, “Bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ Baguma lɛ kĩ, ‘Baavɛ yĩ asɔli kɔla kĩ mpaɛ kabɔakɔ̃.’ Lɛmɛ mikɔa koe mikɛna bayekpanɛ kabɛlakɔ̃!”
Luwi nyɛ luwi ni, Yesu katsa fɔtsa nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ. Yudafɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃, mbla batsanɛ mɔ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ wɛ kĩ bakɔ ye.
Lɛmɛ bɛtámɔ osi a kĩ ye akũ baatsã, kitonɛkĩ bati a flee dzɛmɛna ye fɔlɛtsa kayaatse, ade bɛtáwɛ kĩ ye kalɛ kadima kɛtɛ̃ nɛ be akũ a.
Luwi a, kĩ Yesu na nɛ Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ ɛkatsa fɔtsa, ɛkalɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a, Yudafɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃, mbla batsanɛ mɔ ɔmatɔ a banɔkɔɛ̃ ya nɛ awã.
Ade bibi ye kĩ, “Bi boe osi a kĩ odeĩ fɔmɔ akɛna fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ a. Owei lɛkpa nɔ osi?”
Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mifɔ̃ ĩnya lɔtɔ nvia mi kalɛ mɔa. Mibi yĩ,
Yohanes bati mui kawɔla amaniɛ a ni, Baguma sɛkɛ̃ futo mbɔɛɛ kĩ bati sɛkɛ̃ futo?”
Nɛ awã a, biyi fɔlɛtsa kavɛlɛ mɔ be akũ kĩ, “Litsa bɔ́alɛ? Ntɛ bɔlɛ kĩ futo Baguma sɛkɛ̃ ni, yaavia kĩ, ‘Nde sũ mitátɛ Yohanes mido?’
Ade ntɛ bɔlɛ kĩ bati sɛkɛ̃ futo ni, bati kɔdabu a flee aanɔ boe boe, kitonɛkĩ be flee bɛtɛ bido kĩ Yohanes nyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ.”
Nɛ foesũ bɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Bunyína awã kĩ futo.”
Ade Yesu lɛmɛ bi be kĩ, “Kekɔ̃ yĩ malo nláabi mi awã kĩ ntomɛna kɔbɛ̃ nnɛɛ makɛna fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ.”
Ade Yesu bɔa bati a lɛgbã kĩ, “Lɔkɔ lidi kamɛ ni, onyole odi nɛ waĩ kɔba. Ɛkɔa koe edo nɛ apaafɔ awɛ ɛnaa osi akũ, ɛnadzi nɛ awã ebuna owi.
Kĩ lɔkɔ wo ɔtɔ kĩ bana waĩ babi a, edo ye osumunɛ odi kĩ ɛnaatɛ ye kanyakɔ̃ nɛ apaafɔ a sɛkɛ̃ ɛma ye. Lɛmɛ apaafɔ a bo osumunɛ a, bɛlɔla ye mɔ awɛ pupulidza.
Nɛ foesũ edo osumunɛ bɛbã, lɛmɛ apaafɔ a bo ye malo, bido ye kɔnyɔã, ade bɛnyɛ ye osi mɔ awɛ pupulidza a.
Ade edo osumunɛ ɔlalɛde a. Apaafɔ a bo ye malo bipila ye ade bɛblɔmɛna ye a.
“Kɔba ɔlate a via ye akũ kĩ, ‘Litsa maakɛna? Maado yĩ obi kĩ maátunɔ kalɛ ade matɛ kado kĩ baabu ye.’
“Lɛmɛ kĩ apaafɔ a mɔ́ obi a, bibi akũ kĩ, ‘Ade kɔba ɔlate a obi nɛ awĩ a. Mifɔ̃ bɔkɔ ye lɔkɔa ye adzapadiɛ ɛkɛna boe ade.’
Foesũ bɛvɛlɛ ye bɛnɛmɛna nɛ kɔbã a kamɛ ade bɛkɔ ye a.”
Ade Yesu via be kĩ “Litsa mikɔna kĩ kɔba ɔlate a aakɛna apaafɔ a?
Mabi mi kĩ yaayakɔ apaafɔ a na flee lɔkɔa ɛkɔa kɔba a edo nɛ apaafɔ bɛbã awɛ.”
Kĩ bati a nu fukĩĩ a, bɛlɛ kĩ, “Kusɛ! Baguma lɛláakpa osi fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ lɔmɔ da!”
Yesu ko anɛ ɛdã be ade evia be kĩ, “Litsa Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ fɔlɛtsa atsa?
‘De a kĩ fɔla bakenɛ sĩ a,
ade de lɛdani kɔla akũ de titiliwu a!’
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaatula ɛtɔ nɛ de a na akũ ni, yaaveliveli gblɛgblɛgblɛ, ade ke odi nyɛ odi kĩ de a na aatɔ nɛ ye akũ ni, laanuna ye kpɛtɛkpɛtɛkpɛtɛ.”
Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ a mɔ Yudafɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a bɔa mbɔdi kĩ bapi Yesu nɛ awã, kitonɛkĩ bɛmɔ́ biyi ɔsũ kĩ be sũ mɔ ɛbɔa lɛgbã a, lɛmɛ bivila bati a.

Nɛ foesũ bɛwɛ osi bɛbã kĩ ye akũ baatsã bipi ye. Bɛkpa banyole badi sika kĩ bɛkɛna be akũ ndɛ bati kĩ badi ɔnɔkɔali. Bido be kĩ bɛnaanaĩ Yesu nɛ fɔlɛtsa kavia katse kamɛ, lɔkɔa bɛna osi bɛkɔa ye bido nɛ banɔkɔɛ̃, mɔ Roma abãã ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ awɛ.
Bikĩ banaĩ Yesu a ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃, bibi ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, bunyina kĩ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ alɛ mɔ fukĩ atsa a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali. Bunyina lɛmɛ kĩ aádã oti anɛ, mbom atsa Baguma tisi a nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ.
Finyaakĩĩ ni, bi boe ntɛ boe mbla kpa osi kĩ buse ɔgɔlɛ bɔkpa Romafɔ Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃, mbɔɛɛ kĩ ɛtákpa osi?”
Lɛmɛ Yesu mɔ́ be tɛdake a eyi ɔsũ ade ebi be kĩ,
“Miyamɛna sika ovoe a sidi ndã. Owei lɔlɔ mɔ dĩ teĩ nɛ se akũ?”
Bɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ Kaisare fude fɔanɛ.”
Yesu bi be kĩ, “Kekɔ̃ mikɔa fukĩ fɔnyɛ Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ fude a mikpa Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃, ade mikɔa fukĩ fɔnyɛ Baguma fude lɛmɛ mikpa Baguma a.”
Nɛ bati kɔdabu a anɛ kamɛ na a, bɛtápuli bipi ye nɛ osi odima akũ, foesũ bisua be tunukpɛ̃ nɛ Yesu mbuayɛ a kĩ ɛkɛna be wãwã sũ.
Ade Zadukifɔ kĩ balɛ kĩ kayidza kato kanɔkpa lɛláa a, ya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃, bibi ye kĩ,
“Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, Mose tsɛlɛ mbla ɛkpa boe kĩ, ‘Ntɛ onyole odi ku ɛfɔnɛ ɔtsɔ̃ kĩ bɛmɔ ye bɛtáma ni, onyole a ɔwaɛ̃ ɛkɔã otsole a lɔkɔa bɛmɔ ye bɛma babi bɛnya ekĩ eku a bade.’
Lɔkɔ lidi ni, bawaɛ̃nyole evũkɔnɔ badi dzi nkpã. Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃de a kɔã ɔtsɔ̃ lɛmɛ eku, kĩ bɛtáma obi odima.
Ɔwaɛ̃ ɔyade a mɔ ɔlalɛde a lɛmɛ kɔã okunawa, ade be malo biku kĩ bɛtáma babi badima a.
Ade lɛtsa mɔapɛ a lɛkɛna bawaɛ̃nyole evũkɔnɔ a flee a. Be flee biku nɛ kĩ otsole a táma obi ɛkpa be kamɛ odima.
Nɛ foe kawũna kamɛ a, otsole a mɔawɛ yaku.
Lɔkɔa nɛ luwi a kĩ banɔkpa aabuki biyidza bidzi nkpã a ni, be kamɛ owei ɔtsɔ̃ yaanya, nɛ kĩ be evũkɔnɔ a flee bɛkɔã tɔ̃ ye a?”
Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Katinya kĩĩ kamɛ mɔ́ otsole mɔ onyole akɔã akũ,
lɛmɛ banyole mɔ batsole a kĩ bɛkpɔla kĩ baayidza bito kanɔkpa bidzi nkpã nɛ katinya kĩ kaaya a kamɛ a ni, bɛláakɔã batsɔ̃ ĩye bidzi fɔnyɔ.
Baana ndɛ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ, ade bɛláabuki biku da a. Bɛnyɛ Baguma babi kitonɛkĩ biyidza bito kanɔkpa.

Mose nyɛ ɛtsa yededeede nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ badzɛla banɔkpa babuki kadzi nkpã, kitonɛkĩ lɔkɔ a kĩ ɛdza nɛ kutse a kĩ kɔkatɛ̃ anɛ kamɛ a, ɛvɛ Baguma kĩ Abraham Baguma Isak Baguma mɔ Yakob lɛmɛ Baguma.
Fukĩĩ atsa kĩ ɛnyɛ bikĩ bidzi nkpã a Baguma, nnɛ́ banɔkpa Baguma yanɛ. Kitonɛkĩ nɛ Baguma sɛkɛ̃ ni, be flee bidzi nkpã.”
Nɛ awã a Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ badi lɛ kĩ. “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, ɔkpa mbuayɛ kakpa wĩ paa!”
Ke liti odima tábuki edo ɔwɔlɛ evia ye kadima.
Yesu via be kĩ, “Nde sũ bati alɛ kĩ Kristo a aanya Lɛgã Dawid kasinu kamɛ obi?
Ade Dawid mɔawɛ a lɛ nɛ Tɔnɔ Ovoli a kamɛ kĩ,
‘Boe Ɔlate bi yĩ Ɔlate kĩ,
“Dzi nɛ yĩ sɔmɔna
kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ nkɔa nɔ bakesĩnɛ
nkɛna nɔ abɔa katekɔ̃.” ’
Ade ntɛ Dawid vɛ ye kĩ boe Ɔlate a, nde fɔya mɔ Kristo a aanya Dawid kasinu kamɛ obi?”
Kĩ bati a flee dza bɛkatse Yesu fɔlɛtsa a, ɛdani ebi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ,

“Midã kadã wĩ nɛ Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ a akũ. Bati kĩĩ ado tɛtadiɛ wulaa katsã kamini, ade bawɛ kĩ bati bɛwɔ̃na be nɛ obu kamɛ nɛ kɔya a. Bawɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ fudzikɔ̃ nɛ Yudafɔ fɔtsɛnakɔ̃, mɔ fudzikɔ̃ wĩ nɛ fuwi kanyakɔ̃.
Bakɔa tɛdake kasisi bakunawa katɛ be tɔtɔ ade babɔa mpaɛ gɛlɛɛlɛ kakɔa kamu akũ a. Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ be sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ aaba bati flee fude!”
Nɛ Yudafɔ Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ a, Yesu ko anɛ ɛmɔ asikafɔ kĩ bɛkɔa be futetsa bɛkado nɛ ɔgɔlɛ adakã kamɛ.
Ade ɛmɔ okunawa ohiãni odi kĩ ɛyakɔa kaplɛ nviã edo nɛ adakã a kamɛ a.
Ade ebi be kĩ, “Mabi mi kĩ okunawa ohiãni kĩĩ te fɔtsa ɛba bati bɛbã a flee.
Kitonɛkĩ bati bɛbã a kɔ̃ ni, be akũ kana fɔtsa a kĩ fublusu a kamɛ fudi sukuloo bite, lɛmɛ otsole ohiãni kĩĩ kɔa lɛtsa a kĩ de akũ yaadzi nkpã a flee ɛyate nɛ awĩ.”
Fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kamɛ badi kalɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a akũ, mɔ boe mɔ kalɛ a kĩ bɛkɔa bike koe, mɔ ayekĩ bɛkɛɛlɛ kɔla foebi a, mɔ fɔtsatewa a kĩ bakpa Baguma a. Lɛmɛ Yesu bi be kĩ,
“Lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ miamɔ nɛ awĩ a, lɔkɔ aaya kĩ de lidima lɛláabuki lite nɛ lɔkɔba akũ. Baadzuli be flee biwula.”
Ade ke bivia ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, lɔkɔ lɔwɔdabe fukĩĩ aaya? Ade litsa bɔ́akɔa buyi ɔsũ kĩ lɔkɔ a wo ɔtɔ?”
Yesu bi be kĩ, “Midã kadã wĩ, mitafɔ̃ bɛkɛ mi. Bati pii aaya nɛ yĩ dĩ akũ bɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Yĩ nyɛ Ɔtɛnɛ a,’ mɔ ‘Lɔkɔ a wo ɔtɔ.’ Lɛmɛ mitatomɔ be.
Mitafɔ̃ libe liwo mi ntɛ minu kawũkanɔ mɔ bati kayidza kadza nɛ bati akũ nkã. Kɛnɛ kĩ fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ flee fɔnya lɔtɔ fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ, lɛmɛ fɔátsa kĩ katinya kawũna a fuã kiyua.”
Yesu lɛ ɛnamɛna lɔtɔ kĩ, “Ɔmaĩ mɔ ɔmaĩ aanɔ akũ, fɔgã mɔ fɔgã lɛmɛ aanɔ akũ.
Tite kakuna mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ, kɔlɛ mɔ fɔsɔ kpa kumɛkumɛ lɛmɛ aaya nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ, ade libe mɔ awãwã fɔtsa aanɛ nɛ odetɔ́ kamɛ a.
“Fɔmɔ fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ flee aaya ni, baatomɔ mi liti, bipili mi bɛnamɛna Yudafɔ fɔtsɛnakɔ̃ bɛdzɛ̃mɔ mi, bibo mi lɔkɔa bido mi nɛ kɔla. Ade baakpã mi bɛnaadzɛla nɛ fɔgã mɔ abãã banɔkɔɛ̃ anɛ nɛ yĩ sũ.
Fukĩĩ aakpa mi osi kĩ milɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a.
Mipi miyi kĩ miláaha akũ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ míalɛ minyɛ mi akũ a akũ.
