Kitonɛkĩ maakpa mi fɔlɛtsa mɔ kadikanyi ayekĩ mi bakesĩnɛ kamɛ odima lɛláapuli esĩ ĩye ɛlɛ kalɛ etia lɛtsa a kĩ míalɛ a.
Mi bamanɛ, bawaɛ̃, akũ bati mɔ bakɔba aanyɛ mi bɛkpa ade baakɔ mi kamɛ badi a.
Odi nyɛ odi aakesĩ mi nɛ yĩ sũ.
Lɛmɛ mi lɔlɔ sɔlɔ mɔapɛ malo lɛláayɛla.
Midza pintii lɔkɔa míana katɛ.
“Ntɛ mimɔ́ kĩ sodzafɔ dza bisinya Yerusalem ni, minyi kĩ ɔmatɔ a kawɔla wo ɔtɔ.
Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ ni, bati a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Yudea bilo bɛnaa tɔtɔ akũ. Bikĩ bideĩ nɛ Yerusalem ɔmatɔ a kamɛ bilo bɛnɛ, ade bikĩ bɛláa ɔmatɔ a kamɛ bɛtabuki bimuniki bɛya nɛ ye kamɛ.
Kitonɛkĩ lɔkɔ a na aanya Sɔtɔ Kavɛlɛ fuwi fɔkpa bati, ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa fɔlɛtsa a aaya nɛ foe kamɛ.
Fɔ́ana ɔsĩ paa fɔkpa bamatsɔ̃ mɔ babima a kĩ babi amɛmɛ be a. Lubokamɔ baũ aaya nɛ tite kĩĩ akũ, ade Baguma sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ aaya nɛ bati kĩĩ akũ a.
Bati badi aatɔ nɛ lɛpamɛ onukpɛ̃, ade baapili badi ndom bɛnamɛna tite bɛbã akũ a. Ade bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ aade bidzi nɛ Yerusalem bati akũ kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ Baguma yi ɛkpa be a wũna.
“Awãwã fɔtsa aanɛ nɛ odetɔ́ kamɛ fɔkatsa nsɛntsɛlɛni nɛ suwa, odetɔ mɔ fusibii anɛ. Katinya kamɛ tɛmaĩ akũ aayɛla be, libe liwo be nɛ mpo kayili mɔ kavũ basabasa sũ.
Libe aafɔ̃ anɛ lisinya bati nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ baakadã anɛ kakpa lɛtsa a kĩ de aaya nɛ katinya kamɛ flee akũ a, kitonɛkĩ odetɔ́ kamɛ kɔbɛ̃ fɔtsa lɛláabuki fɔdza nɛ foe kadzakɔ̃.
Ke liti a Otidziwa Obi a aanɛ ɛta, ɛya nɛ luflututu kamɛ mɔ kɔbɛ̃ kpale mɔ ɔhaĩ.
Ntɛ fukĩĩ bamɛ flee do kaya awɛ ni, midzɛla fɔlɔ midã ode kitonɛkĩ mi katɛ lɔkɔ wo ɔtɔ.”
Ade Yesu bɔa be lɛgbã kĩ, “Midã atɔ kutse mɔ futse bɛbã a.
Ntɛ mimɔ́ kĩ kɔnyɛ tɔɔta vɔɛ̃ ni, minyina kĩ kanɔde lɔkɔ wo ɔtɔ.
Ade ayea ntɛ mimɔ́ fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ kĩ fɔlamɛna kaya ni, míanyi kĩ Baguma lɛgãkanya a fuã.
“Mabi mi pipiipi kĩ bati a kĩ bidzi finyaa lɛláaku biwoli fɔmɔ fɔtsa kĩĩ flee aaya nɛ foe kamɛ.
Tite mɔ ode flee onukpɛ̃ aatɛ̃ lɛmɛ yĩ fɔlɛtsa a kɔ̃ aana daa.
“Midã akũ kadã wĩ. Mitakɔa mi akũ mikpa kanya mɔ kamɔa pɔtɔɔ, mɔ katinya kamɛ ɔhau. Ntɛ nnɛ́ aye ni, Luwi a aayafuta mi,
ndɛ ayekĩ ɔyaɛ atɔ kpeĩ, kitonɛkĩ Luwi a aaketimɔ odi nyɛ odi kĩ edzi nkpã.
Foesũ mina nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ, mikaabɔa mpaɛ luwi nyɛ luwi ayekĩ míana kɔbɛ̃ mitsã yedede nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔ́aya a flee kamɛ, lɔkɔa miyaadza nɛ Otidziwa Obi a anɛ kamɛ.”
Yesu kanaatsa bati fɔtsa luwi nyɛ luwi nɛ Yudafɔ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ, ade ntɛ olobe wo ɔtɔ lɔkɔa yadzakũ kanaa Kugua Futse Ɔtɔ a akũ kawa nɛ awã.
Ɔnɔnɛ nyɛ ɔnɔnɛ ni, bati kɔdabu atsɛna nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ katse ye fɔtsa katsa.
Yudafɔ Abodoo Kĩ Ɛtáyila Luwi a kĩ bavɛ Wuda Katɛ̃ Luwi a kanya wo ɔtɔ.
Yudafɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ mbla batsanɛ a kavila bati a, foesũ bɛkabɔa mbɔdi kawɛ osi kĩ baatsã bɛna Yesu bɛkɔ nɛ kabɛla kamɛ.
Ade Abonsam wo nɛ Yuda kĩ bavɛ Iskariot, kĩ ɛnyɛ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ewua-nviã a kamɛ ɔmɔa kamɛ a.
Foesũ Yuda naa Yudafɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ Yudafɔ mɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ badãmɛna Asɔli Kɔla akũ a sɛkɛ̃, ade bipi adzuni nɛ osi wĩ a kĩ ye akũ yaatsã ɛnyɛ Yesu ɛkpa a.
Kawɔlɛ de be ade bike otse kĩ baakpa ye sika.
Yuda tunɔ nɛ foe akũ, foesũ ɛkawɛ lɔkɔ wĩ kĩ yaanyɛ Yesu ɛkpa nɛ bati kɔdabu a katanyi kamɛ.
Luwi a kĩ bakɔ Wuda Katɛ̃ kavelibi nɛ Abodoo Kĩ Ɛtáyila Luwi Kanya kamɛ a wo ɔtɔ.
Ade ke Yesu do Petro mɔ Yohanes kĩ, “Minaa lɔkɔa minaamanɛ Wuda Katɛ̃ funitsã a miyi mikpa boe kanya.”
Nɛ awã a bivia ye kĩ, “Nɛ ndia awɛ kĩ bɔnaamanɛ foe buyi?”
Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ miawo nɛ Yerusalem ɔmatɔ a kamɛ ni, onyole odi kĩ ɛnɔnɛ kugumi mɔ mui aatsɛlamɔ mi. Mitomɔ ye miwo nɛ tɔtɔ a kĩ te kamɛ yaawo a.
Mibi tɔtɔ ɔlate a kĩ, ‘Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ bo buvia nɔ kĩ, “Nde kɔla kĩ koe kamɛ bɔmɔ yĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a bɔ́anya Wuda Katɛ̃ funitsã a?” ’
Yaatsa mi kɔla kpale kudi nɛ abansulu ode kĩ bike opunu mɔ fukpo nɛ koe kamɛ. Mifɔ̃ bɛmanɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa biyi nɛ awã.”
Bipi osi ade bɛnamɔ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa pɛpɛɛpɛ ndɛ ayekĩ Yesu bi be a, ade bɛtɔ Wuda Katɛ̃ funitsã a nɛ awã a.
Yesu mɔ ye fɔtɔ banyanɛ a nadzi nɛ opunu akũ kĩ banya.
Ade ebi be kĩ, “Fɔnyɛ yĩ kawɛ kɔkɔɛ kĩ bɔmɔ mi bɔnya Wuda Katɛ̃ Funitsã kĩĩ fɔmɔ maamɔ lubo.
Mabi mi kĩ nláabuki ĩnya funitsã kĩĩ kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ foe kayɔkanu flee a ya nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanya a kamɛ.”
Ke liti a, Yesu bɔɛ kɔɔpu, ɛnyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Mitɛ fukĩĩ misɛ̃ mikpa akũ.
Mabi mi kĩ kito finyaa kanaa ni, nláabuki mmɔa waĩ kɛnaawo kĩ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a ya.”
Ade ɛbɔɛ abodoo, ɛnyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ, ebulibuli ye ɛkpa be ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ade yĩ sukɛna kĩ bɛkɔa bakpa nɛ mi lɔlɔ a. Mikɛna fukĩĩ mikɔa mikai yĩ.”
Ade ayea kĩ bɛnya biyua a, ɛbɔɛ kɔɔpu mɔ waĩ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Kɔɔpu kĩĩ nyɛ Baguma nhihiɛ vɔɛ̃ kĩ esipi nɛ foe akũ mɔ yĩ babɔanɛ a kĩ maako nɛ tite nɛ mi lɔlɔ.
Lɛmɛ midã, oti a kĩ yaanyɛ yĩ ɛkpa a, bɔmɔ ye budzi nɛ kanyakɔ̃ nɛ awĩ.
Otidziwa Obi a kɔ̃, aaku ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma hihiɛ eyi a. Lɛmɛ bɔbɔɛ bakpa owula a kĩ yaanyɛ ye ɛkpa a.”
Nɛ awã a biyi akũ kavia kayɔ kĩ be kamɛ owei aakɛna fukĩĩ odu.
Fɔlɛtsa kavɛlɛ fudi yawo nɛ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kamɛ kĩ be kamɛ owei baabu kĩ ɛbɛ̃ flee.
Ade ke Yesu bi be kĩ, “Bati a kĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a, be fɔgã deĩ otumi mɔ ɔsĩ nɛ be akũ, ade fɔgã kĩĩ te be akũ buĩ kĩ, Bati Bakɔba.
Lɛmɛ fɔtana lɔmɔ nɛ mi kamɛ. Mbom oti a kĩ ɛbɛ̃ flee nɛ mi kamɛ ni, ɛkɛna ye akũ ndɛ obisɛ̃ kɔlaa. Ade kɛnɛ kĩ lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ nɛ mi kamɛ ɛna ndɛ osumunɛ ayea.
Owei bɛ̃ ɔkɔba, ekĩ edzi yanya mbɔɛɛ ekĩ yasum ye a? Fɔwaa yededeede kĩ ekĩ edzi yanya a bɛ̃. Lɛmɛ ndeĩ nɛ mi kamɛ ndɛ osumunɛ aye.
Mina nɛ yĩ akũ nɛ yĩ sɔhuiɛ flee kamɛ.
Ndɛ ayekĩ Nda kpa yĩ kɔbɛ̃ kĩ ĩnya bati akũ a, ade ayea maakpa mi kɔbɛ̃ a na odu a.
Míanya mimɔa mɔ yĩ nɛ opunu akũ nɛ yĩ lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ, ade míadzi nɛ fɔgãkpo akũ minya Israel futete ewua-nviã a akũ a.”
Yesu vɛ Simon Petro ɛlɛ kĩ, “Simon, Simon! Tse katse wĩ! Bɛkpa Abonsam osi kĩ ɛsɔ mi ɛdã lɔkɔa ɛsa bati wĩ a nɛ bakpa kamɛ, ndɛ ayekĩ okuani awɛ afafa kanyɛ nɛ kamɔnɛ kamɛ a.
Lɛmɛ Simon, mbɔa mpaɛ nkpa nɔ kĩ nɔ katɛkado kɛtadĩ. Ade ntɛ ɔyamuniki ɔya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ ni, do awaɛ̃ amɛ kɔbɛ̃.”
Awã naa Petro kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Boe ɔlate, mmanɛ akũ nkpa kĩ bɔmɔ nɔ aawa kɔla ĩye kĩ bɔmɔ nɔ aaku!”
Ade Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Petro, mabi nɔ kĩ fɔmɔ ɔkɔkɔ aanyɛ onukpɛ̃ nviã lɛnyɛ kĩĩ ni, aalɛ titi ɛlalɛ kĩ onyína yĩ.”
Yesu via ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Lɔkɔ a kĩ ndo mi fɔtɔ kĩ ntáfɔ̃ mibɔɛ sika kuvũ, ĩye kuvũ kĩ babɛla ĩye mpabua a ni, litsedi nasĩ mi?”
Bɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Lɛtsama tásĩ boe.”
Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Finyaakĩĩ kɔ̃ ni, odi nyɛ odi kĩ edeĩ sika kuvũ ĩye osi akũ kanaa kuvũ ni, ɛbɔɛ ɛlɛ, ade oti kĩ ɛlá lɛpamɛ gɛlɛɛlɛ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ ɛnɔ ye atadiɛ wulaa lɔkɔa ɛya lɔmɔa.
Mabi mi kĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ fɔlɛ kĩ, ‘Bibu ye bido nɛ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ kamɛ,’ a kɛnɛ kĩ fɔya nɛ yĩ akũ. Kitonɛkĩ fɔtsa a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ yĩ akũ a lamɛna kaya nɛ foe kamɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ.”
Fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a bi ye kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, amɔ, fɔpamɛ gɛlɛɛlɛ nviã nɛ awĩ!”
Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Fɔlɛ!”
Yesu dzakũ ɛnɛ nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ ɛnaa Kugua Futse Ɔtɔ akũ ndɛ ayekĩ yawɛ kakɛna a, ade ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ lɛmɛ to mɔ ye a.
Kĩ ewo awã a, ebi be kĩ, “Mibɔa mpaɛ ayekĩ sɔhuiɛ lɛláanya nɛ mi akũ.”
Ɛvɛlɛ akũ nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ ɛnaa lɔtɔ sukuloo, ade ɛnake aduli ɛbɔa mpaɛ a.
Ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nda, ntɛ fɔnyɛ nɔ kawɛ ni, tinya lubo kamɔ kɔɔpu kĩĩ nɛ yĩ akũ. Lɛmɛ takɛna nɛ yĩ kawɛ akũ, mbom kɛna nɛ nɔ kawɛ akũ.”
Nɛ awã naa, ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ odi to ode ɛnyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa ye, edo ye kɔbɛ̃.
Ɛna nɛ ayɔlɔhɔ mɔ kɔnɛyɔɔlɛ kamɛ, ɛbɔa mpaɛ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ ebu ade ye olulu na ndɛ babɔanɛ fɔbɔ, kako nɛ tite a.
Kĩ Yesu yidza nɛ mpaɛbɔ kamɛ a, emuniki ɛnaa ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a sɛkɛ̃, ɛnamɔ be kĩ bɛwaa tida nɛ ayɔlɔhɔ a kĩ epi be a sũ.
Ebi be kĩ, “Nde sũ miawa tida? Miyidza mibɔa mpaɛ ayekĩ miláawo nɛ sɔhuiɛ kamɛ.”
Lɔkɔ a kĩ Yesu lamɛna kɔdzɛla kalɛ a, bati kɔdabu kudi de kɔnɛ. Yuda kĩ ɛnyɛ fɔtɔ banyanɛ ewua-nviã a kamɛ ɔmɔa nyaa be lɔtɔ. Efuã Yesu, etu eboomu ye.
Lɛmɛ Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Yuda, ɔkɔa onukpɛ̃ kadzɛmɛ anyɛ Otidziwa Obi a ɔkpa bati?”
Kĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ bɛna nɛ ye akũ a mɔ́ lɛtsa a kĩ laya nɛ Yesu akũ a, bivia ye kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, bɔkɛna boe fɔpamɛ gɛlɛɛlɛ a akũ adzuma?”
Lɛtalɛta be kamɛ ɔmɔa tsua Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a osumunɛ sɔmɔna sɔtɔ emuni.
Lɛmɛ Yesu lɛ kĩ, “Oowo! Fukpula nɛ awã!” Ade ke ɛta awã kĩ bitsua sɔtɔ a ɛtsa ye a.
Ke liti a, Yesu bi basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ badãmɛna Asɔli Kɔla akũ a mɔ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ bɛyaapi ye a kĩ, “Nde sũ minɛɛ futsekpa mɔ fɔpamɛ miyaapi yĩ ndɛ tɔkpa ɔkɛnanɛ aye?
Nna nɛ mi kamɛ nɛ Yudafɔ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ luwi nyɛ luwi, ade ke mitádo ɔwɔlɛ mipi yĩ a. Lɛmɛ mi lɔkɔ liwo ɔtɔ kĩ mikɛna mi adzuma a, nɛ lɔkɔ kĩ Abonsam ɔtũ kɔbɛ̃ a anya akũ finyaa.”
Foesũ bipi Yesu ade bɛkpã ye bɛnamɛna Yudafɔ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a awã a. Petro lɛmɛ tomɔ be ɛna nɛ liti flee.
Bɛkpɔta fi nɛ tɔtɔ a lɔwabe ade Petro lɛmɛ nadzi nɛ bati a kamɛ a.
Kĩ bikĩ banya abawa kamɛ adi yamɔ Petro kĩ edzi yawa fi a, eke anɛ nɛ ye akũ ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Obi kĩĩ malo tomɔ Yesu.”
Lɛmɛ Petro sĩ ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Otsole dã, ĩnyina ye kɔlaa!”
Owi tábuna mɔ onyole odi mɔ́ Petro eyi ɔsũ a ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nɔ malo ɔnyɛ be kamɛ ɔmɔa!”
Lɛmɛ Petro kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Onyole dã, nnɛ́ yĩ manɛ!”
Ndɛ ndɔũhuilɛ mɔa liti a, onyole bɛbã yalɛ pipiipi kĩ, “Atsindze katɛ lɛláa nɛ foe kamɛ kĩ oti kĩĩ tomɔ Yesu, kitonɛkĩ ɛnyɛ Galileani!”
Lɛmɛ Petro kpa mbuayɛ kĩ “Onyole dã, ĩnyína lɛtsa a kĩ de ɔlamɛna kalɛ!” Mɔ Petro onukpɛ̃ katɔ pɛ, ɔkɔkɔ nyɛ onukpɛ̃.
Boe Ɔlate dani ɛdã Petro, ade Petro te anɛ kĩ boe Ɔlate bi ye kĩ, “Fɔmɔ ɔkɔkɔ aanyɛ onukpɛ̃ lɛnyɛ kĩĩ ni, aalɛ titi ɛlalɛ kĩ onyína yĩ.”
Ade ke Petro nɛ ɛnaa kanya ɛnabe blobloblo a.
Bati a kĩ bɛdãmɛna Yesu akũ a di ye nsekuo bibo ye lɛmɛ.
Bisui ye anɛ ade bivia ye kĩ, “Bi boe owula a kĩ ɛbɔa nɔ.”
Ade bibi ye fuvũnatsa pii lɛmɛ a.
Kĩ kade nyina a, ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃, basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ mbla batsanɛ a yakpɔta ade bɛkpã Yesu bɛyadzɛla nɛ be anɛ kamɛ a.
Nɛ awã a, bivia Yesu kĩ, “Bi boe ntɛ nɔ nyɛ Kristo a.”
Ade Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ nlɛ kadi malo miláatɛ yĩ mido.
Ade ntɛ nvia mi kadi malo ni, miláakpa mbuayɛ.
Lɛmɛ kito nviã kĩĩ kanaa ni, baadzina Otidziwa Obi a nɛ Baguma Kpale Nɛ Ode a sɔmɔna.”
Ade ke be a flee bivia ye kĩ, “Foesũ Baguma obi anɛ?”
Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mi lamɛna kalɛ kĩ ye manɛ.”
Ade bɛlɛ kĩ, “Bɔtásĩ adansifɔ badima. Boe mɔawɛ a bunu lɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ a.”
Ade bati kɔdabu a flee yidza bɛkpã Yesu bɛnamɛna Pilato sɛkɛ̃ a.
Ade bido ye onukpɛ̃ katsua awɛ kalɛ kĩ, “Bupi obi kĩĩ kĩ ɛlamɔ boe kade bati adzuni kadani. Yabi be kĩ bɛtate ɔgɔlɛ bɛkpa Romafɔ Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃. Ɛbɔɛ ye akũ kĩ ye nyɛ Kristo, lɛgã a.”
Pilato via ye kĩ, “Nɔ nyɛ Yudafɔ Lɛgã a?”
Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oo, fɔla ndɛ aye kĩ ɔlɛ a.”
Ade Pilato bi Yudafɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ bati kɔdabu a kĩ, “Ntámɔ lɛtsama nɛ ye akũ kĩ madza nɛ foe akũ nkɔ oti kĩĩ kɔtɔ.”
Lɛmɛ bɛdzɛmɛna kalɛ kabuli kĩ, “Ɛnɛɛ ye fɔtsa katsa yado ɔtutũ nɛ bati kamɛ nɛ Yudea tite flee akũ. Eyi fukĩĩ kayɔ nɛ Galilea ade finyaa ɛkɔa foe ɛyamɛna nɛ awĩ lɛmɛ a.”
Kĩ Pilato nu fukĩĩ a, evia be kĩ, “Galileani yanɛ?”
Foesũ kĩ enyi kĩ Yesu to Galilea nɛ awã kĩ Lɛgã Herodes anya akũ a, ɛkɔa ye ɛma Herodes, kĩ ɛna nɛ Yerusalem nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ.
Kawɔlɛ de Herodes paa kĩ ɛmɔ Yesu, kitonɛkĩ enu ye nkã ade ɛkawɛ kĩ yamɔ ye anɛ kɔkɔkɔɛ a. Ɛkadã anɛ kĩ Yesu aakɛna awãwã fɔtsa fudi ɛtsa ye.
Foesũ Herodes via Yesu fɔlɛtsa pii lɛmɛ Yesu tábinya onukpɛ̃.
Awã naa Yudafɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ mbla batsanɛ a nɛ bɛyadza nɛ lɔtɔ bitsua fɔlɛtsa mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ bite nɛ Yesu akũ.
Lɛgã Herodes mɔ ye sodzafɔ a di Yesu nsekuo bisupa ye. Bido ye atadiɛ wulaa mɔ kalɛ ndɛ lɛgã aye, bimuniki mɔ ye bɛma Pilato.
Luwi a na, Herodes mɔ Pilato dani bɛkɛna bakɔba, kufɛ kɔkɔɛ a bakesĩ akũ.
Pilato vɛ Yudafɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃, ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ bati a ɛkpɔta.

Ade ebi be kĩ, “Mikpã oti kĩĩ mima yĩ ade milɛ kĩ ɛlamɔ bati adzuni kadani a. Finyaa nɛ mi anɛ kamɛ nɛ awĩ a, nvia ye onukpɛ̃ kamɛ tuwuli, ade fɔlɛtsa a kĩ mibɔɛ nɛ ye akũ a, ntámɔ tɔkpa tidima nɛ foe kamɛ kĩ makɔ ye kɔtɔ.
Lɛgã Herodes lɛmɛ támɔ tɔkpa tidima nɛ ye akũ foesũ emunikimɔ ye ɛma boe. Oti kĩĩ tákɛna tɔkpa tidima kĩ ɛfɛta ɛkpa wuda.
Foesũ maafɔ̃ bibo ye nfɔnɛ ye awɛ ɛdzakũ ɛnaa.”
Nɛ Wuda Katɛ̃ Luwi kanya kamɛ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ Pilato ɛfɔnɛ bati a kĩ bɛwaa kɔla a kamɛ ɔmɔa awɛ ɛkpa be.
Bati kɔdabu a flee bɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba kĩ, “Kɔ ye! Fɔnɛ Baraba awɛ kakpa boe!”
Bido Baraba nɛ kɔla kĩ edo ɔtutũ nɛ ɔmatɔ kpale kamɛ, ɛkɔ bati lɛmɛ.
Pilato wɛ kĩ yafɔnɛ Yesu awɛ foesũ ebuki ɛnyɛ fɔlɛtsa kamɛ ɛtsa bati kɔdabu a.
Lɛmɛ bɛbɔa fɔwɔla biko nɛ ye akũ kĩ, “Bɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ! Bɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ!”
Pilato buki ebi be lɛlalɛde kĩ, “Mɔ litsa tɔkpa oti kĩĩ kɛna? Ntámɔ lɛtsa kĩ ɛkɛna kĩ yana foe akũ wuda! Maafɔ̃ bibo ye lɔkɔa nfɔnɛ ye awɛ.”
Lɛmɛ bati a dzɛmɛna fɔwɔla kabɔa kɔɔba kĩ bɛbɔa Yesu nɛ asendua akũ. Nɛ foe kawũna kamɛ a, bati a fɔwɔla kabɔa nya Pilato akũ.
Foesũ Pilato kɔ Yesu kɔtɔ ndɛ ayekĩ bati a wɛ a.
Ade ɛfɔnɛ oti a kĩ bawɛ a awɛ ɛkpa be a, oti kĩ bido nɛ kɔla nɛ ɔtutũ mɔ bati kakɔ sũ, ade ɛkɔa Yesu edo nɛ be awɛ kĩ bɛkɛna ye ndɛ ayekĩ bɛwɛ a.
Sodzafɔ a kpã Yesu bɛnamɛna. Ade kĩ banaa nɛ osi a, bɛtsɛlamɛna Kireneni onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Simon, kĩ eto akula adi kamɛ yanna Yerusalem. Bipi ye bɛhɛ ye kĩ ɛlɔ asendua a etomɔ Yesu nɛ liti.
Bati kɔdabu baũ a tomɔ Yesu nɛ liti, ade batsole nɛ be kamɛ kabe kakpa ye a.
Yesu dani ɛtsɛlamɔ be ebi be kĩ, “Yerusalem batsole, mitabe mikpa yĩ mbom mibe mikpa mi babi mɔ mi akũ.
Kitonɛkĩ lɔkɔ aaya kĩ bati aalɛ kĩ, ‘Be a kĩ bɛnyɛ baduko, be a kĩ bɛtátsãmɔ kɔma bɛma tɔ̃, mɔ be a kĩ bɛtámɛmɛ be tɛmɛ tɔ̃ a na lɔlɔ wĩ!’
Ade lɔkɔ a na mɔ bati aabi tɔtɔ kĩ, ‘Midzuli miko nɛ boe akũ!’ Ade baabi kɔtɔbii kĩ, ‘Mikɔla boe!’
Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ bɛkɛna fukĩĩ nɛ kutse gɔ̃ akũ ni, nde fɔána fɔkpa kutse wɔlɛwa?”
Bɛkpã banyole bɛbã nviã kĩ bɛnyɛ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ bibumɔ Yesu kĩ bɛnaakɔ be.
Kĩ biwo awã kĩ bavɛ kĩ Oti Lɔlɔ Fɔtsɔ̃ a, bɛbɔa Yesu nɛ asendua akũ. Bɛbɔa banyole nviã a lɛmɛ nɛ asendua akũ, ɔmɔa nɛ ye sɔmɔna, ɔyade a nɛ ye sɛbã.
Ade Yesu lɛ kĩ, “Nda, kɔa kate be, kitonɛkĩ binyína lɛtsa a kĩ bɛlamɛna kakɛna.” Ke liti a sodzafɔ a wole ade bɛsɛ̃ Yesu tɛtadiɛ bɛkpa be akũ a.
Bati a flee dza nɛ awã bɛkadã foe. Ade Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a di Yesu nsekuo bɛlɛ kĩ, “Ɛtɛ bati bɛbã nkpã foesũ ntɛ ye nyɛ Kristo a kĩ Baguma pau a ni, ɛnyɛ ye akũ!”
Ade ayea sodzafɔ a lɛmɛ di Yesu nsekuo a. Bifuã ye bɛkɔa waĩ mɔ ɔnyɛ mɔ ɔnyɛ bɛkpa ye kĩ ɛmɔa.
Ade bibi ye kĩ, “Ntɛ nɔ nyɛ Yudafɔ lɛgã a ni, tɛ nɔ akũ!”
Bɛtsɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ nɛ ye lɔlɔ nyangɛ kĩ, “Ade Yudafɔ Lɛgã nɛ awĩ a.”
Tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ a kĩ bɛbɔa nɛ asendua akũ a kamɛ ɔmɔa vũna Yesu kĩ, “Nnɛ́ nɔ nyɛ Kristo a? Tɛ nɔ akũ katɛ boe malo!”
Lɛmɛ ɔyade a wũni nɛ ye akũ kĩ, “Aávila Baguma mbɔɛɛ? Ɔtɛ sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ mɔapɛ a kĩ ɛtɛ a.
Lɛmɛ boe sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ a fɛta boe, kitonɛkĩ lɛtsa a kĩ bɔkɛna a, ade de sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ bɔtɛ a. Lɛmɛ ɛtákɛna tɔkpa tidima.”
Ade ebi Yesu kĩ, “Yesu, te anɛ nɛ yĩ akũ ntɛ owo nɔ lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ.”
Awã naa Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Mabi nɔ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ nviã kĩĩ aana nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ nɛ Paradiso kamɛ.”
Kĩ kite sukuloo suwa tɔdɔũ ewua-nviã abɔa a, suwa fɔ̃ kata, ade ɔtũ ke nɛ katinya flee kamɛ kɛnawo tɔdɔũ ɛlalɛ kamɛ a.
Ade lima a kĩ lɛvanɛ nɛ Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ a bɛ̃ nɛ kayite a.
Yesu bɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba kĩ, “Nda, nkɔa yĩ kawɛya ndo nɛ nɔ awɛ.” Kĩ ɛlɛ fukĩĩ a, eku.
Sodzafɔ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a mɔ́ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya, ade emu Baguma ɛlɛ kĩ, “Fɔnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali kĩ oti wĩ yanɛ.”
Kĩ bati a kĩ bɛkpɔta nɛ awã bɛkadã foe flee a mɔ́ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya a, bɛdzakũ bɛnaa kɔla mɔ ayɔlɔhɔ mɔ akpɔ kako nɛ lɔlɔ mɔ ɔwɔlɛ.
Bati a kĩ binyina Yesu kanyina wĩ a, mɔ batsole a kĩ bitomɔ ye bito Galilea a, dza mɔ lugo bɛkadã fɔtsa kĩĩ.
Onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Yosef kĩ edzi nɛ Arimatia ɔmatɔ a kamɛ nɛ Yudea tite akũ na nɛ awã. Ɛnya oti wĩ kĩ ye akũ deĩ obu, ade ɛkadã anɛ kakpa lɔkɔ a kĩ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a aaya.
Titɔ kĩ ɛna nɛ Yudafɔ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ fɔlɛtsa badzɛnɛ katsɛna a kamɛ malo ni, ɛtátunɔ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ de akũ bike otse, mɔ lɛtsa a kĩ bɛkɛna a akũ.
Ɛnaa Pilato anɛ kamɛ ade ɛnawã Yesu ɔnɔkpa a.
Ade ke ɛvɛnya ɔnɔkpa a ɛkɔa lima ovoe esuli ye a. Ɛkɔa ye ɛwɔla nɛ linikɛ kĩ bɛnyɛ nɛ de kamɛ, kĩ bɛtábila odima nɛ de kamɛ tɔ̃ a kamɛ.
Luwi a nya Efieda ade Kawɛya Luwi a lamɔ ɔtɔ kawo a.
Batsole a kĩ bitómɔ Yesu bito Galilea tomɔ Yosef bɛnadã linikɛ a, mɔ ayekĩ bɛkɔa Yesu ɔnɔkpa bɛwɔla nɛ de kamɛ.
Ke liti a, bimuniki bɛnaa kɔla bɛnamanɛ tutsonu mɔ fugua mɔ ɔlɛ̃ mɔ ɔlɛ̃ kĩ baakɔa bɛtsɛla ɔnɔkpa a biyi. Nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ a, bidzi bɛwɛya nɛ be mbla a onukpɛ̃.
Ɛkwansieda ɔnɔnɛ tutuutu a, batsole a naa linikɛ a ɔwɛ̃, bɛnɛɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bɛmanɛ biyi a.
Awã naa bɛmɔ́ kĩ bimininya de kpale a kĩ bɛkɔa bisua linikɛ onukpɛ̃ a biyi nɛ ɔɔwɛ̃.
Foesũ biwo nɛ de kamɛ lɛmɛ bɛtámɔ boe Ɔlate Yesu ɔnɔkpa a.
Bɛkɛna saa bɛdzɛ̃ bakɔna foe akũ, ade lɛtalɛta bati nviã kĩ bɛna nɛ tɛtadiɛ kĩ tata muamua kamɛ nɛ bɛta nɛ be akũ a.
Libe wo be paa foesũ bɛkɛna akũ nɛ kayɔ bɛkpa be, ade banyole a bi be kĩ, “Nde sũ miawɛ oti kĩ edzi nkpã nɛ banɔkpa kamɛ?
Ɛláa awĩ. Eyidza eto kanɔkpa! Mite anɛ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ebi mi nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ ɛna nɛ Galilea kĩ,
kɛnɛ kĩ bɛkɔa Otidziwa Obi a bido nɛ bati kpa awɛ, baabɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ, lɔkɔa nɛ fuwi ɛlalɛ liti a, eyidza edzi nkpã.”
Ade batsole a te anɛ nɛ ye fɔlɛtsa a akũ a.
Bimuniki bito linikɛ a ɔwɛ̃ bɛnabi fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ewua-odi a mɔ bati bɛbã fɔlɛtsa a flee.
Batsole a nyɛ Maria Magdalani, Yohana mɔ Maria kĩ ɛnyɛ Yakobo ɔma. Bɛmɔ batsole bɛbã a bɛnabi fɔtɔ banyanɛ a fɔlɛtsa a flee.
Lɛmɛ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kɔna kĩ lɛtsa a kĩ bibi be a nyɛ fɔkɔasiatsa, foesũ bɛtátɛ be bido.
Lɛmɛ Petro ta eyidza ewula atsɛ ɛnaa linikɛ a ɔwɛ̃. Ɛkɛna akũ ɛdã de kamɛ ade ɛmɔ ɔnɔkpa tilima odi a. Ɛkɛna saa emuniki ɛnaa kɔla nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya a sũ.
Nɛ luwi mɔapɛ a akũ a, bikĩ bitómɔ Yesu a be kamɛ bati nviã tsɛ̃ osi banaa akula adi kĩ bavɛ Emaus kamɛ. Osi a lugo aana ndɛ fusikũ evũkɔnɔ kito awã kɛnaa Yerusalem.
Bati a kalɔmɛna nɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ fɔya a flee akũ.
Kĩ bɛkalɔmɛna kanyɛ fɔlɛtsa kamɛ a, Yesu yapi be ade bɛtsã bɛnaa a.
Bɛmɔ́ ye lɛmɛ bɛtáyi ɔsũ kĩ ye yanɛ.
Yesu via be kĩ, “Litsa akũ milamɛna kalɔmɛna nɛ osi a?”
Bɛfɔ̃ bɛdza dĩĩ mɔ anɛ kamɛ mɔ kɔnya.
Ade be kamɛ ɔmɔa kĩ bavɛ Kleopa via ye kĩ, “Nɔ odi nyɛ ɔnɔvɔɛ̃ nɛ Yerusalem kĩ ɔtánu lɛtsa a kĩ de lɛya nɛ fuwi lukũ kĩĩ kamɛ a mbɔɛɛ?”
Yesu via be kĩ, “Litsa fɔlɛtsa lɛya?”
Bɛkpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Fɔlɛtsa a kĩ fɔya nɛ Yesu Nazaretni akũ a. Oti kĩĩ nyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ kĩ edeĩ kɔbɛ̃ yakɛna awãwã fɔtsa pii, ɛnyɛ fɔtsa ɔtsanɛ kpale kĩ Baguma mɔ bati flee akpa ye obu.
Lɛmɛ Yudafɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ pi ye bɛkɔa ye bido nɛ Roma abãã awɛ, kĩ bɛkɔ ye kɔtɔ bɛkpa wuda, bɛbɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ.
Bɔna kɔnɛte nɛ ye akũ kĩ ye aanya oti a kĩ yaanyɛ Israel. Ade nviã nyɛ fuwi ɛlalɛ kĩ fukĩĩ flee ya nɛ foe kamɛ a.
Boe katsu a kĩ kitomɔ ye a kamɛ batsole badi fɔ̃ akũ nyɛnɛ boe, kitonɛkĩ ɔnɔnɛ tutuutu kĩĩ bɛnaa ye linikɛ ɔwɛ̃,
lɛmɛ bɛtámɔ ɔnɔkpa a. Bimuniki bɛyabi boe kĩ Baguma ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ nyɛ be akũ bɛtsa be, bibi be kĩ Yesu dzi nkpã.
Boe katsu a kamɛ banyole badi naa linikɛ a ɔwɛ̃ bɛnamɔ foe pɛpɛɛpɛ ndɛ ayekĩ batsole a lɛ a, lɛmɛ bɛtámɔ Yesu.”
Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mitɛnɛ kadzimbi! Mi adzuni lɛlá sɔwa kĩ miatɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a fɔlɛtsa a flee mido!
Mitányi tɔ̃ kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ Kristo a ɛmɔ lubo kĩĩ bamɛ flee fɔmɔ yaaawo nɛ ye lɛgãkanya kukũkpalɛ a kamɛ?”
Ade ke Yesu kpalɛ fɔlɛtsa kamɛ ɛtsa be nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a tsɛlɛ nɛ ye akũ, kito Mose tuvoli akũ kɛyake nɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ flee katsɛlɛ a akũ a.
Kĩ bifuã akula a kĩ ye kamɛ banaa biyua a, Yesu kɛna ndɛ yatɛ̃ ɛnaa lɔtɔ.
Lɛmɛ biwũnya ye ade bibi ye kĩ, “Dzi nɛ boe sɛkɛ̃. Kade dɔ kiyua ade ɔtũ do kake awɛ a.” Foesũ ɛnase nɛ be sɛkɛ̃.
Kĩ bɛmɔ be bidzi kĩ banya a, ɛbɔɛ abodoo ɛnyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ, ɛsɛ̃ ɛkpa be.
Nɛ awã naa, be anɛ binya ade bɛmɔ́ ye biyi ɔsũ a, lɛmɛ ɛyɛla nɛ be anɛ kamɛ.
Ade ke bibi be akũ kĩ, “Fɔtákɛna ndɛ fi fudi lɛkatɛ̃ nɛ boe tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ, kĩ ɛkanyɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa fɔlɛtsa a kamɛ katsa boe nɛ osi a?”
Ade biyidza bimuniki mɔatsɛ bɛnaa Yerusalem, bɛnamɔ fɔtɔ banyanɛ ewua-odi a mɔ bati bɛbã a kĩ bɛkpɔta a.
Bɛnabi be kĩ, “Nuwĩ boe Ɔlate yidza eto kanɔkpa ade ɛnyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa Simon a.”
Bati nviã a bi be lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya nɛ osi akũ a, mɔ ayekĩ bɛmɔ́ boe Ɔlate a biyi ɔsũ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ ɛyɛlɛ abodoo ɛkpa be a.
Kĩ bati nviã kĩĩ kabi be fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, deedimɔapɛ Yesu mɔawɛ nɛ ɛdza nɛ be kayite, ade ebi be kĩ, “Lukudɔ litomɔ mi.”
Libe wo be paa ade bɛkakɔna kĩ ɔnɔkpa bɛmɔ.
Lɛmɛ Yesu bi be kĩ, “Nde sũ mibɔa obili lɔmɔ? Nde sũ miatɛ atsindze nɛ mi kamɛ?
Midã yĩ awɛ mɔ yĩ fɔnɛta. Mita yĩ midã mimɔ kĩ nnɛ́ ɔnɔkpa manɛ, kitonɛkĩ hũhũ lɛlá sukɛna mɔ fɔtsɔ̃ ndɛ ayekĩ miamɔ kĩ ndeĩ a.”
Kĩ ɛlɛ foe a, ɛkɔa ye awɛ mɔ fɔnɛta ɛtsa be.
Kawɔlɛ de be paa, lɛmɛ fɔkɛna be wãwã, foesũ biti bɛtátɛ bido. Ade ke Yesu via be kĩ, “Mideĩ funitsã fudi nɛ awĩ?”
Bɛkpa ye kafɔabi tɔlɛwa kadi,
ɛtɛ ke ɛba nɛ be anɛ kamɛ.

Ke liti a ebi be kĩ, “Ade fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ bamɛ mbi mi nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ nna nɛ mi kamɛ a. Kɛnɛ kĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ biyi nɛ Mose mbla, Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ tuvoli mɔ Tɔnɔ Ovoli a kamɛ fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ lɔmɔ.”
Ebinya be adzuni ayekĩ baanu Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ fɔlɛtsa a kayɔ.
Ebi be kĩ, “Bɛtsɛlɛ biyi kĩ Kristo a aamɔ lubo, lɔkɔa eyidza eto kanɔkpa nɛ luwi lɛlalɛde a akũ.
Nɛ ye dĩ akũ ni, bikĩ bitomɔ ye a aade lɛtsã nɛ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kadani mɔ tɔkpa kakɔakate akũ bɛkpa katinya kamɛ bati flee. Baayi lɛtsã kĩĩ kade kayɔ bitomɛna Yerusalem.
Mi nyɛ fukĩĩ bamɛ flee adansifɔ.
Yĩ mɔawɛ a maakɔa Hũhũ Kpalɛwa mma mi ndɛ ayekĩ Nda lɛ eyi a. Lɛmɛ midzi nɛ Yerusalem nɛ awĩ kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ kɔbɛ̃ a aato ode kɔyaatɛ mi kamɛ.”
Ade ɛkpã be bɛnɛ nɛ Yerusalem ɔmatɔ a kamɛ bɛnaa Betania, awã kĩ ɛdzɛla awɛ nɛ ode ehila be a.
Kĩ ɛkahila be a, ɛdzakũ ɛfɔnɛ be ade bɛbɔɛ ye bɛnamɛna ode a.
Ade ke bisum ye bimuniki bɛnaa Yerusalem nɛ kawɔlɛ kpale kamɛ a.
Bidzi nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ daa, bɛkamu Baguma.
John: Fɔmɔ baabɔa katinya ni, Baguma Kalɛ a deĩ kɔkɔɛ. Kalɛ a mɔ Baguma deĩ, ade Kalɛ a nyɛ Baguma a.
Kalɛ a mɔ Baguma deĩ anɛ kayɔkayi a fɔmɔ bɛbɔa katinya.
Baguma bɔa fɔtsa flee ɛtsãmɛna ye akũ, ade lɛtsama lɛláa kĩ ɛnɛ ye liti ɛbɔa.
Kalɛ a kamɛ nkpã deĩ, ade nkpã kĩĩ lɛma batidziwa ɔhaĩ a.
Ɔhaĩ a avɔlɛ nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ, ade ɔtũ tápuli edina ye da a.
Baguma do onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Yohanes.
Ɛya kĩ yayaadi adansiɛ nɛ ɔhaĩ a akũ ayekĩ bati flee aatsã ye akũ bɛtɛ bido.
Nnɛ́ Yohanes nyɛ ɔhaĩ a, mbom adansiɛ ɛyadi nɛ ɔhaĩ a akũ.
Ɔhaĩ wĩ a kĩ yatɛ̃ kakpa odi nyɛ odi a, aya nɛ katinya kamɛ.
Kalɛ a na nɛ katinya kamɛ, lɛmɛ titɔ kĩ Baguma bɔa katinya ɛtsãmɛna ye akũ malo ni, batidziwa támɔ ye biyi ɔsũ.
Ɛya nɛ ye mɔawɛ bati sɛkɛ̃, lɛmɛ ye bati a tátɛ ye.
Lɛmɛ bati flee a kĩ bɛtɛ ye, ade bɛtɛ ye bido lɛmɛ a, ɛkpa be kɔbɛ̃ kĩ bɛdani Baguma babi.
Bɛtádani Baguma babi nɛ batidziwa kama onukpɛ̃, ĩye ndɛ ayekĩ otinyole ama babi aye, mbom Baguma mɔawɛ lɛwɛ kĩ yakɛna be ye babi.
Kalɛ a dani kɛkɛna otidziwa, edzi nɛ boe kamɛ, ade kɔnyakamɔ mɔ ɔnɔkɔali yi ye kamɛ a. Bɔmɔ́ ye kukũkpalɛ a, kukũkpalɛ a kĩ ɛtɛ ndɛ Ɔlɛga a Obi mɔapɛ a aye.
Yohanes di adansiɛ nɛ ye akũ, ɛbɔa fɔwɔla ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ade oti kĩĩ akũ fɔlɛtsa mbi mi kĩ, ‘Oti odi aya nɛ yĩ liti, lɛmɛ ɛbɛ̃ yĩ kitonɛkĩ edzi nkpã kɔkɔɛ fɔmɔ bɛma yĩ.’ ”
Nɛ ye kɔnyakamɔ beblebee sũ ni, ehila boe flee ɛkpa boe nhila ete nɛ nhila akũ.
Mose akũ Baguma mbla a tsã ɛya, lɛmɛ ye kɔnyakamɔ mɔ ɔnɔkɔali a tsã Yesu Kristo akũ fɔya.
Odima támɔ tɔ̃ Baguma. Ye Obi mɔapɛ a kĩ eketimɔ Baguma a, kĩ edeĩ nɛ Ɔlɛga sɛkɛ̃ a, ade ye lɛnyɛ ayekĩ Baguma la a ɛtsa boe a.
Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ nɛ Yerusalem do be basɔfɔ mɔ Levifɔ nɛ Yohanes sɛkɛ̃ kĩ bɛnaavia ye kĩ, “Nɔ nyɛ owei?”
Yohanes tásĩ be mbuayɛ kakpa, mbom ɛkpalɛ fɔlɛtsa kamɛ yededeede ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nnɛ́ yĩ nyɛ Kristo a.”
Ade bivia ye kĩ, “Kekɔ̃ nɔ nyɛ owei? Mbɔɛɛ nɔ nyɛ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Eliya a?”
Ɛkpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oowo, nnɛ́ ye manɛ.”
Bibuki bivia ye kĩ, “Nɔ nyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ a kĩ bɛlɛ biyi kĩ yaaya a?”
Ɛkpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oowo.”
Adeke bibi ye kĩ, “Kekɔ̃ bi boe oti a kĩ anɛ, kitonɛkĩ kɛnɛ kĩ bɔkɔa mbuayɛ bɔma bikĩ bido boe fɔtɔ a. Owei koũ anɛ?”
Yohanes kpa be mbuayɛ ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yesaya tsɛlɛ eyi a kĩ, “Yĩ nyɛ oti a kĩ ɛtsɛ̃ nɛ kɔsa kamɛ yabɔa fɔwɔla a odo kĩ bɛkɛna osi kpĩĩ bɛkpa Ɔlate a.”
Batɔ a kĩ bido bito Farisifɔ sɛkɛ̃ a,
via Yohanes kĩ, “Ntɛ nnɛ́ nɔ nyɛ Kristo a, ĩye Eliya, ĩye Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ a ni, nde sũ akɛna mui kawɔla amaniɛ?”
Ade Yohanes kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Yĩ kɔ̃ ni, mawɔla bati mui, lɛmɛ odi kĩ minyína ye dzɛ̃ nɛ mi kamɛ.
Ade ye tomɔ yĩ nɛ liti yaya a, lɛmɛ ntáfɛta kĩ mawũnya ye mpabua tɔwɛ̃ malo.”
Fukĩĩ flee ya nɛ foe kamɛ nɛ Betania ɔmatɔ kamɛ, nɛ Yordan ɔwɔ liti, awã kĩ Yohanes kawɔla bati mui a.
Kĩ kade nyina a, Yohanes mɔ́ Yesu kĩ yaya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃, ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Midã Baguma Kavelibi a kĩ yaakɔa katinya kamɛ bati tɔkpa ɛnamɛna a!
Ade oti kĩĩ akũ fɔlɛtsa mbi mi kĩ, ‘Oti odi aya nɛ yĩ liti, kĩ ɛbɛ̃ yĩ, kitonɛkĩ edzi nkpã kɔkɔɛ fɔmɔ bɛma yĩ.’
Yĩ mɔawɛ a ntányi oti a kĩ ye yanɛ, lɛmɛ ĩyaawɔla bati mui, ayekĩ maanyɛ ye ntsa Israel kade a.”
Ade Yohanes lɛ nɛ Yesu akũ kĩ, “Mmɔ́ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a kĩ ɛka eto ode ndɛ mblɔduma aye ɛyadzi nɛ ye akũ.
Nɛ kayɔkayi a, ntányi ye, lɛmɛ Baguma kĩ edo yĩ kĩ nwɔla bati mui a bi yĩ kĩ, ‘Oti a kĩ aamɔ kĩ yĩ Hũhũ a ka ɛyadzi nɛ ye akũ a ni, ade ye aakɔa Hũhũ Kpalɛwa ɛwɔla bati mui a.’
Mmɔ́ foe lɔmɔ, ndi adansiɛ kĩ ade oti kĩĩ nyɛ Baguma Obi a.”
Luwi lɛyade a, kĩ Yohanes mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ nviã dzɛ̃ nɛ awã a,
bɛmɔ́ Yesu kĩ yatɛ̃ a, Yohanes lɛ kĩ, “Midã Baguma Kavelibi a!”
Fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ nviã a nu fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ a, foesũ bitomɔ Yesu bɛnaa.
Yesu dani, ɛmɔ́ be kĩ bitomɔ ye, ade evia be kĩ, “Litsa miawɛ?”
Bɛkpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Rabi,” foe kayɔ nyɛ Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, “ndia odzi?”
Yesu bi be kĩ, “Miyaadã.”
Lɔkɔ a aana ndɛ olobe tɔdɔũ ɛna kamɛ, foesũ bitomɔ ye bɛnamɔ awã kĩ edzi a, ade bidzi nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ olobe a flee a.
Fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ nviã a kamɛ ɔmɔa nyɛ Andrea, Simon Petro ɔwaɛ̃nyole.
Lɛtsa a kĩ Andrea nya lɔtɔ ɛkɛna nyɛ kĩ ɛnawɛ ɔwaɛ̃ Petro ebi ye kĩ, “Bɔmɔ́ Mesia a!” De kayɔ nyɛ Kristo.
Ke liti a, Andrea kpã Simon ɛnamɛna Yesu sɛkɛ̃.
Yesu dã Simon kɛnanaana ade ebi ye kĩ, “Nɔ dĩ nyɛ Simon kĩ ɛnyɛ Yohanes obi a, lɛmɛ kito finyaa baavɛ nɔ Kefas,” ĩye Petro. Buĩ nviã a kayɔ nyɛ de.
Kĩ kade nyina a, Yesu wɛ kĩ yadzakũ ɛnaa Galilea tite akũ, ade ɛmɔ Filipo ebi ye kĩ, “Yaatomɔ yĩ.”
Filipo lɛmɛ to Betsaida, ɔmatɔ a kĩ Andrea mɔ Simon dzi a kamɛ.
Filipo mɔ Nataniel ade ebi ye kĩ, “Bɔmɔ́ oti a kĩ Mose mɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ tsɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa nɛ ye akũ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa kamɛ a. Ade ye nyɛ Yosef obi Yesu, kĩ eto Nazaret a!”
Nataniel via kĩ, “Fɔtsa wĩ fudi aapuli fɔnɛ futo Nazaret lɛmɛ kamɛ?”
Filipo kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Yaadã!”
Kĩ Yesu mɔ́ Nataniel yaya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ a, ɛlɛ nɛ ye akũ kĩ, “Ade Israelni kpanunuunu nɛ awĩ a, ɛnyɛ́ anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa ɔkɛnanɛ!”
Nataniel via Yesu kĩ, “Nde ɔkɛna onyi yĩ?”
Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mmɔ́ nɔ kɔkɔɛ nɛ kɔya kutse a kayɔ fɔmɔ Filipo yavɛ nɔ.”
Ade Nataniel lɛ kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, nɔ nyɛ Baguma Obi a. Nɔ nyɛ Israel Lɛgã a!”
Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Ayekĩ mbi nɔ kĩ mmɔ́ nɔ nɛ kɔya kutse a kayɔ sũ mɔ ɔtɛ odo a? Aamɔ fɔtsa baũ kĩ fɔbɛ̃ fukĩĩ!”
Ade ke ebi be kĩ, “Mabi mi flee nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ míamɔ ode kĩ ebinya, ade míamɔ kĩ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ aakade bɛkaka nɛ yĩ, Otidziwa Obi a, akũ.”
Nɛ luwi lɛlalɛde akũ a, bipi obolitsɔ̃ nɛ Kana ɔmatɔ kĩ edeĩ nɛ Galilea tite akũ. Yesu ɔma na nɛ awã,
ade bɛvɛ Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a lɛmɛ bɛya nɛ obolitsɔ̃ kapikɔ̃ a.
Kĩ waĩ woli a, Yesu ɔma fuã Yesu ebi ye kĩ, “Be waĩ a woli.”
Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Otsole, nnɛ́ nɔ aabi yĩ lɛtsa a kĩ nkɛna. Yĩ lɔkɔ táwo tɔ̃ ɔtɔ.”
Yesu ɔma nabi basumunɛ a kĩ, “Lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ yaabi mi ni, mikɛna.”
Ayekĩ fɔnyɛ Yudafɔ amaniɛ kĩ bavɔlɛ akũ fɔmɔ bawo nɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ sũ ni, bake boe tɔpɔɔlɔ evũ nɛ tɔtɔ a kamɛ. Mui fugumi tsɛtsɛɛ ɛna ĩye foe elo awo nɛ lɔmɔa kamɛ.
Yesu bi basumunɛ a kĩ, “Minu mui miyula tɔpɔɔlɔ a.” Foesũ binu mui biyula foe tsɔnɔnɔɔnɔ.
Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Minu mui a badi mima oti a kĩ yadãmɛna funitsã akũ a.” Ade binu badi bɛma ye a.
Funitsã akũ ɔdãmɛnanɛ a tá mui a kĩ bɛdani bavɛ a onukpɛ̃ ɛdã. Ɛtányi awã kĩ bitomɛna be, lɛmɛ basumunɛ a kɔ̃ nyina. Foesũ ɛvɛ obolitsɔ̃ ɔnyɔ a,
evia ye kĩ, “Odi nyɛ odi akpa bati a bavɛ vɔɛ̃ kanyamɛna lɔtɔ, lɔkɔa ntɛ bɛmɔa be biwĩ a, yabɔɛ bakɔɛ a kayamɛna. Nde fɔya mɔ nɔ kɔ̃ ɔkɔa bavɛ vɔɛ̃ a oke kɛyawo lɔkɔ kĩĩ?”
Yesu kɛna ye awãwã fɔtsa fɔtɔnyade kĩĩ nɛ Kana nɛ Galilea tite akũ, ɛkɔa ɛnyɛ ye kukũkpalɛ ɛtsa, ade ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a tɛ ye bido a.
Ke liti a, Yesu mɔ ɔma, mɔ bawaɛ̃nyole mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a dzakũ bɛnaa Kapernaum, bɛnadzi nɛ awã fuwi sukuloo.
Kĩ Yudafɔ Wuda Katɛ̃ luwi kanya a wo ɔtɔ liyua a, Yesu naa Yerusalem.
Nɛ Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ a, ɛmɔ kĩ bati dzi banɔ banantsue, baveli mɔ mblɔduma. Ɛmɔ́ lɛmɛ kĩ sika babɛ̃nɛ dzi nɛ be tupunu akũ nɛ awã.
Foesũ ɛnɔ ɔwɛ̃ ɛkɛna mple ɛkɔa ɛblɔmɛna bayaɛ a flee, banantsue mɔ baveli a nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ. Edu be tupunu lɛmɛ ewula, ɛpansam sika babɛ̃nɛ a sika ɛsã.
Ade ebi bikĩ banɔ mblɔduma a kĩ, “Mifila fɔtsa kĩĩ minɛmɛna nɛ awĩ, mitakɔa Nda kɔla mikɛna kɔyaatɔ.”
Ade ke ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a te anɛ kĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “O Baguma, nɔ kɔla akũ mbɔdibɔ atɛ̃ nɛ yĩ kamɛ ndɛ fi aye.”
Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ yavia Yesu kĩ, “Litsa nsɛntsɛlɛni aapuli ɔkɛna ɔtsa boe kĩ odeĩ osi kĩ akɛna fukĩĩ?”
Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Miveli Baguma Kɔla kĩĩ, ade nɛ fuwi ɛlalɛ liti ni, maabuki nke koe.”
Yudafɔ a bi ye kĩ, “Bɛkɔa futeli tɛna-avũ bike Asɔli Kɔla kĩĩ, ke mɔ alɛ kĩ aakɔa fuwi ɛlalɛ obuki oke koe a?”
Lɛmɛ asɔli kɔla a kĩ Yesu lamɛna kalɛ a nyɛ ye sukɛna.
Foesũ kĩ Baguma dzɛla ye etomɛna kanɔkpa liti a, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a te anɛ kĩ ɛlɛ fukĩĩ eyi, ade bɛtɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa fɔlɛtsa mɔ lɛtsa a kĩ Yesu lɛ a bido a.
Kĩ Yesu na nɛ Yerusalem nɛ Wuda Katɛ̃ luwi kanya kamɛ a, bati pii tɛ ye bido nɛ awãwã fɔtsa a kĩ bɛmɔ́ kĩ ɛkɛna a sũ.
Lɛmɛ Yesu tákɔa ye akũ ɛkpa be, kitonɛkĩ enyina bati flee.
Foesũ fɔtásĩ kĩ odima abi ye kadi nɛ bati akũ, kitonɛkĩ ye mɔawɛ a enyina lɛtsa a kĩ lideĩ nɛ be tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ.
Nɛ lɔkɔ a naa kamɛ a, Yudafɔ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔa na kĩ ɛnyɛ Farisini, kĩ bavɛ Nikodemo.
Luwi a lɛnyɛ, ɛya nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃ ɛyabi ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, bunyina kĩ Baguma sɛkɛ̃ oto ɔya, kitonɛkĩ odima lɛláapuli ɛkɛna nsɛntsɛlɛni a kĩ akɛna a, ntɛ Baguma lítomɔ ye.”
Ade Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔali mabi nɔ kĩ ntɛ bɛtábuki bɛlɔla oti kama ni, ɛláapuli ɛmɔ Baguma lɛgãkanya a.”
Nikodemo via ye kĩ, “Nde baapuli bibuki bɛma oti kĩ ebo anɛ? Ɛláapuli ewo nɛ ɔma sɛmɛ kamɛ bɛlɔla ye kama lɛyade.”
Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔali a mabi nɔ kĩ, ntɛ bɛtáma oti bitomɛna mui mɔ Baguma Hũhũ kamɛ ni, ɛláapuli ewo nɛ ye lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ.
Sukɛna kamɛ bama sukɛna oti katomɛna, lɛmɛ Baguma Hũhũ kamɛ bama hũhũ ode.
Foesũ fɔtakɛna nɔ wãwã kĩ nlɛ kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ bɛlɔla mi flee kama.
Ɔwɛ abɔa kanaa awã kĩ yawɛ, anu ye nkã, lɛmɛ onyína awã kĩ eto ĩye awã kĩ yanaa. Ade aye fɔla fɔkpa odi nyɛ odi kĩ bɛma ye nɛ Hũhũ a kamɛ a.”
Ade Nikodemo via ye kĩ, “Nde fukĩĩ aapuli fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ?”
Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛnɔkɔɛ̃ anɛ nɛ Israel, mɔ onyína fukĩĩ a?
Mabi nɔ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ bɔalɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bunyina a akũ, ade bɔadi adansiɛ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bɔmɔ́ akũ a, lɛmɛ mi kamɛ odima láwɛ kĩ yatɛ boe fɔlɛtsa a.
Ntɛ mbi nɔ tite akũ fɔlɛtsa mɔ́ ɔtátɛ foe odo a, lɔkɔa ntɛ mbi nɔ ode fɔlɛtsa a ni, aapuli ɔtɛ foe odo?
Ade odima táde tɔ̃ ɛnaa ode, mbɔɛntɛ yĩ, Otidziwa Obi a, kĩ nto ode ĩya a odi.
“Ndɛ ayekĩ Mose dɛla kɔɛ kĩ bɛkɔa kɔɔble bɛkɛna a nɛ otse akũ nɛ kɔsa kamɛ a, ade ayea kɛnɛ kĩ baadɛla yĩ, Otidziwa Obi a, lɛmɛ nɛ asendua akũ a,
ayekĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ yĩ edo aana nkpã kĩ ɛla kawũna a.
“Kitonɛkĩ Baguma ti ɛwɛ katinya kalɛ paa kĩ ɛkɔa ye Obi mɔapɛ a ɛkpa kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ ye edo lɛláaku ɛwɔ, mbom yaana nkpã kĩ ɛla kawũna a.
Kitonɛkĩ Baguma tádo ye Obi kĩ ɛyaakɔ katinya kamɛ bati kɔtɔ, mbom kĩ fɔtsã ye akũ bati bɛna katɛ.
“Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ Obi a edo ni, bɛtákɔ ye kɔtɔ, lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtátɛ edo ni, bɛkɔ ye kɔtɔ kɔkɔɛ, kitonɛkĩ ɛtátɛ Baguma Obi mɔapɛ a edo.
Ayekĩ badzɛmɔ katinya kakɔ bati kɔtɔ a nyɛ kĩ ɔhaĩ a ya nɛ katinya kamɛ lɛmɛ bati wɛ ɔtũ kalɛ bɛba ɔhaĩ a, kitonɛkĩ be fɔtsakɛlawa nyɛ tɔkpa.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɛna tɔkpa akesĩ ɔhaĩ a, ade ɛláaya nɛ ɔhaĩ a sɛkɛ̃ a, kitonɛkĩ yaáwɛ kĩ yanyɛ ye tɔkpa kanya.
Lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ edzi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, yaya nɛ ɔhaĩ a kamɛ ayekĩ ɔhaĩ a aafɔ̃ bɛmɔ́ kĩ yakɛna fɔtsa nɛ Baguma kawɛ akũ.”
Fukĩĩ liti a, Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a naa Yudea amantam a kamɛ a. Edzi nɛ awã fuwi sukuloo ɛwɔla bati mui.
Yohanes lɛmɛ kawɔla bati mui nɛ Ainon kĩ efuã Salim, kitonɛkĩ mui bɔ nɛ awã. Bati kaya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ kĩ ɛwɔla be mui.
Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, bɛtápi tɔ̃ Yohanes bido nɛ kɔla kamɛ.
Luwi a, fɔlɛtsa kavɛlɛ ya nɛ Yohanes fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ mɔ Yudani odi kayite nɛ Yudafɔ akũ mui kawɔla amaniɛ akũ.

Foesũ bɛya nɛ Yohanes sɛkɛ̃ bɛyabi ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, ate anɛ nɛ onyole a kĩ ɛna nɛ nɔ sɛkɛ̃ nɛ Yordan ɔwɔ liti, kĩ odi adansiɛ nɛ ye akũ a? Ɛlamɛna bati mui kawɔla ade bati flee lamɛna ye sɛkɛ̃ kanaa a!”
Yohanes kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Odima lɛláapuli ɛna litsedi mbɔɛntɛ Baguma lɛkpa ye de.
Mi mɔawɛ a nyɛ yĩ adansifɔ kĩ nlɛ kĩ, ‘Nnɛ́ yĩ nyɛ Kristo a, mbom Baguma do yĩ kĩ ĩnya ye lɔtɔ.’
Obolitsɔ̃ ɔnyɔ nyɛ oti a kĩ ɛla obolitsɔ̃ a, lɛmɛ obolitsɔ̃ ɔnyɔ ɔkɔba kĩ ɛdzɛ̃ nɛ ɔɔwɛ̃ yatse a kɔ̃, kawɔlɛ ade ye pii ntɛ enu obolitsɔ̃ ɔnyɔ a odo. Ade ayea kĩ nnu ye odo a, yĩ kawɔlɛkamɔ akpɔla a.
Kɛnɛ kĩ ye dĩ lide nɛ ode lɔkɔa yĩ lide lɛka nɛ kayɔ.
“Oti a kĩ eto ode ɛya a bɛ̃ be flee. Oti a kĩ eto tite akũ a nyɛ tite akũ oti, ade tite akũ fɔlɛtsa yalɛ a, lɛmɛ oti a kĩ eto ode a bɛ̃ be flee.
Yalɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ɛmɔ́, mɔ lɛtsa a kĩ enu, lɛmɛ odima látɛ ye adansiɛ kadi a.
Lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ ye fɔlɛtsa a, asipi kĩ Baguma adi ɔnɔkɔali.
Oti a kĩ Baguma do a alɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa, kitonɛkĩ Baguma kɔa Hũhũ eyula ye kamɛ.
Ɔlɛga a awɛ ye Obi kalɛ, ade foesũ ɛkɔa fɔtsa flee edo nɛ ye awɛ a.
“Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ Obi a edo ni, edeĩ nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a, odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaátse Obi a ni, ɛláana nkpã, mbom Baguma kalɔkpa aana nɛ ye akũ.”
Farisifɔ a nu kĩ Yesu kawɔla bati mui, kĩ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kapɔ kaba Yohanes bade.
Lɛmɛ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, Yesu mɔawɛ táwɔla odima mui, mbom ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a odi lɛwɔla bati mui.
Foesũ kĩ Yesu nu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, ɛdzakũ nɛ Yudea emuniki ɛnaa Galilea tite akũ.
Kɛnɛ kĩ ɛtsã Samaria tite kamɛ ɛnaa awã.
Yesu yawo Samaria ɔmatɔ odi kĩ bavɛ Sikar. Ɔmatɔ a fuã mɔ tite a kĩ be ɔwanyɔ Yakob kɔa ɛkpa ye obi Yosef.
Yakob lɔwɔkɛ deĩ nɛ awã. Yesu yawo awã ndɛ suwa tɔdɔũ ewua-nviã kamɛ, ade kĩ osi katsã piã ye sũ ni, ɛkɛna akũ edzi nɛ lɔwɔkɛ a ɔwɛ̃.
Owi tábuna mɔ Samaria otsole odi ya kĩ yaanu mui. Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Kpa yĩ mui badi mmɔa.”
Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ ni, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a naa ɔmatɔ kamɛ bɛnaaya funitsã.
Otsole a bi Yesu kĩ, “Nde fɔya mɔ nɔ Yudani avia yĩ Samaria otsole kĩ nkpa nɔ mui kamɔa?” Ɛlɛ lɔmɔ kitonɛkĩ Yudafɔ mɔ Samariafɔ lákã.
Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ kanyina onyina lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma akpa, mɔ oti a kĩ ye lamɛna nɔ mui mɔawa kavia ni, kufɛ nɔ aavia ye lɔkɔa ɛkpa nɔ mui kĩ bakpa nkpã a.”
Otsole a bi ye kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃, ɔnɛ́ɛ bokiti kĩ bakɔa kanu mui, ade lɔwɔkɛ a lɛmɛ dzũ a. Ndia aatomɛna mui a kĩ bakpa nkpã a?
Boe ɔwanyɔ Yakob lɛnyɛ lɔwɔkɛ kĩĩ ɛkpa boe, ade ye mɔawɛ, ye babi mɔ ye bayaɛ flee mɔa mui bitomɛna de kamɛ a. Mbɔɛɛ katsa atsa kĩ ɔbɛ̃ Yakob?”
Ade Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛmɔa mui kĩĩ ni, ɔmɔado aabuki ɛkɔ ye,
lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yamɔa mui a kĩ maakpa ye a ni, ɔmɔado lɛláabuki ɛkɔ ye da. Kitonɛkĩ mui a kĩ maakpa oti a aadani mui katokɔ̃ kĩ nkpã mui deĩ a nɛ ye kamɛ, bɛkpa ye nkpã kĩ ɛla kawũna a.”
Otsole a bi Yesu kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃, kpa yĩ mui a na badi ayekĩ ɔmɔado lɛláabuki ɛkɔ yĩ da, ĩye mbuki ĩya nɛ awĩ kĩ maanu mui.”
Ade Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Naakpã nɔ ɔnyɔ miya.”
Otsole a bi ye kĩ, “Nlá ɔnyɔ.”
Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Ɔlɛ ɔnɔkɔali kĩ ɔlá ɔnyɔ.
Nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, odzimɔ banyole elo tɔ̃, ade onyole a kĩ mimɔ ye midzi finyaakĩĩ malo liti ɛnyɛ́ nɔ ɔnyɔ a.”
Ade otsole a bi Yesu kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃, mmɔ́ kĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ anɛ.
Boe Samariafɔ bawanyɔ sum Baguma nɛ ɔtɔ kĩĩ akũ, lɛmɛ mi Yudafɔ mibo Yerusalem nyɛ awã kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ bati bisum Baguma.”
Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Boe ɔma, tɛ yĩ kado kĩ lɔkɔ aaya kĩ bati lɛláabuki bisum Ɔlɛga a nɛ ɔtɔ kĩĩ akũ ĩye nɛ Yerusalem.
Mi Samariafɔ miti minyína oti a kĩ ye miasum. Lɛmɛ boe Yudafɔ kɔ̃ bunyina oti a kĩ bɔasum, kitonɛkĩ Yudafɔ akũ nkpã katɛ a tsã kɛya.
Lɛmɛ lɔkɔ aya, ade lɛya kɔkɔɛ malo kĩ bati a kĩ basum Baguma nɛ osi wĩ akũ a, aasum Ɔlɛga a nɛ Baguma Hũhũ mɔ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ. Ade bati a kĩ basum ye lɔmɔ a Baguma awɛ a.
Baguma ni, Hũhũ yanɛ, foesũ kɛnɛ kĩ bati a kĩ basum ye a, bisum ye nɛ Hũhũ mɔ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ.”
Ade otsole a bi ye kĩ, “Ĩnyina kĩ Mesia kĩ bavɛ Kristo a aaya, ade ntɛ ɛya ni, yaabi boe lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa.”
Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Yĩ nyɛ ye, yĩ a kĩ nlamɛna kɔdzɛla kalɛ mɔ nɔ a.”

Lɔkɔ a na kamɛ mɔ Yesu fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a muniki bɛya. Fɔkɛna be wãwã paa kĩ bɛmɔ́ kĩ ye mɔ otsole bɛlamɛna kɔdzɛla kalɛ. Lɛmɛ be kamɛ odima távia otsole a kĩ, “Litsa awɛ?” ĩye bivia Yesu kĩ, “Nde sũ mimɔ ye mialɔmɛna?”
Ade otsole a fɔnɛ ye kugumi awɛ eyi nɛ awã, ɛnaa ɔmatɔ kamɛ ɛnabi bati kĩ,
“Miyaadã onyole odi kĩ ebi yĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ nkɛna tɔ̃. Mbɔɛɛ ye nyɛ Kristo a?”
Foesũ bati nɛ́ nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ bɛnaa Yesu sɛkɛ̃.
Nɛ lɔkɔ a kamɛ a, Yesu fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kake ye aduli kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, yaanya litsedi.”
Lɛmɛ Yesu bi be kĩ, “Ndeĩ funitsã kĩ maanya, kĩ minyína foe akũ lɛtsama.”
Foesũ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kavia be akũ kĩ, “Mbɔɛɛ odi ma ye funitsã?”
Yesu bi be kĩ, “Yĩ funitsã nyɛ kĩ makɛna nɛ oti a kĩ edo yĩ a kawɛ akũ, lɔkɔa nwũna ye adzuma a kĩ ɛkpa yĩ a.
Nnɛ́ mi alɛ kĩ kite tidetɔ ɛna sɔũ kĩ funitsã kakpɔta lɔkɔ awo ɔtɔ? Lɛmɛ mabi mi kĩ miko anɛ midã fɔba a! Funitsã a bo kĩ bakpɔta.
Oti a kĩ yakpɔta funitsã a atɛ kɔtɔkase, ade ɔkpɔtanɛ akpɔta foe kakpa nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a. Foesũ funitsã odunɛ a mɔ ɔkpɔtanɛ a flee aamɔ kawɔlɛ bɛkpɔta.
Foesũ kalɛ a kĩ balɛ kĩ, ‘Oti mɔa adu fɔtsa, oti bɛbã akpɔta foe’ a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali.
Ndo mi kĩ minaakpɔta funitsã nɛ fɔba a kĩ mitákɛna adzuma nɛ foe kamɛ a. Bati bɛbã lɛkɛna adzuma nɛ awã, lɛmɛ mi mina nfasɔ mitomɛna be adzuma kakɛna kamɛ.”
Samariafɔ pii kĩ bito ɔmatɔ a kamɛ a tɛ Yesu bido nɛ otsole a adansiɛ a kĩ edi kĩ, “Ebi yĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ nkɛna tɔ̃ nɛ yĩ nkpã kamɛ,” a sũ.
Foesũ kĩ bɛyamɔ Yesu a, bike ye aduli kĩ edzi nɛ be sɛkɛ̃, ade Yesu dzi nɛ awã fuwi nviã fudi a.
Bati bɛbã pii lɛmɛ tɛ Yesu bido nɛ ye mɔawɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ a sũ.
Ade bibi otsole a kĩ, “Finyaa kɔ̃, nnɛ́ nɔ fɔlɛtsa a sũ bɔtɛ budo, kitonɛkĩ boe mɔawɛ a bunu fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ a, ade bunyi kĩ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, ye nyɛ katinya kamɛ Ɔtɛnɛ a.”
Nɛ fuwi nviã a liti a, Yesu dzakũ nɛ awã ɛnaa Galilea tite akũ.
Ye mɔawɛ a ɛlɛ kĩ, “Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ lɛ́la obu nɛ ye mɔawɛ kade bati kamɛ.”
Lɛmɛ kĩ ewo Galilea tite akũ a, bati a tɛ ye katɛ wĩ, kitonɛkĩ bɛnaa Yerusalem nɛ Wuda Katɛ̃ Luwi kanya a kamɛ, ade bɛmɔ́ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ɛkɛna a nɛ luwi kanya a kamɛ.
Ke liti a, Yesu muniki ɛnaa Kana nɛ Galilea tite akũ, awã kĩ ɛdani mui bɛkɛna bavɛ a. Abãã ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ odi deĩ nɛ awã, ye obinyole asɔ nɛ Kapernaum.
Kĩ enu kĩ Yesu to Yudea ɛya nɛ Galilea a, ɛnaa ye sɛkɛ̃ ɛnake ye aduli kĩ ɛyatsa ye obi kĩ edeĩ nɛ wuda mɔ nkpã kayite a ɛkpa ye.
Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Ntɛ mitámɔ awãwã mɔ nsɛntsɛlɛni fɔtsa ni, miátɛ kado.”
Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a ke ye aduli kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, ntɛ ɔtáya mɔatsɛ ni, yĩ obi aaku.”
Ade Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Naa, nɔ obi aana nkpã.”
Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a tɛ Yesu fɔlɛtsa a edo ade epi ɔtɔsi a.
Kĩ yanaa a, ye basumunɛ yatsɛlamɔ ye bibi ye kĩ ye obinyole a saɛ.
Evia be lɔkɔ a kĩ de kamɛ obinyole a saɛ, ade bibi ye kĩ, “Kadzɔ suwa ɔdɔũ mɔa kamɛ mɔ atilili a fɔnɛ ye awɛ.”
Ade ɔlɛga a te anɛ kĩ ade lɔkɔ a na kamɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Nɔ obi aana nkpã.” Nɛ foesũ ye mɔ ye tɔtɔ kamɛ bati flee tɛ Yesu bido.
Ade fukĩĩ nyɛ nsɛntsɛlɛni ayade kĩ Yesu kɛna nɛ Galilea, kĩ emuniki eto Yudea ɛya a.
Ke liti a, kĩ Yudafɔ luwi lidi kanya wo ɔtɔ a, Yesu muniki ɛnaa Yerusalem.
Lutubu lidi deĩ nɛ Yerusalem kakɔ a kĩ bavɛ Baveli Onyukpɛ̃ a ɔwɛ̃, kĩ bavɛ nɛ Hebri tide kamɛ kĩ Betesda. Bike tɛpata elo nɛ de atɔ.
Basɔnɛ beblebee awa nɛ tɛpata a kamɛ, be badi nyɛ banɛkunɛ, babɛbã nyɛ lɛkpɛ̃ banɛnɛ mɔ abafã amɛ. Bawa nɛ awã kadzɔlɛ kĩ bɛyaakputua mui a.
(Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ kideĩ kideĩ Baguma ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ odi ato ode kayaakputua mui a. Ɔsɔnɛ ɔtɔnyade kĩ yawo nɛ mui a kamɛ nɛ be kakputua liti a, asaɛ nɛ fɔsɔ nyɛ fɔsɔ kĩ yasɔ a kamɛ.)
Onyole odi kĩ ɛkasɔ futeli taalɛ-alɛ̃ flee na nɛ awã.
Kĩ Yesu mɔ́ ye kĩ ɛwaa nɛ awã a, enyi kĩ ɛkasɔ owi buna, foesũ evia ye kĩ, “Awɛ kĩ asaɛ?”
Ɔsɔnɛ a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃, ntɛ bikputua mui a ni, nlá odima kĩ yabɔɛ yĩ ɛnaado nɛ lutubu a kamɛ. Ntɛ mbɔa mbɔdi ĩyidza manaa a, lɔkɔa oti bɛbã tɛ̃ ɛnya yĩ lɔtɔ.”
Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Yidza kadza, kabɔɛ nɔ ɔkɛna katsã!”
Lɛtalɛta ɔsɔnɛ a na akũ ɔsĩ, ɛbɔɛ ye ɔkɛna edo katsã awɛ.
Luwi a kĩ fukĩĩ ya a nyɛ Yudafɔ Kawɛya Luwi,
foesũ Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a bi oti a kĩ Yesu tsa a kĩ ɛnɔnɛ ye ɔkɛna a kĩ, “Nviã nyɛ Kawɛya Luwi. Boe mbla a tákpa osi kĩ alɔ nɔ ɔkɛna.”
Onyole a kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oti a kĩ ɛtsa yĩ a libi yĩ kĩ, ‘Yidza kadza, kabɔɛ nɔ ɔkɛna katsã!’ ”
Ade ke bivia ye kĩ, “Owei nyɛ oti a kĩ ebi nɔ kĩ bɔɛ nɔ ɔkɛna katsã?”
Lɛmɛ oti a kĩ bɛtsa a linyína Yesu, kitonɛkĩ bati yi awã, ade Yesu lɛmɛ vɛlɛ akũ ɛnɛ nɛ bati a kamɛ a.
Ke liti a, Yesu mɔ́ ye nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ ade ebi ye kĩ, “Dã! Finyaa ɔna akũ ɔsĩ, foesũ fɔ̃ tɔkpa kakɛna, ntɛ nnɛ́ aye ni, lɛtsa kpa bɛbã kĩ lɛbɛ̃ fukĩĩ aaya nɛ nɔ akũ.”
Ade ke onyole a dzakũ ɛnabi Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ Yesu lɛtsa ye.
Foesũ bido Yesu liti katomɛna awɛ, kitonɛkĩ ɛtsa oti nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ.
Lɛmɛ Yesu bi be kĩ, “Nda akɛna adzuma luwi nyɛ luwi, ade yĩ malo kɛnɛ kĩ nkɛna adzuma a.”
Fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ fɔ̃ Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a buki bɛwɛ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ bakɔ Yesu, kitonɛkĩ nnɛ́ Kawɛya Luwi mbla a odi efum, mbom ebuki ɛlɛ kĩ Baguma nyɛ Ɔlɛga, kĩ fɔatsa kĩ ɛkɔa ye akũ eketimɔ Baguma.
Foesũ Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ Obi a lɛláapuli ɛkɛna lɛtsama nɛ ye mɔawɛ akũ. Lɛtsa a kĩ Obi a amɔ kĩ Ɔlɛga akɛna a, ade de odi ye malo yakɛna a.
Kitonɛkĩ Ɔlɛga a awɛ Obi a kalɛ, ade yatsa ye lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ ye mɔawɛ yakɛna a. Yaatsa Obi fɔtsa kpale kɔlaa kĩ fɔbɛ̃ fukĩĩ kĩ ɛkɛna, kĩ fɔ́akɛna mi wãwã.
Ndɛ ayekĩ Ɔlɛga a adzɛla banɔkpa badzi nkpã a, ade aye Obi a lɛmɛ aakpa bikĩ ɛpau a nkpã a.
Ɔlɛga mɔawɛ a ládzɛmɔ odima, mbom ɛkɔa kɔbɛ̃ flee edo nɛ Obi a awɛ kĩ ɛdzɛmɔ bati flee,
ayekĩ be flee baakɔa obu bɛkpa Obi a ndɛ ayekĩ bakɔa kakpa Ɔlɛga a. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaábu Obi a ni, yaábu Ɔlɛga a kĩ ye lido ye a lɛmɛ.
“Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yatse yĩ fɔlɛtsa, mɔ yatɛ oti a kĩ edo yĩ a kado ni, edeĩ nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a. Bɛláadzɛmɔ ye, mbom ɛtsã wuda kamɛ ɛtɛ̃, ɛna nkpã kɔkɔɛ.
Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ lɔkɔ lidi aya, ade lɛya kɔkɔɛ malo, kĩ banɔkpa aanu Baguma Obi a odo, ade bikĩ binu ye odo a aadzi nkpã a.
Ndɛ ayekĩ Ɔlɛga a mɔawɛ kamɛ nkpã deĩ a, ade ayea ɛfɔ̃ nkpã deĩ nɛ Obi a lɛmɛ kamɛ a.
Ɛkpa ye kɔbɛ̃ kĩ ɛdzɛ ɛkɔ kɔtɔ lɛmɛ, kitonɛkĩ ye nyɛ Otidziwa Obi a.
“Fukĩĩ fɔtakɛna mi wãwã, kitonɛkĩ lɔkɔ lidi aya kĩ banɔkpa flee aanu ye odo,
lɔkɔa baanɛ nɛ be funikɛ kamɛ. Bikĩ bɛkɛna tuwĩ a aayidza bidzi nkpã, ade bikĩ bɛkɛna tɔkpa a aayidza bɛkpa kɔtɔkaku.”

Yesu buki ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nláapuli nkɛna lɛtsama nɛ yĩ mɔawɛ otumi akũ. Madzɛ fɔlɛtsa ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma abi yĩ, foesũ madzɛ nɛ osi kpĩĩ akũ, kitonɛkĩ maákɛna nɛ yĩ mɔawɛ kawɛ akũ, mbom makɛna nɛ oti a kĩ edo yĩ a kawɛ akũ.
“Ntɛ ndi adansiɛ nɛ yĩ mɔawɛ akũ ni, yĩ adansiɛ a tákpɔla.
Lɛmɛ oti bɛbã deĩ kĩ yadi adansiɛ nɛ yĩ akũ, ade ĩnyina kĩ lɛtsa a kĩ yalɛ nɛ yĩ akũ a kpɔla.
“Mido batɔ nɛ Yohanes sɛkɛ̃, ade ebi mi ɔnɔkɔali nɛ yĩ akũ a.
Ntásĩ otidziwa adansiɛ kadi nɛ yĩ akũ, mbom nlɛ fukĩĩ ayekĩ míana nkpã katɛ.
Yohanes la ndɛ ɔsɛdza kĩ yatɛ̃ kakpalɛ fɔkɔ, ade miawɛ kĩ miamɔ kawɔlɛ sukuloo nɛ ye ɔhaĩ a kamɛ a.
“Lɛmɛ ndeĩ adansiɛ kĩ ɛbɛ̃ Yohanes ade a. Fɔtsa a kĩ makɛna a kĩ fɔnyɛ tudzuma kĩ Nda kpa yĩ kĩ nkɛna nwũna a, ade foe adi adansiɛ nɛ yĩ akũ, katsa lɛmɛ kĩ Ɔlɛga a lido yĩ a.
Ɔlɛga a kĩ edo yĩ a, ade ye adi adansiɛ nɛ yĩ akũ a. Mitánu tɔ̃ ye odo ĩye mimɔ́ tɔ̃ ayekĩ ɛla a.
Mitátɛ ye fɔlɛtsa a nɛ mi tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ mitátɛ oti a kĩ edo a mido.
Miatsã Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a fɔlɛtsa kamɛ fininiini, kitonɛkĩ miakɔna kĩ foe kamɛ míatsã mina nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a. Ade ovoli kĩĩ kamɛ fɔlɛtsa mɔapɛ a adi adansiɛ nɛ yĩ akũ a,
lɛmɛ miáwɛ kĩ miaya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ ayekĩ míana nkpã.
“Maáwɛ kamu ntomɛna batidziwa sɛkɛ̃,
kitonɛkĩ ĩnyina bati a odu kĩ be mianɛ, ade ĩnyina lɛmɛ kĩ milá ɔdɔ mikpa Baguma nɛ mi tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ a.
Ĩya nɛ Nda dĩ akũ lɛmɛ mitátɛ yĩ. Lɛmɛ ntɛ oti bɛbã lɛya nɛ ye mɔawɛ dĩ akũ ni, míatɛ ye.
Miawɛ kĩ miatɛ mi akũ akũ kamu, lɛmɛ miáwɛ kamu a kĩ kito oti a kĩ ye odi nyɛ Baguma a sɛkɛ̃, lɔkɔa nde míapuli mitɛ yĩ mido?
“Lɛmɛ mitakɔna kĩ yĩ aatsua mi onukpɛ̃ nkpa Nda. Mose a kĩ ye akũ mikɔa anɛ mite a, ade ye nyɛ oti kĩ yaatsua mi onukpɛ̃ a.
Ntɛ miti mitɛ Mose mido ni, kufɛ míatɛ yĩ malo mido, kitonɛkĩ ɛtsɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa eyi nɛ yĩ akũ.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ mitátɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ɛtsɛlɛ eyi a mido ni, nde míakɛna mitɛ yĩ fɔlɛtsa a mido?”
Ke liti a, Yesu nyina Galilea ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a kĩ bavɛ lɛmɛ kĩ Tiberia ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a, ɛnaa sɛkɛ sitide a.
Bati kɔdabu kpale tomɔ ye kitonɛkĩ bɛmɔ́ awãwã fɔtsa a kĩ ɛkɛna, nɛ basɔnɛ katsa kamɛ a.
Ade Yesu de ɛnaa ɔtɔ akũ ɛnakɛna akũ edzi mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ.
Finyaa, Wuda Katɛ̃ Luwi kanya lɔkɔ a wo ɔtɔ liyua.
Kĩ Yesu dzɛla anɛ ɛdã fɔkɔ a, ɛmɔ́ kĩ bati kɔdabu baũ kudi lamɛna ye sɛkɛ̃ kaya, foesũ evia Filipo kĩ, “Ndia bɔ́ana funitsã bɔya bɔkpa bati kĩĩ flee?”
Yesu mɔawɛ nyina lɛtsa a kĩ yaakɛna, lɛmɛ evia Filipo kalɛ kĩĩ kĩ yasɔ ye ɛdã.
Ade Filipo kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ bɔya funitsã sika ovoe ɔha nviã malo ni, fɔláawĩ be ntɛ odi nyɛ odi tɛ sukuloo sukuloo malo.”
Awã naa, Yesu fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kamɛ ɔmɔa, Andrea, kĩ ɛnyɛ Simon Petro ɔwaɛ̃ bi ye kĩ,
“Opopo odi nɛɛ abodoo fɔbɔ elo mɔ kɔfɔabi nviã nɛ awĩ. Lɛmɛ futi fɔláato bati beblebee kĩĩ?”
Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mifɔ̃ bati a flee bɛkɛna akũ bidzi.” Tuwĩ blɔblɔ deĩ nɛ awã ade bati a flee kɛna akũ bidzi nɛ te akũ a. Banyole a lidede aana ndɛ mpim elo.
Ade ke Yesu tɛ abodoo a ɛnyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ, ade ɛsɛ̃ ye ɛkpa bati a. Ɛkɛna kɔfɔabi a lɛmɛ lɔmɔ, ade be flee bɛna funitsã ndɛ ayekĩ bawɛ a.
Kĩ bɛnya biwĩ a, Yesu bi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Mikpɔta fukĩ fute a. Mitafɔ̃ bubula fudima kade.”
Foesũ bifila fukĩ bati a nya bitina nɛ abodoo elo a kamɛ a biyula tɛtsɛtsɛ ewua-nviã.
Kĩ bati a mɔ́ awãwã fɔtsa a kĩ Yesu kɛna nɛ awã a, bɛlɛ kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔali, ade Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ a kĩ yaya nɛ katinya kamɛ a!”
Kĩ Yesu mɔ́ kĩ baayatimtim ye bipi bidzina lɛgã a, foesũ ɛnɛ́ nɛ be kamɛ ebuki ede ɛnaa ɔtɔ akũ ye odi.
Kĩ olobe lɔkɔ wo ɔtɔ a, Yesu fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a ka bɛnaa ɔwɔ lutubu baũ a abuĩ.
Biwo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ kamɛ bimuniki binyina banaa Kapernaum. Nɛ lɔkɔ a, kade dɔ lɛmɛ Yesu táyawo tɔ̃ be sɛkɛ̃.
Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, ɔwɛ kpale odi kavũ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kabɔa mui kadɛla kakamɛna.
Kĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a tá ɔkɔlɔ a banaa lɔtɔ ndɛ fusikũ ɛlalɛ ĩye foe ɛna a, bɛmɔ́ Yesu kĩ ɛtsɛ̃ mui anɛ yaya nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a sɛkɛ̃, ade libe wo be a.
Lɛmɛ Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mitavila. Yĩ manɛ!”
Ɔwɔlɛ ka edzi be ade bɛfɔ̃ Yesu wo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ a. Lɛtalɛta ɔkɔlɔ a wo lɔwɔtuni nɛ awã kĩ banaa a.

Kĩ kade nyina a, bati kɔdabu a kĩ bɛkahɔ nɛ ɔwɔ lutuni litide kadzɔ a mɔ́ biyi ɔsũ kĩ ɔkɔlɔ mɔapɛ lɛna nɛ awã. Bɛmɔ́ lɛmɛ kĩ Yesu táwo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ ebumɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a, mbom bɛdzakũ bɛfɔnɛ ye.
Lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, tɔkɔlɔ bɛbã tidi kĩ tito Tiberia ɔmatɔ a yadza tifuã awã kĩ bati nya abodoo a kĩ boe Ɔlate bɔa mpaɛ nɛ ye akũ a.
Kĩ bati kɔdabu a mɔ́ kĩ Yesu ĩye ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kamɛ odima lɛláa awã a, biwo nɛ tɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ bɛnaa Kapernaum bɛnaawɛ ye.
Kĩ bati a mɔ́ Yesu nɛ lɔwɔtuni litide a ni, bivia ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, lɔkɔ lɔwɔdabe ɔyawo awĩ?”
Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ, nnɛ́ awãwã fɔtsa a kĩ nkɛna mimɔ́ a sũ mitsɛ̃ miawɛ yĩ, mbom abodoo a kĩ mina minya miwĩ a sũ.
Mitaha akũ nɛ funitsã kĩ fɔ́abu kade akũ, mbom miha akũ miwɛ funitsã a kĩ fɔ́awa fɔkpa daa nkpã a kĩ Otidziwa Obi a aakpa mi a, kitonɛkĩ ade ye akũ Baguma boe Ɔlɛga a te awɛ a.”
Foesũ bati a via Yesu kĩ, “Litsa kɛnɛ kĩ bɔkɛna fɔtsa kĩ bɔakɛna Baguma adzuma?”
Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma awɛ kĩ mikɛna nyɛ kĩ mitɛ oti a kĩ edo a mido.”
Ade bivia ye kĩ, “Nsɛntsɛlɛni awɔdabe aakɛna bɔmɔ́ lɔkɔa bɔtɛ nɔ budo? Litsa aakɛna?
Boe bawanyɔ nya funitsã a kĩ bavɛ mana a nɛ kɔsa kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ bɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ, ‘Ɛkpa be abodoo etomɛna ode kĩ bɛnya.’ ”
Yesu bi be kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔali a mabi mi kĩ, nnɛ́ Mose lɛkpa mi abodoo a etomɛna ode, mbom Nda akpa abodoo wĩ katomɛna ode.
Kitonɛkĩ Baguma abodoo a nyɛ́ oti a kĩ eto ode ɛya kĩ yakpa katinya nkpã.”
Ade bibi ye kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, kpa boe abodoo kĩĩ daa.”
Yesu bi be kĩ, “Yĩ nyɛ abodoo a kĩ yakpa nkpã. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ ni, kɔlɛ lɛláakɔ ye da, ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ yĩ edo ni, ɔmɔado lɛláakɔ ye da.
Finyaa mbi mi kĩ, mimɔ́ yĩ, lɛmɛ miátɛ mido.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ Nda kɔa ɛkpa yĩ ni, yaaya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃, ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ ni, nláablɔmɛna ye da,
kitonɛkĩ nto ode ĩya, nnɛ́ kĩ mayaakɛna nɛ yĩ mɔawɛ kawɛ akũ, mbom kĩ makɛna oti a kĩ edo yĩ a odi kawɛ akũ.
Ade oti a kĩ edo yĩ a kawɛ nyɛ kĩ bati a kĩ ɛkɔa ɛkpa yĩ a kamɛ odima ɛtayɛla, mbom kĩ ndzɛla be flee bidzi nkpã nɛ luwi nkaɛ a akũ.
Kitonɛkĩ Nda kawɛ nyɛ kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛmɔ́ Obi a mɔ ɛtɛ ye edo lɛmɛ ni, ɛna nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a. Ade maadzɛla ye edzi nkpã nɛ luwi nkaɛ a akũ a.”
Yudafɔ a do hũhũhũhũ kakɛna awɛ nɛ Yesu akũ, kitonɛkĩ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Yĩ nyɛ abodoo a kĩ eto ode ɛya a.”
Foesũ bɛlɛ kĩ, “Nnɛ́ Yesu, Yosef obinyole a kĩ bunyina ɔlɛga mɔ ɔma flee a nɛ awĩ a? Nde fɔya mɔ finyaa yalɛ kĩ ode eto ɛya?”
Ade Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mifɔ̃ hũhũhũhũ kakɛna nɛ mi kamɛ.
Odima lɛláapuli ɛya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ mbɔɛntɛ Nda a kĩ edo yĩ a vɛlɛ ye ɛma yĩ, ade maadzɛla ye edzi nkpã nɛ luwi nkaɛ a akũ a.
Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a tsɛlɛ biyi kĩ, ‘Baguma aatsa bati flee fɔtsa!’ Odi nyɛ odi kĩ etse Ɔlɛga a, ɛkɔlɛ fɔtsa etomɛna ye sɛkɛ̃ ni, aya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃.
Lɛmɛ fukĩĩ látsa kĩ odi mɔ́ tɔ̃ Ɔlɛga a, mbɔɛntɛ oti a kĩ eto Baguma sɛkɛ̃ a odi lɛmɔ Ɔlɛga a.
Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ edo ni, edeĩ nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a.
Yĩ nyɛ abodoo a kĩ yakpa nkpã.
Mi bawanyɔ nya mana nɛ kɔsa kamɛ, lɛmɛ biku.
Lɛmɛ abodoo a kĩ eto ode ɛya a aafɔ̃ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yanya ye a lɛláaku.
Yĩ nyɛ abodoo a kĩ yakpa nkpã, kĩ eto ode ɛya a. Ntɛ odi nya abodoo kĩĩ ni, yaadzi nkpã daa, ade ke abodoo a kĩ maakpa ye a nyɛ yĩ sukɛna, kĩ makpa katinya kamɛ bati bɛna nkpã.”
Fukĩĩ fɔ̃ Yudafɔ a yi fɔlɛtsa kavɛlɛ kayɔ nɛ kalɔkpa kamɛ nɛ be kamɛ ade bivia kĩ, “Nde oti kĩĩ aapuli ɛkɔa ye sukɛna ɛkpa boe kĩ bɔba?”
Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ ntɛ mitába Otidziwa Obi a sukɛna, mimɔa ye babɔanɛ a ni, miláana nkpã nɛ mi kamɛ.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛba yĩ sukɛna ɛmɔa yĩ babɔanɛ lɛmɛ ni, yaana daa nkpã a, ade maadzɛla ye edzi nkpã nɛ luwi nkaɛ a akũ a.
Kitonɛkĩ yĩ sukɛna nyɛ funitsã wĩ a, ade yĩ babɔanɛ lɛmɛ nyɛ bavɛ wĩ a.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaba yĩ sukɛna, kĩ yamɔa yĩ babɔanɛ lɛmɛ ni, edeĩ nɛ yĩ kamɛ ade yĩ malo ndeĩ nɛ ye kamɛ a.
Ndɛ ayekĩ Ɔlɛga a kĩ edzi nkpã do yĩ a, kĩ ndzi nkpã nɛ ye sũ a, ade ayea odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛba yĩ sukɛna lɛmɛ aadzi nkpã nɛ yĩ sũ a.
Ade abodoo a kĩ eto ode a nɛ awĩ a. Ɛlá ndɛ mana a kĩ mi bawanyɔ nya lɛmɛ ke liti, biku a. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛnya abodoo kĩĩ aadzi nkpã daa.”
Yesu lɛ fukĩĩ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ ɛkatsa fɔtsa nɛ Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ nɛ Kapernaum.
Yesu fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a pii nu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ ade bɛlɛ kĩ, “Fɔtsa katsa kĩĩ tɛnɛ́ ɔsĩ! Owei aapuli ɛtɛ foe?”
Yesu mɔ́ eyi ɔsũ kĩ bɛkakɛna hũhũhũhũ, foesũ ebi be kĩ, “Mbɔɛɛ fukĩĩ fɔ̃ miawɛ kĩ miakpa lɔlɔ?
Kekɔ̃ nde fɔ́ana ntɛ mimɔ́ Otidziwa Obi a kĩ emuniki ede yanaa ode, awã kĩ ɛna tɔ̃ a?
Baguma Hũhũ a akpa nkpã, otidziwa kɔbɛ̃ lɛláa lɛtsama kamɛ. Fɔlɛtsa a kĩ mbi mi a nyɛ Hũhũ kamɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩ foe kamɛ nkpã deĩ.
Lɛmɛ mi kamɛ badi tátɛ bido.” Kitonɛkĩ Yesu nyi kito anɛ kayɔkayi a bati a kĩ bɛláatɛ bido mɔ oti a kĩ ye aanyɛ ye ɛkpa a.
Ɛlɛ ebu kĩ, “Ade fukĩĩ sũ mbi mi kĩ odima lɛláapuli ɛya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ mbɔɛntɛ Ɔlɛga a kpa ye osi.”
Kito fukĩĩ akũ a, Yesu fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a badi pii muniki nɛ ye liti, ade bɛtábuki bitomɔ ye a.
Foesũ evia fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ewua-nviã a kĩ, “Mi malo miawɛ kĩ miadzakũ mbɔɛɛ?”
Ade Simon Petro kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, owei sɛkɛ̃ bɔ́adzakũ bɔnaa? Nɔ deĩ daa nkpã a fɔlɛtsa.
Finyaa kɔ̃ bɔtɛ budo ade bunyina kĩ nɔ nyɛ Oti Kpalɛwa a kĩ eto Baguma sɛkɛ̃ a.”
Ade ke Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nnɛ́ mi bati ewua-nviã mpau? Lɛmɛ mi kamɛ ɔmɔa nyɛ Abonsam!”
Yuda, Simon Iskariot obi a akũ fɔlɛtsa ɛkalɛ, kitonɛkĩ titɔ kĩ ɛnyɛ be ewua-nviã a kamɛ ɔmɔa malo ni, ade ye aanyɛ ye ɛkpa a.
Ke liti a, Yesu natsã emini nɛ Galilea tite akũ, ɛtáwɛ kĩ yamini nɛ Yudea tite kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ nɛ awã kawɛ kĩ bakɔ ye.
Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, Yudafɔ Tɛpatampa Kayɔ Kadzi Luwi kanya a fuã,
foesũ Yesu bawaɛ̃nyole bi ye kĩ, “Dzakũ nɛ awĩ kanaa Yudea tite akũ, lɔkɔa nɔ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a lɛmɛ bɛmɔ adzuma a kĩ ɔlamɛna kakɛna a.
Odima lákɔla ye adzuma ntɛ yawɛ kĩ bati binyi ye kanyi wĩ. Ntɛ nuwĩ ɔlamɛna fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ flee kakɛna ni, nyɛ nɔ akũ katsa katinya kamɛ bati flee!”
Yesu bawaɛ̃nyole a lɛ fukĩĩ kitonɛkĩ be malo bɛtátɛ ye bido.
Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Yĩ lɔkɔ wĩ táwo tɔ̃ ɔtɔ, lɛmɛ mi kɔ̃ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ nɛnɛ lɛkpa mi.
Katinya kamɛ bati lɛláapuli bikesĩ mi, lɛmɛ yĩ kɔ̃ bakesĩ yĩ, kitonɛkĩ ndzɛmɔ be kabi kĩ be tudzuma nyɛ tɔkpa.
Minaa luwi a kanyakɔ̃. Yĩ kɔ̃ nláanaa luwi kĩĩ kanyakɔ̃, kitonɛkĩ yĩ lɔkɔ wĩ táwo tɔ̃ ɔtɔ.”
Kĩ Yesu lɛ fukĩĩ eyua a, ebuki ɛkahɔ nɛ Galilea.
Kĩ Yesu bawaɛ̃nyole a dzakũ bɛnaa luwi kanyakɔ̃ a, ye malo ɛyanaa awã, lɛmɛ ɛtányɛ ye akũ ɛtsa, mbom ɛbɛla ye akũ.
Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a kawɛ ye nɛ luwi a kanyakɔ̃, bɛkavia kĩ, “Nde oti a?”
Bati kɔdabu a kalɛ kɔdzɛla pɛtɛɛ pɛtɛɛ nɛ Yesu akũ. Be kamɛ badi lɛ kĩ, “Oti wĩ yanɛ.”
Ade babɛbã lɛmɛ lɛ kĩ, “Oowo, ɛtsɛ̃ yakɛ bati.”
Lɛmɛ odima tápuli ɛlɛ foe kɔɔba, kitonɛkĩ bivila Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a.
Kĩ kite sukuloo luwi kanya a atɛ̃ de kayite a, Yesu naa Baguma Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ ɛnado bati fɔtsa katsa awɛ.
Ye fɔtsa katsa a kɛna Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a wãwã paa, ade bɛlɛ kĩ, “Nde oti kĩĩ kɛna enyina ovoli lɔmɔ, kĩ ɛtána fɔtsa kakɔlɛ kadima?”
Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Fɔtsa a kĩ matsa a lɛnyɛ́ yĩ mɔawɛ fude, mbom futo Baguma kĩ edo yĩ a sɛkɛ̃.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yawɛ kĩ yakɛna nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma awɛ akũ a, aanyi ntɛ fɔtsa a kĩ matsa a to Baguma sɛkɛ̃ ĩye malɛ foe nɛ yĩ mɔawɛ kɔbɛ̃ akũ.
Oti kĩ yatsa fɔtsa nɛ ye mɔawɛ kɔbɛ̃ akũ ni, obu yawɛ ɛkpa ye akũ. Lɛmɛ ntɛ oti awɛ obu ɛkpa oti a kĩ edo ye a ni, ɛnyɛ ɔnɔkɔalini, ade tɔkpa tidima lɛláa ye kamɛ a.
Mbɔɛɛ nnɛ́ Mose lɛkpa mi mbla a? Lɛmɛ mi kamɛ odima lákɛna nɛ mbla a akũ. Nde sũ miawɛ kĩ miakɔ yĩ?”
Ade bati kɔdabu a bi ye kĩ, “Hũhũ kpa deĩ nɛ nɔ kamɛ! Owei awɛ kĩ yakɔ nɔ?”
Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Awãwã fɔtsa mɔa kĩĩ nkɛna, ade mi flee mikɛna saa a.
Mose kpa mi mbla kĩ mitsua mi babinyole fɔkpati, ade titɔ kĩ nnɛ́ Mose sɛkɛ̃ futo, mbom mi bawanyɔ liyi foe kayɔ malo ni, miatsua onyole lɛkpati nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ.
Ntɛ bitsua obi lɛkpati nɛ Kawɛya luwi akũ ayekĩ bɛláafum Mose mbla a ni, nde sũ mina kalɔkpa nɛ yĩ akũ kĩ ntsa oti fɔsɔ nɛ Kawɛya Luwi a akũ?
Mitadã bati anɛ midzɛ mikɔ kɔtɔ, mbom midzɛ kalɛ nɛ ke osi kpĩĩ akũ.”
Yerusalem ɔmatɔ a kamɛ bati badi via kĩ, “Nnɛ́ oti kĩĩ Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a lamɛna kawɛ kĩ bakɔ a nɛ awĩ a?
Midã kĩ ɛdzɛ̃ nɛ kanade yalɛ kɔdzɛla, kĩ bɛtávia ye kadima. Mbɔɛɛ fɔ́anya kĩ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ a nyina nuwĩ kĩ ye nyɛ Kristo a?
Boe flee bunyina awã kĩ oti kĩĩ kɔ̃ to, lɛmɛ ntɛ Kristo a ya ni, odima lɛláanyi awã kĩ eto.”

Kĩ Yesu katsa fɔtsa nɛ Baguma Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ a, ɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba ɛlɛ kĩ, “Kalɛ mialɛ kĩ miti minyina yĩ mɔ awã kĩ nto a? Ntáya nɛ yĩ mɔawɛ kɔbɛ̃ akũ. Oti a kĩ edo yĩ a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔalini kĩ mi minyína ye,
lɛmɛ yĩ kɔ̃ ĩnyina ye, kitonɛkĩ ye sɛkɛ̃ nto ĩya ade ye lido yĩ a.”
Nɛ foesũ bɛwɛ kĩ bapi Yesu, lɛmɛ odima tákɔa awɛ ɛta ye, kitonɛkĩ ye lɔkɔ táwo tɔ̃ ɔtɔ.
Lɛmɛ bati kɔdabu a kamɛ bati pii tɛ ye bido ade bivia kĩ, “Ntɛ Kristo a ya ni, yaakɛna awãwã fɔtsa pii fɔba fukĩ oti kĩĩ lamɛna kakɛna a?”
Farisifɔ nu fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bati kɔdabu a lamɛna kalɛ pɛtɛɛ pɛtɛɛ nɛ Yesu akũ a, foesũ bɛmɔ Yudafɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a bido Asɔli Kɔla akũ badãmɛnanɛ a kĩ bɛnaapi ye.
Ade Yesu lɛ kĩ, “Maana nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ fubuna owi sukuloo, lɔkɔa maadzakũ nnaa oti a kĩ edo yĩ a sɛkɛ̃.
Míawɛ yĩ lɛmɛ miláamɔ yĩ, kitonɛkĩ miláapuli miya nɛ awã kĩ maana a.”
Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a via akũ kĩ, “Nɛ ndia ɛwɛ kĩ yanaa kĩ bɔláapuli bɔmɔ́ ye? Mbɔɛɛ kĩ yanaa Yudafɔ a kĩ bɛgba biko nɛ Helafɔ kamɛ a ɛnaatsa Helafɔ a fɔtsa?
Ɛlɛ kĩ bɔ́awɛ ye lɛmɛ bɔláamɔ ye, ade bɔláapuli bɔnaa awã kĩ yaana a. Foe kayɔ nyɛ litsa?”
Nɛ luwi nkaɛ a kĩ lɛnyɛ luwi titiliwu nɛ fuwi kanya kamɛ akũ a, Yesu yidza ɛdza ade ɛbɔa fɔwɔla ɛlɛ kĩ, “Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɔmɔado akɔ ye ni, ɛya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ ɛyaamɔa mui.
Ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ a, ‘Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ yĩ edo ni, nkpã tɔwɔ aatini bito ye ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ.’ ”
Yesu kalɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ Hũhũ a kĩ bikĩ bɛtɛ ye bido a aayatɛ a akũ. Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, bɛtákpa tɔ̃ Hũhũ a, kitonɛkĩ bɛtádzɛla Yesu ewo nɛ kukũkpalɛ kamɛ.
Kĩ bati a badi nu fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Yesu lɛ a, bɛlɛ kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔali, Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ a nyɛ oti kĩĩ.”
Babɛbã lɛ kĩ, “Ade Kristo a nɛ awĩ a.”
Lɛmɛ bati bɛbã kɔ̃ via kĩ, “Mbɔɛɛ Galilea tite akũ Kristo a aato ɛya?
Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a tálɛ kĩ Kristo aato Lɛgã Dawid kasinu a kamɛ, ade baama ye nɛ Betlehem, ɔmatɔ a kĩ Dawid dzi a kamɛ?”
Foesũ kasɛ̃ wo nɛ bati kɔdabu a kamɛ nɛ Yesu sũ.
Badi wɛ kĩ bapi ye, lɛmɛ odima tákɔa awɛ ɛta ye.
Kĩ Asɔli Kɔla akũ badãmɛnanɛ a muniki bɛya nɛ Yudafɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ Farisifɔ a sɛkɛ̃ a, bivia be kĩ, “Nde sũ mitápi ye miyamɛna?”
Asɔli Kɔla akũ badãmɛnanɛ a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Odima tálɛ tɔ̃ kɔdzɛla ndɛ ayekĩ oti kĩĩ alɛ a!”
Ade Farisifɔ a via be kĩ, “Mbɔɛɛ ɛnakɛ mi malo?
Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ ĩye Farisini ɔdabe lɛtɛ ye edo kĩ minyina?
Ade bati kɔdabu kĩĩ, kĩ binyína Mose mbla a sũ ni, Baguma dumu be!”
Nikodemo kĩ ɛnyɛ Farisifɔ a kamɛ ɔmɔa, kĩ ɛnaa Yesu sɛkɛ̃ tɔ̃ a na nɛ awã. Edo onukpɛ̃ ebi be kĩ,
“Boe mbla tákpa boe osi kĩ bɔakɔ oti kɔtɔ, mbɔɛntɛ bɔdzɛmɔ ye butse ye onukpɛ̃ kamɛ fɔlɛtsa bunyi lɛtsa a kĩ ɛkɛna a.”
Bibi ye kĩ, “Mbɔɛɛ Galilea nɔ malo oto? Tsã Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kadã, lɔkɔa aamɔ kĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ odima láto Galilea.”
(Ke liti a, odi nyɛ odi dzakũ ɛnaa kɔla.)
Lɛmɛ Yesu de ɛnaa Kugua Futse Ɔtɔ a akũ.
Kĩ kade nyina ɔnɔnɛ tutuutu a, Yesu muniki ɛya nɛ Baguma Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ. Bati pii yakpɔta nɛ ye akũ, ade ɛkɛna akũ edzi eyi be fɔtsa katsa kayɔ a.
Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ mɔ Farisifɔ a kpã otsole odi nɛ adɔpaa kabɔa kamɛ bɛyadzɛla nɛ bati a flee anɛ kamɛ.
Ade bibi Yesu kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, bipi otsole kĩĩ kĩ onyole bɛbã awa mɔ ye.
Nɛ boe mbla a kamɛ ni, Mose kpa otumi kĩ bɛtalɛ otsole kĩĩ odu boe bɛkɔ. Litsa nɔ kɔ̃ alɛ nɛ foe akũ?”
Bivia fukĩĩ kĩ bakɔa banaĩ ye, ayekĩ baana kalɛ kadi bɛkɔa bitsua ye onukpɛ̃.
Lɛmɛ Yesu kɛna akũ ɛkɔa lawobi ɛtsɛlɛ fɔtsa nɛ tite.
Kĩ bɛdza bɛkavia ye fɔlɛtsa a, ɛdzɛla akũ ade ebi be kĩ, “Mi kamɛ owula a kĩ ɛtákɛna tɔkpa tidima tɔ̃ ni, ɛnya lɔtɔ ɛta de ɛbɔa otsole a.”
Ade ke ebuki ɛkɛna akũ ɛtsɛlɛ fɔtsa nɛ tite a.
Kĩ binu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, be flee bɛdzakũ ɔmɔa ɔmɔa, kito banɔkɔɛ̃ a akũ kɛnawo kĩ kite Yesu mɔ otsole a odi nɛ awã.
Yesu dzɛla akũ evia otsole a kĩ, “Boe ɔma, nde bati a? Be kamɛ odima táte kĩ yakɔ nɔ kɔtɔ?”
Otsole a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃, oowo.”
Ade ke Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Kekɔ̃ yĩ malo ntákɔ nɔ kɔtɔ. Dzakũ kanaa, lɛmɛ tabuki ɔkɛna tɔkpa.”
Yesu buki ebi bati a kĩ, “Yĩ nyɛ katinya kamɛ ɔhaĩ, odi nyɛ odi kĩ etomɔ yĩ ni, yaana nkpã ɔhaĩ a, ade ɛláatsã nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ da a.”
Farisifɔ a bi ye kĩ, “Adi adansiɛ nɛ nɔ mɔawɛ akũ, foesũ nɔ adansiɛ a tákpɔla.”
Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ madi adansiɛ nɛ yĩ mɔawɛ akũ malo ni, lɛtsa a kĩ malɛ a kpɔla, kitonɛkĩ ĩnyina awã kĩ nto mɔ awã kĩ manaa a. Mi linyína awã kĩ nto ĩye awã kĩ manaa a.
Miadzɛ fɔlɛtsa nɛ batidziwa kamɔ onukpɛ̃, lɛmɛ yĩ kɔ̃ maádzɛmɔ odima.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ maadzɛ mɔ bati ni, yĩ kadzɛ a aakpɔla, kitonɛkĩ nnɛ́ yĩ odi adzɛ kalɛ, mbom bɔmɔ Nda a kĩ edo yĩ a adzɛ fɔlɛtsa.
Bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ mi mbla a kamɛ kĩ ntɛ adansifɔ nviã onukpɛ̃ kɛna ɔmɔa ni, lɛtsa a kĩ bɛlɛ a kpɔla.
Madi adansiɛ kakpa yĩ akũ, ade Nda a kĩ edo yĩ a lɛmɛ adi yĩ akũ adansiɛ a.”
Bati a via Yesu kĩ, “Ndia aga deĩ?”
Ɛkpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Minyína yĩ, ĩye Nda. Ntɛ kanyina minyina yĩ ni, kufɛ míanyi Nda lɛmɛ.”
Yesu lɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ flee nɛ tɔgɔlɛ katekɔ̃ a, kĩ ɛkatsa fɔtsa nɛ Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ a, lɛmɛ odima tápi ye, kitonɛkĩ ye lɔkɔ táwo tɔ̃ ɔtɔ.
Yesu buki ebi be kĩ, “Maadzakũ, ade míawɛ yĩ, lɛmɛ míaku nɛ mi tɔkpa kamɛ. Miláapuli minaa awã kĩ manaa a.”
Ade ke Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a via kĩ, “Ye akũ yanaakɔ sũ mɔ ɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Miláapuli miya nɛ awã kĩ manaa a’?”
Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Tite kĩĩ akũ mito, lɛmɛ yĩ kɔ̃ ode nto ĩya. Katinya kĩĩ kamɛ bati mianɛ, lɛmɛ nnɛ́ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ oti manɛ.
Ade foesũ mbi mi kĩ míaku nɛ mi tɔkpa kamɛ a. Míaku nɛ mi tɔkpa kamɛ ntɛ mitátɛ mido kĩ yĩ nyɛ oti a kĩ ye manɛ a.”
Bɛdani bivia ye kĩ, “Owei anɛ?”
Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Lɛtsa a kĩ mbi mi kito anɛ kayɔkayi a, ade foe mɔapɛ a.
Ndeĩ fɔlɛtsa pii kĩ maalɛ nɛ mi akũ nkɔa nkɔ mi kɔtɔ, lɛmɛ oti a kĩ edo yĩ a adi ɔnɔkɔali, ade lɛtsa a kĩ nnu ntomɛna ye sɛkɛ̃ a odi mabi katinya kamɛ bati a.”
Bati a tánu foe kayɔ kĩ Ɔlɛga akũ fɔlɛtsa Yesu kabi be.
Foesũ ebi be kĩ, “Ntɛ midɛla Otidziwa Obi a nɛ ode a fɔmɔ míanyi kĩ yĩ nyɛ oti a kĩ ye manɛ a. Ade ke míanyi kĩ maákɛna lɛtsama nɛ yĩ mɔawɛ kɔbɛ̃ akũ, mbom lɛtsa a kĩ Nda tsa yĩ kĩ nlɛ a odi malɛ.
Oti a kĩ edo yĩ a deĩ nɛ yĩ ɔwɛ̃. Ɛtáfɔnɛ yĩ odi eyi, kitonɛkĩ makɛna lɛtsa a kĩ lawo ye anɛ a daa.”
Kĩ Yesu lɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, bati pii tɛ ye bido.
Yesu bi Yudafɔ a kĩ bɛtɛ ye bido a kĩ, “Ntɛ mitɛ yĩ fɔtsa katsa a midomɔ akũ ni, kekɔ̃ yĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ wĩ mianɛ.
Míanyi ɔnɔkɔali a, ade ɔnɔkɔali a aakpa mi akũ akũ kadzi a.”
Bati a kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Abraham babi mɔ bawa bɔanɛ, ade bɔtánya tɔ̃ odima basate a. Nde sũ alɛ kĩ, ‘Míana akũ akũ kadzi’?”
Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mabi mi ɔnɔkɔali a kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɛna tɔkpa ni, ɛnyɛ tɔkpa ɔsate.
Ɔsate lánya kɔla obi daa, lɛmɛ obinyole kɔ̃ nyɛ kɔla obi daa.
Foesũ ntɛ Obi a kpa mi akũ akũ kadzi ni, lɔkɔa mina akũ akũ kadzi wĩ.
Ĩnyina kĩ Abraham babi mɔ bawa mianɛ, lɛmɛ miawɛ kĩ miakɔ yĩ, kitonɛkĩ yĩ fɔtsa katsa a táwo nɛ mi kamɛ.
Fɔtsa a kĩ mmɔ́ nɛ Nda sɛkɛ̃ a, ade foe akũ malɛ kɔdzɛla a, lɛmɛ mi kɔ̃ miakɛna lɛtsa a kĩ mi ɔlɛga bi mi a.”
Bibi ye kĩ, “Boe ɔlɛga nyɛ Abraham.”
Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ Abraham babi mɔ bawa paa mianɛ ni, kufɛ míakɛna fɔtsa ndɛ ayekĩ ɛkɛna a.
Lɛmɛ miawɛ kĩ miakɔ yĩ oti a kĩ mbi mi ɔnɔkɔali fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ntɛ ntomɛna Baguma sɛkɛ̃ a. Abraham tákɛna fukĩĩ odu.
Mi miakɛna lɛtsa a kĩ mi ɔlɛga a kɛna a.”
Bɛkpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ɔlɛga mɔapɛ budeĩ, ade ye nyɛ Baguma a. Bɔnyɛ́ adɔpaa kamɛ babi.”
Yesu bi be kĩ, “Ntɛ Baguma liti ɛnyɛ mi Ɔlɛga ni, kufɛ míawɛ yĩ kalɛ, kitonɛkĩ Baguma sɛkɛ̃ nto ĩya. Ntáya nɛ yĩ mɔawɛ kɔbɛ̃ akũ, mbom Baguma lido yĩ.
Nde sũ miánu fɔlɛtsa a kĩ malɛ a kayɔ? Kitonɛkĩ miáwɛ kĩ miatse yĩ fɔlɛtsa a.

Mi ɔlɛga Abonsam bade mianɛ, ade miawɛ kĩ miakɛna nɛ mi ɔlɛga a fɔwɛtsa akũ a. Owudini yanɛ kito anɛ kayɔkayi, ade yaátomɔ ɔnɔkɔali liti a, kitonɛkĩ ɔnɔkɔali lɛláa ye kamɛ da. Ntɛ ɛma fɔvã ni, ye kutitse ɛnyɛ yatsa, kitonɛkĩ ɛnyɛ ɔvãlɛvã mɔ fɔvã ɔlɛga.
Lɛmɛ yĩ kɔ̃ ɔnɔkɔali a mabi mi, ade foesũ miátɛ yĩ mido a.
Mi kamɛ owei aapuli ɛkɔ yĩ kɔtɔ kĩ nkɛna tɔkpa? Ntɛ nlɛ ɔnɔkɔali a ni, nde sũ mitátɛ yĩ mido?
Oti kĩ eto Baguma kamɛ a, atse Baguma fɔlɛtsa. Lɛmɛ ayekĩ mitáto Baguma kamɛ sũ ni, miátɛ yĩ fɔlɛtsa.”
Yudafɔ a via Yesu kĩ, “Ntɛ bɔlɛ kĩ Samariani anɛ, ade hũhũ kpa lɛmɛ deĩ nɛ nɔ kamɛ a ni, bɔtálɛ ɔnɔkɔali?”
Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Hũhũ kpa adima lɛláa yĩ kamɛ. Makpa Nda obu lɛmɛ mi miasupa yĩ.
Maáwɛ kĩ mado yĩ akũ obu, lɛmɛ odi deĩ kĩ yawɛ foe ade ye adzɛ kakpa yĩ a.
Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ, odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɛna nɛ yĩ fɔtsa katsa a akũ a, lɛláaku da.”
Yudafɔ a bi ye kĩ, “Ade owi bɔmɔ́ pefee kĩ hũhũ kpa deĩ nɛ nɔ kamɛ a! Abraham ku, Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a lɛmɛ ku. Lɛmɛ nɔ kɔ̃ alɛ kĩ, ‘Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɛna nɛ yĩ fɔtsa katsa a akũ a, lɛláaku da.’
Mbɔɛɛ nɔ bɛ̃ boe ɔwanyɔ Abraham kĩ eku a? Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a lɛmɛ ku. Owei abu kĩ ye anɛ?”
Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ mado yĩ mɔawɛ akũ obu ni, yĩ obu a lɛláana nfasɔ. Oti a kĩ ye ado yĩ obu a nyɛ Nda, oti kĩ mialɛ kĩ ɛnyɛ mi Baguma a.
Minyína Nda a, lɛmɛ yĩ kɔ̃ ĩnyina ye. Ntɛ nlɛ kĩ ĩnyína ye ni, maakɛna ɔvãlɛvã ndɛ mi aye. Lɛmɛ nti ĩnyina ye ade makɛna nɛ ye kalɛ a akũ a.
Mi ɔwanyɔ Abraham mɔ́ kawɔlɛ kĩ yaamɔ yĩ kaya. Ɛmɔ́ ke lɛmɛ ade kawɔlɛ de ye a.”
Ade ke Yudafɔ a bi ye kĩ, “Ɔtátɛ tɔ̃ futeli aduenum malo, ke mɔ alɛ kĩ ɔmɔ́ Abraham a?”
Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ, yĩ ndeĩ fɔmɔ bɛma Abraham.”
Ade ke bati a fila boe kĩ bata bɛbɔa ye a, lɛmɛ Yesu bɛla, ade ɛnɛ́ nɛ Baguma Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ a.
Kĩ Yesu anaa a, ɛmɔ́ onyole odi kĩ bɛma ye ɔnɛkunɛ.
Ade ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a via ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ, owei tɔkpa sũ bɛma onyole kĩĩ ɔnɛkunɛ? Ye mɔawɛ tɔkpa mbɔɛɛ ye bamanɛ tɔkpa sũ?”
Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nnɛ́ onyole kĩĩ ĩye ye bamanɛ lɛkɛna tɔkpa, mbom bɛma ye ɔnɛkunɛ, ayekĩ baanyɛ Baguma kɔbɛ̃ adzuma bɛtsãmɛna ye akũ.
Ntɛ budeĩ nɛ kade kanyina kamɛ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ bɔakɛna adzuma bɔkpa oti a kĩ edo yĩ a. Kade aya kadɔkɔ̃ kĩ odima lɛláapuli ɛkɛna adzuma.
Kĩ ndeĩ nɛ katinya kamɛ kĩĩ ni, yĩ nyɛ katinya kamɛ ɔhaĩ a.”
Kĩ Yesu lɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ eyua a, etua tanɛ eyi nɛ tite, ɛfɔnɛ te ɛkɔa ɛtsɛla onyole a nɛ banebi.
Ade ebi ye kĩ, “Naavɔlɛ anɛ nɛ Siloam Lutubu a kamɛ.” Dĩ Siloam kayɔ nyɛ, bido ye. Ade onyole a navɔlɛ anɛ, ade ɛmɔ́ fɔkɔ kĩ emuniki yaya a.
Ye badzikɔba mɔ bikĩ bɛkamɔ ye kĩ ɛkawã fɔtsa a via kĩ, “Mbɔɛɛ nnɛ́ oti kĩĩ adzi kawã fɔtsa a?”
Badi lɛ kĩ, “Ade ye a.” Lɛmɛ babɛbã lɛ kĩ, “Oowo, nnɛ́ ye yanɛ, kanɛ ɛnɛ́ ye.”
Nɛ foesũ oti a mɔawɛ lɛ kĩ, “Ye manɛ.”
Bivia ye kĩ, “Nde fɔya mɔ finyaa kɔ̃ mɔ amɔ fɔkɔ?”
Ɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Onyole a kĩ bavɛ Yesu lɛfɔnɛ tite ekputa yĩ banebi ade ebi yĩ kĩ naavɔlɛ anɛ nɛ Siloam Lutubu a kamɛ. Foesũ nnaa adeke, kĩ nsila nvɔlɛ anɛ pɛ, mpuli mmɔ́ fɔkɔ.”
Bivia ye kĩ, “Nɛ ndia edeĩ?”
Ɛkpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ĩnyína.”
Ade ke bati a kpã onyole a kĩ eku tɔ̃ anɛ a bɛma Farisifɔ a.
Luwi a kĩ de akũ Yesu fɔnɛ tite ɛkɔa ebinya ye anɛ a nyɛ Kawɛya Luwi.
Foesũ Farisifɔ a lɛmɛ via ye ayekĩ fɔkɛna fɔmɔ bibinya ye anɛ. Ɛkpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ɛkɔa tite fɔnɛwa ekputa yĩ banebi. Ɛfɔ̃ nnavɔlɛ anɛ, ade finyaakĩĩ mpuli mamɔ fɔkɔ a.”
Farisifɔ a badi lɛ kĩ, “Oti a kĩ ɛkɛna fukĩĩ táto Baguma sɛkɛ̃, kitonɛkĩ yaákɛna nɛ Kawɛya Luwi mbla a akũ.”
Ade babɛbã lɛmɛ via kĩ, “Nde fɔ́aya kĩ tɔkpa ɔkɛnanɛ aapuli ɛkɛna nsɛntsɛlɛni kĩĩ odu?” Nɛ foesũ kasɛ̃ wo nɛ be kamɛ.
Farisifɔ a buki bivia onyole a kĩ, “Kĩ ɔlɛ kĩ ye libinya nɔ anɛ a ni, nɔ malo litsa odeĩ kĩ alɛ nɛ ye akũ?”
Onyole a kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ yanɛ.”
Lɛmɛ Yudafɔ a táwɛ kĩ batɛ bido kĩ onyole a nya tɔ̃ ɔnɛkunɛ fɔmɔ ye anɛ binya, kɛnawo kĩ bɛvɛ ye bamanɛ bɛyamɛna.
Ade bivia be kĩ, “Mi obi a kĩ milɛ kĩ mima ye ɔnɛkunɛ a nɛ awĩ a? Nde fɔya mɔ finyaa kɔ̃ yamɔ fɔkɔ?”
Ye bamanɛ a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Bunyina kĩ boe obi yanɛ, ade bunyina kĩ bɔma ye ɔnɛkunɛ a.
Lɛmɛ ayekĩ fɔkɛna fɔmɔ yamɔ fɔkɔ a ni, bunyína foe kɔ̃, ade bunyína oti a kĩ ye libinya ye anɛ a lɛmɛ a. Mivia ye mɔawɛ a, ebo anɛ, yaapuli ɛnyɛ ye akũ onukpɛ̃.”
Ye bamanɛ lɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ ayekĩ bɛkavila Yudafɔ a sũ. Kitonɛkĩ Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a lɛ biyi kɔkɔɛ kĩ ntɛ odi tɛ edo kĩ Yesu nyɛ Kristo a ni, baablɔmɛna ye nɛ Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ a.
Ade foesũ ye bamanɛ a lɛ kĩ, “Ebo anɛ, mivia ye mɔawɛ a!”
Banɔkɔɛ̃ a vɛ onyole a kĩ bɛma ɔnɛkunɛ a lɛyade ade bibi ye kĩ, “Lɛ ɔnɔkɔali a nɛ Baguma anɛ! Bunyina kĩ onyole a kĩ ɛtsa nɔ a nyɛ tɔkpa ɔkɛnanɛ.”
Onyole a lɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ ɛnyɛ tɔkpa ɔkɛnanɛ o-o, ĩye ɛnyɛ́ tɔkpa ɔkɛnanɛ o-o, ĩnyína. Lɛtsa mɔapɛ kĩ ĩnyina nyɛ kĩ ĩnya tɔ̃ ɔnɛkunɛ, lɛmɛ finyaa mamɔ fɔkɔ.”
Banɔkɔɛ̃ a via ye kĩ, “Litsa ɛkɛna nɔ? Nde ɛkɛna ebinya nɔ anɛ?”
Ɛkpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mbi mi foe kɔkɔɛ lɛmɛ miáwɛ kĩ miatse foe. Nde sũ miawɛ kĩ miabuki mitse foe? Mbɔɛɛ mi malo miawɛ kĩ minya ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ?”
Bivũna ye bɛlɛ kĩ, “Nɔ odi nyɛ ye fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ, lɛmɛ boe kɔ̃ Mose fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ bɔanɛ.
Bunyina kĩ Baguma bi Mose fɔlɛtsa, lɛmɛ oti a naa kɔ̃ bunyína awã kĩ eto malo!”
Ade onyole a bi be kĩ, “Litsa awãwã fɔlɛtsa a? Minyína awã kĩ eto, lɛmɛ ade ye libinya yĩ anɛ a!
Bunyina kĩ Baguma látse tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ, lɛmɛ yatse bati a kĩ bakpa ye obu, kakɛna nɛ ye yawɛ akũ a.
Kito anɛ katinya kayɔkayi a, bɔtánu tɔ̃ kĩ odi puli ebinya oti kĩ bɛma ɔnɛkunɛ anɛ.
Ntɛ ɛtato Baguma sɛkɛ̃ ni, kufɛ ɛláapuli ɛkɛna lɛtsama.”
Banɔkɔɛ̃ a via ye kĩ, “Katsa atsa kĩ nɔ a kĩ bɛma bɛdɔɔla nɛ tɔkpa kamɛ a, nɔ mbom awɛ kĩ atsa boe fɔtsa?” Ade bɛblɔmɛna ye nɛ Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ a.
Yesu nu kĩ bɛblɔmɛna onyole a nɛ be kamɛ, foesũ kĩ ɛmɔ́ onyole a, evia ye kĩ, “Ɔtɛ Otidziwa Obi a odo?”
Onyole a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃, bi yĩ oti a kĩ yanɛ, ayekĩ maapuli ntɛ ye ndo!”
Ade Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Ɔmɔ́ ye kɔkɔɛ, ade ye nyɛ oti a kĩ ɛlamɛna kɔdzɛla kalɛ mɔ nɔ finyaakĩĩ a.”
Onyole a lɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, ntɛ ndo!” Ade ke eke aduli nɛ Yesu anɛ a.
Yesu lɛ kĩ, “Ĩya nɛ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ kĩ mayaadzɛmɔ bati, ayekĩ banɛkunɛ aamɔ fɔkɔ, ade bikĩ bamɔ fɔkɔ a aadani banɛkunɛ.”
Farisifɔ a kĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ awã a badi nu lɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ a, ade bivia ye kĩ, “Katsa atsa kĩ boe malo banɛkunɛ bɔanɛ mbɔɛɛ?”
Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ kaku mi anɛ eku ni, kufɛ bɛláakɔ mi kɔtɔ, lɛmɛ kĩ mialɛ kĩ miamɔ fɔkɔ sũ ni, tɔkpa deĩ nɛ mi akũ.”
Yesu lɛ kĩ, “Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ, oti kĩ ɛtátsã onyukpɛ̃ a ewo nɛ baveli kɔbã kamɛ, mbom ede ɛtsã kɔbã a akũ ewo ni, ɛnyɛ oyekpanɛ mɔ ɔblɔfɔ.
Oti a kĩ ɛtsã kɔbã onyukpɛ̃ ewo a nyɛ baveli ɔkpãnɛ a.
Ade ye mɔ kɔbã onyukpɛ̃ ɔdzɔlɛnɛ a abinya kakpa ye, ade baveli a anu ye odo a. Yavɛ ye bade a buĩ a kĩ ete be a, kakpã be kanɛmɛna kanya.
Ntɛ ɛkpã be ɛnɛmɛna a, yanya be lɔtɔ, ade baveli a atomɔ ye, kitonɛkĩ binyina ye odo.
Bɛláatomɔ oti bɛbã, mbom baalo nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃, kitonɛkĩ binyína ye odo.”
Yesu bɔa be lɛgbã kĩĩ, lɛmɛ bɛtánu lɛtsa a kĩ yatsa a kayɔ.
Nɛ foesũ Yesu buki ɛlɛ kĩ, “Mabi mi ɔnɔkɔali a kĩ yĩ nyɛ baveli a kɔbã onyukpɛ̃ a.
Bati bɛbã a kĩ bɛnya yĩ lɔtɔ bɛya flee a nyɛ bayekpanɛ mɔ bablɔfɔ, foesũ baveli a tátse be fɔlɛtsa.
Yĩ nyɛ kɔbã onyukpɛ̃ a. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtsã yĩ akũ ewo ni, yaana katɛ. Yaawo ɛnɛ, ade yaana funitsã kanyakɔ̃ a.
Oyekpanɛ aya kĩ yayaaye, edi awu, ebula fɔtsa kade. Yĩ kɔ̃ ĩya ayekĩ bati aana nkpã kĩ ɛkpɔla nɛ osi nyɛ osi akũ.
“Yĩ nyɛ baveli ɔkpãnɛ wĩ a, baveli ɔkpãnɛ wĩ a akɔa ye nkpã kakpa nɛ baveli a lɔlɔ.
Ntɛ ɔpaani kĩ ɛnyɛ́ baveli ɔkpãnɛ, ade ɛnyɛ́ baveli a ɔlate lɛmɛ mɔ́ kalikii kaya ni, yalo kafɔnɛ baveli a. Foesũ kalikii a apili baveli a kapansam be.
Ɔpaani a alo kadzakũ kitonɛkĩ kabɔɛ bɛbɔɛ ye kĩ ɛkɛna adzuma a, ade ɛtsɛ́la baveli a lɛtsama akũ a.
“Yĩ nyɛ baveli ɔkpãnɛ wĩ a. Ndɛ ayekĩ Nda nyina yĩ, yĩ malo ĩnyina Nda a ni, ade aye ĩnyina yĩ mɔawɛ baveli ade be malo binyina yĩ a. Nkɔa yĩ nkpã nkpa nɛ be lɔlɔ.
“Yĩ nyɛ baveli ɔkpãnɛ wĩ a. Ndɛ ayekĩ Nda nyina yĩ, yĩ malo ĩnyina Nda a ni, ade aye ĩnyina yĩ mɔawɛ baveli ade be malo binyina yĩ a. Nkɔa yĩ nkpã nkpa nɛ be lɔlɔ.
Ndeĩ baveli bɛbã kĩ bɛláa baveli kɔbã kĩĩ kamɛ. Kɛnɛ kĩ nkpã be malo ĩyamɛna, bitse yĩ odo lɔkɔa be flee baanya baveli katsu mɔa, bɛna nɛ baveli ɔkpãnɛ mɔa kayɔ.
“Nda awɛ yĩ kalɛ, kitonɛkĩ nkɔa yĩ nkpã nkpa, kĩ maabuki ntɛ ye.
Odima lɛláatɛ ye nɛ yĩ awɛ, mbom yĩ mɔawɛ lɛkɔa ye nkpa. Ndeĩ osi kĩ makɔa ye nkpa, ade ndeĩ osi kĩ mabuki ntɛ ye a. Ade lɛtsa a kĩ Nda do yĩ kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ nkɛna a.”
Nɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ sũ kasɛ̃ buki kiwo nɛ Yudafɔ a kamɛ.
Be pii, bɛkalɛ kĩ, “Hũhũ kpa deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ! Ye lɔlɔ kamɛ bu kade! Nde sũ koũ miatse ye?”
Lɛmɛ babɛbã lɛ kĩ, “Oti kĩ hũhũ kpa deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ lɛláapuli ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla lɔmɔ! Nde koũ hũhũ kpa aapuli ebinya banɛkunɛ anɛ?”
Osili lɔkɔ wo ɔtɔ, ade Yudafɔ kanya Baguma Asɔli Kɔla Akũ kakpalɛ Luwi nɛ Yerusalem a.
Yesu kamini nɛ Baguma Asɔli Kɔla a kakɔ a kĩ bavɛ Salomo Ablanda a kamɛ.
Ade Yudafɔ a nakpɔta nɛ ye akũ, ade bivia ye kĩ, “Nde sũ ɔfɔ̃ bɔlamɛna anɛ kadã kavia? Ntɛ nɔ nyɛ Kristo a ni, bi boe ɔnɔkɔali a faa.”
Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mbi mi kɔkɔɛ, lɛmɛ miátɛ yĩ mido. Fɔtsa a kĩ makɛna nɛ Nda kɔbɛ̃ akũ a, adi yĩ akũ adansiɛ.
Lɛmɛ miátɛ kado kitonɛkĩ minyɛ́ yĩ baveli.
Yĩ baveli atse yĩ ɔlɛdo, ĩnyina be ade batomɔ yĩ a.
Makpa be nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a, ade bɛláaku bɛwɔ da. Odima lɛláapuli ɛwãnɛ be ɛtɛ nɛ yĩ awɛ.
Fɔtsa a kĩ Nda kɔa edo nɛ yĩ awɛ a deĩ kɔbɛ̃ fɔbɛ̃ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa, ade odima lɛláapuli ɛwãnɛ foe ɛtɛ nɛ Nda awɛ a.
Bɔmɔ́ Nda ni, ɔmɔa bɔanɛ.”
Foesũ Yudafɔ a buki bifila boe kĩ batalɛ Yesu.
Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Nkɛna fɔtsa wĩ pii kĩ Nda do yĩ kĩ nkɛna nɛ mi anɛ. Foe kamɛ fɔɔdabe sũ miawɛ kĩ miatalɛ yĩ boe?”
Bɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nnɛ́ fɔtsa wĩ a kĩ ɔkɛna a sũ bɔawɛ kĩ bɔatalɛ nɔ boe, mbom nɛ mbusuo fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ɔlɛ a sũ! Otidziwa kɛkɛ anɛ, lɛmɛ awɛ kĩ akɛna nɔ akũ Baguma!”
Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ mi mbla ovoli a kamɛ kĩ Baguma lɛ kĩ, ‘Minyɛ baguma amɛ.’
Bunyina kĩ lɛtsa a kĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa lɛ a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali daa. Baguma vɛ bati a kĩ ɛkpa be ye ɔlɛdo a kĩ baguma amɛ.
Yĩ kɔ̃, Ɔlɛga a lɛpau yĩ edo yĩ nɛ katinya kamɛ. Lɔkɔa nde sũ miti mialɛ kĩ nlɛ fubusuotsa nɛ ayekĩ nlɛ kĩ Baguma Obi manɛ a sũ?
Foesũ ntɛ nlámɛna fɔtsa a kĩ Nda do yĩ kĩ nkɛna a kakɛna ni, mitatɛ yĩ mido.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ makɛna foe, titɔ kĩ miátɛ yĩ kado malo ni, mitɛ fɔtsa a kĩ makɛna a mido, ayekĩ míanyi, minu foe kayɔ yededeede kĩ Ɔlɛga a deĩ nɛ yĩ kamɛ ade yĩ malo ndeĩ nɛ Ɔlɛga a kamɛ a.”
Yudafɔ a buki bɛwɛ kĩ bapi Yesu, lɛmɛ ɛnɛ́ nɛ be kamɛ ɛdzakũ.
Ade Yesu muniki enyina Yordan Ɔwɔ a ɛnaa awã kĩ Yohanes wɔla bati mui tɔ̃ a, ɛnadzi nɛ awã.
Bati pii ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃, ade bɛlɛ kĩ, “Yohanes tákɛna awãwã fɔtsa fudima, lɛmɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ nɛ oti kĩĩ akũ a flee nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali.”
Bati pii nɛ awã tɛ ye bido.
Onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Lazaro kasɔ. Eto Betania, ɔmatɔ a kĩ bawaɛ̃tsole nviã Maria mɔ Marta dzi a kamɛ.
Ade Maria kĩĩ lɛkɔa kugua mɔ ɔlɛ̃ eko nɛ boe Ɔlate fɔnɛta, ɛkɔa ye lɔlɔ tɔlɔ ɛyɔ foe a. Ye ɔwaɛ̃nyole nyɛ Lazaro kĩ yasɔ a.
Bawaɛ̃tsole a do lɔtɔ nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, nɔ ɔkɔba a kĩ aátunɔ ye kalɛ a asɔ.”
Kĩ Yesu nu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, ɛlɛ kĩ, “Fɔsɔ kĩĩ lɛnyɛ wuda fɔsɔ, mbom fɔnyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ baatsã foe akũ bɛdɛla Baguma dĩ nɛ ode, ade baadɛla Baguma Obi a lɛmɛ dĩ nɛ ode a.”
Yesu awɛ Marta, mɔ ɔwaɛ̃tsole mɔ Lazaro kalɛ.
Lɛmɛ kĩ Yesu nu Lazaro fɔsɔ a, ebuki ɛkahɔ nɛ awã kĩ edeĩ a fuwi nviã.
Ke liti a, ebi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Mifɔ̃ bumuniki bɔnaa Yudea.”
Ade ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a bi ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa ɔtsanɛ, wádzɔ nɛ awĩ mɔ Yudafɔ a wɛ kĩ batalɛ nɔ boe, mɔ obuki anaa awã a?”
Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nnɛ́ dɔũhuilɛ ewua-nviã deĩ nɛ kade kanyina kamɛ? Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtsɛ̃ nɛ suwa ni, ɛláatula kitonɛkĩ katinya kamɛ ɔhaĩ a afɔ̃ yamɔ fɔkɔ.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi tsɛ̃ nɛ lɛnyɛ ni, yatula kitonɛkĩ ɔhaĩ lɛláa.”
Kĩ Yesu lɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ eyua a, ebuki ɛlɛ kĩ, “Boe ɔkɔba Lazaro wa tida, lɛmɛ maanaadzɛla ye.”
Ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, ntɛ tida ɛwaa kɔ̃ ni, yaasaɛ.”
Lɛtsa a kĩ Yesu atsa a nyɛ kĩ Lazaro ku, lɛmɛ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kɔ̃ kɔna kĩ tida pupulidza kawa ɛlɛ.
Foesũ Yesu binya ebi be pefee kĩ, “Lazaro ku.
Lɛmɛ nɛ mi sũ ni, kawɔlɛ de yĩ kĩ ntána nɛ awã ayekĩ míatɛ mido. Mifɔ̃ bɔnaa ye sɛkɛ̃.”
Ade Toma kĩ bavɛ Ata a bi ye bakɔba fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Mifɔ̃ boe malo butomɔ Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ a bɔnaa, bɔnaaku mɔ ye!”
Kĩ Yesu wo awã a, ɛmɔ́ kĩ fɔtɛ fuwi ɛna kĩ bibila Lazaro.
Kito Betania kɛnaa Yerusalem aana ndɛ fusikũ nviã,
ade Yudafɔ pii ya kĩ bayaadzam Maria mɔ Marta nɛ be ɔwaɛ̃nyole wuda a sũ.
Kĩ Marta nu kĩ Yesu aya a, ɛnɛ́ ɛnaatsɛlamɔ ye, lɛmɛ Maria kɔ̃ kahɔ nɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ.
Ade Marta bi Yesu kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, ntɛ kana ɔna nɛ awĩ kufɛ nwaɛ̃nyole táku!
Lɛmɛ ĩnyina kĩ finyaa malo Baguma aakpa nɔ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ ovia ye.”
Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Awaɛ̃nyole a aabuki eyidza edzi nkpã.”
Ade Marta bi ye kĩ, “Ĩnyina kĩ yaabuki eyidza edzi nkpã nɛ Luwi Nkaɛ a kĩ banɔkpa aayidza a akũ.”
Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Yĩ nyɛ kayidza kadzi nkpã mɔ nkpã a. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ yĩ edo, ntɛ eku malo ni, yaayidza edzi nkpã.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ edzi nkpã mɔ́ ɛtɛ yĩ edo ni, ɛláaku da. Ɔtɛ fukĩĩ odo?”
Marta kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oo, boe Ɔlate! Ntɛ ndo kĩ nɔ nyɛ Kristo a, Baguma Obi a kĩ bɛlɛ biyi kĩ yaaya nɛ katinya kamɛ a.”
Kĩ Marta lɛ fukĩĩ eyua a, emuniki ɛnaa kɔla ɛnavɛ ɔwaɛ̃tsole Maria pɛtɛɛ. Ebi ye kĩ, “Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ a ya nɛ awĩ, ade evia nɔ akũ a.”
Kĩ Maria nu foe pɛ, ɛta eyidza ewula atsɛ ɛnaatsɛlamɔ ye.
Nɛ lɔkɔ a naa Yesu táwo tɔ̃ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ, mbom ebuki ɛdzɛ̃ nɛ awã kĩ Marta yatsɛlamɔ ye a.
Kĩ bati a kĩ bideĩ nɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ bɛkadzam Maria a mɔ́ kĩ ɛta eyidza ɛnɛ a, bitomɔ ye, kitonɛkĩ bɛkɔna kĩ yanaa linikɛ a ɔwɛ̃ ɛnaabe.
Maria yawo awã kĩ Yesu dzɛ̃ a, ade kĩ esila ɛmɔ́ ye pɛ ɛtɔ nɛ Yesu abɔa kamɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, ntɛ ɔna nɛ awĩ kufɛ nwaɛ̃nyole a táku.”
Kĩ Yesu mɔ́ ayekĩ ɛkabe, mɔ ayekĩ bati a kĩ bitomɔ ye kabe a, fɔkɛna adzuma nɛ ye kamɛ ade ɛwɛya eke hũũ a.
Evia be kĩ, “Nɛ ndia mibila ye?”
Bɛkpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, yaadã.”
Nɛ awã naa, Yesu be.
Ade Yudafɔ a lɛ kĩ, “Midã tɔ̃ ayekĩ yawɛ ye kalɛ!”
Lɛmɛ badi lɛ kĩ, “Ebinya ɔnɛkunɛ anɛ. Kapuli ɛláapuli ɛfɔ̃ kĩ onyole kĩĩ ɛtaku?”
Kalɔɛ a buki kɛna nɛ Yesu kamɛ ade ɛnaa linikɛ a ɔwɛ̃ a. Linikɛ a nyɛ de ɔkɛ kĩ bɛkɔa de bisua de onukpɛ̃.
Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mibɔɛ de a nɛ lɛkɛ a onukpɛ̃.”
Ade Marta, ɔnɔkpa a ɔwaɛ̃tsole, bi Yesu kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, finyaa kɔ̃ edo kakũ awɛ, kitonɛkĩ ade fuwi ɛna kĩ bibila ye a.”
Yesu bi Marta kĩ, “Mbɔɛɛ ntábi nɔ kĩ ntɛ ɔtɛ odo ni, aamɔ Baguma kukũkpalɛ a?”
Bati a bɔɛ de a bɛnyɛ. Yesu dɛla anɛ nɛ ode ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nda, manyɛ nɔ kɔlɛ kĩ atse yĩ.
Ĩnyina kĩ atse yĩ daa, lɛmɛ bikĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ awĩ a sũ malɛ fukĩĩ, ayekĩ baatɛ bido kĩ nɔ lido yĩ.”
Kĩ ɛlɛ fukĩĩ eyua a, ɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba kĩ, “Lazaro, nɛ́ kaya!”
Ade ɔnɔkpa a nɛ́ ɛya a. Lima a kĩ bɛkɔa bisuli ye akpɔ mɔ abɔa a buki lɛna nɛ ye akũ, ade duku a kĩ bɛkɔa bisuli ye anɛ a lɛmɛ na nɛ ye akũ a.
Yesu bi be kĩ, “Miwũnya tilima a nɛ ye akũ mifɔ̃ ɛnaa.”
Yudafɔ a kĩ bɛya nɛ Maria sɛkɛ̃ mɔ́ lɛtsa a kĩ Yesu kɛna a, ade be pii tɛ ye bido a.
Lɛmɛ be kamɛ badi muniki bɛnaa Farisifɔ a sɛkɛ̃ bɛnabi be lɛtsa a kĩ Yesu kɛna a.
Foesũ Farisifɔ a mɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a natsa fɔlɔ mɔ Yudafɔ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ a ade bɛlɛ kĩ, “Litsa bɔ́akɛna? Kitonɛkĩ oti kĩĩ lamɛna awãwã fɔtsa pii kakɛna!
Ntɛ bɔkpa ye osi lɔmɔ ni, odi nyɛ odi aayatɛ ye edo, ade Roma abãã ayabubuli boe Asɔli Kɔla a, ɛwɔla boe ɔmaĩ lɛmɛ.”
Be kamɛ ɔmɔa kĩ bavɛ Kaiafa, kĩ ɛnyɛ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee nɛ kateli a na kamɛ a bi be kĩ, “Minyína lɛtsama kɔlaa!
Minyína kĩ fɔnɛnɛ fɔkpa mi kĩ oti mɔa aaku nɛ bati a flee lɔlɔ kɛba kĩ baawɔla ɔmaĩ a flee a?”
Nnɛ́ ye mɔawɛ kakɔna ɛkɔa ɛlɛ fukĩĩ, mbom ndɛ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee nɛ kateli a kamɛ ni, ɛlɛ eyi kĩ Yesu aaku nɛ Yudafɔ a lɔlɔ.
Nnɛ́ Yudafɔ a odi yaku ɛkpa, mbom kĩ yaakpɔta Baguma bade a kĩ bɛgba biko nɛ katinya kamɛ a bɛkɛna ɔmɔa.
Kito luwi a kanaa a, Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ kapi adzuni kĩ baakɔ Yesu.
Nɛ foesũ Yesu tábuki ɛkanɛ kanya Yudafɔ a lɛmɔ ye. Ɛdzakũ ɛnaa ɔmatɔ odi kĩ bavɛ Efrayim kamɛ nɛ kɔsa kudi kamɛ, ade awã bɛmɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a bidzi nɛ awã a.
Finyaa Yudafɔ Wuda Katɛ̃ luwi kanya a fuã, ade bati pii to ɔmaĩ a fɔkɔ kumɛkumɛ bɛya nɛ Yerusalem, kĩ bayaakpalɛ be akũ fɔmɔ luwi a aawo ɔtɔ.
Kĩ bɛna nɛ Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ a, bɛkawɛ Yesu, ade bɛkavia akũ kĩ, “Nde akɔna? Mbɔɛɛ ɛláaya nɛ luwi a kanyakɔ̃?”
Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ Farisifɔ a si mbla kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ enyina awã kĩ Yesu deĩ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ ɛyaakpa kanyi lɔkɔa bɛnaapi ye.
Kĩ kite fuwi evũ kĩ banya Wuda Katɛ̃ Luwi a, Yesu naa Betania, Lazaro ɔtɔ, awã kĩ ɛdzɛla ye etomɛna kanɔkpa a.
Bɛtɔ olobe funitsã bɛkpa ye nɛ awã. Marta sum nɛ opunu akũ, ade Lazaro lɛmɛ na nɛ bati a kĩ bidzi bɛkanya mɔ Yesu a kamɛ a.
Ade Maria bɔɛ kugua mɔ ɔlɛ̃ baũ, kĩ bavɛ koe nard, kĩ kudeĩ kɔya paa lita sɛkɛ ɛyatsɛla Yesu fɔnɛta, ade ɛkɔa ye lɔlɔ tɔlɔ ɛyɔ foe akũ a. Kugua a ɔlɛ̃ tɛ tɔtɔ a flee kamɛ.
Ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kamɛ ɔmɔa, Yuda Iskariot, kĩ ye aanyɛ Yesu ɛkpa a lɛ kĩ,
“Nde sũ bɛtánɔ kugua kĩĩ sika ovoe ɔha ɛlalɛ lɔkɔa bɛkɔa sɛ bɛkpa ahiãfɔ?”
Nnɛ́ kĩ ɛtsɛla ahiãfɔ akũ sũ ɛlɛ fukĩĩ, mbom oyekpanɛ yanɛ. Ye nɛɛ sika kuvũ a ade yado awɛ nɛ koe kamɛ a.
Ade Yesu lɛ kĩ, “Mifɔnɛ ye awɛ! Mifɔ̃ ɛmanɛ koe eyi ɛkpa yĩ kabila.
Ahiãfɔ deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ luwi nyɛ luwi, lɛmɛ yĩ kɔ̃ nláana nɛ mi kamɛ daa.”
Yudafɔ pii nu kĩ Yesu deĩ nɛ Betania, foesũ bɛya nɛ awã. Nnɛ́ Yesu odi sũ bɛya, mbom kĩ bayaadã Lazaro a kĩ Yesu dzɛla etomɛna kanɔkpa a.
Nɛ foesũ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a pi adzuni kĩ baakɔ Lazaro lɛmɛ,
kitonɛkĩ ye sũ Yudafɔ a pii kasĩ be kanaatɛ Yesu kado.
Kĩ kade nyina a, bati kɔdabu a kĩ bɛya nɛ Wuda Katɛ̃ Luwi kanyakɔ̃ a nu kĩ Yesu aya nɛ Yerusalem.
Foesũ bɛbɔɛ tuko bɛnɛ kĩ banaatsɛlamɔ ye, ade bɛkabɔa fɔwɔla kĩ,
“Mimu Baguma!
Baguma hila oti a kĩ yaya nɛ boe Ɔlate dĩ akũ a!
Baguma hila Israel Lɛgã a!”
Yesu mɔ́ aflimu adi, ade ede edzi nɛ ye akũ ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ,
“Zion ɔmatɔ, tavila!
Amɔ nɔ Lɛgã kĩ laya!
Edzi nɛ aflimu obi akũ.”
Ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a tánu fukĩĩ kayɔ nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ, lɛmɛ kĩ Baguma dzɛla Yesu ɛkpalɛ ye akũ a, bɛyate anɛ kĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bɛkɛna bɛkpa ye a nɛ ye akũ.
Bati a kĩ bɛna nɛ Yesu sɛkɛ̃, nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ ɛvɛ Lazaro etomɛna linikɛ kamɛ edzi nkpã a, di adansiɛ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya a akũ.
Ade fukĩĩ sũ bati kɔdabu a natsɛlɛmɔ Yesu a, kitonɛkĩ binu kĩ ɛkɛna awãwã fɔtsa kĩĩ.
