Foesũ Farisifɔ a bi akũ kĩ, “Midã kĩ bɔlámɔ kadzakɔ̃ kana kɔlaa. Midã, katinya kamɛ bati a flee nɛ́ bitomɔ ye!”
Helafɔ badi na nɛ bati a kĩ bɛnaa Yerusalem kĩ baasum Baguma nɛ luwi a kanya kamɛ a kamɛ.
Ade bɛnaa Filipo, kĩ eto Betsaida a nɛ Galilea sɛkɛ̃, ade bibi ye kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃, bɔawɛ kĩ bɔamɔ Yesu.”
Filipo nabi Andrea, ade be nviã a bɛnabi Yesu a.
Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Finyaa kɔ̃ lɔkɔ a wo ɔtɔ kĩ baadɛla Otidziwa Obi a nɛ ode.
Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ ntɛ ligbanɔbi táwo nɛ tite kamɛ lɛvɔ̃ ni, libi mɔapɛ keĩ a lanɛ, lɛmɛ ntɛ lɛvɔ̃ ni, lado babi beblebee.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yawɛ ye nkpã kalɛ ni, yaayɛla ye, lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ekesĩ ye nkpã nɛ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ ni, ɛkɔla ye ɛkpa nkpã kĩ ɛla kawũna a.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yawɛ kĩ yasum yĩ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ etomɔ yĩ, kitonɛkĩ awã kĩ ndeĩ a, ade awã yĩ ɔsumunɛ lɛmɛ ana a. Ade Nda aado obu nɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yasum yĩ akũ.
“Yĩ ɔwɔlɛ aha yĩ finyaa. Lɛmɛ litsa maalɛ? Kalɛ maalɛ kĩ, ‘Nda, nyɛ yĩ katomɛna lubo kamɔ lɔkɔ kĩĩ kamɛ mbɔɛɛ’? Oowo, ade foesũ ĩya nɛ katinya kamɛ a, ayekĩ maatsã lubo kamɔ lɔkɔ kĩĩ kamɛ.
Nda, do nɔ dĩ akũ obu.”
Adeke odo odi to ode ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ndo de obu kɔkɔɛ, ade maabuki ndo de a.”
Bati kɔdabu a kĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ awã nu odo a, ade be kamɛ badi lɛ kĩ, ɔplala lɛnyɛ onukpɛ̃, lɛmɛ badi lɛ kĩ, “Ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ odi lɛlɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ ye!”
Lɛmɛ Yesu bi be kĩ, “Nnɛ́ yĩ sũ odo a lɛ́ kɔdzɛla, mbom mi sũ.
“Finyaa nyɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ Baguma aadzɛmɔ katinya kamɛ. Finyaa mɔ baablɔmɛna katinya kĩĩ kamɛ akũ ɔnyanɛ a.
Ntɛ bɛdɛla yĩ nɛ ode nɛ asendua akũ ni, maavɛlɛ bati flee ĩyamɛna nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃.”
Yesu lɛ fukĩĩ yakɔa ɛtsa wuda odu a kĩ yaaku.
Adeke bati kɔdabu a kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Boe Mbla Ovoli a atsa boe kĩ Kristo a aadzi nkpã daa. Nde fɔya mɔ alɛ kĩ baadɛla Otidziwa Obi a nɛ ode nɛ asendua akũ? Owei nyɛ Otidziwa Obi kĩĩ a?”

Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ɔhaĩ a aabuki ɛna nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ lɔkɔ lukũ lidi pɛ. Lɔkɔ kĩ ɔhaĩ a deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ ni, mitsã nɛ ye kamɛ ayekĩ ɔtũ lɛláake edo mi, kitonɛkĩ oti kĩ ɛtsɛ̃ nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ linyína awã kĩ yanaa.
Kĩ ɔhaĩ a deĩ nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ kĩĩ ni, mitɛ ɔhaĩ mido ayekĩ míakɛna ɔhaĩ a kamɛ bati.”
Kĩ Yesu lɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ eyua a, ɛdzakũ nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ ɛnabɛla.
Titɔ kĩ Yesu kɛna awãwã fɔtsa kĩĩ flee nɛ be anɛ kamɛ malo ni, bɛtátɛ ye bido.
Ayekĩ lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yesaya lɛ eyi a, aaya nɛ foe kamɛ kĩ,
“Boe Ɔlate, owei lɛtɛ nɔ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɔlɛ a edo?
Owei ɛnyɛ ye kɔbɛ̃ ɛtsa?”
Nɛ foesũ bɛtápuli bɛtɛ bido, kitonɛkĩ Yesaya buki ɛlɛ kĩ,
“Baguma kɔ be anɛ ade esua be adzuni
ayekĩ be anɛ lɛláamɔ fɔkɔ,
ade be adzuni lɛláanu fɔlɛtsa kayɔ a.
Baguma lɛ kĩ, ‘Bɛláamuniki bɛya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ lɔkɔa ntsa be.’ ”
Yesaya lɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kitonɛkĩ ɛmɔ́ Yesu kukũkpalɛ a, ade ɛlɛ kalɛ nɛ foe akũ eyi a.
Titɔ kĩ fɔla lɔmɔ malo a, Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a pii tɛ Yesu bido, lɛmɛ nɛ Farisifɔ a sũ bɛtálɛ foe akũ kɔdzɛla nɛ kanade, ayekĩ bɛláablɔmɛna be nɛ be katsɛnakɔ̃ a.
Kitonɛkĩ bawɛ kĩ batidziwa bimu be kɛba kĩ Baguma aamu be.
Ade Yesu bɔa fɔwɔla ɛlɛ kĩ, “Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ yĩ edo ni, nnɛ́ yĩ odi ɛtɛ edo, mbom mɔ oti a kĩ edo yĩ a ɛtɛ edo.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yamɔ yĩ ni, yamɔ oti a kĩ edo yĩ a lɛmɛ.
Ĩya nɛ katinya kamɛ ndɛ ɔhaĩ aye, ayekĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ yĩ edo ni, ɛláana nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ.
“Ntɛ odi nu yĩ fɔlɛtsa a mɔ́ ɛtákɛna nɛ foe akũ ni, nláadzɛmɔ ye. Ntáya kĩ mayaadzɛmɔ katinya kamɛ bati, mbom ĩya kĩ mayaanyɛ be.
Oti a kĩ esĩ yĩ, kĩ ɛtátɛ yĩ fɔlɛtsa a deĩ oti kĩ yaadzɛmɔ ye. Fɔlɛtsa a kĩ nlɛ a aadzɛmɔ ye nɛ luwi nkaɛ a akũ!
Fukĩĩ nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali, kitonɛkĩ ntálɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ yĩ mɔawɛ otumi akũ, mbom Nda a kĩ edo yĩ a lɛkpa yĩ otumi kĩ nlɛ kɔdzɛla, nlɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ nlɛ a.
Ade ĩnyina kĩ ye mbla a akpa nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a. Nɛ foesũ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ malɛ a nyɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩ Nda bi yĩ kĩ nlɛ.”
Luwi a kĩ lɛnyaa Wuda Katɛ̃ Luwi lɔtɔ a, Yesu nyi kĩ lɔkɔ kpɔla ye kĩ yaadzakũ nɛ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ ɛnaa Ɔlɛga sɛkɛ̃. Ɛwɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ ye bade nɛ katinya kamɛ a kalɛ, ade ɛwɛ be kalɛ kɛnawo kawũnakɔ̃ a.
Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a dzi nɛ opunu akũ bɛkanya olobe funitsã. Abonsam kɔa edo nɛ Yuda kĩ ɛnyɛ Simon Iskariot obi a adzuni kamɛ kɔkɔɛ kĩ ɛnyɛ Yesu ɛkpa.
Yesu nyina kĩ Ɔlɛga kpa ye kɔbɛ̃ flee. Enyina kĩ Baguma sɛkɛ̃ eto ɛya, ade Baguma sɛkɛ̃ yaabuki ɛnaa a.
Foesũ eyidza nɛ opunu a akũ, ɛnyɛ ye atadiɛ wulaa eyi nɛ ɔɔwɛ̃, ade ɛkɔa ɔsa efili nɛ kate a.
Ke liti a, eko mui nɛ lɔɔda kamɛ, eyi ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a abɔa kavɔlɛ kayɔ, ade ɛkɔa ɔsa a kĩ efili nɛ kate a ɛyɔ mui a.
Kĩ ewo Petro sɛkɛ̃ a, Petro bi ye kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, ayaavɔlɛ yĩ abɔa?”
Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Finyaa ɔláanu lɛtsa a kĩ makɛna a kayɔ, lɛmɛ ke liti aanu foe kayɔ.”
Petro bi ye kĩ, “Owoo, ɔláavɔlɛ yĩ abɔa da.”
Ade Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Ntɛ ntávɔlɛ nɔ abɔa ni, ke kɔ̃ ɔláabuki ɔnya yĩ fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ.”
Petro kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, ntɛ aye kɔ̃ ni, tavɔlɛ yĩ abɔa odi, mbom vɔlɛ yĩ awɛ mɔ lɔlɔ lɛmɛ!”
Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Oti kĩ ewo mui ɛnɛ́ yededeede tábuki esĩ ɛkpa mui kawo, kɛba abɔa odi kavɔlɛ. Mi kɔ̃ mi flee akũ nɛ́, mbɔɛntɛ oti mɔapɛ.”
Yesu nyina oti a kĩ yaanyɛ ye ɛkpa a kɔkɔɛ, ade foesũ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Mi a flee akũ nɛ́, mbɔɛntɛ oti mɔapɛ a.”
Kĩ Yesu vɔlɛ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a abɔa eyua a, ɛbɔɛ ye atadiɛ wulaa a edo, emuniki ɛnadzi nɛ ye kadzikɔ̃ nɛ opunu akũ. Evia ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Minu lɛtsa a kĩ nkɛna nkpa mi a finyaa kayɔ mbɔɛɛ?
Miavɛ yĩ kĩ Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ mɔ Ɔlate. Ade aye fɔla pɛpɛɛpɛ a, kitonɛkĩ ade lɛtsa a kĩ manɛ a.
Yĩ a kĩ ĩnyɛ mi Ɔlate mɔ Fɔtsa Ɔtsanɛ a, lɛvɔlɛ mi abɔa finyaa, foesũ kɛnɛ kĩ miavɔlɛ akũ akũ abɔa.
Nfantuhũ fɔanɛ nkpa mi kĩ mi malo mikɛna lɛtsa mɔapɛ a kĩ nkɛna nkpa mi a.
Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ ɔsumunɛ lɛbɛ́ ye ɔlate, ade ayea fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ lɛbɛ́ oti a kĩ edo ye fɔtɔ a.
Finyaa, kĩ minyi ɔnɔkɔali kĩĩ a, Baguma aahila mi ntɛ mikɛna nɛ ke akũ.
“Nnɛ́ mi flee malɛ, ĩnyina bati a kĩ mpau a. Lɛmɛ kɛnɛ kĩ Baguma fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ biyi a fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ kĩ, ‘Oti a kĩ bɔmɔ ye budo awɛ bɔanya a yidza ɛdza nɛ yĩ akũ.’
“Mabi mi fukĩĩ ĩyi finyaa, fɔmɔ fɔ́aya nɛ foe kamɛ lɔkɔa míatɛ mido kĩ yĩ nyɛ oti a kĩ ye manɛ a.
Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ oti odi kĩ ndo fɔtɔ ni, yĩ ɛtɛ. Ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ yĩ ni, ɛtɛ oti a kĩ edo yĩ a.”
Kĩ Yesu lɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ eyua a, fɔha ye ɔwɔlɛ paa ade ɛlɛ yededeede kĩ, “Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ mi kamɛ odi aanyɛ yĩ ɛkpa.”
Awã naa, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a dã akũ anɛ, ade bɛkɛna saa kitonɛkĩ binyína be kamɛ oti a kĩ Yesu alɛ a.
Fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kamɛ ɔmɔa kĩ Yesu awɛ kalɛ a dzi ɛmɛnamɔ Yesu.
Adeke Simon Petro baa ye sɛnɛ kĩ, “Via ye owula a kĩ yalɛ a.”
Foesũ fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ a fuã Yesu tsɛmɛtsɛmɛ evia ye kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, owei yanɛ?”
Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oti a kĩ maabuli abodoo ntamɔ kutu nkpa a ni, ade ye a.” Ade ebuli abodoo sɛkɛ̃, ɛta kutu ɛkɔa ɛkpa Yuda kĩ ɛnyɛ Simon Iskariot obi a.
Kĩ Yuda sila ɛtɛ funitsã a pɛ, Satana wo nɛ ye kamɛ.
Ade Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Wɛ sɔwa nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ awɛ kĩ akɛna a akũ.”
Lɛmɛ be a kĩ bidzi nɛ opunu akũ mɔ ye a kamɛ odima tánu lɛtsa a sũ kĩ Yesu bi ye tuwuli kayɔ.
Ayekĩ Yuda nɛɛ be sika kuvũ sũ ni, fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a badi kɔna kĩ kabi Yesu bi ye kĩ ɛnaaya fɔtsa a kĩ baakɔa bɛnya luwi a, ĩye kĩ ɛnaakɔa litsedi ete ahiãfɔ.
Kĩ Yuda tɛ funitsã a, deedimɔapɛ ɛnɛ́ ɛdzakũ. Kade dɔ paa.
Kĩ Yuda nɛ ɛdzakũ a, Yesu lɛ kĩ, “Finyaa bɛdɛla Otidziwa Obi a dĩ nɛ ode, ade finyaa bɛdɛla Baguma dĩ lɛmɛ nɛ ode bɛtsãmɛna ye akũ a.
Ntɛ bɛdɛla Baguma dĩ nɛ ode bɛtsãmɛna Otidziwa Obi a akũ ni, lɔkɔa Baguma aadɛla Otidziwa Obi a dĩ nɛ ode nɛ ye mɔawɛ kamɛ lɛtalɛta.
“Yĩ babi, nláabuki nna nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ owi libuna pii. Míawɛ yĩ, lɛmɛ finyaa mabi mi fɔlɛtsa a kĩ mbi Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ, ‘Miláapuli minaa awã kĩ manaa a.’
“Finyaa makpa mi mbla vɔɛ̃. Miwɛ mi akũ kalɛ. Ayekĩ nwɛ mi kalɛ a ni, mi malo miwɛ mi akũ kalɛ lɔmɔ.
Ntɛ miawɛ mi akũ kalɛ ni, odi nyɛ odi aamɔ eyi ɔsũ kĩ yĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ mianɛ.”
Ade Simon Petro via kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, nɛ ndia akpa?”
Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Awã kĩ manaa, ɔláapuli otomɔ yĩ finyaa bɔnaa, lɛmɛ ke liti ni, aatomɔ yĩ liti.”
Petro via ye kĩ, “Nde sũ nláapuli ntomɔ nɔ finyaa? Mmanɛ akũ kĩ maaku nɛ nɔ lɔlɔ!”
Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Kalɛ alɛ kĩ ɔmanɛ akũ kĩ aaku nɛ yĩ lɔlɔ? Mabi nɔ ɔnɔkɔali a kĩ fɔmɔ ɔkɔkɔ aabe ni, aalɛ titi ɛlalɛ kĩ onyína yĩ.”
Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mitafɔ̃ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ lɛha mi. Mitɛ Baguma mido, mitɛ yĩ malo mido.
Fɔla beblebee deĩ nɛ Nda tɔtɔ kamɛ. Manaamanɛ kakɔ kadi ĩyi mi. Ntɛ fɔlá lɔmɔ ni, kufɛ nláabi mi kĩ manaamanɛ kadzikɔ̃ ĩyi mi.
Ade ntɛ nnaa nnamanɛ kadzikɔ̃ ĩyi mi ĩyua ni, maamuniki ĩyaakpã mi nnamɛna yĩ sɛkɛ̃, ayekĩ awã kĩ ndeĩ a mi malo míana nɛ awã.
Minyina osi a kĩ ɛwaa ɛnaa awã kĩ manaa a.”
Ade Toma bi Yesu kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, bunyína awã kĩ anaa, foesũ nde bɔ́akɛna bɔmɔ́ osi a kĩ yanaa awã a?”
Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Yĩ nyɛ osi a, ɔnɔkɔali a mɔ nkpã a. Odima láya nɛ Nda sɛkɛ̃ mbɔɛntɛ ɛtsã yĩ akũ.
Ntɛ kanyina minyina yĩ ni, kufɛ minyina Nda lɛmɛ. Lɛmɛ kito finyaa kanaa ni, minyina ye ade mimɔ́ ye lɛmɛ a.”
Ade Filipo bi Yesu kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, tsa boe Ɔlɛga a, ade lɛtsa a kĩ liti lisĩ boe a.”
Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Filipo, owi buna kĩ ndeĩ nɛ mi flee sɛkɛ̃, lɛmɛ onyína yĩ? Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛmɔ́ yĩ ni, ɛmɔ́ Nda lɛmɛ. Nde sũ obuki avia kĩ, ‘Tsa boe Ɔlɛga a’?
Filipo, mbɔɛɛ ɔtátɛ odo kĩ ndeĩ nɛ Nda kamɛ ade kĩ ye malo edeĩ nɛ yĩ kamɛ? Fɔlɛtsa a kĩ mbi mi a flee táto yĩ sɛkɛ̃, mbom Nda a kĩ edeĩ nɛ yĩ kamɛ a lamɛna ye adzuma kakɛna.
Mitɛ yĩ mido ntɛ nlɛ kĩ ndeĩ nɛ Nda kamɛ, ade Nda lɛmɛ deĩ nɛ yĩ kamɛ a. Ntɛ mitátɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ mido ni, ke kɔ̃ mitɛ mido nɛ adzuma a kĩ makɛna a sũ.
Mabi mi nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ yĩ edo ni, yaakɛna lɛtsa a kĩ makɛna a. Nuwĩ yaapuli ɛkɛna fɔtsa ɛba yĩ fude a, kitonɛkĩ manaa Nda sɛkɛ̃.
Lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ míavia nɛ yĩ dĩ akũ ni, maakɛna foe nkpa mi ayekĩ baatsã Obi a akũ bɛdɛla Nda dĩ nɛ ode.
Ntɛ mivia litsedi nɛ yĩ dĩ akũ ni, maakɛna foe.”
Yesu buki ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ miawɛ yĩ kalɛ ni, míakɛna nɛ yĩ tɛbla a akũ.
Maake Nda aduli ɛkpa mi Obumɛnanɛ bɛbã kĩ yaana nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ daa.

Ade ye nyɛ Hũhũ a kĩ yanyɛ ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ nɛ Baguma akũ a katsa a. Katinya kamɛ bati kɔ̃ lɛláapuli bɛtɛ ye, kitonɛkĩ bɛláapuli bɛmɔ́ ye mɔ baanyi ye. Lɛmɛ mi kɔ̃ minyina ye kitonɛkĩ yaana nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ ade edeĩ nɛ mi kamɛ a.
“Nláafɔnɛ mi awɛ ĩyi ndɛ banɔkpabi aye. Maamuniki ĩya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃.
Kite sukuloo katinya kamɛ bati lɛláabuki bɛmɔ́ yĩ, lɛmɛ mi kɔ̃ míamɔ yĩ. Ayekĩ ndzi nkpã sũ ni, mi malo míadzi nkpã.
Ntɛ luwi a wo ɔtɔ ni, míanyi kĩ ndeĩ nɛ Nda kamɛ ade mi mideĩ nɛ yĩ kamɛ ade yĩ malo ndeĩ nɛ mi kamɛ a.
“Oti a kĩ epini yĩ tɛbla, yakɛna nɛ te akũ ni, ade ye nyɛ oti a kĩ yawɛ yĩ kalɛ a. Oti a kĩ yawɛ yĩ kalɛ ni, Nda aawɛ ye kalɛ. Yĩ malo maawɛ ye kalɛ ade maanyɛ yĩ akũ ntsa ye a.”
Ade Yuda, nnɛ́ ekĩ ɛnyɛ Iskariot a, via kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, nde sũ aanyɛ nɔ akũ ɔtsa boe, mɔ nnɛ́ katinya kamɛ bati a?”
Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yawɛ yĩ kalɛ ni, yaapi yĩ fɔlɛtsa edomɔ akũ. Nda aawɛ ye kalɛ ade bɔmɔ Nda bɔ́aya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ bɔkɛna kadzikɔ̃ nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaáwɛ yĩ kalɛ ni, yaápi yĩ fɔlɛtsa kadomɔ akũ. Fɔlɛtsa a kĩ minu a lɛnyɛ́ yĩ mɔawɛ fude, mbom futo Ɔlɛga a kĩ edo yĩ a fude fɔanɛ.
“Mbi mi fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ mbuki ndeĩ nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃.
Lɛmɛ Obumɛnanɛ a kĩ ɛnyɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa kĩ Baguma aado nɛ yĩ dĩ akũ a, aatsa mi lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa, ade yaate mi anɛ nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ mbi mi a akũ a.
“Lukudɔ nkɔa mayi mi. Yĩ lukudɔ nkɔa makpa mi, nnɛ́ ndɛ ayekĩ katinya kamɛ bati akpa a aye. Mitafɔ̃ mi ɔwɔlɛ lɛha mi ĩye mifɔ̃ libe liwo mi.
Minu ayekĩ mbi mi kĩ, ‘Madzakũ, lɛmɛ maamuniki ĩya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃.’ Ntɛ miwɛ yĩ kalɛ ni, kufɛ kawɔlɛ de mi kĩ manaa Ɔlɛga a sɛkɛ̃, kitonɛkĩ ye ɛbɛ̃ yĩ.
Finyaa mbi mi fukĩĩ ĩnyamɛna lɔtɔ fɔmɔ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa aaya nɛ foe kamɛ, ayekĩ ntɛ fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ ni, míatɛ mido.
Nláabuki nlɛ mɔ mi kɔdzɛla nnamɛna lɔtɔ, kitonɛkĩ katinya kamɛ akũ ɔnyanɛ a aya, ade ɛlá kɔbɛ̃ nɛ yĩ akũ a.
Lɛmɛ kɛnɛ kĩ katinya kamɛ bati binyi kĩ mawɛ Ɔlɛga a kalɛ, ade makɛna nɛ ye ɔlɛdo akũ pɛpɛɛpɛ a.
“Finyaa, miyidza bɔdzakũ nɛ awĩ.
“Yĩ nyɛ kutse wĩ a, ade Nda nyɛ futse kɔba ɔnɛnɛ a.
Ɔnanɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ edeĩ nɛ yĩ akũ kĩ yaáwũ babi ni, yatsua ye kamuni, ade ɔnanɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yawũ babi ni, yanyɛ ye akũ tɔɔta, ayekĩ yaawũ babi pii.
Finyaa yĩ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ mbi mi a kpalɛ mi akũ kɔkɔɛ.
Mikɛna ɔmɔa mɔ yĩ, yĩ malo nkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ mi. Ndɛ ayekĩ kutse ɔnanɛ lɛláapuli kuwũ nɛ koe akũ, mbɔɛntɛ kɔmanɛ nɛ kutse ɔma akũ a, ade aye mi malo miláapuli miwũ babi ntɛ mitákɛna ɔmɔa mɔ yĩ a.
“Yĩ nyɛ kutse a, ade mi minyɛ tɛnanɛ a. Oti a kĩ ɛkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ yĩ, mɔ yĩ malo nkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ ye ni, ade ye aawũ babi pii, kitonɛkĩ ntɛ nláa mi kamɛ ni, miláapuli mikɛna lɛtsama.
Oti a kĩ ɛláa yĩ kamɛ ni, ɛla ndɛ ɔnanɛ kĩ bitsua bɛta bimuni ade yawɔlɛ a. Bakpɔta tɛnanɛ a kafila kado nɛ fi kamɛ tavio.
Ntɛ mikɛna ɔmɔa mɔ yĩ, mɔ yĩ fɔlɛtsa a deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ ni, míavia lɛtsa a kĩ miawɛ ade baakɛna foe bɛkpa mi a.
Ntɛ miwũ babi beblebee ni, foe fɔnyɛ Nda kukũkpalɛ fɔtsa, ade fusipi kĩ yĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ mianɛ.
Ayekĩ Nda awɛ yĩ kalɛ a ni, ade aye yĩ malo mawɛ mi kalɛ a. Foesũ mifɔ̃ yĩ ɔdɔ a ɛna nkɔsu nɛ mi kamɛ lɔmɔ.
Ntɛ mipi yĩ tɛbla a midomɔ akũ ni, míana nɛ yĩ ɔdɔ a kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ yĩ malo mpi Nda mbla ndomɔ akũ fɔfɔ̃ ye ɔdɔ deĩ nɛ yĩ kamɛ a.
“Mbi mi fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ ayekĩ kawɔlɛ a kĩ kideĩ nɛ yĩ kamɛ a odu kɛna nɛ mi kamɛ, lɔkɔa mi kawɔlɛ a kɛkpɔla.
Ade yĩ mbla kĩ makpa mi nyɛ kĩ, miwɛ mi akũ akũ kalɛ ndɛ ayekĩ nwɛ mi kalɛ a.
Ɔdɔ titiliwu adima lɛláa kĩ oti akɔa ye nkpã ɛbɔa afɔliɛ nɛ bakɔba lɔlɔ.
Ntɛ mikɛna nɛ yĩ mbla a kĩ nkpa mi a akũ a ni, lɔkɔa minyɛ yĩ bakɔba.
Nláabuki nvɛ mi kĩ basumunɛ, kitonɛkĩ ɔsumunɛ linyína lɛtsa a kĩ ye ɔlate akɛna. Lɛmɛ mavɛ mi kĩ bakɔba kitonɛkĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ nnu ntomɛna Nda sɛkɛ̃ ni, nfɔ̃ minyi foe.
Nnɛ́ mi lɛpau yĩ, mbom yĩ lɛpau mi ndzina mi kĩ minaawũ babi beblebee kĩ baawa daa. Nɛ foesũ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ míavia Ɔlɛga a nɛ yĩ dĩ akũ ni, yaakpa mi foe.
Foesũ ade mbla kĩ makpa mi kĩ miwɛ mi akũ kalɛ.”
Yesu buki ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ katinya kamɛ bati akesĩ mi ni, minyi kĩ bɛnya lɔtɔ bikesĩ yĩ.
Ntɛ katinya kamɛ bade mianɛ ni, kufɛ baawɛ mi kalɛ ndɛ be bade aye. Lɛmɛ kĩ mpau mi ntomɛna katinya bati kamɛ ade mibuki minyɛ́ be bade a sũ ni, katinya kamɛ bati akesĩ mi.
Mite anɛ nɛ kalɛ a kĩ mbi mi akũ a kĩ, ‘Ɔsumunɛ lɛbɛ́ ye ɔlate.’ Ntɛ bati yidza bɛdza nɛ yĩ akũ ni, baayidza bɛdza nɛ mi malo akũ. Ntɛ bipi yĩ fɔlɛtsa bidomɔ akũ ni, baapi mi fude lɛmɛ bidomɔ akũ.
Lɛmɛ baakɛna fukĩĩ flee nɛ mi akũ nɛ yĩ dĩ sũ, kitonɛkĩ binyína oti a kĩ edo yĩ a.
Ntɛ ntayaabi be fɔlɛtsa ni, kufɛ bɛtáku tɔkpa kɔtɔ. Lɛmɛ finyaa bɛkɛna tɔkpa ade bɛlá onukpɛ̃ kanyɛ kadima a.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakesĩ yĩ ni, yakesĩ Nda lɛmɛ.
Ntɛ ntakɛna fɔtsa kĩ odima tákɛna tɔ̃ nɛ be kamɛ ni, kufɛ bɛtákɛna tɔkpa, lɛmɛ kĩ finyaa bɛmɔ́ fɔtsa a kĩ nkɛna a malo ni, bakesĩ bɔmɔ Nda.
Lɛmɛ fukĩĩ flee ya nɛ foe kamɛ ayekĩ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ be mbla ovoli kamɛ a, fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ kĩ, ‘Bikesĩ yĩ pupulidza.’
“Maado Obumɛnanɛ eto Ɔlɛga a sɛkɛ̃ ɛya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃. Ade ye nyɛ Hũhũ a kĩ yaanyɛ ɔnɔkɔali a nɛ Baguma akũ ɛtsa a. Ntɛ eto Ɔlɛga a sɛkɛ̃ ɛya ni, yaadi adansiɛ nɛ yĩ akũ.
Mi malo míadi adansiɛ, kitonɛkĩ mina nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ kito kayɔkayi a.
“Mbi mi fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ flee ayekĩ bati lɛláafɔ̃ akpɔ liveli mi nɛ mi katɛkado kamɛ.
Baablɔmɛna mi nɛ Yudafɔ fɔtsɛnakɔ̃. Lɔkɔ aya kĩ ntɛ oti odi kɔ mi ni, yaakɔna kĩ Baguma adzuma ɛkɛna.
Bati aakɛna fukĩĩ nɛ mi akũ kitonɛkĩ bɛtányi Ɔlɛga a ĩye yĩ.
Lɛmɛ mabi mi fukĩĩ ayekĩ ntɛ lɔkɔ a wo ɔtɔ ni, míate anɛ kĩ mbi mi foe.
“Ntábi mi fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ nɛ kayɔkayi a, kitonɛkĩ nna nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃.
Lɛmɛ finyaa kĩ madzakũ nnaa oti a kĩ edo yĩ a sɛkɛ̃ a, mi kamɛ odima távia yĩ awã kĩ manaa a.
Finyaa, kĩ mbi mi fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, mi flee miwo ɔblɔ.
Lɛmɛ mabi mi ɔnɔkɔali a kĩ fɔnɛnɛ fɔkpa mi kĩ ndzakũ, kitonɛkĩ ntɛ ntánaa ni, Obumɛnanɛ a lɛláaya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃. Lɛmɛ ntɛ ndzakũ nnaa ni, maado ye ɛya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃.
Ade ntɛ ɛya ni, yaakɔ katinya kamɛ bati kɔtɔ ɛfɔ̃ binyi lɛtsa a kĩ lɛnyɛ tɔkpa, mɔ kadzi kpĩĩ, mɔ Baguma kɔtɔkakɔ.
Yaakɔ be kɔtɔ nɛ tɔkpa sũ, kitonɛkĩ bɛtátɛ yĩ bido.
Yaakɔ be kɔtɔ bɛkɔa binyi kadzi kpĩĩ kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ manaa Nda sɛkɛ̃, kĩ miláabuki mimɔ́ yĩ,
ade baanyi lɛtsa a kĩ lɛnyɛ kɔtɔkaku, kitonɛkĩ bɛkɔ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ akũ ɔnyanɛ a kɔtɔ kɔkɔɛ.
“Ndeĩ fɔlɛtsa pii kĩ maabi mi, lɛmɛ fɔ́aba mi kalɔ finyaa.

Lɛmɛ ntɛ Hũhũ a kĩ yanyɛ ɔnɔkɔali nɛ Baguma akũ katsa a ya ni, yaafɔ̃ minyi Baguma akũ ɔnɔkɔali a flee a. Ɛláalɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ ye mɔawɛ otumi akũ, mbom lɛtsa a kĩ enu a odi mɔ yaalɛ, ade yaafɔ̃ minyi fɔtsa a kĩ fɔ́ayaya a.
Yaado yĩ obu ɛnyɛ yĩ kukũkpalɛ ɛtsa, kitonɛkĩ yaabi mi lɛtsa a kĩ ɛtɛ etomɛna yĩ sɛkɛ̃ a.
Fɔtsa a kĩ fɔnyɛ Nda fude a flee, yĩ fude fɔanɛ. Ade foesũ nlɛ kĩ Hũhũ a aanu etomɛna yĩ sɛkɛ̃ ɛyaabi mi a.”
Yesu lɛ ɛnamɛna lɔtɔ kĩ, “Kite sukuloo kĩ miláabuki mimɔ́ yĩ, lɛmɛ owi lɛláabuna kĩ míabuki mimɔ́ yĩ.”
Adeke ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a badi via akũ kĩ, “Foe kayɔ nyɛ litsa kĩ yabi boe kĩ, ‘Kite sukuloo miláabuki mimɔ́ yĩ, lɛmɛ owi lɛláabuna kĩ míabuki mimɔ́ yĩ.’ Ebuki ɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Kitonɛkĩ manaa Nda sɛkɛ̃.’
Fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Kite sukuloo’ a kayɔ nyɛ litsa? Bɔánu lɛtsa a kĩ yalɛ a kayɔ!”

Yesu mɔ́ kĩ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a wɛ kĩ bavia ye kalɛ kadi, foesũ ebi be kĩ, “Nlɛ kĩ kite sukuloo miláabuki mimɔ́ yĩ, lɛmɛ owi lɛláabuna kĩ míabuki mimɔ́ yĩ. Mbɔɛɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kamɛ milamɛna kasa mɔ akũ a?
Mabi mi ɔnɔkɔali a kĩ míabe miwo ɔblɔ, lɛmɛ katinya kamɛ bati aamɔ kawɔlɛ. Míadi ayɔlɔhɔ lɛmɛ mi ayɔlɔhɔ a aadani kawɔlɛkamɔ.
Ntɛ sɛmɛ pi otsole ni, yawo ɔblɔ kitonɛkĩ ye lubo kamɔ ɔdɔũ a bɔa. Lɛmɛ ntɛ ɛma eyua a, yalɛla ye lubo kamɔ a, kitonɛkĩ yamɔ kawɔlɛ kĩ ɛma obi edo nɛ katinya kamɛ.
Ade aye fɔla fɔkpa mi a. Finyaa miwo ɔblɔ, lɛmɛ maabuki mmɔ́ mi, lɔkɔa mi tɔwɔlɛ lɛka tidzi mi mɔ kawɔlɛ paa a kĩ odima lɛláapuli ɛtɛ nɛ mi awɛ a.
“Ntɛ luwi a wo ɔtɔ ni, miláabuki mivia yĩ lɛtsama. Ɔnɔkɔali a mabi mi kĩ, Nda aakpa mi lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ míavia ye nɛ yĩ dĩ akũ.
Kito kɛyawo finyaa kĩĩ a, mitávia tɔ̃ lɛtsama nɛ yĩ dĩ akũ. Mivia, lɔkɔa míatɛ, ayekĩ mi kawɔlɛkamɔ aakpɔla.
“Mabi mi fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ nɛ fɔgbã kamɛ. Lɛmɛ lɔkɔ aaya kĩ nláabuki mbi mi fɔlɛtsa nɛ fɔgbã kamɛ, mbom maabi mi Nda akũ fɔlɛtsa pefee.
Ntɛ luwi a wo ɔtɔ ni, mivia ye fɔtsa nɛ yĩ dĩ akũ. Maátsa kĩ yĩ maavia ye nkpa mi,
kitonɛkĩ Nda mɔawɛ a awɛ mi kalɛ. Yawɛ mi kalɛ kitonɛkĩ miawɛ yĩ kalɛ ade mitɛ mido kĩ Baguma sɛkɛ̃ nto ĩya.
Nuwĩ, Ɔlɛga a sɛkɛ̃ nto ĩya nɛ katinya kamɛ, ade finyaa madzakũ nɛ katinya kamɛ nnaa Nda sɛkɛ̃ a.”
Ade ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a bi ye kĩ, “Dã, finyaa kɔ̃ alɛ kɔdzɛla pefee, kĩ obuki aábɔa fɔgbã.
Finyaa kɔ̃ bunyina kĩ onyina lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa, ade fɔtásĩ kĩ odi abuki evia nɔ kalɛ kadima a. Fukĩĩ fɔ̃ bɔtɛ budo kĩ Baguma sɛkɛ̃ oto.”
Yesu kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Finyaa kɔ̃ mitɛ mido?
Lɔkɔ aya ade liwo ɔtɔ kɔkɔɛ malo, kĩ baapasam mi flee odi nyɛ odi lɛnaa ye tɔtɔ kamɛ kite yĩ odi. Lɛmɛ nnɛ́ yĩ odi aate, kitonɛkĩ Nda deĩ nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃.
Mbi mi fukĩĩ kĩĩ flee ayekĩ míakɛna ɔmɔa mɔ yĩ bɔna lukudɔ. Katinya kamɛ bati aafɔ̃ mimɔ́ lubo. Lɛmɛ mido ɔwɔlɛ! Ĩnya katinya kamɛ akũ!”
Kĩ Yesu lɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ eyua a, ɛdɛla anɛ ɛdã ode, ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nda, ɔdɔũ a bɔa. Dɛla nɔ Obi dĩ nɛ ode lɔkɔa nɔ Obi lɛmɛ ɛdɛla nɔ dĩ nɛ ode.
Kitonɛkĩ ɔkpa ye otumi nɛ batidziwa flee akũ ayekĩ yaakpa bati a kĩ ɔkɔa odo nɛ ye awɛ a nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a.
Nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a nyɛ kĩ baanyi nɔ ɔnɔkɔali Baguma keĩ a mɔ Yesu Kristo a kĩ odo fɔtɔ a.
Ndɛla nɔ dĩ nɛ ode nɛ tite akũ, ade ĩyua adzuma a kĩ ɔkpa yĩ kĩ nkɛna a.
Foesũ Nda, dɛla yĩ dĩ nɛ ode nɛ nɔ anɛ kamɛ, ndɛ ayekĩ nna nɛ nɔ sɛkɛ̃ fɔmɔ bɛbɔa katinya a.
“Ĩnyɛ nɔ ntsa bati a kĩ ɔnyɛ nɛ katinya kamɛ ɔkpa yĩ a. Nɔ bade banɛ, lɛmɛ ɔkɔa ɔkpa yĩ. Bɛkɛna nɛ nɔ kalɛ akũ.
Finyaa kɔ̃ binyina kĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ ɔkɔa ɔkpa yĩ a flee to nɔ sɛkɛ̃.
Nkɔa ɔlɛdo a kĩ ɔkpa yĩ a nkpa be, ade bɛtɛ ye a. Binyina kĩ ɔnɔkɔali fɔanɛ kĩ nɔ sɛkɛ̃ nto, ade bɛtɛ bido kĩ nɔ lido yĩ a.
“Make aduli nɛ be lɔlɔ. Nlámɛna aduli kake nɛ katinya kamɛ bati lɔlɔ, mbom nɛ bati a kĩ ɔkɔa odo nɛ yĩ awɛ a lɔlɔ, kitonɛkĩ nɔ bade banɛ.
Yĩ bati a flee nɔ bade banɛ, ade ayea nɔ bade flee lɛmɛ nyɛ yĩ bade a, ade bɛdɛla yĩ dĩ nɛ ode bɛtsãmɛna be akũ a.

Ade finyaa maya nɛ nɔ sɛkɛ̃, mbuki nláa katinya kamɛ, lɛmɛ be kɔ̃ bideĩ nɛ katinya kamɛ. Ɔlɛga Kpalɛwa, kɔa nɔ dĩ akũ kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ ɔkpa yĩ a kadãmɛna be akũ ayekĩ baakɛna ɔmɔa ndɛ ayekĩ bɔmɔ nɔ bɔnyɛ ɔmɔa a.
Kĩ nna nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ a, nkɔa nɔ dĩ akũ kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ ɔkpa yĩ a ndãmɛna be akũ. Ndã be akũ kĩ be kamɛ odima táyɛla, mbɔɛntɛ oti a kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ ɛyɛla a, ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa fɔlɛtsa a aaya nɛ foe kamɛ.
Lɛmɛ finyaa maya nɛ nɔ sɛkɛ̃, ade malɛ fukĩĩ bamɛ nɛ katinya kamɛ ayekĩ baamɔ kawɔlɛ kɛkpɔla nɛ be kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ yĩ malo mamɔ ke a.
“Nkɔa nɔ ɔlɛdo a nkpa be lɛmɛ katinya kamɛ bati kesĩ be, kitonɛkĩ bɛtáto katinya kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ yĩ malo ntáto katinya kamɛ a.
Ntávia nɔ kĩ nyɛ be nɛ katinya kamɛ, mbom mawã nɔ kĩ nyɛ be nɛ Okesĩnɛ a awɛ kamɛ.
Ndɛ ayekĩ ntáto katinya kamɛ sũ ni, be malo bɛnyɛ́ katinya kamɛ bade.
Kɛna be bati kpalɛwa kakpa nɔ akũ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali a kamɛ, nɔ kalɛ a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali.
Ndo be nɛ katinya kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ nɔ malo odo yĩ nɛ katinya kamɛ a.
Ade nɛ be sũ ni, nkpalɛ yĩ akũ nkpa nɔ ayekĩ be malo baakpalɛ be malo akũ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali a kamɛ bɛkpa nɔ.
“Nnɛ́ bati kĩĩ odi lɔlɔ mabɔa mpaɛ, mbom mabɔa nkpa bati a kĩ baatɛ yĩ bido nɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ baabi be a sũ.
Make nɔ aduli kĩ fɔ̃ be flee bɛkɛna ɔmɔa. Nda, fɔ̃ be malo bɛna nɛ boe kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ odeĩ nɛ yĩ kamɛ, ade yĩ malo ndeĩ nɛ nɔ kamɛ a. Fɔ̃ bɛkɛna ɔmɔa ayekĩ katinya kamɛ bati aatɛ bido kĩ nɔ lido yĩ.
“Ndɛla be buĩ nɛ ode ndɛ ayekĩ ɔdɛla yĩ dĩ nɛ ode, ayekĩ baakɛna ɔmɔa ndɛ ayekĩ bɔmɔ nɔ bɔnyɛ ɔmɔa a.
Yĩ ndeĩ nɛ be kamɛ ade nɔ malo odeĩ nɛ yĩ kamɛ, kĩ baakɛna ɔmɔa bɛkpɔla, ayekĩ katinya kamɛ bati aanyi kĩ nɔ lido yĩ. Ade baanyi kĩ awɛ be kalɛ ndɛ ayekĩ awɛ yĩ kalɛ a.
“Nda, mawɛ kĩ bati a kĩ ɔkɔa ɔkpa yĩ a bɛna nɛ awã kĩ ndeĩ a, ayekĩ baamɔ yĩ kukũkpalɛ a kĩ ɔkpa yĩ a, kitonɛkĩ ɔwɛ yĩ kalɛ fɔmɔ biyi katinya kayɔ.
“Nda, Oti Kpĩĩ, katinya kamɛ bati linyína nɔ lɛmɛ yĩ kɔ̃ ĩnyina nɔ, ade bati kĩĩ lɛmɛ nyina kĩ nɔ lido yĩ a.
Ĩnyɛ nɔ ntsa be yededeede, ade maakanyɛ nɔ nkatsa be, ayekĩ ɔdɔ a kĩ odeĩ ɔkpa yĩ a aana nɛ be kamɛ, lɔkɔa yĩ malo maana nɛ be kamɛ.”
Kĩ Yesu bɔa mpaɛ kĩĩ eyua a, bɛmɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a bɛdzakũ nɛ awã, bɛnanyina Kidron kawɔbi a ade bɛnawo nɛ kugua futse kɔba kudi kamɛ a.
Yuda a kĩ ɛnyɛ ye ɛkpa a, nyina awã, kitonɛkĩ lɔkɔlɔkɔ Yesu mɔ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a awɛ katsɛna nɛ awã.
Foesũ Yuda kpã Roma sodzafɔ mɔ Asɔli Kɔla akũ badãmɛnanɛ a kĩ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ Farisifɔ do a ɛnamɛna kɔba a kamɛ. Bɛnɛɛ kawũkanɔ fɔtsa, tɛsɛdza mɔ tibia tɛnawa.
Ayekĩ Yesu nyina fɔtsa a kĩ fɔ́aya nɛ ye akũ a flee sũ ni, ɛnɛ ɛya nɛ lɔtɔ evia be kĩ, “Owei miawɛ?”
Bɛkpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Yesu Nazaretni a.”
Yesu bi be kĩ, “Amɔ yĩ.” Yuda a kĩ ɛnyɛ ye ɛkpa a lɛmɛ dzɛ̃ nɛ awã.
Kĩ Yesu bi be kĩ, “Amɔ yĩ” a, be flee bɛnaa litiliti bɛnatɔ nɛ tite.
Ade Yesu buki evia be kĩ, “Owei miawɛ?”
Bɛkpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Yesu Nazaretni a.”
Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mbi mi kɔkɔɛ kĩ yĩ nyɛ ye, foesũ ntɛ yĩ miawɛ kɔ̃ ni, mifɔ̃ bati kĩĩ bɛdzakũ.”
Ɛlɛ fukĩĩ ayekĩ kalɛ a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi a aaya nɛ foe kamɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ kĩ, “Nda, bati a kĩ ɔkɔa odo nɛ yĩ awɛ a kamɛ odima táyɛla.”
Ade Simon Petro nyɛ kɔpã a kĩ ɛnɛɛ a ɛbaa Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a ɔsumunɛ sɔmɔna sɔtɔ emuni a. Ɔsumunɛ a dĩ nyɛ Malko.
Ade Yesu bi Petro kĩ, “Kɔa nɔ kɔpã a kado nɛ kuvũ kamɛ! Ɔkɔna kĩ nláamɔa lubo kamɔ kɔɔpu a kĩ Nda kɔa ɛkpa yĩ a mbɔɛɛ?”
Ke liti a, Roma sodzafɔ mɔ be banɔkɔɛ̃, mɔ Yudafɔ Asɔli Kɔla akũ badãmɛnanɛ a pi Yesu ade bisui ye a.
Bɛnya lɔtɔ bɛkpã ye bɛnamɛna Hana sɛkɛ̃. Hana kĩĩ nyɛ Kayafa, kĩ yanya Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee nɛ kateli a kamɛ a otse.
Ade Kayafa kĩĩ lɛmɛ lɛkpa Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a adzuni kĩ fɔnɛnɛ fɔbɛ̃ kĩ oti mɔa aku nɛ ɔmaĩ a lɔlɔ.
Simon Petro mɔ fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ bɛbã odi tomɔ Yesu nɛ liti. Fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ bɛbã kĩĩ a nyɛ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a oti nyiwa, foesũ etomɔ Yesu ewo nɛ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a fɔlɛtsa kadzɛkɔ̃.
Lɛmɛ Petro fɔ̃ ɛdza nɛ kanya nɛ onyukpɛ̃. Ade fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ bɛbã a nɛ́, ɛnaa kanya ɛnalɛmɔ oyitsɔ̃ a kĩ yadã onyukpɛ̃ akũ a kɔdzɛla, ade ɛkpã Petro ewomɛna nɛ tɔtɔ a kamɛ a.
Oyitsɔ̃ a kĩ yadã onyukpɛ̃ akũ a via Petro kĩ, “Nɔ malo nnɛ́ onyole kĩĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kamɛ ɔmɔa anɛ?”
Petro kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oowo, ĩnyɛ́ ye fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ.”
Osili na, foesũ basumunɛ mɔ bikĩ badzɔlɛ awã akũ a tɛna futuã fi bɛdza bisinya bawa foe. Petro lɛmɛ nadza nɛ be ɔwɛ̃ ɛkawa fi a.
Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a via Yesu fɔlɛtsa nɛ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ mɔ ye fɔtsa katsa a akũ.
Ade Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Malɛ kɔdzɛla daa nɛ kanade kakpa odi nyɛ odi. Matsa fɔtsa nɛ Yudafɔ fɔtsɛnakɔ̃ mɔ Baguma Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ, awã kĩ bati a flee atsɛna, ade maálɛ lɛtsama nɛ kabɛla kamɛ a.
Mɔ nde sũ avia yĩ fɔlɛtsa? Via bikĩ binu yĩ fɔlɛtsa a. Ade be nyina lɛtsa a kĩ nlɛ a.”
Kĩ Yesu lɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, bikĩ badzɔlɛ awã akũ a kamɛ ɔmɔa balɛ ye awɛ nɛ ɔlɔtɔ ade ebi ye kĩ, “Nde mɔ odo ɔwɔlɛ ɔkpa Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a mbuayɛ lɔmɔ?”
Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ nlɛ fɔlɛtsa kpa ni, bi odi nyɛ odi nɛ awĩ kĩĩ lɛtsa a kĩ fɔanɛ. Lɛmɛ ntɛ lɛtsa a kĩ nlɛ a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali ni, litsa sũ ɔbalɛ yĩ awɛ?”
Ade Hana fɔ̃ bɛkpã Yesu kĩ ebuki edeĩ nɛ tɔwɛ̃ kamɛ a bɛma Kayafa, Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a.
Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, Petro buki ɛdzɛ̃ yawa fi. Ade bati bɛbã a via ye kĩ, “Mbɔɛɛ nɔ malo ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kamɛ ɔmɔa anɛ?”
Lɛmɛ Petro nunya kĩ, “Oowo, ĩnyɛ́ ye fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ.”
Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a basumunɛ a kamɛ ɔmɔa kĩ ye akũ oti sɔtɔ Petro baa emuni a via ye kĩ, “Ntámɔ nɔ nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ nɛ kɔbã a kamɛ?”
Petro buki ɛlɛ kĩ, “Oowo!” Deedimɔapɛ ɔkɔkɔ be.

Ɔnɔnɛ tutuutu a, bɛkpã Yesu bitomɛna Kayafa sɛkɛ̃ bɛnamɛna abãã ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a tɔtɔ kamɛ. Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a mɔawɛ táwo nɛ abãã tɔtɔ a kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ bɛwɛ kĩ be akũ ɛkpalɛ nɛ be amaniɛ onukpɛ̃ ɛkpa Wuda Katɛ̃ funitsã a kanya.
Foesũ Pilato nɛ́ ɛnaa be sɛkɛ̃ evia be kĩ, “Litsa fɔlɛtsa mibɔɛ nɛ oti kĩĩ akũ?”
Bɛkpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ nnɛ́ tɔkpa ɔkɛnanɛ yanɛ ni, kufɛ bɔtákpã ye bɔma nɔ.”
Ade Pilato bi be kĩ, “Kekɔ̃ mi mɔawɛ mikpã ye minaadzɛmɔ ye nɛ mi mbla onukpɛ̃.”
Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Bɛtákpa boe osi kĩ bɔakɔ oti odima.”
Fukĩĩ ya lɔmɔ ayekĩ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Yesu lɛ eyi nɛ wuda odu kĩ yaaku a akũ a fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ.
Pilato dani ewo nɛ abãã tɔtɔ kamɛ ade ɛvɛ Yesu evia ye kĩ, “Nɔ nyɛ Yudafɔ lɛgã a mbɔɛɛ?”
Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nɔ mɔawɛ avia yĩ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ, mbɔɛɛ kĩ bati bɛbã libi nɔ yĩ akũ fɔlɛtsa?”
Pilato kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Akɔna kĩ Yudani manɛ? Nɔ mɔawɛ kade bati mɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a lɛkpã nɔ bɛmɛ yĩ. Litsa ɔkɛna?”

Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Yĩ lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ táto katinya kĩĩ kamɛ. Ntɛ yĩ lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ kito katinya kĩĩ kamɛ ni, kufɛ yĩ basumunɛ a pili yĩ lɔlɔ, mɔ baakɔa yĩ bido nɛ Yudafɔ awɛ kamɛ. Lɛmɛ yĩ lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a táto katinya kĩĩ kamɛ.”
Pilato via ye kĩ, “Foesũ lɛgã anɛ kɔ̃?”

Yesu kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nɔ lɛlɛ kĩ lɛgã manɛ. Yĩ kɔ̃ ni, ade fukĩĩ sũ bɛma yĩ a, ade foesũ ĩya nɛ katinya kamɛ kĩ mayaalɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a akũ. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ eto ɔnɔkɔali a kamɛ ni, yatse yĩ.”
Pilato via ye kĩ, “Litsa nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali a?”
Kĩ Pilato lɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ eyua a, ɛnɛ́ ɛnaa Yudafɔ a sɛkɛ̃ nɛ kanya ade ebi be kĩ, “Ntámɔ tɔkpa tidima nɛ oti kĩĩ akũ kĩ makɔ ye kɔtɔ.
Lɛmɛ nɛ mi amaniɛ onukpɛ̃ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ nfɔnɛ kɔla bawanɛ a kamɛ ɔmɔa nkpa mi nɛ Wuda Katɛ̃ Luwi kanya kamɛ. Miawɛ kĩ nfɔnɛ Yudafɔ lɛgã a awɛ nkpa mi mbɔɛɛ?”
Ade bɛbɔa fɔwɔla bɛlɛ kĩ, “Oowo, nnɛ́ ye bɔawɛ! Baraba bɔawɛ!” Baraba nyɛ oti kĩ eyidza ɛdza nɛ abãã akũ.
Ade Pilato fɔ̃ bɛkpã Yesu bɛdzakũmɛna bɛnabo ye mɔ mple.
Sodzafɔ kɔa fɔtsɔlɛwɛ bɛnɔ lɛgãbɔɛ bɛtsa ye. Kĩ bido ye atadiɛ ngbã biyua a,
bifuã ye bibi ye kĩ, “Yiiduu! Yudafɔ Lɛgã o-o!” Ade bɛbalɛbalɛ ye awɛ nɛ tɔlɔtɔ a.
Ke liti a, Pilato buki ɛnɛ́ ɛnaa kanya ɛnabi bati kɔdabu a kĩ, “Midã, maakpã ye nnɛmɛna mma mi mimɔ́ kĩ ntámɔ́ mfumsu adima nɛ ye akũ kĩ makɔ ye kɔtɔ.”
Adeke Yesu nɛ́ ɛya nɛ kanya, fɔtsɔlɛwɛ lɔbɔɛ a tsanɛ nɛ ye lɔlɔ, edeĩ nɛ atadiɛ ngbã a kamɛ. Pilato bi bati a kĩ, “Midã! Amɔ oti a nɛ awĩ!”
Kĩ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ Asɔli Kɔla akũ badzɔlɛnɛ a mɔ́ ye a, bɛbɔa fɔwɔla kĩ, “Bɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ! Bɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ!”
Ade Pilato bi be kĩ “Mi mɔawɛ mikpã ye minaabɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ. Yĩ kɔ̃ ntámɔ kĩ ɛkɛna lɛtsa kpa lidima.”
Yudafɔ a kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Boe kɔ̃ budeĩ mbla, ade nɛ mbla a onukpɛ̃ ni, kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ eku, kitonɛkĩ ɛkɛna ye akũ Baguma Obi.”
Kĩ Pilato nu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, ebuki evila ɛba kɔkɔɛ a.
Foesũ emuniki ɛnaa abãã tɔtɔ a kamɛ ade evia Yesu kĩ, “Ndia oto?”
Lɛmɛ Yesu tákpa ye mbuayɛ adima.
Ade Pilato bi ye kĩ, “Hei! Aákpa yĩ kalɛ a mbuayɛ? Mbɔɛɛ onyína kĩ ndeĩ kɔbɛ̃ kĩ mafɔnɛ nɔ awɛ, ĩye kĩ mafɔ̃ bɛbɔa nɔ nɛ asendua akũ?”
Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ bɛtakpa nɔ kɔbɛ̃ bitomɛna ode ni, kufɛ ɔláana kɔbɛ̃ nɛ yĩ akũ. Foesũ oti a kĩ ɛnyɛ yĩ ɛkpa nɔ a tɔkpa bɛ̃ nɔ tide.”

Kĩ Pilato nu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, ɛwɛ kĩ yatsã osi nyɛ osi akũ ɛfɔnɛ ye awɛ, lɛmɛ Yudafɔ a bɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba kĩ, “Ntɛ ɔfɔnɛ ye awɛ ni, fɔatsa kĩ ɔnyɛ́ Roma Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ ɔkɔba! Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛkɛna ye akũ Lɛgã ni, eyidza ɛdza nɛ Roma Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ akũ!”
Kĩ Pilato nu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, ɛkpã Yesu ɛnamɛna kanya ade ye mɔawɛ ɛnadzi nɛ fɔlɛtsa kadzɛ lukpo kamɛ nɛ kakɔ a kĩ bavɛ kĩ Boe Ɔda a. Bavɛ kakɔ a nɛ Hebri tide kamɛ kĩ Gabata.
Lɔkɔ a nyɛ Wuda Katɛ̃ kukũmanɛ luwi, ade fɔ́ana ndɛ suwa tɔdɔũ ewua-nviã a.
Ade Pilato bi Yudafɔ a kĩ, “Amɔ mi Lɛgã a nɛ awĩ!”
Bati a bɔa fɔwɔla kĩ, “Kpã ye kanamɛna! Kpã ye kanamɛna! Bɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ!”
Ade Pilato via be kĩ, “Miawɛ kĩ mbɔa mi lɛgã nɛ asendua akũ?”
Basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Bɔlá Lɛgã lidima kɛba Roma Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃!”
Adeke Pilato fɔnɛ Yesu awɛ ɛkpa sodzafɔ a kĩ bɛnaabɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ a.
Foesũ bɛkpã Yesu bɛdzakũmɛna.
Ye mɔawɛ ɛlɔ ye asendua ɛnawo awã kĩ bavɛ Oti Lɔlɔ Fɔtsɔ̃. Bavɛ awã nɛ Hebri tide kamɛ kĩ Golgata.
Ade awã naa, bɛbɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ a. Bɛbɔa bati nviã bɛbã nɛ asendua akũ bibumɔ ye, ɔmɔa nɛ ye sɛba, ɔyade nɛ ye sɔmɔna, ade Yesu deĩ nɛ be kayite a.
Pilato tsɛlɛ ye onukpɛ̃ katsua fɔlɛtsa bɛbɔa nɛ asendua a lɔlɔ nyangɛ. Fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ɛtsɛlɛ nyɛ, “Yesu Nazaretni, Yudafɔ Lɛgã a.”
Yudafɔ pii kã fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ a, kitonɛkĩ awã kĩ bɛbɔa Yesu a fuãmɔ ɔmatɔ kamɛ. Pilato tsɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa a nɛ Hebri, Roma mɔ Hela lɛmɛ tide kamɛ.
Ade basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a sĩ fɔlɛtsa a, ade bibi Pilato kĩ, “Tatsɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Yudafɔ Lɛgã,’ mbom ‘Oti kĩĩ lɛ kĩ, “Yĩ nyɛ Yudafɔ Lɛgã a.” ’ ”
Pilato kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Lɛtsa a kĩ ntsɛlɛ ni, ntsɛlɛ de kɔkɔɛ.”

Kĩ sodzafɔ a bɔa Yesu nɛ asendua akũ biyua a, bɛbɔɛ ye tɛtadiɛ bɛsɛ̃ nɛ kutsu ɛna kamɛ, ade sodzafɔ a kamɛ odi nyɛ odi bɔɛ kamɔa a. Ke liti a, bɛbɔɛ ye atadiɛ amɛde a kĩ bɛtápam, mbom bɛnɔ ye kito sɔmɔ kɛnake kayɔ a.
Sodzafɔ a bi akũ kĩ, “Mitafɔ̃ bɔyɛlɛ atadiɛ a, mbom mifɔ̃ bɔta bavulibi bɔmɔ́ oti a kĩ yaatɛ ye.”
Fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ ya ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a aaya nɛ foe kamɛ kĩ,
“Bɛsɛ̃ yĩ tɛtadiɛ bɛkpa akũ.
Ade bɛta bavulibi nɛ yĩ atadiɛ akũ a.”
Ade lɛtsa a kĩ sodzafɔ a kɛna a.
Finyaakĩiĩ a, Yesu ɔma, ɔma ɔwaɛ̃tsole, Maria kĩ ɛnyɛ Clopa ɔtsɔ̃, mɔ Maria Magdalani dzɛ̃ nɛ Yesu asendua a ɔwɛ̃.
Kĩ Yesu mɔ́ ɔma mɔ ye fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ a kĩ yaátunɔ kalɛ a kĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ awã a, ebi ɔma kĩ, “Mma, dã ade nɔ obi nɛ awĩ a!”
Ade ebi fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ a kĩ, “Dã, ade ama nɛ awĩ a!” Kito luwi a akũ a, fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ a kpã Maria ɛnamɛna nɛ ye mɔawɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ.
Finyaa Yesu nyi kĩ biyua lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kakɛna. Ayekĩ fɔ́afɔ̃ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛya nɛ foe kamɛ sũ ni, ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ɔmɔado akɔ yĩ.”
Kugumi kudi keni nɛ awã kĩ kuyi mɔ waĩ yilawa. Ade bɛkɔa ɔsapɔ bɛta waĩ a bɛkɔa bido nɛ otse akũ bɛnatamɔ Yesu onukpɛ̃.
Kĩ Yesu mɔa bavɛ a eyua a, ɛlɛ kĩ, “Fuwoli!”
Ɛkɛna lɔlɔ ade ye kawɛya nɛ a.

Luwi a nyɛ Efieda, ade Kawɛya Luwi kĩ litomɔ de a nyɛ luwi kpalɛwa lɛkpa Yudafɔ, foesũ bɛtáwɛ kĩ banɔkpa a bɛkahɔ nɛ asendua akũ Kawɛya Luwi a liwo ɔtɔ. Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a navia Pilato kĩ ɛkpa be osi bɛnaaveliveli bati a kĩ bɛbɔa nɛ asendua akũ a abɔa, lɔkɔa bɛnyɛ be banɔkpa a.
Foesũ sodzafɔ a yaveli oti ɔtɔnyade mɔ oti bɛbã a kĩ bɛbɔa nɛ asendua akũ bibumɔ Yesu a abɔa.
Lɛmɛ kĩ biwo Yesu akũ a, bɛmɔ́ kĩ eku kɔkɔɛ, foesũ bɛtáveli ye abɔa.
Lɛmɛ be kamɛ ɔmɔa kɔa lɔtsɔɛ ɛtsɔɛ ye sɛklabi, ade deedimɔapɛ babɔanɛ mɔ mui nɛ a.
Oti a kĩ ɛmɔ́ fɔtsa kĩĩ lidi adansiɛ nɛ foe akũ ayekĩ nɔ malo aatɛ odo. Lɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali, ade enyina pefee kĩ ɔnɔkɔali ɛlɛ a.
Fukĩĩ ya ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa fɔlɛtsa a aaya nɛ foe kamɛ kĩ, “Bɛláave ye lɔtsɔ̃ lidima.”
Fɔlɛtsa bɛbã nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ lɛmɛ lɛ kĩ, “Bati aako anɛ bɛdã oti a kĩ bɛtsɔɛ ye lɔtsɔɛ a.”

Ke liti a, Yosef kĩ eto Arimatia yavia Pilato kĩ ɛkpa ye osi ɛbɔɛ Yesu ɔnɔkpa a. Yosef kĩĩ nyɛ Yesu fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ odi nɛ kabɛla kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ ɛkavila Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a. Pilato kpa osi, ade Yosef yabɔɛ ɔnɔkpa a ɛdzakumɛna a.
Ade Nikodemo kĩ ɛnya lɔtɔ ɛnaa Yesu sɛkɛ̃ mɔ lɛnyɛ a lɛmɛ tomɔ Yosef ɛya a. Ɛnɛɛ tutsonu mɔ ɔlɛ̃ kĩ bɛkɔa klubɔũ mɔ odi kĩ bavɛ aloa bɛkɛna ɛyamɛna. Te ɔlɔmɛ kamɛ aana ndɛ kilo taalɛ.
Banyole nviã a kɔa tutsonu a bikputa Yesu ɔnɔkpa a, ade bɛkɔa aklala ovoe bisuli ye ndɛ ayekĩ Yudafɔ akɛna ɔnɔkpa fɔmɔ babila ye a.
Kɔbã kudi deĩ nɛ awã kĩ bɛbɔa Yesu nɛ asendua akũ a. Linikɛ vɔɛ̃ kĩ bɛtábila oti tɔ̃ deĩ nɛ kɔbã a kamɛ.
Ayekĩ luwi a nyɛ Kukũmanɛ luwi lɛkpa Kawɛya Luwi a, ade kĩ awã lɛmɛ fuã be sũ ni, bɛkɔa Yesu ɔnɔkpa a bibila nɛ awã.
Ɛkwansieda ɔnɔnɛ tutuutu a, kĩ fɔkɔ tákpalɛ tɔ̃ a, Maria Magdalani naa linikɛ a ɔwɛ̃, ade ɛmɔ́ kĩ bitinya de a nɛ linikɛ a onukpɛ̃.
Foesũ ewula atsɛ ɛnaa Simon Petro mɔ fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ a kĩ Yesu látunɔ kalɛ a sɛkɛ̃, ebi be kĩ, “Bɛyabɔɛ boe Ɔlate nɛ linikɛ a kamɛ bɛdzakũmɛna, ade bunyína awã kĩ bɛkɔa ye biyi a.”
Ade Petro mɔ fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ kĩ a yidza bɛnaa linikɛ a ɔwɛ̃.
Be nviã a flee bɛkawula atsɛ, lɛmɛ fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ kĩ a wula atsɛ ɛtɛ̃ Petro ɛnya lɔtɔ ewo linikɛ a ɔwɛ̃.
Ɛkɛna akũ ɛdã de kamɛ ɛmɔ́ aklala a kĩ bɛkɔa bisuli ɔnɔkpa a, lɛmɛ ɛtáwo nɛ linikɛ a kamɛ.
Simon Petro kĩ etomɔ ye nɛ liti a, ya ade ye kɔ̃ ewo nɛ linikɛ a kamɛ a. Ɛmɔ́ aklala ovoe a kĩ ɛwaa nɛ awã.
Ɛmɔ́ lima a kĩ bɛkɔa bisui Yesu lɔlɔ a lɛmɛ nɛ awã, lɛmɛ lɛwáa nɛ aklala a ɔwɛ̃, mbom bibuta de biyi de lite.
Ke liti a, fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ bɛbã a kĩ ɛnya lɔtɔ ewo linikɛ a ɔwɛ̃ a, lɛmɛ wo nɛ de kamɛ. Ɛmɔ́ aklala mɔ lɔlɔ kasui lima a, ade ɛtɛ edo a.
Ke malo ni, bɛtánu kayɔ kĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ Yesu eyidza eto kanɔkpa.
Ke liti a, fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a dzakũ bɛnaa be tɔtɔ kamɛ.
Lɛmɛ Maria dza nɛ linikɛ a ɔwɛ̃ ɛkabe. Kĩ ɛkabe a, ɛkɛna akũ ɛdã linikɛ a kamɛ,
ade ɛmɔ́ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ nviã kĩ bideĩ nɛ tɛtadiɛ fitaa kamɛ, kĩ bidzi nɛ awã kĩ bɛwɔ́la Yesu a. Ɔmɔa dzi nɛ ye lɔlɔ nyangɛ, ɔbɛbã dzi nɛ ye abɔa kayɔ.
Bivia Maria kĩ, “Boe ɔma, litsa sũ abe?”
Maria kpa be mbuayɛ kĩ, “Bɛbɔɛ yĩ Ɔlate bɛnamɛna, ade ĩnyína awã kĩ bɛkɔa ye bɛnamɛna a.”
Kĩ ɛlɛ fukĩĩ eyua a, ɛdani akũ ade ɛmɔ́ Yesu kĩ ɛdzɛ̃ nɛ awã, lɛmɛ ɛtányi kĩ ye yanɛ.
Yesu via ye kĩ, “Boe ɔma, nde sũ abe? Owei awɛ?”
Lɛmɛ Maria kɔna kĩ oti a kĩ yadãmɛna awã a yanɛ, foesũ ebi ye kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃, ntɛ nɔ lɛbɔɛ ye ni, bi yĩ awã kĩ oyi ye lɔkɔa nnaabɔɛ ye.”
Ade Yesu vɛ ye kĩ, “Maria!”
Ɛdani ɛtsɛlamɔ ye ade ɛlɛ nɛ Hebri tide kamɛ kĩ, “Raboni!” Foe kayɔ nyɛ Fɔtsa ɔtsanɛ.
Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Tata yĩ, kitonɛkĩ ntámuniki nnaa ode nɛ Nda sɛkɛ̃ tɔ̃. Lɛmɛ naa nwaɛ̃ amɛ sɛkɛ̃ kabi be kĩ mmuniki manaa oti a kĩ ɛnyɛ Nda mɔ mi Ɔlɛga, yĩ Baguma mɔ mi Baguma a sɛkɛ̃.”
Foesũ Maria Magdalani a nabi fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ ɛmɔ́ Ɔlate a, ade ebi be fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Yesu bi ye a flee a.

Nɛ Ɛkwansieda a na olobe a, fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kpɔta nɛ kɔla kamɛ, ade bɛbalɛ onyukpɛ̃ tupunu a flee, kitonɛkĩ bɛkavila Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a. Lɛtalɛta Yesu yanɛ ɛdza nɛ be kayite, ade ebi be kĩ, “Lukudɔ litomɔ mi.”
Kĩ ɛlɛ fukĩĩ eyua a, ɛkɔa ye awɛ mɔ sɛklabi ɛtsa be. Adeke kawɔlɛ de fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kĩ bɛmɔ́ Ɔlate a.
Yesu buki ebi be kĩ, “Lukudɔ litomɔ mi! Ndɛ ayekĩ Nda do yĩ a, ade aye mado mi a.”
Adeke ɛwɛya eko nɛ be akũ, ɛlɛ kĩ, “Mitɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a.
Ntɛ mikɔa bati tɔkpa mite be ni, bɛkɔa bite be, lɛmɛ ntɛ mitákɔa be tɔkpa mite be a ni, bɛtákɔa te bite be.”
Kĩ Yesu ya a, Toma kĩ ɛnyɛ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ ewua-nviã a kamɛ ɔmɔa, kĩ bibuki bavɛ Ata a, tána nɛ ye bade a kamɛ.
Foesũ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ bɛbã a bi ye kĩ, “Bɔmɔ́ boe Ɔlate a!”
Ade Toma bi be kĩ, “Ntɛ ntámɔ ye awɛ kamɛ tiplego fɔɔkpa a, nkɔa lawobi nte nɛ fɔɔkpa a akũ ndo awɛ nɛ ye sɛklabi ni, nláatɛ ndo da.”
Nɛ fuwi ɛlɛ̃ liti a, fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a buki bɛkpɔta nɛ kɔla a kamɛ, ade Toma lɛmɛ na nɛ be kamɛ a. Bɛbalɛ tupunu a flee, lɛmɛ Yesu yadza nɛ be kayite ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Lukudɔ litomɔ mi!”
Adeke ebi Toma kĩ, “Kɔa nɔ lawobi kate nɛ awĩ, kadã yĩ awɛ kamɛ. Yo kɔkpɔ kado awɛ nɛ yĩ sɛklabi kamɛ. Fɔ̃ atsindze katɛ, lɔkɔa katɛ kado!”
Toma bi ye kĩ, “Yĩ Ɔlate mɔ yĩ Baguma!”
Ade Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Ayekĩ ɔmɔ́ yĩ sũ ɔtɛ odo. Baguma hila bikĩ bɛtámɔ yĩ, lɛmɛ bɛtɛ bido a!”
Nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, Yesu kɛna awãwã fɔtsa bɛbã pii nɛ ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a anɛ, kĩ bɛtátsɛlɛ bido nɛ ovoli kĩĩ kamɛ.
Lɛmɛ bɛtsɛlɛ fukĩĩ biyi ayekĩ míatɛ mido kĩ Yesu nyɛ Kristo, Baguma Obi, ade mitɛ ye mido ni, míatsã ye akũ mina nkpã kĩ ɛla kawũna a.
Ke liti a, Yesu buki ɛnyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ nɛ Tiberia Lutubu Baũ a abuĩ. Ayekĩ ɛnyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa a nyɛ.
Luwi a, ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ badi kpɔta. Ade be nyɛ Simon Petro, Toma kĩ bavɛ Ata obi, mɔ Nataniel kĩ eto Kana nɛ Galilea tite akũ, mɔ Zebedeo babi mɔ Yesu fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ bɛbã nviã.
Ade Simon Petro bi be kĩ, “Manaata asau.”
Bibi ye kĩ, “Bɔ́atomɔ nɔ bɔnaa.” Foesũ bɛnawo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ kamɛ bɛnaa, lɛmɛ lɛnyɛ a flee bɛtányɛ lɛtsama.
Kĩ kade aya kanyina kɔ̃ a, Yesu ya ɛdzɛ̃ nɛ ɔwɔ abuĩ, lɛmɛ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a linyína kĩ Yesu yanɛ.
Ade evia be kĩ, “Bapopo, mbɔɛɛ mitányɛ kɔfɔabi kudima?”
Bɛkpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oowo!”
Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mita asau nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a sɔmɔna sɛmakɛ lɔkɔa míana kɔfɔabi a kudi.” Ade bɛta asau a bɛnyɛ kɔfɔabi beblebee kĩ bɛtápuli bɛvɛlɛ bɛnɛmɛna.
Fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ a kĩ Yesu látunɔ kalɛ a bi Petro kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate a yanɛ!” Kĩ Petro nu kĩ boe Ɔlate yanɛ a, ɛbɔɛ ye atadiɛ anyanglede efili nɛ kate, kitonɛkĩ edzi ɔdzɔ, ade ɛvɛnya ewo nɛ mui a kamɛ a.
Fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ nkaɛ a ta ɔkɔlɔ a, bɛvɛlɛ asau a kĩ eyi mɔ kɔfɔabi a bɛyamɛna nɛ ɔwɔ abuĩ a. Awã kĩ bɛna a mɔ ɔwɔ abuĩ lɛlá lugo, fɔ́ana ndɛ abasam ɔha.
Kĩ biduma nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ a, bɛmɔ́ kĩ bɛtɛna futuã fi kĩ kɔfɔabi teĩ nɛ foe akũ, ade abodoo adi lɛmɛ waa nɛ awã a.
Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Mikɔa kɔfɔabi a kĩ minyɛ finyaa kudi miyamɛna.”
Simon Petro wo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ, ɛnavɛlɛ asau a ɛyamɛna nɛ lɔwɔ tuni. Kɔfɔabi baũ baũ ɔha mɔa mɔ aduenum ɛlalɛ yi asau a. Titɔ kĩ kɔfɔabi a pɔnɛ malo ni, asau a tákpeli.
Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Miyaanya.” Lɛmɛ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a kamɛ odima tádo ɔwɔlɛ evia ye kĩ, “Owei anɛ?” kitonɛkĩ binyina kĩ Boe Ɔlate a yanɛ.
Foesũ Yesu nabɔɛ abodoo a ɛkɔa ɛkpa be, ade ayea ɛbɔɛ kɔfɔabi a lɛmɛ ɛkpa be a.
Ade fukĩĩ nyɛ lɛlade kĩ Yesu nyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa ye fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ, kĩ Baguma dzɛla ye etomɛna kanɔkpa a.
Kĩ bɛnya biyua a, Yesu via Simon Petro kĩ, “Simon, Yona obi, awɛ yĩ kalɛ kaba ayekĩ bati bɛbã kĩĩ a awɛ yĩ kalɛ a?”
Ɛkpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oo, Boe Ɔlate! Onyina kĩ mawɛ nɔ kalɛ.”
Ade Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Dãmɛna yĩ bavelibi akũ.”
Yesu buki evia ye lɛyade kĩ, “Simon, Yona obi, awɛ yĩ kalɛ?”
Petro kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oo, Boe Ɔlate! Nɔ mɔawɛ onyina kĩ mawɛ nɔ kalɛ.”
Ade Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Dãmɛna yĩ baveli a akũ.”
Yesu buki evia Petro lɛlalɛde kĩ, “Simon, Yona obi, awɛ yĩ kalɛ?”
Petro wo ɔblɔ kitonɛkĩ Yesu via ye lɛlade kĩ, “Awɛ yĩ kalɛ?” Foesũ ebi Yesu kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, nɔ mɔawɛ onyina lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa. Nɔ mɔawɛ onyina kĩ mawɛ nɔ kalɛ!”
Ade Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Dãmɛna yĩ baveli a akũ.
Mabi nɔ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ kĩ lɔkɔ a kĩ ɔnyɛ opopo a, apuli kafili lima, kanaa kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ kĩ awɛ, lɛmɛ ntɛ ɔdɛ a ni, aadzɛla akpɔ, oti bɛbã lifili nɔ lima, ɛkpã nɔ ɛnamɛna awã kĩ aáwɛ kĩ anaa.”
Yesu lɛ fukĩĩ ɛkɔa ɛtsa wuda odu a kĩ Petro aaku, ɛkɔa ɛnyɛ Baguma kukũkpalɛ a ɛtsa.
Ke liti a, Yesu bi ye kĩ, “Tomɔ yĩ.”
Petro dani ade ɛmɔ́ fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ a kĩ Yesu látunɔ kalɛ a kĩ etomɔ be nɛ liti yaya. Ade fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ kĩĩ lidzi ɛmɛnamɔ Yesu kĩ bidzi bɛkanya, ade evia ye kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, owei aanyɛ nɔ ɛkpa a?”
Kĩ Petro mɔ́ ye a, evia Yesu kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, litsa aaya nɛ oti kĩĩ akũ?”
Ade Yesu kpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ mawɛ kĩ edzi nkpã kɛnaawo kĩ maaya a ni, fɔwɔdabe tsɛla nɔ akũ? Nɔ kɔ̃, tomɔ yĩ!”
Fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ gba nɛ Yesu batomɛnanɛ a kamɛ kĩ fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ kĩĩ lɛláaku. Lɛmɛ Yesu tálɛ kĩ ɛláaku, mbom kalɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ mawɛ kĩ edzi nkpã kɛnaawo kĩ maaya a ni, fɔɔdabe tsɛla nɔ akũ?”
Ade fɔtsa ɔkɔlɛnɛ kĩĩ adi adansiɛ nɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ akũ a, ade ye lɛmɛ lɛtsɛlɛ foe eyi a. Foesũ bunyina kĩ lɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali.
Fɔtsa bɛbã pii deĩ kĩ Yesu kɛna. Ntɛ katsɛlɛ bɛtsɛlɛ foe flee biyi fɔmɔa fɔmɔa ni, nkɔna kĩ katinya kĩĩ flee kamɛ malo lɛláana kakokɔ̃ kɛkpa tuvoli a kĩ baatsɛlɛ a.
Acts: Nwaɛ̃ Tiofilo, nɛ yĩ ovoli ɔtɔnyade a kamɛ a, ntsɛlɛ ntsa lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ Yesu kɛna mɔ fukĩ ɛtsa, kito nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ eyi ye adzuma kayɔ, kɛnawo lɔkɔ a kĩ Baguma bɔɛ ye ɛnamɛna ode. Fɔmɔ Baguma bɔɛ ye bɛnamɛna ode a, Yesu tsã Hũhũ Kpalɛwa kɔbɛ̃ akũ ɛtsa ye fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kĩ ɛpau a fɔtsa.

Nwaɛ̃ Tiofilo, nɛ yĩ ovoli ɔtɔnyade a kamɛ a, ntsɛlɛ ntsa lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ Yesu kɛna mɔ fukĩ ɛtsa, kito nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ eyi ye adzuma kayɔ, kɛnawo lɔkɔ a kĩ Baguma bɔɛ ye ɛnamɛna ode. Fɔmɔ Baguma bɔɛ ye bɛnamɛna ode a, Yesu tsã Hũhũ Kpalɛwa kɔbɛ̃ akũ ɛtsa ye fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kĩ ɛpau a fɔtsa.
Nɛ ye wuda liti a, ɛnyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa be nɛ tisi pii akũ nɛ fuwi tɛna kamɛ, kĩ atsindze katɛ lɛláa foe kamɛ kĩ edzi nkpã. Ɛlɛmɔ bikĩ bɛmɔ́ ye a kɔdzɛla nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ fɔlɛtsa a akũ.
Lɔkɔ a kĩ bɛkpɔta a, esi be mbla kĩ, “Mitadzakũ nɛ Yerusalem, mbom midzi midzɔlɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a kĩ mbi mi kĩ yĩ Ɔlɛga lɛ eyi kĩ yaakpa mi a kaya.
Yohanes kɔ̃ ni, mui ɛkɔa ɛwɔla bati. Lɛmɛ nɛ fuwi lukũ kamɛ ni, Baguma aakɔa Hũhũ Kpalɛwa ɛwɔla mi.”
Lɔkɔ a kĩ Yesu mɔ ye fɔtɔ banyanɛ a buki bɛkpɔta a, bivia ye kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, mbɔɛɛ finyaakĩĩ ɔwɛ kĩ ayaamunikimɔ Israelfɔ lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a ɔkpa be?”
Ade Yesu bi be kĩ, “Fɔtásĩ kĩ mianyi lɔkɔ ĩye fuwi a kĩ yĩ ɔlɛga lɛ eyi ɛkpa kĩ litsedi lɛya a nɛ ye kɔbɛ̃ akũ a.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a yawo nɛ mi kamɛ ni, yaado mi kɔbɛ̃ lɔkɔa milɛ yĩ fɔlɛtsa a nɛ Yerusalem, mɔ Yudea flee mɔ Samaria, kɛnaawo katinya kamɛ tite kawũnakɔ̃.”
Kĩ ɛlɛ fukĩĩ eyua a nɛ be anɛ kamɛ naa, Baguma bɔɛ ye ɛnamɛna ode, ade ɛyɛla nɛ luflututu kamɛ a.
Kĩ bɛdza bɛkadã koee kĩ yanaa odetɔ́ kamɛ a, lɛtalɛta banyole nviã badi kĩ bideĩ nɛ fɔtsa ovoe kamɛ nyɛ be akũ bɛtsa be,
ade bibi be kĩ, “Galileafɔ, nde sũ midzɛ̃ miadã odetɔ́ kamɛ lɔmɔ? Yesu a kĩ Baguma bɔɛ nɛ mi ɔwɛ̃ nɛ awĩ ɛnamɛna ode a, aabuki ɛya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ ndɛ ayekĩ mimɔ́ kĩ yanaa ode a.”
Ke liti a, fɔtɔ banyanɛ kĩĩ dzakũ nɛ Kugua Futse Ɔtɔ akũ a bɛnaa Yerusalem ɔmatɔ kamɛ. Kito awã kɛnawo ɔmatɔ a kamɛ ana ndɛ lisikũ sɛkɛ.

Kĩ biwo ɔmatɔ a kamɛ a, bɛnaa be kadzikɔ̃ nɛ abansulu kɔla ode. Bati a kĩ bɛna nɛ awã nyɛ Petro, Yohanes, Yakobo, Andrea, Filipo, Toma, Bartolomeo, Mateo, Yakobo kĩ ɛnyɛ Alfeo obi, mɔ Simon kĩ epili ye kade lɔlɔ, mɔ Yuda kĩ ɛnyɛ Yakobo obi.
Bati kĩĩ flee katsɛna lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ mɔ kakɔna mɔa, kabɔa mpaɛ kakpa Baguma. Bati a badi lɛmɛ nyɛ batsole mɔ Yesu ɔma Maria, mɔ Yesu bawaɛ̃nyole.
Nɛ fuwi a na kamɛ a, bikĩ bɛtɛ bido a tsɛna, be lidede aawo ndɛ bati ɔha mɔ be tɛya. Ade Petro yidza ɛdza ebi be kĩ,
“Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, kɛnɛ kĩ lɛtsa a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ, kĩ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a lɛ eyi ɛtsãmɛna Lɛgã Dawid akũ nɛ Yuda kĩ ye lɛnya bati lɔtɔ bipi Yesu a, fɔya lɔmɔ.
Yuda nya boe kamɛ ɔmɔa kĩ boe Ɔlate nyɛ ye kĩ ɛkɛna fɔtɔ banyanɛ adzuma.”
Lɛmɛ ɛkɛna tɔkpa kĩ ɛnatɛ sika kĩ se bɛkɔa bɛya tite a kĩ te akũ eku a. Ade awã na kĩ eto ode ɛtɔ a, ye lupu tui lɛbɛ̃, ade ke ye fɔmɛtsa flee nɛ fuko nɛ tite a.
Ye wuda a akũ fɔlɛtsa gba nɛ Yerusalem kĩ odi nyɛ odi nu foe. Foesũ awã kĩ ɛnaku ɛwa a bavɛ ke kĩ Akeldamak, foe kayɔ nyɛ Babɔanɛ Tite.
Foesũ Petro buki ɛlɛ kĩ, “Bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Dawid Tɔnɔ Ovoli a kamɛ kĩ,
‘Mifɔ̃ ye tɔtɔ tɛwa luto,
odima ɛtabuki edzi nɛ te kamɛ.’
Bɛtsɛlɛ lɛmɛ kĩ,
‘Mifɔ̃ oti bɛbã ɛtɛ ye kadzakɔ̃ a.’

Foesũ fusĩ kĩ oti bɛbã ɛyaawo nɛ boe kamɛ ndɛ ɔdansini ɛkpa boe Ɔlate Yesu kayidza kato kanɔkpa a. Ade fusĩ lɛmɛ kĩ ɛnya oti kĩ ɛnya boe bati a kĩ bɔtsã butomɛna boe Ɔlate Yesu a kamɛ ɔmɔa, kito lɔkɔ a kĩ Yohanes de lɛtsã nɛ mui kawɔla amaniɛ akũ kɛyawo lɔkɔ a kĩ Baguma bɔɛ Yesu nɛ boe sɛkɛ̃ ɛnamɛna ode a.”

Foesũ fusĩ kĩ oti bɛbã ɛyaawo nɛ boe kamɛ ndɛ ɔdansini ɛkpa boe Ɔlate Yesu kayidza kato kanɔkpa a. Ade fusĩ lɛmɛ kĩ ɛnya oti kĩ ɛnya boe bati a kĩ bɔtsã butomɛna boe Ɔlate Yesu a kamɛ ɔmɔa, kito lɔkɔ a kĩ Yohanes de lɛtsã nɛ mui kawɔla amaniɛ akũ kɛyawo lɔkɔ a kĩ Baguma bɔɛ Yesu nɛ boe sɛkɛ̃ ɛnamɛna ode a.”
Foesũ bɛnyɛ bati nviã ade be nyɛ Matias mɔ Yosef kĩ bavɛ Barsaba kĩ babuki kavɛ Yusto a.
Ade bɛbɔa mpaɛ bɛvɛ Baguma kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, nɔ nyina odi nyɛ odi lɔlɔ kamɛ. Tsa boe bati nviã kĩĩ kamɛ ekĩ ɔnyɛ kĩ ɛdza ndɛ fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ nɛ kadzakɔ̃ a kĩ Yuda fɔnɛ awɛ eyi ɛnaa awã kĩ kɛfɛta ye a.”
Ade bɛbɔa mpaɛ bɛvɛ Baguma kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, nɔ nyina odi nyɛ odi lɔlɔ kamɛ. Tsa boe bati nviã kĩĩ kamɛ ekĩ ɔnyɛ kĩ ɛdza ndɛ fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ nɛ kadzakɔ̃ a kĩ Yuda fɔnɛ awɛ eyi ɛnaa awã kĩ kɛfɛta ye a.”
Kĩ bɛta bavulibi nɛ bati nviã kĩĩ fɔlɔ a, fɔyake nɛ Matias akũ, ade bɛkɔa ye bibumɛna fɔtɔ banyanɛ ewua-odi a akũ a.
Kĩ Pentekoste luwi a wo ɔtɔ a, batɛ badonɛ a flee natsɛna nɛ kakɔ mɔapɛ.
Deedimɔapɛ, binu litsedi nkã ndɛ ayekĩ ɔwɛ kpale avũ a nɛ odetɔ́ kamɛ, ade ɔwɛ kĩĩ tɛ tɔtɔ a flee kĩ te kamɛ bɛna a kamɛ a.
Bɛmɔ́ litsedi ndɛ fi fɔmɛ kĩ fɔka fudzi nɛ odi nyɛ odi akũ.
Ade Hũhũ Kpalɛwa tɛ be kamɛ flee, ade bido kɔdzɛla kalɛ awɛ nɛ tide futefute kamɛ, ndɛ ayekĩ Hũhũ a kpa be a.
Ade nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, Yudafɔ kĩ bavila Baguma kĩ bito fude kumɛkumɛ nɛ katinya kamɛ flee a ya bideĩ nɛ Yerusalem.
Foesũ kĩ binu ɔwɛ baũ kĩĩ nkã a, bati pii bɔa obũ bɛnakpɔta nɛ awã. Kĩ binu kĩ batɛ badonɛ kĩĩ kalɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ be kamɛ odi nyɛ odi tide kamɛ a, fɔkɛna be wãwã.
Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ libe wo be, bɛkɛna saa, ade bido akũ kavia awɛ kĩ, “Midã, mbɔɛɛ nnɛ́ Galileafɔ bati kĩĩ flee anɛ?
Mɔ nde fɔya mɔ bɔanu kĩ bɛlamɛna kɔdzɛla kalɛ nɛ boe tide kamɛ?
Bɔnyɛ Partiafɔ mɔ Mediafɔ mɔ Elamfɔ ade boe kamɛ badi to Mesopotamia mɔ Yudea mɔ Kapadokia mɔ Ponto mɔ Asia mɔ Frigia mɔ Pamfilia mɔ Egipte mɔ Libia kakɔ a kĩ kifuã Kirene. Boe badi buto Roma
Bɔnyɛ Partiafɔ mɔ Mediafɔ mɔ Elamfɔ ade boe kamɛ badi to Mesopotamia mɔ Yudea mɔ Kapadokia mɔ Ponto mɔ Asia mɔ Frigia mɔ Pamfilia mɔ Egipte mɔ Libia kakɔ a kĩ kifuã Kirene. Boe badi buto Roma
kĩ bɔnyɛ Yudafɔ ĩye bati kĩ bɛdani akũ bɛkɛna Yudafɔ, boe badi bɔnyɛ Kretafɔ mɔ Arabiafɔ. Ade boe flee bɔanu kĩ bɛlamɛna Baguma awãwã fɔtsa kalɛ nɛ boe tide kamɛ a.”
Ade kĩ fɔkɛna be saa mɔ basaa lɔmɔ a, bɛkavia be akũ kĩ, “Litsa fɔlɛtsa nɛ awĩ a?”
Lɛmɛ bikĩ bɛdza nɛ awã badi di be nsekuo bɛlɛ kĩ, “Bavɛ lamɛna be kawugɛla.”
Ade awã mɔ Petro yidza ɛdza mɔ be ewua-odi a, ɛdzɛla odo ɛlɛ kĩ, “Mi Yudafɔ mɔ mi a flee kĩ midzi nɛ Yerusalem, mawɛ kĩ manyɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩ flee kayɔ ntsa mi, foesũ mitse katse wĩ.
Nnɛ́ bavɛ bati kĩĩ wuga ndɛ ayekĩ mikɔna a. Midã kĩ ade owi fɔmɔ ɔnɔnɛ tɔdɔũ evedi bɔa a.
Mbom lɛtsa a kĩ de milamɛna kamɔ nɛ awĩ a nyɛ fukĩ Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yoel lɛ eyi anɛ kɔkɔɛ a kĩ,
‘Baguma lɛ kĩ,
“Nɛ fuwi nkaɛ a kamɛ ni,
maado yĩ Hũhũ ɛyaawo nɛ bati flee kamɛ,
lɔkɔa mi babinyole mɔ babitsole aade lɛtsã nɛ yĩ kalɛ a akũ.
Mi bapopo aamɔ ode fɔtsa kɛnawa nɛ hũhũ kamɛ,
ade mi banɔkɔɛ̃ lɛmɛ aawa fɔda a.
Ɔnɔkɔali, nɛ fuwi a na kamɛ ni, yĩ Hũhũ aatɛ mi basumunɛ batsole mɔ banyole flee kamɛ,
lɔkɔa baadɛ lɛtsã nɛ yĩ fɔlɛtsa akũ.
Ade maafɔ̃ awãwã fɔtsa lɛnɛ
nɛ odetɔ kamɛ mɔ tite akũ.
Míamɔ babɔanɛ, mɔ fi mɔ ɔnyɔ kusuu kĩ fɔgba nɛ tite akũ.
Suwa aake ɔtũ,
odetɔ anɛ aadani ngbã ndɛ babɔanɛ aye,
ade owi fɔmɔ Baguma Luwi kpale
mɔ kukũkpalɛ a aaya a.
Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ ni, odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaavɛ Ɔlate a dĩ
mɔ evia ye kɔnyakamɔ ni, yaana katɛ.” ’ ”

Ade Petro buki ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nwaɛ̃ amɛ Israelfɔ, mitse fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ. Yesu Nazaretni nyɛ Oti a kĩ Baguma pau, kĩ ye deĩ Baguma kɔbɛ̃. Ɛnyɛ kɔbɛ̃ kĩĩ ɛtsa mi nɛ ye awãwã mɔ nsɛntsɛlɛni fɔtsa kɛnawa kamɛ, ndɛ ayekĩ mi mɔawɛ minyina lɛmɛ a.
Lɛmɛ nɛ Baguma kawɛ mɔ nhihiɛ onukpɛ̃ ni ɛfɔnɛ ye awɛ ɛkpa mi, ade mitsã tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ akũ mikɔ ye, nɛ kĩ mibɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ a.
Lɛmɛ Baguma buki ɛdzɛla ye etomɛna banɔkpa kamɛ ade ɛnɛ́ nɛ wuda awɛ kamɛ a, kitonɛkĩ wuda tápuli ɛfɔ̃ ɛkahɔ nɛ kanɔkpa da.
Ade lɛgã Dawid lɛ eyi nɛ ye akũ kĩ,
‘Mamɔ kĩ yĩ Ɔlate dzɛ̃ nɛ yĩ anɛ kamɛ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ
Nɛ kĩ ɛdzɛ̃ nɛ yĩ sɔmɔna ndɛ yĩ obumɛnanɛ sũ maávila.
Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ kawɔlɛ de yĩ ade fɔfɔ̃ mamu ye luwi daa.
Titɔ kĩ sukɛna pupulidza manɛ malo ni,
maadzi nɛ kɔnɛte kamɛ.
Kitonɛkĩ ɔláafɔ̃nɛ yĩ ɔkla oyi nɛ kanɔkpade,
ade ɔláafɔ̃ nɔ Obi Kpalɛwa sukɛna lɛvɔ̃ nɛ linikɛ kamɛ a.
Nɔ lɛtsa yĩ nkpã osi a,
ade nɔ sɛkɛ̃ kana aafɔ̃ mmɔ́ kawɔlɛ paa.’
“Foesũ, nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mabi mi yededeede kĩ boe ɔwanyɔ Lɛgã Dawid ku, bibila ye, ade ye kuni waa nɛ boe kamɛ kɛyawo nviã kĩ a.
Lɛmɛ kĩ ɛnya Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ sũ ni, enyi lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi kĩ yaakɛna ɛkpa ye. Baguma lɔ fubo kĩ yaakɛna Dawid kasinu a kamɛ obi mɔa odi ɛyaadzi ɛnya lɛgã ndɛ Dawid aye.
Nɛ kĩ Dawid nyi fukĩĩ ɛnyamɛna lɔtɔ sũ ni, ɛlɛ eyi kĩ Kristo aayidza eto banɔkpa kamɛ. Ɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Baguma táfɔnɛ ye awɛ ɛkahɔ nɛ kanɔkpa, ade ye sukɛna lɛmɛ távɔ̃ nɛ linikɛ kamɛ a.’
Ade Yesu kĩĩ Baguma dzɛla etomɛna banɔkpa kamɛ a, ade boe a flee bɔnyɛ foe akũ adansifɔ a.

Finyaakĩĩ ni, Ɔlɛga Baguma kpa ye lɔnɔkɔɛ̃ kadzikɔ̃ nɛ ye sɔmɔna, ade ɛkɔa ye Hũhũ ɛkpa ye ndɛ ayekĩ ɛlɛ eyi a. Foesũ ye malo ɛkɔa ye Hũhũ a, eko nɛ boe akũ. Ade foesũ mimɔ́, minu lɛmɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛlamɛna kaya nɛ awĩ a.
Nnɛ́ Dawid liyidza ɛnaa ode, mbom ye lɛlɛ kĩ,
‘Baguma bi yĩ Ɔlate kĩ,
“Dzi nɛ yĩ sɔmɔna
kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ maakɔa nɔ bakesĩnɛ nkɛna
ndɛ nɔ abɔa katekɔ̃.” ’
Nnɛ́ Dawid liyidza ɛnaa ode, mbom ye lɛlɛ kĩ,
‘Baguma bi yĩ Ɔlate kĩ,
“Dzi nɛ yĩ sɔmɔna
kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ maakɔa nɔ bakesĩnɛ nkɛna
ndɛ nɔ abɔa katekɔ̃.” ’
Foesũ mawɛ kĩ mi Israelfɔ flee minyi kĩ Yesu a kĩ mibɔa nɛ asendua akũ a, ade ye Baguma kɛna Ɔlate mɔ Kristo Oti a Kĩ Bɛbɔa Tɔdɔ̃ a.”
Kĩ bati kĩĩ nu Petro fɔlɛtsa a, fɔha be paa. Foesũ bivia ye mɔ fɔtɔ banyanɛ bɛbã a kĩ, “Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, litsa kɛnɛ kĩ bɔkɛna?”

Ade Petro bi be kĩ, “Fusĩ kĩ mi kamɛ odi nyɛ odi ɛdani ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ ɛtɛ Baguma edo, lɔkɔa ɛtɛ mui kawɔla amaniɛ nɛ Yesu Kristo dĩ akũ ayekĩ Baguma aakɔa ye titikpa ete ye, ɛtɛ Baguma futetsa a kĩ fɔnyɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a lɛmɛ.
Kitonɛkĩ lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi kĩĩ a waa fɔkpa mi, mɔ mi babi mɔ bikĩ bito mɔ lugo, mɔ bikĩ boe Ɔlate Baguma aavɛ kĩ bɛya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ a.”
Ade Petro dɛ be pii ɛlɛ kĩ, “Minyɛ mi akũ mitomɛna sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ a kĩ saaya nɛ nviã katinya bati kpa kĩĩ akũ a kamɛ.”
Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ bati pii nɛ be kamɛ tɛ Petro fɔlɛtsa a bido, ade bɛwɔla be mui nɛ Yesu dĩ akũ a. Be lidede aana ndɛ mpim ɛlalɛ kĩ bɛkɔa bibumɛna batɛ badonɛ a akũ nɛ luwi a.
Bɛfɔnɛ be akũ awɛ bɛkpa fɔtɔ banyanɛ a bɛkatsa be fɔtsa, ade bɛkabɔa mpaɛ mɔ kanya kakpɔta mɔ ɔmɔa kakɛna a.
Nɛ kĩ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kakɛna awãwã fɔtsa mɔ nsɛntsɛlɛni pii sũ ni, fɔkɛna bati pii wãwã.
Batɛ badonɛ kĩĩ flee katsɛna luwi daa kakɛna lɛtsa mɔa, ade bɛkasɛ̃ be fɔtsa kakpa akũ a.
Ntɛ ɔsa bɛnɔ be akũ fɔtsa fudi ni, basɛ̃ sika a kakpa akũ nɛ be kamɛ odi nyɛ odi kasĩ onukpɛ̃.
Bɛkanaa Baguma afɔliɛ kabɔakɔ̃ a luwi daa, ade bɛkatsɛna nɛ kutsu kutsu kamɛ nɛ be tɔtɔ kamɛ kanya kakpɔta nɛ kawɔlɛ mɔ akũ kadɔla kamɛ a.
Ade bɛkanyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ, kamu ye lɛmɛ a. Bati flee kɔa obu bɛkpa be. Luwi daa boe Ɔlate akɔa bikĩ bɛtɛ bido a kĩ ɛtɛ a kayaabumɔ be.
Luwi a Petro mɔ Yohanes naa Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ Yudafɔ abɔa mpaɛ a kamɛ. Fɔ́ana ndɛ olobe tɔdɔũ ɛlalɛ kamɛ.

Kĩ biwo Asɔli Kɔla onyukpɛ̃ a kĩ bavɛ Onyukpɛ̃ Mɔ Kalɛ a, bɛmɔ́ onyole odi kĩ eveliveli kito ye lɛmawi, kĩ ɛwaa nɛ awã. Ye bati abɔɛ ye kanaayi nɛ awã luwi daa ayekĩ yaakawã sika katomɛna bikĩ batɛ̃ nɛ awã a sɛkɛ̃.
Kĩ Petro mɔ Yohanes atɛ̃ a, ɛwã be sika.
Bɛfɔ̃ bɛdza bɛdã ye koee ade Petro bi ye kĩ, “Dã boe anɛ kamɛ!”
Ade oti a dzɛla anɛ ɛdã be mɔ kakɔna kĩ baakpa ye litsedi.
Petro bi ye kĩ, “Nla sika sidima kĩ makpa nɔ, lɛmɛ maakpa nɔ lɛtsa a kĩ ndeĩ a! Nɛ Yesu Kristo Nazaretni dĩ akũ ni, mabi nɔ kĩ yidza kadza, katsã!”
Ade Petro pi oti a nɛ sɔmɔna kɔkpɔ ɛdzɛla ye a. Deedimɔapɛ ye abɔa mɔ anya flee de ɔsĩ,
ade ɛvɛnya ɛdza nɛ abɔa akũ, edo katokatɛ̃ awɛ a. Etomɔ be biwo nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ ade ɛkavɛnya kamu Baguma lɛmɛ a.
Bati a kĩ bɛna nɛ awã a mɔ́ ye kĩ ɛtsɛ̃, ade binu ayekĩ ɛkamu Baguma a.
Kĩ bɛmɔ́ biyi ɔsũ kĩ ye lɛkadzi nɛ Onyukpɛ̃ Mɔ Kalɛ ɔwɛ̃ kawã fɔtsa a, fɔnyɛnɛ be flee akũ ade bɛkɛna saa nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya nɛ ye akũ a.
Bati pii wula atsɛ bɛnaa be sɛkɛ̃ nɛ awã kĩ bavɛ Lɛgã Salomo Mblada nɛ Asɔli kɔla kamɛ a. Bɛyamɔ oti a kĩ ɛmanɛmɔ Petro mɔ Yohanes tsɛmɛtsɛmɛ ade ye kasaɛ a kɛna be saa a.

Kĩ Petro mɔ́ bati kĩĩ a ebi be kĩ, “Nwaɛ̃ amɛ Israelfɔ, litsa koũ liti lakɛna mi wãwã nɛ fɔtsa kĩĩ akũ? Nde sũ miadã boe bãã lɔmɔ ndɛ bati kpalɛwa bɔanɛ? Mitakɔna kĩ boe awɛ kɔbɛ̃ bɔkɔa bɔtsa oti kĩĩ!

Baguma a kĩ ɛnyɛ Abraham, Isak mɔ Yakob mɔ boe bawanyɔ Baguma a do ye Ɔsumunɛ Yesu obu. Ade ye obi Yesu mikɔa mikpa bɛkɔ a. Misĩ ye nɛ Pilato anɛ kamɛ, titɔ kĩ minyina ye nɛ kĩ Pilato wɛ kĩ yafɔnɛ ye awɛ kufɛ.
Misĩ oti kpĩĩ mɔ oti kpalɛwa a, ade mitunɔ kĩ ɛfɔnɛ owudini awɛ ɛkpa mi nɛ ye kadokɔ̃ a.
Mifɔ̃ bɛkɔ oti a kĩ yakpa nkpã a, lɛmɛ Baguma dzɛla ye etomɛna banɔkpa kamɛ. Boe awɛ a bɔmɔ́ ye mɔ anɛ.
Yesu dĩ kɔbɛ̃ akũ futo mɔ oti kĩ miamɔ kĩĩ, minyina lɛmɛ a na akũ ɔsĩ. Nɛ kĩ ɛtɛ Yesu edo sũ ni, boe Ɔlate tsa ye nɛ mi anɛ kamɛ.
“Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, finyaakĩĩ ĩnyina kĩ mi mɔ mi banɔkɔɛ̃ mikɛna fukĩĩ nɛ Yesu akũ nɛ katanyi kamɛ.
Lɛmɛ Baguma lɛ eyi anɛ kɔkɔɛ ɛtsãmɛna ye onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ flee akũ kĩ ye Kristo a aatsã lubo kamɔ kamɛ. Ade foesũ ɛfɔ̃ fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ lɔmɔ a.

Foesũ midani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ mimuniki miyaatómɔ Baguma ayekĩ yaakɔa mi tɔkpa ete mi. Ntɛ mikɛna lɔmɔ ni, fɔ́afɔ̃ mina hũhũ kamɛ kɔbɛ̃ mitomɛna boe Ɔlate sɛkɛ̃, ayekĩ yaado Yesu a kĩ ye nyɛ Kristo a nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃.

Foesũ midani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ mimuniki miyaatómɔ Baguma ayekĩ yaakɔa mi tɔkpa ete mi. Ntɛ mikɛna lɔmɔ ni, fɔ́afɔ̃ mina hũhũ kamɛ kɔbɛ̃ mitomɛna boe Ɔlate sɛkɛ̃, ayekĩ yaado Yesu a kĩ ye nyɛ Kristo a nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃.
Kɛnɛ kĩ Yesu ɛna nɛ ode kɛnawo lɔkɔ a kĩ Baguma lɔla lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa nɛ de osi akũ ndɛ ayekĩ ye onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ kpalɛwa a kĩ bidzi nkpã kɔkɔɛ a lɛ biyi a.
Kitonɛkĩ Mose lɛ kĩ, ‘Mi Ɔlate Baguma aanyɛ onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ odi ndɛ yĩ aye etomɛna mi kamɛ. Foesũ mitse lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ yaabi mi.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛláatse ye kalɛ ni, baanyɛ ye nɛ Baguma bati a kamɛ lɔkɔa bɛwɔla ye mɔ odu mɔ odu.’
“Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ flee a, kito Samuel akũ kɛyawo bikĩ bitomɔ ye a, lɛ biyi bɛnyamɛna lɔtɔ nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔlamɛna kaya nɛ nviã fuwi kĩĩ kamɛ a akũ.

Baguma apam a kĩ ɛkɛna mɔ mi bawanyɔ ɛtsãmɛna ye onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ akũ a nyɛ mi fude, ade mi aanya tsɛfã nɛ apam kĩĩ fɔtsa akũ a. Ebi Abraham kĩ fɔ́atsã ye ɔwa akũ yaakɔa nhila ɛkpa katinya kamɛ bati flee.
Foesũ kĩ Baguma pau ye Ɔsumunɛ a ni, mi sɛkɛ̃ ɛnya lɔtɔ edo ye kĩ ɛkɔa nhila ɛkpa mi, lɔkɔa ɛfɔ̃ mi kamɛ odi nyɛ odi ɛfɔ̃ tɔkpa kakɛna.”
Nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ Petro mɔ Yohanes dza bɛkabi bati a fɔlɛtsa a, Yudafɔ basɔfɔ badi, Asɔli kɔla a akũ ɔdãmɛnanɛ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ Zadukifɔ badi ya nɛ awã.
Kĩ binu kĩ Petro mɔ Yohanes katsa fɔtsa nɛ Yesu kayidza fɔlɛtsa akũ, katsa kĩ banɔkpa aayidza bidzi nkpã a, bɛna kalɔkpa paa!
Foesũ bipi be, lɛmɛ kĩ kade dɔ sũ ni, bɛkɔa be bido nɛ kɔla kamɛ kɛnawo kĩ kade nyina.
Lɛmɛ bati pii kĩ binu be fɔlɛtsa a badi tɛ kalɛ wĩ a bido. Banyole batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bɛtɛ bido a pɔ biwo ndɛ mpim elo.
Ade kĩ kade nyina a, Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ mbla batsanɛ a yakpɔta nɛ Yerusalem.
Bɛyatsa fɔlɔ mɔ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee Hana mɔ Kayafa, Yohanes mɔ Aleksandro mɔ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a akũ bati badi.
Ade bɛnyɛ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a bɛyadzɛla nɛ be anɛ kamɛ a. Bivia be kĩ, “Osi ɔwɔdabe akũ mikɛna fukĩĩ? Owei dĩ akũ ĩye ɔwa kɔbɛ̃ akũ mikɛna fɔtsa kĩĩ?”
Ade Petro kĩ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa tɛ ye kamɛ a yidza ɛlɛ kĩ, “Boe lɔtɔ banyanɛ mɔ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃,
ntɛ miwɛ fɔlɛtsa kamɛ kanyɛ nɛ lɛtsa wĩ a kĩ bɔkɛna bɔkpa oti kĩ eveliveli mɔ ayekĩ bɛtsa ye a akũ ni,
mitse mbi mi, lɔkɔa Israelfɔ flee binyi kĩ, Yesu Kristo Nazaretni a kĩ mibɔa nɛ asendua akũ, lɛmɛ Baguma dzɛla ye etomɛna banɔkpa kamɛ a, ye dĩ akũ fɔtsã sũ mɔ oti kĩĩ na akũ ɔsĩ.
Ade Yesu kĩĩ akũ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa lɛ kĩ,
‘De a kĩ fɔla bakenɛ sĩ a,
ade de lɛdani kɔla akũ de titiliwu a.’
Ye odi nyɛ bati Ɔtɛnɛ, ade otidziwa odima lɛláa tite akũ kĩ ye akũ bɔ́atsã bɔna nkpã a.”
Kĩ lɔtɔ banyanɛ mɔ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ a mɔ́ ayekĩ Petro mɔ Yohanes lɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ kɔbɛ̃, titɔ kĩ bɛtánaa sukuu malo ni, fɔkɛna be saa. Ade bɛmɔ́ biyi ɔsũ kĩ bɛtsã bitomɔ Yesu a.
Lɛmɛ kĩ bɛmɔ́ oti a kĩ bɛtsa a kĩ ɛdzɛ̃ nɛ be ɔwɛ̃ sũ ni, bɛtápuli bɛlɛ kadima.
Bibi be kĩ bɛnɛ nɛ katsɛnakɔ̃ a, kite be odi bɛkapi adzuni.
Badi via kĩ, “Litsa bɔakɛna bati kĩĩ? Bɔláapuli busĩ kĩ lɛtsa a kĩ bɛkɛna a lɛnyɛ́ awãwã fɔtsa, kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi nɛ Yerusalem nyina, enu kalɛ kĩĩ lɛmɛ.
Nɛ kĩ fɔlɛtsa kĩ fɔtagba sũ ni, mifɔ̃ budo be libe kĩ bɛtabi odima kalɛ nɛ Yesu dĩ akũ.”
Ade bibuki bɛvɛ be bɛnamɛna katsɛnakɔ̃ a bisĩ be mbla kĩ bɛtabuki bibi odima kalɛ ĩye bɛtsa fɔtsa nɛ Yesu dĩ akũ a.
Lɛmɛ Petro mɔ Yohanes kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Mi awɛ mibu fukĩ fɔfɛta nɛ Baguma anɛ kĩ bɔkɛna, mi ɔlɛdo butse, mbɔɛɛ kĩ Baguma ode?
Lɛtsa a kĩ de bɔmɔ́, bunu lɛmɛ a, bɔláapuli busua onukpɛ̃ nɛ de akũ budzi kulokulo.”
Ade awã mɔ́ banɔkɔɛ̃ a kã be anɛ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ, bɛfɔnɛ be awɛ a. Nɛ kĩ bati a flee kamu Baguma nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya a akũ sũ ni, bɛtápuli bɛna osi a kĩ ye akũ baatsã bɛvɛlɛ be sɔtɔ.
Oti a kĩ ye bɛtsa a, tɛ fɔba futeli tɛna.
Kĩ bɛfɔnɛ Petro mɔ Yohanes awɛ bɛnaa be bati sɛkɛ̃ a, bɛbɔa be amandiɛ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ a bi be a akũ.
Ade batɛ badonɛ a flee kpɔta bɛbɔa mpaɛ bɛvɛ Baguma bɛlɛ kĩ, “O boe Ɔlate, nɔ kĩ ɔkɛna tite mɔ ode, mpo mɔ fɔtsa a kĩ fudeĩ nɛ ye kamɛ,
nɔ lɛtsã Hũhũ Kpalɛwa akũ ɔfɔ̃ boe ɔwanyɔ Dawid, nɔ ɔsumunɛ lɛ eyi kĩ,
‘Nde sũ katinya kamɛ bati de adɔ̃
mɔ bati tsa fɔlɔ nɛ tɔkpa akũ pupulidza?
Katinya kamɛ fɔgã flee kɛna ɔmɔa
ade biyidza bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ boe Ɔlate mɔ ye Kristo akũ a.’
Fɔnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali kĩ Herodes mɔ Pontio Pilato mɔ Israelfɔ, mɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Israelfɔ a tsɛna nɛ ɔmatɔ kĩĩ kamɛ, ade biyidza bɛdza nɛ Yesu nɔ Ɔsumunɛ kpalɛwa a kĩ ɔbɔa tɔdɔ̃ a akũ a.
Lɛmɛ nɛ nɔ kɔbɛ̃, mɔ nɔ kawɛ, ɔkpa osi bɛkpɔta bɛkɛna lɛtsa kĩ ohihiɛ oyi a fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ.
Finyaakĩĩ, O boe Ɔlate, dã ɔhau a kĩ ye kamɛ bido boe, lɔkɔa kado boe nɔ adzuma bakɛnanɛ a ɔwɔlɛ, ayekĩ bɔ́apuli bɔlɛ nɔ kalɛ wĩ a nɛ katavila kamɛ.
Te awɛ nɛ nɔ bati akũ bɛna kasaɛ, kafɔ̃ awãwã fɔtsa mɔ nsɛntsɛlɛni pii fɔya nɛ nɔ Ɔsumunɛ Kpalɛwa Yesu dĩ akũ.”
Kĩ bɛbɔa mpaɛ biyua a, kɔla kĩ koe kamɛ bɛna a kuna. Hũhũ Kpalɛwa wo nɛ be flee kamɛ ade bido Baguma fɔlɛtsa kalɛ awɛ mɔ kɔbɛ̃ a.
Nɛ fuwi kĩĩ kamɛ a, batɛ badonɛ a flee kɛna ɔmɔa nɛ be fɔkɛnatsa mɔ adzuni kamɛ. Be kamɛ odima tákɔna kĩ ye odi la ye fɔtsa kĩ ɛna a, mbom fɔtsa kumɛkumɛ a nya be flee fude.
Fɔtɔ banyanɛ kĩĩ de lɛtsã mɔ kɔbɛ̃ kĩ boe Ɔlate Yesu kayidza kato banɔkpa kamɛ a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali, ade Baguma lukudɔ mɔ nhila na nɛ be flee akũ a.
Odima tánya ohiãni kitonɛkĩ bikĩ bɛna fɔla mɔ tite a nɔ foe.
Bɛkɔa sika a bɛma fɔtɔ banyanɛ a ade bɛsɛ̃ se bɛkpa odi nyɛ odi nɛ ye kasĩ onukpɛ̃ a.
Onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Yosef na nɛ awã. Ɛnyɛ Levini kĩ bɛma nɛ Kipro tite akũ. Fɔtɔ banyanɛ a te ye dĩ kĩ Barnaba, dĩ a kayɔ nyɛ Ekĩ yado Bati Ɔwɔlɛ.
Barnaba malo nɔ ye tite ɛkɔa sika a ɛma fɔtɔ banyanɛ a.
Lɛmɛ onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Anania mɔ ɔtsɔ̃ Safira na nɛ be kamɛ, be malo bɛnɔ be tite tidi.
Anania kɔa sika a sidi ɛkɔla ade ɛkɔa se nkaɛ ɛma fɔtɔ banyanɛ a. Ɔtsɔ̃ Safira nyina foe akũ litsedi ade etunɔ kĩ bakɛna lɔmɔ a.
Ade Petro via ye kĩ, “Anania, nde sũ ɔfɔ̃ Abonsam nya nɔ akũ, ɔma fɔvã ɔkpa Hũhũ Kpalɛwa, fɔfɔ̃ ɔkɔla tite a kĩ ɔnɔ a sika a sidi?
Nɔ tide nyɛ tite a fɔmɔ ɔnɔ te, sika a kĩ ɔtɛ a lɛmɛ nɔ side sanɛ. Litsa lɛfɔ̃ ɔbɔɛ adzuni kpa kĩĩ odu? Nnɛ́ boe batidziwa ɔkɛ, mbom Baguma ɔkɛ!”
Kĩ Anania sila enu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ pɛ, esinya ɛtɔ nɛ tite eku. Libe wo bati flee a kĩ binu fɔlɛtsa a paa.
Bapopo a kĩ bɛna nɛ be kamɛ a kɔa lima bisuli ye bɛbɔɛ bɛnabila.
Ɔtsɔ̃ yanɛ ɛta nɛ awã ndɛ ndɔũhuilɛ ɛlalɛ liti, kĩ enyína lɛtsa kĩ lɛya lɛtɛ̃ a.
Ade Petro via ye kĩ, “Bi yĩ. Kĩ mimɔ nɔ ɔnyɔ minɔ tite a sika a kĩ bise mi a ni, se a flee nɛ awĩ a?”
Otsole a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oo, ade se a flee nɛ awã a.”
Foesũ Petro bi ye kĩ, “Nde sũ mimɔ nɔ ɔnyɔ mikɛna onukpɛ̃ mɔa miasɔ boe Ɔlate Hũhũ midã? Dã, bapopo a kĩ bɛbɔɛ nɔ ɔnyɔ bɛnabila a dzɛ̃ nɛ onyukpɛ̃ finyaakĩĩ. Baabɔɛ nɔ malo bɛnaabila.”
Deedimɔapɛ otsole a ka ɛtɔ nɛ tite, eku. Ade kĩ bapopo a yamɔ kĩ eku ɛwaa a, bɛbɔɛ ye malo bɛnabila nɛ ɔnyɔ ɔwɛ̃.
Foesũ libe paa wo batɛ badonɛ a flee mɔ be flee a kĩ binu lɛtsa kĩ lɛya nɛ awã a.
Nɛ lɔkɔ kĩĩ kamɛ a fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kakɛna awãwã mɔ nsɛntsɛlɛni fɔtsa pii nɛ bati a kamɛ. Batɛ badonɛ a flee katsɛna nɛ Yudafɔ Asɔli kɔla kakɔa kĩ bavɛ Salomo Mblada a kamɛ.
Bikĩ bɛtána nɛ batɛ badonɛ a kamɛ a tádo ɔwɔlɛ kĩ bafuã be, titɔ kĩ bakɔa obu kakpa be malo.
Bati pii, batsole mɔ banyole, dani ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ bɛtɛ boe Ɔlate bido.
Ade bati pii bɔɛ be basɔnɛ mɔ tɛpa mɔ tɛkɛna bɛnayi nɛ kɔya nɛ awã kĩ ntɛ Petro atɛ̃ mɔ ye kuyo ako nɛ be akũ ni, lɔkɔa bɛsaɛ.
Ade bɛkɔa basɔnɛ mɔ bikĩ hũhũ kpa deĩ nɛ be kamɛ a bitomɛna tɛmatɔ a kĩ tisinya Yerusalem a bɛyamɛna bɛtsa be flee a.
Ade Yudafɔ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee mɔ bikĩ bideĩ nɛ ye akũ kĩ bito Zadukifɔ katsu kamɛ a yɔɔla anɛ nɛ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a akũ a. Foesũ bike otse kĩ baakɛna litsedi.
Nɛ foesũ bipi be bɛnado nɛ kɔla kamɛ.
Lɛmɛ ke lɛnyɛ a, boe Ɔlate ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ odi yabinya opunu a, ɛnyɛ be, ade ebi be kĩ,
“Minaa Yudafɔ Asɔli kɔla a kamɛ lɔkɔa mibi bati fɔlɛtsa a flee nɛ nkpã vɔɛ̃ kĩĩ akũ!”
Foesũ kĩ kade nyina a bɛnawo nɛ Asɔli kɔla a kamɛ ade biyi fɔtsa katsa kayɔ nɛ awã a.
Lɔkɔa na kamɛ, Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a mɔ bikĩ bitomɔ ye a, mɔ Yudafɔ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ a tsɛna, ade bido bikĩ badã asɔli kɔla akũ kĩ bɛnaanyɛ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a nɛ kɔla a kamɛ bɛyamɛna.
Lɛmɛ kĩ bati a naa awã a, bɛtámɔ be, foesũ bimuniki bɛyabi be kĩ,
“Kĩ bɔnaa a, bɛbalɛ kɔla a kpakplakpa ade bikĩ badã kɔla a akũ lɛmɛ dzɛ̃ nɛ onyukpɛ̃ a pɛpɛɛpɛ a. Lɛmɛ kĩ bubinya kɔla a bati a kamɛ odima lɛláa koe kamɛ.”
Kĩ asɔli kɔla akũ ɔdãmɛnanɛ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a nu kalɛ kĩĩ a, akũ dzuli be ade bɛkakɔna lɛtsa kĩ lɛya nɛ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a akũ a.
Ade odi yabi be kĩ, “Bati a kĩ mipi mido nɛ kɔla kamɛ a, deĩ nɛ asɔli kɔla kamɛ ade bɛlamɛna bati fɔtsa katsa nɛ awã a.”
Nɛ awã a Asɔli Kɔla ɔdãmɛnanɛ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ ye bati yidza bɛnakpã be bɛyamɛna. Nɛ kĩ bivila kĩ bati aanɔ be boe sũ ni, bɛtákpã be nɛ ɔhɛ kamɛ.
Kĩ bɛkpã fɔtɔ banyanɛ a bɛyamɛna a, bɛfɔ̃ bɛdza nɛ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ a anɛ kamɛ.
Ade Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a via be kĩ,
“Bɔtábi mi kĩ mitabuki milɛ kadima nɛ Yesu dĩ akũ a? Lɛmɛ migbamɛna fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ flee nɛ Yerusalem, ade miawɛ kĩ miakɔa ye wuda sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ a mite nɛ boe akũ a.”
Awã na Petro mɔ fɔtɔ banyanɛ bɛbã a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Kɛnɛ kĩ bɔabu Baguma, nnɛ́ batidziwa.
Yesu a kĩ mifɔ̃ bɛbɔa nɛ asendua akũ mikɔ ye a, boe bawanyɔ Baguma dzɛla ye etomɛna kanɔkpa, edzi nkpã.
Baguma kpa ye kadzikɔ̃nɔkɔɛ̃ nɛ ye sɔmɔna, ade ɛkɛna ye Ɔkpãnɛ mɔ Ɔtɛnɛ, ayekĩ Israelfɔ aana osi bɛdani be tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ lɔkɔa bɛna be titikpa kakɔakate.
Ade boe mɔ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a, kĩ ɛnyɛ Baguma futetsa kĩ ɛkpa bikĩ babu ye a, bɔnyɛ foe akũ adansifɔ a.”
Kĩ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ a nu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, fɔfɔ̃ bɛna kalɔkpa paa ade bɛwɛ kĩ bakɔ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a.

Lɛmɛ Farisifɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a kamɛ ɔmɔa kĩ bavɛ Gamaliel sua be osi. Ɛnyɛ fɔtsa ɔtsanɛ nɛ Mose mbla akũ, ade bati a flee akɔa obu baũ kakpa ye a. Eyidza ɛdza ade ɛlɛ kĩ bɛfɔ̃ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a bɛkpa be osi sukuloo bɛkɔna fɔlɛtsa a akũ.
Ade ke liti ebi be kĩ, “Nwaɛ̃ Israelfɔ, midã kadã wĩ nɛ lɛtsa kĩ miawɛ kĩ miakɛna nɛ bati kĩĩ akũ a!

Míate anɛ kĩ lɔkɔ lidi kĩ lɛyatɛ̃ a, onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Teuda yakɛna ye akũ kĩ oti titiliwu odi odu yanɛ. Bati ndɛ ɔha ɛna tomɔ ye nɛ liti. Ade kĩ bɛkɔ ye a bikĩ bitomɔ ye a flee pansam, ade ye fɔlɛtsa a lɛmɛ wɔ a.
Ke liti, nɛ bati kakã lɔkɔ a, Yuda, Galileani a yayidza, ɛvɛlɛ bati kɔdabu ebumɔ ye akũ. Kĩ ye malo ɛyaku a bikĩ bitomɔ ye a flee yalɛ, ade ye fɔlɛtsa a lɛmɛ wɔ a.
Foesũ lɛtsa kĩ mabi mi nyɛ kĩ mifɔnɛ bati kĩĩ awɛ bɛnaa. Ntɛ be fɔtsa katsa a mɔ bati fude fɔanɛ ni, owi lɛláabuna mɔ fɔ́awɔ.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ Baguma sɛkɛ̃ futo kɔ̃ ni, bɔláapuli busua foe osi. Ntɛ mitádã kadã wĩ ni, luwi lidi míamɔ kĩ Baguma awɛ akũ buyidza bɔdza.”
Katsɛnakɔ̃ bati a tɛ Gamaliel kalɛ a.
Foesũ bɛvɛ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a bimuniki bɛya ade bibo be a. Bisĩ be mbla kĩ bɛtabuki bɛlɛ kadima nɛ Yesu dĩ akũ dadaada, ade bɛfɔnɛ be awɛ a.
Kĩ bɛdzakũ banaa a, bɛmɔ́ kawɔlɛ pii kitonɛkĩ Baguma bu be ndɛ bati kĩ bɛfɛta bɛkpa lubo kamɔ mɔ kɔnyɔãkado nɛ Yesu dĩ sũ.
Nɛ fukĩĩ liti a, luwi daa bɛkatsa fɔtsa nɛ Asɔli kɔla kamɛ, mɔ bati tɔtɔ kamɛ, kade lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ akũ kĩ Yesu nyɛ Kristo a.
Ke liti a, kĩ fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ a lidede lamɛna kapɔ kabu a, ɔdzɛ yawo nɛ Yudafɔ a kĩ balɛ Tigriki mɔ Yudafɔ mɔawɛ a kayite. Grikifɔ a tsa kĩ ntɛ bɛsɛ̃ funitsã ni, baákpa be bakunawa.
Nɛ foesũ fɔtɔ banyanɛ ewua-nviã a vɛ batɛ badonɛ a flee bɛkpɔta ade bibi be kĩ, “Fɔtáfɛta kĩ bɔakɔa lɔkɔ a kĩ bɔalɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa bɔkɛna funitsã kasɛ̃ lɔkɔ.

Foesũ nwaɛ̃ amɛ, midã mi kamɛ minyɛ banyole evũkɔnɔ kĩ binyina kadi, kĩ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa lɛmɛ yi be kamɛ, lɔkɔa bɔkɔa adzuma kĩĩ budo nɛ be awɛ, ayekĩ boe mɔawɛ a bɔ́ana aya bɔkpa mpaɛ kabɔa mɔ Baguma fɔlɛtsa a kalɛ.”

Foesũ nwaɛ̃ amɛ, midã mi kamɛ minyɛ banyole evũkɔnɔ kĩ binyina kadi, kĩ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa lɛmɛ yi be kamɛ, lɔkɔa bɔkɔa adzuma kĩĩ budo nɛ be awɛ, ayekĩ boe mɔawɛ a bɔ́ana aya bɔkpa mpaɛ kabɔa mɔ Baguma fɔlɛtsa a kalɛ.”
Fɔlɛtsa a de bati a flee kawɔlɛ ade bɛnyɛ Stefano, oti kĩ edeĩ katɛkado, kĩ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa lɛmɛ tɛ ye kamɛ, Filipo, Prokoro, Nikanora, Timona, Parmena mɔ Nikolao, kĩ ɛdani ɛkɛna Yudani. Eto Antiokia.
Bɛnyɛ bati evũkɔnɔ a kĩ bɛpau a bɛtsa fɔtɔ banyanɛ a ade bɛbɔa mpaɛ nɛ be lɔlɔ, bite awɛ nɛ be akũ a.
Bati pii tɛ Baguma kalɛ wĩ a. Fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ nɛ Yerusalem danɛ kapɔ ade Yudafɔ basɔfɔ a pii lɛmɛ dani bɛtɛ Yesu bido a.
Stefano kĩ Baguma kɔbɛ̃ mɔ sɛmɛ kalɛ yi ye kamɛ a, kɛna awãwã mɔ nsɛntsɛlɛni fɔtsa pii nɛ bati a kamɛ.
Yudafɔ a kĩ bɛnyɛ be nɛ awɔba kamɛ a kĩ bito Kirene mɔ Aleksandria bibumɔ bikĩ bito Kilikia mɔ Asia yidza nɛ Stefano akũ, bɛkavɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa mɔ ye.
Lɛmɛ Baguma Hũhũ kpa Stefano nyansã mɔ kadikanyi paa foesũ ntɛ ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla ni, be kamɛ odima lápuli katɛ ye atsindze.
Foesũ bɛkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ badi kĩ bɛma fɔvã kĩ, “Bunu kĩ Stefano lɛ fubusuotsa nɛ Mose mɔ Baguma akũ.”
Ye onukpɛ̃ katsua kĩĩ fɔ̃ bati a, banɔkɔɛ̃ a, mɔ mbla batsanɛ a na kalɔkpa paa, ade Yudafɔ mbla batsanɛ a yapi Stefano bɛnamɛna Ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ katsɛnakɔ̃ a.
Bati a kĩ bitsua Stefano onukpɛ̃ a yama fɔvã bɛlɛ kĩ, “Oti kĩĩ alɛ kɔdzɛla katia Asɔli Kɔla Kpalɛwa mɔ Mose mbla a luwi nyɛ luwi.
Bunu lɛmɛ kĩ ɛlɛ kĩ Yesu Nazaretni a aaveli Asɔli kɔla kĩĩ lɔkɔa ɛdani tɛmaniɛ flee a kĩ Mose yi ɛkpa boe a.”
Lɔkɔ a na kamɛ bati a flee kĩ bɛna nɛ katsɛnakɔ̃ a ke anɛ nɛ Stefano akũ ade bɛmɔ́ kĩ ye anɛ kamɛ dani ndɛ ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ ade aye a.
Ade Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a via Stefano kĩ, “Lɛtsa a kĩ bɛlamɛna kalɛ nɛ nɔ akũ a ni, nuwĩ fɔanɛ?”
Stefano kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nda amɛ mɔ nwãɛ amɛ, mitse katse wĩ! Fɔmɔ boe ɔwanyɔ Abraham aatu ɛnaadzi nɛ Haram tite akũ a, Baguma Kpalɛwa a nyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa ye nɛ Mesopotamia tite akũ.
Ade awã ebi ye kĩ, ‘Yidza kafɔnɛ nɔ katete bati mɔ tite a na kanaa tite a kĩ maatsa nɔ a akũ.’
“Foesũ ɛdzakũ nɛ Kaldea tite akũ ɛnadzi nɛ Haram kɛnawo lɔkɔ a kĩ ɔlɛga ku. Ade ke Baguma kpã ye ɛyamɛna nɛ awã kĩ midzi nviã kĩĩ a.
Baguma tákpa Abraham tite kanyakɔ̃ sɛnɛta mɔa malo kĩ tɛnya ye tide. Lɛmɛ ɛlɛ eyi kĩ yaakɔa tite a na ɛkpa ye tɛnya ye mɔ ye babi mɔ bawa tide, titɔ kĩ nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ malo ɛtáma obi odima!
Lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma bi ye nyɛ kĩ, ‘Nɔ bawa aanya banɔvɔɛ̃ nɛ tite bɛbã akũ, bɛnya abawa bɛkɛna be tɛnya futeli ɔha ɛna kpɔũ.’
Ebuki ɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Maadzɛ mɔ bati a kĩ be baasum a. Ke liti baadzakũ nɛ tite a akũ bɛyaasum yĩ nɛ awĩ kĩĩ.’

Ade ke Baguma kɛna lɛkpati katsua ndɛ apam aye nɛ Abraham mɔ Ye Baguma kayite a. Nɛ foesũ kĩ Abraham ma Isak a etsua ye lɛkpati kĩ ɛtɛ fuwi ɛlɛ̃ a. Isak lɛmɛ ma Yakob, Yakob lɛmɛ ma babi ewua-nviã kĩ bɛnyɛ Yudafɔ bawanyɔ ewua-nviã a.
“Yakob babi kĩĩ yɔɔlɛ anɛ nɛ be ɔwaɛ̃ Yosef akũ ade bipi ye bɛnɔ bɛkpa bati badi bɛkpã ye bɛnamɛna Egipte tite akũ a. Lɛmɛ Baguma dã ye akũ,
ade ɛnyɛ ye etomɛna ye lubo kamɔ mɔ ayɔlɔhɔ kamɛ a. Baguma kpa ye nyansã mɔ kɔnyakamɔ baũ foesũ Egiptefɔ Lɛgã Farao wɛ ye kalɛ ade ɛkɔa ye ɛkɛna ye tite mɔ lɛgã tɔtɔ a akũ ɔdãmɛnanɛ a.
“Lɔkɔ lidi kamɛ ni, kɔlɛ kpale ya nɛ Egipte mɔ Kanan tite flee akũ kĩ fɔyamɛna lubo kamɔ beblebee kĩ boe bawanyɔ tána funitsã.
Ade kĩ Yakob nu kĩ fugbanɔ na nɛ Egipte a, edo ye babi lɔtɔnyade a bɛnaaya funitsã bɛyamɛna.
Kĩ Yakob babi buki bɛnaa awã lɛyade kĩ banaaya funitsã a, Yosef nyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa bawaɛ̃, ade ɛnyɛ be lɛmɛ ɛtsa Lɛgã Farao a.
Yosef bi be kĩ ntɛ bɛnaa ni, bɛkpã ɔlɛga Yakob mɔ ye akũ bati flee a kĩ baana ndɛ bati aduesɔũ-elo bɛyamɛna nɛ Egipte.
Foesũ Yakob mɔ ye babi dzakũ bɛnaa Egipte bɛnadzi nɛ awã kɛnawo kĩ biku.
Ke liti a, bɛkɔa be banɔkpa bɛyamɛna nɛ Sekem bɛyabila nɛ linikɛ a kĩ Abraham ya mɔ sika etomɛna Hamor babi sɛkɛ̃ a kamɛ.
“Kĩ lɔkɔ a kĩ Baguma sui mɔ Abraham wo ɔtɔ kiyua a, Israelfɔ nɛ Egipte a ma bɛsa beblebee.
Fɔyaya lɛmɛ kĩ lɛgã vɔɛ̃ Farao a kĩ ɛnya Egipte akũ a tányi Yosef kɔlaa.
Farao kĩĩ tsã tɛdake kamɛ ɛkɛna boe bawanyɔ tɛnya, ɛfɔ̃ bɛnyɛ be babi bakɔkɔa nɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ ayekĩ baaku.
“Ade lɔkɔ a na kamɛ bɛma Mose a. Obisɛ̃ kĩĩ kalɛ kadã paa. Nɛ foesũ ye bamanɛ kɔla ye nɛ kɔla kamɛ tidetɔ ɛlalɛ.
Kĩ bɛnyɛ ye nɛ be akũ a, Farao obitsole namɔ ye ɛbɔɛ, ade ɛdɔɔla ye ndɛ ye mɔawɛ sɛmɛ kamɛ obi a.
Bɛtsa ye Egiptefɔ kadikanyi mɔ be kadzi kamɛ fɔkɛnatsa a flee, ade ɛyabo anɛ ɛkɛna oti a. Ɛna ovio nɛ kɔdzɛla kalɛ mɔ fɔkɛnatsa pii kamɛ.
“Kĩ Mose tɛ futeli tɛna a, kakɔna wo nɛ ye kamɛ kĩ ɛnaasɛla ye bawaɛ̃ Israelfɔ ɛdã.
Kĩ ewo awã a, ɛmɔ́ kĩ Egipteni odi lamɛna Israelni odi awɔda kakɛna foesũ ɛnabumɔ Israelni a, ade ebo Egipteni a ɛkɔ a.
Mose kɔna kĩ bawaɛ̃ a aanu foe kayɔ kĩ Baguma lɛwɛ kĩ yatsã ye akũ ɛtɛ be lɛmɛ bɛtánu foe kayɔ lɔmɔ.
Kĩ kade nyina a, ebuki ɛmɔ́ kĩ Israelfɔ bati nviã lamɛna kavũ. Ɛnaakpɔla lɛma a ade ebi be kĩ, ‘Midã, bawaɛ̃ mɔ bawaɛ̃ mianɛ, nde sũ miakɛna akũ awɔda lɔmɔ?’
“Lɛmɛ ekĩ ɛwɛ sɔwã a du Mose ɛdzɛla nɛ ɔɔwɛ̃ ade evia ye kĩ, ‘Fɔɔdabe tsɛla nɔ? Owei lɛkɛna nɔ boe akũ ɔnyanɛ mɔ fɔlɛtsa ɔdzɛnɛ?
Mbɔɛ awɛ kĩ akɔ yĩ ndɛ ayekĩ ɔkɔ Egipteni a kadzɔ a?’
Kĩ Mose nu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, libe wo ye paa, foesũ elo ɛnaa Midianfɔ tite akũ, awã kĩ ɛnadzi ndɛ ɔnɔvɔɛ̃ aye, ɛma babinyole nviã.
“Futeli tɛna liti a, ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ odi nyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa Mose nɛ tuwĩ mɔ fu kĩ tɛkatɛ̃ nɛ kɔsa a kĩ kufuã Sinai ɔtɔ a kamɛ.
Kĩ Mose mɔ́ fukĩĩ a, fɔkɛna ye saa foesũ efuã kĩ yanaadã lɛtsa a kadã wĩ. Ade Baguma vɛ ye ebi ye kĩ,
‘Yĩ nyɛ nɔ bawanyɔ a Baguma, Abraham mɔ Isak mɔ Yakob Baguma.’ Mose katila bliblibli mɔ libe foesũ ɛtápuli ebuki ɛdã awã kadã wĩ.
“Ade Baguma bi ye kĩ, ‘Nyɛ nɔ mpabua nɛ abɔa, kitonɛkĩ awã kĩ ɔdzɛ̃ a ni, tite kpalɛwa tanɛ.
Ɔnɔkɔali mmɔ́ yĩ bati a lubo kamɔ mɔ tɛnya a kĩ bakɛna be nɛ Egipte tite akũ a. Nnu be kɔnyakabe foesũ ĩya kĩ mayaanyɛ be. Finyaakĩĩ ya, lɔkɔa ndo nɔ fɔtɔ nɛ Egipte.’

“Ade Mose a kĩ bisĩ kĩĩ bivia kĩ, ‘Owei lɛkɔa nɔ ɛdzɛla ndɛ boe akũ ɔnyanɛ mɔ fɔlɛtsa ɔdzɛnɛ?’ Ade ye Mose kĩĩ a Baguma do kĩ ɛnaanya be akũ, lɔkɔa ɛnyɛ be nɛ ɔhau kamɛ fɔtsãmɛna ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a kĩ ɛnyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa ye nɛ tuwĩ a kĩ tɛkatɛ̃ a kamɛ a.
Mose kpã bati a bɛdzakũ nɛ Egipte. Ɛkɛna awãwã fɔtsa pii nɛ Egipte mɔ Mpo Ngbã a abuĩ mɔ kɔsa kamɛ nɛ be osi katsã futeli tɛna a flee kamɛ.
“Ade Mose kĩĩ mɔapɛ a libi Israelfɔ kĩ, ‘Baguma aanyɛ onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ odi ndɛ ayekĩ ɛnyɛ yĩ a etomɛna mimɔa a kamɛ.’
Mose nyɛ oti kĩ ɛna nɛ boe bawanyɔ a sɛkɛ̃ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ Israelfɔ na nɛ kɔsa kamɛ a. Ade ye mɔ Baguma fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ lɛmɔ kɔdzɛla nɛ Sinai ɔtɔ akũ, ɛtɛ Baguma nkpã kalɛ a ɛma boe a.
“Lɛmɛ boe bawanyɔ táwɛ kĩ batse Mose, mbom bisĩ ye, ade bɛwɛ kĩ bamuniki bɛnaa Egipte tite akũ a.
Foesũ bibi ɔwaɛ̃ Aron kĩ, ‘Kɛna baviɔ̃ kĩ baakpã boe, kakpa boe, kitonɛkĩ bunyína lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya nɛ Mose a kĩ ɛkpã boe etomɛna Egipte a akũ.’
Ade ke bɛmɛ baviɔ̃ ndɛ ɔnantsue obi aye, bɛkabɔa afɔliɛ kakpa ye a. Bɛmɔ́ kawɔlɛ bɛnya luwi bɛkpa lɛtsa a kĩ be mɔa bɛkɔa awɛ bɛkɛna a.
Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ Baguma muniki nɛ be liti, ɛfɔ̃ bɛkasum suwa mɔ odetɔ mɔ fusibii, ndɛ ayekĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ Ovoli a kamɛ kĩ,
‘Israelfɔ, nnɛ́ yĩ mikɔa bayaɛ mibɔa afɔliɛ mikpa
nɛ futeli tɛna a kĩ mina nɛ kɔsa kamɛ a.
Mbom Molok pata mɔ Romfa fusibii
baviɔ̃ a kĩ mikɛna a mikabɔa afɔliɛ kakpa.
Foesũ maafɔ̃ bipili mi ndom bɛkpã mi bɛnamɛna mɔ lugo nɛ Babilonia liti flee.’
“Boe bawanyɔ na patampa kĩ ye kamɛ Baguma kanyɛ akũ katsa be nɛ kɔsa a kamɛ. Bike patampa kĩĩ ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma nyɛ ɛtsa Mose kĩ ɛkɛna pɛpɛɛpɛ a.

Patampa kĩĩ, kĩ boe bawanyɔ tɛ bitomɛna be balɛga sɛkɛ̃ a na nɛ be awɛ, nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ Yosua kpã be a, ade bɛtɛ bati a kĩ Baguma blɔmɛna nɛ be lɔtɔ a tite a. Patampa kĩĩ na nɛ be kamɛ kɛyawo Lɛgã Dawid lɔkɔ.
Dawid fɔkɛnatsa wo Baguma anɛ, ade evia Baguma kĩ ɛkpa ye osi eke kadzikɔ̃ wĩ ɛkpa Yakob Baguma a.
Lɛmɛ Salomo lɛyake kɔla a ɛkpa Baguma.
“Lɛmɛ Baguma Kpale ládzi nɛ fɔla kĩ batidziwa ke a kamɛ. Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ lɛ kĩ,
‘Ode nyɛ yĩ lɛgãkpo,
ade tite lɛmɛ nyɛ yĩ abɔa katekɔ̃ a.
Kɔla kɔɔdabe odu míapuli mike mikpa yĩ,
mbɔɛɛ kadzikɔ̃ mɔ nlá?
Nnɛ́ yĩ mɔawɛ lɛkɛna fukĩĩ bamɛ flee a?’ ”
Ade Stefano buki ebi be kĩ, “Bati kĩ mideĩ atɔ ɔsĩ mianɛ! Misĩ kĩ míatse Baguma kalɛ ndɛ ayekĩ mi balɛga kɛna a. Daa miayidza kadza nɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa akũ.
Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ ɔɔdabe mɔ mi bawanyɔ tátomɔ ye liti? Bɛkɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a kĩ bɛlɛ biyi kĩ Oti a Kĩ Bɛpau kĩ ye akũ kpalɛ a aaya. Oti Kĩ Bɛpau kĩĩ malo, minyɛ ye mikpa bɛkɔ ye.
Ɔnɔkɔali fɔanɛ kĩ mi a kĩ mitɛ Baguma mbla mitomɛna ye ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ sɛkɛ̃ a, misĩ ye akũ kakɛna.”
Kĩ binu Stefano fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ nɛ be akũ a, be tɔwɔlɛ hulu, ade bɛkaba adɔ̃ dzadzadza mɔ kalɔkpa a.
Lɛmɛ Stefano kĩ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa yi ye kamɛ, dzɛla anɛ ɛdã ode koee ade ɛmɔ Baguma kukũkpalɛ a mɔ Yesu kĩ ɛdzɛ̃ nɛ Baguma sɔmɔna a.
Ade ebi be kĩ, “Midã! Mamɔ kĩ odetɔ́ kamɛ binya ade Otidziwa Obi a dzɛ̃ nɛ Baguma sɔmɔna a!”
Bati a bɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba, bisua atɔ ade biwula atsɛ bɛnapi ye a.
Bɛvɛlɛ ye bɛnɛmɛna nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ ade bɛtalɛ ye boe a. Bati a kĩ bɛvɛlɛ ye bɛnɛmɛna a nyɛ be tɛtadiɛ wulaa biyi nɛ opopo odi kĩ bavɛ Saulo sɛkɛ̃.
Kĩ bɛkatalɛ Stefano boe a, ɛbɔa mpaɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate Yesu, tɛ yĩ hũhũ.”
Ade ke eke aduli ɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba ɛlɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, tase be tɔkpa kĩĩ akũ kɔtɔ!” Kĩ ɛlɛ fukĩĩ eyua a, ade eku a.
Lɔkɔ a kĩ bɛkɔ Stefano a, Saulo mɔ́ kawɔlɛ nɛ ye wuda akũ.
Kito luwi a na, ade bido batɛ badonɛ a liti katomɛna awɛ nɛ Yerusalem a. Batɛ badonɛ a flee pansam bilo bɛnaa Yudea mɔ Samaria tite akũ. Lɛmɛ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kɔ̃ kahɔ nɛ awã.
Bikĩ bavila Baguma a kamɛ badi bɔɛ Stefano ɔnɔkpa a bɛnabila, ade bibe ye paa a.
Ade Saulo kɔa ete nɛ ye akũ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ yakɔ batɛ badonɛ a. Foesũ ɛkawo nɛ tɔtɔ tidi nyɛ tidi kamɛ kapili batsole mɔ banyole flee kavɛlɛ be kanaado nɛ kɔla kamɛ.
Lɛmɛ batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bilo nɛ Yerusalem a tsã bimini bɛkalɛ kalɛ wĩ a nɛ Yesu akũ.
Ade Filipo naa Samaria ɔmatɔ odi kamɛ ɛnabi bati a Kalɛ Wĩ nɛ Kristo akũ a.
Bati pii tse ye fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ a nɛ awãwã fɔtsa a kĩ ɛkɛna bɛmɔ́ a sũ.
Ɛblɔmɛna hũhũ kpa etomɛna bati pii kamɛ. Hũhũ kpa a kabɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba ntɛ banɛ nɛ bati a kamɛ. Ɛtsa bati kĩ biveliveli mɔ bikĩ bɛnɛ lɛkpɛ̃ lɛmɛ.
Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ Samaria ɔmatɔ a kamɛ bati mɔ kawɔlɛ paa!
Kanɔkɔnɛ ɔdãnɛ odi kĩ bavɛ Simon na nɛ Samaria ɔmatɔ a kamɛ Ye kanɔkɔnɛ kadã a kakɛna bati wãwã kĩ fɔfɔ̃ yabu ye akũ kĩ oti mɔ kɔbɛ̃ odi odu yanɛ.
Samariafɔ batsole mɔ banyole flee abu ye nɛ fukĩĩ sũ, ade balɛ nɛ ye akũ kĩ, “Ye nyɛ Baguma kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ bavɛ Kɔbɛ̃ Kpalede a.”
Nɛ ayekĩ ye kanɔkɔnɛ kadã awo be anɛ sũ ni, bati atse ye ɔlɛdo.
Lɛmɛ finyaakĩĩ kɔ̃, bɛtɛ Filipo fɔtsa katsa nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanya akũ a nɛ Yesu Kristo dĩ akũ bido. Nɛ foesũ batsole mɔ banyole pii tɛ mui kawɔla amaniɛ.
Simon kĩĩ lɛmɛ tɛ edo ade ɛtɛ mui kawɔla amaniɛ a. Ɛtsã etomɔ Filipo bɛkamini ade Filipo awãwã fɔtsa kpale a kĩ ɛkakɛna a fɔ̃ akũ dzuli ye a!
Kĩ fɔtɔ banyanɛ nɛ Yerusalem nu kĩ Samariafɔ tɛ Baguma kalɛ a bido a, bido Petro mɔ Yohanes kĩ bɛnaasɛla be.
Kĩ biwo awã a, bɛbɔa mpaɛ nɛ batɛ badonɛ vɔɛ̃ a lɔlɔ kĩ bɛtɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a.
Titɔ kĩ bɛkɛna be mui kawɔla amaniɛ a nɛ Yesu dĩ akũ malo ni, bɛtátɛ tɔ̃ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a.
Foesũ Petro mɔ Yohanes te awɛ nɛ be akũ ade bɛtɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a.
Kĩ Simon mɔ́ kĩ awɛ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a ate nɛ bati akũ fɔmɔ batɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a sũ ni, ɛbɔɛ sika ɛkpa,
ade ebi be kĩ, “Mikpa yĩ kɔbɛ̃ kĩĩ odu ayekĩ ntɛ nte awɛ nɛ bati akũ ni, baana Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a.”
Ade Petro bi ye kĩ, “Mimɔ nɔ sika a flee míawɔ, kitonɛkĩ ɔkɔna kĩ aapuli ɔya Baguma futetsa mɔ sika.
Ɔláapuli ɔkɛna adzuma kĩĩ, kitonɛkĩ nɔ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ lɛ́waa yededeede nɛ Baguma anɛ.
Fɔnɛ adzuni kpa a kĩ ewo nɛ nɔ kamɛ a awɛ kabɔa mpaɛ kakpa boe Ɔlate, ɔsa yaakɔa nɔ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kakɔna kpa kĩ ete nɔ,
kitonɛkĩ mmɔ́ kĩ anɛngbã mɔ titikpa kakɛna nya nɔ kamɛ kamɛ!”
Ade Simon bi Petro mɔ Yohanes kĩ, “Mike boe Ɔlate aduli mikpa yĩ ayekĩ kadumu fɔlɛtsa kĩ milɛ kĩĩ fudima lɛlaaya nɛ yĩ akũ.”
Kĩ Petro mɔ Yohanes lɛ boe Ɔlate kalɛ wĩ a, bidi adansiɛ lɛmɛ nɛ ke akũ nɛ Samaria biyua a, bimuniki bɛnaa Yerusalem. Bɛnatsã Samaria tukula pii kamɛ bɛkade lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ.
Ade boe Ɔlate ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ odi yabi Filipo kĩ, “Yidza, kaka nɛ kayɔ, katsã kɔsa kamɛ osi a kĩ eto Yerusalem ɛnaa Gaza akũ a.”
Ade ke eyidza epi osi a. Kĩ yanaa a, ɛnatsɛlamɛna onyole odi kĩ yaya. Onyole kĩĩ nyɛ Etiopia lɛgãtsole kĩ bavɛ Kandake, sika akũ fɔtsa ɔdãmɛnanɛ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃. Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ kĩĩ nabɔa mpaɛ nɛ Yerusalem.
Emuniki yatsã, ade edzi nɛ ohilili kĩ bapɔnkɔ avɛlɛ kamɛ, ɛkakã Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yesaya ovoli a.
Ade Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a bi Filipo kĩ, “Tsã kanaapi ohilili a.”
Foesũ Filipo wula atsɛ ɛnaa ye sɛkɛ̃ ade enu kĩ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a kakã Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yesaya ovoli a kĩ ɛtsɛlɛ a. Ade evia ye kĩ, “Anu fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ɔlamɛna kakã a kayɔ?”
Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oowo, nde maakɛna nnu foe kayɔ ntɛ odima tányɛ foe kamɛ ɛtsa yĩ?” Eke Filipo aduli kĩ ede ewo nɛ ohilili a kamɛ edzi nɛ ye ɔwɛ̃.
Fɔlɛtsa a kĩ foe ɛkakã nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ nyɛ kĩ,
“Bɛkpã ye ndɛ kuveli aye banamɛna kakɔkɔ̃.
Edzɛ̃ dĩĩ ndɛ kavelibi nɛ ke tɛtsã bakpelinɛ anɛ
ade ayea lɛmɛ ɛtábinya onukpɛ̃ a.
Nɛ ye akũ kadɔla sũ, bɛtádzɛ bɛkpa ye ɔtɛbɛ
Owei aalɛ kadi etomɛna ye babi mɔ bawa akũ,
Kitonɛkĩ bɛtɛ ye nkpã nɛ ye awɛ nɛ katinya kamɛ.”
Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a via Filipo kĩ, “Bi yĩ. Owei akũ fɔlɛtsa onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ a lamɛna kɔdzɛla kalɛ, ye mɔa akũ mbɔɛɛ kĩ oti bɛbã?”
Filipo yi kayɔ etomɛna fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ akũ, ade ɛkɔa fɔbɛbã pii ebu, ebi ye Kalɛ Wĩ a nɛ Yesu akũ a.
Kĩ banaa nɛ osi a bɛnawo kakɔ kadi kĩ mui dzɛ̃ nɛ osi ɔwɛ̃. Fɔtsa akũ ɔdãmɛnanɛ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a bi Filipo kĩ, “Aádã mui badi nɛ awĩ! Litsa sũ nláapuli ntɛ Baguma mui kawɔla amaniɛ a?”
Ade Filipo bi ye kĩ, “Ntɛ ɔtɛ odo mɔ nɔ ɔwɔlɛ flee kɔ̃ ni, aapuli ɔtɛ”
Kĩ banaa nɛ osi a bɛnawo kakɔ kadi kĩ mui dzɛ̃ nɛ osi ɔwɛ̃. Fɔtsa akũ ɔdãmɛnanɛ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a bi Filipo kĩ, “Aádã mui badi nɛ awĩ! Litsa sũ nláapuli ntɛ Baguma mui kawɔla amaniɛ a?”
Ade Filipo bi ye kĩ, “Ntɛ ɔtɛ odo mɔ nɔ ɔwɔlɛ flee kɔ̃ ni, aapuli ɔtɛ”
Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a bi ye kĩ, “Ntɛ ndo kĩ Yesu Kristo nyɛ́ Baguma Obi a.” Ade awã ɛfɔ̃ ohilili a dza a. Biduma bɛnawo nɛ mui a kamɛ ade Filipo wɔla ye mui nɛ Yesu dĩ akũ a.
Kĩ bɛnɛ nɛ mui a kamɛ a, Boe Ɔlate Hũhũ a bɔɛ Filipo ɛdzakũmɛna, ade ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a tabuki ɛmɔ ye a. Ɛtɔasu ye osi ɛnaa mɔ kawɔlɛ.
Ke liti a, Filipo mɔ eyi ɔsũ kĩ ɛyanɛ ɛta nɛ Asoto ɔmatɔ kamɛ. Ɛtsã emini eto awã ɛkalɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a nɛ tɛmatɔ a kĩ tideĩ nɛ osi akũ a flee kɛnawo Kaisarea ɔmatɔ a kamɛ.
Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ, Saulo kɔa kɔnɛyɔɔlɛ etomɔ batɛ badonɛ a liti kĩ yawɔla be.
Ɛnaa Yudafɔ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a sɛkɛ̃.
ɛnavia kĩ bɛkpa ye otumi tuvoli, lɔkɔa ɛnaa Yudafɔ fɔtsɛnakɔ̃ nɛ Damasko, ɛnaapili bikĩ bɛtsɛ̃ nɛ boe Ɔlate osi vɔɛ̃ a akũ, batsole mɔ banyole flee, esuli be ɛyamɛna nɛ Yerusalem.
Lɔkɔ a kĩ Saulo fuã Damasko ɔmatɔ a eyua mɔ kakɔna kĩĩ a ni, deedimɔapɛ ɔhaĩ odi mɔanɛ eto ode etsua esinya ye.
Ɛka ɛtɔ ade enu ɔlɛdo odi kĩ, “Saulo, Saulo litsa sũ otomɔ yĩ liti?”
Ade Saulo via kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, nɔ owei anɛ?”
Ɔlɛdo kĩĩ kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Yĩ nyɛ Yesu a kĩ ye liti otomɛna a.
Yidza finyaakĩĩ kanaa ɔmatɔ a kamɛ, lɔkɔa baabi nɔ lɛtsa a kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ akɛna.”
Banyole a kĩ bɛmɔ Saulo bɛtsɛ̃ a fɔ̃ bɛdza lɛmɛ baámɔ lɛtsa a kĩ de balɛ. Binu ɔlɛdo a lɛmɛ bɛtámɔ oti odima.
Ade kĩ Saulo yidza nɛ tite ebinya banebi a, ebuki yaámɔ fɔkɔ. Foesũ bipi ye nɛ kɔkpɔ bɛkpã ye bɛnamɛna Damasko ɔmatɔ a kamɛ.
Edzi fuwi ɛlalɛ kĩ yaámɔ fɔkɔ, yaánya, yaámɔa lɛmɛ.
Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ ɔtɛ odonɛ odi kĩ bavɛ Anania na nɛ Damasko. Boe Ɔlate nyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa ye ɛvɛ ye kĩ, “Anania!”
Anania tunɔ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, amɔ yĩ nɛ awĩ!”
Ade boe Ɔlate bi ye kĩ, “Yidza katsã ɔblɔnu a kĩ bavɛ Ɔblɔnu Kpĩĩ a akũ, lɔkɔa ntɛ owo Yuda tɔtɔ kamɛ ni, via Saulo kĩ eto Tarso a akũ.
Edeĩ nɛ awã ɛlamɛna mpaɛ kabɔa, kitonɛkĩ ĩnyɛ ntsa ye ɛmɔ nɛ hũhũ kamɛ kĩ onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Anania aayate awɛ nɛ ye akũ ebuki ɛmɔ fɔkɔ.”
Ade ke Anania kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, nnu fɔlɛtsa pii ntomɛna oti kĩĩ akũ nɛ ayekĩ ɛkɛna nɔ bati awɔda nɛ Yerusalem a!
Ade bunu kĩ ɛtɛ otumi tuvoli etomɛna Basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ sɛkɛ̃ kĩ epili nɔ batɛ badonɛ flee nɛ Damasko a.”
Lɛmɛ boe Ɔlate bi ye kĩ, “Naa nɔ kɔ̃ kanaakɛna ayekĩ mbi nɔ a, kitonɛkĩ mpau ye kĩ ɛyaanya yĩ ɔsumunɛ ɛlɛ kalɛ wĩ a ɛtsa bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ, fɔgã, mɔ Israelfɔ flee.
Ade yĩ mɔawɛ a maanyɛ lubo a kĩ yaamɔ nɛ yĩ sũ a ntsa ye a.”
