Foesũ Anania pi osi ɛnawo nɛ tɔtɔ a kĩ te kamɛ Saulo na, ade ete awɛ nɛ ye akũ ebi ye kĩ, “Nwaɛ̃ Saulo, Boe Ɔlate Yesu kĩ ɛnyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa nɔ nɛ osi a lido yĩ nɛ nɔ sɛkɛ̃ kĩ buki kamɔ fɔkɔ, lɔkɔa Hũhũ Kpalɛwa ɛtɛ nɔ kamɛ.”
Deedimɔapɛ fɔkɛna Saulo ndɛ tupo lɛtsɛ nɛ ye anɛ tɛnɛ tɛtɔ, ade edo fɔkɔ kamɔ awɛ a. Eyidza ɛkpa osi bɛkɛna ye mui kawɔla amaniɛ.
Ade kĩ ɛnya eyua a, akũ de ye ɔsĩ.
Saulo dzi nɛ batɛ badonɛ a sɛkɛ̃ nɛ Damasko fuwi fudi.
Nɛ fuwi a kamɛ a, ɛnaa Yudafɔ fɔtsɛnakɔ̃ a, ade ɛnalɛ kɔdzɛla ɛtsa kĩ Yesu nyɛ Baguma Obi a.

Fɔkɛna bati flee a kĩ binu ye fɔtsa katsa a saa, ade bivia be akũ kĩ, “Nnɛ́ oti kĩĩ tsɛ̃ yakɔ bikĩ bɛtɛ Yesu bido a nɛ Yerusalem a mbɔɛɛ? Nnɛ́ ye lɛmɛ lɛya nɛ awĩ mɔ botaɛ kĩ yayaapili batɛ badonɛ a ɛma basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a mbɔɛɛ?”
Lɛmɛ Saulo fɔtsa katsa na kɔbɛ̃ ade ye fɔlɛtsa kamɛ kanyɛ kĩ Yesu nyɛ Kristo a táfɔ̃ Yudafɔ a kĩ bɛna nɛ Damasko a lɛtɛmɔ ye atsindze a.
Fuwi fudi liti ni, Yudafɔ a natsɛna ade bipi adzuni kĩ bakɔ ye a.
Lɛmɛ bati bɔɛ bɛyabi Saulo. Lɛnyɛ mɔ suwa flee bɛkadzɔlɛ ɔmatɔ a seebi a kĩ bike bisinya a tunyukpɛ̃ ayekĩ baana ye bɛkɔ.
Lɛmɛ lɛnyɛ mɔa kayite a, bikĩ bitomɔ Saulo a bɔɛ ye bido nɛ ɔtsɛtsɛ kamɛ bɛtsãmɛna seebi ɔkɛ kamɛ bɛkamɛna ye bɛdzɛla nɛ tite!
Kĩ Saulo naa Yerusalem a, ɛwɛ kĩ yanaawo nɛ batɛ badonɛ a kamɛ nɛ awã. Lɛmɛ be flee bivila ye kitonɛkĩ bɛtátɛ bido kĩ ɔtɛ odonɛ yanɛ.

Ade Barnaba bumɔ ye ɛkpã ye ɛnamɛna fɔtɔ banyanɛ a sɛkɛ̃ a. Ebi be ayekĩ Saulo mɔ́ boe Ɔlate a nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ yanaa Damasko, mɔ ayekĩ boe Ɔlate lɛmɔ ye kɔdzɛla lɛmɛ a. Ebi be lɛmɛ ayekĩ Saulo lɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ kɔbɛ̃ nɛ Yesu dĩ akũ nɛ Damasko.
Ade bɛtɛ ye ɛna nɛ be kamɛ a. Kito ke a, ɛna nɛ be kamɛ, emini nɛ Yerusalem flee ɛkalɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa a nɛ boe Ɔlate dĩ akũ mɔ kɔbɛ̃.
Ade Yudafɔ badi kĩ balɛ Griki, kavɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa mɔ Saulo a, lɛmɛ bɛwɛ kĩ bakɔ ye.
Kĩ batɛ badonɛ a badi nu fukĩĩ a bɛkpã Saulo bɛnamɛna Kaisarea ade bɛnyɛ ye osi ɛnaa ye ɔtɔ Tarso a.
Fɔyaya kĩ nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ, batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bɛna nɛ Yudea, Galilea mɔ Samaria na nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ. Nɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa kɔbɛ̃ akũ sũ ni, bɛna ɔwɔlɛ kado. Bɛpɔ bibu ade bɛkɔa obu bɛkpa boe Ɔlate a.
Petro mini ɛnaa fɔkɔ pii. Nɛ foe kamɛ a, ɛnasɛla batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ ɔmatɔ odi kĩ bavɛ Lida kamɛ.
Awã na ɛmɔ onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Ainea. Ade futeli ɛlɛ̃ flee kĩ eveliveli kĩ yaápuli eyidza nɛ ɔkɛna akũ a.
Kĩ Petro mɔ ye a, ebi ye kĩ, “Ainea! Yesu Kristo tsa nɔ fɔsɔ! Yidza kadza kabuta nɔ ɔkɛna.” Deedimɔapɛ Ainea yidza ɛdza, nɛ akũ ɔsĩ kamɛ.
Bati a flee kĩ bidzi nɛ Lida mɔ Saron a, mɔ́ Ainea foesũ bɛkɔa be akũ bɛkpa boe Ɔlate.
Ke liti a, otsole odi kĩ bavɛ Tabita na nɛ Yopa. Nɛ Griki tide kamɛ ni, bavɛ ye Dorkas kĩ de kayɔ nyɛ kayisie. Ɛnyɛ ɔtɛ odonɛ kĩ yakɛna tuwĩ daa, kabumɛna ahiãfɔ lɛmɛ.
Fɔsɔ yabɔa ye ade eku a. Foesũ ye bati wɔla ye mui bihihiɛ ye bɛwɔla nɛ kɔla kamɛ nɛ abansulu ode.
Yopa mɔ Lida kayite távɛlɛ, foesũ kĩ batɛ badonɛ a nu kĩ Petro na nɛ Lida a, bido bati nviã mɔ ɔlɛdo nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ kĩ, “Wɛ sɔwa kaya nɛ boe sɛkɛ̃.”

Ade ke Petro yidza ɛmanɛ akũ etomɔ be a. Kĩ ewo awã a bɛkpã ye bɛnamɛna kɔla kĩ koe kamɛ bɛwɔla Dorkas a. Bakunawa batsole dza bisinya Petro nɛ awã bɛkabe ade bɛtsa ye tɛtadie flee a kĩ Dorkas kapamu nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ edzi nkpã a.
Ade Petro nyɛ be flee nɛ kɔla a kamɛ, eke aduli ɛbɔa mpaɛ a. Ɛdani ɛtsɛlamɔ ɔnɔkpa a ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Tabita! Yidza!” Awã na ebinya anɛ ade kĩ ɛmɔ Petro a, eyidza edzi.
Ade Petro pi ye nɛ kɔkpɔ ɛdzɛla ye a. Foesũ Petro vɛ batɛ badonɛ mɔ bakunawa a, ade ɛkɔa ye nkpã ode edo nɛ be awɛ a.
Fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ gba nɛ Yopa flee ade bati pii tɛ boe Ɔlate bido a.
Ke liti a, Petro dzi nɛ Yopa fuwi pii ade ɛna nɛ Simon adi kĩ yakɔa bayaɛ tuvoli kapamu fɔtsa a sɛkɛ̃ a.
Lɔkɔ a na kamɛ, onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Kornelio na nɛ Kaisarea ɔmatɔ a kamɛ. Ɛnyɛ Romafɔ kawũ ɔnɔnɛ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃.
Ɛnyɛ oti wĩ, ade ye mɔ ye kɔla flee basum Baguma a. Oti kĩĩ abumɔ Yudafɔ ahiãfɔ kĩ futo ye ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ, ade yabɔa mpaɛ luwi daa lɛmɛ a.
Luwi a, kĩ kanaa olobe tɔdɔũ ɛlalɛ kamɛ a, ɛna hũhũ kamɛ kanyɛkatsa, ɛmɔ́ yededeede kĩ ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ odi yabi ye kĩ, “Kornelio!”
Kornelio dã ye koee mɔ libe ade evia ye kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, litsa fɔanɛ?”
Ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a bi ye kĩ, “Nɔ sɛmɛ kalɛ kakɛna mɔ mpaɛbɔ a wo Baguma sɛkɛ̃.
Do bati bɛnaa Yopa bɛnaakpã onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Simon Petro bɛyamɛna.
Edeĩ nɛ Simon kĩ yakɛna bayaɛ tuvoli akũ adzuma nɛ mpo abuĩ a sɛkɛ̃.”
Kĩ Baguma ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a dzakũ a, Kornelio vɛ ye kɔla basumunɛ nviã mɔ kawũ ɔnɔnɛ mɔa kĩ ɛnyɛ oti kpĩĩ kĩ yadzɔlɛ ye akũ lɛmɛ.
Ebi be lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya a, ade edo be kĩ bɛnaa Yopa a.
Kĩ kade nyina a kĩ bɛkɔa bafuã Yopa a, Petro de ɛnaa lɛtsã ode nɛ awã kĩ ese a, ɛnaabɔa mpaɛ mɔ suwa tɔdɔũ ewua-nviã lɔkɔ a.
Kɔlɛ kakɔ ye ade ɛwɛ litsedi kĩ yanya a. Lɛmɛ kĩ bɛkatɔ funitsã a, ɛna kanyɛkatsa.
Awã na ɛmɔ́ kĩ odetɔ́ binya, ade ɛmɔ́ kĩ bɛkayɔna litsedi ndɛ lima kpale kĩ bipini de nɛ atɔ ɛna a.
Bayaɛ ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ, bɔɛ mɔ kɔvɔlabi lɛmɛ na nɛ lima a kamɛ.
Ade ɔlɛdo odi bi ye kĩ “Petro Yidza, kɔ, kaba!”
Lɛmɛ Petro kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Oowo! Kusɛ! Boe Ɔlate yĩ onukpɛ̃ táta ɔyaɛ sɛkɛna kĩ boe Yudafɔ bɔakesĩ a da!”
Ɔlɛdo a buki ɛlɛ kĩ, “Lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma kpalɛ de akũ ni, tabu kĩ efĩĩ deĩ nɛ de akũ!”
Ɛna kanyɛkatsa kĩĩ titi ɛlalɛ, ade bɛvɛlɛ fɔtsa a bɛnamɛna ode a.
Lɔkɔ a na kamɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kakɛna Petro basa basa, ade evia ye akũ kĩ, “Litsa fukĩĩ atsa?”
Ade ke kamɛ a mɔ bati a kĩ Kornelio do fɔtɔ a yawo ɔmatɔ a kamɛ a. Kĩ bɛmɔ́ tɔtɔ a kĩ bawɛ a, bɛnadza nɛ te onyukpɛ̃,
ade bɛkavia katse awã kĩ Simon Petro dzi a.
Petro buki edzimɔ lɔlɔ kamɛ kakɔna nɛ kanyɛkatsa a kayɔ kanu akũ, ade Baguma Hũhũ a bi ye kĩ, “Bati ɛlalɛ ya bɛlamɛna nɔ kawɛ.
Yidza katsɛlamɔ be. Tavila be katomɛna kanaa kitonɛkĩ yĩ lido be.”
Ade Petro duma ɛka ɛnabi be kĩ, “Yĩ nyɛ oti a kĩ milamɛna kawɛ a. Litsa sũ mitsɛ̃?”

Bɛkpa ye mbuayɛ kĩ, “Kornelio kĩ ɛnyɛ Romafɔ kawũ ɔnɔnɛ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ lido boe fɔtɔ. Ɛnyɛ oti kĩ edzi kpĩĩ, yasum Baguma, ade Yudafɔ flee akpa ye obu a. Baguma ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ odi bi ye kĩ edo batɔ nɛ nɔ sɛkɛ̃, lɔkɔa etse nɔ onukpɛ̃ kamɛ fɔlɛtsa.”
Foesũ Petro kpa be kasɛkɔ̃ nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ ade ɛtɛ be ndɛ ye banɔvɔɛ̃ aye a.
Kĩ kade nyina a, ye mɔ batɛ badonɛ badi kĩ bito Yopa mɔ batɔ a bipi osi.
Luwi lɛyade a, bɛnawo Kaisarea, awã kĩ Kornelio kpɔta ye tɔtɔ kamɛ bati mɔ bakɔba badi bidzi bɛkadzɔlɛ Petro kaya a.
Kĩ Petro aawo nɛ tɔtɔ a kamɛ a, Kornelio natsɛlamɔ ye, eke aduli nɛ ye abɔa kayɔ ade ɛkɛna lɔlɔ a.
Lɛmɛ Petro dzɛla ye ebi ye kĩ, “Yidza kadza! Yĩ malo otidziwa manɛ.”
Kĩ bɛkalɔmɛna a, Kornelio kpã ye ewomɛna nɛ awã kĩ bati nkaɛ a kpɔta bidzi badzɔlɛ be a.
Ade Petro bi be kĩ, “Minyina yededeede kĩ boe Yudafɔ mbla tákpa yĩ osi kĩ nnaa odi bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a sɛkɛ̃ ĩye nkɔa akũ mbɔamɔ be. Lɛmɛ Baguma nyɛ ɛtsa yĩ kĩ ntabu odima kĩ ye akũ tákpalɛ.
Nɛ foesũ kĩ batɔ a yavɛ yĩ a, ntásĩ. Litsa sũ odo bati kĩ bɛyaavɛ yĩ?”
Ade Kornelio bi ye kĩ, “Nviã fuwi ɛlalɛ, fɔ́ana ndɛ tɔdɔũ ɛlalɛ kamɛ, nkabɔa mpaɛ nɛ yĩ awã. Deedimɔapɛ onyole odi kĩ edeĩ nɛ tɛtadiɛ ovoe kĩ tata muamua kamɛ nɛ ɛta nɛ yĩ anɛ kamɛ,

ade ebi yĩ kĩ, ‘Kornelio, Baguma nu nɔ mpaɛbɔ, eyi nɔ sɛmɛ kalɛ kakɛna lɛmɛ ɔsũ. Do bati bɛnaa Yopa bɛnaakpã odi kĩ bavɛ Simon Petro. Ɛyase nɛ Simon kĩ yakɔa bayaɛ tuvoli kapamu fɔtsa nɛ mpo abuĩ a sɛkɛ̃.’

ade ebi yĩ kĩ, ‘Kornelio, Baguma nu nɔ mpaɛbɔ, eyi nɔ sɛmɛ kalɛ kakɛna lɛmɛ ɔsũ. Do bati bɛnaa Yopa bɛnaakpã odi kĩ bavɛ Simon Petro. Ɛyase nɛ Simon kĩ yakɔa bayaɛ tuvoli kapamu fɔtsa nɛ mpo abuĩ a sɛkɛ̃.’
Ade foesũ ndo batɔ nɛ nɔ sɛkɛ̃ lɛtalɛta a, ade odi foe akũ ɔya mɔatsɛ lɛmɛ a. Foesũ boe flee budzi nɛ awĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ kamɛ kĩ yaaabi boe lɛtsa a kĩ ebi nɔ kĩ bi boe a.”
Ade Petro bi ye kĩ, “Finyaakĩĩ mmɔ́ ĩyi ɔsũ kĩ Baguma ládã bati anɛ.
Mbom oti kĩ ɛdɔla ye akũ ɛkpa Baguma, yakɛna nɛ ye kawɛ akũ lɛmɛ ni, ade ye Baguma awɛ a.
Matɛ kado kĩ minu kalɛ a kĩ ɛma Israelfɔ kĩ fɔnyɛ lukudɔ Kalɛ Wĩ a kĩ fɔtsɛ̃ Yesu Kristo akũ a. Ade ye lɛmɛ nyɛ katinya kamɛ bati flee Ɔlate a.
Ade minyina kalɛ kpale a kĩ fɔya nɛ Israelfɔ tite akũ, kĩ kiyi kayɔ nɛ Galilea, kito lɔkɔ a kĩ Yohanes de lɛtsã nɛ mui kawɔla amaniɛ akũ a.
Minu lɛmɛ ayekĩ Baguma kɔa ye Hũhũ mɔ kɔbɛ̃ eko nɛ Yesu kĩ eto Nazaret a akũ. Ɛtsã emini nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ ɛkakɛna tuwĩ, ade ɛtsa bikĩ hũhũ kpa kaha be a, kitonɛkĩ Baguma tomɔ ye.
“Boe bɔnyɛ adansifɔ bɔkpa fɔtsa a kĩ ɛkɛna nɛ Israelfɔ tite akũ mɔ Yerusalem a. Ade ke bɛkɔ ye nɛ ye kabɔa kamɛna nɛ asendua akũ a.
Lɛmɛ Baguma dzɛla ye eto kanɔkpa nɛ luwi lɛlalɛde akũ, ade ɛfɔ̃ ɛnyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa bati a.
Lɛmɛ nnɛ́ bati flee lɔmɔ ye, mbom boe a kĩ Baguma pau ndɛ adansifɔ a lɛmɔ́ ye. Budo awɛ bɔnya, bɔmɔa mɔ ye kĩ eyidza eto kanɔkpa liti a.
Ade boe edo kĩ bɔnaalɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ, budi adansiɛ lɛmɛ kĩ Baguma kɛna Yesu batidziwa mɔ banɔkpa flee fɔlɛtsa ɔdzɛnɛ.
Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ flee lɛ nɛ ye akũ kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaatɛ ye edo ni, Baguma aakɔa ye tɔkpa ete ye nɛ Yesu dĩ akũ.”
Ade kĩ Petro kalɛ kɔdzɛla a, Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a ka eko nɛ bati a flee kĩ bidzi batsɛ ye fɔlɛtsa a akũ.
Fɔkɛna Yudafɔ batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bitomɛna Petro nɛ Yopa bɛyaa a saa, nɛ ayekĩ Baguma Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a ka eko nɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ lɛmɛ a akũ.
Kitonɛkĩ binu kĩ bɛkalɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ tide ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ kamɛ ade bɛkamu Baguma Kpale a. Ade ke Petro lɛ kĩ,
“Ayekĩ bati kĩĩ tɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a ndɛ ayekĩ boe malo bɔtɛ a sũ ni, bɔ́apuli busĩ kĩ bɔákɛna be mui kawɔla amaniɛ?”
Foesũ ɛkpa osi kĩ bɛkɛna be mui kawɔla amaniɛ nɛ Yesu Kristo dĩ akũ. Ke liti a, bɛwã ye kĩ edzi nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ fɔtɛ fuwi fudi.
Owi tábuna mɔ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a mɔ batɛ badonɛ bɛbã nɛ Yudea nu kĩ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a lɛmɛ tɛ Baguma Kalɛ Wĩ a.
Lɛmɛ kĩ Petro muniki ɛya nɛ Yerusalem a, Yudafɔ a kĩ bɛna nɛ awã a tátunɔ mɔ ye, ade bibi ye kĩ,
“Ɔnakɔa nɔ akũ ɔtsɛkamɔ banɔvɔɛ̃ kĩ bitómɛna Yudafɔ fɔtsa katsa a, ade odo awɛ ɔnyamɔ be malo a!”
Ade ke Petro nyɛ fɔlɛtsa kamɛ ɛtsa be kĩ,
“Lɔkɔ a kĩ nna nɛ Yopa nkabɔa mpaɛ a, nna kanyɛkatsa. Nɛ foe kamɛ a, mmɔ́ kĩ bɛkakɛna lima dzɛlɛwa baũ lidi kĩ bipini de nɛ atɔ ɛna, ade lɛka lɛyakpula nɛ yĩ ɔwɛ̃ a.
Bayaɛ kumɛkumɛ na nɛ lima kpale kĩĩ kamɛ, bayaɛ kĩ bideĩ abɔa ɛna, bikĩ bɛtsɛ̃ nɛ sɛmɛ akũ, mɔ kɔvɔlabi kĩ bɔába malo.
Ade nnu ɔlɛdo odi ebi yĩ kĩ, ‘Petro! Yidza kakɔ kaba!’
“Lɛmɛ nkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Oowo! Kusɛ! Boe Ɔlate, yĩ onukpɛ̃ táta ɔyaɛ kĩ boe Yudafɔ bɔakesĩ a da.’
“Ɔlɛdo a buki ɛlɛ kĩ, ‘Ntɛ lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma kpalɛ de akũ ni, tabu kĩ efĩĩ deĩ nɛ de akũ.’
Fɔtsa kĩĩ kɛna lɔmɔ titi ɛlalɛ flee. Ke liti a, bɛvɛlɛ lima kpale kĩĩ mɔ bayaɛ a flee bɛnamɛna ode.
“Ade lɔkɔ a na kamɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ mɔ́ batɔ ɛlalɛ a kĩ bito Kaisarea bɛyaakpã yĩ a wo tɔtɔ a kĩ te kamɛ nse a.
Baguma Hũhũ a bi yĩ kĩ ntasĩ, mbom ntomɔ be bɔnaa. Batɛ badonɛ evũ a kĩ bito Yopa a, tomɔ yĩ bɔnawo oti a kĩ ye lido batɔ a tɔtɔ kamɛ.
Ye malo ebi boe ayekĩ Baguma fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ nyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa ye, ebi ye kĩ, ‘Naawɛ odi kado ye nɛ Yopa ɛnaavɛ onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Simon Petro.
Yaabi nɔ ayekĩ mimɔ nɔ tɔtɔ kamɛ bati flee míana katɛ.’
“Ke liti a, ĩyi kayɔ mɔ be Baguma fɔlɛtsa a kabi. Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a ka eko nɛ be akũ ndɛ ayekĩ eko nɛ boe flee akũ nɛ kayɔkayi a.
Ade ke nte anɛ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ boe Ɔlate lɛ eyi kĩ, ‘Nuwĩnuwĩ, Yohanes kɔa mui ɛwɔla bati mui, lɛmɛ Baguma aakɔa Hũhũ Kpalɛwa ɛwɔla mi mui.’
Ade kĩ Baguma lɛkpa bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a futetsa kĩĩ ndɛ ayekĩ ɛkpa boe kĩ bɔtɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo budo sũ ni, yĩ nyɛ owei kĩ masua Baguma osi!”
Kĩ binu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a bɛfɔ̃ atsindze katɛ ade bimu Baguma bɛlɛ kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔali, Baguma binya osi ɛkpa bati bɛbã lɛmɛ kĩ bɛdani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ lɔkɔa bɛna nkpã kĩ ɛla kawũna a!”
Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ kĩ fukĩĩ bamɛ lamɛna kaya a, batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bilo tɛnya kakɛna nɛ Stefano wuda sũ a, lo bɛnaa Foenike, Kipro mɔ Antiokia tɛmatɔ a kamɛ. Bimini bɛlɛ Baguma kalɛ a bɛkpa Yudafɔ odi.
Lɛmɛ batɛ badonɛ bɛbã a kĩ bito Kipro mɔ Kirene naa Antiokia bɛnabi Grikifɔ Baguma kalɛ a nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu akũ.
Nɛ kĩ boe Ɔlate kɔbɛ̃ na nɛ be kamɛ sũ bati pii tɛ bido.
Kĩ batɛ badonɛ nɛ Yerusalem nu lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya nɛ Antiokia a, bido Barnaba kĩ ɛnaa awã.
Kĩ ewo awã a, ɛmɔ́ ayekĩ Baguma bumɔ be a, kawɔlɛ de ye paa, ade ɛkpa be kɔdɛ kĩ bɛkɔa be tɔwɔlɛ flee bite nɛ boe Ɔlate akũ a.
Barnaba nyɛ oti wĩ, edeĩ katɛkado ade Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a lɛmɛ tɛ ye kamɛ. Futo ye akũ sũ ni, bati pii tɛ boe Ɔlate bido.
Ke liti a, Barnaba naa Tarso kĩ yanaawɛ Saulo nɛ awã a.
Kĩ ɛmɔ ye a, ɛkpã ye bɛnaa Antiokia. Bɛna nɛ awã kateli mɔa flee, bɛkatsɛna bati pii katsa be fɔtsa. Ade Antiokia mɔ bɛnya lɔtɔ bɛvɛ batɛ badonɛ a kĩ Kristofɔ a.
Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ ni, Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ badi to Yerusalem bɛya nɛ Antiokia a.

Ade Agabo kĩ ɛnyɛ be kamɛ ɔmɔa yidza ɛdza nɛ be katsɛnakɔ̃, ade nɛ Baguma Hũhũ kɔbɛ̃ onukpɛ̃ ni, ɛlɛ eyi kĩ kɔlɛ kpale aanɛ nɛ katinya flee kamɛ. Fukĩĩ yaya nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ Klaudio nya Romafɔ Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ a.
Nɛ foesũ batɛ badonɛ a yake otse kĩ baate fɔtsa fudi bɛkɔa bɛmɛna be bawaɛ̃ nɛ Yudea. Be kamɛ odi nyɛ odi te ayekĩ yaapuli.
Kĩ bɛkpɔta fɔtsa kĩĩ a, bɛkɔa foe bɛkpa Barnaba mɔ Saulo kĩ bɛkɔa bɛma batɛ badonɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ a nɛ Yudea.
Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ, Lɛgã Herodes pi batɛ badonɛ a badi kĩ bɛkɔ be.
Ɛfɔ̃ bɛkɔ Yakobo kĩ ɛnyɛ Yohanes ɔwaɛ̃ a mɔ lɛpamɛ.
Kĩ ɛmɔ kĩ kawɔlɛ de Yudafɔ a sũ ni, ɛfɔ̃ bipi Petro lɛmɛ. Ɛkɛna foe nɛ Abodoo Kĩ Ɛtáyila Fuwi Kanya a kamɛ.
Bɛkɔa ye bido nɛ kɔla kamɛ, awã kĩ sodzafɔ ɛna ɛna na nɛ kutsu ɛna kamɛ kavɛmɛna akũ kadzɔlɛ ye akũ. Herodes nhihiɛ nyɛ kĩ yaakɔa ye ɛkpa kanade a bɛdzɛmɔ ye ntɛ bɛnya Wuda Katɛ̃ Luwi a biyua.
Foesũ sodzafɔ a kadzɔlɛ ye akũ kadzɔlɛ wĩ nɛ kɔla a kamɛ. Lɛmɛ batɛ badonɛ a kabɔa mpaɛ nɛ ye lɔlɔ kakpa Baguma mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ.
Lɛnyɛ a kĩ ke kade kanyina kamɛ Herodes aakɔa Petro ɛkpa bati a, Petro waa tida nɛ sodzafɔ nviã kayite. Bido ye nkɔsɔnkɔsɔ nviã ade sodzafɔ bɛbã dzɛ̃ nɛ opunu liti badzɔlɛ kɔla akũ a.

Deedimɔapɛ ɔhaĩ odi mɔanɛ nɛ kɔla a kamɛ. Ade ke ode Baguma fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ odi nɛ ɛdza nɛ Petro ɔwɛ̃ a. Ɛbɔa Petro nɛ lɔbɔtɛɛ enyina ye, ade ebi ye kĩ, “Yidza mɔatsɛ!” Lɛtalɛta nkɔsɔnkɔsɔ a nɛ́ nɛ ye akpɔ ɛtɔ nɛ tite.
Ade ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a bi ye kĩ, “Bɔɛ nɔ tɛtadiɛ, kado nɔ mpabua lɛmɛ.” Petro kɛna foe lɔmɔ, ade ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a buki ɛlɛ kĩ, “Bɔɛ nɔ atadiɛ kpale katsa akũ katomɔ yĩ.”
Foesũ Petro tomɔ ye bɛnɛ nɛ kɔla a kamɛ. Ɛtányi ntɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a kakɛna a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali, mbom ɛkɔna kĩ kɔda kamɛ fɔanɛ.

Bɛtɛ̃ kawũ banɔnɛ katsu katɔnyade mɔ kayade a kĩ badzɔlɛ tunyukpɛ̃ akũ a. Kĩ biwo fɔbɔtsaɛ onyukpɛ̃ a kĩ babinya kawo nɛ ɔmatɔ kamɛ a, onyukpɛ̃ a mɔawɛ binya nɛ ye akũ akũ ade bɛtɛ̃ a. Kĩ bɛnaa lɔtɔ sukuloo a, Baguma ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a dzakũ ɛfɔnɛ ye.

Kĩ anɛ kamɛ kpalɛ Petro a, ɛyanyi lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya nɛ ye akũ, ade ebi ye akũ kĩ, “Finyaakĩĩ, mmɔ́ kĩ ɔnɔkɔali fɔanɛ. Boe Ɔlate do ye ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ kĩ ɛyaanyɛ yĩ etomɛna Herodes awɛ kamɛ mɔ lɛtsa a kĩ Yudafɔ hihiɛ kĩ baakɛna yĩ a kamɛ!”
Kĩ ɛmɔ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya nɛ ye akũ a, ɛdzakũ ɛnaa Maria kĩ ɛnyɛ Yohanes Marko ɔma awã. Bati pii tsɛna nɛ awã bɛkabɔa mpaɛ.
Ade kĩ Petro dza ɛkabɔa kanya opunu a, katsolebi abawa kĩ bavɛ Roda yabinya kɔla a.
Kĩ eyi Petro odo ɔsũ a, kawɔlɛ de ye paa, foesũ ɛtábinya opunu a, mbom ewula atsɛ ɛnakpa bati a kanyi kĩ Petro dzɛ̃ nɛ opunu liti.
Bati a tátɛ bido foesũ bibi ye kĩ, “Kamɔ aamɔ mbɔɛɛ?” Lɛmɛ kĩ ɛdzɛmɛna kalɛ kĩ nuwĩ fɔanɛ sũ ni, bibi be akũ kĩ, “Ɔsa fɔ́anya ye Baguma ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ.”
Lɔkɔa na flee Petro dzɛmɔ opunu a kabɔa. Kĩ bibinya opunu bɛmɔ́ ye a, akũ dzuli be.
Ete be awɛ kĩ bɛkɛna dĩĩ, ade ebi be ayekĩ boe Ɔlate nyɛ ye etomɛna kɔla a kamɛ a. Ebi be kĩ, “Mibi Yakobo mɔ batɛ badonɛ nkaɛ a lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya a.” Ke liti a, ɛdzakũ nɛ awã ɛnaa kakɔ bɛbã.
Kĩ kade nyina, kukũtila mɔ ɔtutũ kpale wo nɛ sodzafɔ a kamɛ nɛ kawakɔ̃ a, ade bɛkavia be akũ kĩ, “Ndia koũ Petro tsã?”
Kĩ Herodes wɛ Petro kayɛla evia a, ɛfɔ̃ bipi sodzafɔ a bivia be onukpɛ̃ kamɛ tuwuli. Ɛkɔ be kɔtɔ ɛfɔ̃ bɛkɔ be.
Ke liti a, Herodes dzakũ nɛ Yudea ɛnaa Kaisarea, ɛnadzi nɛ awã fuwi fudi.

Lɔkɔ a na kamɛ Herodes na kalɔkpa nɛ Tirofɔ mɔ Sidomfɔ akũ. Foesũ bɛkɛna ɔmɔa bɛya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃. Bɛnya lɔtɔ bɛnamɔ Blasto, kĩ ɛnyɛ Herodes tɔtɔ akũ ɔdãmɛnanɛ, kĩ eke Herodes aduli ɛkpa be. Bɛwɛ kĩ tɛmatɔ nviã a tɛkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Herodes, kitonɛkĩ ye tite akũ bana funitsã katomɛna.
Nɛ luwi a kĩ Herodes yi ɛkpa be akũ a, edo ye fɔgãtsa edzi nɛ ye lɛgãkpo akũ, ade ɛkabi ɔmaĩ a fɔlɛtsa a.
Nɛ ye kɔdzɛla kawũna kamɛ a, bati a mu ye mɔ fɔwɔla bɛlɛ kĩ, “Fukĩĩ kɔ̃ nnɛ́ otidziwa lamɛna kɔdzɛla kalɛ. Baguma Kpale lamɔ kɔdzɛla kalɛ!”
Deedimɔapɛ ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ yabɔa Herodes emuni, kitonɛkĩ ɛtákpa Baguma obu. Ewo batsɛ bɛba ye kamɛ kamɛ, ade ke eku a.
Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ Baguma kalɛ a gba nɛ fɔkɔ pii, ade batɛ badonɛ a lɛmɛ pɔ bibu a.
Kĩ Barnaba mɔ Saulo yua be adzuma a kĩ bido be a, bɛdzakũ nɛ Yerusalem ade bɛkpã Yohanes Marko bibumɔ be akũ a.

Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ mɔ fɔtsa batsanɛ badi na nɛ batɛ badonɛ a kamɛ nɛ Antiokia. Ade be nyɛ Barnaba mɔ Simeon kĩ bavɛ Oti Ɔɔwa, Lukio kĩ eto Kirene tite akũ, Manahen kĩ bɛmɔ Lɛgã Herodes bɛdɔɔla nɛ be tibisɛ̃ kamɛ, mɔ Saulo.
Kĩ bɛna nɛ awã bɛkamu boe Ɔlate, bɛkasui onukpɛ̃ lɛmɛ a, Hũhũ Kpalɛwa bi be kĩ, “Minyɛ Barnaba mɔ Saulo miyi lite lɔkɔa bɛnaakɛna adzuma a kĩ foesũ nvɛ be a.”
Nɛ foesũ bisui onukpɛ̃ bɛbɔa mpaɛ, bite awɛ nɛ be akũ ade bɛnyɛ be osi a.
Kĩ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa lido be sũ ni, bɛnaa ɔmatɔ a kĩ bavɛ Seleukia kamɛ. Awã na bidzi ɔkɔlɔ binyina bɛnaa Kipro tite kĩ mui tsua bisinya te a akũ.
Kĩ biwo Salami ɔmatɔ kamɛ a, bɛnalɛ Baguma Kalɛ Wĩ nɛ Yudafɔ fɔtsɛnakɔ̃. Yohanes Marko lɛmɛ tomɔ be ndɛ be obumɛnanɛ aye.
Kĩ bɛtsã mpo akũ bɛnawo Pafo ɔmatɔ a kamɛ a, bɛtsɛlamɔ Yudani odi kĩ yaveli tɔɔta. Bavɛ ye kĩ Yesuobi, ade ɛbɔɛ ye akũ kĩ ɛnyɛ onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ a.
Ɔwanɛ kĩĩ mɔ tite a akũ ɔdãnɛ kĩ bavɛ Sergio Paulo nyɛ bakɔba. Abãã ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ kĩĩ tsua linebi. Ɛvɛ Barnaba mɔ Saulo bɛnaa ye awã kitonɛkĩ ɛwɛ kĩ yatse Baguma fɔlɛtsa a.
Lɛmɛ kĩ bɛnaa awã a, ɔwanɛ a kĩ babuki kavɛ Elima nɛ Griki tide kamɛ a, tɛ atsindze mɔ be. Ɛwɛ kĩ yadani ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a adzuni nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ Saulo mɔ Barnaba lɛ a akũ.

Lɛmɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a kɔbɛ̃ tɛ Saulo kĩ babuki kavɛ Paulo kamɛ ade eke anɛ nɛ ɔwanɛ a akũ fɛɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nɔ Abonsam obi! Ɔnyɛ okesĩnɛ ɔkpa tuwĩ tidi nyɛ tidi kakɛna. Tɛdake mɔ tɔkpa yi nɔ kamɛ flee. Luwi daa abɔa mbɔdi kĩ adani boe Ɔlate ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a liti mɔ lɔtɔ!

Lɛmɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a kɔbɛ̃ tɛ Saulo kĩ babuki kavɛ Paulo kamɛ ade eke anɛ nɛ ɔwanɛ a akũ fɛɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nɔ Abonsam obi! Ɔnyɛ okesĩnɛ ɔkpa tuwĩ tidi nyɛ tidi kakɛna. Tɛdake mɔ tɔkpa yi nɔ kamɛ flee. Luwi daa abɔa mbɔdi kĩ adani boe Ɔlate ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a liti mɔ lɔtɔ!
Dã, boe Ɔlate aavɛlɛ nɔ sɔtɔ finyaakĩĩ. Yaafɔ̃ oku anɛ, ade ɔláabuki ɔmɔ́ suwa kɛnaawo lɔkɔ lidi a.”
Lɛtalɛta Elima anɛ kamɛ ke ɔtũ, ade ke ebuki yaámɔ fɔkɔ a. Ɛkatalɛ fɔkɔ kĩ yawɛ odi kĩ epi ye nɛ kɔkpɔ.
Kĩ abãã ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ kĩĩ mɔ́ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya a, ɛtɛ edo kitonɛkĩ fɔtsa katsa nɛ boe Ɔlate kalɛ wĩ a akũ kɛna ye wãwã paa.
Ke liti a, Paulo mɔ bikĩ bitomɔ ye a wo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ kamɛ bito Pafo bɛnaa Perge ɔmatɔ a kĩ edeĩ nɛ Pamfilia tite kamɛ. Ade awã mɔ Yohanes Marko dzakũ ɛfɔnɛ be emuniki ɛnaa Yerusalem a.
Kĩ bito Perge a, bɛyawo Antiokia kĩ edeĩ nɛ Pisidia. Nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ a ni, bɛnaa Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ a bɛnadzi nɛ bati a kamɛ.
Ade kĩ bɛkã fɔlɛtsa nɛ Mose mbla, mɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ tuvoli kamɛ biyua a, katsɛnakɔ̃ banɔkɔɛ̃ a bi be kĩ, “Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ntɛ mideĩ kadi kĩ míalɛ mido boe kɔbɛ̃ ni, osi waa, milɛ faa.”
Ade Paulo yidza ɛdza ete be awɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nwaɛ̃ Israelfɔ mɔ mi a kĩ minyɛ́ Israelfɔ lɛmɛ miasum Baguma a, mitse katse wĩ!
Israelfɔ Baguma lɛpau boe bawanyɔ, ade ɛkɛna be ɔmaĩ kpale nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ bɛnya banɔvɔɛ̃ nɛ Egipte a. Ye mɔawɛ lɛnyɛ be etomɛna Egipte tɛsate kamɛ mɔ ye kɔbɛ̃.
Ade ɛdãmɛna be akũ futeli tɛna flee nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ bɛna nɛ kɔsa kamɛ a.
Ɛwɔla fude evũkɔnɔ bati nɛ Kanan tite akũ, ade ɛkɔa te ɛkpa Israelfɔ kĩ tɛnya be adzapadiɛ a.
Fukĩĩ flee ya nɛ ndɛ futeli ɔha ɛna mɔ aduenum kamɛ.
“Ke liti a, Baguma kpa be fɔlɛtsa badzɛnɛ bɛnya be akũ flee kɛyawo Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Samuel akũ.
Bivia ye kĩ edzina lɛgã ɛkpa be, ade Baguma pau Saulo, kĩ ɛnyɛ Kis obi ɛkpa be a. Eto Benyamin kasinu a kamɛ, ade ɛnya lɛgã futeli tɛna flee a.
Lɛmɛ Baguma dzɛla ye nɛ lukpo a akũ, ade ɛkɔa Dawid ɛkɛna lɛgã a. Ade lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma lɛ nɛ ye akũ nyɛ kĩ, ‘Yese obi Dawid nyɛ oti kĩ yĩ ɔwɔlɛ awɛ, kitonɛkĩ yaakɛna nɛ yĩ kawɛ akũ.’
“Ade Dawid kasinu a kamɛ Baguma nyɛ Ɔtɛnɛ a kĩ ɛnyɛ Yesu ɛkpa Israelfɔ ndɛ ayekĩ ɛlɛ eyi a.
Fɔmɔ Yesu aayi ye adzuma kayɔ a, Yohanes mui ɔwɔlanɛ a de lɛtsã ebi bati Israelfɔ flee kĩ bɛdani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ lɔkɔa bɛtɛ mui kawɔla amaniɛ.
Kĩ Yohanes aawũna ye adzuma kakɛna a, evia bati a kĩ, ‘Mikɔna kĩ yĩ nyɛ Oti a Kĩ Bɛbɔa Tɔdɔ̃ a mbɔɛɛ? Oowo! Lɛmɛ etomɛna yĩ nɛ liti yaya, ade ntáfɛta kĩ mawũnya mpabua nɛ ye abɔa malo a.’
“Nwaɛ̃ amɛ Israelfɔ, Abraham babi mɔ bawa, mɔ mi a kĩ minyɛ́ Yudafɔ lɛmɛ miasum Baguma, bɛkɔa katɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ bɛma boe flee.

Nɛ ayekĩ bikĩ bideĩ nɛ Yerusalem mɔ be banɔkɔɛ̃ a tányi kĩ ye nyɛ Ɔtɛnɛ, ĩye binu Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bakã nɛ Kawɛya Luwi lidi nyɛ lidi akũ kayɔ sũ ni, fɔlɛtsa a ya nɛ foe kamɛ lɔmɔ, ade bɛkɔ ye kɔtɔ a.
Titɔ kĩ bɛtámɔ tɔkpa tidima nɛ ye akũ malo ni, bɛkɔ ye kɔtɔ ade bɛfɔ̃ Pilato kpa osi bɛkɔ ye a.
Ade kĩ bɛkɛna lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa biyua ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ eyi nɛ ye akũ a, bɛnyɛ ye nɛ asendua akũ bɛnabila nɛ linikɛ kamɛ.
Lɛmɛ Baguma dzɛla ye etomɛna kanɔkpa ebuki edzi nkpã.
Nɛ fuwi pii na kamɛ ni, ɛnyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa bikĩ bɛmɔ ye bɛtsã bito Galilea bɛnaa Yerusalem. Ade be nyɛ ye adansifɔ bɛkpa Israelfɔ finyaakĩĩ a.
“Finyaakĩĩ bɔkɔa Kalɛ Wĩ a bɔama mi, kĩ Baguma fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi nɛ boe bawanyɔ lɔkɔ a ya nɛ foe kamɛ nɛ boe lɔkɔ. Baguma fɔ̃ Yesu yidza edzi nkpã ndɛ ayekĩ Dawid tsɛlɛ nɛ ɔnɔ ɔyade a kamɛ kĩ,
‘Nɔ nyɛ yĩ obi.
Nviã kĩĩ nkɛna nɔ Ɔlɛga.’
“Finyaakĩĩ bɔkɔa Kalɛ Wĩ a bɔama mi, kĩ Baguma fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi nɛ boe bawanyɔ lɔkɔ a ya nɛ foe kamɛ nɛ boe lɔkɔ. Baguma fɔ̃ Yesu yidza edzi nkpã ndɛ ayekĩ Dawid tsɛlɛ nɛ ɔnɔ ɔyade a kamɛ kĩ,
‘Nɔ nyɛ yĩ obi.
Nviã kĩĩ nkɛna nɔ Ɔlɛga.’
Ade lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi nɛ ye kadzɛla katomɛna kanɔkpa nyɛ kĩ ye sukɛna lɛláavɔ̃ nɛ linikɛ kamɛ da. Baguma lɛ kĩ,
‘Maakɔa nhila kpalɛwa a kĩ nlɛ ĩyi nkpa Dawid a nkpa nɔ.’
Ebuki ɛlɛ nɛ Dawid ɔnɔ bɛbã kamɛ kĩ,
‘Ɔláafɔ̃ nɔ oti kpalɛwa a lɛvɔ̃ nɛ linikɛ kamɛ.’
“Kĩ Dawid kɛna nɛ Baguma fɔwɛtsa akũ lɔkɔ a kĩ edzi nkpã eyua a, eku bɛbɔɛ ye bibila nɛ ye bawanyɔ ɔwɛ̃, ade ɛvɔ̃ nɛ linikɛ kamɛ lɛmɛ a.
Lɛmɛ oti a kĩ Baguma dzɛla etomɛna kanɔkpa a sukɛna távɔ̃ nɛ linikɛ kamɛ.
“Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, bɔwɛ kĩ minyi kĩ fɔtsɛ̃ Yesu akũ mɔ bide lɛtsã nɛ Baguma tɔkpa kakɔakate a bɛkpa mi.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaatɛ Yesu edo ni, Baguma aabɔɛ ye kĩ ɛnya ɔtɔbɛ. Ade fukĩĩ Mose mbla a tápuli ɛkɛna a.
Foesũ midã kadã wĩ ayekĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛlɛ biyi a lɛlaaya nɛ mi akũ.
Kitonɛkĩ Baguma lɛ kĩ,
‘Midã mi a kĩ miadi kalɛ a nsekuo!
Fɔkɛna mi saa lɔkɔa miwɔ.
Kitonɛkĩ lɛtsa a kĩ makɛna nviã kĩĩ a
ntɛ odi nyɛ foe kayɔ ɛtsa mi malo,
miláatɛ foe mido!’ ”
Kĩ Paulo mɔ Barnaba adzakũ nɛ katsɛnakɔ̃ a, bati a bi be kĩ bibuki bɛya nɛ Kawɛya Luwi a kĩ laayaa akũ, lɔkɔa bɛyaaabi be fɔlɛtsa a bibu.
Kĩ bɛpansam nɛ katsɛnakɔ̃ a, Yudafɔ pii mɔ bikĩ bɛdani bɛkɛna Yudafɔ bavila Baguma lɛmɛ a, tomɔ Paulo mɔ Barnaba. Fɔtɔ banyanɛ a dɛ be kĩ bɛdza pintii nɛ Baguma kɔnyakamɔ a kĩ edeĩ ɛkpa be a sũ.
Nɛ Kawɛya Luwi lɛyade akũ a, kite sukuloo ɔmatɔ a flee yabɔa obũ nɛ katsɛnakɔ̃ a kĩ batse boe Ɔlate kalɛ a.
Kĩ Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a mɔ́ bati lidede kĩĩ odu nɛ katsɛnakɔ̃ a, anɛ bɛɛlɛ be. Bɛvɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa mɔ Paulo nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ de ɛlɛ a akũ ade bivũna ye a.
Lɛmɛ Paulo mɔ Barnaba lɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ kɔbɛ̃ kĩ, “Kɛnɛ kĩ bɔnya lɔtɔ bubi mi Yudafɔ Baguma kalɛ kĩĩ. Lɛmɛ kĩ misĩ ke kĩ mitákpɔla mikpa nkpã kĩ ɛla kawũna a sũ ni, bɔkɔa ke bɔama bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a.
Kitonɛkĩ ade ɔlɛdo kĩ Baguma kpa boe kĩ,
‘Nkɛna nɔ ndɛ ɔsɛdza nkpa bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a
ayekĩ katinya kamɛ bati flee aana katɛ.’ ”
Kĩ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a nu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, kawɔlɛ de be, ade bimu boe Ɔlate kalɛ a. Ade bikĩ Baguma pau kĩ bɛna nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a, dani bɛkɛna batɛ badonɛ a.
Baguma Kalɛ a gba nɛ tite a na flee akũ.
Lɛmɛ Yudafɔ a fɔ̃ batsole badi kĩ obu deĩ nɛ be akũ kĩ basum Baguma lɛmɛ, mɔ ɔmatɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a biyidza bɛdza nɛ Paulo mɔ Barnaba akũ, ade bɛblɔmɛna be nɛ be kayite a.
Ade kĩ Paulo mɔ Barnaba anɛ nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ a, bɛkpa be abɔa kudu biko ɔmatɔ a bɛkɔa batsa kĩ bisĩ be. Ke liti a, bɛdzakũ bɛnaa Ikonio.
Kawɔlɛ de batɛ badonɛ nɛ Antiokia ade Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a lɛmɛ yi be kamɛ paa a.
Kĩ biwo Ikonio a, Paulo mɔ Barnaba naa Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃. Ayekĩ bɛlɛ kalɛ wĩ a fɔ̃ Yudafɔ mɔ Grikifɔ pii tɛ bido.
Ade Yudafɔ a kĩ bɛtátɛ boe Ɔlate kalɛ wĩ kĩĩ bido a kɔa ɔdzɛ bido nɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a mɔ Paulo mɔ Barnaba kayite.
Lɛmɛ fɔtɔ banyanɛ kĩĩ kahɔ nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ lɔkɔ gɛlɛɛlɛ, bɛlɛ kalɛ boe Ɔlate akũ mɔ kɔbɛ̃. Ade ɛnyɛ ye kawɛ ɛtsa ɛfɔ̃ bɛkɛna awãwã mɔ nsɛntsɛlɛni fɔtsa pii a.
Fɔyaya kĩ bati nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ sɛ̃ nɛ kutsu nviã kamɛ, badi tomɔ Yudafɔ a ade badi lɛmɛ tomɔ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a.

Nɛ lɔkɔ a kamɛ a, bamatɔnɛ a badi, Yudafɔ mɔ be banɔkɔɛ̃ a flee yidza kĩ bayaaha be, bɛnɔ be boe. Kĩ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a nu foe a bilo bɛnaa Likaonia tɛmatɔ a kĩ tɛnyɛ Listra mɔ Derbe mɔ tikĩ tideĩ nɛ kayite a kamɛ.

Nɛ lɔkɔ a kamɛ a, bamatɔnɛ a badi, Yudafɔ mɔ be banɔkɔɛ̃ a flee yidza kĩ bayaaha be, bɛnɔ be boe. Kĩ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a nu foe a bilo bɛnaa Likaonia tɛmatɔ a kĩ tɛnyɛ Listra mɔ Derbe mɔ tikĩ tideĩ nɛ kayite a kamɛ.
Ade bɛnalɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a nɛ awã a.
Kĩ biwo Listra a bɛmɔ́ onyole odi kĩ eveliveli. Kito nɛ ye lɛmawi ɛtápuli eyidza ɛtsã da.
Edzi nɛ awã ɛkatse fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Paulo kalɛ a. Kĩ Paulo mɔ eyi ɔsũ kĩ oti kĩĩ tɛ edo kĩ baapuli bɛtsa ye sũ ni,
ɛdã ɔsɔnɛ a koee ade ɛlɛ kɔɔba kĩ, “Yidza kadza ɔkpalɛ!” Onyole kĩĩ ta eyidza ade edo kato katɛ̃ awɛ a.
Kĩ bati a kĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ awã batse kalɛ a mɔ́ lɛtsa a kĩ Paulo kɛna a, bɛbɔa fɔwɔla nɛ Likaonia tide kamɛ kĩ, “Baviɔ̃ banɛ, bɛka bɛya ndɛ batidziwa aye nɛ boe kayite!”
Foesũ bite Barnaba dĩ kĩ Zeus. Bite Paulo lɛmɛ kĩ Herme, kitonɛkĩ ade ye lɛdza ɛkalɛ kɔdzɛla a.
Adeke Zeus oviɔ̃late a kĩ ye kuviɔ̃la kpale dza nɛ ɔmatɔ ɔbaɛ̃ a, nakpã banantsue ɛbɔɛ flawasi lɛka lɛmɛ ɛyamɛna nɛ ɔmatɔ a kɔbã onyukpɛ̃ kĩ bayaabɔa afɔliɛ bɛkpa fɔtɔ banyanɛ a.
Kĩ Paulo mɔ Barnaba nu lɛtsa kĩ bati a wɛ kĩ bakɛna a, bɛyɛlɛ be akũ tɛtadiɛ. Foesũ biwula atsɛ biwo nɛ bati a kamɛ, bɛbɔa fɔwɔla kĩ,

“Nda amɛ, nde sũ miakɛna fukĩĩ odu? Boe malo batidziwa bɔanɛ ndɛ mi aye. Bɔya nɛ awĩ kĩ bɔkɔa kalɛ wĩ a bɔma mi. Mifɔ̃ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔlá kayɔ kakɛna lɔkɔa midani mimu Baguma kĩ edzi nkpã a. Ade ye lɛkɛna tite mɔ ode, mpo mɔ fɔtsa a kĩ fudeĩ nɛ foe kamɛ a flee a!
Kɔkɔɛ a ɛnyɛ anɛ nɛ batidziwa flee akũ ɛfɔ̃ bɛkakɛna lɛtsa a kĩ bawɛ a.

Lɛmɛ ebuki yanyɛ ye fɔkɛlatsa katsa boe kĩ fɔatsa kĩ nuwĩ edzi nkpã. Lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ fɔtsa deĩ kĩ fɔakai boe ye tudzuma wĩ a. Yakpa boe oni lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ, fudutsa nɛ lɔkɔ wĩ akũ, funitsã mɔ kawɔlɛ lɛmɛ.”
Titɔ kĩ bɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ lɔmɔ malo ni, fɔna ɔsĩ fɔmɔ bati a fɔ̃ afɔliɛ kabɔa kakpa be.
Ade Yudafɔ badi to Antiokia nɛ Pisidia, mɔ Ikonio bɛyadani bati a adzuni a. Bɛfɔ̃ bɛtalɛ Paulo boe bɛvɛlɛ ye bɛnɛmɛna nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ nɛ kĩ bɛkɔna kĩ eku sũ.
Lɛmɛ kĩ batɛ badonɛ a yatsɛna nɛ ye akũ a, eyidza ɛdza ade emuniki ɛnaa ɔmatɔ a kamɛ a. Kĩ kade nyina a, bɛmɔ Barnaba bɛdzakũ bɛnaa Derbe.
Paulo mɔ Barnaba de lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ nɛ Derbe, ade bɛna batɛ badonɛ pii nɛ awã a. Bimuniki bito awã bɛnaa Listra, Ikonio mɔ Antiokia nɛ Pisidia.
Awã na bɛdɛ batɛ badonɛ a, bido be kɔbɛ̃ lɛmɛ kĩ bidi ɔnɔkɔali nɛ be katɛkado kamɛ. Ade bibi be lɛmɛ kĩ, “Kɛnɛ kĩ bɔtsã lubo kamɔ pii kamɛ fɔmɔ bɔawo nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ.”
Ade ke Paulo mɔ Barnaba pau lɔtɔ banyanɛ bɛkpa asɔli adi nyɛ adi a. Bɛtsã mpaɛbɔ mɔ onukpɛ̃ kasui kamɛ bɛkɔa be bido nɛ boe Ɔlate a kĩ bɛtɛ bido a awɛ.
Ade kĩ bimini nɛ Pisidia tɛmatɔ kamɛ biyua a, bɛdani bɛnaa Pamfilia tite kamɛ.
Bɛlɛ kalɛ wĩ a nɛ Perge fɔmɔ bɛtɛ̃ bɛnaa Atalia.
Ade awã binyina mpo bɛnaa Antiokia, awã kĩ bɛnya lɔtɔ bɛkɔa be bido nɛ Baguma awɛ kamɛ nɛ adzuma a kĩ bɛkɛna biyua finyaa a.
Kĩ biwo Antiokia a, bɛkpɔta batɛ badonɛ a flee nɛ awã, bɛbɔa be osi akũ amandiɛ. Ade bibi be fɔtsa flee a kĩ Baguma kɛna ɛtsãmɛna be akũ mɔ ayekĩ ebinya katɛkado osi ɛkpa bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a.
Bidzi nɛ batɛ badonɛ nɛ Antiokia sɛkɛ̃ owi buna kɔlaa.
Kĩ Paulo mɔ Barnaba na nɛ Antiokia a, bati badi to Yudea bɛyatsa batɛ badonɛ nɛ awã fɔtsa kĩ, “Miláana katɛ mbɔɛntɛ bitsua mi lɛkpati nɛ Mose mbla a onukpɛ̃.”

Lɛmɛ Paulo mɔ Barnaba vɛlɛ foe mɔ be mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ. Nɛ foesũ bɛnyɛ batɛ badonɛ a badi kĩ bito Antiokia kĩ bitomɔ be bɛnaa Yerusalem lɔkɔa bɛmɔ fɔtɔ banyanɛ mɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Yerusalem a bɛwɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kamɛ.
Foesũ batɛ badonɛ a yi be osi. Bɛnatsã Foenike mɔ Samaria bɛsɛla batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ awã, ade bibi be ayekĩ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a kɔa be akũ bɛkpa Baguma a. Fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ de be kawɔlɛ paa.
Kĩ biwo Yerusalem a, batɛ badonɛ a, fɔtɔ banyanɛ a mɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a flee tɛ be mɔ kawɔlɛ. Paulo mɔ Barnaba bɔa be amandiɛ nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ Baguma kɛna ɛtsãmɛna be akũ a flee.
Lɛmɛ Farisifɔ batɛ badonɛ badi yidza bɛdza ade bɛlɛ kĩ, “Kɛnɛ kĩ batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a bitsua fɔkpati lɔkɔa bɛkɛna nɛ Mose mbla a akũ.”
Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ banɔkɔɛ̃ a mɔ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a tsɛna bɛkɔna fɔlɛtsa a akũ.

Kĩ bɛsa foe kamɛ fɛɛ a, Petro yidza ɛdza ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, miawɛ minyina kĩ lɔkɔ lidi Baguma pau yĩ etomɛna mi kamɛ kĩ nnaabi bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a Kalɛ Wĩ a, ayekĩ be malo baanu ke bɛtɛ bido lɛmɛ.
Ade Baguma kĩ enyina otidziwa kakɔna a nyɛ ye kawɛ ɛtsa nɛ kĩ ɛkpa be Hũhũ Kpalɛwa ndɛ ayekĩ ɛkpa boe malo a.
Ɛtátsa ntsitsemu adima nɛ bɔmɔ́ be kayite, kitonɛkĩ ɛtɛ be nɛ ayekĩ bɛtɛ bido sũ, ade ɛkɔa be tɔkpa ete be ndɛ boe aye a.
Finyaakĩĩ, nde sũ bɔasɔ Baguma bɔdã? Nde sũ bɔkɔa fɔlɔtsa a kĩ bɔmɔ́ boe bawanyɔ bɔtápuli bɔlɔ a bɔate nɛ batɛ badonɛ kĩĩ akũ?
Oowo! Ndɛ ayekĩ bɔtɛ budo kĩ boe a flee bɔna katɛ fɔtsã boe Ɔlate Yesu kɔnyakamɔ kamɛ a, ade ayea be malo bɛna katɛ a.”
Ade ke be flee bɛkɛna dĩĩ, bitse Paulo mɔ Barnaba amandiɛ kabɔa nɛ ayekĩ Baguma tsã be akũ ɛkɛna awãwã fɔtsa ɛkpa bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a.
Kĩ bɛbɔa amandiɛ biyua a, Yakobo lɛmɛ yidza ɛdza ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mitse!
Simon Petro bi boe ayekĩ Baguma nya lɔtɔ ɛnyɛ ye kawɛ ɛtsa bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a, ade ɛpau be badi kĩ bɛnya ye bade a.
Ade Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛlɛ biyi a ketimɔ fukĩĩ pɛpɛɛpɛ ndɛ ayekĩ katsɛlɛ kpalɛwa fɔlɛtsa a lɛ kĩ,
‘Nɛ fukĩĩ liti ni, maamuniki ĩya.
Maayalɔla Dawid lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kadzɛla,
ade maalɔla fɔtsa a kĩ fubu kade nɛ awã kake a,
lɔkɔa awã libuki kɛdza pintii.
Ade bati nkaɛ a aaya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃,
mɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a kĩ nvɛ
kĩ bɛnya yĩ bade a aatomɔ yĩ liti.
Ade aye boe Ɔlate lɛ eyi anɛ kɔkɔɛ kĩ yaakɛna a.’
“Foesũ nɛ yĩ, Yakobo, kakɔna onukpɛ̃ ni, kɛtánɛ kĩ bɔaha bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a kĩ bɛkɔa be akũ bakpa Baguma a.
Mbom mifɔ̃ bɔtsɛlɛ ovoli bɔma be kĩ bɛfɔ̃ fukĩĩ bamɛ ndɛ bayaɛ kĩ bɛkɔa bɛbɔa afɔliɛ bɛkpa baviɔ̃ kaba, bɛfɔ̃ litsolewɛ mɔ linyolewɛ, bɛfɔ̃ ɔyaɛ kĩ bɛtátsua ye sɔmɔ kaba mɔ babɔanɛ kanya.
Kitonɛkĩ kito anɛ kɔkɔɛ a bakã Mose mbla a kĩ ɛtsɛlɛ eyi a nɛ Kawɛya Luwi lidi nyɛ lidi akũ nɛ Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ ade bade lɛtsã nɛ ye fɔlɛtsa akũ nɛ ɔmatɔ nyɛ ɔmatɔ kamɛ a.”

Ade ke fɔtɔ banyanɛ, banɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ batɛ badonɛ a flee kɛna onukpɛ̃ mɔa kĩ bɛnyɛ be kamɛ badi bibumɔ Paulo mɔ Barnaba bɛnaa Antiokia a. Bɛpau bati nviã kĩ batɛ badonɛ a akpa be obu paa. Ade be nyɛ Yuda kĩ bibuki bavɛ Barnaba mɔ Sila a.
Ovoli a kĩ bɛnɛɛ banamɛna a kamɛ fɔlɛtsa nyɛ kĩ,
Ovoli kĩĩ to boe fɔtɔ banyanɛ, banɔkɔɛ̃, mɔ batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Yerusalem sɛkɛ̃. Bɔawɔ̃na mi, boe bawaɛ̃ kĩ minyɛ́ Yudafɔ a kĩ mito Antiokia, Siria mɔ Kilikia.
Bunu kĩ batɛ badonɛ badi to boe kamɛ nɛ awĩ bɛyabi mi fɔlɛtsa fudi kĩ fɔha mi fudo ɔtutũ lɛmɛ nɛ mi kamɛ. Lɛmɛ nnɛ́ boe lido be.
Nɛ foesũ bɔtsa fɔlɔ buke otse kĩ bɔado batɔ nviã nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃. Baatomɔ boe bawaɛ̃ nviã Barnaba mɔ Paulo, kĩ bɛkɔa be nkpã bɛkpa boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo ɔsum a.
Nɛ foesũ bɔtsa fɔlɔ buke otse kĩ bɔado batɔ nviã nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃. Baatomɔ boe bawaɛ̃ nviã Barnaba mɔ Paulo, kĩ bɛkɔa be nkpã bɛkpa boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo ɔsum a.
Budo Yuda mɔ Sila kĩ be mɔa awɛ bibi mi fɔlɛtsa a kĩ foe bɔtsɛlɛ a.
Kitonɛkĩ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a mɔ boe mɔawɛ a bɔmɔ́ buyi ɔsũ kĩ kɛtánɛ kĩ bɔakɔa fɔlɔtsa kpale bɔlɔla mi kɛba tɛbla sĩwa kĩĩ.

Ade te nyɛ kĩ mitanya funitsã kĩ bɛkɔa bɛbɔa afɔliɛ bɛkpa baviɔ̃, mitanya babɔanɛ, mitaba ɔyaɛ kĩ bɛtátsua ye sɔmɔ, mipi mi akũ nɛ linyolewɛ mɔ litsolewɛ kamɛ. Ntɛ mipi mi akũ limii ni, katinya kamɛ aalɛ kɛkpa mi.
Midzi nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ.
Foesũ bɛnyɛ batɔ kĩĩ osi bɛnaa Antiokia. Bɛnakpɔta batɛ badonɛ a flee nɛ be katsɛnakɔ̃ a, ade bɛkɔa ovoli a bɛkpa be a.
Kawɔlɛ de bati a nɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛkã nɛ ovoli a kamɛ a sũ.
Yuda mɔ Sila kĩ bɛnyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ nyɛ fɔlɛtsa pii kayɔ bɛtsa be nɛ lɔkɔ gɛlɛɛlɛ kamɛ, bido be kɔbɛ̃ lɛmɛ.
Bidzi nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ bɛtɛ fuwi fudi, ade batɛ badonɛ a nyɛ be osi nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ kĩ bimuniki bɛnaa Yerusalem a.
Lɛmɛ Sila kɔ̃ wɛ kĩ yakahɔ nɛ awã.
Paulo mɔ Barnaba dzi nɛ Antiokia sukuloo. Bɛmɔ bati bɛbã pii bɛtsa fɔtsa ade bɛkade lɛtsã nɛ boe Ɔlate kalɛ a akũ a.
Nɛ fuwi fudi liti ni, Paulo bi Barnaba kĩ, “Fɔ̃ bumuniki bɔnaasɛla boe bawaɛ̃ nɛ tɛmatɔ a kĩ bɔtsã te kamɛ bude lɛtsã nɛ boe Ɔlate kalɛ a akũ a, lɔkɔa bɔdã ni nde bidzi.”
Barnaba tunɔ ade ɛwɛ kĩ bakpã Yohanes Marko bibumɔ be akũ a.
Lɛmɛ Paulo tátunɔ kɔlaa kitonɛkĩ, kĩ bɛnaa Pamfilia a, Yohanes Marko dzakũ ɛfɔnɛ be nɛ awã ade ɛtábumɔ be biyua adzuma a.
Bati nviã kĩĩ vɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa a mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ ade fɔfɔ̃ bɛyalɛ a. Barnaba kpã Marko ade binyina mpo bɛnaa Kipro a.
Paulo lɛmɛ kpã Sila ade batɛ badonɛ a kɔa be bido nɛ boe Ɔlate awɛ kĩ ɛmɔ be kɔnya fɔmɔ bɛdzakũ a.
Ɛtsã Siria mɔ Kilikia tite kamɛ ɛkado tɛsɔli nɛ awã a kɔbɛ̃.
Ade Paulo dzakũ ɛnaa ɔmatɔ odi kĩ bavɛ Derbe, ade ɛtɛ̃ ɛnaa Listra lɛmɛ a. Ade awã ɛnamɔ ɔtɛ odonɛ odi kĩ bavɛ Timoteo a. Ɔma nyɛ Yudani kĩ ɛtɛ Kristo edo. Lɛmɛ ɔlɛga kɔ̃ nyɛ Grikini.
Batɛ badonɛ flee a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Listra mɔ Ikonio bɔa Timoteo dĩ wĩ.
Ade ye Paulo wɛ kĩ yakpã ɛnamɛna a, foesũ etsua ye lɛkpati, kitonɛkĩ Yudafɔ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ kayite a na nyina kĩ ɔlɛga nyɛ Grikini.
Ade kĩ bɛdzakũ a, bɛtsã bimini nɛ tɛmatɔ a kamɛ, bibi be tɛbla a kĩ fɔtɔ banyanɛ mɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ nɛ Yerusalem ke otse nɛ te akũ a. Bɛdɛ be kĩ bɛkɛna nɛ te akũ.
Foesũ luwi daa bati a kapɔ ade be katɛkado lɛmɛ na ɔsĩ kibu a.
Ke liti a, bɛtsã Frigia mɔ Galatia tite a kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a tákpa be osi kĩ bɛnaade lɛtsã kalɛ wĩ a akũ nɛ Asia tite akũ.
Kĩ biwo Misia tite ɔbaɛ̃ a, bɛwɛ kĩ bawo nɛ Bitinia tite kamɛ, lɛmɛ Yesu Hũhũ a tákpa be osi.
Foesũ bimuniki bɛtsã Misia bɛnawo Troa ɔmatɔ a kĩ ɛwaa nɛ mpo abuĩ a kamɛ.
Ke lɛnyɛ a, Paulo na kanyɛkatsa nɛ kɔda kamɛ. Nɛ kɔda a kamɛ a, ɛmɔ onyole odi kĩ eto Makedonia, ɛdza ɛlamɛna ye aduli kake kĩ, “Nyina mpo kaya nɛ Makedonia kayaabumɔ boe!”
Kĩ Paulo na kanyɛkatsa kĩĩ sũ ni, bɔmanɛ akũ bupi Makedonia osi, kitonɛkĩ fɔatsa kĩ Baguma lɛvɛ boe kĩ bɔnaade lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ nɛ awã.
Ade ke budzi nɛ ɔkɔlɔ kamɛ nɛ Troa bunyina kpĩĩ bɔnaa Samotrake a. Kĩ kade nyina a, buwo Neapoli.
Kĩ buto awã a, bɔnawo Filipi kĩ ɛnyɛ Makedonia ɔmatɔ kpale flee a kamɛ. Awã lɛmɛ nyɛ tite kĩ Romafɔ adãmɛna te akũ. Budzi nɛ awã fuwi fudi.
Nɛ Kawɛya Luwi akũ a, bɔnɛ nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ bɔnaa ɔwɔ abuĩ, awã kĩ bɔkɔna kĩ Yudafɔ atsɛna kabɔa mpaɛ. Ade budzi nɛ awã bɔkatsa batsole a kĩ bɛkpɔta nɛ awã Baguma kalɛ a.

Bavɛ be kamɛ ɔmɔa kĩ eto Tiatira kĩ Lidia. Yanɔ tilima ngbã, ade ɛnyɛ oti kĩ yasum Baguma yededeede a. Ade lɔkɔ a kĩ ɛna nɛ awã ɛkatse boe a, Baguma binya ye ɔwɔlɛ kĩ ɛtɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Paulo kalɛ a edo.

Ade kĩ ye mɔ ye tɔtɔ kamɛ bati flee bɛtɛ mui kawɔla amaniɛ a, eke boe aduli kĩ, “Ntɛ mitunɔ kĩ ntɛ boe Ɔlate ndo paa kɔ̃ ni, miyaadzi nɛ yĩ tɔtɔ kamɛ” Ɛdza nɛ boe akũ flee kɛnawo kĩ butunɔ bɔnaa ye sɛkɛ̃.
Luwi mɔa lidi kĩ bɔanaa mpaɛ kabɔakɔ̃ a, bɔtsɛlamɔ oyitsɔ̃ abawa adi kĩ hũhũ kpa deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ, fɔafɔ̃ yapuli kadã kanɔkɔnɛ. Nɛ foesũ yakɛna sika baũ kakpa ye balate.
Oyitsɔ̃ kĩĩ tomɔ boe mɔ Paulo mɔ fɔwɔla kabɔa kĩ, “Baguma Kpale basumunɛ bati kĩĩ anɛ, ade bɛya nɛ awĩ kĩ bayaatsa mi nkpã kana osi a!”
Fukĩĩ na nkɔsu fuwi pii. Ade kĩ fuwo Paulo odo a, ɛdani ebi hũhũ a kĩ etomɔ oyitsɔ̃ a kĩ, “Nɛ Yesu Kristo dĩ akũ, mabi nɔ kĩ nɛ́ nɛ oti a kamɛ!” Lɛtalɛta hũhũ kpa a nɛ́ nɛ ye kamɛ.
Kĩ ye balate a mɔ́ kĩ osi a kĩ ye akũ batsã kana sika yɛla be a, bipi Paulo mɔ Sila bɛma fɔlɛtsa badzɛnɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ a nɛ kɔya.
Bɛlɛ nɛ kɔya kĩ, “Bati kĩĩ nyɛ Yudafɔ kĩ bɛyaabula boe ɔmatɔ a kade.
Batsa bati fɔtsa kĩ boe ndɛ Romafɔ bɔláapuli bɔtɛ foe.”
Ade bati kɔdabu a yidza bɛdza bisinya Paulo mɔ Sila, bido be katsootsoo awɛ a.
Fɔlɛtsa badzɛnɛ a fɔ̃ bɛyɛlɛ tɛtadiɛ nɛ be akũ, ade bɛkpa kɔbɛ̃ kĩ bibo be mɔ kutse a.
Kĩ bibo be kabo kpa biyua a, bɛnado be nɛ kɔla, ade bibi ekĩ yadãmɛna bikĩ bɛwaa kɔla akũ a kĩ ɛbalɛ Paulo mɔ Sila kabalɛ wĩ.
Kĩ bibi ye lɔmɔ sũ ni, ɛnado be nɛ kamɛ flee a, ade ɛbɔa be agba a.
Lɛnyɛ kayite a, kĩ Paulo mɔ Sila kabɔa mpaɛ mɔ tɔnɔ kasã kakpa Baguma a, kɔlabawanɛ nkaɛ a katse be.
Ade deedimɔapɛ tite kuna mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ ade kɔla a flee kuna kɔnake a. Lɛtalɛta kɔla tupunu a flee binya ade nkɔsɔnkɔsɔ a wɔlɔ nɛ kɔlabawanɛ a flee akũ tɛtɔ a.
Kĩ kɔlabawanɛ akũ ɔdãmɛnanɛ a nyinya a, ɛmɔ kĩ kɔla a tunyukpɛ̃ flee waa luto. Ɛkɔna kĩ kɔlabawanɛ a nɛ bilo sũ ni, ɛbɔlɛ lɛpamɛ ɛnyɛ kĩ yatsɔɛ ye akũ ekɔ.
Lɛmɛ Paulo bɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba kĩ, “Takɛna nɔ akũ lɛtsama. Boe a flee budeĩ nɛ awĩ!”
Kɔla bawanɛ akũ ɔdãmɛnanɛ a fɔ̃ bɛma ye ɔsɛdza ade nɛ kukũtila kamɛ ewula atsɛ ɛnatɔ nɛ Paulo mɔ Sila abɔa kamɛ.
Ade ke ɛnyɛ be nɛ kɔla a kamɛ, evia be kĩ, “Nda amɛ, litsa kɛnɛ kĩ nkɛna nna katɛ?”
Bibi ye kĩ, “Tɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu kado lɔkɔa mimɔ nɔ tɔtɔ kamɛ bati flee míana katɛ.”
Ade ke bɛnaa bɛnade lɛtsã nɛ boe Ɔlate kalɛ akũ bɛkpa ye tɔtɔ kamɛ bati a flee a.
Lɛnyɛ a na, ɛkpã be ɛnasu be fɔkpa, ade ye mɔ ye tɔtɔ kamɛ bati bɛtɛ mui kawɔla amaniɛ a.
Ɛkpã Paulo mɔ Sila ɛnamɛna ye awã, ade ɛkpa be funitsã bɛnya a. Ye mɔ ye tɔtɔ kamɛ bati a flee bɛmɔ́ kawɔlɛ paa kitonɛkĩ bɛtɛ Baguma bido.
Kĩ kade nyina a, ɔmatɔ a kamɛ fɔlɛtsa badzɛnɛ do fɔtɔ banyanɛ bɛnabi kɔlabawanɛ akũ ɔdãmɛnanɛ a kĩ, “Fɔnɛ bati a awɛ bɛnaa.”
Kɔla bawanɛ akũ ɔdãmɛnanɛ a bi Paulo mɔ Sila kĩ, “Fɔlɛtsa badzɛnɛ a bo nfɔnɛ mi awɛ midzakũ. Foesũ minaa faa nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ.”

Lɛmɛ Paulo bi batɔ a kĩ, “Bibo boe nɛ kanade nɛ lɔkɔ kĩ bɛtádzɛmɔ boe bɛkɔ boe kɔtɔ, ade bido boe nɛ kɔla kamɛ a, titɔ kĩ Romafɔ bɔanɛ. Ade finyaa kɔ̃ bawɛ kĩ bɔdzakũ nɛ kabɛla kamɛ? Oowo! Ke kɔ̃ nviã nɛ awĩ! Fɔ̃ be mɔawɛ a bɛyaanyɛ boe!”
Ade ke fɔtɔ banyanɛ a muniki bɛnabi fɔlɛtsa badzɛnɛ a ɔlɛdo a. Kĩ binu kĩ Paulo mɔ Sila nyɛ Romafɔ a, libe wo be paa.
Foesũ bɛnaa be sɛkɛ̃ bɛnakpa be sɛmɛ bɔɛɛ, ade bɛnyɛ be nɛ kɔla a kamɛ a. Bike be aduli kĩ bɛdzakũ nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ bɛnaa kakɔ bɛbã.
Paulo mɔ Sila dzakũ bɛnaa Lidia awã. Ade awã bɛnamɔ batɛ badonɛ bɛbã a. Bido be kɔbɛ̃ bibu ade bɛdzakũ a.
Paulo mɔ Sila tsã bito Amfipoli mɔ Apolonia bɛyawo Tesalonika, awã kĩ Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ kadi na.
Ndɛ ayekĩ Paulo awɛ kakɛna a, ɛnaa Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ a Kawɛya Fuwi ɛlalɛ etomɔ akũ, ɛnyɛ fɔlɛtsa kayɔ ɛtsa bati a.
Ɛnyɛ lubo a kĩ bɛlɛ biyi kĩ Kristo aayamɔ, mɔ ayekĩ yaabuki eyidza edzi nkpã ɛtsa. Ebi be kĩ, “Oti a kĩ ye akũ fɔlɛtsa nlamɔ mi kabi a nyɛ Yesu Kristo a.”

Fɔlɛtsa a kĩ foe kayɔ ɛnyɛ ɛtsa nɛ awĩ fɔ̃ bati a badi dani be adzuni, ade bɛtɛ bido bitomɔ Paulo mɔ Sila a. Ade aye a nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ, Grikifɔ pii kĩ bipi be akũ nɛ Baguma kavila kamɛ, mɔ batsole pii kĩ obu deĩ nɛ be akũ lɛmɛ dani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ bitomɔ Baguma.

Lɛmɛ anɛ bɛɛlɛ Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a, ade ke bɛnawɛ patapaafɔ nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ bibumɔ be akũ bido ɔtutũ nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ a. Bɛbɔa obũ bɛkɛna dede bɛnawo nɛ Yason tɔtɔ kamɛ kĩ bapi Paulo mɔ Sila bɛnamɛna ɔmatɔ a katsɛnakɔ̃.
Kĩ bɛtamɔ be sũ ni, bɛvɛlɛ Yason mɔ batɛ badonɛ badi bɛnamɛna katsɛnakɔ̃ a. Awã na bɛkabɔa fɔwɔla kĩ, “Bati badi tsɛ̃mɔ ɔtutũ kado nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ, ade bɛkɔa foe bɛyamɛna nɛ awĩ kĩĩ lɛmɛ a.
Ade Yason lɛmɛ tɛ be edo nɛ ye tɔtɔ kamɛ a. Bati kĩĩ yidza bɛdza nɛ Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ Kaisare tɛbla akũ. Ade batsa kĩ onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Yesu nyɛ Lɛgã a.”
Kĩ kɔdabu a mɔ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ nu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a fɔha be paa.
Banɔkɔɛ̃ a fɔ̃ Yason mɔ ye bade a se be akũ liti kadza kɔtɔ ade bɛfɔnɛ be awɛ a.
Kĩ kade sila kɛdɔ pɛ, batɛ badonɛ a kpã Paulo mɔ Sila bilo bɛnaa Beroia. Kĩ biwo awã a, bɛnaa Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ a.
Beroia bati a tsua linebi bɛba bikĩ nɛ Tesalonika a. Biyi atɔ bitse kalɛ a. Luwi nyɛ luwi bɛkasa Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ fɔlɛtsa kadã ntɛ lɛtsa a kĩ Paulo kabi be a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali.
Foesũ be kamɛ bati pii tɛ bido. Grikifɔ batsole pii kĩ obu deĩ nɛ be akũ mɔ banyole pii lɛmɛ tɛ bido.
Lɛmɛ kĩ Yudafɔ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Tesalonika nu kĩ Paulo ya ɛlamɛna Baguma kalɛ a katsa nɛ Beroia, bɛnaa awã bɛnado ɔtutũ nɛ bati a kamɛ.
Batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ awã a kpã Paulo mɔatsɛ mɔatsɛ bɛnamɛna mpo abuĩ. Lɛmɛ Sila mɔ Timoteo kɔ̃ kahɔ nɛ Beroia.
Bikĩ biyi Paulo osi a naa flee bɛnawo Atene. Ade awã bimuniki a, ade Paulo kpa ɔlɛdo kĩ bibi Sila mɔ Timoteo kĩ bɛya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ mɔatsɛ.
Kĩ Paulo na nɛ Atene ɛkadzɔlɛ Sila mɔ Timoteo a, ɛtɛ kalɔɛ nɛ ayekĩ ɛmɔ kĩ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ flee yi mɔ baviɔ̃ kasum.
Foesũ ɛnanyɛ fɔlɛtsa kamɛ ɛtsa Yudafɔ a mɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a kĩ basum Baguma a, mɔ bikĩ batɛ̃ nɛ kɔya luwi daa a.
Bati kutsu kudi kĩ bɛnyɛ Epikurofɔ mɔ Stoafɔ kĩ bideĩ katinya kamɛ kadikanyi kavɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa mɔ Paulo. Badi via kĩ, “Litsa fɔlɛtsa koũ oti kĩĩ wɛ kĩ yalɛ?”
Bati bɛbã lɛmɛ kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Fɔadã ndɛ kade bɛbã baviɔ̃ akũ fɔlɛtsa ɛlamɛna kalɛ.” Bɛlɛ foe lɔmɔ kitonɛkĩ binu kĩ Paulo de lɛtsã nɛ Yesu mɔ bati kayidza kato kanɔkpa akũ.
Nɛ foesũ bɛkpã ye bɛnɛmɛna be ɔmatɔ a banɔkɔɛ̃ katsɛnakɔ̃ nɛ Areopago, ade bibi ye kĩ, “Bɔawɛ kĩ bɔanu fɔlɛtsa vɔɛ̃ a kĩ ɔlamɛna katsa a kayɔ.
Nɛ kĩ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ɔlamɛna kalɛ a kamɛ tákpalɛ boe sũ ni, bɔawɛ butse foe kamɛ.”
Atenefɔ mɔ banɔvɔɛ̃ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ awã awɛ be lɔkɔ flee kakpa fɔlɛtsa vɔɛ̃ katse mɔ foe akũ kɔlɔmɛna.
Ade Paulo yidza ɛdza nɛ bati a anɛ kamɛ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Atenefɔ! Mmɔ́ kĩ nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɛ ni, miapi mi ɔsum kadunamɔ akũ paa.

Kitonɛkĩ kĩ ntsɛ̃ nɛ ɔmatɔ kamɛ ndã mi fɔtsa kumɛkumɛ a kĩ miasum a ni, mmɔ́ kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ afɔliɛ kabɔa de lidi akũ kĩ, ‘Bɔkɔa bɔakpa Baguma a kĩ bunyína a.’ Baguma a kĩ minyina, lɛmɛ miabɔa afɔliɛ kakpa ye a, ade ye akũ fɔlɛtsa nlamɛna mi kabi finyaakĩĩ a.
“Baguma kĩĩ nyɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa Ɔlate, kĩ ɛbɔa tite mɔ ode mɔ fɔtsa flee a kĩ fudeĩ nɛ foe kamɛ. Yaádzi nɛ kɔla a kĩ batidziwa ke mɔ awɛ a kamɛ.
Ɛtási boe lɛtsama kĩ bɔkɔa awɛ bɔkɛna a, kitonɛkĩ ye mɔawɛ akpa oti nkpã mɔ kawɛya, mɔ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ lisĩ oti.
Ɛnyɛ fude fude bati a a flee etomɛna otidziwa mɔapɛ kamɛ kĩ bidzi nɛ tite akũ. Ye mɔawɛ liyi lɔkɔ mɔ fudzikɔ̃ tɛbɛ̃ ɛkpa bati flee.
Baguma kɛna fukĩĩ ayekĩ boe batidziwa baawɛ ye liti osi bɔmɔ́ ye, titɔ kĩ ɛláa mɔ lugo nɛ boe sɛkɛ̃ malo.
Kitonɛkĩ ndɛ ayekĩ mi tɔnɔ bamɛnɛ badi alɛ kĩ, ‘Ade ye dzi fɔ̃ budzi, bɔtsɛ̃ budeĩ nkpã a.’ Ade bɛlɛ lɛmɛ kĩ, ‘Boe malo bɔnyɛ ye kasinu a kamɛ babi.’
“Nɛ kĩ bɔnyɛ Baguma babi sũ ni, kɛtáfɛta kĩ bɔakɔna kĩ Baguma kutitse la ndɛ litsedi kĩ batidziwa kɔa awɛ bɛmɛ mɔ sika ngbã, suwovoe ĩye futse.
Kito anɛ katinya kayɔkayi kɛyawo nviã kĩĩ a, Baguma távɛlɛ bati sɔtɔ kitonɛkĩ bɛtányi ye sũ. Lɛmɛ finyaakɔ̃ ɛkpa ɔlɛdo kĩ bati flee nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ bɛdani be tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ.

Kitonɛkĩ ehihiɛ luwi eyi kĩ de akũ oti a kĩ ɛpau a, aadzɛmɔ katinya kamɛ flee nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ. Kĩ yaakɛna fukĩĩ sũ ni, ɛdzɛla Oti a Kĩ Baguma bɔa Tɔdɔ̃ a etomɛna kanɔkpa ade ke ɛnyɛ ye ɛtsa bati flee a!”
Kĩ binu kĩ Paulo lɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ kayidza kato kanɔkpa akũ a, bati a badi di ye nsekuo, ade babɛbã lɛmɛ lɛ kĩ, “Bɔawɛ kĩ bɔabuki butse fɔlɛtsa fudi nɛ oti kabu kayidza a akũ.”
Kĩ fɔya lɔmɔ a, Paulo dzakũ ɛfɔnɛ be.
Lɛmɛ bati a badi tomɔ ye bɛdani bɛkɛna batɛ badonɛ. Be kamɛ badi nyɛ Dionisio, kĩ ɛnyɛ Areopago ɔnɔkɔɛ̃, mɔ otsole odi kĩ bavɛ Damari, mɔ bati bɛbã.
Fukĩĩ liti a, Paulo dzakũ nɛ Atene ɛnaa Korinto.
Nɛ awã a ɛmɔ Yudani odi kĩ bavɛ Akwila kĩ eto Ponto. Bɛmɔ ɔtsɔ̃ Priskila bito Italia bɛya nɛ awã owi tábuna, kitonɛkĩ lɛgã a kĩ bavɛ Klaudio si mbla kĩ Yudafɔ flee bɛnɛ nɛ Roma. Paulo naa ɛnamɔ be,
ade ɛna nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ ɛkabumɔ be adzuma, nɛ kĩ bɛmɔ be bakɛna adzuma mɔa sũ. Bɛkɔa bayaɛ tuvoli bɛkapam tilima fɔla fɔtsa ndɛ ayekĩ Paulo lɛmɛ akɛna a.
Nɛ Kawɛya Luwi lidi nyɛ lidi akũ ni, Paulo kanaa Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃, kanaanyɛ fɔlɛtsa kamɛ katsa Yudafɔ mɔ Grikifɔ, kĩ bɛdani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ.
Kĩ Sila mɔ Timoteo to Makedonia bɛya a, Paulo na aya koũ ede lɛtsã nɛ kalɛ wĩ a akũ, ade edi adansiɛ ɛtsa Yudafɔ a kĩ Yesu nyɛ Kristo a.

Lɛmɛ kĩ Yudafɔ a yidza bɛdza nɛ ye akũ bɛlɛ fuvũnatsa nɛ ye akũ sũ ni, ɛkpa ye akũ eko be ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ miyɛla ni, mi mɔawɛ aatɛ foe sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ. Yĩ akũ kpalɛ, ntáku kɔtɔ. Kito finyaakĩĩ kanaa ni, maanaa bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a sɛkɛ̃ nnaabi be kalɛ wĩ kĩĩ.”
Kĩ ɛdzakũ nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ a, ɛnadzi nɛ onyole odi kĩ ɛnyɛ Yudani kĩ bavɛ Tito Yusto tɔtɔ kamɛ. Ɛnyɛ oti kĩ yasum Baguma ade ye awã lɛmɛ fuãmɔ Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ a.
Katsɛnakɔ̃ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ bavɛ Krispo mɔ ye akũ bati flee tɛ boe Ɔlate bido ade bɛtɛ mui kawɔla amaniɛ a. Ade ayea bɛkɛna Korintofɔ pii a kĩ bɛtɛ bido a mui kawɔla amaniɛ lɛmɛ a.
Luwi a lɛnyɛ ni, Paulo na kanyɛkatsa, ade boe Ɔlate bi ye kĩ, “Tavila. Tafɔ̃ kalɛ wĩ a kalɛ.
Ntomɔ nɔ, odima lɛláapuli ɛkɛna nɔ lɛtsakpa lidima, kitonɛkĩ bati pii kĩ bɛnyɛ yĩ bade lɛmɛ deĩ nɛ ɔmatɔ kĩĩ kamɛ.”
Foesũ Paulo dzi nɛ awã kateli mɔa mɔ sɛkɛ ɛkatsa bati Baguma kalɛ a.
Lɛmɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ bɛyadzina Galio ndɛ Roma abãã ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ nɛ Akaia tite akũ a, Yudafɔ badi tsa fɔlɔ biyidza bɛdza nɛ Paulo akũ, bipi ye bɛnamɛna fɔlɛtsa kadzɛkɔ̃.
Ade ke bibi ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ, “Obi kĩĩ lamɛna bati adzuni kadani kĩ bisum Baguma nɛ osi kĩ etia boe mbla akũ.”
Lɛmɛ kĩ Paulo wɛ kĩ yanyɛ ye akũ onukpɛ̃ pɛ, Galio bi Yudafɔ a kĩ, “Yudafɔ mitse! Ntɛ mi kalɛ kĩ miyamɛna kĩĩ mɔ mfumsu baũ adi yanɛ kɔ̃ ni, kufɛ maana ɔwɔlɛ ntse mi.
Lɛmɛ kĩ fɔnyɛ fɔlɛtsa kamɛ kanyɛ nɛ buĩ mɔ mi tɛmaniɛ akũ sũ ni, mi mɔawɛ minaasa foe kamɛ mimanɛ foe. Fɔnyɛ́ fɔlɛtsa kĩ madzi ndzɛ.”
Foesũ ɛblɔmɛna be ɛnɛmɛna nɛ ye fɔlɛtsakadzɛkɔ̃ a.
Ade bati kɔdabu a napi Sostene kĩ ɛnyɛ Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a bibo nɛ fɔlɛtsa kadzɛkɔ̃ kɔla kamɛ a. Lɛmɛ Galio tákpeti be kɔlaa.

Paulo dzi nɛ Korinto fuwi beblebee. Ke liti a, ɛkla batɛ badonɛ a ade bɛmɔ Akwila mɔ Priskila binyina mpo bɛnaa Siria a. Fɔmɔ Paulo aadzakũ nɛ Kenkrea a, ɛfɔ̃ bɛkpa ye lɔlɔ tsɔlitsɔli nɛ fubo a kĩ ɛlɔ nɛ Yudafɔ amaniɛ osi sũ.
Kĩ biwo Efeso a, ɛdzakũ ɛfɔnɛ Priskila mɔ Akwila nɛ awã. Ɛdzakũ ɛnaa Yudafɔ katsɛnakɔ̃ a ɛnanyɛ fɔlɛtsa kamɛ mɔ Yudafɔ a kĩ bɛna nɛ awã a.
Bati a ke ye aduli kĩ edzi nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ sukuloo a, lɛmɛ ɛtátunɔ.
Nɛ foesũ kĩ yadzakũ a, ebi be kĩ, “Ntɛ fɔnyɛ Baguma kawɛ ni, owi lɛláabuna mɔ maabuki ĩya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃.” Ade ke ewo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ kamɛ ɛdzakũ nɛ Efeso a.
Kĩ ewo Kaisarea a, ɛnaa Yerusalem ɛnawɔ̃na batɛ badonɛ a, ade ebuki ɛtɛ̃ ɛnaa Antiokia a.
Edzi nɛ awã sukuloo ɛtsã emini nɛ Galatia mɔ Frigia tite a kamɛ, ɛkado batɛ badonɛ a kɛbɛ̃.
Nɛ lɔkɔa na kamɛ ni, Yudani odi ya nɛ Efeso. Bavɛ ye Apolo ade bɛma ye nɛ Aleksandria a. Ɛnyɛ oti kĩ enyina kɔdzɛla kalɛ ade enyina Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ fɔlɛtsa lɛmɛ a.
Titɔ kĩ bɛtsa ye fɔtsa nɛ boe Ɔlate kalɛ wĩ a akũ, yalɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ kɔbɛ̃ nɛ Yesu akũ malo ni, Yohanes mui kawɔla amaniɛ akũ fɔlɛtsa odi enyina.
Ɛkalɛ kalɛ mɔ kɔbɛ̃ nɛ katsɛnakɔ̃ a. Kĩ Priskila mɔ Akwila tse ye fɔlɛtsa a, bɛkpã ye bɛnamɛna be awã ade bɛnanyɛ Baguma osi a bɛtsa ye yededeede a.

Kĩ Apolo yake otse kĩ yaanaa Akaia, batɛ badonɛ nɛ Efeso a yado ye kɔbɛ̃. Bɛtsɛlɛ ovoli bɛkpa bikĩ nɛ Akaia kĩ bɛtɛ ye atuu. Kĩ ewo awã a ebumɔ bati pii a kĩ bɛdani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ nɛ Baguma kɔnyakamɔ sũ.
Ade ke ɛnya Yudafɔ a akũ nɛ fɔlɛtsa kavɛlɛ kamɛ a, kitonɛkĩ ɛnyɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ fɔlɛtsa ɛtsa yededeede kĩ Yesu nyɛ Oti a kĩ Bɛbɔa tɔdɔ̃ a.
Kĩ Apolo na nɛ Korinto a, Paulo tsã abɔa, ɛtsã fuyite fuyite a ɛnanɛ nɛ Efeso. Awã naa, ɛmɔ batɛ badonɛ badi.
Ade evia be kĩ, “Kĩ mitɛ mido a ni, mitɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a?”
Ade ke bɛkpa mbuayɛ kĩ “Oowo! Litsa nyɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a? Bɔtánu tɔ̃ foe akũ lɛtsama.”
Ebuki evia be kĩ, “Litsa mui kawɔla amaniɛ mitɛ?”
Ade bibi ye kĩ, “Yohanes mui kawɔla amaniɛ a kĩ ke akũ ede lɛtsã a.”
Paulo nyɛ foe kayɔ ɛtsa be kĩ, “Yohanes kɛna bati mui kawɔla amaniɛ kĩ bɛdani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ. Ade ebi be kĩ bɛtɛ oti a kĩ yaaya nɛ ye Yohanes liti a bido. Ade oti a nyɛ Yesu a.”
Kĩ binu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, bɛfɔ̃ Paulo kɛna be mui kawɔla amaniɛ nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu dĩ akũ.
Ade kĩ Paulo te awɛ nɛ be akũ a, Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a ka ɛyatɛ be flee kamɛ ade bɛlɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ tide ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ kamɛ a, bɛlɛ Baguma kalɛ a lɛmɛ a.
Be lidede aawo ndɛ banyole ewua-nviã.
Paulo kanaa katsɛnakɔ̃ a nɛ tidetɔ ɛlalɛ kamɛ, ɛkabi bati kalɛ wĩ a mɔ ɔwɔlɛ kado. Ɛnyɛ fɔlɛtsa kamɛ ɛtsa be, ɛbɔa mbɔdi kĩ yavɛlɛ be adzuni ɛyamɛna nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanya a akũ a.

Lɛmɛ bati a badi na atɔ ɔsĩ, bɛtátse kalɛ wĩ a, ade bɛlɛ tuwuli kpa nɛ boe Ɔlate Osi Wĩ a akũ nɛ bati a flee anɛ kamɛ a. Foesũ Paulo dzakũ nɛ be sɛkɛ̃, ade ɛkpã bikĩ bɛtɛ bido a ɛnamɛna Tirano kadzikɔ̃. Ade awã ɛkatsa be fɔtsa luwi nyɛ luwi a.
Ɛkɔa futeli nviã ɛtsa be fɔtsa lɔmɔ, ade Yudafɔ mɔ Helafɔ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Asia kamɛ kamɛ a lɛmɛ nu boe Ɔlate kalɛ a.
Baguma kpa Paulo kɔbɛ̃ ɛkɛna awãwã fɔtsa pii.
Ntɛ bɛkɔa ye tuduku mɔ tɛtadiɛ malo bɛtamɔ basɔnɛ ni, bana akũ ɔsi, ade fɔablɔmɛna hũhũ kpa katomɛna bikĩ edeĩ nɛ be kamɛ a kamɛ a.

Ade Yudafɔ bawanɛ badi tsɛ̃ nɛ fɔkɔ kĩ be malo bablɔmɛna hũhũ kpa. Bɛkɔna kĩ baapuli bɛkɔa Yesu dĩ bɛblɔmɛna hũhũ a. Bibi hũhũ kpa a kĩ, “Mablɔmɛna mi nɛ Yesu a kĩ ye fɔlɛtsa Paulo tsɛ̃ yalɛ a dĩ akũ!”
Bikĩ bɛkɛna fukĩĩ nyɛ bawaɛ̃nyole evũkɔnɔ kĩ bɛnyɛ Skeva, Yudafɔ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee babi.
Lɛmɛ kĩ bɛnabi hũhũ kpa adi tuwuli kĩĩ a, ebi be kĩ, “Ĩnyina Yesu, ĩnyina Paulo malo. Lɛmɛ mi kɔ̃, ĩnyína mi! Bawei mianɛ?”
Ade oti a kĩ ye kamɛ hũhũ a deĩ a wo nɛ be akũ ebo be a! Bilomɔ mɔ ɔdzɔ mɔ akũ fɔkpa bɛnɛ nɛ tɔtɔ a kamɛ.
Fɔlɛtsa a kĩ fɔya a gba nɛ Efeso, ade Yudafɔ mɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ flee nu foe a. Nɛ foesũ libe wo bati paa, ade boe Ɔlate Yesu dĩ buki lide nɛ ode libu a.
Bati pii kĩ bɛdani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ a, nɛ bɛya nɛ kanade bɛyanyɛ be tɔkpa bɛtsa.
Bikĩ bɛnyɛ bawanɛ ĩye madzikifɔ a lɛmɛ lɔ be fuwa, fɔ́bɛ mɔ foe akũ tuvoli bɛyamɛna bipila nɛ kanade. Tuvoli a kɔya aawo ndɛ sika ovoe mpim aduenum.
Fɔtsã osi kĩĩ akũ boe Ɔlate kalɛ a gba mɔ kɔbɛ̃, kɛtɛ awã lɛmɛ flee.
Nɛ fukĩĩ liti a Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a fɔ̃ Paulo kɛna adzuni kĩ yanatsã Makedonia mɔ Akaia ɛnaa Yerusalem. Paulo lɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ nto awã ni, kɛnɛ kĩ ntɛ̃ nnaadã Roma lama.”
Edo ye babumɛnanɛ nviã Timoteo mɔ Erasto kĩ bɛnya lɔtɔ bɛna Makedonia, ade ye mɔa edzi nɛ Asia kamɛ kamɛ fɛɛ a.
Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ ni, ɔdzɛ kpale odi ya nɛ Efeso kĩ fɔtsɛ̃ Kristo katɛ kado osi a akũ sũ.

Fukĩĩ yi kayɔ futo odi kĩ bavɛ Demetrio kĩ yakɔa sika ovoe katu Artemis asɔli kɔla akũ fɔtsa a. Bɛmɔ ye adzuma bakɛnanɛ a banɔ foe kakpa bikĩ bayaabɔa afɔliɛ kakpa baviɔ̃ a. Adzuma kĩĩ akpa be nfasɔ baũ paa.
Luwi a, Demetrio ve sika fɔtsa batunɛ a flee ɛkpɔta ade ebi be kĩ, “Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, minyina kĩ boe akũ kana to adzuma kĩĩ kamɛ.

Ade mi mɔawɛ minu, mimɔ́ yededeede ayekĩ Paulo do boe adzuma kĩĩ kɔnyɔã a. Epuli ebula bati a adzuni kade kĩ baviɔ̃ fɔtsa kĩ bɔatu a lɛnɛ́nɛ, nnɛ́ nɛ Efeso odi fukĩĩ lamɛna kaya, mbom nɛ Asia tite a flee akũ.
Lɛmɛ nnɛ́ boe adzuma odi aabu kade! Boe baviɔ̃ kpale Artemis dĩ mɔ obu flee lɛmɛ aawɔ nɛ Asia mɔ katinya kamɛ flee!”
Kĩ binu Demetrio fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a kalɔkpa wo be mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ ade bido fɔwɔla kabɔa awɛ kɔɔba kĩ, “Boe Ɔma Artemis nyɛ Efesofɔ baviɔ̃ kpale!”
Fɔwɔla kĩĩ tɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ flee. Nɛ foesũ ɔmatɔ a bɔa obũ ade bipi Paulo batomɛnanɛ nviã a kĩ be nyɛ Gaio mɔ Aristarko kĩ bito Makedonia, bɛnamɛna ɔmatɔ a katsɛnakɔ̃ a.
Paulo lɛmɛ wɛ kufɛ kĩ yanaa awã, lɛmɛ batɛ badonɛ bɛbã sua ye osi.
Kayite a na banɔkɔɛ̃ kĩ bɛnyɛ Paulo bakɔba lɛmɛ do lɔtɔ nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃, bike ye aduli kĩ ɛtasuma katsɛnakɔ̃ a.
Lɔkɔ a na ni, katsɛnakɔ̃ a flee kɛna yoo. Bati a badi lamɛna lɛtsa mɔa kalɛ, babɛbã lamɛna lɛtsa bɛbã kalɛ, ade be pii lɛmɛ ti binyína lɛtsa a kĩ de sũ bɛyatsɛna nɛ awã a.
Ade Yudafɔ a vɛlɛ Aleksandro bɛyadzɛla nɛ lɔtɔ kĩ ɛyaanyɛ lɛtsa kĩ de lɛya a onukpɛ̃. Ade Aleksandro dzɛla akpɔ nɛ ode ete be awɛ kĩ bɛfɔ̃ ebi be kadi.
Kĩ bati a mɔ biyi ɔsũ kĩ Yudani yanɛ sũ ni, bibuki bɛbɔa fɔwɔla, fɔtɛ ndɛ ndɔũhuilɛ nviã. Bɛkalɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔma Artemis nyɛ Efesofɔ baviɔ̃ kpale!”

Owi tábuna fɔmɔ abãã ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ odi puli ɛyadina bati a ade ebi be kĩ, “Nwaɛ̃ amɛ Efesofɔ, mi kamɛ odi nyɛ odi nyina kĩ Efeso nyɛ Artemis, baviɔ̃ kpale a kadzikɔ̃, ade ke de kpalɛwa a kĩ lito ode lɛka a lɛmɛ deĩ nɛ boe sɛkɛ̃ a.
Odima lɛláapuli ɛlɛ kĩ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ lɛnyɛ́ ɔnɔkɔali, foesũ mina ɔwɔlɛ lɔkɔa mitakɛna lɛtsama mɔ kalɔkpa.
Kitonɛkĩ bati a kĩ mipi miyamɛna nɛ awĩ a táye Artemis kuviɔ̃la fɔtsa fudima ĩye bɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa kpa fudima bitia boe baviɔ̃ a.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ Demetrio mɔ ye adzuma bakɛnanɛ a deĩ kalɛ mɔ odi kɔ̃ ni, fɔlɛtsa badzɛnɛ deĩ. Ade budeĩ fuwi kĩ foe akũ badzɛ fɔlɛtsa, kĩ baapuli bɛkɔa bɛtsa lɛtsa kĩ litia be a bɛnamɛna awã.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ fɔlɛtsa bɛbã minɛɛ kɔ̃ ni, mifɔ̃ bɔkɔa foe bɔnaayi nɛ fɔlɛtsa badzɛnɛ a anɛ bɛdzɛ nɛ mbla onukpɛ̃.
Kitonɛkĩ nviã ɔtutũ kĩĩ kɔ̃ kɛna ndɛ kayidza kadza nɛ abãã akũ kĩ baapuli bɛbɔɛ fɔlɛtsa nɛ boe akũ. Ade ntɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ a via boe kadi ni, bɔláapuli bɔnyɛ foe onukpɛ̃. Baavɛlɛ boe sɔtɔ.”
Kĩ ɛlɛ fukĩĩ eyua, ɛnyɛ be flee a osi, ade bɛpansam a.
Kĩ ɔtutũ a onukpɛ̃ dɔ a, Paulo vɛ batɛ badonɛ a ɛkpɔta. Kĩ ɛna kadi ebi be, edo be kɔbɛ̃ lɛmɛ eyua a, evia osi ɛdzakũ ɛnaa Makedonia.
Paulo tsã kamɛ kamɛ na flee ebi bati boe Ɔlate fɔlɛtsa pii ɛkado be kɔbɛ̃, ɛkɔa ɛyawo Akaia.
Edzi nɛ awã tidetɔ ɛlalɛ. Lɔkɔ a kĩ ɛkamanɛ akũ kĩ yadzakũ ɛnaa Siria tite akũ, ɛyamɔ kĩ Yudafɔ a sui nɛ ye akũ. Nɛ foesũ eke otse kĩ yabuki ɛdani ɛtsã Makedonia kamɛ a.
Bɛmɔ bati pii lɛtsã bɛnaa. Ade be nyɛ Sopater, Piro obi kĩ eto Beroia, Aristarko mɔ Sekundo kĩ bito Tesalonika. Babɛbã nyɛ Gaio kĩ eto Derbe, Tihiko mɔ Trofimo kĩ bito Asia, mɔ Timoteo.
Bɛnya boe lɔtɔ bɛnadzɔlɛ boe nɛ Troa ɔmatɔ a kamɛ.
Kĩ bɔnya Yudafɔ Abodoo kĩ Ɛtáyila Fuwi a buyua a, budzi ɔkɔlɔ nɛ Filipi ade bunyina bɔnaa be sɛkɛ̃ nɛ Troa a. Buwo awã nɛ fuwi elo liti, ade budzi nɛ awã fuwi evũkɔnɔ a.
Nɛ ɛkwansieda luwi lɛtɔnyade akũ a, bɔtsɛna kĩ bɔa nya boe Ɔlate funitsã a. Nɛ kĩ Paulo aadzakũ ntɛ kade nyina sũ ni, ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla flee kɛnawo lɛnyɛ kayite.
Bɛtɛna tɛsɛdza nɛ abansulu kɔla a kamɛ.
Kĩ Paulo lɛ kɔdzɛla gɛlɛɛlɛ sũ tida bɔɛ Eutiko, opopo kĩ ede edzi nɛ nfansili. Eto abansulu kɔla kɔlalɛde a ɛyatɔ nɛ tite. Bikĩ bɛnabɔɛ ye a mɔ́ kĩ eku.
Lɛmɛ kĩ Paulo ka ɛnaa a, ɛkɛna akũ eboomu ye, ade ebi be kĩ, “Mitavila! Edeĩ nkpã!”
Ade be flee bibuki bide bɛnaa abansulu ode a bɛnanya boe Ɔlate funitsã a. Paulo buki ɛlɛmɔ be kɔdzɛla flee kɛnawo odenyinawi ade ɛdzakũ a.
Nɛ kĩ lɛtsama tákɛna opopo a sũ ni, bɛkpã ye bɛnamɛna kɔla, ade ɔwɔlɛ ka edzi be a.
Paulo tsã abɔa ɛnaa Aso a. Lɛmɛ boe a kĩ butomɔ ye a budzi ɔkɔlɔ bɔnya ye lɔtɔ kĩ bɔ́anatsɛlamɔ akũ nɛ awã, lɔkɔa bɔbɔɛ ye ndɛ ayekĩ ɛtsa a.
Kĩ ɛyamɔ boe nɛ Aso a, boe flee bɔdzakũ bɔnaa Mitilene.
Odenyinawi a buwo Kio ntintisɔ. Luwi lɛyade akũ ni bɔnawo Samo, ade nɛ luwi lɛlade a buwo Mileto a.
Paulo fɔ̃ bɔtɛ̃ Efeso, kitonɛkĩ ɛtáwɛ kĩ yabula lɔkɔ pii kade nɛ Asia tite akũ. Eke otse lɛmɛ kĩ ntɛ fɔ́ana ye sɔwa ni, yaana nɛ Yerusalem nɛ Pentekoste luwi a akũ.
Lɛmɛ kĩ buwo Mileto a Paulo do batɔ nɛ Efeso batɛ badonɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ a sɛkɛ̃ kĩ bɛyaatsɛlamɔ ye nɛ awã.
Ade kĩ bɛyaa a, ebi be kĩ, “Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mi a flee minyina ayekĩ ndzi nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃, kito lɔkɔ a kĩ ĩya nɛ Asia tite akũ a kɛyawo nviã kĩĩ a.
Mimɔ́ ayekĩ ndɔla yĩ akũ nsum Boe Ɔlate, titɔ kĩ nna nɛ lubo kamɔ mɔ kabe kamɛ, nɛ ayekĩ Yudafɔ wɛ kĩ bakɔ yĩ sũ.
Lɛmɛ minyina kĩ ntákɔla mi ɔnɔkɔali a. Fɔtsa a flee kĩ ĩnyina nɛ boe Ɔlate akũ a, ade foe ntsa mi a. Ntsa foe nɛ kanade flee anɛ mɔ mi tɔtɔ kamɛ.
Ade kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ kĩ ntsã mmini ni, ndɛ Yudafɔ mɔ Helafɔ flee mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ bɛdani be tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ bɛya nɛ Baguma sɛkɛ̃, lɔkɔa bɛtɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu bido.
“Finyaakĩĩ manaa Yerusalem nɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa kawɛ onukpɛ̃, nɛ kĩ ĩnyína lɛtsa kĩ laaya nɛ yĩ akũ nɛ awã a.
Lɛmɛ nɛ ɔmatɔ odi nyɛ odi kamɛ kĩ ntsã ni, Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a fɔ̃ ĩnyi kĩ maawa kɔla nɛ lubo kamɔ kamɛ.
Yĩ nkpã lɛla nfasɔ adima, ntɛ ntápuli nkɛna lɛtsa a kĩ boe Ɔlate Yesu do yĩ kĩ nkɛna a. Lɛtsa kĩ edo yĩ kĩ nkɛna nyɛ kĩ nkaabi bati Baguma Kalɛ Wĩ a, mɔ ayekĩ edeĩ sɛmɛ kalɛ ɛkpa boe.
“Finyaakĩĩ ĩnyina kĩ mi a flee kĩ minu kĩ ntsa mi fɔtsa nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ akũ, bɔmɔ́ mi bɔlaabuki bɔmɔ́ akũ dadaada.
Nɛ foesũ mabi mi paa nviã kĩĩ, kĩ ntɛ odi yɛla ye nkpã ni, nnɛ́ yĩ nfumusu fɔanɛ.
Kitonɛkĩ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, ntákɔla mi lɛtsama nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a akũ.
Nɛ foesũ mina nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ. Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a lɛpau mi ndɛ lɔtɔ banyanɛ kĩ mipi ye babi a kĩ edo mi nɛ awɛ a kapi wĩ. Mipi be kapi wĩ, kitonɛkĩ Baguma kɔa ye Obi babɔanɛ eko nɛ tite ɛnyɛ be.
Ade ĩnyina yededeede kĩ ntɛ ndzakũ ni, bati kpa aayawo nɛ mi kamɛ lɔkɔa bɛyalɛ mi ndɛ ayekĩ kulikii awo nɛ baveli kamɛ a.
Nɛ mi mɔa awɛ kamɛ malo ni, bavãlɛvã aanɛ, lɔkɔa bɛkpã batɛ badonɛ pii bɛtsãmɛna fɔvã fɔtsa katsa a osi akũ.
Foesũ midã kadã wĩ, lɔkɔa mite anɛ ayekĩ nkɔa anɛ mɔ babe ntsa mi fɔtsa lɛnyɛ mɔ suwa flee nɛ futeli ɛlalɛ a kĩ nna nɛ mi kamɛ a.
“Finyaakĩĩ, nkɔa mi mado nɛ Baguma awɛ kĩ ɛdãmɛna mi akũ mɔ ye fɔlɛtsa a kĩ fɔabumɛna bati a, fudo mi katɛkado kɔbɛ̃ ayekĩ fɔ́akɛna mi ode fɔtsa banyanɛ ndɛ bikĩ ɛpau ɛkpa ye akũ a aye.
Anɛ tábɛɛlɛ yĩ nɛ odima sika ngbã ĩye suwovoe ĩye tilima akũ.
Mi awɛ minyina kĩ yĩ awɛ kĩĩ nkɔa nkɛna adzuma ndãmɛna yĩ mɔ bikĩ bitomɔ yĩ a lɛmɛ akũ a.
Nkɛna fukĩĩ bamɛ flee nnɛɛ matsa mi ayekĩ mikɛna adzuma kɔɔba mibumɛna ahiãfɔ, ade mite anɛ nɛ lɛtsa kĩ boe Ɔlate Yesu lɛ a kĩ, ‘Kakpa deĩ nhila kɛbɛ̃ katɛ.’ ”
Ade ke kĩ Paulo lɛ kɔdzɛla eyua a, eke aduli ade bɛmɔ be flee bɔbɔa mpaɛ a.
Lɔkɔ a kĩ ɛkakla be a, bɛkɔa anɛ mɔ babe bɛkatu kaboomu ye.
Lɛtsa a kĩ de lɛfɔ̃ biwo ɔblɔ koũ a nyɛ ayekĩ ɛlɛ kĩ bɛmɔ be bɛláabuki bɛmɔ akũ dadaada a. Biyi ye osi bɛnawo ɔkɔlɔ a ɔwɛ̃ nɛ ɔwɔ abuĩ.
Kĩ bɔkla akũ buyua a, budzi ɔkɔlɔ bɔtsã kpĩĩ bunyina bɔnaa Kos. Kĩ kade nyina a buwo Rodo ade bɔtɛ̃ bɔnaa Patara a.
Awã naa budzi ɔkɔlɔ odi kĩ yanaa Foenike.
Bɔmɔ́ Kipro tite a nɛ lɔtɔ, ade bɔtsã te kayɔ kayɔ a bɔnaduma nɛ Tiro, nɛ Siria tite akũ, awã kĩ baanyɛ fɔtsa flee a kĩ ɔkɔlɔ a nɔnɛ a.
Bɔmɔ́ batɛ badonɛ badi nɛ awã, ade bɔna nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ ɛkwansieda mɔa a, kitonɛkĩ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a tsã be akũ bibi Paulo kĩ ɛtanaa Yerusalem.
Kĩ boe kadzakũ wo ɔtɔ a, batɛ badonɛ a mɔ batsɔ̃ mɔ babi flee yi boe osi bɛnawo mpo abuĩ. Awã na boe flee buke aduli bɔbɔa mpaɛ.
Kĩ bɔkla akũ buyua a, buwo nɛ ɔkɔlɔ kamɛ ade be malo bimuniki bɛnaa fɔla a.
Bɔbɔɛ buto Tiro ade bɔnadza nɛ Ptolemia a. Bɔnawɔ̃na batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ awã ade budzi nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ luwi mɔa a.
Kĩ kade nyina a, bɔdzakũ nɛ awã bɔnaa Kaisarea. Bɔnase nɛ Filipo, Kalɛ Wĩ a Lɛtsã odenɛ a awã. Ɛnyɛ babumɛnanɛ evũkɔnɔ a kĩ bɛpau nɛ Yerusalem a kamɛ ɔmɔa.
Edeĩ bayitsɔ̃ ɛna kĩ bidzí fɔnyɔ, ade bɛnyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ lɛmɛ a.
Bɔna nɛ awã fuwi fudi ade foe kamɛ a Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ a kĩ bavɛ Agabo to Yudea ɛya a.

Ade kĩ ɛya nɛ boe sɛkɛ̃ a ɛbɔɛ Paulo ɔwɛ̃ a kĩ yakɔa kaboomu kate a esuli ye mɔa awɛ akpɔ mɔ abɔa, ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a bo ni, ade aye Yudafɔ nɛ Yerusalem aasuli ɔwɛ̃ kĩĩ ɔlate bɛkɔa ye bido nɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a awɛ a.”
Kĩ boe flee bunu fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, bɔmɔ́ bati a kĩ bideĩ nɛ awã flee a buke Paulo aduli kĩ ɛtanaa Yerusalem.
Lɛmɛ Paulo bi boe kĩ, “Litsa nyɛ kabe a kĩ mikɔa miaveli yĩ akpɔ? Mmanɛ akũ nkpa nnɛ́ kĩ bisuli yĩ nɛ Yerusalem odi lɛmɛ kĩ maaku nɛ awã nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu sũ.”
Kĩ bɔmɔ́ kĩ bɔláapuli bɔdani ye adzuni sũ ni, bɔfɔnɛ ye awɛ ade bɔlɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate kawɛ kɛya nɛ foe kamɛ.”
Fuwi fudi liti ni, bɔmanɛ akũ ade bɔdzakũ bɔnaa Yerusalem.
Batɛ badonɛ badi to Kaisarea bitomɔ boe bɔnaa. Kĩ buwo awã a, bɛkpã boe bɔnase nɛ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ odi kĩ bavɛ Mnason awã. Eto Kipro ade ɛnyɛ batɛ badonɛ batɔnyade a kamɛ ɔmɔa a.
Kĩ buwo Yerusalem a batɛ badonɛ a tɛ boe mɔ kawɔlɛ.
Kĩ kade nyina a, Paulo kpã boe bɔnamɔ Yakobo mɔ batɛ badonɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ flee a nɛ Yerusalem.
Ade kĩ bɔnawɔ̃nɔ akũ buyua a, Paulo bɔa be amandiɛ nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma kɛna nɛ ye kamini nɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ kamɛ a akũ.
Kĩ bitse fɔlɛtsa a biyua a, be flee bimu Baguma ade bibi ye kĩ, “Boe ɔwaɛ̃, dã ayekĩ Yudafɔ mpim mpim tɛ bido, ade bipini Mose mbla a mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ a.
Bati badi bi be kĩ ɔtsa Yudafɔ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ fude fude a kĩ bɛtakɛna nɛ Mose mbla mɔ boe tɛmaniɛ a akũ, ade obuki ɔtsa kĩ bɛtatsua be babi fɔkpati lɛmɛ a.
Baanu kokooko kĩ ɔya nɛ boe sɛkɛ̃. Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ litsa kɛnɛ kĩ bɔkɛna finyaa?”
Ade ke bɛkpa ye adzuni kĩ “Budeĩ bati ɛna kĩ bido lidetɔ.
Kpã be kanamɛna Yudafɔ Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ kabumɔ be minyɛ lɔlɔ kakpa lidetɔ a kase foe kɔtɔ. Fukĩĩ aafɔ̃ odi nyɛ odi lɔmɔ kĩ fɔvã bɛma bite nɛ nɔ akũ, lɔkɔa fɔtsa lɛmɛ kĩ opini Mose mbla a kapini wĩ.

Batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a kɔ̃ ni, bɔtsɛlɛ be ovoli bubi be kĩ bɛtabuki bɛnya fɔtsa kĩ bɛkɔa bɛbɔa afɔliɛ bɛkpa baviɔ̃, bɛfɔ̃ babɔanɛ kanya, bɛtaba bayaɛ kĩ bɛtátsua be fɔmɔ, lɔkɔa bɛfɔ̃ linyolewɛ mɔ litsolewɛ.”

Foesũ kĩ kade nyina a, Paulo kpã banyole a, ade bɔnakɛna lɔlɔ kakpa tsɔli tsɔli amaniɛ a. Ke liti a, ɛnaa Yudafɔ afɔliɛ kabɔakɔ̃ a ɛnakpa basɔfɔ kanyi nɛ fuwi a kĩ tɔlɔ kakpa amaniɛ a aawũna, mɔ futetsa a lɛmɛ kĩ yaama be bɛkɔa bɛbɔa afɔliɛ a nɛ be lɔlɔ.
Ade kĩ kite sukuloo lɔkɔa fuwi evũkɔnɔ a aawo ɔtɔ a, Yudafɔ badi kĩ bito Asia kamɛ a yamɔ Paulo nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ. Bido ɔtutũ nɛ bati a badi kamɛ ade bipi Paulo a.

Bɛkabɔa fɔwɔla kalɛ kĩ, “Israelfɔ miyaatɛ mɔ boe tsoo! Ade oti kĩĩ tsɛ̃ yamini nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ, yabi bati kĩ bɛtakɛna nɛ boe Yudafɔ mbla aku a. Ye lɛmɛ ɛkpã Grikifɔ ɛyawomɛna nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ, kĩ fɔatsa kĩ ebula boe kakɔ kpalɛwa kĩĩ.”
Bɛlɛ foe lɔmɔ kitonɛkĩ luwi a bɛnya lɔtɔ bɛmɔ́ Paulo mɔ Trofimo kĩ eto Efeso a, kĩ bɛtsɛ̃ bamini nɛ Yerusalem. Nɛ foe sũ bɛkɔna kĩ ɛkpã ye ewomɛna nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ.
Nɛ fɔwɔla kabɔa a sũ, akũ nyɛnɛ bati a flee ade biwula atsɛ yoo bɛnatsɛna nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ. Badi vɛlɛ Paulo bɛnɛmɛna ade bɛbalɛ tunyukpɛ̃ flee a.
Lɔkɔ a kĩ bɛwɛ kĩ bakɔ ye a, Romafɔ sodzafɔ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ odi nu kĩ Yerusalem ɔmatɔ a flee deĩ nɛ ɔtutũ kamɛ mɔ fɔwɔla kabɔa.
Deedimɔapɛ ɛkpã sodzafɔ badi bɛnaa awã kĩ bɛkakɛna hũnyɛhũnyɛ a. Kĩ bati kĩĩ mɔ sodzafɔ mɔ be ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a pɛ bɛfɔ̃ Paulo katuli.
Awã naa, sodzafɔ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a fɔ̃ bipi Paulo ade bido ye nkɔsɔnkɔsɔ nviã a. Ade evia etse oti a odu kĩ yanɛ mɔ lɛtsa a kĩ de ɛkɛna a.
Bati a flee kanyɛ tunukpɛ̃ futefute. Kĩ sodzafɔ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a lanu lɛtsama kayɔ pɔtii etomɛna be sɛkɛ̃ nɛ fɔwɔla mɔ ɔsĩ a sũ ni, ɛfɔ̃ bɛkɔa Paulo bɛnado nɛ kɔla a kamɛ.

Kĩ bɛkɔa bade kɔla onyukpɛ̃ kadekɔ̃ a, fɔya nɛ sodzafɔ a kamɛ kĩ bɛbɔɛ Paulo bɛdɛla nɛ ode nɛ bati kɔdabu a kalɔkpa a kĩ bɛna nɛ Paulo akũ sũ. Ade bitomɔ be mɔ fɔwɔla kpaa kabɔa kĩ, “Mikɔ ye! Mikɔ ye!”

Kĩ bɛkɔa bade kɔla onyukpɛ̃ kadekɔ̃ a, fɔya nɛ sodzafɔ a kamɛ kĩ bɛbɔɛ Paulo bɛdɛla nɛ ode nɛ bati kɔdabu a kalɔkpa a kĩ bɛna nɛ Paulo akũ sũ. Ade bitomɔ be mɔ fɔwɔla kpaa kabɔa kĩ, “Mikɔ ye! Mikɔ ye!”
Lɔkɔ a kĩ bɛkɔa ye bado nɛ kɔla kamɛ a, Paulo bi sodzafɔ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ. “Nwɛ kĩ malɔmɛna mɔ nɔ sukuloo.”
Ade ke sodzafɔ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a via ye kĩ, “Yie! Alɛ Griki tide?”
Ade ebuki evia ye kĩ, “Nɛ nɔ nyɛ Egipteni a kĩ lɔkɔ lidi ɛkpã awudifɔ mpim ɛna biyidza bɛdza nɛ abãã akũ, kĩ bilo bɛnaa kɔsa kamɛ a?”
Ade Paulo kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Yudani manɛ. Bɛma yĩ nɛ Tarso nɛ Kilikia tite akũ. Ade ɔmatɔ a na ni, nnɛ́ ɔmatɔ kabii yanɛ. Foesũ make nɔ aduli fɔ̃ nlɛmɔ bati kĩĩ kɔdzɛla.”

Adeke ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ kĩĩ tunɔ kĩ Paulo ɛlɛmɔ be kɔdzɛla a. Paulo nɛ ɛyadza nɛ onyukpɛ̃ kadekɔ̃ a, ade ete awɛ nɛ bati kɔdabu akũ kĩ bɛkɛna dĩĩ a. Kĩ bɛfɔ̃ fɔwɔla kabɔa a, ɛlɛmɔ be kɔdzɛla nɛ Yudafɔ tide kamɛ kĩ,
“Nda amɛ mɔ nwaɛ̃ amɛ, agoo! Mifɔ̃ ĩnyɛ yĩ onukpɛ̃ kamɛ fɔlɛtsa mitse.”
Kĩ binu kĩ Yudafɔ tide kamɛ ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla a, bɛkɛna fɔwɔla kabɔa nɛ kayɔ bibu. Ade ke Paulo bi be kĩ,

“Yudani manɛ ade bɛma yĩ nɛ Tarso, nɛ Kilikia tite akũ a. Lɛmɛ Yerusalem nɛ awĩ bɛdɔɔla yĩ, nkɔlɛ fɔtsa nɛ Gamaliel kayɔ. Bɛtsa yĩ boe bawanyɔ mbla a mɔ foe akũ amaniɛ a flee yededeede. Ade nkɔa yĩ ɔwɔlɛ flee nkpa Baguma ndɛ ayekĩ mi malo miakɛna nviã kĩĩ a.
Kito lɔkɔ a na, ntomɔ batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bɛtsɛ̃ osi vɔɛ̃ a liti, nwɛ kĩ bɛkɔ be. Ade nkapi batsole mɔ banyole kado nɛ kɔla a.

Boe Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee mɔ ɔmaĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ aapuli bidi adansiɛ nɛ fukĩ malɛ kĩĩ akũ, kitonɛkĩ bɛkatsɛlɛ tuvoli kakpa yĩ kĩ nkɔa nkɛna fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ. Ade lɔkɔ a kĩ manaa Damasko a ni, bɛkpa yĩ tuvoli kĩ nkɔa mma Yudafɔ nɛ awã ndza nɛ foe akũ mpili batɛ badonɛ a nsuli be nkɔa ĩyamɛna nɛ Yerusalem bɛvɛlɛ be sɔtɔ.
“Lɔkɔ a kĩ ntsɛ̃ manaa, kĩ kite sukuloo mawo Damasko, ndɛ suwa tɔdɔũ ewua-nviã kamɛ a ni, deedimɔapɛ ɔhaĩ mɔ ɔsĩ odi to ode ɛka eko nɛ yĩ akũ!
Adeke nka ntɔ nɛ tite, ade nnu ɔlɛdo odi kĩ ɛkavia yĩ kĩ, ‘Saulo, Saulo, nde sũ oyidza ɔdza nɛ yĩ akũ lɔmɔ?’
“Ade nvia kĩ, ‘Boe Ɔlate, nɔ owei anɛ?’
“Ebuki ebi yĩ kĩ, ‘Yĩ nyɛ Yesu Nazaretni a kĩ ye akũ oyidza ɔdza a.’
Bati a kĩ bɔmɔ be tsɛ̃ a mɔ́ ɔhaĩ a lɛmɛ bɛtánu oti a kĩ bɔmɔ ye lɛkalɛ kɔdzɛla a odo.
“Ade nvia ye kĩ, ‘Boe Ɔlate, litsa kɛnɛ kĩ nkɛna?’
“Ebi yĩ kĩ, ‘Yidza kanaa Damasko ɔmatɔ a kamɛ. Awã na maatsa nɔ lɛtsa a kĩ nwɛ kĩ kɛna a.’
Ɔhaĩ kĩĩ kɔ yĩ anɛ foesũ bati a kĩ bɔmɔ be tsɛ̃ a lipi yĩ nɛ kɔkpɔ bɛkpã yĩ bɔdzakũ bɔnawo Damasko ɔmatɔ a kamɛ.
“Onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Anania na nɛ awã. Ɛnyɛ oti kĩ yavila Baguma ade yakɛna nɛ boe mbla lɛmɛ akũ yededeede a. Yudafɔ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ awã flee a akpa ye obu.
Oti kĩĩ yadza nɛ yĩ ɔwɛ̃ ade ebi yĩ kĩ, ‘Nwaɛ̃ Saulo bu kamɔ fɔkɔ!’ Lɔkɔ a na kamɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ yĩ anɛ kamɛ kpalɛ yededeede ade mmɔ́ ye a.
“Ade ebi yĩ kĩ, ‘Boe bawanyɔ Baguma lɛpau nɔ eyi kĩ nyi ye fɔwɛtsa, kamɔ ye Obi Kpalɛwa a kĩ Bɛpau a lɔkɔa kanu ye kɔdzɛla lɛmɛ.
Kɛnɛ kĩ akɔa ɔlɛdo kĩĩ ɔnamɛna kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ, obi bati flee lɛtsa a kĩ ɔmɔ́ mɔ lɛtsa kĩ onu a.
Finyaakĩĩ litsa adzɔlɛ? Yidza lɔkɔa katɛ mui kawɔla amaniɛ. Bɔa mpaɛ nɛ ye dĩ akũ lɔkɔa ɛkɔa nɔ titikpa ete nɔ.’
“Fukĩĩ liti a, mmuniki nnaa Yerusalem. Ade kĩ nna nɛ Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ nkabɔa mpaɛ a, fɔkɔna ndɛ tida abɔɛ yĩ, ade nna kanyɛkatsa kadi a.
Ade awã na boe Ɔlate bi yĩ kĩ, ‘Wɛ sɔwa kadzakũ nɛ Yerusalem kitonɛkĩ awĩ bati lɛláatse nɔ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ aalɛ nɛ yĩ akũ a.’
“Lɛmɛ nkpa mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Boe Ɔlate, be flee binyina kĩ yĩ lɛkapili bikĩ bɛtɛ nɔ bido a nɛ Yudafɔ fɔtsɛnakɔ̃ a kabo be.
Ade lɔkɔ a kĩ bɛkakɔ nɔ ɔdansini Stefano a, yĩ malo ntunɔ. Foesũ bɛnyɛ be tɛtadiɛ bɛkpa yĩ nlɛ ade bɛkatalɛ ye boe a.’
“Lɛmɛ boe Ɔlate bi yĩ kĩ, ‘Yidza kanaa, maado nɔ mɔ lugo nɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a kamɛ!’ ”
Lɔkɔ kĩĩ flee a, bati a dza dĩĩ bɛkatse ye kalɛ a. Lɛmɛ mɔ ye kalɛ nkaɛ kawũna pɛ, be flee bɔbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba kĩ, “Aa! Kɛtáfɛta kĩ yadzi nkpã! Mikpã ye minamɛna minaakɔ ye!”
Nɛ kĩ bɛna kalɔkpa paa sũ ni, bɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba ade bido be tɛtadiɛ kayɛlɛ, mɔ kudu kata nɛ ɔwɛ kamɛ awɛ a.
Ade ke kawũ banɔnɛ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a fɔ̃ bɛkpã ye biwomɛna nɛ kɔla kamɛ kĩ bɛnaabo ye lɔkɔa binyi lɛtsa a sũ kĩ Yudafɔ a kpa biko nɛ ye akũ lɔmɔ.
Lɔkɔ a kĩ bɛkasuli ye a, Paulo via kawũ banɔnɛ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ odi kĩ ɛdzɛ̃ nɛ awã kĩ, “Osi waa kĩ babo Romani ntɛ bɛtádzɛ ye fɔlɛtsa tɔ̃?”
Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ kĩĩ naa be lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a sɛkɛ̃ ade evia ye kĩ, “Litsa akɛna nɛ awĩ a? Onyole kĩĩ boni Romani yanɛ!”
Foesũ kawũ banɔnɛ lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a ya nɛ Paulo sɛkɛ̃ ade evia ye kĩ, “Abo nde? Romani anɛ?”
Ade ke Paulo kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Romani manɛ!”
Kawũ banɔnɛ lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a bi ye kĩ, “Yĩ malo Romani manɛ. Yĩ kɔ̃ nse kɔtɔ baũ fɔmɔ ndani nkɛna Romani!”
Ade Paulo bi ye kĩ, “Yĩ kɔ̃ yĩ bamanɛ flee nyɛ Romafɔ.”

Ade ke kĩ bati a kĩ bɛdza kĩ babo ye bivia ye onukpɛ̃ kamɛ fɔlɛtsa nu kĩ Romani yanɛ a, bɛvɛlɛ akũ bɛnaa liti. Kĩ be lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a nyi kĩ Romani yanɛ a, libe wo ye paa, kitonɛkĩ ye lɛkpa osi kĩ bisuli Paulo bibo ye.

Kĩ kade nyina, kawũ banɔnɛ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a wɛ kĩ yanyi lɛtsa a kĩ de sũ bɛbɔɛ fɔlɛtsa nɛ Paulo akũ. Ɛvɛ Yudafɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ be fɔlɛtsa badzɛnɛ ɛkpɔta. Ɛfɔ̃ biwũnya tɔwɛ̃ nɛ Paulo akũ ade bɛkpã ye bɛyadzɛla nɛ be anɛ kamɛ kĩ bawɛ ye fɔlɛtsa a kamɛ a.
Ade kĩ Paulo ko anɛ ɛdã Yudafɔ fɔlɛtsa badzɛnɛ a kĩ bikoni dĩĩ nɛ fɔlɛtsa kadzɛkɔ̃ a, ebi be kĩ, “Nwaɛ̃ amɛ Israelfɔ, yĩ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kpalɛ nɛ ayekĩ ndzi nkpã nɛ Baguma anɛ kɛyawo nviã kĩĩ a.”
Kĩ Anania, Yudafɔ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a kĩ ɛna nɛ awã nu ayekĩ Paulo kpa mbuayɛ a, ebi bikĩ bɛdza bifuãmɔ Paulo kĩ bɛbɔa ye nɛ onukpɛ̃.

Ade awã mɔ Paulo bi ye kĩ, “Baguma lɛmɛ aabalɛ nɔ awɛ! Nɔ seebi kĩ bikputa se fɔtsa ovoe bɛdzɛla anɛ! Litsa fɔlɛtsa ɔdzɛnɛ anɛ? Mbla akũ ɔtsɛ̃ adzɛmɔ yĩ, lɛmɛ ade ye mɔapɛ a ɔlamɛna kafum a, nɛ kĩ ɔkpa kɔbɛ̃ bɛbalɛ yĩ ɔlɔtɔ sũ!”
Ade ke bikĩ bɛdzɛ nɛ Paulo ɔwɛ̃ a via ye kĩ, “Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee ovũna lɔmɔ?”
Paulo kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ntɛ ĩnyi kĩ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee yanɛ ni, kufɛ ntádo ye onukpɛ̃ lɔmɔ. Kitonɛkĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, ‘Talɛ tuwuli kpa nɛ bikĩ banya mi akũ a akũ.’ ”

Ade kĩ Paulo mɔ eyi ɔsũ kĩ bati a kĩ bɛkpɔta nɛ awã a be kamɛ badi nyɛ Zadukifɔ ade badi lɛmɛ nyɛ Farisifɔ a sũ ni, ɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba kĩ, “Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, Farisini manɛ! Farisifɔ lɛmɛ lɛma yĩ! Nviã kĩĩ badzɛmɔ yĩ kitonɛkĩ ntɛ banɔkpa kabuki kayidza kadzi nkpã a ndo sũ!”
Kĩ Paulo sila ɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ eyua pɛ, kavɛlɛ ya nɛ Farisifɔ mɔ Zadukifɔ a kayite, ade bɛsɛ̃ be akũ a.
Kitonɛkĩ Zadukifɔ alɛ kĩ banɔkpa lábuki kayidza, ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ lɛláa, ade hũhũ lɛmɛ lɛláa a. Lɛmɛ Farisifɔ kɔ̃ tɛ fukĩĩ bamɛ flee bido.

Ɔtutũ kpale wo nɛ be kamɛ. Farisifɔ mbla batsanɛ a dza nɛ Paulo liti kĩ ye fɔlɛtsa a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali. Ade ke bɛbɔa fɔwɔla kɔɔba kĩ, “Bɔtámɔ lɛtsa kpa lidima nɛ ye akũ! Ɔsa hũhũ adi ĩye ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ odi alɛmɔ ye kɔdzɛla!”

Fɔwɔla kabɔa a buki fude nɛ ode fubu. Ade bati a flee pini Paulo bɛkavɛlɛ kadu kanamɛna kayamɛna a. Kĩ sodza ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a vila kĩ baavɛlɛ ye bɛpããpãã sũ ni, ebi ye sodzafɔ a kĩ bɛka bɛnaatɛ ye bɛnaado nɛ kɔla.
Luwi a lɛnyɛ a, boe Ɔlate yadza nɛ Paulo ɔwɛ̃ ebi ye kĩ, “Paulo do ɔwɔlɛ. Ayekĩ odi adansiɛ nɛ yĩ akũ nɛ Yerusalem nɛ awĩ a, ade ayea kɛnɛ kĩ akɛna nɛ Roma lɛmɛ a.”
Kĩ kade nyina a, Yudafɔ badi lɔ fubo bɛkpa be akũ kĩ ntɛ bɛtákɔ Paulo ni, bɛláanya ĩye bɛmɔa!
Bati kĩĩ lidede aana ndɛ be tɛna mɔ liti.
Ade ke bibuki bɛnaa basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ be lɔtɔ banyanɛ sɛkɛ̃ bibi be kĩ, “Bɔlɔ fubo kĩ bɔlaanya ĩye bɔmɔa kɛnaawo kĩ bɔkɔ Paulo.

Foesũ mimɔ fɔlɛtsa badzɛnɛ a mibi sodzafɔ lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a kĩ, ebuki ɛkɔa Paulo ɛyamɛna nɛ katsɛnakɔ̃ nɛ awĩ. Mikɛna ndɛ miawɛ kĩ miavia ye fɔlɛtsa fudi mibu. Ntɛ bɛkɔa ye bayamɛna ni, bɔ́akɔ ye nɛ osi.”
Lɛmɛ Paulo ɔfanyole odi nu fɔlɛtsa a flee kĩ bɛlɛ a, ade ewula atsɛ ɛnaa kɔla kamɛ, ɛnabi Paulo lɛtsa a kĩ de bɛlɛ a.
Ade ke Paulo vɛ sodzafɔ a kĩ bɛdza nɛ awã kamɛ ɔmɔa ebi ye kĩ, “Kpã obisɛ̃ kĩĩ minaa ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ sɛkɛ̃. Ɛnɛɛ kalɛ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ yaabi ye.”
Foesũ sodzani a kpã kabisɛ̃ɛ̃ a bɛnaa be lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a sɛkɛ̃, ade ebi ye kĩ, “Paulo a kĩ bido nɛ kɔla kamɛ nɛ awĩ a lɛvɛ yĩ ebi yĩ kĩ nkpã kabisɛ̃ɛ̃ kĩĩ mma nɔ, lɔkɔa kibi nɔ kalɛ kadi.”
Ade sodzafɔ lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a pi kabisɛ̃ɛ̃ a nɛ kɔkpɔ bɛnaa ɔɔwɛ̃ ade evia ye kĩ, “Litsa awɛ kĩ abi yĩ?”
Ade ke mɔ ebi ye kĩ, “Yudafɔ badi kɛna onukpɛ̃ mɔa mɔ be banɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ bayaake nɔ aduli lɔkɔa kunya ɔkpã Paulo ɔyamɛna nɛ katsɛnakɔ̃, mɔ kakɔna kĩ bavia ye fɔlɛtsa fudi.

Lɛmɛ tatse be kitonɛkĩ bati ndɛ be tɛna bɛla nɛ osi badzɔlɛ ye. Bati kĩĩ lɔ fubo kĩ mbɔɛntɛ bɛkɔ Paulo fɔmɔ baata funitsã onukpɛ̃. Nɛ foesũ bɛmanɛ akũ bɛnabɛla badzɔlɛ nɔ osi kakpa. Bɛnabɛla nɛ osi ɔɔwɛ̃ kitonɛkĩ bɛtɛ bido kĩ aatunɔ ɔkpa be.”
Sodzafɔ lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a si ye mbla kĩ, “Tafɔ̃ odima libuki enu lɛtsa a kĩ ɔyabi yĩ nɛ awĩ a dadaada.” Ade ke ɛnyɛ ye osi ɛdzakũ a.
Ade ke sodzafɔ lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a vɛ ye banɔkɔɛ̃ nviã ade ebi be kĩ, “Miwɛ sodzafɔ ɔha nviã kĩ baanaa Kaisarea nviã lɛnyɛ. Miwɛ bikĩ balɛ fɔtsɔɛ ɔha nviã, mɔ bikĩ badzi bapɔnkɔ lɛmɛ be bati aduesɔũ.
Miwɛ ɔpɔnkɔ mikpa Paulo edzi nɛ ye akũ lɔkɔa mikpã ye bɔɛɛ, mima abãã ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Felike.”
Ade ke ɛtsɛlɛ ovoli odi ɛkpa abãã ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ,
Ovoli kĩĩ to yĩ Klaudio Lisia sɛkɛ̃. Mawɔ̃na nɔ, boe Abãã Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Felike.
Yudafɔ badi pi oti kĩĩ, ade bɛwɛ kĩ bakɔ ye a. Lɛmɛ kĩ bɔmɔ sodzafɔ buwo awã a, nnu kĩ Romani yanɛ sũ ni, nfɔ̃ sodzafɔ a tɛ ye nɛ be awɛ.
Foesũ nkpã ye ĩyamɛna nɛ be fɔlɛtsa kadzɛkɔ̃ kĩ manyi lɛtsa a kĩ ɛkɛna a.
Ĩyamɔ kĩ lɛtsa kĩ bɛbɔɛ nɛ ye akũ a nyɛ Yudafɔ ɔsum mbla akũ fɔlɛtsa kĩ fɔnyɛ́ fukĩ bado ye nɛ kɔla kamɛ ĩye bɛkɔ ye.
Adeke kĩ bibi yĩ kĩ bɛlamɔ nhihiɛ kakɛna kĩ baakɔ ye sũ ni, nkɔna kĩ makɔa ye mma nɔ. Mbi bikĩ bɛbɔɛ kalɛ nɛ ye akũ a ku kĩ bɛkɔa ke bɛma nɔ.
Foesũ luwi a lɛnyɛ a sodzafɔ a kpã Paulo bɛnawo Antipatre.
Kĩ kade nyina, sodzafɔ a kĩ bɛtsã abɔa a muniki bɛnaa kɔla kamɛ, ade bɛfɔ̃ bapɔnkɔ badzinɛ a kpã Paulo bɛnamɛna Kaisarea a.
Kĩ biwo awã a, bɛkɔa Paulo mɔ ovoli a kĩ bɛnɛɛ a bɛkpa abãã ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a.
Kĩ ɛkã ovoli a eyua a, evia Paulo amantam a kĩ eto. Ade kĩ enyi kĩ Paulo to Kilikia a, ebi ye kĩ,

“Maanaa nɔ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kamɛ yededeede ntɛ bikĩ mimɔ be mina kalɛ a ya nɛ awĩ.” Ade ke ɛkpa sodzafɔ a kĩ bɛdza nɛ awã a kɔbɛ̃ kĩ bɛkɔa Paulo bido nɛ kɔla a kĩ Lɛgã Herodes ke a kamɛ lɔkɔa bɛkaadã ye akũ.
Fuwi elo liti a, Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee Anania, Yudafɔ lɔtɔ banyanɛ mɔ fɔlɛtsa ɔdzɛnɛ kĩ bavɛ Tertulo naa Kaisarea. Bɛya nɛ Felike sɛkɛ̃ kĩ bayaanyɛ Paulo nfumusu bɛtsa ye.
Kĩ bɛvɛ Paulo bɛyamɛna a, Tertulo yi Paulo onukpɛ̃ katsua kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, nɛ nɔ nyansã mɔ adzuni kĩ ɔnɛɛ akpã boe sũ ni, bɔna lukudɔ nɛ lɔkɔ pii kamɛ. Ade kavɛmɛna pii lɛmɛ ya nɛ boe tite akũ a.
Fukĩĩ nyɛ fɔtsa kĩ fuwo boe Yudafɔ flee anɛ.
Bɔake nɔ aduli kĩ tse fɔlɛtsa a kĩ maabi nɔ nɛ onyole kĩĩ akũ a.
Kitonɛkĩ bɔmɔ́ ye buyi ɔsũ kĩ ɔdzɛ odonɛ yanɛ, ade ɛtsɛ̃ nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ yadani Yudafɔ kakɔna nɛ katinya kamɛ kĩ bɛkɛna fɔtsa basa bitia abãã a. Ɛnyɛ lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ ɛkpa Nazaretfɔ katsu a.
Foe liti a bɔmɔ́ lɛmɛ kĩ ɛtsɛ̃ yakɛna fɔtsa kĩ fɔado boe Yudafɔ Asɔli Kɔla a efĩĩ, ade bupi ye a. Foesũ bɔwɛ kĩ bɔadzɛmɔ ye nɛ boe mbla onukpɛ̃.
Lɛmɛ kawũ banɔnɛ lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ Lisia kɔa kɔbɛ̃ ɛyate ye nɛ boe awɛ.
Ntɛ ovia oti kĩĩ onukpɛ̃ kamɛ fɔlɛtsa ni, aapuli onyi fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɔbɔɛ nɛ ye akũ a otomɛna ye sɛkɛ̃.”
Ade ke Yudafɔ a flee tunɔ mɔ onukpɛ̃ mɔa bɛlɛ kĩ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Tertulo lɛ a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali.
Kĩ abãã ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a vɛ Paulo kĩ ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla a, eyi kayɔ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlɛga, ĩnyina kĩ nɛ futeli pii kĩ fɔtɛ̃ kĩĩ kamɛ ni, nɔ adzɛ Yudafɔ fɔlɛtsa. Nɛ foesũ kawɔlɛ de yĩ kĩ maanyɛ yĩ onukpɛ̃ nɛ nɔ anɛ.
Aanu kĩ fɔ́ana ndɛ fuwi ewua-nviã kĩ ĩya nɛ Yerusalem ĩyaabɔa afɔliɛ nɛ Yudafɔ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ.
Ade odima támɔ kĩ bɔmɔ odi bɔkɛna ɔdzɛ ĩye ndo ɔtutũ nɛ Yudafɔ Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ, be fɔtsɛnakɔ̃, ĩye kakɔ kadi nɛ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ a.
Ade bati kĩĩ kamɛ odima lɛláapuli eke otse nɛ lɛtsama akũ pɔtii kĩ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛlɛ nɛ awĩ a ni, ɔnɔkɔali fɔanɛ.
Lɛmɛ lɛtsa a kĩ de akũ ntunɔ nyɛ kĩ masum boe bawanyɔ Baguma, ade ntomɛna Osi a kĩ balɛ kĩ ɛnyɛ́ osi wĩ a. Ntɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Mose mbla a mɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ tuvoli a kamɛ a ndo.
Ndeĩ kɔnɛte nɛ Baguma akũ ndɛ ayekĩ be malo bideĩ, kĩ Baguma aadzɛla bati wĩ mɔ bati kpa flee etomɛna kanɔkpa.
Nɛ kɔnɛte kĩĩ sũ ni, mabɔa mbɔdi paa kĩ yĩ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ ɛkpalɛ yededeede nɛ Baguma mɔ batidziwa anɛ.
“Ade futeli pii kĩ ndzakũ nɛ Yerusalem a. Finyaakĩĩ ĩyaate ahiãfɔ fɔtsa lɔkɔa mbɔa afɔliɛ nkpa Baguma.
Kĩ mayua lɔlɔ kakpa amaniɛ a, Yudafɔ badi yamɔ yĩ nɛ Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ. Nnɛ́ bɔmɔ́ bati kĩ banyɛ lɛma tsɛ̃. Ade ke ntádo ɔdzɛ odima lɛmɛ a.
Yudafɔ a kĩ bito Asia tite akũ a na nɛ awã, ade be kɛnɛ kĩ bɛyaadza nɛ nɔ anɛ kamɛ a, lɔkɔa ntɛ bideĩ kalɛ kadi nɛ yĩ akũ ni, baalɛ.
Ĩye afɔ̃ bati a kĩ bidzi nɛ awĩ a bɛlɛ kɔtɔ a kĩ bɛkɔ yĩ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ Yudafɔ ɔmaĩ fɔlɛtsa badzɛnɛ a dzɛmɔ yĩ a.
Mbɔɛ ntɛ kalɛ mɔa a kĩ ndzɛla ɔlɛdo nlɛ kĩ, ‘Miadzɛmɔ yĩ nviã kĩĩ kitonɛkĩ ntɛ banɔkpa kayidza kadzi nkpã a ndo.’ ”
Ade Felike, oti kĩ enyina katɛkado osi vɔɛ̃ kĩĩ paa a bi Yudafɔ a kĩ, “Midzɔlɛ yĩ kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ Lisia aaya fɔmɔ maatsua fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kamɛ.”
Adeke ɛfɔ̃ bɛkɔa Paulo bɛnado nɛ kɔla a. Lɛmɛ ebi bikĩ badãmɛna ye akũ a kĩ bɛtakɛna ye tɛnya. Ntɛ ye bakɔba badi ya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ ni, bɛkpa be osi lɔkɔa bɛkɛna lɛtsa a kĩ yawɛ a bɛkpa ye.
Nɛ fuwi fudi liti ni, Felike mɔ ɔtsɔ̃ Drusila kĩ ɛnyɛ Yudani ya. Ɛfɔ̃ bɛnyɛ Paulo bɛyamɛna ade ebi be kalɛ nɛ Yesu Kristo katɛkado fɔlɛtsa akũ a.
Kĩ ɛkanyɛ fɔlɛtsa kamɛ nɛ kadzi wĩ, akũ kapi, mɔ Baguma kadzɛ a kĩ kaaya nɛ kunya kamɛ a akũ ni, libe wo Felike paa. Adeke Felike bi ye kĩ, “Yidza kanaa tɔ̃. Ntɛ nna lɔkɔ wĩ ni, maafɔ̃ bɛvɛ nɔ.”
Nɛ kĩ ɛkɔna kĩ Paulo aakpa ye litsedi sũ ni, yado bavɛ ye mɔatsɛ mɔatsɛ bɛmɔ ye balɔmɛna.
Nɛ futeli nviã liti a, bɛnyɛ Felike ade bɛkɔa Porkio Festo bɛyamɛna nɛ ye kadzakɔ̃ a. Lɛmɛ kĩ Felike wɛ kĩ Yudafɔ a bɛwɛ ye kalɛ sũ ni, ɛfɔ̃ Paulo buki ɛna nɛ kɔla nɛ awã.
Kĩ Festo yawo kayite a kĩ yanya lɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a, ke fuwi ɛlalɛ liti a, eto Kaisarea ɛnaa Yerusalem.
Nɛ awã naa, basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a mɔ Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a yabi ye fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛbɔɛ nɛ Paulo akũ. Ade ke bike ye aduli kĩ,
ɛmɔ be kɔnya ɛfɔ̃ bɛkɔa ye bɛyamɛna nɛ Yerusalem. Be kasui nyɛ kĩ baadzi ye osi lɔkɔa ntɛ yatɛ̃ a bɛkɔ ye.
Lɛmɛ Festo bi be kĩ, “Paulo waa kɔla nɛ Kaisare. Yĩ malo maamuniki naa awã nɛ fuwi lukũ kamɛ.
Foesũ mifɔ̃ mi banɔkɔɛ̃ a bɛya nɛ awã bɛyaanyɛ ye nfumusu a bɛtsa.”
Nɛ fuwi ɛlɛ̃ ĩye foe ewua liti ni, Festo muniki ɛnaa Kaisare, ade ke luwi lɛyade a ɛvɛ Paulo fɔlɛtsa a.
Ade ke kĩ Paulo yawo fɔlɛtsa kadzɛkɔ̃ a, Yudafɔ a kĩ bito Yerusalem a yadza bisinya ye. Bitsua fɔlɛtsa pii bite nɛ ye akũ lɛmɛ fudima tápi ye.
Paulo nyɛ onukpɛ̃ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ntáfum Yudafɔ mbla ĩye Yudafɔ Asɔli Kɔla a ĩye Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ Kaisare.”
Nɛ kĩ Festo awɛ kĩ Yudafɔ a bɛwɛ ye kalɛ sũ ni, evia Paulo kĩ, “Ɔwɛ kĩ anaa Yerusalem lɔkɔa ndzɛ nɔ fɔlɛtsa a nɛ awã mbɔɛɛ?”
Ade ke Paulo bi ye kĩ, “Oowo. Romafɔ Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ fɔlɛtsa kadzɛkɔ̃ ndzɛ̃. Ade awĩ kɛfɛta kĩ bɛdzɛmɔ yĩ a. Onyina yededeede kĩ ntákɛna tɔkpa tidima nɛ Yudafɔ akũ.

Ntɛ nkɛna lɛtsa a kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ bɛkɔ yĩ ni, maatunɔ kĩ bɛkɔ yĩ. Lɛmɛ ntɛ ntákɛna tɔkpa ni, kɛtáfɛta kĩ nɔ ĩye oti bɛbã akɔa yĩ edo nɛ bati kĩĩ awɛ kamɛ kĩ bɛkɔ yĩ. Nɛ foesũ nkɔa yĩ fɔlɛtsa makpa Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ Kaisare!”
Fukĩĩ liti a, Festo mɔ ye fɔlɛtsa badzɛnɛ a tsa fɔlɔ ade bibi ye kĩ, “Kĩ ɔkɔa nɔ fɔlɛtsa akpa Kaisare sũ ni, Kaisare sɛkɛ̃ mɔ aanaa.”
Fuwi fudi liti a, Lɛgã Agripa mɔ Bernike ya nɛ Festo sɛkɛ̃ nɛ Kaisare kĩ bɛyaawɔ̃na ye.
Bidzi nɛ awã fuwi pii, ade Festo kɔa Paulo fɔlɛtsa a ebi lɛgã a kĩ, “Onyole odi waa kɔla nɛ awĩ kĩ Felike kɔa ye fɔlɛtsa ɛkpa yĩ kĩ ndzɛ.
Kĩ nnaa Yerusalem a, basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ be banɔkɔɛ̃ a tsua ye onukpɛ̃ bɛkpa yĩ ade bɛwɛ kĩ nkɔ ye kɔtɔ a.
“Nfɔ̃ binyi kĩ Romafɔ mbla tákpa osi kĩ bɛkɔ oti fɔmɔ baadzɛmɔ ye. Kɛnɛ kĩ bɛkpa ye osi bɛmɔ bikĩ bideĩ fɔlɛtsa a bɛkpɔta anɛ mɔ anɛ fɔmɔ bɛlɛ foe.
Foesũ kĩ bɛya nɛ awĩ a, ntátɛ̃ ndzi nɛ kalɛ kĩĩ akũ. Kĩ kade sila kinyina a, nfɔ̃ bɛkpã oti kĩĩ bɛyamɛna.
Lɛmɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛlɛ bitomɛna ye akũ a vɛmɛna nɛ fukĩ nkɔna kĩ baalɛ a akũ.
Fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛlɛ nɛ awĩ a to be kasum mɔ onyole odi kĩ bavɛ Yesu kĩ eku, lɛmɛ Paulo kɔ̃ tsɛ̃ yalɛ kĩ ebuki edzi nkpã akũ!
Fɔkɛna yĩ basaa ade ĩnyína ayekĩ matsua fɔlɛtsa a kamɛ a. Foesũ nvia Paulo ntɛ ɛwɛ kĩ nkɔa ye nnamɛna Yerusalem lɔkɔa ɛnaanyɛ ye akũ onukpɛ̃ nɛ awã.
Lɛmɛ Paulo lɛ kĩ ɛwɛ kĩ bɛkɔa ye fɔlɛtsa bɛkpa Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ Kaisare. Ade nfɔ̃ bimunikimɔ ye bɛnado nɛ kɔla kɛnawo kĩ maakɔa ye mma Kaisare a.”
Ade ke Lɛgã Agripa bi Festo kĩ “Yĩ mɔawɛ mawɛ kĩ matse ye onukpɛ̃ kamɛ fɔlɛtsa a.”
Ade Festo bi ye kĩ, “Aatse ye kunya!”

Kĩ kade nyina a, Lɛgã Agripa mɔ Bernike hɛhɛ akũ mɔ fɔgãtsa, bɛnɛ bɛya nɛ fɔlɛtsa kadzɛkɔ̃ a. Ade kawũ banɔnɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ ɔmatɔ a kamɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ a tomɔ be bɛya a. Festo nyɛ onukpɛ̃ kĩ bɛkpã Paulo bɛyamɛna.
Ade Festo lɛ kĩ, “Lɛgã Agripa mɔ mi a flee kĩ mikpɔta nɛ awĩ a, onyole kĩĩ nyɛ oti kĩ Yudafɔ nɛ Yerusalem mɔ Kaisare wɛ kĩ bɛkɔ!
Lɛmɛ nɛ yĩ kamɔ kamɛ ni, ɛtákɛna lɛtsa a kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ bɛkɔ ye. Kĩ ye a lɛmɛ ɛlɛ kĩ ɛkɔa ye fɔlɛtsa yakpa boe Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ sũ ni, yĩ malo ntásĩ.

Lɛmɛ litsa koũ maatsɛlɛ nkɔa mmɛna yĩ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a? Kitonɛkĩ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, ɛtákɛna nfumusu adima. Ade foesũ nkɔa ye ĩyamɛna nɛ mi anɛ kamɛ titiliwu nɔ Lɛgã Agripa kĩ ntɛ bɔdzɛ ye fɔlɛtsa ni lɔkɔa maana kadi ntsɛlɛ nɛ ye akũ mma ye.
Kitonɛkĩ fɔnɛ́nɛ kĩ bakɔa odi kĩ ɛwaa kɔla bɛma Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ kĩ bɛtámɔ tɔkpa a kĩ ɛkɛna a bɛtsa.”
Ade ke Agripa bi Paulo kĩ, “Osi waa kĩ apuli ɔlɛ kɔdzɛla.”
Foesũ Paulo dɛla awɛ ade ɛlɛ kĩ,
“Boe Ɔlate Agripa, nna lɔlɔ wĩ kĩ maanyɛ yĩ akũ onukpɛ̃ nɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ foesũ Yudafɔ bɔɛ kalɛ nɛ yĩ akũ a akũ, nɛ nɔ anɛ.
Kitonɛkĩ onyina Yudafɔ tɛdzɛ mɔ be tɛmaniɛ a flee kanyina wĩ. Foesũ na ɔwɔlɛ katse yĩ fɔlɛtsa.
“Yudafɔ flee nyina ayekĩ ndzi nkpã kito yĩ tibisɛ̃ kamɛ nɛ boe ɔtɔ mɔ Yerusalem lɛmɛ.
Ade ntɛ baalɛ ɔnɔkɔali nɛ yĩ akũ ni, baanyi kĩ ĩnyɛ Farisini kĩ mabu Yudafɔ mbla mɔ tɛmaniɛ a flee kaba mbla adi nyɛ adi.
Finyaakĩĩ ndzɛ̃ badzɛmɔ yĩ nɛ ayekĩ yĩ anɛ teĩ nɛ Baguma kalɛ a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi ɛkpa boe bawanyɔ a sũ.
Ade foesũ Yudafɔ futete ewua-nviã bɔa mbɔdi kĩ basum Baguma lɛnyɛ mɔ suwa flee lɔkɔa bɛna kɔnɛte kĩĩ odu a. Boe Ɔlate, ade fukĩĩ sũ Yudafɔ a bɔɛ fɔlɛtsa nɛ yĩ akũ a.
Nde sũ fudeĩ mi ɔsĩ kĩ miatɛ mido kĩ Baguma adzɛla banɔkpa?
“Lɔkɔ lidi kamɛ ni, nkɔa nte nɛ yĩ akũ kĩ mayidza ndza nɛ bikĩ bitomɔ Yesu kĩ ɛnyɛ Nazaretni a akũ.
Yudafɔ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a kpa yĩ kɔbɛ̃ kĩ mpili bati kpalɛwa pii ndo nɛ kɔla kamɛ nɛ Yerusalem. Ade ke ntɛ bakɔ be lɛmɛ matunɔ nɛ foe akũ a.
Ntomɔ be nkakɛna be tɛnya flee kɛnawo tɛmatɔ bɛbã kĩ tideĩ mɔ lugo a malo kamɛ. Nfɔ̃ bɛvɛlɛ be sɔtɔ nɛ Yudafɔ fɔlɛtsa kadzɛkɔ̃ flee, ndza nɛ be akũ kĩ bɛlɛ fubusuotsa nɛ Yesu akũ.
“Ade kakɔna kĩĩ odu nnɛɛ manaa Damasko, mɔ kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a kpa yĩ a.
