Boe Ɔlate, kĩ ntsɛ̃ nɛ osi manaa mɔ suwa ketee a, mmɔ́ ɔhaĩ odi kĩ ɛkpalɛ ɛba suwa, kĩ ɛmɔanɛ eto ode ɛyako nɛ bɔmɔ́ bikĩ bɔtsɛ̃ bɔanaa akũ.
Kĩ boe flee bɔka bɔtɔ a, nnu ɔlɛdo odi nɛ Yudafɔ tide kamɛ evia kĩ, ‘Saulo, Saulo nde sũ otomɔ yĩ liti? Ntɛ ɔta fu sɛnɛta ni, nɔ mɔawɛ akũ opila.’
“Ade ke nvia ye kĩ, ‘Boe Ɔlate, nɔ owei anɛ?’
“Ɔlɛdo a kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, ‘Yĩ nyɛ Yesu a kĩ ɔlamɛna ye kanɔ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ a.
Finyaakĩĩ yidza kadza! Ĩnyɛ yĩ akũ ntsa nɔ kitonɛkĩ mawɛ kĩ nkɔa nɔ nkɛna yĩ tudzuma ɔkɛnanɛ. Aabi katinya kamɛ bati flee lɛtsa kĩ ɔmɔ́ nɛ awĩ, mɔ fɔtsa a kĩ maanyɛ ntsa nɔ a.
Ade kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ kĩ maado nɔ ni, maadza nɛ nɔ liti nɛ nɔ awɛ bati mɔ kade bɛbã bati lɛmɛ kamɛ.
Ade aabinya be anɛ bɛnɛ nɛ Abonsam ɔtũ kɔbɛ̃ kamɛ bɛya nɛ ɔhaĩ mɔ Baguma kɔbɛ̃ kamɛ a. Baguma aakɔa be titikpa ete be lɔkɔa ɛkɛna be ndɛ bati kĩ ɛnyɛ ɛkpa ye akũ, nɛ kĩ bɛtɛ ye bido sũ.’
“Foesũ, boe Ɔlate Agripa, ntátu kanyɛ katsa a kĩ mmɔ́ ntomɛna ode a atsɛlɛ.
Ĩyi kayɔ mɔ kalɛ wĩ a kabi Damaskofɔ, Yerusalemfɔ, Yudafɔ mɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a kĩ bɛdani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ bɛya nɛ Baguma sɛkɛ̃, lɔkɔa bɛkaakɛna fɔtsa a kĩ foe aatsa kĩ bɛdani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ yededeede a.
Ade fukĩĩ sũ Yudafɔ a yapi yĩ nɛ be Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ kĩ ndza nkalɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ, ade ke bɛwɛ kĩ bakɔ yĩ a.

Lɛmɛ Baguma nyɛ yĩ nɛ be awɛ kamɛ. Foesũ mbuki ndzi nkpã ade nlamɛna fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kamɛ kanyɛ katsa mi banɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ bati flee a. Lɛtsa a kĩ de nlamɛna kalɛ nɛ awĩ a nyɛ fukĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ mɔ Mose lɛ biyi kĩ fɔ́aya nɛ foe kamɛ a.
Ade foe nyɛ kĩ Kristo aayamɔ lubo. Ade ye aanya oti ɔtɔnyade kĩ yaayidza eto banɔkpa kamɛ, lɔkɔa ɛkɔa ɔsɛdza ɛma Yudafɔ mɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a flee a.”
Deedimɔapɛ Festo bɔa fɔwɔla ɛlɛ kĩ, “Paulo, nɔ lɔlɔ kamɛ bu kade! Nɔ fɔtsa beblebee kakɔlɛ fɔ̃ nɔ lɔlɔ kamɛ bu kade!”
Ade Paulo kpa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate Festo, yĩ lɔlɔ kamɛ tábu kade. Takɔa fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ ɔkɛna kagulo. Kalɛ wĩ paa nlamɛna kalɛ.
Ɔnɔkɔali ni, Lɛgã Agripa nyina fɔlɛtsa kĩ malɛ a. Foesũ maapuli nlɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ ye faa. Matɛ kado paa kĩ bɛtákɛna fɔtsa kĩĩ nɛ kabɛla kamɛ.
Nda Agripa, ɔtɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a odo? Ĩnyina kĩ ɔtɛ be odo.”
Ade Agripa bi Paulo kĩ, “Ɔkɔna kĩ aapuli ɔdani yĩ nkɛna okristoni nɛ lɔkɔ lukũ kĩĩ kamɛ?”

Ade ke Paulo kpaa mbuayɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ lɔkɔ lukũ ĩye lɔkɔ gɛlɛɛlɛ malo ni, mabɔa mpaɛ nkpa Baguma kĩ, nviã kĩĩ mi a flee kĩ mideĩ nɛ awĩ a, midani mikɛna ndɛ ayekĩ nla. Lɛmɛ bɛtádo mi nkɔsɔnkɔsɔ ndɛ yĩ aye!”
Ade lɛgã, abãã ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ Bernike mɔ bati a flee yidza a.
Kĩ biyidza a, bɛnaa adzina ade bibi be akũ kĩ, “Oti kĩĩ tákɛna lɛtsa kpa lidima kĩ bakɔ ye ĩye bido ye nɛ kɔla.”
Ade Agripa bi Festo kĩ, “Ntɛ obi kĩĩ ɛtalɛ kĩ ɛkɔa ye fɔlɛtsa yama Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ ni, kufɛ bɔ́apuli bɔfɔnɛ ye awɛ.”
Kĩ bike otse kĩ bɔanaa Italia a, bɛkɔa Paulo mɔ kɔla bawanɛ bɛbã bido nɛ Romafɔ sodzafɔ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ kĩ bavɛ Yulio awɛ kamɛ. Ade ye adãmɛna sodzafɔ katsu a kĩ bavɛ Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ Sodzafɔ Katsu akũ a.
Ade ke budzi ɔkɔlɔ kĩ eto Adramitio yanaa tɔkɔlɔ fɔdzakɔ̃ nɛ Asia kamɛ a. Bɔmɔ Makedoniani kĩ bavɛ Aristarko lidzi nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ. Eto Tesalonika.
Kĩ kade nyina a, bɔnadza nɛ Sidon mpo abuĩ. Ade Yulio kpa Paulo osi kĩ ɛnaa ɔmatɔ kamɛ ɛnaamɔ ye bakɔba, lɔkɔa bɛkpa ye fɔtsa a kĩ yaakɔa ɛtsã osi a.
Kĩ bɔbɔɛ nɛ awã a nɛ kĩ ɔwɛ kabɔa katsɛlamɔ boe a onukpɛ̃ deĩ ɔsi sũ ni, bɔtsã Kipro kayɔ sɛmakɛ bɔbɛla ɔwɛ a.
Kĩ bɔtɛ̃ awã a, bɔtsã Kilikia mɔ Pamfilia mpo abuĩ, ade bɔnadza nɛ Mira nɛ Likia a.
Awĩ a sodzafɔ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ yakpã boe a mɔ́ ɔkɔlɔ odi kĩ eto Aleksandria yanaa Italia tite akũ, ade ke ɛkɔa boe flee edo nɛ ye kamɛ a.

Osi a katsã kamɛ na boe ɔsĩ nɛ fuwi pii kamɛ fɔmɔ bupuli buwo Knido ɔmatɔ a kamɛ. Kĩ ɔwɛ mɔ ɔsĩ kabɔa sũ ni, bɔtápuli bɔtɛ̃ bɔnaa kpĩĩ. Foesũ kĩ buwo Salmone a, bɔblɛ bɔtsã Kreta ɔmatɔ a ɔlɔtɔ, awã kĩ tite a sua ɔwɛ a kɔbɛ̃ onukpɛ̃.
Ɔsĩ kamɛ bɔkɔa bɔtsã mpo abuĩ a bɔnawo kakɔ a kĩ bavɛ Tɔkɔlɔ Kadzakɔ̃ Wĩ a. Awã mɔ Lasea kayite lɛlá lugo.
Bubula fuwi kade, ade kĩ mui akũ katsã lɛmɛ na ɔsĩ sũ ni, Onukpɛ̃ Kasui Lɔkɔ a tɛ̃. Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ Paulo kpa be kakɔna ɛlɛ kĩ,
“Nda amɛ, mmɔ́ ĩyi ɔsũ kĩ boe mui anɛ osi katsã aawo nɛ mbɛtahu kamɛ, kĩ fɔtsa pii mɔ bati malo aawɔ.”
Lɛmɛ kawũ banɔnɛ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ kĩĩ tɛ ɔkɔlɔ ɔtanɛ mɔ ye ɔlate a kakɔna ɛba lɛtsa kĩ Paulo lɛ a.

Nɛ kĩ tɔkɔlɔ kadzakɔ̃ a lɛnɛ́nɛ kadzi gɛlɛɛlɛ nɛ osili lɔkɔ sũ ni, osi batsãnɛ a wɛ kĩ bɛdzakũ ɔsa baawo Foenike. Baapuli bidzi nɛ awã nɛ osili lɔkɔ, kitonɛkĩ Foenike nyɛ ɔmatɔ nɛ Kreta tite akũ. Edeĩ tɔkɔlɔ fɔdzakɔ̃ kĩ futsua ɔwɛ onukpɛ̃ nɛ suwa katomukɔ̃ a.
Kĩ ɔwɛ bɔɛɛ do kabɔa kademɛna awɛ a, fɔkɛna ndɛ fɔ́alɛ fɔkpa osi a akũ kanaa. Foesũ bɛmanɛ akũ ade bɛtsã Kreta mpo abuĩ a.
Lɛmɛ owi tábuna mɔ ɔwɛ mɔ ɔsĩ odi vũ eto Kreta sɛba sɛmakɛ.
Ɛvũ ɛtsɛlamɔ ɔkɔlɔ a lɔtɔ foesũ bɛtápuli bɛdani ɔkɔlɔ a anɛ bɛtsɛlamɔ mpo abuĩ. Nɛ foesũ bɛfɔnɛ ɔkɔlɔ a awɛ ade ɔwɛ a bɔa ye ɛkanamɛna a.
Ke liti kɔlaa, bɔyana kablakɔ̃ kadi nɛ Kauda tite kĩ mui tsua bisinya te liti. Kɔbɛ̃ kamɛ fɔmɔ bupuli busuli boe ɔkɔlɔ kabii a budo nɛ ɔkpale a kĩ ye kamɛ bɔna a kamɛ.

Kĩ bɛmanɛ ye biyua a, bɔkɔa tɔwɛ̃ bisuli bɔtɛ̃mɛna bupimɔ ɔkɔlɔ kpale a kitonɛkĩ bivila kĩ ɔwɛ aabɔa ye ɛnaabãã nɛ dã kamɛ nɛ Libia mpo abuĩ. Foesũ bɛkɛna tilima nɛ ɔkɔlɔ titse a akũ. Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ ɔwɛ a kabɔa ye kanamɛna bɔɛɛ.
Kade nyina, lɛmɛ kĩ ɔwɛ a táfɔ̃ kavũ sũ ni, bido fɔtsa a kĩ ɔkɔlɔ a nɔnɛ a kanyɛ kawula nɛ mui kamɛ awɛ.
Ade nɛ luwi lɛlalɛde a, bɛyatalɛ ɔkɔlɔ a akũ fɔtsa pii lɛmɛ biwula.
Ɔwɛ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩĩ vũ fuwi beblebee kĩ bɛtámɔ suwa ĩye fusibii malo. Ade bɔtátɛ budo kĩ bɔ́ana nkpã a.

Kĩ bidzi fuwi beblebee kĩ bɛtánya sũ ni, Paulo yidza ɛdza nɛ be anɛ kamɛ, ade ebi be kĩ, “Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ntɛ mitse yĩ kalɛ ni, kufɛ bɔtábɔɛ nɛ Kreta, kufɛ fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ flee taya nɛ boe akũ, bɔyɛla boe akũ fɔtsa.
Finyaakĩĩ, make mi aduli kĩ mina ɔwɔlɛ. Ade mabi mi yededeede kĩ ɔkɔlɔ kĩĩ aayɛla lɛmɛ mi kamɛ odima lɛláaku.
Kitonɛkĩ kadzɔ lɛnyɛ ni, Baguma a kĩ ye ode manɛ, mɔ ekĩ masum a, ye ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ yadza nɛ yĩ ɔwɛ̃.
Ade ke ebi yĩ kĩ, ‘Paulo, tavila. Kɛnɛ kĩ akɔa nɔ kalɛ oyi nɛ Kaisare anɛ kamɛ! Nɛ Baguma kɔnyakamɔ sũ ni, nɔ mɔ bikĩ bɛtsɛ̃ osi a flee kamɛ odima lɛláaku.’
Foesũ, nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mina ɔwɔlɛ! Ntɛ Baguma ndo kĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa aaya nɛ foe kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ ɛlɛ eyi a.
Lɛmɛ ɔwɛ aabɔa boe ɛnamɛna tite tidi kĩ mui tsua bisinya te a akũ.”
Ade ke ɔwɛ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩĩ kabɔa boe kanamɛna lɔtɔ mɔ liti fuwi ewuana flee nɛ Adria mpo akũ a. Luwi luwuanade lɛnyɛ a, boe ɔkɔlɔ kamɛ adzuma bakɛnanɛ a kɔna kĩ bifuã tite tidi.
Awã na bɛkɔna mui a kadzũ bɛdã, ade bɛmɔ́ kĩ foe kadzũ aana ndɛ fɔnɛta ɔha mɔ foe tɛya. Ade kĩ bɛnaa lɔtɔ sukuloo a, bibuki bɛkɔna ade bɛmɔ́ kĩ mui a a kadzũ nyɛ fɔnɛta aduekrɔũ a.

Nɛ kĩ bivila kĩ ɔwɛ a aabɔa ɔkɔlɔ a ɛnaasãmɔ boe kpale kpale sũ ni, bɛkɔa fɔbɔtsaɛ mɔ ɔlɔmɛ ɛna kĩ bido ɔwɛ̃ bipimɔ ɔkɔlɔ a nɛ liti bido nɛ mui a kamɛ. Fɔbɔtsaɛ a nabãã nɛ mui ɔda fɔfɔ̃ ɔkɔlɔ a dza. Ade ke bɛkadã anɛ kĩ kade wĩ kinyina a.
Kĩ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ adzuma bakɛnanɛ wɛ kĩ balo sũ ni, bɛkɛna ɔkɔlɔ kabii a, nɛ tɛdake kamɛ kĩ banaakɛna fɔbɔtsaɛ mɔ ɔlɔmɛ a nɛ ɔkɔlɔ kpale a lɔtɔ.
Lɛmɛ Paulo bi sodzafɔ a mɔ be lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a kĩ, “Ntɛ bati kĩĩ flee tána nɛ ɔkɔlɔ kĩĩ kamɛ kɔ̃ ni, míaku.”
Foesũ sodzafɔ a tsua ɔwɛ̃ a kĩ epini ɔkɔlɔ kabii a, ade ɛka ewo nɛ mui a kamɛ a.
Odenyinawi a, Paulo ke be flee aduli kĩ bɛnya. Ebi be kĩ, “Ade nviã nyɛ fuwi ewuana kĩ mi kamɛ odima táta lɛtsama onukpɛ̃ a.
Nɛ foesũ, make mi aduli, minya litsedi lɔkɔa mina kɔbɛ̃ ayekĩ miláaku. Kitonɛkĩ odima sɔlɔ mɔapɛ malo lɛláakamu.”
Ade ke Paulo bɔɛ abodoo adi, ade kĩ ɛbɔa mpaɛ ɛkpa Baguma nɛ be flee anɛ a, ebuli adi ɛba.
Ade ke ɔwɔlɛ ka edzi odi nyɛ odi bido kanya awɛ a.
Bati a kĩ bɛna nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ lidede nyɛ ɔha nviã mɔ be aduesɔũ-evũ (276).
Kĩ bati a nya biwĩ a, bɛnyɛ funitsã mɔ fuvũ a flee nɛ ɔkɔlɔ a kamɛ biko nɛ mui kamɛ ade ɔkɔlɔ a nɛ́ ɔlɔmɛ a.
Kĩ fɔkɔ kpalɛ a, ɔkɔlɔ batanɛ a támɔ awã mpo abuĩ a biyi ɔsũ. Lɛmɛ bɛmɔ́ kadzakɔ̃ kadi kĩ bɛkɔna kĩ awã aalɛ bɛdza. Foesũ bɛwɛ kĩ ntɛ fɔ́alɛ ni bata ɔkɔlɔ a bɛnamɛna awã.
Foesũ bikpeli fɔbɔtsaɛ mɔ ɔlɔmɛ kĩ fupini ɔkɔlɔ a tɔwɛ̃ bido nɛ mui kamɛ, ade biwũnya otse a kĩ ye atsa ɔkɔlɔ a osi a. Ke liti bɛdzɛla ɔkɔlɔ a tilima ayekĩ ɔwɛ aabɔa ye ɛnamɛna.
Kĩ bɛyɛlɛ banaa a, ɔkɔlɔ a nabãã nɛ dã kamɛ ade ye anɛ sɛmakɛ tábuki epuli ekuna akũ a. Ɔwɛ mɔ ɔsĩ a lɛmɛ yabo ye nɛ liti sɛmakɛ a ɛyɛlɛ ye fɔkɛ fɔkɛ.
Sodzafɔ a ke otse kĩ bakɔ kɔla bawanɛ a flee ayekĩ bɛláato mui bilo.
Lɛmɛ be lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ wɛ kĩ yatɛ Paulo nkpã, foesũ ɛtátunɔ bɛkɛna nɛ be kawɛ akũ. Ade ɛkpa kɔbɛ̃ kĩ ntɛ bikĩ baapuli bito mui ni, bɛnya lɔtɔ bɛvɛnya biwo bito mui bɛnaa mpo abuĩ.
Bati a kĩ bite a lɛmɛ bɛbɔɛ titse fɔkɛ mɔ fɔtsa bɛbã kĩ fɔ́apuli fɔtsãmɔ be nɛ mui anɛ lɔkɔa biwo ɔwɔ abuĩ. Ade aye bɔkɛna buwo ɔwɔ abuĩ sɔũ a.
Ade kĩ bɔnɛ nɛ mbɛtahu kamɛ a, bɔyamɔ kĩ tite a kĩ mui tsua bisinya te a bavɛ Malta.
Bati nɛ tite kĩĩ akũ a tɛ boe mɔ kawɔlɛ paa a. Nɛ kĩ oni kako osili lɛmɛ na sũ ni, bɛkpɔta fi kpale nɛ mpo abuĩ a bɛkpa boe.
Kĩ Paulo fila tuvotsei kĩ yako nɛ fi kamɛ a, nɛ fi a ɔwɛ ɔbɔ̃ sũ kɔɛ kudi nɛ nɛ avo a kamɛ kɔyadɔ̃ ye kɔvanɛ nɛ ye kɔkpɔ.
Kĩ awã bati a mɔ kɔɛ a kĩ kɔvanɛ nɛ ye kɔkpɔ a, bibi akũ kĩ, “Owudini oti kĩĩ anɛ. Ade foesũ boe baviɔ̃ lɛláafɔ̃ edzi nkpã a, titɔ kĩ elo nɛ wuda awɛ kamɛ nɛ mpo kamɛ malo.”
Ade Paulo wunya kɔɛ a edo nɛ fi a kamɛ a, lɛmɛ lɛtsama tákɛna ye.
Ade bati a dza bɛkadã anɛ kĩ yaawumi ĩye yaaka ɛtɔ deedimɔapɛ eku. Owi buna kĩ bɛdza bɛkadã, ade kĩ lɛtsama tákɛna ye a, bɛdani be adzuni nɛ ye akũ, ade bɛlɛ kĩ, baguma adi yanɛ.
Awã kĩ bɔnadza a, fuãmɔ Publio kĩ ɛnyɛ tite a lɛgã. Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ kĩĩ lɛmɛ tɛ boe mɔ kawɔlɛ ade ɛdã boe akũ fuwi ɛlalɛ flee a.
Nɛ fuwi kĩĩ kamɛ ni, Publio ɔlɛga kasɔ atilili, ade ɛkayo kɔbɔa mɔatsɛ mɔatsɛ a. Paulo naa ye sɛkɛ̃, ɛnabɔa mpaɛ ete awɛ nɛ ye akũ, ade ɛsaɛ a.
Kĩ binu fɔsɔ katsa kĩĩ a, basɔnɛ nɛ tite akũ flee nɛ bɛya, ade Paulo tsa be a.
Nɛ lɛkɛnana kĩĩ sũ bɛkpa boe fɔtsa pii. Ade kĩ boe kadzakũ wo ɔtɔ a, bɛma boe fɔtsa a kĩ bɔ́akɔa bɔtsã osi.
Bɔtɛ tidetɔ ɛlalɛ nɛ awã fɔmɔ bɔdzakũ. Kĩ bɔadzakũ a budzi ɔkɔlɔ kĩ bavɛ Nta Baviɔ̃ kĩ eto Aleksandria ɛyadza nɛ kasekɔ̃ a nɛ osili lɔkɔ.
Kĩ bɔbɔɛ buto awã a, bɔnaa Sirakuse ɔmatɔ a, ade bɔna nɛ awã fuwi ɛlalɛ a.
Ade ke luwi lɛyade buto awã bunyina bɔnaa Regio a. Ɔwɛ wĩ odi bɔa boe nɛ liti, ade bɔyawo Puteoli a.
Awã naa, bɔmɔ́ batɛ badonɛ badi, ade bike boe aduli kĩ budzi nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ ɛkwansieda mɔa. Nɛ ke liti a, buto awã bɔnaa Roma.

Kĩ boe bawaɛ̃ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Roma nu kĩ bɔaya a, bɛyatsɛlamɔ boe nɛ awã kĩ bavɛ Apia Kɔyaatɔ a. Badi lɛmɛ yatsɛlamɔ boe nɛ Fusekɔ̃ Ɛlalɛ a. Kĩ Paulo mɔ́ be a, ɛnyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ ade ke ebuki ɛna ɔwɔlɛ kado a.
Kĩ buwo Roma a, bɛkpa Paulo osi kĩ edzi ye akũ akũ nɛ awã kĩ ɛwɛ a, lɛmɛ bɛfɔ̃ sodzafɔ a kamɛ ɔmɔa kadãmɛna ye akũ.

Fuwi ɛlalɛ liti a, Paulo vɛ Yudafɔ banɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ awã a ɛkpɔta. Kĩ bɛtsɛna a, ebi be kĩ, “Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, bipi yĩ nɛ Yerusalem bɛkɔa bɛma Roma abãã kĩ ɛdzɛmɔ yĩ, titɔ kĩ ntáfum odima, ĩye nfum boe bawanyɔ amaniɛ adima malo.
Romafɔ a dzɛmɔ yĩ, ade ke bɛwɛ kĩ bafɔnɛ yĩ awɛ kufɛ a, kitonɛkĩ bɛtámɔ lɛtsa a kĩ de akũ baadza bɛkɔ yĩ wuda kɔtɔ.
Kĩ Yudafɔ a tátunɔ nɛ foe akũ sũ ni, fɔyasĩ kĩ nkɔa yĩ kalɛ mma Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ Kaisare, titɔ kĩ ntábɔɛ fɔlɛtsa nɛ yĩ kade bati akũ malo.
Ade fukĩĩ sũ nvɛ mi a, kitonɛkĩ Oti a kĩ Bɛbɔa Tɔdɔ̃ a, kĩ ye akũ Yudafɔ ate anɛ a, ade ye ntɛ ndo sũ nkɔsɔnkɔsɔ kĩĩ pini yĩ a.”
Ade bibi ye kĩ, “Boe kɔ̃ bɔtánu kadima butomɛna nɔ akũ. Ade bɔtátɛ ovoli ĩye ɔlɛdo kpa odima nɛ nɔ akũ butomɛna bikĩ bito Yudea bɛya nɛ awĩ a sɛkɛ̃ a.
Lɛmɛ bɔawɛ kĩ bɔatse litsedi butomɛna lɛtsa a kĩ de ɔtɛ odo a akũ. Kitonɛkĩ baálɛ kalɛ wĩ kadima nɛ katɛkado katsu a kĩ ke kamɛ odeĩ a akũ nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ.”

Biyi luwi ade ke bati pii yatsɛna nɛ Paulo awã a. Awã naa, ebi be fɔlɛtsa nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a akũ. Ade ɛtsa be fɔtsa nɛ Yesu akũ etomɛna Mose mɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a tuvoli kamɛ a. Ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla kito ɔnɔnɛ kɛnawo olobe.
Be kamɛ badi tɛ fɔlɛtsa a bido, badi lɛmɛ tátɛ bido.
Fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ dani kavɛlɛ nɛ be kamɛ, ade bɛsɛ̃ be akũ a. Paulo bi be kĩ, “Hũhũ Kpalɛwa lɛ ɔnɔkɔali ɛtsã Yesaya akũ ebi boe bawanyɔ kĩ,
‘Naa kanaabi Yudafɔ a kĩ,
“Míanu yĩ fɔlɛtsa lɛmɛ miláanu foe kayɔ,
míako anɛ midã lɛmɛ miláamɔ foe miyi ɔsũ.”
Kitonɛkĩ bati kĩĩ tɔwɔlɛ deĩ ɔsĩ,
ade be atɔ sĩ a,
ade bisua anɛ lɛmɛ a.
Ntɛ nnɛ́ aye ni, kufɛ be anɛ aamɔ
ade be atɔ aanu, be adzuni kamɛ lɛmɛ aakpalɛ,
ade baadani bɛya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ lɔkɔa ntsa be fɔsɔ.’ ”
Paulo wũna kɔdzɛla kalɛ mɔ be kĩ, “Kɛnɛ kĩ minyi kĩ, bɛkɔa Baguma bati nkpã katɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a bɛma bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a lɛmɛ. Be ni, baatɛ foe!”
Paulo wũna kɔdzɛla kalɛ mɔ be kĩ, “Kɛnɛ kĩ minyi kĩ, bɛkɔa Baguma bati nkpã katɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a bɛma bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a lɛmɛ. Be ni, baatɛ foe!”
Paulo dzi nɛ awã futeli nviã nɛ kɔla kĩ ɛwã a kamɛ. Ade awã ɛkatɛ bati a flee kĩ bɛkaya nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ a.
Ɛkalɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ akũ fɔlɛtsa mɔ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kɔbɛ̃ flee kakpa be, ɛtsa be fɔtsa etomɛna boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo akũ, ade odima tásua ye osi a.
Romans: Ovoli kĩĩ to yĩ, Paulo, Yesu Kristo ɔsumunɛ sɛkɛ̃. Baguma lɛpau yĩ, ɛvɛ yĩ kĩ ĩyadani ye fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ, nde lɛtsã nɛ ye Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ.
Baguma lɛ Kalɛ Wĩ kĩĩ eyi anɛ kɔkɔɛ ɛtsãmɛna ye onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ akũ, ndɛ ayekĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ a.
Bɛlɛ Kalɛ Wĩ kĩĩ nɛ Obi, boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo akũ. Bɛma ye ndɛ otidziwa aye nɛ Lɛgã Dawid kasinu a kamɛ.
Nɛ kakpalɛ nɛ hũhũ kamɛ ni, Baguma nyɛ ye ɛtsa mɔ kɔbɛ̃ ndɛ ye obi, lɔkɔ a kĩ ɛdzɛla ye etomɛna wuda kamɛ a.
Baguma tsã Yesu Kristo akũ ɛmɔ́ boe kɔnya bɔyadani fɔtɔ banyanɛ, ayekĩ fɔ́atsã ye dĩ akũ, bɔ́akpã fude fude bati flee bɛtɛ ye bido, bitse ye.
Mi Romafɔ lɛmɛ, mideĩ nɛ bati a kĩ Baguma vɛ kĩ bɛyaakɛna Yesu Kristo bade a kamɛ.
Ade foesũ ntsɛlɛ ovoli kĩĩ mama mi flee a kĩ mideĩ nɛ Roma, kĩ Baguma awɛ mi kalɛ, ade ɛvɛ mi kĩ miyaakɛna bati kĩ ɛkpalɛ be akũ a.
Baguma boe Ɔlɛga mɔ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo, bɛmɔ mi kɔnya, bɛkpa mi lukudɔ lɛmɛ!
Lɛtsa a kĩ lɛnyaa lɔtɔ nyɛ kĩ, nkɔa Yesu Kristo manyɛ yĩ Baguma kɔlɛ nɛ mi flee lɔlɔ, kitonɛkĩ balɛ ayekĩ mitɛ Kristo mido a fɔlɛtsa nɛ katinya kamɛ flee.
Baguma a kĩ masum mɔ yĩ ɔwɔlɛ flee, nɛ lɛtsã a kĩ made nɛ ye Obi Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ a, nyɛ yĩ adansiɛ kĩ lɛtsa a kĩ malɛ a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali. Baguma nyina kĩ mate anɛ nɛ mi akũ,
lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ kĩ mabɔa mpaɛ. Mawã Baguma kĩ ntɛ fɔnyɛ ye kawɛ ni, ɛkpa yĩ osi ĩyaasɛla mi finyaa.
Kitonɛkĩ mawɛ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ bɔmɔ akũ, lɔkɔa nkɔa hũhũ kamɛ futetsa fudi mma mi nkɔa ndo mi kɔbɛ̃.
Lɛtsa a kĩ matsa nyɛ kĩ bɔmɔ mi bɔ́ado akũ kɔbɛ̃. Yĩ katɛkado ado mi kɔbɛ̃, ade mi kade lɛmɛ aado yĩ kɔbɛ̃ a.

Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mawɛ kĩ minyi kĩ nkɛna nhihiɛ lɔkɔ pii kĩ mayaasɛla mi kufɛ, lɛmɛ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ litsedi asua yĩ osi. Mawɛ kĩ mana bati kĩ bɛtɛ Kristo bido nɛ mi kamɛ, ndɛ ayekĩ nna nɛ bati bɛbã a kĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a kamɛ a.
Kitonɛkĩ yĩ adzuma fɔanɛ kĩ nde lɛtsã nkpa bati flee, bikĩ binyina kadi mɔ bikĩ binyína kadi, bati kĩ binyina tuvoli mɔ bikĩ binyína tuvoli.
Ade foesũ akũ asĩ yĩ kĩ made lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ nkpa mi a kĩ mideĩ nɛ Roma lɛmɛ a.
Kalɛ Wĩ a lákɔ yĩ kɔnyɔã, kitonɛkĩ Baguma kɔbɛ̃ kɔanɛ. Kakpa bati a kĩ bɛtɛ ke bido a nkpã, Yudafɔ nyaa lɔtɔ fɔmɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a.

Kitonɛkĩ Kalɛ Wĩ a kamɛ banyɛ ayekĩ Baguma abu bati kĩ bɛkpɔla a katsa. Fɔnyɛ katɛkado fɔlɛtsa kĩto kayɔkayi kɛnawo kawũna. Ndɛ ayekĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ, “Oti kĩ Baguma abu kĩ yadã kpĩĩ nɛ ye katɛkado sũ ni, yaana nkpã.”
Baguma anyɛ ye kalɔkpa katomɛna ode kako nɛ bati a kĩ bakɔa tɔkpa mɔ ablɔ fɔtsa kasua ɔnɔkɔali a kanyi osi a akũ.
Baguma avɛlɛ bati a sɔtɔ kitonɛkĩ binyina fɔtsa a kĩ otidziwa aapuli enyi nɛ ye akũ a. Baguma mɔawɛ a lɛnyɛ foe ɛtsa be yededeede.

Kito anɛ kĩ Baguma bɔa katinya a, ye kutitse kĩ baámɔ mɔ anɛ a, mɔ kɔbɛ̃ kĩ kudeĩ daa mɔ ye Baguma kutidu a, anyɛ foe akũ katsa nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ ɛbɔa a kamɛ. Foesũ bati a lɛláapuli bɛnyɛ onukpɛ̃ kĩ binyína Baguma.
Titɔ kĩ binyina Baguma malo ni, baákpa ye obu a kĩ ɛfɛta ye, ade baányɛ ye kɔlɛ a. Mbom fɔtsa a kĩ fɔlá nfasɔ akũ bakɔna, ade be adzuni kamɛ ke ɔtũ a.
Babu be akũ kĩ binyina kadi, lɛmɛ bɛdani badzimbifɔ.
Nɛ kĩ bɛkɔa obu bɛkpa Baguma a kĩ edzi nkpã daa a ni, basum fɔtsa a kĩ bɛmɛ mɔ awɛ kutidu, kĩ fɔla ndɛ oti kĩ yaku, ĩye kɔvɔlabi, ĩye bayaɛ, ĩye bayaɛ kĩ baboli nɛ sɛmɛ akũ.
Nɛ foesũ Baguma fɔnɛ be awɛ kĩ bɛkɛna efĩĩ fɔtsa kĩ be tɔwɔlɛ awɛ a, kĩ bɛkɔa be sukɛna bakɛna fɔnyɔãtsa mɔ be akũ akũ.
Bakɔa Baguma akũ ɔnɔkɔali a kavɛmɛna mɔ fɔvã. Basum fɔtsa a kĩ Baguma bɔa a kaba Baguma mɔawɛ a kĩ ɛbɔa foe a, kĩ kɛfɛta kĩ bɛkaamu daa a! Fɔya lɔmɔ.
Nɛ fukĩ bakɛna a sũ, Baguma fɔnɛ be awɛ ɛkpa sukɛna fɔwɛtsa kĩ fɔado akũ kɔnyɔã kakɛna. Be batsole dani bawamɔ bakɔba batsole.

Ade ayea banyole lɛmɛ fɔ̃ bɛmɔ batsole kawa ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma kɛna eyi a, mbom bakɔba banyole akɔ be odo. Foesũ banyole awamɔ akũ kĩ kɔnyɔã lɛláa foe kamɛ. Nɛ ɔbla kpa kĩ bɛbɔa kĩĩ sũ ni, Baguma vɛlɛ be sɔtɔ a kĩ sɛfɛta be a, nɛ be mɔawɛ kamɛ.
Ayekĩ bati a sĩ kĩ baátɛ kadikanyi wĩ nɛ Baguma akũ a bido nɛ be kamɛ sũ ni, Baguma fɔnɛ be awɛ ɛkpa be adzuni kĩ bibula kade a, kĩ bɛkɛna fɔtsa a kĩ fɔtáfɛta a.
Be kamɛ yi mɔ tɔkpa tidi nyɛ tidi kakɛna, ablɔ, anɛngbã mɔ bati tɔkpa kawɛ. Fɔbɛbã kĩ fudeĩ nɛ be kamɛ nyɛ lineke kanɔ, awudi, lɛma kavũ, bati kakɛ mɔ likesĩ. Fukĩ fubu nyɛ kĩ balɛ bati akũ kɔdzɛla,
bɛnyɛ bati buĩ banyɛnɛ, mɔ Baguma bakesĩnɛ. Bɛnyɛ bati bavũnanɛ, akũ batanɛ, akũ bapianɛ, bawɛ tɔkpa tisi bɛbã pii kayamɛna mɔ bati kĩ baábu be bamanɛ a.
Bɛnyɛ bati kĩ be tɔwɔlɛ lákɔ be kɔtɔ, baákɛna nɛ bɔhɛ a akũ a, bɛlá sɛmɛ kalɛ ade baámɔ oti kɔnya a.

Titɔ kĩ binyina pefee kĩ nɛ Baguma mbla a onukpɛ̃ ni, bikĩ bidzi nkpã nɛ osi kĩĩ odu akũ a fɛta bɛkpa wuda malo ni, bɛkakɛna foe. Nnɛ́ foe odi bakɛna, mbom bɛdza nɛ bikĩ bakɛna fɔtsa kpa kĩĩ odu a liti.
Nwaɛ̃, nɔ akɔ bati bɛbã kɔtɔ? Ntɛ litsa oti anɛ malo ɔláapuli ɔnyɛ onukpɛ̃ kĩ nɔ kɔ̃ oti kpĩĩ anɛ. Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ adzɛmɔ bati bɛbã adeke akɛna lɛtsa mɔapɛ a kĩ de bakɛna a ni, nɔ mɔawɛ akũ akɔ kɔtɔ.
Bunyina kĩ Baguma deĩ ɔtɔbɛ ntɛ ɛdzɛmɔ bati a kĩ bakɛna fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ a.
Lɛmɛ nwaɛ̃, nɔ a kĩ akɛna fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ a lɛmɛ akɔ bati bɛbã kɔtɔ nɛ foe akũ a ni, abu kĩ aapuli olo Baguma kɔtɔkakɔ?
Mbɔɛɛ ɔbɔɛ foe kĩ Baguma deĩ sɛmɛ kalɛ, ɔwɔlɛ kado mɔ ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ sũ ɔtsɛ́la lɛtsama? Onyina kĩ nuwĩ Baguma deĩ sɛmɛ kalɛ, kitonɛkĩ yawɛ kĩ yakpã nɔ ɔdani ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ.
Lɛmɛ nɛ nɔ atɔ ɔsĩ kĩ aádani ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ sũ ni, ɔfɔ̃ nɔ sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ aana ɔsɛ̃ nɛ luwi a kĩ Baguma aanyɛ ye kalɔkpa mɔ ye fɔlɛtsa kadzɛ kpĩĩ akũ a kanya.
Kitonɛkĩ Baguma aase odi nyɛ odi kɔtɔ nɛ ye adzuma a kĩ ɛkɛna a onukpɛ̃.
Bati a kĩ bakɛna tuwĩ kĩ bawɛ kukũkpalɛ, obu mɔ daa nkpã a, Baguma aakpa be nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a.
Lɛmɛ bati bɛbã a kĩ be odi fude bawɛ, kĩ bisĩ ɔnɔkɔali a, bitomɔ tɔkpa a, Baguma aakɔa kalɔkpa ɛvɛlɛ be sɔtɔ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ.
Bati flee a kĩ bakɛna tɔkpa a, aamɔ lubo mɔ kalɔɛ, Yudafɔ aanya lɔtɔ, ke liti bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a lɛmɛ.
Lɛmɛ Baguma aakpa bikĩ bakɛna tuwĩ a kukũkpalɛ, obu mɔ lukudɔ, Yudafɔ aanya lɔtɔ bɛna, fɔmɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a lɛmɛ.
Kitonɛkĩ Baguma ládã oti anɛ nɛ ye fɔlɛtsa kadzɛ kamɛ.
Bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a tána Mose mbla a, lɛmɛ kĩ bɛkɛna titikpa ni, Baguma aavɛlɛ be sɔtɔ, kĩ ɛláakɔa mbla a bɛdzɛmɔ be. Yudafɔ a na Mose mbla a, lɛmɛ bɛkɛna titikpa, Baguma aakɔa mbla a ɛdzɛ mɔ be.
Kitonɛkĩ nnɛ́ bati a kĩ batse mbla a nyɛ bati kpĩĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ, mbom bati a kĩ bɛkɛna nɛ mbla akũ a, adã kpĩĩ.
Nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a tána mbla a, lɛmɛ ntɛ oti kabɔa kamɛ fɔ̃ bɛkɛna lɛtsa a kĩ Mose mbla tsa ni, fɔatsa kĩ bɛkɛna mbla bɛkpa be akũ, titɔ kĩ bɛlá Mose mbla a malo.
Be fɔkɛlatsa atsa kĩ Baguma tsɛlɛ mbla a nɛ be tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ. Be tɔwɔlɛ lɛmɛ atsa kĩ fɔnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali, kitonɛkĩ fɔkɔ fudi be tɔwɔlɛ akɔ be kɔtɔ ade yadza nɛ be liti a.
Nɛ foesũ nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a kĩ malɛ a onukpɛ̃ ni, ade aye fɔ́ana nɛ Luwi a akũ kĩ Baguma aatsã Yesu Kristo akũ ɛdzɛmɔ bati flee fɔlɔ kamɛ fɔlɛtsa kɔlawa a.
Avɛ nɔ akũ kĩ Yudani, akɔa anɛ kate nɛ mbla akũ, ade apia nɛ Baguma akũ a.
Onyina lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma awɛ kĩ kɛna, ade ɔkɔlɛ otomɛna mbla a kamɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛnyɛ fɔtsa wĩ a.
Atɛ kado kĩ ɔnyɛ banɛkunɛ ɔkpãnɛ, ɔnyɛ ɔhaĩ ɔkpa bikĩ bideĩ nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ a.
Ɔkɔa nɔ akũ ɔkɛna bakɔasia ɔvɛlɛnɛ mɔ bikĩ bɛtábo anɛ tɔ̃ fɔtsa ɔtsanɛ. Onyina yededeede lɛmɛ kĩ kadikanyi mɔ ɔnɔkɔali deĩ nɛ mbla a kamɛ.
Nɔ a kĩ atsa bati bɛbã fɔtsa a, nde sũ aátsa nɔ mɔawɛ akũ? Ade lɛtsã kĩ bati bɛtaye, lɛmɛ nɔ mɔawɛ a aáye?
Abi bati kĩ bɛtabɔa adɔpaa, lɛmɛ nɔ mɔawɛ a aábɔa adɔpaa? Aáwɛ baviɔ̃ fɔlɛtsa, lɛmɛ aáye kuviɔ̃la kamɛ fɔtsa?
Abo ɔwɔlɛ nɛ Baguma mbla a akũ, lɛmɛ afum ye mbla a kakɔado Baguma kɔnyɔã.
Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Mi Yudafɔ ɔbla kpa sũ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a alɛ fɔlɛtsa kpa nɛ Baguma dĩ akũ.”
Ntɛ akɛna nɛ mbla a akũ ni, kekɔ̃ nɔ lɛkpati katsua a akũ deĩ nfasɔ, lɛmɛ ntɛ aákɛna nɛ mbla a akũ kɔ̃ ni, oketimɔ bikĩ bɛtátsua fɔkpati a.
Ntɛ oti kĩ ɛnyɛ́ Yudani, kĩ ɛtátsua lɛkpati akɛna nɛ mbla a akũ ni, Baguma lɛláabu ye ndɛ oti kĩ etsua lɛkpati aye?
Foesũ, mi Yudafɔ, oti kĩ ɛnyɛ́ Yudani a kĩ ɛkɛna nɛ mbla a akũ aakɔ mi kɔtɔ, kitonɛkĩ miafum mbla a, titɔ kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ ye biyi bɛkpa mi, ade miatsua lɛkpati a.
Nnɛ́ oti kĩ bɛma Yudani ĩye oti kĩ bitsua lɛkpati nɛ Mose mbla a onukpɛ̃ nyɛ Yudani. Ade lɛkpati katsua paa ni, fɔdzɛ́ fɔkpa sukɛna katsua lɛkɛnana kĩ bamɔ nɛ oti akũ a,

mbom Yudani kpanunuunu nyɛ oti kĩ ɛnyɛ Yudani nɛ ye kamɛkamɛ, ade foe nyɛ kĩ bitsua ye ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ lɛkpati. Lɛkpati katsua kĩĩ nyɛ Baguma Hũhũ adzuma, fɔtáto mbla a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ biyi a kamɛ. Baguma amu oti kĩĩ odu, nnɛ́ batidziwa.
Litsa koũ Yudani deĩ ɛbɛ̃ oti kĩ ɛnyɛ́ Yudani, ĩye litsa nfasɔ deĩ nɛ lɛkpati katsua kamɛ?
Ɔnɔkɔali nfasɔ a pɔnɛ nɛ tisi pii akũ. Katɔnyade nyɛ kĩ Yudafɔ awɛ Baguma kɔa ye fɔlɛtsa a edo.
Lɛmɛ nde ntɛ be kamɛ badi tátɛ bido a? Katsa fɔatsa kĩ be katatɛkado aafɔ̃ Baguma lɛláadi ɔnɔkɔali?
Oowo! Kɛnɛ kĩ Baguma adi ɔnɔkɔali, titɔ kĩ oti nyɛ oti ama fɔvã malo, ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ,
“Ntɛ ɔlɛ kɔdzɛla ni, nɔ fɔlɛtsa fɔnya ɔnɔkɔali.
Ntɛ bɛdzɛmɔ nɔ ni, aanya akũ.”
Lɛmɛ ntɛ boe titikpa kakɛna anyɛ fɔtsa wĩ a kĩ Baguma akɛna a katsa yededeede a ni, bɔ́apuli bɔlɛ kĩ Baguma akɛna tɔkpa ntɛ ɛvɛlɛ boe sɔtɔ? Ade kavia kĩ otidziwa aavia a.
Oowo! Ntɛ Baguma ládã kpĩĩ ni, nde yaakɛna ɛdzɛmɔ katinya kamɛ?
Ntɛ yĩ fɔvã kama anyɛ Baguma ɔnɔkɔali a katsa, kĩ bamu ye a, nde sũ bakɔ yĩ kɔtɔ ndɛ tɔkpa ɔkɛnanɛ?
Nde sũ bɔálɛ kĩ, “Mifɔ̃ bɔkɛna titikpa ayekĩ tuwĩ aanɛ tito foe kamɛ?” Ɔnɔkɔali bati badi lamɛna fɔvã kama kate nɛ yĩ akũ kĩ ade aye nlɛ a. Baguma aakɔ be kɔtɔ ndɛ ayekĩ kɛfɛta.
Mbɔɛɛ finyaa, boe Yudafɔ kadzi kamɛ nɛnɛ kɛbɛ̃ bikĩ bɛnyɛ Yudafɔ a? Oowo! Kitonɛkĩ ĩnya lɔtɔ ntsa kɔkɔɛ kĩ tɔkpa nya Yudafɔ mɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a flee akũ,
ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ,
“Oti odima lɛláa kĩ yadã kpĩĩ. Midi oti mɔapɛ malo lɛláa.
Odima lɛláa kĩ yanu fɔlɛtsa kayɔ,
ĩye kĩ yawɛ Baguma liti osi.
Bati flee muniki nɛ Baguma liti,
be flee bɛyɛla osi,
ade odima lɛláa kĩ yakɛna tuwĩ a,
oti mɔapɛ malo lɛláa.
Be tudomɛna binya tɛwaa
ndɛ linikɛ kĩ lɛwaa luto aye,
bakɛ bati mɛnɛmɛnɛ mɔ be fɔmɛ.
Be onukpɛ̃ kamɛ fɔlɛtsa la ndɛ kɔɛ kadɔ̃ aye.
Fudumutsa mɔ fɔlɔɛwotsa yi be tunukpɛ̃ kamɛ.
Bawɛ sɔwa kĩ bapila bati bɛkɔ be.
Kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ kĩ banaa ni, kawɔla mɔ fɔtsa kade kabula ate nɛ liti.
Binyína kadzi nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ,
ade Baguma kavila kadima lɛláa be kamɛ a.”
Finyaa, bunyina kĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa nɛ mbla a kamɛ a atamɔ bikĩ bideĩ nɛ mbla a kayɔ, ayekĩ baasua batidziwa onukpɛ̃ kanyɛ osi, lɔkɔa Baguma lɛdzɛmɔ katinya kamɛ flee.
Kitonɛkĩ odima lɛnyɛ́ oti kpĩĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ, nɛ ayekĩ yakɛna nɛ mbla a akũ sũ. Lɛtsa a kĩ mbla a akɛna nyɛ kĩ yafɔ̃ oti anyi kĩ ɛkɛna tɔkpa.
Lɛmɛ finyaa, bɛnyɛ osi a kĩ Baguma atsã kakɛna bati kpĩĩ nɛ ye anɛ a bɛtsa. Fukĩĩ lɛtsɛ́la mbla a akũ, titɔ kĩ Mose mbla a mɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ di foe akũ adansiɛ malo.
Baguma akɛna bati badã kpĩĩ katsãmɛna be Yesu Kristo katɛkado kamɛ. Yakɛna fukĩĩ kakpa bati a kĩ bɛtɛ Kristo bido a flee, kĩ ntsitsemu adima lɛláa foe kamɛ.
Kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi kɛna tɔkpa, ade edeĩ mɔ lugo nɛ Baguma kukũkpalɛ a ɔwɛ̃ a.
Lɛmɛ nɛ kɔnya a kĩ Baguma amɔ faa sũ ni, ɛtsã Kristo Yesu a kĩ ese kɔtɔ nɛ boe lɔlɔ a akũ, ɛkɛna boe bati kpĩĩ.

Baguma kɔa ye ɛkpa ndɛ lɛma ɔkplanɛ kĩ fɔtsã ye wuda kamɛ bati bɛna tɔkpa kakɔakate ntɛ bɛtɛ ye bido. Baguma kɛna fukĩĩ ɛnɛɛ yatsa kĩ yadã kpĩĩ. Nɛ kɔkɔɛ a, Baguma na ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ, ɛve sinepo esua bati tɔkpa,
lɛmɛ finyaa kɔ̃ yate anɛ nɛ be tɔkpa akũ ɛkɔa yatsa kĩ yadã kpĩĩ. Nɛ osi kĩĩ akũ, Baguma atsa kĩ ye mɔawɛ ɛnyɛ oti kpĩĩ ade yakɛna odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ Yesu edo oti kpĩĩ a.
Finyaa ni, litsa bɔ́akɔa bubo ɔwɔlɛ? Bɔlá lɛtsamama! Mɔ litsa sũ? Ayekĩ bɔakɛna nɛ mbla a akũ sũ mbɔɛɛ? Oowo! Mbom ayekĩ bɔtɛ budo sũ.
Foesũ bɔ́awũna kĩ katɛkado odi akũ fɔtsã mɔ oti adã kpĩĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ, kĩ nnɛ́ mbla a akũ kakɛna sũ.
Mbɔɛɛ Baguma a ni, Yudafɔ odi ode yanɛ? Nnɛ́ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a lɛmɛ Baguma yanɛ? Oo, be malo Baguma yanɛ!
Baguma mɔapɛ deĩ, ade yaakɛna Yudafɔ bati kpĩĩ ɛtsãmɛna be katɛkado akũ a, ɛkɛna bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a lɛmɛ bati kpĩĩ ɛtsãmɛna be katɛkado kamɛ.
Katsa fɔatsa kĩ katɛkado sũ bɔfɔnɛ mbla a awɛ? Oowo! Fɔlá lɔmɔ kɔlaa, mbom bupini mbla a mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ.
Litsa bɔ́apuli bɔlɛ nɛ boe kade ɔwanyɔ Abraham akũ? Litsa ɛmɔ́ eyi ɔsũ nɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ akũ?
Ntɛ tudzuma a kĩ ɛkɛna a akũ fɔtsã sũ Baguma bu Abraham kĩ ɛnyɛ oti kpĩĩ ni, kekɔ̃ yaana litsedi kĩ yakɔa ebo ɔwɔlɛ, lɛmɛ nnɛ́ nɛ Baguma anɛ.
Kitonɛkĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Abraham tɛ Baguma edo, ade nɛ ye katɛkado sũ Baguma tɛ ye kĩ yadã kpĩĩ.”
Oti kĩ yakɛna adzuma ni, base ye kɔtɔ, lɛmɛ baábu kɔtɔkase a ndɛ futetsa, mbom fɔnyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ fɔfɛta fɔkpa ye adzuma a kĩ ɛkɛna a.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi tátɛ dĩ nɛ adzuma kakɛna kamɛ, mɔ ɛtɛ edo kĩ Baguma akɛna bikĩ baávila ye bati kpĩĩ ni, nɛ ye katɛkado sũ Baguma aabu ye kĩ ɛnyɛ oti kpĩĩ.
Ade foe Lɛgã Dawid lɛmɛ lɛ kĩ bihila oti a kĩ Baguma bu ye kĩ ɛnyɛ oti kpĩĩ, kĩ nnɛ́ ye adzuma wĩ a kĩ ɛkɛna a sũ. Dawid lɛ kĩ,
“Baguma hila bikĩ ye mɔawɛ
ɛkɔa be tɔkpa ete be a,
bikĩ ɛkɔa be titikpa ɛkɔla.
Baguma hila oti a
kĩ Baguma nyɛ anɛ nɛ ye tɔkpa akũ.”

Nhila fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Dawid lɛ nɛ awĩ a ni, bikĩ bitsua fɔkpati a odi fude yanɛ, mbɔɛɛ kĩ mɔ bikĩ bɛtátsua fɔkpati a? Oowo! Ɛnyɛ bikĩ bɛtátsua fɔkpati a lɛmɛ ade, kitonɛkĩ bɔlɛ butomɛna Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ, “Nɛ Abraham katɛkado sũ, Baguma bu ye oti kpĩĩ.”
Lɔkɔ lɔwɔdabe Baguma bu ye oti kpĩĩ? Nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ bitsua Abraham lɛkpati a, mbɔɛɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ bɛtátsua de tɔ̃ a? Fɔnyɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ ɛtátsua tɔ̃ lɛkpati a, nnɛ́ lɔkɔ a kĩ etsua liti a.

Ke liti kɔlaa fɔmɔ bitsua Abraham lɛkpati. Ye lɛkpati katsua lɛmɛ nyɛ nsɛntsɛlɛni kĩ Baguma tɛ ye kĩ ɛnyɛ oti kpĩĩ nɛ ye katɛkado sũ, titɔ kĩ nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ malo bɛtátsua tɔ̃ ye lɛkpati. Foesũ Abraham yadani bati a kĩ bɛtɛ Baguma bido a flee hũhũ kamɛ ɔlɛga. Titɔ kĩ bɛtátsua fɔkpati malo ni, bɛtɛ be ndɛ bati kpĩĩ.

Ade ayea Abraham nyɛ bikĩ bitsua fɔkpati a lɛmɛ ɔlɛga a. Lɛmɛ nnɛ́ nɛ ayekĩ bitsua be fɔkpati a odi sũ, mbom nɛ ayekĩ bidzi nkpã nɛ katɛkado kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ boe ɔlɛga Abraham dzi fɔmɔ bitsua ye lɛkpati a sũ.
Baguma kpa Abraham mɔ ye kasinu kamɛ babi bɔhɛ kĩ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ aanya be adzapadiɛ. Ɛkɛna foe nnɛ́ nɛ ayekĩ Abraham kɛna nɛ mbla a akũ sũ, mbom nɛ ayekĩ ɛtɛ edo kĩ Baguma bu ye oti kpĩĩ sũ.
Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ bikĩ bakɛna nɛ mbla a akũ odi aanya fɔtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi a ni, kekɔ̃ katɛkado lɛnyɛ́ lɛtsama ade Baguma kalɛkayi a lɛmɛ nyɛ fɔtsa pupulidza a.
Mbla a avɛlɛ Baguma kalɔkpa kayamɛna, lɛmɛ awã kĩ mbla lɛláa ni, mbla kafum lɛláa.

Foesũ bɔhɛ a dzɛ̃ nɛ katɛkado akũ, ayekĩ bɔhɛ a aatim ndɛ fɔtsa a kĩ Baguma mɔ kɔnya ɛkɔa ete Abraham kasinu a kamɛ babi. Nnɛ́ bikĩ bakɛna nɛ mbla a akũ odi fɔwaa fɔkpa, mbom mɔ bikĩ bɛtɛ bido ndɛ ayekĩ Abraham tɛ edo a, kitonɛkĩ Abraham nyɛ boe flee hũhũ kamɛ ɔlɛga,

ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Nkɔa nɔ nkɛna fude fude pii ɔlɛga.” Foesũ bɔhɛ a nɛnɛ nɛ Baguma anɛ. Ade ye nyɛ Baguma a kĩ Abraham tɛ edo kĩ yadzɛla banɔkpa bayidza kadzi nkpã, kĩ yafɔ̃ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔláa kɔkɔɛ fɔanɛ katinya.
Titɔ kĩ anɛ kate adima buki ɛláa malo ni, Abraham tɛ edo ɛkadã anɛ, ade foesũ ɛkɛna fude pii ɔlɛga, ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma bi ye a kĩ, “Nɔ babi mɔ bawa aama bɛsa beblebee ndɛ fusibii aye.”
Nɛ lɔkɔ a, Abraham tɛ ndɛ futeli ɔha, lɛmɛ ye katɛkado onukpɛ̃ tádɔ, titɔ kĩ ɛmɔ eyi ɔsũ kĩ kɔbɛ̃ woli nɛ ye sukɛna kamɛ, mɔ ayekĩ Sara lɛmɛ tɛ̃ kɔma kana malo a.
Ɛtátɛ fɔtsa a kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi kĩ yaakɛna ɛkpa ye a akũ atsindze, ade ɛtáfɔnɛ ye katɛkado awɛ a, mbom ye katɛkado a do ye kɔbɛ̃, edo Baguma obu.
Ɛtɛ edo pipiipi kĩ Baguma aapuli ɛkɛna nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi a akũ.
Ade Abraham katɛkado sũ mɔ Baguma bu ye kĩ ɛnyɛ oti kpĩĩ a.
Fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛlɛ kĩ, “Baguma bu ye kĩ yadã kpĩĩ” a, nnɛ́ Abraham odi sũ bɛtsɛlɛ foe,
mbom bɛtsɛlɛ foe bɛkpa boe lɛmɛ. Boe a kĩ bɔ́atɛ oti a kĩ ɛdzɛla boe Ɔlate Yesu etomɛna kanɔkpa a budo a, baabu boe kĩ bɔnyɛ bati kpĩĩ.
Boe titikpa sũ Baguma fɔnɛ Kristo awɛ ɛkpa kĩ bɛkɔ, ade ɛdzɛla ye edzi nkpã, ayekĩ yaabu boe bati kpĩĩ.
Finyaa, kĩ Baguma bu boe bati kpĩĩ nɛ boe katɛkado sũ ni, bɔtsɛ̃ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo akũ bɔna lukudɔ nɛ bɔmɔ Baguma kayite.
Ye akũ lɛmɛ bɔtsã mɔ osi binya ɛkpa boe kĩ Baguma aamɔ boe kɔnya, budzi nɛ ye kɔnyakamɔ a kamɛ. Nɛ foesũ bɔapia nɛ kɔnɛte a kĩ budeĩ kĩ bɔ́ana tsɛfã nɛ Baguma kukũkpalɛ a kamɛ.
Nɛ ɔhau pii kamɛ malo bɔamɔ kawɔlɛ, kitonɛkĩ bunyina kĩ ɔhau afɔ̃ bɔakɔlɛ ɔwɔlɛ kado,
ɔwɔlɛ kado afɔ̃ bɔadza pintii, ade kadza pintii afɔ̃ bɔana kɔnɛte a.
Ade kɔnɛte láfɔ̃ kɔnyɔã awo boe, kitonɛkĩ Baguma kɔa ye ɔdɔ edo nɛ boe tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ ɛtsãmɛna ye Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a kĩ ɛkpa boe a akũ.
Kitonɛkĩ kĩ bubuki bɔlá kɔbɛ̃ kudima a, ade lɔkɔ a na kamɛ Kristo ku nɛ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ lɔlɔ, ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma mɔawɛ yi ɛkpa a.
Fɔnyɛ lɛtsa mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ oti odi aku nɛ oti kpĩĩ lɔlɔ. Fɔ́apuli fɔya malo kĩ oti odi aado ɔwɔlɛ kĩ yaku nɛ oti wĩ lɔlɔ.
Lɛmɛ Baguma tsa boe ayekĩ eti yawɛ boe kalɛ, kitonɛkĩ lɔkɔ a kĩ bubuki bɔnyɛ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ a, Kristo ku nɛ boe lɔlɔ.
Ɛtsã ye wuda kamɛ ɛkɛna bati boe kpĩĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ. Wuda kĩĩ sũ yaanyɛ boe etomɛna Baguma kalɔkpa a kamɛ.
Bɔnya Baguma bakesĩnɛ lɛmɛ ɛkɛna boe ye bakɔba ɛtsãmɛna ye Obi wuda a kĩ ɛkɔa ɛpata ye a kamɛ. Finyaa kĩ ɛkpɔla Baguma ɛkpa boe kĩĩ ni, yaatɛ boe ɛba, kitonɛkĩ edzi nkpã.
Lɛmɛ nnɛ́ fukĩĩ odi, mbom bɔamɔ kawɔlɛ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma tsã boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo akũ ɛlɔla bɔmɔ ye kayite a sũ.
Tɔkpa tsã oti mɔa akũ tɛya nɛ katinya kamɛ, ade wuda tsã ye akũ ɛya a. Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ ni, wuda yalɛ ewo nɛ batidziwa flee kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi kɛna tɔkpa.
Nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, tɔkpa na nɛ katinya kamɛ fɔmɔ mbla a ya, lɛmɛ awã kĩ mbla lɛláa ni, baábu lɛtsama kĩ lɛnyɛ tɔkpa.
Lɛmɛ kito Adam lɔkɔ kɛyawo Mose lɔkɔ a ni, wuda nya batidziwa flee akũ, mɔ bikĩ bɛtákɛna tɔkpa ndɛ tikĩ Adam kɛna a malo. Adam kĩĩ dzɛ̃ ndɛ oti a kĩ yaaya a.

Lɛmɛ be bati nviã a bɛtáketi, kitonɛkĩ Baguma futetsa faa a lɛlá ndɛ Adam tɔkpa a. Fɔnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali kĩ bati pii ku nɛ oti mɔa tɔkpa sũ. Lɛmɛ Baguma kɔnyakamɔ bɛ̃ kɔlaa, foesũ ade ayea ye futetsa a kĩ yakpa bati pii faa katsãmɛna oti mɔa kĩ ɛnyɛ Yesu Kristo akũ a la a.

Futesa a kĩ Baguma kpa faa a lɛlá ndɛ lɛtsa a kĩ oti mɔa tɔkpa vɛlɛ tɛyamɛna a, kitonɛkĩ tɔkpa a kĩ oti mɔa a kɛna a yamɔ kadzɛ mɔ kɔtɔkaku. Lɛmɛ futetsa a kĩ Baguma kpa faa a fɔ̃ bibu bati beblebee tɔkpa a kĩ bɛkɛna a kĩ badã kpĩĩ.

Fɔnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali kĩ oti mɔa tɔkpa a kĩ ɛkɛna sũ wuda yaanya akũ. Lɛmɛ lɛtsa a kĩ oti mɔa a kĩ ɛnyɛ Yesu Kristo kɛna a bɛ̃ foe flee. Bikĩ bɛna Baguma kɔnyakamɔ baũ kĩĩ flee a, kĩ ɛkɛna be bati kpĩĩ lɛmɛ a, aanya akũ nɛ nkpã kamɛ bɛtsãmɛna Kristo akũ.
Foesũ ndɛ ayekĩ oti mɔa tɔkpa a kĩ ɛkɛna fɔ̃ bɛkɔ batidziwa flee kɔtɔ a, ade ayea oti mɔa tuwĩ kĩ ɛkɛna a kpa batidziwa flee ɔtɔbɛ, bɛna nkpã lɛmɛ a.
Ade ndɛ ayekĩ oti mɔa atɔ ɔsĩ kakɛna fɔ̃ bati flee dani tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ a ni, ade ayea oti mɔa Baguma ɔlɛdo akũ kakɛna aafɔ̃ bɛkɛna bati pii kpĩĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ a.
Bɛyamɛna mbla a ayekĩ tɔkpa kakɛna aapɔ ebu, lɛmɛ awã kĩ tɔkpa kakɛna pɔnɛ ni, Baguma kɔnyakamɔ lɛmɛ apɔ kabu.
Foesũ ayekĩ tɔkpa nya akũ nɛ wuda kamɛ a ni, ade ayea Baguma kɔnyakamɔ anya akũ katsãmɛna kadzi kpĩĩ kamɛ, kakpã boe kawomɛna nkpã a kĩ kɛlá kawũna a kamɛ, nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo dĩ akũ a.
Foesũ, finyaa litsa bɔ́alɛ? Bɔ́ana nɛ tɔkpa kakɛna kamɛ ayekĩ Baguma kɔnyakamɔ aapɔ kibu mbɔɛɛ?
Oowo! Kĩ buku bɔkpa tɔkpa kɔkɔɛ a, nde bɔabuki budzi nkpã bɔkakɛna tɔkpa?
Mbɔɛɛ minyína kĩ, kĩ bɛwɔla boe mui, bɔkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Yesu Kristo a, bɛwɔla boe mui bɔkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ ye wuda a lɛmɛ?

Nɛ boe mui kawɔla kĩĩ kamɛ a, bɔna tsɛfã nɛ ye wuda a kamɛ, ade bibila bɔmɔ ye a. Ndɛ ayekĩ Ɔlɛga a tsã ye kukũkpalɛ kɔbɛ̃ kamɛ ɛdzɛla Kristo etomɛna banɔkpa kamɛ a, ade aye boe malo bɔ́ayidza budzi nkpã vɔɛ̃ a.
Kitonɛkĩ ayekĩ bɔkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ ye nɛ ye wuda kamɛ a, ade ayea bɔ́abuki bɔkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ ye nɛ boe kadzɛla kadzi nkpã kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ bɛdzɛla ye a.
Bunyina kĩ, kĩ bɛbɔa boe kutitse kɔɛ a nɛ asendua akũ mɔ Kristo ayekĩ boe sukɛna kĩ sawɛ tɔkpa kakɛna a aawɔ, ayekĩ bɔláabuki bɔnya tɔkpa basate.
Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ oti sila eku ni, bɛnyɛ ye nɛ tɔkpa kɔbɛ̃ kayɔ.
Ntɛ buku mɔ Kristo ni, bɔtɛ budo kĩ bɔ́adzi nkpã lɛmɛ mɔ ye.
Bunyina kĩ, kĩ Baguma dzɛla Kristo etomɛna kanɔkpa sũ ni, ɛláabuki eku da. Wuda buki lɛláabuki ɛna kɔbɛ̃ kudima nɛ ye akũ.
Wuda a kĩ Kristo ku a, eku ye deedimɔapɛ ɛkpa tɔkpa, lɛmɛ nkpã a kĩ edzi finyaa, edzi ye ɛkpa Baguma.
Ade ayea mi malo mibu mi akũ kĩ miku mikpa tɔkpa, lɛmɛ Baguma nɛ ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ Kristo Yesu kamɛ.
Kɛtánɛ kĩ tɔkpa tibuki tɛnya mi sukɛna a kĩ saku a akũ, ayekĩ míakakɛna nɛ se fɔwɛtsa akũ.

Mitafɔnɛ mi sukɛna kakɔma awɛ mikpa tɔkpa tɛkɔa tɛkɛna ablɔ adima, mbom mikɔa mi akũ mikpa Baguma ndɛ bati kĩ ɛnyɛ etomɛna wuda kamɛ ɛyamɛna nɛ nkpã kamɛ. Mifɔnɛ mi akũ flee awɛ mikpa Baguma fɔnya fɔtsa kĩ yaakɔa ɛkɛna tuwĩ.
Kɛtánɛ kĩ tɔkpa tɛnya mi akũ, kitonɛkĩ miláa mbla kayɔ, mbom mideĩ nɛ Baguma kɔnyakamɔ kayɔ.
Foesũ litsa bɔalɛ? Bɔ́akɛna tɔkpa kitonɛkĩ bɔláa mbla kayɔ, mbom budeĩ nɛ Baguma kɔnyakamɔ kayɔ sũ? Oowo!

Minyina pefee kĩ ntɛ mikɔa mi akũ mikɛna odi basumunɛ ni, minyɛ ɔlate a kĩ ye kayɔ mideĩ a basate. Ntɛ mikɔa akũ mikpa tɔkpa kakɛna ni, lɛtsa a kĩ laanɛ nɛ foe kamɛ nyɛ wuda, lɛmɛ ntɛ mikɛna nɛ Baguma ɔlɛdo akũ ni, foe nfasɔ nyɛ kadzi kpĩĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ.
Bɔanyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ paa, kitonɛkĩ titɔ kĩ minya tɔkpa basate miyatɛ̃ malo ni, finyaa mitɛ ɔnɔkɔali fɔtsa katsa a mɔ mi tɔwɔlɛ, milamɔ foe akũ kakɛna pɛpɛɛpɛ.
Baguma nyɛ mi etomɛna tɔkpa kamɛ, midani fɔtsa wĩ kakɛna basate.

Malɛ kɔdzɛla ndɛ otidziwa aye nɛ ayekĩ otidziwa adɔ nɛ sukɛna kamɛ sũ. Nɛ lɔkɔ lidi kĩ lɛtɛ̃ kamɛ ni, mifɔnɛ mi akũ flee awɛ ndɛ basate mikpa efĩĩ mɔ ablɔ fɔtsa kakɛna. Ade ayea kɛnɛ kĩ finyaa miafɔnɛ mi akũ flee awɛ mikpa ndɛ tuwĩ kakɛna basate a.
Kĩ minya tɔkpa kakɛna basate a, tuwĩ kakɛna tánya ɔhɛ fɔkpa mi.
Litsa nfasɔ mina mitomɛna fɔtsa a kĩ mikakɛna a kĩ finyaa fɔakɔ mi kɔnyɔã a kamɛ? Fɔtsa a na bamɛ flee kawũna nyɛ wuda.
Lɛmɛ finyaa, Baguma nyɛ mi nɛ tɔkpa kamɛ midani ye basate. Nfasɔ a kĩ míana nyɛ kĩ miakɔa mi akũ flee mikpa Baguma ɛkpalɛ ye akũ, lɔkɔa nɛ foe kawũna mina nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a.
Kitonɛkĩ tɔkpa kɔtɔkase nyɛ wuda, lɛmɛ Baguma futetsa faa nyɛ nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a, nɛ ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ boe Ɔlate Kristo Yesu kamɛ.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mi a kĩ minyina Mose mbla a, míanu lɛtsa a kĩ mawɛ kĩ malɛ nɛ awĩ a kayɔ. Mbla anya oti akũ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ edzi nkpã a odi.
Foe nfantuhũ nyɛ kĩ mbla sui otsole kĩ edzi kɔnyɔ edo nɛ ɔnyɔ kayɔ nɛ onyole a nkpã kamɛ. Lɛmɛ ntɛ onyole a ku ni, otsole a nɛ́ nɛ mbla a kĩ esui ye ɛmɛna mɔ onyole a kamɛ.
Foesũ ntɛ otsole a naa onyole bɛbã sɛkɛ̃ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ ɔnyɔ a buki edzi nkpã ni, baavɛ ye ɔdɔpaani. Lɛmɛ ntɛ ɔnyɔ a ku kɔ̃ ni, mbla kĩĩ tásui ye, ade ntɛ ɛnadzi mɔ onyole bɛbã ni, ɛtábɔa adɔpaa.

Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ade aye fɔla fɔkpa mi malo a. Nɛ mbla a onukpɛ̃ ni, mi malo miku, kitonɛkĩ minyɛ Kristo sukɛna a sɛkɛ sidi. Ade finyaa minyɛ ye a kĩ Baguma dzɛla etomɛna kanɔkpa a bade, ayekĩ bɔ́anɛ libi bɔkpa Baguma.
Kitonɛkĩ kĩ budzi nkpã nɛ sukɛna kamɛ a ni, sukɛna fɔwɛtsa kpa a kĩ mbla a dzɛla nɛ boe kamɛ a, kɛna adzuma nɛ boe kamɛ, ɛmanɛ boe ɛkpa wuda.
Lɛmɛ finyaa bɔnɛ́ nɛ mbla a kayɔ, kitonɛkĩ buku bɔkpa fɔtsa a kĩ fusuli boe ndɛ kɔla bawanɛ a. Bɔláabuki busum nɛ mbla kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ osi kɔɛ a akũ, mbom bɔ́asum nɛ Hũhũ kamɛ osi vɔɛ̃ a akũ.

Finyaa litsa bɔ́alɛ? Kalɛ bɔ́alɛ kĩ mbla nyɛ tɔkpa? Oowo! Fɔlá lɔmɔ. Lɛmɛ mbla a lɛfɔ̃ ĩnyi lɛtsa a kĩ tɔkpa anɛ. Ntɛ mbla a ɛtalɛ kĩ, “Tayɔɔla anɛ nɛ oti bɛbã fɔtsa akũ” ni, kufɛ ĩnyína anɛngbã kawɛ a na.
Lɛmɛ fɔtsã mbla a akũ, tɔkpa na osi tinyina odo kakɔ fɔtsa kpa flee nɛ yĩ kamɛ. Ntɛ mbla kalaa ɛláa ni, kufɛ tɔkpa lɛmɛ ku.
Yĩ mɔawɛ a ndzi tɔ̃ nkpã, kĩ mbla a tána, lɛmɛ kĩ mbla a ya a, tɔkpa yidza tidzi nkpã,
ade nku a. Ade mbla a kĩ kufɛ ɛma yĩ nkpã a, yĩ kɔ̃ wuda ɛkɔa ɛma yĩ.
Tɔkpa tsã mbla akũ tɛna osi tɛkɛ yĩ, ade tɛkɔ yĩ a.
Foesũ mbla mɔawɛ a akũ kpalɛ, ade ayea ye nhihiɛ a adã kpĩĩ, ɛnɛnɛ lɛmɛ a.

Lɔkɔa lɛtsa wĩ a kĩ lɛnɛnɛ a dani wuda lɛkpa yĩ? Oowo! Fɔlá lɔmɔ. Tɔkpa tsã tuwĩ akũ tɛkɔa wuda tɛma yĩ, ayekĩ taanyɛ te kutitse paa a tɛtsa. Foesũ fɔtsã mbla akũ bɛnyɛ tɔkpa bɛtsa ndɛ lɛtsa kpa kĩ liti lɛnɛ́nɛ koũ.
Bunyina kĩ mbla a nyɛ hũhũ kamɛ fɔtsa, lɛmɛ yĩ kɔ̃ ĩnyɛ otidziwa, kĩ bɛnɔ ɔsate bɛkpa tɔkpa.
Maánu yĩ fɔtsa kɛnawa a kayɔ, kitonɛkĩ maákɛna lɛtsa a kĩ mawɛ kĩ makɛna a, mbom makɛna lɛtsa a kĩ makesĩ a.
Ntɛ lɛtsa a kĩ maáwɛ a makɛna kɔ̃ ni, kekɔ̃ ntunɔ kĩ mbla a nɛnɛ.
Foesũ nnɛ́ yĩ mɔawɛ akɛna fɔtsa a, mbom tɔkpa a kĩ tideĩ nɛ yĩ kamɛ a akɛna foe.
Ĩnyina kĩ tuwĩ tidima lidzí nɛ yĩ kamɛ ayekĩ ĩnyɛ otidziwa sũ. Kitonɛkĩ titɔ kĩ kawɛ a kĩ makɛna tuwĩ deĩ nɛ yĩ kamɛ malo ni, maápuli nkɛna te.
Tuwĩ a kĩ mawɛ kĩ makɛna a, maákɛna te, mbom makɛna tɔkpa a kĩ maáwɛ kĩ makɛna a.
Ntɛ lɛtsa a kĩ maáwɛ a makɛna ni, kekɔ̃ nnɛ́ yĩ mɔawɛ a akɛna foe, mbom tɔkpa a kĩ tideĩ nɛ yĩ kamɛ a akɛna foe.
Foesũ mmɔ́ mbla kĩĩ fɔlɛtsa ĩyi ɔsũ, kĩ ntɛ mawɛ kĩ makɛna tuwĩ ni, tɔkpa mbom makɛna.
Nɛ yĩ kamɛkamɛ ni, mamɔ kawɔlɛ nɛ Baguma mbla a akũ.
Lɛmɛ mamɔ mbla bɛbã nɛ yĩ sukɛna kamɛ kĩ yanɔ lɛma mɔ yĩ lɔlɔ kamɛ tuwĩ kĩ mawɛ a. Ɛkɛna yĩ kɔla ɔwanɛ ɛkpa tɔkpa mbla a kĩ edeĩ nɛ yĩ sukɛna kamɛ.
Nkɛna oti kĩ ye akũ akɔ kɔnya. Owei aatɛ yĩ etomɛna sukɛna kĩ sɛkpã yĩ sanamɛna wuda kamɛ a awɛ?
Kɔlɛ bɔanyɛ Baguma bɔtsãmɛna boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo akũ.
Finyaa, ayekĩ nla nyɛ kĩ nɛ yĩ mɔa akũ akũ ni, nnɛɛ yĩ adzuma makɛna nɛ Baguma mbla a akũ, lɛmɛ sukɛna a kɔ̃ ni, nnɛ masum tɔkpa mbla a.
Foesũ finyaa kɔtɔkakɔ lɛláa kɛkpa bikĩ bɛkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Kristo Yesu a.
Kitonɛkĩ Hũhũ mbla a kĩ yakpa oti nkpã nɛ ɔmɔa kakɛna kamɛ mɔ Kristo Yesu a, nyɛ yĩ etomɛna tɔkpa mɔ wuda mbla a kamɛ.
Lɛtsa a kĩ mbla a tápuli ɛkɛna a, ayekĩ sukɛna a tɛ kɔbɛ̃ nɛ ye awɛ sũ ni, Baguma kɔ̃ kɛna foe. Edo ye mɔawɛ obi ɛya nɛ otidziwa sukɛna kĩ sakɛna tɔkpa kamɛ, ade ɛyakɔ tɔkpa kɔtɔ, ɛnyɛ te a.
Baguma kɛna fukĩĩ ayekĩ boe a kĩ budzi nɛ Hũhũ kamɛ, kĩ nnɛ́ nɛ sukɛna kamɛ a, bɔ́apuli budzi nɛ tuwĩ kakɛna a kĩ ye mbla awɛ a onukpɛ̃.
Bati kĩ bidzi nkpã ndɛ ayekĩ be sukɛna awɛ a onukpɛ̃ ni, fɔtsa a kĩ be sukɛna awɛ a akũ bakɔna. Lɛmɛ bikĩ bidzi nkpã ndɛ ayekĩ Hũhũ a awɛ a onukpɛ̃ ni, fɔtsa a kĩ Hũhũ a awɛ a akũ be adzuni ana.
Oti kadzi nɛ sukɛna fɔwɛtsa tsɛ̃mɔ wuda, lɛmɛ oti kĩ Hũhũ a akpã ye a, ana nkpã mɔ lukudɔ.
Nɛ foesũ oti a kĩ ye sukɛna fɔwɛtsa nya ye akũ a adani Baguma okesĩnɛ, kitonɛkĩ yaákɛna nɛ Baguma mbla akũ, ade nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, ɛláapuli ɛkɛna nɛ ye akũ.
Bikĩ bidzi nkpã nɛ be sukɛna kawɛ onukpɛ̃ a fɔkɛlatsa lɛláapuli fuwo Baguma anɛ.
Lɛmɛ mi kɔ̃ midzí nɛ sukɛna kawɛ onukpɛ̃, mbom midzi ndɛ ayekĩ Hũhũ a awɛ kĩ midzi a. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ Kristo Hũhũ lɛláa ye kamɛ lɛnyɛ́ Kristo ode.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ Kristo deĩ nɛ nɔ kamɛ a, Hũhũ a nyɛ nkpã ɛkpa nɔ, kitonɛkĩ ɛkɛna nɔ oti kpĩĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ, titɔ kĩ nɔ sukɛna ayaku malo nɛ tɔkpa sũ.

Ntɛ Baguma Hũhũ a kĩ ɛdzɛla Yesu etomɛna banɔkpa kamɛ a deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ ni, kekɔ̃ oti a kĩ ɛdzɛla Kristo etomɛna banɔkpa kamɛ a lɛmɛ aakpa mi sukɛna kĩ saku a nkpã, nɛ ye Hũhũ a kĩ edeĩ nɛ mi kamɛ a sũ.
Foesũ nwaɛ̃ amɛ, budeĩ adzuma adi kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ bɔkɛna lɛmɛ fɔnyɛ́ kĩ bɔadzi nkpã ndɛ ayekĩ boe sukɛna awɛ kĩ budzi a.
Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ midzi nkpã nɛ sukɛna kawɛ onukpɛ̃ ni, míaku. Lɛmɛ ntɛ mitsã Hũhũ kamɛ mikɔ mi fɔkɛlatsa kpa a, míana nkpã.
Bati a kĩ Baguma Hũhũ akpã a flee nyɛ Baguma babi.
Kitonɛkĩ Hũhũ a kĩ Baguma kpa mi a tákɛna mi basate mikavila, mbom Hũhũ a akɛna mi Baguma babi. Ade Hũhũ a kɔbɛ̃ afɔ̃ bɔbɔa fɔwɔla kavɛ Baguma kĩ, “Abba!” kĩ foe kayɔ nyɛ kĩ “Ao Nda!”
Baguma Hũhũ a mɔawɛ lɛkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ boe hũhũ yadi adansiɛ kĩ Baguma babi bɔanɛ.

Ntɛ bɔnyɛ ye babi ni, bɔnyɛ ye adzapadiɛ lɛmɛ banyanɛ, ade bɔmɔ Kristo bɔ́anya adzapadiɛ a kĩ Baguma kɔa eyi ye a. Foesũ ntɛ bɔna tsɛfã nɛ Kristo lubo kamɔ a kamɛ ni, bɔ́ana tsɛfã lɛmɛ nɛ ye kukũkpalɛ a kamɛ a.
Makɔna kĩ bɔláapuli bɔkɔa lubo a kĩ bɔamɔ finyaa a bɔkɔnamɔ Baguma kukũkpalɛ a kĩ baanyɛ bɛtsa boe a kɔlaa.
Fɔtsa a kĩ Baguma bɔa a flee dzi fɔadzɔlɛ mɔ akũ kasĩ kĩ Baguma ɛnyɛ ye babi ɛtsa.
Kitonɛkĩ bɛkɔ fɔtsa a kĩ Baguma bɔa a flee kɔtɔ kĩ fɔnyɛ fɔtsa pupulidza, nnɛ́ nɛ foe kawɛ akũ, mbom Baguma lɛwɛ kĩ fɔna lɔmɔ. Lɛmɛ kɔnɛte a deĩ kĩ,
luwi lidi ni, fɔtsa a kĩ bɛbɔa flee aanyɛ foe akũ nɛ tɛsate ɔsum kĩ yabu kade a kamɛ, fɔyaawo nɛ akũ akũ kadzi mɔ kukũkpalɛ a kĩ Baguma aakpa ye babi a kamɛ.
Kitonɛkĩ bunyina kĩ kɛyawo nviã lɔkɔ kĩĩ a, fɔtsa a kĩ Baguma bɔa a flee abe ayɔlɔhɔ ndɛ ɔmatsɔ̃ kĩ sɛmɛ pi ye aye.
Lɛmɛ nnɛ́ fɔtsa kĩ bɛbɔa a odi abe ayɔlɔhɔ, mbom boe a kĩ Baguma kpa ye Hũhũ ndɛ ye futetsa fɔtɔnyade a lɛmɛ bɔabe ayɔlɔhɔ nɛ boe kamɛ, kadzɔlɛ Baguma kĩ ɛkɛna boe ye babi a, ɛnyɛ boe kutitse a flee.
Kitonɛkĩ ade kɔnɛte kĩĩ sũ bɔna katɛ a, lɛmɛ ntɛ bɔamɔ kɔnɛte fɔtsa kɔkɔɛ ni, fubuki fɔnyɛ́ kɔnɛte. Kitonɛkĩ owei akɔa anɛ kate nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ yamɔ a akũ?
Lɛmɛ ntɛ boe anɛ teĩ nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ bɔámɔ akũ ni, bɔana ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ kadzɔlɛ foe.
Ade ayea Hũhũ a lɛmɛ aayabumɔ boe a kĩ bɔdɔ a, kitonɛkĩ bunyína ayekĩ kɛfɛta kĩ bɔabɔa mpaɛ bɔkpa Baguma. Hũhũ mɔawɛ a abe ayɔlɔhɔ kapili boe lɔlɔ nɛ Baguma sɛkɛ̃ mɔ fɔlɛtsa kĩ onukpɛ̃ lɛláapuli ɛlɛ.
Ade Baguma a kĩ yamɔ bati tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ a nyina lɛtsa a kĩ lɛnyɛ Hũhũ a adzuni, kitonɛkĩ Hũhũ a ake Baguma aduli nɛ ye bade lɔlɔ ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma awɛ a.
Bunyina kĩ Baguma akɛna fɔtsa flee fɔaboomu kakɛna fuwĩ kakpa bati a kĩ bawɛ ye kalɛ a, kĩ ɛvɛ nɛ ye nhihiɛ onukpɛ̃ a.
Bati a kĩ Baguma nyi ɛnyamɛna lɔtɔ a, ɛpau be eyi kĩ bɛyaakɛna ndɛ ye Obi aye, ayekĩ ye Obi a aanya be ɔtɔnyade nɛ bawaɛ̃ pii kamɛ.
Foesũ bati a kĩ Baguma nyɛ eyi a, ade be ɛvɛ a, ade bikĩ ɛvɛ a, ɛkɛna be bɛkpɔla ade ɛkpa be tsɛfã nɛ ye kukũkpalɛ a kamɛ a.
Ntɛ bɔkɔna fukĩĩ flee akũ a, litsa bɔ́apuli bɔlɛ? Ntɛ Baguma dzɛ̃ nɛ boe liti a ni, owei aapuli eyidza ɛdza nɛ boe akũ?
Ntɛ Baguma a kĩ ɛtásĩ ye mɔawɛ Obi kakɔa kakpa, mbom ɛkɔa ye ɛkpa faa nɛ boe flee lɔlɔ a ni, nde fɔ́anya kĩ ɛláakɔa fɔtsa bɛbã flee faa ebu Obi ɛkpa boe?
Owei aapuli ɛbɔɛ fɔlɛtsa nɛ bati a kĩ Baguma pau a akũ? Baguma mɔawɛ di adansiɛ kĩ bɛtáku kɔtɔ.
Foesũ owei aakɔ be kɔtɔ? Nnɛ́ Kristo Yesu a kĩ eku ĩye kĩ Baguma dzɛla ye etomɛna banɔkpa kamɛ, edzi nkpã nɛ Baguma sɔmɔna, yake ye aduli nɛ boe lɔlɔ a!
Kekɔ̃ owei ĩye litsa aapuli etsua bɔmɔ Kristo ɔdɔ a kayite? Lubokamɔ aapuli, mbɔɛɛ ɔhau, mbɔɛɛ bati liti katomɛna, mbɔɛɛ kɔlɛkakɔ ĩye ohiã, mbɔɛɛ ɔdzɔ kadzi, mbɔɛɛ wuda libe, mbɔɛɛ kĩ wuda?
Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ,
“Nɔ sũ, bakɔ boe lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ.
Ade babu boe ndɛ baveli kĩ bɛkpã banaakɔ aye.”
Nɛ fukĩĩ flee kamɛ a, bɔtsã Kristo kĩ yawɛ boe kalɛ a akũ bɔba ayekĩ bɔkɔna malo.
Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ ndo kĩ lɛtsama lɛláapuli lɛnyɛ boe nɛ boe Ɔlate Kristo ɔdɔ a kamɛ. Fɔláanya wuda ĩye nkpã, ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ ĩye hũhũ kpa kɔbɛ̃ kudi, lɔkɔ kĩĩ ĩye lɔkɔ kĩ laaya,

katinya kĩ kideĩ nɛ ode ĩye katinya kĩ kideĩ nɛ tite kayɔ ĩye fɔtsa a kĩ bɛbɔa a kamɛ fudima. Lɛtsama koũ lɛláa katinya kamɛ flee kĩ láapuli lɛnyɛ boe nɛ Baguma ɔdɔ a kĩ bɔna bɔtsãmɛna boe Ɔlate Kristo Yesu akũ a kamɛ!
Lɛtsa a kĩ malɛ a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali, Kristo ode manɛ ade maáma fɔvã a. Yĩ ɔwɔlɛ kĩ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa anya ye akũ a akpa yĩ katɛkado kĩ nnɛ́ fɔvã mama.
Mabe ayɔlɔhɔ, ade ntɛ kalɔɛ kĩ kaádɔ nɛ yĩ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ,
kakpa yĩ bati a kĩ bɔmɔ be bɔnyɛ sukɛna mɔ babɔanɛ mɔa. Nɛ be sũ maawɛ kĩ Baguma edumu yĩ faa, ɛsɛ̃ bɔmɔ Kristo kayite malo kufɛ.

Kitonɛkĩ ade be nyɛ Israel ɔmaĩ a kĩ Baguma pau, ɛkɔa ɛkɛna ye bade, ɛnyɛ ye kukũkpalɛ a ɛtsa be a. Esui onukpɛ̃ mɔ be, ɛkpa be ye mbla a lɛmɛ. Be nɛɛ Baguma ɔsum osi wĩ a, ade be lɛmɛ ɛkɛna bɔhɛ ɛkpa a.
Be kasinu to Hebrifɔ bawanyɔ a kĩ bɛtɛ buĩ a kamɛ, ade be kade kamɛ Kristo lɛmɛ nɛ eto ndɛ otidziwa aye ɛya a. Mifɔ̃ bumu Baguma a kĩ yanya fɔtsa flee akũ daa daa a! Fɔya lɔmɔ.
Nlámɔ kalɛ kĩ Baguma kalɛkayi a táya nɛ foe kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ nnɛ́ bati a kĩ bito Israel a flee nyɛ Israelfɔ kpanunu.
Ade ayea nnɛ́ Abraham kasinu babi a flee nyɛ Baguma babi. Baguma bi Abraham kĩ, “Isak akũ fɔ́atsã mɔ aana babi mɔ bawa a kĩ nlɛ ĩyi a.”
Foe kayɔ nyɛ kĩ nnɛ́ babi a kĩ Abraham ma ndɛ bati ayea nyɛ Baguma babi, mbom bikĩ ɛma nɛ ye bɔhɛ kamɛ a.
Kitonɛkĩ Baguma bɔhɛ a nyɛ, “Kateliva, lɔkɔ kĩĩ kamɛ a, maamuniki ĩya ade Sara aama obinyole a.”
Nnɛ́ fukĩĩ odi a. Babinyole nviã a kĩ Rebeka ma a ɔlɛga nyɛ boe ɔwanyɔ Isak.

Lɛmɛ nɛ ayekĩ babinyole nviã kamɛ ɔmɔa kapau fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ nɛ Baguma nhihiɛ onukpɛ̃ sũ ni, Baguma bi Rebeka kĩ, “Obinɔkɔɛ̃ a aasum obisɛ̃de a.” Ebi ye eyi kɔkɔɛ fɔmɔ ɛyama babi a. Foesũ Baguma kapau a kĩ ɛkɛna a lɛdzɛ́ nɛ tuwĩ ĩye tɔkpa a kĩ nta babi a kamɛ odi kɛna a akũ, mbom Baguma kawɛ fɔanɛ.

Lɛmɛ nɛ ayekĩ babinyole nviã kamɛ ɔmɔa kapau fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ nɛ Baguma nhihiɛ onukpɛ̃ sũ ni, Baguma bi Rebeka kĩ, “Obinɔkɔɛ̃ a aasum obisɛ̃de a.” Ebi ye eyi kɔkɔɛ fɔmɔ ɛyama babi a. Foesũ Baguma kapau a kĩ ɛkɛna a lɛdzɛ́ nɛ tuwĩ ĩye tɔkpa a kĩ nta babi a kamɛ odi kɛna a akũ, mbom Baguma kawɛ fɔanɛ.
Bɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ, “Nwɛ Yakob kalɛ, lɛmɛ nkesĩ Esau.”
Lɔkɔa bɔ́alɛ kĩ Baguma lɛmɛ ládã kpĩĩ? Oowo! Fɔlá lɔmɔ kɔlaa.
Kitonɛkĩ ebi Mose kĩ,
“Odi nyɛ odi kĩ mawɛ kĩ makɛna sɛmɛ kalɛ nkpa ni,
ade ye maakɛna sɛmɛ kalɛ nkpa a.
Ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ ye akũ kɔ yĩ kɔnya ni,
maamɔ ye kɔnya.”
Foesũ Baguma oti kapau lɛdzɛ́ nɛ ye mbɔdibɔ ĩye lɛtsa a kĩ yawɛ a akũ, mbom lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa dzɛ̃ nɛ Baguma kɔnyakamɔ odi akũ.
Kitonɛkĩ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa kamɛ a, Baguma bi Egipte lɛgã kĩ, “Ndzina nɔ lɛgã ayekĩ maatsã nɔ akũ ĩnyɛ yĩ kɔbɛ̃ ntsa, lɔkɔa yĩ dĩ lɛgba nɛ katinya kamɛ flee.”
Foesũ odi nyɛ odi kĩ Baguma awɛ kĩ yamɔ kɔnya a, ade ye yamɔ kɔnya a, ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ yawɛ kĩ ɛna atɔ ɔsĩ a, yafɔ̃ yana atɔ ɔsĩ.
Mi kamɛ odi aavia yĩ kĩ, “Ntɛ fɔla lɔmɔ a, nde sũ Baguma buki yanyɛ nfumusu kakpa odi? Owei aapuli eyidza ɛdza nɛ Baguma kawɛ akũ?”
Nɔ otidziwa, owei anɛ kĩ akpa Baguma mbuayɛ lɔmɔ? Lubui lávia de ɔmɛnɛ kĩ, “Nde sũ ɔmɛ yĩ lɔmɔ?”

Fubui ɔmɛnɛ deĩ osi kĩ yakɔa tibute a kĩ enuna ɛbɔa lɔbɔ a ɛmɛ lɛtsa a kĩ yawɛ. Mbɔɛɛ ɛlá osi kĩ yakɔa tite lɔbɔ mɔapɛ a ɛmɛ fubui nviã? Yaamɛ lɔmɔa kĩ lalɛ kadã eyi ɛkpa fuwi titiliwu, lɔkɔa ɛkɔa te nkaɛ a ɛmɛ lɛbɛbã kĩ laálɛ kadã eyi ɛkpa luwi daa akũ adzuma kakɛna.

Ade lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma kɛna a kayɔ nɛ awĩ a. Ntɛ Baguma wɛ kĩ yanyɛ ye kalɔkpa kanya, ɛfɔ̃ bɛmɔ ye otumi, lɛmɛ ebuki ɛna ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ epini bikĩ be akũ ɛna kalɔkpa, kĩ bidum be bɛkpa kawɔla a ni, litsa odeĩ kĩ aalɛ?
Ade ntɛ Baguma wɛ lɛmɛ kĩ yanyɛ ye kukũkpalɛ baũ a kĩ biko nɛ boe a kĩ ɛmɔ kɔnya akũ a, boe a kĩ ɛmanɛ eyi ɛkpa ye kukũkpalɛ a,
kitonɛkĩ boe nyɛ bati a kĩ ɛpau etomɛna Yudafɔ mɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a kamɛ a ni, odeĩ kadi kalɛ?
Ade fukĩĩ Baguma lɛ nɛ Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Hosea ovoli kamɛ kĩ,
“Bati kĩ bɛnyɛ́ yĩ ɔmaĩ bati a, maavɛ be kĩ, ‘Yĩ bati.’
Kade a kĩ ntáwɛ ke kalɛ a, maavɛ ke ‘Yĩ ɔdɔ bati.’
Nɛ kakɔ mɔapɛ a kĩ bibi be kĩ,
‘Minyɛ́ yĩ bati’ a
Ade awã baavɛ be kĩ ‘Baguma Kĩ Edzi Nkpã Daa a babi.’ ”
Baguma Onukpɛ̃ Ɔnyɛnɛ Yesaya bɔa fɔwɔla ɛlɛ nɛ Israelfɔ akũ kĩ,
“Ntɛ Israelfɔ nɛ lidede ndɛ mpo abuĩ dã malo ni,
be kamɛ bati sukuloo badi aana katɛ,
kitonɛkĩ boe Ɔlate aadzɛmɔ katinya kamɛ bati pɛpɛɛpɛ mɔatsɛ, etsua lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa lukũ.”
Yesaya buki ɛlɛ eyi kĩ,
“Ntɛ boe Ɔlate Otumifɔ Flee a ɛtatina boe babi mɔ bawa a badi ni,
kufɛ bɔdani bɔkɛna ndɛ Sodom, buketimɔ Gomora!”
Foesũ litsa koũ bɔ́alɛ? Matsa kĩ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Israelfɔ a kĩ bɛtápili kĩ badzi kpĩĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ a, bɛkɛna be bati kĩ bɛkpɔla bɛtsãmɛna be katɛkado akũ.
Ade Israelfɔ a kĩ bɛkawɛ mbla a kĩ yaakɛna be bati kpĩĩ a, tápuli bɛkɛna nɛ mbla a akũ a.
Litsa sũ bɛtápuli? Kitonɛkĩ bɛtákɔa katɛkado bɛwɛ foe, mbom bɛkɔa anɛ bite nɛ be mɔawɛ mbɔdibɔ akũ. Nɛ foesũ bitula nɛ Kristo kĩ ɛla ndɛ de a kĩ bati atula nɛ de akũ a akũ,
ndɛ ayekĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ,
“Midã! Nkɔa de lidi mayi nɛ Zion,
de kĩ bati aatula nɛ de akũ bɛnɛ bɛtɔ.
Lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ ye edo ni,
kɔnyɔã lɛláawo ye.”
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, lɛtsa a kĩ mawɛ nɛ yĩ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ flee, mɔ mpaɛ kĩ mabɔa nɛ de akũ kakpa Baguma nyɛ kĩ, ɛfɔ̃ yĩ awɛ kade bati bɛna nkpã katɛ!
Maapuli ndi adansiɛ kĩ bɛkɔa be akũ flee bɛkpa Baguma ɔsum, lɛmɛ binyína ayekĩ basum ye nɛ osi wĩ akũ a kanyina wĩ.

Bɛtányi osi a kĩ Baguma atsã kabu bati kĩ bidzi kpĩĩ nɛ ye anɛ, foesũ bɛwɛ be mɔawɛ tisi kĩ batsã bɛkɛna fɔtsa biwo Baguma anɛ, ade foesũ bɛtákɔa be akũ bɛkpa Baguma osi a kĩ yatsã kakɛna bati kpĩĩ a.
Kitonɛkĩ Kristo nyɛ Mose mbla a kawũna, ayekĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ ye edo ni, baabu ye oti kpĩĩ.
Mose tsɛlɛ eyi ɛtsa ayekĩ oti adzi kpĩĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ ntɛ edi mbla a akũ. Ɛlɛ kĩ, “Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛkɛna nɛ mbla a akũ pɛpɛɛpɛ ni, yaana nkpã.”
Lɛmɛ lɛtsa a kĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ nɛ ayekĩ oti aadã kpĩĩ nɛ katɛkado kamɛ nyɛ kĩ, “Tavia nɔ akũ kĩ, ‘Owei aade ɛnaa ode?’ kĩ fɔatsa kĩ ɛnaakpã Kristo eto kanɔkpade ede ɛya.
Ĩye tavia kĩ, ‘Owei aaka ɛnaa kayɔ?’ Foe nyɛ kĩ owei aanaa kanɔkpade ɛnaakpã Kristo ɛyamɛna.”
Lɛtsa a kĩ yatsa a nyɛ kĩ, “Baguma kalɛ a fuã nɔ plɛplɛplɛ, kideĩ nɛ nɔ onukpɛ̃ mɔ nɔ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ.” Ade katɛkado ɔlɛdo a kĩ bɔade lɛtsã nɛ ke akũ a nɛ awĩ a.
Ntɛ ɔkɔa onukpɛ̃ ɔlɛ kĩ Yesu nyɛ boe Ɔlate, mɔ ɔtɛ odo nɛ nɔ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kĩ Baguma dzɛla ye etomɛna banɔkpa kamɛ ni, Baguma aakpa nɔ nkpã.
Kitonɛkĩ ɔwɔlɛ bakɔa katɛ kado kana kadzi kpĩĩ, ade onukpɛ̃ bakɔa kanyɛ foe kanya mɔ Baguma akpa boe nkpã.
Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ ye edo lɛláatɛ kɔnyɔã.”
Odi nyɛ odi deĩ nɛ foe kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ ntsitsemu adima lɛláa Yudafɔ mɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a kayite. Baguma mɔapɛ a nyɛ bati flee Ɔlate, ade yakpa akũ kana fɔtsa nhila pii bikĩ babɔa mpaɛ kavɛ ye a.
Ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ a, “Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaavɛ boe Ɔlate a dĩ ni, yaana nkpã.”
Lɛmɛ nde bati aakɛna bɛvɛ oti a kĩ bɛtátɛ ye bido a? Nde baakɛna bɛtɛ oti a kĩ bɛtánu ye fɔlɛtsa a bido? Ade ntɛ bɛtáde lɛtsã nɛ fɔlɛtsa a akũ a, nde baakɛna binu ye dĩ?
Ade nde baakɛna bide lɛtsã Baguma fɔlɛtsa ntɛ bɛtádo fɔtɔ banyanɛ? Ade foe akũ mɔ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Batɔ a kĩ bɛyaade lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ a kaya alɛ kadã paa!”
Lɛmɛ nnɛ́ bati flee lɛtɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a, kitonɛkĩ Yesaya lɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate, owei lɛtɛ boe kalɛ a edo?”
Foesũ katɛkado ato kalɛ a kanu kamɛ, ade fɔlɛtsa a kanu ato lɛtsã kade nɛ Kristo akũ a.
Lɛmɛ mavia kĩ ɔnɔkɔali fɔanɛ kĩ bɛtánu Baguma fɔlɛtsa a kɔlaa? Ɔnɔkɔali binu foe, kitonɛkĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ,
“Lɛtsã badenɛ a odo tsɛna katinya kamɛ flee,
ade be fɔlɛtsa a gba fɔnawo katinya kawũnakɔ̃ a flee.”
Mavia bio kĩ lɔkɔa kanu Israelfɔ a tánu fɔlɛtsa a kayɔ? Mose mɔawɛ lɛnya lɔtɔ ɛlɛ kĩ, Baguma lɛ kĩ,
“Maafɔ̃ minɔ lineke mɔ bati kĩ bɛnyɛ́ ɔmaĩ a.
Maakɔa ɔmaĩ a kĩ ɛtábinya anɛ a ndo mi kalɔkpa.”
Ade Yesaya do ɔwɔlɛ ɛba ebi be kĩ, Baguma lɛ kĩ,
“Bati a kĩ bɛtáwɛ yĩ liti osi a, ade be lɛmɔ́ yĩ a
bati a kĩ bɛtávia yĩ akũ a, ade be ĩnyɛ yĩ akũ ntsa a.”
Baguma buki ɛlɛ nɛ Israelfɔ akũ kĩ,
“Luwi mɔa flee ndzɛlɛ yĩ akpɔ kamɛ nkpa
bati a kĩ bideĩ atɔ ɔsĩ,
kĩ biyidza bɛdza nɛ yĩ akũ lɛmɛ a.”
Foesũ mavia kĩ Baguma pu ye mɔawɛ bati a flefle? Oowo! Yĩ mɔawɛ Israelni manɛ, ĩnyɛ Abraham kasinu ɔwa, kĩ nto Benyamin katete a kamɛ.
Baguma tápu ye ɔmaĩ a kĩ ɛpau eyi kito kayɔkayi a. Mbɔɛɛ minyína lɛtsa a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ, awã a kĩ Eliya ke Baguma aduli nɛ Israelfɔ lɔlɔ a? Ɛlɛ kĩ,
“Boe Ɔlate, bɛkɔ nɔ onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ, ade bidzuli nɔ afɔlibɔ tɛtɛnyɛ a. Yĩ odi keĩ lite ade bawɛ kĩ bakɔ yĩ malo a!”
Lɛmɛ nde Baguma kpa Eliya mbuayɛ? Ebi ye kĩ, “Ntina bati mpim evũkɔnɔ kĩ bɛtásum Baal baviɔ̃ a ĩyi nkpa yĩ akũ.”
Ade aye fɔla nɛ finyaa lɔkɔ kĩĩ kamɛ malo a. Israelfɔ sukuloo badi te kĩ Baguma mɔ be kɔnya ɛpau eyi a.
Baguma mɔ be kɔnya, ɛpau be, nnɛ́ nɛ be adzuma a kĩ bɛkɛna a sũ. Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ bati kapau dzɛ̃ nɛ be lɛkɛnana akũ ni, kekɔ̃ ye kɔnyakamɔ a buki kɔnyɛ́ kɔnyakamɔ.
Foesũ nde? Israelfɔ a tána lɛtsa a kĩ bɛkawɛ a. Lɛmɛ be kamɛ badi sukuloo a kĩ Baguma pau a lɛna foe, ade be nkaɛ kɛna atɔ ɔsĩ nɛ Baguma kavɛ akũ a.
Ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ,
“Baguma fɔ̃ be adzuni mɔ be tɔwɔlɛ dɔ kĩ baánu fɔlɛtsa kayɔ,
Ade kito nɛ ke kɛyawo nviã kĩĩ a,
baápuli bɛmɔ́ biyi ɔsũ ĩye binu foe kayɔ.”
Ade Dawid lɛ kĩ,
“Baguma ɛfɔ̃ be kanyakɔ̃ opunu ɛdani kpɛĩ epi be,
mɔ lɛtsa a kĩ baatula bɛtɔ fɔnya be sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ.
Ɛfɔ̃ be anɛ eke ɔtũ ayekĩ bɛláamɔ fɔkɔ,
ɛfɔ̃ bikũũkũ nɛ be lubokamɔ kayɔ daa daa.”
Finyaa mavia kĩ, kĩ Yudafɔ tula bɛnɛ bɛtɔ a, bɛkahɔ kɔlaa nɛ awã? Oowo! Ayekĩ bɛkɛna tɔkpa sũ ni, nkpã katɛ a ya nɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a sɛkɛ̃, ayekĩ Yudafɔ a aanɔ be lineke.
Ntɛ Yudafɔ tɔkpa yamɛna akũ kana nhila baũ nɛ katinya kamɛ, mɔ ntɛ be hũhũ kamɛ katɔ a ma bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a nhila pii ni, kekɔ̃ nhila a aablusu paa ntɛ Yudafɔ a flee dani bɛkɛna Baguma bade.
Ade mi a kĩ minyɛ́ Yudafɔ a mabi fɔlɛtsa finyaa a. Ayekĩ ĩnyɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ sũ ni, maapia nɛ adzuma a akũ.
Ɔsa fɔ́atsã ye kakɛna kamɛ ni, maapuli nfɔ̃ yĩ kade bati lɛnɔ lineke ayekĩ maapuli ntɛ badi nkpã.
Kitonɛkĩ kĩ Baguma fɔnɛ be awɛ a, ɛkpɔla batidziwa kĩ bɛnyɛ ye bakesĩnɛ a ɛkɛna be ye bakɔba. Foesũ nde fɔ́ana ntɛ Baguma buki ɛtɛ be? Fɔ́ana ndɛ nkpã ɛkpa banɔkpa!
Ntɛ abodoo sɛkɛ sɛtɔnyade a kĩ bɛkɔa bɛkpa Baguma akũ kpalɛ ni, kekɔ̃ ye nkaɛ a lɛmɛ akũ kpalɛ. Ade ayea ntɛ bɛkɔa kutse tunu bɛbɔa afɔliɛ bɛkpa Baguma ni, koe tɛnanɛ a lɛmɛ nyɛ ye tide.

Bitsua kugua kutse kĩ bidu a tɛnanɛ tidi bɛnyɛ, ade bɛkɔa lupo kamɛ kugua kutsede tɛnanɛ bɛyatalɛ nɛ koe akũ a. Mi a kĩ minyɛ́ Yudafɔ a la ndɛ lupo kamɛ kutse tɛnanɛ a kĩ bɛkɔa bɛyatalɛ nɛ kukĩ bidu akũ a, ade finyaa míana kutse a tunu kamɛ funitsã a fudi.
Foesũ mitasupa bikĩ bitsua bɛnyɛ ndɛ tɛnanɛ aye a. Nde sũ miapia akũ mitsa be? Mite anɛ kĩ tɛnanɛ kɛkɛ mianɛ, nnɛ́ mi nyɛ kutse tunu a, mbom tunu a pini mi.
Lɛmɛ ɔsa nɔ aalɛ kĩ, “Bitsua tɛnanɛ a bɛnyɛ kĩ yĩ nna nɛ te kadokɔ̃.”
Fɔnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali. Bitsua te kitonɛkĩ bɛtátɛ bido, ade mina kadzakɔ̃ nɛ mi katɛkado sũ a, foesũ mitapia nɛ foe akũ, mbom mikavila.
Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ Baguma támɔ Yudafɔ a kĩ bɛla ndɛ kutse kpĩĩ a tɛnanɛ a kɔnya ni, ɔkɔna kĩ yaamɔ nɔ kɔnya?

Dã ayekĩ Baguma deĩ sɛmɛ kalɛ, mɔ ayekĩ edeĩ ɔsĩ. Baguma deĩ ɔsĩ nɛ bikĩ bɛnɛ bɛtɔ akũ, lɛmɛ edeĩ sɛmɛ kalɛ ɛkpa nɔ ntɛ osila odzi nɛ ye sɛmɛ kalɛ a kamɛ. Lɛmɛ ntɛ ɔtádzi lɔmɔ ni, Baguma aatsua nɔ malo ɛnyɛ nɛ kutse a akũ.
Ade ntɛ Yudafɔ a muniki bɛyatɛ Baguma bidoi ni, Baguma aakɔa be ɛdzɛla nɛ be kadzakɔ̃ kɔɛ a, kitonɛkĩ Baguma aapuli ɛkɛna foe.

Mi a kĩ minyɛ́ Yudafɔ a, mila ndɛ lupo kamɛ kugua kutse tɛnanɛ a kĩ bitsua bɛyatalɛ nɛ kugua kutse wĩ a akũ a aye. Yudafɔ a la ndɛ kugua kutse a kĩ bidu a, foesũ fɔlá ɔsĩ fɔkpa Baguma kĩ yaabuki ɛkɔa kugua kutse mɔawɛ tɛnanɛ a kĩ bitsua bɛnyɛ a ɛtalɛ nɛ kutse mɔawɛ a akũ.

Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ɔnɔkɔali fɔlɛtsa bɛlawa fudi deĩ kĩ mawɛ kĩ minyi, ayekĩ miláabu mi akũ anyansãfɔ. Ade foe nyɛ kĩ Israelfɔ badi atɔ ɔsĩ a aana kɛnaawo kĩ, bati a kĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a, kakã flee ya nɛ Baguma sɛkɛ̃.
Ntɛ fɔya lɔmɔ fuyua a lɔkɔa Yudafɔ a flee aana katɛ, ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ,
“Ɔtɛnɛ a aato Zion ɛya.
Yaanyɛ ablɔ fɔtsa flee ɛnɛmɛna nɛ Yakob katete a kamɛ a.
Maakɛna bɔhɛ kĩĩ mɔ be,
ntɛ ĩnyɛ be tɔkpa nnamɛna.”
Nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ kɔ̃ ni, Yudafɔ a dani Baguma bakesĩnɛ nɛ mi a kĩ minyɛ́ Yudafɔ a sũ. Lɛmɛ nɛ Baguma be kapau sũ ni, bɛnyɛ Baguma bakɔba nɛ be bawanyɔ sũ.
Kitonɛkĩ Baguma ládani ye adzuni nɛ oti a kĩ ɛpau ĩye ehila a akũ.
Kɔkɔɛ a, mi a kĩ minyɛ́ Yudafɔ a, mitákɛna nɛ Baguma kawɛ akũ, lɛmɛ finyaa Baguma mɔ mi kɔnya kitonɛkĩ Yudafɔ a na atɔ ɔsĩ.
Ade ayea kɔnya a kĩ Baguma mɔ mi a sũ ni, finyaa Yudafɔ lɛmɛ lákɛna nɛ Baguma kawɛ akũ ayekĩ Baguma aamɔ be malo kɔnya.
Ayekĩ batidziwa flee sĩ kĩ baátse Baguma sũ ni, ɛfɔ̃ bati flee kɛna fɔkɔ katabu kɔla bawanɛ, ayekĩ yaamɔ be flee kɔnya.
Baguma akũ kana fɔtsa nɛ lidede paa!
Ye nyansã mɔ kadikanyi kamɛ dzũ paa!
Owei aapuli ɛnyɛ ye kɔtɔkakɔ kamɛ?
Owei aapuli enu ye tisi kayɔ?
Ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ,
“Owei nyina boe Ɔlate a adzuni?
Owei aapuli ɛkpa ye kɔdɛ?
Owei lɛkpa Baguma litsedi tɔ̃,
ayekĩ yaakɛna ese ye kɔtɔ?”
Kitonɛkĩ Baguma lɛbɔa fɔtsa flee,
ye kɔbɛ̃ akũ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa dzi nkpã,
ade ye kamɛ lɛmɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa aawũna a.
Obu mɔ kamu nyɛ Baguma fude daa.
Fɔya lɔmɔ.

Foesũ nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ayekĩ Baguma amɔ boe kɔnya sũ ni, make mi aduli paa kĩ mikɔa mi akũ mikpa Baguma ndɛ afɔliɛ fɔtsa kĩ fudeĩ nkpã, kĩ foe akũ kpalɛ, fɔawo ye anɛ. Ade fukĩĩ nyɛ ayekĩ miasum Baguma nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ mɔ mi tɔwɔlɛ a.

Mitadzi nkpã ndɛ ayekĩ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ bati adzi nɛ tɔkpa kakɛna kamɛ a, mbom mifɔ̃ Baguma ɛdani mi adzuni ɛkɛna avɔɛ̃ lɔkɔa midani ɔbla. Fɔ́afɔ̃ minyi Baguma kawɛ, fɔtsa a kĩ fɔnɛnɛ, kĩ fɔawo ye anɛ, fɔkpɔla lɛmɛ a.

Nɛ Baguma kɔnyakamɔ futetsa baũ a kĩ ɛkpa yĩ sũ ni, mabi mi kamɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtabu ye tɔnɔkɔɛ̃ ɛba ayekĩ kɛfɛta. Nɛ foe kadokɔ̃ a, ɛkɔna fɔtsa a kĩ fɔatsa akũ kadɔla, lɔkɔa ɛdzɛmɔ ye akũ ɛdã nɛ katɛkado a kĩ Baguma kpa ye a onukpɛ̃.
Ayekĩ budeĩ sukɛna fɔkɔ kumɛkumɛ pii nɛ oti mɔawɛ a kamɛ, kĩ fɔakɛna tudzuma futefute a,
ade ayea titɔ kĩ bati pii bɔanɛ malo ni, oti mɔa bɔanɛ nɛ Kristo kamɛ, kĩ bɔtsamɔ akũ ndɛ sukɛna fɔkɔ futefute nɛ oti mɔa kamɛ.

Baguma mɔ boe kɔnya, ɛkpa boe futetsa futefute, foesũ mifɔ̃ bɔkɛna foe akũ adzuma nɛ ye kɔnyakamɔ a onukpɛ̃. Ntɛ boe futetsa nyɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa onukpɛ̃ kanyɛ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ bɔakɛna nɛ katɛkado a kĩ budeĩ a onukpɛ̃.
Ntɛ boe futetsa nyɛ kĩ busum bati ni, kɛnɛ kĩ busum be ayekĩ kɛfɛta, ntɛ futetsa nyɛ fɔtsa katsa ni, kɛnɛ kĩ bɔtsa fɔtsa.

Ntɛ fɔnyɛ bati ɔwɔlɛ kɔbɛ̃ kado ni, kɛnɛ kĩ bɔkɛna foe. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakpa bati fɔtsa ni, ɛkɛna foe mɔ ɔwɔlɛ faa. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛdzɛ̃ nɛ bati onukpɛ̃ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ ɛkɛna adzuma mɔ ɔsĩ, ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɛna sɛmɛ kalɛ kakɛna ni, kɛnɛ kĩ ɛkɛna foe mɔ anɛ kakpalɛ.
Miwɛ akũ kalɛ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ. Mikesĩ tɔkpa, lɔkɔa mipi fɔtsa wĩ midomɔ akũ.
Miwɛ akũ akũ kalɛ ndɛ bawaɛ̃ nɛ Kristo kamɛ aye, ade odi nyɛ odi ɛbɔa mbɔdi ɛkɔa obu ɛkpa ɔwaɛ̃ a.
Mikɛna adzuma mɔ ɔsĩ ade mitana ɔnyɔnɛ a. Misum boe Ɔlate a mɔ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kɔbɛ̃.
Mifɔ̃ mi kɔnɛte a kɔkpã mi nɛ kawɔlɛ kamɛ. Mina ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ nɛ mi ɔhau kamɛ, mikaabɔa mpaɛ daa daa.
Mibumɔ asɔli bati a kĩ badi ahiã a, ade mitɛ banɔvɔɛ̃ faa nɛ mi tɔtɔ kamɛ a.
Miwã Baguma kĩ ehila bikĩ bitomɔ mi liti a. Mivia kĩ ehila be, ɛtadum be.
Mimɔ kawɔlɛ mɔ bikĩ bamɔ kawɔlɛ, ade mibe mɔ bikĩ babe lɛmɛ a.
Mina nɛ adzuni mɔapɛ kamɛ mikpa odi nyɛ odi. Mitapia akũ, mbom mikɛna tɔkɔba mɔ bikĩ bɛdɔla be akũ kĩ bati lábu nɛ lɛtsama kamɛ a. Mitabu mi akũ kĩ minyina kadi.
Ntɛ oti odi fum nɔ ni, takɔa tɔkpa ose ye kɔtɔ. Mibɔa mbɔdi mikɛna lɛtsa kĩ odi nyɛ odi abu kĩ lɛnɛnɛ a.
Ntɛ fɔ́alɛ kakɛna, mɔ fɔ́ato mi sɛkɛ̃ ni, mimɔ odi nyɛ odi midzi nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mitakɛna odima tɔkpa mise kɔtɔ da, mbom mifɔ̃ Baguma kalɔkpa kɛkɛna foe. Kitonɛkĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, Ɔlate a lɛ kĩ, “Yĩ aavɛlɛ sɔtɔ, yĩ aakɛna nse kɔtɔ.”
Lɛmɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ,
“Ntɛ kɔlɛ akɔ nɔ okesĩnɛ ni, kpa ye funitsã ɛnya.
Ntɛ ɔmɔado akɔ ye ni, kpa ye mui ɛmɔa.
Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ ɔkɛna fukĩĩ ni, aafɔ̃ kɔnyɔã liwo ye paa.”
Tafɔ̃ tɔkpa lɛnya nɔ akũ, mbom kɔa tuwĩ kanya tɔkpa akũ.
Kɛnɛ kĩ odi nyɛ odi ebu ɔmaĩ akũ banyanɛ, kitonɛkĩ otumi odima lɛláa kĩ ɛtáto Baguma sɛkɛ̃, ade ɔmaĩ akũ banyanɛ a kĩ bidzi finyaa a, Baguma lidzina be.
Foesũ odi nyɛ odi kĩ eyidza ɛdza nɛ ɔmaĩ akũ banyanɛ otumi akũ a, yidza ɛdza nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ehihiɛ eyi a akũ. Ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɛna lɔmɔ a, aavɛlɛ kɔtɔkaku ɛkpa ye mɔawɛ.
Bati a kĩ bakɛna tuwĩ a, lávila bati akũ banyanɛ, mbom bikĩ bakɛna tɔkpa a avila be. Ɔwɛ kĩ bati akũ ɔnyanɛ ɛtahũnahũna nɔ? Kekɔ̃ kɛna lɛtsa a kĩ lɛnɛnɛ, lɔkɔa yaamu nɔ.

Kitonɛkĩ bati akũ ɔnyanɛ a nyɛ Baguma ɔsumunɛ kĩ yakɛna adzuma ɛkpa nɔ kalɛ. Lɛmɛ ntɛ ɔkɛna tɔkpa kɔ̃ ni, kekɔ̃ vila ye, kitonɛkĩ edeĩ kɔbɛ̃ kĩ yavɛlɛ sɔtɔ ndɛ ayekĩ kɛfɛta. Baguma fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ yanɛ, ade yadã kĩ bɛkpa bikĩ bɛkɛna tɔkpa a Baguma sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ a.
Nɛ fukĩ sũ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ oti adɔla akũ ɛkpa ɔmaĩ akũ banyanɛ a, nnɛ́ nɛ Baguma sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ odi sũ, mbom ayekĩ oti ɔwɔlɛ fɔ̃ enyina tuwĩ a sũ.
Ade fukĩĩ lɛmɛ sũ miase ɔmaĩ tɔgɔlɛ a, kitonɛkĩ ɔmaĩ akũ banyanɛ a akɛna adzuma kakpa Baguma ntɛ bɛkɛna be tudzuma tɛkpɔla.
Foesũ mise be lɛtsa a kĩ midzimɔ be a. Mise ɔgɔlɛ mɔ dutɛ mikpa bikĩ kɛfɛta. Mivila oti a kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ bivila a, ade mibu oti a kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ bɛkpa obu a.
Mitadzimɔ odima kɔtɔ, kɔtɔ a kĩ miadzimɛna a nyɛ kĩ miwɛ mi akũ akũ kalɛ. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛwɛ ɔwaɛ̃ kalɛ ni, ɛkɛna nɛ Baguma mbla a flee akũ.

Mbla a kĩ Baguma kpa a lɛ kĩ, “Tabɔa adɔpaa, takɔ oti, taye, tayɔɔlɛ anɛ nɛ nɔ ɔkɔba fɔtsa akũ,” mɔ tɛbɛbã a kĩ tibu a flee boomu nɛ mbla mɔapɛ kamɛ kĩ, “Wɛ nɔ ɔkɔba kalɛ ndɛ ayekĩ awɛ nɔ akũ kalɛ a.”
Ntɛ awɛ odi kalɛ ni, ɔláakɛna tɔkpa nɛ ye akũ, foesũ ɔdɔ nyɛ mbla a flee akũ kakɛna.
Kɛnɛ kĩ miakɛna fukĩĩ, kitonɛkĩ minyina kĩ lɔkɔ wo ɔtɔ kĩ mianyinya nɛ tida kamɛ. Kitonɛkĩ lɔkɔ a kĩ Baguma aatɛ boe a nkpã fuã finyaa lɛba lɔkɔ a kĩ bɔnya lɔtɔ bɔtɛ Kristo budo a.
Lɛnyɛ lɔkɔ tɛ̃ liyua, kade lamɛna kanyina. Mifɔ̃ bɔfɔ̃ ɔtũ kamɛ fɔtsa kakɛna, lɔkɔa bɔbɔɛ kawũ kanɔ fɔtsa bɔbla bɔkpa kanɔ nɛ ɔhaĩ kamɛ.
Mifɔ̃ bupi boe akũ kapi wĩ ndɛ bati kĩ bidzi nɛ ɔhaĩ kamɛ. Mitafɔ̃ bɔna nɛ kanya mɔ futo kawɔlɛ mɔ bavɛ kawuga kamɛ, ĩye adɔpaa kabɔa, ĩye ablɔ kadi, ĩye kapaa mɔ anɛngbã kakɛna kamɛ.
Mbom mibɔɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo kawũ fɔtsa mido ndɛ atadiɛ aye, lɔkɔa mifɔ̃ mi sukɛna akũ kadã kakɔna miyaadani se odo fɔtsa akũ bakɛnanɛ.
Mitɛ oti a kĩ ɛtátim nɛ katɛkado kamɛ a mido nɛ mi kamɛ faa, mitavɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa mɔ ye nɛ lɛtsa kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ ɛkɛna mɔ likĩ kɛtáfɛta kĩ ɛkɛna a akũ.
Oti odi katɛkado kpa ye osi kĩ ɛnya funitsã fudi nyɛ fufudi, lɛmɛ oti a kĩ ye katɛkado tátim a kɔ̃ anya kɔba kamɛ funitsã odi.
Oti a kĩ yanya lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a, ɛtasupa oti a kĩ yaánya foe. Ade oti a kĩ yanya kɔba funitsã odi a, ɛtadzɛmɔ ekĩ yanya lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa, kitonɛkĩ Baguma tɛ ye.
Owei anɛ kĩ adzɛmɔ oti bɛbã ɔsumunɛ? Ye mɔawɛ ɔlate aamɔ ntɛ ɛdzɛ̃ pintii ĩye ɛtɔ. Lɛmɛ yaanya akũ kitonɛkĩ boe Ɔlate a aapuli ɛkɛna ye ɛdza pintii.
Oti odi abu kĩ luwi lidi sĩ lɛba fuwi bɛbã a, ade odi lɛmɛ adã kĩ fuwi a flee keti a. Nɛ fukĩĩ odu akũ a, odi nyɛ odi ɛdza pintii nɛ kakɔ mɔa.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ebu luwi lidi paa ni, ɛkɛna foe kĩ yado boe Ɔlate a obu. Ade ayea odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaánya funitsã fudi a, kɛna foe kĩ yado boe Ɔlate a obu, ade yanyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ nɛ foe akũ a.
Boe kamɛ odima lidzí nkpã ɛkpa ye akũ odi, ade boe kamɛ odima láku lɛmɛ kakpa ye akũ odi a.
Ntɛ budzi nkpã ni, boe Ɔlate a budzi bɔkpa, ade ntɛ buku a, boe Ɔlate a buku bɔkpa. Foesũ ntɛ budzi nkpã o-o ĩye buku o-o, boe Ɔlate a bade bɔanɛ.
Ade fukĩĩ sũ mɔ Kristo ku, ade eyidza edzi nkpã ayekĩ yaanya bikĩ bidzi nkpã mɔ bikĩ biku a Ɔlate a.
Ade nɔ kɔ̃, nde sũ akɔ awaɛ̃ kɔtɔ? Ĩye nɔ malo nde sũ asupa awaɛ̃? Boe a flee bɔ́adza nɛ Baguma anɛ kamɛ lɔkɔa ɛdzɛmɔ boe.
Kitonɛkĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ,
“Ɔlate a lɛ kĩ, ‘Kĩ ndzi nkpã kĩĩ a,
odi nyɛ odi aake aduli ɛkpa yĩ,
ade odi nyɛ odi aabinya onukpɛ̃ ɛlɛ kĩ
yĩ nyɛ Baguma a.’ ”
Foesũ boe kamɛ odi nyɛ odi aakpa Baguma ye mɔawɛ akũ akunta.
Foesũ mifɔ̃ bɔfɔ̃ akũ akũ kadzɛmɛna, kakɔ kɔtɔ. Fukĩ miakɛna nyɛ kĩ mikɛna adzuma kĩ miláakɛna lɛtsama kĩ fɔ́afɔ̃ awaɛ̃ lɛtɔ ĩye fɔfɔ̃ ɛkɛna tɔkpa.
Yĩ ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ boe Ɔlate Yesu sũ, ntɛ ndo kĩ funitsã fudima nɛ foe akũ akũ lɛnyɛ́ efĩĩ fɔtsa. Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi tɛ edo kĩ funitsã fudi akũ tákpalɛ ni, kekɔ̃ fɔkɛna efĩĩ fɔtsa fɔkpa ye.
Ntɛ nɔ funitsã kĩ anya sũ awaɛ̃ tɛ kalɔɛ ni, kekɔ̃ nnɛ́ ɔdɔ kamɛ ɔtsɛ̃mɔ ye. Tafɔ̃ funitsã a kĩ anya a lɛwɔla oti a kĩ ye lɔlɔ Kristo ku a.
Foesũ mitafɔ̃ bati bɛbã lisupa fɔtsa a kĩ mi miakɔna kĩ fɔnɛnɛ a.
Kitonɛkĩ Baguma lɛgãkanya a lɛnyɛ́ kanya mɔ kamɔa, mbom fɔnyɛ tuwĩ kakɛna mɔ lukudɔ, mɔ kawɔlɛ kĩ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a akpa a.
Ade ntɛ odi asum Kristo nɛ osi kĩĩ akũ a, yawo Baguma anɛ ade bati lɛmɛ akpa ye obu a.
Foesũ mifɔ̃ boe botaɛ ɛnya kĩ bɔakɛna lɛtsa a kĩ layamɛna lukudɔ, titiliwu mɔ fukĩ fɔ́abumɛna akũ akũ.
Mitabula Baguma adzuma kade nɛ funitsã sũ. Nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, funitsã flee akũ kpalɛ fɔkpa kanya, lɛmɛ fɔnɛ́nɛ kĩ banya lɛtsa kĩ laha odi fɔfɔ̃ ɛkɛna tɔkpa.
Lɛtsa wĩde nyɛ kĩ taba sɛkɛna ĩye ɔmɔa waĩ ĩye akɛna lɛtsa bɛbã lidima kĩ fɔ́afɔ̃ awaɛ̃ lɛkɛna tɔkpa.
Fɔ̃ lɛtsa a kĩ ɔtɛ odo nɛ fɔtsa kĩĩ akũ a, fɔna nɛ mimɔ nɔ Baguma odi kayite. Baguma hila oti a kĩ ɛtákɔ ye akũ kɔtɔ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ɛkɛna, ɛmɔ kĩ lɛnɛnɛ a sũ.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi anya lɛtsa kĩ ye ɔwɔlɛ tákpa ye osi a, Baguma akɔ ye kɔtɔ, kitonɛkĩ lɛtsa a kĩ ɛkɛna a táto katɛkado kamɛ. Lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ oti akɛna kĩ fɔtáto katɛkado kamɛ ni, tɔkpa tanɛ.
Kɛnɛ kĩ boe a kĩ budeĩ ɔsĩ nɛ katɛkado kamɛ a, bɔabumɔ bati a kĩ be katɛkado lɛlá ɔsĩ a nɛ be ɔhau kamɛ. Kɛtánɛ kĩ bɔakɛna lɛtsa a kĩ laawo boe mɔawɛ anɛ.
Mifɔ̃ boe kamɛ odi nyɛ odi ɛkɛna lɛtsa a kĩ laawo boe bakɔba anɛ ayekĩ fɔ́alɛ fɔkpa be, bitim nɛ be katɛkado kamɛ.
Kitonɛkĩ Kristo malo tákɛna fɔtsa a kĩ fuwo ye anɛ, mbom ndɛ ayekĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ, Kristo bi Baguma kĩ, “Fuvũnatsa a kĩ bɛta bɛkpa nɔ a, yako nɛ yĩ akũ.”
Ade lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ biyi nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ a, bɛtsɛlɛ foe batsa boe fɔtsa, kĩ bɔkɔa ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ mɔ Baguma fɔlɛtsa bɔdza pintii, budo ɔwɔlɛ bɔna lɛtsa a kĩ bɔadã anɛ a.
Baguma a kĩ ye nyɛ ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ mɔ kɔbɛ̃ kado katokɔ̃ a, ɛfɔ̃ mina onukpɛ̃ mɔa nɛ mi kamɛ, mitomɔ Kristo Yesu osi a kĩ ɛtsa a,
ayekĩ mi flee míakɔa ɔwɔlɛ mɔa mɔ odo mɔa mimu Baguma, kĩ ɛnyɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo Ɔlɛga a.
Foesũ mitɛ mi bawaɛ̃ ndɛ ayekĩ Kristo tɛ mi a, fɔnya obu fɔkpa Baguma.
Mabi mi kĩ Kristo yakɛna Yudafɔ a ɔsumunɛ, ɛkɔa ɛtsa kĩ Baguma adi ɔnɔkɔali, lɔkɔa ete de nɛ bɔhɛ a kĩ Baguma kɛna mɔ Yudafɔ bawanyɔ a akũ,
ayekĩ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a lɛmɛ aamu Baguma nɛ ye kɔnyakamɔ sũ. Ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ,
“Nɛ foesũ maamu nɔ nɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a kamɛ.
Maasã kamu tɔnɔ ndɛla nɔ dĩ nɛ ode.”
Ade bibuki bɛtsɛlɛ biyi kĩ,
“Mi a kĩ minyɛ́ Yudafɔ a,
mimɔ kawɔlɛ mɔ Baguma bade a.”
Katsɛlɛ bɛbã lɛ kĩ,
“Mi a kĩ minyɛ́ Yudafɔ a flee mimu boe Ɔlate a.
Mi fude fude flee mimu ye!”
Ade Yesaya lɛmɛ lɛ kĩ,
“Isai kasinu a kamɛ obi odi aanɛ ɛta,
ye aayanya bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a akũ.
Ade ye akũ baakɔa anɛ bite a.”
Baguma a kĩ ye akũ bɔate anɛ a ɛfɔ̃ kawɔlɛ mɔ lukudɔ lɛtɛ mi kamɛ nɛ mi ye katɛkado sũ, ayekĩ mi kɔnɛte a aakabo anɛ nɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa kɔbɛ̃ a kamɛ.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, yĩ mɔawɛ a ntɛ ndo paa kĩ fɔtsa wĩ kakɛna tɛ mi kamɛkamɛ, ade minyina kadi pii kĩ míapuli midɛ akũ akũ.
Lɛmɛ nɛ ovoli kĩĩ kamɛ a, ndo ɔwɔlɛ ntsɛlɛ fɔtsa fudi faa kĩ mabuki nkɔa nkai mi foe. Ndo ɔwɔlɛ kitonɛkĩ Baguma mɔ yĩ kɔnya ɛkɔa adzuma kĩĩ edo yĩ nɛ awɛ,

kĩ ĩnya Kristo Yesu ɔsumunɛ nkɛna adzuma nkpa bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a. Nkɛna adzuma ndɛ ɔsɔfɔ nkalɛ Baguma Kalɛ Wĩ a, ayekĩ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a aakɛna ndɛ afɔlibɔ wĩ kĩ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa kpalɛ ye akũ ɛkpa Baguma.
Foesũ yĩ ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ Yesu Kristo sũ ni, maapuli mpia nɛ adzuma a kĩ nkɛna nkpa Baguma a akũ.
Lɛtsa a kĩ odi maado ɔwɔlɛ nlɛ nyɛ kĩ Kristo tsã yĩ akũ ɛfɔ̃ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ na osetie nɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa akũ. Ɛkɛna fukĩĩ ɛtsãmɛna yĩ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ nlɛ, mɔ adzuma a kĩ nkɛna a kamɛ.

Fukĩĩ ya nɛ foe kamɛ nɛ awãwã mɔ nsɛntsɛlɛni fɔtsa a kĩ nkɛna, nɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a kɔbɛ̃ a kamɛ. Foesũ ntsã mmini nto Yerusalem nnawo Iliriko tite akũ a, nde lɛtsã nɛ Kristo Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ ntsɛna tɛmatɔ a flee.
Yĩ kawɛ mɔ ɔsĩ nyɛ kĩ made lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ nɛ awã kĩ bati tánu tɔ̃ Kristo dĩ, ayekĩ nlánake nte nɛ litekũ kĩ odi nya lɔtɔ eke a akũ.
Ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ,
“Bati a kĩ bɛtábi be kadima nɛ ye akũ tɔ̃ a, aamɔ ye,
ade bikĩ bɛtánu tɔ̃ kadima nɛ ye akũ a, aanu foe kayɔ.”
Ade foesũ nkawɛ lɔkɔ pii kĩ maya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃, mɔ ntána osi a.
Lɛmɛ finyaa kĩ ĩyua yĩ adzuma nɛ fuyite kĩĩ, mɔ ayekĩ nkawɛ futeli pii kĩ mayaasɛla mi a sũ ni,
matɛ kado kĩ maapuli nkɛna foe finyaa. Mawɛ kĩ ntɛ ĩyaatɛ̃ nnnaa Spania, maadza nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ sukuloo budo akũ kawɔlɛ, lɔkɔa mibumɛna minyɛ yĩ osi nnaa.
Finyaa kɔ̃ ni, manaa Yerusalem nkɔa futelitsa fudi mma Baguma bade a nɛ awã.
Kitonɛkĩ Makedonia mɔ Akaia tɛsɔli a te fɔtsa faa kĩ bakɔa bibumɛna ahiãfɔ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Baguma bade a kamɛ nɛ Yerusalem.

Be mɔawɛ a adzuni fɔanɛ, lɛmɛ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, be adzuma fɔanɛ kĩ bibumɔ be. Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a na tsɛfã nɛ Yudafɔ hũhũ nhila fɔtsa a kamɛ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a lɛmɛ akɔa be akũ kana fɔtsa bibumɛna Yudafɔ a.
Foesũ ntɛ nkɛna adzuma kĩĩ ĩyua, mɔ nkɔa fɔtsa a kĩ bite a nkpa be ni, maatsã mi sɛkɛ̃ ntɛ̃ nnaa Spania.
Ĩnyina kĩ ntɛ maya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ ni, maakɔa Kristo Kalɛ Wĩ kamɛ nhila baũ mma mi.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, nnɛɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo mɔ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a ɔdɔ kĩ yakpa a, make mi aduli kĩ mikɛna ɔmɔa mɔ yĩ bɔbɔa mpaɛ mɔ ɔsĩ bɔkpa Baguma nɛ yĩ lɔlɔ.
Mibɔa mpaɛ kĩ ɛnyɛ yĩ etomɛna bati a kĩ bɛtátɛ bido nɛ Yudea a awɛ. Mibɔa mpaɛ lɛmɛ kĩ yĩ kasum a kĩ manaakɛna nɛ Yerusalem a kiwo Baguma bade a anɛ.
Ntɛ fɔnyɛ Baguma kawɛ ni, maaya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ mɔ kawɔlɛ ĩyaadzi nwɛya.
Baguma kĩ yakpa lukudɔ a, ɛnamɔ mi flee. Fɔya lɔmɔ.
Mawɛ kĩ mabɔa boe ɔwaɛ̃tsole Foibe kĩ ɛnyɛ ɔsumunɛ paa nɛ Kenkrea asɔli a kamɛ dĩ ntsa mi.
Mitɛ ye nɛ boe Ɔlate a dĩ akũ ndɛ ayekĩ fɔfɛta Baguma bade a aye. Mikpa ye kabumɛna kadi nyɛ kadi kĩ yaasĩ etomɛna mi sɛkɛ̃, kitonɛkĩ ɛnyɛ bati pii mɔ yĩ mɔawɛ malo obumɛnanɛ.
Mawɔ̃na Priskila mɔ Akwila kĩ bɛnyɛ yĩ bakɔba adzuma bakɛnanɛ nɛ Yesu Kristo adzuma kamɛ.
Bɛkɔa be nkpã bɛwãnɛ yĩ lɔlɔ. Nnɛ́ yĩ odi anyɛ be kɔlɛ, mbom mɔ tɛsɔli a kĩ tideĩ nɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ kamɛ a lɛmɛ.
Mawɔ̃na asɔli bati a kĩ batsɛna nɛ be tɔtɔ kamɛ a lɛmɛ. Mawɔ̃na yĩ ɔwɛnɛ Epaineto kĩ ɛnya oti ɔtɔnyade kĩ ɛtɛ Kristo edo nɛ Asia amantam a kamɛ.
Mawɔ̃na Maria kĩ ɛkɛna adzuma mɔ ɔsĩ ɛkpa mi a.
Mawɔ̃na Androniko mɔ Yunia, yĩ akũ bati, kĩ bɔmɔ be bɔwa kɔla a. Bɛtɛ dĩ nɛ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kamɛ, ade bɛnya yĩ lɔtɔ nɛ Kristo katɛ kado kamɛ a.
Mawɔ̃na Ampila kĩ mawɛ kalɛ paa, kĩ edeĩ nɛ ɔmɔa kakɛna kamɛ mɔ boe Ɔlate a.
Mawɔ̃na Urbana lɛmɛ, boe ɔkɔba nɛ Kristo adzuma a kamɛ, mɔ yĩ ɔkɔba paa Staki.
Mawɔ̃na Apele kĩ bɛmɔ́ kĩ etim nɛ Kristo kamɛ a. Mawɔ̃na Aristobulo tɔtɔ kamɛ bati a flee.
Mawɔ̃na yĩ kade oti Herodion mɔ Narkiso tɔtɔ kamɛ bati a kĩ bɛkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Kristo a.
Mawɔ̃na Trifaina mɔ Trifosa kĩ bakɛna boe Ɔlate a adzuma a, mɔ yĩ ɔwɛnɛ Persi kĩ ɛkɛna adzuma paa ɛkpa boe Ɔlate a.
Mawɔ̃na Rufo kĩ ɛtɛ dĩ nɛ boe Ɔlate adzuma kamɛ a, mɔ ɔma kĩ epi yĩ ndɛ obi aye a.
Mawɔ̃na Asinkrito, Flegon, Herme, Patroba, Herma mɔ be bawaɛ̃ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ a.
Mawɔ̃na Filologo, Yulia, Nerea mɔ ye ɔwaɛ̃tsole, mɔ Olipa mɔ Baguma bade a kĩ bideĩ nɛ be sɛkɛ̃ a.
Miwɔ̃na akũ mikɛna atuu nɛ Kristo ɔdɔ kamɛ. Kristo tɛsɔli bati a flee awɔ̃na mi!
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, make mi aduli kĩ mifɔ̃ mi anɛ ɛna nɛ bati a kĩ bayamɛna kasɛ̃, kakpã badi bayɛla be katɛkado a akũ. Mivɛlɛ akũ nɛ be akũ!
Kitonɛkĩ bati a kĩ bakɛna fukĩnaa bamɛ odu a lásum Kristo, boe Ɔlate a, mbom be mɔawɛ lupu basum. Bakɔa sɛmɛ mɛnɛmɛnɛ mɔ fɔvã fɔlɛtsa kamu bati, ade bakɛ bati a kĩ binyína tɔkpa a adzuni a.

Lɛmɛ mi kɔ̃ odi nyɛ odi nu ayekĩ miayi atɔ katse Kalɛ Wĩ a, nɛ foesũ kawɔlɛ ade yĩ paa nɛ mi akũ. Lɛtsa a kĩ mawɛ nyɛ kĩ minyi kadi nɛ lɛtsa wĩ kakɛna kamɛ, lɛmɛ nɛ tɔkpa kakɛna kamɛ kɔ̃ ni, minya bati kpĩĩ.
Owi lɛláabuna, Baguma a kĩ yakpa lukudɔ a, aabubuli Satana kpɛtɛkpɛtɛkpɛtɛ nɛ mi abɔa kayɔ. Boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo ɛmɔ mi kɔnya.
Timoteo yĩ adzuma kamɛ ɔkɔba awɔ̃na mi flee. Ade aye a Lukio lɛmɛ, mɔ Yason mɔ Sosipatro kĩ bɛnyɛ yĩ kade bati awɔ̃na mi a.
Yĩ Tertio, kĩ ntsɛlɛ ovoli kĩĩ nkpa Paulo a, lɛmɛ mawɔ̃na mi nɛ boe Ɔlate a dĩ akũ.
Yĩ tɔtɔ ɔlate Gaio, kĩ ye awã batɛ badonɛ a atsɛna a, awɔ̃na mi.
Ade Erasto kĩ ɛnyɛ ɔmatɔ kĩĩ sika ɔkɔlanɛ mɔ boe ɔwaɛ̃nyole Kwarto awɔ̃na mi papaapa.
Boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo ɛmɔ mi flee kɔnya. Fɔya lɔmɔ.
Mifɔ̃ bumu Baguma. Yaapuli edo mi katɛkado kɔbɛ̃ nɛ ayekĩ ɛfɔ̃ nde lɛtsã Kalɛ Wĩ a nɛ Yesu Kristo akũ a, mɔ ayekĩ ɛnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali fɔlɛtsa bɛlawa a kito anɛ kɔkɔɔkɔɛ a ɛtsa sũ.

Lɛmɛ finyaa, bɛnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali a na bɛtsa fude flee bɛtsãmɛna Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ fɔlɛtsa katsɛlɛ kayi a kamɛ, ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma kĩ edzi nkpã daa hihiɛ eyi a, ayekĩ bati flee aatɛ bido, bɛkɛna nɛ ye ɔlɛdo a akũ.
Baguma a kĩ ye mɔapɛ nyɛ ɔnyansãni a, bɔakpa kamu bɔtsãmɛna Yesu Kristo akũ kanaa daa daa. Fɔya lɔmɔ.
I Corinthians: Yĩ Paulo kĩ Baguma vɛ nɛ ye kawɛ onukpɛ̃, kĩ nkɛna Kristo Yesu fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ, mɔ boe ɔwaɛ̃ Sostene sɛkɛ̃ ovoli kĩĩ to.

Bɔtsɛlɛ ovoli kĩĩ bɔakpa batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Korinto, mɔ bati a kĩ Baguma vɛ kĩ bɛkɛna ye bati kpalɛwa, kĩ bɛnyɛ ye bade nɛ ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ Kristo Yesu a. Bɛvɛ mi bati kĩĩ mɔ bati a flee kĩ basum boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ. Yesu kĩĩ nyɛ be mɔ boe flee Ɔlate.
Mawã Baguma boe Ɔlɛga mɔ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo kĩ bɛmɔ mi kɔnya, bɛkpa mi lukudɔ lɛmɛ.
Luwi daa manyɛ yĩ Baguma kɔlɛ nɛ mi lɔlɔ kĩ ɛtsã Yesu Kristo akũ ɛmɔ mi kɔnya.
Nɛ mi ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ Kristo sũ ni, mina akũ nɛ fɔtsa flee kamɛ, titiliwu nɛ mi kɔdzɛla kalɛ mɔ kadikanyi kamɛ.
Baguma fɔlɛtsa a nɛ Kristo akũ a sipi nɛ mi kamɛ paa,
kĩ foesũ mitɛ hũhũ kamɛ futetsa fudi nyɛ fudi kĩ fusĩ mi, nɛ kĩ midzi miadzɔlɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo kaya a.
Yaapi mi edomɔ akũ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kɛnaawo kawũna, ayekĩ nfumsu adima lɛláana nɛ mi akũ nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo Luwi a akũ.
Baguma a kĩ ɛvɛ mi kĩ mikɛna ɔmɔa mɔ ye Obi, boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo a, nyɛ oti kĩ yadi ɔnɔkɔali.

Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ndzɛ̃ nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo otumi akũ make mi a flee aduli kĩ mikɛna ɔmɔa nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ mialɛ a akũ ayekĩ kasɛ̃ lɛláaya nɛ mi kayite. Mina onukpɛ̃ mɔa nɛ mi kakɔna mɔ fukĩ foe akũ mike otse a kamɛ,
kitonɛkĩ, nwaɛ̃ amɛ, bati badi to Kloe tɔtɔ kamɛ bɛyabi yĩ pefee kĩ ɔdzɛ deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ.
Mifɔ̃ nlɛ foe limii, bati a lɛ kĩ mi kamɛ badi alɛ kĩ, “Yĩ kɔ̃ Paulo ntomɛna.” Ɔbɛbã lɛmɛ alɛ kĩ, “Ntomɛna Apolo.” Odi lɛmɛ bo, “Ntomɔ Petro.” Ade odi lɛmɛ bo, “Ntomɔ Kristo.”
Mavia mi ni, bɛsɛ̃ Kristo nɛ kutsukutsu kamɛ mbɔɛɛ? Paulo bɛbɔa nɛ asendua akũ nɛ mi lɔlɔ mbɔɛɛ? Mbɔɛɛ kĩ bɛkɛna mi kamɛ odi mui kawɔla amaniɛ ndɛ Paulo fɔtsa bakɔlɛnɛ aye?
Manyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ kĩ ntákɛna mi kamɛ odima mui kawɔla amaniɛ kɛba Krispo mɔ Gayo odi pɛ.
Foesũ odima lɛláapuli ɛlɛ kĩ bɛkɛna ye mui kawɔla amaniɛ nɛ yĩ dĩ akũ.
Nuwĩ mate anɛ kĩ nkɛna Stefana mɔ ye tɔtɔ kamɛ bati mui kawɔla amaniɛ, lɛmɛ maáte anɛ kĩ nwɔla oti bɛbã odima.

Kristo tádo yĩ kĩ ĩyaakɛna mui kawɔla amaniɛ nkpa bati. Edo yĩ kĩ ĩyaade lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ, kĩ ntákɔa batidziwa kadikanyi nlɛ ke ayekĩ Kristo wuda nɛ asendua akũ kɔbɛ̃ a lɛláakɛna fɔtsa pupulidza.
Kristo wuda nɛ asendua akũ fɔlɛtsa a nyɛ fudzimbitsa fɔkpa bati a kĩ bɛtsɛ̃ nɛ kawɔ osi akũ, lɛmɛ boe a kĩ bɛlamɔ katɛ a, bɔmɔ́ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ buyi ɔsũ ndɛ Baguma kɔbɛ̃ aye.
Nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa kamɛ a, Baguma lɛ kĩ,
“Maawɔla kadi banyinɛ a kadikanyi,
ade maanyɛ tuvoli banyinɛ kayɔkanu a ĩyi nɛ ɔɔwɛ̃ a.”
Foesũ finyaa ndia kadi banyinɛ a dzɛ̃? Ndia tuvoli banyinɛ fɔtsa batsanɛ a mɔ fɔlɛtsa bavɛlɛnɛ a deĩ? Baguma kɔa foe ɛtsa kĩ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ kadikanyi nyɛ fudzimbitsa.

Kitonɛkĩ Baguma nɛ ye kadikanyi onukpɛ̃ ni, ɛkɛna foe kĩ batidziwa bɛtatsã be kadikanyi kamɛ binyi ye. Mbom lɛtsa kĩ bavɛ boe tidzimbi lɛtsã kade fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ a, Baguma kɔa foe ɛnyɛ bikĩ bɛtɛ ye bido a.
Yudafɔ awɛ awãwã fɔtsa bɛmɔ́, ade Grikifɔ lɛmɛ tomɛna katinya kadikanyi liti a.
Lɛmɛ boe kɔ̃ bɔade lɛtsã nɛ Kristo wuda nɛ asendua akũ. Fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ aba Yudafɔ tuwũna, ade fɔnyɛ fɔkɔasiatsa fɔkpa bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a.
Lɛmɛ be a kĩ Baguma vɛ a kĩ bɛnyɛ Yudafɔ, mɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ Helafɔ a ni, fɔlɛtsa a nyɛ Kristo kĩ ɛnyɛ Baguma kɔbɛ̃ mɔ ye kadikanyi.
Kitonɛkĩ lɛtsa a kĩ bɔamɔ ndɛ Baguma tidzimbi nhihiɛ a bɛ̃ otidziwa kadikanyi kɔlaa, ade ke awã kĩ fɔkɛna ndɛ Baguma kɔbɛ̃ dɔ nɛ ye lɛkɛnana kamɛ a, bɛ̃ otidziwa kɔbɛ̃ kɔlaa.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mikɔna mi akũ midã ayekĩ mina fɔmɔ Baguma vɛ mi a. Nɛ batidziwa kamɔ onukpɛ̃ ni, mi badi sukuloo nyɛ kadi banyinɛ, ĩye bikĩ bideĩ kɔbɛ̃, ĩye kĩ mi akũ deĩ obu.
Baguma bua ɛpau katinya kamɛ fɔtsa kĩ foe akũ lɛlá nfasɔ, kĩ yakɔa foe edo kadi banyinɛ kɔnyɔã, ade ɛpau fɔtsa a kĩ fɔlá akũ ɔsĩ kĩ yakɔa foe edo bikĩ bideĩ kɔbɛ̃ a kɔnyɔã.
Baguma pau fɔtsa a kĩ bati lábu foe kado nɛ lɛtsama kamɛ, kasupa foe lɛmɛ a, kĩ yakɔa foe ɛwɔla fukĩ bati akɔna kĩ fɔtɛ kɔya a.
Baguma kɛna fukĩĩ ayekĩ otidziwa odima lɛláapuli epia ye akũ nɛ ye anɛ.
Lɛmɛ Baguma kĩĩ lɛfɔ̃ mikɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Yesu Kristo, ade ɛfɔ̃ Kristo nyɛ boe kadikanyi a. Baguma tsã ye akũ ɛkɛna boe bati kpĩĩ, ɛkpalɛ boe akũ, ɛfɔ̃ bɔna nkpã.
Foesũ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Oti kĩ yawɛ kĩ yapia ye akũ ni, epia nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ boe Ɔlate kɛna a akũ.”
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ade foesũ lɔkɔ a kĩ ĩya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ kĩ matsa Baguma ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ kɔlawa a, ntákɔa onukpɛ̃ mɛnɛmɛnɛ fɔlɛtsa kalɛ baũbaũ mɔ nyansã dzununuunu ntsa mi foe.
Kitonɛkĩ kĩ nna nɛ mi kamɛ a, nke otse kĩ manyɛ anɛ nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa akũ mbɔɛntɛ Yesu Kristo mɔ ye wuda nɛ asendua akũ a.
Foesũ kĩ ĩya nɛ awã a, ndã kpɛtɛɛ, nna nɛ libe mɔ kukũtila kamɛ,
ade yĩ fɔtsa katsa mɔ yĩ ɔlɛdo a tánya batidziwa kɔdzɛla kalɛ baũ baũ ĩye nyansã tisi akũ fɔlɛtsa, mbom nde lɛtsã a kayɔ kanu a kĩ Baguma Hũhũ kɔbɛ̃ a nyɛ ɛtsa a.
Nɛ foesũ mi katɛkado lɛdzɛ̃ nɛ batidziwa nyansã akũ, mbom kɛdzɛ̃ nɛ Baguma kɔbɛ̃ akũ.
Lɛmɛ made kadikanyi lɛtsã kakpa bikĩ bibo anɛ nɛ hũhũ kamɛ a. Lɛmɛ fɔnyɛ́ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ kadikanyi ĩye ke kɔbɛ̃ kĩ kanya katinya akũ. Kɔbɛ̃ a akũ ɔlɔmɛ lamɛna katinya.
Kadikanyi fɔlɛtsa a kĩ matsa a nyɛ Baguma kadikanyi kɔlawa, kĩ bɛkɔa bɛkɔla batidziwa, lɛmɛ Baguma nyɛ foe eyi ɛkpa boe kadɛla nɛ ode fɔmɔ ɛbɔa katinya malo.
Katinya kamɛ kĩĩ banɔkɔɛ̃ a kamɛ odima tányi kadikanyi kĩĩ. Ntɛ kanyi binyi ke kufɛ bɛtábɔa boe Ɔlate kpalɛwa a nɛ asendua akũ.
Lɛmɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ,
“Lɛtsa a kĩ linebi támɔ tɔ̃,
sɔtɔ tánu tɔ̃,
lɛtsa a kĩ odima tákɔna tɔ̃ kĩ laapuli lɛya a,
ade foe pɛpɛɛpɛ Baguma manɛ eyi ɛkpa bati a kĩ bawɛ ye a.”
Lɛmɛ ade boe Baguma tsã ye Hũhũ Kpalɛwa akũ ɛnyɛ foe ɛtsa a.
Hũhũ a awɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɛ yededeede, ade yafiifii Baguma fɔtsa a kĩ ɛkɔla a dzununuunu kamɛ malo a.
Odima lɛláapuli enyi lɛtsa a kĩ oti bɛbã akɔna mbɔɛntɛ oti a mɔawɛ hũhũ a kĩ edeĩ nɛ ye kamɛ a. Ade ayea odima lɛláapuli enyi Baguma kakɔna mbɔɛntɛ ye mɔawɛ Hũhũ odi.
Bɔtátɛ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ hũhũ, mbom bɔtɛ Baguma Hũhũ a kĩ edo a, ayekĩ bɔ́anyi fɔtsa a kĩ Baguma kpa boe a flee.
Foesũ nnɛ́ batidziwa kadikanyi kĩ batsa bɔnɛɛ bɔalɛ kalɛ, mbom bɔnɛɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Hũhũ a tsa boe a bɔkɔa bɔanyɛ hũhũ kamɛ ɔnɔkɔali fɔtsa a katsa bikĩ Hũhũ deĩ nɛ be kamɛ a.

Odi nyɛ odi kĩ Hũhũ a lɛláa ye kamɛ ni, ɛláapuli ɛtɛ futetsa a kĩ futo Baguma Hũhũ a sɛkɛ̃. Oti a na odu tánu foe kayɔ koũ, fudzimbitsa fɔanɛ fɔkpa ye. Fɔnyɛ fudzimbitsa fɔkpa ye, kitonɛkĩ mbɔɛntɛ bikĩ Hũhũ deĩ nɛ be kamɛ a aapuli binu Hũhũ kamɛ fɔlɛtsa kayɔ.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ Hũhũ a deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ aapuli enu fukĩĩ flee kayɔ. Lɛmɛ odima lɛláapuli ɛdzɛmɔ ye.
Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ,
“Owei nyina lɛtsa a kĩ de boe Ɔlate akɔna?
Owei aapuli ɛkpa ye kɔdɛ?”
Lɛmɛ boe kɔ̃ Kristo kakɔna a deĩ nɛ boe kamɛ.

Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, fɔnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali kĩ ntápuli mbi mi fɔlɛtsa ndɛ ayekĩ maabi bikĩ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa deĩ nɛ be kamɛ aye, mbom mbi mi fɔlɛtsa ndɛ bati kĩ bidzi nɛ sukɛna kamɛ kĩ bɛnyɛ babisɛ̃ nɛ Kristo katɛkado kamɛ.
Tɛmɛ mui nkpa mi, nnɛ́ funitsã kɔkɔlɔkɔ kitonɛkĩ mitábo anɛ tɔ̃ kĩ mianya foe. Finyaakĩĩ malo mitáwo tɔ̃ kĩ mianya foe,
kitonɛkĩ mibuki midzi ndɛ ayekĩ katinya kamɛ kĩĩ bati dzi nkpã. Ntɛ mianɔ lineke, kapaa mɔ akũ ni, nnɛ́ katsa fɔatsa kĩ minyɛ katinya kamɛ bati kĩ bidzi nɛ ke tisi akũ?
Ntɛ mi kamɛ ɔmɔa lɛ kĩ, “Ntomɔ Paulo,” mɔ ɔbɛbã bo, “Ntomɔ Apolo,” nnɛ́ katsa fɔatsa kĩ miakɛna fɔtsa ndɛ katinya kamɛ bati aye?
Nɛ foe kamɛ a, owei nyɛ Apolo? Owei lɛmɛ nyɛ Paulo? Baguma adzuma bakɛnanɛ kɛkɛ bɔanɛ, ade mitsã boe akũ mitɛ mido a. Boe kamɛ odi nyɛ odi akɛna adzuma a kĩ Baguma kpa ye a.
Yĩ lidu kutse libi a, ade Apolo ko de mui a, lɛmɛ Baguma lɛfɔ̃ kutse a bo anɛ.
Oti a kĩ edu mɔ ekĩ eko de mui a tásĩ. Baguma lisĩ, kitonɛkĩ ade ye lɛfɔ̃ kutse a bo anɛ a.
Kavɛmɛna kadima lɛláa ekĩ edu mɔ ekĩ eko mui a kayite. Baguma aase be kamɛ odi nyɛ odi kɔtɔ nɛ ye adzuma a kĩ ɛkɛna onukpɛ̃.
Boe, buboomu bɔakɛna adzuma bɔkpa Baguma, ade mi nyɛ Baguma kɔba a kĩ koe kamɛ bɔakɛna adzuma a. Minyɛ Baguma kɔla a kĩ bɔake a.

Nɛ kĩ Baguma mɔ yĩ kɔnya sũ ni, nkɛna adzuma ndɛ kɔla okenɛ wĩ. Ĩyi litekũ lɔyɔde a kayɔ ade oti bɛbã lamɛna kake kadɛla nɛ ode a. Lɛmɛ kɛnɛ kĩ ekĩ ɛlamɛna kake kadɛla ɛdã kadã wĩ nɛ ayekĩ yake a akũ.
Kitonɛkĩ Baguma kɔa Yesu Kristo eyi kɔkɔɛ ndɛ litekũ lɔyɔde kĩ odima lɛláapuli eyi lɛbɛbã kayɔ.
Badi aakɔa sika ngbã ĩye sika ovoe ĩye boe kĩ bɛtɛ kɔya bike bite nɛ litekũ a akũ, babɛbã aakɔa titse ĩye tuwĩ, ĩye lipili bike bite.

Lɛmɛ baanyɛ kɔla a kĩ odi nyɛ odi lamɛna kake a kutitse bɛtsa nɛ Kristo Luwi a akũ. Kitonɛkĩ nɛ Luwi a na akũ fi aanyɛ odi nyɛ odi adzuma kĩ ɛkɛna a kanya. Baakɔa fi kĩĩ bɛsɔ tudzuma a bɛdã, fɔtsa te kɔyakatɛ lɛmɛ.
Ntɛ fɔtsa a kĩ bike bite nɛ litekũ lɛyɔde a akũ puli fɔdza nɛ fi onukpɛ̃ ni, kɔla okenɛ a aana kɔtɔkase.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi fɔtsa vio ni, ɛláana kɔtɔkase, lɛmɛ ye mɔawɛ a yaana katɛ ndɛ kalo elo ɛnɛ nɛ fi a kamɛ aye.
Minyína kĩ Baguma Asɔli Kɔla mianɛ, kĩ Baguma Hũhũ a dzi nɛ mi kamɛ?
