Foesũ ntɛ odi bula Baguma Asɔli Kɔla a kade ni, Baguma lɛmɛ aawɔla ye, kitonɛkĩ Baguma Asɔli Kɔla akũ kpalɛ. Ade mi nyɛ ye Asɔli Kɔla a.
Odima ɛtakɛ ye akũ. Ntɛ mi kamɛ odi kɔna kĩ enyina kadi nɛ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ kamɔ onukpɛ̃ ni, kɛfɛta kĩ ɛdani ɛkɛna odzimbifɔ mbom ayekĩ yaakɛna ɔnyansãni nɛ Baguma anɛ.
Kitonɛkĩ lɛtsa a kĩ bati abu ndɛ kadikanyi a ni, fɔnyɛ fudzimbitsa nɛ Baguma anɛ. Ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa lɛ a, “Baguma api anyansãfɔ nɛ be mɔawɛ kadikanyi kamɛ.”
Ade bibuki bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa kamɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate nyina kĩ, bikĩ binyina kadi a be adzuni nyɛ fɔtsa pupulidza.”
Foesũ kɛtánɛ kĩ odima apia nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bati apuli kakɛna a akũ, kitonɛkĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa nyɛ mi fude.
Paulo, Apolo, Petro, katinya kĩĩ, nkpã ĩye wuda, lɔkɔ kĩĩ ĩye, likĩ laaya o-o, foe flee fɔnyɛ mi fude.
Lɛmɛ mi kɔ̃ minyɛ Kristo bade, ade Kristo lɛmɛ nyɛ Baguma ode a.
Mibu boe ndɛ Kristo basumunɛ a kĩ be awɛ Baguma kɔa ɔnɔkɔali fɔtsa kɔlawa a edo.
Lɛtsa kĩ bawɛ bitomɛna adzuma ɔkɛna kĩĩ odu awɛ nyɛ kĩ, yadi ɔnɔkɔali ɛkpa ɔlate.
Finyaakĩĩ ntsɛ́la kɔlaa ntɛ miadzɛmɔ yĩ, ĩye odi bɛbã adzɛmɔ yĩ. Ade maádzɛmɔ yĩ akũ malo a.
Yĩ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kpalɛ, lɛmɛ fɔátsa kĩ tɔkpa lɛláa yĩ akũ, kitonɛkĩ boe Ɔlate nyɛ oti kĩ yaadzɛmɔ yĩ.

Foesũ odima ɛtadzɛmɔ odi kɛnaawo kĩ lɔkɔ wĩ a wo ɔtɔ. Kɛnɛ kĩ kadzɛ nkaɛ a kɛdzɔlɛ boe Ɔlate a kaya. Ade ye aanyɛ ɔtũ kamɛ fɔtsa bɛlawa mɔ bati kakɔna a kĩ bɛkɔa bɛkɔla a kanya a. Ade lɔkɔ a na Baguma aakɔa kamu ɛkpa odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛfɛta ɛkpa kamu a.

Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, nɛ mi kalɛ sũ, nkɔa bɔmɔ Apolo fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ nkpa nfantuhũ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ matsa a akũ, ayekĩ míanu fɔlɛtsa a kĩ balɛ a kayɔ kĩ, “Mitsã nɛ osi kpĩĩ a akũ.” Mi kamɛ odima ɛtapia nɛ oti mɔa akũ lɔkɔa esupa ɔbɛbã.
Owei lɛkɛna mi bati kĩ bɛtɛ kɔya bɛba babɛbã? Nnɛ́ Baguma lɛkpa mi lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ mideĩ a? Lɔkɔa nde sũ miadɛla akũ ndɛ nnɛ́ Baguma lite mi fɔtsa a na?
Mi awɛ ta lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lisĩ mi a kɔkɔɛ mbɔɛɛ? Midani asikafɔ kɔkɔɛ mbɔɛɛ? Midani fɔgã titɔ kĩ boe bɔnyɛ́ fɔgã malo? Awoo. Mawɛ kĩ minyɛ fɔgã lɔkɔa boe malo bɔnya fɔgã bubumɔ mi kufɛ.

Fɔadã yĩ ndɛ Baguma kɔa boe fɔtɔ banyanɛ a ɛdzɛla nɛ kadzakɔ̃ nkaɛ. Bɔkɛna ndɛ bati kĩ biku kɔtɔ kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ bɛkɔ be nɛ kanade anɛ, ade bɔkɛna ndɛ fɔtsa dãwa lɛmɛ bɔkpa katinya kamɛ bati mɔ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ flee a.
Nɛ Kristo sũ bɔnyɛ badzimbifɔ, lɛmɛ mi minyɛ kadi banyinɛ nɛ ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ Kristo kamɛ! Bɔlá kɔbɛ̃ lɛmɛ mi kɔ̃ mideĩ kɔbɛ̃! Bati lábu boe kado nɛ lɛtsama kamɛ, lɛmɛ mi kɔ̃ bakpa mi obu!
Kito kɛyawo nviã lɔkɔ kĩĩ malo budzi kɔlɛ mɔ ɔmɔado, budeĩ nɛ tɛtadiɛ kpeliwa kamɛ, babo boe, ade bɔtsɛ̃ bɔato katɛ̃ kĩ bɔlá kadzikɔ̃.
Bɔakɛna adzuma mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kaveli akũ. Ntɛ bati dumu boe bɔakpa be nhila, ade ntɛ bitomɔ boe liti bɔado ɔwɔlɛ katɛ foe.
Ntɛ bivũna boe a, bɔakɔa ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ kakpa be mbuayɛ. Bɛkɛna boe ndɛ katinya kamɛ fukluku kĩ bɔnyɛ tite akũ fukluku kawulakɔ̃ kɛyawo nviã kĩĩ.
Maátsɛlɛ mi fukĩĩ kĩ mado mi kɔnyɔã, mbom makɔa foe ndɛ mi ndɛ yĩ babi kĩ mawɛ be kalɛ aye.
Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ mideĩ bati mpim ewua kĩ batsa mi fɔtsa nɛ Kristo akũ malo ni, ɔlɛga mɔapɛ mideĩ. Ntsã Kalɛ Wĩ a kalɛ kamɛ ndani mi ɔlɛga, kitonɛkĩ mikɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Yesu nɛ mi nkpã kamɛ.
Foesũ make mi aduli kĩ mikɔlɛ yĩ ɔbla.

Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ mado Timoteo kĩ ɛya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃. Ɛnyɛ yĩ mɔawɛ obi nɛ Kristo kamɛ, kĩ maátunɔ ye kalɛ ade ɛnyɛ oti kĩ yadi ɔnɔkɔali nɛ ye kadzi kamɛ a. Yaate mi anɛ nɛ tisi vɔɛ̃ a kĩ te akũ ndzi nkpã nɛ Kristo kamɛ a akũ. Ade foe lɛmɛ matsa nɛ tɔsɔli a flee kamɛ nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ a.
Mi kamɛ badi miata akũ, kitonɛkĩ mikɔna kĩ nláabuki ĩyaasɛla mi.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ boe Ɔlate tunɔ kɔ̃ ni, owi lɛláabuna kɔlaa mɔ maaya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃. Ntɛ ĩya ni, maawɛ kĩ manyi kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ bikĩ bata akũ deĩ, nnɛ́ lɛtsa a kĩ bɛtsɛ̃ balɛ a odi.
Kitonɛkĩ Baguma lɛgãkanya a lɛnyɛ́ onukpɛ̃ kamɛ fɔlɛtsa kalɛ kɛkɛ, mbom fɔnyɛ kɔbɛ̃ fɔlɛtsa.
Fɔɔdabe miawɛ? Ĩya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ mɔ katsei, mbɔɛɛ kĩ ĩya nɛ ɔdɔ mɔ akũ kadɔla bɔɛɛ?
Finyaakĩĩ bɛlamɛna kalɛ kokooko kĩ adɔpaa deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ ye odu lɛláa amamufɔ malo kamɛ. Bɛlɛ kĩ onyole odi mɔ ɔlɛga ɔtsɔ̃ dzi.
Lɔkɔa nde míapuli midɛla mi akũ nɛ ode? Kanɛ kɛnɛ kĩ ayɔlɔhɔ api mi lɔkɔa minyɛ oti a kĩ ɛkɛna fɔtsa kpa kĩĩ odu a nɛ mi asɔli katsu a kamɛ.
Titɔ kĩ nláa mi kamɛ nɛ sukɛna kamɛ malo ni, ndeĩ nɛ mi kamɛ nɛ hũhũ kamɛ. Ndzɛmɔ oti a, nkɔ ye kɔtɔ kɔkɔɛ nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu dĩ akũ.
Ntɛ mitsɛna ni, maana nɛ mi kamɛ nɛ hũhũ kamɛ nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ kɔana nɛ boe kamɛ a sũ,
mikɔa oti a mido nɛ Abonsam awɛ lɔkɔa ɛwɔla ye sukɛna a, ayekĩ ye hũhũ a aapuli ɛna katɛ nɛ boe Ɔlate Luwi a akũ.
Fɔnɛ́nɛ fɔkpa mi kĩ miata akũ! Minyina lɛgbã a kĩ, “Oyila kabii nɛ bodobodo mawɛ kamɛ afɔ̃ ye flee yavuya.”

Minyɛ oyila kɔɛ a kĩ ɛnyɛ tɔkpa a nɛ mi kamɛ lɔkɔa mi akũ ɛkpalɛ. Míadani mikɛna onuvoe lɔbɔ vɔɛ̃ kĩ oyila lɛláa ye kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ ĩnyina kĩ mila a. Kitonɛkĩ bɛkɔ Kristo kĩ ɛnyɛ boe Wuda Katɛ̃ kavelibi bɛkɔa bɛbɔa afɔliɛ nɛ boe lɔlɔ.
Foesũ mifɔ̃ bɔnya boe Wuda Katɛ̃ luwi a, nnɛ́ mɔ abodoo kĩ edeĩ oyila kɔɛ kĩ ɛnyɛ tɔkpa mɔ ablɔ kakɛna, mbom bɔnya abodoo kĩ ɛlá oyila kĩ ɛnyɛ tuwĩ kakɛna mɔ ɔnɔkɔali kadi.
Nɛ ovoli a kĩ ntsɛlɛ nkpa mi kamɛ a, mbi mi kĩ mitakɔa akũ mibɔamɔ bati kĩ bideĩ adɔpaa.
Finyaakĩĩ ni, nnɛ́ amamufɔ a kĩ bideĩ adɔpaa, ĩye bideĩ anɛ ngbã, ĩye baye, ĩye basum baviɔ̃ a malɛ. Ntɛ miwɛ kĩ mianyɛ mi akũ nɛ be flee kamɛ ni, kekɔ̃ kɛnɛ kĩ mianɛ nɛ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ kɔlaa.

Lɛtsa kĩ matsa a nyɛ kĩ mitakɔa akũ mibɔamɔ oti kĩ yavɛ ye akũ kĩ ɔtɛ odonɛ lɛmɛ yabɔa adɔpaa, ĩye edeĩ anɛ ngbã, yasum baviɔ̃, ĩye yavɛ bati buĩ kpa, ĩye yawuga bavɛ ĩye yaye. Mimɔ oti a na odu mitado awɛ minya malo.

Kitonɛkĩ fɔnyɛ́ yĩ adzuma kĩ madzɛmɔ bikĩ bɛláa asɔli a kamɛ. Baguma aadzɛmɔ be. Lɛmɛ kɛnɛ kĩ miadzɛmɔ bikĩ bideĩ nɛ mi asɔli a kamɛ, ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Miblɔmɛna oti kpa a nɛ mi kamɛ.”

Kitonɛkĩ fɔnyɛ́ yĩ adzuma kĩ madzɛmɔ bikĩ bɛláa asɔli a kamɛ. Baguma aadzɛmɔ be. Lɛmɛ kɛnɛ kĩ miadzɛmɔ bikĩ bideĩ nɛ mi asɔli a kamɛ, ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Miblɔmɛna oti kpa a nɛ mi kamɛ.”
Ntɛ ɔdzɛ wo nɛ mi kamɛ odi mɔ ɔkɔba ɔtɛ odonɛ kayite ni, nde sũ yakɔa kalɛ a ɛma amamufɔ fɔlɛtsa badzɛnɛ, mɔ yaáfɔ̃ Baguma bati lɛdzɛ kalɛ a?
Minyína kĩ boe a kĩ bɔnyɛ Baguma bati a aayadzɛmɔ katinya kamɛ? Ntɛ mi aayadzɛmɔ katinya kamɛ a, nde sũ miláapuli midzɛ fɔlɛtsa kubii kubii?
Minyína kĩ boe aadzɛmɔ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ lɛmɛ mbɔɛɛ? Lɔkɔa nde sũ mɔ miláapuli midzɛ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ fɔtsa?
Ntɛ fɔlɛtsa a na odu ya ni, miákɔa foe mikpa bati kĩ bɛla fɔdzakɔ̃ nɛ asɔli a kamɛ malo kĩ bɛdzɛ foe?
Kɔnyɔã kuwo mi! Matɛ kado kĩ oti mɔapɛ aye kĩ enyina kadi deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ kĩ yaapuli ɛdzɛ mi batɛ badonɛ a kayite fɔlɛtsa.
Kĩ miakɛna foe lɔmɔ mbom a ni, ɔtɛ odonɛ akpã ɔkɔba kanamɛna fɔlɛtsa kadzɛkɔ̃ kafɔ̃ bikĩ bɛtátɛ bido a adzɛ fɔlɛtsa a!

Kalɛ ɔnɔkɔali a nyɛ kĩ nɛ ayekĩ miti miakɔa fɔlɛtsa kanamɛna fɔlɛtsa kadzɛkɔ̃ a atsa kĩ, obu salɛ nɛ mi akũ. Fɔláalɛ fɔba ntɛ bɛkɛna tɔkpa nɛ mi akũ lɔkɔa miálɛ kadima? Fɔláalɛ fɔba ntɛ mifɔnɛ be awɛ bisisi mi mbom?
Lɛmɛ mi mɔawɛ a miakɛna tɔkpa nɛ mi bakɔba akũ, kasisi akũ mɔ mi bawaɛ̃ batɛ badonɛ malo.

Minyina pefee kĩ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ tɔkpa a na odu lɛláana kanyakɔ̃ nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ. Mitakɛ mi akũ, kitonɛkĩ bati kĩ babɔa adɔpaa, ĩye basum baviɔ̃, ĩye banɛ kɔnyɔ mɔ kɔtsɔ̃ liti, batsole kĩ bawamɔ batsole mɔ banyole kĩ bawamɔ akũ,
ĩye bati kĩ baye, ĩye bikĩ bideĩ anɛ ngbã, ĩye bikĩ bawuga bavɛ, ĩye bikĩ banyɛ bati buĩ kpa ĩye bablɔfɔ bayekpanɛ ni, be kamɛ odima lɛláana kanyakɔ̃ nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ.
Ade aye mi kamɛ badi mina miyatɛ̃ a, lɛmɛ finyaakĩĩ bɛvɔlɛ titikpa nɛ mi akũ. Bɛkɔa mi bido nɛ Baguma awɛ, bɛkɛna mi bati kpalɛwa nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo dĩ mɔ Baguma Hũhũ akũ.

Mi kamɛ badi aalɛ kĩ, “Bɛkpa yĩ osi kĩ nkɛna lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa.” Oo! Nuwĩ fɔanɛ. Lɛmɛ nnɛ́ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa nɛnɛ lɛkpa oti. Maapuli nlɛ kĩ, “Bɛkpa yĩ osi kĩ nkɛna lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa.” Lɛmɛ nláafɔ̃ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa lɛnya yĩ akũ.

Oti bɛbã lɛmɛ aalɛ kĩ, “Funitsã waa fɔkpa lupu ade lupu lɛmɛ waa lɛkpa funitsã a.” Oo! Nuwĩ fɔanɛ. Lɛmɛ Baguma aawɔla foe nviã a. Kɛtánɛ kĩ bɔakɔa boe sukɛna bɔkpa linyolewɛ mɔ litsolewɛ, mbom kĩ bɔakɔa sukɛna busum boe Ɔlate ade boe Ɔlate lɛmɛ adãmɛna se akũ a.
Ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma dzɛla boe Ɔlate etomɛna kanɔkpa a, ade ayea yaakɔa ye kɔbɛ̃ ɛdzɛla boe lɛmɛ a.
Minyina kĩ mi sukɛna nyɛ Kristo sukɛna a sidi. Fɔnɛnɛ kĩ makɔa Kristo sukɛna sɛkɛ sidi nkɛna otsole ɔdɔpaani sukɛna sukɛna a sidi? Kɛtánɛ kĩ fɔna lɔmɔ koũ!
Mbɔɛɛ minyína kĩ ntɛ odi kɔa akũ ɛta otsole kĩ yabɔa adɔpaa ni, bɛmɔ ye bɛkɛna sukɛna mɔa? Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Be bati nviã a baakɛna sukɛna mɔa.”
Lɛmɛ oti kĩ ɛkɔa ye akũ ɛmɛnamɔ boe Ɔlate ni, bɛmɔ ye bɛkɛna ɔmɔa nɛ hũhũ kamɛ.
Mivɛlɛ akũ nɛ linyolewɛ mɔ litsolewɛ tɔkpa ɔwɛ̃! Titikpa bɛbã kĩ oti akɛna látamɔ ye sukɛna, lɛmɛ oti kĩ ɛbɔa adɔpaa titikpa a tamɔ ye mɔawɛ sukɛna.
Minyína kĩ mi sukɛna nyɛ asɔli kɔla kɔkpa Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a kĩ Baguma kpa mi, kĩ edeĩ nɛ mi kamɛ lɛmɛ a? Foesũ nnɛ́ mi awɛ la mi sukɛna mbom Baguma side sanɛ.
Baguma se kɔtɔ kpale nɛ mi lɔlɔ, foesũ mikɔa mi sukɛna mido ye obu.
Finyaakĩĩ maalɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ mitsɛlɛ mikpa yĩ a akũ. Fɔnɛnɛ ntɛ onyole odi tákɔã ɔtsɔ̃.
Lɛmɛ nɛ kĩ linyolewɛ mɔ litsolewɛ bɔ paa sũ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ onyole nyɛ onyole ɛkɔã ɔtsɔ̃, ade kɛnɛ kĩ otsole nyɛ otsole lɛmɛ edzi kɔnyɔ a.
Kɛtánɛ kĩ onyole ɛkɛna ɔtsɔ̃ be kawa lɔlɔ ɔsĩ, ade ayea kɛtánɛ kĩ otsole asĩ ɔnyɔ sɛkɛ̃ kawa a. Kɛnɛ kĩ bakɛna lɛtsa sĩwa lidi nyɛ lidi bɛkpa be akũ.
Otsole a sukɛna lɛnyɛ́ ye odi side, mbom ɔnyɔ side sanɛ lɛmɛ. Ade ayea onyole a sukɛna lɛnyɛ́ ye odi side, mbom sɛnyɛ ɔtsɔ̃ lɛmɛ side.

Ɔtsɔ̃ mɔ ɔnyɔ bɛtakɛna be kawa akũ lɔlɔ ɔsĩ, mbɔɛntɛ binu be akũ kayɔ ade bɛwɛ lɛmɛ kĩ bakɔa lɔkɔ lidi bɛkpa mpaɛbɔ. Lɛmɛ ke liti a, kɛnɛ kĩ bamuniki bidzi tɔtsɔ̃ mɔ tɔnyɔ, ayekĩ Abonsam lɛláafɔ̃ biwo nɛ sɔhuiɛ kamɛ ntɛ bɛtápuli bɛnya be akũ akũ.
Nlɛ fukĩĩ ndɛ osi kakpa aye nɛ mi kadzi kamɛ, lɛmɛ nnɛ́ mbla yanɛ makpa mi.
Kufɛ maawɛ kĩ bati flee bidzi ndɛ ayekĩ ndzi a. Lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi deĩ futetsa fudi kĩ ɛtɛ etomɛna Baguma sɛkɛ̃. Odi nyɛ odi fude vɛmɛna nɛ ɔkɔba fude akũ.
Finyaa, mabi bakutse mɔ bakunawa kĩ fɔnɛnɛ fɔkpa be fɔbɛ̃ ntɛ bidzi be odi ndɛ ayekĩ yĩ odi ndzi a.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ bɛláapuli bɛnya be akũ kɔ̃ ni, bɛkɔã batsɔ̃ ĩye bidzi fɔnyɔ, kitonɛkĩ kɔtsɔ̃ mɔ kɔnyɔ kadzi nɛnɛ fɔbɛ̃ kĩ sukɛna kawɛ aakaha be.
Ndeĩ mbla nkpa batsɔ̃ mɔ banyɔ. Mbla a lɛnyɛ́ yĩ ade, mbom boe Ɔlate sɛkɛ̃ eto. Ade ye nyɛ kĩ otsole ɛtasĩ ɔnyɔ,
lɛmɛ ntɛ esĩ kɔnyɔ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ edzi ye odi, ntɛ nnɛ́ aye emuniki ɛnaakpɔla ɔnyɔ a. Ade ayea kɛtáfɛta kĩ onyole lɛmɛ asĩ ɔtsɔ̃ a.
Mi bati nkaɛ a kɔ̃ ni, yĩ lamɔ be kabi, nnɛ́ boe Ɔlate. Ntɛ okristoni deĩ ɔtsɔ̃ kĩ ɛnyɛ ɔmamuni, kĩ etunɔ kĩ badzimɔ akũ ni, onyole a ɛtasĩ ye.
Ade ayea ntɛ otsole okristoni dzimɔ ɔnyɔ kĩ ɛnyɛ ɔmamuni, mɔ etunɔ kĩ bɛmɔ ye badzi ni, otsole a ɛtasĩ ye.

Kitonɛkĩ ɔnyɔ a kĩ ɛtátɛ edo a kɛna oti kpalɛwa nɛ Baguma anɛ, nɛ ayekĩ biboomu a sũ. Ade ayea ɔtsɔ̃ a kĩ ɛtátɛ edo a lɛmɛ kɛna oti kpalɛwa nɛ Baguma anɛ nɛ ayekĩ bɛmɔ ɔnyɔ a biboomu sũ a. Ntɛ nnɛ́ lɔmɔ ni, be babi a aakɛna ndɛ amamufɔ babi aye. Lɛmɛ nɛ be ɔmɔa kakɛna sũ be babi kɛna bati kpalɛwa nɛ Baguma anɛ.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ fɔya kĩ be kamɛ odi kĩ ɛtátɛ edo tátunɔ kĩ yadzimɔ ɔtɔ odonɛ ni, yapuli ɛdzakũ faa. Ntɛ fɔya lɔmɔ a ɔtɛ odonɛ a deĩ osi kĩ yabɔɛ ye osi, kitonɛkĩ Baguma wɛ kĩ midzi nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ.
Mi batɛ badonɛ batsole a mite anɛ kĩ fɔtsɛ̃ mi akũ mi banyɔ aapuli bɛdani be tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ. Ade ayea mi batɛ badonɛ banyole mite anɛ kĩ fɔtsɛ̃ mi akũ mi batsɔ̃ lɛmɛ aapuli bɛdani be tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ a.
Finyaakĩĩ odi nyɛ odi edzi nkpã ndɛ ayekĩ boe Ɔlate kpa ye, ndɛ ayekĩ ɛna fɔmɔ Baguma vɛ ye a. Ade mbla kĩ matsa nɛ tɛsɔli flee a kamɛ a.
Ntɛ oti tsua lɛkpati fɔmɔ Baguma vɛ ye ni, fɔ̃ ɛna lɔmɔ. Ntɛ ɛtátsua lɛkpati fɔmɔ Baguma vɛ ye ni, ɛtalɛ kĩ yanaatsua lɛkpati.
Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ otsua lɛkpati ĩye ɔtátsua ni, fɔtsɛ́la. Lɛtsa a kĩ lisĩ nyɛ kĩ akɛna nɛ Baguma mbla a akũ.
Foesũ odi nyɛ odi ɛna ndɛ ayekĩ ɛla fɔmɔ Baguma vɛ ye a.
Ɔsate anɛ fɔmɔ Baguma vɛ nɔ? Fɔtsɛ́la. Lɛmɛ ntɛ ɔna osi kĩ aanyɛ nɔ akũ nɛ tɛsate kamɛ ni tsã ye akũ,
kitonɛkĩ ɔsate a kĩ boe Ɔlate vɛ a nɛ́ nɛ tɛtsate kamɛ. Ade ayea oti kĩ ɛnyɛ́ ɔsate fɔmɔ bɛvɛ ye ni, ye malo ɛdani ɔsate ɛkpa boe Ɔlate.
Baguma se kɔtɔ kpale nɛ mi lɔlɔ, foesũ mibuki minyɛ́ basate mikpa batidziwa.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mi kamɛ odi nyɛ odi ɛna ndɛ ayekĩ ɛla fɔmɔ Baguma vɛ ye a.
Finyaakĩĩ, nɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ mitsɛlɛ nɛ bakutse akũ a ni, ntátɛ mbla ntomɛna boe Ɔlate sɛkɛ̃. Lɛmɛ ade yĩ kakɔna a, kitonɛkĩ nɛ ayekĩ boe Ɔlate mɔ yĩ kɔnya sũ miapuli mitɛ yĩ mido.
Nɛ yĩ kamɔ onukpɛ̃ mɔ ayekĩ nviã katinya lamɛna ɔsĩ kana sũ ni, fɔnɛnɛ kĩ oti edzi ndɛ ayekĩ ɛla a.
Ntɛ ɔkɔã ɔtsɔ̃ ni talɛ kĩ asĩ ye. Ntɛ ɔtákɔã ɔtsɔ̃ ni, talɛ kĩ awɛ odi ɔkɔã.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ ɔkɔã ɔtsɔ̃ ni ɔtákɛna titikpa, ade ayea ntɛ odi dzi kɔnyɔ ni, ye malo ɛtákɛna titikpa a. Lɛmɛ ntáwɛ kĩ awo nɛ ɔhau a kĩ ɔtsɔ̃ mɔ ɔnyɔ amɔ a kamɛ.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, lɛtsa a kĩ matsa nyɛ kĩ lɔkɔ pii buki lɛwáa nɛ boe lɔtɔ, foesũ kito finyaa kanaa ni, banyole kĩ bɛkɔã batsɔ̃ bidzi ndɛ bɛtákɔã batsɔ̃.
Bikĩ babe ni, bidzi ndɛ bati kĩ be akũ lákɔ kɔnya, bikĩ bamɛmɛ ni, bɛkɛna ndɛ kawɔlɛ láde be. Bikĩ bɛya fɔtsa ni bɛkɛna ndɛ nnɛ́ be la fɔtsa a kĩ bɛya a.
Bikĩ bitomɛna katinya kamɛ fɔtsa liti kĩ bawɛ kĩ foe flee fɔnya be fude ni, bidzi ndɛ bɛtsɛ́la katinya kamɛ fɔtsa akũ, kitonɛkĩ katinya kĩĩ lɛláana lɔmɔ flee ndɛ ayekĩ kɛla finyaa.
Maáwɛ kĩ ana nɛ ɔhau odima kamɛ. Kitonɛkĩ oti kĩ ɛtákɔã ɔtsɔ̃ ni, ɛkɔa ye akũ flee ɛkpa Baguma adzuma kakɛna, ade yabɔa mbɔdi kĩ yakɛna adzuma a edo Baguma kawɔlɛ a.
Lɛmɛ onyole kĩ ɛkɔã ɔtsɔ̃ ni, yakɔna katinya kamɛ fɔtsa akũ, kitonɛkĩ yawɛ kĩ yado ɔtsɔ̃ kawɔlɛ.

Nɛ foesũ ye adzuni sɛ̃ tisi nviã. Otsole kĩ ɛtádzi kɔnyɔ ĩye oyitsɔ̃ kĩ enyína onyole ni, ɛkɔa Baguma adzuma ete nɛ ye akũ, kitonɛkĩ ɛwɛ kĩ yakɔa ye sukɛna mɔ hũhũ flee edzi nkpã yedede. Otsole kĩ edzi kɔnyɔ ni, ɛkɔa ye akũ ɛkpa katinya kamɛ fɔtsa kitonɛkĩ yawɛ kĩ yado ɔnyɔ kawɔlɛ.

Malɛ fukĩĩ bamɛ flee kitonɛkĩ mawɛ kĩ makpa mi kabumɛna. Ntáwɛ kĩ miana nɛ́ kasuli kamɛ, mbom mawɛ kĩ mikɛna lɛtsa a kĩ lɛnɛnɛ mɔ likĩ lɛfɛta, lɔkɔa mikɔa mi akũ mikpa Baguma ɔsum, kĩ kavia katse lɛláa foe akũ.
Ntɛ onyole tinya oyitsɔ̃ mɔ ɛmɔ́ kĩ yaápuli epi ye akũ, ĩye ɛmɔ kĩ lɔkɔ lamɛna katɛ̃ ni, baapuli bɛkɔã akũ. Fɔnyɛ́ titikpa ntɛ fɔya lɔmɔ.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ onyole tinya oyitsɔ̃, mɔ ɛkɔna nɛ ye kamɛ kĩ yaapuli epi ye akũ, kĩ baadzimɔ akũ kokooko ni, ɛkɛna foe kakɛna wĩ.
Foesũ onyole kĩ ɛkɔã ɔtsɔ̃ ni, ɛkɛna kakɛna wĩ, lɛmɛ onyole kĩ ɛtákɔã ɔtsɔ̃ ni, ye fude nɛnɛ fɔbɛ̃ kɔlaa.
Otsole kĩ edzi kɔnyɔ ni ebuki ɛlá osi kĩ yadzi kɔnyɔ bɛbã. Lɛmɛ ntɛ ɔnyɔ a ku ni, edeĩ osi kĩ yadzimɔ onyole a kĩ yawɛ. Kɛnɛ kĩ onyole a ɛnya ɔtɛ odonɛ.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ edzi ndɛ okunawa aye ni, yaamɔ kawɔlɛ ɛba. Ade yĩ kakɔna a, ade matɛ kado kĩ ade aye nyɛ Baguma Hũhũ a kakɔna kĩ ɛkpa yĩ a.

Finyaa, mawɛ kĩ mabi mi litsedi nɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ mitsɛlɛ nɛ funitsã a kĩ bɛkɔa bɛbɔa afɔliɛ bɛkpa baviɔ̃ akũ. Boe flee bɔalɛ kĩ bunyina kadi. Lɛmɛ bunyina kĩ kadikanyi kĩĩ afɔ̃ oti adɛla ye akũ nɛ ode. Lɛtsa a kĩ lakpa boe kɔbɛ̃ nyɛ ɔdɔ.
Ntɛ odi kɔna kĩ enyina fɔtsa nɛ litsedi akũ paa ni, ɛtámɔ foe kamɔ wĩ ndɛ ayekĩ kɛnɛ kĩ fɔna a.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi awɛ Baguma ni, Baguma lɛmɛ nyina ye.
Foesũ ade lɛtsa a kĩ mabi mi nɛ funitsã kĩ bɛkɔa bɛbɔa afɔliɛ bɛkpa baviɔ̃ akũ a. Bunyina kĩ baviɔ̃ nyɛ fɔtsa a kĩ bɛkɔa awɛ bɛmɛ, kĩ fɔlá nkpã, kitonɛkĩ Baguma odi pɛ deĩ nkpã.
Titɔ kĩ bati alɛ kĩ baviɔ̃ deĩ nɛ ode mɔ tite akũ, kĩ baviɔ̃ kumɛkumɛ kĩĩ mɔ be balate deĩ malo ni,

boe kɔ̃ bunyina kĩ Baguma mɔapɛ deĩ. Ade ye nyɛ boe Ɔlɛga kĩ ɛbɔa lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa, ade budzi bɔkpa ye a. Boe Ɔlate kĩ ɛnyɛ Yesu Kristo mɔapɛ lɛmɛ deĩ. Ade ye akũ Baguma tsã ɛbɔa lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa, kĩ fɔtsɛ̃ ye akũ budzi nkpã.

Lɛmɛ nnɛ́ odi nyɛ odi nyina ɔnɔkɔali fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ. Baviɔ̃ akũ fɔlɛtsa nya bati badi kamɛkamɛ limii kĩ kɛyawo nviã kĩĩ ntɛ bɛnya funitsã kĩ bɛkɔa bɛbɔa afɔliɛ bɛkpa baviɔ̃ pɛ bakɔna kĩ baviɔ̃ funitsã fɔanɛ. Nɛ kĩ bɛtábo anɛ nɛ be katɛkado kamɛ sũ ni, bakɔna kĩ funitsã a do be efĩĩ.
Funitsã lɛláapuli fɔlɔla bɔmɔ Baguma kayite. Bɔláayɛla lɛtsama ntɛ bɔtánya ade ayea bɔláana nfasɔ adima ntɛ bɔnya lɛmɛ a.
Lɛmɛ midã kadã wĩ lɔkɔa mitafɔ̃ mi lɛkɛnana nɛ akũ akũ kadzi kamɛ lɛfɔ̃ bikĩ bɛtábo anɛ nɛ be katɛkado kamɛ liwo nɛ tɔkpa kamɛ.
Bɔɛ foe kĩ oti kĩ ɛtábo anɛ nɛ ye katɛkado kamɛ mɔ́ kĩ nɔ a kĩ onyina kadi a odzi anya nɛ kuviɔ̃la. Nnɛ́ kɔbɛ̃ ado ye kĩ ɛnya funitsã kĩ bɛkɔa bɛbɔa afɔliɛ bɛkpa baviɔ̃?
Awaɛ̃ ɔtɛ odonɛ a kĩ ye katɛkado tábo anɛ, lɛmɛ Kristo ku nɛ ye lɔlɔ a ni, yaawɔ nɛ nɔ kadi a kĩ onyina a sũ.
Miafɔ̃ mi bawaɛ̃ batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bɛtábo anɛ nɛ be katɛkado kamɛ a, akɛna titikpa nɛ Kristo akũ, kitonɛkĩ miado be kɔbɛ̃ bakɛna lɛtsa kĩ bɛtɛ bido kĩ fɔnɛ́nɛ.
Foesũ ntɛ funitsã fudi kanya aafɔ̃ nwaɛ̃ lɛkɛna titikpa ni, nláanya funitsã a na da, ayekĩ ɛláawo nɛ tɔkpa kamɛ.
Miakɔna kĩ ĩnyɛ́ oti kĩ edzí ye akũ akũ mbɔɛɛ? Miakɔna kĩ ĩnyɛ́ fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ mbɔɛɛ? Miakɔna kĩ ntákɔa anɛ mmɔ́ boe Ɔlate Yesu mbɔɛɛ? Nnɛ́ mi nyɛ adzuma a kĩ nkɛna nkpa boe Ɔlate a foe akũ nfasɔ?
Ntɛ bati bɛbã támɔ yĩ biyi ɔsũ ndɛ fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ aye ni, mi kɔ̃ mitɛ yĩ. Kitonɛkĩ ayekĩ miawɛ midzi nkpã nɛ boe Ɔlate dĩ akũ a atsa kĩ ĩnyɛ ye fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ.
Ntɛ bati atɛ yĩ atsindze ni, ade limii manyɛ yĩ akũ onukpɛ̃ a.
Bɔlá osi kĩ bakpa boe funitsã mɔ mui nɛ adzuma a kĩ bɔakɛna a sũ mbɔɛɛ?
Bɔlá osi kĩ bakpã boe batsɔ̃ batɛ badonɛ bɔnamɛna osi akũ ndɛ ayekĩ fɔtɔ banyanɛ bɛbã, Petro mɔ boe Ɔlate bawaɛ̃ a akɛna mbɔɛɛ?
Mbɔɛɛ kĩ bɔmɔ Barnaba odi pɛ kɛnɛ kĩ bɔkɛna adzuma bɔkɔa bɔdãmɛna boe akũ?
Sodzani ɔdabe adãmɛna ye mɔawɛ akũ ntɛ edeĩ nɛ kawũkanɔ adzumamu? Okuani ɔdabe anɛ kɔba kĩ yaánya funitsã a kĩ fɔnɛ a? Ĩye owei adɔɔla ɔnantsue kĩ yaámɔa ye tɛmɛ mui badi?
Maátsa fɔtsa nɛ bati kakɔna onukpɛ̃. Ade aye mbla a lɛmɛ tsa kalɛ mɔapɛ a.
Bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Mose mbla ovoli a kamɛ kĩ, “Mitasui ɔyaɛ kĩ minɛɛ miakɛna adzuma nɛ kɔba a onukpɛ̃.” Baguma tsɛla ɔyaɛ odi akũ mbɔɛɛ?
Nnɛ́ boe sũ ɛlɛ kalɛ a na mbɔɛɛ? Ɔnɔkɔali ade boe kalɛ sũ bɛtsɛlɛ foe a. Kɛnɛ kĩ ekĩ yadu mɔ ekĩ yakpɔta a flee bakɛna adzuma a mɔ kɔnɛte kĩ baana be tsɛfã nɛ funitsã a kĩ fɔ́anɛ a kamɛ.
Budu hũhũ kamɛ fɔtsa nɛ mi kamɛ. Ntɛ mi malo mikpa boe katinya kamɛ fɔtsa a ni, miyɛla osi?
Ntɛ bati bɛbã deĩ osi kĩ bana nfasɔ adi bitomɛna mi sɛkɛ̃ ni, kekɔ̃ kɛnɛ kĩ boe bɔana foe butomɛna mi sɛkɛ̃, fublusu malo.
Lɛmɛ bɔtákɔa boe osi kawa a na bɔkɛna adzuma. Mbom bɔkɔa lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa bute nɛ boe mɔawɛ akũ ayekĩ lɛtsama lɛláanya mbɛtahu fɔkpa boe nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a kalɛ nɛ Kristo akũ.
Minyina yededeede kĩ be a kĩ bakɛna adzuma nɛ Baguma Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ ana be funitsã katomɛna Asɔli Kɔla a kamɛ, ade bikĩ babɔa afɔliɛ nɛ afɔliɛ de akũ a lɛmɛ ana afɔliɛ fɔtsa a foe tsɛfã a.
Ade aye boe Ɔlate lɛmɛ lɛ eyi kĩ be a kĩ bade lɛtsã nɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa akũ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ bɛna be kanya bitomɛna lɛtsã kade a kamɛ.

Lɛmɛ yĩ kɔ̃ ntákɛna osi kĩĩ akũ adzuma, ade nlámɛna mi ovoli kĩĩ katsɛlɛ kĩ mikɛna nɛ foe akũ mikpa yĩ a. Ntɛ foe lɔmɔ sũ ni, maaku mbom! Kitonɛkĩ ntáwɛ kĩ odi ɛkɔa lɛtsa kĩ mapia nɛ de akũ a ɛkɛna fɔtsa pupulidza.
Nlá osi kĩ mapia nɛ kĩ made lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ sũ. Fɔnyɛ ɔhɛ fɔkpa yĩ kĩ ndɛ lɛtsã a, ade Baguma aavɛlɛ yĩ sɔtɔ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ ntɛ ntálɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a lɛmɛ.
Ntɛ yĩ mɔawɛ kawɛ onukpɛ̃ makɛna adzuma kĩĩ ni, maadã kĩ bise yĩ foe kɔtɔ. Lɛmɛ makɛna foe ndɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bihihiɛ bɛkpa yĩ kĩ nkɛna, kitonɛkĩ fɔnyɛ adzuma kĩ Baguma hihiɛ ɛkpa yĩ.
Foesũ litsa kɔtɔkase maana? Yĩ kɔtɔkase nyɛ kĩ made lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ faa, ade maáte anɛ kĩ maatsã osi odi akũ nna foe akũ kɔtɔkase kudi a.
Ndzi yĩ akũ akũ ade ĩnyɛ́ ɔsate nkpa odima a. Lɛmɛ nkɔa yĩ akũ nkɛna oti kĩ yasum odi nyɛ odi ayekĩ maapuli ĩnyɛ bati pii nkpa boe Ɔlate.

Lɔkɔ a kĩ nkɛna adzuma nɛ Yudafɔ kamɛ a, ndzi nkpã ndɛ Yudani ayekĩ maavɛlɛ be mma boe Ɔlate. Titɔ kĩ nláa Mose mbla kayɔ malo ni, ndzi nkpã ndɛ bikĩ bideĩ nɛ mbla kayɔ, ayekĩ maanyɛ bikĩ bideĩ nɛ mbla a kayɔ nkpa boe Ɔlate.

Ade ayea kĩ makɛna adzuma nɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ kamɛ a, ndzi nkpã ndɛ oti kĩ ɛnyɛ́ Yudani. Ntákɛna nɛ Yudafɔ mbla akũ ayekĩ maana bati nkpa boe Ɔlate. Lɛmɛ fukĩĩ látsa kĩ mpu Baguma mbla a. Ɔnɔkɔali a nyɛ kĩ ndeĩ nɛ Kristo mbla a kayɔ.

Ntɛ ndeĩ nɛ bikĩ be katɛkado tabo anɛ kamɛ ni, makɛna yĩ akũ ndɛ be kamɛ ɔmɔa aye, ayekĩ maavɛlɛ be nkpa boe Ɔlate. Matsã osi nyɛ osi akũ kakɛna ɔmɔa mɔ odi nyɛ odi ayekĩ maavɛlɛ be kamɛ badi nkpa boe Ɔlate.
Makɛna fukĩĩ bamɛ flee nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a sũ, ayekĩ yĩ malo maana foe akũ nhila.
Minyina yededeede kĩ bati pii adã akũ nɛ atsɛ kalo kamɛ, lɛmɛ be kamɛ ɔmɔapɛ anya akũ katɛ foe akũ lɔbɔɛ. Foesũ miwula atsɛ ayekĩ míapuli minya akũ mitɛ foe akũ kɔtɔkase a.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛmanɛ akũ ɛkpa atsɛ kalo ni, yakɔa ye akũ kado nɛ mbla mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kayɔ ayekĩ yaana lɛgãbɔɛ a kĩ de kɔ̃ laawɔ. Lɛmɛ boe kɔ̃ bɔamanɛ akũ ayekĩ bɔ́ana lɛgãbɔɛ a kĩ lɛláawɔ da.
Foesũ mawula atsɛ kanaa kpĩĩ kĩ manaatsua ɔwɛ̃ a. Ade foesũ nla ndɛ fukpeni ɔbɔanɛ kĩ yaáta fukpeni nɛ ɔwɛ kamɛ aye aye a.

Mafɔ̃ fukpeni awo yĩ akũ ayekĩ yĩ sukɛna aapuli sɛdza sɛkpa lubo kamɔ. Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ made lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ kakpa bati bɛbã ni, ntáwɛ kĩ bɛyaanyɛ yĩ nɛ boe a kĩ bɔadã akũ nɛ atse kalo kɔdza a kamɛ.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mawɛ kĩ mikai lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya nɛ boe bawanyɔ a kĩ bitómɔ Mose a akũ. Be flee bɛna nɛ luflututu a kɔbɛ̃ kayɔ ade bɛtsã Mpo Ngbã a kamɛ bɛnɛ yededeede a.
Baguma kɔa luflututu mɔ mpo mui ɛkɛna be mui kawɔla amaniɛ ndɛ bati kĩ bitomɔ Mose aye.
Be flee bɛnya hũhũ kamɛ funitsã mɔapɛ a,
ade bɛmɔa hũhũ kamɛ bavɛ mɔapɛ a lɛmɛ a. Bɛmɔa mui bitomɛna awãwã hũhũ de a kĩ litomɔ be a kamɛ. Ade de kĩĩ nyɛ Kristo awɛ a.
Lɛmɛ nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ ni, Baguma támɔ kawɔlɛ nɛ be pii akũ. Nɛ foesũ biku nɛ kɔsa kamɛ.
Finyaakĩĩ ni, fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ flee nyɛ nfantuhũ fɔkpa boe ayekĩ fɔ́abɔa boe kɔkɔ, kĩ bɔláatomɔ fɔtsa kpa liti ndɛ ayekĩ bɛkɛna,

ĩye bɔakɔa boe akũ bɔkpa baviɔ̃ kasum ndɛ ayekĩ be kamɛ badi kɛna a. Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Bati a dzi banya luwi, lɛmɛ be kanya mɔ kamɔa dani fɔkɛna bavɛ kawuga, mɔ litsolewɛ mɔ linyolewɛ kakɛna.”
Kɛtánɛ kĩ bakɔ boe kɔtɔ nɛ litsolewɛ mɔ linyolewɛ kakɛna kamɛ, ndɛ ayekĩ be badi kɛna. Nɛ foesũ be kamɛ bati mpim tɛya ɛlalɛ ku luwi mɔapɛ.
Kɛtánɛ kĩ bɔasɔ boe Ɔlate bɔdã ndɛ ayekĩ be kamɛ badi kɛna a, nɛ foesũ bɔɛ dɔ̃ be biku.
Mitafɔ̃ buyidza bɔdza nɛ Baguma akũ ndɛ ayekĩ be kamɛ badi kɛna, nɛ foesũ Wuda Ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ yawɔla be.
Fukĩĩ bamɛ flee ya nɛ be akũ ayekĩ bati bɛbã aakɔlɛ fɔtsa bitomɛna foe akũ. Bɛtsɛlɛ foe biyi ayekĩ bɔ́akɔa bɔkpã boe akũ, kitonɛkĩ budeĩ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ katinya kamɛ kawũna fuã kiyua a kamɛ.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɔna kĩ ɛdzɛ̃ pintii ni, ɛdã kadã wĩ ayekĩ ɛláatɔ.

Kasɔ kadã kadi nyɛ kadi kĩ kɛya nɛ nɔ akũ ni, ade foe odu aya nɛ bati bɛbã akũ a. Lɛmɛ Baguma akɛna nɛ ye kalɛ akũ, ade ke ɛláafɔ̃ kasɔ a na lɛba nɔ kɔbɛ̃ a. Nɛ kasɔ a kamɛ ni, yaakpa mi kɔbɛ̃ ayekĩ míapuli midza nɛ foe kamɛ, mipuli minya foe akũ lɛmɛ.
Foesũ, nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mivɛlɛ mi akũ nɛ baviɔ̃ kasum ɔwɛ̃.
Mabi mi fɔlɛtsa ndɛ bati kĩ binyina kadi, foesũ mikɔna fɔlɛtsa a kĩ nlɛ a akũ midã.

Kɔɔpu a kĩ bɔalɛ kanyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ a nyɛ boe Ɔlate babɔanɛ. Ntɛ buhila kayei a na, bɔmɔa bavɛ a ni, bɔmɔ Kristo bɔkɛna ɔmɔa. Ntɛ bɔanya boe Ɔlate funitsã kpalɛwa ni, fɔatsa kĩ bɔmɔ Kristo bɔkɛna ɔmɔa.
Titɔ kĩ bɔpɔnɛ malo ni bɔkɛna oti mɔa, kito nɛ abodoo mɔapɛ a kĩ boe flee bɔsɛ̃ bɔanya a sũ.
Mikɔna Israelfɔ midã. Be a kĩ bɛnya funitsã a kĩ bɛkɔa bɛbɔa afɔliɛ bɛkpa Baguma a, bɛkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Baguma.
Foesũ katsa matsa kĩ baviɔ̃ ĩye fɔtsa a kĩ bakɔa kabɔa afɔliɛ kakpa be a nyɛ fɔtsa sĩwa fudi mbɔɛɛ?
Oowo! Lɛtsa a kĩ matsa a nyɛ kĩ fɔtsa a kĩ bɛkɔa bɛbɔa afɔliɛ bɛkpa baviɔ̃ ni, bɛkɔa foe bɛkpa hũhũ kpa, lɛmɛ nnɛ́ Baguma bɛbɔa bɛkpa. Ntáwɛ kĩ miakɛna ɔmɔa mɔ hũhũ kpa.
Kɛtánɛ kĩ miamɔa mui nɛ boe Ɔlate kɔɔpu kamɛ lɔkɔa mibuki minaamɔa nɛ hũhũ kpa kɔɔpu lɛmɛ kamɛ, ĩye minya nɛ boe Ɔlate opunu akũ lɔkɔa minaanya nɛ hũhũ kpa opunu akũ lɛmɛ.
Miawɛ kĩ boe Ɔlate ɛna kalɔkpa, ɛnɔ lineke lɛmɛ mbɔɛɛ? Bɔakɔna kĩ budeĩ kɔbɛ̃ bɔbɛ̃ ye mbɔɛɛ?

Babɔa lɛgbã kĩ, “Bɛkpa boe osi kĩ bɔkɛna lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa.” Fɔnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali, lɛmɛ nnɛ́ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa nɛnɛ lɛkpa boe. “Bɛkpa boe osi kĩ bɔkɛna lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa.” Lɛmɛ nnɛ́ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa deĩ nfasɔ lɛkpa boe.
Kɛtánɛ kĩ oti akɔna ye odi kalɛ, mbom kɛnɛ kĩ yakɔna bati bɛbã kalɛ akũ.
Mideĩ osi kĩ mianya sɛkɛna sidi nyɛ sidi kĩ banɔ nɛ kɔyaatɔ. Mitafɔ̃ fɔha mi tɔwɔlɛ ĩye mivia ntɛ se akũ kpalɛ ĩye sɛtákpalɛ.
Kitonɛkĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Baguma la katinya mɔ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ lideĩ nɛ ke kamɛ a.”
Ntɛ oti kĩ ɛnyɛ́ ɔtɛ odonɛ vɛ nɔ kĩ yaanya mɔ́ otunɔ ɔnaa ni, nya funitsã a kĩ ete opunu ɛkpa nɔ a, lɛmɛ tavia ye otse ntɛ foe akũ kpalɛ ĩye fɔtákpalɛ.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi bi nɔ kĩ, “Dã, bɛkɔa funitsã a na bɛbɔa afɔliɛ bɛkpa baviɔ̃” kekɔ̃ tanya foe nɛ ayekĩ fɔláaha oti a ɔwɔlɛ.
Kitonɛkĩ nnɛ́ nɔ a kĩ ɔnya a ɔwɔlɛ fɔ́aha, mbom fɔ́aha oti a kĩ ebi nɔ a. Odi aavia kĩ, “Nde sũ ntɛ ndeĩ osi kĩ makɛna litsedi mɔ fɔaha odi ɔwɔlɛ?
Ntɛ ĩnyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ nɛ funitsã a kĩ ɛkpa yĩ a akũ ni, nde sũ odi alɛ kɔdzɛla etia yĩ?”
Lɛmɛ mite anɛ kĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ miakɛna, ntɛ fɔnyɛ kanya ĩye kamɔa malo ni mikɛna foe mikɔa mimu Baguma.
Midzi nkpã ayekĩ miláavɛlɛ ɔhau adima mikpa Yudafɔ ĩye bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ mɔ be a kĩ bɛnyɛ Baguma asɔli bati a.
Mikɛna ndɛ ayekĩ nlamɛna kakɛna. Mbɔa mbɔdi kĩ makɛna lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa fuwo odi nyɛ odi anɛ. Maákɔna yĩ akũ mbom makɔna bati flee be tuwĩ akũ ayekĩ baana nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a.
Mikɔlɛ yĩ ɔbla mikɛna ndɛ ayekĩ yĩ malo makɔlɛ Kristo ɔbla kakɛna a.
Mamu mi nɛ ayekĩ mite anɛ nɛ yĩ akũ luwi daa mɔ ayekĩ mitomɔ fɔtsa flee a kĩ ntsa mi a.
Lɛmɛ mawɛ kĩ minyi kĩ Kristo nyɛ lɔlɔ ɛkpa odi nyɛ odi. Onyole nyɛ ɔtsɔ̃ lɔlɔ ade Baguma lɛmɛ nyɛ Kristo lɔlɔ a.
Foesũ ntɛ onyole kĩ yabɔa mpaɛ ĩye yalɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa nɛ asɔli kɔla kamɛ sua ye lɔlɔ ni, edo Kristo kɔnyɔã.
Lɛmɛ otsole kĩ yabɔa mpaɛ ĩye yalɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa nɛ asɔli kɔla kamɛ, tásui duku nɛ lɔlɔ ni, edo ɔnyɔ kɔnyɔã. Ntsitsemu lɛláa bɛmɔ otsole kĩ ɛkpa lɔlɔ tsɔlitsɔli kayite.
Ntɛ otsole tásui duku nɛ lɔlɔ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ ekpeli tɔlɔ. Lɛmɛ nɛ kĩ fɔnyɛ kɔnyɔã ntɛ otsole kpeli tɔlɔ ĩye ɛkpa lɔlɔ sũ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ esui duku nɛ lɔlɔ.
Fɔtásĩ kĩ onyole asua lɔlɔ kitonɛkĩ ɛla ndɛ Baguma kutitse mɔ ye kukũkpalɛ. Lɛmɛ otsole kɔ̃ nyɛ onyole kukũkpalɛ.
Kitonɛkĩ Baguma tábɔa onyole etomɛna otsole kamɛ, mbom ɛbɔa otsole etomɛna onyole kamɛ.
Bɛtábɔa onyole bɛkpa otsole nɛ ye otsole a kalɛ sũ, lɛmɛ bɛkɛna otsole bɛkpa nɛ onyole a kalɛ sũ.
Nɛ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ sũ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ otsole esui duku nɛ lɔlɔ ɛkɔa ɛtsa kĩ edeĩ nɛ ɔnyɔ kɔbɛ̃ kayɔ.
Titɔ kĩ fɔla lɔmɔ malo nɛ ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ boe Ɔlate sũ ni, otsole lídzi ye akũ akũ, ade onyole lɛmɛ lídzi ye akũ akũ a.
Kitonɛkĩ ndɛ ayekĩ bɛbɔa otsole bitomɛna onyole kamɛ a, ade aye a bɛma onyole bitomɛna otsole kamɛ a. Lɛmɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa to Baguma sɛkɛ̃.
Mi mɔawɛ mikɔna midã ntɛ fɔnɛnɛ kĩ otsole abɔa mpaɛ ɛkpa Baguma nɛ kanade, kĩ ɛtásui duku nɛ lɔlɔ.
Ayekĩ Baguma bɔa katinya kamɛ malo atsa boe litsedi kĩ fɔnyɛ kɔnyɔã ntɛ onyole deĩ lɔlɔ tɔlɔ gɛlɛɛlɛ.
Lɛmɛ tɔlɔ gɛlɛɛlɛ nyɛ akũ obu fɔkpa otsole. Bɛkpa ye tɔlɔ gɛlɛɛlɛ kĩ ɛkɔa ɛkɛɛlɛ ye akũ.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi awɛ kĩ yatɛ atsindze nɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ akũ ni, lɛtsa a kĩ maalɛ nɛ foe akũ nyɛ kĩ boe ĩye Baguma tɛsɔli a buki tɛlá amaniɛ bɛbã adima.
Nɛ kɔdɛ a kĩ makpa mi finyaa kamɛ ni, maámu mi kitonɛkĩ ntɛ mikpɔta kĩ miasum Baguma ni, miakɛna mi akũ tɔkpa kaba tuwĩ.
Kalɛ katɔnyade ni, nnu kĩ ntɛ mikpɔta ndɛ asɔli bati aye ni, miasɛ̃ mi akũ. Ntɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ fudi ndo.
Fusĩ kĩ kasɛ̃ kɛna nɛ mi kamɛ ayekĩ bɔ́amɔ yededeede bikĩ badi ɔnɔkɔali nɛ mi kamɛ.
Ntɛ mikpɔta nɛ kakɔ mɔa ni, nnɛ́ boe Ɔlate Funitsã kpalɛwa a mianya.
Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ mianya ni, odi nyɛ odi abɔɛ ye funitsã kanya. Fɔfɔ̃ badi lána kanya, ade badi lɛmɛ awuga bavɛ.
Milá tɔtɔ kĩ mianya mimɔa nɛ te kamɛ mbɔɛɛ? Kawɛ miawɛ kĩ miasupa Baguma asɔli a, mido ahiãfɔ kɔnyɔã lɛmɛ mbɔɛɛ? Litsa miwɛ kĩ mbi mi nɛ fukĩĩ akũ? Miwɛ kĩ mmu mi mbɔɛɛ? Oowo! Fukĩĩ kɔ̃ nláamu mi.
Kitonɛkĩ lɛtsa a kĩ ntɛ ntomɛna boe Ɔlate sɛkɛ̃ a, ade foe ntsa mi a. Lɛnyɛ a kĩ ke mɔ bɛnyɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu bɛkpa a, ɛbɔɛ abodoo,
ade ɛnyɛ kɔlɛ, ɛyɛlɛ ye ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ade yĩ sukɛna kĩ nkɔa mabɔa afɔliɛ nkpa mi a. Mikɛna fukĩĩ mikɔa mikai yĩ.”
Ade ayea kĩ bɛnya biyua a, ɛbɔɛ kɔɔpu ade ɛlɛ kĩ, “Kɔɔpu kĩĩ nyɛ nhihiɛ vɔɛ̃ kĩ bɛkɔa yĩ babɔanɛ bisui. Lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ kĩ miamɔa bavɛ kĩĩ ni, mikɛna foe mikai yĩ.”
Fɔatsa kĩ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ kĩ mianya abodoo, miamɔa bavɛ nɛ kɔɔpu kĩĩ kamɛ lɛmɛ ni, milamɛna lɛtsã kade nɛ boe Ɔlate wuda akũ, kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ yaabuki ɛya.
Foesũ ntɛ odi nya boe Ɔlate abodoo, ɛmɔa kɔɔpu kĩĩ nɛ osi kpa akũ ni, baakɔ ye kɔtɔ kĩ efum nɛ boe Ɔlate sukɛna mɔ ye babɔanɛ akũ.
Nɛ foesũ kɛnɛ kĩ odi nyɛ odi ɛkɔna ye ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ fɔmɔ yaanya funitsã, ɛmɔa bavɛ nɛ kɔɔpu a lɛmɛ kamɛ.
Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ odi táyi boe Ɔlate babɔanɛ mɔ sukɛna ɔsũ kĩ fɔnyɛ fɔtsa kpalɛwa fɔmɔ ɛnya ĩye ɛmɔa foe nɛ osi kpa akũ ni, ɛvɛlɛ kadzɛ eko nɛ ye akũ.
Ade foesũ mi pii miasɔ ade milá akũ ɔsĩ a. Mi kamɛ bati pii lɛmɛ ku.
Ntɛ bɔnya lɔtɔ bɔnaa boe tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ ni, Baguma lɛláadzɛmɔ boe.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ boe Ɔlate adzɛmɔ boe, ɛvɛlɛ boe sɔtɔ lɛmɛ ni, yalɔla boe ayekĩ Baguma lɛláakɔ bɔmɔ bikĩ bɛtátɛ bido a flee kɔtɔ ɛkpɔta.
Foesũ nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ntɛ miyakpɔta kĩ mianya ni, midzɔlɛ mi bawaɛ̃.
Ntɛ kɔlɛ akɔ odi ni, ɛnya nɛ kɔla ayekĩ ntɛ miyatsɛna nɛ Baguma kɔla kamɛ ni owula lɛláana kadzɛ ɛkpa ye akũ. Ntɛ ĩya ni, maadɛ mi nɛ fɔlɛtsa bɛbã a kĩ fute a akũ.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, finyaa ni mawɛ kĩ minu Hũhũ kamɛ futetsa a kĩ mitsɛlɛ mivia akũ fɔlɛtsa kayɔ a yededeede.
Minyina kĩ fɔmɔ midani mikɛna batɛ badonɛ a, mitsã tisi pii akũ ade mikɔa mi akũ mikpa baviɔ̃ kĩ báalɛ kɔdzɛla kasum a.
Foesũ mafɔ̃ minyi kĩ ntɛ odi kɔa Hũhũ Kpalɛwa kɔbɛ̃ yalɛ kɔdzɛla ni, ɛláalɛ kĩ, “Yesu, kɔa nɛ ke a!” ade odima lɛmɛ lɛláapuli ɛlɛ kĩ, “Yesu nyɛ boe Ɔlate,” ntɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa kɔbɛ̃ lɛláa ye kamɛ.
Futetsa futefute deĩ lɛmɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa mɔapɛ a lɛkpa foe flee.
Tisi pii deĩ kĩ te akũ bɔatsã kakɛna Baguma adzuma, lɛmɛ ade boe Ɔlate mɔapɛ a bɔasum a.
Ade ayea tisi pii deĩ kĩ Baguma atsã kakpa bati kɔbɛ̃ bakɛna fɔtsa, lɛmɛ Baguma mɔapɛ akpa kɔbɛ̃ a flee.
Baguma kɔa Hũhũ Kpalɛwa ɛtsã bati akũ bakɛna tuwĩ fɔnɛ libi fɔkpa bati flee.
Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a apuli kakpa oti mɔa kɔbɛ̃ ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ nyansã, ade Hũhũ Kpalɛwa mɔapɛ a akpa oti bɛbã lɛmɛ kɔbɛ̃ ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ kadikanyi a.
Hũhũ Kpalɛwa mɔapɛ a akpa oti mɔa katɛkado baũ. Ye mɔapɛ a yakpa oti bɛbã fɔsɔ katsa kɔbɛ̃.

Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a akpa oti bɛbã kɔbɛ̃ kĩ ɛkɛna awãwã fɔtsa, odi bɛbã lɛmɛ kĩ ɛnyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃. Yakpa oti mɔa kɔbɛ̃ kĩ epuli ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ tide ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ kamɛ, ade yakpa odi bɛbã lɛmɛ kɔbɛ̃ kĩ yapuli ɛnyɛ tide a kayɔ, oti bɛbã kɔbɛ̃ kĩ epuli enyi ntɛ futetsa kĩĩ to Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a sɛkɛ̃ ĩye fɔtáto ye sɛkɛ̃.
Hũhũ Kpalɛwa mɔapɛ kĩĩ a akɛna fɔtsa a flee, ade yakpa odi nyɛ odi futetsa ndɛ ayekĩ yawɛ a.
Otidziwa kutitse a deĩ akũ fɔkɔ futefute, lɛmɛ foe flee fɔnyɛ oti mɔapɛ. Titɔ kĩ kuti a deĩ akũ fɔtsa pii malo ni, foe flee fɔkɛna oti mɔa. Ade aye Kristo lɛmɛ la a.

Boe badi bɔnyɛ Yudafɔ ade badi lɛmɛ nyɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a. Badi nyɛ basate ade badi lɛmɛ dzi be akũ akũ a. Lɛmɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a wɔla boe flee mui nɛ Kristo kamɛ, bɔkɛna ɔmɔa nɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa mɔapɛ a kamɛ. Boe flee bɔtɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa mɔapɛ a mui bɔmɔa.
Kitonɛkĩ otidziwa kutitse a lɛnyɛ́ fɔtsa fɔmɔapɛ, mbom kudeĩ fɔkɔ ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ.
Ntɛ kɔbɔa lɛ kĩ, “Nnɛ́ awɛ manɛ sũ ĩnyɛ́ kutitse a sɛkɛ sidima” a, foe kalɛ lɔmɔ lɛláafɔ̃ kĩ kɔbɔa buki kɔnyɛ́ kutitse a sɛkɛ sidi.
Ntɛ sɔtɔ lɛmɛ lɛ kĩ, “Nnɛ́ linebi manɛ sũ ĩnyɛ kutitse a sɛkɛ sidima,” foe kalɛ lɔmɔ lɛláafɔ̃ kĩ sɔtɔ buki sɛnyɛ́ kuti a sɛkɛ sidi.
Ntɛ kutitse a flee nyɛ linebi odi ni, kɔláapuli kunu fɔkɔ. Ntɛ kutitse a flee nyɛ sɔtɔ odi ni, kɔláapuli kɔtɛ fɔtsa nfiã.
Lɛmɛ Baguma bɔa boe kutitse mɔ foe akũ ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ, ade edo fudi nyɛ fudi nɛ awã kĩ yawɛ a.
Nde otidziwa kuti a aana ndɛ akũ fɔtsa mɔapɛ fɔanɛ?
Oti akũ fɔkɔ futefute deĩ lɛmɛ kutitse mɔapɛ kɔanɛ.
Foesũ linebi lɛláapuli libi awɛ kĩ, “Ntásĩ nɔ!” Lɔlɔ lɛmɛ lɛláapuli libi sɛnɛta kĩ, “Ntásĩ nɔ!”
Oti akũ fɔkɔ a kĩ fɔadã ndɛ fɔlá akũ ɔsĩ a, ade foe mbom akũ lisĩ boe a.
Ade ke fɔkɔ a kĩ bɔakɔna kĩ fɔtátɛ kɔya a, ade foe bɔakpa obu kaba a. Fukĩ fɔálɛ kadã a, ade foe bɔakɔla kaba a.
Boe akũ fɔkɔ a kĩ fɔalɛ kadã a tásĩ akũ kadãmɛna. Baguma awɛ boomu akũ fɔkɔ a flee ade edo obu nɛ fukĩ obu lɛláa foe akũ,
ayekĩ boe kutitse a lɛláasɛ̃ koe akũ. Baguma wɛ kĩ fɔkɔ futefute a fɔdãmɛna fɔkɔba akũ pɛpɛɛpɛ.
Ntɛ oti kakɔ kadi asɔ ni, fɔkɔ nkaɛ a lɛmɛ amɔ lubo kabumɔ foe. Ntɛ bido kakɔ kadi anunyam ni, fɔkɔ nkaɛ a lɛmɛ amɔ kawɔlɛ kabumɔ foe.
Finyaakĩĩ mi a flee mikpɔta minyɛ Kristo kutitse a, ade mi kamɛ odi nyɛ odi nyɛ kutitse a sɛkɛ sĩwa sidi a.

Baguma kɔa badi ɛdzɛla nɛ ye batɛ badonɛ onukpɛ̃. Bɛkɔa kadzakɔ̃ katɔnyade bɛkpa fɔtɔ banyanɛ, kayade bɛkpa bikĩ bɛnyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ, ade kalalɛde a naa fɔtsa batsanɛ sɛkɛ̃ a. Ke liti Baguma kɔa kadzakɔ̃ bɛbã ɛkpa bikĩ bakɛna awãwã fɔtsa, bikĩ bideĩ kɔbɛ̃ kĩ batsa fɔsɔ, bikĩ babumɛna bati, bikĩ banya bati lɔtɔ nɛ tudzuma kakɛna kamɛ, mɔ bikĩ balɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ tide ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ kamɛ.
Nnɛ́ bati flee nyɛ fɔtɔ banyanɛ ĩye kĩ bɛnyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ ĩye fɔtsa batsanɛ. Ade nnɛ́ bati flee deĩ kɔbɛ̃ kĩ bakɛna awãwã fɔtsa a.
Nnɛ́ bati flee deĩ kɔbɛ̃ kĩ batsa fɔsɔ, ĩye balɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ tide ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ kamɛ ĩye banyɛ tide a kayɔ.
Nɛ foe flee kamɛ a, mitomɔ futetsa a kĩ fɔtɛ kɔya fɔba flee a liti.
Lɛmɛ finyaakĩĩ maatsa mi fukĩ fɔbɛ̃ a flee.
Ntɛ mapuli kalɛ batidziwa mɔ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ flee tide, mɔ bati kawɛ lɛláa yĩ kamɛ ni, kekɔ̃ yĩ kɔdzɛla kalɛ la ndɛ lɔwɔda ĩye ɔdɔũ kĩ yanɛ kɔɔba kasĩna atɔ.
Ntɛ ndeĩ kɔbɛ̃ kĩ manyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃, ĩye ĩnyina fɔtsa kɔlawa mɔ kadikanyi flee, ĩye ntɛ ndeĩ katɛkado kĩ maapuli ndzɛla ɔtɔ nɛ ye kadzakɔ̃, mɔ́ bati kawɛ lɛláa yĩ kamɛ ni, kekɔ̃ ĩnyɛ́ lɛtsama.
Ntɛ nkɔa yĩ akũ fɔtsa flee nte ahiãfɔ, ĩye ntɛ nkɔa yĩ akũ mbɔa afɔliɛ kĩ bipila mɔ ntɛ bati kawɛ lɛláa yĩ kamɛ ni, nlá nfasɔ adima.
Ɔdɔ deĩ ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ edeĩ sɛmɛ kalɛ lɛmɛ. Ɔdɔ lɛlá anɛngbã, yaátui ɔwɔlɛ ade yaáta akũ lɛmɛ a.
Ɔdɔ lákɛna fɔnyɔãtsa, yaáwɛ ye odi fude, yaána kalɔkpa, ade yaápi tɔkpa kado nɛ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ a.
Ɔdɔ lámɔ kawɔlɛ nɛ tɔkpa akũ, mbom yamɔ kawɔlɛ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ kamɛ.
Akpɔ láveli ɔdɔ, yaákpa lɔlɔ nɛ ye katɛkado kamɛ, edeĩ kɔnɛte luwi nyɛ luwi ade yadza pintii nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɛ a.
Ɔdɔ lɛlá kawũna da. Baguma onukpɛ̃ kanyɛ aayatɛ̃, kɔdzɛla kalɛ nɛ tide ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ kamɛ mɔ kadikanyi deĩ, lɛmɛ lɔkɔ aaya kĩ foe flee fɔ́atsua,
kitonɛkĩ boe kadikanyi mɔ boe Baguma onukpɛ̃ kanyɛ a lɛmɛ tákpɔla fuyua a.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔkpɔla yawo ɔtɔ ni, futetsa kĩĩ flee aatɛ̃.
Lɔkɔ a kĩ nna nɛ tibisɛ̃ kamɛ a, nlɛ kɔdzɛla, mbɔɛ adzuni, mbu lɔlɔ kamɛ ndɛ obisɛ̃ aye. Lɛmɛ kĩ mbo anɛ ndani ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ ni, nfɔnɛ tibisɛ̃ kamɛ fɔtsa flee awɛ.

Finyaakĩĩ bɔamɔ fɔtsa futufutu ndɛ ayekĩ fɔla nɛ ahuhɔɛ kamɛ. Lɛmɛ ke liti ni bɔ́ayamɔ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa anɛ mɔ anɛ. Lɛtsa a kĩ ĩnyina finyaa ni, fɔtákpɔla fuyua, lɛmɛ liti maamɔ foe yededeede ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma nyina yĩ a.
Nɛ foe kamɛ a, fɔtsa ɛlalɛ deĩ kĩ foe kɔ̃ fɔ́awa daa. Ade foe nyɛ katɛkado, kɔnɛte mɔ ɔdɔ, lɛmɛ fukĩ fɔbɛ̃ flee nyɛ ɔdɔ.
Foesũ ɔdɔ ɛnya fɔtsa a kĩ foe liti míatomɛna mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ, lɛmɛ miwɛ hũhũ kamɛ futetsa liti osi, titiliwu Baguma onukpɛ̃ kanyɛ.
Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ odi deĩ kɔbɛ̃ kĩ yalɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ tide ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ kamɛ ni bɛmɔ Baguma odi alɛ kɔdzɛla, lɛmɛ nnɛ́ bɛmɔ bati kitonɛkĩ bɛláanu foe kayɔ. Fɔnyɛ fɔlɛtsa kɔlawa kĩ futo Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a sɛkɛ̃.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi nyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ni, yabi bati kalɛ ade yabumɔ be, yado be kɔbɛ̃, kadɔla be tɔwɔlɛ lɛmɛ.
Oti kĩ yalɛ kalɛ nɛ tide ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ kamɛ kĩ bati lánu foe kayɔ ni, ye odi akũ yabumɛna. Lɛmɛ odi kĩ ɛnyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ni, yabumɛna batɛ badonɛ a flee.

Nwɛ kĩ mipuli milɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ tide ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ kamɛ, lɛmɛ ntɛ mipuli minyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ni fɔnɛnɛ fɔbɛ̃. Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ odi nyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ni, ebumɔ asɔli bati a ɛba odi kĩ yalɛ tide ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ, mbɔɛntɛ odi bɛbã nyɛ foe kayɔ fɔnya kabumɛna fɔkpa bati a flee.

Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ntɛ ĩya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ ĩyalɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ tide ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ kamɛ kĩ odima tánu foe kayɔ a ni, nfasɔ wɔdabe deĩ nɛ foe kamɛ fɔkpa mi? Lɛmɛ ntɛ nkɔa kanyɛkatsa kadi, kadikanyi kadi, Baguma onukpɛ̃ kanyɛ kadi ĩye kadikanyi, Baguma fɔlɛtsa, fɔtsa katsa fudi mma mi ni, ade foe aakpa mi kabumɛna a.
Ade aye kagbulɛɛ ĩye ɔsankuo, titɔ kĩ fɔlá nkpã malo ni, foe odo deĩ. Ntɛ bɛtávɔ̃ ĩye bɛbɔa foe nɛ osi odi akũ ni, ndɛ baakɛna biyi odo a ɔsũ?
Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ oti a kĩ yavɔ̃ kagbulɛɛ távɔ̃ ke kavɔ̃ wĩ ni, nde kawũ banɔnɛ aakɛna binyi kĩ bɛpai be bɛkpa kawũkanɔ?
Ade ayea ntɛ ɔlɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ tide bɛbã kamɛ ni, nde bati aakɛna binu nɔ fɔlɛtsa a kayɔ? Fɔatsa kĩ ɔlɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ ɔwɛ kamɛ.
Tide ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ deĩ nɛ katinya kamɛ, ade te flee tideĩ kayɔ kanu a.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi lánu yĩ tide ni, ndani oti kĩ mapɔtɔ nkpa ye, ade ke ye malo ɛdani ɔpɔtɔni ɛkpa yĩ a.
Nɛ kĩ miawɛ kĩ miana hũhũ kamɛ futetsa mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ sũ ni, mivia Baguma ɛkpa mi fukĩ fɔ́anya kabumɛna fɔkpa asɔli bati a flee.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ edeĩ kɔbɛ̃ kĩ yalɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ tide ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ kamɛ ni, eke Baguma aduli ɛkpa ye foe kayɔkanyɛ kɔbɛ̃ lɛmɛ, lɔkɔa ɛnyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ de ɛlɛ a kayɔ yededeede.
Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ mbɔa mpaɛ nɛ tide ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ kamɛ ni, yĩ hũhũ kɔ̃ bɔa mpaɛ lɛmɛ yĩ adzuni lɛláa foe kamɛ.
Foesũ litsa kɛnɛ kĩ nkɛna? Maabɔa mpaɛ nɛ hũhũ kamɛ ade maabɔa mpaɛ lɛmɛ nɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩ manu foe kayɔ kamɛ a. Maasã tɔnɔ nɛ hũhũ kamɛ ade maasã tɔnɔ lɛmɛ mɔ fɔlɛtsa kĩ manu foe kayɔ a kamɛ.
Ntɛ amu Baguma nɛ hũhũ kamɛ ni, nde oti a kĩ ɛtánu nɔ fɔlɛtsa kayɔ nɛ katsɛnakɔ̃ a aapuli etunɔ kĩ, “Fɔya lɔmɔ” nɛ nɔ kɔlɛ kanyɛ a onukpɛ̃?
Ntɛ nɔ kɔlɛkanyɛ mpaɛbɔ a nɛnɛ malo ni, fɔtábumɛna oti bɛbã nɛ osi odima akũ.
Manyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ kĩ mapuli kalɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ tide ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ kamɛ kaba mi kamɛ odi nyɛ odi.
Lɛmɛ nɛ boe katsɛna kamɛ ni, mawɛ kĩ malɛ fɔlɛtsa sukuloo kĩ bati aanu foe kayɔ bɛkɔa bɛkɔlɛ fɔtsa, kɛba kĩ maalɛ fɔlɛtsa pii nɛ tide bɛbã kamɛ.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mitato tibisɛ̃ nɛ mi kakɔna kamɛ. Mikɛna ndɛ babisɛ̃ ntɛ fɔnyɛ tɔkpa lɛmɛ mibo anɛ nɛ kadikanyi kamɛ.
Bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ,
“Maalɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ yĩ kade bati
ntsã bati kĩ balɛ tide ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ akũ.
Ade maabi be kalɛ ntomɛna banɔvɔɛ̃ tunukpɛ̃,
lɛmɛ bɛláatse yĩ kalɛ.”

Foesũ miamɔ kĩ kɔdzɛla kalɛ nɛ tide ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ kamɛ nyɛ nsɛntsɛlɛni fɔkpa bikĩ bɛtátɛ bido, nnɛ́ bikĩ bɛtɛ bido a. Lɛmɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ kanyɛ nyɛ nsɛntsɛlɛni ɛkpa bikĩ bɛtɛ bido a, nnɛ́ bikĩ bɛtátɛ bido a.
Foesũ ntɛ asɔli bati flee tsɛna mɔ odi nyɛ odi lamɛna kɔdzɛla kalɛ nɛ tide ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ kamɛ, mɔ fɔya kĩ bati pupulidza ĩye bikĩ bɛtátɛ bido deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ a, nnɛ́ kalɛ baalɛ kĩ mi fɔlɔ kamɛ bu kade?
Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi nyɛ odi lamɛna Baguma onukpɛ̃ kanyɛ mɔ oti pulidza ĩye ekĩ ɛtátɛ edo ya nɛ awã ni, lɛtsa kĩ yanu aafɔ̃ ɛdani ye ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ. Fɔlɛtsa a kĩ yanu a aadzɛmɔ ye,
ade lɛtsa kĩ ɛkɔa ɛkɔla nɛ ye kamɛ aanɛ fɔwa pefee a. Yaadɔla ye akũ emu Baguma ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔali, Baguma deĩ nɛ boe kamɛ nɛ awĩ.”

Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ade fukĩĩ mawɛ kĩ mikɛna a. Ntɛ mitsɛna kĩ miasum Baguma ni, mi kamɛ odi deĩ kĩ yasã ɔnɔ, odi atsa fɔtsa, odi deĩ kanyɛkatsa kĩ futo Baguma sɛkɛ̃, odi alɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ tide bɛbã kamɛ, ade odi lɛmɛ anyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bɛlɛ a kayɔ a. Kɛnɛ kĩ miakɛna lɛtsa a kĩ fɔado asɔli bati a flee kɔbɛ̃.
Ntɛ odi aalɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ tide bɛbã kamɛ ni, bati nviã ĩye be ɛlalɛ bɛlɛ bitomɔ akũ, lɛmɛ kɛnɛ kĩ oti bɛbã anyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bɛlɛ a kayɔ.
Ntɛ odima lɛláa kĩ yaanyɛ foe kayɔ ni, kekɔ̃ oti a kĩ yalɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ tide bɛbã kamɛ a ɛkɛna dĩĩ ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla ɛkpa ye akũ mɔ Baguma.
Bati nviã ĩye be ɛlalɛ bɛnyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ lɔkɔa bati nkaɛ a bɛsa fɔlɛtsa a kĩ baalɛ a kamɛ.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi deĩ nɛ katsɛnakɔ̃ kĩ ɛtɛ kanyɛkatsa etomɛna Baguma sɛkɛ̃ ni, owula kĩ ɛlamɛna kɔdzɛla kalɛ a ɛfɔ̃ kalɛ.
Mi a flee míapuli milɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa ɔmɔa ɔmɔa ayekĩ odi nyɛ odi aakɔlɛ fɔtsa ɛkɔa foe edo ye akũ kɔbɛ̃.
Bikĩ banyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ a bipuli bipi be akũ nɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ balɛ a kamɛ,
kitonɛkĩ Baguma táwɛ kĩ bɔna nɛ ɔtutũ kamɛ mbom budzi nɛ ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ lukudɔ kamɛ.
Ade aye kɛnɛ kĩ fɔna nɛ Baguma tɛsɔli a flee kamɛ a.
Kɛnɛ kĩ batsole bɛkɛna dĩĩ nɛ fɔtsɛnakɔ̃. Bɛtákpa be osi kĩ balɛ kɔdzɛla, ade Yudafɔ mbla lɛmɛ tsa kĩ bɛtanya lɔtɔ nɛ adzuma adima kamɛ a.
Ntɛ bɛwɛ kĩ banyi litsedi kamɛ ni bivia be banyɔ nɛ kɔla. Fɔnyɛ kɔnyɔã fɔkpa otsole kĩ yalɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ batɛ badonɛ katsɛnakɔ̃ a.
Mi sɛkɛ̃ Baguma kalɛ a nɛ kito mbɔɛɛ? Mbɔɛɛ kĩ mi odi bɛkɔa ke bɛma?
Ntɛ mi kamɛ odi kɔna kĩ ɛnyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ, ĩye edeĩ hũhũ kamɛ futetsa ni, enyi kĩ lɛtsa a kĩ ntsɛlɛ mamɛna mi a nyɛ boe Ɔlate mbla kĩ ɛkpa.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi tátse fukĩĩ ni, mi malo mitatse ye kalɛ.
Foesũ nwaɛ̃ amɛ, fɔnya mi kawɛ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ mianyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃, lɛmɛ mitasua bikĩ balɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ tide ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ kamɛ a osi.
Kɛnɛ kĩ miakɛna lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa nɛ de osi akũ mɔ obu kamɛ.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, nwɛ kĩ mate mi anɛ nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a kĩ nde lɛtsa nkpa mi a akũ. Mitɛ ɔlɛdo a mido ade mi katɛkado dzɛ̃ nɛ foe akũ pintii a.
Ade fɔlɛtsa wĩ a kĩ nde foe akũ lɛtsã nkpa mi a. Míana katɛ ntɛ mipi fɔlɛtsa wĩ kĩĩ midomɔ akũ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ, ntɛ nnɛ́ aye ni, kekɔ̃ katɛ mitɛ mido pupulidza.
Fɔlɛtsa titiliwu a kĩ ntɛ a, ade foe nkɔa nkpa mi a. Ade foe nyɛ kĩ Kristo ku nɛ boe tɔkpa lɔlɔ, ndɛ ayekĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ a.
Bibila ye ade ke nɛ luwi lɛlalɛde akũ ni, Baguma dzɛla ye edzi nkpã ndɛ ayekĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ a.
Ɛnyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa Petro, mɔ fɔtɔ banyanɛ ewua-nviã a flee.
Ke liti a, ɛnyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa bikĩ bitomɔ ye kĩ bɛbɛ̃ bati ɔha elo nɛ lɔkɔ mɔa kamɛ, ade be kamɛ badi pii dzi nkpã kɛyawo nviã kĩĩ lɛmɛ be pii tɛ̃ kuwa liti.
Ɛyanyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa Yakobo, ade ke liti ɛnyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa fɔtɔ banyanɛ a flee a.
Nɛ ke kawũna a, ɛnyɛ ye akũ ɛtsa yĩ malo, titɔ kĩ nkɛna ndɛ oti kĩ bɛtáma ye nɛ lɔkɔ wĩ kamɛ.
Kitonɛkĩ yĩ nyɛ obisɛ̃ kɔlaa nɛ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kamɛ, ade ntáfɛta nkpa kĩ bavɛ yĩ fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ malo, kitonɛkĩ ntomɔ Baguma asɔli bati a liti.

Lɛmɛ nɛ kĩ Baguma mɔ yĩ kɔnya sũ ni, ɛkɛna yĩ oti a kĩ ye manɛ finyaakĩĩ. Ye kɔnyakamɔ kĩĩ tákɛna fɔtsa pupulidza. Nkɛna adzuma paa mba fɔtɔ banyanɛ bɛbã a, kĩ nnɛ́ yĩ mɔawɛ kɔbɛ̃ nkɔa nkɛna, mbom Baguma kɔnyakamɔ a libumɔ yĩ.
Foesũ ntɛ fɔlɛtsa a to yĩ sɛkɛ̃ o-o, futo be sɛkɛ̃ o-o, ade foe akũ boe flee bɔade lɛtsã a. Fɔnyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ mi malo mitɛ mido.
Finyaakĩĩ boe ɔlɛdo nyɛ kĩ Baguma dzɛla Kristo etomɛna kanɔkpa. Nde sũ mi kamɛ badi alɛ kĩ bɛláadzɛla banɔkpa bidzi nkpã?
Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ banɔkpa láyidza ni, kekɔ̃ fɔatsa kĩ Kristo táyidza.
Ntɛ Baguma ɛtadzɛla Kristo eto kanɔkpa ni, kekɔ̃ bɔlá lɛtsama kĩ bɔade lɛtsã nɛ de akũ, ade mi malo lɛtsama lɛláa kĩ miatɛ mido a.
Lɛtsa a kĩ lɛbɛ̃ nyɛ kĩ fɔadã ndɛ bɔma fɔvã bɔate nɛ Baguma akũ, kitonɛkĩ bɔlɛ kĩ ɛdzɛla Kristo etomɛna kanɔkpa. Lɛmɛ ntɛ ɔnɔkɔali fɔanɛ kĩ banɔkpa lɛláayidza ni, kekɔ̃ Baguma tádzɛla Kristo.
Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ Baguma ɛtadzɛla banɔkpa ni, ade aye a ɛtádzɛla Kristo lɛmɛ a.
Ntɛ Baguma ɛtadzɛla Kristo ni, kekɔ̃ mi katɛkado nyɛ ɔwɛ kamɛ fɔtsa ade ke míabuki mina nɛ mi tɔkpa kamɛ a.
Foe kayɔ lɛmɛ atsa kĩ bikĩ bɛtɛ Kristo bido fɔmɔ biku ni, bɛtána katɛ.
Ntɛ boe anɛ teĩ nɛ Kristo akũ fɔkpa katinya kĩĩ odi kɔ̃ ni, kekɔ̃ boe akũ akɔ kɔnya paa kaba odi nyɛ odi nɛ katinya flee kamɛ.
Lɛmɛ kalɛ ɔnɔkɔali a nyɛ kĩ Baguma dzɛla Kristo etomɛna kanɔkpa ade fɔnyɛ kasipi kĩ bikĩ biku a ni, yaadzɛla be malo.
Kitonɛkĩ ndɛ ayekĩ wuda tsã oti akũ ɛya nɛ katinya kamɛ a, ade aye bati kayidza kato kanɔkpa lɛmɛ tsã oti akũ a.
Ndɛ ayekĩ bati flee aaku nɛ kĩ bɛnɛ bito Adam kamɛ sũ a, ade ayea Baguma aadzɛla bati flee nɛ ayekĩ bɛkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Kristo sũ a.
Lɛmɛ Baguma aadzɛla odi nyɛ odi nɛ ye nhihiɛ a kĩ ɛkɛna eyi akũ. Kristo nyɛ oti ɔtɔnyade, ke liti lɔkɔ a kĩ yaabuki ɛya a, yaadzɛla bikĩ bɛnyɛ ye bade a.
Ke liti a, katinya kawũna aaya. Kristo aanya hũhũ flee kɔbɛ̃, katinya kamɛ otumifɔ mɔ bikĩ bideĩ kɔbɛ̃ akũ, lɔkɔa ɛkɔa lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a edo nɛ Baguma boe Ɔlɛga awɛ.
Kɛnɛ kĩ Kristo ɛnya lɛgã kɛnawo kĩ Baguma nya bakesĩnɛ flee akũ, ɛkɔa ye abɔa ete nɛ be akũ.
Okesĩnɛ nkaɛ kĩ Baguma aanya ye akũ nyɛ wuda.

Kitonɛkĩ bɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ, “Baguma fɔ̃ ɛkɔa ye abɔa ete nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa akũ.” Fɔwaa yedede kĩ ntɛ bɛlɛ kĩ “lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa” a, fɔátsa kĩ Baguma awɛ a kĩ ɛfɔ̃ Kristo kɔa abɔa ete nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa akũ a tsɛka nɛ foe kamɛ.

Lɛmɛ ntɛ bɛkɔa lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa bido nɛ Kristo lɛgãkanya kayɔ ni, ye mɔawɛ kĩ ɛnyɛ Obi a, aakɔa ye akũ edo nɛ Baguma a kĩ ɛkɔa lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa edo nɛ ye kayɔ a kayɔ. Baguma aanya lɛgã nɛ fɔtsa flee akũ.

Finyaakĩĩ, nde nyɛ bikĩ bɛkɛna be mui kawɔla amaniɛ nɛ bikĩ biku lɔlɔ a? Litsa nyɛ likĩ baamɔ nɛ foe kamɛ? Ntɛ ɔnɔkɔali fɔanɛ ndɛ ayekĩ badi alɛ kĩ Baguma lɛláadzɛla bati bidzi nkpã a, nde sũ bɛfɔ̃ bɛkɛna boe be mui kawɔla amaniɛ?
Nde sũ boe fɔtɔ banyanɛ a malo budeĩ nɛ nkpã mɔ wuda kayite lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ?
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ndeĩ nɛ wuda awɛ kamɛ luwi daa. Mapia nɛ mi akũ nɛ kĩ bɔkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo sũ. Ade foe lɛfɔ̃ manyɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kanya a.
Ntɛ fɔnyɛ otidziwa kakɔna onukpɛ̃ sũ mɔ nvũ lɛma mɔ bayaɛ kpa kĩ bɛla ndɛ bati aye nɛ Efeso nɛ awĩ ni, litsa nfasɔ nna? Lɛmɛ ntɛ bɛláadzɛla banɔkpa bidzi nkpã ni, kekɔ̃ fuketi mɔ kalɛ a kĩ balɛ kĩ,
“Mifɔ̃ bɔnya bɔmɔa,
kitonɛkĩ kunya bɔ́aku.”
Mitafɔ̃ bɛkɛ mi. “Tɔkɔbato abula oti kĩ edeĩ ɔbla wĩ kade.”
Milɔla adzuni wĩ kabɔɛ, lɔkɔa mifɔ̃ tɔkpa kakɛna. Mabi mi kĩ kɔnyɔã fɔanɛ fɔkpa mi kĩ mi kamɛ badi linyína Baguma.
Odi aavia kĩ, “Nde banɔkpa aapuli biyidza bidzi nkpã? Sukɛna sɔwɔdabe odu baana?”
Odzimbifɔ anɛ! Ntɛ odu kutse libi, libi a lɛláamɛ ntɛ lɛtávɔ̃ nɛ tite kamɛ.
Lɛtsa kĩ odu a nyɛ kutse libi pupulidza, ndɛ ligbanɔbi ĩye fudutsa bɛbã. Fɔnyɛ́ kutse munumunu kĩ ɔbɔɛ odu fɔanɛ.
Baguma kpa kutse libi a na sukɛna a kĩ yawɛ, ade ɛkpa libi nyɛ libi de sukɛna a.
Fɔtsa kĩ fudzi nkpã flee lɛlá sukɛna mɔa odu, batidziwa deĩ be sukɛna odu, bayaɛ deĩ be side, kɔvɔlabi deĩ be side, ade kɔfɔabi lɛmɛ deĩ be side a.
Ode kamɛ fɔtsa deĩ be sukɛna, fɔmɔ tite akũ fɔtsa lɛmɛ deĩ be sukɛna. Ayekĩ ode kamɛ bati alɛ kadã a vɛmɛna nɛ ayekĩ tite akũ bati alɛ kadã a akũ.
Suwa deĩ se kakpalɛ, odetɔ deĩ ye kakpalɛ. Fusibii lɛmɛ deĩ foe kakpalɛ lite lɛmɛ nɛ foe kamɛ malo fudeĩ foe kakpalɛ futefute.
Ade limii fɔ́ana ntɛ Baguma aadzɛla banɔkpa bidzi nkpã a. Ntɛ bibila ɔnɔkpa ni, sukɛna a aavɔ̃, lɛmɛ ntɛ bɛdzɛla ye ni ɛláabuki eku.
Ntɛ bibila sukɛna a ni, saálɛ kadã ade sɛlá ɔsĩ a. Lɛmɛ ntɛ bɛdzɛla ye ni, yaalɛ kadã, ɛna kɔbɛ̃ lɛmɛ.
Ntɛ bibila ɔnɔkpa ni, ɛnyɛ sukɛna pupulidza, lɛmɛ ntɛ bɛdzɛla ye ni, yaana hũhũ kamɛ sukɛna. Fɔwaa pefee kĩ oti sukɛna deĩ ade hũhũ kamɛ sukɛna lɛmɛ deĩ a.
Kitonɛkĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Baguma bɔa oti ɔtɔnyade a kĩ ɛnyɛ Adam ndɛ otidziwa aye.” Lɛmɛ Adam nkaɛ a nyɛ Hũhũ kĩ yakpa nkpã.
Nnɛ́ hũhũ a lɛnya lɔtɔ ɛya, mbom otidziwa a ya fɔmɔ hũhũ a lɛmɛ yaya.
Baguma bɔa Adam ɔtɔnyade a etomɛna tite kamɛ, lɛmɛ Adam ɔyade a kɔ̃ to ode.
Bati a kĩ bɛnyɛ katinya kamɛ bade a la ndɛ oti a kĩ bɛbɔa ye bitomɛna tite kamɛ a. Bikĩ bɛnyɛ ode bade lɛmɛ la ndɛ okĩ eto ode a aye.
Ndɛ ayekĩ budeĩ nɛ ekĩ bɛbɔa bitomɛna tite kamɛ kutitse odu kamɛ a, ade aye bɔ́ana nɛ Otidziwa a kĩ eto ode kutitse a kamɛ a.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, lɛtsa kĩ matsa nyɛ kĩ lɛtsa kĩ lideĩ sukɛna mɔ babɔanɛ ni, lɛláapuli lɛna kanyakɔ̃ nɛ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ. Lɛtsa a kĩ laaku ni, lɛláapuli lɛna nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔláawɔ a kamɛ.

Mitse ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ kĩĩ kĩ bɛkɔa bɛkɔla boe. Nnɛ́ boe flee aaku, lɛmɛ ntɛ bɛvɔ̃ kagbulɛɛ nkaɛ a ni, boe flee bɔ́adani deedimɔapɛ. Fɔ́aya nɛ sinepo kabɔa mɔa kamɛ. Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ bɛvɔ̃ kagbulɛɛ a pɛ, Baguma aadzɛla banɔkpa flee lɔkɔa bɛláabuki biku dadaada, yaadani be bɛkɛna bati vɔɛ̃.

Mitse ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ kĩĩ kĩ bɛkɔa bɛkɔla boe. Nnɛ́ boe flee aaku, lɛmɛ ntɛ bɛvɔ̃ kagbulɛɛ nkaɛ a ni, boe flee bɔ́adani deedimɔapɛ. Fɔ́aya nɛ sinepo kabɔa mɔa kamɛ. Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ bɛvɔ̃ kagbulɛɛ a pɛ, Baguma aadzɛla banɔkpa flee lɔkɔa bɛláabuki biku dadaada, yaadani be bɛkɛna bati vɔɛ̃.
Kitonɛkĩ lɛtsa kĩ laabu kade ni, kɛnɛ kĩ lɛdani lɛkɛna lɛtsa kĩ lɛláabu kade, ade lɛtsa a kĩ laaku ni, kɛnɛ kĩ lɛdani lɛkɛna lɛtsa kĩ lɛláaku.
Foesũ ntɛ fɔya kĩ lɛtsa a kĩ laapuli libu kade dani lɛkɛna lɛtsa a kĩ lɛláabu kade ni, lɔkɔa fɔlɛtsa nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ aaya nɛ foe kamɛ kĩ, “Bɛwɔla wuda, bɛnya ye akũ.”
“Wuda, nde nɔ anunyam a kĩ odeĩ a?
Nde nɔ kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ ɔnɛɛ apila boe a?”
Wuda tɛ ye kɔbɛ̃ kĩ ɛnɛɛ yapila boe a etomɛna titikpa kakɛna kamɛ, ade titikpa kakɛna lɛmɛ tɛ te kɔbɛ̃ titomɛna mbla a kamɛ a.
Lɛmɛ bɔanyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ kĩ ɛkpa boe anunyam ɛtsãmɛna boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo akũ.

Foesũ, nwaɛ̃ amɛ kĩ maátunɔ kalɛ, midza pintii, mitakpã nɛ mi adzuma kakɛna kamɛ. Midanɛ boe Ɔlate adzuma kakɛna, kitonɛkĩ minyina kĩ adzuma adi nyɛ adi kĩ mikɛna lɛnyɛ́ adzuma pupulidza ɛkpa boe Ɔlate.
Finyaakĩĩ, nɛ sika a kĩ miawɛ kĩ miate mikɔa mibumɛna Baguma bati nɛ Yudea a akũ ni, mikɛna ndɛ ayekĩ mbi Galatiafɔ batɛ badonɛ kutsu a kĩ bɛkɛna a.
Ɛkwansieda nyɛ́ Ɛkwansieda ni, mi kamɛ odi nyɛ odi ɛmanɛ sika nɛ ye kɔtɔkase onukpɛ̃ eyi, lɔkɔa ntɛ ĩya ni, fɔláasĩ kĩ miate tɔgɔlɛ.
Ntɛ ĩya ni, maakpa bati a kĩ mite awɛ nɛ be akũ a tuvoli, lɔkɔa bɛkɔa mi futetsa bɛnamɛna Yerusalem.
Ntɛ fɔ́asĩ kĩ yĩ malo nnaa ni, bɔmɔ be bɔ́atsã kɔbɔa mɔa.
Maatsã Makedonia kamɛ fɔmɔ maaya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃, kitonɛkĩ nke otse kĩ maatsã awã lɛmɛ.
Ɔsa maana nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ sukuloo nɛ osili lɔkɔ flee a, lɔkɔa ntɛ madzakũ ni, míapuli mibumɔ yĩ nɛ yĩ osi akũ kanaa kamɛ nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ.
Ntáwɛ kĩ yĩ kasɛla a fɔdã lukũ lɔkɔa ntɛ̃ nnaa lɔtɔ. Nwɛ kĩ mana nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ lɔkɔ gɛlɛɛlɛ ntɛ boe Ɔlate kpa osi.
Maadzi nɛ Efeso nɛ awĩ kɛnaawo Pentekoste luwi a akũ,
kitonɛkĩ osi waa paa ɛkpa adzuma sĩwa baũ kakɛna nɛ awĩ, titɔ kĩ bati pii yidza bɛdza nɛ yĩ akũ malo.
Ntɛ Timoteo ya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ ni, mitɛ ye atuu kitonɛkĩ yakɛna boe Ɔlate adzuma ndɛ yĩ aye.
Odima ɛtadã ye ndɛ oti kĩ ɛla kadzakɔ̃ kadima, lɛmɛ mikpa ye kabumɛna lɔkɔa ɛnaa ye osi akũ nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ, emuniki ɛya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃, kitonɛkĩ madã anɛ kĩ bɛmɔ boe bawaɛ̃ a aamuniki bɛya.
Finyaakĩĩ, kalɛ nɛ boe ɔwaɛ̃ Apolo akũ nyɛ kĩ, lɔkɔ pii mado ye kɔbɛ̃ kĩ bɛmɔ bawaɛ̃ bɛbã a bɛyaasɛla mi, lɛmɛ fɔnyɛ́ ye kawɛ kɔlaa kĩ yaya nɛ awã lɔkɔ kĩĩ kamɛ. Ntɛ ɛna osi ni, yaaya ke liti.
Mina nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ, midza pintii nɛ mi katɛkado kamɛ. Mido ɔwɔlɛ, mido akũ kɔbɛ̃ lɛmɛ.
Mikɛna mi tudzuma flee nɛ ɔdɔ kamɛ.
Minyina kĩ Stefana mɔ ye tɔtɔ kamɛ bati a nyɛ bati batɔnyade kĩ bɛdani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ nɛ Akaia, kĩ bɛkɔa be akũ bɛkpa Baguma adzuma kakɛna. Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, make mi aduli kĩ,
mitomɔ lɔtɔ banyanɛ kĩĩ odu ɔbla liti mɔ bati bɛbã kĩ bakɛna adzuma kabumɔ boe.
Kawɔlɛ deĩ yĩ kĩ Stefana, Fortunato mɔ Akaiko ya bideĩ nɛ awĩ nɛ mi kadokɔ̃.
Bido yĩ kɔbɛ̃ ndɛ ayekĩ bido mi kɔbɛ̃ a. Kɛnɛ kĩ buyi bati kĩĩ odu ɔsũ.
Batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Asia kamɛkamɛ a awɔ̃na mi. Akwila mɔ Priskila mɔ asɔli bati a kĩ batsɛna nɛ be tɔtɔ kamɛ a awɔ̃na mi nɛ boe Ɔlate dĩ akũ.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ flee a kĩ bideĩ nɛ awĩ bo nwɔ̃na mi nkpa be tsoo!
Mitu miboomu akũ nɛ tɔwaɛ̃ kamɛ.
Yĩ Paulo mɔawɛ lɛkɔa awɛ ntsɛlɛ kawɔ̃na kĩĩ.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaáwɛ boe Ɔlate kalɛ ni, ɛkɔa nɛ ke a! O boe Ɔlate, ya!
Boe Ɔlate Yesu kɔnyakamɔ kitomɔ mi.
Yĩ ɔdɔ ɛnamɔ mi flee nɛ Kristo Yesu dĩ akũ. Fɔya lɔmɔ.
II Corinthians: Ovoli kĩĩ to yĩ, Paulo, kĩ Baguma pau ndɛ Kristo Yesu fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ nɛ ye kawɛ onukpɛ̃, mɔ boe ɔwaɛ̃ Timoteo sɛkɛ̃. Bɔtsɛlɛ ovoli a bɔama Baguma asɔli a kĩ edeĩ nɛ Korinto mɔ Baguma bade a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Akaia tite flee a akũ.
Bɔawã kĩ Baguma boe Ɔlɛga mɔ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo, bɛmɔ mi kɔnya bɛkpa mi lukudɔ.
Mifɔ̃ bɔnyɛ Baguma kĩ ɛnyɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo Ɔlɛga, kĩ yamɔ bati kɔnya, kĩ ye sɛkɛ̃ kabumɛna flee lɛmɛ ato a, kɔlɛ.
Yado boe ɔwɔlɛ nɛ boe ɔhau flee kamɛ, ayekĩ bɔ́apuli bɔdɔla bikĩ bideĩ nɛ ɔhau adi nyɛ adi kamɛ a tɔwɔlɛ, mɔ kabumna a kĩ boe mɔawɛ bɔtɛ butomɛna Baguma sɛkɛ̃ a.
Ndɛ ayekĩ bɔamɔ lubo beblebee odu a kĩ Kristo mɔ́ a, ade aye fɔtsɛ̃ Kristo akũ bɔana tsɛfã katomɛna Baguma kabumɛna baũ a kamɛ a.
Ntɛ bɔamɔ lubo ni, fɔnyɛ kabumɛna mɔ nkpã katɛ fɔkpa mi. Ntɛ Baguma bumɔ boe ni, ebumɔ mɔ mi malo, ɛkpa mi kɔbɛ̃ kĩ míapuli mina ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ mimɔ́ lubo odu a kĩ de bɔamɔ a.
Foesũ boe kɔnɛte nɛ mi akũ dzɛ̃ kpli. Kitonɛkĩ bunyina kĩ ayekĩ miamɔ lubo ndɛ boe ayea, ade aye mi malo miana kabumɛna a kĩ bɔana a.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, bɔawɛ kĩ minyi ɔhau a kĩ bɔna nɛ Asia kamɛkamɛ a. Fɔlɔtsa a kĩ bite nɛ boe akũ pɔnɛ paa, fɔna ɔlɔmɛ fɔba boe kalɔ kĩ bɔtákɔna kĩ bɔ́abuki budzi nkpã.
Bɔmɔ́ nɛ boe kamɛ kĩ bɛkɔ boe kɔtɔ bɛkpa wuda. Lɛmɛ fukĩĩ ya nɛ boe akũ ayekĩ bɔláakɔa anɛ bute nɛ boe mɔawɛ akũ, mbom nɛ Baguma kĩ yadzɛla banɔkpa a akũ.
Ɛnyɛ boe etomɛna wuda tisi kĩ tideĩ libe kamɛ, ade yaabuki ɛnyɛ boe a. Bɔkɔa anɛ bute nɛ ye akũ kĩ yaabuki ɛnyɛ boe,

ndɛ ayekĩ miabumɛna boe nɛ mi mpaɛbɔ kabɔa kakpa boe kamɛ a. Foesũ fɔ́aya kĩ Baguma aatse mi mpaɛbɔ pii a kĩ mibɔa mikpa boe a, lɔkɔa ehila boe, ade bati pii aakɔa osee bɛnyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ nɛ boe lɔlɔ a.

Lɛtsa mɔa kĩ de akũ bɔapia nyɛ kĩ boe tɔwɔlɛ abi boe kĩ budzi kadzi wĩ nɛ katinya kamɛ, titiliwu nɛ bɔmɔ mi kadzi kamɛ. Bɔkɛna foe nnɛ́ nɛ batidziwa kadikanyi kamɛ, mbom Baguma kɔnyakamɔ kɔbɛ̃ kamɛ futo.

Bɔtsɛlɛ lɛtsa a kĩ de míapuli mikã minu foe kayɔ a odi bɔma mi. Lɛmɛ titɔ kĩ finyaa mianu boe kayɔ sɛkɛ mɔ sɛkɛ malo ni, yĩ anɛ teĩ kĩ míayanu boe kayɔ yededeede, ayekĩ nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Luwi a akũ ni, míata akũ nɛ boe akũ ndɛ ayekĩ boe malo bɔ́akɔa mi bupia a.

Bɔtsɛlɛ lɛtsa a kĩ de míapuli mikã minu foe kayɔ a odi bɔma mi. Lɛmɛ titɔ kĩ finyaa mianu boe kayɔ sɛkɛ mɔ sɛkɛ malo ni, yĩ anɛ teĩ kĩ míayanu boe kayɔ yededeede, ayekĩ nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Luwi a akũ ni, míata akũ nɛ boe akũ ndɛ ayekĩ boe malo bɔ́akɔa mi bupia a.
Ĩnyina fɔtsa kĩĩ flee yededeede, ade foesũ nkɛna nhihiɛ kĩ maanya lɔtɔ ĩyaasɛla mi kufɛ, ayekĩ míana kasɛla titi nviã kamɛ nfasɔ.
Kitonɛkĩ nkɛna nhihiɛ kĩ maayasɛla mi ntɛ manaa Makedonia, ade ntɛ mmuniki maya lɛmɛ maatsã awã, lɔkɔa maatɛ osi katsã kabumɛna ntomɛna mi sɛkɛ̃ nnaa Yudea.
Kĩ nkakɛna nhihiɛ kĩĩ a, ntáke otse paa nɛ foe akũ mbɔɛɛ? Mbɔɛɛ kĩ nkɛna nhihiɛ a ni, nkɛna ye nɛ batidziwa kawɛ onukpɛ̃ kĩ maapuli nlɛ “Oo” mɔ “Oowo” nɛ lɔkɔ mɔa kamɛ?
Nɛ ayekĩ Baguma akɛna nɛ ye kalɛ akũ sũ ni, yĩ lɛtsa a kĩ nlɛ ĩyi nkpa mi a lɛnyɛ́ “Oo” mɔ “Oowo” fɔlɛtsa.
Kitonɛkĩ Yesu Kristo, Baguma Obi, kĩ ye akũ fɔlɛtsa Sila, Timoteo mɔ yĩ bude lɛtsã a lɛnyɛ́ oti kĩ yalɛ “Oo” mɔ “Oowo” oti, mbom ye nyɛ Baguma a kĩ yalɛ “Oo” lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ.
Kitonɛkĩ ade ye nyɛ oti kĩ ɛnyɛ Baguma kĩ yalɛ “Oo” kĩ ɛdzɛ̃ ɛkpa ye fɔlɛtsa flee a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi a. Ade foesũ bɔamu Baguma katsãmɛna Yesu Kristo akũ kalɛ kĩ, “Fɔya lɔmɔ” a.
Baguma mɔawɛ lɛkɛna kĩ bɔmɔ mi nkpã esipi nɛ ɔmɔa kakɛna nɛ Kristo kamɛ. Ade Baguma a mɔawɛ lɛpau boe eyi lite,
eyi boe ɔsũ kĩ ye la boe, ade ɛkɔa Hũhũ Kpalɛwa edo nɛ boe kamɛ ndɛ kasipi nɛ fɔtsa flee a kĩ yaakpa boe a akũ a.
Baguma nyɛ yĩ ɔdansini, kitonɛkĩ enyina yĩ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ. Fɔnɛnɛ kĩ mmɔ mi kɔnya, ade foesũ ntábuki ĩya nɛ Korinto a.
Bɔtáwɛ kĩ bɔahɛ mi nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ mitɛ mido a akũ, kitonɛkĩ bunyina kĩ midzɛ̃ pintii nɛ mi katɛkado kamɛ. Mbom bɔakɛna adzuma mɔ mi ayekĩ míamɔ kawɔlɛ.
Nɛ foesũ nkɛna adzuni kĩ nláaya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ ayekĩ míawo ɔblɔ.
Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ nfɔ̃ miwo ɔblɔ ni, bawei deĩ kĩ baado yĩ kawɔlɛ? Ade mi mɔapɛ a kĩ nfɔ̃ miwo ɔblɔ a.
Ade foesũ ntsɛlɛ ovoli a na mma mi a. Ntáwɛ kĩ maya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ lɔkɔa mi a kĩ kɛfɛta kĩ mido yĩ kawɔlɛ a miyaafɔ̃ nwo ɔblɔ. Ĩnyina yededeede kĩ ntɛ kawɔlɛ ade yĩ ni, mi malo kawɔlɛ ade mi.
Ntsɛlɛ ovoli a nɛ ɔhau, ɔwɔlɛ kabubuli mɔ babe pii kamɛ. Nnɛ́ yĩ kawɛ nyɛ kĩ mado mi kɔnyɔã, mbom mawɛ kĩ mimɔ miyi ɔsũ ayekĩ mawɛ mi a flee kalɛ.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ oti odi fɔ̃ odi wo ɔblɔ ni, nnɛ́ yĩ odi ɛfɔ̃ nwo ɔblɔ, mbom ntɛ nláasɛsɛ foe ni, mi badi kɔ̃ miwo ɔblɔ. Ntáwɛ kĩ mana ɔsĩ beblebee nɛ ye akũ.
Sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ a kĩ mi bati pii mikpa ye a kpɔla.
Finyaakĩĩ ni, mikɔa tɔkpa a mite ye, mido ye kɔbɛ̃ ayekĩ ɛláatɛnɛ ɔblɔ kawo beblebee, ɛyaatɔ flefle.
Nɛ foesũ make mi aduli kĩ mifɔ̃ ɛmɔ kĩ miawɛ ye kalɛ paa.
Ntsɛlɛ ovoli a na mma mi, kitonɛkĩ nwɛ kĩ manyi ayekĩ midzɛ̃ pintii nɛ mi sɔhuiɛ kamɛ, mɔ ayekĩ miakɛna nɛ yĩ fɔtsa katsa a akũ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ.
Ntɛ mikɔa odi tɔkpa mite ye ni, yĩ malo nkɔa nte ye. Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ nkɔa oti tɔkpa nte, mɔ fusĩ malo kĩ nkɔa litsedi nte kɔ̃ ni, makɛna foe nɛ Kristo anɛ kamɛ nɛ mi sũ.
Nkɛna foe ayekĩ Abonsam lɛláakɔa tɛdake ɛnya mi akũ, kitonɛkĩ bunyina ye tisi a flee.
Kĩ ĩyaade lɛtsã nɛ Kristo Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ nɛ Troa a, mmɔ́ kĩ boe Ɔlate binya osi ɛkpa ye adzuma kakɛna nɛ awã.
Lɛmɛ fɔha yĩ paa, kitonɛkĩ ntámɔ boe ɔwaɛ̃ Tito nɛ awã. Foesũ nkla bati a ntɛ̃ nnaa Makedonia.

Lɛmɛ bɔanyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ! Kitonɛkĩ nɛ boe ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ Kristo kamɛ ni, Baguma akpã boe ndɛ bati kĩ bipili be ndom aye nɛ Kristo akũ kanya kɔdza kamɛ. Baguma tsã boe akũ ɛfɔ̃ Kristo akũ fɔlɛtsa gba nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ ndɛ ayekĩ kugua mɔ ɔlɛ̃ abɔa kanaa mɔ lugo.
Kalá bɔla ndɛ fɔtsa mɔ ɔlɛ̃ kĩ Kristo kɔa ɛbɔa afɔliɛ ɛkpa Baguma, ade bɔgba buko nɛ bikĩ bɛlamɛna nkpã katɛ kana, mɔ bikĩ baawɔ a kamɛ a.
Bɔla ndɛ nfiã kpitii kĩ yakɔ bati a kĩ baawɔ, lɛmɛ bɔla ndɛ ɔlɛ̃ klɔũklɔũ kakpa bikĩ baana nkpã katɛ a. Owei aapuli ɛkɛna adzuma kpale kĩĩ odu?
Boe kɔ̃ bɔlá ndɛ bati bɛbã pii kĩ bɛnɛɛ Baguma kalɛ a ndɛ kɔyaatɔ fɔtsa kĩ fɔlá kɔya mɔ kanɔ aye. Lɛmɛ nɛ ayekĩ Baguma do boe sũ ni, bɔalɛ kalɛ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ye anɛ kamɛ, ndɛ Kristo basumunɛ aye.
Katsa fɔatsa kĩ bubuki bɔapia boe akũ mbɔɛɛ? Kanɛ kɛnɛ kĩ bɔkpa mi boe akũ adansiɛ tuvoli, mbɔɛɛ kĩ bɔtɛ te butomɛna mi sɛkɛ̃ ndɛ ayekĩ bati badi akɛna a?
Ade mi mɔawɛ a nyɛ tuvoli kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ boe tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ, kĩ odi nyɛ odi aapuli enyi ɛkã lɛmɛ.

Foe kamɛ kpalɛ kĩ Kristo mɔawɛ lɛtsɛlɛ ovoli kĩĩ ɛkpa boe bɔkɔa bɔma mi. Bɛtákɔa ovoli katsɛlɛ mui bɛtsɛlɛ ye, mbom bɛkɔa Baguma kĩ edeĩ nkpã a Hũhũ bɛtsɛlɛ foe. Bɛtátsɛlɛ ovoli a nɛ sileti akũ, mbom bɛtsɛlɛ ye nɛ batidziwa du akũ.
Bɔalɛ fukĩĩ kitonɛkĩ nɛ Kristo sũ, budeĩ kadzakɔ̃ nɛ Baguma anɛ.
Lɛtsama lɛláa boe kamɛ kĩ laafɔ̃ bɔlɛ kĩ bɔ́apuli bɔkɛna adzuma kĩĩ. Kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ budeĩ to Baguma sɛkɛ̃.
Ade ye lɛfɔ̃ kĩ bupuli bɔnya apam vɔɛ̃ basumunɛ, kĩ ɛnyɛ́ mbla a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ biyi a, mbom bɔasum ekĩ Hũhũ kamɛ edeĩ a. Mbla a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ a tsɛ̃mɔ wuda lɛmɛ Hũhũ ade a kɔ̃ akpa nkpã.

Lɔkɔ a kĩ Baguma kɔa mbla a kĩ ɛtsɛlɛ nɛ boe tratra akũ yakpa Mose a ni, Baguma nyɛ ye kukũkpalɛ ɛtsa. Mose anɛ kamɛ kata muamua mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ, mɔ kukũkpalɛ paa kĩ Israelfɔ tápuli bike anɛ nɛ ye akũ, titɔ kĩ kɔkadĩ malo. Ntɛ mbla a kĩ ɛtsɛ̃mɔ wuda a nɛ́ mɔ kukũkpalɛ mɔ ɔsĩ a ni,
kekɔ̃ ntɛ bɛkɔa Hũhũ a bakpa a, kukũkpalɛ a aana ɔsĩ kɔba paa.
Ntɛ osi a kĩ batsã ye akũ kana kɔtɔkaku ayamɔ kukũkpalɛ, kekɔ̃ osi a kĩ ɛtsɛ̃mɔ nkpã lɛláana kukũkpalɛ baũ ɛba!
Bɔalɛ foe lɔmɔ kitonɛkĩ finyaa kukũkpalɛ a bɛ̃ kɔtɔnyade a, ade kukũkpalɛ a kĩ kɔna ɔsĩ kɔkɔɛ a yɛla a.
Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ kukũkpalɛ na nɛ lɛtsa kĩ lɛtábuna owi akũ ni, kekɔ̃ lɛtsa a kĩ laawa daa a kukũkpalɛ aana ɔsĩ kɔba.
Ayekĩ budeĩ kɔnɛte kĩĩ sũ ni, budeĩ ɔwɔlɛ kado paa.
Boe kɔ̃ bɔlá ndɛ Mose kĩ ɛkɔa lima esua anɛ kĩ Israelfɔ bɛtamɔ ye anɛ kamɛ kata muamua kĩ fɔlamɛna kadĩ a.
Nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, be adzuni kamɛ tábinya kɛyawo nviã. Ntɛ bakã tuvoli kɔɛ a kamɛ fɔlɛtsa a malo ni, lima mɔapɛ a buki lasua be anɛ. Ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ Kristo kamɛ odi mɔ baanyɛ lima a na.
Nɛ nviã fuwi kĩĩ kamɛ malo ni, ntɛ bɛkã Mose ovoli kamɛ fɔlɛtsa a, anɛ kasua fɔtsa a buki fɔasua be adzuni.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi muniki ɛya nɛ Ɔlate a sɛkɛ̃ ni, baanyɛ limakũ a nɛ ye anɛ.
Finyaakĩĩ ni, “Ɔlate a” nɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kamɛ nyɛ Hũhũ a, ade awã kĩ boe Ɔlate Hũhũ deĩ ni, kawɛya lɛmɛ deĩ nɛ awã.
Foesũ bɛnyɛ limakũ a nɛ boe flee anɛ, ade bɔanyɛ boe Ɔlate kukũkpalɛ a katsa yededeede a. Ɛlamɛna boe kadani kanamɛna ye kutidu odu a kamɛ, ade boe kukũkpalɛ lɛmɛ ade nɛ ode kabu a.
Ayekĩ Baguma mɔ́ boe kɔnya, ɛkɔa ɔsum adzuma kĩĩ edo nɛ boe awɛ sũ ni, akpɔ láveli boe.

Bɔfɔnɛ fɔtsa bɛlawa mɔ fɔnyɔãtsa flee awɛ buyi nɛ ɔɔ́wɛ̃. Bɔákɛna lɛtsama nɛ kakɛ osi akũ, ade bɔádani Baguma fɔlɛtsa a kalɛ a. Nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, budzi nkpã wĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ, ade bɔabɔa mbɔdi kĩ boe kadzi kamɛ kiwo odi nyɛ odi anɛ a.
Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a kĩ bɔalɛ a nyɛ fɔtsa kɔlawa ni, fɔnyɛ fɔtsa kɔlawa fɔkpa bikĩ bɛtsɛ̃ nɛ kayɛla osi akũ a.
Katinya kĩĩ kamɛ oti kpa a kɔ bati a kĩ bɛtátɛ bido a adzuni. Esua be anɛ kĩ bɛtamɔ Kalɛ Wĩ a ɔhaĩ a nɛ Kristo kukũkpalɛ akũ a, kĩ kɔla ndɛ Baguma kutidu pɛpɛɛpɛ a kĩ kɔako nɛ be akũ a.
Kitonɛkĩ bɔáde lɛtsã nɛ boe mɔawɛ akũ, mbom bɔade lɛtsã nɛ Yesu Kristo boe Ɔlate akũ, ade boe kɔ̃ bɔnyɛ mi basumunɛ nɛ Yesu sũ a.
Baguma a kĩ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ɔhaĩ ɛvɔlɛ eto ɔtũ kamɛ” a, ade ye nyɛ Baguma mɔapɛ a kĩ ye ɔhaĩ a ko nɛ boe tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ, ɛkpa boe kadikanyi kĩ bɔmɔ Baguma kukũkpalɛ nɛ Yesu anɛ kamɛ a buyi ɔsũ.
Lɛmɛ boe a kĩ boe kamɛ hũhũ fɔtsa mɔ kɔya kĩĩ deĩ a, bɔla ndɛ tibute fubui aye. Ɛkɛna fukĩĩ yatsa kĩ kɔbɛ̃ kpale fle a nyɛ ye Baguma kude, nnɛ́ boe kude kɔanɛ.
Lɔkɔ pii bawɛ boe kado nɛ ɔhau kamɛ lɛmɛ baánya boe akũ, ade fɔkɔ fudi bakɛna boe adzuni basabasa lɛmɛ akpɔ láveli boe da.
Bakesĩnɛ pii deĩ nɛ boe akũ, lɛmɛ budeĩ ɔkɔba odi kĩ yaálo kafɔnɛ boe, ade fɔkɔ fudi babɔa boe kamuni kapila boe lɛmɛ baákɔ boe.
Lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ boe sukɛna amɔ lubo ndɛ Yesu wuda tsɛfã a aye, ayekĩ baamɔ ye nkpã kadzi a nɛ boe sukɛna kamɛ.
Nɛ boe nkpã flee kadzi kamɛ ni, wuda ado boe libe daa nɛ Yesu sũ, ayekĩ baamɔ ye nkpã nɛ boe sukɛna kĩ saaku a kamɛ.
Fukĩĩ atsa kĩ wuda lamɛna adzuma kakɛna nɛ boe kamɛ, ade nkpã lɛmɛ lamɛna adzuma nɛ mi kamɛ a.
Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Nlɛ kɔdzɛla kitonɛkĩ ntɛ ndo.” Nɛ hũhũ mɔapɛ a katɛkado onukpɛ̃ ni, boe malo bɔalɛ kɔdzɛla kitonɛkĩ bɔtɛ budo.
Bunyina kĩ Baguma a kĩ ɛdzɛla boe Ɔlate Yesu edzi nkpã a aadzɛla boe malo, lɔkɔa ɛkpã bɔmɔ mi lodo ɛnamɛna Yesu anɛ kamɛ.
Bɔakɛna fukĩĩ bamɛ flee nɛ mi kalɛ sũ. Ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma sɛmɛkalɛ lamɛna bati pii sɛkɛ̃ kawo a, ade aye baakɔa kɔlɛkanyɛ mɔ mpaɛbɔ bɛkpa Baguma nɛ ye kukũkpalɛ kamɛ a.
Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ ni, akpɔ láveli boe dadaada. Titɔ kĩ boe sukɛna kĩĩ lamɛna kavɔ̃ malo ni, boe hũhũ a kɔ̃ ana nkpã vɔɛ̃ luwi daa.
Lubokamɔ kabii lukũ kĩĩ aakpa boe kukũkpalɛ kĩ fɔláana kawũna da, ade fɔ́aba lubo a kĩ bɔamɔ a.
Boe anɛ líteĩ nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ bɔamɔ a akũ, mbom futeĩ nɛ fukĩ bɔámɔ mɔ anɛ a akũ. Lɛtsa a kĩ bɔapuli kamɔ mɔ anɛ waa fɔkpa nɛ lɔkɔ lukũ kamɛ, lɛmɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bɔláapuli bɔmɔ́ mɔ anɛ a aana daa.
Kitonɛkĩ bunyina kĩ ntɛ biveli boe tite akũ lɛpɛ kĩ budzi nɛ de kamɛ, kĩ de nyɛ boe sukɛna a, Baguma aakpa boe kɔla vɔɛ̃ kĩ ye mɔawɛ eke nɛ ode budzi nɛ koe kamɛ daa.
Finyaa bɔawɛya kake, ade boe kawɛ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ nyɛ kĩ Baguma ɛkɔa boe ode tɔtɔ sukɛna a esua boe akũ.
Ntɛ ɛkɔa se esua boe akũ ni, bɔláadzi ɔdzɔ.

Kĩ budzi nɛ tite akũ lɛpɛ kĩĩ kamɛ sũ ni, bɔawɛya kake kĩ boe fɔlɔtsa tɛ́nɛ ɔlɔmɛ. Nnɛ́ kawɛ bɔawɛ kĩ bɛnyɛ tite akũ sukɛna kĩĩ nɛ boe akũ, mbom bɔawɛ kĩ Baguma ɛkɔa ode side a edo boe ayekĩ sukɛna a kĩ saaku a, aadani flefle sɛkɛna sikĩ saana nkpã.
Baguma nyɛ oti a kĩ ɛmanɛ boe ɛkpa kadani kĩĩ, ade ɛkɔa ye Hũhũ ɛkpa boe ndɛ kasipi nɛ fɔtsa flee a kĩ ɛmanɛ eyi boe a akũ a.
Foesũ bɔado boe akũ kɔbɛ̃ luwi daa. Bunyina kĩ ntɛ busila budzi nɛ tɔtɔ kĩ tɛnyɛ sukɛna tɔtɔ kamɛ kɔ̃ ni, bɔvɛlɛ akũ nɛ boe Ɔlate ɔwɛ̃.
Kitonɛkĩ katɛkado bɔkɔa budzi nkpã, nnɛ́ lɛtsa a kĩ bɔamɔ mɔ anɛ a.
Budeĩ ɔwɔlɛ, ade bɔawɛ mbom kĩ bɔanɛ nɛ boe sukɛna tɔtɔ kamɛ bɔnaadzi nɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ nɛ boe Ɔlate a sɛkɛ̃.
Lɛmɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛbɛ̃ flee nyɛ kĩ, bɔawɛ kĩ bɔakɛna lɛtsa a kĩ laawo boe Ɔlate anɛ, ntɛ budzi nɛ boe tɔtɔ kamɛ nɛ awĩ ĩye bɔnaa ye sɛkɛ̃.
Kitonɛkĩ boe flee bɔ́anadza nɛ Kristo anɛ kamɛ, ɛdzɛmɔ boe. Odi nyɛ odi aatɛ kɔtɔkase nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ɛkɛna a onukpɛ̃, ntɛ fɔnyɛ tuwĩ ĩye tɔkpa a kĩ ɛkɛna nɛ ye katinya nkpã kadzi onukpɛ̃.
Bunyina ayekĩ kɛnɛ kĩ buvila boe Ɔlate, foesũ bɔabɔa mbɔdi kado bati bɛbã kɔbɛ̃ kĩ bivila ye. Baguma kɔ̃ nyina ayekĩ bɔla yededeede, ade matɛ kado kĩ mi malo minyina yĩ nɛ mi tɔwɔlɛ fii kamɛ a.

Bɔlámɛna boe akũ kabuki kamu katsa mi, mbom bɔawɛ kĩ bɔakpa mi osi minyi lɛtsa sũ kĩ mita akũ nɛ boe akũ. Bɔkɛna foe lɔmɔ ayekĩ míapuli mina mbuayɛ mikpa bikĩ badã oti kutitse kapia nɛ ye akũ, kĩ nnɛ́ ye ɔbla badã a.
Ntɛ bati badi alɛ kĩ boe fɔlɔ kamɛ bu kade ni, Baguma sũ fubu kade. Lɛmɛ ntɛ boe fɔlɔ kamɛ waa yedede ni, mi kalɛ sũ fɔla lɔmɔ.
Kristo ɔdɔ anya boe akũ, kitonɛkĩ finyaa bɔmɔ́ buyi ɔsũ kĩ oti mɔapɛ liku nɛ bati flee lɔlɔ, kĩ fɔatsa kĩ bati flee liku nɛ ye wuda a kamɛ.
Eku nɛ bati flee lɔlɔ, ayekĩ bikĩ bidzi a lɛláabuki bidzi nkpã bɛkpa be akũ, mbom baadzi bɛkpa ye odi pɛ a kĩ eku, kĩ bɛdzɛla ye edzi nkpã nɛ be kalɛ sũ a.
Foesũ kito finyaa kanaa ni, bɔláabuki bɔdzɛmɔ odima bɔkɔ ye kɔtɔ nɛ otidziwa kakɔna onukpɛ̃. Titɔ kĩ bɔdzɛmɔ Kristo tɔ̃ nɛ bati adzuni onukpɛ̃ malo ni, bubuki bɔákɛna foe.
Ntɛ odi kɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Kristo ni, ɛdani oti vɔɛ̃, oti kɔɛ a naa, ɔvɔɛ̃ lɛya.
Baguma lɛkɛna fukĩĩ flee, ɛtsã Kristo akũ ɛdani boe, ye bakesĩnɛ a ɛkɛna bakɔba, ade ɛkpa boe adzuma kĩ boe malo bɔkɛna bati bɛbã ye bakɔba a.
Boe fɔlɛtsa nyɛ kĩ Baguma tsɛ̃ Kristo akũ yalɔla bɛmɔ batidziwa flee kayite bɛdani ye bakɔba. Baguma tátɛ batidziwa tɔkpa eyi, mbom ɛkpa boe ɔlɛdo kĩ bude lɛtsã kĩ ɛlɔla bɛmɔ batidziwa flee kayite.
Foesũ bido boe kĩ bɔlɛ kalɛ bɔkpa Kristo. Fɔkɛna ndɛ Baguma awɛ lamɛna bati kadɛ katsãmɛna boe akũ. Bɔake mi aduli nɛ Kristo dĩ akũ kĩ mifɔ̃ Baguma ɛdani mi ndɛ ye bakesĩnɛ a ɛkɛna ye bakɔba.
Titɔ kĩ Kristo tákɛna tɔkpa tidima malo ni, Baguma fɔ̃ ɛlɔ boe tɔkpa ɛnamɛna ayekĩ ntɛ bɔkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ ye ni, boe malo bɔ́anya bati kpĩĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ.
Foesũ kĩ bɔmɔ Baguma bɔakɛna adzuma sũ ni, bɔake mi aduli kĩ mitafɔ̃ kɔnya a kĩ Baguma mɔ́ mi a lɛkɛna fɔtsa pupulidza.
Mitse lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma lɛ,
“Kĩ lɔkɔ wo ɔtɔ kĩ mmɔ mi kɔnya a, ntse mi,
kĩ luwi a wo ɔtɔ kĩ matɛ mi nkpã a, mbumɔ mi.”
Mitse! Ade finyaa kɛnɛ kĩ bɔatɛ Baguma kɔnyakamɔ a, nviã nyɛ luwi a kĩ ɛtɛ boe nkpã!
Bɔáwɛ kĩ odima amɔ nfumusu nɛ boe adzuma akũ, foesũ bɔáwɛ kĩ bɔakɛna lɛtsa kpa lidima kĩ laasua odi osi.
Mbom nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bɔakɛna kamɛ ni, bɔatsa kĩ Baguma basumunɛ bɔanɛ. Nɛ foesũ bɔado ɔwɔlɛ katɛ ɔhau, kamɔ lubo mɔ ohiã mɔ ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ.
Bibo boe, bido boe nɛ kɔla, bido ɔtutũ nɛ boe kamɛ, bɛfɔ̃ bɔkɛna adzuma bɔtɛ̃ ɔbɛ̃, ade budzi tida katawa mɔ katanya malo a.

Nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɛ ni, bɔbɔa mbɔdi kĩ bɔanya bati kpalɛwa nɛ Baguma anɛ. Bɔkɔa boe kadikanyi, ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ mɔ boe sɛmɛ kalɛ kakɛna bɔatsa kĩ Baguma basumunɛ bɔanɛ. Fukĩ fubu nyɛ kĩ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa mɔ ɔdɔ dzununuunu,
boe ɔnɔkɔali ɔlɛdo a, mɔ Baguma kɔbɛ̃ abumɔ boe. Bɔnɛɛ kadzi kpĩĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ a ndɛ boe kawũkanɔ fɔtsa kĩ bɔkɔa bɔanɔ kawũ, ade bɔakɔa foe bɔapili boe lɔlɔ lɛmɛ a.
Bakpa boe obu, badi asupa boe, badi avũna boe badi lɛmɛ amu boe. Badi adã boe ndɛ bavãlɛvã bɔanɛ, lɛmɛ bɔalɛ ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a.
Bakɛna boe ndɛ bati kĩ binyína, lɛmɛ bati flee nyina boe. Babu boe ndɛ bati kĩ bɛlá nkpã lɛmɛ budeĩ nkpã. Titɔ kĩ bavɛlɛ boe sɔtɔ malo ni, bɛtákɔ boe,
titɔ kĩ bido boe nɛ ɔbɔdɔ kamɛ malo ni, bɔamɔ kawɔlɛ luwi daa. Bɔadã ndɛ ahiãfɔ lɛmɛ bɔafɔ̃ bati pii akɛna asikafɔ. Bɔkɛna ndɛ bɔlá lɛtsama lɛmɛ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, ade boe deĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ Korintofɔ, bubinya boe tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ mɔ ɔdɔ bɔkpa mi, ade bubi mi ɔnɔkɔali fɔlɛtsa a yededeede.
Nnɛ́ boe lɛtányɛ boe ɔdɔ kanya, mbom mi lɔkɔa mi ɔdɔ mikɔla boe.
Foesũ finyaa mabi mi tuwuli ndɛ yĩ babi aye. Minyɛ mi tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ fɔlɛtsa mitsa boe ndɛ ayekĩ boe malo bɔakɛna kakpa mi a.
Mitakɛna ɔmɔa mɔ bikĩ bɛtátɛ bido a. Tuwĩ kakɛna mɔ tɔkpa kakɛna aapuli tɛkpɔta tɛkɛna lɛtsa mɔa mbɔɛɛ? Nde ɔhaĩ mɔ ɔtũ aapuli bidzi bɛkpɔta?
Nde Kristo mɔ Belial baviɔ̃ a aapuli bɛkɛna onukpɛ̃ mɔa? Litsa nyɛ lɛtsa mɔa kĩ lideĩ nɛ ɔtɛ odonɛ mɔ ekĩ ɛtátɛ edo kayite?

Nde Baguma asɔli kɔla mɔ kuviɔ̃la aapuli bɛkɛna ɔmɔa? Kitonɛkĩ boe nyɛ Baguma kĩ edzi nkpã a asɔli fɔla! Baguma mɔawɛ lɛ kĩ, “Maake tɔtɔ nɛ yĩ bati sɛkɛ̃, lɔkɔa maadzi nɛ be kamɛ. Maanya be Baguma lɔkɔa bɛnya yĩ bati.”
Foesũ boe Ɔlate a lɛ kĩ,
“Midzakũ nɛ be sɛkɛ̃,
minyɛ mi akũ nɛ be kamɛ.
Mitakɛna lɛtsa a kĩ de akũ tákpalɛ,
lɔkɔa maatɛ mi atuu.
Maanya mi ɔlɛga
ade mi míanya yĩ babinyole mɔ babitsole a.
Ade aye boe Ɔlate Mɔ Kɔbɛ̃ Flee a lɛ a.”
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ayekĩ bɛkpa boe kɔnɛte nɛ fukĩĩ flee akũ sũ ni, mifɔ̃ bɔkpalɛ boe akũ nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ lado sukɛna mɔ hũhũ efĩĩ a kamɛ. Mifɔ̃ boe kadzi kamɛ flee kɛdã yedede nɛ Baguma kavila kamɛ.
Minyɛ mi ɔdɔ mitsa boe. Bɔtáfum odima, bɔtábula odima kadzi kamɛ kade, ade bɔtásisi odima lɛmɛ a.
Ntálɛ fukĩĩ kĩ makɔ mi kɔtɔ, kitonɛkĩ ndɛ ayekĩ nlɛ ĩnyamɛna lɔtɔ a, mitɛ kɔya mikpa boe paa kĩ ntɛ fɔnyɛ wuda malo ni, bɔmɔ mi aaku, ade ntɛ fɔnyɛ nkpã lɛmɛ ni, bɔmɔ mi aadzi nkpã.
Ntɛ mi ndo paa ade mapia akũ nɛ mi akũ lɛmɛ a. Ɔwɔlɛ ka edzi yĩ. Nɛ boe lubo kamɔ flee kamɛ ni, mbuki ndeĩ ɔwɔlɛ paa, ade kawɔlɛ ade yĩ paa a.
Kĩ bɔyawo Makedonia malo ni, bɔtána kawɛya kadima. Bɔmɔ́ lubo nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ, bati do boe tɛdzɛ ade libe na nɛ boe kamɛ a.
Lɛmɛ Baguma kĩ yado bikĩ akpɔ veli be kɔbɛ̃ a, do boe ɔwɔlɛ nɛ Tito kaya kamɛ.

Nnɛ́ Tito kaya a odi lido boe ɔwɔlɛ, mbom ye adansiɛ a kĩ edi nɛ mi akũ kĩ mido ye ɔwɔlɛ a lɛmɛ bu. Ebi boe ayekĩ miwɛ paa kĩ miamɔ yĩ, ayekĩ fuwo mi kalɔɛ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya a akũ, mɔ ayekĩ mimanɛ akũ midzi kĩ míadza nɛ yĩ liti mipili yĩ lɔlɔ. Nɛ foesũ finyaa mamɔ kawɔlɛ kaba kɔkɔɛ a.
Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ ovoli a kĩ ntsɛlɛ mma mi a fɔ̃ miwo ɔbɔdɔ malo ni, fɔtáwo yĩ kalɔɛ kĩ ntsɛlɛ ye. Fɔ́apuli fuwo yĩ kalɔɛ kitonɛkĩ mmɔ́ kĩ lɔkɔ lukũ odi kamɛ mɔ miwo ɔbɔdɔ.
Lɛmɛ finyaa, kawɔlɛ ade yĩ, nnɛ́ kĩ ndo mi ɔbɔdɔ a sũ, mbom mi ɔbɔdɔ kawo a fɔ̃ midani mi kadzi kamɛ. Baguma kawɛ fɔanɛ kĩ miwo ɔbɔdɔ, foesũ lɛtsa a kĩ bɔkɛna a nyɛ nfasɔ mbom fɔkpa mi.

Kitonɛkĩ ɔbɔdɔ kawo a kĩ fɔnyɛ Baguma kawɛ afɔ̃ oti adani ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ, ade fɔakpã ye kanamɛna daa nkpã a kamɛ a. Fukĩnaa láwo kalɔɛ! Lɛmɛ ntɛ oti wo ɔbɔdɔ nɛ katinya kamɛ kawɛ onukpɛ̃ kɔ̃ ni, wuda fɔavɛlɛ kayamɛna.

Midã ayekĩ ɔbɔdɔ kĩĩ odu, kĩ Baguma awɛ a akɛna adzuma nɛ mi kamɛ! Fɔfɔ̃ miayili akũ kakɛna fɔtsa wĩ, ade fɔfɔ̃ miakpalɛ mi akũ a. Fɔfɔ̃ miana kalɔkpa nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔtákpɔla akũ, fɔfɔ̃ miavila ade fɔfɔ̃ miadã anɛ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ a. Fɔfɔ̃ miana ovio nɛ fɔtsa kakɛna kamɛ, ade miawɛ kĩ bɛvɛlɛ oti a kĩ ɛkɛna tɔkpa a sɔtɔ a. Nɛ foe flee kamɛ ni, minyɛ mi akũ miatsa kĩ mitádi mfumsu nɛ fɔlɛtsa a kamɛ.
Foesũ titɔ kĩ ntsɛlɛ ovoli a na malo ni, nnɛ́ oti a kĩ efum, ĩye ekĩ ye bifum a sũ ntsɛlɛ ye. Mbom ntsɛlɛ ye matsa ayekĩ miakɔa mi akũ flee kakpa boe a nɛ Baguma anɛ.
Ade foesũ bɔkado ɔwɔlɛ a.
Nnɛ́ ɔwɔlɛ kado odi bɔna, kawɔlɛ de boe baũ nɛ kawɔlɛ a kĩ Tito mɔ́ nɛ mi akũ a sũ, kitonɛkĩ ebi boe ayekĩ mi flee mifɔ̃ ɔwɔlɛ ka edzi ye a.
Nkɔa mi mpia ntsa ye, ade mitádo yĩ kɔnyɔã lɛmɛ a. Bubi mi ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a, ade ayea kapia a kĩ bupia bɔtsa Tito a lɛmɛ yanya ɔnɔkɔali a.
Ye ɔdɔ nɛ mi akũ ade nɛ ode kabu, ntɛ ete anɛ nɛ ayekĩ mi flee miwɛ kĩ míakɛna nɛ ye fɔtsa katsa akũ, mɔ ayekĩ mitɛ ye atuu nɛ obu mɔ kukũtila kamɛ a.
Kawɔlɛ ade yĩ, kitonɛkĩ maapuli nkɔa anɛ nte nɛ mi akũ nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɛ.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, bɔawɛ kĩ minyi lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma tsãmɛna ye kɔnya kamɔ kamɛ ɛkɛna nɛ Makedonia tɛsɔli a kamɛ.
Bɛsɔ be bɛdã nɛ lubo kamɔ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kamɛ, lɛmɛ fude be kawɔlɛ baũ, foesũ titɔ kĩ ahiãfɔ banɛ malo ni, bite fɔtsa mɔ kawɔlɛ.
Maapuli nlɛ pipiipi kĩ bite fɔtsa ndɛ ayekĩ baapuli, malo kɔlaa ni, bite fɔba be kɔbɛ̃. Nɛ be mɔawɛ kawɛ onukpɛ̃ bite fɔtsa faa.
Bike boe aduli mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ bɔkpa be osi be malo bibumɛna Baguma bade a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Yudea bakɛna adzuma a.
Fukĩ bɛkɛna kĩĩ bɛ̃ lɛtsa a kĩ de akũ bute anɛ. Lɛtsa lɛtɔnyade nyɛ kĩ bɛkɔa be akũ bɛkpa boe Ɔlate, ade ke liti a, bɛkɔa be akũ bɛkpa boe nɛ Baguma kawɛ onukpɛ̃.
Foesũ budo Tito, kĩ ye liyi adzuma kĩĩ kayɔ a kɔbɛ̃, kĩ ɛnaa lɔtɔ mɔ ye adzuma, lɔkɔa ebumɛna mi miwũna ɔdɔ adzuma titiliwu kĩĩ.

Finyaa minyɛ bati kĩ bɛnyaa lɔtɔ nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɛ. Mi katɛkado, mi kɔdzɛla kalɛ, mɔ mi kadikanyi awo anɛ. Miayili akũ nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɛ ade miawɛ boe kalɛ a. Nɛ foesũ bɔawɛ kĩ minya lɔtɔ nɛ kɔnyakamɔ adzuma kĩĩ lɛmɛ kamɛ.
Nnɛ́ mbla adima masui nkpa mi, mbom nɛ ayekĩ bati bɛbã lamɛna akũ kayili kĩ bakpa kabumɛna sũ ni, mawɛ ĩnyi ntɛ mi ɔdɔ a kĩ mideĩ a lɛmɛ kpɔla.
Minyina boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo kɔnya kamɔ a kĩ edeĩ ɛkpa boe, ade titɔ kĩ ɛnyɛ osikani malo ni, ɛkɛna ye akũ ndɛ ohiãni nɛ mi kalɛ sũ, ayekĩ yaakɛna boe asikafɔ nɛ ye tihiã a kamɛ.
Yĩ kakɔna nyɛ kĩ fɔnɛnɛ kĩ miwũna adzuma a kĩ miyi kayɔ katukɔɛ a. Mi nyɛ́ bati batɔnyade kĩ biyi kayɔ, ade minya batɔnyade malo kĩ bitunɔ kĩ baakpa a.
Finyaa mikɛna adzuma a minamɛna lɔtɔ lɔkɔa miwũna ye! Miyili akũ miwũna ye ndɛ ayekĩ mikɔa miyi ye kayɔ a. Mikɔa futetsa a kĩ mideĩ a mikɛna adzuma a.
Ntɛ futo odi ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ paa kĩ yaate fɔtsa ni, Baguma aatɛ fukĩ ɛna ɛkpa a, lɛmɛ nnɛ́ fukĩ ɛlá a.
Nlámɛna bati bɛbã fɔlɔtsa akũ katinya kĩ makɔa ndo mi fude ɔlɔmɛ,
lɛmɛ ayekĩ mideĩ fɔtsa pii nɛ lɔkɔ kĩĩ kamɛ sũ ni, fɔnɛnɛ kĩ miabumɔ bikĩ fusĩ be a. Ke liti ntɛ kɛyaasĩ mi, mɔ bideĩ fɔtsa pii ni, baabumɛna mi. Nɛ osi kĩĩ akũ ni, mi akũ kabumɛna a aaketi.
Bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ, “Ekĩ ɛkpɔta fɔtsa beblebee tána fublusu, ade ekĩ ɛkpɔta kabii lɛmɛ tásĩ lɛtsama a.”
Bɔanyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ kĩ ɛfɔ̃ Tito bɔa mbɔdi yabumɔ mi ndɛ ayekĩ boe malo bɔawɛ kĩ bɔakpa mi kabumɛna.
Kĩ bubi ye kĩ ɛya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ a, etunɔ mɔ kawɔlɛ. Lɛmɛ fɔnyɛ ye kawɛ kɔkɔɛ kĩ yaya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃.
Budo bɛmɔ boe ɔwaɛ̃nyole, kĩ tɛsɔli bati a flee akpa obu paa nɛ ye Baguma fɔlɛtsa kalɛ kamɛ a kĩ etomɔ ye.
Lɛtsa a kĩ libu nyɛ kĩ tɛsɔli a lɛnyɛ ye, bitunɔ lɛmɛ kĩ ɛtsã etomɔ boe bɔkɛna ɔdɔ adzuma a fudo boe Ɔlate obu, lɔkɔa fɔtsa lɛmɛ kĩ bɔwɛ kĩ bɔakpa bati bɛbã kabumɛna.
Bɔadã kadã wĩ kĩ odima lɛláayavia boe kadi etomɛna ayekĩ bɔakɛna sɛmɛ kalɛ futetsa kĩĩ akũ adzuma.
Boe botaɛ nyɛ kĩ bɔakɛna lɛtsa a kĩ lɛnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali, nnɛ́ nɛ boe Ɔlate odi anɛ, mbom mɔ batidziwa lɛmɛ anɛ.
Foesũ budo boe ɔwaɛ̃ kĩ etomɔ be. Bɔsɔ ye bɔdã lɔkɔ pii ade bɔmɔ́ kĩ yabɔa mbɔdi nɛ fɔtsa pii kakɛna kamɛ a. Ade finyaa, kĩ ɛtɛ mi edo paa sũ ni, akũ asĩ ye paa kĩ yayaakpa mi kabumɛna.
Tito kɔ̃ ni, ɛnyɛ yĩ ɔkɔba paa kĩ bɔakɛna adzuma bubumɔ mi. Boe bawaɛ̃nyole bɛbã a kĩ bitomɔ ye a kɔ̃ ni, ade be dzɛ̃ nɛ tɛsɔli a kadzakɔ̃ bɛkɔa kamu bakpa Kristo a.
Minyɛ mi ɔdɔ mitsa be, ayekĩ tɛsɔli a flee aatɛ bido, binyi lɛmɛ kĩ boe kukũpia nɛ mi akũ a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali.
Fɔtásĩ kɔlaa kĩ matsɛlɛ mi ovoli nɛ futetsa a kĩ miakɔa kama Baguma bade a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Yudea tite akũ a akũ.

Ĩnyina kĩ miawɛ kĩ miakpa kabumɛna, foesũ nkɔa mi mpia ntsa bati a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Makedonia tite akũ a. Nlɛ kĩ, “Boe bawaɛ̃ nɛ Akaia tite akũ a manɛ akũ kĩ bakpa kabumɛna anɛ katukɔɛ.” Mi mbɔdi nɛ foe akũ fɔ̃ fi wo nɛ be sɛkɛ mɔa pii kamɛ.

Finyaakĩĩ mado boe bawaɛ̃ kĩĩ nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃, ayekĩ baamɔ kĩ boe kukũpia nɛ mi akũ nɛ futetsa akũ a lɛnyɛ́ kɔdzɛla pupulidza. Lɛmɛ ndɛ ayekĩ mbi be kĩ mimanɛ akũ mɔ mi fubumɛnatsa a, mawɛ kĩ mina nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ lɔmɔ.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ Makedoniafɔ aatomɔ yĩ bɛyaamɔ kĩ mitámanɛ akũ mikpa futetsa a kɔ̃ ni, kɔnyɔã aawo boe, lɛmɛ kɔnyɔã baũ aawo mi kɔba, kitonɛkĩ baakɔna kĩ bɔtɛ́nɛ anɛ kate nɛ mi akũ.

Foesũ nkɔna kĩ fusĩ kĩ mapiã boe bawaɛ̃ kĩĩ bɛnya yĩ lɔtɔ lɔkɔa bɛyaamanɛ futetsa a kĩ milɛ miyi kĩ míakpa a. Futetsa kĩĩ aakpɔta ntɛ ĩya, ade fɔ́atsa kĩ mi ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ futo sũ mikpa, fɔnyɛ́ fukĩ bɛhɛ mi kĩ mikpa.
Mite anɛ kĩ oti kĩ edu funitsã kabii ni, funitsã sukuloo yaana, ekĩ edu funitsã pii aanyɛ funitsã baũ.
Foesũ odi nyɛ odi ɛkpa ndɛ ayekĩ ɛwɛ futo ye kamɛ, ɛtakɛna foe mɔ kalɔɛ ĩye kĩ fɔnyɛ ɔhɛ kĩ ɛkɛna sũ, kitonɛkĩ Baguma awɛ oti a kĩ yakpa fɔtsa mɔ kawɔlɛ.
Baguma aapuli ɛkpa mi fɔtsa ɛba fukĩ misĩ, ayekĩ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ míana fɔtsa a kĩ misĩ mikpa mi akũ a, mina fublusu mikɔa mikɛna tudzuma wĩ tidi nyɛ tidi.
Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ,
“Yakpa ahiãfɔ fɔtsa faa
ade ye sɛmɛ kalɛ kakɛna waa daa a.”
Baguma kĩ yakpa okuani fudutsa mɔ funitsã kĩ yanya, aakpa mi fudutsa flee a kĩ misĩ a, ɛfɔ̃ fubo anɛ fɔkpa mi funitsã beblebee ayekĩ míakɔa mikɛna sɛmɛ kalɛ tudzuma pii.
Baguma aafɔ̃ mina akũ fɔtsa daa, mipuli mikakɛna sɛmɛ kalɛ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ, ayekĩ bati pii aanyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ nɛ futetsa a kĩ bɛtɛ bitomɛna boe sɛkɛ̃ a sũ.
Kitonɛkĩ kabumɛna a kĩ mikpa a ni, nnɛ́ Baguma bati a odi kasĩ onukpɛ̃ mipi, mbom fɔfɔ̃ bati pii anyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ paa.
Lɛtsa a kĩ laato mi ɔsum kĩĩ kamɛ aafɔ̃ bati pii limu Baguma, kitonɛkĩ mitɛ Kristo Kalɛ Wĩ a mido, mikɛna nɛ ke akũ, ade mikɛna sɛmɛ kalɛ kĩ mite fɔtsa mikpa be mɔ bati bɛbã lɛmɛ a.
Foesũ baakɔa ɔdɔ kĩ eto ɔwɔlɛ dzununuunu kamɛ bɛbɔa mpaɛ bɛkpa mi, kitonɛkĩ Baguma mɔ́ mi kɔnya pii.
Mifɔ̃ bɔnyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ nɛ ye futetsa a kĩ ɛkpa boe, kĩ bɔláapuli bɔnyɛ foe kayɔ sũ a!
Yĩ Paulo mɔawɛ lamɛna mi aduli kake. Ade yĩ bati alɛ kĩ ĩnyɛ oti dɔwa ntɛ ndeĩ nɛ mi kamɛ, lɛmɛ ntɛ nláa mi sɛkɛ̃ kɔ̃ ni, ndeĩ awũni. Ntsɛ̃ Kristo akũ kadɔla mɔ ye sɛmɛ kalɛ kamɛ,
make mi aduli kĩ ntɛ ĩya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ ni, mitafɔ̃ ĩyaana awũni, kitonɛkĩ matɛ kado kĩ maapuli nna awũni paa nɛ bikĩ balɛ kĩ katinya liti katomɛna sũ bɔakɛna adzuma kĩĩ akũ a.
Fɔnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali kĩ katinya kamɛ budzi, lɛmɛ bɔánɔ kawũ nɛ katinya kamɛ kɔbɛ̃ onukpɛ̃.
Kawũkanɔ fɔtsa a kĩ bɔnɛɛ bɔanɔ a lɛnyɛ́ katinya kamɛ fude, mbom fɔnyɛ Baguma fude a kĩ fudeĩ kɔbɛ̃, kĩ bɔkɔa bɔabubuli okesĩnɛ fudzikɔ̃ mɔ ɔsĩ a.

Bɔabula fɔvã kama fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bati avɛlɛ a kade. Bɔawɔla lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ latsa kapia kĩ fɔasua Baguma kanyi osi. Bɔapi adzuni adi nyɛ adi ndɛ ayekĩ bapili bati nɛ kawũ kamɛ kĩ ɛkɛna nɛ Kristo kawɛ akũ.
Ntɛ mikɔa mi akũ flee mikpa boe, mɔ miatse boe ɔlɛdo ni, boe malo bɔmanɛ akũ bɔkpa kĩ bɔ́avɛlɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɛna atɔ ɔsĩ a sɔtɔ.

Miadã oti anɛ kakɛna fɔtsa. Odi deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ kĩ yabu ye akũ kĩ ɛnyɛ Kristo ode mbɔɛɛ? Ntɛ aye ni, mifɔ̃ owula ebuki ɛkɔna ye akũ ɛdã, kitonɛkĩ ndɛ ayekĩ ɛnyɛ Kristo ode a, ade aye boe malo bɔnyɛ Kristo bade a.
Kitonɛkĩ kɔnyɔã lákɔ yĩ, ntɛ ntɛ́nɛ kapia beblebee nɛ otumi a kĩ boe Ɔlate kpa boe a sũ. Ɛkpa boe otumi kĩ bɔkɔa bɔdɔɔla mi mibo anɛ, nnɛ́ kĩ bɔkɔa bubula mi kade.
Ntáwɛ kĩ fɔkɛna mi ndɛ mado mi libe mɔ tuvoli kĩ ntsɛlɛ a.
Badi aalɛ kĩ, “Paulo tuvoli kamɛ fɔlɛtsa deĩ ɔsĩ, fudeĩ kɔbɛ̃ malo, lɛmɛ ntɛ ye mɔawɛ a edeĩ nɛ boe sɛkɛ̃ kɔ̃ ni, ɛlá ɔsĩ ade ye kɔdzɛla kalɛ lɛmɛ lányɛnɛ bati akũ!”
Bati a na odu binu foe kayɔ, kĩ kavɛmɛna kadima lɛláa lɛtsa a kĩ bɔatsɛlɛ kado nɛ boe tuvoli kamɛ ntɛ budeĩ mɔ lugo, mɔ lɛtsa a kĩ bɔ́akɛna ntɛ budeĩ nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ a kamɛ.

Nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, bɔláawɛ kĩ bɔakɔ akũ bɔbɔa mɔ ĩye bɔkɔna mɔ bati a kĩ bamu be akũ beblebee a. Badzimbifɔ paa banɛ! Bideĩ be mɔawɛ tisi kĩ te akũ batsã kakɔna akũ kadã, foesũ badzɛmɔ be akũ nɛ be mɔawɛ tisi a akũ.
Lɛmɛ boe kɔ̃ ni, boe kukũpia lɛláanyina ɔbɛ̃. Mbom kɔ́ana nɛ awã kĩ Baguma yi ɛkpa nɛ boe adzuma kakɛna kamɛ, ade boe adzuma nɛ mi kamɛ lɛmɛ bu a.
Nɛ ayekĩ mideĩ nɛ kakɔ a kĩ Baguma tsua ɛkpa boe a kamɛ sũ ni, kĩ bɔkɔa Kalɛ Wĩ nɛ Kristo akũ a bɔama mi a, bɔtányina bɔnaa tɛbɛ̃ a liti.

Foesũ bɔápia nɛ adzuma a kĩ bati bɛbã kɛna binyina tɛbɛ̃ a kĩ Baguma yi ɛkpa boe a akũ. Mbom bɔadã anɛ kĩ mi katɛkado aabo anɛ, lɔkɔa bɔ́apuli bɔkɛna adzuma baũ bɔnaa lɔtɔ nɛ mi kamɛ, nɛ awã kĩ Baguma kpa boe ekpula a.
Ke liti a, bɔ́apuli bunyina mi bɔnaade lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ nɛ fude bɛbã kamɛ, ade fɔláasĩ kĩ bɔapia nɛ adzuma a kĩ bati bɛbã kɛna kɔkɔɛ nɛ be kakɔ akũ a.
Lɛmɛ ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ odi awɛ epia ni, kɛnɛ kĩ epia nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ boe Ɔlate kɛna a akũ.”
Kitonɛkĩ nnɛ́ oti a kĩ yamu ye mɔawɛ akũ a nyɛ oti wĩ, mbom oti a kĩ boe Ɔlate amu nyɛ oti wĩ.
Mawɛ kĩ mina ɔwɔlɛ mikpa yĩ, titɔ kĩ míadã kĩ ndzimbi sukuloo malo. Make mi aduli, mitɛ foe lɔmɔ mi kpa yĩ.
Manɔ lineke nɛ mi lɔlɔ ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma lɛmɛ anɔ lineke a. Mila ndɛ oyitsɔ̃ kĩ enyína onyole kĩ ntinya nkpa onyole mɔapɛ odi kĩ ɛnyɛ Kristo mɔawɛ a.
Mavila kĩ bati aabula mi adzuni kade ndɛ ayekĩ kɔɛ kɔa tɛdake kɔkɛ Eva, kĩ miláakɔa tɔwɔlɛ kpalɛwa misum Kristo ndɛ ayekĩ mikakɛna a.

Kitonɛkĩ miatɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yade lɛtsã nɛ Yesu bɛbã kĩ nnɛ́ ye akũ bude lɛtsã bɔkpa mi a mɔ kawɔlɛ mɔatsɛ mɔatsɛ. Ade ke miatɛ hũhũ mɔ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ fɔvɛmɛna kɔlaa nɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa mɔ Kalɛ Wĩ a kĩ mitɛ mitomɛna boe sɛkɛ̃ a lɛmɛ a.
Maábu kĩ mi fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kĩ miakɔna kĩ bɛnyɛ bati titiliwu badi odu a tɛ kɔya bɛba yĩ nɛ osi odima akũ.
Ɔsa ĩnyɛ oti kĩ yaápuli kalɛ kɔdzɛla kalɛ wĩ, lɛmɛ mabi mi pipiipi kĩ nnɛ́ mɔ kadikanyi kamɛ. Bɔnyɛ foe bɔtsa mi pefee nɛ lɔkɔ a flee kamɛ nɛ osi nyɛ osi akũ.
Kĩ ĩyalɛ Baguma Kalɛ Wĩ a ntsa mi a, ntátɛ lɛtsama ntomɛna mi sɛkɛ̃. Lɛmɛ ndɔla yĩ akũ ayekĩ baadɛla mi nɛ ode. Tɔkpa tanɛ kĩ nkɛna mbɔɛɛ?
Kĩ nkakɛna adzuma nɛ mi kamɛ a, tɛsɔli bɛbã bati lise yĩ kɔtɔ. Bɔ́abɔɛ foe kĩ nkaye be kĩ makɔa mbumɛna mi.

Ade lɔkɔ a kĩ nna nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ a, ntáha mi mɔ kabumɛna ntɛ nsĩ sika malo. Boe bawaɛ̃ batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bito Makedonia bɛya a lɛma yĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ lisĩ yĩ. Ndɛ ayekĩ fɔna kɔkɔɛ a ade aye fɔ́ana nɛ kunya kamɛ lɛmɛ a, kĩ nláakɔa yĩ akũ nkɛna fɔlɔtsa nte nɛ mi akũ da.
Kĩ Kristo ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a deĩ nɛ yĩ kamɛ sũ ni, lɛtsama lɛláasua yĩ osi nɛ kakɔma, kĩ ntapia nɛ fukĩĩ akũ nɛ Akaia tite flee akũ.
Kalɛ nlɛ fukĩĩ kitonɛkĩ maáwɛ mi kalɛ sũ mbɔɛɛ? Baguma nyina kĩ mawɛ mi kalɛ!
Maakakɛna lɛtsa a kĩ makɛna finyaa, kĩ nláakɔa yĩ fɔlɔtsa nte nɛ mi akũ, ayekĩ fɔtɔ banyanɛ babɛbã a lɛláana osi bipia akũ bɛlɛ kĩ bɔmɔ be akɛna adzuma nɛ osi mɔapɛ akũ.
Bati a na lɛnyɛ́ fɔtɔ banyanɛ wĩ, mbom bɛnyɛ fɔvã fɔtɔ banyanɛ kĩ bakɛ bati nɛ be adzuma a kĩ bakɛna a kamɛ. Bakɛna be akũ ndɛ Kristo fɔtɔ banyanɛ mɔawɛ paa banɛ.
Fukĩĩ tákɛna wãwã, kitonɛkĩ Abonsam malo apuli kadani ye akũ kadã ndɛ ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ aye nɛ ɔhaĩ kamɛ.
Foesũ fɔnyɛ́ lɛtsa baũ lidima ntɛ ye basumunɛ lɛmɛ dani be akũ bɛkɛna ndɛ Baguma basumunɛ kĩ bakɛna fɔtsa nɛ osi kpĩĩ akũ. Nɛ ke kawũna a, baana lɛtsa a kĩ be lɛkɛnana fɛta a pɛpɛɛpɛ.
Mbuki malɛ kĩ odima ɛtakɔna kĩ ndzimbi. Lɛmɛ ntɛ mibu yĩ lɔmɔ kɔ̃ ni, mitɛ yĩ ndɛ odzimbifɔ aye lɔkɔa yĩ malo mia sukuloo.
