Ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ kĩ malɛ kĩĩ lɛnyɛ́ lɛtsa a kĩ boe Ɔlate aawɛ kĩ nlɛ. Nɛ kukũpia fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kamɛ ni, malɛ kɔdzɛla koũ ndɛ odzimbifɔ aye.
Lɛmɛ nɛ ayekĩ bati pii apia akũ nɛ katinya kamɛ fɔtsa akũ sũ ni, yĩ malo maakɔa foe mpia.
Mi mɔawɛ a minyɛ bati kĩ binyina kadi paa, foesũ miana ɔwɔlɛ katɛ bikĩ bidzimbi a nɛ kawɔlɛ kamɛ.
Ntɛ odi akpã mi nɛ ɔhɛ kamɛ, ĩye yasisi mi, ĩye yadã mi nɛ kayɔ kayɔ ĩye yabalɛ mi nɛ anɛ kamɛ malo ni, miatɛ foe mɔ ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ.
Kɔnyɔã fɔanɛ fɔkpa yĩ kĩ bɔtána ɔwɔlɛ bɔkɛna fukĩna bamɛ odu. Mbɔɛɛ fɔfɛta kĩ bɔkɛna lɔmɔ?
Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi do ɔwɔlɛ kĩ yapia nɛ litsedi akũ ni, yĩ malo maado ɔwɔlɛ ndɛ ye aye, lɛmɛ finyaa malɛ kɔdzɛla ndɛ odzimbifɔ aye.
Balɛ kĩ Hebrifɔ banɛ. Oo, yĩ malo Hebrini manɛ. Balɛ kĩ Israelfɔ banɛ. Yĩ malo Israelni manɛ. Balɛ kĩ Abraham babi mɔ bawa banɛ. Yĩ malo nto Abraham kasinu a kamɛ.

Balɛ kĩ Kristo basumunɛ banɛ. Malɛ kɔdzɛla ndɛ ɔbɔndamfɔ manɛ, lɛmɛ ĩnyɛ ɔsumunɛ wĩ mbɛ̃ be! Nkɛna adzuma mɔ ɔsĩ mba be, bido yĩ nɛ kɔla mba be, bibo yĩ mɔ kutsei fɔba be, ade nkawo nɛ wuda awɛ kamɛ mɔatsɛ mɔatsɛ.
Titi elo mɔa kĩ Yudafɔ bo yĩ kutsei taalɛ-avedi.
Titi ɛlalɛ kĩ Romafɔ bo yĩ mɔ mpile ade bɛnɔ yĩ boe deedi a. Ndzi nɛ ɔkɔlɔ kamɛ titi ɛlalɛ kĩ ɔwɛ bubuli ye, luwi mɔa mɔ lɛnyɛ flee nkahɔ nɛ mui anɛ.

Nɛ yĩ tisi pii katsã kamɛ ni, tɔwɔ kayili, bayekpanɛ kado yĩ libe ade ayea Yudafɔ mɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ kawɛ kĩ bakɔ yĩ a. Nna nɛ nkpã mɔ wuda kayite nɛ tɛmatɔ tɛkpale tɛkpale kamɛ, nɛ fupo kamɛ, nɛ mpo anɛ mɔ fɔvã lɛtsã badenɛ awɛ kamɛ.
Ĩyili akũ nkɛna adzuma mɔ ɔsĩ, fɔkɔ fudi ndzi kĩ maána tida nwa. Kɔlɛ mɔ ɔmɔado kakɔ yĩ, fɔkɔ fudi ndzi maána funitsã ĩnya nwĩ, ade maána kawakɔ̃ ĩye tɛtadiɛ kĩ mado a.
Nɛ fukĩĩ flee liti ni, luwi nyɛ luwi tɛsɔli a akũ kakɔna kɛna fɔlɔtsa kĩ futeĩ nɛ yĩ ɔwɔlɛ.
Ntɛ akpɔ veli odi nɛ ye katɛkado kamɛ ni, akpɔ aveli yĩ kaba. Ntɛ bɛfɔ̃ odi wo nɛ tɔkpa kamɛ ni, mana foe akũ kalɔkpa baũ.
Ntɛ kɛnɛ kĩ mpia akũ ni, maapia nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔatsa kĩ nlá kɔbɛ̃ a akũ.
Baguma, kĩ ɛnyɛ boe Ɔlate Kristo Ɔlɛga, kĩ bamu ye dĩ daa a, nyina kĩ nnɛ́ fɔvã mama.
Kĩ nna nɛ Damasko a, Lɛgã Areta fɔ̃ bikĩ badã ɔmatɔ a akũ a dza nɛ ɔmatɔ a seebi kɔbã onukpɛ̃ kĩ bipi yĩ.
Lɛmɛ bati do yĩ nɛ ɔtsɛtsɛ kamɛ bɛtsãmɛna nɛ seebi nfansili kamɛ bɛkamɛna bɛdzɛla, ade nlo nfɔnɛ ye a.
Titɔ kĩ nfasɔ adima lɛláa kapia kamɛ malo ni, kɛnɛ kĩ mpia akũ. Lɛmɛ finyaa maalɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ mmɔ́ nɛ anɛ ketee fɔda kamɛ, mɔ fɔtsa a kĩ boe Ɔlate nyɛ ɛtsa yĩ a akũ.
Ĩnyina onyole odi kĩ ɛnyɛ Kristo ode. Ade futeli ewua-ana kĩ fɔtɛ̃ kĩ bɛbɔɛ ye bɛnamɛna ode flefle a. Ĩnyína ntɛ sukɛna kamɛ ɛna ĩye nnɛ́ sukɛna kamɛ ɛna, mbɔɛntɛ Baguma odi nyina.

Mbuki malɛ kĩ ĩnyina kĩ bipi onyole kĩĩ bɛnamɛna Paradiso kamɛ, lɛmɛ ĩnyína ntɛ ɛna nɛ sukɛna kamɛ, ĩye nnɛ́ sukɛna kamɛ ɛna, mbɔɛntɛ Baguma odi nyina. Ade awã enu fɔtsa a kĩ otidziwa lɛláapuli ɛlɛ, mɔ fɔtsa a kĩ bɛtákpa odima osi kĩ ebinya onukpɛ̃ nɛ foe akũ.

Mbuki malɛ kĩ ĩnyina kĩ bipi onyole kĩĩ bɛnamɛna Paradiso kamɛ, lɛmɛ ĩnyína ntɛ ɛna nɛ sukɛna kamɛ, ĩye nnɛ́ sukɛna kamɛ ɛna, mbɔɛntɛ Baguma odi nyina. Ade awã enu fɔtsa a kĩ otidziwa lɛláapuli ɛlɛ, mɔ fɔtsa a kĩ bɛtákpa odima osi kĩ ebinya onukpɛ̃ nɛ foe akũ.
Foesũ maapia nɛ onyole kĩĩ akũ, lɛmɛ nláapia nɛ yĩ mɔawɛ akũ, mbɔɛntɛ nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔatsa kĩ nlá kɔbɛ̃ a akũ.

Ntɛ kawɛ nwɛ kĩ mapia akũ malo ni, nláakɛna foe ndɛ odzimbifɔ aye, kitonɛkĩ maakalɛ ɔnɔkɔali a. Lɛmɛ nláapia akũ, kitonɛkĩ ntáwɛ kĩ odima ebu yĩ ɛba ayekĩ enyina kĩ nla a, nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ɛmɔ́ kĩ nkɛna mɔ likĩ enu kĩ nlɛ a sũ.

Lɛmɛ nɛ ayekĩ nláadɛla yĩ akũ nɛ ode nɛ awãwã fɔtsa pii a kĩ Baguma nyɛ ɛtsa yĩ a sũ ni, bido fɔsɔ ndɛ su kĩ sawo paa nɛ yĩ sukɛna kamɛ. Fɔsɔ a kɛna ndɛ Abonsam fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ kĩ fɔkaaha yĩ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ, ayekĩ nláatɛnɛ yĩ akũ kadɛla nɛ ode.
Mbɔa mpaɛ titi ɛlalɛ nkpa boe Ɔlate kĩ ɛnyɛ fɔsɔ kĩĩ nɛ yĩ kamɛ.

Lɛmɛ mbuayɛ kĩ ɛkpa yĩ nyɛ kĩ, “Yĩ kɔnyakamɔ nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ de osĩ, kitonɛkĩ yĩ kɔbɛ̃ ana ɔsĩ paa ntɛ nɔ ɔlá kɔbɛ̃.” Foesũ kawɔlɛ ade yĩ paa kĩ mapia akũ nɛ yĩ ɔsĩ katana a akũ, ayekĩ maamɔ Kristo kɔbɛ̃ a nɛ yĩ kamɛ.
Foesũ kawɔlɛ ade yĩ nɛ ɔsĩ katana, fuvũnatsa, lubo kamɔ, liti katomɛna, mɔ ɔhau kamɔ akũ nɛ Kristo sũ. Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ nlá kɔbɛ̃ ni, Kristo ado yĩ kɔbɛ̃.
Malɛ kɔdzɛla ndɛ odzimbifɔ aye, lɛmɛ mi lɛfɔ̃ nkɛna foe, kitonɛkĩ mi nyɛ bati kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ bimu yĩ kufɛ. Kitonɛkĩ titɔ kĩ ĩnyɛ́ lɛtsama malo ni, mi fɔtɔ banyanɛ titiliwu a lɛbɛ̃ yĩ nɛ osi odima akũ.
Awãwã mɔ kɔbɛ̃ fɔtsa, mɔ nsɛntsɛlɛni a kĩ nkɔa ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ nkɛna nɛ mi kamɛ a atsa pefee kĩ fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ wĩ manɛ.
Nkɛna tuwĩ tidi nkpa tɛsɔli bɛbã a mba mi mbɔɛɛ? Nnɛ́ foe nyɛ kĩ ntákɔa yĩ akũ kadã nte nɛ mi akũ sũ mbɔɛɛ? Make mi aduli kĩ mikɔa mite yĩ, nɛ ayekĩ ntákɛna mi kakɛna wĩ sũ!

Finyaa ade lɛlalɛde kĩ mmanɛ akũ kĩ mayaasɛla mi a, lɛmɛ nláawã mi lɛtsama. Mi mɔawɛ a mawɛ, nnɛ́ mi sika. Malo kɔlaa ni, nnɛ́ babi kɛnɛ kĩ bɛmanɛ fɔtsa biyi be bamanɛ, mbom bamanɛ kɛnɛ kĩ bɛkpɔta fɔtsa biyi be babi.
Maamɔ kawɔlɛ ntɛ mbula yĩ kɔbɛ̃ flee a kĩ ndeĩ a kade, nkɔa mbumɛna mi. Ntɛ mawɛ mi kalɛ paa a ni, nde sũ kɛnɛ kĩ mi ɔdɔ a kĩ mideĩ mikpa yĩ a akũ etinya?
Foesũ mitɛ foe kĩ ntánya fɔlɔtsa nte nɛ mi akũ. Lɛmɛ badi aalɛ kĩ ndeĩ tɛdake, ade nkɛ mi nɛ nyansã kamɛ ntɛ fɔtsa a.
Ntsã batɔ a kĩ ndo nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ a kamɛ odi akũ nsisi mi mbɔɛɛ?
Nke Tito aduli kĩ ɛya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃, ade ndo ɔtɛ odonɛ bɛbã lɛmɛ kĩ etomɔ ye a. Míalɛ kĩ Tito sisi mi mbɔɛɛ? Mbɔɛɛ nnɛ́ kakɔna mɔapɛ a bɔmɔ ye bɔnɛɛ, bɔtsɛ̃ osi mɔapɛ a lɛmɛ akũ bɔakɛna adzuma?

Ɔsa miakɔna kĩ nɛ foe kamɛ a, bɔbɔa mbɔdi kĩ bɔapili boe lɔlɔ nɛ mi anɛ. Oowo, fɔlá lɔmɔ! Bɔalɛ kɔdzɛla ndɛ ayekĩ Kristo awɛ kĩ bɔlɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ Baguma anɛ. Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ bɔakɛna ni, bɔakɛna foe kĩ fubumɛna mi mibo anɛ nɛ mi katɛkado kamɛ.

Mavila kĩ ntɛ ĩyawo awã ni, maamɔ mi kĩ miláana ndɛ ayekĩ maawɛ kĩ mina, ade ayea mi malo miláamɔ yĩ ndɛ ayekĩ miawɛ kĩ nna a. Mavila kĩ maayamɔ ɔdzɛ kakɛna, mɔ lineke kanɔ, mɔ kalɔkpa kana mɔatsɛ mɔatsɛ, mɔ akũ odi fude kawɛ, mɔ fuvũnatsa, mɔ bati buĩ kanyɛ, mɔ lukũta mɔ onukpɛ̃ mɔa katakɛna nɛ mi kamɛ.

Mavila lɛmɛ kĩ ntɛ mbuki ĩya ni, yĩ Baguma aadɔla yĩ nɛ mi anɛ, ade maabe nko nɛ bati pii a kĩ bɛkɛna tɔkpa bɛtɛ̃ a akũ. Kitonɛkĩ bɛtádani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ nɛ efĩĩ fɔtsa mɔ sukɛna fɔwɛtsa kpa kakɛna kamɛ, mɔ litsolewɛ mɔ linyolewɛ akũ a.
Ade fukĩĩ nyɛ lɛlalɛde kĩ maayasɛla mi a. Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ bɛbɔɛ fɔlɛtsa nɛ odi akũ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ adansifɔ nviã ĩye be ɛlalɛ bɛlɛ kĩ fɔlɛtsa a deĩ nɛ foe kamɛ fɔmɔ baakɔ ye kɔtɔ.”

Kĩ ĩya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ lɛyade a, ndɛ bati a kĩ bɛkɛna titikpa nɛ lɔkɔ kĩ lɛtɛ̃ kamɛ, mɔ bati bɛbã lɛmɛ. Lɛmɛ maabuki nlɛ foe finyaa, kĩ nláa mi sɛkɛ̃ malo. Ntɛ mbuki ĩya ni, odima lɛláanɛ nɛ sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ kamɛ.
Míamɔ yĩ kadzakɔ̃ a kĩ miawɛ a, kĩ fɔatsa kĩ Kristo alɛ kɔdzɛla katsãmɛna yĩ akũ a. Ntɛ yakɛna adzuma nɛ mi kamɛ ni, ye kɔ̃ ɛtádɔ, mbom yanyɛ ye kɔbɛ̃ katsa nɛ mi kamɛ.

Kĩ bɛbɔa ye nɛ asendua akũ a, ɛdɔ lɛmɛ Baguma kɔbɛ̃ fɔ̃ edzi nkpã. Ade ayea boe a kĩ bɔkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Kristo a bɔlá ɔsĩ a, lɛmɛ Baguma aado boe kɔbɛ̃ ayekĩ bɔ́apuli bɔkɛna adzuma a kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ bɔkɛna nɛ mi kamɛ a.
Minaa mi kamɛ, misɔ mi akũ midã ntɛ midzi nɛ mi katɛkado onukpɛ̃. Mitámɔ miyi ɔsũ kĩ Yesu Kristo deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ mbɔɛɛ? Minyina kĩ edeĩ nɛ mi kamɛ, mbɔɛntɛ mitákpɔla nɛ mi akũ kasɔkadã a kamɛ.
Matɛ kado kĩ míayanyi kĩ boe kɔ̃ bɔnya akũ nɛ kasɔkadã a kamɛ.
Bɔake Baguma aduli kĩ mitakɛna nfumusu adima, nnɛ́ kĩ bati aamɔ kĩ bɔnya akũ nɛ boe akũ kasɔkadã a kamɛ, mbom kĩ miakɛna fɔtsa wĩ titɔ kĩ fɔadã ndɛ boe adzuma kakɛna tákpɔla malo.
Kitonɛkĩ bɔláapuli bɔkɛna lɛtsama butia ɔnɔkɔali a, mbom kɛnɛ kĩ bɔadza pintii bɔkpa ɔnɔkɔali a.
Kawɔlɛ ade boe ntɛ bɔdɔ, mɔ mi kɔ̃ midzɛ̃ pintii nɛ mi katɛkado kamɛ. Nɛ foesũ bɔabɔa mpaɛ kĩ mibo anɛ mikpɔla flefle.

Ade foesũ matsɛlɛ mi ovoli kĩĩ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ ndzakũ nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ a. Nkɛna foe lɔmɔ ayekĩ ntɛ ĩyawo awã ni, nláakɔa kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ boe Ɔlate kpa yĩ a nvɛlɛ mi mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ. Ɛkpa yĩ kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ nkɔa ndɔɔla mi mibo anɛ nɛ mi katɛkado kamɛ, nnɛ́ kĩ makɔa mbula mi kade.

Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, nɛ kawũna ni, midzi kadzi wĩ. Mibo anɛ mikpɔla flefle nɛ mi katɛkado kamɛ. Mibɔa mbɔdi mikɛna nɛ yĩ kɔdɛ a akũ, mikɛna onukpɛ̃ mɔa, midzi nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ lɛmɛ. Baguma kĩ yawɛ bati kalɛ, mɔ ye lukudɔ lɛmɛ litomɔ mi flee.
Miwɔ̃na akũ flee nɛ Baguma lukudɔ kamɛ.
Baguma bade a flee awɔ̃na mi!
Boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo kɔnyakamɔ, Baguma ɔdɔ, mɔ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a ɔmɔa kakɛna a, fɔna nɛ mi flee kamɛ.
Galatians: Ovoli kĩĩ to yĩ, Paulo, kĩ ĩnyɛ Kristo fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a sɛkɛ̃. Nnɛ́ batidziwa lɛpau yĩ, ĩye nnɛ́ otidziwa akũ bɛtsã bɛpau yĩ ndɛ fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ aye, mbom yĩ kavɛ a to Yesu Kristo mɔ Baguma boe Ɔlɛga a kĩ ɛdzɛla Yesu etomɛna kanɔkpa a sɛkɛ̃.
Bɔmɔ nwaɛ̃ amɛ flee a kĩ bideĩ nɛ awĩ a, bɔnɛɛ ovoli kĩĩ a bɔawɔ̃na tɛsɔli bati a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Galatia a.
Baguma boe Ɔlɛga mɔ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo bɛmɔ mi kɔnya, bɛkpa mi lukudɔ lɛmɛ.
Yesu Kristo kɔa ye akũ ɛbɔa afɔliɛ nɛ boe tɔkpa lɔlɔ, ayekĩ yaanyɛ boe etomɛna nviã katinya kpa kĩĩ kamɛ, nɛ Baguma boe Ɔlɛga kawɛ onukpɛ̃.
Mifɔ̃ bumu Baguma kito finyaa kanaa daa! Fɔya lɔmɔ.
Mi fɔlɛtsa kɛna yĩ wãwã, kitonɛkĩ owi tábuna kɔlaa kĩ mimuniki nɛ oti a kĩ ɛtsã Kristo kɔnyakamɔ kamɛ ɛvɛ mi a liti, ade minaatɛ kalɛ wĩ bɛbã a.
Lɛmɛ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, kalɛ wĩ bɛbã kadima buki kɛláa, mbom bati badi tsɛ̃ babula mi atɔ kade, ade bawɛ kĩ badani Kristo Kalɛ Wĩ a bɛkɛna lɛtsa bɛbã a.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ boe, ĩye Baguma fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ odi malo to ode ɛyalɛ kalɛ wĩ kĩ kɛvɛmɛna nɛ kikĩ ke akũ bude lɛtsã bɔkpa mi a ni, Baguma edumu ye ɛkpa lubo kamɔ!
Kalɛ a kĩ bɔlɛ bɔtɛ̃ a, ade ke a finyaa mbuki malɛ a. Nlɛ kĩ ntɛ odi aato ode ɛyaabi mi kalɛ wĩ kĩ kɛvɛmɛna nɛ kikĩ mitɛ a akũ ni, Baguma edumu ye ɛkpa lubo kamɔ!
Fɔlɛtsa a kĩ malɛ a ni, kalɛ malɛ foe nwo bati ĩye Baguma anɛ mbɔɛɛ? Oowo! Kawɛ mawɛ kĩ fuwo Baguma anɛ. Ntɛ mbuki makɛna foe fuwo batidziwa anɛ ni, kufɛ nláabuki ĩnya Kristo ɔsumunɛ.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mifɔ̃ mbi mi yededeede kĩ Kalɛ Wĩ a kĩ ke akũ made lɛtsã a lɛnyɛ́ otidziwa kade.
Ntátɛ ke ntomɛna otidziwa odima sɛkɛ̃ ade odima lɛmɛ tátsa yĩ ke a, mbom Yesu Kristo mɔawɛ lɛnyɛ ke ɛtsa yĩ.
Minu ayekĩ ndzi nkpã tɔ̃ a, kĩ mpi Yudafɔ ɔsum a ndomɔ akũ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ. Minu lɛmɛ ayekĩ nkɔa kɔnɛyɔɔlɛ ntomɛna asɔli bati a liti, mbɔa mbɔdi kĩ mawɔla be dzɔrɔbii.
Nnaa lɔtɔ mba yĩ bakɔba Yudafɔ pii a kĩ bɔmɔ́ be bɔnyɛ lɛtsã nɛ boe Yudafɔ ɔsum a kamɛ, ade ntomɔ boe bawanyɔ tɛmaniɛ a liti mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ a.

Lɛmɛ Baguma nɛ ye kɔnyakamɔ kamɛ pau yĩ eyi malo fɔmɔ bɛma yĩ, ade ɛvɛ yĩ kĩ ĩyasum ye a. Ade kĩ ɛwɛ kĩ yanyɛ Obi ɛtsa yĩ ayekĩ maade lɛtsã nɛ ye Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ nkpa bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a, ntánaa otidziwa odima sɛkɛ̃ kĩ ɛtsa yĩ foe tisi.

Lɛmɛ Baguma nɛ ye kɔnyakamɔ kamɛ pau yĩ eyi malo fɔmɔ bɛma yĩ, ade ɛvɛ yĩ kĩ ĩyasum ye a. Ade kĩ ɛwɛ kĩ yanyɛ Obi ɛtsa yĩ ayekĩ maade lɛtsã nɛ ye Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ nkpa bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a, ntánaa otidziwa odima sɛkɛ̃ kĩ ɛtsa yĩ foe tisi.
Ntánaa Yerusalem lɛmɛ kĩ manaamɔ bikĩ bɛnya fɔtɔ banyanɛ bɛnyaa yĩ lɔtɔ, mbom lɛtalɛta nnaa Arabia tite akũ. Ke liti a, mmuniki nto awã ntɛ̃ nnaa Damasko.
Futeli ɛlalɛ liti fɔmɔ nnaa Yerusalem kĩ manaamɔ Petro. Ndzi nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ tɛkwansieda nviã.
Ntámɔ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kamɛ odima kɛba Yakobo, boe Ɔlate ɔwaɛ̃nyole a.
Lɛtsa a kĩ matsɛlɛ kĩĩ nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali. Baguma nyina kĩ nnɛ́ fɔvã mama.
Ke liti a, ndzakũ nnaa fɔkɔ kumɛkumɛ nɛ Siria mɔ Kilikia tite akũ.
Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, Kristo batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Yudea linyína yĩ anɛ mɔ anɛ.
Kanu binu nɛ bati tunukpɛ̃ kĩ, “Oti a kĩ ɛkatomɔ boe liti kɔkɔɛ a ni, finyaa kɔ̃ ɛlamɔ lɛtsã kade nɛ katɛkado a kĩ ɛwɛ kĩ yawɔla a akũ!”
Nɛ foesũ bimu Baguma nɛ yĩ sũ.
Nɛ futeli ewuana liti a, bɔmɔ́ Barnaba bubuki bumuniki bɔnaa Yerusalem, ade nkpã Tito lɛmɛ nnamɛna a.

Nnaa awã kitonɛkĩ Baguma nyɛ ɛtsa yĩ kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ nnaa. Nɛ bɔmɔ́ lɔtɔ banyanɛ a odi katsɛna kamɛ ni, nkpalɛ fɔlɛtsa kamɛ ntsa be nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ lɛtsã a kĩ nlamɛna kade kakpa bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a akũ. Ntáwɛ kĩ adzuma a kĩ nkɛna ntɛ̃ a, mɔ ekĩ makɛna finyaa a, ɛkɛna fɔtsa pupulidza.
Titɔ kĩ yĩ obumɛnanɛ Tito lɛnyɛ́ Yudani malo ni, odima táhɛ ye kĩ etsua lɛkpati.

Lɛmɛ bavãlɛvã batɛ badonɛ badi tsã tɛdake osi akũ biwo nɛ asɔli bati a kamɛ kĩ banaĩ bɛmɔ boe akũ akũ kadzi a kĩ bɔna nɛ ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ Kristo Yesu a. Bɛwɛ kĩ bakɛna boe basate bɛkpa be tɛmaniɛ a kĩ bɛnɛɛ a.
Lɛmɛ ayekĩ bɔwɛ kĩ kalɛ wĩ a ɔnɔkɔali a ɛdza pintii kɛkpa mi sũ ni, bɔtákpa be osi kɔlaa.

Lɛmɛ bati a kĩ badã ndɛ be nyɛ lɔtɔ banyanɛ a tákpa yĩ kɔdɛ kudima. Lɛmɛ ntɛ bɛnyɛ bati titiliwu badi malo ni, yĩ kɔ̃ ntsɛ́la, kitonɛkĩ Baguma ládã oti anɛ. Mbuki malɛ kĩ lɔtɔ banyanɛ a tákpa yĩ kɔdɛ vɔɛ̃ kudima.
Mbom bɛmɔ́ kĩ adzuma a kĩ Baguma do yĩ nɛ awɛ nyɛ kĩ nde lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ nkpã bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a, ndɛ ayekĩ edo ye nɛ Petro lɛmɛ awɛ kĩ ede lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ ɛkpa Yudafɔ a.
Kitonɛkĩ fɔtsã Baguma kɔbɛ̃ akũ, bɛkɛna yĩ fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ bɛkpa bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ ndɛ ayekĩ bɛkɛna Petro fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ bɛkpa Yudafɔ a.

Yakobo, mɔ Petro mɔ Yohanes, kĩ bɛkɛna ndɛ lɔtɔ banyanɛ a mɔ́ biyi ɔsũ kĩ Baguma lido yĩ adzuma pɔtii kĩĩ nɛ awɛ. Foesũ bigua bɔmɔ́ Barnaba bɛkɔa bɛtsa kĩ boe flee bɔnyɛ adzuma mɔa bakɛnanɛ. Bɔkɛna onukpɛ̃ mɔa kĩ bɔmɔ́ Barnaba bɔ́akɛna adzuma nɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a kamɛ, lɔkɔa be malo bɛkɛna adzuma nɛ Yudafɔ a kamɛ.
Lɛtsa a kĩ bivia bitomɛna boe sɛkɛ̃ nyɛ kĩ bute anɛ nɛ batɛ badonɛ ahiãfɔ a akũ, kĩ fɔnyɛ lɛtsa titiliwu a kĩ fɔasĩ yĩ akũ kĩ nkɛna.
Lɛmɛ kĩ Petro ya nɛ Antiokia a, ĩyidza ndza nɛ ye akũ nɛ kanade, kitonɛkĩ ɛkɛna lɛtsa kĩ lɛtáfɛta.

Fɔmɔ batɔ a kĩ Yakobo do a ayawo awã ni, Petro kado awɛ kanya mɔ batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a. Lɛmɛ kĩ bati a ya liti a, Petro vɛlɛ ye akũ nɛ be akũ, esĩ kanya mɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a, kitonɛkĩ evila be a kĩ batsa kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ oti ɛtsua lɛkpati a.
Yudafɔ batɛ badonɛ bɛbã a do kakɛna awɛ ndɛ babelibe bitomɔ Petro nɛ liti, ade Barnaba malo fɔ̃ libe lɛkɛnana kĩĩ nya ye akũ a.

Lɛmɛ kĩ mmɔ́ kĩ bɛtsɛ́ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali Kalɛ Wĩ a osi kpĩĩ akũ ni, mbi Petro nɛ bati a flee anɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ nɔ a kĩ ɔnyɛ Yudani, odzi nkpã ndɛ oti kĩ ɛnyɛ́ Yudani a ni, nde sũ mɔ finyaakĩĩ kɔ̃ ahɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a kĩ bidzi ndɛ Yudafɔ aye?”
Nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, Yudafɔ bɔanɛ kito nɛ kama kamɛ, ade ke nnɛ́ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ a bɔanɛ.

Lɛmɛ bunyina kĩ nnɛ́ oti a kĩ yakɛna nɛ mbla a akũ nyɛ oti kĩ ɛkpɔla nɛ Baguma anɛ, mbom oti kĩ ɛtɛ Kristo edo. Boe malo bɔtɛ Kristo Yesu budo, ayekĩ bɔ́akpɔla nɛ Baguma anɛ kĩ bɔtɛ Kristo budo sũ, lɛmɛ nnɛ́ nɛ mbla akũ kakɛna sũ. Kitonɛkĩ odima lɛláakpɔla nɛ Baguma anɛ, nɛ ayekĩ yakɛna nɛ mbla a akũ sũ.

Foesũ ntɛ bɔabɔa mbɔdi kĩ bɔakɛna bati kĩ bɛkpalɛ nɛ Baguma anɛ nɛ boe ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ Kristo sũ, mɔ bɛmɔ́ kĩ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ bɔanɛ ndɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a aye ni, katsa fɔatsa kĩ Kristo lɛmɛ tomɔ tɔkpa liti? Oowo, fɔlá lɔmɔ!
Ntɛ mbuki madzɛla mbla a akũ kakɛna a kĩ nfɔnɛ awɛ a ni, ke kɔ̃ ĩnyɛ yĩ akũ kanya ndɛ odi kĩ yaádi mbla a akũ.
Nɛ mbla a onukpɛ̃ ni, nku nkpa mbla a, ayekĩ maadzi nkpã nkpa Baguma.

Bɛbɔa bɔmɔ́ Kristo nɛ asendua akũ. Foesũ finyaa ni, nnɛ́ yĩ mɔawɛ a ndzi nkpã, mbom Kristo dzi nkpã nɛ yĩ kamɛ. Nkpã a kĩ ndzi finyaa nɛ sukɛna kamɛ a, ndzi ye nɛ Baguma Obi a kĩ yawɛ yĩ kalɛ, ɛkɔa ye akũ ɛbɔa afɔliɛ nɛ yĩ lɔlɔ a nɛ katɛkado kamɛ.
Maáwɛ kĩ masĩ Baguma kɔnyakamɔ a. Lɛmɛ ntɛ oti akpɔla nɛ Baguma anɛ nɛ ayekĩ ɛkɛna nɛ mbla akũ sũ ni, kekɔ̃ fɔatsa kĩ Kristo ku pupulidza!
Mi Galatiafɔ kĩ minyína kadi! Owei koũ libula mi lɔlɔ kamɛ kade lɔmɔ? Mi mɔawɛ anɛ kamɛ bɛnyɛ bɛtsa mi yededeede ayekĩ bɛbɔa Yesu Kristo nɛ asendua akũ a!
Mikpa yĩ kalɛ mɔa kĩĩ mbuayɛ. Baguma Hũhũ a kĩ mitɛ a ni, mbla a akũ mikɛna sũ, mbɔɛɛ kĩ Kalɛ Wĩ a mitse, mitɛ mido sũ mitɛ Hũhũ a?
Nde mitɛnɛ kadzimbi lɔmɔ! Mikɔa Baguma Hũhũ a miyi adzuma kayɔ a ni, finyaakɔ̃ miawɛ kĩ miwũna ye mɔ miawɛ kɔbɛ̃?
Mbɔɛɛ fɔtsa flee a kĩ foe kamɛ mitsã mitɛ̃ a dani fɔtsa pupulidza? Fɔláanya fɔtsa pupulidza da!
Ayekĩ miakɛna nɛ mbla a akũ sũ Baguma kpa mi Hũhũ yakɛna awãwã fɔtsa nɛ mi kamɛ, mbɔɛɛ nɛ ayekĩ mitse Baguma fɔlɛtsa a mitɛ foe mido sũ?
Midã Abraham kadzi kamɛ. Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Abraham tɛ Baguma edo, ade nɛ ye katɛkado sũ Baguma tɛ ye ndɛ oti kĩ ɛkpɔla.”
Foesũ kɛnɛ kĩ mianyi kĩ bati kĩ bɛtɛ bido nyɛ Abraham babi mɔ bawa.

Bɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ biyi kĩ Baguma aakɛna bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a bati kpĩĩ nɛ be katɛkado sũ. Ade foesũ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a bi Abraham Kalɛ Wĩ a kɔkɔɛ eyi kĩ, “Baguma aatsã nɔ akũ ehila katinya kamɛ fude flee.”
Abraham tɛ edo ade Baguma hila ye a. Foesũ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ edo ni, Baguma ahila ye ndɛ Abraham aye.
Lɛmɛ bati a kĩ bipi mbla a akũ kakɛna bido mɔ akũ ni, bidum be, kitonɛkĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaákɛna nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ lideĩ nɛ mbla a kamɛ ni, Baguma dumu ye!”

Nɛ foesũ finyaa foe kamɛ kpalɛ kĩ odima lɛláapuli ɛkɛna oti kpĩĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ nɛ mbla a akũ kakɛna sũ. Kitonɛkĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Oti a kĩ ɛtsã katɛkado kamɛ ɛkɛna oti kpĩĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ a, odi aadzi nkpã.”
Lɛmɛ mbla a lɛtsɛ́la oti katɛkado akũ. Mbom Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɛna nɛ mbla a flee akũ ni, yaatsã foe kamɛ edzi nkpã.”
Kĩ Kristo yadani fudumutsa nɛ boe lɔlɔ sũ ni, ɛnyɛ boe etomɛna mbla kadumu a kamɛ. Kitonɛkĩ bɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ, “Odi nyɛ odi kĩ bɛvɛla ye nɛ asendua akũ ni, Baguma dumu ye.”
Kristo kɛna fukĩĩ ayekĩ Baguma nhila a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi ɛkpa Abraham a aata mɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a, ade fɔtsãmɛna Kristo Yesu akũ, bɔ́atsã katɛkado kamɛ bɔtɛ Hũhũ a kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi a.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mawɛ kĩ makpa mi kadzi kamɛ nfantuhũ adi. Ntɛ bati nviã kɛna nhihiɛ adi, mɔ bɛtsɛlɛ ovoli bido awɛ nɛ kayɔ ni, odima lɛláapuli ɛnyɛ lɛtsama ĩye ɛkɔa lɛtsa bɛbã ebu.
Mite anɛ kĩ Abraham mɔ ye obi Baguma kɛna nhihiɛ ɛkpa. Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a tálɛ kĩ, “Abraham babi” kĩ fɔatsa kĩ bati beblebee, mbom ɛlɛ kĩ, “obi” kĩ fɔatsa kĩ oti mɔapɛ. Ade oti kĩĩ nyɛ Kristo a.

Lɛtsa a kĩ matsa nyɛ kĩ Baguma kɛna nhihiɛ ɛkpa Abraham mɔ ye obi, ade eke otse kĩ yaakɛna nɛ ye akũ a. Foesũ mbla a kĩ Baguma kpa Mose nɛ futeli ɔha ɛna mɔ foe taalɛ liti a, lɛláapuli ɛdani ĩye ɛwɔla Baguma nhihiɛ a.
Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ Baguma futetsa a tsã mbla akũ ni, kekɔ̃ fubuki fɔtsɛ́ ye nhihiɛ a akũ. Lɛmɛ Baguma mɔawɛ nhihiɛ yanɛ sũ ɛkɔa futetsa a ɛkpa Abraham.

Kekɔ̃, litsa sũ bɛkɛna mbla a? Bɛkɛna mbla a bibu ayekĩ oti aamɔ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛnyɛ tɔkpa, ade fɔwaa kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ Abraham obi a kĩ bɛkpa nhihiɛ a aaya. Baguma ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ lɛkɔa mbla a bɛma oti a kĩ edeĩ nɛ bati mɔ Baguma kayite.
Lɛmɛ kayite ɔnanɛ tásĩ ntɛ fɔnyɛ kĩ oti mɔapɛ akɛna nhihiɛ, ade Baguma mɔapɛ yanɛ a.

Katsa fukĩĩ atsa kĩ mbla a tia Baguma nhihiɛ a? Oowo. Fɔlá lɔmɔ! Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ batidziwa tɛ mbla adi kĩ yaapuli ɛkpa oti nkpã ni, kufɛ odi nyɛ odi aapuli ɛkɛna oti kpĩĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ, ntɛ ɛkɛna nɛ ye akũ.
Lɛmɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ katinya kamɛ flee deĩ nɛ tɔkpa kɔbɛ̃ kayɔ, foesũ futetsa a kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi nɛ Yesu Kristo katɛkado kamɛ a waa fɔkpa bikĩ bɛtɛ bido.
Lɛmɛ fɔmɔ Kristo katɛkado ya ni, mbla a pili boe flee edo nɛ kɔla ndɛ kɔla bawanɛ aye, kɛnawo lɔkɔ a kĩ baanyɛ Kristo katɛkado kĩĩ kanya.
Foesũ mbla a lɛkadãmɛna boe akũ kɛnawo kĩ Kristo ya, ayekĩ fɔ́atsã boe katɛkado kamɛ bɛkɛna boe bati kpĩĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ.
Finyaakĩĩ, kĩ katɛkado a yawo boe kamɛ a, mbla a buki ɛnyɛ́ boe ɔdãmɛnanɛ.
Ayekĩ mi flee mitɛ Kristo Yesu mido sũ ni, mi flee midani Baguma babi.
Mi a kĩ bɛwɔla mi mui, kĩ mikɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Kristo a, mido Kristo ndɛ atadiɛ aye.
Nɛ foesũ ntsitsemu adima buki ɛláa Yudafɔ mɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ kayite, mɔ basate ĩye bikĩ bidzi be akũ akũ, mɔ batsole ĩye banyole, mbom mi flee mikɛna ɔmɔa nɛ Kristo Yesu kamɛ.
Ntɛ minyɛ Kristo bade ni, kekɔ̃ minyɛ Abraham babi mɔ bawa, ade míakɛna fɔtsa a kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi a banyanɛ a.
Lɛmɛ lɛtsa a kĩ matsa nyɛ kĩ obinyole a kĩ ɛtábo tɔ̃ anɛ kĩ yaanya ɔlɛga adzapadiɛ ni, babu ye ndɛ ɔsate aye, titɔ kĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa nyɛ ye fude malo.
Lɔkɔ a kĩ ɛnyɛ obisɛ̃ a, bati deĩ kĩ badãmɛna ye mɔ ye fɔtsa a akũ kanaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ ɔlɛga yi ɛkpa ye fɔtsa a katɛ.
Ade ayea boe malo bɔna nɛ hũhũ kĩ yanya katinya kamɛ akũ kayɔ ndɛ basate aye, kɛyawo kĩ bubo anɛ nɛ hũhũ kɔbɛ̃ kamɛ.
Lɛmɛ kĩ lɔkɔ wĩ a wo ɔtɔ a, Baguma do ye mɔawɛ Obi ɛya. Ɛya ndɛ otidziwa kĩ otsole ma aye, edzi nkpã nɛ Yudafɔ mbla a kayɔ.
Baguma do ye kĩ ɛyaase kɔtɔ ɛnyɛ bikĩ bideĩ nɛ mbla a kayɔ, ayekĩ bɔ́adani bɔkɛna ye Baguma babi.
Kĩ Baguma wɛ kĩ yatsa kĩ minyɛ ye babi sũ ni, ɛkɔa ye Obi Hũhũ a edo nɛ boe tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ. Hũhũ kĩĩ abɔa fɔwɔla kĩ, “Ao Nda!”
Nɛ foesũ obuki ɔnyɛ́ ɔsate, mbom ɔnyɛ obi. Kĩ ɔnyɛ ye obi sũ ni, Baguma aakɔa lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ edeĩ ɛkpa ye babi a ɛkpa nɔ.
Kɔkɔɛ a kĩ minyína Baguma a, minya basate mikpa fɔtsa kumɛkumɛ kĩ fɔnyɛ́ Baguma.
Lɛmɛ finyaa kĩ minyina Baguma, ĩye maalɛ kĩ Baguma nyina mi a, nde sũ miawɛ kĩ miamuniki minaa hũhũ a kĩ ɛla kɔbɛ̃, kĩ ye akũ akɔ kɔnya a sɛkɛ̃? Nde sũ miawɛ kĩ miabuki mikɛna be basate?
Minyɛ fuwi fudi, tidetɔ tidi, fɔkɔ́ fudi mɔ futeli fudi koũ miyi miakɛna tɛmaniɛ nɛ foe akũ.
Mi fɔlɛtsa aha yĩ ɔwɔlɛ paa! Fɔakɛna ndɛ yĩ adzuma a kĩ nkɛna nɛ mi kamɛ a flee kɛna pupulidza.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, make mi aduli kĩ midani mikɛna ndɛ yĩ aye, kitonɛkĩ yĩ malo nkɛna yĩ akũ ndɛ mi aye. Mitákɛna tɔkpa tidima nɛ yĩ akũ.
Míate anɛ kĩ kĩ ĩnya lɔtɔ ĩyade lɛtsã nɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa a akũ nkpa mi a, nna nɛ fɔsɔ kamɛ.
Lɛmɛ titɔ kĩ ayekĩ yĩ akũ na a nya sɔhuiɛ baũ fɔkpa mi malo ni, yĩ akũ tákɔ mi kɔwɛ̃ misĩ yĩ katɛ, mbom mitɛ yĩ ndɛ Baguma ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ aye, ĩye ndɛ ayekĩ míatɛ Kristo Yesu mɔawɛ a.
Kawɔlɛ a kĩ mimɔ́ mɔ ɔmɛnɛ a kĩ mido nɛ yĩ akũ nɛ lɔkɔ a kamɛ a ni, nɛ ndia fudeĩ finyaa? Yĩ mɔawɛ maapuli nlɛ kĩ ntɛ kapuli míapuli kufɛ mibɔlɛ mi mɔawɛ banebi malo mikpa yĩ.
Kadani ndani mi okesĩnɛ finyaa kɔ̃, nɛ ayekĩ mbi mi ɔnɔkɔali a sũ?
Bati bɛbã kĩĩ a amɔ kawɔlɛ paa nɛ mi akũ, lɛmɛ baákɔna fɔtsa wĩ nɛ mi akũ. Lɛtsa a kĩ bawɛ nyɛ kĩ banyɛ mi nɛ yĩ akũ, ayekĩ míadani mimɔ́ kawɔlɛ nɛ be akũ ndɛ ayekĩ be malo bamɔ nɛ mi akũ a.
Fɔnɛnɛ kĩ bati amɔ kawɔlɛ nɛ mi fɔtsa wĩ kakɛna akũ, ntɛ be botaɛ a nɛnɛ daa, nnɛ́ ntɛ ndeĩ nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ odi.
Yĩ babi kĩ maátunɔ kalɛ! Mbuki manu kalɔɛ nɛ yĩ kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ sɛmɛ api ɔmatsɔ̃ kakpa mi, kɛnaawo kĩ Kristo ɔbla a aatɛ mi kamɛ.
Nwɛ kĩ mana nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ finyaakĩĩ kufɛ, ayekĩ maadɔla yĩ odo nɛ mi akũ ĩnyɛ ayekĩ mila a ntsa. Mi fɔlɛtsa aha yĩ ɔwɔlɛ paa!
Mi a kĩ miawɛ kĩ mbla a ɛnya mi akũ a, mikpa yĩ kalɛ kĩĩ mbuayɛ. Mbɔɛɛ mitánu lɛtsa a kĩ mbla a lɛ a?
Ɛlɛ kĩ Abraham ma babinyole nviã, ɔmɔa nyɛ ye ɔsatetsole a obi, ade ɔyade a nyɛ otsole a kĩ edzi ye akũ akũ a obi a.
Bɛma ɔsate obinyole a ndɛ ayekĩ otidziwa ama obi aye, lɛmɛ obinyole a kĩ otsole a kĩ edzi ye akũ akũ a ma a kɔ̃ ni, bɛma ye bɛtsãmɛna nɛ Baguma kalɛ kayi a onukpɛ̃.
Fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ nyɛ nfantuhũ. Batsole nviã kĩĩ dzɛ̃ bɛkpa apam atsu nviã. Be kamɛ ɔmɔa a kĩ ɛnyɛ Hagar dzɛ̃ ɛkpa apam a kĩ bɛkɛna nɛ Sinai ɔtɔ a akũ a, ade ye babi a kĩ ɛma a nyɛ basate a.
Hagar dzɛ̃ ɛkpa Sinai ɔtɔ nɛ Arabia tite akũ. Ade ye nyɛ nviã Yerusalem ɔmatɔ a, kitonɛkĩ ye mɔ ye bati a flee buki bideĩ nɛ tɛsate kamɛ.
Lɛmɛ ode Yerusalem a nyɛ otsole a kĩ edzi ye akũ akũ a, ade ye nyɛ boe ɔma a.
Kitonɛkĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ,
“Nɔ oduko, mɔ kawɔlɛ!
Bɔa fɔwɔla, kamɔ kawɔlɛ,
nɔ a kĩ ɔtámɔ tɔ̃ kama lubo.
Kitonɛkĩ otsole kĩ ɔnyɔ lɛtsɛ́la ye akũ a,
babi aapɔ bɛba otsole a kĩ ɔnyɔ deĩ nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ daa a bade.”
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, finyaa ni, mi malo minyɛ Baguma babi nɛ ye nhihiɛ a onukpɛ̃ ndɛ Isak aye.
Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ ni, obinyole a kĩ bɛma ndɛ ayekĩ otidziwa ama obi kɛkɛ a yidza ɛdza nɛ ekĩ bɛma nɛ Baguma Hũhũ kamɛ a akũ. Ade aye fubuki fɔla nviã kĩĩ malo a.
Lɛmɛ litsa Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ? Kɛlɛ kĩ, “Blɔmɛna ɔsatetsole a mɔ ye obinyole a bɛdzakũ, kitonɛkĩ ɔsate a obi a mɔ otsole a kĩ edzi ye akũ akũ obi lɛláasɛ̃ be ɔlɛga adzapadiɛ.”
Nɛ foesũ, nwaɛ̃ amɛ, bɔnyɛ́ ɔsatetsole a babi, mbom otsole a kĩ edzi ye akũ akũ a babi bɔanɛ.
Akũ akũ kadzi Kristo awɛ kĩ bɔna ade foesũ ɛnyɛ boe a. Nɛ foesũ midza pintii ndɛ bati kĩ bidzi be akũ akũ aye, mitafɔ̃ bibuki bɛkɛna mi basate.
Mitse fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ katse wĩ! Yĩ Paulo mabi mi kĩ ntɛ mifɔ̃ bitsua mi fɔkpati ni, fɔatsa kĩ Kristo buki ɛlá nfasɔ adima ɛkpa mi.
Mbuki masipi kĩ ntɛ odi tunɔ bitsua ye lɛkpati ni, kɛnɛ kĩ ɛkɛna nɛ mbla a flee akũ.
Mi a kĩ miawɛ kĩ miakɛna nɛ mbla a akũ lɔkɔa minya bati kĩ bɛkpɔla nɛ Baguma anɛ ni, minyɛ mi akũ nɛ Kristo akũ. Minɛ́ nɛ Baguma kɔnyakamɔ a kamɛ.
Boe kɔ̃ ni, kĩ bɔtɛ budo Baguma Hũhũ a sũ ni, bɔna ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ kĩ Baguma aakɛna boe bati kĩ bɛkpɔla.
Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ bɔkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Kristo Yesu ni, lɛkpati katsua ĩye de katatsua távɛmɛna lɛtsama. Lɛtsa a kĩ lisĩ nyɛ kĩ bɔ́alɛ katɛkado a kĩ kakɛna adzuma nɛ ɔdɔ kamɛ.
Mikabɔa mbɔdi paa kufɛ! Owei lisua mi osi kĩ mitakɛna nɛ ɔnɔkɔali osi a akũ?
Nnɛ́ Baguma a kĩ ɛvɛ mi a lɛdani mi adzuni.
Balɛ kĩ, “Fuyilatsa kabii bakɔa kado nɛ mbɔli kamɛ fɔmɔ yayila.”
Lɛmɛ nɛ boe ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ boe Ɔlate sũ ni, matɛ kado kĩ miláabuki mitɛ oti bɛbã adzuni kɛba yĩ ade. Lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛlamɛna mi adzuni kadani a ni, nde eti ɛla o-o, Baguma aavɛlɛ ye sɔtɔ kokooko.

Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, yĩ kɔ̃ ntɛ mbuki made lɛtsã kĩ lɛkpati katsua sĩ ni, nde sũ bati buki biyidza bɛdza nɛ yĩ akũ? Ntɛ fɔnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali ni, kekɔ̃ yĩ lɛtsã kade nɛ Kristo wuda nɛ asendua akũ a lɛláayamɛna ɔhau odima.
Mawɛ kĩ bati a kĩ batutulu mi a bipi akũ bɛnaa lɔtɔ bɛnyɛ be akũ tɛsaɛ lɔkɔa kalɛ kiwoli!
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mi kɔ̃ bɛvɛ mi kĩ mina mi akũ akũ kadzi. Lɛmɛ mitafɔ̃ mi akũ akũ kadzi kĩĩ lɛkpa mi osi mikɛna sukɛna fɔwɛtsa kpa, mbom mikɔa ɔdɔ misum mi akũ akũ.
Kitonɛkĩ mbla a ɔlɛdo flee nyɛ kĩ, “Wɛ nɔ ɔkɔba kalɛ ndɛ ayekĩ awɛ nɔ akũ a.”
Lɛmɛ ntɛ miakɛna mi akũ awɔda ndɛ bayaɛ kpa aye ni, midã kadã wĩ, ntɛ nnɛ́ aye míawɔla akũ.
Lɛtsa a kĩ malɛ nyɛ kĩ mifɔ̃ Hũhũ a ɛkpã mi nɛ mi nkpã kadzi kamɛ, ayekĩ miláakɔa akũ mikpa sukɛna fɔwɛtsa kpa kakɛna.

Kitonɛkĩ lɛtsa a kĩ oti kutidu awɛ a ayidza kadza nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ Hũhũ a awɛ a akũ. Ade lɛtsa a kĩ Hũhũ a awɛ a lɛmɛ ayidza kadza nɛ oti kutidu fɔwɛtsa a akũ a. Fɔtsa nviã kĩĩ akesĩ akũ, ade fɔatsa kĩ miláapuli mikɛna lɛtsa a kĩ miawɛ a.
Foesũ ntɛ Hũhũ akpã mi ni, mibuki miláa mbla a kayɔ.
Fɔtsa a kĩ oti kutidu akɛna a anɛ kawa yedede. Ade foe nyɛ litsolewɛ mɔ linyolewɛ, fɔtsa a kĩ fɔado akũ efĩĩ, kɔkɔbato,
baviɔ̃ kasum, mɔ kabɔ katsɔ. Fɔbɛbã nyɛ likesĩ, ɔdzɛ kakɛna, anɛngbã, kalɔkpa kana, yĩ odi fude kalɛ, bati kayalɛ mɔ kasɛ̃ nɛ kutsu kutsu kamɛ,

lineke kanɔ, bavɛ kawuga, kawɔlɛ kamɔ mɔ kuto kpa katɛ̃ ɔbɛ̃, mɔ fɔtsa bɛbã ndɛ fukĩĩ bamɛ. Mbuki madɛ mi finyaa ndɛ ayekĩ ĩnya lɔtɔ ndɛ mi a, kĩ bikĩ bakɛna fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ odu a lɛláanaa Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ.
Lɛmɛ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔanɛ kato Hũhũ a kamɛ nyɛ ɔdɔ, kawɔlɛ, lukudɔ, ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ, sɛmɛkalɛ, tuwĩ kakɛna, fɔtsa kakɛna nɛ osi wĩ akũ,
akũ kadɔla mɔ akũ akũ kanya. Mbla adima lɛláa kĩ etia fukĩĩ flee kamɛ fudima.
Bati a kĩ bɛnyɛ Kristo Yesu bade a, kɔa be sukɛna bɛbɔa bɛmɛna nɛ asendua akũ, mɔ sɛ fɔwɛtsa mɔ ɔbla kpa flee.
Ntɛ Hũhũ a akpã boe ni, kekɔ̃ mifɔ̃ ye ɛkpã boe nɛ boe kadzi kamɛ.
Mitafɔ̃ bɔdɛla akũ nɛ ode, ĩye budo akũ kalɔkpa, ĩye bɔna anɛngbã nɛ boe akũ akũ.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ntɛ mi kamɛ odi kɛna tɔkpa tidi ni, mi a kĩ Baguma Hũhũ a deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ a, mikɔa ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ midɛ ye ɛdani ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ. Midã mi mɔawɛ a akũ kadã wĩ ayekĩ mi malo bɛláasɔ mi bɛdã.
Mibumɛna akũ akũ nɛ ɔhau adi nyɛ adi kamɛ, lɔkɔa nɛ osi kĩĩ akũ ni, míakɛna nɛ Kristo mbla a akũ.
Ntɛ odi abu ye akũ kĩ ɛnyɛ oti odi odu lɛmɛ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ɛnyɛ́ lɛtsama a, ye odi akũ yakɛ.
Odi nyɛ odi ɛdzɛmɔ ye mɔawɛ akũ ɛdã. Ntɛ fɔnɛnɛ ni, owula aapuli epia nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ɛkɛna a akũ, kɛtánɛ kĩ yakɔa ye fɔkɛlatsa ɛkɔna mɔ oti bɛbã fude.
Kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi aalɔ ye mɔawɛ fɔlɔtsa.
Ntɛ batsa odi Kristo fɔlɛtsa a ni, kɛnɛ kĩ oti a ɛkpa ye fɔtsa ɔtsanɛ a ye fɔtsa wĩ flee a kĩ edeĩ a fudi.
Mitakɛ mi akũ, kitonɛkĩ odima lɛmɛ lɛláapuli ebu Baguma tɛkɔasia. Lɛtsa a kĩ oti du a, ade foe mɔapɛ a yaana a.
Ntɛ edu fɔtsa nɛ sukɛna fɔwɛtsa kamɛ ni, lɛtsa a kĩ yaana etomɛna foe kamɛ nyɛ wuda. Lɛmɛ ntɛ edu fɔtsa nɛ Hũhũ a fɔwɛtsa kamɛ ni, yaana nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a etomɛna ye kamɛ.
Mitafɔ̃ akpɔ liveli boe nɛ tuwĩ kakɛna kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ ntɛ akpɔ táveli boe ni, lɔkɔ aaya kĩ bɔ́ana foe akũ nfasɔ.
Nɛ foesũ kĩ lɔkɔ buki lideĩ lɛkpa boe sũ ni, mifɔ̃ bɔkɛna tuwĩ bɔkpa odi nyɛ odi, titiliwu bikĩ bɔmɔ́ be bɛkɛna ɔmɔa nɛ Kristo katɛkado kamɛ a.
Midã ayekĩ yĩ mɔawɛ nkɔa katsɛlɛ baũ baũ matsɛlɛ mi ovoli finyaa!
Bati a kĩ bawɛ kĩ bahɛ mi mitsua fɔkpati a nyɛ bikĩ bata akũ, kawɛ kĩ bawo bati anɛ. Lɛtsa a sũ kĩ bakɛna fukĩĩ nyɛ kĩ bɛtáwɛ kĩ bana liti katomɛna nɛ Kristo wuda nɛ asendua akũ a.
Bati a kĩ batsua fɔkpati a malo lákɛna nɛ mbla a akũ. Bawɛ kĩ mitsua fɔkpati ayekĩ baapuli bipia kĩ miakɛna nɛ be amaniɛ akũ.

Lɛmɛ yĩ kɔ̃ ni, maapia nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo wuda nɛ asendua akũ a odi akũ. Kitonɛkĩ fɔtsã Kristo wuda kamɛ ni, bɛbɔa katinya kamɛ nɛ asendua akũ bɛkpa yĩ, ade nɛ Kristo wuda kamɛ lɛmɛ fɔtsã bɛbɔa yĩ malo nɛ asendua akũ bɛkpa katinya kamɛ.
Ntɛ bitsua odi lɛkpati ĩye bɛtátsua ye ni, fɔnyɛ́ lɛtsama. Lɛtsa a kĩ lisĩ nyɛ kĩ oti a dani ɛkɛna oti vɔɛ̃.
Baguma ɛmɔ bati a kĩ bitomɔ osi kĩĩ nɛ be nkpã kamɛ a kɔnya, ɛkpa be lukudɔ lɛmɛ. Ɛkɛna foe lɔmɔ lɛmɛ ɛkpa Baguma bati a flee.
Kito finyaa kanaa ni, odima ɛtabuki ɛkpa yĩ ɔhau odima, kitonɛkĩ fuloi nɛ yĩ akũ a atsa kĩ ĩnyɛ Yesu ɔsate.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo ɛmɔ mi hũhũ flee kɔnya. Fɔya lɔmɔ.
Ephesians: Yĩ Paulo kĩ ĩyadani Kristo Yesu fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ nɛ Baguma kawɛ onukpɛ̃, lɛtsɛlɛ ovoli kĩĩ mamɛna mi Baguma bati nɛ Efeso a kĩ miadi ɔnɔkɔali nɛ mi kadzi kamɛ, mikɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Kristo Yesu a.
Baguma boe Ɔlɛga, mɔ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo bɛmɔ mi kɔnya bɛkpa mi lukudɔ lɛmɛ.
Mifɔ̃ bɔnyɛ Baguma boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo Ɔlɛga a kɔlɛ, kitonɛkĩ nɛ ayekĩ bɔkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Kristo sũ ni, ɛkpa boe hũhũ kamɛ nhila adi nyɛ adi kĩ edeĩ nɛ ode katinya a kamɛ a.
Fɔmɔ Baguma labɔa katinya malo ni, ɛpau boe eyi kɔkɔɛ kĩ bɔ́anya ye bade fɔtsã ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ Kristo akũ, ayekĩ bɔ́akɛna bati kpalɛwa kĩ nfumusu adima lɛláa be akũ nɛ ye anɛ.
Ayekĩ Baguma awɛ boe kalɛ sũ ni, ehihiɛ kɔkɔɛ kĩ fɔ́atsã Kristo akũ yaakɛna boe ye babi. Ade fukĩĩ koũ nyɛ ye kakɔna mɔ kawɔlɛ a.
Nɛ foesũ mifɔ̃ bumu Baguma, nɛ kɔnya baũ a kĩ ɛmɔ boe faa ɛtsãmɛna ye Obi kĩ yaátunɔ kalɛ a akũ!
Kitonɛkĩ fɔtsã Kristo babɔanɛ kawula kamɛ sũ ni, bɔna katɛ, ade foe nyɛ kĩ Baguma kɔa boe tɔkpa ete boe. Midã ayekĩ Baguma kɔnya a kĩ ɛmɔ́ boe, ɛkpa boe nyansã mɔ fɔtsa kayɔkanu a pɔnɛ!
Kitonɛkĩ fɔtsã Kristo babɔanɛ kawula kamɛ sũ ni, bɔna katɛ, ade foe nyɛ kĩ Baguma kɔa boe tɔkpa ete boe. Midã ayekĩ Baguma kɔnya a kĩ ɛmɔ́ boe, ɛkpa boe nyansã mɔ fɔtsa kayɔkanu a pɔnɛ!
Baguma fɔ̃ bunyi nhihiɛ a kĩ ɛkɛna ɛkɔla eyi anɛ kɔkɔɛ, kĩ yaawũna ɛtsãmɛna Kristo akũ a.
Nhihiɛ a nyɛ kĩ ntɛ lɔkɔ a wo ɔtɔ ni, Baguma aakpɔta lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ɛbɔa nɛ tite mɔ ode a ɛkɔa edo nɛ Kristo kayɔ.
Baguma fɔ̃ bɛkɛna lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa nɛ ye kawɛ mɔ nhihiɛ onukpɛ̃. Ade ɛpau boe kĩ bɔnya ye mɔawɛ bati nɛ ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ Kristo kamɛ, nɛ ye kawɛ mɔ kalɛkayi, nɛ kayɔkayi a onukpɛ̃.
Nɛ foesũ mifɔ̃ boe a kĩ bɔnya lɔtɔ bɔadã Kristo anɛ a, bumu Baguma kukũkpalɛ a.
Ade mi malo, kĩ minu ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a kĩ kɛnyɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a, kĩ kɛma mi nkpã katɛ a, midani Baguma bati. Ayekĩ mitɛ Kristo mido sũ ni, Baguma kɔa Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi a eyi mi ɔsũ kĩ minya ye bade.
Hũhũ Kpalɛwa kĩĩ nyɛ kasipi kĩ bɔ́atɛ lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi ɛkpa ye bati a. Kasipi kĩĩ akpa boe anɛ kate kĩ Baguma aakpa bati a kĩ bɛnyɛ ye bade a akũ akũ kadzi. Mifɔ̃ bumu ye kukũkpalɛ a!
Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ, kito anɛ kĩ nnu kĩ mitɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu mido, miawɛ Baguma bati a flee kalɛ a,
ntáfɔ̃ Baguma kɔlɛ kanyɛ nɛ mi lɔlɔ. Mate anɛ nɛ mi akũ nɛ yĩ mpaɛbɔ kamɛ,
ade mawã Baguma, boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo Ɔlɛga, kĩ ɛnyɛ kukũkpalɛ flee a, kĩ ɛkpa mi Hũhũ a kĩ yaakpa mi nyansã, ɛnyɛ Baguma ɛtsa mi ayekĩ míanyi ye kanyi wĩ.
Make Baguma aduli kĩ ebinya mi anɛ mipuli mimɔ ye ɔhaĩ a, ayekĩ míanyi lɛtsa a kĩ de akũ ɛvɛ mi ɛkpa kĩ midã anɛ a. Ye awãwã nhila a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi kĩ yaakpa ye bati a kĩ bɛkpalɛ be akũ a atɛ kɔya paa.
Midã ayekĩ ye kɔbɛ̃ kpale a akɛna adzuma nɛ boe a kĩ bɔtɛ ye budo a kamɛ. Kɔbɛ̃ kĩĩ kĩ kɔakɛna adzuma nɛ boe kamɛ a,
ketimɔ kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ Baguma kɔa ɛdzɛla Kristo etomɛna kanɔkpa, ɛkɔa ye edzina nɛ ye sɔmɔna nɛ ode flee a.
Ade awã Kristo anya lɛgã nɛ ode fɔgã flee, bati kĩ bideĩ otumi flee, bati kĩ bideĩ kɔbɛ̃ flee mɔ balate flee akũ a. Ye lɛgã kadzakɔ̃ bɛ̃ lɛgã nyɛ lɛgã kadzakɔ̃ nɛ katinya kĩĩ mɔ kikĩ kaaya a kamɛ.
Baguma kɔa lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa edo nɛ Kristo abɔa kayɔ ade ɛkɔa ye ɛkpa asɔli a ndɛ ye lɔlɔ nɛ fɔtsa flee kamɛ a.
Asɔli kĩĩ nyɛ Kristo sukɛna, kĩ sɛfɔ̃ asɔli a kpɔla, ade Kristo mɔawɛ lɛmɛ afɔ̃ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa akpɔla nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ a.
Kɔkɔɛ a, nɛ mi atɔ ɔsĩ mɔ tɔkpa sũ ni, miku nɛ hũhũ kamɛ.

Nɛ lɔkɔ na kamɛ a, midzi nkpã nɛ katinya kamɛ tisi akũ. Mikɔa akũ mikpa kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ kɔanya lɛgã nɛ ɔwɛ kamɛ hũhũ a akũ a. Ade koe nyɛ hũhũ a kĩ finyaa yakɛna adzuma nɛ bati a kĩ baátse Baguma ɔlɛdo a kamɛ a.

Nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, boe flee bɔna ndɛ be, budzi nkpã nɛ boe sukɛna fɔwɛtsa onukpɛ̃, bɔkakɛna fɔtsa a kĩ boe sukɛna mɔ adzuni awɛ a. Nɛ katinya kamɛ ɔbla kpa a kĩ edeĩ nɛ boe kamɛ sũ ni, Baguma na kalɔkpa nɛ boe akũ ndɛ ayekĩ ɛna nɛ batidziwa kasinu flee a akũ a.
Lɛmɛ kĩ Baguma deĩ kɔnyakamɔ, mɔ ɔdɔ baũ ɛkpa boe sũ ni,
titɔ kĩ boe tɔkpa fɔ̃ buku nɛ hũhũ kamɛ malo a, ɛfɔ̃ bɔna nkpã nɛ Kristo kamɛ. Baguma sɛmɛkalɛ odi sũ mina nkpã katɛ.
Ayekĩ bɔkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Yesu Kristo sũ ni, Baguma dzɛla boe mɔ ye etomɛna kanɔkpa kĩ bɔnya lɛgã mɔ ye nɛ ode.
Baguma kɛna fukĩĩ kĩ yanyɛ ye sɛmɛkalɛ baũ a kĩ edeĩ ɛkpa boe nɛ lɔkɔ flee kamɛ a, nɛ ayekĩ edeĩ ɔdɔ ɛkpa boe nɛ Kristo sũ a.
Baguma sɛmɛkalɛ odi, mɔ mi katɛkado akũ fɔtsã sũ mina katɛ. Nnɛ́ mi mɔawɛ mbɔdi kabɔa kamɛ futo, mbom Baguma futetsa fɔanɛ kĩ odima lɛláapuli ɛkɔa foe epia.
Baguma sɛmɛkalɛ odi, mɔ mi katɛkado akũ fɔtsã sũ mina katɛ. Nnɛ́ mi mɔawɛ mbɔdi kabɔa kamɛ futo, mbom Baguma futetsa fɔanɛ kĩ odima lɛláapuli ɛkɔa foe epia.
Baguma lɛbɔa boe mɔ ye mɔawɛ awɛ, kĩ bɔkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Kristo Yesu, budzi nkpã bɔkɛna adzuma wĩ a kĩ ye mɔawɛ a ɛkɔa eyi kĩ bɔyaakɛna a.
Mite anɛ kĩ kɔkɔɛ a, nnɛ́ Yudafɔ babi mianɛ. Yudafɔ a kĩ bitsua fɔkpati a avũna mi kĩ bati kĩ bɛtátsua fɔkpati. Lɛmɛ lɛkpati katsua nyɛ sukɛna katsua kɛkɛ, kĩ otidziwa lɛkɔa awɛ ɛkɛna foe.

Mite anɛ kĩ nɛ lɔkɔ na kamɛ a, mina mɔ lugo nɛ Kristo sɛkɛ̃. Minya banɔvɔɛ̃ kĩ bɛtána nɛ bati a kĩ Baguma pau a kamɛ. Mitána nɛ apam a kĩ Baguma kɛna mɔ fɔtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi ɛkpa ye bati a kamɛ. Midzi nɛ katinya kamɛ kĩ mitána anɛ kate nɛ lɛtsama akũ, ade mitána Baguma adima a.
Lɛmɛ finyaakĩĩ fɔtsã Kristo Yesu wuda kamɛ bɛkpã mi a kĩ mina mɔ lugo a mifuã miyakɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Kristo.
Kitonɛkĩ Kristo mɔawɛ a lɛkɔa lukudɔ ɛma boe, ɛkɛna bikĩ bɛnyɛ Yudafɔ mɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a ɔmɔa. Ɛkɔa ye mɔawɛ sukɛna ɛnyɛ likesĩ ndɛ seebi a nɛ be kayite.
Ɛwɔla Yudafɔ mbla mɔ ye akũ tɛmaniɛ a, ayekĩ yaakpɔta bati kutsu nviã a bɛkɛna oti vɔɛ̃ mɔa mɔ ye, lɔkɔa lukudɔ lɛya.
Kristo tsã ye wuda nɛ asendua akũ a kamɛ ɛwɔla likesĩ a kĩ lideĩ nɛ be kamɛ a. Eboomu fude nviã a, bɛkɛna ɔmɔa ade bɛdani bɛya nɛ Baguma sɛkɛ̃ a.
Foesũ Kristo yade lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a lukudɔ akũ ɛkpa bati flee, bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a kĩ bɛna mɔ lugo nɛ Baguma sɛkɛ̃ a, mɔ Yudafɔ a kĩ bifuã Baguma a.
Kristo akũ fɔtsã mɔ boe a kĩ bɔnyɛ Yudafɔ mɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a bɔ́apuli bɔtsã Hũhũ a akũ bɔya nɛ Ɔlɛga a sɛkɛ̃.
Nɛ foesũ ni, mi a kĩ minyɛ́ Yudafɔ a mibuki minyɛ́ basitsãnɛ ĩye banɔvɔɛ̃, mbom finyaa mimɔ Baguma bati a midani kade mɔa bati mɔ Baguma kɔla babi.
Bike mi malo mite nɛ seebi sɛyɔde a kĩ fɔtɔ banyanɛ mɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a ke a akũ, ade Kristo Yesu mɔawɛ nyɛ́ kɔla a akũ de titiliwu a.
Ade ye pini kɔla akũ fɔtsa a flee ɛkpɔta a, kafɔ̃ kɔabo anɛ kakɛna ndɛ afɔliɛ kɔla kpalɛwa kakpa Baguma a.
Nɛ mi ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ Kristo kamɛ a, bɛkɔa mi malo bibumɔ be nkaɛ a bake kɔla a kĩ Baguma aadzi nɛ Hũhũ kamɛ a.
Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ ni, yĩ, Paulo, kĩ bido nɛ kɔla nɛ Kristo Yesu mɔ mi a kĩ minyɛ́ Yudafɔ a sũ, mabɔa mpaɛ kakpa Baguma.
Matɛ kado kĩ minu ayekĩ Baguma mɔ́ yĩ kɔnya, ɛkpa yĩ adzuma kĩĩ kĩ nkɛna nkpa mi kalɛ.
Ndɛ ayekĩ ntsɛlɛ foe lukũ mma mi ĩyatɛ̃ a, Baguma nyɛ ye nhihiɛ a kĩ ɛkɛna ɛkɔla a ɛtsa yĩ.
Ntɛ miakã ovoli a ni, míapuli mimɔ́ ayekĩ nnu Kristo fɔtsa kɔlawa a kayɔ.
Nɛ kɔkɔɛ lɔkɔ a, Baguma tányɛ nhihiɛ kɔlawa kĩĩ ɛtsa batidziwa, lɛmɛ finyaa ni, Baguma nyɛ foe ɛtsa ɛtsãmɛna Hũhũ a akũ ɛkpa ye fɔtɔ banyanɛ kpalɛwa mɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a.
Nhihiɛ kɔlawa a nyɛ kĩ fɔtsã Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a lɛmɛ kɛna ndɛ Yudafɔ aye. Bɛkɛna sukɛna mɔapɛ a bati, kĩ bɛna tsɛfã nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi ɛtsãmɛna Kristo Yesu akũ a kamɛ.
Baguma tsã ye kɔbɛ̃ akũ ɛmɔ yĩ kɔnya ɛkɔa yĩ ɛkɛna Kalɛ Wĩ kĩĩ ɔsumunɛ.
Titɔ kĩ ĩnyɛ obisɛ̃de kɔlaa nɛ Baguma bati a kamɛ malo ni, Baguma mɔ yĩ kɔnya kĩ nkɔa fɔtsa wĩ beblebee a kĩ fudeĩ nɛ Kristo kamɛ, kĩ fɔtɛ kɔya baũ lɛmɛ a nde lɛtsã nkpa bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a.
Ade edo yĩ kĩ nfɔ̃ bati flee binyi ayekĩ Baguma nhihiɛ kɔlawa a aanɛ kanya ɛkɛna adzuma. Baguma kĩ ye nyɛ fɔtsa flee ɔbɔanɛ a, kɔa fɔtsa ɛkɔla anɛ kɔkɔɛ,
ayekĩ nɛ finyaa lɔkɔ kamɛ, baatsã asɔli bati a akũ bɛnyɛ Baguma nyansã ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ a bɛtsa fɔgã mɔ otumifɔ a kĩ banya akũ nɛ ode katinya kamɛ a.
Fukĩĩ nyɛ Baguma nhihiɛ kĩ ɛlá kawũna a kĩ ɛkɛna eyi anɛ kɔkɔɛ, ade fɔtsã boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo akũ fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ a.
Ayekĩ bɔkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Kristo, bɔtɛ ye budo lɛmɛ sũ ni, budeĩ ɔwɔlɛ kado kĩ bɔ́apuli bɔnaa Baguma anɛ faa.
Nɛ foesũ make mi aduli, mitafɔ̃ akpɔ liveli mi nɛ lubo a kĩ mamɔ nɛ mi lɔlɔ a sũ, kitonɛkĩ foe flee fɔ́anya mi nfasɔ.
Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ ni, nke aduli mabɔa mpaɛ nɛ boe Ɔlɛga a,
kĩ ɛla katete kadi nyɛ kadi nɛ tite mɔ ode anɛ. Ade ye ate ke dĩ lɛmɛ a.
Mabaɔ mpaɛ kĩ Baguma ɛtsã ye Hũhũ akũ edo mi ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ kudeĩ nɛ ye kukũkpalɛ beblebee kamɛ a.
Mabɔa mpaɛ kĩ mi katɛkado kɛfɔ̃ Kristo ɛna nɛ mi kamɛ. Mabɔa mpaɛ lɛmɛ kĩ midza pintii nɛ ɔdɔ kamɛ,
ayekĩ mi mɔ Baguma bati a flee míana kɔbɛ̃ minu Kristo ɔdɔ a kadzɛlɛ mɔ ye lugo, ye kade mɔ kadzũ a kayɔ.
Baguma ɛfɔ̃ miyaanyi Kristo ɔdɔ a, titɔ kĩ otidziwa lɛláapuli enu foe kayɔ dzununuunu eyua malo, ayekĩ Baguma kutidu a aatɛ mi kamɛ flee.
Baguma a kĩ yapuli kakɛna fukĩ bɔavia a flee mɔ fukĩ bɔakɛna a, nɛ kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ kɔakɛna adzuma nɛ boe kamɛ a,
ade ye kade nyɛ kamu nɛ asɔli bati a mɔ Kristo Yesu kamɛ, fɔnaa kasinu flee kamɛ, kito finyaakĩĩ kanaa daa daa! Fɔya lɔmɔ.
Foesũ yĩ a kĩ nwaa kɔla nɛ ayekĩ masum boe Ɔlate sũ a, makpa mi kɔdɛ kĩ midzi nkpã a kĩ yaaketi mɔ ayekĩ Baguma vɛ mi kĩ midzi a.
Midɔla mi akũ, minya bati dɔwa, mina ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ. Minyɛ mi ɔdɔ mitsa nɛ mi kamɛ nɛ ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ kana kamɛ.
Nɛ ayekĩ mikɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Hũhũ a sũ ni, mibɔa mbɔdi mipi ɔmɔa kakɛna midomɔ akũ nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ.
Sukɛna mɔapɛ mɔ Hũhũ mɔapɛ deĩ, ade ayea budeĩ kɔnɛte nɛ lɛtsa mɔapɛ a kĩ Baguma vɛ boe ɛkpa a akũ a.
Ɔlate mɔapɛ mɔ katɛkado mɔapɛ deĩ, ade mui kawɔla mɔapɛ lɛmɛ deĩ a.
Ade ayea budeĩ Baguma mɔapɛ, batidziwa flee Ɔlɛga kĩ ɛnyɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa Ɔlate a. Yakɛna adzuma katsãmɛna boe flee akũ, ade edeĩ nɛ boe flee kamɛ a.
Boe kamɛ odi nyɛ odi tɛ futetsa pɔtii fudi kĩ fuketimɔ kɔnyakamɔ a kĩ Kristo kpa a.
Ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ,
“Kĩ ede ɛnaa ode flee a, ɛkpã bati pii a kĩ bideĩ nɛ ndom kamɛ a ebumɔ ye akũ,
ɛsɛ̃ futetsa ɛkpa batidziwa.”
Finyaa, kĩ bɛlɛ kĩ ede ɛnaa ode flee a ni, foe kayɔ nyɛ litsa? Foe kamɛ kpalɛ kĩ ɛnya lɔtɔ ɛka ɛnaa tite ɔda flee a.
Foesũ oti a kĩ ɛka ɛnaa tite ɔda flee a, ade ye mɔapɛ a lide ɛnaa ode flee a, ayekĩ yaatɛ katinya flee a kamɛ.
Ade ye lite batidziwa futetsa, ɛpau bati kĩ bɛnya fɔtɔ banyanɛ, babɛbã onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ, badi lɛtsã badenɛ, badi bɛnya batɛ badonɛ akũ badãmɛnanɛ mɔ fɔtsa batsanɛ.
Ɛkɛna fukĩĩ ayekĩ yaalɔla Baguma bati a flee ɛkpa Kristo adzuma kakɛna, lɔkɔa bido Kristo sukɛna a kĩ sɛnyɛ asɔli bati a kɔbɛ̃.
Foesũ boe flee bɔ́akɛna ɔmɔa nɛ boe katɛkado kamɛ, lɔkɔa bunyi Baguma Obi a lɛmɛ. Fɔ́afɔ̃ bubo anɛ buketi mɔ Kristo, bɔna ye kutitse flee a.
Lɔkɔa bɔláabuki bɔnya ndɛ babisɛ̃ kĩ bavãlɛvã fɔtsa katsa vɔɛ̃ fudi nyɛ fudi abɔa be katomɛna katɛ̃mɛna ndɛ ɔwɛ aye, ade tɛdake bati akɛ be kado nɛ be adzuni tɔkpa kamɛ a.
Nɛ foe kadokɔ̃ ni, ntɛ bɔalɛ ɔnɔkɔali nɛ ɔdɔ kamɛ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ bubo anɛ nɛ osi nyɛ osi akũ nɛ Kristo kĩ ɛnyɛ lɔlɔ a kamɛ.
Ade ye pini sukɛna fɔtsakɔ̃ fɔtsakɔ̃ mɔ tisĩ fɔatsa mɔ akũ kakɛna adzuma a. Foesũ ntɛ sukɛna kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ akɛna se adzuma ndɛ ayekĩ kɛfɛta ni, oti mɔawɛ a abo anɛ kana ɔsĩ nɛ ɔdɔ kamɛ.
Foesũ mabi mi nɛ boe Ɔlate dĩ akũ kĩ mitabuki midzi nkpã ndɛ bati a kĩ binyína Baguma, kĩ be adzuni adã faa faa,
ade be lɔlɔ kamɛ mɔ fɔlɛtsa kayɔkanu lɛmɛ deĩ nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ a. Ayekĩ binyína lɛtsama, bideĩ atɔ ɔsĩ lɛmɛ sũ ni, nkpã a kĩ bidzi a táketi mɔ nkpã a kĩ Baguma awɛ kĩ ye bati bidzi a.
Bibuki bɛlá kɔnyɔã nɛ lɛtsama akũ, foesũ bɛkɔa be akũ bɛkpa tɔkpa mɔ fɔtsa kumɛkumɛ a kĩ fɔado akũ efĩĩ kakɛna.
Midã, nnɛ́ fɔtsa kĩĩ odu mikɔlɛ nɛ Kristo akũ!
Fɔnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali kĩ minu Yesu nkã, ade ndɛ bati kĩ bitomɛna ye ni, bɛtsa mi ɔnɔkɔali a kĩ edeĩ nɛ ye kamɛ a.
Foesũ mifɔnɛ mi ɔbla kpa kɔɛ a kĩ midzi mitɛ̃ a awɛ. Fɔwɛtsa kĩ fɔakɛ bati libula mi nkpã a kĩ midzi tɔ̃ a kade.
Midani mi tɔwɔlɛ mɔ mi adzuni kamɛ fɔkɛna fɔtsa vɔɛ̃,
mibɔa ɔbla vɔɛ̃ kĩ ɛla ndɛ Baguma kutidu a, kĩ yanyɛ akũ katsa nɛ nkpã wĩ kĩ ɛkpalɛ kamɛ a aye. Ɛna nɛ mi akũ ndɛ atadiɛ aye.
Foesũ mifɔ̃ fɔvã kama! Kɛnɛ kĩ odi nyɛ odi edi ɔnɔkɔali ɛkpa ye ɔkɔba ɔtɛ odonɛ, kitonɛkĩ boe flee bɔnyɛ Kristo sukɛna a akũ sɛkɛ sidi.
Ntɛ mina kalɔkpa ni, mitafɔ̃ kalɔkpa lɛfɔ̃ mikɛna tɔkpa, ade mitafɔ̃ kade lɛdɔ nɛ mi kalɔkpa a akũ.
Mitakpa Abonsam osi odima.
Oti a kĩ ɛkaye a ɛfɔ̃ kaye. Ɛkɔa awɛ ɛkɛna adzuma ayekĩ yaana ɛnya nɛ foe kamɛ, ete ahiãfɔ lɛmɛ fɔtsa.
Mitafɔ̃ tuwuli kpa lɛnɛ nɛ mi onukpɛ̃, mbom milɛ tuwuli wĩ kĩ taabumɔ bati a kĩ batse mi nɛ lɔkɔ a odu kamɛ a, lɔkɔa fɔvɛlɛ nhila fɔma be.
Mitakɛna lɛtsa a kĩ laawo Baguma Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a kalɔɛ, kitonɛkĩ Hũhũ a Baguma kɔa eyi mi ɔsũ, esipi kĩ Baguma aatɛ mi nɛ Luwi nkaɛ a akũ.
Mifɔnɛ kako katɛ awɛ, minyɛ kalɔkpa mɔ likesĩ nɛ mi kamɛ. Ade ayea mifɔ̃ awũni mɔ bati buĩ kanyɛ, mɔ adzuni kpa kakɛna nɛ bati akũ a.
Nɛ foe kadokɔ̃ ni, mikɛna sɛmɛ kalɛ mina ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ mikpa akũ. Mikɔa tɔkpa mite akũ ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma lɛmɛ kɔa ete mi ɛtsãmɛna Kristo akũ a.
Ayekĩ minyɛ Baguma babi kĩ yawɛ kalɛ sũ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ miabɔa mbɔdi mina ndɛ ye aye.
Kɛnɛ kĩ ɔdɔ ɛnya mi kadzi kamɛ akũ ndɛ ayekĩ Kristo wɛ boe kalɛ, ɛkɔa ye akũ ɛkpa nɛ boe lɔlɔ ndɛ futetsa mɔ ɔlɛ̃ kĩ bɛkɔa bɛbɔa bɛkpa Baguma, fuwo ye anɛ.
Nɛ ayekĩ minyɛ babi kĩ bɛkpalɛ be akũ sũ ni, kɛtáfɛta kĩ adɔpaa, efĩĩ fɔtsa mɔ anɛngbã lɛkɛnana anɛ nɛ mi kamɛ malo.
Ade ayea kɛtánɛ kĩ mialɛ okendze tuwuli, tuwuli kĩ taálɛ katse, ĩye kĩ takɔ kɔnyɔã. Nɛ fukĩĩ kadokɔ̃ ni, mikaanyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ.
Minu foe kayɔ kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yabɔa adɔpaa, yado ye akũ efĩĩ, mɔ edeĩ anɛngbã, kitonɛkĩ anɛngbã keti mɔ baviɔ̃ kasum a, ɛláana tsɛfã nɛ Kristo mɔ Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ da.
Mitafɔ̃ odima lɛkɔa tɔkɔsia tuwuli ɛkɛ mi, kitonɛkĩ ade foe bamɛ sũ Baguma sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ aaya nɛ bikĩ bideĩ atɔ ɔsĩ a akũ a.
Foesũ mimɔ bati a na odu mitakɛna ɔmɔa.
Kitonɛkĩ, mi mɔawɛ a mina nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ tɔ̃, lɛmɛ finyaa kĩ midani boe Ɔlate bati sũ ni, mideĩ nɛ ɔhaĩ kamɛ. Foesũ midzi nkpã ndɛ bati kĩ bideĩ nɛ ɔhaĩ kamɛ,
kitonɛkĩ fɔtsa wĩ a kĩ nkpã kadzi nɛ ɔhaĩ kamɛ ayamɛna nyɛ tuwĩ kakɛna, kadzi nɛ osi kpĩĩ akũ mɔ ɔnɔkɔali kadi.
Mibɔa mbɔdi mikɔlɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lawo boe Ɔlate a anɛ.
Mitado akũ nɛ fɔtsa kpa a kĩ bati akɛna nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ a kamɛ, mbom minyɛ foe miwɛla,
kitonɛkĩ fɔnyɛ kɔnyɔã kĩ balɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bakɛna nɛ kabɛla kamɛ a akũ malo.
Ade ntɛ bɛnyɛ fɔtsa flee biko nɛ ɔhaĩ kamɛ ni, bamɔ foe kutidu kamɔ wĩ,
kitonɛkĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ bɛnyɛ kanya ni, liwo nɛ ɔhaĩ kamɛ. Ade foesũ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ,
“Nyinya, nɔ kĩ ɔwaa tida a,
yidza kato kanɔkpa,
lɔkɔa Kristo ɔhaĩ a aako nɛ nɔ akũ.”
Foesũ midã kadã wĩ nɛ ayekĩ midzi nkpã akũ. Mitadzi ndɛ bati kĩ binyína kadi, mbom midzi ndɛ anyansãfɔ aye.
Mikɛna osi nyɛ osi kĩ mina finyaa akũ adzuma kakɛna wĩ, kitonɛkĩ budeĩ nɛ tɔkpa kakɛna fuwi kamɛ.
Nɛ foesũ mitakɛna mi akũ badzimbifɔ, mbom mibɔa mbɔdi kĩ míanu lɛtsa a kĩ boe Ɔlate awɛ kĩ mikɛna a kayɔ.
Mitamɔa bavɛ miwuga, kitonɛkĩ fɔafɔ̃ oti akɛna fɔtsa kpa, mbom mifɔ̃ Hũhũ a ɛtɛ mi kamɛ flee.
Mikɔa fɔlɛtsa a kĩ fudeĩ nɛ Psalomo Ovoli, asɔli tɔnɔ mɔ hũhũ kamɛ tɔnɔ milɔmɛna mɔ akũ. Misã kamu tɔnɔ mɔ kawɔlɛ tɔnɔ mikpa boe Ɔlate nɛ mi tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ.
Minyɛ Baguma boe Ɔlɛga kɔlɛ daa nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɛ, nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo dĩ akũ.
Ayekĩ miakɔa obu kakpa Kristo sũ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ miadɔla mi akũ mikpa akũ.
Mi batsole kĩ bidzi fɔnyɔ, midɔla mi akũ mikpa mi banyɔ ndɛ ayekĩ miadɔla akũ kakpa boe Ɔlate a,
kitonɛkĩ onyole nyɛ lɔlɔ ɛkpa ɔtsɔ̃ ndɛ ayekĩ Kristo lɛmɛ nyɛ asɔli a lɔlɔ. Asɔli bati a nyɛ Kristo sukɛna, ade Kristo mɔawɛ a nyɛ ye Ɔtɛnɛ a.
Nɛ foesũ batsole bɛdɔla be akũ nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɛ bɛkpa banyɔ, ndɛ ayekĩ asɔli bati a lɛmɛ adɔla be akũ kakpa Kristo a.
Mi banyɔ, miwɛ mi batsɔ̃ kalɛ ndɛ ayekĩ Kristo wɛ asɔli bati a kalɛ, ɛkɔa ye nkpã ɛkpa nɛ ye lɔlɔ.
Ɛkɛna fukĩĩ yakɔa ɛkpalɛ asɔli bati a akũ, nɛ kĩ ɛkɔa ye kalɛ ɛkpalɛ be akũ, ndɛ ayekĩ bawɔla oti mui a aye.
Ɛwɛ kĩ asɔli bati a kĩ yaakɔa ɛkpa ye a akũ bɛkpalɛ yededeede, bɛlɛ kadã, ĩye tuduli, ĩye katsĩĩtsĩĩ, mɔ efĩĩ adima ɛtana nɛ be akũ.
Ade ayea kɛnɛ kĩ banyole bɛwɛ be batsɔ̃ kalɛ ndɛ ayekĩ bawɛ be mɔawɛ sukɛna kalɛ a. Onyole kĩ yawɛ ɔtsɔ̃ kalɛ ni, ye mɔawɛ akũ ɛwɛ kalɛ.
Odima lákesĩ ye mɔawɛ sukɛna, mbom yadɔɔla se, kadã se kadã wĩ, ndɛ ayekĩ Kristo lɛmɛ adãmɛna asɔli bati a akũ,
kitonɛkĩ ye sukɛna a akũ fɔkɔ fudi bɔanɛ.
Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ onyole aafɔnɛ ɔlɛga mɔ ɔma eyi ɛkɔa akũ ɛmɛna mɔ ɔtsɔ̃, lɔkɔa be nviã a bɛkɛna oti mɔa.”
Ɔnɔkɔali a kĩ ɛbɛla nɛ Baguma kalɛ kĩĩ kamɛ a dzũ paa. Manu foe kayɔ kĩ Kristo mɔ asɔli bati a ɔmɔa kakɛna balɛ.
Lɛmɛ fɔatamɔ mi malo. Mi kamɛ odi nyɛ odi ɛwɛ ɔtsɔ̃ kalɛ ndɛ ayekĩ yawɛ ye akũ kalɛ, ade ayea mi kamɛ odi nyɛ odi lɛmɛ ebu ɔnyɔ a.
Mi babisɛ̃, mibu mi bamanɛ, kitonɛkĩ Kristo kamɛ lɛkɛnana wĩ fɔanɛ kĩ miakɛna.
Mbla atɔnyade kĩ nfasɔ deĩ nɛ ye akũ nyɛ kĩ, “Bu aga mɔ ama,
ayekĩ nɔ kadzi kamɛ aalɛ, odzi nkpã gɛlɛɛlɛ nɛ tite akũ.”
Mi balɛga, mitakado mi babi kalɔkpa, mbom midɔɔla be kadɔɔla wĩ, mivɛlɛ be, mikpa be kɔdɛ nɛ boe Ɔlate osi a akũ.
Mi basate, mibu mi tite akũ balate nɛ libe mɔ kukũtila kamɛ. Mikɛna foe mɔ mi tɔwɔlɛ flee ndɛ ayekĩ míasum Kristo.
Mitakɛna foe anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ kasum, ayekĩ baamu mi sũ, mbom ndɛ Kristo basumunɛ aye ni, mikɛna lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma awɛ a futo mi tɔwɔlɛ flee kamɛ.
Mikɛna mi basate tudzuma nɛ kawɔlɛ kamɛ ndɛ boe Ɔlate miasum, kĩ nnɛ́ batidziwa miasum.
Mite anɛ kĩ boe Ɔlate aase odi nyɛ odi kɔtɔ nɛ adzuma wĩ a kĩ ɛkɛna a akũ, ntɛ ɛnyɛ ɔsate ĩye edzi ye akũ akũ.
Mi balate lɛmɛ, kɛnɛ kĩ miakɛna foe lɔmɔ mikpa mi basate, lɔkɔa mifɔ̃ be libe kado. Mite anɛ kĩ mi atsu nviã a flee Ɔlate mɔapɛ mideĩ nɛ ode, kĩ yaadzɛmɔ odi nyɛ odi, ade ɛláadã odima anɛ a.
Ke kawũna kamɛ a, mi ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ boe Ɔlate ɛna ɔsĩ ebu, fɔtsã ye kɔbɛ̃ kpale akũ.
Mibla kawũkanɔ fɔtsa flee a kĩ Baguma kpa mi a, ayekĩ míapuli miyidza midza nɛ Abonsam tɛdake tisi a akũ.
Kitonɛkĩ nnɛ́ bɔmɔ́ batidziwa lamɛna kawũ kanɔ, mbom bɔmɔ́ ablɔ hũhũ kpa kĩ edeĩ kɔbɛ̃ nɛ ɔwɛ kamɛ, hũhũ kĩ yanya akũ, hũhũ kĩ edeĩ otumi, mɔ hũhũ kpa kĩ edeĩ nɛ ɔtũ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ lamɔ kanɔ.
Foesũ mibla Baguma kawũkanɔ fɔtsa flee a finyaa, ayekĩ ntɛ Luwi kpa a ya ni, míapuli midza minɔ kawũ a minaawũna, mibuki mina kɔbɛ̃ nɛ mi kamɛ.
Foesũ mina nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ, mikɔa ɔnɔkɔali mibɔa abɔsɔ, mikɔa tuwĩ kakɛna misua mi ɔwɔlɛ ndɛ tɔwɔlɛ libĩĩ katɛ sɔbɔtsaɛ aye.
Ade mina nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ milɛ lukudɔ Kalɛ Wĩ a kĩ kɛnyɛ mi kawũkanɔ tɛpambua kĩ miado.
Lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ ni, milɛ katɛkado ndɛ fubĩĩ katɛ sɔbɔtsaɛ, kitonɛkĩ ade foe bɔakɔa budina fubĩĩ mɔ fi a kĩ Okesĩnɛ a atalɛ a.
Mitsa Baguma nkpã katɛ a ndɛ sɔbɔtsaɛ lɔbɔɛ aye, milɛ Baguma kalɛ a ndɛ lɛpamɛ gɛlɛɛlɛ kĩ Hũhũ a kɔa edo nɛ mi awɛ.

Mikɛna fukĩĩ flee nɛ mpaɛbɔ kamɛ, mikaavia Baguma kabumɛna. Mifɔ̃ Hũhũ a ɛkpã mi mibɔa mpaɛ nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɛ. Nɛ foesũ ni, mina nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ, mitafɔ̃ akpɔ liveli mi. Mibɔa mpaɛ daa nɛ bati a kĩ bɛkpalɛ be akũ a flee lɔlɔ.
Mibɔa mpaɛ nɛ yĩ malo lɔlɔ kĩ Baguma edo yĩ fɔlɛtsa wĩ nɛ onukpɛ̃, ayekĩ ntɛ maalɛ kɔdzɛla ni, maapuli ndo ɔwɔlɛ ĩnyɛ Kalɛ Wĩ fɔlɛtsa kɔlawa a ntsa bati.
Baguma Kalɛ Wĩ kĩĩ fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ manɛ sũ, ade foesũ nwaa kɔla malo a. Mibɔa mpaɛ mikpa yĩ kĩ mpuli ndo ɔwɔlɛ nlɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a ndɛ ayekĩ fɔfɛta.
Tihiko, boe ɔwaɛ̃ paa, kĩ ɛnyɛ boe Ɔlate adzuma wĩ ɔkɛnanɛ a, aaya nɛ awã, ebi mi yĩ akũ fɔlɛtsa, ɛfɔ̃ minyi ayekĩ nlamɛna adzuma a.
Kado ndo ye nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ kĩ ɛyaabi mi ayekĩ boe flee bɔlamɛna adzuma nɛ awĩ, lɔkɔa edo mi kɔbɛ̃ lɛmɛ.
Baguma boe Ɔlɛga mɔ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo bɛkpa boe bawaɛ̃ a flee lukudɔ, ɔdɔ mɔ katɛkado.
Baguma ɛmɔ be flee a kĩ bɛkɔa ɔdɔ kĩ ɛla kawũna a bawɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo kalɛ a kɔnya.
Philippians: Ovoli kĩĩ to yĩ, Paulo, mɔ Timoteo kĩ bɔnyɛ Kristo Yesu basumunɛ sɛkɛ̃.
Bɔtsɛlɛ ye bɔama mi Baguma bade a kĩ mideĩ nɛ Filipi, kĩ mikɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Kristo Yesu a, mɔ asɔli banɔkɔɛ̃ mɔ babumɛnanɛ a flee.
Baguma boe Ɔlɛga mɔ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo bɛmɔ mi kɔnya, bɛkpa mi lukudɔ lɛmɛ.
Manyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ kĩ nte anɛ nɛ mi akũ,
ade lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ kĩ mabɔa mpaɛ nɛ mi flee lɔlɔ ni, mabɔa ye mɔ kawɔlɛ,
nɛ ayekĩ mibumɔ yĩ nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a kalɛ kamɛ, kito luwi lɛtɔnyade a kɛyawo nviã kĩĩ.
Nɛ foesũ matɛ kado kĩ Baguma a kĩ eyi adzuma wĩ kĩĩ kakɛna kayɔ nɛ mi kamɛ a, aafɔ̃ mikɛna ye ɛnaawũna nɛ Kristo Yesu luwi a akũ.

Yĩ anɛ teĩ nɛ mi akũ daa! Fɔnɛnɛ kĩ nkaakɔna mi akũ lɔmɔ, kitonɛkĩ Baguma mɔ bɔmɔ mi flee kɔnya kĩ miamɔ lubo mɔ yĩ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ nwaa kɔla a. Lɛtsa a kĩ libu nyɛ kĩ mibumɔ yĩ bɔlamɛna Kalɛ Wĩ a lɔlɔ kapili, kĩ kitim lɛmɛ.
Baguma nyɛ yĩ ɔdansini kĩ ɔnɔkɔali malɛ, kĩ makɔna mi flee mɔ ɔdɔ a kĩ eto Kristo Yesu kamɛ a.
Mabɔa mpaɛ kĩ mi ɔdɔ a ebu ebo anɛ nɛ kadikanyi mɔ fɔlɛtsa kayɔkanu dzununuunu kamɛ,
ayekĩ míapuli misa fɔtsa wĩ mikpa mi akũ, lɔkɔa míanya bati kpalɛwa kĩ efĩĩ mɔ nfumusu adima lɛláana nɛ be akũ nɛ Kristo Luwi a akũ.
Mi nkpã kadzi kamɛ aayi mɔ ɔbla wĩ kabɔa a kĩ Yesu Kristo odi aapuli ɛkpa a, fɔnya kukũkpalɛ mɔ kamu fɔkpa Baguma.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mawɛ kĩ mianyi kĩ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔya nɛ yĩ akũ a bumɛna Kalɛ Wĩ a kɛnaa lɔtɔ.
Nɛ foesũ sodzafɔ a kĩ badzɔlɛ lɛgã tɔtɔ akũ a flee, mɔ bati bɛbã a kĩ bideĩ nɛ awĩ a mɔ́ biyi ɔsũ kĩ Kristo sũ mɔ nwaa kɔla.
Ade yĩ kɔla kawa a lɛmɛ fɔ̃ Kristofɔ pii kɔa anɛ bite nɛ boe Ɔlate akũ, ade bado ɔwɔlɛ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ, kalɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa a mɔ libe katana nɛ foe kamɛ a.
Nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, be kamɛ badi ade lɛtsã nɛ Kristo akũ kitonɛkĩ banɔ yĩ lineke kawɛ yĩ sɔwã, lɛmɛ badi kɔ̃ ade lɛtsã a mɔ adzuni wĩ.
Bati katsu kayade kĩĩ akɛna adzuma mɔ ɔdɔ kitonɛkĩ binyina kĩ Baguma lɛkpa yĩ adzuma kĩ mpili ye Kalɛ Wĩ a lɔlɔ.
Bati bɛbã a láde lɛtsã nɛ Kristo akũ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ, mbom bade de nɛ be odi kawɛ onukpɛ̃. Bɛkɔna kĩ bakɛna foe bɛkɔa bɛwɛ fɔlɛtsa bɛkpa yĩ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ nwaa kɔla, lɔkɔa lubo kamɔ lɛna ɔsĩ libu.
Fukĩĩ lɛnyɛ́ latsama! Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ bide lɛtsã nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ĩye nɛ fɔvã kama osi akũ malo ni, kĩ Kristo akũ bide lɛtsã a sũ ni, kawɔlɛ de yĩ.
Kitonɛkĩ ĩnyina kĩ mi mpaɛbɔ nɛ yĩ lɔlɔ mɔ Yesu kabumɛna a kĩ kito Kristo Hũhũ a sũ ni, baanyɛ yĩ nɛ kɔla.
Yĩ kawɛ mɔ ɔsĩ, mɔ lɛtsa a kĩ madã anɛ nyɛ kĩ kɔnyɔã kɔtakɔ yĩ nɛ yĩ adzuma kamɛ, titiliwu nɛ lɔkɔ kĩĩ, mbom nna ɔwɔlɛ ayekĩ maakɔa yĩ sukɛna flee ndo Kristo obu ntɛ ndzi nkpã ĩye nku malo.
Litsa nyɛ nkpã? Nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ kɔ̃ ni, Kristo ndzi nkpã nkpa, lɛmɛ ntɛ maaku ni, maana foe akũ nfasɔ mba.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ maadzi nkpã mpuli nkɛna adzuma kĩ edeĩ nfasɔ ni, kekɔ̃ maáti ĩnyi foe kamɛ fukĩ ĩnyɛ ntɛ nkpã ĩye wuda.
Ndeĩ nɛ fɔtsa atsu nviã kayite. Mawɛ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ manɛ nɛ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ nnaa Kristo sɛkɛ̃, kĩ lɛnɛnɛ lɛbɛ̃.
Lɛmɛ nɛ mi sũ ni, fusĩ paa kĩ ndzi nkpã nɛ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ.
Ntɛ fukĩĩ ndo, foesũ ĩnyina kĩ maadzi nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃, mbuki nkɛna adzuma mɔ mi flee minamɛna lɔtɔ, mimɔ́ kawɔlɛ nɛ Kristo katɛkado kamɛ.
Fukĩĩ aafɔ̃ kĩ ntɛ mbuki ĩya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ ni, míapuli mipia nɛ yĩ akũ kĩ mikɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Kristo Yesu.

Lɛtsa a kĩ lisĩ finyaa nyɛ kĩ, midzi nkpã ndɛ bati kĩ bɛtɛ Kristo Kalɛ Wĩ a, ayekĩ ntɛ ĩya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ ĩye ntápuli ĩya malo ni, maanu kĩ midzɛ̃ pintii, nɛ hũhũ mɔa adzuni mɔa kamɛ, miapili katɛkado a Kalɛ Wĩ a lɔlɔ.
Mitavila mi bakesĩnɛ, mbom mido ɔwɔlɛ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ. Fukĩĩ aafɔ̃ binyi kĩ Baguma aawɔla be kokooko, lɛmɛ mi kɔ̃ yaakpa mi nkpã, kitonɛkĩ Baguma lɛfɔ̃ minya akũ.
Kitonɛkĩ Baguma kpa mi osi kĩ misum Kristo nnɛ́ nɛ ayekĩ mitɛ ye mido a odi sũ, mbom nɛ ayekĩ miamɔ lubo nɛ ye lɔlɔ a sũ.
Finyaakĩĩ míapuli minɔ kawũ a mɔ yĩ. Ade kawũ mɔapɛ a kĩ mimɔ́ kĩ nnɔ ntɛ̃ a, ndɛ ayekĩ minu a, ade ke mɔapɛ a nlamɛna kanɔ a.
Nkpã a kĩ midzi nɛ Kristo kamɛ a ado mi kɔbɛ̃, ade ye ɔdɔ adɔla mi ɔwɔlɛ a. Mikɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Hũhũ a, ade miakɛna mi akũ sɛmɛ kalɛ, kamɔ akũ kɔnya a.
Nɛ foesũ mifɔ̃ kawɔlɛ de yĩ paa kĩ mideĩ adzuni mɔa. Miawɛ akũ kalɛ, kakɛna ɔmɔa nɛ hũhũ mɔ adzuni mɔa kamɛ nɛ lɛtsa mɔapɛ akũ.
Mitakɛna lɛtsama nɛ mi odi kawɛ onukpɛ̃, ĩye miwɛ kĩ miapia akũ. Midɔla akũ mikpa akũ, mibu bati bɛbã kĩ bɛnɛnɛ bɛbɛ̃ mi.
Odima ɛtakɔna fɔtsa wĩ ɛkpa ye odi akũ, mbom ɛwɛ bati bɛbã lɛmɛ fude.
Mifɔ̃ ɔbla a kĩ ɛna nɛ Kristo Yesu kamɛ a, ɛna nɛ mi malo kamɛ.
Titɔ kĩ edeĩ nɛ Baguma kutidu kamɛ malo ni, ɛtákɔna kĩ yakɔa ye kɔbɛ̃ ɛtsa kĩ bɛmɔ Baguma biketi.
Mbom ɛfɔnɛ ye obu kadzakɔ̃ a awɛ faa, ɛkɔa ye akũ ɛkɛna osumunɛ. Bɛma ye ndɛ otidziwa aye, ade ɛya nɛ oti kutidu kamɛ a.
Nɛ foesũ ɛdɔla ye akũ, etse Baguma kɛnawo wuda nɛ asendua akũ.
Nɛ foesũ Baguma dɛla ye nɛ ode flee, ade ete ye dĩ kĩ lɛbɛ̃ dĩ lidi nyɛ lidi a.
Foesũ ntɛ bɛbɔa Yesu dĩ ni, kɛfɛta kĩ fɔtsa a kĩ fudzi nkpã nɛ tite mɔ ode, mɔ tite ɔda fɔ́ake aduli.
Ade foe flee aanyɛ onukpɛ̃ kĩ Yesu Kristo nyɛ boe Ɔlate, bɛkɔa bimu Baguma boe Ɔlɛga a.

Foesũ nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ndɛ ayekĩ miatse yĩ ɔlɛdo lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ kĩ nna nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ a, ade ayea fusĩ kĩ ntɛ nláa mi sɛkɛ̃ malo ni, miakɛna miba ayekĩ ndeĩ nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ a. Mikɔa libe mɔ kukũtila mikɛna adzuma miwũna mitsa kĩ mina nkpã katɛ,
kitonɛkĩ Baguma lamɛna adzuma kakɛna nɛ mi kamɛ daa ayekĩ míafɔnɛ akũ awɛ mikɛna nɛ ye kawɛ wĩ akũ.
Mikɛna lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa onukpɛ̃ kanyɛ ĩye fɔlɛtsa kavɛlɛ fɔtana nɛ foe kamɛ,

ayekĩ míanya bati kĩ bɛtákɔ be kɔtɔ, kĩ be akũ kpalɛ ndɛ Baguma babi kĩ bɛkpɔla, kĩ bidzi nɛ katinya kpa kĩ kiyi mɔ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ kamɛ, lɛmɛ mi kɔ̃ tɔkpa lɛláa mi akũ. Kɛnɛ kĩ miavɔlɛ nɛ be kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ fusibii avɔlɛ nɛ ode,
ntɛ miatsa be nkpã kalɛ a. Nɛ Kristo Luwi a akũ ni, maapuli mpia nɛ mi akũ kĩ yĩ mbɔdibɔ mɔ adzuma tákɛna pupulidza.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ baako yĩ babɔanɛ nɛ tite nɛ mi katɛkado akũ ndɛ afɔliɛ fɔtsa aye ni, kawɔlɛ aade yĩ, ade fɔ́anya bɔmɔ mi flee kawɔlɛ a.
Ade ayea kɛnɛ kĩ mi malo kawɔlɛ kide mi, mimɔ kawɔlɛ mɔ yĩ a.
Ntɛ fɔnyɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu kawɛ ni, matɛ kado kĩ owi lɛláabuna mɔ maado Timoteo nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃, ayekĩ mi akũ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ yayabi yĩ a aado yĩ kawɔlɛ.
Ye odi keĩ nyɛ oti kĩ yanu yĩ fɔlɛtsa kayɔ mɔ oti kĩ mi fɔlɛtsa tsɛla ye.
Bati bɛbã a kɔ̃ ni, be odi kalɛ liti bitomɛna, kĩ nnɛ́ fukĩ fɔnyɛ Yesu Kristo fude.
Mi mɔawɛ minyina ayekĩ Timoteo nyɛ oti titiliwu mɔ ayekĩ ndɛ obi mɔ ɔlɛga aye ni, bɔmɔ ye bɔkɛna adzuma nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a kalɛ kamɛ.
Foesũ madã anɛ kĩ ntɛ nsila mmɔ́ ayekĩ yĩ fɔlɛtsa kamɛ la ni, maado ye nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃.
Matɛ kado nɛ boe Ɔlate dĩ akũ kĩ yĩ mɔawɛ a maapuli ĩya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ mɔatsɛ.
Lɛmɛ nkɔna kĩ fusĩ kĩ mado boe ɔwaɛ̃ Epafrodito nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃. Ɛnyɛ oti kĩ bɔmɔ ye bɔkɛna adzuma, bɔnɔ kawũ, ade ɛnya mi fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ mɔ yĩ obumɛnanɛ a.
Akũ asĩ ye kĩ ɛmɔ mi flee, ade ewo ɔblɔ kĩ minu kĩ ye fukɛna kamɛ bu kade.
Nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, ɛsɔ paa kĩ ɛna nɛ wuda mɔ nkpã kayite, lɛmɛ Baguma mɔ́ bɔmɔ ye kɔnya. Ntɛ fɔtana lɔmɔ ni, kufɛ yĩ kalɔɛ aaba yĩ kalɔ.
Ade foesũ akũ asĩ yĩ kĩ mado ye nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃, ayekĩ ntɛ mimɔ́ ye ni, kawɔlɛ aabuki kide mi lɔkɔa yĩ malo yĩ ɔwɔlɛ lɛka edzi yĩ.
Nɛ foesũ mitɛ ye mɔ kawɔlɛ ndɛ ɔwaɛ̃ nɛ boe Ɔlate dĩ akũ. Mikpa bati kĩ bɛla ndɛ ye aye a obu,
kitonɛkĩ ɛkɔa ye akũ ɛkpa kĩ yakɛna Kristo adzuma ebumɔ yĩ nɛ mi kadokɔ̃, ade kite sukuloo kufɛ eku nɛ foe kamɛ a.

Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, nɛ kawũna kamɛ a, kawɔlɛ kide mi kĩ mikɛna ɔmɔa mɔ boe Ɔlate a. Fɔtápiã yĩ kĩ mbuki matsɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ĩnya lɔtɔ ntsɛlɛ mma mi a mma mi. Ntɛ nkɛna foe lɔmɔ malo ni, fɔ́afɔ̃ lɛtsama lɛláakɛna mi.
Midã kadã wĩ nɛ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ akũ! Midã kadã wĩ nɛ bakpete a kĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ mi akũ kĩ mitsua mi sukɛna a.
Kitonɛkĩ boe a kĩ bɔasum Baguma nɛ Hũhũ kamɛ a, mbom bitsua boe nɛ osi wĩ akũ, foesũ bɔamɔ kawɔlɛ kĩ bɔakɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Kristo Yesu. Boe kɔ̃ bɔáte anɛ nɛ sukɛna kamɛ tɛmaniɛ akũ.
Yĩ aapuli nkɔa anɛ ntɛ nɛ tɛmaniɛ a na akũ kufɛ. Ntɛ odi kɔna kĩ yaapuli ɛkɔa anɛ ete nɛ te akũ ni, ndeĩ kadzakɔ̃ kĩ makɔna lɔmɔ mbɛ̃ oti a na kɔlaa.
Bitsua yĩ lɛkpati kĩ bɛma yĩ ke luwi lɛlɛ̃de a. Israelni manɛ, nto Benyamin katete a kamɛ. Ĩnyɛ Hebrini kpanunuunu, ade ke nɛ Yudafɔ mbla a onukpɛ̃ ni, Farisini manɛ.
Mpi mbla a ndo mɔ akũ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ ade foesũ ĩyidza ndza nɛ asɔli a akũ a. Ntɛ oti kakɛna nɛ mbla a akũ pɛpɛɛpɛ akɛna ye oti kpĩĩ nɛ Baguma anɛ ni, maapuli nlɛ kĩ nfumusu adima tána nɛ yĩ akũ.
Lɛmɛ fɔtsa a kĩĩ bamɛ a kĩ nkɔna kĩ fudeĩ yĩ nfasɔ a, finyaakĩĩ nɛ Kristo sũ mabu foe fɔtsa pupulidza.

Nnɛ́ fɔtsa a na odi, mbom mabu lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ lɛnyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛlá nfasɔ, kitonɛkĩ fɔtátɛ kɔya fuwo Kristo Yesu kanyi ndɛ yĩ Ɔlate. Nɛ ye sũ nfɔnɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa awɛ, ade mabu foe flee ndɛ fukluku, ayekĩ Kristo aanya yĩ ode sũ,

lɔkɔa nkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ ye. Ade ke nláabuki nna kadzi kpĩĩ nɛ yĩ mɔawɛ akũ akũ nɛ ayekĩ makɛna nɛ mbla a akũ sũ, mbom maakɛna oti kpĩĩ nɛ Kristo katɛkado sũ. Ade fukĩĩ nyɛ kadzi kpĩĩ kĩ kito Baguma sɛkɛ̃ nɛ katɛkado kamɛ a.
Lɛtsa a kĩ nti mawɛ nyɛ kĩ manyi Kristo, mmɔ́ kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ kɔdzɛla ye kutomɛna kanɔkpa a, mmɔ́ mɔ ye lubo, lɔkɔa nkɛna ndɛ ye aye nɛ ye wuda kamɛ,
mɔ katɛkado kĩ yĩ malo Baguma aadzɛla yĩ etomɛna kanɔkpa ndzi nkpã.
Nlámɔ kalɛ kĩ yĩ awɛ tá lɛtsa a kĩ mawɛ ĩye kĩ nkpɔla kɔkɔɛ. Lɛmɛ nlamɛna kapili mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ yĩ awɛ ɛta fɔtsa a kĩ foesũ Kristo Yesu kɔa yĩ ɛkɛna ye ode a.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, maákɔna kĩ yĩ awɛ ta fɔtsa a kɔkɔɛ. Mbom lɛtsa a kĩ makɛna nyɛ kĩ nlɛla fɔtsa a kĩ fɔya fɔtɛ̃ a, lɔkɔa nkɔa yĩ kɔbɛ̃ flee ntomɔ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛwaa nɛ lɔtɔ a liti.
Ade foesũ nlamɛna atsɛ kawula kɔɔba kĩ maawo akũ kanyakɔ̃ a lɔkɔa ntɛ futelitsa a kĩ Baguma vɛ yĩ ɛtsãmɛna Kristo Yesu akũ kĩ ĩyaatɛ nɛ ode a.
Kɛnɛ kĩ boe flee a kĩ bubo anɛ nɛ Baguma Hũhũ kamɛ a bɔna adzuni kĩĩ odu. Lɛmɛ ntɛ mi kamɛ badi deĩ adzuni bɛbã ni, Baguma aakpalɛ foe malo kamɛ ɛtsa mi.
Ntɛ nde aye fɔla malo ni, mifɔ̃ bubuki bɔkɛna nɛ osi a kĩ ye akũ bɔtsɛ̃ kɛyawo finyaakĩĩ a akũ.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mi a flee midã yĩ ɔbla mibɔa ye odu, midã bikĩ bidzi nkpã nɛ osi wĩ akũ ndɛ ayekĩ budzi bɔtsa mi a.
Mbi mi fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ lɔkɔ pii kɛyatɛ̃, lɛmɛ mbuki malɛ foe finyaa mɔ babe malo. Bati pii deĩ kĩ be nkpã kadzi kamɛ a fɔ̃ bɛdani bakesĩnɛ bɛkpa Kristo wuda nɛ asendua akũ a.
Nɛ kawũna kamɛ a, bati kĩĩ aawɔ nɛ fi luwotu kpale kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ be baguma nyɛ sukɛna fɔwɛtsa kpa kakɛna. Bamɔ kawɔlɛ nɛ be fɔnyɔãtsa kakɛna akũ, ade katinya kĩĩ kamɛ fɔtsa odi akũ bakɔna a.
Lɛmɛ boe kɔ̃ ni, boe ɔtɔ nyɛ ode, ade budzi bɔadã boe Ɔtɛnɛ kĩ ɛnyɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo anɛ kĩ eto ode ɛya a.
Yaakɔa kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ kɔfɔ̃ yapuli kanya lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa akũ a, ɛdani boe sukɛna kĩ sɛlá kɔbɛ̃ kĩĩ siketi mɔ ye sukɛna kpalɛwa a.
Foesũ nwaɛ̃ amɛ, bati kĩ mawɛ kalɛ, kĩ makɔna mi akũ, miado yĩ kawɔlɛ. Ade aye kɛnɛ kĩ midza pintii nɛ mi nkpã kadzi kamɛ nɛ boe Ɔlate a dĩ akũ a.
Make Ewodia mɔ Sinteke aduli kĩ bɛbɔa mbɔdi binu akũ kayɔ ndɛ bawaɛ̃tsole aye nɛ boe Ɔlate dĩ akũ.

Nɔ malo yĩ ɔkɔba adzuma ɔkɛnanɛ kĩ yadi ɔnɔkɔali, mawɛ kĩ bumɛna batsole kĩĩ, kitonɛkĩ be mɔ Klemens mɔ asɔli bati bɛbã a bɛkɛna adzuma mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ bibumɔ yĩ bɔlɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a. Bɛtsɛlɛ bati kĩĩ buĩ bido nɛ Baguma ovoli a kĩ nkpã badzinɛ buĩ deĩ a kamɛ.
Kawɔlɛ kide mi luwi daa kĩ mikɛna ɔmɔa mɔ boe Ɔlate a. Mbuki malɛ kĩ kawɔlɛ kide mi!
Mina ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ mikpa odi nyɛ odi. Boe Ɔlate kaya wo ɔtɔ kiyua.
Mitaha akũ nɛ lɛtsama akũ, mbom nɛ mi mpaɛbɔ kamɛ ni, mivia Baguma lɛtsa a kĩ lisĩ mi, minyɛ ye kɔlɛ luwi daa.
Ade Baguma lukudɔ a kĩ lide lɛba otidziwa kayɔkanu a, lɛdãmɛna mi tɔwɔlɛ mɔ adzuni akũ nɛ Kristo Yesu dĩ akũ.

Nɛ ke kawũna kamɛ ni, nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mifɔ̃ fɔtsa a wĩ mɔ fukĩ fɔfɛta kamu fɔtɛ mi adzuni kamɛ. Fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ nyɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali, lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lideĩ obu, lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛtsɛ̃ nɛ osi kpĩĩ akũ, lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ de akũ kpalɛ, lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lalɛ kadã mɔ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛfɛta oti.
Midzi nkpã nɛ yĩ fɔtsa a kĩ mikɔlɛ nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃, fukĩ mitɛ, fukĩ minu mɔ ɔbla a kĩ mimɔ́ nɛ yĩ akũ a onukpɛ̃. Ade Baguma a kĩ yakpa boe lukudɔ a aadzi nɛ mi kamɛ.
Nɛ boe Ɔlate a sũ ni, kawɔlɛ de yĩ paa kĩ nɛ lɔkɔ gɛlɛɛlɛ liti a, mibuki mina osi miatsa kĩ miakɔna yĩ akũ. Maátsa kĩ mifɔ̃ yĩ akũ kadãmɛna, mbom kana mitána osi kĩ mianyɛ foe mitsa.
Ade nlámɛna katsa kĩ nsĩ litsedi, kitonɛkĩ nkɔlɛ nɛ kadzi kadi nyɛ kadi kamɛ kĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ ndeĩ liwo yĩ anɛ.

Ĩnyina lɛtsa a kĩ lɛnyɛ ohiã ade ĩnyina lɛtsa a kĩ lɛnyɛ akũ kana fɔtsa lɛmɛ a. Nɛ kadzi osi nyɛ osi akũ ni, nkɔlɛ ayekĩ kɛnɛ kĩ fɔtsa fuwo yĩ anɛ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ ntɛ fɔnyɛ kɔlɛ ĩye funitsã kabɔ lɔkɔ, ntɛ ndeĩ foe sukuloo ĩye fɔbɔ yĩ malo.
Maapuli ndza pintii nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɛ nɛ kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ Kristo ado yĩ a akũ.
Lɛmɛ mikɛna foe kakɛna wĩ paa kĩ mibumɔ yĩ nɛ yĩ kasuli kamɛ.
Mi Filipifɔ minyina yededeede kĩ ndzakũ nɛ Makedonia nɛ kayɔkayi, kĩ nkade lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ a, mi odi nyɛ asɔli bati a kĩ bɛkabumɛna yĩ.
Lɔkɔ lɔkɔ kĩ nna nɛ Tesalonika malo ni, ntɛ nsĩ kabumɛna miamɛna yĩ futelitsa.
Nnɛ́ futelitsa mawɛ kufɛ, mbom nfasɔ a kĩ míana mibu mitomɛna mi fɔtsa kate kamɛ a mawɛ.

Finyaa mise yĩ kɔtɔ minyina malo. Futelitsa a kĩ mimɛna mitsãmɛna Epafrodito akũ a yawo yĩ sɛkɛ̃, foesũ finyaa nna fɔtsa a kĩ fusĩ a flee. Futelitsa a na kɛna ndɛ afɔliɛ mɔ ɔlɛ̃ mɔ ɔlɛ̃ kĩ bɛbɔa bɛkpa Baguma, kĩ fuwo ye anɛ fudo ye kawɔlɛ lɛmɛ.
Yĩ Baguma a kĩ masum a, aakpa mi lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ misĩ a etomɛna ye kukũkpalɛ beblebee nɛ Yesu Kristo kamɛ a.
Mifɔ̃ bumu boe Baguma boe Ɔlɛga kito finyaa kanaa daa daa. Fɔya lɔmɔ.
Mawɔ̃na Baguma bati a kĩ bɛkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Kristo Yesu a. Boe bawaɛ̃ Kristofɔ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ nɛ awĩ awɔ̃na mi a flee.
Baguma bati kpalɛwa nɛ awĩ a awɔ̃na mi, titiliwu bikĩ bideĩ nɛ Romafɔ Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ tɔtɔ kamɛ a lɛmɛ awɔ̃na mi flee.
Boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo nhila ɛmɔ mi hũhũ.
Colossians: Ovoli kĩĩ to yĩ, Paulo, kĩ ndani Kristo Yesu fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ nɛ Baguma kawɛ onukpɛ̃, kĩ bɔmɔ Timoteo lɛtsɛlɛ ye bɔama mi.
Bɔtsɛlɛ ye bɔamɛna boe bawaɛ̃ a kĩ Baguma kpalɛ be akũ, kĩ bideĩ nɛ Kolose, kĩ bɛtɛ Kristo bido, bɛkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ ye a.
Baguma, boe Ɔlɛga ɛmɔ mi kɔnya, ɛkpa mi lukudɔ lɛmɛ.
Ntɛ bɔabɔa mpaɛ nɛ mi lɔlɔ daa ni, bɔanyɛ Baguma boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo Ɔlɛga a kɔlɛ,
kitonɛkĩ bunu ayekĩ mitɛ Kristo Yesu mido, mɔ ayekĩ miawɛ Baguma bade a flee kalɛ.
Kĩ bɛnya lɔtɔ bɛkɔa ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a, Kalɛ Wĩ a bɛma mi a, minu kɔnɛte a kĩ kudeĩ kɔkpa mi a. Foesũ mi katɛkado mɔ ɔdɔ dzɛ̃ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ miadã anɛ a, kĩ bɛmanɛ biyi nɛ ode bɛkpa mi a akũ.
Kalɛ Wĩ a lamɛna anɛ kabo kawũ babi wĩ, ade kɛlamɛna kagba nɛ katinya kamɛ flee, ndɛ ayekĩ kɛgba nɛ mi kamɛ kito luwi a kĩ minya lɔtɔ minu ayekĩ Baguma amɔ bati kɔnya, ade minu ke kayɔ kanu wĩ a.
Epafra lɛtsa mi fɔtsa nɛ Baguma bati kɔnyakamɔ akũ. Ɛnyɛ boe ɔkɔba adzuma ɔkɛnanɛ kĩ bɔawɛ kalɛ paa, kĩ yakɛna Kristo adzuma a nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ nɛ boe kadokɔ̃.
Ye libi boe mi ɔdɔ a kĩ Baguma Hũhũ a kɔa edo nɛ mi kamɛ a.
Nɛ foesũ bɔabɔa mpaɛ daa nɛ mi lɔlɔ, kito luwi a kĩ bunu mi nkã a. Bɔake Baguma aduli kĩ ebinya mi adzuni kamɛ mipuli minyi ye, mina nyansã mɔ fɔlɛtsa kayɔkanu flee a kĩ Baguma Hũhũ a akpa a.
Fukĩĩ aafɔ̃ mipuli midzi nkpã ndɛ ayekĩ Boe Ɔlate awɛ, mikɛna lɛtsa a kĩ fɔ́awo ye anɛ daa, lɔkɔa mi adzuma wĩ adi nyɛ adi aawũ babi, mibo anɛ nɛ Baguma kanyi kamɛ.
Baguma ɛkɔa ye kɔbɛ̃ flee a kĩ kuto ye kukũkpalɛ kɔbɛ̃ a kamɛ epi mi, ayekĩ míapuli mido ɔwɔlɛ mina ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ lɛmɛ nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɛ.
Mikɔa kawɔlɛ minyɛ Ɔlɛga a kɔlɛ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ, kitonɛkĩ ye lɛfɔ̃ mikpɔla, kĩ mimɔ bati a kĩ Baguma kpalɛ be akũ a, míana tsɛfã nɛ ye lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ ɔhaĩ a kamɛ.
Baguma lɛnyɛ boe sɔũ etomɛna ɔtũ kamɛ kɔbɛ̃ kamɛ, ɛkɔa edo nɛ ye Obi kĩ yaátunɔ ye kalɛ a lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ.
Obi kĩĩ akũ bɔtsã bɔna akũ akũ kadzi, mɔ tɔkpa kakɔakate.
Kristo nyɛ Baguma a kĩ bɔámɔ mɔ anɛ a kutidu. Ade ye nyɛ Baguma Obi ɔtɔnyade kĩ yanya fɔtsa flee a kĩ bɛbɔa nɛ katinya kamɛ a akũ a.

Kitonɛkĩ Baguma tsã Kristo akũ ɛbɔa lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ lideĩ nɛ tite mɔ ode, fukĩ bɔamɔ mɔ fukĩ bɔámɔ, mɔ hũhũ kamɛ kɔbɛ̃, kĩ fɔnyɛ fɔgã, abãã mɔ otumifɔ. Baguma tsã ye akũ ɛbɔa katinya kamɛ fɔtsa flee edo nɛ ye awɛ.
Kristo deĩ katinya fɔmɔ bɛbɔa lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa, ade fɔtsɛ̃ ye akũ fɔtsa flee akɛna ɔmɔa a.
Ye nyɛ asɔli a lɔlɔ, ade asɔli a lɛmɛ nyɛ ye sukɛna a. Asɔli a nɛ́ eto ye kamɛ, ade ɛnyɛ Baguma Obi ɔtɔnyade kĩ eyidza eto kanɔkpa, ayekĩ ye odi aanya lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɛ.
Kitonɛkĩ fɔnyɛ Baguma kawɛ kĩ Obi ɛna ye Baguma kutidu a flee odu.
Baguma tsã obi akũ, ɛlɔla bɛmɔ katinya kamɛ flee kayite. Ade foe nyɛ kĩ ɛtsã ye Obi a kĩ ewula babɔanɛ nɛ asendua akũ a akũ, ɛyamɛna lukudɔ nɛ ye mɔ fɔtsa a kĩ fudeĩ nɛ tite mɔ ode a flee kayite.
Nɛ lɔkɔ lidi kamɛ ni, mina mɔ lugo nɛ Baguma akũ, ade minya ye bakesĩnɛ nɛ fɔtsa kpa a kĩ mikakɛna mɔ tɔkpa a kĩ mikakɔna a sũ.
Lɛmɛ finyaa, nɛ Obi wuda nɛ asendua akũ a sũ ni, Baguma kɛna mi ye bakɔba ayekĩ yaakpã mi ɛyamɛna nɛ ye anɛ ndɛ bati kĩ mi akũ kpalɛ, kĩ nfumusu lɛláa mi akũ, kĩ odima lɛmɛ lɛláapuli ɛkɔ mi kɔtɔ.

Foesũ kɛnɛ kĩ midza pintii nɛ mi katɛkado kamɛ, mitafɔnɛ mi kɔnɛte a kĩ mideĩ nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ a kĩ bubi mi minu a awɛ. Ade Kalɛ Wĩ kĩĩ akũ bide lɛtsã bɛkpa katinya kamɛ flee a. Ade Kalɛ Wĩ kĩĩ osumunɛ yĩ, Paulo, ndani a.
Finyaa, kawɔlɛ ade yĩ kĩ mmɔ́ lubo nɛ mi lɔlɔ. Mamɔ lubo nɛ yĩ sukɛna kamɛ nkɔa nwũna lubo a kĩ lite kĩ Kristo kĩ ɛnyɛ asɔli a lɔlɔ ɛmɔ nɛ sukɛna kamɛ.
Baguma kɛna yĩ asɔli a ɔsumunɛ, kĩ nde lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ nkpa mi, ayekĩ bati flee aanyi Baguma fɔlɛtsa a flee kanyi wĩ.
Ade fɔlɛtsa kɔlawa kĩĩ Baguma kɔa ɛkɔla batidziwa kasinu flee kito anɛ kɔkɔkɔɛ a. Lɛmɛ finyaa Baguma nyɛ foe kanya ɛtsa ye bati a kĩ bɛtɛ ye bido a.
Baguma kawɛ nyɛ kĩ yanyɛ ye fɔtsa kɔlawa mɔ kɔya a, mɔ foe kukũkpalɛ a ɛtsa bati flee. Fɔlɛtsa kɔlawa a nyɛ kĩ, Kristo deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ, foesũ mideĩ Baguma kukũkpalɛ a kudi.

Ade foesũ bɔade lɛtsã nɛ Kristo akũ kakpa odi nyɛ odi a. Bɔnɛɛ boe nyansã flee bɔadɛ odi nyɛ odi katsa be fɔtsa lɛmɛ, ayekĩ bɔ́akpã be bɔnamɛna Baguma anɛ ndɛ bati kĩ bibo anɛ bɛkpɔla, bɛkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Kristo lɛmɛ.
Ade fukĩĩ sũ nlamɛna kapili mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kakɛna adzuma a, mɔ kɔbɛ̃ kpale a kĩ Kristo ado yĩ a.
Mawɛ kĩ minyi adzuma mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ a kĩ nkɛna nkpa mi, mɔ bati a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Laodikea, mɔ bati nkaɛ flee a kĩ binyína yĩ mɔ anɛ a.

Malɛ fukĩĩ ayekĩ baado ɔwɔlɛ, bɛkɛna ɔmɔa nɛ ɔdɔ kamɛ. Fɔfɔ̃ bɛna fɔlɛtsa kayɔkanu yededeede a kĩ bike otse nɛ foe akũ a, binyi Baguma fɔtsa kɔlawa a kĩ foe fɔnyɛ Kristo mɔawɛ a. Fukĩĩ nyɛ akũ kana fɔtsa kpale.
Kristo kamɛ Baguma kɔa ye fɔtsa mɔ kɔya a, kĩ foe nyɛ ye nyansã mɔ kadikanyi a ɛkɔla.
Foesũ mabi mi kĩ mitafɔ̃ odima kĩ edeĩ sɛmɛ lɛkɛ mi mɔ fɔvã fɔlɛtsa kayɔkanyɛ.
Titɔ kĩ nláa mi kamɛ nɛ sukɛna kamɛ malo ni, ndeĩ nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ nɛ hũhũ kamɛ, ade kawɔlɛ ade yĩ kĩ mmɔ́ kĩ mitsɛ̃ nɛ osi kpĩĩ akũ, ade midzɛ̃ pintii nɛ Kristo katɛkado kamɛ lɛmɛ a.
Ayekĩ mitɛ Kristo Yesu ndɛ Ɔlate aye sũ ni, mikɛna ɔmɔa mɔ ye nɛ mi nkpã kadzi kamɛ.
Minɛ tunu nɛ ye kamɛ, midzi nkpã ndɛ ye aye, lɔkɔa midza pintii nɛ mi katɛkado kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ bɔtsa mi a. Nɛ foe kawũna a ni, mikaanyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ daa.

Foesũ midã kadã wĩ kĩ odima ɛtakɔa katinya kamɛ kadikanyi mɔ kakɛ pupulidza ɛkɛ mi miyɛla osi wĩ a. Kitonɛkĩ kadikanyi a na to batidziwa tɛmaniɛ katsa kĩ bɛnyɛ bitomɛna hũhũ kĩ yanya ɔwɛ akũ a kamɛ, kĩ nnɛ́ Kristo sɛkɛ̃ futo.
Kitonɛkĩ Kristo kamɛ Baguma kutidu a flee deĩ,
ade mi ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ Kristo kpa mi nkpã kĩ ɛkpɔla flee nɛ ye kamɛ a. Kristo deĩ kɔbɛ̃ kpale nɛ hũhũ kamɛ kɔbɛ̃ mɔ otumi adi nyɛ adi akũ.

Kristo kamɛ mikɛna ndɛ bitsua mi fɔkpati, nnɛ́ lɛkpati katsua a kĩ batidziwa akɛna mɔ awɛ a, mbom mi tɔkpa a kĩ mikɛna nɛ sukɛna kamɛ a bɛwɔla nɛ mi akũ. Ade fukĩĩ nyɛ lɛkpati katsua nɛ Kristo kamɛ a.
Kitonɛkĩ, kĩ bɛwɔla mi mui a, mimɔ Kristo bibila, ade nɛ mui kawɔla kamɛ a, mimɔ Kristo Baguma dzɛla etomɛna kanɔkpa, kitonɛkĩ mitɛ Baguma kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ ɛkɔa ɛdzɛla ye a mido.
Nɛ lɔkɔ lidi kamɛ ni, minyɛ bati kĩ biku nɛ hũhũ kamɛ, nɛ mi tɔkpa mɔ ayekĩ minyɛ́ Yudafɔ kĩ milá mbla a lɛmɛ sũ. Lɛmɛ finyaa Baguma kpa mi mɔ Kristo nkpã, kitonɛkĩ ɛkɔa boe tɔkpa flee ete boe.
Baguma wɔla nhihiɛ a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ biyi kĩ esui boe, ɛkɔ boe kɔtɔ nɛ mbla a onukpɛ̃ a, ade ɛkɔa ɛbɔa nɛ asendua a akũ a.
Nɛ asendua akũ a, Kristo tɛ kɔbɛ̃ nɛ hũhũ kamɛ fɔgã mɔ hũhũ kamɛ batumifɔ a flee awɛ, ade edo be kɔnyɔã nɛ kanade, ade ɛkpã be ndɛ bati kĩ bipili be ndom aye nɛ ye kawɔlɛ kamɛ ɛnamɛna a.
Foesũ mitafɔ̃ odima lɛkã mi anɛ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ mianya ĩye miamɔa a akũ, ĩye luwi kpalɛwa kanya, odetɔ vɔɛ̃ kade fuwi kanya mɔ Kawɛya Luwi kanya akũ.
Fukĩĩ bamɛ flee nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lideĩ nɛ liti laya a kuyo kɛkɛ. Lɛtsa mɔawɛ a nyɛ Kristo.

Mitafɔ̃ odima kĩ ɛbɔɛ ye akũ kĩ ɛbɛ̃ mi, kitonɛkĩ ɛna kanyɛkatsa titiliwu sũ lɛkɔ mi kɔtɔ, lɔkɔa ɛkɛ mi kĩ midɔla mi akũ nɛ tɛdake kamɛ misum ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ. Oti kĩĩ odu adɛla ye akũ nɛ ode pupulidza, kitonɛkĩ batidziwa adzuni odi edeĩ.

Oti kĩĩ odu wai akũ nɛ Kristo a kĩ ye nyɛ lɔlɔ a akũ. Lɛmɛ ade Kristo a kĩ ɛnyɛ lɔlɔ a sɛkɛ̃ sukɛna a flee ana funitsã katomɛna a. Ade Kristo pini sukɛna fɔtsakɔ̃ fɔtsakɔ̃ mɔ tisĩ flee ɛkpɔta, fɔabo anɛ ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma awɛ a.
Ayekĩ mimɔ Kristo liku sũ ni, minɛ́ nɛ hũhũ a kĩ yanya katinya kamɛ akũ a kɔbɛ̃ kayɔ. Lɔkɔa nde sũ midzi nkpã ndɛ katinya kĩĩ bati mianɛ? Nde sũ miadi tɛbla ndɛ,
“Takɛna fukĩĩ akũ adzuma, tata fukĩĩ onukpɛ̃,” ĩye “takɔa awɛ ɔta fɔbɛbã lɛmɛ”?
Tɛbla kĩĩ flee nyɛ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔawɔ ntɛ bakɛna foe akũ adzuma, kitonɛkĩ batidziwa tɛbla mɔ fɔtsa katsa fɔanɛ.
Nɛ kamɔ kamɛ ni, ntɛ odi pi tɛbla kĩĩ edomɔ akũ, ɛdɔla ye akũ, mɔ ɛmɔna ye sukɛna lubo ni, nyansã baũ adi deĩ nɛ foe kamɛ, lɛmɛ fukĩna kakɛna lábumɔ oti yapuli kanya ye sukɛna kamɛ fɔwɛtsa akũ kɔlaa.
Baguma dzɛla mimɔ Kristo etomɛna kanɔkpa, foesũ mikɔa mi anɛ mite nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ fudeĩ nɛ ode, awã kĩ Kristo dzi nɛ Baguma sɔmɔna a akũ.
Mifɔ̃ mi adzuni ete nɛ ode fɔtsa akũ, kĩ nnɛ́ nɛ tite kĩĩ fɔtsa akũ,
kitonɛkĩ kĩ miku a, bɛkɔa mi nkpã mɔ Kristo bɛkɔla nɛ Baguma kamɛ.
Ntɛ Kristo kĩ ɛnyɛ mi nkpã a, nyɛ ye akũ katinya ni, mi malo míanɛ kanya mɔ ye, nɛ ye kukũkpalɛ a kamɛ.

Foesũ mikɔ tite akũ fɔwɛtsa a kĩ fudeĩ nɛ mi kamɛ a. Ade foe nyɛ, adɔpaa kabɔa, fɔtsa kpa kĩ fɔado oti efĩĩ, sukɛna odo fɔwɛtsa kpa, odo fɔtsa kpa mɔ anɛ ngbã. Nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, anɛ ngbã nyɛ baviɔ̃ kasum.
Ade fukĩĩ bamɛ aafɔ̃ Baguma kalɔkpa lɛya nɛ bati a kĩ bideĩ atɔ ɔsĩ akũ a.
Nɛ nkpã kĩ midzi mitɛ̃ a kamɛ a, mi malo mibɔa ɔbla kpa a na odu.
Lɛmɛ finyaa kɛnɛ kĩ miafɔnɛ fukĩĩ flee awɛ. Ade foe nyɛ kalɔkpa kana, ɔwɔlɛ kahulu, likesĩ, bati kavũna, fubusuotsa mɔ fɔnyɔãtsa kalɛ. Kɛtánɛ kĩ fukĩĩ flee anɛ nɛ mi onukpɛ̃.
Mitakama fɔvã kakpa akũ, kitonɛkĩ mifɔnɛ mi tɛbla kɔɛ a awɛ.
Mibɔɛ ɔbla vɔɛ̃ kĩĩ mido. Baguma lamɛna tɛbla kɔɛ kadani lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ nɛ ye kutidu onukpɛ̃, ayekĩ míanyi ye kanyi wĩ.

Nɛ fukĩĩ kamɛ kɔ̃ ni, ntsitsemu adima lɛláa Yudafɔ mɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ, ĩye bikĩ bitsua fɔkpati mɔ bikĩ bɛtátsua fɔkpati a kayite. Ade ayea ntsitsemu buki ɛláa banɔvɔɛ̃, bikĩ be anɛ tábinya, mɔ bikĩ bidzi be akũ akũ mɔ basate kayite. Be flee bɛnyɛ ɔmɔa nɛ Kristo kamɛ ade Kristo lɛmɛ deĩ nɛ be flee kamɛ a.
Kĩ minyɛ Baguma bati kpalɛwa kĩ ɛpau, yawɛ kalɛ lɛmɛ sũ ni, mibɔa ɔbla vɔɛ̃ a kĩ eketimɔ foe a. Ade ye nyɛ oti kɔnyakamɔ, sɛmɛ kalɛ kakɛna, kadɔ mɔ ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ kana.
Mina ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ mikpa akũ. Ntɛ odi fum odi ni, miakɔa mite ye ndɛ ayekĩ boe Ɔlate lɛmɛ kɔa mi tɔkpa ete mi a.
Fukĩ fɔbɛ̃ nyɛ kĩ ɔdɔ ɛna nɛ mi kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ ɔdɔ aboomu fɔtsa flee kakpɔta mɔ fɔakpɔla kakpɔla wĩ.
Mifɔ̃ Kristo lukudɔ a lɛnya akũ nɛ mi kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ ade lukudɔ kĩĩ sũ Baguma vɛ mi ɛkpɔta ndɛ oti mɔa aye a. Minya kɔlɛ banyɛnɛ.

Mifɔ̃ Kristo Kalɛ Wĩ a, mɔ ke kɔyakatɛ a flee kidzi nɛ mi kamɛ. Mitsa akũ fɔtsa, mikpa kɔdɛ nɛ nyansã flee kamɛ. Misã Psalomo tɔnɔ, asɔli tɔnɔ, mɔ Hũhũ kamɛ tɔnɔ mikɔa minyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ nɛ mi tɔwɔlɛ flee kamɛ.
Foesũ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ míakɛna ĩye míalɛ ni, mikɛna foe nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu dĩ akũ, mitsã ye dĩ akũ minyɛ Baguma boe Ɔlɛga kɔlɛ.
Mi fɔnyɔ badzinɛ, midɔla mi akũ mikpa mi banyɔ, ndɛ ayekĩ kɛfɛta Kristofɔ.
Mi batsɔ̃ bakɔãnɛ miwɛ mi batsɔ̃ kalɛ, mitakɛna be aũkani.
Mi babisɛ̃, mitse mi bamanɛ ɔlɛdo nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ ade foe awo Baguma anɛ a.
Mi balɛga, mitado mi babi kalɔkpa, ayekĩ akpɔ lɛláaveli be.
Mi basumunɛ, mibu mi balate nɛ tite akũ nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɛ, mitakɛna anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa kĩ bati bimu mi. Mbom misum be nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ndɛ bati kĩ bavila Baguma.
Adzuma adi nyɛ adi kĩ miakɛna ni, mikɛna ye mɔ mi tɔwɔlɛ flee, ndɛ boe Ɔlate miakɛna mikpa, kĩ nnɛ́ batidziwa miakɛna mikpa.
Mite anɛ kĩ boe Ɔlate aakpa mi ndɛ kɔtɔkase aye, lɛtsa a kĩ ɛmanɛ eyi ye bati, kitonɛkĩ Kristo, boe Ɔlate mɔawɛ a bɔasum.
Baguma aase tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ a tɔkpa a kĩ bɛkɛna a kɔtɔ, kĩ oti anɛ kadã lɛláana nɛ foe kamɛ.
Mi balate mikɛna lɛtsa a kĩ lɛfɛta, mɔ likĩ lɛnɛnɛ lɛmɛ mikpa mi basumunɛ, kitonɛkĩ minyina kĩ mideĩ Ɔlate nɛ ode.
Mina nɛ mpaɛbɔ kamɛ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ. Ntɛ miabɔa mpaɛ ni, mi adzuni ɛdza nɛ lɛtsa mɔa akũ, mikaanyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ luwi daa.
Mibɔa mpaɛ nɛ boe malo lɔlɔ, ayekĩ Baguma aabinya osi ɛkpa boe bude lɛtsã nɛ Kristo kalɛ kɔlawa a akũ, kĩ ke sũ finyaa malo nwaa kɔla a.
Mibɔa mpaɛ mikpa yĩ mpuli nkpalɛ fɔlɛtsa kɔlawa kĩĩ kamɛ ntsa yededeede ndɛ ayekĩ kɛfɛta kĩ nkɛna a.
Minyi ayekĩ míatsã nɛ nyansã kamɛ mɔ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ batɛ badonɛ a, lɔkɔa mikɛna osi nyɛ osi kĩ ebinya ɛkpa mi a akũ adzuma kakɛna wĩ.
Milɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ obu kamɛ, ayekĩ fɔ́alɛ bati katse, lɔkɔa minyi ayekĩ kɛfɛta kĩ miakpa odi nyɛ odi mbuayɛ.
Tihiko, boe ɔwaɛ̃ kĩ bɔátunɔ kalɛ, aayabi mi yĩ akũ fɔlɛtsa flee. Ɛnyɛ boe ɔkɔba ɔsumunɛ kĩ yadi ɔnɔkɔali nɛ boe Ɔlate adzuma a kamɛ.
Ade foesũ nlamɛna ye kado nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ kĩ ɛyaabi mi boe akũ fɔlɛtsa, lɔkɔa edo mi kɔbɛ̃.
Onesimo, boe ɔwaɛ̃ kĩ yadi ɔnɔkɔali, kĩ ɛnyɛ mi kamɛ ɔmɔa a, aatomɔ ye bɛya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃. Baabi mi lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ lɛlamɛna kaya nɛ awĩ a flee.
Aristarko, kĩ bɔmɔ ye waa kɔla a, awɔ̃na mi. Ade ayea Marko, Barnaba ɔwaɛ̃nyole lɛmɛ awɔ̃na mi a. Ĩnya lɔtɔ nkpa mi kanyi kĩ ntɛ Marko ya ni, mitɛ ye mɔ kawɔlɛ.
Yosua kĩ bibuki bavɛ Yusto lɛmɛ awɔ̃na mi. Bati ɛlalɛ kĩĩ odi nyɛ Yudafɔ kĩ bɛdani Kristofɔ bakɛna mɔ yĩ adzuma a bɔkpa Baguma lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a. Ade ye alɛ kado yĩ a.

Epafra, Kristo ɔsumunɛ, kĩ ɛnyɛ mi kamɛ ɔmɔa a lɛmɛ awɔ̃na mi. Yabɔa mpaɛ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ luwi daa nɛ mi lɔlɔ kĩ midza pintii, mibo anɛ mikpɔla nɛ katɛkado kamɛ, lɔkɔa mikɛna Baguma kawɛ nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɛ.
Yĩ mɔawɛ a maapuli ndi ye akũ adansiɛ kĩ yakɛna adzuma mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kakpa mi, mɔ bati a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Laodikea mɔ Hierapoli.
Boe ɔwaɛ̃ Luka, tutsonu ɔkɛnanɛ a kĩ bɔátunɔ kalɛ a, mɔ Dema awɔ̃na mi.
Miwɔ̃na boe bawaɛ̃ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Laodikea mikpa boe. Ade ayea miwɔ̃na boe ɔwaɛ̃ Nimfa mɔ asɔli bati a kĩ batsɛna nɛ ye tɔtɔ kamɛ a lɛmɛ mikpa boe a.
Ntɛ mikã ovoli kĩĩ miyua ni, midã kĩ bɛnakã ye bɛkpa asɔli bati a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Laodikea lɛmɛ. Ade ayea kɛnɛ kĩ mi malo miakã ovoli a kĩ asɔli bati a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Laodikea aakɔa bɛma mi a.
Nɛ kawũna a, mibi Arkipo kĩ boe Ɔlate ɔsum adzuma a kĩ bɛkɔa bido nɛ ye awɛ a ni, ɛdã kĩ ɛkɛna ye ewũna pɛpɛɛpɛ.
Yĩ Paulo mɔawɛ lɛkɔa yĩ awɛ ntsɛlɛ kawɔ̃na fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ. Mite anɛ kĩ mbuki nwaa kɔla!
Baguma kɔnyakamɔ a, kitomɔ mi.
I Thessalonians: Yĩ Paulo, Silvano mɔ Timoteo, bɔtsɛlɛ ovoli kĩĩ bɔama mi a kĩ minyɛ Baguma boe Ɔlɛga mɔ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo bade a nɛ Tesalonika a. Baguma boe Ɔlɛga mɔ boe Ɔlate bɛmɔ mi kɔnya, bɛkpa mi lukudɔ lɛmɛ.
Bɔanyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ nɛ mi flee lɔlɔ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ ade daa ntɛ bɔabɔa mpaɛ ni, bɔakɔa mi fɔlɛtsa kayi nɛ ye anɛ.
Bɔálɛla Baguma boe Ɔlɛga kabi ayekĩ mipini mi katɛkado miakɔa kakɛna adzuma. Bɔalɛ lɛmɛ ayekĩ miabumɔ bati nɛ ɔdɔ kamɛ, mɔ ayekĩ mikɔa anɛ mite nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo akũ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, bunyina kĩ Baguma awɛ mi kalɛ paa, ade ɛpau mi kĩ minya ye bati lɛmɛ a.
Kalɛ Wĩ a kĩ bɔyabi mi a ni, nnɛ́ kalɛ pupulidza kanɛ, mbom nɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa kɔbɛ̃ kamɛ ni, mitɛ foe kĩ ɔnɔkɔali fɔlɛtsa fɔanɛ. Mimɔ́ ayekĩ bupi boe akũ nɛ mi kamɛ kĩ fɔnya kabumɛna fɔkpa mi.
Nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, mitomɔ boe mɔ boe Ɔlate ɔbla a, foesũ titɔ kĩ mimɔ́ lubo pii malo ni, mitɛ kalɛ a mɔ kawɔlɛ kĩ kito Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a sɛkɛ̃.
Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ ni, midani nfantuhũ mikpa batɛ badonɛ flee a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Makedonia mɔ Akaia.
Lɛmɛ nnɛ́ boe Ɔlate kalɛ kĩĩ odi lɛgba kito mi sɛkɛ̃ kɛnaa Makedonia mɔ Akaia flee, mbom mi Baguma katɛkado lɛmɛ gba nɛ kakɔ nyɛ kakɔ. Foesũ fɔtásĩ kĩ bɔlɛ kadi nɛ foe akũ.
Be mɔawɛ a balɛ ayekĩ mitɛ boe nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ bɔya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃, mɔ ayekĩ mifɔ̃ baviɔ̃ kasum, mikɔa mi akũ mikpa Baguma kĩ ye odi dzi nkpã kĩ ɛla kawũna a.

Ade midzi miadzɔlɛ ye Obi Yesu a kĩ ɛdzɛla etomɛna banɔkpa kamɛ, kĩ yaabuki eto ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ ɛya a. Ade Yesu kĩĩ odi aapuli ɛnyɛ boe etomɛna kalɔkpa a kĩ Baguma aana nɛ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ flee akũ a kamɛ a.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, miawɛ minyina kĩ boe kaya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ a tánya kɔa.
Minyina ayekĩ bɛmɔna boe lubo, bivũna boe nɛ Filipi fɔmɔ bɔyawo mi sɛkɛ̃ nɛ Tesalonika. Lɛmɛ titɔ kĩ biyidza bɛdza nɛ boe akũ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ nɛ awã malo ni, Baguma do boe kɔbɛ̃ bubi mi ye Kalɛ Wĩ a.
Kɔdɛ a kĩ bɔakpa mi a táto bati kakɛ, adzuni kpa ĩye tɛdake tisi kamɛ,

mbom bubi mi kalɛ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma wɛ kĩ bɔlɛ, kitonɛkĩ ye mɔawɛ a ɛsɔ boe ɛdã, ɛmɔ́ kĩ bɔfɛta bɔkpa ye Kalɛ Wĩ a kalɛ. Foesũ bɔáwɛ kĩ bɔalɛ bati limu boe, mbom kĩ boe kɔdzɛla kalɛ aawo Baguma a kĩ enyina bati ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ a anɛ.
Minyina pefee kĩ nnɛ́ onukpɛ̃ mɛnɛmɛnɛ fɔlɛtsa bɔkɔa bɔma mi, ade ke bɔtábɛɛlɛ anɛ nɛ odima fɔtsa akũ da a. Baguma odi nyɛ boe ɔdansini.
Bɔtáwɛ kamu butomɛna mi ĩye bati bɛbã sɛkɛ̃.
Titɔ kĩ boe ndɛ Kristo fɔtɔ banyanɛ aye budeĩ osi kĩ bɔavia fɔtsa butomɛna mi sɛkɛ̃ malo ni,
bupi boe akũ nɛ mi kamɛ ndɛ obima kĩ yadãmɛna ye babi akũ aye.
Nɛ ayekĩ bɔawɛ mi kalɛ paa sũ ni, bɔawɛ kĩ mi malo minu Kalɛ Wĩ kĩĩ. Ade fɔnyɛ́ Baguma Kalɛ Wĩ kĩĩ odi, mbom bɔkɔa boe mɔawɛ akũ bɔkpa mi, kitonɛkĩ mitɛ kɔya mikpa boe paa.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mite anɛ ayekĩ lɔkɔ a kĩ bɔna nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃, bɔkabi mi Baguma Kalɛ Wĩ a, bɔkɛna adzuma lɛnyɛ mɔ suwa bɔdã boe akũ, ayekĩ bɔláakɔa fɔlɔtsa fudima bute nɛ odima akũ.
Mi mɔawɛ a mɔ Baguma míapuli midi boe akũ adansiɛ kĩ, kĩ budzi nɛ mi batɛ badonɛ kamɛ a, bupi boe akũ kapi wĩ. Bɔkɛna fɔtsa wĩ, ade odima támɔ nfumusu nɛ boe akũ a.
Minyina lɛmɛ kĩ bɔlɛ odi nyɛ odi ndɛ ayekĩ obilɛga alɛ ye babi.
Budo mi kɔbɛ̃, bɔkadɔla mi tɔwɔlɛ, ade bɔkadɛ mi kĩ midzi nkpã kĩ yaadɔ Baguma sɛmɛ. Ye mɔawɛ lɛvɛ mi kĩ mina nkpã katɛ nɛ ye lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ mɔ kukũkpalɛ a kamɛ.

Ade lɛtsa bɛbã sũ kĩ bɔanyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ daa nyɛ kĩ lɔkɔ a kĩ bubi mi Baguma kalɛ wĩ kĩĩ a, mitákɔa ke mikɛna batidziwa kalɛ, mbom mibu ke, mitɛ ke ndɛ Baguma kalɛ aye, kĩ kɛnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ. Baguma kalɛ kĩĩ akɛna adzuma nɛ mi batɛ badonɛ a nkpã kadzi kamɛ.

Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya nɛ mi akũ nɛ awĩ a, ade foe mɔapɛ a lɛya nɛ Baguma bati akũ nɛ Yudea tite akũ a. Lubo a kĩ mimɔ́ mitomɛna mi bati mɔawɛ kamɛ a, ade de Yudafɔ a kĩ bɛtɛ Yesu bido a lɛmɛ mɔ́ bitomɛna Yudafɔ mɔawɛ kamɛ a.
Yudafɔ kĩĩ lɛkɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ, bɛfɔ̃ bɛkɔ boe Ɔlate Yesu lɛmɛ, ade be tomɔ boe malo liti a. Be fɔkɛlatsa do Baguma kalɔkpa ade biyidza bɛdza nɛ bati flee akũ a.

Bɛbɔa mbɔdi kĩ basua boe osi kĩ bɔtabi bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a kalɛ wĩ a kĩ kaafɔ̃ bɛna nkpã a kĩ ɛlá kawũna a. Nɛ fukĩĩ kakɛna kamɛ ni, bɛkakɛna tɔkpa pii kabu be tɔkpa. Finyaa Baguma kalɔkpa yidza nɛ be akũ.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ade fuwi sukuloo kĩ bɔdzakũ bɔfɔnɛ mi a. Titɔ kĩ bɔámɔ akũ anɛ mɔ anɛ malo ni, bɔakɔna mi akũ paa. Bɔwɛ paa ade bɔbɔa mbɔdi kĩ bɔayaamɔ mi a.
Bɔwɛ kĩ bubuki bɔyaasɛla mi. Yĩ Paulo kɔ̃ ɔnɔkɔali mbɔa mbɔdi pii kĩ maya, lɛmɛ Abonsam tákpa osi.
Fɔnyɛ yĩ kawɛ paa kĩ ĩyaasɛla mi kitonɛkĩ mi akũ bute anɛ, minyɛ boe kawɔlɛ lɛmɛ. Ade minyɛ boe nfasɔ a kĩ foesũ bɔ́ata akũ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ boe Ɔlate Yesu aabuki ɛya a.
Ɔnɔkɔali ni, minyɛ boe obu mɔ kawɔlɛ a.
Nɛ ayekĩ bɔláapuli bubuki budo ɔwɔlɛ sũ ni, buke otse kĩ bɔakahɔ nɛ Atene,
ade ke budo Timoteo kĩ ɛyaado mi kɔbɛ̃, ebumɛna mi nɛ mi katɛkado kamɛ. Ɛnyɛ boe ɔwaɛ̃ kĩ yabumɛna boe nɛ Baguma adzuma mɔ Kristo Kalɛ Wĩ a kalɛ kamɛ.
Bɔkɛna foe lɔmɔ kitonɛkĩ bɔtáwɛ kĩ bati liti katomɛna kĩĩ kiveli odima akpɔ. Mi mɔawɛ minyina kĩ bati liti katomɛna kĩĩ waa kɛkpa boe a kĩ butomɔ Kristo.
Míate anɛ kĩ lɔkɔ a kĩ bɔna nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ a, bɔkpa kanyi bɔnyamɛna lɔtɔ kĩ bati liti katomɛna aaya. Ade ndɛ ayekĩ minyina a, fɔya lɔmɔ pɛpɛɛpɛ.
Nɛ ayekĩ maápuli mbuki ndo ɔwɔlɛ sũ ni, ndo Timoteo kĩ ɛyaadã ayekĩ mi katɛkado la. Nkavila kĩ ɔsa okesĩnɛ a yasɔ mi ɛdã, lɔkɔa boe adzuma kakɛna a flee kɛna pupulidza.
Lɛmɛ Timoteo muniki ɛya mɔ kawɔlɛ ɛyabi boe kĩ mi katɛkado mɔ tɔwaɛ̃ kawɛ távɛmɛna. Ɛlɛ kĩ miate anɛ nɛ boe akũ daa, ade miawɛ osi kĩ míamɔ boe ndɛ ayekĩ boe malo bɔawɛ kĩ bɔamɔ mi a.
Foesũ nwaɛ̃ amɛ, nɛ boe lubo kamɔ mɔ kasuli kamɛ malo ni, mi katɛkado do boe kɔbɛ̃,
kitonɛkĩ ntɛ midzɛ̃ kɔɔba nɛ boe Ɔlate kamɛ ni, nkpã vɔɛ̃ awo nɛ boe kamɛ.
