Bɔ́apuli bɔnyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ nɛ mi lɔlɔ fuwo ye anɛ? Kawɔlɛ baũ ade boe nɛ Baguma anɛ, nɛ mi sũ.
Lɛnyɛ mɔ suwa bɔake boe Ɔlate aduli mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ ɛfɔ̃ bubuki bɔmɔ́ akũ lɔkɔa bɔkpa mi lɛtsa a kĩ lisĩ nɛ mi katɛkado kamɛ.
Finyaakĩĩ Baguma boe Ɔlɛga, mɔ boe Ɔlate Yesu bibinya osi bɛkpa boe lɔkɔa bɔya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃.
Boe Ɔlate ɛfɔ̃ mi akũ kalɛkawɛ mɔ bati bɛbã kalɛkawɛ a kide nɛ ode kibu, ndɛ ayekĩ bɔwɛ mi a.
Fukĩĩ fɔfɔ̃ edo mi kɔbɛ̃, ɛkɛna mikpɔla, ɛkɛna mi bati kpalɛwa nɛ Baguma boe Ɔlɛga anɛ, kɛnaawo luwi a kĩ boe Ɔlate Yesu mɔ ye bade a flee kĩ bɛkpalɛ a aabuki bɛya.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ke kawũna a, mikɔlɛ mitomɛna boe sɛkɛ̃ ayekĩ míadzi nkpã kĩ yaawo Baguma anɛ. Ade aye midzi kɔkɔɛ a, lɛmɛ bɔado mi fi, nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu dĩ akũ kĩ mikɛna fɔba lɔmɔ.
Minyina fɔtsa a kĩ foe bɔtsa mi nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu dĩ akũ a.
Baguma awɛ kĩ mi akũ ɛkpalɛ nɛ linyolewɛ mɔ litsolewɛ akũ.
Onyole nyɛ onyole enyi ɔtsɔ̃ kapi wĩ nɛ kukũkpalɛ mɔ obu kamɛ,
ɛtatomɔ sukɛna fɔwɛtsa ɔmɛnɛ liti ndɛ bikĩ binyína Baguma aye.
Nɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ akũ ni, odima ɛtakɛna tɔkpa nɛ ɔkɔba akũ ĩye esisi ye. Bubi mi fukĩĩ tɔ̃, buke mi awɛ nɛ akũ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ boe Ɔlate aavɛlɛ bikĩ bakɛna fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ a sɔtɔ.
Baguma távɛ boe kĩ bɔnya bati kĩ be akũ deĩ efĩĩ, mbom bɔnya bikĩ be akũ kpalɛ.
Nɛ foesũ ntɛ odi sĩ nhihiɛ kĩĩ akũ kakɛna ni, nnɛ́ otidziwa esĩ, mbom eyidza ɛdza nɛ Baguma kĩ yakɔa ye Hũhũ Kpalɛwa kakpa mi a akũ.
Nɛ mi bawaɛ̃ batɛ badonɛ akũ kalɛkawɛ akũ kɔ̃ ni, fɔtásĩ kĩ matsɛlɛ litsedi nɛ foe akũ, kitonɛkĩ Baguma tsa mi kɔkɔɛ kĩ miwɛ mi akũ kalɛ.
Fɔnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali kĩ miawɛ mi bawaɛ̃ batɛ badonɛ flee a kĩ bideĩ nɛ Makedonia flee a kalɛ, lɛmɛ bɔake mi aduli kĩ mikɛna foe fɔba lɔmɔ.
Mi botaɛ fɔnya kĩ miadzi nkpã nɛ akũ kadɔla kamɛ, odi nyɛ odi ɛdã ye adzuma. Mikɔa awɛ mikɛna mi mɔawɛ adzuma minya ndɛ ayekĩ bubi mi a.
Fukĩĩ aafɔ̃ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ batɛ badonɛ a lɛkpa mi obu, lɔkɔa miláakɔa anɛ mite nɛ odima lɛtsama akũ.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, bɔawɛ kĩ bɔabi mi lɛtsa kĩ laaya nɛ bati kĩ biku bɛtɛ̃ a akũ, ayekĩ miláadzi nɛ ayɔlɔhɔ kamɛ ndɛ bati kĩ bɛlá kɔnɛte.
Bɔtɛ budo kĩ Yesu ku ade ebuki eyidza edzi nkpã a. Foesũ bɔtɛ budo kĩ batɛ badonɛ flee a kĩ biku a ni, Baguma aafɔ̃ Yesu lɛkpã be ɛyamɛna nɛ ye kaya kamɛ.
Lɛtsa a kĩ bɔatsa mi finyaakĩĩ nyɛ boe Ɔlate fɔtsa katsa, kĩ boe a kĩ bɔ́adzi nkpã nɛ luwi a kĩ boe Ɔlate aaya akũ a ni, bɔláanya bikĩ biku a lɔtɔ mɔ ode kanaa.

Nɛ lɔkɔ a na ni, bɔ́anu boe Ɔlate kaya a mɔ fɔwɔla kɔɔba. Bɔ́anu ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a odo. Baguma kagbulɛɛ aanɛ, lɔkɔa boe Ɔlate mɔawɛ aato ode ɛya. Bati a kĩ bɛtɛ Kristo bido fɔmɔ biku a aanya lɔtɔ biyidza.
Ke liti a, Baguma aakpɔta boe a kĩ bute budzi nkpã a ɛnaabumɔ bikĩ biyidza a, bɔnaatsɛlamɔ boe Ɔlate nɛ odetɔ́ kamɛ. Lɔkɔa bɔ́adzi nɛ boe Ɔlate a sɛkɛ̃ daa.
Foesũ mikɔa fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ mikaadɔla mi bawaɛ̃ tɔwɔlɛ.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, fɔtásĩ kĩ matsɛlɛ lɛtsama mma mi futomɛna lɔkɔ ĩye fuwi a kĩ fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ aaya a akũ,
kitonɛkĩ mi mɔawɛ minyina yededeede kĩ boe Ɔlate Kaya Luwi a aaya ndɛ ayekĩ oyekpanɛ afuta oti mɔ lɛnyɛ.
Lɔkɔ a kĩ bati alɛ kĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa yamɔ lukudɔ mɔ kadzi wĩ a, ade lɔkɔ a na kamɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ mɔ baawɔla be deedimɔapɛ a. Fɔ́aya ndɛ ayekĩ sɛmɛ api ɔmatsɔ̃, ade kalo lɛláana a.
Lɛmɛ, nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mi kɔ̃ miláa ɔtũ kamɛ. Foesũ luwi a na lɛtayaafuta mi ndɛ oyekpanɛ aye,
kitonɛkĩ mi flee minyɛ ɔhaĩ bati. Ade bɔnyɛ́ bati kĩ bakɛna fɔtsa nɛ lɛnyɛ ĩye ɔtũ kamɛ a.
Foesũ mitawa tida ndɛ bati bɛbã, mbom mina nɛ kukũmanɛ mɔ kɔnɛte kamɛ.
Lɛnyɛ bati awa tida, ade bikĩ bavɛ bamɔa kawuga ni, lɛnyɛ bawugɛla be.
Lɛmɛ kĩ ɔhaĩ kamɛ bati bɔanɛ sũ ni, mifɔ̃ bɔkɔa boe katɛkado mɔ ɔdɔ bɔkɛna ɔwɔlɛ libĩĩ katɛ sɔbɔtsaɛ, mɔ boe kɔnɛte nɛ boe nkpã akũ bɔkɛna sɔbɔtsaɛ lɔbɔɛ.
Kitonɛkĩ Baguma tápau boe kĩ yaakɔa ye kawũnaba a ɛwɔla boe, mbom kĩ bɔ́atsã boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo akũ bɔna nkpã katɛ.
Yesu ku nɛ boe lɔlɔ, kĩ ntɛ budzi o-o, ĩye ntɛ buku o-o, bɔ́adzimɔ ye nɛ ye kabuki kaya kamɛ.
Nɛ foesũ ni, mikaado akũ fi, mikaabumɛna akũ ndɛ ayekĩ milamɛna kakɛna finyaa a.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, bɔake mi aduli kĩ mikɔa obu wĩ mikpa mi lɔtɔ banyanɛ a kĩ bakɛna adzuma nɛ mi kamɛ, kakpã mi nɛ Kristo nkpã kadzi kamɛ a.
Miwɛ be kalɛ, mikpa be obu paa nɛ adzuma a kĩ bakɛna a sũ. Ade midzi mɔ akũ nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ a.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, bɔawɛ kĩ midɛ banyɔnɛpo, mido bikĩ bideĩ libe a ɔwɔlɛ, mibumɛna bikĩ akpɔ veli be a. Mina ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ mikpa odi nyɛ odi.
Midã kadã wĩ kĩ odima ɛtakɔa tɔkpa ese tɔkpa kɔtɔ, mbom mibɔa mbɔdi kĩ miakɛna tuwĩ mikpa akũ mɔ odi nyɛ odi.
Mimɔ kawɔlɛ luwi daa.
Mikaabɔa mpaɛ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ.
Minyɛ boe Ɔlate kɔlɛ nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ ade fukĩĩ bamɛ Baguma awɛ etomɛna be a kĩ bitomɔ Yesu Kristo a.
Mitasua Hũhũ Kpalɛwa kɔbɛ̃ a osi.
Mitasupa Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ fɔlɛtsa a.
Mbom misɔ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa midã lɔkɔa mipi fuwĩ a midomɔ akũ.
Milo nɛ tɔkpa tidi nyɛ tidi ɔwɛ̃.
Bɔwɛ kĩ Baguma kĩ yakpa boe lukudɔ a, ɛkpalɛ mi akũ nɛ osi nyɛ osi akũ, ɛdã mi hũhũ, mi tɛkla mɔ mi sukɛna flee. Ɛnyɛ mi nɛ mfumsu flee kamɛ nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo kabuki kaya a kamɛ.
Baguma a kĩ ɛvɛ mi a aakɛna foe, kitonɛkĩ yadi ɔnɔkɔali.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mikaabɔa mpaɛ nɛ boe malo lɔlɔ.
Bɔawɔ̃na batɛ badonɛ a flee nɛ ɔdɔ mɔ kawɔlɛ kamɛ.
Mawã mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo kɔbɛ̃ akũ kĩ mikã ovoli kĩĩ mitsa batɛ badonɛ a flee.
Boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo ɛmɔ mi kɔnya.
II Thessalonians: Yĩ, Paulo, Silvano mɔ Timoteo, bɔtsɛlɛ ovoli kĩĩ bɔama mi a kĩ minyɛ Baguma mɔ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo bade a nɛ Tesalonika.
Bɔwɛ kĩ Baguma boe Ɔlɛga, mɔ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo, bɛmɔ mi kɔnya, bɛkpa mi lukudɔ lɛmɛ.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, kɛnɛ kĩ bɔanyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ nɛ mi lɔlɔ. Fɔnɛnɛ kĩ bɔanyɛ ye kɔlɛ, kitonɛkĩ mi katɛkado abo anɛ, ade mi bawaɛ̃ akũ kawɛ lɛmɛ lamɛna lɔtɔ kanaa a.
Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ bɔapia nɛ mi akũ katsa Baguma tɛsɔli a. Bɔapia lɛmɛ nɛ ayekĩ midzɛ̃ pintii nɛ mi katɛkado a akũ, titɔ kĩ bitomɔ mi liti ade miamɔ lubo lɛmɛ.
Fukĩĩ flee atsa kĩ Baguma kadzɛ kamɛ kpalɛ, nɛ foesũ yaamɔ mi kĩ mikpɔla mikpa kadzikɔ̃ nɛ ye lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kĩ de akũ miamɔ lubo a kamɛ.
Baguma aakɛna lɛtsa a kĩ lɛnɛnɛ nɛ de osi akũ, ade yaavɛlɛ lubo kamɔ eko nɛ bikĩ bɛmɔna mi lubo akũ a.
Yaafɔ̃ mi a kĩ mimɔ́ lubo a, mɔ boe a flee bɔna kawɛya. Baguma aakɛna fukĩĩ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ boe Ɔlate Yesu mɔ ye ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ anɛ nɛ odetɔ́ kamɛ nɛ fi mɔ kɔbɛ̃ kamɛ.
Yaavɛlɛ bati a kĩ binyína Baguma, mɔ bikĩ bisĩ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo Kalɛ Wĩ a sɔtɔ.
Boe Ɔlate aablɔmɛna be nɛ ye anɛ kamɛ mɔ ye awã kĩ ye kukũkpalɛ mɔ ye kɔbɛ̃ deĩ a. Yaawɔla be mɔ odu mɔ odu,
ntɛ ɛya nɛ Luwi kpale a akũ. Yaatɛ obu mɔ kamu etomɛna ye batɛ badonɛ a flee sɛkɛ̃. Mi malo míana nɛ be kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ mitɛ ye fɔlɛtsa wĩ a kĩ bubi mi a mido.
Ade fukĩĩ sũ bɔabɔa mpaɛ nɛ mi lɔlɔ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ a. Bɔawã Baguma kĩ ɛfɔ̃ mi kadzi kamɛ kiketimɔ kavɛ a kĩ ɛvɛ mi a. Ye kɔbɛ̃ kɔfɔ̃ mi tuwĩ kakɛna flee nɛ mi katɛkado kamɛ a fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ.
Fɔ́atsã fukĩĩ akũ boe Ɔlate Yesu dĩ aade nɛ ode, mi malo mina dĩ kadɛla nɛ ode mitomɛna ye sɛkɛ̃ nɛ Baguma mɔ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo kɔnyakamɔ sũ.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, bɔawɛ kĩ bɔabi mi fɔlɛtsa fudi nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo kabuki kaya mɔ boe kakpɔta nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ a akũ.

Ntɛ minu kĩ boe Ɔlate kaya luwi a ya kɔkɔɛ ni, mitafɔ̃ mi kakɔna litutulu ĩye libe liwo mi. Ɔsa míakɔna kĩ boe lɛlɛ fukĩĩ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ bɔnyɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃, ĩye kĩ bɔlɛ Baguma kalɛ a, ĩye kĩ bɔtsɛlɛ ovoli odi bɔma mi.
Mitafɔ̃ oti odima lɛkɛ mi nɛ osi odima akũ, kitonɛkĩ boe Ɔlate luwi a lɛláaya mbɔɛntɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ bati pii aayidza bɛdza nɛ Baguma akũ a ya, ade oti kpa a kĩ Baguma nyɛ eyi kĩ yaawɔla a aanɛ ɛdza a.

Oti Kpa a aayidza ɛdza nɛ Baguma Hũhũ kɔbɛ̃ adi nyɛ adi akũ, ĩye lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ bati asum akũ, lɔkɔa ɛbɔɛ ye akũ kĩ ɛbɛ̃ hũhũ a flee. Malo kɔlaa, yanadzá nɛ Baguma Asɔli Kɔla kamɛ, ɛkɛna ye akũ kĩ ye nyɛ Baguma mɔawɛ a.
Miáte anɛ kĩ lɔkɔ a kĩ nna nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ a mbi mi fukĩĩ bamɛ?
Lɛmɛ kɔbɛ̃ kudi sua foe kaya osi finyaakĩĩ. Mi mɔawɛ a minyina lɛtsa kĩ fɔanɛ. Oti Kpa a aanyɛ ye akũ kanya ntɛ ye lɔkɔ wo ɔtɔ.
Tɔkpa kakɛna kɔbɛ̃ lamɛna adzuma kakɛna nɛ kabɛla kamɛ kɔkɔɛ. Lɛmɛ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔ́aya a ni, fɔláaya nɛ foe kamɛ tɔ̃ kɛnaawo kĩ Baguma nyɛ oti a kĩ yasua foe osi.
Fukĩĩ liti ni, Baguma aanyɛ oti kpa a kanya, lɛmɛ ntɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu ya ni, yaakɔa ye onukpɛ̃ kamɛ otutuo ɛkɔ ye lɔkɔa ɛkɔa ye kukũkpalɛ ɛwɔla ye.
Oti Kpa a na aaya mɔ Abonsam kɔbɛ̃, lɔkɔa ɛkɛna awãwã mɔ fɔvã nsɛntsɛlɛni fɔtsa kumɛkumɛ.
Ade bati a kĩ baya kawɔkɔ̃ a ni, oti kpa a aatsã ablɔ tɛdake tisi nyɛ tisi akũ ɛkɛ be. Baawɔ kitonɛkĩ bɛtátɛ ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ wĩ a kĩ fɔ́afɔ̃ Baguma lɛkpa be nkpã a bido.
Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ, Baguma aakɔa hũhũ kĩ yaafɔ̃ bɛyɛla osi edo nɛ be kamɛ ayekĩ baatɛ fɔvã kama fɔlɛtsa bido.
Foe kawũna aanya kĩ, Baguma aakɔ be flee kɔtɔ, kitonɛkĩ bɛtátɛ ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a bido, mbom bamɔ kawɔlɛ nɛ tɔkpa kakɛna akũ.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, kɛfɛta kĩ bɔanyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ daa nɛ mi lɔlɔ, kitonɛkĩ yawɛ mi kalɛ paa. Kito anɛ kayɔkayi a, Baguma nyɛ mi kĩ mina katɛ. Ɛkɔa ye Hũhũ Kpalɛwa ɛkpalɛ mi akũ nɛ ayekĩ mitɛ kalɛ wĩ a mido sũ.
Ade fɔtsã Kalɛ Wĩ a kĩ bubi mi a akũ sũ ni, Baguma vɛ mi kĩ miyaana tsɛfã nɛ boe Ɔlate Kristo kukũkpalɛ a kamɛ.
Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ, nwaɛ̃ amɛ, midza kɔɔba, mipi ɔnɔkɔali fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɔtsa mi nɛ boe fɔtsa katsa, mɔ boe tuvoli kamɛ a midomɔ akũ.
Bɔawã boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo, mɔ Baguma boe Ɔlɛga kĩ yawɛ boe kalɛ a, kĩ nɛ ye kɔnyakamɔ kamɛ ni, ɛkpa boe ɔwɔlɛ kado mɔ kɔnɛte pii,
ɛkpa mi kɔbɛ̃, edo mi tɔwɔlɛ fi nɛ kɔdzɛla wĩ kalɛ, mɔ tudzuma wĩ kakɛna kamɛ.
Yĩ kalɛ kawũnade nyɛ kĩ, nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mibɔa mpaɛ nɛ boe lɔlɔ ayekĩ boe Ɔlate kalɛ a aagba nɛ fɔkɔ kumɛkumɛ, lɔkɔa bɛtɛ ke mɔ obu ndɛ ayekĩ fɔna nɛ mi kamɛ a.
Mibɔa mpaɛ lɛmɛ kĩ Baguma ɛnyɛ boe etomɛna tɔkpa mɔ bati kpa awɛ kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ nnɛ́ bati flee lɛtɛ kalɛ a bido.
Lɛmɛ boe Ɔlate nyɛ ɔnɔkɔalini, ade yaado mi kɔbɛ̃, ɛdã mi akũ ayekĩ okesĩnɛ a lɛláanya mi akũ.
Boe Ɔlate akpa boe katɛkado nɛ mi akũ kĩ míakɛna nɛ fukĩ bɔtsa mi a akũ, ade bɔatɛ kado kĩ míakɛna nɛ foe akũ lɛmɛ a.
Bɔawã Baguma kĩ ɛkpa mi ye ɔdɔ a kayɔkanu baũ, mɔ ɔwɔlɛ kado a kĩ Kristo akpa a.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, bɔasi mi mbla nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo dĩ akũ kĩ mivɛlɛ mi akũ nɛ batɛ badonɛ banyɔnɛpo a kĩ baákɛna nɛ fɔtsa kĩ bɔtsa mi akũ a ɔwɛ̃.
Mi mɔawɛ minyina yededeede kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ miakɛna adzuma ndɛ ayekĩ boe malo bɔkɛna a, kitonɛkĩ bɔtákɛna ɔnyɔnɛ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ bɔna nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ a.
Bɔtákɔa boe kanya bute nɛ odima akũ kĩ bɔtáse kɔtɔ. Mbom bɔkɛna adzuma mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ lɛnyɛ mɔ suwa ayekĩ odima lɛláabɔa kɔtɔ nɛ boe akũ kadã kamɛ.
Budeĩ osi kufɛ kĩ bɔakɔa boe akũ kadã bute nɛ mi akũ, lɛmɛ bɔkɛna foe kĩ mikɔlɛ mitomɛna boe sɛkɛ̃.
Míate anɛ kĩ lɔkɔ a kĩ bɔna nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ a, bɔkabi mi kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ esĩ kĩ yaakɛna adzuma ni, ɛtanya lɛmɛ.
Bɔabi mi fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ kitonɛkĩ bɔanu kĩ banyɔnɛpo badi deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ, kĩ baákɛna lɛtsama kɛba bakɔba akũ fɔlɛtsa katsã kalɛ.
Bɔasi bati kĩĩ mbla bɔkpa be kɔdɛ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo dĩ akũ, kĩ bidzi kadzi wĩ lɔkɔa bɛkɛna adzuma bɛdã be mɔawɛ akũ.
Lɛmɛ, nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mitafɔ̃ akpɔ liveli mi nɛ tuwĩ kakɛna kamɛ.
Ade ntɛ odi lákɛna nɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɔabi mi nɛ ovoli kĩĩ kamɛ akũ ni, miyi ye ɔsũ lɔkɔa mifɔnɛ ye awɛ, kɔnyɔã kuwo ye.
Lɛmɛ mitabɔɛ ye likesĩ, mbom midɛ ye ndɛ ɔwaɛ̃ aye.
Bɔawã boe Ɔlate mɔawɛ a kĩ ɛnyɛ lukudɔ oti a, kĩ ɛkpa mi lukudɔ daa nɛ mi kadzi kamɛ. Boe Ɔlate ɛdãmɛna mi flee akũ.
Yĩ Paulo mɔawɛ lɛtsɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ makla mi. Ade aye mado awɛ nɛ yĩ tuvoli flee kayɔ a, ade aye lɛmɛ matsɛlɛ fɔtsa a.
Bɔawã kĩ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo ɛmɔ mi flee kɔnya.
I Timothy: Ovoli kĩĩ to yĩ, Paulo, kĩ ĩnyɛ Yesu Kristo fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ, kĩ Baguma boe Ɔtɛnɛ a pau, mɔ Kristo Yesu kĩ ye akũ budeĩ kɔnɛte a sɛkɛ̃.
Nkɔa mmɛna nɔ Timoteo, kĩ ɔnyɛ yĩ obi nɛ katɛkado kamɛ. Mawã kĩ Baguma boe Ɔlɛga, mɔ Kristo Yesu boe Ɔlate bɛmɔ mi kɔnya, bɛkɛna mi sɛmɛ kalɛ, bɛkpa mi lukudɔ lɛmɛ.
Mawɛ kĩ buki kadzi nɛ Efeso ndɛ ayekĩ nwɛ ntomɛna nɔ sɛkɛ̃ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ ndzakũ manaa Makedonia a. Bati badi deĩ nɛ awã kĩ batsa fɔvã fɔtsa nɛ Kristo katɛkado a akũ, ade kɛnɛ kĩ ate awɛ nɛ be akũ a.

Bi be kĩ bɛfɔ̃ lɔkɔ kade kabula nɛ atitifɔ fɔlɛtsa mɔ bawanyɔ bawanyɔ kasinu katokɔ̃ fɔtsa katsa awɛ. Fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ bamɛ katsa ayamɛna fɔlɛtsa kavɛlɛ nɛ bati kayite. Foe bamɛ lɛnyɛ́ Baguma nhihiɛ kĩ ɛkɛna. Katɛkado odi kamɛ bɔatsã kanyi foe.
Lɛtsa a kĩ de sũ makpa nɔ mbla kĩĩ nyɛ kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ bɔanyi ɔdɔ a kĩ eto ɔwɔlɛ kpalɛwa, adzuni kpalɛwa mɔ katɛkado wĩ kamɛ.
Lɛmɛ bati badi muniki nɛ fɔtsa kĩĩ liti, foesũ bɛyɛla osi wĩ a, ade bɛkɔa be lɔkɔ bɛkpa fɔlɛtsa kavɛlɛ mɔ fɔkɔasiatsa kalɛ a.
Bawɛ kĩ banya Mose mbla fɔtsa batsanɛ. Lɛmɛ baánu be mɔawɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ balɛ, ĩye fukĩ bɛtɛ bido mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ a kayɔ malo.
Boe flee bunyina kĩ Mose mbla a nɛnɛ, ntɛ bɔakɛna nɛ ye akũ ndɛ ayekĩ fɔfɛta a.

Kɛnɛ kĩ bɔate anɛ kĩ bɛtákɛna mbla bɛkpa bati wĩ, mbom bikĩ bafum Baguma mbla, bikĩ bideĩ atɔ ɔsĩ, bikĩ bɛnyɛ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ, bikĩ binyína Baguma, mɔ bikĩ tɔkpa yi be kamɛkamɛ. Badi lɛmɛ nyɛ bikĩ bɛláa katɛkado kadima kamɛ, bikĩ bakɔ be balɛga mɔ bama, mɔ awudifɔ.
Bati bɛbã lɛmɛ nyɛ bikĩ bɛkɔa akũ bɛkpa linyolewɛ mɔ litsolewɛ, banyole kĩ bawamɔ akũ, bati kĩ bapili bati kanɔ, bavãlɛvã, bikĩ balɔ fubo kama fɔvã, mɔ be flee a kĩ bitómɔ fɔtsa wĩ a katsa.
Fɔtsa katsa kĩĩ a deĩ nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a kĩ bɛkɔa bido nɛ yĩ awɛ kĩ nlɛ a kamɛ. Kalɛ Wĩ a to Baguma a kĩ bɔakɔa obu mɔ nhila kakpa a sɛkɛ̃.
Nláapuli ĩnyɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo kɔlɛ nɛ kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ ɛkpa yĩ nnɛɛ makɛna adzuma wĩ kĩĩ akũ. Manyɛ ye kɔlɛ kĩ ɛmɔ́ kĩ nkpɔla sũ ɛpau yĩ kĩ nkɛna ye adzuma,
titɔ kĩ nɛ lɔkɔ lidi kamɛ ni, nsupa ye, ntomɔ ye liti, nvũna ye malo. Lɛmɛ Baguma mɔ́ yĩ kɔnya, kitonɛkĩ nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ ni, ntátɛ ye ndo ade ntányi lɛtsa a kĩ de nkakɛna a.
Ade boe Ɔlate mɔ́ yĩ kɔnya pii, ɛfɔ̃ nna katɛkado mɔ ɔdɔ kĩ fɔnyɛ boe fude nɛ ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ Kristo Yesu kamɛ.
Fɔlɛtsa a kĩ malɛ nɛ awĩ a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ paa, kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ bati bɛtɛ ke bido. Ade foe nyɛ kĩ Kristo Yesu ya nɛ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ kĩ yayaatɛ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ. Yĩ nyɛ ɔkpade flefle nɛ be kamɛ.
Lɛmɛ Baguma mɔ́ yĩ kɔnya ayekĩ Kristo Yesu aapuli ɛkɔa yĩ a kĩ ĩnyɛ tɔkpa ɔkɛnanɛ flee a, ɛtsa bati bɛmɔ́ ayekĩ edeĩ ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ, lɔkɔa bikĩ bayatɛ ye bido a bɛna nkpã kĩ ɛla kawũna a.
Mifɔ̃ bɔkɔa obu mɔ kamu bɔkpa boe Lɛgã kĩ edzi kito titiiti a, kĩ bɔámɔ mɔ anɛ, kĩ ye odi keĩ nyɛ Baguma a daa daa. Fɔya lɔmɔ.
Yĩ obi Timoteo, kɔdɛ a kĩ makpa nɔ nɛ awĩ a tsɛ̃ nɛ katɛ mɔ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ lɛ nɛ nɔ akũ biyi a akũ. Kɔa fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kakɛna ndɛ kawũkanɔ fɔtsa lɔkɔa kanɔ kawũ a kanɔ wĩ.
Pi nɔ katɛkado nɛ Kristo kamɛ mɔ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kakpalɛ kalɛ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ. Bati badi tátse be tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kɔdɛ ade bɛyɛla be katɛkado a.
Be kamɛ badi nyɛ Himenaio mɔ Aleksandro, kĩ nvɛlɛ be sɔtɔ, nkɔa be ndo nɛ Abonsam awɛ. Fukĩĩ aafɔ̃ bɛfɔ̃ fubusuotsa kalɛ nɛ Baguma akũ.
Fɔtsa fɔtɔnyade kĩ mawɛ kĩ mikɛna nyɛ kĩ mibɔa mpaɛ nɛ bati flee lɔlɔ. Mikaavia mi fɔtsa sĩwa mɔ be fude flee katomɛna Baguma sɛkɛ̃, mikaanyɛ ye kɔlɛ nɛ be flee lɔlɔ.
Mikaabɔa mpaɛ kakpa fɔgã mɔ bikĩ bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ bati onukpɛ̃, ayekĩ bɔ́adzi kulokulo nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ, lɔkɔa bupuli busum Baguma nɛ obu kamɛ.
Fukĩĩ nɛnɛ, fɔade Baguma boe Ɔtɛnɛ a kawɔlɛ,
kitonɛkĩ yawɛ kĩ odi nyɛ odi ɛna katɛ lɔkɔa enu ɔnɔkɔali a kayɔ.
Nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, Baguma mɔapɛ deĩ, ade ayea lɛmɛ lɛma ɔkplanɛ mɔapɛ deĩ nɛ Baguma mɔ batidziwa kayite a. Ade ye nyɛ Kristo Yesu a.
Ade ye lɔkɔa ye akũ ɛbɔa afɔliɛ nɛ bati flee lɔlɔ a. Ade fukĩĩ atsa kĩ lɔkɔ wĩ a kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi kĩ yaatɛ katinya kamɛ bati flee a wo ɔtɔ a.
Ade fukĩĩ sũ Baguma do yĩ ndɛ fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ mɔ fɔtsa ɔtsanɛ nɛ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ sɛkɛ̃ kĩ nde lɛtsã nɛ katɛkado mɔ ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a akũ. Nnɛ́ fɔvã mama, ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ malɛ.
Nɛ asɔli adi nyɛ adi kamɛ ni, banyole a bɛnya bikĩ be tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kpalɛ kĩ baapuli bɛdɛla akpɔ nɛ ode bɛbɔa mpaɛ kĩ kalɔkpa ĩye ɔdzɛ lɛláa be kamɛ.
Mawɛ lɛmɛ kĩ batsole bɛdɔla be akũ, bidzi tilima nɛ osi kĩ fɔláatsɔlɛ anɛ akũ. Fɔnɛ́nɛ kĩ basui tɔlɔ nɛ kahɛhɛ kamɛ, bido sika ngbã mɔ fɔtsa kĩ fɔtɛ kɔya. Bɛtado tɛtadiɛ kĩ tatɛ kɔya lɛmɛ.
Mbom be fɔtsakɛlawa fɔnya fɔtsa wĩ ndɛ batsole kĩ bɛkɔa be akũ bɛkpa Baguma.
Kɛnɛ kĩ batsole bɛdɔla be akũ, bitse kulokulo bɛkɔlɛ fɔtsa.
Ntákpa be osi kĩ batsa banyole fɔtsa ĩye kĩ bɛnya banyole akũ, mbom kɛnɛ kĩ bisua onukpɛ̃ bidzi kulokulo.
Kitonɛkĩ Adam Baguma nya lɔtɔ ɛbɔa fɔmɔ ɛyakɛna Eva.
Ade nnɛ́ Adam Abonsam kɛ, mbom otsole a ɛkɛ ade ɛfɔ̃ efum Baguma mbla a.
Lɛmɛ otsole aana nkpã nɛ ye kɔma kamɛ ntɛ edzi nɛ katɛkado mɔ ɔdɔ kamɛ, ɛkɛna ye akũ yedede nɛ akũ kadɔla kamɛ lɛmɛ.
Fɔnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali kĩ ntɛ oti odi awɛ kĩ yanya asɔli lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ ni, adzuma wĩ liti etomɛna.

Kɛnɛ kĩ asɔli lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ ɛnya oti kĩ nfumusu lɛláa ye akũ, kĩ ɛkɔã ɔtsɔ̃ mɔapɛ, ye adzuni waa yedede, yapi ye akũ ade bati akpa ye obu a. Kɛnɛ kĩ ɛnya oti kĩ yapuli katɛ banɔvɔɛ̃ ade yapuli katsa fɔtsa a.
Kɛtánɛ kĩ ɛnya bavɛ owuganɛ ĩye oti kĩ ye anɛ kamɛ tádɔ, mbom kɛnɛ kĩ ɛnya oti kĩ ɛdɔ, kĩ yaákɛna ɔdzɛ, ade ɛlá anɛngbã nɛ sika akũ a.
Kɛnɛ kĩ epuli ɛdãmɛna ye tɔtɔ akũ kadãmɛna wĩ, lɔkɔa ye babi bibu fɔkɔ nɛ osi nyɛ osi akũ.
Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ onyole lápuli ɛdãmɛna ye tɔtɔ akũ ni, nde yaapuli ɛkpã Baguma asɔli a?
Kɛnɛ kĩ ɛnya oti kĩ ebuna owi nɛ asɔli a kamɛ, ntɛ nnɛ́ aye ni yaadɛla ye akũ nɛ ode, lɔkɔa fɔtsã lukũta kamɛ ɛyaatɔ ndɛ ayekĩ fɔya fɔkpa okesĩnɛ a.
Kɛnɛ kĩ ɛnya oti kĩ bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ batɛ badonɛ a malo abɔa ye dĩ wĩ, ayekĩ ɛláado ye akũ kɔnyɔã lɔkɔa ewo nɛ okesĩnɛ a awɛ kamɛ.
Ade aye lɛmɛ kɛnɛ kĩ asɔli lɔtɔ banyanɛ babumɛnanɛ a malo banya bati kĩ bideĩ ɔbla wĩ mɔ ɔnɔkɔali a. Bɛnya bati kĩ baáwuga bavɛ ade bɛlá anɛngbã nɛ sika lɛmɛ akũ.
Kɛnɛ kĩ bapi katɛkado fɔlɛtsa wĩ a kĩ bɛnyɛ bɛtsa a bidomɔ akũ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ, bidzi mɔ tɔwɔlɛ kpalɛwa.
Ade kɛnɛ kĩ basɔ be bɛdã nɛ asɔli tudzuma tidi kakɛna kamɛ. Ntɛ bɛkpɔla ni, baapuli bɛkɛna adzuma ndɛ lɔtɔ banyanɛ babumɛnanɛ aye.
Kɛnɛ kĩ batsɔ̃ malo bɛna tɛbla wĩ, kĩ bɛtanya bati kĩ balɛ bati akũ fɔlɛtsa. Bɛnya batsole kĩ baámɔa bavɛ kawuga, kĩ badi ɔnɔkɔali nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kakɛna kamɛ.
Dã kĩ babumɛnanɛ kĩĩ be kamɛ odi nyɛ odi deĩ ɔtsɔ̃ mɔapɛ, epuli yadãmɛna ye babi mɔ tɔtɔ kamɛ bati flee akũ kadã wĩ.
Babumɛnanɛ a kĩ bakɛna be adzuma kakɛna wĩ a deĩ kadzakɔ̃ wĩ nɛ bati anɛ, ade baapuli bɛna ɔwɔlɛ kɔbɛ̃ bɛlɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ be Kristo Yesu katɛkado akũ a.

Titɔ kĩ matsɛlɛ ovoli kĩĩ mma nɔ malo ni, nlamɛna osi kadã kĩ maayasɛla nɔ nɛ lɔkɔ lukũ kamɛ. Lɛmɛ matsɛlɛ ye ayekĩ ntɛ nkpa liti ni, aanyi ayekĩ bati bipi be akũ nɛ Baguma asɔli a kamɛ. Ade asɔli a nyɛ bikĩ bɛtɛ Baguma a kĩ edzi nkpã daa bido, kĩ fɔnyɛ luku kĩ lɛnɔnɛ ɔnɔkɔali a.

Titɔ kĩ matsɛlɛ ovoli kĩĩ mma nɔ malo ni, nlamɛna osi kadã kĩ maayasɛla nɔ nɛ lɔkɔ lukũ kamɛ. Lɛmɛ matsɛlɛ ye ayekĩ ntɛ nkpa liti ni, aanyi ayekĩ bati bipi be akũ nɛ Baguma asɔli a kamɛ. Ade asɔli a nyɛ bikĩ bɛtɛ Baguma a kĩ edzi nkpã daa bido, kĩ fɔnyɛ luku kĩ lɛnɔnɛ ɔnɔkɔali a.
Nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, kalɛ a kĩ bɛkɔa bɛkɔla nɛ Baguma ɔsum kamɛ a nyɛ kalɛ kpale kĩ odima lɛláapuli esĩ ke. Ade foe nyɛ kĩ,
“Kristo ya nɛ katinya kamɛ ndɛ otidziwa aye
Baguma Hũhũ a nyɛ ɛtsa kĩ oti kpalɛwa yanɛ.
Ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ mɔ́ ye,
ade bide lɛtsã nɛ ye akũ nɛ fude fude kamɛ a.
Bɛtɛ ye bido nɛ katinya kamɛ flee,
ade Baguma bɔɛ ye ɛnamɛna ode nɛ kukũkpalɛ kamɛ a.”
Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a nyɛ ɛtsa yededeede kĩ, nɛ fuwi nkaɛ a kamɛ ni, bati badi aafɔnɛ ɔnɔkɔali katɛkado kĩĩ awɛ bitse hũhũ kpa a kĩ yakɛ bati, mɔ hũhũ kpa fɔtsa katsa.
Fɔvã bati kĩĩ aagbamɛna fɔtsa katsa kĩĩ odu. Bɛnyɛ bikĩ be tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kakɔna ku ndɛ sɔbɔtsaɛ mɔ ovio bɛkɔa bipila te.

Batsa fɔtsa kĩ kɔtsɔ̃ mɔ kɔnyɔ kadzi lɛnɛ́nɛ. Balɛ lɛmɛ kĩ kɛtánɛ kĩ bati anya funitsã fudi odu. Lɛmɛ Baguma lɛkɛna funitsã a na bamɛ, kĩ bikĩ bɛtɛ bido mɔ binyi ɔnɔkɔali a, bɛbɔa mpaɛ nɛ foe akũ bɛnya.
Nɛ ayekĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ Baguma bɔa nɛnɛ sũ ni, kɛtánɛ kĩ bati asĩ funitsã fudima, mbom kɛnɛ kĩ bɔatɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa mɔ kɔlɛkanyɛ nɛ foe akũ.
Kitonɛkĩ Baguma kalɛ a mɔ boe kɔlɛkanyɛ a akpalɛ funitsã a akũ.
Ntɛ atsa awaɛ̃ amɛ batɛ badonɛ fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ ni, lɔkɔa aanya Kristo Yesu ɔsumunɛ wĩ, kĩ bɛdɔɔla mɔ katɛkado fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ mɔ boe fɔtsa katsa wĩ a kĩ opini a.
Foesũ vɛlɛ nɔ akũ nɛ atitifɔ katɛkado fɔlɛtsa mɛwa mɔ fɔlɛtsa kĩ fɔlá kayɔ ɔwɛ̃. Kɔa hũhũ kamɛ nkpã kadzi kavɛlɛ nɔ akũ. Baguma fɔlɛtsa a, tomɔ foe liti pintii, kadzi nkpã wĩ ndɛ ɔtɛ odonɛ aye.
Akũ ɔsĩ nɛnɛ kɔ̃, lɛmɛ ayekĩ bakɔlɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa mɔ foe akũ kakɛna akpa nfasɔ kĩ ɛbɛ̃ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa. Kitonɛkĩ fɔakpa nɔ nfasɔ nɛ nkpã kĩĩ kamɛ mɔ nkpã nɛ wuda liti a lɛmɛ kamɛ.
Ade ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ kĩĩ kɛnɛ kĩ odi nyɛ odi atɛ edo a.
Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ bɔapuli kakɛna adzuma kɔɔba, kitonɛkĩ boe anɛ teĩ nɛ Baguma kĩ edzi nkpã a akũ. Ye nyɛ bati flee a kĩ titiliwu bikĩ bɛtɛ bido a Ɔtɛnɛ.
Kɛnɛ kĩ atsa be fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ flee, ɔdã kĩ odi nyɛ odi kɔlɛ foe.
Tafɔ̃ oti odima lɛdã nɔ ndɛ obisɛ̃ nɛ ayekĩ ɔnyɛ opopo sũ. Mbom kɔa nɔ akũ kakɛna nfantuhũ wĩ kakpa batɛ badonɛ a nɛ nɔ kɔdzɛla, nɔ ɔbla, nɔ bati kawɛ, nɔ katɛkado, mɔ nɔ kadzi yedede kamɛ.
Fɔmɔ maaya ni, kaakã Baguma kalɛ a katsa be nɛ asɔli, kakaanyɛ foe kayɔ katsa be, katsa be fɔtsa lɛmɛ.

Tafɔ̃ hũhũ kamɛ futetsa a kĩ Baguma kɔa edo nɛ nɔ kamɛ a akũ adzuma kakɛna. Bɛkpa nɔ foe bɛtsãmɛna Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ akũ nɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛlɛ biyi a kamɛ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ asɔli banɔkɔɛ̃ te awɛ nɛ nɔ akũ a.
Kɔa nɔ akũ flee kakpa nɛ tudzuma kĩĩ flee kakɛna kamɛ. Pi te kadomɔ akũ ayekĩ bati flee aamɔ nɔ adzuma lɔtɔ kanaa biyi ɔsũ.
Di nɔ akũ oni nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ atsa a akũ. Pi nɔ adzuma a kadomɔ akũ, kitonɛkĩ ntɛ ɔkɛna foe lɔmɔ ni, aatɛ nɔ mɔawɛ a akũ mɔ bikĩ batse nɔ kalɛ a nkpã.
Tawũni nɛ onyolenɔkɔɛ̃ akũ, mbom dɛ ye nɛ obu kamɛ ndɛ aga aye. Bi bapopo tuwuli ndɛ awaɛ̃nyole amɛ aye.
Bi batsolenɔkɔɛ̃ tuwuli ndɛ ama amɛ, mɔ bayitsɔ̃ lɛmɛ ndɛ awaɛ̃tsole amɛ nɛ akũ yedede kamɛ.
Kɔa obu kakpa bakunawa kĩ bɛlá babumɛnanɛ.

Lɛmɛ ntɛ okunawa odi deĩ babi ĩye bawa ni, babi a bɛnya lɔtɔ bɛkɔlɛ be ɔsum kamɛ adzuma kakɛna kakpa be akũ bati, lɔkɔa fɔtsã foe akũ bɛdã be bamanɛ akũ bɛkɔa biyi be ayɛ. Ade fukĩĩ nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lawo Baguma anɛ a.
Okunawa kĩ ɛlá odima kĩ yadãmɛna ye akũ kɔa ye anɛ ete nɛ Baguma akũ, yabɔa mpaɛ lɛnyɛ mɔ suwa kavia ye kabumɛna.
Lɛmɛ okunawa kĩ ɛkɔa ye akũ ɛkpa nkpã kanya ni, eku kɔkɔɛ nɛ Baguma anɛ titɔ kĩ edzi nkpã malo.
Kpa be kɔdɛ nɛ fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ akũ ayekĩ odima lɛláamɔ mfumsu nɛ be akũ.
Ade ntɛ mi kamɛ odi ládãmɛna ye akũ bati akũ, titiliwu ye tɔtɔ kamɛ bade akũ ni, ade emuniki nɛ katɛkado a liti a. Oti kĩĩ nyɛ oti kpa ɛbɛ̃ bikĩ bɛtátɛ bido malo a.
Takɔa okunawa odima kĩ ɛtátɛ futeli aduesia tɔ̃ dĩ obumɔ bakunawa kĩ bideĩ a. Lɛtsa kĩ libu nyɛ kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ okunawa ɛnya otsole kĩ bɛkɔã deedimɔapɛ,

ade kɛnɛ kĩ ɛna dĩ wĩ nɛ ye sɛmɛ kalɛ kakɛna sũ, ɛnya otsole kĩ ɛdɔɔla ye babi kadɔɔla wĩ, yatɛ banɔvɔɛ̃ lɛmɛ. Ɛnya otsole kĩ yasum ye bakɔba batɛ badonɛ, yabumɔ bati kĩ bideĩ nɛ lubokamɔ kamɛ, ade ɛkɔa ye akũ ɛkpa tuwĩ kakɛna a.
Takɔa bakunawa kĩ bɛtábo anɛ buĩ odo nɛ katsu a kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ ntɛ kɔnyɔ kadzi kɔ be odo ni, baafɔnɛ Kristo awɛ,
ade baatu fubo a kĩ bɛlɔ bɛkpa ye a lɔkɔa ɛkɔ be kɔtɔ.
Fukĩ fubu nyɛ kĩ, babula be lɔkɔ kade, katsã kamini nɛ bati tɔtɔ kamɛ, kadani banyɔnɛpo, kĩ balɛ bati akũ fɔlɛtsa, mɔ fɔlɛtsa kĩ fɔtáfɛta kalɛ.
Foesũ, mawɛ kĩ bakunawa kĩ bɛtábo anɛ a bidzi fɔnyɔ bɛma babi, lɔkɔa bɛdãmɛna be tɔtɔ akũ. Fukĩĩ aafɔ̃ bɛláakɛna fɔtsa kĩ fɔtáfɛta kĩ fɔ́akpa boe bakesĩnɛ osi bɛkalɛ tuwuli kpa nɛ boe akũ.
Malɛ fukĩĩ kitonɛkĩ bakunawa pii yɛla osi kɔkɔɛ bitomɔ Abonsam.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ bakunawa deĩ nɛ otsole ɔtɛ odonɛ odi awɛ nɛ ye tɔtɔ kamɛ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ ɛdã be akũ, ɛtakɔa fɔlɔtsa a ete nɛ asɔli a akũ. Fukĩĩ aafɔ̃ batɛ badonɛ a lɛdã bakunawa a kĩ bɛlá babumɛnanɛ a akũ.
Kɛnɛ kĩ bɛkpa batɛ badonɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ bakpã bati kakpã wĩ a obu mɔ kɔtɔkase kutsu nviã, titiliwu bikĩ bakɛna adzuma mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ nɛ fɔtsa katsa mɔ fɔtsa kayɔ kanyɛ kamɛ.
Kitonɛkĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Tasui ɔyaɛ kĩ yabumɔ nɔ kamɔnɛ kagɔlɛ onukpɛ̃.” ade, “Kɛnɛ kĩ bise adzuma ɔkɛnanɛ kɔtɔ bɛkpa adzuma a kĩ ɛkɛna a.”
Ntɛ odi bɔɛ kalɛ nɛ asɔli ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ akũ ni, tatɛ foe ɔkpa ye mbɔɛntɛ otse kalɛ otomɛna adansifɔ nviã ĩye be ɛlalɛ sɛkɛ̃.
Kã bati a kĩ bakɛna tɔkpa anɛ nɛ batɛ badonɛ flee anɛ kamɛ, ayekĩ fɔ́ado babɛbã a libe.
Ndzɛ̃ nɛ Baguma, mɔ Kristo mɔ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ anɛ kamɛ mabi nɔ nɛ kudulike kamɛ kĩ pi fɔtsa katsa a kadomɔ akũ, tadã oti anɛ nɛ nɔ tudzuma kakɛna kamɛ.
Tawɛ sɔwa kĩ ate awɛ nɛ odi akũ ɔkpa ye boe Ɔlate adzuma kĩ ɛkɛna. Tado akũ nɛ bati bɛbã tɔkpa kakɛna kamɛ. Pi nɔ akũ yededeede.
Nɛ sɛmɛ kpa kĩ odeĩ sũ ni, takamɔa mui odi mbom kaamɔa bavɛ sukuloo sukuloo fubumɛna nɔ.
Bati badi titikpa anɛ kanya mɔatsɛ kanya be lɔtɔ kanamɛna kadzɛ kamɛ, lɛmɛ badi kɔ̃, liti liti fɔmɔ be tɔkpa anɛ kanya.
Ade aye a tuwĩ kakɛna lɛmɛ lábɛla a, ade fukĩ fɔbɛla a malo fɔ́anɛ kanya.
Kɛnɛ kĩ bi batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bɛnyɛ basumunɛ a kĩ bɛkɔa obu bɛkpa be balate ayekĩ odima lɛláalɛ tuwuli kpa nɛ Baguma dĩ mɔ boe fɔtsa katsa a akũ.

Ade kɛtáfɛta kĩ basumunɛ a kĩ be balate nyɛ batɛ badonɛ bɛkɔa be katɛkado kamɛ ɔmɔa kakɛna sũ bisupa be balate a. Mbom kɛnɛ kĩ bisum be kasum wĩ bɛba, kitonɛkĩ balate a kĩ bana be akũ nfasɔ a nyɛ be batɛ badonɛ mɔ bawɛnɛ. Kɛnɛ kĩ atsa be ɔnɔkɔali fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ lɔkɔa odo be fi bɛkɛna nɛ foe akũ.

Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yatsa fɔtsa kĩ fɔtáketi mɔ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo ɔnɔkɔali fɔlɛtsa, mɔ boe katɛkado fɔtsa katsa a ni, oti a naa dɛla ye akũ nɛ ode, ade enyína lɛtsama a. Edeĩ ɔdɔ nɛ fɔlɛtsa kavɛlɛ mɔ ɔdzɛ kakɛna mɔ bati akũ. Fukĩĩ ayamɛna lineke kanɔ, ɔdzɛ kakɛna, bati kavũna mɔ adzuni kpa kakɔna nɛ oti akũ.

Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yatsa fɔtsa kĩ fɔtáketi mɔ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo ɔnɔkɔali fɔlɛtsa, mɔ boe katɛkado fɔtsa katsa a ni, oti a naa dɛla ye akũ nɛ ode, ade enyína lɛtsama a. Edeĩ ɔdɔ nɛ fɔlɛtsa kavɛlɛ mɔ ɔdzɛ kakɛna mɔ bati akũ. Fukĩĩ ayamɛna lineke kanɔ, ɔdzɛ kakɛna, bati kavũna mɔ adzuni kpa kakɔna nɛ oti akũ.
Foe lɛmɛ fɔayamɛna fɔlɛtsa kavɛlɛ mɔatsɛ mɔatsɛ. Bati kĩĩ be lɔlɔ kamɛ lɛ́waa yedede ade bɛyɛla ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a lɛmɛ a. Bakɔna kĩ Baguma ɔsum nyɛ akũ kana fɔtsa osi odi.
Fɔnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali kĩ ntɛ oti yɔɔla anɛ nɛ Baguma liti katomɛna akũ, mɔ fɔtsa a kĩ edeĩ a fuwo ye anɛ ni, ɛdani osikani,
kitonɛkĩ awɛ pupulidza bɔkɔa bɔya nɛ katinya kamɛ, ade bɔ́adzakũ mɔ awɛ pupulidza a.
Foesũ ntɛ budeĩ tilima mɔ funitsã ni, mifɔ̃ fuwo boe anɛ.
Lɛmɛ bati a kĩ anɛ ayɔɔla be nɛ akũ kana fɔtsa akũ ni, bawo nɛ sɔhuiɛ kamɛ ade batɔ a. Fɔkɔasiatsa mɔ fɔwɛtsa kpa tɔwɛ̃ pini be fɔavɛlɛ be kanamɛna lubo kamɔ mɔ kawɔ kamɛ.
Kitonɛkĩ sika anɛngbã kamɛ tɔkpa kumɛkumɛ flee anɛ kato. Badi tomɔ sika kawɛ liti limii kĩ bɛyɛla katɛkado a, ade biwo nɛ ayɔlɔhɔ pii kĩ ɛfɔ̃ be tɔwɔlɛ tɛ kaakpa kamɛ a.
Lɛmɛ Timoteo, Baguma oti anɛ sũ vɛlɛ nɔ akũ nɛ fɔlɛtsa kpa kĩĩ flee ɔwɛ̃. Pili kakpa tuwĩ kakɛna, katomɔ Baguma liti nɛ katɛkado, ɔdɔ mɔ ɔwɔlɛ kado, mɔ akũ kadɔla kamɛ.
Pili kɔɔba kanya nkpã kĩ ɛla kawũna a kakpa nɔ akũ. Ade nkpã kĩĩ sũ Baguma pau nɔ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ ɔnyɛ nɔ katɛkado ɔtsa pefee nɛ adansifɔ pii anɛ a.
Ade makpa nɔ mbla kĩĩ nɛ Baguma kĩ yakpa lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa nkpã, mɔ Kristo Yesu kĩ ɛnyɛ ye katɛkado ɛtsa pefee nɛ Pontio Pilato anɛ kamɛ a dĩ akũ kĩ,
pi fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kadomɔ akũ pɛpɛɛpɛ ayekĩ odima lɛláamɔ tɔkpa nɛ nɔ akũ, kɛnaawo Luwi a kĩ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo aabuki ɛya.
Baguma fɛta ɛkpa obu, yanya lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa akũ, ɛnyɛ fɔgã flee Lɛgã. Lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa avɛ ye kĩ Baguma Kpale. Ade ye aanyɛ Kristo kanya nɛ lɔkɔ wĩ a kĩ eyi ɛkpa a kamɛ a.
Ye odi keĩ dzi nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna dadaada, edzi nɛ ɔhaĩ kĩ odima lɛláapuli efuã ɛdã ye a kamɛ. Odima támɔ tɔ̃ ye ade odima lɛláapuli ɛmɔ́ ye da. Ye fude nyɛ kamu, obu mɔ otumi daa. Fɔya lɔmɔ.

Dɛ bikĩ bideĩ katinya kamɛ akũ fɔtsa kĩ bɛtapia be akũ, ade bɛtakɔa anɛ bite nɛ akũ kana fɔtsa a kĩ fɔláawa daa akũ, mbom bɛkɔa anɛ bite nɛ Baguma kĩ ye akpa boe lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa mɔ sɛmɛ kalɛ ayekĩ bɔ́amɔ kawɔlɛ a akũ.
Bi be kĩ bɛkakɛna tuwĩ bɛnya asikafɔ nɛ tudzuma wĩ kakɛna kamɛ, bɛkɛna sɛmɛ kalɛ, bɛkaate ahiãfɔ fɔtsa faa.
Ntɛ bɛkɛna foe lɔmɔ ni, baakpɔta fɔtsa kĩ fɔáwɔ biyi bɛkpa be akũ nɛ kunya kamɛ, lɔkɔa be awɛ aata nkpã wĩ a.
Timoteo, dã fɔtsa a kĩ Baguma kɔa edo nɔ nɛ awɛ a akũ kadã wĩ. Tado akũ nɛ kɔlɔmɛna pupulidza mɔ fɔkɔasiatsa kavɛlɛ kamɛ. Ade fukĩĩ badi nɛɛ bakɛ bati kĩ kadikanyi fɔlɛtsa fɔanɛ a.
Kitonɛkĩ badi bɔɛ be akũ kĩ binyina fukĩna bamɛ, lɛmɛ fɔtsɛ̃ foe akũ bɛyɛla katɛkado osi a.
Mawã Baguma kĩ ɛmɔ mi kɔnya.
II Timothy: Ovoli kĩĩ to yĩ, Paulo, kĩ fɔtsɛ̃ Baguma kawɛ sũ ĩnyɛ Kristo Yesu fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a sɛkɛ̃. Bido yĩ kĩ nde lɛtsã nɛ nkpã a kĩ bɛlɛ biyi kĩ budeĩ nɛ boe Ɔlate Kristo Yesu sɛkɛ̃, mɔ bɔmɔ ye ɔmɔa kakɛna a kamɛ.
Matsɛlɛ mma yĩ obi Timoteo kĩ maátunɔ ye kalɛ. Baguma boe Ɔlɛga mɔ boe Ɔlate Kristo Yesu bɛmɔ nɔ kɔnya, bɛkɛna nɔ sɛmɛ kalɛ, bɛkpa nɔ lukudɔ lɛmɛ.
Manyɛ Baguma a kĩ masum mɔ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kpalɛwa ndɛ ayekĩ boe bawanyɔ kakɛna a kɔlɛ. Ntɛ mabɔa mpaɛ makai nɔ daa. Manyɛ ye kɔlɛ lɛnyɛ mɔ suwa ntɛ nkai nɔ nɛ yĩ mpaɛbɔ kamɛ.
Mate anɛ nɛ nɔ babe a akũ, ade mawɛ kĩ mbuki mmɔ́ nɔ ayekĩ kawɔlɛ aade yĩ.
Mate anɛ nɛ nɔ katɛkado wĩ a kĩ odeĩ a akũ. Ade katɛkado kĩ kɛna nɛ nɔ ɔwatsɔ̃ Lois mɔ ama Eunike amɛ kamɛ a. Matɛ kado kĩ ade ke odu nɔ malo odeĩ a.
Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ makai nɔ kĩ pi futetsa a kĩ Baguma kpa nɔ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ nte awɛ nɛ nɔ akũ a kɔɔba.
Kitonɛkĩ Hũhũ a kĩ Baguma kpa boe a láfɔ̃ bɔavila, mbom ye Hũhũ a afɔ̃ kɔbɛ̃ awo nɛ boe kamɛ, kawɛ bati kalɛ, kapuli kanya boe akũ.

Foesũ tafɔ̃ kɔnyɔã lɔkɔ nɔ nɛ boe Ɔlate fɔlɛtsa kalɛ kamɛ, ĩye kɔnyɔã lɔkɔ nɔ nɛ yĩ kĩ nwaa kɔla nɛ Kristo sũ. Mbom nɔ malo dza kɔɔba nɛ lubo kamɔ kamɛ, nɛ boe Ɔlate Kalɛ Wĩ a sũ, ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma kpa nɔ kɔbɛ̃ kĩ kɛna a.

Baguma lɛkpa boe nkpã ɛvɛ boe kĩ bɔnya ye bade. Nnɛ́ ayekĩ bɔfɛta sũ, mbom fɔnyɛ ye mɔawɛ nhihiɛ mɔ kɔnyakamɔ a kĩ edeĩ ɛkpa boe a sũ. Ɛkpa boe kɔnyakamɔ kĩĩ ɛtsãmɛna boe Ɔlate Kristo Yesu akũ, fɔmɔ katinya yi kayɔ.
Lɛmɛ finyaakĩĩ ni, Baguma nyɛ foe kanya ɛtsa boe pefee fɔtsã boe Ɔtɛnɛ Kristo Yesu kaya kamɛ. Ade ye lɛwɔla wuda kɔbɛ̃ a. Ɛtsã Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ ɛtsa boe nkpã a kĩ ebuki ɛlá kawũna dadaada a osi a.
Baguma pau yĩ ndɛ fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ, mɔ fɔtsa ɔtsanɛ kĩ nde lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ.
Ade fukĩĩ sũ mamɔ lubo kĩĩ a. Lɛmɛ kɔnyɔã lákɔ yĩ, kitonɛkĩ ĩnyina oti a kĩ ye ntɛ ndo. Ade ĩnyina kĩ yaapuli ɛdãmɛna lɛtsa a kĩ ɛkɔa edo nɛ yĩ awɛ kɛnaawo Luwi nkaɛ a akũ.
Pi ɔnɔkɔali fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ntsa nɔ a kalɛ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ fɔkɛna lɛtsa kĩ de liti otomɛna. Na nɛ katɛkado kĩĩ mɔ ɔdɔ a kĩ fɔnyɛ boe fude nɛ ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ Kristo Yesu kamɛ pintii.
Baguma Hũhũ kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ kudeĩ nɛ boe kamɛ a kudo nɔ kɔbɛ̃, kapi fɔtsa wĩ a kĩ bɛkɔa bido nɛ nɔ awɛ a kapi wĩ.
Onyina kĩ Asiafɔ batɛ badonɛ a flee dzakũ bɛfɔnɛ yĩ, ade ayea Figelo mɔ Hermogene lɛmɛ dzakũ a.
Mawã Baguma kĩ ɛmɔ Onesiforo mɔ ye tɔtɔ kamɛ bati kɔnya, kitonɛkĩ ɛkado yĩ ɔwɔlɛ lɔkɔ pii. Kɔnyɔã tákɔ ye kĩ nwaa kɔla sũ.
Kĩ esila ewo Roma a, ɛtsã emini ɛwɛ yĩ flee kɛnawo kĩ ɛmɔ́ yĩ.
Mawã Baguma kĩ ɛmɔ ye kɔnya nɛ Kadzɛ Luwi a akũ. Ade nɔ mɔawɛ onyina pefee kabumɛna a kĩ ɛkpa yĩ nɛ Efeso a.
Yĩ obi, do nɔ akũ kɔbɛ̃ mɔ Baguma kɔnyakamɔ nɛ ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ Kristo Yesu a kĩ bɛkpa boe a kamɛ.
Kɔa fɔtsa a kĩ onu kĩ ntsa nɛ adansifɔ pii anɛ kamɛ a kado nɛ bikĩ ɔtɛ odo kĩ baapuli bɛtsa bati bɛbã lɛmɛ a awɛ.
Do ɔwɔlɛ kamɔ lubo ndɛ sodzani wĩ kĩ ɛdzɛ̃ ɛkpa Kristo Yesu.
Sodzani kĩ ɛdzɛ̃ nɛ ye adzuma akũ ni, yawɛ kĩ yakɛna fɔtsa fuwo ye lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ anɛ, foesũ ɛláado akũ nɛ adzuma kĩ ɛnyɛ́ sodzafɔ adzuma kamɛ.
Ade ayea fɔmɔ atsɛ owulanɛ aanya akũ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ ɛkɛna nɛ atsɛ kalo mbla akũ.
Okuani kĩ yanɛ kɔba mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ ni, ade ye anya lɔtɔ kanya funitsã a kĩ fubo a.
Kɔna fɔtsa a kĩ mbi nɔ a akũ, kitonɛkĩ boe Ɔlate aabumɔ nɔ onu foe flee kayɔ.
Te anɛ nɛ Yesu Kristo kĩ ɛnyɛ Lɛgã Dawid kasinu obi a kĩ Baguma dzɛla ye etomɛna banɔkpa kamɛ a akũ ndɛ ayekĩ bɛtsa a. Ade foe nyɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a kĩ made lɛtsã nɛ ke akũ a.
Ade Kalɛ Wĩ a kĩ malɛ a sũ nlamɛna lubo kamɔ, ade ke bido yĩ nɛ nkɔsɔnkɔsɔ kamɛ ndɛ oti kĩ efum a. Lɛmɛ Baguma kalɛ kɔ̃ bɛtádo ke nkɔsɔnkɔsɔ!
Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ mado ɔwɔlɛ kamɔ lubo nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɛ nɛ Baguma bati a kĩ ɛpau a sũ, ayekĩ nɛ Kristo Yesu akũ be malo baana katɛ mɔ kawɔlɛ nkpã a kĩ ɛla kawũna a.
Fukĩĩ nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali fɔlɛtsa kĩ balɛ,
“Ntɛ buku mɔ boe Ɔlate ni,
bɔ́adzi nkpã lɛmɛ mɔ ye.
Ntɛ budo ɔwɔlɛ bɔmɔ́ lubo ni,
bɔ́anya lɛgã lɛmɛ mɔ ye.
Ade ntɛ busĩ ye ni,
ye malo yaasĩ boe.
Ntɛ boe bɔákɛna nɛ boe katɛkado akũ malo ni,
ye kɔ̃ yakɛna nɛ ye kalɛ akũ daa,
kitonɛkĩ ɛláapuli esĩ ye akũ da.”
Te bati a fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ anɛ, lɔkɔa kasi be mbla nɛ Baguma anɛ kĩ bɛtakavɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa, kitonɛkĩ nfasɔ adima lɛláa foe kamɛ, mbom kabula fɔabula bati a kĩ batse foe a katɛkado kade.
Bɔa mbɔdi kakɛna adzuma mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ ayekĩ fɔ́awo Baguma anɛ. Kɛna adzuma ndɛ oti kĩ ye adzuma lákɔ ye kɔnyɔã mbom yatsa Baguma ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a pɛpɛɛpɛ.
Tado nɔ akũ nɛ kɔlɔmɛna kĩ fɔátsa Baguma kavila kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ fɔakpã bati kanɛlitimɛna nɛ Baguma akũ.
Fɔtsa katsa a na la ndɛ kaakpa kĩ kasa kaba sukɛna. Bati nviã kĩ bɛtsa foe odu nyɛ Himenaio mɔ Fileto.
Bimuniki nɛ ɔnɔkɔali osi a akũ, ade badani batɛ badonɛ a badi katɛkado a. Bɛkatsa fɔtsa kĩ banɔkpa kabuki kayidza kadzi nkpã ya kɛtɛ̃ kɔkɔɛ.

Lɛmɛ, Baguma kɔla kayɔkayi litekũ a kĩ eke a ni, lɛtsama lɛláapuli likuna de. Ade kayɔkayi litekũ kĩĩ akũ bɛtsɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate nyina bikĩ bɛnyɛ ye bade a.” ade “Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yalɛ kĩ ɛnyɛ boe Ɔlate a ode ni, kɛnɛ kĩ emuniki nɛ tɔkpa liti.”

Nɛ tɔtɔ kpale kamɛ ni, fɔɔdaɛ mɔ titsensi kumɛkumɛ deĩ. Fudi nyɛ sika ngbã fude, fudi lɛmɛ nyɛ sika ovoe fude. Ade fudi lɛmɛ nyɛ tite ĩye titse fude a. Bɛkɔa fukĩ fudeĩ kɔya biyi bɛkpa fuwi titiliwu kanya, ade bɛkɔa fɔbɛbã biyi bɛkpa luwi daa akũ a.
Foesũ ntɛ oti odi vɔlɛ ye akũ ɛkɛna ye akũ yedede, ɛnɛ nɛ tɔkpa kamɛ ni, yaanya adzuma titiliwu ɔkɛnanɛ kitonɛkĩ bɛkpalɛ ye akũ ade edeĩ nfasɔ ɛkpa boe Ɔlate a.

Takɔa nɔ akũ ɔkpa fɔwɛtsa kpa a kĩ foe kakɛna akɔ bapopo odo. Pili katɛkado, nkpã wĩ kadzi, mɔ bati kawɛ. Mimɔ bati a mikɛna fukĩĩ mɔ kadzi nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ, mibɔa mpaɛ mivia boe Ɔlate kabumɛna mɔ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ yedede.
Tado onukpɛ̃ nɛ fɔlɛtsa kavɛlɛ kĩ nyansã lɛláa foe kamɛ. Nɔ mɔawɛ a onyina kĩ fɔlɛtsa kavɛlɛ naa bamɛ ayamɔ ɔdzɛ.
Kɛtánɛ kĩ boe Ɔlate ɔsumunɛ akɛna ɔdzɛ, mbom kɛnɛ kĩ ɛkɛna sɛmɛ kalɛ ɛkpa odi nyɛ odi, ɛnya fɔtsa ɔtsanɛ wĩ kĩ edeĩ ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ ɛkpa bikĩ bideĩ ɔsĩ a.
Ade ke kɛnɛ kĩ ɛkɔa ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ ɛkaanyɛ fɔlɛtsa kamɛ katsa bati a kĩ biyidza bɛdza nɛ kalɛ wĩ a akũ a. Ɔsa Baguma aafɔ̃ bɛdani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ lɔkɔa bɛyaanyi ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a.
Nɛ foe kamɛ a, be adzuni kamɛ aabinya lɔkɔa bɛnɛ nɛ Abonsam kpeĩ kĩ bɛtɔ a, kĩ ɛkɔa be ɛkɛna ye fɔwɛtsa bakɛnanɛ a kamɛ.
Te anɛ kĩ nɛ fuwi nkaɛ kamɛ ni, kadzi kamɛ aana ɔsĩ.

Bati aawɛ be odi kalɛ fɔtsa bawɛnɛ, bɛna sika anɛngbã, bɛkabɔa tɔwɔlɛ, bɛkapia akũ. Baanya bati kĩ be akũ awo be anɛ, kĩ bavũna bati, kĩ baákɔa obu kakpa be bamanɛ. Baanya bati kĩ baáyi bati ayɛ, mɔ bikĩ bɛlá katɛkado.
Baanya bati kĩ bideĩ sɛmɛ ɔnyɛ, bikĩ baámɔ bati kɔnya, bikĩ bama fɔvã kate nɛ bati akũ, mɔ bikĩ baápuli kanya be mɔawɛ akũ. Baanya bati kĩ bideĩ aũkani, baáwɛ kĩ bakɛna tuwĩ.
Ade badi lɛmɛ aanya bati liti osi batsãnɛ, bati kĩ baakɛna fɔtsa kĩ badɛla be akũ nɛ ode, mɔ bikĩ bawɛ katinya kamɛ kawɔlɛ kamɔ fɔtsa kaba Baguma kawɛ.
Bati kĩĩ odu aakɛna be akũ ndɛ bati wĩ, lɛmɛ baasĩ Baguma kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ kɔ́akpa be nkpã wĩ kadzi a. Vɛlɛ akũ nɛ bati kĩĩ odu ɔwɛ̃.
Bati kĩĩ odu kamɛ badi atsã nɛ bati tɔtɔ kamɛ kakɛ batsole kĩ baápuli kapi be adzuni. Be titikpa kĩĩ odu kakɛna fɔ̃ batsole a kakɔna láwa kpĩĩ ade bitomɔ fɔwɛtsa pii liti a.
Batsole kĩĩ odu akɔlɛ fɔtsa vɔɛ̃ luwi daa lɛmɛ baápuli binu ɔnɔkɔali a kayɔ.
Ndɛ ayekĩ Yane mɔ Yambi yidza bɛdza nɛ Mose akũ a, ade aye fɔtsa batsanɛ kĩĩ lɛmɛ yidza bɛdza nɛ ɔnɔkɔali a akũ a. Be tɔkpa kakɛna bula be adzuni kade, ade bɛyɛla be katɛkado lɛmɛ a.
Lɛmɛ bati kĩĩ lɛláanaa lɔtɔ mɔ foe kakɛna, kitonɛkĩ be fudzimbitsa a aanɛ fɔwa odi nyɛ odi lɛmɔ. Ade aye pɛpɛɛpɛ fɔya nɛ Yane mɔ Yambi akũ a.
Lɛmɛ nɔ kɔ̃ otomɔ yĩ fɔtsa katsa, yĩ ɔbla, yĩ kakɔna mɔ yĩ katɛkado, yĩ bati kalɛ kawɛ, yĩ ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ kana mɔ yĩ ɔwɔlɛ kado nɛ lubo kamɔ kamɛ.
Onyina ayekĩ bitomɔ yĩ liti, bɛmɔna yĩ lubo nɛ Antiokia, Ikonio mɔ Listra, mɔ bati liti katomɛna pii a kĩ mpuli ndza nɛ foe kamɛ a. Lɛmɛ boe Ɔlate nyɛ yĩ nɛ foe flee kamɛ.
Ɔnɔkɔali fɔanɛ kĩ, odi nyɛ odi kĩ yawɛ kĩ yadzi nkpã wĩ nɛ ɔmɔa kakɛna nɛ Kristo Yesu kamɛ ni, baatomɔ ye liti.
Lɛmɛ bati kpa mɔ bati bakɛnɛ kɔ̃ ni, be tɔkpa aakade nɛ ode kaba, ade baakakɛ bati, bati bɛbã lɛmɛ lɛkɛ be a.
Lɛmɛ nɔ kɔ̃ ni, pi ɔnɔkɔali fɔtsa a kĩ bɛtsa nɔ, kĩ ɔtɛ odo lɛmɛ a kadomɔ akũ, kitonɛkĩ onyina bati a kĩ be sɛkɛ̃ ɔkɔlɛ foe otomɛna.
Kito anɛ nɔ tibisɛ̃ kamɛ kĩ bɛtsa nɔ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ fɔlɛtsa, kĩ fɔkpa nɔ kadikanyi a kĩ fɔ́akpa nɔ nkpã ntɛ ɔtɛ Kristo Yesu odo.
Baguma kɔbɛ̃ liwo nɛ bati kamɛ kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ fɔlɛtsa, foesũ fɔnɛnɛ fɔkpa fɔtsa katsa, oti anɛ kakã, kɔdɛ kakpa, mɔ oti kavɛlɛ kakpa nkpã wĩ kadzi.
Bɛtsɛlɛ foe ayekĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yasum Baguma ni, yaakpɔla, epuli ɛna nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ ɛkpa fɔtsa wĩ fudi nyɛ fudi kakɛna.
Ndzɛ̃ nɛ Baguma mɔ Kristo Yesu kĩ yayadzɛmɔ batidziwa mɔ banɔkpa, mɔ ye a kĩ yayanya akũ ndɛ lɛgã aye a anɛ kamɛ, makpa nɔ kɔdɛ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ,

ntɛ odeĩ aya ĩye ɔtána aya malo ni, bɔa mbɔdi kade lɛtsã nɛ fɔlɛtsa wĩ a akũ. Dã kĩ atsa bati a fɔtsa, kakã be anɛ lɔkɔa kakaado be kɔbɛ̃. Na ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ kanyɛ fɔlɛtsa kayɔ katsa bati nɛ fukĩĩ flee kakɛna kamɛ. Tafɔ̃ fɔtsa katsa lɛmɛ.
Kitonɛkĩ lɔkɔ lidi aaya kĩ bati lɛláabuki bitse fɔtsa katsa wĩ kĩĩ a. Mbom baatomɛna be mɔawɛ fɔwɛtsa, ade baawɛ fɔtsa batsanɛ bɛbã kĩ baabi be fɔtsa a kĩ akũ asĩ be kĩ binu a.
Bɛláawɛ kĩ batse ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a, mbom baayi atɔ bitse fɔlɛtsa mɛwa.
Lɛmɛ nɔ kɔ̃ kɛnɛ kĩ api nɔ akũ nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɛ, kaado ɔwɔlɛ nɛ lubo lidi nyɛ lidi kamɛ. Kɛna Kalɛ Wĩ a ɔlɛnɛ kawũna ndɛ Baguma ɔsumunɛ aye.
Yĩ kɔ̃ ni, lɔkɔ kpɔla liyua kĩ baakɔa yĩ bɛbɔa ndɛ afɔliɛ bɛkpa Baguma, ade lɔkɔ lɛmɛ wo ɔtɔ kĩ manɛ nɛ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ a.
Nvũ lɛma wĩ a kavũ wĩ, nlo atsɛ a flee ĩyua ade mpini yĩ katɛkado a nɛ Kristo kamɛ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ a.

Ade kito finyaa ni, futetsa wĩ a kĩ bakpa akũ banyanɛ nɛ nkpã wĩ kadzi kamɛ a adzɔlɛ yĩ. Ade futetsa kĩĩ boe Ɔlate kĩ ɛnyɛ fɔlɛtsa ɔdzɛnɛ wĩ a, aakɔa ɛkpa yĩ nɛ luwi nkaɛ a akũ a. Ade ke nnɛ́ yĩ odi keĩ aatɛ de, mbom mɔ bati flee a kĩ bidzi nɛ ɔdɔ kamɛ badã boe Ɔlate kabu kaya a anɛ.
Bɔa mbɔdi kaya nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ mɔatsɛ,
kitonɛkĩ Dema dzakũ ɛfɔnɛ yĩ, ɛnɛ etomɛna katinya kamɛ fɔtsa kawɛ liti nɛ Tesalonika. Kreske dzakũ ɛnaa Galatia, ade Tito lɛmɛ naa Dalmatia a.
Luka odi lite nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃. Kpã Marko kayamɛna kitonɛkĩ yaanya obumɛnanɛ paa ɛkpa yĩ nɛ adzuma a kamɛ.
Ndo Tihiko ɛnaa Efeso.
Ntɛ aya ni, bɔɛ yĩ osili atadiɛ wulaa a kĩ nkɔa ĩyi nɛ Karpo sɛkɛ̃ nɛ Troa kama yĩ. Bɔɛ yĩ tuvoli lɛmɛ, titiliwu tikĩ bɛkɛna mɔ ɔyaɛ ovoli a kayamɛna.
Aleksandro kĩ ɛnyɛ otumfɔ a kɛna yĩ fɔlɔɛwotsa paa. Boe Ɔlate aase ye lɛtsa kĩ ɛkɛna yĩ a kɔtɔ.
Foesũ dã nɔ akũ kadã wĩ nɛ ye akũ, kitonɛkĩ eyidza ɛdza nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ bɔatsa a akũ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ.
Kĩ bɛnya lɔtɔ bɛkpã yĩ bɛnamɛna fɔlɛtsa ɔdzɛnɛ anɛ a, odima tátomɔ yĩ, be flee bilo bɛfɔnɛ yĩ. Lɛmɛ mawã Baguma kĩ ɛtase be foe kɔtɔ.
Lɛmɛ boe Ɔlate dza nɛ yĩ liti, edo yĩ kɔbɛ̃ ɛfɔ̃ mpuli nlɛ ye Kalɛ Wĩ a nkpa bikĩ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a nɛ awã, ade ɛnyɛ yĩ etomɛna wuda awɛ kamɛ a.
Boe Ɔlate aanyɛ yĩ etomɛna tɔkpa tidi nyɛ tidi kamɛ, ade yaakpã yĩ bɔɛɛ bɔɛɛ nnaawo nɛ ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kamɛ a. Kamu mɔ kukũkpalɛ bɔakpa Baguma kito finyaa kanaa daa daa. Fɔya lɔmɔ.
Mawɔ̃na Priska mɔ Akwila, mɔ Onesiforo tɔtɔ kamɛ bati a flee.
Erasto kahɔ nɛ Korinto ade nfɔnɛ Trofimo kĩ yasɔ awɛ nɛ Mileto a.
Bɔa mbɔdi kĩ ayawo yĩ sɛkɛ̃ nɛ awĩ fɔmɔ osili lɔkɔ aawo ɔtɔ. Eubolo, Pude, Lino, Klaudia, mɔ batɛ badonɛ, batsole mɔ banyole, flee awɔ̃na nɔ!
Boe Ɔlate ɛnamɔ nɔ hũhũ. Baguma ɛmɔ mi kɔnya.
Titus: Ovoli kĩĩ to yĩ, Paulo, kĩ ĩnyɛ Baguma ɔsumunɛ, mɔ Yesu Kristo fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ sɛkɛ̃. Baguma pau yĩ ade edo yĩ kĩ mbumɛna bati a kĩ ɛpau a, ntsa be ɔnɔkɔali a kĩ boe katɛkado ɔsum atsa a.
Ade ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ nɛ nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a akũ a. Baguma kĩ yaáma fɔvã a mɔawɛ lɛma boe kalɛ a kĩ ɛkɛna eyi fɔmɔ ɛkɛna katinya kamɛ a.
Nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ ɛpau eyi akũ a, ɛnyɛ ye Kalɛ Wĩ a kanya nɛ ye kalɛ a kĩ mabi mi nɛ awĩ a kamɛ. Bɛkɔa fukĩĩ bido nɛ yĩ awɛ kĩ nde lɛtsã nɛ foe akũ nɛ Baguma boe Ɔtɛnɛ dĩ akũ.
Yĩ obi wĩ Tito, matsɛlɛ nɔ ovoli kĩĩ, kitonɛkĩ bɔnyɛ ɔmɔa nɛ boe katɛkado a kamɛ. Boe Ɔlɛga Baguma mɔ Kristo Yesu boe Ɔtɛnɛ, bɛmɔ nɔ kɔnya, bɛkpa nɔ lukudɔ lɛmɛ.
Nkɔa nɔ ndzina nɛ Kreta ayekĩ aalɔla fɔtsa a kĩ fute a kakɛna. Mawɛ kĩ pau asɔli banɔkɔɛ̃ nɛ ɔmatɔ odi nyɛ odi kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ ntsa nɔ a.
Kɛtánɛ kĩ bamɔ mfumsu nɛ batɛ badonɛ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ akũ. Kɛnɛ kĩ ɛnya oti kĩ ɛkɔã ɔtsɔ̃ mɔapɛ, ade kɛnɛ kĩ ye babi lɛmɛ bɛnya batɛ badonɛ, bɛtanya bati kĩ bideĩ atɔ ɔsĩ ĩye baábu fɔkɔ.

Nɛ ayekĩ asɔli batɛ badonɛ lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ adã Baguma adzuma akũ sũ ni, kɛtánɛ kĩ bɛmɔ mfumsu nɛ ye akũ. Kɛtánɛ kĩ yata akũ, ĩye ɛkana kalɔkpa mɔatsɛ mɔatsɛ, ĩye ɛkamɔa bavɛ kawuga, ĩye ɛnya oti kĩ yadã kitikiti, ĩye ɛyɔɔla anɛ nɛ sika akũ.
Kɛnɛ kĩ epuli ɛtɛ banɔvɔɛ̃, ɛwɛ lɛtsa kĩ lɛnɛnɛ, epi ye akũ kapi wĩ. Kɛnɛ kĩ ɛnya oti kĩ edeĩ ɔbla wĩ, kĩ efĩĩ lɛláa ye akũ ade yapuli kanya ye akũ lɛmɛ a.

Kɛnɛ kĩ yapi ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a kĩ bɔtɛ budo a, kĩ fuketi mɔ fɔtsa katsa a ɛlɛ. Ade osi kĩĩ akũ yaatsã epuli ɛtsa fɔtsa wĩ, ɛkado bati bɛbã kɔbɛ̃, lɔkɔa ɛnyɛ bikĩ biyidza bɛdza nɛ kalɛ a akũ nfumusu ɛtsa be.
Malɛ fukĩĩ kitonɛkĩ bati pii, titiliwu Yudafɔ a kĩ bɛtɛ bido a, deĩ atɔ ɔsĩ, bɛtsɛ̃ balɛ tuwuli pupulidza, kakɛ bati lɛmɛ.
Kɛnɛ kĩ asua be osi bɛfɔ̃ foe odu katsa, kitonɛkĩ bɛlamɛna bati adzuni kade kabula nɛ be katɛkado kamɛ. Bɛtsɛ̃mɔ fɔtsa kpa kĩ kɛtáfɛta kĩ bɛtsa a katsa, nɛ sika fuu sũ.
Kretani odi kĩ ɛnyɛ be onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ lɛlɛ kĩ, “Kretafɔ nyɛ bavãlɛvã bati daa, bayaɛ kpa kĩ bideĩ ablɔ, banyakpanɛ mɔ banyɔnɛpo lɛmɛ.”
Fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali. Nɛ foesũ kã be anɛ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ ayekĩ baana katɛkado kĩ kideĩ ɔsĩ.
Fukĩĩ aafɔ̃ bɛnyɛ atɔ nɛ Yudafɔ fɔlɛtsa mɛwa mɔ mbla a kĩ bikĩ bisĩ kalɛ wĩ a atsa a.
Lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa adã yedede kakpa bikĩ be mɔawɛ tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kpalɛ, lɛmɛ bikĩ be mɔawɛ akũ tákpalɛ, kĩ bɛtátɛ bido lɛmɛ ni, lɛtsama ládã yedede kakpa be, kitonɛkĩ be adzuni mɔ tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ tákpalɛ.
Bati kĩĩ odu abɔa ɔwɔlɛ kĩ binyina Baguma lɛmɛ be fɔkɛlatsa atsa kĩ bisĩ ye. Bɛnyɛ bati kĩ be akũ deĩ libe, kĩ baábu fɔkɔ ade bɛtáfɛta bɛkpa lɛtsa wĩ lidima kakɛna a.
Lɛmɛ nɔ kɔ̃ ni, tsa fɔtsa a kĩ fuketimɔ katɛkado fɔtsa katsa wĩ a.
Tsa banyolenɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ bidzi mɔ anɛ yedede nɛ kadikanyi mɔ be akũ kapi wĩ kamɛ. Bɛnya bati kĩ bɛdzɛ̃ pintii nɛ be katɛkado kamɛ, bati kĩ bideĩ bati akũ ɔdɔ mɔ bikĩ bado ɔwɔlɛ.
Ade ayea batsole banɔkɔɛ̃ a lɛmɛ ni, tsa be kĩ bidzi nkpã kĩ ɛfɛta batsole kĩ be akũ kpalɛ. Kɛtánɛ kĩ banyɛ bati buĩ, ĩye bɛkawuga bavɛ, mbom kɛnɛ kĩ bɛtsa bati lɛtsa kĩ lɛnɛnɛ,
bɛtsa bayitsɔ̃ kĩ bidzi fɔnyɔ ayekĩ baawɛ be banyɔ mɔ be babi kalɛ.
Kɛnɛ kĩ binyi ayekĩ bapi be akũ, bɛkɛna be akũ ɛkpalɛ lɔkɔa bɛnya batsɔ̃ wĩ kĩ badɔla be akũ kakpa be banyɔ. Fukĩĩ aafɔ̃ odima lɛláalɛ tuwuli kpa nɛ Baguma kalɛ a akũ.
Ade osi mɔapɛ a akũ atsã ɔdɛ bapopo lɛmɛ bɛnya be akũ akũ a.
Nɛ foe flee kamɛ a, kɛnɛ kĩ nɔ mɔawɛ a anya oti kĩ ye ɔbla wĩ bati akɔlɛ. Kɔa anɛ ovio katsa fɔtsa nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ.
Bi bati tuwuli nɛ osi kpĩĩ akũ ayekĩ bɛláanyɛ nɔ nfumusu. Fukĩĩ aafɔ̃ kɔnyɔã liwo nɔ bakesĩnɛ nɛ ayekĩ bɛláana lɛtsa kpa bɛlɛ nɛ boe akũ sũ.
Bati kĩ basum badi ni, bɛdɔla be akũ bɛkpa be balate, bɛkɛna fɔtsa a kĩ fɔ́awo balate a anɛ. Kɛtánɛ kĩ bakpa onukpɛ̃ bɛkpa be.
Kɛtánɛ kĩ baye be lɛmɛ, mbom bɛtsa be akũ kĩ bɛnyɛ bati wĩ, ade badi ɔnɔkɔali kĩ baapuli bɛtɛ be bido a. Fukĩĩ aafɔ̃ bɛkɔa obu bɛkpa boe fɔtsa katsa nɛ Baguma boe Ɔtɛnɛ a akũ.
Kitonɛkĩ Baguma nyɛ ye kɔnyakamɔ a kĩ edeĩ ɛkpa katinya kamɛ bati nkpã katɛ a ɛtsa.
Kɔnyakamɔ kĩĩ atsa boe kĩ bɔfɔnɛ nkpã kpa kadzi mɔ katinya kamɛ fɔtsa kpa liti katomɛna awɛ. Kɛnɛ kĩ bɔadzi nkpã kĩ bɔ́anya boe akũ, budzi nkpã wĩ nɛ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ.
Ade osi kĩĩ akũ bɔ́atsã bɔkadzɔlɛ Luwi kpale a kĩ bɔadã anɛ a. Ade luwi kĩĩ akũ mɔ boe Baguma Kpale, mɔ boe Ɔtɛnɛ Yesu Kristo aanɛ nɛ kukũkpalɛ kamɛ a.
Ɛkɔa ye akũ ɛkpa nɛ boe lɔlɔ kĩ yanyɛ boe etomɛna tɔkpa flee kamɛ, ɛkɛna boe bati kpalɛwa kĩ bɛnyɛ ye odi bade a kĩ bɔawɛ kĩ bakakɛna tuwĩ.
Tsa fɔtsa kĩĩ bamɛ mɔ kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ Baguma kpa nɔ, kado bikĩ batse nɔ a kɔbɛ̃. Kã bikĩ bitómɔ osi kĩĩ akũ a anɛ. Tafɔ̃ be kamɛ odima lɛmɔ nɔ ndɛ oti kĩ ɛtákpɔla.
Te be anɛ kĩ bɛdɔla be akũ bɛkpa abãã mɔ bati a kĩ banya be akũ a, bitse be kalɛ, bɛna nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ bɛkɛna tuwĩ nɛ osi nyɛ osi akũ.
Bi be kĩ bɛtalɛ tɔkpa nɛ odima akũ, mbom bidzi nɛ lukudɔ mɔ tɔkɔba kakɛna kamɛ. Bɛkaakɔa obu kakpa odi nyɛ odi.

Kitonɛkĩ kɔkɔɛ a, boe mɔawɛ malo bɔkɛna fɔkɔasiatsa mɔ atɔ ɔsĩ, ade bɔyɛla osi wĩ a. Kɔkɔɛ lɛmɛ a sukɛna fɔwɛtsa kpa mɔ kawɔlɛkamɔ futefute nya boe akũ. Bɔkɔa boe lɔkɔ bɔkpa fɔtsa kpa kakɛna mɔ anɛ kayɔɔla. Bati badi kesĩ boe ade boe malo bukesĩ be a.
Lɛmɛ kĩ Baguma boe Ɔtɛnɛ nyɛ ye sɛmɛ kalɛ mɔ kawɛ ɛtsa boe a ni,
ɛtɛ boe nkpã. Nnɛ́ boe tuwĩ a kĩ bɔkɛna sũ, mbom ye mɔawɛ kɔnyakamɔ sũ ɛtɛ boe. Ɛfɔ̃ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa yako nɛ boe akũ, ɛlɔla boe kama, ɛwɔla boe mui ade ɛkpa boe nkpã vɔɛ̃ a.
Baguma tsã Yesu Kristo boe Ɔtɛnɛ akũ ɛkɔa ye Hũhũ Kpalɛwa kɔbɛ̃ pii a eko nɛ boe akũ,
ayekĩ nɛ ye sɛmɛ kalɛ sũ bɔmɔ ye kayite kɛlɛ, lɔkɔa boe malo bɔna nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a, kĩ ye akũ lɛmɛ budeĩ kɔnɛte a.
Kalɛ kĩĩ nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali paa.
Mawɛ kĩ lɛ kasisa fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ bamɛ ayekĩ bikĩ bɛtɛ Baguma bido a aakɔa be lɔkɔ bɛkpa tuwĩ kakɛna kĩ fudeĩ nfasɔ fɔkpa odi nyɛ odi.
Tado onukpɛ̃ nɛ fɔkɔasiatsa kavɛlɛ kamɛ, nɛ bati kasinu katokɔ̃ kakã akũ. Tawɛ sɔwa ɔkɛna ɔdzɛ ĩye ɔtɛ atsindze nɛ Yudafɔ mbla a akũ. Foe flee fɔlá nfasɔ adima.
Ntɛ oti odi ayamɛna kasɛ̃ nɛ bati kamɛ ni, sua ye osi deedi ĩye titi nviã. Nɛ ke liti a, tabuki odo ye onukpɛ̃.
Nyi kĩ oti a na odu ni, tɔkpa nya ye kamɛkamɛ ade ye titikpa aakɔ ye kɔtɔ a.
Ntɛ ndo Artema ĩye Tihiko nɛ nɔ sɛkɛ̃ ni, bɔa mbɔdi kayawo yĩ sɛkɛ̃ nɛ Nikopoli, kitonɛkĩ ade awã mawɛ kĩ maadzi nɛ osili lɔkɔ a.
Bɔa mbɔdi kanyɛ Sena kĩ ɛnyɛ fɔlɛtsa ɔdzɛnɛ a mɔ Apolo osi bɛnaa be osi akũ. Dã kĩ bɛna lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ laasĩ be.
Kɛnɛ kĩ batɛ badonɛ a bɛkɔlɛ ayekĩ baakɔa be lɔkɔ flee bɛkpa tudzuma wĩ kakɛna, kĩ baapuli bɛkabumɔ bati bɛbã lɛmɛ. Bɛtadzi nkpã kĩ ɛlá nfasɔ.
Bati flee a kĩ bideĩ nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ nɛ awĩ a awɔ̃na nɔ! Wɔ̃na batɛ badonɛ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ awã kakpa boe.
Baguma ɛmɔ mi flee kɔnya.
Philemon: Yĩ, Paulo kĩ bido nɛ kɔla nɛ Kristo Yesu sũ, mɔ boe ɔwaɛ̃ Timoteo sɛkɛ̃ ovoli kĩĩ to. Bɔtsɛlɛ ye bɔama nɔ, Filemon boe ɔkɔba adzuma ɔkɛnanɛ kĩ bɔawɛ kalɛ paa.
Bɔtsɛlɛ ye lɛmɛ bɔama batɛ badonɛ a kĩ batsɛna nɛ nɔ tɔtɔ kamɛ, mɔ boe ɔwaɛ̃tsole Apia, mɔ boe ɔkɔba paa Arkipo kĩ yakɛna boe Ɔlate adzuma mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ ndɛ sodzani aye a.
Baguma boe Ɔlɛga mɔ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo bɛmɔ mi kɔnya, bɛkpa mi lukudɔ lɛmɛ.
Nwaɛ̃ Filemon, lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ kĩ mabɔa mpaɛ ni, mate anɛ nɛ nɔ akũ, ade manyɛ Baguma kɔlɛ nɛ nɔ lɔlɔ,
kitonɛkĩ nnu ayekĩ awɛ Baguma bati kalɛ, mɔ ayekĩ ɔtɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu odo a sũ.
Mabɔa mpaɛ kĩ ɔmɔa a kĩ bɔakɛna ndɛ batɛ badonɛ aye a ɛna ɔsĩ ebu, ayekĩ bɔ́apuli bunu fɔtsa wĩ flee a kĩ fudeĩ nɛ ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ Kristo kayɔ a dzununuunu.
Nwaɛ̃, mmɔ́ kawɔlɛ ade ɔwɔlɛ ka edzi yĩ a, kitonɛkĩ nɔ ɔdɔ a kĩ odeĩ ɔkpa Baguma bati a fɔ̃ bɛna kawɛya.
Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ, yĩ ndɛ awaɛ̃ nɛ Kristo kamɛ aye a, maapuli nkɔa otumi mbi nɔ kĩ kɛna lɛtsa a kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ kɛna.
Lɛmɛ kĩ mawɛ nɔ kalɛ sũ ni, nkɔa kudulike makpa nɔ mbom. Makɛna fukĩĩ midi kĩ yĩ, Paulo, Kristo Yesu fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ, nwaa kɔla nɛ ye sũ.
Nɛ foesũ nkɔa kudulike makpa nɔ nɛ Onesimo lɔlɔ. Ɛnyɛ yĩ mɔawɛ obi nɛ Kristo kamɛ. Ndani hũhũ kamɛ kɔlɛga nkpa ye nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ nwaa kɔla a.
Titɔ kĩ ye dĩ kayɔ nyɛ nfasɔ malo a, kɔkɔɛ a, ɔtána ye akũ nfasɔ adima, lɛmɛ finyaakĩĩ a, ye akũ deĩ nfasɔ ɛkpa bɔmɔ nɔ flee.
Nfɔ̃ emuniki yaya nɛ nɔ sɛkɛ̃, ade fɔakɛna yĩ ndɛ yĩ ɔwɔlɛ flee tomɔ ye a.
Kĩ nwaa kɔla nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a sũ ni, nwɛ kĩ ɛkahɔ nɛ yĩ sɛkɛ̃ nɛ awĩ kufɛ, ɛkaabumɔ yĩ adzuma nɛ nɔ kadokɔ̃.
Lɛmɛ ntáwɛ kĩ mahɛ nɔ kĩ kpa yĩ kabumɛna, mbom mawɛ kĩ kɛna foe futo nɔ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ. Foesũ nláakɛna lɛtsama mbɔɛntɛ otunɔ nɛ foe akũ.
Ɔsa Onesimo dzakũ nɛ nɔ sɛkɛ̃ nɛ lɔkɔ lukũ kamɛ, ayekĩ yaabuki emuniki ɛya nɛ nɔ sɛkɛ̃ ɛyaadzi flee.

Finyaakĩĩ nnɛ́ ɔsate odi ebuki yanɛ, mbom ɛnyɛ oti kĩ ɛbɛ̃ ɔsate kɔlaa. Ɛnyɛ ɔwaɛ̃nyole kĩ maátunɔ ye kalɛ nɛ Kristo kamɛ. Dã ayekĩ ɛtɛ kɔya ɛkpa yĩ! Lɛmɛ yaabuki ɛtɛ kɔya ɛkpa nɔ ɛba ndɛ ɔsate aye, ade yaabuki ɛnya ɔwaɛ̃nyole nɛ boe Ɔlate dĩ akũ a.
Foesũ ntɛ ɔbɔɛ yĩ ndɛ nɔ ɔkɔba adzuma ɔkɛnanɛ aye ni, tɛ ye mɔ kawɔlɛ ndɛ ayekĩ aatɛ yĩ.
Ntɛ edi nfumusu adi nɛ nɔ akũ, ĩye edzimɔ nɔ kɔtɔ kudi malo ni, bu foe akũ akunta kakɔa kakpa yĩ.
Yĩ Paulo mɔawɛ lɛkɔa awɛ matsɛlɛ kĩ maase nɔ kɔtɔ. Lɛmɛ ntáwɛ kĩ mate nɔ anɛ kĩ nɔ mɔawɛ a odzimɔ yĩ nɔ nkpã kɔtɔ.
Foesũ nwaɛ̃, mawɛ kĩ kpa yĩ kabumɛna kĩĩ nɛ boe Ɔlate sũ. Nɛ Kristo sũ kɛna foe ayekĩ ɔwɔlɛ aaka edzi yĩ.
Ntsɛlɛ ovoli kĩĩ mamɛna nɔ, ade matɛ kado kĩ aakɛna nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ mavia nɔ a akũ a. Ĩnyina pefee kĩ aakɛna ɔkpa yĩ fɔba ayekĩ nvia nɔ malo.
Fukĩ fubu nyɛ kĩ wɛ kɔla kayi yĩ, kitonɛkĩ matɛ kado kĩ Baguma aatse mi flee mpaɛbɔ lɔkɔa etunɔ ĩya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃.
Epafra, kĩ bɔmɔ ye waa kɔla nɛ Kristo sũ a bo yawɔ̃na nɔ!
Ade ayea Marko, mɔ Aristarko, mɔ Dema, mɔ Luka, yĩ bakɔba kĩ babumɔ yĩ adzuma kĩĩ kakɛna a, awɔ̃na nɔ.
Boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo ɛmɔ mi hũhũ flee kɔnya.
Hebrews: Nɛ kɔkɔɛ a, Baguma lɛmɔ boe bawanyɔ a kɔdzɛla lɔkɔ pii nɛ tisi ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ akũ, ɛtsãmɛna ye onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ akũ.
Lɛmɛ nɛ fuwi nkaɛ kĩĩ kamɛ ni, Baguma lɛmɔ boe kɔdzɛla ɛtsãmɛna ye Obi akũ. Ade Obi kĩĩ akũ ɛtsã ɛbɔa katinya flee, ɛpau ye kĩ ɛnya lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa ɔlate a.

Obi a lɛnyɛ ayekĩ Baguma kukũkpalɛ la ɛtsa, ade Baguma kutidu a pɛpɛɛpɛ ye malo edeĩ a. Obi a kɔa Baguma kalɛ a kɔbɛ̃ epini katinya flee. Kĩ ɛvɔlɛ bati tɔkpa eyua a, ɛnadzi nɛ Baguma Kpale nɛ ode flee a sɔmɔna.
Baguma kɛna ye Obi a ɛbɛ̃ Baguma ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a, kitonɛkĩ dĩ a kĩ Baguma te ye a tɛ kɔya lɛba be bade a.
Kitonɛkĩ Baguma tábi ye fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kamɛ odima tɔ̃ kĩ,
“Nɔ nyɛ yĩ Obinyole.
Nviã luwi kĩĩ mma nɔ.”
Bio Baguma tálɛ nɛ ye ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kamɛ odima akũ kĩ,
“Maanya ye Ɔlɛga,
ade ye malo ɛnya yĩ Obi a.”
Ade lɔkɔ a kĩ Baguma wɛ kĩ yado ye obinyole ɔtɔnyade nɛ katinya kamɛ a ni, ɛlɛ kĩ,
“Ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a flee, misum ye.”
Lɛmɛ nɛ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a akũ ni, Baguma lɛ kĩ,
“Baguma kɛna ye ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ ndɛ ɔwɛ,
ade ɛkɛna ye ode basumunɛ ndɛ fi fɔmɛ a.”
Lɛmɛ nɛ ye Obi akũ ni, Baguma lɛ kĩ,
“O Baguma, nɔ lɛgãkanya aawa daa daa.
Nɔ bati akũ kanya tsɛ̃ osi kpĩĩ akũ.
Awɛ tuwĩ kakɛna lɛmɛ akesĩ tɔkpa a.
Ade foesũ Baguma, nɔ Baguma a pau nɔ a,
ɛkpa nɔ obũ kadzikɔ̃ kĩ kawɔlɛ deĩ kɛbɛ̃ nɔ bakɔba flee kade a.”
Baguma buki ɛlɛ kĩ,
“Boe Ɔlate, nɔ lɛbɔa tite nɛ kayɔkayi a,
ade ɔkɔa nɔ mɔa awɛ ɔkɛna ode lɛmɛ a.
Fɔtsa kĩĩ flee aawɔ, lɛmɛ nɔ kɔ̃ aana daa,
foe flee fɔ́adɛ fɔtsɛ ndɛ tɛtadiɛ.
Aabuta foe ndɛ atadiɛ,
ade fɔ́adani ndɛ tɛtadiɛ.
Lɛmɛ nɔ kɔ̃ ade ayea aana daa a,
ade nɔ nkpã kadzi lɛlá kawũna a.”
Baguma tábi ye ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kamɛ odima tɔ̃ kĩ,
“Dzi nɛ yĩ sɔmɔna nɛ awĩ,
kɛnaawo kĩ nkɔa nɔ bakesĩnɛ nkɛna nɔ abɔa katekɔ̃.”
Kekɔ̃ baáde nyɛ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a? Ade be nyɛ hũhũ a kĩ basum Baguma, ade yado be lɛmɛ kĩ bɛnaabumɛna bati a kĩ baana nkpã katɛ a.
Ade foesũ kɛnɛ kĩ bɔapi ɔnɔkɔali fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bunu a budomɔ akũ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ, ayekĩ bɔláayɛla osi.
Bɛtsa kĩ ntɛ Baguma ɔlɛdo a kĩ ye ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ kɔa bɛma boe bawanyɔ a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali, mɔ odi nyɛ odi kĩ efum ĩye ɛtákɛna nɛ ye akũ a tɛ foe sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ kĩ sɛfɛta a ni,
nde bɔ́apuli bulo sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ a kĩ baakpa boe a, ntɛ bɔtátɛ nkpã katɛ kpale kĩĩ a? Boe Ɔlate mɔawɛ lɛnya lɔtɔ ɛlɛ nkpã katɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ, ade bikĩ binu foe a di adansiɛ kĩ fɔnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali a.
Nɛ lɔkɔ mɔapɛ a kamɛ a, Baguma mɔawɛ kɔa nsɛntsɛlɛni mɔ awãwã fɔtsa futefute kakɛna edi adansiɛ nɛ nkpã katɛ a akũ, ade ɛsɛ̃ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa futetsa a ɛkpa bati nɛ ye kawɛ onukpɛ̃ a.
Baguma tákɔa katinya a kĩ kaaya, kĩ ke akũ fɔlɛtsa bɔlamɛna kalɛ a akũ kanya edo nɛ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a awɛ.
Mbom bɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kakɔ kadi kamɛ kĩ,
“Litsa nyɛ otidziwa obi kĩ akɔna ye akũ?
Litsa koũ nyɛ otidziwa kĩ api ye kadunamɔ akũ?
Ɔkɛ́na ye nɛ kayɔ lɔkɔ lukũ lidi ɔba ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a.
Lɛmɛ ɔkɔa kukũkpalɛ mɔ obu ɔtsa ye ndɛ lɛgãbɔɛ aye.
Ade ɔkɛna ye kĩ ɛnya fɔtsa flee akũ a.”
Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ ɔkɛna ye kĩ ɛnya fɔtsa flee akũ, foesũ lɛtsama tábuki lite kĩ ɛlá kɔbɛ̃ nɛ de akũ. Lɛmɛ finyaa bɔámɔ kĩ otidziwa deĩ kɔbɛ̃ nɛ fɔtsa flee akũ.

Lɛmɛ bɔmɔ́ Yesu a kĩ bɛkɛna nɛ kayɔ nɛ lɔkɔ lukũ kamɛ ɛba ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a, ayekĩ fɔtsã Baguma kɔnyakamɔ kamɛ ɛyaaku nɛ odi nyɛ odi lɔlɔ a, finyaa kɔ̃ bɔmɔ́ ye kĩ Baguma kɔa obu mɔ kukũkpalɛ ɛtsa ye ndɛ lɛgãbɔɛ aye, nɛ wuda lubo a kĩ ɛmɔ́ a sũ.

Fɔnɛnɛ kĩ Baguma kĩ ɛbɔa fɔtsa flee, epini foe a, ɛkɛna Yesu ɛkpɔla ɛtsãmɛna lubo kamɔ kamɛ, ayekĩ yaakpã bati beblebee bɛyaana tsɛfã nɛ ye kukũkpalɛ a kamɛ. Kitonɛkĩ oti a kĩ yakpã be kanamɛna nkpã katɛ kamɛ a nyɛ Kristo.
Kitonɛkĩ oti a kĩ yakpalɛ bati akũ a, mɔ bati a kĩ bɛkpalɛ be akũ a flee deĩ Ɔlɛga mɔapɛ. Ade foesũ kɔnyɔã lákɔ Yesu kĩ yavɛ be ye bawaɛ̃ a.
Yabi Baguma kĩ,
“Maade nɔ dĩ akũ lɛtsã nkpa awaɛ̃ amɛ,
ade maasã tɔnɔ mmu nɔ nɛ be katsɛnakɔ̃ a.”
Ebuki ɛlɛ kĩ,
“Maakɔa anɛ nte nɛ Baguma akũ.”
Ade ebuki ɛlɛ kĩ,
“Amɔ yĩ mɔ babi a kĩ Baguma kɔa ɛkpa yĩ a nɛ awĩ.”
Nɛ ayekĩ babi a kĩ yawɛ a nyɛ batidziwa, kĩ bideĩ sukɛna mɔ babɔanɛ sũ ni, Yesu malo dani ɛkɛna otidziwa, edzi nkpã ndɛ be aye. Ɛkɛna fukĩĩ fɔtsã ye wuda kamɛ, ɛwɔla Abonsam a kĩ ye nɛɛ wuda kɔbɛ̃ a.
Ke liti lɛmɛ, Yesu kɛna fukĩĩ kĩ bati a kĩ wuda kavila nɛ be nkpã kadzi flee kamɛ fɔ̃ bɛdani basate a, bɛfɔ̃ wuda kavila.
Kitonɛkĩ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, nnɛ́ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a yakpa kabumɛna, mbom Abraham babi mɔ bawa yabumɛna.

Fukĩĩ atsa kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ bɛkɛna ye ndɛ ye bawaɛ̃ aye nɛ osi nyɛ osi akũ, ayekĩ yaapuli ɛnya be Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee kĩ yamɔ bati kɔnya. Yaakasum Baguma nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ lɛmɛ, ayekĩ yaafɔ̃ bɛnyɛ tɔkpa nɛ bati akũ.
Nɛ ayekĩ ye mɔawɛ ɛmɔ lubo, ɛtsã sɔhuiɛ kamɛ lɛmɛ sũ ni, yaapuli ebumɔ bikĩ be malo bideĩ nɛ sɔhuiɛ kamɛ a lɛmɛ.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ Kristofɔ, kĩ Baguma vɛ etomɛna ode lɛmɛ a, mikɔna Yesu a kĩ Baguma do kĩ ɛnya Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee nɛ katɛkado a kĩ bɔnɛɛ a midã.
Edi ɔnɔkɔali ɛkpa Baguma a kĩ ye lɛpau ye kĩ ɛkɛna adzuma kĩĩ, ndɛ ayekĩ Mose lɛmɛ di ɔnɔkɔali ɛkɛna adzuma nɛ Baguma tɔtɔ kamɛ a.
Ndɛ ayekĩ babu kɔla okenɛ kaba kɔla mɔawɛ a ni, ade aye kɛfɛta kĩ Yesu ɛna obu baũ ɛba Mose a.
Kɔla nyɛ kɔla ni, oti ake koe. Lɛmɛ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, Baguma nyɛ oti a kĩ eke fɔtsa a flee.
Mose di ɔnɔkɔali ndɛ ɔsumunɛ aye nɛ Baguma tɔtɔ kamɛ, ade edi adansiɛ nɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Baguma aanyɛ ɛtsa nɛ kunya kamɛ a akũ a.
Lɛmɛ Kristo kɔ̃ dã Baguma tɔtɔ akũ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ndɛ Obi aye. Boe nyɛ ye kɔla a, ntɛ budo ɔwɔlɛ, bɔna katɛkado nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ boe anɛ teĩ nɛ de akũ a akũ.
Nɛ foesũ ndɛ ayekĩ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a lɛ a,
“Ntɛ minu Baguma odo nɛ nviã ni,
mitakɛna atɔ ɔsĩ,
ndɛ ayekĩ mi bawanyɔ kɛna a,
kĩ biyidza bɛdza nɛ Baguma akũ luwi a nɛ kɔsa kamɛ, bɛsɔ ye bɛdã a.
Ade bɛsɔ yĩ bɛdã nɛ awã bɛwɛ fɔlɛtsa lɛmɛ nɛ yĩ akũ,
titɔ kĩ bɛmɔ́ fɔtsa a kĩ nkɛna nɛ futeli tɛna kamɛ a malo.
Nɛ foesũ nna kalɔkpa nɛ bati a akũ ade nlɛ kĩ,
‘Bafum ade bayɛla osi a,
ade bisĩ baákɛna nɛ yĩ mbla a akũ a.’
Nna kalɔkpa ade nlɔ fubo nlɛ kĩ,
‘Bɛláake kɔbɔa nɛ tite a kĩ kufɛ maakpa be kawɛya a akũ da!’ ”
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ batɛ badonɛ, midã kadã wĩ kĩ mi kamɛ odima ɛtana ɔwɔlɛ kpa mɔ katatɛkado lɔkɔa emuniki nɛ Baguma a kĩ edzi nkpã a liti.
Mbom mikaabumɛna akũ akũ luwi nyɛ luwi, kĩ nviã nɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa kamɛ a tsɛla boe akũ, ayekĩ tɔkpa lɛláakɛ mi, ĩye mina atɔ ɔsĩ. Tsɛla boe akũ.
Kitonɛkĩ boe flee budeĩ tsɛfã mɔ Kristo ntɛ bupini boe katɛkado mɔ ɔsĩ kɛnawo kawũna a, ndɛ ayekĩ buyi kayɔ a.
Bɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ,
“Ntɛ minu Baguma odo nviã ni,
mitakɛna atɔ ɔsĩ
ndɛ ayekĩ mi bawanyɔ kɛna a,
kĩ biyidza bɛdza nɛ Baguma akũ a.”
Bawei linu Baguma odo mɔ biyidza bɛdza nɛ ye akũ a? Ade be nyɛ bati flee a kĩ Mose kpã etomɛna Egipte tite akũ a.
Bawei akũ mɔ Baguma na kalɔkpa futeli tɛna flee? Ade be nyɛ bati a kĩ bɛkɛna tɔkpa kĩ biku bɛkahɔ nɛ kɔsa kamɛ a.
Bawei akũ Baguma lɔ fubo ɛlɛ kĩ, “Bɛláake kɔbɔa nɛ tite a kĩ kufɛ maakpa be kawɛya a akũ da”? Ade bati a kĩ biyidza bɛdza nɛ Baguma akũ a.
Foesũ bɔmɔ́ kĩ bɛtápuli biwo tite akũ, kitonɛkĩ bɛtátɛ Baguma bido.
Foesũ kĩ Baguma buki ebinya osi eyi nɛ ye kawɛya a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi a kamɛ kawo sũ ni, mifɔ̃ bɔdã kadã wĩ ayekĩ bɛláamɔ kĩ mi kamɛ odi tápuli ɛna kawɛya a kamɛ kawo.
Kitonɛkĩ bibi boe Kalɛ Wĩ a ndɛ ayekĩ bibi be malo a. Binu fɔlɛtsa a, lɛmɛ bɛtána foe akũ nfasɔ, kitonɛkĩ kĩ binu foe a, bɛtátɛ foe bido.
Lɛmɛ boe a kĩ bɔtɛ budo a, buwo nɛ kawɛya a kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi a kamɛ. Ndɛ ayekĩ ɛlɛ kĩ,
“Nna kalɔkpa ade nlɔ fubo kĩ,
‘Bɛláake kɔbɔa nɛ tite a
kĩ kufɛ maakpa be kawɛya a akũ da!’ ”
Baguma lɛ fukĩĩ titɔ kĩ eyua ye mɔawɛ adzuma kito lɔkɔ a kĩ ɛbɔa katinya a malo.
Kitonɛkĩ Baguma lɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kakɔ kadi nɛ luwi luvũkɔnɔde a akũ kĩ,
“Nɛ luwi luvũkɔnɔde akũ a,
Baguma dzi ɛwɛya,
ade ɛtábuki ɛkɛna adzuma adima a.”
Ebuki ɛlɛ kalɛ mɔapɛ a kĩ, “Bɛláake kɔbɔa nɛ tite a kĩ kufɛ maakpa be kawɛya a akũ da!”
Bikĩ bɛnya lɔtɔ binu Kalɛ Wĩ a tápuli biwo nɛ kawɛyakɔ̃ a, kitonɛkĩ bɛtátɛ bido, lɛmɛ osi buki ebinya kĩ badi biwo.
Baguma yi luwi bɛbã kĩ bavɛ Nviã, nɛ futeli pii liti. Ke liti a, Lɛgã Dawid lɛ kɔdzɛla ɛtsãmɛna fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɔlɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ foe akũ bɔyatɛ̃ a kĩ,
“Ntɛ minu Baguma odo nviã ni,
mitakɛna atɔ ɔsĩ.”
Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ Yosua ɛkpã be ewo nɛ kawɛyakɔ̃ a kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi a ni, kufɛ Baguma lɛláabuki ɛlɛ kalɛ nɛ kawɛya luwi bɛbã akũ ke liti a.
Foesũ kawɛya luwi buki lideĩ lɛkpa Baguma bade a, ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma awɛya nɛ luwi luvũkɔnɔde akũ a
kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ewo nɛ Baguma kawɛyakɔ̃ a, aatɛ kawɛya nɛ be adzuma kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma lɛmɛ fɔ̃ ye mɔawɛ adzuma kakɛna, ɛwɛya a.
Foesũ mifɔ̃ bɔbɔa mbɔdi buwo nɛ kawɛyakɔ̃ a kamɛ, ayekĩ boe kamɛ odima lɛláatomɛna be ɔbla kpa a, ɛtɔ nɛ atɔ ɔsĩ sũ.

Kitonɛkĩ Baguma kalɛ a deĩ nkpã ade kɛlamɛna adzuma a. Kideĩ ɔbɔ̃ kɛbɛ̃ atugbe adi nyɛ adi, ade katsɔɛ kanaawo awã kĩ kasɛ̃ ɔkla mɔ hũhũ kayite. Kawo kanaasɛ̃ fɔtsakɔ̃ fɔtsakɔ̃ mɔ fɔtsɔ̃ kamɛ tɔbɔ̃ kayite. Kalɛ a adzɛmɔ oti adzuni mɔ ye ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ fɔwɛtsa yededeede.
Lɛtsama lɛláa kĩ baapuli bɛkɔa bɛkɔla Baguma, kitonɛkĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ ɛbɔa nɛ katinya kamɛ waa ɔdzɔ nɛ ye anɛ kamɛ. Ade ye mɔ bɔ́akɛna akunta nɛ boe kadzi kamɛ akũ bɔkpa a.
Foesũ mifɔ̃ bupi boe katɛkado a kĩ bɔanyɛ katsa a budomɔ akũ mɔ ɔsĩ, kitonɛkĩ budeĩ Yesu, Baguma Obi kĩ ɛnyɛ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a kĩ ɛtsã ode flee kamɛ ɛnɛ́ edzi nɛ Baguma ɔwɛ̃ a.
Nnɛ́ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee kĩ ɛláapuli enu boe katɛkado onukpɛ̃ kadɔ kayɔ budeĩ, mbom oti kĩ ye malo bɛsɔ ye bɛdã nɛ osi nyɛ osi akũ ndɛ boe aye, lɛmɛ ɛtákɛna tɔkpa tidima a budeĩ.
Foesũ mifɔ̃ budo ɔwɔlɛ bufuã Baguma kɔnyakamɔ lɛgãkpo a, ayekĩ bɔ́ana Baguma sɛmɛkalɛ mɔ kɔnyakamɔ fubumɔ boe nɛ kasĩ lɔkɔ.
Bapau Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a odi nyɛ odi katomɛna ye bakɔba kamɛ, kate awɛ nɛ ye akũ kĩ ɛdza nɛ be onukpɛ̃ esum Baguma. Ye adzuma nyɛ kĩ ɛkɔa bati futetsa ɛkpa Baguma, ɛbɔa afɔliɛ nɛ be tɔkpa akũ.
Nɛ ayekĩ ye mɔawɛ a ɛlá kɔbɛ̃ nɛ tisi pii akũ sũ ni, yana ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ kakpa bikĩ binyína kadi mɔ bikĩ bɛyɛla osi a.
Ade foesũ kɛnɛ kĩ ɛbɔa tɔkpa afɔliɛ nɛ ye mɔawɛ lɔlɔ mɔ bati bɛbã tɔkpa flee lɛmɛ akũ a.
Odima ládzina ye akũ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee kado ye akũ foe obu, mbom Baguma avɛ ye ndɛ ayekĩ ɛvɛ Aron a.
Ade ayea Kristo lɛmɛ tádo ye akũ obu kĩ yanya Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee, mbom Baguma lidzina ye ebi ye kĩ,
“Yĩ Obinyole anɛ.
Nviã luwi kĩĩ mma nɔ.”
Ebuki ɛlɛ nɛ kakɔ bɛbã kĩ,
“Aanya ɔsɔfɔ daa,
nɛ Melkizedek osi a akũ.”
Kĩ Yesu dzi nkpã nɛ tite akũ a, ɛbɔa mpaɛ, eke aduli mɔ fɔwɔla mɔ babe ɛkpa Baguma a kĩ ye lipuli ɛnyɛ ye nɛ wuda awɛ kamɛ a. Baguma tse ye, kitonɛkĩ ɛdɔla ye akũ ɛkpa Baguma ɔsum a.
Titɔ kĩ Baguma Obi yanɛ malo ni, ɛkɔlɛ osetie etomɛna ye lubokamɔ kamɛ.
Kĩ Baguma kɛna Yesu ɛkpɔla nɛ osi nyɛ osi akũ a, ɛdani oti a kĩ ye akũ bikĩ babu ye a flee aatsã bɛna nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a.
Ade ye nyɛ oti a kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi kĩ yaanya Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee nɛ Melkizedek osi a akũ a.
Fɔlɛtsa pii deĩ kĩ bɔ́alɛ nɛ fukĩĩ akũ kufɛ, lɛmɛ foe kayɔkanyɛ deĩ ɔsĩ, kitonɛkĩ miápuli kanu fɔlɛtsa kayɔ mɔatsɛ.

Fɔnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali kĩ titɔ kĩ mɔ lɔkɔ kĩĩ kɛnɛkĩ minya fɔtsa batsanɛ malo ni, mibuki misĩ odi kĩ ɛtsa mi Baguma fɔlɛtsa kayɔkayi fude a. Mila ndɛ akɔkɔa amɛ kĩ bisĩ tɛmɛ mui, lɛmɛ nnɛ́ ndɛ bikĩ bisĩ funitsã kĩ fudeĩ ɔsĩ.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yamɛmɛ ni, akɔkɔa ebuki yanɛ, foesũ enyína lɛtsama nɛ tɔkpa mɔ tuwĩ akũ.
Banɔkɔɛ̃ anya funitsã kĩ fudeĩ ɔsĩ, kitonɛkĩ bɛvɛlɛ be adzuni nɛ fɔtsa pii kamɛ, kĩ foesũ bapuli kamɔ tɔkpa mɔ tuwĩ kayi ɔsũ.

Foesũ mifɔ̃ bɔnaa lɔtɔ bɔkɔlɛ banɔkɔɛ̃ fɔtsa katsa, lɔkɔa bɔfɔnɛ kayɔkayi fɔtsa a kĩ bɛtsa nɛ Kristo akũ a awɛ buyi. Mitafɔ̃ bumuniki bɔnaayi kayɔ mɔ fɔtsa katsa nɛ ayekĩ bɔdani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ, bɔfɔnɛ tudzuma kĩ tɛla nfasɔ, mɔ ayekĩ bɔtɛ Baguma budo,
mɔ fɔtsa katsa nɛ mui kawɔla amaniɛ, awɛ kate nɛ bati akũ, kayidza kato kanɔkpa mɔ kadzɛmɛna nkaɛ a akũ.
Mifɔ̃ bɔnaa lɔtɔ bubo anɛ! Ade lɛtsa a kĩ ntɛ Baguma tunɔ ni, bɔ́akɛna a.
Kitonɛkĩ nde bati a kĩ bimuniki nɛ be katɛkado liti a, aapuli bibuki bɛdani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ? Bɛna nɛ Baguma ɔhaĩ kamɛ tɔ̃ bɛta ode futetsa a onukpɛ̃ bɛmɔ́, bɛna Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a lɛmɛ tsɛfã.
Ade bɛta lɛtsa wĩ a kĩ lideĩ nɛ Baguma kalɛ kamɛ a onukpɛ̃ bɛmɔ́, bɛna katinya a kĩ kaaya a kamɛ kɔbɛ̃ a tsɛfã a.
Lɛmɛ bimuniki nɛ be katɛkado liti! Bɛláapuli bimuniki mɔ be bibuki bɛdani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ bibuki babɔa Baguma Obi a nɛ asendua akũ, kado ye kɔnyɔã nɛ kanade.
Baguma ahila tite a, kĩ tamɔa oni mui kafɔ̃ futse amɛ nɛ te akũ kana nfasɔ kakpa bikĩ be sũ banɛ fɔba nɛ te akũ a.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ fu mɔ tuwĩ kpa mɛ nɛ te akũ ni, nfasɔ adima lɛláa te akũ. Baguma aapuli edumu te ade nɛ kawũna kamɛ a, baapila te mɔ fi.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, titɔ kĩ bɔlɛ foe lɔmɔ malo ni, mi kɔ̃ bɔtɛ budo kĩ minyina fɔtsa wĩ a kĩ fɔnɛnɛ fɔbɛ̃, kĩ fɔ́afɔ̃ mina nkpã katɛ.
Kitonɛkĩ Baguma lɛ́nyɛ oti kĩ yaádã kpĩĩ, kĩ yaálɛla adzuma a kĩ mikɛna mɔ ɔdɔ a kĩ minyɛ mitsa nɛ yĩ dĩ sũ. Mibumɛna mi bakɔba Kristofɔ ade milamɛna be kabumɛna finyaa malo a.
Boe kawɛ mɔ ɔsĩ nyɛ kĩ mi kamɛ odi nyɛ odi epi ye mbɔdi kabɔa kamɛ lɔmɔ kɛnaawo kawũna, ayekĩ mi awɛ aata lɛtsa a kĩ de akũ miate anɛ a.
Bɔtáwɛ kĩ mikɛna ɔnyɔnɛ, mbom mikɛna fɔtsa ndɛ bati kĩ bɛtɛ bido, kĩ bideĩ ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ, kĩ foesũ bɛna fɔtsa a kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi kĩ yaakpa a.
Kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi kĩ yaakpa Abraham fɔtsa a, ɛtani ye mɔawɛ akũ ɛkpa ye, kitonɛkĩ odima lɛbɛ̃ ye Baguma kĩ yaatani.
Ɛlɛ kĩ, “Maahila nɔ ade maakpa nɔ babi mɔ bawa beblebee lɛmɛ a.”
Abraham na ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ, foesũ ye awɛ ta lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma ke otse kĩ yaakpa ye a.
Bati atani fɔtsa kavɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛbɛ̃ be a kakɔa katsua fɔlɛtsa kavɛlɛ a kamɛ.
Ade foesũ Baguma tani fɔtsa nɛ ye bɔhɛ a akũ a, kitonɛkĩ ɛwɛ kĩ foe kamɛ fɔkpalɛ bikĩ baatɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi a kĩ ye nhihiɛ lɛláavɛmɛna da.

Foesũ Baguma kɛna fɔtsa nviã kĩ fɔnyɛ bɔhɛ mɔ katani, kĩ fɔláapuli fɔdani, ade Baguma lɛmɛ lɛláapuli ɛma fɔvã nɛ foe akũ a. Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ ni, boe a kĩ bulo bɔnatani ye a bubuki bɔana ɔwɔlɛ, bɔate anɛ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi kĩ yaakpa boe a akũ.
Budeĩ kɔnɛte kĩĩ bɔkpa boe akũ nɛ boe kadzi kamɛ, ndɛ ayekĩ kutse tunu api koe kadzɛla kpli a. Kɔnɛte a akpã boe katsãmɛna lima a kĩ litsua kɔla a kamɛ kawomɛna nɛ kakɔ kpalɛwa flee a.
Ade awĩ Yesu nya lɔtɔ ewo ndɛ boe lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ aye, ɛdani daa Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee nɛ Melkizedek osi a akũ a.
Melkizedek kĩĩ nyɛ Salem lɛgã, ade ɛnyɛ Baguma Kpale a ɔsɔfɔ a. Kĩ Abraham to kawũ a kĩ ke kamɛ ɛnya fɔgã ɛna akũ yaya a, Melkizedek natsɛlamɔ ye ehila ye.
Awã naa, Abraham kɔa kawũ kamɛ fɔtsa a kĩ ɛna a flee katsu kawuade a ɛkpa ye.
Dĩ Melkizedek kayɔkanyɛ katɔnyade nyɛ kĩ Lɛgã, fɔtsa kpĩĩ akũ ɔkɛnanɛ. Kayade nyɛ Salem lɛgã kĩ fɔatsa kĩ Lukudɔ Lɛgã.
Bɛtálɛ lɛtsama nɛ ɔlɛga ĩye ɔma akũ. Bɛtálɛ lɛtsama nɛ ye babi mɔ bawa akũ, bɛtátsa lɔkɔ a kĩ bɛma ye, ĩye lɔkɔ a kĩ eku a. Melkizedek kĩĩ la ndɛ Baguma Obi a ade ɛnyɛ ɔsɔfɔ daa daa a.
Midã ayekĩ Melkizedek tɛ dĩ! Boe ɔwanyɔ Abraham ndɛ otinɔkɔɛ̃ malo a kpa ye kawũ kamɛ fɔtsa a kĩ ɛna a kasɛ̃ kamɛ katsu kawuade a.
Nɛ mbla a onukpɛ̃ ni, Levi babi mɔ bawa kĩ banya basɔfɔ a deĩ osi kĩ batɛ fɔtsa kasɛ̃ kamɛ katsu kawuade nɛ Israelfɔ awɛ, titɔ kĩ be malo bɛnyɛ Abraham kasinu kamɛ babi malo.
Ade Melkizedek táto Levi kasinu a kamɛ a, lɛmɛ ɛtɛ fɔtsa katsu kawuade etomɛna Abraham sɛkɛ̃, ade ehila ye oti a kĩ Baguma kpa bɔhɛ a.
Atsindze adima lɛláa foe kamɛ kĩ oti a kĩ yakpa nhila a bɛ̃ oti a kĩ ye bihila a.
Nɛ basɔfɔ sɛmakɛ ni, batidziwa kĩ baku a atɛ fɔtsa katsu kawuade, lɛmɛ nɛ Melkizedek sɛmakɛ kɔ̃ ni, oti kĩ bidi adansiɛ nɛ ye akũ kĩ edzi nkpã daa, ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma fɔlɛtsa a lɛ a, lɛtɛ fɔtsa a.
Foesũ bɔ́apuli bɔlɛ malo kĩ, Levi kĩ yatɛ fɔtsa kasɛ̃ kamɛ katsu kawuade a malo kpa fɔtsa ɛtsãmɛna Abraham akũ,
kitonɛkĩ bɛtáma tɔ̃ Levi, lɛmɛ ntɛ bɔ́alɛ ni, ɛna nɛ ɔwanyɔ Abraham kate kamɛ nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ Melkizedek natsɛlamɔ ɔwanyɔ a.

Levifɔ a tɔsɔfɔ kanya kamɛ fɔtsã mɔ bɛkpa Israelfɔ mbla a. Ade finyaa ntɛ Levifɔ tɔsɔfɔ kanya a kakpɔla kɛkpɔla ni, kufɛ fɔtásĩ kĩ ɔsɔfɔ bɛbã ndɛ Melkizedek aye ebuki ɛnɛ, kĩ nnɛ́ Aron kasinu a kamɛ eto.
Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ bɛvɛmɛna tɔsɔfɔ kanya a ni, kɛnɛ kĩ kavɛmɛna kɛya nɛ tɔsɔfɔ kanya mbla a lɛmɛ kamɛ.
Boe Ɔlate kĩ ye akũ fɔlɛtsa bɔlamɛna kalɛ a to katete bɛbã kamɛ, ade ke katete a kamɛ obi odima tánya tɔ̃ ɔsɔfɔ a.
Fɔnɛ fɔwaa pefee kĩ Yuda katete kamɛ bɛma ye, lɛmɛ Mose tábɔa katete kĩĩ dĩ ɛlɛ tɔsɔfɔ kanya lɛtsama.
Fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kamɛ kpalɛ fɔba kĩ ɔsɔfɔ bɛbã kĩ ɛla ndɛ Melkizedek aye ya.
Oti kĩĩ nya ɔsɔfɔ nnɛ́ nɛ batidziwa mbla onukpɛ̃, mbom ɛtsã nkpã kĩ ɛla kawũna a kɔbɛ̃ akũ ɛya.
Kitonɛkĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ nɛ ye akũ kĩ,
“Aanya ɔsɔfɔ daa,
nɛ Melkizedek osi a akũ.”
Foesũ bɛnyɛ mbla kɔɛ a biyi nɛ ɔɔ́wɛ̃, kitonɛkĩ ɛtána kɔbɛ̃ ĩye nfasɔ adima.
Kitonɛkĩ Mose mbla a tápuli ɛkɛna lɛtsama lɛkpɔla. Finyaa budeĩ kɔnɛte kĩ kɔnɛnɛ kɔbɛ̃, kĩ bɔtsɛ̃ koe akũ bɔafuã Baguma.
Fukĩ fubu nyɛ kĩ Baguma lɔ fubo nɛ tɔsɔfɔ kanya kĩĩ akũ. Kɔkɔɛ a Baguma tálɔ fubo ɛkpa bikĩ bidzina basɔfɔ a.
Lɛmɛ kĩ Yesu yanya ɔsɔfɔ a, Baguma lɔ fubo ɛkpa ye ɛlɛ kĩ,
“Boe Ɔlate a lɔ fubo
ade ɛláadani ye adzuni a,
‘Aanya ɔsɔfɔ daa.’ ”
Fubo kĩĩ sũ Yesu dani apam a kĩ ɛnɛnɛ ɛbɛ̃ kɔlaa a liti ɔdzanɛ.
Ntsitsemu bɛbã buki edeĩ. Kɔkɔɛ a basɔfɔ nɛ lidede, kitonɛkĩ bɛkaku mɔatsɛ mɔatsɛ kafɔnɛ adzuma a.
Lɛmɛ kĩ Yesu kɔ̃ dzi nkpã daa sũ ni, ye tɔsɔfɔ kanya a lɛláato ye akũ tɛnaa odima akũ.
Foesũ yaapuli ɛtɛ bati a kĩ batsã ye akũ kaya nɛ Baguma sɛkɛ̃ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ, kitonɛkĩ edzi nkpã daa, ade yake Baguma aduli kakpa be a.
Foesũ Yesu nyɛ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a kĩ busĩ. Ɛnyɛ oti kpalɛwa kĩ nfumusu adima lɛláa ye akũ, ade tɔkpa tidima lɛláa ye akũ a. Bɛnyɛ ye nɛ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ kamɛ, ade bɛdɛla ye flee ɛtɛ̃ ode a.

Yesu lɛlá ndɛ basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ nkaɛ a, ade fɔtásĩ kĩ yabɔa afɔliɛ luwi nyɛ luwi nɛ ye mɔawɛ tɔkpa akũ, lɔkɔa ke liti ɛbɔa nɛ bati bɛbã tɔkpa lɔlɔ. Ɛbɔa afɔliɛ deedimɔapɛ ɛkpa fɔkɔ a flee, nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ ɛkɔa ye akũ ɛbɔa afɔliɛ a.
Mose mbla a apau banyole kĩ badɔ kadzina be basɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ flee, lɛmɛ Baguma tsã ye fubo kalɔ akũ nɛ mbla a liti a, ɛpau Obi a kĩ ɛkɛna ye ɛkpɔla a yanya ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ flee daa.
Kalɛ titiliwu nɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɔlamɛna kalɛ a kamɛ nyɛ kĩ budeĩ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee kĩĩ odu, kĩ edzi nɛ Obu Lɛgã Kpale lɛgãkpo a sɔmɔna nɛ ode.
Yasum ndɛ ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ aye nɛ Kakɔ Kpalɛwa Flee a kĩ kɛnyɛ lima patampa wĩ a kamɛ, kĩ nnɛ́ otidziwa lɛbɔa de, mbom boe Ɔlate a lɛbɔa de.
Badzina ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ flee kamɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛkɔa afɔliɛ fɔtsa ɛkpa Baguma ɛbɔa afɔliɛ lɛmɛ, foesũ kɛnɛ kĩ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee kĩĩ lɛmɛ ɛna afɔliɛ litsedi ɛkpa Baguma.
Ade ntɛ tite akũ edzi ni, kufɛ ɛláanya ɔsɔfɔ kɔlaa, kitonɛkĩ basɔfɔ a kĩ be akɔa futetsa kakpa Baguma nɛ Yudafɔ mbla a onukpɛ̃ a deĩ kɔkɔɛ.
Adzuma kĩ bakɛna ndɛ basɔfɔ aye nɛ kasumkɔ̃ la ndɛ fukĩ fudeĩ nɛ ode a kuyo odi.
Ade foesũ kĩ Mose aabɔa Lima Patampa Kpalɛwa a ni, Baguma bi ye kĩ, “Dã kĩ ɔkɛna nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bɛtsa nɔ nɛ ɔtɔ akũ a onukpɛ̃.”
Lɛmɛ finyaa Baguma kpa Yesu ɔsɔfɔ adzuma kĩ ɛnɛnɛ ɛbɛ̃ basɔfɔ a tide kɔlaa, ndɛ ayekĩ apam a kĩ ɛkɛna nɛ Baguma mɔ ye bati kayite a nɛnɛ ɛbɛ̃ a, kitonɛkĩ bɛkɛna ye nɛ bɔhɛ a kĩ ɛnɛnɛ ɛbɛ̃ a akũ.
Ntɛ mfumsu adima ɛtana nɛ apam atɔnyade a akũ ni, kufɛ fɔláabuki fusĩ kĩ bakɛna ayade.
Lɛmɛ Baguma amɔ mfumsu nɛ ye bati akũ kĩ ɛlɛ kĩ,
“Boe Ɔlate a lɛ kĩ,
fuwi fudi aya kĩ maakɛna apam vɔɛ̃ mɔ
Israel kade a
mɔ Yuda kade a lɛmɛ.
Apam kĩĩ lɛláana ndɛ ekĩ
nkɛna mɔ be bawanyɔ
nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ mpi be nɛ akpɔ
nkpã be nnɛmɛna nɛ Egipte tite akũ a.
Kitonɛkĩ bɛtákɛna nɛ apam a kĩ nkɛna mɔ be a akũ,
foesũ yĩ malo mbɔa kanɛ nkpa be.”
Ɔlate a buki ɛlɛ kĩ,
“Ade apam kĩ maakɛna mɔ Israel bati
nɛ fuwi a kĩ fɔ́aya a liti a.
Maakɔa yĩ mbla ndo nɛ be adzuni kamɛ,
ade maatsɛlɛ ye nɛ be tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ a.
Maanya be Baguma,
ade be baanya yĩ bati a.
Odima lɛláabuki ɛtsa ɔkɔba fɔtsa
ĩye ebi ɔwaɛ̃ kĩ, ‘Nyi Baguma,’
kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi aanyi yĩ
kito babisɛ̃ akũ kɛnawo banɔkɔɛ̃ akũ.
Maamɔ be kɔnya nɛ be ɔbla kpa a kĩ bɛbɔa akũ,
ade nláabuki nte anɛ nɛ be tɔkpa akũ kɔlaa a.”
Kĩ Baguma lɛ kĩ apam vɔɛ̃ a, fɔatsa kĩ ɛkɛna atɔnyade a akɔɛ. Ade finyaakĩĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ lɛkɛna lɔkɔɛ ni, owi lɛláabuna mɔ laatɛ̃ lɛnaa.
Apam atɔnyade a na tɛbla kĩ te akũ batsã kasum, mɔ tite akũ kɔla, awã kĩ basum lɛmɛ.
Bike patampa bɛkɔa lima bɛsɛ̃ ye kamɛ. Bavɛ kakɔ katɔnyade a kĩ Kakɔ Kpalɛwa, ade awã lɛmɛ bike ɔsɛdza otse mɔ opunu a kĩ ye akũ bate abodoo kakpa Baguma a.
Nɛ kɔla kamɛ katsua lima a liti ni, patampa bɛbã deĩ kĩ bavɛ Kakɔ Kpalɛwa Flee.

Fɔtsa a kĩ fudeĩ nɛ awã nyɛ sika ngbã atɛnyɛ a kĩ ye akũ bate lifii ɔnyɔ, apam adakã kĩ bidue mɔ sika ngbã. Adakã a kamɛ fɔtsa a nyɛ sika ngbã okluwa kĩ funitsã kĩ bavɛ mana deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ, Aron otse kĩ yake katsã, kĩ ɛnyɛ tɔɔta, mɔ boe tratra nviã kĩ be akũ bɛtsɛlɛ mbla ewua a bite a.

Bɛmɛ Kerubifɔ kutidu bɛdzɛ̃ nɛ adakã a akũ, kĩ banyɛ Baguma kukũkpalɛ katsa, ade bɛdzɛlɛ be fupoki bɛtsa awã kĩ bakɔa bati tɔkpa kate a. Lɛmɛ bɔláapuli bɔlɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ fɔtsa a na flee akũ dzununuunu finyaa.
Ade ntɛ bɛmanɛ fɔtsa a biyi lɔmɔ a, basɔfɔ awo nɛ Patampa atɔnyade a kamɛ kakɛna be tɔsɔfɔ adzuma.

Lɛmɛ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a odi awo nɛ kɔla kɔyade a kamɛ deedimɔapɛ nɛ kateli kamɛ. Ntɛ yanaa a, kɛnɛkĩ yalɛ bayaɛ babɔanɛ kĩ yaakɔa ɛbɔa afɔliɛ ɛkpa Baguma nɛ ye mɔawɛ tɔkpa mɔ tɔkpa a kĩ bati kɛna nɛ katanyi kamɛ a lɔlɔ.
Nɛ nhihiɛ kĩĩ onukpɛ̃ ni, Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a nyɛ ɛtsa kĩ, nɛ ayekĩ patampa atɔnyade a buki ɛdzɛ̃ sũ ni, osi tábinya kĩ bati biwo nɛ Kakɔ Kpalɛwa Flee a kamɛ.
Fukĩĩ nyɛ nfantuhũ fɔtsa katsa fɔkpa nviã fuwi kĩĩ. Fɔatsa kĩ afɔliɛ mɔ futetsa a kĩ bakpa Baguma a lápuli kafɔ̃ basumunɛ a ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ akpalɛ flefle,
kitonɛkĩ be ɔsum a manɛ mɔ funitsã, bavɛ mɔ akũ kakpalɛ tɛmaniɛ ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ odi. Fukĩĩ flee nyɛ katinya kamɛ tɛbla kĩ bakɛna kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ Baguma aalɔla foe.

Lɛmɛ Kristo ya kɔkɔɛ ndɛ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee ɛkpa fɔtsa wĩ a kĩ fɔya kɔkɔɛ a. Patampa Kpalɛwa a kĩ ye kamɛ yasum a pɔnɛ lububu, ade ɛkpɔla ɛba akɔɛ a. Ade ye kɔ̃ nnɛ́ patampa kĩ batidziwa like ye, ade foe nyɛ kĩ ɛtáto katinya kĩĩ kamɛ.
Kĩ Kristo wo nɛ patampa a kamɛ ɛnaa Kakɔ Kpalɛwa Flee kamɛ deedimɔapɛ a, ɛtákɔa kutukpabi mɔ banantsue babi babɔanɛ ɛbɔa afɔliɛ, mbom ye mɔawɛ babɔanɛ ɛkɔa ɛvɛlɛ nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna ɛma boe.
Kutukpabi, banantsue babɔanɛ mɔ ɔnantsue obi kĩ bipila ye batɔ bakɔa kasã nɛ oti a kĩ efĩĩ deĩ nɛ ye akũ, lɔkɔa ye akũ akpalɛ.

Ayekĩ fukĩĩ nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali sũ ni, nde mɔ Kristo babɔanɛ lɛláakɛna fɔtsa kpale kɔlaa? Kristo tsã daa Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a kɔbɛ̃ akũ, ɛkɔa ye a kĩ efĩĩ adima lɛláa ye akũ a, ɛbɔa afɔliɛ ɛkpa Baguma. Ye babɔanɛ a akpalɛ boe tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ, ɛnyɛ boe tɛmaniɛ kĩ tɛlá nfasɔ ayekĩ bɔ́apuli busum Baguma a kĩ edzi nkpã a.

Ade fukĩĩ sũ Kristo kɛna apam vɔɛ̃ a kamɛ ɔkpɔlanɛ, ayekĩ bati a kĩ Baguma vɛ a, aana daa adzapadiɛ a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi a. Fukĩĩ aaya nɛ foe kamɛ kitonɛkĩ oti liku, ade fɔnyɛ tɔkpa a kĩ bati kɛna nɛ apam atɔnyade a kamɛ a.
Awã kĩ adzapadiɛ akũ ovoli deĩ ni, baákɛna ye akũ adzuma ntɛ bɛtámɔ́ foe kamɛ kĩ ovoli a ɔkɔnanɛ ku,
kitonɛkĩ adzapadiɛ akũ ovoli lɛnyɛ́ lɛtsama ntɛ oti a kĩ ɛkɛna ye a dzi nkpã. Mbɔɛntɛ oti a ku fɔmɔ baapuli bɛkɛna ye akũ adzuma.
Ade foesũ apam atɔnyade a malo ni, bɛtánɛ babɔanɛ liti bɛkɛna ye adzuma.

Mose nya lɔtɔ ede lɛtsã nɛ tɛbla flee a kĩ tideĩ nɛ mbla ovoli kamɛ a ɛkpa bati a. Ke liti a, ɛkɔa mui ɛtsɛka mɔ kutukpabi mɔ banantsue babɔanɛ, ɛkɔa kuveli tɛtsã mɔ tuwĩ mɔ ɔlɛ̃ ɛta ade ɛnyɛ ɛsã nɛ mbla ovoli a mɔ bati a flee akũ.
Ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ade apam a kĩ Baguma kɛna mɔ mi a kĩ mikɛna nɛ ye akũ a babɔanɛ nɛ awĩ a.”
Ade ayea Mose lɛmɛ akɔa babɔanɛ kasã nɛ Patampa Kpalɛwa a mɔ fɔtsa a kĩ foe akũ adzuma bakɛna nɛ kasum kamɛ a flee akũ a.
Ɔnɔkɔali, bɔ́apuli bɔlɛ kĩ nɛ mbla a onukpɛ̃ ni, babɔanɛ bakɔa kakpalɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa akũ, ade ntɛ bɛtáko babɔanɛ nɛ tite ni, tɔkpa kakɔa kate láya.
Foesũ fusĩ kĩ bɛkpalɛ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔla ndɛ ode fude kuyo a akũ nɛ osi kĩĩ akũ. Lɛmɛ ode fɔtsa a mɔawɛ kɔ̃ afɔliɛ kĩ ɛnɛnɛ ɛbɛ̃ tite akũ ade bɛkɔa bɛkpalɛ foe akũ.
Kitonɛkĩ Kristo táwo ɛnaa Patampa Kpalɛwa a kĩ batidziwa like, kĩ ɛnyɛ ode fude a odi kuyo a kamɛ. Ewo ɛnaa ode mɔawɛ a, awã kĩ finyaa ɛnanyɛ ye akũ nɛ Baguma anɛ nɛ boe onukpɛ̃.
Lɛmɛ Kristo táwo nɛ awã kĩ yakɔa ye akũ ɛbɔa afɔliɛ ebuli ndɛ ayekĩ Yudafɔ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a akɔa ɔyaɛ babɔanɛ kawomɛna nɛ Kakɔ Kpalɛwa Flee a kamɛ kateli nyɛ kateli a.
Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ aye fɔla ni, kufɛ kɛnɛ kĩ ɛkaamɔ lubo lɔkɔ pii, kito anɛ katinya kayɔkayi a. Lɛmɛ finyaa kĩ katinya anaa kawũna a, Kristo ya deedimɔapɛ kĩ yakɔa ye akũ ɛbɔa afɔliɛ ɛnyɛ tɔkpa.
Baguma hihiɛ kĩ otidziwa eku deedimɔapɛ, ade nɛ wuda liti a, yaadzɛmɔ ye.

Ade ayea Kristo lɛmɛ kɔa ye akũ ɛbɔa afɔliɛ deedimɔapɛ, ɛnyɛ bati pii tɔkpa a ɛnamɛna a. Yaabuki ɛya lɛyade, lɛmɛ ɛláabuki ɛkɛna lɛtsama nɛ tɔkpa akũ, mbom yaatɛ bati a kĩ bidzi badã ye anɛ a bɛna nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a.

Yudafɔ mbla a lɛnyɛ́ fɔtsa wĩ a kutidu, mbom ɛla ndɛ fɔtsa wĩ a kĩ fɔ́aya a kuyo kɛkɛ. Nɛ mbla a onukpɛ̃ ni, kateli nyɛ kateli basɔfɔ a abɔa afɔliɛ mɔapɛ a kakpa Baguma. Ade foesũ ntɛ fɔtsã mbla kĩĩ akũ ni, bɛláapuli bɛkɛna bati a kĩ baya nɛ Baguma sɛkɛ̃ a bɛkpɔla da a.
Ntɛ bipuli bɛkpalɛ bati a kĩ basum Baguma a akũ deedimɔapɛ ni, kufɛ be tɔwɔlɛ lɛláabuki tɛkakɔ be kɔtɔ bio kĩ tɔkpa deĩ nɛ be akũ, lɔkɔa bɛfɔ̃ afɔlibɔ flee kabɔa.
Lɛmɛ ndɛ ayekĩ fɔla a, kateli nyɛ kateli afɔlibɔ afɔ̃ bati akai be tɔkpa kɛkɛ,
kitonɛkĩ banantsue mɔ kutukpabi babɔanɛ lɛláapuli bɛnyɛ tɔkpa da.
Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ kĩ Kristo aaya nɛ katinya kamɛ a, ebi Baguma kĩ,
“Aáwɛ afɔlibɔ mɔ futetsa,
mbom ɔkɛna sukɛna ɔkpa yĩ.
Ɔyaɛ kĩ bipila ye lodo nɛ afɔlibɔ atɛnyɛ akũ
ĩye tɔkpa kanyɛ afɔliɛ
láwo nɔ anɛ.
Ade ke nlɛ kĩ, ‘O Baguma, amɔ yĩ nɛ awĩ.
Ĩya kĩ mayaakɛna nɔ kawɛ
ndɛ ayekĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ yĩ akũ
nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ a.’ ”
Ɛnya lɔtɔ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Aáwɛ afɔlibɔ, mɔ futetsa, ĩye ɔyaɛ kĩ bapila ye nɛ afɔlibɔ atɛnyɛ akũ, mɔ tɔkpa kanyɛ afɔliɛ láwo nɔ anɛ.” Ɛlɛ fukĩĩ titɔ kĩ babɔa afɔliɛ kĩĩ flee nɛ mbla a onukpɛ̃ malo.
Ade ke ɛlɛ kĩ, “O Baguma, amɔ yĩ nɛ awĩ. Ĩya kĩ mayaakɛna nɔ kawɛ.” Nɛ osi kĩĩ akũ a, Baguma fɔnɛ afɔlibɔ kɔɛ a flee awɛ ɛkɔa Kristo afɔliɛ a edo nɛ te kadokɔ̃.
Ayekĩ Yesu Kristo kɛna Baguma kawɛ akũ, ɛkɔa ye akũ ɛbɔa afɔliɛ deedimɔapɛ, ɛkpa fɔkɔ flee ɛkpalɛ boe akũ.
Yudafɔ ɔsɔfɔ odi nyɛ odi akɛna ye ɔsɔfɔ adzuma luwi nyɛ luwi, kabɔa afɔliɛ mɔapɛ a kabuli, titɔ kĩ afɔlibɔ kĩĩ lɛláapuli ɛnyɛ tɔkpa malo.
Lɛmɛ kĩ Kristo kɔa ye akũ ɛbɔa afɔliɛ mɔapɛ nɛ tɔkpa akũ eyua a, ɛnadzi nɛ Baguma sɔmɔna,
awã kĩ edzi yadzɔlɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ Baguma aakɔa ye bakesĩnɛ ɛkɛna ye abɔa katekɔ̃.
Kristo kɔa afɔliɛ mɔapɛ a kĩ ɛbɔa a, ɛkɛna bati a kĩ bɛkpalɛ be akũ a bɛkpɔla daa.
Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a lɛmɛ adi adansiɛ nɛ foe akũ. Ɛnya lɔtɔ ɛlɛ kĩ,
“Boe Ɔlate lɛ kĩ,
‘Ade apam vɔɛ̃ kĩ maakɛna mɔ be,
nɛ lɔkɔ kĩ laya a kamɛ a.
Maakɔa yĩ mbla a ndo nɛ be tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ.
Ade maatsɛlɛ ye nɛ be adzuni kamɛ a.’ ”
Ebuki ɛlɛ kĩ,
“Nláabuki nte anɛ nɛ be tɔkpa mɔ be ɔbla kpa akũ.”
Foesũ ntɛ bɛkɔa fukĩĩ flee bite ni, tɔkpa kanyɛ afɔliɛ tábuki esĩ.
Foesũ nwaɛ̃ amɛ, bɔtsã Yesu wuda akũ, bɔna osi faa kĩ bɔ́apuli buwo nɛ Kakɔ Kpalɛwa Flee a kamɛ.
Ebinya nkpã osi vɔɛ̃ ɛkpa boe ɛtsãmɛna lima a kĩ lɛsɛ̃ patampa kamɛ a kĩ lɛdza lɛkpa ye sukɛna a.
Budeĩ Ɔsɔfɔ Kpale kĩ ye adãmɛna Baguma tɔtɔ a akũ,
foesũ mifɔ̃ bɔkɔa ɔnɔkɔali ɔwɔlɛ, mɔ katɛkado kĩ kitim, mɔ tɔwɔlɛ kĩ tɛkpalɛ kĩ kɔtɔkaku lɛláa, mɔ sukɛna kĩ bɛwɔla se mui klɛĩklɛĩ bufuã Baguma.
Mifɔ̃ bupi kɔnɛte fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɔanyɛ katsa a budomɔ akũ pintii nɛ boe katɛkado kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ bɔ́apuli bɔtɛ Baguma budo kĩ yaakɛna nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi a akũ.
Mifɔ̃ bɔkɔna ayekĩ bɔ́ado boe bawaɛ̃ kɔbɛ̃ bibumɛna akũ akũ, bɛwɛ akũ kalɛ, bɛkɛna tudzuma wĩ lɛmɛ.
Mitafɔ̃ bɔfɔ̃ boe katsɛna kanaa ndɛ ayekĩ mi kamɛ badi akɛna a, mbom mifɔ̃ budo akũ kɔbɛ̃ bubu, kitonɛkĩ mimɔ́ kĩ boe Ɔlate Luwi a lamɛna kafuã.
Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ bunyi ɔnɔkɔali a buyua, mɔ bubua pa bɔakɛna tɔkpa ni, afɔliɛ adima buki ɛláa kĩ yaapuli ɛnyɛ tɔkpa.
Mbom lɛtsa a kĩ lite nyɛ kĩ bɔadzi bɔkadã Kadzɛ mɔ libe a kĩ laaya a anɛ, mɔ fi gɛĩgɛĩ a kĩ fɔ́awɔla Baguma bakesĩnɛ a!
Ntɛ odi fum Mose mbla a ni, baámɔ ye kɔnya, kakɔ bakɔ ye ntɛ bɛdza nɛ bati nviã ĩye bati ɛlalɛ adansiɛ kadi akũ.

Kekɔ̃ mikɔna midã ni, litsa sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ aaya nɛ oti a kĩ esupa Baguma Obi a, kĩ ebu Baguma apam babɔanɛ a kĩ ɛkɔa ɛvɔlɛ tɔkpa nɛ ye akũ a fɔtsa pupulidza? Litsa lɛmɛ miakɔna kĩ laaya nɛ oti a kĩ yasupa Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a kĩ yamɔ bati kɔnya a akũ? Mikɔna midã sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ mɔ ɔsĩ a kĩ baakpa ye a!
Kitonɛkĩ bunyina oti a kĩ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Yĩ aavia tɔkpa kɔtɔkase, yĩ aase te kɔtɔ.” Ebuki ɛlɛ kĩ, “Boe Ɔlate a aadzɛmɔ ye bati.”
Fɔnyɛ libe paa kĩ odi aawo nɛ Baguma kĩ edzi nkpã a kalɔkpa kamɛ!
Mite anɛ nɛ fuwi a kĩ fɔtɛ̃, kĩ minya lɔtɔ minyi Baguma laa a. Nɛ lɔkɔ a na kamɛ a, kĩ Baguma ɔhaĩ ko nɛ mi akũ a, mido ɔwɔlɛ mipili mɔ ɔsĩ titɔ kĩ mimɔ́ lubo pii malo.
Fɔkɔ fudi bavũna mi nɛ kanade, kakɛna mi awɔda. Fɔkɔ bɛbã lɛmɛ miakɔa mi akũ kabumɛna bikĩ bamɔna be lubo kĩĩ odu a.

Nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, mimɔ́ lubo ndɛ bati a kĩ bɛwaa kɔla, ade titɔ kĩ bɛkɔa kɔbɛ̃ bɛtɛ mi akũ fɔtsa flee nɛ mi awɛ malo ni, mido ɔwɔlɛ mitɛ foe mɔ kawɔlɛ, kitonɛkĩ minyina kĩ mibuki mideĩ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛnɛnɛ lɛbɛ̃, kĩ laana daa a.
Foesũ akpɔ ɛtaveli mi, kitonɛkĩ fɔ́ama mi kɔtɔkase kpale.
Fusĩ kĩ miana ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ, ayekĩ míapuli mikɛna nɛ Baguma kawɛ akũ, lɔkɔa mi awɛ aata lɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi a.
Kitonɛkĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ,
“Kite sukuloo oti a kĩ yaaya a, aaya, ade ɛláabuna owi a.
Yĩ oti kpĩĩ aatɛ yĩ edo, edzi nkpã.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi muniki liti ni,
ɛláabuki ewo yĩ anɛ.”
Lɛmɛ boe kɔ̃ bɔnyɛ́ bati a kĩ bamuniki liti kanaa kayɛla kamɛ, mbom budeĩ katɛ kado ade bɔna nkpã katɛ a.
Katɛkado nyɛ fɔatsa kĩ nɔ anɛ teĩ nɛ foe akũ a anɛ kadã mɔ fɔtsa a kĩ aámɔ mɔ anɛ a foe katɛkado kĩ fudeĩ.
Katɛkado akũ fɔtsã mɔ Baguma mɔ́ kawɔlɛ nɛ boe atitifɔ bawanyɔ a akũ a.
Katɛkado kamɛ fɔtsã mɔ bunu foe kayɔ kĩ Baguma kalɛ a ɛkɔa ɛbɔa katinya, ayekĩ lɛtsa a kĩ bɔamɔ a, ɛkɛna de etomɛna lɛtsa a kĩ bɔámɔ mɔ anɛ a kamɛ.

Katɛkado lɛfɔ̃ Abel bɔa afɔliɛ kĩ ɛnɛnɛ ɛbɛ̃ Kain ade ɛkpa Baguma. Ye katɛkado kamɛ ɛtsã ɛna Baguma adansiɛ nɛ ye akũ kĩ ɛnyɛ oti kpĩĩ, kitonɛkĩ Baguma mɔawɛ lɛtɛ ye futetsa a. Titɔ kĩ Abel ku malo ni, ɛtsã ye katɛkado kamɛ ebuki yalɛ kɔdzɛla nviã.

Katɛkado lɛfɔ̃ bɛbɔɛ Henok bɛnamɛna ode kĩ ɛtáku. Odima tábuki ɛmɔ́ ye, kitonɛkĩ Baguma yabɔɛ ye ɛnamɛna ode. Fɔmɔ ɛbɔɛ ye ɛnamɛna ode a ni, Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a di adansiɛ nɛ ye akũ kĩ ye fɔlɛtsa wo Baguma anɛ.
Ntɛ odi lɛlá katɛkado ni, ye fɔlɛtsa lɛláawo Baguma anɛ, kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaya nɛ Baguma sɛkɛ̃ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ ɛna katɛkado kĩ Baguma deĩ, ade ɛnyɛ bikĩ bawɛ ye liti osi a kɔtɔ osenɛ a.

Katɛkado lɛfɔ̃ Noa tɛ Baguma kɔdɛ nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔ́aya kĩ ɛláapuli ɛmɔ́ a akũ. Ebu Baguma ade ke ɛmɛ mui anɛ adakã kpale kĩ ɛnyɛ ye mɔ ye tɔtɔ bati a. Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ ni, ye katɛkado nyɛ kɛtsa kĩ katinya kamɛ bati ku kɔtɔ ade Baguma bɔɛ ye kĩ ɛnyɛ oti kpĩĩ a.
Katɛkado lɛfɔ̃ Abraham bu Baguma, kĩ ɛvɛ ye kĩ ɛdzakũ ɛnaa tite a kĩ taanya ye adzapadiɛ akũ a. Ade ɛdzakũ nɛ ye mɔawɛ tite akũ ɛnaa awã kĩ enyína malo a.
Katɛkado ɛkɔa ɛnanya ɔnɔvɔɛ̃ nɛ tite a kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi yaakpa ye a akũ. Edzi nɛ patampa kamɛ, ade ayea Isak mɔ Yakob lɛmɛ dzi nɛ tɛpatampa kamɛ a, titɔ kĩ bɛkpa be tite mɔapɛ a bɔhɛ a.
Abraham kɛna foe lɔmɔ, kitonɛkĩ ɛkadã anɛ kakpa ɔmatɔ kpale a kĩ Baguma awɛ tsua ɛdzɛ̃ nɛ kayɔkayi futekũ mɔ ɔsĩ akũ.
Katɛkado lɛfɔ̃ Sara lɛmɛ na kɔbɛ̃ epuli ɛtsãmɔ kɔma, titɔ kĩ ɛkɛna katsɔkpa malo, kitonɛkĩ ebu Baguma a kĩ ɛkpa ye bɔhɛ a ɔnɔkɔalini.
Foesũ kito Abraham mɔapɛ a kĩ eku eyua malo a kamɛ babi mɔ bawa kĩ bɛnɛ lidede ndɛ fusibii, mɔ mpo abuĩ dã kĩ bɛláapuli bɛkã a nɛ́ bito a.

Bati kĩĩ flee ku nɛ be katɛkado kamɛ, kĩ be awɛ táta lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi kĩ yaakpa be a. Lɛmɛ bɛmɔ́ foe mɔ lugo, bɛtɛ foe mɔ kawɔlɛ ade bitunɔ nɛ foe akũ kĩ banɔvɔɛ̃ mɔ basitsãnɛ banɛ nɛ tite kĩĩ akũ a.
Kitonɛkĩ bati a kĩ balɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ odu a, nyɛ bɛtsa pefee kĩ bɛlamɔ be mɔawɛ tite kawɛ.
Ntɛ tite a kĩ te akũ bɛdzakũ a bɛkakɔna ni, kufɛ bɛna osi bimuniki bɛnaa te akũ.
Mbom bɛkawɛ tite kĩ tɛnɛnɛ tɛbɛ̃, kĩ tɛnyɛ ode tide a lɛmɛ. Nɛ foesũ fɔákɔ Baguma kɔnyɔã kĩ bavɛ ye kĩ be Baguma, kitonɛkĩ ɛlɔla ɔmatɔ kpale odi eyi be.

Katɛkado lɛfɔ̃ Abraham kɔa ye obi Isak ɛbɔa afɔliɛ, lɔkɔ a kĩ Baguma sɔ ye ɛdã a. Titɔ kĩ obi a na Baguma lɛ eyi kĩ yaakpa Abraham malo ni, etunɔ faa kĩ yakɔa ye obinyole mɔapɛ a ɛbɔa afɔliɛ ɛkpa Baguma.
Baguma bi ye kɔkɔɛ kĩ, “Isak akũ fɔ́atsã mɔ aana babi mɔ bawa a kĩ nlɛ ĩyi a.”
Abraham kɔna kĩ Baguma aapuli ɛdzɛla Isak etomɛna kanɔkpa malo. Ade foesũ emuniki ɛtɛ ye obi ndɛ wuda kamɛ bɛdzɛla ye bitomɛna a.
Katɛkado lɛfɔ̃ Isak hila Yakob mɔ Esau nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔ́aya a akũ a.
