Katɛkado lɛfɔ̃ kĩ Yakob aaku a, ehila Yosef babinyole a, ade kĩ ɛkɛna lɔlɔ ete nɛ ye otse kĩ yake katsã akũ a, esum Baguma.
Katɛkado lɛfɔ̃ kĩ Yosef aaku a, ɛlɛ eyi kĩ Israelfɔ aadzakũ nɛ Egipte tite akũ, ade ɛtsa ayekĩ bɛkɛna mɔ ye fɔtsɔ̃ a.
Katɛkado lɛfɔ̃ kĩ bɛma Mose a, ye bamanɛ kɔla ye tidetɔ ɛlalɛ, kitonɛkĩ bɛmɔ́ kĩ yalɛ kadã paa, ade bɛtávila mbla a kĩ Egipte Lɛgã si a katu a.
Katɛkado lɛfɔ̃ kĩ Mose bo anɛ a, esĩ kĩ bɛtavɛ ye kĩ Egipte Lɛgã obitsole obi.
Mbom ɛwɛ kĩ yamɔ lubo mɔ Baguma bati kɛba kĩ yamɔ tɔkpa kamɛ ɔmɛnɛ lɔkɔ lukũ lidi.
Mose kɔna kĩ kɔnyɔã a kĩ baado ye nɛ Kristo sũ tɛ kɔya paa kɔba akũ kana fɔtsa flee a kĩ fudeĩ nɛ Egipte a, kitonɛkĩ ɛkɔa anɛ ete nɛ kɔtɔkase a kĩ Baguma aakpa ye nɛ lɔkɔ kĩ laaya a akũ.
Katɛkado lɛfɔ̃ Mose dzakũ nɛ Egipte, kĩ ɛtávila lɛgã kalɔkpa a. Edo ɔwɔlɛ ɛtámuniki liti, ɛkɛna ndɛ yamɔ Baguma a kĩ bɔámɔ mɔ anɛ a.
Katɛkado Mose kɔa eyi Wuda Katɛ̃ Luwi a, ade ɛfɔ̃ bɛkɔa babɔanɛ bikputa nɛ be tunyukpɛ̃ titse akũ, ayekĩ ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a lɛláakɔ Israelfɔ babinyole batɔnyade a.
Katɛkado lɛfɔ̃ Israelfɔ puli bitsua Mpo Ngbã a binyina ndɛ tite akũ bɛtsɛ̃. Kĩ Egiptefɔ bɔa mbɔdi kĩ be malo banyina a ni, bɛkamu nɛ mui a kamɛ.
Katɛkado lɛfɔ̃ Yeriko ɔmatɔ foebi a kĩ Israelfɔ tsã bisinya foe fuwi evũkɔnɔ a veliveli.
Katɛkado lɛfɔ̃ bɛtákɔ Rahab ɔdɔpaani a bibumɔ bati a kĩ bɛtábu Baguma a, kitonɛkĩ ɛtɛ Israelfɔ a kĩ bɛbɛla bɛnadã tite a kamɛ mɔ kawɔlɛ.
Litsa mbuki nlɛ mbu? Lɔkɔ lɛláa kĩ maalɛ fɔlɛtsa nɛ Gideon, Barak, Samson, Yefta, Dawid, Samuel mɔ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a akũ.
Bɛtsã katɛkado kamɛ bɛnɔ mɔ fude pii bɛnya be akũ. Bɛnya akũ nɛ osi kpĩĩ akũ, ade bɛna fɔtsa a kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi kĩ yaakpa be a. Badi sua dzata tunukpɛ̃,
badi dina fi gɛĩgɛĩ, ade fɔfɔ̃ kĩ badi lo nɛ kawũ onukpɛ̃ a. Katɛkado fɔ̃ bikĩ bɛkɛna kpɛtɛɛ a na kɔbɛ̃, ade bɛna ɔsĩ nɛ kawũ kamɛ bɛnɔ bɛnya banɔvɔɛ̃ kawũ banɔnɛ akũ a.

Katɛkado kamɛ fɔtsã mɔ batsole tɛ be akũ bati banɔkpa kĩ bɛdzɛla bidzi nkpã. Nɛ katɛkado sũ bati bɛbã kĩ bɛtáwɛ kĩ bɛnyɛ be nɛ kɔla fɔnɛ be akũ awɛ bɛkɛna be awɔda biku, ayekĩ baadzɛla be bidzi nkpã kĩ ɛnɛnɛ ɛbɛ̃ a.
Bidi badi nsekuo, bibo be mɔ mple, ade bido badi nkɔsɔnkɔsɔ bɛnado nɛ kɔla kamɛ a.
Bɛtalɛ badi boe, bɛbɛ̃ badi nɛ kayite mɔ ɔsaɛ, bɛkɔ badi mɔ apã. Badi na nɛ baveli ĩye kutukpã tuvoli kamɛ bɛtsã bɛkamini nɛ ohiã kamɛ, bitomɔ be liti ade bɛkɛna be awɔda a.
Nɛ be kalɛ sũ katinya kĩĩ tákpa be kadzi! Bɛtsã bɛkamini ndɛ bati kĩ bilo kawũ nɛ kɔsa kamɛ, bidzi nɛ tɔtɔ akũ, bɛbɛla nɛ tɔtɔ tɛkɛ mɔ tite fɔkɛ kamɛ.
Lɛmɛ bati kĩĩ flee kĩ be katɛkado di adansiɛ nɛ be akũ malo ni, be kamɛ odima awɛ táta lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma lɛ eyi a,
kitonɛkĩ Baguma kɛna nhihiɛ kĩ ɛnɛnɛ ɛbɛ̃ eyi ɛkpa boe. Ye botaɛ nyɛ kĩ ɛláanɛ boe liti ɛkɛna be bɛkpɔla.

Nɛ foe sũ ni, kĩ budeĩ bati kɔdabu kĩĩ odu kĩ bisinya boe, bado boe kɔbɛ̃ sũ ni, mifɔ̃ bɔnyɛ fɔlɔtsa fudi nyɛ fudi kĩ futeĩ nɛ boe akũ, mɔ tɔkpa a kĩ tɛmanɛ nɛ boe akũ buwula, lɔkɔa buwula atsɛ a kĩ ɛwaa nɛ boe lɔtɔ a mɔ kɔnɛyɔɔlɛ.

Mifɔ̃ bɔkɔa anɛ bute nɛ Yesu akũ daa, oti a kĩ ye akũ boe katɛkado dzɛ̃ a, kito kayɔkayi kɛnawo kawũna a. Kĩ enyina kawɔlɛ a kĩ kadzɔlɛ ye a sũ ni, edo ɔwɔlɛ ɛmɔ́ lubo nɛ asendua akũ, ade ɛtábu asendua akũ wuda kɔnyɔã lɛtsama a. Lɛmɛ finyaa ɛnɛ edzi nɛ Baguma lɛgãkpo a sɔmɔna.
Mikɔna lɛtsa a kĩ de kamɛ Yesu tsã ɛtɛ̃ a, mɔ ayekĩ ɛmɔ́ lubo kĩ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ yidza bɛdza nɛ ye akũ pii a midã. Nɛ foesũ mitafɔ̃ akpɔ liveli mi mimuniki nɛ ye liti.
Kitonɛkĩ nɛ mi kanɔ mɔ tɔkpa kamɛ a, mitánɔ miwo tɔ̃ awã kĩ baako mi babɔanɛ nɛ tite.
Mbɔɛɛ milɛla ɔwɔlɛ kado fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Baguma abi mi ndɛ ye babi a? Ade foe nyɛ kĩ,
“Yĩ obi, ntɛ Ɔlate a vɛlɛ nɔ sɔtɔ ni, tabu foe fɔtsa kabii.
Ntɛ ɛkã nɔ anɛ ni, tafɔ̃ fɔha nɔ ɔwɔlɛ.
Kitonɛkĩ oti a kĩ boe Ɔlate awɛ kalɛ ni,
ade ye yavɛlɛ sɔtɔ a.
Ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ ye tibi ni,
yavɛlɛ ye sɔtɔ.”
Ntɛ miamɔ sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ lubo ni, mido ɔwɔlɛ. Mi lubo kamɔ a atsa kĩ Baguma lamɛna mi kavɛlɛ ndɛ ye babi aye. Obisɛ̃ odi deĩ kĩ ɔlɛga lávɛlɛ ye sɔtɔ?
Ntɛ baávɛlɛ mi ndɛ ayekĩ yavɛlɛ ye babi flee a ni, fɔatsa kĩ minyɛ́ ye babi kpanunu a, mbom minyɛ oti bɛbã babi.
Fukĩ fubu nyɛ kĩ budeĩ tite akũ balɛga kĩ bavɛlɛ boe sɔtɔ, lɛmɛ bɔakɔa obu kakpa be. Nde sũ bɔláadɔla boe akũ bɔkpa boe hũhũ Ɔlɛga pii fɔba lɔkɔa budzi nkpã?
Boe balɛga a avɛlɛ boe sɔtɔ lɔkɔ lukũ odi ndɛ ayekĩ fɔnɛnɛ be. Lɛmɛ Baguma kɔ̃ akɛna foe nɛ boe kalɛ sũ, ayekĩ bɔ́anya bati kpalɛwa ndɛ ye aye.
Ntɛ bavɛlɛ boe sɔtɔ a, fɔawo boe kalɔɛ nɛ lɔkɔ a kamɛ, ade kawɔlɛ láde boe a. Lɛmɛ ke liti a, fɔafɔ̃ be a kĩ bɛvɛlɛ be a akɛna bati kpĩĩ, kana lukudɔ nɛ nkpã kamɛ.
Foesũ mido akpɔ a kĩ ɛdɔ a, mɔ mi aduli a kĩ ɛdɔũdɔũ kɔbɛ̃.
Mikaatsã tisi yedede akũ ayekĩ oti kĩ ɛnɛ lɛkpɛ̃ a kɔbɔa lɛláatɛ̃ ye, mbom kĩ yaana fɔsɔ katsa.
Mibɔa mbɔdi kĩ míadzi nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ mɔ odi nyɛ odi, midzi nkpã kĩ ɛkpalɛ, kitonɛkĩ odi kĩ ɛtákpalɛ lɛláapuli ɛmɔ́ɔ boe Ɔlate a.
Midã kadã wĩ kĩ mitáyɛla Baguma kɔnyakamɔ a. Mitafɔ̃ odima lɛkɛna ndɛ tuwĩ mɔ ɔnyɛ tibo anɛ, tido ɔhau mɔ efĩĩ nɛ bati pii kamɛ.
Mitafɔ̃ odima lɛkɛna adɔpaa, ĩye ɛkɛna oti kĩ enyína Baguma ndɛ Esau, kĩ ɛnɔ ye tibinyole lɔnɔkɔɛ̃ ɛtɛ funitsã sɔɔdaɛ mɔapɛ a.
Ndɛ ayekĩ minyina a, ke liti a Esau wɛ kĩ ɔlɛga ɛkpa ye nhila a, lɛmɛ ɛtákpa ye, ade titɔ kĩ ɛkɔa kabe ɛwɛ kĩ yadani lɛtsa a kĩ ɛkɛna a malo ni, ɛtána foe akũ osi.
Nnɛ́ Sinai ɔtɔ a kĩ oti aapuli ɛkɔa awɛ ɛta a sɛkɛ̃ miya. Fɔlá ndɛ ayekĩ Israelfɔ mɔ́ fi gɛĩgɛĩ katɛ̃ nɛ ye akũ, kĩ ɔtũ ke, fɔkɛna kusuu, ade ɔwɛ kpale kavũ a,
mɔ kĩ binu kagbulɛɛ kavɔ̃ mɔ odo a kĩ ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla a. Kĩ odo a nɛ a, bike aduli kĩ oti a ɛtabuki ɛlɛ kalɛ kadima ebu.
Kitonɛkĩ bɛtápuli bɛdza nɛ mbla a kĩ bisi a onukpɛ̃ kĩ, “Ntɛ ɔyaɛ malo lɛta ɔtɔ a ni, kɛnɛ kĩ bɛtalɛ ye boe bɛkɔ.”
Lɛtsa a kĩ bɛmɔ́ a deĩ libe paa kĩ Mose malo lɛ kĩ, “Libe wo yĩ, nkatila bliblibli!”
Lɛmɛ mi kɔ̃ ni, Zion ɔtɔ a sɛkɛ̃ miya, Baguma kĩ edzi nkpã a ɔmatɔ kpale kĩ ɛnyɛ ode Yerusalem. Miya nɛ ye ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ mpim mpim a ɔmatɔ kamɛ.
Miyawo nɛ Baguma babi batɔnyade a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ be buĩ nɛ ode kawɔlɛ katsɛna a kamɛ. Miya nɛ Baguma kĩ ɛnyɛ batidziwa flee fɔlɛtsa ɔdzɛnɛ, mɔ bati wĩ a kĩ bɛkɛna be hũhũ bɛkpɔla a sɛkɛ̃.
Miya nɛ Yesu kĩ ɛnyɛ apam vɔɛ̃ a ɔkplanɛ sɛkɛ̃, mɔ ye babɔanɛ a kĩ bɛsã a kĩ bɛdza bɛkpa bɔhɛ fɔtsa wĩ kaba Abel bade a.

Foesũ midã kadã wĩ kĩ mitásĩ oti a kĩ yalɛ kɔdzɛla a fɔlɛtsa katse. Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ bikĩ bisĩ bɛtátse oti a kĩ ɛlɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa nɛ tite akũ a tápuli bilo a ni, nde bɔ́apuli bulo ntɛ busĩ kĩ bɔátse oti a kĩ yalɛ kɔdzɛla katomɛna ode a?
Lɔkɔ a na kamɛ ni, ye odo kuna tite, lɛmɛ finyaa kɔ̃ ɛlɛ eyi kĩ, “Maakuna deedi bio, lɛmɛ nnɛ́ tite odi, mbom mɔ ode lɛmɛ.”
Fɔlɛtsa “deedi bio” a atsa pefee kĩ yaakuna fɔtsa a kĩ ɛbɔa a, ɛwɔla foe, lɛmɛ fɔtsa a kĩ ɛláakuna a aakahɔ.
Foesũ mifɔ̃ bɔnyɛ kɔlɛ kĩ lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kĩ kɛláakuna a ta boe awɛ. Mifɔ̃ bɔkɔa obu mɔ kavila busum Baguma ayekĩ fɔ́awo ye anɛ,
kitonɛkĩ boe Baguma a nyɛ fi kĩ fɔawɔla fɔtsa.
Mikaawɛ akũ kalɛ daa ndɛ Kristofɔ bawaɛ̃ aye.
Mite anɛ mikaatɛ banɔvɔɛ̃ nɛ mi awã. Badi kɛna foe lɔmɔ bɛtɛ ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ lɛmɛ binyína.
Mite anɛ nɛ bikĩ bɛwaa kɔla a akũ ndɛ mimɔ be waa kɔla. Mite anɛ nɛ bikĩ bamɔna be lubo akũ a ndɛ mimɔ be amɔ lubo.
Kɛnɛ kĩ mi flee mido obu nɛ kɔtsɔ̃ mɔ kɔnyɔ kadzi kamɛ, ade kɛnɛ kĩ batsɔ̃ mɔ banyɔ bidi ɔnɔkɔali bɛkpa akũ a. Baguma aadzɛmɔ bati a kĩ bɛtsɛ̃mɔ linyolewɛ mɔ litsolewɛ, mɔ bikĩ babɔa adɔpaa.
Minyɛ sika anɛngbã nɛ mi kadzi kamɛ, lɔkɔa fɔtsa a kĩ mideĩ fuwo mi anɛ. Kitonɛkĩ Baguma lɛ kĩ,
“Nláadzakũ nfɔnɛ nɔ,
ade nláafɔnɛ nɔ awɛ lɛmɛ a.”
Foesũ mifɔ̃ bɔna ɔwɔlɛ bɔlɛ kĩ,
“Boe Ɔlate nyɛ yĩ obumɛnanɛ, nláavila.
Litsa otidziwa aapuli ɛkɛna yĩ?”
Mite anɛ nɛ mi lɔtɔ banyanɛ kɔɛ a kĩ bide lɛtsã nɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa a akũ bɛkpa mi a akũ. Midã ayekĩ be kadzi kamɛ na, lɔkɔa mitomɔ be katɛkado.
Yesu Kristo mɔapɛ a lɛna kɔkɔɛ, edeĩ nviã kĩĩ, yaana daa.

Mitafɔ̃ fɔtsa vɔɛ̃ ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ katsa lɛkpã mi miyɛla osi wĩ a. Fɔnɛnɛ kĩ miatɛ ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kɔbɛ̃ mitomɛna Baguma kɔnyakamɔ kamɛ odi, kɛba kĩ míakɛna nɛ funitsã kanya tɛbla akũ, kitonɛkĩ fɔtábumɛna bikĩ bɛkɛna nɛ te akũ a.
Budeĩ afɔlibɔ atɛnyɛ kĩ Yudafɔ basɔfɔ a kĩ basum nɛ patampa kamɛ a lɛlá osi kĩ banya ye akũ afɔlibɔ lɛtsama.
Yudafɔ Ɔsɔfɔnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee a akɔa bayaɛ babɔanɛ kawomɛna nɛ Kakɔ Kpalɛwa Flee a kabɔa bati tɔkpa akũ afɔliɛ, lɛmɛ bapila bayaɛ sɛkɛna a nɛ katsɛnakɔ̃ a ɔbaɛ̃.
Ade fukĩĩ sũ Yesu lɛmɛ mɔ́ lubo eku nɛ ɔmatɔ a ɔbaɛ̃, ayekĩ yaakɔa ye mɔawɛ babɔanɛ ɛkpalɛ bati akũ.
Foesũ mifɔ̃ bɔnɛ bɔnaa ye sɛkɛ̃ nɛ ɔmatɔ a ɔbaɛ̃, bɔnaatɛ kɔnyɔã a kĩ bido ye a kudi.
Kitonɛkĩ bɔlá ɔmatɔ odima nɛ tite kĩĩ akũ kĩ yaawa daa, mbom ɔmatɔ a kĩ yaaya a liti osi bɔlamɛna kawɛ.
Foesũ mifɔ̃ bɔtsã Yesu akũ bɔkɔa kamu kĩ kɛla ndɛ afɔliɛ aye bɔkpa Baguma luwi nyɛ luwi. Ade foe nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lanɛ kato bikĩ babɔa ye dĩ ndɛ boe Ɔlate ayea tunukpɛ̃ a.
Mitalɛla fɔtsa wĩ kakɛna mɔ mi bawaɛ̃ fɔtsa kakpa, kitonɛkĩ ade fukĩĩ nyɛ afɔliɛ kĩ yawo Baguma anɛ a.

Mibu mi lɔtɔ banyanɛ, midɔla akũ mikpa be lɛmɛ. Be adzɔlɛ mi tɛkla akũ daa, ndɛ bati kĩ baakɛna akunta bɛkpa Baguma nɛ be adzuma kakɛna a akũ. Foesũ ntɛ mikpa be obu ni, baakɛna ye mɔ kawɔlɛ, lɛmɛ ntɛ nnɛ́ aye ni, baakɛna ye mɔ tuko kabe kĩ fɔláanya libi fɔkpa mi.
Mikaabɔa mpaɛ nɛ boe lɔlɔ. Bɔtɛ budo kĩ boe tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kpalɛ, kitonɛkĩ bɔawɛ kĩ bɔakɛna fɔtsa wĩ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ.
Mibɔa mpaɛ kĩ Baguma ɛfɔ̃ mmuniki ĩya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ mɔatsɛ.
Baguma, lukudɔ ɔkpanɛ a kĩ ɛdzɛla boe Ɔlate Yesu kĩ ɛnyɛ Baveli Bakpãnɛ Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a etomɛna kanɔkpa ɛtsãmɛna apam babɔanɛ vɔɛ̃ a kĩ ɛlá kawũna kamɛ a,
ɛkɔa lɛtsa wĩ lidi nyɛ lidi kĩ lisĩ mi ɛkpa mi, ayekĩ miakɛna nɛ ye kawɛ akũ. Ade mawã kĩ ɛtsã Yesu Kristo akũ ɛkɛna lɛtsa a kĩ yawɛ a nɛ boe kamɛ. Kukũkpalɛ kɔnya ye fude! Fɔya lɔmɔ.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, make mi aduli kĩ mina ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ mitse kɔdɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ, kitonɛkĩ ovoli a kĩ ntsɛlɛ mma mi a kamɛ fɔlɛtsa lɛ́la lugo.
Mawɛ kĩ makpa mi kanyi kĩ bɛnyɛ boe ɔwaɛ̃ Timoteo nɛ kɔla. Ntɛ ewo yĩ sɛkɛ̃ mɔatsɛ ni, bɔmɔ ye bɔ́ayasɛla mi.
Miwɔ̃na mi lɔtɔ banyanɛ a mɔ Baguma bade a flee mikpa boe. Boe bawaɛ̃ a kĩ bito Italia awɔ̃na mi.
Baguma ɛmɔ mi a flee kɔnya.
James: Ovoli kĩĩ to yĩ, Yakobo, Baguma mɔ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo ɔsumunɛ sɛkɛ̃. Ntsɛlɛ ye mama Yuda futete ewua-nviã a kĩ bɛgba biko nɛ katinya kamɛ flee a.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ntɛ miwo nɛ sɔhuiɛ ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ kamɛ malo ni, mitɛ foe mɔ kawɔlɛ baũ,
kitonɛkĩ minyina kĩ ntɛ bɛsɔ mi katɛkado bɛdã ni, fɔafɔ̃ miana kadza pintii mɔ ɔwɔlɛ kado.
Mifɔ̃ mi kadza pintii a kɛnyɛ ke akũ nɛ mi lɛkɛnana kamɛ, ayekĩ míanya bati kĩ be ɔbla kpɔla flee, kĩ bɛláabuki bisĩ lɛtsama.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ mi kamɛ odi sĩ nyansã ni, kɛnɛ kĩ evia Baguma, yaakpa ye, kitonɛkĩ Baguma akɛna sɛmɛ kalɛ faa kakpa odi nyɛ odi fɔtsa kĩ yaádã oti anɛ.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ yabɔa mpaɛ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ ɛtɛ edo, kĩ ɛtatɛ atsindze nɛ ye kamɛ. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yatɛ atsindze nɛ ye kamɛ ni, ɛla ndɛ mpo anɛ mui kpale kĩ ɔwɛ abɔa kato katɛ̃mɛna.
Oti a na odu kĩ ye adzuni adani mɔatsɛ mɔatsɛ, kĩ yaápuli kasipi nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ yakɛna a akũ ni, ɛtakɔna kĩ yaana litsedi etomɛna boe Ɔlate sɛkɛ̃.
Oti a na odu kĩ ye adzuni adani mɔatsɛ mɔatsɛ, kĩ yaápuli kasipi nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ yakɛna a akũ ni, ɛtakɔna kĩ yaana litsedi etomɛna boe Ɔlate sɛkɛ̃.
Okristoni ohiãni a kĩ Baguma dɛla nɛ ode ni, kɛnɛ kĩ epia ye akũ.
Ade ayea okristoni osikani kĩ Baguma kɛna nɛ kayɔ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ ye malo epia akũ. Kitonɛkĩ osikani nkpã aayatɛ̃ ndɛ ayekĩ fɔgbangbã akpalɛ katɔ a.
Ntɛ suwa de sɛta kɔɔba ni, sapila tuwĩ tavɛ, te fɔgbangbã a akpalɛ katɔ lɔkɔa tuwĩ a kalɛ ayɛla flefle. Ade aye osikani lɛmɛ aakapilipili nɛ ye tudzuma kamɛ flee ɛyaaku a.
Baguma hila oti a kĩ epuli edo ɔwɔlɛ nɛ sɔhuiɛ kamɛ. Ntɛ epuli ɛnya sɔhuiɛ a akũ ni, Baguma aakpa ye nkpã a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi ɛkpa bati a kĩ bawɛ ye kalɛ a.
Ntɛ odi wo nɛ sɔhuiɛ kamɛ ni, ɛtalɛ kĩ, “Baguma sɛkɛ̃ sɔhuiɛ kĩĩ to.” Kitonɛkĩ odima lɛláapuli ɛsɔ Baguma ɛdã kĩ ɛkɛna tɔkpa, ade ye mɔawɛ a lɛmɛ yaásɔ odima kadã a.
Mbom oti mɔawɛ sukɛna fɔwɛtsa akɛ ye, kavɛlɛ ye kado nɛ sɔhuiɛ kamɛ.
Lɔkɔa oti sukɛna fɔwɛtsa a atsamɔ kɔma kama tɔkpa, ade ntɛ tɔkpa a bo anɛ ni, tama wuda.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ kĩ maátunɔ kalɛ, mitafɔ̃ odima lɛkɛ mi.
Futetsa wĩ flee mɔ futelitsa a kĩ fɔkpɔla a fudi nyɛ fudi to ode. Foe flee futo Baguma a kĩ lɛbɔa ode tɛsɛdza a sɛkɛ̃. Ɛnyɛ oti kĩ yaádani ade lɛtsama lɛmɛ ládani ɔtũ nɛ ye akũ a.
Baguma kɔa ye mɔawɛ kawɛ ɛtsã ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a akũ, ɛma boe kĩ bɔna ye fɔtsa a kĩ ɛbɔa flee a kamɛ ɔtɔnyade.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ kĩ maátunɔ kalɛ, mite anɛ nɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ akũ! Odi nyɛ odi etse fɔlɛtsa mɔatsɛ, lɛmɛ ɛtawɛ sɔwa ɛlɛ kɔdzɛla mɔatsɛ mɔatsɛ ĩye ɛna kalɔkpa mɔatsɛ mɔatsɛ.
Kitonɛkĩ oti kalɔkpa láfɔ̃ yakɛna tuwĩ a kĩ Baguma awɛ kĩ ɛkɛna a.
Foesũ mifɔnɛ ɔbla kĩ yado efĩĩ mɔ ablɔ kakɛna flee awɛ. Midɔla mi akũ mikpa Baguma, ayekĩ míapuli mitɛ ye kalɛ a kĩ edu nɛ mi tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ a, kĩ kaafɔ̃ mina nkpã katɛ a.
Mitakatse Kalɛ Wĩ a kɛkɛ mikɔa mikakɛ mi akũ, mbom mikɛna nɛ ke akũ.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yatse kalɛ a lɛmɛ yaákɛna nɛ ke akũ ni, ɛla ndɛ oti kĩ ɛdã ahuhɔɛ kamɛ ɛmɔ́ ye akũ ndɛ ayekĩ ɛla a.
Yadã ye akũ, lɛmɛ mɔ ye kadzakũ pɛ ɛla ayekĩ ɛla a.
Lɛmɛ oti a kĩ yadã mbla a kĩ ɛkpɔla a, kĩ yakpa bati akũ akũ kadzi, mɔ yakɛna nɛ ye akũ a, kĩ ɛnyɛ́ oti kĩ yatse kalɛ a kɛkɛ kalɛla ke a ni, Baguma aahila ye nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ yakɛna a kamɛ.
Ntɛ odi kɔna kĩ yasum Baguma lɛmɛ yaápuli ɛnya ye sɛmɛ akũ ni, kakɛ ye akũ, ade ye ɔsum a lɛmɛ nyɛ fɔtsa pupulidza a.
Ɔsum a kĩ ɛkpalɛ, kĩ efĩĩ adima lɛmɛ lɛláa ye akũ a nɛ Baguma boe Ɔlɛga anɛ nyɛ bibumɛna banɔkpabi mɔ bakunawa nɛ be kasĩ kamɛ, kĩ bati bɛnyɛ be akũ nɛ katinya efĩĩ fɔtsa kamɛ.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ndɛ bati kĩ bɛtɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo, kĩ ɛnyɛ kukũkpalɛ Ɔlate a bido sũ ni, mitadã bati anɛ nɛ mi fɔtsa kakɛna kamɛ.
Mifɔ̃ bɔbɔɛ foe kĩ osikani sua lima wĩ akũ, edo sika lipetia, ɛya nɛ mi katsɛnakɔ̃, ade ohiãni odi lɛmɛ do tɛtadiɛ kpeliwa ɛya nɛ awã a.
Ntɛ mikpalɛ anɛ mido oti a kĩ edo fɔtsa wĩ, mibi ye kĩ, “Ɔnɔkɔɛ̃, yaadzi nɛ awĩ,” lɛmɛ mibi ohiãni a kɔ̃ kĩ, “Naadza nɛ akĩĩ!” ĩye “Kɛna akũ kadzi nɛ ɔda nɛ yĩ abɔa kayɔ!”
Ntɛ mikɛna foe lɔmɔ a, lɔkɔa fɔátsa kĩ adzuni kpa mikɔa miadzɛ mi fɔlɛtsa, kĩ miado ntsitsemu lɛmɛ nɛ mi kamɛ?

Nwaɛ̃ amɛ kĩ maátunɔ kalɛ, mitse katse wĩ! Nnɛ́ kapau Baguma pau katinya kĩĩ kamɛ ahiãfɔ kĩ bɛkɛna katɛkado kamɛ asikafɔ, bɛna kanyakɔ̃ nɛ ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi ɛkpa bati a kĩ bawɛ ye kalɛ a kamɛ?
Lɛmɛ mi miasupa ohiãni! Mbɔɛɛ nnɛ́ asikafɔ amɛnana mi, kavɛlɛ mi kanamɛna fɔlɛtsa badzɛnɛ anɛ?
Nnɛ́ asikafɔ alɛ tuwuli kpa kasupa dĩ wĩ a kĩ Baguma te mi a?
Ntɛ miakɛna nɛ ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ mbla a akũ ndɛ ayekĩ bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ ni, kekɔ̃ miakɛna fɔtsa wĩ. Lɛtsa a kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ a nyɛ kĩ, “Wɛ nɔ ɔkɔba kalɛ ndɛ ayekĩ awɛ nɔ akũ kalɛ a.”
Lɛmɛ ntɛ miadã bati anɛ ni, miakɛna tɔkpa, ade mbla a akɔ mi kɔtɔ ndɛ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ a.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛkɛna nɛ mbla a flee akũ, mɔ efum nɛ amɔapɛ akũ ni, efum te flee.
Kitonɛkĩ oti mɔapɛ a kĩ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Tanɛ kɔtsɔ̃ ĩye kɔnyɔ liti” a, ade ye lɛlɛ kĩ, “Takɔ oti” a. Foesũ ntɛ ɔtánɛ kɔtsɔ̃ ĩye kɔnyɔ liti malo, mɔ ɔkɔ oti ni, ofum mbla a.
Foesũ milɛ kɔdzɛla mikɛna fɔtsa ndɛ bati kĩ mbla a kĩ yakpa boe akũ akũ kadzi a, Baguma aakɔa ɛdzɛmɔ be.
Kitonɛkĩ nɛ kadzɛ kamɛ ni, Baguma lɛláamɔ okĩ ɛtámɔ ɔkɔba kɔnya a kɔnya. Lɛmɛ Baguma kɔnyakamɔ a lɛláadzɛmɔ ye.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ntɛ mi kamɛ odi lɛ kĩ edeĩ katɛkado mɔ ye lɛkɛnana lányɛ katsa lɔmɔ a, nfasɔ wɔdabe deĩ nɛ foe kamɛ? Ye katɛkado aapuli kɛkpa ye nkpã mbɔɛɛ?
Mifɔ̃ bɔbɔɛ foe kĩ boe bawaɛ̃nyole ĩye bawaɛ̃tsole badi deĩ kĩ bɛlá tilima ade bɛlá funitsã kĩ banya malo a.
Ntɛ ɔtákpa bati fɔtsa a kĩ fusĩ be a, litsa nfasɔ deĩ nɛ foe kamɛ ntɛ obi be kĩ, “Baguma ehila mi. Akũ ede mi ovio, mina funitsã minya.”
Ade ayea ntɛ odi deĩ katɛkado mɔ lɛkɛnana tábumɔ foe a, ye katɛkado a nyɛ fɔtsa pupulidza.
Lɛmɛ odi aalɛ kĩ, “Oti mɔa deĩ katɛkado, ade ɔbɛbã lɛmɛ akɛna adzuma a.”
Yĩ mbuayɛ nyɛ kĩ, “Nyɛ nɔ katɛkado a kĩ lɛkɛnana lɛláa foe kamɛ a katsa yĩ. Yĩ malo maatsã yĩ tuwĩ kakɛna kamɛ ĩnyɛ yĩ katɛkado ntsa.”
Ɔtɛ odo kĩ Baguma odi pɛ deĩ? Ɔnɔkɔali fɔanɛ. Hũhũ kpa lɛmɛ tɛ bido ade bavila katila nɛ ye anɛ a.
Ɔkɔasia anɛ! Awɛ kĩ ĩnyɛ ntsa nɔ kĩ katɛkado kĩ lɛkɛnana wĩ tábu nɛ foe kamɛ nyɛ fɔtsa pupulidza?
Nde fɔya fɔmɔ Baguma mɔ boe ɔwanyɔ Abraham kĩ ɛnyɛ oti kĩ ɛkpɔla? Fɔtsɛ̃ ye lɛkɛnana kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ ɛkɔa ye mɔawɛ obi Isak ɛnamɛna afɔlibɔ atɛnyɛ akũ kĩ yakɔa ye ɛbɔa afɔliɛ ɛkpa Baguma.
Mimɔ́ foe lɔmɔ? Ye katɛkado mɔ lɛkɛnana a kɛna adzuma fɔkpɔta, ade ye lɛkɛnana a fɔ̃ ye katɛkado a kpɔla a.
Ade Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa fɔlɛtsa a ya nɛ foe kamɛ kĩ, “Abraham tɛ Baguma edo, ade nɛ ye katɛkado sũ ni, Baguma mɔ ye kĩ ɛnyɛ oti kĩ ɛkpɔla.” Nɛ foesũ Baguma vɛ Abraham kĩ ye ɔkɔba.
Foesũ miamɔ kĩ fɔtsɛ̃ oti lɛkɛnana wĩ kamɛ ade Baguma amɔ ye kĩ ɛnyɛ oti kĩ ɛkpɔla, lɛmɛ fɔtsɛ́ ye katɛkado kamɛ odi.

Ade aye pɛpɛɛpɛ Baguma kɔna nɛ Rahab kĩ ɛbɔa adɔpaa a akũ a. Ɛmɔ́ kĩ ɛnyɛ oti kpalɛwa nɛ ye lɛkɛnana kamɛ. Lɛtsa a kĩ ɛkɛna nyɛ kĩ ɛtɛ Israelfɔ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kĩ bɛnabɛla bɛsɛla tite akũ bɛdã a, ade ebumɔ be bɛtsã osi bɛbã akũ bilo a.
Foesũ ndɛ ayekĩ sukɛna nyɛ fɔtsa kuwa ntɛ kawɛya lɛláa se kamɛ a, ade aye katɛkado lɛmɛ nyɛ fɔtsa kuwa ntɛ lɛkɛnana lɛláa foe kamɛ a.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mi kamɛ bati pii bɛtanya fɔtsa batsanɛ, kitonɛkĩ minyina kĩ boe a kĩ bɔatsa fɔtsa a ni, Baguma aadzɛmɔ boe mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ ɛba bati bɛbã.
Kitonɛkĩ boe flee bɔakɛna nfumusu pii. Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi táfum nɛ ye kɔdzɛla kalɛ kamɛ ni, ɛnyɛ oti kĩ ɛkpɔla ade yapuli kanya ye kutidu a flee akũ a.
Bɔado ɔpɔnkɔ sɔbɔtsaɛ nɛ onukpɛ̃ kamɛ kĩ ɛkɛna nɛ boe kawɛ akũ, kapuli kafɔ̃ yanaa awã kĩ bɔawɛ a.
Midã ɔkɔlɔ baũ lɛmɛ. Titɔ kĩ ɛpɔnɛ lububu, kĩ ɔwɛ mɔ ɔsĩ abɔa ye kanamɛna malo a ni, sɔbɔtsaɛ kabii bakɔa kadanidani ye, yanaa awã kĩ ye ɔtanɛ a awɛ kĩ ɛnaa a.
Ade aye sɛmɛ lɛmɛ la a. Titɔ kĩ sukɛna akũ lɛtsa kabii sanɛ malo a, sapia nɛ fɔtsa baũ baũ akũ.
Midã ayekĩ fi kabii kĩ fɔka fɔtɔ nɛ lupo baũ kamɛ apuli kapila de bubloo!
Sɛmɛ la ndɛ fi. Sɛmɛ dzɛ̃ ndɛ katinya kĩ tɔkpa kakɛna tɛ ke kamɛ. Nɛ sukɛna akũ fɔtsa a flee kamɛ ni, sɛmɛ ado oti mɔa a flee tuduli, kado fi nɛ bati kadzi kamɛ mɔ kĩ futo Abonsam fi luwotu kamɛ a.
Batidziwa apuli kadɔla bayaɛ, ade bapuli kadɔla lupo kamɛ bayaɛ kpa, kɔvɔlabi, bayaɛ kĩ baboli nɛ tite mɔ kɔfɔabi lɛmɛ a.
Lɛmɛ sɛmɛ kɔ̃ odima lɛláapuli ɛdɔla se. Sɛmɛ nyɛ lɛtsa kpa kĩ odima lápuli kadɔla, ade otsonu kĩ yakɔ bati yi sɛ kamɛ tɛtɛɛtɛ a.
Bɔakɔa sɛmɛ kamu boe Ɔlate mɔ Ɔlɛga, se mɔapɛ a bɔakɔa kadumu oti kĩ Baguma bɔa nɛ ye mɔawɛ kutidu akũ.
Onukpɛ̃ mɔapɛ a kamɛ nhila fɔlɛtsa mɔ fudumutsa flee anɛ kato. Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, kɛtánɛ kĩ fukĩĩ fɔna lɔmɔ!
Mui wĩ mɔ lɛdɛmɛ mui aapuli bɛnɛ nɛ lɔwɔkɛ mɔa kamɛ?
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, atɔ kutse aapuli kuwũ gowa babi, ĩye akateleku aapuli ewũ atɔ babi, mbɔɛɛ? Ade aye mɔ lɛdɛmɛ mui lɔwɔkɛ lɛláapuli lɛnyɛ mui wĩ a.
Mi kamɛ owei nyɛ nyansãni, kĩ yanu fɔlɛtsa kayɔ? Ɛkɔa ɔbla wĩ ɛnyɛ foe ɛtsa nɛ ye lɛkɛnana kamɛ, nɛ akũ kadɔla kĩ kito nyansã kamɛ.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ lineke kanɔ, kawũnaba mɔ yĩ odi fude fɔlɛ kawɛya deĩ nɛ mi tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ ni, mitama fɔvã nɛ ɔnɔkɔali a akũ, mipia nɛ mi nyansã akũ.
Nyansã kĩĩ odu táto ode, mbom katinya kamɛ ade yanɛ, ɛnyɛ́ hũhũ kamɛ ade, hũhũ kpa kamɛ eto.
Awã kĩ lineke kanɔ mɔ yĩ odi fude fɔlɛ deĩ ni, ade awã ɔtutũ mɔ tɔkpa tidi nyɛ tidi kakɛna ana a.

Lɛmɛ nyansã a kĩ eto ode a, ye lɛtsa a kĩ lɛnya lɔtɔ nyɛ kĩ ye akũ kpalɛ, yawɛ lukudɔ mɔ akũ kadɔla, edeĩ sɛmɛ kalɛ, kakɛna tɔwaɛ̃, yafɔ̃ banu oti kayɔ, yamɔ kɔnya, ade yawũ babi wĩ a. Yaádã oti anɛ, ade yaákɛna anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa a.
Bati a kĩ balɔla bati kayite ni, badu fudutsa nɛ lukudɔ kamɛ, ade foe babi nyɛ nkpã wĩ kadzi a.
Litsa avɛlɛ kawũ mɔ ɔdzɛ kado nɛ mi kamɛ? Nnɛ́ mi sukɛna fɔwɛtsa kpa a kĩ fɔanɔ mɔ a mi kamɛ futo?

Miawɛ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔakɔ mi odo, lɛmɛ miláapuli mina foe, nɛ foesũ miawɛ kĩ miakɔ oti. Anɛ ayɔɔla mi mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ nɛ fɔtsa akũ, lɛmɛ mi awɛ tata foe, nɛ foesũ miawɛ sɔwã kanɔ kawũ. Miána lɛtsa a kĩ miawɛ a, kitonɛkĩ miávia Baguma.
Ntɛ mivia Baguma fɔtsa ni, miána foe, kitonɛkĩ miavia foe mɔ adzuni kpa. Miavia fɔtsa a kĩ míakɔa mido mi mɔa odi akũ kawɔlɛ.
Mi bati kĩ miádi ɔnɔkɔali! Minyína kĩ ntɛ mibɔɛ katinya kamɛ tɔkɔba ni, mikɛna mi akũ Baguma bakesĩnɛ? Foesũ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yawɛ kĩ yanya katinya kamɛ ɔkɔba kɛna ye akũ Baguma okesĩnɛ.
Miakɔna kĩ pupulidza bɛtsɛlɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a kamɛ kĩ, “Hũhũ a kĩ Baguma do nɛ boe kamɛ a anɔ mɔ boe sukɛna fɔwɛtsa a lineke.”
Lɛmɛ Baguma amɔ boe kɔnya pii, ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Baguma asua bati a kĩ bata akũ osi, lɛmɛ yamɔ bati a kĩ badɔla be akũ a kɔnya.”
Nɛ foesũ mifɔnɛ mi akũ awɛ mikpa Baguma. Misua Abonsam osi, lɔkɔa yaalo nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃.
Mifuãmɔ Baguma, lɔkɔa ye malo yaafuã mi. Mi tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ, mivɔlɛ awɛ! Mi anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa bakɛnanɛ, mikpalɛ mi tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ.
Miwo ɔblɔ, mitɛ kalɔɛ, mibe lɛmɛ. Mifɔ̃ mi kamɛmɛ kɛdani ayɔlɔhɔ kabe, mi kawɔlɛkamɔ lɛmɛ kɛdani ɔblɔ kawo.
Midɔla mi akũ nɛ boe Ɔlate anɛ lɔkɔa yaadɛla mi nɛ ode.

Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mitalɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩ fɔtáfɛta nɛ mi akũ akũ. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yalɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩ fɔtáfɛta nɛ ye ɔwaɛ̃ okristoni akũ, ĩye yadzɛmɔ ɔwaɛ̃ ni, yalɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩ fɔtáfɛta nɛ mbla a akũ, ade yadzɛ mɔ mbla a. Ntɛ ɔdzɛmɔ mbla a ni, obuki ɔnyɛ́ oti kĩ yakɛna nɛ mbla a akũ, mbom oti kĩ yadzɛmɔ mbla a.
Baguma odi nyɛ mbla a ɔkpanɛ mɔ ye fɔlɛtsa ɔdzɛnɛ. Ye odi keĩ aapuli ɛkpa nkpã ĩye ɛwɔla ye. Owei anɛ kĩ adzɛmɔ nɔ ɔkɔba?
Finyaa mitse, mi a kĩ mialɛ kĩ, “Nviã ĩye kunya bɔ́anaa ɔmatɔ kpale kĩĩ ĩye okĩ a kamɛ, budzi nɛ awã kateli mɔa bɔnya kɔyaatɔ bɔna nfasɔ.”
Minyína ayekĩ mi nkpã aana nɛ kunya kamɛ malo! Mi nkpã, litsa yanɛ? Mila ndɛ luflututu kĩ laka kako nɛ lɔkɔ lukũ kamɛ kabuki kayɛla.
Lɛtsa a kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ mialɛ nyɛ kĩ, “Ntɛ boe Baguma tunɔ mɔ budeĩ nkpã ni, bɔ́akɛna fukĩĩ ĩye fukĩ nɛ akĩĩ.”
Lɛmɛ finyaa miata akũ kapia akũ. Akũ kata kĩĩ flee nyɛ tɔkpa.
Foesũ odi nyɛ odi kĩ enyina tuwĩ kakɛna mɔ yaákɛna te ni, fɔnyɛ tɔkpa fɔkpa ye.
Finyaa mi a kĩ mideĩ akũ a, mibe, mibɔa fɔwɔla nɛ lubo kamɔ a kĩ laya nɛ mi akũ a sũ.
Mi akũ kana fɔtsa a titi, ade fupuka ba mi tɛtadiɛ a.
Mi sika ngbã mɔ sika ovoe dzi nkandɔlɔ, ade nkandɔlɔ kĩĩ aadi adansiɛ etia mi, ɛba mi sukɛna ndɛ fi aye a. Mikpɔta akũ kana fɔtsa miyi akũ nɛ fuwi nkaɛ kĩĩ kamɛ.

Lɛmɛ midã! Mitáse bati a kĩ bɛkɛna adzuma nɛ mi fɔba kamɛ a kɔtɔ kudima. Mitse be kabe! Kɔtɔ a kĩ misisi mitáse apaafɔ a kĩ bɛnɛ fɔba bɛkpa mi mi a lamɔ mi onukpɛ̃ katsua mɔ fɔwɔla. Bati a kĩ bakpɔta mi fɔba kamɛ fudutsa a kabe wo boe Ɔlate Asafu Yehowa atɔ kamɛ.
Mikɔa fɔtsa a kĩ fɔatɛ kɔya mido mi akũ kawɔlɛ beblebee, midɔli ndɛ bayaɛ aye mikpa luwi a kĩ baakɔ mi a.
Mikɔ́ oti wĩ a kɔtɔ, ade titɔ kĩ ɛtápili mɔ mi malo a, mikɔ ye.
Foesũ nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mina ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ kɛnaawo lɔkɔ a kĩ boe Ɔlate a aaya. Midã ayekĩ okuani a kĩ edzi yadzɔlɛ funitsã mɔ kɔya a kĩ ye tite akpa a, ana ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ kadzɔlɛ oni kako nɛ kanɔde mɔ kɔtsɛ lɔkɔ.
Mi malo kɛnɛ kĩ mina ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ lɔmɔ, mido ɔwɔlɛ, kitonɛkĩ boe Ɔlate kaya luwi a wo ɔtɔ liyua.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mitakɔa mi ɔhau mite nɛ mi bawaɛ̃ akũ mɔ Baguma aadzɛmɔ mi. Midã Ɔdzɛnɛ a dzɛ̃ nɛ onyukpɛ̃!
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mikai Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a kĩ bide lɛtsã nɛ boe Ɔlate dĩ akũ a akũ. Mifɔ̃ ayekĩ bido ɔwɔlɛ bɛmɔ́ lubo a fɔnya nfantuhũ fɔkpa mi.
Bɔabu bati kĩ bado ɔwɔlɛ nɛ lubo kamɔ kamɛ kĩ kawɔlɛ bati. Minu ayekĩ Hiob do ɔwɔlɛ, mɔ lɛtsa a kĩ Baguma kɛna ɛkpa ye nɛ kawũna kamɛ a. Oti fɔlɛtsa api boe Ɔlate a nɛ sɛmɛ, ade yamɔ oti kɔnya a.

Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, yĩ kalɛ titiliwu nyɛ kĩ mitatani fɔtsa nɛ nhihiɛ adi kakɛna kamɛ. Mitatani ode, ĩye tite, ĩye lɛtsama. Ntɛ kalɛ a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali ni, milɛ kĩ, “Oo”, ntɛ kɛnyɛ́ ɔnɔkɔali ni, milɛ kĩ, “Oowo”, ayekĩ Baguma lɛláakɔ mi kɔtɔ.
Ntɛ mi kamɛ odi deĩ nɛ ɔhau kamɛ ni, ɛbɔa mpaɛ ɛkpa Baguma. Ntɛ kawɔlɛ de mi kamɛ odi ni, ɛsã tɔnɔ emu Baguma.
Ntɛ mi kamɛ odi asɔ ni, ɛvɛ asɔli banɔkɔɛ̃ a bɛyaabɔa mpaɛ bɛkpa ye, lɔkɔa bɛtsɛla ye kugua nɛ boe Ɔlate a dĩ akũ.
Mpaɛ kĩ bɔbɔa nɛ katɛkado kamɛ a, aafɔ̃ ɔsɔnɛ a lɛsaɛ. Boe Ɔlate a aafɔ̃ ɛna akũ ɔsĩ, ade ntɛ ɛkɛna tɔkpa tidi malo ni, Baguma aakɔa ete ye.
Nɛ foesũ mibinya mi tɔkpa kamɛ mitsa mi akũ akũ, mibɔa mpaɛ mikpa akũ, ayekĩ míana kasaɛ. Oti kĩ edzi kpĩĩ mpaɛbɔ deĩ kɔbɛ̃ kĩ kɔapuli kakɛna fɔtsa pii.
Eliya nyɛ otidziwa ndɛ boe aye, ade kĩ ɛbɔa mpaɛ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ oni ɛtako a, oni táko nɛ tite futeli ɛlalɛ mɔ sɛkɛ.
Ke liti a, ebuki ɛbɔa mpaɛ ade Baguma fɔ̃ oni ko tite nyɛ funitsã a.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ, ntɛ mi kamɛ odi muniki nɛ katɛkado a liti, mɔ oti bɛbã buki ɛkpã ye ɛyamɛna ni,
mite anɛ kĩ oti a kĩ ɛnyɛ tɔkpa ɔkɛnanɛ a nɛ osi kpa akũ, aafɔ̃ bɛnyɛ tɔkpa ɔkɛnanɛ a nkpã nɛ wuda awɛ, ɛna ye tɔkpa beblebee a kakɔa kate.
I Peter: Ovoli kĩĩ to yĩ, Petro, Yesu Kristo fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ sɛkɛ̃. Ntsɛlɛ ye mamɛna bati a kĩ Baguma pau, kĩ bɛgba biko ndɛ banɔvɔɛ̃ aye nɛ Ponto, Galatia, Kapadokia, Asia mɔ Bitinia amantam kamɛ a.
Baguma boe Ɔlɛga pau mi ndɛ ayekĩ ehihiɛ eyi a, ade ye Hũhũ a kpalɛ mi akũ kĩ míakɔa obu mikpa Yesu Kristo, lɔkɔa ɛkɔa ye babɔanɛ ɛvɔlɛ mi akũ.
Baguma ɛmɔ mi kɔnya, ɛfɔ̃ lukudɔ lɛpɔ nɛ mi kamɛ daa.
Mifɔ̃ bumu Baguma, boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo Ɔlɛga a! Nɛ ye kɔnyakamɔ beblebee a sũ ɛkpa boe nkpã vɔɛ̃ ɛtsãmɛna Yesu Kristo kadzɛla katomɛna kanɔkpa kamɛ. Fukĩĩ fɔ̃ budeĩ kɔnɛte a kĩ kɔkpɔla.
Lɛtsa a kĩ boe anɛ teĩ kĩ boe awɛ aata nyɛ adzapadiɛ mɔ kɔya a kĩ Baguma manɛ eyi ɛkpa ye bati nɛ ode, awã kĩ yaávɔ̃, yaábu kade ade yaátsɛ lɛmɛ a.
Mi a kĩ mitɛ Kristo mido, kĩ bɛkɔa Baguma kɔbɛ̃ bɛmanɛ mi, kĩ Baguma aakpa mi nkpã nɛ luwi nkaɛ akũ a, ade mi lá adzapadiɛ kĩĩ a.
Mimɔ kawɔlɛ nɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ akũ, titɔ kĩ nɛ lɔkɔ lukũ kamɛ malo, míamɔ lubo nɛ sɔhuiɛ ahɔlɔ ahɔlɔ pii kamɛ,

ayekĩ baadã ntɛ mi katɛkado a sipi. Sika ngbã kĩ sapuli kawɔ malo, basɔ se kadã nɛ fi kamɛ. Ade aye kɛnɛ kĩ bɛsɔ mi katɛkado a kĩ kɛtɛ kɔya kɛba sika a bɛdã ayekĩ kɛna daa, lɔkɔa baamu mi, bɛkpa mi kukũkpalɛ mɔ obu nɛ Luwi a kĩ Yesu Kristo aaya a akũ.
Titɔ kĩ mitámɔ ye malo a, miawɛ ye kalɛ, ade kĩ miámɔ ye finyaa malo a, mitɛ ye mido, ade miamɔ kawɔlɛ wĩ kadi kĩ oti lɛláapuli ɛlɛ.
Ayekĩ mitɛ Kristo mido a sũ, Baguma kpa mi tɛkla nkpã.
Ade nkpã kĩĩ akũ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a dzi bɛkɔna, bɛwɛ fɔlɛtsa kamɛ yededeede, ade bɛlɛ biyi ayekĩ Baguma aamɔ mi kɔnya, ɛkpa mi nkpã a.
Bɛbɔa mbɔdi bɛwɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ fɔ́aya mɔ ayekĩ fɔ́aya nɛ foe kamɛ a. Ade fukĩĩ nyɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ Kristo Hũhũ nɛ be kamɛ a katsa ayekĩ Kristo aamɔ lubo, mɔ kukũkpalɛ a kĩ kɔ́atomɔ koe a.

Baguma nyɛ ɛtsa onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a kĩ nnɛ́ be kalɛ sũ bɛkɛna adzuma, mbom nɛ mi kalɛ sũ. Bɛlɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ finyaa fɔtɔ banyanɛ a tsã Hũhũ Kpalɛwa kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ Baguma do etomɛna ode a akũ, bide lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ. Ade fukĩĩ nyɛ fɔtsa a kĩ Baguma ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ malo wɛ kĩ banu kayɔ kufɛ a.
Nɛ foesũ mina nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ mikpa adzuma kakɛna, mipi mi akũ kapi wĩ. Mikɔa anɛ flee mite nɛ nhila a kĩ Baguma aakpa mi nɛ luwi a kĩ Kristo aaya a akũ.
Ndɛ babi kĩ babu Baguma ni, mitafɔ̃ sukɛna fɔwɛtsa kpa a kĩ fɔna nɛ mi kamɛ nɛ kadikatanyi kamɛ kɔkɔɛ a lɛnya mi akũ.
Ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma a kĩ ɛvɛ mi a nyɛ oti kpalɛwa a, ade aye kɛnɛ kĩ mi malo mianya bati kpalɛwa nɛ mi fɔtsakɛlawa fudi nyɛ fudi kamɛ a.
Kitonɛkĩ Baguma lɛ nɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Minya bati kpalɛwa, kitonɛkĩ oti kpalɛwa manɛ.”
Ntɛ miavɛ Baguma a kĩ yaádã oti anɛ ade yadzɛmɔ odi nyɛ odi nɛ ye lɛkɛnana onukpɛ̃ a kĩ boe Ɔlɛga nɛ mi mpaɛ kamɛ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ miavila ye nɛ mi fuwi nkaɛ kamɛ nɛ tite kĩĩ akũ.
Kitonɛkĩ minyina kĩ nnɛ́ sika ngbã ĩye sika ovoe a kĩ savɔ̃ Baguma kɔa ese kɔtɔ nɛ mi lɔlɔ, ɛnyɛ mi nɛ nkpã pupulidza kadzi a kĩ mi bawanyɔ kɔa biyi mi a kamɛ,
mbom Kristo babɔanɛ mɔ kɔya paa a ɛkɔa ɛtɛ mi. Kristo la ndɛ kavelibi kĩ kɛkpɔla ade mfumsu lɛmɛ lɛláa ke akũ a.
Baguma pau ye eyi fɔmɔ ɛbɔa katinya, ade ɛnyɛ ye ɛtsa nɛ fuwi nkaɛ kĩĩ kamɛ nɛ mi sũ.
Mitsã Kristo akũ mitɛ Baguma a kĩ ɛdzɛla ye etomɛna kanɔkpa, edo ye obu lɛmɛ a mido. Nɛ foesũ mi katɛkado mɔ kɔnɛte deĩ nɛ Baguma kamɛ.
Finyaa kĩ mitɛ ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a, mitsã ke kamɛ mikpalɛ mi akũ, ade miawɛ mi bawaɛ̃ Kristofɔ kalɛ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ a, kɛnɛ kĩ miakɔa mi tɔwɔlɛ flee miwɛ akũ kalɛ papaapa.
Baguma kalɛ a kĩ kideĩ nkpã, kĩ kɛlá kawũna a akũ fɔtsã mɔ Baguma kpa mi nkpã vɔɛ̃, mikɛna ndɛ oti a kĩ yaáku a babi. Lɛmɛ nnɛ́ ekĩ yaku a babi mianɛ.
Ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ,
“Batidziwa flee la ndɛ tuwĩ aye
ade be kahɛhɛ flee la ndɛ nhuilɛ a.
Tuwĩ avɛ ade te nhuilɛ a awili.
Lɛmɛ boe Ɔlate kalɛ a kɔ̃ waa daa.”
Ade kalɛ kĩĩ nyɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a kĩ ke akũ bide lɛtsã bɛkpa mi a.
Nɛ foesũ mifɔ̃ tɔkpa tidi nyɛ tidi odu kakɛna. Mifɔ̃ fɔvã kama mɔ anɛ kamɛ kɛkɛ fɔtsa kakɛna, mɔ anɛngbã mɔ bati buĩ kanyɛ.
Miwɛ Baguma ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a ndɛ ayekĩ akɔkɔa awɛ tɛmɛ mui luwi daa, ayekĩ míabo anɛ nɛ mi nkpã katɛ kamɛ.
Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ, “Mi mɔawɛ mita onukpɛ̃ midã, mimɔ ayekĩ boe Ɔlate a deĩ sɛmɛ kalɛ.”
Nɛ foesũ mifuã miya nɛ boe Ɔlate a sɛkɛ̃. Ade ye nyɛ nkpã kɔla kake de a kĩ bati sĩ kĩ lɛnyɛ fɔtsa pupulidza, lɛmɛ ade de Baguma nyɛ kĩ lɛtɛ kɔya nɛ ye anɛ a.

Mi malo mila ndɛ kɔla kake nkpã boe, foesũ miya Baguma ɛkɔa mi eke hũhũ kamɛ afɔliɛ kɔla. Ade kɔla kĩĩ kamɛ míasum ndɛ basɔfɔ kpalɛwa kĩ bɛbɔa hũhũ kamɛ afɔliɛ kĩ yawo Baguma anɛ bɛtsãmɛna Yesu Kristo akũ bɛkpa Baguma.
Kitonɛkĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ,
“Midã! Ĩnyɛ kɔla akũ de titiliwu a,
nkɔa de mayi nɛ Zion.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ ye edo ni,
kɔnyɔã lɛláawo ye da.”
Foesũ mi a kĩ mitɛ mido a ni, de kĩĩ tɛ kɔya paa lɛkpa mi, lɛmɛ bikĩ bɛtátɛ bido a kɔ̃ ni, binyi kĩ,
“De a kĩ kɔla bakenɛ sĩ a,
ade de lɛyadani okonto akũ de
kĩ lisĩ lɛba flee a.”
Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a fɔlɛtsa bɛbã lɛmɛ lɛ kĩ,
“Ade de a kĩ laafɔ̃ bati litula a,
de kpale kĩ laafɔ̃ bati lɛnɛ bɛtɔ.”
Bitula bɛtɔ kitonɛkĩ bɛtátɛ ye kalɛ a bido. Baguma awɛ lihihiɛ foe lɔmɔ eyi ɛkpa be.

Lɛmɛ mi kɔ̃ kade a kĩ Baguma pau, lɛgãkanya basɔfɔ, ɔmaĩ kpalɛwa, mɔ bati kĩ Baguma kɔa ɛkɛna ye bade mianɛ. Baguma vɛ mi etomɛna ɔtũ kamɛ ɛyamɛna nɛ ye awãwã ɔhaĩ a kamɛ, kĩ mide lɛtsã nɛ ye awãwã fɔtsa a akũ.
Nɛ lɔkɔ lidi kĩ lɛtɛ̃ kamɛ ni, mitánya Baguma ɔmaĩ, lɛmɛ finyaa minyɛ ye ɔmaĩ. Nɛ kɔkɔ lɔkɔ lidi kamɛ ni, Baguma támɔ mi kɔnya, lɛmɛ finyaa ɛmɔ mi kɔnya.
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ bawɛnɛ, ndɛ banɔvɔɛ̃ mɔ basitsãnɛ nɛ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ ni, mitakɛna nɛ sukɛna fɔwɛtsa kpa a kĩ fɔakɔ odo kayidza kadza nɛ mi akũ a.
Mibɔa ɔbla wĩ nɛ amamufɔ a kamɛ, ayekĩ ntɛ bɛlɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ mi akũ kĩ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ mianɛ malo ni, ke liti, baamɔ adzuma wĩ a kĩ mikɛna, lɔkɔa baamu Baguma nɛ ye kaya Luwi a akũ.
Nɛ boe Ɔlate sũ ni, midɔla mi akũ mikpa batidziwa a kĩ bidzina nɛ mbla onukpɛ̃. Midɔla mi akũ mikpa Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ Flefle a kĩ lideĩ otumi lɛbɛ̃ flee a.
Midɔla akũ lɔmɔ lɛmɛ mikpa abãã banɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ a ado kĩ bɛyaavɛlɛ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ a sɔtɔ, bimu bati a kĩ bakɛna tuwĩ a lɛmɛ.
Kitonɛkĩ Baguma kawɛ nyɛ kĩ mikɔa tuwĩ kakɛna midina fɔkɔasiatsa a kĩ bati alɛ nɛ mi akũ nɛ kadikatanyi kamɛ a.
Midzi nkpã ndɛ bati kĩ bidzi be akũ akũ aye, lɛmɛ mitakɔa akũ akũ kadzi a mikɛna ndɛ tɔkpa kakɛna osi kana, mbom midzi nkpã ndɛ Baguma basate aye.
Mikɔa obu mikpa odi nyɛ odi. Miwɛ mi bawaɛ̃ batɛ badonɛ kalɛ. Mivila Baguma. Mikɔa obu mikpa Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ Flefle a lɛmɛ.
Mi basumunɛ, midɔla mi akũ mikpa mi balate, mikɔa obu flee mikpa be. Nnɛ́ mi balate a kĩ bɛdɔ, bideĩ sɛmɛ kalɛ a odi kɛnɛ kĩ miakpa obu, mbom mibu bikĩ bideĩ sɛmɛ ɔnyɛ a lɛmɛ.
Ntɛ odi lamɔ lubo a kĩ lɛtáfɛta kĩ ɛmɔ kamɔ, lɛmɛ nɛ Baguma sũ edo ɔwɔlɛ ɛmɔ lubo ni, Baguma aahila ye.
Ntɛ mikɛna fɔtsa kpa mɔ mido ɔwɔlɛ mitɛ sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ a ni, kamu kawɔdabe deĩ nɛ foe kamɛ? Lɛmɛ ntɛ mikɛna tuwĩ mɔ mido ɔwɔlɛ mimɔ́ lubo nɛ foe kamɛ ni, Baguma aahila mi.
Ade fukĩĩ sũ Baguma vɛ mi a, kitonɛkĩ Kristo mɔawɛ a malo mɔ́ lubo nɛ mi lɔlɔ, ɛkɔa foe ɛtsa mi nfantuhũ kĩ míatsã ye abɔa kakekɔ̃.
“Ɛtákɛna tɔkpa tidima,
ade ɛtákɛ odima lɛmɛ a.”
Kĩ bivũna ye a, ɛtávũna odima ese kɔtɔ. Kĩ bɛmɔna ye lubo a, ɛtáhũnahũna odima, mbom ɛkɔa anɛ ete nɛ Baguma a kĩ yadzɛ fɔlɛtsa nɛ osi kpĩĩ akũ a akũ.
Kristo mɔawɛ lɛlɔ boe tɔkpa nɛ ye sukɛna kamɛ ɛnamɛna asendua a akũ, ayekĩ bɔ́anɛ nɛ tɔkpa kɔbɛ̃ kayɔ, budzi nkpã bɔkɛna tuwĩ. Ɛkɔa fɔɔkpa a kĩ ɛtɛ a ɛtsa mi fɔsɔ.
Kɔkɔɛ a, mina ndɛ baveli kĩ bɛyɛla osi, lɛmɛ finyaa Baguma muniki mi miya nɛ mi Baveli Ɔkpãnɛ kĩ ɛnyɛ mi Akũ Ɔdãmɛnanɛ sɛkɛ̃.
Ade ayea mi batsɔ̃ midɔla mi akũ mikpa mi banyɔ, ayekĩ ntɛ be kamɛ badi tátɛ Baguma kalɛ a bido malo ni, mi ɔbla wĩ aafɔ̃ bɛtɛ bido. Ade fɔláasĩ malo kĩ miabinya onukpɛ̃ milɛ kadima,
kitonɛkĩ baamɔ ayekĩ mi ɔbla kabɔa nɛ Baguma kavila kamɛ kpalɛ mi akũ.
Mi kalɛkadã kɛtana nɛ sukɛna kalɔla ndɛ tɔlɔ kasui, sika ngbã fɔtsa kado, mɔ tilima kĩ tɛtɛ kɔya kadzi kamɛ.
Mbom mi kalɛkadã a kɛna nɛ hũhũ kĩ ɛdɔ, yadã dĩĩ kamɛ, ade ɛnya lɛtsa a kĩ lɛláawɔ lɛmɛ a. Tiyitsɔ̃ kĩĩ odu tɛ kɔya paa nɛ Baguma anɛ.
Nɛ kɔkɔɛ a, batsole kpalɛwa a kĩ bɛkɔa anɛ bite nɛ Baguma akũ a, dɔla be akũ bɛkpa be banyɔ, ade fɔnya akũ kakɛɛlɛ fɔkpa be a.
Ade aye Sara dɔla ye akũ ɛkpa Abraham a, ade ɛvɛ ye kĩ, “Yĩ Ɔlate” a. Finyaa mi malo midani Sara babitsole, ntɛ miakɛna tuwĩ mɔ miávila lɛtsama.

Ade aye mi banyɔ lɛmɛ midzi mɔ mi batsɔ̃ nɛ akũ kayɔkanu kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ mi batsɔ̃ lɛlá kɔbɛ̃ ndɛ mi aye. Mikpa be obu kitonɛkĩ mimɔ be flee Baguma mɔ́ kɔnya kĩ míadzi nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna. Ntɛ miakɛna foe lɔmɔ ni, lɛtsama lɛláasua mi mpaɛbɔ osi.
Nɛ kawũna kamɛ a ni, mi flee mina nɛ adzuni mɔa kamɛ, oti akũ ɛkɔ mi kɔnya, miwɛ akũ kalɛ, mikɛna sɛmɛ kalɛ midɔla akũ lɛmɛ mikpa mi akũ akũ.
Mitakɔa tɔkpa mise tɔkpa kɔtɔ, ĩye midumu mise kadumu kɔtɔ, mbom mivia nhila mikpa be, kitonɛkĩ kavɛ Baguma vɛ mi kĩ miyaana nhila.
Ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa lɛ a,
“Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yawɛ kĩ edzi nkpã wĩ
ɛmɔ fuwi wĩ ni,
tuwuli kpa tɛtanɛ tito ye onukpɛ̃
ade ɛtáma fɔvã lɛmɛ a.
Kɛnɛ kĩ ɛfɔ̃ tɔkpa kakɛna, ɛkɛna tuwĩ,
ɛbɔa mbɔdi ɛwɛ lukudɔ osi,
etomɔ de liti mɔ ye ɔwɔlɛ flee.
Kitonɛkĩ boe Ɔlate anɛ teĩ nɛ tuwĩ bakɛnanɛ a akũ,
ade ebinya atɔ yatse be mpaɛbɔ a.
Lɛmɛ boe Ɔlate a abɔa kanɛ liti kakpa tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ.”
Ntɛ akũ asĩ mi kĩ miakɛna tuwĩ ni, owei deĩ kĩ yaakɛna mi fɔlɔɛwotsa?
Lɛmɛ ntɛ míamɔ lubo malo nɛ tuwĩ a kĩ miakɛna sũ ni, Baguma ahila mi! Mitavila odima, lɛtsama lɛmɛ lɛtaha mi tɔwɔlɛ.
Mbom mikɔa obu mikpa Kristo, boe Ɔlate a nɛ mi tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ. Mimanɛ akũ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ, kĩ míapuli minyɛ foe kayɔ mitsa odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaavia mi fɔlɛtsa nɛ kɔnɛte a kĩ mideĩ a akũ.
Lɛmɛ mikɛna foe nɛ obu mɔ akũ kadɔla kamɛ. Mifɔ̃ mi tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ tɛkpalɛ, ayekĩ ntɛ bivũna mi malo ni, kɔnyɔã kuwo bikĩ balɛ tuwuli kpa nɛ ɔbla wĩ a kĩ miabɔa ndɛ Kristo batomɛnanɛ a sũ.
Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ fɔnyɛ Baguma kawɛ ni, fɔnɛnɛ kĩ miamɔ lubo ndɛ tuwĩ bakɛnanɛ, kɛba kĩ míamɔ lubo ndɛ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ.

Kristo lɛmɛ ku nɛ bati tɔkpa lɔlɔ deedimɔapɛ ɛkpa fɔkɔ a flee. Titɔ kĩ ɛnyɛ oti wĩ malo a, eku nɛ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ lɔlɔ ayekĩ yaakpã mi ɛnamɛna Baguma sɛkɛ̃. Bɛkɔ ye nɛ sukɛna kamɛ, lɛmɛ Baguma dzɛla ye edzi nkpã nɛ Hũhũ kamɛ.
Ɛna nɛ Hũhũ a kamɛ, ade ɛnalɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa ɛkpa hũhũ a kĩ ɛwaa kɔla a.
Ade be nyɛ bati a kĩ bɛtátse Baguma ɔlɛdo, titɔ kĩ Baguma na ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ ɛkpa be malo a nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ Noa kamɛ ye adakã kpale a. Ye kamɛ bati sukuloo kĩ biwo be ɛlɛ̃ lɛna nkpã nɛ mui kayili a kamɛ.

Mui kayili kĩĩ ketimɔ mui kawɔla amaniɛ a kĩ finyaa bɛkɔa bɛtɛ mi nkpã. Nnɛ́ tuduli kavɔlɛ nɛ oti akũ fɔanɛ, mbom fɔnyɛ fubo kalɔ kĩ oti aakɔa ye ɔwɔlɛ flee ɛkpa Baguma. Baguma mui kawɔla a lɛtɛ mi nkpã fɔtsãmɛna Yesu Kristo kayidza kato kanɔkpa a akũ.
Kristo naa ode, ade edzi nɛ Baguma sɔmɔna, yanya Baguma ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ, mɔ ode otumifɔ mɔ kɔbɛ̃ flee akũ a.
Ayekĩ Kristo mɔ́ lubo ndɛ otidziwa aye a ni, mi malo miakɔa adzuni mɔapɛ a mido mi akũ kɔbɛ̃, kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛmɔ lubo nɛ sukɛna kamɛ ni, yafɔ̃ tɔkpa kakɛna.
Foesũ kito finyaa kanaa ni, midzi mi nkpã fuwi nkaɛ nɛ tite akũ a nɛ Baguma kawɛ onukpɛ̃, nnɛ́ nɛ otidziwa fɔwɛtsa kĩ fɔakɔ odo a onukpɛ̃.

Kɔkɔɛ a, mibula lɔkɔ kade, midzi nkpã mikakɛna fɔtsa ndɛ amamufɔ aye nɛ lɔkɔ pii kamɛ. Nkpã a kĩ midzi tɔ̃ a nyɛ kɔkɔbato kpa kabɔa, sukɛna fɔwɛtsa kpa liti katomɛna, bavɛ kawuga, anya kpa kanya, futo kpa kato, mɔ baviɔ̃ kasum kĩ fɔláa mbla adima kayɔ.
Finyaa fɔakɛna amamufɔ a wãwã kĩ mibuki miádo akũ nɛ be nkpã pupulidza kadzi kamɛ, nɛ foesũ balɛ mi akũ tuwuli kpa.
Lɛmɛ baanyɛ be akũ onukpɛ̃ bɛkpa Baguma a kĩ ɛmanɛ akũ kĩ yaadzɛmɔ bati a kĩ bidzi nkpã mɔ banɔkpa flee a.

Ade foesũ Kristo de lɛtsã nɛ Kalɛ Wĩ a akũ ɛkpa banɔkpa a lɛmɛ a. Ade titɔ kĩ Baguma adzɛmɔ be ndɛ kɛfɛta odi nyɛ odi malo ni, Kristo de lɛtsã ɛkpa be ayekĩ nɛ hũhũ kamɛ ni, baadzi nkpã ndɛ Baguma aye.
Fɔtsa flee kawũna lɔkɔ fuã, foesũ mipi mi akũ kapi wĩ, mina nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ, ayekĩ míapuli mibɔa mpaɛ.
Lɛtsa titiliwu nyɛ kĩ, miwɛ akũ kalɛ mɔ ɔdɔ kĩ eto mi tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ flee, kitonɛkĩ ɔdɔ afɔ̃ bati akɔa bati bɛbã tɔkpa pii kate.
Ntɛ mi kamɛ odi nase ɔwaɛ̃ ni, ɛtɛ ye mɔ kawɔlɛ hũhũhũhũ kakɛna fɔtana nɛ foe kamɛ.
Mi kamɛ odi nyɛ odi tɛ futetsa pɔtii etomɛna Baguma sɛkɛ̃. Foesũ ndɛ Baguma futetsa futefute kĩĩ akũ badãmɛnanɛ ni, mikɛna foe akũ adzuma kakɛna wĩ, ayekĩ fɔ́ana libi fɔkpa mi akũ akũ.

Ntɛ odi alɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa ni, ɛlɛ foe ndɛ Baguma fɔlɛtsa aye. Ntɛ odi asum ni, ɛkɔa kɔbɛ̃ a kĩ Baguma kpa ye a esum, ayekĩ nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kamɛ ni, bati aatsã Yesu Kristo akũ bimu Baguma. Ye fude nyɛ kukũkpalɛ mɔ kɔbɛ̃ daa daa. Fɔya lɔmɔ.
Yĩ bawɛnɛ, mitafɔ̃ ayekĩ bɛlamɔ mi kasɔ kadã, milamɔ lubo kamɔ mɔ kalɔɛ lɛkɛna mi wãwã ndɛ lɛtsa vɔɛ̃ kĩ miádã anɛ kɔlaa.
Mbom mifɔ̃ kawɔlɛ kide mi kĩ miamɔ lubo ndɛ Kristo aye, ayekĩ ntɛ ɛnɛ́ ɛta nɛ ye kukũkpalɛ a kamɛ ni, mi malo míapuli mimɔ́ kawɔlɛ mitu osee.
Ntɛ bati vũna mi kĩ mi nɛ ayekĩ mitomɔ Kristo sũ ni, kawɔlɛ kide mi, kitonɛkĩ kukũkpalɛ Hũhũ a, kĩ ɛnyɛ Baguma Hũhũ a tomɔ mi.
Ntɛ mi kamɛ odi amɔ lubo ni, fɔtanya kĩ ɛnyɛ owudini, ĩye oyekpanɛ, ĩye fɔtsa kpa ɔkɛnanɛ ĩye kĩ edo onukpɛ̃ nɛ bati bɛbã fɔlɛtsa kĩ fɔtsɛ́la ye akũ a kamɛ.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ mi kamɛ odi amɔ lubo kĩ ɛnyɛ Kristo ode sũ ni, kɔnyɔã kɔtakɔ ye, mbom emu Baguma kĩ Kristo dĩ teĩ nɛ ye akũ.
Lɔkɔ wo ɔtɔ kĩ Baguma aayi bati kadzɛmɛna kayɔ, ade ye mɔawɛ tɔtɔ kamɛ yaanya lɔtɔ ɛdzɛmɛna a. Ade ntɛ eyi kayɔ nɛ boe akũ a, nde fɔ́awũna fɔkpa bati a kĩ bɛtátɛ ye Kalɛ Wĩ a bido a?
Ndɛ ayekĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ a,
“Ntɛ fudeĩ ɔsĩ fɔmɔ Baguma aatɛ bati kpĩĩ bɛna nkpã ni,
kekɔ̃ nde fɔ́ana fɔkpa bati a kĩ baávila Baguma mɔ tɔkpa bakɛnanɛ a?”
Foesũ bati a kĩ bamɔ lubo ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma wɛ ɛkpa be a bɛkɛna tuwĩ, bɛkɔa be ɔkla flee bido nɛ be Ɔbɔanɛ a kĩ yaápãã nɛ ye kalɛkayi akũ da a awɛ kamɛ.

Finyaa, yĩ ndɛ asɔli ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ aye ni, mawɛ kĩ madɛ asafu banɔkɔɛ̃ a kĩ bideĩ nɛ mi kamɛ a. Yĩ mɔawɛ a mmɔ́ ayekĩ Kristo mɔ́ lubo, ade maana tsɛfã nɛ ye kukũkpalɛ a kĩ baanyɛ bɛtsa a kamɛ a. Makpa mi kɔdɛ kĩ,
Mikpã Baguma baveli kɔdabu a kĩ ɛkɔa edo nɛ mi awɛ a kadã wĩ. Midã be akũ ndɛ ayekĩ Baguma awɛ nɛ ɔdɔ kamɛ, kĩ nnɛ́ nɛ ɔhɛ kamɛ. Mitakɛna adzuma nɛ kɔtɔkase sũ, mbom mifɔ̃ futo mi ɔwɔlɛ faa kamɛ.
Mitawɛ kĩ mianya bati a kĩ Baguma kɔa edo mi nɛ awɛ a akũ, mbom mi ɔbla ɛnya nfantuhũ ɛkpa baveli kɔdabu a.
Ntɛ Baveli Ɔdãmɛnanɛ ɔnɔkɔɛ̃ a nɛ ɛta ni, míana kukũkpalɛ lɛgãbɔɛ a kĩ de ɔhaĩ a lɛláabu kade.
Ade ayea mi bapopo lɛmɛ midɔla mi akũ mikpa mi banɔkɔɛ̃ a. Mi a flee midɔla akũ mikpa mi akũ, misum akũ nɛ mi lɛkɛnana lidi nyɛ lidi kamɛ. Kitonɛkĩ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ kĩ,
“Baguma ayidza kadza nɛ bati a
kĩ badɛla be akũ nɛ ode a akũ,
lɛmɛ yamɔ bikĩ bɛdɔla be akũ a kɔnya.”
Nɛ foesũ midɔla akũ mido nɛ Baguma kɔbɛ̃ awɛ a kayɔ, ayekĩ yaadɛla mi nɛ ode nɛ ye mɔawɛ lɔkɔ wĩ a kamɛ.
Mikɔa fɔtsa a kĩ fɔaha mi a flee mido nɛ Baguma awɛ kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ ye adãmɛna mi akũ.
Mina nɛ kukũmanɛ kamɛ, mikaadã kadã wĩ! Mi okesĩnɛ, Abonsam, tsɛ̃ yamini ndɛ Dzata kĩ yakulumɛ, kĩ yawɛ odi epi ɛyɛlɛ ɛba.
Mikɔa kadza pintii nɛ katɛkado kamɛ misua tɔkpa osi, kitonɛkĩ minyina kĩ mi bakɔba Kristofɔ nɛ katinya kamɛ flee lamɛna lubo kĩĩ odu kamɔ.

Lɛmɛ nɛ mi lubo kamɔ lɔkɔ lukũ liti ni, Baguma a kĩ ye kɔnyakamɔ pɔnɛ a, aakɛna mi mikpɔla, edo mi kɔbɛ̃ midza pintii. Kitonɛkĩ ɛvɛ mi kĩ miyaana tsɛfã nɛ ye daa kukũkpalɛ a kamɛ, nɛ ɔmɔa kakɛna mɔ Kristo sũ.
Ade ye deĩ kɔbɛ̃ daa daa a! Fɔya lɔmɔ.

Ntsɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa lukũ kĩĩ ntsãmɛna Silvano akũ mama mi. Mabu ye ndɛ ɔkɔba okristoni kĩ yadi ɔnɔkɔali. Mawɛ kĩ mado mi kɔbɛ̃ mɔ lɛtsa a kĩ yĩ mɔawɛ mmɔ́ kĩ ade Baguma kɔnyakamɔ a nɛ awĩ a. Midza pintii nɛ ye kamɛ.
Babilonia asafu a, kĩ Baguma pau ndɛ mi aye a, awɔ̃na mi. Ade aye yĩ obi Marko lɛmɛ awɔ̃na mi a.
Miwɔ̃na akũ nɛ Kristo ɔdɔ kamɛ.
Lukudɔ litomɔ mi flee a kĩ mikɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Kristo.
II Peter: Ovoli kĩĩ to yĩ, Simon Petro, Yesu Kristo osumunɛ mɔ fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ sɛkɛ̃. Ntsɛlɛ ye mamɛna bati a kĩ bɛtsã boe Baguma mɔ boe Ɔtɛnɛ Yesu Kristo tuwĩ kakɛna akũ bɛna katɛkado kĩ kideĩ kɔya ndɛ boe kade a aye.
Baguma kɔnyakamɔ, mɔ ye lukudɔ lɛpɔ nɛ mi akũ, ayekĩ míabuki minyi ye mɔ Yesu kĩ ɛnyɛ boe Ɔlate a mibu.

Baguma kɔa ye mɔawɛ kɔbɛ̃ ɛkpa boe lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ busĩ nɛ nkpã kamɛ a faa kĩ bupuli budzi nkpã busum ye kasum wĩ. Ɛkɛna fukĩĩ ɛnɛɛ yabumɔ boe kĩ bunyi oti a kĩ ɛvɛ boe kĩ bɔyaana tsɛfã nɛ ye mɔawɛ kukũkpalɛ mɔ tuwĩ kakɛna a kamɛ.

Baguma tsã osi kĩĩ akũ ete boe fɔtsa kpale mɔ kɔya a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi a, ayekĩ bɔ́apuli bɔtsã futetsa kĩĩ akũ bulo nɛ fɔtsa kpa kĩ fɔakɔ oti odo kĩ fɔawɔla oti nɛ katinya onukpɛ̃, lɔkɔa bɔtsã foe akũ bɔna tsɛfã nɛ Baguma kutidu a kamɛ.
Nɛ fukĩĩ sũ, mibɔa mbɔdi mikɔa tuwĩ kakɛna mibumɔ mi katɛkado. Ade ayea kadikanyi kibumɔ mi tuwĩ kakɛna,
akũ kanya kibumɔ kadikanyi, ɔwɔlɛ kado kibumɔ akũ kanya, Baguma kavila kibumɔ ɔwɔlɛ kado.
Mikɔa tɔwaɛ̃ kakɛna nɛ Kristo kamɛ mibumɔ Baguma kavila, ade mikɔa ɔdɔ mibumɔ tɔwaɛ̃ kakɛna a.
Ntɛ mideĩ ɔbla kĩĩ mɔ ɛtɛ mi kamɛ flee ni, fɔafɔ̃ mikabɔa mbɔdi, mi akũ lɛna nfasɔ, nɛ ayekĩ minyi boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo sũ.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ ɔbla kĩĩ lɛláa odi kamɛ ni, kekɔ̃ eku anɛ eyua, kĩ ɛláapuli ɛmɔ mɔ lugo, ade yalɛla tɔkpa a kĩ ɛkɛna ɛtɛ̃ a kĩ Baguma wɔla nɛ ye akũ a.

Foesũ, nwaɛ̃ amɛ, mibɔa mbɔdi mɔ ɔsĩ miba kɔkɔɛ, mido akũ ɔsĩ mifɔ̃ kavɛ a kĩ Baguma vɛ mi, mɔ kapau a kĩ ɛpau mi a, fɔnya fɔtsa kɔlɛwa fɔkpa mi. Ntɛ mikɛna foe lɔmɔ ni, miláamuniki nɛ mi katɛkado a liti.
Ntɛ fɔtsã osi kĩĩ akũ a, baakpa mi osi faa miwo nɛ boe Ɔlate mɔ boe Ɔtɛnɛ Yesu Kristo lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ a kĩ kɛwaa daa a kamɛ.
Titɔ kĩ minyina fɔtsa kĩĩ kɔkɔɛ, midzɛ̃ pintii nɛ ɔnɔkɔali a kĩ bɔtsa mi a kamɛ malo ni, mawɛ kĩ makate mi foe anɛ luwi daa.
Mbu kĩ, kĩ ndzi kpã ni, fɔnɛnɛ kĩ nkaanyina mi nɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ akũ.
Ĩnyina kĩ owi lɛláabuna mɔ maaku ndɛ ayekĩ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo nyɛ ɛtsa yĩ pefee a.
Nɛ foesũ maabɔa mbɔdi ntsa mi osi a kĩ nɛ yĩ wuda liti ni, míapuli mite anɛ nɛ fɔtsa kĩĩ akũ lɔkɔ nyɛ lɔkɔ.
Nnɛ́ tugu kĩ bɛmɛ nɛ nyansã kamɛ bɔkɔa bɔlɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo kaya nɛ kɔbɛ̃ kamɛ a bɔtsa mi. Boe mɔawɛ a lɛmɔ ye kɔbɛ̃, obu mɔ kukũkpalɛ a mɔ anɛ.
Bɔna nɛ awã luwi a fɔmɔ Baguma boe Ɔlɛga a kɔa ye obu mɔ kukũkpalɛ ɛkpa ye, ade odo to ode nɛ Kukũkpalɛ Flee Ɔlate a sɛkɛ̃ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ade yĩ Obi kĩ maátunɔ kalɛ a. Yawo yĩ anɛ.”
Boe mɔawɛ a linu odo kĩĩ kĩ eto ode nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ bɔna nɛ ye sɛkɛ̃ nɛ ɔtɔ kpalɛwa a akũ.

Nɛ foesũ boe mbom bɔtɛ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ lɛtsã a kĩ bide nɛ ye akũ a budo bɔba. Mibɔa mbɔdi mipi ɔlɛdo a kĩ ɛla ndɛ ɔsɛdza kĩ yavɔlɛ nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ a mido mɔ akũ, kɛnaawo odenyinawi kĩ ɔnɔnɛ lisibii a aade lɛvɔlɛ nɛ mi tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ.
Lɛmɛ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛbɛ̃ foe flee nyɛ kĩ, mite anɛ kĩ odima lɛláapuli ɛnyɛ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛlɛ biyi a kayɔ nɛ ye mɔawɛ akũ akũ.
Kitonɛkĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ fɔlɛtsa fudima táto otidziwa kawɛ kamɛ fɔya tɔ̃ da, mbom Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a kɔbɛ̃ lɛfɔ̃ bati lɛ Baguma ɔlɛdo a biyi.

Ndɛ ayekĩ fɔvã onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ nɛ́ nɛ bati kamɛ kɔkɔɛ a, ade ayea bavãlɛvã fɔtsa batsanɛ aanɛ nɛ mi kamɛ a. Baatsã tɛdake kamɛ bɛyamɛna fɔvã fɔtsa katsa a kĩ fɔ́abula bati kade, ade baasĩ boe Ɔlate a kĩ ɛya be ɛtɛ be nkpã a malo. Be fɔtsakɛlawa aafɔ̃ bɛwɔla be mɔatsɛ.
Bati pii aatomɔ be ɔbla kpa kabɔa a liti, ade nɛ fɔvã fɔtsa batsanɛ a sũ ni, bati bɛbã aalɛ kɔdzɛla kpa bitia ɔnɔkɔali osi a.

Ayekĩ bavãlɛvã fɔtsa batsanɛ kĩĩ deĩ anɛngbã nɛ sika akũ sũ ni, baatsã tɛdake mɔ fɔvã kamɛ bɛna mi akũ nfasɔ. Lɛmɛ Baguma kɔ be kɔtɔ eyi anɛ kɔkɔkɔɛ, ade Oti a kĩ yaawɔla be a lɛmɛ lanyɛ anɛ nɛ be akũ!
Baguma támɔ ye ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kĩ bɛkɛna tɔkpa a kɔnya, mbom edo be nkɔsɔnkɔsɔ, ɛta be edo nɛ fi kĩ fɔádĩ da a kamɛ, awã kĩ bideĩ nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ badzɔlɛ kadzɛ Luwi a.

Ade ayea Baguma támɔ atitifɔ katinya bati a kɔnya a. Ɛfɔ̃ mui kayili wɔla bati a kĩ bɛtávila Baguma nɛ katinya kamɛ flee a, mbɔɛntɛ Noa kĩ ede lɛtsã nɛ nkpã kadzi kpĩĩ akũ, mɔ bati evũkɔnɔ bɛbã odi Baguma nyɛ nɛ foe kamɛ.
Baguma kɔ Sodom mɔ Gomora tɛmatɔ tɛkpale tɛkpale a kɔtɔ, ade ɛfɔ̃ fi wɔla te bubloo tɛdani batɔ nɛnɛ a. Ɛkɛna be kĩ bɛnya nfantuhũ bɛkpa bikĩ baávila Baguma a lɛtsa a kĩ laaya nɛ be akũ.
Lɛmɛ Baguma nyɛ Lot, oti kpĩĩ kĩ bati ɔbla kpa kabɔa kaha ye ɔwɔlɛ.
Oti wĩ kĩĩ dzi nɛ be kamɛ, ade be ɔbla kpa a kĩ ɛkamɔ ɛkanu mɔ be titikpa a kaha ye ɔwɔlɛ luwi nyɛ luwi.
Nɛ foesũ boe Ɔlate nyina ayekĩ yanyɛ bati a kĩ bavila ye a etomɛna be sɔhuiɛ kamɛ, mɔ ayekĩ yafɔ̃ bati kpa aana nɛ sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ kamɛ bɛkɔa bɛdzɔlɛ kadzɛ luwi a.
Yakɛna foe titiliwu nɛ bati a kĩ bitomɔ sukɛna fɔwɛtsa kpa kĩ fɔakɔ odo liti, kĩ foesũ baábu Baguma otumi kĩ yanya be akũ a kado nɛ lɛtsama kamɛ.
Fɔvã fɔtsa batsanɛ kĩĩ deĩ anɛ ɔsĩ, ade badɛla be akũ nɛ ode a. Baákɔa obu kakpa ode bati kpalɛwa a, ade ntɛ balɛ tɔkpa nɛ be akũ malo ni, akũ lányɛnɛ be.
Baguma ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kĩ bideĩ kɔbɛ̃ mɔ otumi bɛbɛ̃ fɔvã fɔtsa batsanɛ malo a lákɔa fɔlɛtsa kpa katsua be onukpɛ̃ nɛ boe Ɔlate a anɛ.

Lɛmɛ bati kĩĩ la ndɛ bayaɛ kpa kĩ bɛlá adzuni, kĩ katinya nyɛ be kĩ bati bipili be bɛkɔ. Balɛ fɔlɛtsa kpa nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bɛtánu de kayɔ a akũ. Baguma aawɔla be ndɛ ayekĩ batidziwa awɔla tuwĩ kamɛ bayaɛ.

Baamɔ lubo nɛ lubo a kĩ bɛfɔ̃ bati mɔ́ a sũ. Be kawɔlɛ nyɛ kĩ bɛkɛna be sukɛna fɔwɛtsa kpa fudi nyɛ fudi nɛ suwa ketee. Bɛnyɛ kɔnyɔã mɔ tuduli fɔtsa bakɛnanɛ, ade ntɛ mi mɔ be midzi mianya a, bamɔ kawɔlɛ nɛ be bati kakɛ tisi a akũ.
Bideĩ anɛ kĩ yamɔ batsole adɔpaafɔ, ade anɛ a kakɔa kakɛna tɔkpa láplo be a. Bavɛlɛ bati kĩ be katɛkado lɛdzɛ́ pintii kado nɛ tɔkpa kamɛ. Bɛvɛlɛ be akũ bɛkpa anɛngbã. Baguma kadumu tomɔ be!
Bɛfɔnɛ nɛ osi kpĩĩ a awɛ, ade bɛyɛla osi a. Bɛtsã osi a kĩ Balam, Boer obinyole a tsã a. Balam mɔ kawɔlɛ nɛ sika a kĩ yaana etomɛna tɔkpa kakɛna kamɛ a akũ.
Lɛmɛ Baguma kã ye anɛ nɛ ye tɔkpa a sũ. Ye mɔawɛ aflimu kĩ ɛnɔnɛ lɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ oti odo, ade esua onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ a fɔbɔdamtsa kakɛna osi a.
Fɔvã fɔtsa batsanɛ kĩĩ la ndɛ fɔwɔkɛ kĩ fuviɔ̃, ĩye luflututu kĩ ɔwɛ mɔ ɔsĩ abɔa kanamɛna. Baguma manɛ kadzikɔ̃ eyi ɛkpa be nɛ ɔtũ kpli kamɛ.
Balɛ kɔdzɛla mɔ akũ kata, kalɛ fɔkɔasiatsa lɛmɛ. Bakɔa sukɛna fɔwɛtsa kĩ fɔakɔ odo kakɛ bikĩ owi tábuna kĩ bilo nɛ amamu kadzi kamɛ.
Bakpa be anɛ kate nɛ akũ akũ kadzi akũ, lɛmɛ be mɔawɛ a bɛnyɛ ɔbla kpa a kĩ yawɔla bati a basate, kitonɛkĩ lɛtsa a kĩ lɛnya oti akũ ni, oti a adani ɔsate ɛkpa lɛtsa a.

Ntɛ bati tsã boe Ɔlate mɔ Ɔtɛnɛ Yesu Kristo kanyi kamɛ bilo nɛ katinya kamɛ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔado oti efĩĩ sɛkɛ̃, mɔ́ ɔbla a na muniki ewo nɛ be kamɛ ɛnya be akũ ni, bati a na nkpã awũnade a abu kade kaba atɔnyade a.
Ntɛ kanyi kĩĩ bɛtanyi lɛtsama nɛ kadzi nɛ osi kpĩĩ akũ ni, kufɛ fɔnɛnɛ kɔlaa fɔkpa be kɛba kĩ binyi osi wĩ kĩĩ lɛmɛ bibuki bimuniki nɛ mbla kpalɛwa a kĩ Baguma kpa be a liti.
Lɛtsa a kĩ lɛya nɛ be akũ a atsa kĩ fɔgbã kĩĩ nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali kĩ, “Okpete amuniki kanaabɔɛ ye mɔawɛ tɛdã,” ade, “Ɔplakuo kĩ bɛwɔla ye mui yededeede amuniki kanaato tɔdɔ̃.”
Nwaɛ̃ amɛ kĩ maátunɔ kalɛ, ade ovoli ɔyade kĩ ntsɛlɛ mamɛna mi a. Nɛ tuvoli nviã a kamɛ a, nwɛ kĩ manyina mi adzuni nɛ fɔtsa wĩ kakɛna akũ, ndɛ fɔlɛtsa kakai aye.
Mawɛ kĩ mite anɛ nɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Baguma onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ kpalɛwa a lɛ biyi anɛ kɔkɔɛ a, mɔ tɛbla a kĩ mi fɔtɔ banyanɛ a tɛ bitomɛna boe Ɔlate mɔ Ɔtɛnɛ sɛkɛ̃ bɛma mi a akũ.
Minya lɔtɔ minu foe kayɔ kĩ nɛ fuwi nkaɛ a kamɛ ni, nsekuo badinɛ aaya. Baadzi nkpã nɛ be sukɛna fɔwɛtsa kĩ fɔakɔ oti odo onukpɛ̃ bidi mi nsekuo.
Ade baalɛ kĩ, “Ɛlɛ eyi kĩ yaaya. Nde ye? Kitonɛkĩ anɛ kĩ boe bawanyɔ ku kɛyawo finyaa, ade ayea lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa buki lideĩ ndɛ ayekĩ fɔna kĩ Baguma bɔa katinya a!”
Bibua pa bisĩ ɔnɔkɔali a kĩ anɛ kɔkɔɛ mɔ Baguma kɔa kalɛ ɛbɔa tite mɔ ode. Ɛkɛna tite etomɛna mui kamɛ, tɛdzɛ̃ nɛ mui kamɛ,
ade mui lɛmɛ, mui a kĩ biyili a ɛkɔa ɛwɔla katinya kɔɛ a.
Ade Baguma kalɛ mɔapɛ kĩĩ pini tite mɔ ode a kĩ fudeĩ finyaa, ade ɛmanɛ foe eyi kĩ yaakɔa fi ɛwɔla foe a. Baguma manɛ foe eyi ɛkpa kadzɛ luwi a kĩ yaawɔla bati a kĩ bɛtávila ye a.
Lɛmɛ nwaɛ̃ amɛ kĩ maátunɔ kalɛ, mitalɛla kalɛ mɔa kĩĩ! Ade ke nyɛ kĩ nɛ boe Ɔlate sɛkɛ̃ ni, luwi mɔa la ndɛ futeli apim, ade futeli apim lɛmɛ la ndɛ luwi mɔa a.
Nɛ badi kakɔna onukpɛ̃ ni, boe Ɔlate lána sɔwa nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ɛlɛ eyi a kakɛna akũ. Fɔlá lɔmɔ, mbom ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ edeĩ ɛkpa mi, kitonɛkĩ yaáwɛ kĩ odima ɛyaawɔ, mbom yawɛ kĩ bati flee bɛdani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ.

Lɛmɛ boe Ɔlate Luwi a aaya ndɛ ayekĩ oyekpanɛ aya a aye. Nɛ luwi a akũ ni, ode aatɛ̃ ɛnaa nɛ odo kpaa kanɛ kamɛ, ade odetɔ́ kamɛ fɔtsa flee a aatɛ̃ fuvio fɔwɔ, ade tite mɔ te akũ fɔtsa flee lɛmɛ aavio a.
Foesũ ntɛ baawɔla fɔtsa kĩĩ flee nɛ osi kĩĩ akũ ni, bati bawɔdabe odu kɛnɛ kĩ mianya? Kɛnɛ kĩ mibɔa ɔbla kĩ ɛkpalɛ, mikɔa mi akũ flee misum Baguma,
nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ midzi miadzɔlɛ Baguma Luwi a mɔ akũ kasĩ kĩ lɛya mɔatsɛ. Ade luwi a mɔ ode aapi fi evio, ade fi ɔwɛ a aanyinyina odetɔ́ kamɛ fɔtsa flee a.
Lɛmɛ boe kɔ̃ nɛ Baguma kalɛkayi onukpɛ̃ ni, bɔadzɔlɛ ode vɔɛ̃ mɔ tite vɔɛ̃, awã kĩ fɔtsa wĩ kakɛna tɛ tɔtɔ.
Foesũ nwaɛ̃ amɛ, kĩ miadzɔlɛ boe Ɔlate Luwi a ni, mibɔa mbɔdi kĩ míanya bati kpalɛwa, kĩ nfumusu lɛláa mi akũ nɛ Baguma anɛ, mbom lukudɔ lɛna nɛ mimɔ Baguma kayite.
Kɛnɛ kĩ bɔabu boe Ɔlate a ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ kana kakpa boe a ndɛ osi kĩ ebinya ɛkpa mi kĩ mina nkpã katɛ. Ade fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ boe ɔwɛnɛ Paulo malo tsɛlɛ ɛma mi nɛ nyansã a kĩ Baguma kpa ye a onukpɛ̃ a.

Ade lɛtsa a kĩ yalɛ nɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ akũ nɛ ye tuvoli a kamɛ a. Ye tuvoli a kamɛ fɔlɛtsa a fudi kayɔ kanu deĩ ɔsĩ. Nɛ foesũ bati a kĩ binyína tuvoli mɔ bikĩ bɛtátim nɛ be katɛkado kamɛ a adani foe kayɔ kanyɛ, ndɛ ayekĩ bakɛna mɔ Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa fɔlɛtsa bɛbã a fudi. Fukĩĩ kakɛna aafɔ̃ bɛwɔla be akũ.
Lɛmɛ mi yĩ bakɔba, minyina fukĩĩ kɔkɔɛ. Foesũ midã mi akũ kadã wĩ ayekĩ bati a kĩ baábu mbla a lɛláanyɛ kudu nɛ mi abɔa kayɔ minɛ mitɔ!
Mibo anɛ nɛ boe Ɔlate mɔ Ɔtɛnɛ Yesu Kristo kɔnyakamɔ mɔ kanyi kamɛ. Ye kade nyɛ kukũkpalɛ kito finyaa kanaa daa. Fɔya lɔmɔ.
I John: Bɔtsɛlɛ ovoli kĩĩ bɔamɛna mi nɛ Baguma kalɛ a kĩ kakpa nkpã, kĩ kideĩ anɛ kayɔkayi a akũ. Bunu kalɛ kĩĩ, bɔmɔ́ ke mɔ anɛ, nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, bɔmɔ́ ke, ade bɔta ke mɔ awɛ lɛmɛ a.
Kĩ nkpã kĩĩ nyɛ ye akũ kanya a, bɔmɔ́ ye, foesũ bɔlɛ fɔlɛtsa nɛ ye akũ, ade bude lɛtsã nɛ nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a, kĩ edeĩ nɛ Ɔlɛga a sɛkɛ̃ kĩ Baguma nyɛ ɛtsa boe malo akũ a, bɔkpa mi.
Lɛtsa a kĩ bɔmɔ́, bunu a, ade de bɔabi mi malo a, ayekĩ míayabumɔ boe nɛ ɔmɔa a kĩ bɔkɛna mɔ Ɔlɛga a mɔ ye Obi Yesu Kristo.
Bɔtsɛlɛ ovoli kĩĩ katsɛlɛ bɔama mi, ayekĩ boe kawɔlɛkamɔ a aakpɔla.
Finyaa ni, ɔlɛdo a kĩ bunu butomɛna ye Obi sɛkɛ̃ a, kĩ bɔkɔa bɔade lɛtsã nɛ ye akũ bɔkpa mi a nyɛ Baguma nyɛ ɔhaĩ, ade ɔtũ odima lɛláa ye kamɛ a.
Foesũ ntɛ bɔlɛ kĩ budeĩ nɛ ɔmɔa kakɛna kamɛ mɔ ye mɔ bubuki bɔtsɛ̃ nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ ni, kekɔ̃ bɔama fɔvã nɛ boe kɔdzɛla kalɛ mɔ boe fɔkɛlatsa kamɛ.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ budeĩ nɛ ɔhaĩ kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ ye malo edeĩ nɛ ɔhaĩ a kamɛ ni, kekɔ̃ bɔakɛna ɔmɔa mɔ boe akũ akũ, ade ye Obi Yesu babɔanɛ a vɔlɛ tɔkpa tidi nyɛ tidi nɛ boe akũ a.
Ntɛ bɔlɛ kĩ tɔkpa lɛláa boe akũ ni, kakɛ bɔakɛ boe akũ, ade ɔnɔkɔali a lɛláa boe kamɛ a.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ bubinya boe tɔkpa kamɛ bɔtsa Baguma ni, ɛnyɛ ɔnɔkɔalini mɔ oti kpĩĩ kĩ yaakɔa boe tɔkpa ete boe, ɛvɔlɛ efĩĩ adi nyɛ adi nɛ boe akũ.
Lɛmɛ ntɛ bɔlɛ kĩ bɔtákɛna tɔkpa ni, bute Baguma fɔvã, ade ke ye kalɛ a lɛmɛ lɛláa boe kamɛ a.
Yĩ babi, nlamɛna fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ katsɛlɛ kamɛna mi ayekĩ miláakɛna tɔkpa. Lɛmɛ ntɛ odi kɛna tɔkpa ni, budeĩ odi kĩ yawãnɛ boe lɔlɔ nɛ Ɔlɛga a sɛkɛ̃. Ade ye nyɛ Yesu Kristo kĩ ɛnyɛ oti kpĩĩ a.
Kristo akũ Baguma tsã ɛkɔa boe tɔkpa ete boe. Nnɛ́ boe odi tɔkpa ɛkɔa ete, mbom ɛkɔa ete batidziwa flee.
Ntɛ bɔakɛna nɛ Baguma mbla a akũ ni, fɔ́afɔ̃ bɔmɔ́ buyi ɔsũ kĩ bunyina ye.
Oti a kĩ yalɛ kĩ, “Ĩnyina ye,” lɛmɛ yaákɛna nɛ ye mbla a akũ ni, ɔvãlɛvã yanɛ, ade ɔnɔkɔali a lɛláa ye kamɛ a.
Lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɛna nɛ ye kalɛ a akũ ni, ade ye ɔdɔ a kĩ edeĩ ɛkpa Baguma a lɛkpɔla a. Ayekĩ bɔ́akɛna bunyi kĩ bɔkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Baguma nyɛ kĩ,
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yalɛ kĩ edeĩ nɛ Baguma kamɛ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ edzi nkpã ndɛ ayekĩ Yesu Kristo dzi a.
Yĩ bakɔba kĩ maátunɔ kalɛ, nnɔ mbla vɔɛ̃ ntsɛlɛ mama mi, mbom mbla kɔɛ a kĩ bɛkpa mi kito anɛ kayɔkayi a yanɛ. Mbla kɔɛ a nyɛ ɔlɛdo a kĩ minu kɔkɔɔkɔɛ a.
Lɛmɛ mbla a kĩ ntsɛlɛ finyaa mamɛna mi a nyɛ avɔɛ̃, ade ɔnɔkɔali a kĩ edeĩ nɛ ye kamɛ a lɛmɛ nyɛ akũ nɛ Kristo mɔ mi kamɛ a. Kitonɛkĩ ɔtũ a lamɛna katɛ̃ ade ɔhaĩ mɔawɛ a lamɛna kavɔlɛ kɔkɔɛ a.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yalɛ kĩ edeĩ nɛ ɔhaĩ a kamɛ, lɛmɛ yakesĩ ɔwaɛ̃ ni, ebuki edeĩ nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ kɛyawo finyaa.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yawɛ ɔwaɛ̃ kalɛ ni, edeĩ nɛ ɔhaĩ a kamɛ, foesũ lɛtsama lɛláafɔ̃ ɛkɛna tɔkpa.
Lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakesĩ ɔwaɛ̃ ni, edeĩ nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ, ɛtsɛ̃ nɛ ɔtũ kamɛ, ade enyína awã kĩ yakpa, kitonɛkĩ ɔtũ a kɔ ye anɛ.
Mi babisɛ̃, mi nlamɛna ovoli kĩĩ katsɛlɛ kama, kitonɛkĩ bɛkɔa mi tɔkpa bite mi nɛ Kristo sũ.
Mi balɛga, mi nlamɛna ovoli kĩĩ katsɛlɛ kama, kitonɛkĩ minyi Kristo a kĩ edeĩ nkpã kito anɛ kayɔkayi a.
Mi bapopo, mi nlamɛna ovoli kĩĩ katsɛlɛ kama, kitonɛkĩ minya Oti Kpa a akũ.
Mi babisɛ̃, mi nlamɛna ovoli kĩĩ katsɛlɛ kama, kitonɛkĩ minyina Ɔlɛga a.
Mi balɛga a, ntsɛlɛ mma mi, kitonɛkĩ minyina Kristo a kĩ edeĩ nkpã kito anɛ kayɔkayi a.
Mi bapopo, ntsɛlɛ mma mi, kitonɛkĩ mideĩ kɔbɛ̃, Baguma kalɛ a deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ, ade minya Oti Kpa a akũ a.
Mitawɛ katinya ĩye fɔtsa a kĩ fudeĩ nɛ ke kamɛ a fudima kalɛ. Ntɛ odi awɛ katinya kalɛ ni, Ɔlɛga a ɔdɔ lɛláa ye kamɛ.
Kitonɛkĩ katinya kamɛ fɔtsa flee kĩ fɔakɔ sukɛna odo, ĩye fɔakɔ anɛ odo, mɔ fɔtsa a kĩ oti apia nɛ foe akũ a lɛmɛ, fudima táto Ɔlɛga a sɛkɛ̃, mbom katinya kamɛ futo.
Katinya mɔ ke kamɛ fɔtsa a kĩ fɔakɔ oti odo aatɛ̃, lɛmɛ oti a kĩ yakɛna nɛ Baguma kawɛ akũ a, aadzi nkpã daa.
Yĩ babi, katinya kawũna a fuã! Ndɛ ayekĩ minu kĩ Kristo okesĩnɛ a aaya a, finyaakĩĩ malo Kristo bakesĩnɛ pii nɛ́ kɔkɔɛ, nɛ foesũ bunyina kĩ katinya kawũna a fuã.

Nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, boe kamɛ bati kĩĩ nɛ́ bito, lɛmɛ bɛláa boe kamɛ. Kitonɛkĩ ntɛ boe kamɛ bideĩ ni, kufɛ bibuki bideĩ nɛ boe kamɛ. Lɛmɛ bɛdzakũ ayekĩ fɔ́anɛ fɔwa pefee kĩ be kamɛ odima lɛnyɛ́ boe ode.
Lɛmɛ Kristo kɔa Hũhũ Kpalɛwa eko nɛ mi akũ, ade mi flee minyi ɔnɔkɔali a.
Nnɛ́ kĩ minyína ɔnɔkɔali a sũ mɔ matsɛlɛ mi ovoli kĩĩ, mbom ayekĩ minyina ɔnɔkɔali a, ade minyina lɛmɛ kĩ fɔvã lɛláa ɔnɔkɔali a kamɛ sũ.
Foesũ owei koũ nyɛ ɔvãlɛvã a? Ade ye nyɛ oti a kĩ yalɛ kĩ nnɛ́ Yesu nyɛ Kristo a. Ade oti kĩĩ odu liti ɛnyɛ Kristo okesĩnɛ a kĩ esĩ Ɔlɛga a mɔ Obi a flee a.
Kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ esĩ Obi a ni, Ɔlɛga a lɛnyɛ́ ye ode. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ Obi ni, Ɔlɛga a nyɛ ye ode.
Mifɔ̃ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ minu kito kayɔkayi a fɔna nɛ mi tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ. Ntɛ mipi fɔlɛtsa a kĩ minu a midomɔ akũ ni, míapuli mina nɛ ɔmɔa kakɛna kamɛ mɔ Obi a mɔ Ɔlɛga a.
Lɛtsa a kĩ Kristo mɔawɛ lɛ eyi kĩ yaakpa boe nyɛ nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a.
Ade bati a kĩ bawɛ kĩ bakɛ mi a akũ fɔlɛtsa nlamɛna katsɛlɛ kama mi a.

Lɛmɛ mi kɔ̃ kugua a kĩ Kristo tsɛla mi buki kudeĩ nɛ mi kamɛ, foesũ fɔtásĩ kĩ odima abuki ɛtsa mi fɔtsa. Kitonɛkĩ ye kugua katsɛla a atsa mi lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa, ade fɔtsa a kĩ kɔatsa a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali kĩ fɔvã lɛláa foe kamɛ. Foesũ mikɛna nɛ ye fɔtsa katsa a akũ lɔkɔa mina nɛ Kristo kamɛ.
Foesũ finyaa, yĩ babi, midzi nɛ Kristo kamɛ, ayekĩ ntɛ ɛyanɛ ɛta nɛ Luwi akũ ni, bɔ́ado ɔwɔlɛ, kĩ kɔnyɔã lɛmɛ lɛláakɔ boe nɛ ye anɛ.
Ntɛ minyina kĩ Kristo nyɛ oti kpĩĩ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ mitɛ mido kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɛna fɔtsa wĩ ni, Baguma obi yanɛ.
Midã ɔdɔ a odu kĩ Ɔlɛga a deĩ ɛkpa boe! Yawɛ boe kalɛ paa kĩ bavɛ boe Baguma babi. Ɔnɔkɔali fɔanɛ kĩ ye babi bɔanɛ lɛmɛ. Lɛtsa a sũ kĩ katinya kamɛ bati linyína boe nyɛ kĩ bɛtányi Baguma.

Yĩ bakɔba kĩ maátunɔ kalɛ, finyaa Baguma babi bɔanɛ. Bɛtányɛ lɛtsa a kĩ de bɔ́adani bɔkɛna a bɛtsa boe tɔ̃, lɛmɛ bunyina kĩ ntɛ Kristo ya ni, bɔ́ana ndɛ ye aye, kitonɛkĩ bɔ́amɔ ye ndɛ ayekĩ eti ɛla a.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ edeĩ kɔnɛte kĩĩ nɛ Kristo akũ ni, yakpalɛ ye akũ ndɛ ayekĩ Kristo nyɛ oti kpalɛwa a.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɛna tɔkpa ni, efum Baguma mbla a, kitonɛkĩ tɔkpa nyɛ Baguma mbla kafum.
Lɛmɛ minyina kĩ kaya Kristo ya kĩ yayaalɔ boe tɔkpa ɛnamɛna, ade nɛ ye kamɛ ni, tɔkpa tidima lɛláa.
Foesũ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛkɛna ɔmɔa mɔ Kristo ni, yaádzi kakɛna tɔkpa, lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ edzi yakɛna tɔkpa ni, ɛtámɔ tɔ̃ ye ĩye ɛtányi tɔ̃ ye.
Yĩ babi, mitafɔ̃ odima lɛkɛ mi! Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɛna tuwĩ ni, ɛnyɛ oti kpĩĩ ndɛ ayekĩ Kristo lɛmɛ nyɛ oti kpĩĩ a.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɛna tɔkpa ni, Abonsam ode yanɛ, kitonɛkĩ Abonsam kɛna tɔkpa kito anɛ kayɔkayi a. Lɛtsa a sũ kĩ Baguma Obi a ya nɛ katinya kamɛ nyɛ kĩ yayaawɔla Abonsam fɔkɛlatsa a flee.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛnyɛ Baguma obi ni, yaádzi kakɛna tɔkpa, kitonɛkĩ Baguma kutidu a deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ. Ɛláapuli edzi ɛkakɛna tɔkpa kitonɛkĩ Baguma nyɛ ye Ɔlɛga.
Ntsitsemu a kĩ edeĩ nɛ Baguma babi mɔ Abonsam babi kayite nyɛ kĩ, odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaákɛna fɔtsa nɛ osi kpĩĩ akũ ĩye yaáwɛ ɔwaɛ̃ kalɛ ni, ɛnyɛ́ Baguma obi.
Ɔlɛdo a kĩ minu kito anɛ kayɔkayi a nyɛ kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ bɔawɛ akũ kalɛ.
Mitana ndɛ Kain aye kĩ ɛnya oti kpa a ode, ɛkɔ ye mɔawɛ ɔwaɛ̃ Abel a. Litsa sũ Kain kɔ ye? Ɛkɔ ye kitonɛkĩ ye mɔawɛ a ɛkɛna tɔkpa lɛmɛ ɔwaɛ̃ kɔ̃ kɛna fɔtsa nɛ osi kpĩĩ akũ.
Foesũ, nwaɛ̃ amɛ, fɔtakɛna mi saa kĩ katinya kamɛ bati akesĩ mi.
Boe kɔ̃ bunyina kĩ bɔtsã wuda kamɛ buwo nɛ nkpã kamɛ, kitonɛkĩ bɔawɛ akũ kalɛ. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaáwɛ oti kalɛ ni, ɛkahɔ nɛ wuda kamɛ.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakesĩ ɔwaɛ̃ ni, owudini yanɛ, ade minyina kĩ nkpã kĩ ɛla kawũna a lɛláa owudini odima kamɛ a.
Ade limii bɔ́anyi ayekĩ ɔdɔ la a. Kristo kɔa ye nkpã ɛbɔa afɔliɛ nɛ boe lɔlɔ, foesũ kɛnɛ kĩ boe malo bɔkɔa boe nkpã bɔbɔa afɔliɛ nɛ boe bawaɛ̃ lɔlɔ.
Ntɛ odi deĩ akũ fɔtsa mɔ ɛmɔ́ ɔwaɛ̃ kĩ kisĩ ye lɛmɛ fɔtákɔ ye kɔnya kĩ yabumɔ ɔwaɛ̃ a ni, nde yaapuli ɛlɛ nɛ ye ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kĩ yawɛ Baguma kalɛ?
Yĩ babi, mitafɔ̃ bɔkɔa fɔlɛtsa mɔ kɔdzɛla kalɛ pupulidza bɔwɛ oti kalɛ, mbom mifɔ̃ boe oti kawɛ kɛna nɛ boe fɔkɛlatsa mɔ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ.
Fɔtsɛ̃ fukĩĩ akũ bunyina kĩ bɔnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali a bade, ade bɔ́apuli budo ɔwɔlɛ nɛ Baguma anɛ a.
Ntɛ boe tɔwɔlɛ kɔ boe kɔtɔ malo ni, bunyina kĩ Baguma bɛ̃ boe tɔwɔlɛ ade enyina lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a.
Yĩ bawaɛ̃ kĩ maátunɔ kalɛ, ntɛ boe tɔwɔlɛ lákɔ boe kɔtɔ ni, kekɔ̃ bunyina kĩ bɔ́ado ɔwɔlɛ nɛ Baguma anɛ,
lɔkɔa bɔtɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ buvia a butomɛna ye sɛkɛ̃, kitonɛkĩ bɔakɛna nɛ ye mbla akũ, ade bɔakɛna fɔtsa fɔawo ye anɛ a.
Ye mbla a nyɛ kĩ bɔtɛ ye Obi Yesu Kristo budo, lɔkɔa bɔwɛ akũ kalɛ ndɛ ayekĩ Kristo wɛ etomɛna boe sɛkɛ̃ a.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɛna nɛ Baguma mbla akũ a, edeĩ nɛ Baguma kamɛ, ade Baguma lɛmɛ deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ a. Hũhũ a kĩ Baguma kpa boe sũ ni, bunyina kĩ edeĩ nɛ boe kamɛ.

Yĩ bakɔba kĩ maátunɔ kalɛ, mitatɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yalɛ kĩ Baguma Hũhũ deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ mido, mbom misɔ ye midã ntɛ hũhũ a kĩ edeĩ nɛ ye kamɛ a to Baguma sɛkɛ̃. Kitonɛkĩ fɔvã onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ pii nɛ bɛtsɛ̃ bamini nɛ katinya kamɛ.
Ade fukĩĩ míakɔa minyi ntɛ Hũhũ a to Baguma sɛkɛ̃ a. Hũhũ adi nyɛ adi kĩ yalɛ kĩ Yesu Kristo ya nɛ katinya kamɛ ndɛ otidziwa aye ni, eto Baguma sɛkɛ̃.
Lɛmɛ hũhũ adi nyɛ adi kĩ yaádi Yesu akũ adansiɛ ni, ɛtáto Baguma sɛkɛ̃. Ade ekĩĩ nyɛ Kristo okesĩnɛ hũhũ a kĩ minu kĩ yaaya a, ade finyaakĩĩ malo ɛya edeĩ nɛ katinya kamɛ kɔkɔɛ.
Lɛmɛ yĩ babi, Baguma bade mianɛ, ade minya fɔvã onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a akũ, kitonɛkĩ Hũhũ a kĩ edeĩ nɛ mi kamɛ a bɛ̃ hũhũ a kĩ edeĩ nɛ katinya kamɛ bati kamɛ a.
Ayekĩ katinya kamɛ bati banɛ sũ ni, fɔvã onukpɛ̃ banyɛnɛ a alɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ katinya kamɛ fɔtsa odi akũ, ade katinya kamɛ bati a atse be ɔlɛdo a.
Lɛmɛ boe kɔ̃ ni, Baguma bade bɔanɛ. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛnyina Baguma ni, yatse boe ɔlɛdo, lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛnyɛ́ Baguma ode ni, yaátse boe. Foesũ fukĩĩ bɔ́akɔa bɔmɔ́ ɔnɔkɔali Hũhũ mɔ fɔvã hũhũ.
Bakɔba kĩ maátunɔ kalɛ, mifɔ̃ bɔwɛ akũ kalɛ, kitonɛkĩ Baguma sɛkɛ̃ ɔdɔ to. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yawɛ bati kalɛ ni, Baguma obi yanɛ ade enyina Baguma a.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaáwɛ bati kalɛ ni, enyína Baguma kitonɛkĩ Baguma nyɛ ɔdɔ.
Ayekĩ Baguma nyɛ ye ɔdɔ ɛtsa boe nyɛ kĩ edo ye Obi mɔapɛ nɛ katinya kamɛ, fɔtsɛ̃ ye akũ ni, bɔna nkpã kĩ ɛla kawũna a.
Ade fukĩĩ kamɛ bunyi lɛtsa a kĩ liti lɛnyɛ ɔdɔ a. Nnɛ́ ayekĩ bɔwɛ Baguma kalɛ, mbom ayekĩ Baguma wɛ boe kalɛ, edo ye Obi kĩ ɛnya oti kĩ yaatsã ye akũ ɛkɔa boe tɔkpa ete boe.
Yĩ bakɔba kĩ maátunɔ kalɛ, ntɛ aye Baguma wɛ boe kalɛ kɔ̃ ni, kɛfɛta kĩ boe malo bɔawɛ akũ akũ kalɛ.
Odima támɔ tɔ̃ Baguma. Lɛmɛ ntɛ bɔawɛ akũ akũ kalɛ ni, kekɔ̃ Baguma deĩ nɛ boe kamɛ, ade ɛkɛna ye ɔdɔ a ɛkpɔla nɛ boe kamɛ a.
Bɔtɛ budo kĩ budeĩ nɛ Baguma kamɛ, ade ye malo edeĩ nɛ boe kamɛ a, kitonɛkĩ ɛkɔa ye mɔawɛ Hũhũ ɛkpa boe.
Bɔmɔ́ fukĩĩ ade bude lɛtsã nɛ foe akũ bɔkpa bati kĩ Ɔlɛga a do ye Obi kĩ ɛyaanya katinya kamɛ Ɔtɛnɛ.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ebinya ye kamɛ ɛlɛ kĩ Yesu nyɛ Baguma Obi ni, Baguma deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ ade ke ye malo edeĩ nɛ Baguma kamɛ a.
Boe mɔawɛ a bunyina ade bɔtɛ Baguma ɔdɔ a kĩ edeĩ ɛkpa boe a budo a.
Baguma nyɛ ɔdɔ, ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ yawɛ bati kalɛ ni, edeĩ nɛ Baguma kamɛ ade Baguma lɛmɛ deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ a.
Ade fukĩĩ kamɛ ɔdɔ a aakpɔla nɛ boe kamɛ ayekĩ bɔ́ado ɔwɔlɛ nɛ Kadzɛ Luwi a akũ, kitonɛkĩ boe nkpã kadzi kamɛ nɛ katinya kĩĩ kamɛ ketimɔ Kristo ade a.
Libe lɛláa ɔdɔ kamɛ, mbom ɔdɔ a kĩ ɛkpɔla a, ablɔmɛna libe nɛ bati kamɛ. Nɛ foesũ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yavila ni, ye ɔdɔ tákpɔla kitonɛkĩ libe mɔ sɔtɔ kavɛlɛ tsɛ̃.
Bɔawɛ Baguma kalɛ kitonɛkĩ ye lɛnya lɔtɔ ɛwɛ boe kalɛ.
Ntɛ odi lɛ kĩ, “Mawɛ Baguma kalɛ” lɛmɛ yakesĩ ɔwaɛ̃ ni, ɔvãlɛvã yanɛ. Kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yaáwɛ ɔwaɛ̃ a kĩ yamɔ mɔ anɛ kalɛ a, lɛláapuli ɛwɛ Baguma kĩ yaámɔ mɔ anɛ a kalɛ.
Mbla a kĩ Kristo kpa boe nyɛ kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ yawɛ Baguma kalɛ ni, ɛwɛ ɔwaɛ̃ lɛmɛ kalɛ.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ edo kĩ Yesu nyɛ Kristo a ni, Baguma obi yanɛ. Ade odi nyɛ odi kĩ yawɛ obilɛga kalɛ ni, yawɛ ye obi lɛmɛ kalɛ.
Foesũ ntɛ bɔawɛ Baguma kalɛ mɔ bɔakɛna nɛ ye mbla akũ ni, kekɔ̃ bunyina kĩ bɔawɛ Baguma babi lɛmɛ kalɛ.
Ntɛ bɔkɛna nɛ Baguma mbla a akũ ni, fɔatsa kĩ bɔawɛ ye kalɛ. Baguma mbla akũ kakɛna lɛlá ɔsĩ ɛkpa boe,
kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛnyɛ Baguma obi anya katinya kamɛ akũ. Lɛtsa a kĩ bɔkɔa bɔnya katinya akũ nyɛ boe katɛkado.
Owei aapuli ɛnya katinya akũ kɛba oti a kĩ ɛtɛ edo kĩ Yesu nyɛ Baguma Obi a?

Yesu Kristo nyɛ oti kĩ ɛtsã mui mɔ babɔanɛ kamɛ ɛya nɛ katinya kamɛ. Ɛtáya nɛ mui odi kamɛ mbom ɛya nɛ mui mɔ babɔanɛ kamɛ. Ade Baguma Hũhũ a mɔawɛ adi adansiɛ kĩ ɔnɔkɔali fɔanɛ, kitonɛkĩ Hũhũ a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali a.
Adansifɔ ɛlalɛ deĩ.
Ade be nyɛ Hũhũ a, mui a mɔ babɔanɛ a. Be ɛlalɛ a flee alɛ onukpɛ̃ mɔa.
Bɔtɛ otidziwa adansiɛ kadi a budo, lɛmɛ Baguma adansiɛ kadi a deĩ kɔbɛ̃ kɛbɛ̃, kitonɛkĩ ye lidi adansiɛ nɛ ye Obi akũ.

Foesũ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtɛ Baguma Obi a edo ni, adansiɛ kadi kĩĩ deĩ nɛ ye ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ. Lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtátɛ Baguma edo ni, ɛfɔ̃ Baguma dani ɔvãlɛvã, kitonɛkĩ ɛtátɛ adansiɛ a kĩ Baguma di nɛ ye Obi akũ a edo.
Adansiɛ kadi a nyɛ kĩ, Baguma kpa boe nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a, ade nkpã kĩĩ lɛmɛ deĩ nɛ ye Obi kamɛ a.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ edeĩ Baguma Obi a ni, edeĩ nkpã kĩĩ. Ade aye odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛlá Obi a ni, ɛlá nkpã kĩĩ.
Ntsɛlɛ ovoli kĩĩ mama mi a kĩ mitɛ Baguma Obi a mido, ayekĩ míanyi kĩ mideĩ nkpã kĩ ɛla kawũna a.
Budeĩ ɔwɔlɛ kado nɛ Baguma anɛ kitonɛkĩ ntɛ buvia ye lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa nɛ ye kawɛ onukpɛ̃ ni, yatse boe.
Ntɛ bunyina kĩ yatse lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bɔavia ye ni, kekɔ̃ bunyina lɛmɛ kĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ bɔavia ni, bɔatɛ katomɛna ye sɛkɛ̃.

Ntɛ odi mɔ ɔwaɛ̃ kĩ yakɛna tɔkpa kĩ tɛláakpã ye tɛnamɛna wuda kamɛ ni, kɛnɛ kĩ yabɔa mpaɛ ɛkpa Baguma lɔkɔa yaakpa ye nkpã. Bati a kĩ bakɛna tɔkpa a kĩ taávɛlɛ wuda kayamɛna a fɔlɛtsa malɛ. Lɛmɛ tɔkpa tidi deĩ kĩ takpã oti kanamɛna wuda kamɛ, nlámɛna kalɛ kĩ mibɔa mpaɛ mikpa Baguma nɛ te akũ.
Lɛkɛnana kpa lidi nyɛ lidi nyɛ tɔkpa, lɛmɛ tɔkpa tidi deĩ kĩ taánamɛna oti wuda kamɛ.
Bunyina kĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛnyɛ Baguma obi ládzi kakɛna tɔkpa, kitonɛkĩ Baguma Obi a adãmɛna ye akũ, ade Okesĩnɛ a lɛláapuli ɛkɛna ye ablɔ adima a.
Bunyina kĩ Baguma bade bɔanɛ, ade katinya kamɛ flee lɛmɛ deĩ nɛ Okesĩnɛ a kɔbɛ̃ kayɔ.

Bunyina kĩ Baguma Obi a ya, ade ɛkpa boe fɔlɛtsa kayɔkanu ayekĩ bɔ́anyi Baguma a kĩ ɛnyɛ ɔnɔkɔali a. Budzi nkpã nɛ ɔnɔkɔali Baguma a kamɛ, budzi nkpã nɛ Obi Yesu Kristo lɛmɛ kamɛ. Ade ye nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali Baguma mɔ nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a.
Yĩ babi, mivɛlɛ mi akũ nɛ baviɔ̃ ɔwɛ̃.
II John: Ovoli kĩĩ to yĩ, asɔli lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a sɛkɛ̃. Ntsɛlɛ ye mamɛna boe Ɔma a kĩ Baguma pau, mɔ ye babi a kĩ mawɛ kalɛ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ a. Nnɛ́ yĩ odi awɛ mi kalɛ mbom bati a kĩ binyina ɔnɔkɔali a flee lɛmɛ,
kitonɛkĩ ɔnɔkɔali a deĩ nɛ boe kamɛ ade yaana nɛ boe kamɛ daa a.
Baguma boe Ɔlɛga mɔ Yesu Kristo, kĩ ɛnyɛ Ɔlɛga a Obi a bɛmɔ boe kɔnya, bɛkɛna boe sɛmɛ kalɛ, bɛkpa boe lukudɔ lɛmɛ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali mɔ ɔdɔ kamɛ.
Kawɔlɛ de yĩ paa kĩ mmɔ́ nɔ babi badi kĩ bidzi nkpã nɛ ɔnɔkɔali a kamɛ, ndɛ ayekĩ Ɔlɛga a wɛ etomɛna boe sɛkɛ̃ a.
Nɛ foesũ, boe Ɔma, ntsɛlɛ ovoli kĩĩ makpa mi kĩ bɔwɛ akũ akũ kalɛ. Nnɛ́ mbla vɔɛ̃ yanɛ ntsɛlɛ mama mi, mbom mbla a kĩ bɔtɛ kito anɛ kayɔkayi a yanɛ.
Ɔdɔ a kĩ ye akũ fɔlɛtsa malɛ a nyɛ kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ bɔakɛna nɛ Baguma mbla a akũ. Mbla a kĩ ye mi flee minu kito anɛ kayɔkayi a nyɛ kĩ mi flee midzi nɛ ɔdɔ kamɛ.
Bati bakɛnɛ pii gba bɛtsɛ̃ nɛ katinya kamɛ, bati kĩ baálɛ kĩ Yesu Kristo ya nɛ katinya kamɛ ndɛ otidziwa aye. Oti a na odu nyɛ bati ɔkɛnɛ mɔ Kristo okesĩnɛ.
Foesũ midã kadã wĩ kĩ miláayɛla lɛtsa a kĩ mipili mina a, mbom kĩ míana mi kɔtɔkase lodo.
Odi nyɛ odi kĩ ɛtápi Kristo fɔtsa katsa edomɔ akũ mɔ ɛtsa fɔtsa bɛbã ni, Baguma lɛláa ye kamɛ. Lɛmɛ odi nyɛ odi kĩ epi foe edomɔ akũ ni, Ɔlɛga mɔ Obi a flee deĩ nɛ ye kamɛ.
Nɛ foesũ ntɛ odi ya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃ mɔ ɛtákɔa fɔtsa katsa kĩĩ ɛyamɛna ni, mitatɛ ye nɛ mi tɔtɔ kamɛ. Mitatunɔ ye kawɔ̃na titau malo,
kitonɛkĩ odi nyɛ odi kĩ etunɔ ye kawɔ̃na a, na tsɛfã nɛ ye tɔkpa a kĩ ɛkɛna a kamɛ.
Ndeĩ fɔlɛtsa pii kufɛ kĩ maatsɛlɛ mma mi, lɛmɛ ntáwɛ kĩ mate foe nɛ ovoli akũ. Nɛ foe kadokɔ̃ ni, madã anɛ kĩ yĩ mɔawɛ maaya nɛ mi sɛkɛ̃, bɔlɔmɛna anɛ mɔ anɛ, ayekĩ boe flee kawɔlɛkamɔ a aakpɔla.
Awaɛ̃tsole a kĩ Baguma pau a babi awɔ̃na mi.
III John: Ovoli kĩĩ to yĩ, asɔli lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ sɛkɛ̃. Ntsɛlɛ ye mamɛna Gayo kĩ maátunɔ kalɛ, kĩ mawɛ kalɛ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ lɛmɛ.
Yĩ ɔkɔba kĩ maátunɔ nɔ kalɛ, mabɔa mpaɛ kĩ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa lɛlɛ lɛkpa nɔ, kana akũ ɔsĩ lɛmɛ. Matɛ kado kĩ nɔ hũhũ lɛmɛ deĩ kadeĩ wĩ.
Mmɔ́ kawɔlɛ paa kĩ boe bakɔba batɛ badonɛ badi yabi yĩ ayekĩ opini ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a ndɛ ayekĩ opi ke kɔkɔɛ a.
Kĩ nnu kĩ yĩ babi dzi nkpã nɛ ɔnɔkɔali a onukpɛ̃ a, mmɔ́ kawɔlɛ paa.
Yĩ ɔkɔba kĩ maátunɔ nɔ kalɛ, adi ɔnɔkɔali paa nɛ adzuma a kĩ akɛna a kamɛ kakpa nɔ bakɔba batɛ badonɛ, titiliwu banɔvɔɛ̃.
Bɛyabɔa asɔli bati a amaniɛ nɛ ɔdɔ a kĩ odeĩ ɔkpa be a akũ. Make nɔ aduli kĩ bumɔ be ndɛ ayekĩ fɔtɛta nɛ Baguma adzuma kakɛna kamɛ, lɔkɔa bɛnaa lɔtɔ nɛ be osi katsã kamɛ.
Kitonɛkĩ Kristo adzuma sũ bipi osi ade bɛtátɛ kabumɛna kadima bitomɛna amamufɔ a sɛkɛ̃ a.
Foesũ kɛnɛ kĩ bɔabumɛna bati kĩĩ odu ayekĩ bɔ́anyɛ bɔtsa kĩ bɔmɔ́ be flee bɔnyɛ bakɔba nɛ adzuma kakɛna kamɛ bɔkpa ɔnɔkɔali a.
Ntsɛlɛ ovoli lukũ mmɛna asɔli bati a, lɛmɛ Diotrefo kĩ ɛbɔɛ ye akũ ndɛ lɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ aye, tábu yĩ edo nɛ lɛtsama kamɛ.

Foesũ ntɛ ĩya ni, maavɛlɛ mi adzuni nnamɛna lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ ɛkɛna akũ. Maalɛ fɔtsa kpa a kĩ yalɛ nɛ boe akũ mɔ fɔvã a kĩ yama a! Nnɛ́ foe odi. Esĩ kĩ yaátɛ Kristofɔ a kĩ bayaa nɛ awã a, ade yasua bikĩ bawɛ kĩ batɛ be a osi malo a. Yabɔa mbɔdi kĩ yablɔmɛna bati a nɛ asɔli a kamɛ.
Yĩ ɔkɔba kĩ maátunɔ nɔ kalɛ, tatomɔ tɔkpa liti, mbom tomɛna fɔtsa wĩ liti. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɛna tuwĩ ni, Baguma ode yanɛ. Odi nyɛ odi kĩ yakɛna tɔkpa ni, ɛtámɔ Baguma eyi ɔsũ.
Odi nyɛ odi abɔa Demetrio dĩ wĩ. Ye ɔbla alɛ kalɛ wĩ nɛ ye akũ. Boe malo bɔadi adansiɛ nɛ ye akũ, ade minyina kĩ lɛtsa a kĩ bɔalɛ a nyɛ ɔnɔkɔali a.
Ndeĩ fɔlɛtsa pii kĩ mawɛ kĩ mabi nɔ, lɛmɛ nláakɔa fɔtsa katsɛlɛ otse mɔ katsɛlɛ mui ntsɛlɛ foe.
Lɛmɛ matɛ kado kĩ owi lɛláabuna mɔ maamɔ nɔ, lɔkɔa bɔ́alɔmɛna nɛ foe akũ anɛ mɔ anɛ.
Nɔ bakɔba flee nɛ awĩ awɔ̃na nɔ. Wɔ̃na boe bakɔba a ɔmɔa ɔmɔa nɛ awã kakpa boe.
Jude: Ovoli kĩĩ to yĩ, Yuda, Yesu Kristo ɔsumunɛ a kĩ ĩnyɛ Yakobo ɔwaɛ̃ a sɛkɛ̃. Ntsɛlɛ ye mamɛna bati a kĩ Baguma vɛ, kĩ Baguma boe Ɔlɛga awɛ be kalɛ, ade yadãmɛna be akũ kayi Yesu Kristo a.
Baguma kɔnyakamɔ, ye lukudɔ mɔ ye ɔdɔ ɛpɔ nɛ mi akũ ebu.

Yĩ bakɔba kĩ maátunɔ kalɛ, titɔ kĩ mbɔa mbɔdi kĩ matsɛlɛ mi ovoli nɛ ayekĩ Baguma kpa boe flee nkpã a akũ malo ni, finyaa fɔyasĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kĩ ntsɛlɛ mi ovoli mɔatsɛ nkɔa ndo mi kɔbɛ̃ mipuli mipili katɛkado osi a. Ade katɛkado kĩĩ Baguma kɔa ɛkpa ye bati a deedimɔapɛ a.

Kitonɛkĩ bati kĩ baávila Baguma badi bɛla pɛtɛɛ biwo nɛ mi kamɛ nɛ mi katanyi kamɛ. Bɛdani boe ɔlɛdo a kĩ bɔtɛ nɛ ayekĩ Baguma amɔ oti kɔnya akũ a, batsa fɔtsa bɛbã kĩ fɔkpa be osi bɛbɔa ɔbla kpa. Bisĩ boe Lɛgãnɔkɔɛ̃ mɔapɛ kĩ ɛnyɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo. Katsɛlɛ Kpalɛwa a lɛ eyi anɛ titiiti kĩ Baguma aakɔ be kɔtɔ lɔmɔ.
Titɔ kĩ minyina fukĩĩ flee kɔkɔɛ malo ni, mawɛ kĩ makai mi kĩ boe Ɔlate a nyɛ Israelfɔ etomɛna Egiptefɔ tite akũ, lɛmɛ ke liti a, ɛwɔla bikĩ bɛtátɛ ye bido a.

Mite anɛ kĩ Baguma ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ a kĩ bɛtákɛna nɛ otumi a kĩ bɛkpa be a akũ kakɛna wĩ, mbom bɛdzakũ nɛ be mɔawɛ fudzikɔ̃ a, Baguma do be nɛ nkɔsɔnkɔsɔ kamɛ daa nɛ ɔtũ kpli kamɛ, kĩ bɛna nɛ awã kɛnaawo Luwi Kpale a kĩ yaadzɛmɔ be ɛkɔ be kɔtɔ.
Ade ayea Sodom mɔ Gomora mɔ tɛmatɔ a kĩ tifuã te a, bati kɔa be akũ bɛkpa adɔpaa mɔ ɔbla kpa mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ a. Baguma kɔa be edo nɛ fi kĩ fɔádĩ da kamɛ kĩ fɔnya nfantuhũ fɔkpa bati flee.
Ade ayea fɔda bawanɛ kĩĩ akɛna tɔkpa nɛ be mɔawɛ sukɛna akũ malo a. Baábu Baguma otumi a kĩ yanya be akũ a, ade balɛ tuwuli kpa nɛ ode fɔtsa a kĩ obu deĩ nɛ foe akũ a akũ.

Baguma Ode Fɔtɔ Ɔnyanɛnɔkɔɛ̃ Flee Mikael malo tákɛna fukĩĩ odu. Kĩ ye mɔ Abonsam bɛvɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa nɛ be kamɛ oti a kĩ ye aabɔɛ Mose ɔnɔkpa akũ malo ni, ɛtádo ɔwɔlɛ ɛlɛ tuwuli kpa ɛkɔ Abonsam kɔtɔ, mbom ɛlɛ kĩ, “Ɔlate a ɛkã nɔ anɛ.”

Lɛmɛ bati kĩĩ alɛ fuvũnatsa nɛ lɛtsa nyɛ lɛtsa kĩ bɛtánu de kayɔ a akũ, ade fɔtsa a kĩ binyina bitomɛna be kabɔa kamɛ ndɛ ayekĩ tuwĩ kamɛ bayaɛ kĩ bɛlá adzuni a malo nyina a, ade foe mɔapɛ a awɔla be a.
Bɔbɔɛ makpa be! Bɛtsã osi a kĩ Kain tsã a. Nɛ sika a kĩ baana sũ ni, bɛkɔa be akũ bido nɛ tɔkpa a kĩ Balam kɛna a kamɛ. Biyidza bɛdza nɛ Baguma mbla a akũ ndɛ Kora aye, ade ke bɛwɔla be ndɛ ye aye a.

Ntɛ mikpɔta mianya boe Ɔlate ɔdɔ funitsã a, bati kĩĩ nyɛ efĩĩ nɛ mi kamɛ, awã kĩ baányɔã kanya mɔ kamɔa kpafũũ nɛ Baguma anɛ. Be odi akũ badãmɛna. Bɛla ndɛ luflututu kĩ oni lɛláa de kamɛ, kĩ ɔwɛ abɔa de katɛ̃mɛna. Bɛla ndɛ futse kĩ fɔáwũ babi nɛ kawũ lɔkɔ, ndɛ futse kĩ bɛbɔlɛ mɔ tunu fuku, fuku fubuli.
Bɛla ndɛ mpo mui kĩ ɔwɛ mɔ ɔsĩ abɔa be bafũ kanyɛ be fɔnyɔãtsa katsa ndɛ mui anɛ kuvũ aye. Bɛla ndɛ fusibii kĩ fɔato katɛ̃, bati kĩ Baguma manɛ kadzikɔ̃ ɛkpa be nɛ ɔtũ kpli kamɛ, awã kĩ baana daa.
Ade bati kĩĩ akũ Henok kĩ ɛnyɛ Adam kasinu kavũkɔnɔde a oti lɛ eyi kɔkɔɔkɔɛ kĩ, “Ɔlate a mɔ ye ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ kpalɛwa mpim mpim aya,
ɛyaadzɛmɔ katinya kamɛ bati flee. Yaakɔ bati a kĩ baávila Baguma a kɔtɔ nɛ fɔtsa kpa a kĩ bɛkɛna, mɔ tuwuli kpa a kĩ bɛlɛ nɛ ye akũ a sũ.”
Bati kĩĩ akɛna hũhũhũhũ daa, kanyɛ nfumusu kakpa bati bɛbã. Batomɛna be mɔawɛ fɔwɛtsa kpa liti, bapia akũ, ade bakɛ bati mɔ sɛmɛ mɛnɛmɛnɛ ayekĩ baana lɛtsa a kĩ de bawɛ a.
Lɛmɛ mi yĩ bakɔba, mite anɛ nɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo fɔtɔ banyanɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛlɛ biyi nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ lɛyatɛ̃ kamɛ a akũ.
Bibi mi kĩ, “Nɛ fuwi nkaɛ a kamɛ ni, bati aanɛ, bidi mi nsekuo, bitomɛna be sukɛna fɔwɛtsa kĩ fɔakɔ odo liti nɛ Baguma katavila kamɛ.”
Ade be nyɛ bati kĩ basɛ̃ bati kamɛ a, bati kĩ katinya kamɛ fɔwɛtsa nya be akũ, mɔ bati kĩ Hũhũ a lɛláa be kamɛ.
Lɛmɛ mi yĩ bakɔba, mi kɔ̃ ni, mikaabo anɛ nɛ mi katɛkado kĩ kɛnyɛ mi fɔtsa kpalɛwa a kamɛ, lɔkɔa mibɔa mpaɛ nɛ Hũhũ Kpalɛwa a kɔbɛ̃ kamɛ.
Mikɔla mi akũ nɛ Baguma ɔdɔ kamɛ, nɛ lɔkɔ a kĩ miadzɔlɛ boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo kɔnyakamɔ a kĩ kɔayakpa mi nkpã kĩ ɛlá kawũna a.
Mimɔ́ be kamɛ bikĩ bɛtásipi nɛ katɛkado kamɛ a kɔnya.
Bati bɛbã a kĩ banaa fi kamɛ a ni, miwãnɛ be minyɛ, mitɛ be nkpã. Mimɔ́ bati bɛbã kɔnya lɛmɛ mivila be, lɔkɔa mikesĩ be fɔkɛlatsa ndɛ ayekĩ míawɛ̃ sukɛna tɛtadiɛ kpitii a.
Baguma a kĩ yaapuli epi mi ayekĩ miláatɔ, ɛkpã mi nɛ kawɔlɛ kamɛ minaawo ye kukũkpalɛ a anɛ, kĩ nfumusu adima lɛláa mi akũ.
Baguma odi keĩ kĩ ɛtsã boe Ɔlate Yesu Kristo akũ ɛkɛna ye boe Ɔtɛnɛ a, ade ye mɔ obu, kamu, kɔbɛ̃ mɔ otumi nyɛ ye fude a, kito anɛ kɔkɔɛ, mɔ finyaa kanaa daa. Fɔya lɔmɔ.
Revelation of John: Ovoli kĩĩ kamɛ fɔlɛtsa nyɛ Yesu Kristo kanyɛ katsa a kĩ Baguma kpa ye, kĩ ɛnyɛ ɛtsa ye basumunɛ nɛ fɔtsa a kĩ kɛnɛ kĩ fɔya nɛ lɔkɔ lukũ kamɛ a akũ. Kristo tsã ye ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ akũ ɛfɔ̃ ye ɔsumunɛ Yohanes nyi fɔtsa kĩĩ flee.
Yohanes lɛmɛ lɛ fɔlɛtsa a kĩ ɛmɔ a flee. Edi adansiɛ nɛ Baguma kalɛ a mɔ ɔnɔkɔali kalɛ a kĩ Yesu Kristo nyɛ ɛtsa ye a akũ.
Baguma ahila oti a kĩ yakã ovoli kĩĩ, mɔ bati a kĩ batse fɔlɛtsa a kĩ bɛlɛ biyi, kĩ bɛkɛna nɛ foe akũ lɛmɛ a, kitonɛkĩ lɔkɔ a wo ɔtɔ kĩ fɔtsa kĩĩ flee fɔya nɛ foe kamɛ.
Yĩ, Yohanes, lamɛna fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ katsɛlɛ kamɛna mi tɛsɔli evũkɔnɔ a kĩ tideĩ nɛ Asia amantam kamɛ a.
Baguma kĩ edzi nkpã, kĩ ɛna kɔkɔɛ, kĩ yaaya a, ɛmɔ mi kɔnya, ɛkpa mi lukudɔ. Ade ayea hũhũ evũkɔnɔ a kĩ ɛdzɛ̃ nɛ ye lɛgãkpo anɛ a,
mɔ Yesu Kristo ɔnɔkɔali ɔdansini, kĩ ɛnyɛ bati a kĩ Baguma dzɛla etomɛna kanɔkpa kamɛ ɔtɔnyade, kĩ yanya tite akũ fɔgã flee akũ a, bɛmɔ mi kɔnya bɛkpa mi lukudɔ lɛmɛ.
Yawɛ boe kalɛ ade ɛtsã ye wuda kamɛ ɛnyɛ boe etomɛna tɔkpa kamɛ.
Oti a kĩ eyi lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ ɛkpa boe kĩ bɔnya basɔfɔ busum ye Baguma mɔ Ɔlɛga a, ade ye mɔ mikɔa kukũkpalɛ mɔ kɔbɛ̃ mikpa daa daa! Fɔya lɔmɔ.
Midã, ɛtsɛ̃ nɛ luflututu akũ yaya!
Odi nyɛ odi aamɔ ye,
ade bati a kĩ bɛtsɔɛ ye lɔtsɔɛ nɛ sɛklabi a lɛmɛ aamɔ ye.
Tite akũ bati flee aawula babe yoo nɛ ye akũ!
Ade aye kɛnɛ kĩ fɔna a!
Fɔya lɔmɔ.
Boe Ɔlate, Baguma Kpale, kĩ edzi nkpã, kĩ ɛna kɔkɔɛ, kĩ yaaya a, lɛ kĩ, “Yĩ nyɛ Ɔtɔnyade mɔ Owũnade.”

Yĩ, Yohanes, mi ɔwaɛ̃ kĩ bɔmɔ́ mi bɔtsã butomɛna Yesu a, ĩnyɛ mi ɔkɔba kĩ bɔdɔla boe akũ, bɔmɔ́ lubo a kĩ laya kakpa bikĩ bɛnyɛ ye ode lɛgãkanyakɔ̃ bade a. Bɛkɔa yĩ bɛnadzina nɛ tite nɛ mui kayite a kĩ bavɛ Patmos a akũ, kitonɛkĩ nde lɛtsã nɛ Baguma kalɛ a, mɔ ɔnɔkɔali a kĩ Yesu nyɛ ɛtsa a akũ sũ.
Nɛ boe Ɔlate Luwi a akũ ni, Hũhũ a tɛ yĩ kamɛ, ade nnu odo kɔɔba kĩ ɛnɛ́ ndɛ kagbulɛɛ aye, ade ɛkalɛ kɔdzɛla nɛ yĩ liti a.

Odo a lɛ kĩ, “Tsɛlɛ lɛtsa a kĩ ɔmɔ́ a kayi, lɔkɔa kakɔa ovoli a kamɛna tɛsɔli a kĩ tideĩ nɛ tɛmatɔ tɛkpale tɛkpale evũkɔnɔ kĩĩ kamɛ. Ade te nyɛ Efeso, Smirna, Pergamo, Tiatira, Sardis, Filadelfia mɔ Laodikea a.”
Ndani anɛ kĩ madã oti a kĩ ɛlamɛna yĩ kalɛ kabi a, ade mmɔ́ sika ngbã ɔsɛdza titse evũkɔnɔ a.
Litsedi kĩ lɛla ndɛ Otidziwa Obi aye kĩ edo atadiɛ wulaa kĩ ɛka eko nɛ ye fɔnɛta, ade ɛkɔa sika ngbã abɔsɔ ɛbɔa nɛ ɔwɔlɛ a.
Ye lɔlɔ tɔlɔ voe fitaa ndɛ kuveli tɛtsã ĩye ndɛ lɛdãglɛglɛ aye, ade ye banebi ata ndɛ fi luwotu aye a.
Ye fɔnɛta ata ndɛ kɔɔble kĩ bɛvɔlɛ nɛ fi kamɛ, ade ye odo anɛ ndɛ ɔwɔ mui kĩ baka kato ɔtɔ akũ kako waa nɛ lutubu kamɛ a.
Ɛnɛɛ fusibii evũkɔnɔ nɛ ye sɔmɔna awɛ, ade atugbe mɔ ɔbɔ̃ lɛmɛ nɛ eto ye onukpɛ̃ kamɛ a, ade anɛ kamɛ amɔanɛ ndɛ suwa ketee aye a.
Kĩ mmɔ́ ye a, nnɛ́ ntɔ nɛ ye abɔa kamɛ ndɛ oti kĩ eku, ade ɛkɔa ye sɔmɔna awɛ ete nɛ yĩ akũ ɛlɛ kĩ, “Tavila! Yĩ nyɛ Ɔtɔnyade mɔ Owũnade,
mɔ oti a kĩ edzi nkpã! Nku tɔ̃ lɛmɛ finyaa ndzi nkpã daa. Wuda mɔ kanɔkpade tɛsafi deĩ nɛ yĩ awɛ.
Foesũ tsɛlɛ fɔtsa a kĩ ɔmɔ́, fukĩ fudeĩ finyaa mɔ fukĩ fɔ́aya nɛ foe kamɛ ke liti a kayi.

Kalɛ kɔlawa kĩ kideĩ nɛ fusibii evũkɔnɔ a kĩ ɔmɔ́ nɛ yĩ sɔmɔna awɛ, mɔ sika ngbã ɔsɛdza titse evũkɔnɔ a kayɔ nyɛ. Fusibii evũkɔnɔ a nyɛ tɛsɔli evũkɔnɔ a ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ, ade ɔsɛdza titse evũkɔnɔ a lɛmɛ nyɛ́ tɛsɔli evũkɔnɔ a.”
“Tsɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kama Efeso asɔli a ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a.
Ade oti a kĩ epini fusibii evũkɔnɔ nɛ ye sɔmɔna, kĩ ɛtsɛ̃ nɛ sika ngbã ɔsɛdza titse evũkɔnɔ kayite a ɔlɛdo nɛ awĩ a.

Ĩnyina nɔ adzuma flee mɔ ayekĩ ɔbɔa mbɔdi odo ɔwɔlɛ ɔmɔ́ lubo. Ĩnyina kĩ aáwɛ bati kpa fɔlɛtsa kalɛ. Ɔsɔ bati a kĩ bavɛ be akũ kĩ fɔtɔ banyanɛ lɛmɛ bɛnyɛ́ fɔtɔ banyanɛ a ɔdã, ade ɔmɔ́ oyi ɔsũ kĩ bavãlɛvã banɛ a.
Ĩnyina ayekĩ ɔna ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ ɔmɔ́ lubo nɛ yĩ sũ, lɛmɛ akpɔ táveli nɔ.
Lɛmɛ ndeĩ kalɛ kadi nɛ nɔ akũ. Ade ke nyɛ kĩ aáwɛ yĩ kalɛ finyaa ndɛ ayekĩ ɔnya lɔtɔ ɔwɛ yĩ kalɛ a.

Nɛ foesũ ni, te anɛ nɛ nɔ kadzakɔ̃ a kĩ ɔdza oto ɔtɔ a akũ! Dani ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ lɔkɔa kakɛna lɛtsa a kĩ ɔnya lɔtɔ ɔkɛna a. Ntɛ ɔtádani ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ kɔ̃ ni, maaya nɛ nɔ sɛkɛ̃ ĩyaabɔɛ nɔ ɔsɛdza otse a nɛ ye kadzakɔ̃.
Lɛmɛ lɛtsa a kĩ odeĩ kĩ lawo yĩ anɛ nyɛ kĩ akesĩ Nikolatiafɔ fɔkɛlatsa ndɛ ayekĩ yĩ malo kakesĩ foe a.
Oti a kĩ edeĩ atɔ ni, etse lɛtsa a kĩ Hũhũ a lamɛna tɛsɔli a kabi,
Oti a kĩ ɛnya akũ ni, maakpa ye nkpã kutse a kĩ kɔdzɛ̃ nɛ Baguma kɔbã a kĩ bavɛ Paradiso a kamɛ babi badi ɛnya.”
“Tsɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kama Smirna Asɔli ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a.
Ade ɔlɛdo kĩ eto oti a kĩ ɛnyɛ Ɔtɔnyade mɔ Owũnade, oti a kĩ eku lɛmɛ ebuki edzi nkpã a sɛkɛ̃ nɛ awĩ a.
Ĩnyina nɔ ɔhau flee. Ĩnyina kĩ ohiãni anɛ lɛmɛ nɛ ɔnɔkɔali kamɛ ni, osikani anɛ! Ĩnyina tuwuli kpa a kĩ bikĩ bavɛ be akũ Yudafɔ lɛmɛ bɛnyɛ́ Yudafɔ a, alɛ nɛ nɔ akũ. Bɛnyɛ Abonsam katsu a kamɛ bati.

Tavila lubo lidi nyɛ lidi kĩ laaya nɛ nɔ akũ a kamɔ. Dã! Abonsam aafɔ̃ bipili mi kamɛ badi bido nɛ kɔla ɛsɔ mi ɛdã, ade míamɔ lubo fuwi ewua a. Di ɔnɔkɔali kakpa yĩ ntɛ fɔ́anya wuda malo, lɔkɔa maakpã nɔ nkpã ndɛ akũ kanya lɛgãbɔɛ aye.
Oti a kĩ edeĩ atɔ ni, etse lɛtsa a kĩ Hũhũ a lamɛna tɛsɔli bati a kabi!
Bati a kĩ baanya akũ ni, wuda ayade a lɛláatamɔ be.”
“Tsɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kama Pergamo Asɔli a ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a kĩ,
Ade oti a kĩ ɛnɛɛ atugbe mɔ ɔbɔ̃ a fɔlɛtsa nɛ awĩ a.

Ĩnyina nɔ kadzikɔ̃ nɛ awã kĩ Abonsam lɛgãkpo a deĩ a. Opini yĩ dĩ mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ. Lɔkɔ a kĩ bɛkɔ Antipa, yĩ ɔdansini mɔ ɔnɔkɔalini nɛ mi kamɛ nɛ awã kĩ Abonsam dzi malo ni, ɔtámuniki nɛ yĩ liti, mbom ɔtɛ yĩ odo.

Lɛmɛ ndeĩ nɔ akũ fɔlɛtsa sukuloo. Bati badi deĩ nɛ mi kamɛ kĩ bitomɔ Balam fɔtsa katsa. Ade Balam kĩĩ lɛtsa Balak tisi ɛkpã Israelfɔ edo nɛ tɔkpa kamɛ, ade ɛfɔ̃ bɛnya funitsã kĩ bɛtɔ bɛkpa baviɔ̃, ade bɛbɔa adɔpaa a.
Ade ayea odeĩ bati badi nɛ mi kamɛ kĩ bitomɔ Nikolatiafɔ fɔtsa katsa liti a.
Finyaa, dani ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ! Ntɛ nnɛ́ aye ni, maaya nɛ nɔ akũ mɔatsɛ nkɔa lɛpamɛ a kĩ lideĩ nɛ yĩ onukpɛ̃ kamɛ a nnɔ mɔ bati a.

Oti kĩ edeĩ atɔ ni, etse lɛtsa a kĩ Hũhũ a lamɛna tɛsɔli bati a kabi. Oti a kĩ ɛnya akũ ni, maakpa ye mana a kĩ bɛkɔa bɛkɔla a adi ɛnya. Bio maakpa ye de fitaa kĩ bɛtsɛlɛ dĩ vɔɛ̃ bite nɛ de akũ. Odima linyína dĩ a, mbɔɛntɛ owula a kĩ ɛtɛ de a odi.”
“Tsɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kamɛna Tiatira Asɔli a ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ kĩ,
Ade fɔlɛtsa a kĩ futo Baguma Obi, kĩ ye anɛ atɛ̃ ndɛ fi luwotu aye, ade ye abɔa lɛmɛ amɔanɛ ndɛ kɔɔble kĩ bɛvɔlɛ tsɔlitsɔli a nɛ awĩ a.
Ĩnyina nɔ adzuma a kĩ ɔkɛna. Ĩnyina nɔ ɔdɔ, nɔ katɛkado, nɔ ɔsum, mɔ ayekĩ odeĩ ɔwɔlɛ bɔɛɛ. Ĩnyina kĩ ɔlamɛna adzuma kakɛna finyaa kaba ayekĩ ɔkɛna nɛ kayɔkayi a.
Lɛmɛ kalɛ a kĩ ndeĩ nɛ nɔ akũ a nyɛ kĩ ɔkpa otsole Isabel a kĩ yavɛ ye akũ Baguma onukpɛ̃ ɔnyɛnɛ osi, kĩ yatsa yĩ basumunɛ fɔtsa, ade yakɛ be kĩ bɛbɔa adɔpaa, bɛnya funitsã kĩ bɛtɔ bɛkpa baviɔ̃ a.
Nkpa ye lɔkɔ kĩ ɛdani ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ, lɛmɛ yaáwɛ kĩ yafɔ̃ adɔpaa kabɔa.
Foesũ maafɔ̃ ɛkahɔ nɛ ɔkɛna akũ, awã kĩ bɛmɔ bikĩ babɔa adɔpaa a, ntɛ bɛtádani tɔwɔlɛ kamɛ finyaa ni, baamɔ lubo mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ.
Maakɔ bikĩ bitomɔ ye a flee lɔkɔa asafu a flee linyi kĩ yĩ nyɛ oti a kĩ enyina oti ɔwɔlɛ mɔ ye lɔlɔ kamɛ yededeede. Maase mi kamɛ odi nyɛ odi kɔtɔ nɛ ye adzuma a kĩ ɛkɛna a onukpɛ̃.
Lɛmɛ mi Tiatira bati nkaɛ a kĩ mitátɛ Isabel fɔtsa katsa a, mɔ mi a kĩ mitákɔlɛ fɔtsa a kĩ bavɛ Abonsam kadikanyi dzununuunu a kɔ̃ ni, minu kĩ nláalɔla mi fɔlɔtsa bɛbã.
Lɛmɛ mipi lɛtsa a kĩ mideĩ a mɔ ɔsĩ mɔ ɔsĩ kɛnaawo kĩ maaya.

Oti a kĩ epi yĩ adzuma a kĩ mawɛ edomɔ akũ kɛnawo kawũna, mɔ ɛnya akũ ni, maakpa ye otumi a kĩ ntɛ ntomɛna Nda sɛkɛ̃ a. Maakpa ye otumi nɛ fude fude akũ, ɛkɔa sɔbɔtsaɛ otse ɛkpã be, lɔkɔa ebubuli be ndɛ ayekĩ babubuli lubui a.

Oti a kĩ epi yĩ adzuma a kĩ mawɛ edomɔ akũ kɛnawo kawũna, mɔ ɛnya akũ ni, maakpa ye otumi a kĩ ntɛ ntomɛna Nda sɛkɛ̃ a. Maakpa ye otumi nɛ fude fude akũ, ɛkɔa sɔbɔtsaɛ otse ɛkpã be, lɔkɔa ebubuli be ndɛ ayekĩ babubuli lubui a.
Ade maakpa ye odenyinawi lisibii a.
Oti a kĩ edeĩ atɔ ni, etse fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Baguma Hũhũ a lamɛna tɛsɔli bati a kabi.”
“Tsɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kamɛna Sardis Asɔli a ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a kĩ,
Oti a kĩ ɛnɛɛ Baguma Hũhũ evũkɔnɔ mɔ fusibii evũkɔnɔ a fɔlɛtsa nyɛ fukĩĩ,
Ĩnyina nɔ adzuma a kĩ ɔkɛna a. Ĩnyina kĩ ɔtɛ dĩ kĩ odzi nkpã, lɛmɛ oku.
Nɛ foesũ nyinya, kado lɛtsa a kĩ lite nɛ nɔ kamɛ a kĩ laaku a kɔbɛ̃. Kitonɛkĩ mmɔ́ kĩ lɛtsa a kĩ ɔkɛna a tákpɔla tɔ̃ nɛ yĩ Baguma anɛ.

Foesũ te anɛ nɛ lɛtsa a kĩ bɛtsa nɔ, mɔ lɛtsa a kĩ onu a akũ, kakɛna nɛ foe akũ, kadani ɔwɔlɛ kamɛ. Ntɛ ɔtányinya ni, maayawo nɛ nɔ akũ ndɛ oyekpanɛ aye, ade ɔláanyi lɔkɔ a kĩ maawo nɛ nɔ akũ a malo a.
Lɛmɛ mi kamɛ badi sukuloo deĩ nɛ Sardis kĩ bɛtádo be tɛtadiɛ tuduli. Baado tɛtadiɛ ovoe bɔmɔ be bɔtsã, kitonɛkĩ bɛkpɔla bɛkpa foe.
Owula a kĩ ɛnya akũ ni, yaado ye tɛtadiɛ ovoe lɔmɔ, ade nláawɔla ye dĩ ĩnyɛ nɛ nkpã badzinɛ ovoli a kamɛ. Maanyɛ ye ntsa nɛ kanade nɛ Nda mɔ ye ode fɔtɔ banyanɛ anɛ kĩ yĩ ode yanɛ.
Oti a kĩ edeĩ atɔ ni, etse fɔlɛtsa a kĩ Hũhũ a lamɛna tɛsɔli bati a kabi.”
“Tsɛlɛ fɔlɛtsa kĩĩ kama Filadelfia Asɔli a ode fɔtɔ ɔnyanɛ a.
